blank: laysal-birr ʾ tuwallū wujūhakum qibalal-mashriq w-l-maghrib w-lākinnal-birr m ʾāman b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-l-malāʾikat w-l-kitāb w-n-nabiyyīn w-ʾātāl-māl ʿalā ḥubbihī dhawīl-qurbā w-l-yatāmā w-l-masākīn w-bn s-sabīl w-s-sāʾilīn w-fī r-riqāb w-ʾaqām ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātā z-zakāt w-l-mūfūn b-ʿahdihim ʾidhā ʿāhadū w-ṣ-ṣābirīn fīl-baʾsāʾ w-ḍ-ḍarrāʾ w-ḥīnal-baʾs ʾulāʾikalladhīn ṣadaqū w-ʾulāʾik humul-muttaqūn
english_saheeh_international: Righteousness is not that you turn your faces toward the east or the west, but true righteousness is in one who believes in Allah, the Last Day, the angels, the Book, and the prophets and gives wealth, in spite of love for it, to relatives, orphans, the needy, the traveler, those who ask for help, and for freeing slaves; and who establishes prayer and gives zakah; those who fulfill their promise when they promise; and those who are patient in poverty and hardship and during battle. Those are the ones who have been true, and it is those who are the righteous

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا كُتِبَ عَلَيكُمُ القِصاصُ فِي القَتلَى ۖ الحُرُّ بِالحُرِّ وَالعَبدُ بِالعَبدِ وَالأُنثىٰ بِالأُنثىٰ ۚ فَمَن عُفِيَ لَهُ مِن أَخيهِ شَيءٌ فَاتِّباعٌ بِالمَعروفِ وَأَداءٌ إِلَيهِ بِإِحسانٍ ۗ ذٰلِكَ تَخفيفٌ مِن رَبِّكُم وَرَحمَةٌ ۗ فَمَنِ اعتَدىٰ بَعدَ ذٰلِكَ فَلَهُ عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū kutib ʿalaykumul-qiṣāṣ fīl-qatlāl-ḥurr b-l-ḥurr w-l-ʿabd b-l-ʿabd w-l-ʾunthā b-l-ʾunthā f-m ʿufiy lahū m ʾakhīh shayʾ f-ttibāʿ b-l-maʿrūf w-ʾadāʾ ʾilayh b-ʾiḥsān dhālik takhfīf m rabbikum w-raḥmat f-man ʿtadā baʿd dhālik f-lahū ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, prescribed for you is legal retribution for those murdered - the free for the free, the slave for the slave, and the female for the female. But whoever overlooks from his brother anything, then there should be a suitable follow-up and payment to him with good conduct. This is an alleviation from your Lord and a mercy. But whoever transgresses after that will have a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَلَكُم فِي القِصاصِ حَياةٌ يا أُولِي الأَلبابِ لَعَلَّكُم تَتَّقونَ
blank: w-lakum fīl-qiṣāṣ ḥayāt yā-ʾulīl-ʾalbāb laʿallakum tattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And there is for you in legal retribution saving of life, O you people of understanding, that you may become righteous

arabic_uthmani: كُتِبَ عَلَيكُم إِذا حَضَرَ أَحَدَكُمُ المَوتُ إِن تَرَكَ خَيرًا الوَصِيَّةُ لِلوالِدَينِ وَالأَقرَبينَ بِالمَعروفِ ۖ حَقًّا عَلَى المُتَّقينَ
blank: kutib ʿalaykum ʾidhā ḥaḍar ʾaḥadakumul-mawt ʾ tarak khayr-il-waṣiyyat l-l-wālidayn w-l-ʾaqrabīn b-l-maʿrūf ḥaqq ʿalāl-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Prescribed for you when death approaches any one of you if he leaves wealth is that he should make a bequest for the parents and near relatives according to what is acceptable - a duty upon the righteous

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن بَدَّلَهُ بَعدَما سَمِعَهُ فَإِنَّما إِثمُهُ عَلَى الَّذينَ يُبَدِّلونَهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: f-m baddalahū baʿd mā samiʿahū f-ʾinnamā ʾithmuhū ʿalālladhīn yubaddilūnahū ʾinn llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Then whoever alters the bequest after he has heard it - the sin is only upon those who have altered it. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن خافَ مِن موصٍ جَنَفًا أَو إِثمًا فَأَصلَحَ بَينَهُم فَلا إِثمَ عَلَيهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: f-m khāf m mūṣ janaf ʾaw ʾithm f-ʾaṣlaḥ baynahum f-lā ʾithm ʿalayh ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: But if one fears from the bequeather some error or sin and corrects that which is between them, there is no sin upon him. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا كُتِبَ عَلَيكُمُ الصِّيامُ كَما كُتِبَ عَلَى الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِكُم لَعَلَّكُم تَتَّقونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū kutib ʿalaykum ṣ-ṣiyām k-mā kutib ʿalālladhīn m qablikum laʿallakum tattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, decreed upon you is fasting as it was decreed upon those before you that you may become righteous

arabic_uthmani: أَيّامًا مَعدوداتٍ ۚ فَمَن كانَ مِنكُم مَريضًا أَو عَلىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِن أَيّامٍ أُخَرَ ۚ وَعَلَى الَّذينَ يُطيقونَهُ فِديَةٌ طَعامُ مِسكينٍ ۖ فَمَن تَطَوَّعَ خَيرًا فَهُوَ خَيرٌ لَهُ ۚ وَأَن تَصوموا خَيرٌ لَكُم ۖ إِن كُنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: ʾayyāmam-maʿdūdāt f-m kān minkum marīḍ ʾaw ʿalā safar f-ʿiddat m ʾayyām ʾukhar w-ʿalālladhīn yuṭīqūnahū fidyat ṭaʿām miskīn f-m taṭawwaʿ khayr f-huw khayr lahū w-ʾ taṣūmū khayr lakum ʾ kuntum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Fasting for a limited number of days. So whoever among you is ill or on a journey during them - then an equal number of days are to be made up. And upon those who are able to fast, but with hardship - a ransom as substitute of feeding a poor person each day. And whoever volunteers excess - it is better for him. But to fast is best for you, if you only knew

arabic_uthmani: شَهرُ رَمَضانَ الَّذي أُنزِلَ فيهِ القُرآنُ هُدًى لِلنّاسِ وَبَيِّناتٍ مِنَ الهُدىٰ وَالفُرقانِ ۚ فَمَن شَهِدَ مِنكُمُ الشَّهرَ فَليَصُمهُ ۖ وَمَن كانَ مَريضًا أَو عَلىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِن أَيّامٍ أُخَرَ ۗ يُريدُ اللَّهُ بِكُمُ اليُسرَ وَلا يُريدُ بِكُمُ العُسرَ وَلِتُكمِلُوا العِدَّةَ وَلِتُكَبِّرُوا اللَّهَ عَلىٰ ما هَداكُم وَلَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: shahr ramaḍānalladhī ʾunzil fīhil-qurʾān hud l-n-nās w-bayyināt minal-hudā w-l-furqān f-m shahid minkum sh-shahr f-l-yaṣumh w-m kān marīḍ ʾaw-ʿalā safar f-ʿiddat m ʾayyām ʾukhar yurīd llāh bikumul-yusr w-lā yurīd bikumul-ʿusr w-l-tukmilūl-ʿiddat w-l-tukabbirū llāh ʿalā mā hadākum w-laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: The month of Ramadhan is that in which was revealed the Qur'an, a guidance for the people and clear proofs of guidance and criterion. So whoever sights the new moon of the month, let him fast it; and whoever is ill or on a journey - then an equal number of other days. Allah intends for you ease and does not intend for you hardship and wants for you to complete the period and to glorify Allah for that to which He has guided you; and perhaps you will be grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا سَأَلَكَ عِبادي عَنّي فَإِنّي قَريبٌ ۖ أُجيبُ دَعوَةَ الدّاعِ إِذا دَعانِ ۖ فَليَستَجيبوا لي وَليُؤمِنوا بي لَعَلَّهُم يَرشُدونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā saʾalak ʿibādī ʿannī f-ʾinnī qarīb ʾujīb daʿwat d-dāʿ ʾidhā daʿān f-l-yastajībū lī w-l-yuʾminū bī laʿallahum yarshudūn
english_saheeh_international: And when My servants ask you, O Muhammad, concerning Me - indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me. So let them respond to Me by obedience and believe in Me that they may be rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: أُحِلَّ لَكُم لَيلَةَ الصِّيامِ الرَّفَثُ إِلىٰ نِسائِكُم ۚ هُنَّ لِباسٌ لَكُم وَأَنتُم لِباسٌ لَهُنَّ ۗ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُم كُنتُم تَختانونَ أَنفُسَكُم فَتابَ عَلَيكُم وَعَفا عَنكُم ۖ فَالآنَ باشِروهُنَّ وَابتَغوا ما كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَكُم ۚ وَكُلوا وَاشرَبوا حَتّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمُ الخَيطُ الأَبيَضُ مِنَ الخَيطِ الأَسوَدِ مِنَ الفَجرِ ۖ ثُمَّ أَتِمُّوا الصِّيامَ إِلَى اللَّيلِ ۚ وَلا تُباشِروهُنَّ وَأَنتُم عاكِفونَ فِي المَساجِدِ ۗ تِلكَ حُدودُ اللَّهِ فَلا تَقرَبوها ۗ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ آياتِهِ لِلنّاسِ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَّقونَ
blank: ʾuḥill lakum laylat ṣ-ṣiyām r-rafath ʾilā nisāʾikum hunn libās lakum w-ʾantum libās lahunn ʿalim llāh ʾannakum kuntum takhtānūn ʾanfusakum f-tāb ʿalaykum w-ʿafā ʿankum f-l-ʾān bāshirūhunn w-btaghū mā katab llāh lakum w-kulū w-shrabū ḥattā yatabayyan lakumul-khayṭul-ʾabyaḍ minal-khayṭil-ʾaswad minal-fajr thumm ʾatimmū ṣ-ṣiyām ʾilāl-layl w-lā tubāshirūhunn w-ʾantum ʿākifūn fīl-masājid tilk ḥudūd llāh f-lā taqrabūhā k-dhālik yubayyin llāh ʾāyātihī l-n-nās laʿallahum yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: It has been made permissible for you the night preceding fasting to go to your wives for sexual relations. They are clothing for you and you are clothing for them. Allah knows that you used to deceive yourselves, so He accepted your repentance and forgave you. So now, have relations with them and seek that which Allah has decreed for you. And eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct to you from the black thread of night. Then complete the fast until the sunset. And do not have relations with them as long as you are staying for worship in the mosques. These are the limits set by Allah, so do not approach them. Thus does Allah make clear His ordinances to the people that they may become righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَأكُلوا أَموالَكُم بَينَكُم بِالباطِلِ وَتُدلوا بِها إِلَى الحُكّامِ لِتَأكُلوا فَريقًا مِن أَموالِ النّاسِ بِالإِثمِ وَأَنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-lā taʾkulū ʾamwālakum baynakum b-l-bāṭil w-tudlū bihā ʾilāl-ḥukkām l-taʾkulū farīqam-m ʾamwāl n-nās b-l-ʾithm w-ʾantum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not consume one another's wealth unjustly or send it in bribery to the rulers in order that they might aid you to consume a portion of the wealth of the people in sin, while you know it is unlawful

arabic_uthmani: ۞ يَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ الأَهِلَّةِ ۖ قُل هِيَ مَواقيتُ لِلنّاسِ وَالحَجِّ ۗ وَلَيسَ البِرُّ بِأَن تَأتُوا البُيوتَ مِن ظُهورِها وَلٰكِنَّ البِرَّ مَنِ اتَّقىٰ ۗ وَأتُوا البُيوتَ مِن أَبوابِها ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُم تُفلِحونَ
blank: yasʾalūnak ʿanil-ʾahillat qul hiy mawāqīt l-n-nās w-l-ḥajj w-laysal-birr b-ʾ taʾtūl-buyūt m ẓuhūrihā w-lākinnal-birr man ttaqā w-ʾtūl-buyūt m ʾabwābihā w-ttaqū llāh laʿallakum tufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: They ask you, O Muhammad, about the new moons. Say, "They are measurements of time for the people and for Hajj." And it is not righteousness to enter houses from the back, but righteousness is in one who fears Allah. And enter houses from their doors. And fear Allah that you may succeed

arabic_uthmani: وَقاتِلوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ الَّذينَ يُقاتِلونَكُم وَلا تَعتَدوا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُحِبُّ المُعتَدينَ
blank: w-qātilū fī sabīl llāhilladhīn yuqātilūnakum w-lā taʿtadū ʾinn llāh lā yuḥibbul-muʿtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Fight in the way of Allah those who fight you but do not transgress. Indeed. Allah does not like transgressors

arabic_uthmani: وَاقتُلوهُم حَيثُ ثَقِفتُموهُم وَأَخرِجوهُم مِن حَيثُ أَخرَجوكُم ۚ وَالفِتنَةُ أَشَدُّ مِنَ القَتلِ ۚ وَلا تُقاتِلوهُم عِندَ المَسجِدِ الحَرامِ حَتّىٰ يُقاتِلوكُم فيهِ ۖ فَإِن قاتَلوكُم فَاقتُلوهُم ۗ كَذٰلِكَ جَزاءُ الكافِرينَ
blank: w-qtulūhum ḥayth thaqiftumūhum w-ʾakhrijūhum m ḥayth ʾakhrajūkum w-l-fitnat ʾashadd minal-qatl w-lā tuqātilūhum ʿindal-masjidil-ḥarām ḥattā yuqātilūkum fīh f-ʾ qātalūkum f-qtulūhum k-dhālik jazāʾul-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And kill them wherever you overtake them and expel them from wherever they have expelled you, and fitnah is worse than killing. And do not fight them at al-Masjid al- Haram until they fight you there. But if they fight you, then kill them. Such is the recompense of the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنِ انتَهَوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: f-ʾin ntahaw f-ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And if they cease, then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَقاتِلوهُم حَتّىٰ لا تَكونَ فِتنَةٌ وَيَكونَ الدّينُ لِلَّهِ ۖ فَإِنِ انتَهَوا فَلا عُدوانَ إِلّا عَلَى الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-qātilūhum ḥattā lā takūn fitnat w-yakūn d-dīn l-llāh f-ʾin ntahaw f-lā ʿudwān ʾillā ʿalā ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Fight them until there is no more fitnah and until worship is acknowledged to be for Allah. But if they cease, then there is to be no aggression except against the oppressors

arabic_uthmani: الشَّهرُ الحَرامُ بِالشَّهرِ الحَرامِ وَالحُرُماتُ قِصاصٌ ۚ فَمَنِ اعتَدىٰ عَلَيكُم فَاعتَدوا عَلَيهِ بِمِثلِ مَا اعتَدىٰ عَلَيكُم ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ المُتَّقينَ
blank: ash-shahrul-ḥarām b-sh-shahril-ḥarām w-l-ḥurumāt qiṣāṣ f-man ʿtadā ʿalaykum f-ʿtadū ʿalayh b-mithl mā ʿtadā ʿalaykum w-ttaqū llāh w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh maʿal-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Fighting in the sacred month is for aggression committed in the sacred month, and for all violations is legal retribution. So whoever has assaulted you, then assault him in the same way that he has assaulted you. And fear Allah and know that Allah is with those who fear Him

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنفِقوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَلا تُلقوا بِأَيديكُم إِلَى التَّهلُكَةِ ۛ وَأَحسِنوا ۛ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ المُحسِنينَ
blank: w-ʾanfiqū fī sabīl llāh w-lā tulqū b-ʾaydīkum ʾilā t-tahlukat w-ʾaḥsinū ʾinn llāh yuḥibbul-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: And spend in the way of Allah and do not throw yourselves with your own hands into destruction by refraining. And do good; indeed, Allah loves the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: وَأَتِمُّوا الحَجَّ وَالعُمرَةَ لِلَّهِ ۚ فَإِن أُحصِرتُم فَمَا استَيسَرَ مِنَ الهَديِ ۖ وَلا تَحلِقوا رُءوسَكُم حَتّىٰ يَبلُغَ الهَديُ مَحِلَّهُ ۚ فَمَن كانَ مِنكُم مَريضًا أَو بِهِ أَذًى مِن رَأسِهِ فَفِديَةٌ مِن صِيامٍ أَو صَدَقَةٍ أَو نُسُكٍ ۚ فَإِذا أَمِنتُم فَمَن تَمَتَّعَ بِالعُمرَةِ إِلَى الحَجِّ فَمَا استَيسَرَ مِنَ الهَديِ ۚ فَمَن لَم يَجِد فَصِيامُ ثَلاثَةِ أَيّامٍ فِي الحَجِّ وَسَبعَةٍ إِذا رَجَعتُم ۗ تِلكَ عَشَرَةٌ كامِلَةٌ ۗ ذٰلِكَ لِمَن لَم يَكُن أَهلُهُ حاضِرِي المَسجِدِ الحَرامِ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: w-ʾatimmūl-ḥajj w-l-ʿumrat l-llāh f-ʾ ʾuḥṣirtum f-mā staysar minal-hady w-lā taḥliqū ruʾūsakum ḥattā yablughal-hady maḥillahū f-m kān minkum marīḍ ʾaw bihī ʾadham-m raʾsihī f-fidyat m ṣiyām ʾaw ṣadaqat ʾaw nusuk f-ʾidhā ʾamintum f-m tamattaʿ b-l-ʿumrat ʾilāl-ḥajj f-mā staysar minal-hady f-m lam yajid f-ṣiyām thalāthat ʾayyām fīl-ḥajj w-sabʿat ʾidhā rajaʿtum tilk ʿasharat kāmilat dhālik l-m lam yak ʾahluhū ḥāḍirīl-masjidil-ḥarām w-ttaqū llāh w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: And complete the Hajj and 'umrah for Allah. But if you are prevented, then offer what can be obtained with ease of sacrificial animals. And do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of slaughter. And whoever among you is ill or has an ailment of the head making shaving necessary must offer a ransom of fasting three days or charity or sacrifice. And when you are secure, then whoever performs 'umrah during the Hajj months followed by Hajj offers what can be obtained with ease of sacrificial animals. And whoever cannot find or afford such an animal - then a fast of three days during Hajj and of seven when you have returned home. Those are ten complete days. This is for those whose family is not in the area of al-Masjid al-Haram. And fear Allah and know that Allah is severe in penalty

arabic_uthmani: الحَجُّ أَشهُرٌ مَعلوماتٌ ۚ فَمَن فَرَضَ فيهِنَّ الحَجَّ فَلا رَفَثَ وَلا فُسوقَ وَلا جِدالَ فِي الحَجِّ ۗ وَما تَفعَلوا مِن خَيرٍ يَعلَمهُ اللَّهُ ۗ وَتَزَوَّدوا فَإِنَّ خَيرَ الزّادِ التَّقوىٰ ۚ وَاتَّقونِ يا أُولِي الأَلبابِ
blank: al-ḥajj ʾashhur maʿlūmāt f-m faraḍ fīhinnal-ḥajj f-lā rafath w-lā fusūq w-lā jidāl fīl-ḥajj w-mā tafʿalū m khayr yaʿlamh llāh w-tazawwadū f-ʾinn khayr z-zād t-taqwā w-ttaqūn yā-ʾulīl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: Hajj is during well-known months, so whoever has made Hajj obligatory upon himself therein by entering the state of ihram, there is to be for him no sexual relations and no disobedience and no disputing during Hajj. And whatever good you do - Allah knows it. And take provisions, but indeed, the best provision is fear of Allah. And fear Me, O you of understanding

arabic_uthmani: لَيسَ عَلَيكُم جُناحٌ أَن تَبتَغوا فَضلًا مِن رَبِّكُم ۚ فَإِذا أَفَضتُم مِن عَرَفاتٍ فَاذكُرُوا اللَّهَ عِندَ المَشعَرِ الحَرامِ ۖ وَاذكُروهُ كَما هَداكُم وَإِن كُنتُم مِن قَبلِهِ لَمِنَ الضّالّينَ
blank: lays ʿalaykum junāḥ ʾ tabtaghū faḍlam-m rabbikum f-ʾidhā ʾafaḍtum m ʿarafāt f-dhkurū llāh ʿindal-mashʿaril-ḥarām w-dhkurūh k-mā hadākum w-ʾ kuntum m qablihī l-min ḍ-ḍāllīn
english_saheeh_international: There is no blame upon you for seeking bounty from your Lord during Hajj. But when you depart from 'Arafat, remember Allah at al- Mash'ar al-Haram. And remember Him, as He has guided you, for indeed, you were before that among those astray

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَفيضوا مِن حَيثُ أَفاضَ النّاسُ وَاستَغفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: thumm ʾafīḍū m ḥayth ʾafāḍ n-nās w-staghfirū llāh ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Then depart from the place from where all the people depart and ask forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا قَضَيتُم مَناسِكَكُم فَاذكُرُوا اللَّهَ كَذِكرِكُم آباءَكُم أَو أَشَدَّ ذِكرًا ۗ فَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يَقولُ رَبَّنا آتِنا فِي الدُّنيا وَما لَهُ فِي الآخِرَةِ مِن خَلاقٍ
blank: f-ʾidhā qaḍaytum manāsikakum f-dhkurū llāh k-dhikrikum ʾābāʾakum ʾaw ʾashadd dhikr f-min n-nās m yaqūl rabbanā ʾātinā fī d-dunyā w-mā lahū fīl-ʾākhirat m khalāq
english_saheeh_international: And when you have completed your rites, remember Allah like your previous remembrance of your fathers or with much greater remembrance. And among the people is he who says, "Our Lord, give us in this world," and he will have in the Hereafter no share

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنهُم مَن يَقولُ رَبَّنا آتِنا فِي الدُّنيا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنا عَذابَ النّارِ
blank: w-minhum m yaqūl rabbanā ʾātinā fī d-dunyā ḥasanat w-fīl-ʾākhirat ḥasanat w-qinā ʿadhāb n-nār
english_saheeh_international: But among them is he who says, "Our Lord, give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ لَهُم نَصيبٌ مِمّا كَسَبوا ۚ وَاللَّهُ سَريعُ الحِسابِ
blank: ʾulāʾik lahum naṣīb mimmā kasabū w-llāh sarīʿul-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: Those will have a share of what they have earned, and Allah is swift in account

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَاذكُرُوا اللَّهَ في أَيّامٍ مَعدوداتٍ ۚ فَمَن تَعَجَّلَ في يَومَينِ فَلا إِثمَ عَلَيهِ وَمَن تَأَخَّرَ فَلا إِثمَ عَلَيهِ ۚ لِمَنِ اتَّقىٰ ۗ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعلَموا أَنَّكُم إِلَيهِ تُحشَرونَ
blank: w-dhkurū llāh fī ʾayyām maʿdūdāt f-m taʿajjal fī yawmayn f-lā ʾithm ʿalayh w-m taʾakhkhar f-lā ʾithm ʿalayh l-man ttaqā w-ttaqū llāh w-ʿlamū ʾannakum ʾilayh tuḥsharūn
english_saheeh_international: And remember Allah during specific numbered days. Then whoever hastens his departure in two days - there is no sin upon him; and whoever delays until the third - there is no sin upon him - for him who fears Allah. And fear Allah and know that unto Him you will be gathered

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يُعجِبُكَ قَولُهُ فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَيُشهِدُ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ ما في قَلبِهِ وَهُوَ أَلَدُّ الخِصامِ
blank: w-min n-nās m yuʿjibuk qawluhū fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-yushhid llāh ʿalā mā fī qalbihī w-huw ʾaladdul-khiṣām
english_saheeh_international: And of the people is he whose speech pleases you in worldly life, and he calls Allah to witness as to what is in his heart, yet he is the fiercest of opponents

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا تَوَلّىٰ سَعىٰ فِي الأَرضِ لِيُفسِدَ فيها وَيُهلِكَ الحَرثَ وَالنَّسلَ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ الفَسادَ
blank: w-ʾidhā tawallā saʿā fīl-ʾarḍ l-yufsid fīhā w-yuhlikal-ḥarth w-n-nasl w-llāh lā yuḥibbul-fasād
english_saheeh_international: And when he goes away, he strives throughout the land to cause corruption therein and destroy crops and animals. And Allah does not like corruption

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُ اتَّقِ اللَّهَ أَخَذَتهُ العِزَّةُ بِالإِثمِ ۚ فَحَسبُهُ جَهَنَّمُ ۚ وَلَبِئسَ المِهادُ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lah ttaq llāh ʾakhadhathul-ʿizzat b-l-ʾithm f-ḥasbuhū jahannam w-l-biʾsal-mihād
english_saheeh_international: And when it is said to him, "Fear Allah," pride in the sin takes hold of him. Sufficient for him is Hellfire, and how wretched is the resting place

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يَشري نَفسَهُ ابتِغاءَ مَرضاتِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ رَءوفٌ بِالعِبادِ
blank: w-min n-nās m yashrī nafsah btighāʾ marḍāt llāh w-llāh raʾūf b-l-ʿibād
english_saheeh_international: And of the people is he who sells himself, seeking means to the approval of Allah. And Allah is kind to His servants

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا ادخُلوا فِي السِّلمِ كافَّةً وَلا تَتَّبِعوا خُطُواتِ الشَّيطانِ ۚ إِنَّهُ لَكُم عَدُوٌّ مُبينٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū dkhulū fī s-silm kāffat w-lā tattabiʿū khuṭuwāt sh-shayṭān ʾinnahū lakum ʿaduww mubīn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, enter into Islam completely and perfectly and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن زَلَلتُم مِن بَعدِ ما جاءَتكُمُ البَيِّناتُ فَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: f-ʾ zalaltum m baʿd mā jāʾatkumul-bayyināt f-ʿlamū ʾann llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: But if you deviate after clear proofs have come to you, then know that Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: هَل يَنظُرونَ إِلّا أَن يَأتِيَهُمُ اللَّهُ في ظُلَلٍ مِنَ الغَمامِ وَالمَلائِكَةُ وَقُضِيَ الأَمرُ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرجَعُ الأُمورُ
blank: hal yanẓurūn ʾillā ʾ yaʾtiyahum llāh fī ẓulal minal-ghamām w-l-malāʾikat w-quḍiyal-ʾamr w-ʾilā llāh turjaʿul-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: Do they await but that Allah should come to them in covers of clouds and the angels as well and the matter is then decided? And to Allah all matters are returned

arabic_uthmani: سَل بَني إِسرائيلَ كَم آتَيناهُم مِن آيَةٍ بَيِّنَةٍ ۗ وَمَن يُبَدِّل نِعمَةَ اللَّهِ مِن بَعدِ ما جاءَتهُ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: sal banī ʾisrāʾīl kam ʾātaynāhum m ʾāyat bayyinat w-m yubaddil niʿmat llāh m baʿd mā jāʾath f-ʾinn llāh shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: Ask the Children of Israel how many a sign of evidence We have given them. And whoever exchanges the favor of Allah for disbelief after it has come to him - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty

arabic_uthmani: زُيِّنَ لِلَّذينَ كَفَرُوا الحَياةُ الدُّنيا وَيَسخَرونَ مِنَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا ۘ وَالَّذينَ اتَّقَوا فَوقَهُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَرزُقُ مَن يَشاءُ بِغَيرِ حِسابٍ
blank: zuyyin l-lladhīn kafarūl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-yaskharūn minalladhīn ʾāmanū w-lladhīn ttaqaw fawqahum yawmal-qiyāmat w-llāh yarzuq m yashāʾ b-ghayr ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: Beautified for those who disbelieve is the life of this world, and they ridicule those who believe. But those who fear Allah are above them on the Day of Resurrection. And Allah gives provision to whom He wills without account

arabic_uthmani: كانَ النّاسُ أُمَّةً واحِدَةً فَبَعَثَ اللَّهُ النَّبِيّينَ مُبَشِّرينَ وَمُنذِرينَ وَأَنزَلَ مَعَهُمُ الكِتابَ بِالحَقِّ لِيَحكُمَ بَينَ النّاسِ فيمَا اختَلَفوا فيهِ ۚ وَمَا اختَلَفَ فيهِ إِلَّا الَّذينَ أوتوهُ مِن بَعدِ ما جاءَتهُمُ البَيِّناتُ بَغيًا بَينَهُم ۖ فَهَدَى اللَّهُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا لِمَا اختَلَفوا فيهِ مِنَ الحَقِّ بِإِذنِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَهدي مَن يَشاءُ إِلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: kān n-nās ʾummat wāḥidat f-baʿath llāh n-nabiyyīn mubashshirīn w-mundhirīn w-ʾanzal maʿahumul-kitāb b-l-ḥaqq l-yaḥkum bayn n-nās fī-mā khtalafū fīh w-mā khtalaf fīh ʾillālladhīn ʾūtūh m baʿd mā jāʾathumul-bayyināt baghy baynahum f-hadā llāhulladhīn ʾāmanū l-mā khtalafū fīh minal-ḥaqq b-ʾidhnihī w-llāh yahdī m yashāʾ ʾilā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: Mankind was of one religion before their deviation; then Allah sent the prophets as bringers of good tidings and warners and sent down with them the Scripture in truth to judge between the people concerning that in which they differed. And none differed over the Scripture except those who were given it - after the clear proofs came to them - out of jealous animosity among themselves. And Allah guided those who believed to the truth concerning that over which they had differed, by His permission. And Allah guides whom He wills to a straight path

arabic_uthmani: أَم حَسِبتُم أَن تَدخُلُوا الجَنَّةَ وَلَمّا يَأتِكُم مَثَلُ الَّذينَ خَلَوا مِن قَبلِكُم ۖ مَسَّتهُمُ البَأساءُ وَالضَّرّاءُ وَزُلزِلوا حَتّىٰ يَقولَ الرَّسولُ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مَعَهُ مَتىٰ نَصرُ اللَّهِ ۗ أَلا إِنَّ نَصرَ اللَّهِ قَريبٌ
blank: ʾam ḥasibtum ʾ tadkhulūl-jannat w-lammā yaʾtikum mathalulladhīn khalaw m qablikum massathumul-baʾsāʾ w-ḍ-ḍarrāʾ w-zulzilū ḥattā yaqūl r-rasūl w-lladhīn ʾāmanū maʿahū matā naṣr llāh ʾ-lā ʾinn naṣr llāh qarīb
english_saheeh_international: Or do you think that you will enter Paradise while such trial has not yet come to you as came to those who passed on before you? They were touched by poverty and hardship and were shaken until even their messenger and those who believed with him said, "When is the help of Allah?" Unquestionably, the help of Allah is near

arabic_uthmani: يَسأَلونَكَ ماذا يُنفِقونَ ۖ قُل ما أَنفَقتُم مِن خَيرٍ فَلِلوالِدَينِ وَالأَقرَبينَ وَاليَتامىٰ وَالمَساكينِ وَابنِ السَّبيلِ ۗ وَما تَفعَلوا مِن خَيرٍ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِهِ عَليمٌ
blank: yasʾalūnak mādhā yunfiqūn qul mā ʾanfaqtum m khayr f-l-l-wālidayn w-l-ʾaqrabīn w-l-yatāmā w-l-masākīn w-bn s-sabīl w-mā tafʿalū m khayr f-ʾinn llāh bihī ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: They ask you, O Muhammad, what they should spend. Say, "Whatever you spend of good is to be for parents and relatives and orphans and the needy and the traveler. And whatever you do of good - indeed, Allah is Knowing of it

arabic_uthmani: كُتِبَ عَلَيكُمُ القِتالُ وَهُوَ كُرهٌ لَكُم ۖ وَعَسىٰ أَن تَكرَهوا شَيئًا وَهُوَ خَيرٌ لَكُم ۖ وَعَسىٰ أَن تُحِبّوا شَيئًا وَهُوَ شَرٌّ لَكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ وَأَنتُم لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: kutib ʿalaykumul-qitāl w-huw kurh lakum w-ʿasā ʾ takrahū shayʾ w-huw khayr lakum w-ʿasā ʾ tuḥibbū shayʾ w-huw sharr lakum w-llāh yaʿlam w-ʾantum lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Fighting has been enjoined upon you while it is hateful to you. But perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you; and perhaps you love a thing and it is bad for you. And Allah Knows, while you know not

arabic_uthmani: يَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ الشَّهرِ الحَرامِ قِتالٍ فيهِ ۖ قُل قِتالٌ فيهِ كَبيرٌ ۖ وَصَدٌّ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَكُفرٌ بِهِ وَالمَسجِدِ الحَرامِ وَإِخراجُ أَهلِهِ مِنهُ أَكبَرُ عِندَ اللَّهِ ۚ وَالفِتنَةُ أَكبَرُ مِنَ القَتلِ ۗ وَلا يَزالونَ يُقاتِلونَكُم حَتّىٰ يَرُدّوكُم عَن دينِكُم إِنِ استَطاعوا ۚ وَمَن يَرتَدِد مِنكُم عَن دينِهِ فَيَمُت وَهُوَ كافِرٌ فَأُولٰئِكَ حَبِطَت أَعمالُهُم فِي الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةِ ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ النّارِ ۖ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: yasʾalūnak ʿan sh-shahril-ḥarām qitāl fīh qul qitāl fīh kabīr w-ṣadd ʿ sabīl llāh w-kufr bihī w-l-masjidil-ḥarām w-ʾikhrāj ʾahlihī minh ʾakbar ʿind llāh w-l-fitnat ʾakbar minal-qatl w-lā yazālūn yuqātilūnakum ḥattā yaruddūkum ʿ dīnikum ʾin staṭāʿū w-m yartadid minkum ʿ dīnihī f-yamut w-huw kāfir f-ʾulāʾik ḥabiṭat ʾaʿmāluhum fī d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat w-ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥāb n-nār hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: They ask you about the sacred month - about fighting therein. Say, "Fighting therein is great sin, but averting people from the way of Allah and disbelief in Him and preventing access to al-Masjid al-Haram and the expulsion of its people therefrom are greater evil in the sight of Allah. And fitnah is greater than killing." And they will continue to fight you until they turn you back from your religion if they are able. And whoever of you reverts from his religion to disbelief and dies while he is a disbeliever - for those, their deeds have become worthless in this world and the Hereafter, and those are the companions of the Fire, they will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَالَّذينَ هاجَروا وَجاهَدوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ أُولٰئِكَ يَرجونَ رَحمَتَ اللَّهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾāmanū w-lladhīn hājarū w-jāhadū fī sabīl llāh ʾulāʾik yarjūn raḥmat llāh w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who have believed and those who have emigrated and fought in the cause of Allah - those expect the mercy of Allah. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: ۞ يَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ الخَمرِ وَالمَيسِرِ ۖ قُل فيهِما إِثمٌ كَبيرٌ وَمَنافِعُ لِلنّاسِ وَإِثمُهُما أَكبَرُ مِن نَفعِهِما ۗ وَيَسأَلونَكَ ماذا يُنفِقونَ قُلِ العَفوَ ۗ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الآياتِ لَعَلَّكُم تَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: yasʾalūnak ʿanil-khamr w-l-maysir qul fīhimā ʾithm kabīr w-manāfiʿ l-n-nās w-ʾithmuhumā ʾakbar m nafʿihimā w-yasʾalūnak mādhā yunfiqūn qulil-ʿafw k-dhālik yubayyin llāh lakumul-ʾāyāt laʿallakum tatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: They ask you about wine and gambling. Say, "In them is great sin and yet, some benefit for people. But their sin is greater than their benefit." And they ask you what they should spend. Say, "The excess beyond needs." Thus Allah makes clear to you the verses of revelation that you might give thought

arabic_uthmani: فِي الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةِ ۗ وَيَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ اليَتامىٰ ۖ قُل إِصلاحٌ لَهُم خَيرٌ ۖ وَإِن تُخالِطوهُم فَإِخوانُكُم ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ المُفسِدَ مِنَ المُصلِحِ ۚ وَلَو شاءَ اللَّهُ لَأَعنَتَكُم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: fī d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat w-yasʾalūnak ʿanil-yatāmā qul ʾiṣlāḥ lahum khayr w-ʾ tukhāliṭūhum f-ʾikhwānukum w-llāh yaʿlamul-mufsid minal-muṣliḥ w-law shāʾ llāh l-ʾaʿnatakum ʾinn llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: To this world and the Hereafter. And they ask you about orphans. Say, "Improvement for them is best. And if you mix your affairs with theirs - they are your brothers. And Allah knows the corrupter from the amender. And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in difficulty. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَنكِحُوا المُشرِكاتِ حَتّىٰ يُؤمِنَّ ۚ وَلَأَمَةٌ مُؤمِنَةٌ خَيرٌ مِن مُشرِكَةٍ وَلَو أَعجَبَتكُم ۗ وَلا تُنكِحُوا المُشرِكينَ حَتّىٰ يُؤمِنوا ۚ وَلَعَبدٌ مُؤمِنٌ خَيرٌ مِن مُشرِكٍ وَلَو أَعجَبَكُم ۗ أُولٰئِكَ يَدعونَ إِلَى النّارِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَدعو إِلَى الجَنَّةِ وَالمَغفِرَةِ بِإِذنِهِ ۖ وَيُبَيِّنُ آياتِهِ لِلنّاسِ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-lā tankiḥūl-mushrikāt ḥattā yuʾminn w-l-ʾamat muʾminat khayr m mushrikat w-law ʾaʿjabatkum w-lā tunkiḥūl-mushrikīn ḥattā yuʾminū w-l-ʿabd muʾmin khayr m mushrik w-law ʾaʿjabakum ʾulāʾik yadʿūn ʾilā n-nār w-llāh yadʿū ʾilāl-jannat w-l-maghfirat b-ʾidhnihī w-yubayyin ʾāyātihī l-n-nās laʿallahum yatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not marry polytheistic women until they believe. And a believing slave woman is better than a polytheist, even though she might please you. And do not marry polytheistic men to your women until they believe. And a believing slave is better than a polytheist, even though he might please you. Those invite you to the Fire, but Allah invites to Paradise and to forgiveness, by His permission. And He makes clear His verses to the people that perhaps they may remember

arabic_uthmani: وَيَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ المَحيضِ ۖ قُل هُوَ أَذًى فَاعتَزِلُوا النِّساءَ فِي المَحيضِ ۖ وَلا تَقرَبوهُنَّ حَتّىٰ يَطهُرنَ ۖ فَإِذا تَطَهَّرنَ فَأتوهُنَّ مِن حَيثُ أَمَرَكُمُ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ التَّوّابينَ وَيُحِبُّ المُتَطَهِّرينَ
blank: w-yasʾalūnak ʿanil-maḥīḍ qul huw ʾadh f-ʿtazilū n-nisāʾ fīl-maḥīḍ w-lā taqrabūhunn ḥattā yaṭhurn f-ʾidhā taṭahharn f-ʾtūhunn m ḥayth ʾamarakum llāh ʾinn llāh yuḥibb t-tawwābīn w-yuḥibbul-mutaṭahhirīn
english_saheeh_international: And they ask you about menstruation. Say, "It is harm, so keep away from wives during menstruation. And do not approach them until they are pure. And when they have purified themselves, then come to them from where Allah has ordained for you. Indeed, Allah loves those who are constantly repentant and loves those who purify themselves

arabic_uthmani: نِساؤُكُم حَرثٌ لَكُم فَأتوا حَرثَكُم أَنّىٰ شِئتُم ۖ وَقَدِّموا لِأَنفُسِكُم ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعلَموا أَنَّكُم مُلاقوهُ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: nisāʾukum ḥarth lakum f-ʾtū ḥarthakum ʾannā shiʾtum w-qaddimū l-ʾanfusikum w-ttaqū llāh w-ʿlamū ʾannakum mulāqūh w-bashshiril-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Your wives are a place of sowing of seed for you, so come to your place of cultivation however you wish and put forth righteousness for yourselves. And fear Allah and know that you will meet Him. And give good tidings to the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَجعَلُوا اللَّهَ عُرضَةً لِأَيمانِكُم أَن تَبَرّوا وَتَتَّقوا وَتُصلِحوا بَينَ النّاسِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-lā tajʿalū llāh ʿurḍat l-ʾaymānikum ʾ tabarrū w-tattaqū w-tuṣliḥū bayn n-nās w-llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And do not make your oath by Allah an excuse against being righteous and fearing Allah and making peace among people. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: لا يُؤاخِذُكُمُ اللَّهُ بِاللَّغوِ في أَيمانِكُم وَلٰكِن يُؤاخِذُكُم بِما كَسَبَت قُلوبُكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ حَليمٌ
blank: lā yuʾākhidhukum llāh b-l-laghw fī ʾaymānikum w-lāk yuʾākhidhukum b-mā kasabat qulūbukum w-llāh ghafūr ḥalīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah does not impose blame upon you for what is unintentional in your oaths, but He imposes blame upon you for what your hearts have earned. And Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing

arabic_uthmani: لِلَّذينَ يُؤلونَ مِن نِسائِهِم تَرَبُّصُ أَربَعَةِ أَشهُرٍ ۖ فَإِن فاءوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: l-lladhīn yuʾlūn m nisāʾihim tarabbuṣ ʾarbaʿat ʾashhur f-ʾ fāʾū f-ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: For those who swear not to have sexual relations with their wives is a waiting time of four months, but if they return to normal relations - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن عَزَمُوا الطَّلاقَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-ʾ ʿazamū ṭ-ṭalāq f-ʾinn llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And if they decide on divorce - then indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَالمُطَلَّقاتُ يَتَرَبَّصنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ ثَلاثَةَ قُروءٍ ۚ وَلا يَحِلُّ لَهُنَّ أَن يَكتُمنَ ما خَلَقَ اللَّهُ في أَرحامِهِنَّ إِن كُنَّ يُؤمِنَّ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ ۚ وَبُعولَتُهُنَّ أَحَقُّ بِرَدِّهِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ إِن أَرادوا إِصلاحًا ۚ وَلَهُنَّ مِثلُ الَّذي عَلَيهِنَّ بِالمَعروفِ ۚ وَلِلرِّجالِ عَلَيهِنَّ دَرَجَةٌ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-l-muṭallaqāt yatarabbaṣn b-ʾanfusihinn thalāthat qurūʾ w-lā yaḥill lahunn ʾ yaktumn mā khalaq llāh fī ʾarḥāmihinn ʾ kunn yuʾminn b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-buʿūlatuhunn ʾaḥaqq b-raddihinn fī dhālik ʾ ʾarādū ʾiṣlāḥ w-lahunn mithlulladhī ʿalayhinn b-l-maʿrūf w-l-r-rijāl ʿalayhinn darajat w-llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm-
english_saheeh_international: Divorced women remain in waiting for three periods, and it is not lawful for them to conceal what Allah has created in their wombs if they believe in Allah and the Last Day. And their husbands have more right to take them back in this period if they want reconciliation. And due to the wives is similar to what is expected of them, according to what is reasonable. But the men have a degree over them in responsibility and authority. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: الطَّلاقُ مَرَّتانِ ۖ فَإِمساكٌ بِمَعروفٍ أَو تَسريحٌ بِإِحسانٍ ۗ وَلا يَحِلُّ لَكُم أَن تَأخُذوا مِمّا آتَيتُموهُنَّ شَيئًا إِلّا أَن يَخافا أَلّا يُقيما حُدودَ اللَّهِ ۖ فَإِن خِفتُم أَلّا يُقيما حُدودَ اللَّهِ فَلا جُناحَ عَلَيهِما فيمَا افتَدَت بِهِ ۗ تِلكَ حُدودُ اللَّهِ فَلا تَعتَدوها ۚ وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: aṭ-ṭalāq marratān f-ʾimsāk b-maʿrūf ʾaw tasrīḥ b-ʾiḥsān w-lā yaḥill lakum ʾ taʾkhudhū mimmā ʾātaytumūhunn shayʾ ʾillā ʾ yakhāfā ʾallā yuqīmā ḥudūd llāh f-ʾ khiftum ʾallā yuqīmā ḥudūd llāh f-lā junāḥ ʿalayhimā fī-mā ftadat bihī tilk ḥudūd llāh f-lā taʿtadūhā w-m yataʿadd ḥudūd llāh f-ʾulāʾik hum ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: Divorce is twice. Then, either keep her in an acceptable manner or release her with good treatment. And it is not lawful for you to take anything of what you have given them unless both fear that they will not be able to keep within the limits of Allah. But if you fear that they will not keep within the limits of Allah, then there is no blame upon either of them concerning that by which she ransoms herself. These are the limits of Allah, so do not transgress them. And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah - it is those who are the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن طَلَّقَها فَلا تَحِلُّ لَهُ مِن بَعدُ حَتّىٰ تَنكِحَ زَوجًا غَيرَهُ ۗ فَإِن طَلَّقَها فَلا جُناحَ عَلَيهِما أَن يَتَراجَعا إِن ظَنّا أَن يُقيما حُدودَ اللَّهِ ۗ وَتِلكَ حُدودُ اللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُها لِقَومٍ يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-ʾ ṭallaqahā f-lā taḥill lahū m baʿd ḥattā tankiḥ zawj ghayrahū f-ʾ ṭallaqahā f-lā junāḥ ʿalayhimā ʾ yatarājaʿā ʾ ẓannā ʾ yuqīmā ḥudūd llāh w-tilk ḥudūd llāh yubayyinuhā l-qawm yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And if he has divorced her for the third time, then she is not lawful to him afterward until after she marries a husband other than him. And if the latter husband divorces her or dies, there is no blame upon the woman and her former husband for returning to each other if they think that they can keep within the limits of Allah. These are the limits of Allah, which He makes clear to a people who know

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا طَلَّقتُمُ النِّساءَ فَبَلَغنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمسِكوهُنَّ بِمَعروفٍ أَو سَرِّحوهُنَّ بِمَعروفٍ ۚ وَلا تُمسِكوهُنَّ ضِرارًا لِتَعتَدوا ۚ وَمَن يَفعَل ذٰلِكَ فَقَد ظَلَمَ نَفسَهُ ۚ وَلا تَتَّخِذوا آياتِ اللَّهِ هُزُوًا ۚ وَاذكُروا نِعمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيكُم وَما أَنزَلَ عَلَيكُم مِنَ الكِتابِ وَالحِكمَةِ يَعِظُكُم بِهِ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: w-ʾidhā ṭallaqtum n-nisāʾ f-balaghn ʾajalahunn f-ʾamsikūhunn b-maʿrūf ʾaw sarriḥūhunn b-maʿrūf w-lā tumsikūhunn ḍirār l-taʿtadū w-m yafʿal dhālik f-qad ẓalam nafsahū w-lā tattakhidhū ʾāyāt llāh huzuw w-dhkurū niʿmat llāh ʿalaykum w-mā ʾanzal ʿalaykum minal-kitāb w-l-ḥikmat yaʿiẓukum bihī w-ttaqū llāh w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And when you divorce women and they have nearly fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or release them according to acceptable terms, and do not keep them, intending harm, to transgress against them. And whoever does that has certainly wronged himself. And do not take the verses of Allah in jest. And remember the favor of Allah upon you and what has been revealed to you of the Book and wisdom by which He instructs you. And fear Allah and know that Allah is Knowing of all things

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا طَلَّقتُمُ النِّساءَ فَبَلَغنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَلا تَعضُلوهُنَّ أَن يَنكِحنَ أَزواجَهُنَّ إِذا تَراضَوا بَينَهُم بِالمَعروفِ ۗ ذٰلِكَ يوعَظُ بِهِ مَن كانَ مِنكُم يُؤمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ ۗ ذٰلِكُم أَزكىٰ لَكُم وَأَطهَرُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ وَأَنتُم لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā ṭallaqtum n-nisāʾ f-balaghn ʾajalahunn f-lā taʿḍulūhunn ʾ yankiḥn ʾazwājahunn ʾidhā tarāḍaw baynahum b-l-maʿrūf dhālik yūʿaẓ bihī m kān minkum yuʾmin b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir dhālikum ʾazkā lakum w-ʾaṭhar w-llāh yaʿlam w-ʾantum lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And when you divorce women and they have fulfilled their term, do not prevent them from remarrying their former husbands if they agree among themselves on an acceptable basis. That is instructed to whoever of you believes in Allah and the Last Day. That is better for you and purer, and Allah knows and you know not

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَالوالِداتُ يُرضِعنَ أَولادَهُنَّ حَولَينِ كامِلَينِ ۖ لِمَن أَرادَ أَن يُتِمَّ الرَّضاعَةَ ۚ وَعَلَى المَولودِ لَهُ رِزقُهُنَّ وَكِسوَتُهُنَّ بِالمَعروفِ ۚ لا تُكَلَّفُ نَفسٌ إِلّا وُسعَها ۚ لا تُضارَّ والِدَةٌ بِوَلَدِها وَلا مَولودٌ لَهُ بِوَلَدِهِ ۚ وَعَلَى الوارِثِ مِثلُ ذٰلِكَ ۗ فَإِن أَرادا فِصالًا عَن تَراضٍ مِنهُما وَتَشاوُرٍ فَلا جُناحَ عَلَيهِما ۗ وَإِن أَرَدتُم أَن تَستَرضِعوا أَولادَكُم فَلا جُناحَ عَلَيكُم إِذا سَلَّمتُم ما آتَيتُم بِالمَعروفِ ۗ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرٌ
blank: w-l-wālidāt yurḍiʿn ʾawlādahunn ḥawlayn kāmilayn l-m ʾarād ʾ yutimm r-raḍāʿat w-ʿalāl-mawlūd lahū rizquhunn w-kiswatuhunn b-l-maʿrūf lā tukallaf nafs ʾillā wusʿahā lā tuḍārr wālidat b-waladihā w-lā mawlūd lahū b-waladihī w-ʿalāl-wārith mithl dhālik f-ʾ ʾarādā fiṣāl ʿ tarāḍ minhumā w-tashāwur f-lā junāḥ ʿalayhimā w-ʾ ʾaradtum ʾ tastarḍiʿū ʾawlādakum f-lā junāḥ ʿalaykum ʾidhā sallamtum mā ʾātaytum b-l-maʿrūf w-ttaqū llāh w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Mothers may breastfeed their children two complete years for whoever wishes to complete the nursing period. Upon the father is the mothers' provision and their clothing according to what is acceptable. No person is charged with more than his capacity. No mother should be harmed through her child, and no father through his child. And upon the father's heir is a duty like that of the father. And if they both desire weaning through mutual consent from both of them and consultation, there is no blame upon either of them. And if you wish to have your children nursed by a substitute, there is no blame upon you as long as you give payment according to what is acceptable. And fear Allah and know that Allah is Seeing of what you do

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يُتَوَفَّونَ مِنكُم وَيَذَرونَ أَزواجًا يَتَرَبَّصنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ أَربَعَةَ أَشهُرٍ وَعَشرًا ۖ فَإِذا بَلَغنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَلا جُناحَ عَلَيكُم فيما فَعَلنَ في أَنفُسِهِنَّ بِالمَعروفِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ خَبيرٌ
blank: w-lladhīn yutawaffawn minkum w-yadharūn ʾazwāj yatarabbaṣn b-ʾanfusihinn ʾarbaʿat ʾashhur w-ʿashr f-ʾidhā balaghn ʾajalahunn f-lā junāḥ ʿalaykum fī-mā faʿaln fī ʾanfusihinn b-l-maʿrūf w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And those who are taken in death among you and leave wives behind - they, the wives, shall wait four months and ten days. And when they have fulfilled their term, then there is no blame upon you for what they do with themselves in an acceptable manner. And Allah is fully Acquainted with what you do

arabic_uthmani: وَلا جُناحَ عَلَيكُم فيما عَرَّضتُم بِهِ مِن خِطبَةِ النِّساءِ أَو أَكنَنتُم في أَنفُسِكُم ۚ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُم سَتَذكُرونَهُنَّ وَلٰكِن لا تُواعِدوهُنَّ سِرًّا إِلّا أَن تَقولوا قَولًا مَعروفًا ۚ وَلا تَعزِموا عُقدَةَ النِّكاحِ حَتّىٰ يَبلُغَ الكِتابُ أَجَلَهُ ۚ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعلَمُ ما في أَنفُسِكُم فَاحذَروهُ ۚ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ حَليمٌ
blank: w-lā junāḥ ʿalaykum fī-mā ʿarraḍtum bihī m khiṭbat n-nisāʾ ʾaw ʾaknantum fī ʾanfusikum ʿalim llāh ʾannakum s-tadhkurūnahunn w-lāk lā tuwāʿidūhunn sirr ʾillā ʾ taqūlū qawlam-maʿrūf w-lā taʿzimū ʿuqdat n-nikāḥ ḥattā yablughal-kitāb ʾajalahū w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh yaʿlam mā fī ʾanfusikum f-ḥdharūh w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh ghafūr ḥalīm
english_saheeh_international: There is no blame upon you for that to which you indirectly allude concerning a proposal to women or for what you conceal within yourselves. Allah knows that you will have them in mind. But do not promise them secretly except for saying a proper saying. And do not determine to undertake a marriage contract until the decreed period reaches its end. And know that Allah knows what is within yourselves, so beware of Him. And know that Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing

arabic_uthmani: لا جُناحَ عَلَيكُم إِن طَلَّقتُمُ النِّساءَ ما لَم تَمَسّوهُنَّ أَو تَفرِضوا لَهُنَّ فَريضَةً ۚ وَمَتِّعوهُنَّ عَلَى الموسِعِ قَدَرُهُ وَعَلَى المُقتِرِ قَدَرُهُ مَتاعًا بِالمَعروفِ ۖ حَقًّا عَلَى المُحسِنينَ
blank: lā junāḥ ʿalaykum ʾ ṭallaqtum n-nisāʾ mā lam tamassūhunn ʾaw tafriḍū lahunn farīḍat w-mattiʿūhunn ʿalāl-mūsiʿ qadaruhū w-ʿalāl-muqtir qadaruhū matāʿ b-l-maʿrūf ḥaqq ʿalāl-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: There is no blame upon you if you divorce women you have not touched nor specified for them an obligation. But give them a gift of compensation - the wealthy according to his capability and the poor according to his capability - a provision according to what is acceptable, a duty upon the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن طَلَّقتُموهُنَّ مِن قَبلِ أَن تَمَسّوهُنَّ وَقَد فَرَضتُم لَهُنَّ فَريضَةً فَنِصفُ ما فَرَضتُم إِلّا أَن يَعفونَ أَو يَعفُوَ الَّذي بِيَدِهِ عُقدَةُ النِّكاحِ ۚ وَأَن تَعفوا أَقرَبُ لِلتَّقوىٰ ۚ وَلا تَنسَوُا الفَضلَ بَينَكُم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرٌ
blank: w-ʾ ṭallaqtumūhunn m qabl ʾ tamassūhunn w-qad faraḍtum lahunn farīḍat f-niṣf mā faraḍtum ʾillā ʾ yaʿfūn ʾaw yaʿfuwalladhī b-yadihī ʿuqdat n-nikāḥ w-ʾ taʿfū ʾaqrab l-t-taqwā w-lā tansawul-faḍl baynakum ʾinn llāh b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And if you divorce them before you have touched them and you have already specified for them an obligation, then give half of what you specified - unless they forego the right or the one in whose hand is the marriage contract foregoes it. And to forego it is nearer to righteousness. And do not forget graciousness between you. Indeed Allah, of whatever you do, is Seeing

arabic_uthmani: حافِظوا عَلَى الصَّلَواتِ وَالصَّلاةِ الوُسطىٰ وَقوموا لِلَّهِ قانِتينَ
blank: ḥāfiẓū ʿalā ṣ-ṣalawāt w-ṣ-ṣalātil-wusṭā w-qūmū l-llāh qānitīn
english_saheeh_international: Maintain with care the obligatory prayers and in particular the middle prayer and stand before Allah, devoutly obedient

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن خِفتُم فَرِجالًا أَو رُكبانًا ۖ فَإِذا أَمِنتُم فَاذكُرُوا اللَّهَ كَما عَلَّمَكُم ما لَم تَكونوا تَعلَمونَ
blank: f-ʾ khiftum f-rijāl ʾaw rukbān f-ʾidhā ʾamintum f-dhkurū llāh k-mā ʿallamakum mā lam takūnū taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you fear an enemy, then pray on foot or riding. But when you are secure, then remember Allah in prayer, as He has taught you that which you did not previously know

english_saheeh_international: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of all existence. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. His Kursi extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great

english_saheeh_international: There shall be no compulsion in acceptance of the religion. The right course has become clear from the wrong. So whoever disbelieves in Taghut and believes in Allah has grasped the most trustworthy handhold with no break in it. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing

english_saheeh_international: Allah is the ally of those who believe. He brings them out from darknesses into the light. And those who disbelieve - their allies are Taghut. They take them out of the light into darknesses. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide eternally therein

blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾilālladhī ḥājj ʾibrāhīm fī rabbihī ʾ ʾātāh llāhul-mulk ʾidh qāl ʾibrāhīm rabbiyalladhī yuḥyī w-yumīt qāl ʾan ʾuḥyī w-ʾumīt qāl ʾibrāhīm f-ʾinn llāh yaʾtī b-sh-shams minal-mashriq f-ʾt bihā minal-maghrib f-buhitalladhī kafar w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Have you not considered the one who argued with Abraham about his Lord merely because Allah had given him kingship? When Abraham said, "My Lord is the one who gives life and causes death," he said, "I give life and cause death." Abraham said, "Indeed, Allah brings up the sun from the east, so bring it up from the west." So the disbeliever was overwhelmed by astonishment, and Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

english_saheeh_international: Or consider such an example as the one who passed by a township which had fallen into ruin. He said, "How will Allah bring this to life after its death?" He said, "Rather, you have remained one hundred years. Look at your food and your drink; it has not changed with time. And look at your donkey; and We will make you a sign for the people. And look at the bones of this donkey - how We raise them and then We cover them with flesh." And when it became clear to him, he said, "I know that Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ إِبراهيمُ رَبِّ أَرِني كَيفَ تُحيِي المَوتىٰ ۖ قالَ أَوَلَم تُؤمِن ۖ قالَ بَلىٰ وَلٰكِن لِيَطمَئِنَّ قَلبي ۖ قالَ فَخُذ أَربَعَةً مِنَ الطَّيرِ فَصُرهُنَّ إِلَيكَ ثُمَّ اجعَل عَلىٰ كُلِّ جَبَلٍ مِنهُنَّ جُزءًا ثُمَّ ادعُهُنَّ يَأتينَكَ سَعيًا ۚ وَاعلَم أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ

english_saheeh_international: And mention when Abraham said, "My Lord, show me how You give life to the dead." Allah said, "Have you not believed?" english_saheeh_international: The example of those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah is like a seed of grain which grows seven spikes; in each spike is a hundred grains. And Allah multiplies His reward for whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing

english_saheeh_international: Those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah and then do not follow up what they have spent with reminders of it or other injury will have their reward with their Lord, and there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قَولٌ مَعروفٌ وَمَغفِرَةٌ خَيرٌ مِن صَدَقَةٍ يَتبَعُها أَذًى ۗ وَاللَّهُ غَنِيٌّ حَليمٌ
blank: qawl maʿrūf w-maghfirat khayr m ṣadaqat yatbaʿuhā ʾadh w-llāh ghaniyy ḥalīm
english_saheeh_international: Kind speech and forgiveness are better than charity followed by injury. And Allah is Free of need and Forbearing

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تُبطِلوا صَدَقاتِكُم بِالمَنِّ وَالأَذىٰ كَالَّذي يُنفِقُ مالَهُ رِئَاءَ النّاسِ وَلا يُؤمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ ۖ فَمَثَلُهُ كَمَثَلِ صَفوانٍ عَلَيهِ تُرابٌ فَأَصابَهُ وابِلٌ فَتَرَكَهُ صَلدًا ۖ لا يَقدِرونَ عَلىٰ شَيءٍ مِمّا كَسَبوا ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الكافِرينَ

english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not invalidate your charities with reminders or injury as does one who spends his wealth only to be seen by the people and does not believe in Allah and the Last Day. And Allah does not guide the disbelieving people

english_saheeh_international: And the example of those who spend their wealth seeking means to the approval of Allah and assuring reward for themselves is like a garden on high ground which is hit by a downpour - so it yields its fruits in double. english_saheeh_international: Would one of you like to have a garden of palm trees and grapevines underneath which rivers flow in which he has from every fruit? english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned and from that which We have produced for you from the earth. english_saheeh_international: Satan threatens you with poverty and orders you to immorality, while Allah promises you forgiveness from Him and bounty. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing

english_saheeh_international: He gives wisdom to whom He wills, and whoever has been given wisdom has certainly been given much good. And none will remember except those of understanding

english_saheeh_international: If you disclose your charitable expenditures, they are good; but if you conceal them and give them to the poor, it is better for you, and He will remove from you some of your misdeeds thereby. And Allah, with what you do, is fully Acquainted

english_saheeh_international: Charity is for the poor who have been restricted for the cause of Allah, unable to move about in the land. english_saheeh_international: Those who spend their wealth in Allah 's way by night and by day, secretly and publicly - they will have their reward with their Lord. And no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve

That is because they say, "Trade is just like interest." But Allah has permitted trade and has forbidden interest. So whoever has received an admonition from his Lord and desists may have what is past, and his affair rests with Allah. But whoever returns to dealing in interest or usury - those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide eternally therein

arabic_uthmani: يَمحَقُ اللَّهُ الرِّبا وَيُربِي الصَّدَقاتِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ كَفّارٍ أَثيمٍ
blank: yamḥaq llāh r-ribā w-yurbī ṣ-ṣadaqāt w-llāh lā yuḥibb kull kaffār ʾathīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah destroys interest and gives increase for charities. And Allah does not like every sinning disbeliever

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ وَأَقامُوا الصَّلاةَ وَآتَوُا الزَّكاةَ لَهُم أَجرُهُم عِندَ رَبِّهِم وَلا خَوفٌ عَلَيهِم وَلا هُم يَحزَنونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-ʾaqāmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātaw z-zakāt lahum ʾajruhum ʿind rabbihim w-lā khawf ʿalayhim w-lā hum yaḥzanūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds and establish prayer and give zakah will have their reward with their Lord, and there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَذَروا ما بَقِيَ مِنَ الرِّبا إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ttaqū llāh w-dharū mā baqiy min r-ribā ʾ kuntum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, fear Allah and give up what remains due to you of interest, if you should be believers

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن لَم تَفعَلوا فَأذَنوا بِحَربٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ ۖ وَإِن تُبتُم فَلَكُم رُءوسُ أَموالِكُم لا تَظلِمونَ وَلا تُظلَمونَ
blank: f-ʾ lam tafʿalū f-ʾdhanū b-ḥarb min llāh w-rasūlihī w-ʾ tubtum f-lakum ruʾūs ʾamwālikum lā taẓlimūn w-lā tuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you do not, then be informed of a war against you from Allah and His Messenger. But if you repent, you may have your principal - thus you do no wrong, nor are you wronged

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كانَ ذو عُسرَةٍ فَنَظِرَةٌ إِلىٰ مَيسَرَةٍ ۚ وَأَن تَصَدَّقوا خَيرٌ لَكُم ۖ إِن كُنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾ kān dhū ʿusrat f-naẓirat ʾilā maysarat w-ʾ taṣaddaqū khayr lakum ʾ kuntum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And if someone is in hardship, then let there be postponement until a time of ease. But if you give from your right as charity, then it is better for you, if you only knew

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّقوا يَومًا تُرجَعونَ فيهِ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ ثُمَّ تُوَفّىٰ كُلُّ نَفسٍ ما كَسَبَت وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: w-ttaqū yawm turjaʿūn fīh ʾilā llāh thumm tuwaffā kull nafs mā kasabat w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And fear a Day when you will be returned to Allah. Then every soul will be compensated for what it earned, and they will not be treated unjustly

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِذا تَدايَنتُم بِدَينٍ إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى فَاكتُبوهُ ۚ وَليَكتُب بَينَكُم كاتِبٌ بِالعَدلِ ۚ وَلا يَأبَ كاتِبٌ أَن يَكتُبَ كَما عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ ۚ فَليَكتُب وَليُملِلِ الَّذي عَلَيهِ الحَقُّ وَليَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلا يَبخَس مِنهُ شَيئًا ۚ فَإِن كانَ الَّذي عَلَيهِ الحَقُّ سَفيهًا أَو ضَعيفًا أَو لا يَستَطيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَليُملِل وَلِيُّهُ بِالعَدلِ ۚ وَاستَشهِدوا شَهيدَينِ مِن رِجالِكُم ۖ فَإِن لَم يَكونا رَجُلَينِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامرَأَتانِ مِمَّن تَرضَونَ مِنَ الشُّهَداءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحداهُما فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحداهُمَا الأُخرىٰ ۚ وَلا يَأبَ الشُّهَداءُ إِذا ما دُعوا ۚ وَلا تَسأَموا أَن تَكتُبوهُ صَغيرًا أَو كَبيرًا إِلىٰ أَجَلِهِ ۚ ذٰلِكُم أَقسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقوَمُ لِلشَّهادَةِ وَأَدنىٰ أَلّا تَرتابوا ۖ إِلّا أَن تَكونَ تِجارَةً حاضِرَةً تُديرونَها بَينَكُم فَلَيسَ عَلَيكُم جُناحٌ أَلّا تَكتُبوها ۗ وَأَشهِدوا إِذا تَبايَعتُم ۚ وَلا يُضارَّ كاتِبٌ وَلا شَهيدٌ ۚ وَإِن تَفعَلوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسوقٌ بِكُم ۗ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۖ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾidhā tadāyantum b-dayn ʾilā ʾajal musamm f-ktubūh w-l-yaktub baynakum kātib b-l-ʿadl w-lā yaʾb kātib ʾ yaktub k-mā ʿallamah llāh f-l-yaktub w-l-yumlililladhī ʿalayhil-ḥaqq w-l-yattaq llāh rabbahū w-lā yabkhas minh shayʾ f-ʾ kānalladhī ʿalayhil-ḥaqq safīh ʾaw ḍaʿīf ʾaw lā yastaṭīʿ ʾ yumill huw f-l-yumlil waliyyuhū b-l-ʿadl w-stashhidū shahīdayn m rijālikum f-ʾ lam yakūnā rajulayn f-rajul w-mraʾatān mimm tarḍawn min sh-shuhadāʾ ʾ taḍill ʾiḥdāhumā f-tudhakkir ʾiḥdāhumāl-ʾukhrā w-lā yaʾb sh-shuhadāʾ ʾidhā mā duʿū w-lā tasʾamū ʾ taktubūh ṣaghīr ʾaw kabīr ʾilā ʾajalihī dhālikum ʾaqsaṭ ʿind llāh w-ʾaqwam l-sh-shahādat w-ʾadnā ʾallā tartābū ʾillā ʾ takūn tijārat ḥāḍirat tudīrūnahā baynakum f-lays ʿalaykum junāḥ ʾallā taktubūhā w-ʾashhidū ʾidhā tabāyaʿtum w-lā yuḍārr kātib w-lā shahīd w-ʾ tafʿalū f-ʾinnahū fusūq bikum w-ttaqū llāh w-yuʿallimukum llāh w-llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, when you contract a debt for a specified term, write it down. And let a scribe write it between you in justice. Let no scribe refuse to write as Allah has taught him. So let him write and let the one who has the obligation dictate. And let him fear Allah, his Lord, and not leave anything out of it. But if the one who has the obligation is of limited understanding or weak or unable to dictate himself, then let his guardian dictate in justice. And bring to witness two witnesses from among your men. And if there are not two men available, then a man and two women from those whom you accept as witnesses - so that if one of the women errs, then the other can remind her. And let not the witnesses refuse when they are called upon. And do not be too weary to write it, whether it is small or large, for its specified term. That is more just in the sight of Allah and stronger as evidence and more likely to prevent doubt between you, except when it is an immediate transaction which you conduct among yourselves. For then there is no blame upon you if you do not write it. And take witnesses when you conclude a contract. Let no scribe be harmed or any witness. For if you do so, indeed, it is grave disobedience in you. And fear Allah. And Allah teaches you. And Allah is Knowing of all things

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِن كُنتُم عَلىٰ سَفَرٍ وَلَم تَجِدوا كاتِبًا فَرِهانٌ مَقبوضَةٌ ۖ فَإِن أَمِنَ بَعضُكُم بَعضًا فَليُؤَدِّ الَّذِي اؤتُمِنَ أَمانَتَهُ وَليَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ ۗ وَلا تَكتُمُوا الشَّهادَةَ ۚ وَمَن يَكتُمها فَإِنَّهُ آثِمٌ قَلبُهُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ عَليمٌ
blank: w-ʾ kuntum ʿalā safar w-lam tajidū kātib f-rihān maqbūḍat f-ʾ ʾamin baʿḍukum baʿḍ f-l-yuʾaddilladhī ʾtumin ʾamānatahū w-l-yattaq llāh rabbahū w-lā taktumū sh-shahādat w-m yaktumhā f-ʾinnahū ʾāthim qalbuhū w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And if you are on a journey and cannot find a scribe, then a security deposit should be taken. And if one of you entrusts another, then let him who is entrusted discharge his trust faithfully and let him fear Allah, his Lord. And do not conceal testimony, for whoever conceals it - his heart is indeed sinful, and Allah is Knowing of what you do

arabic_uthmani: لِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۗ وَإِن تُبدوا ما في أَنفُسِكُم أَو تُخفوهُ يُحاسِبكُم بِهِ اللَّهُ ۖ فَيَغفِرُ لِمَن يَشاءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشاءُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-ʾ tubdū mā fī ʾanfusikum ʾaw tukhfūh yuḥāsibkum bih llāh f-yaghfir l-m yashāʾ w-yuʿadhdhib m yashāʾ w-llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth. Whether you show what is within yourselves or conceal it, Allah will bring you to account for it. Then He will forgive whom He wills and punish whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: آمَنَ الرَّسولُ بِما أُنزِلَ إِلَيهِ مِن رَبِّهِ وَالمُؤمِنونَ ۚ كُلٌّ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَمَلائِكَتِهِ وَكُتُبِهِ وَرُسُلِهِ لا نُفَرِّقُ بَينَ أَحَدٍ مِن رُسُلِهِ ۚ وَقالوا سَمِعنا وَأَطَعنا ۖ غُفرانَكَ رَبَّنا وَإِلَيكَ المَصيرُ
blank: ʾāman r-rasūl b-mā ʾunzil ʾilayh m rabbihī w-l-muʾminūn kull ʾāman b-llāh w-malāʾikatihī w-kutubihī w-rusulihī lā nufarriq bayn ʾaḥad m rusulihī w-qālū samiʿnā w-ʾaṭaʿnā ghufrānak rabbanā w-ʾilaykal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: The Messenger has believed in what was revealed to him from his Lord, and so have the believers. All of them have believed in Allah and His angels and His books and His messengers, saying, "We make no distinction between any of His messengers." And they say, "We hear and we obey. We seek Your forgiveness, our Lord, and to You is the final destination

arabic_uthmani: لا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفسًا إِلّا وُسعَها ۚ لَها ما كَسَبَت وَعَلَيها مَا اكتَسَبَت ۗ رَبَّنا لا تُؤاخِذنا إِن نَسينا أَو أَخطَأنا ۚ رَبَّنا وَلا تَحمِل عَلَينا إِصرًا كَما حَمَلتَهُ عَلَى الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِنا ۚ رَبَّنا وَلا تُحَمِّلنا ما لا طاقَةَ لَنا بِهِ ۖ وَاعفُ عَنّا وَاغفِر لَنا وَارحَمنا ۚ أَنتَ مَولانا فَانصُرنا عَلَى القَومِ الكافِرينَ
blank: lā yukallif llāh nafs ʾillā wusʿahā lahā mā kasabat w-ʿalayhā mā ktasabat rabbanā lā tuʾākhidhnā ʾ nasīnā ʾaw ʾakhṭaʾnā rabbanā w-lā taḥmil ʿalaynā ʾiṣr k-mā ḥamaltahū ʿalālladhīn m qablinā rabbanā w-lā tuḥammilnā mā lā ṭāqat lanā bihī w-ʿf ʿannā w-ghfir lanā w-rḥamnā ʾant mawlānā f-nṣurnā ʿalāl-qawmil-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah does not charge a soul except with that within its capacity. It will have the consequence of what good it has gained, and it will bear the consequence of what evil it has earned. "Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred. Our Lord, and lay not upon us a burden like that which You laid upon those before us. Our Lord, and burden us not with that which we have no ability to bear. And pardon us; and forgive us; and have mercy upon us. You are our protector, so give us victory over the disbelieving people

arabic_uthmani: الم
blank: -l-m (ʾalif lām mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Meem

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ الحَيُّ القَيّومُ
blank: allāh lā ʾilāh ʾillā huwal-ḥayyul-qayyūm
english_saheeh_international: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence

arabic_uthmani: نَزَّلَ عَلَيكَ الكِتابَ بِالحَقِّ مُصَدِّقًا لِما بَينَ يَدَيهِ وَأَنزَلَ التَّوراةَ وَالإِنجيلَ
blank: nazzal ʿalaykal-kitāb b-l-ḥaqq muṣaddiq l-mā bayn yadayh w-ʾanzal t-tawrāt w-l-ʾinjīl
english_saheeh_international: He has sent down upon you, O Muhammad, the Book in truth, confirming what was before it. And He revealed the Torah and the Gospel

arabic_uthmani: مِن قَبلُ هُدًى لِلنّاسِ وَأَنزَلَ الفُرقانَ ۗ إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا بِآياتِ اللَّهِ لَهُم عَذابٌ شَديدٌ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَزيزٌ ذُو انتِقامٍ
blank: m qabl hud l-n-nās w-ʾanzalal-furqān ʾinnalladhīn kafarū b-ʾāyāt llāh lahum ʿadhāb shadīd w-llāh ʿazīz dhū ntiqām
english_saheeh_international: Before, as guidance for the people. And He revealed the Qur'an. Indeed, those who disbelieve in the verses of Allah will have a severe punishment, and Allah is exalted in Might, the Owner of Retribution

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَخفىٰ عَلَيهِ شَيءٌ فِي الأَرضِ وَلا فِي السَّماءِ
blank: ʾinn llāh lā yakhfā ʿalayh shayʾ fīl-ʾarḍ w-lā fī s-samāʾ
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, from Allah nothing is hidden in the earth nor in the heaven

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي يُصَوِّرُكُم فِي الأَرحامِ كَيفَ يَشاءُ ۚ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: huwalladhī yuṣawwirukum fīl-ʾarḥām kayf yashāʾ lā ʾilāh ʾillā huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: It is He who forms you in the wombs however He wills. There is no deity except Him, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي أَنزَلَ عَلَيكَ الكِتابَ مِنهُ آياتٌ مُحكَماتٌ هُنَّ أُمُّ الكِتابِ وَأُخَرُ مُتَشابِهاتٌ ۖ فَأَمَّا الَّذينَ في قُلوبِهِم زَيغٌ فَيَتَّبِعونَ ما تَشابَهَ مِنهُ ابتِغاءَ الفِتنَةِ وَابتِغاءَ تَأويلِهِ ۗ وَما يَعلَمُ تَأويلَهُ إِلَّا اللَّهُ ۗ وَالرّاسِخونَ فِي العِلمِ يَقولونَ آمَنّا بِهِ كُلٌّ مِن عِندِ رَبِّنا ۗ وَما يَذَّكَّرُ إِلّا أُولُو الأَلبابِ
blank: huwalladhī ʾanzal ʿalaykal-kitāb minh ʾāyāt muḥkamāt hunn ʾummul-kitāb w-ʾukhar mutashābihāt f-ʾammālladhīn fī qulūbihim zaygh f-yattabiʿūn mā tashābah minh btighāʾal-fitnat w-btighāʾ taʾwīlihī w-mā yaʿlam taʾwīlahū ʾillā llāh w-r-rāsikhūn fīl-ʿilm yaqūlūn ʾāmannā bihī kull m ʿind rabbinā w-mā yadhdhakkar ʾillā ʾulūl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: It is He who has sent down to you, O Muhammad, the Book; in it are verses that are precise - they are the foundation of the Book - and others unspecific. As for those in whose hearts is deviation from truth, they will follow that of it which is unspecific, seeking discord and seeking an interpretation suitable to them. And no one knows its true interpretation except Allah. But those firm in knowledge say, "We believe in it. All of it is from our Lord." And no one will be reminded except those of understanding

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا لا تُزِغ قُلوبَنا بَعدَ إِذ هَدَيتَنا وَهَب لَنا مِن لَدُنكَ رَحمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الوَهّابُ
blank: rabbanā lā tuzigh qulūbanā baʿd ʾidh hadaytanā w-hab lanā m ladunk raḥmat ʾinnak ʾantal-wahhāb
english_saheeh_international: Who say, "Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا إِنَّكَ جامِعُ النّاسِ لِيَومٍ لا رَيبَ فيهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُخلِفُ الميعادَ
blank: rabbanā ʾinnak jāmiʿ n-nās l-yawm lā rayb fīh ʾinn llāh lā yukhliful-mīʿād
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لَن تُغنِيَ عَنهُم أَموالُهُم وَلا أَولادُهُم مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيئًا ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُم وَقودُ النّارِ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū l tughniy ʿanhum ʾamwāluhum w-lā ʾawlāduhum min llāh shayʾ w-ʾulāʾik hum waqūd n-nār
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who disbelieve - never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. And it is they who are fuel for the Fire

arabic_uthmani: كَدَأبِ آلِ فِرعَونَ وَالَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا فَأَخَذَهُمُ اللَّهُ بِذُنوبِهِم ۗ وَاللَّهُ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: k-daʾb ʾāl firʿawn w-lladhīn m qablihim kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā f-ʾakhadhahum llāh b-dhunūbihim w-llāh shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: Theirs is like the custom of the people of Pharaoh and those before them. They denied Our signs, so Allah seized them for their sins. And Allah is severe in penalty

arabic_uthmani: قُل لِلَّذينَ كَفَروا سَتُغلَبونَ وَتُحشَرونَ إِلىٰ جَهَنَّمَ ۚ وَبِئسَ المِهادُ
blank: qul l-lladhīn kafarū s-tughlabūn w-tuḥsharūn ʾilā jahannam w-biʾsal-mihād
english_saheeh_international: Say to those who disbelieve, "You will be overcome and gathered together to Hell, and wretched is the resting place

arabic_uthmani: قَد كانَ لَكُم آيَةٌ في فِئَتَينِ التَقَتا ۖ فِئَةٌ تُقاتِلُ في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَأُخرىٰ كافِرَةٌ يَرَونَهُم مِثلَيهِم رَأيَ العَينِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُؤَيِّدُ بِنَصرِهِ مَن يَشاءُ ۗ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَعِبرَةً لِأُولِي الأَبصارِ
blank: qad kān lakum ʾāyat fī fiʾatayn ltaqatā fiʾat tuqātil fī sabīl llāh w-ʾukhrā kāfirat yarawnahum mithlayhim raʾyal-ʿayn w-llāh yuʾayyid b-naṣrihī m yashāʾ ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʿibrat l-ʾulīl-ʾabṣār
english_saheeh_international: Already there has been for you a sign in the two armies which met - one fighting in the cause of Allah and another of disbelievers. They saw them to be twice their own number by their eyesight. But Allah supports with His victory whom He wills. Indeed in that is a lesson for those of vision

arabic_uthmani: زُيِّنَ لِلنّاسِ حُبُّ الشَّهَواتِ مِنَ النِّساءِ وَالبَنينَ وَالقَناطيرِ المُقَنطَرَةِ مِنَ الذَّهَبِ وَالفِضَّةِ وَالخَيلِ المُسَوَّمَةِ وَالأَنعامِ وَالحَرثِ ۗ ذٰلِكَ مَتاعُ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ۖ وَاللَّهُ عِندَهُ حُسنُ المَآبِ
blank: zuyyin l-n-nās ḥubb sh-shahawāt min n-nisāʾ w-l-banīn w-l-qanāṭīril-muqanṭarat min dh-dhahab w-l-fiḍḍat w-l-khaylil-musawwamat w-l-ʾanʿām w-l-ḥarth dhālik matāʿul-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-llāh ʿindahū ḥusnul-maʾāb
english_saheeh_international: Beautified for people is the love of that which they desire - of women and sons, heaped-up sums of gold and silver, fine branded horses, and cattle and tilled land. That is the enjoyment of worldly life, but Allah has with Him the best return

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قُل أَؤُنَبِّئُكُم بِخَيرٍ مِن ذٰلِكُم ۚ لِلَّذينَ اتَّقَوا عِندَ رَبِّهِم جَنّاتٌ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها وَأَزواجٌ مُطَهَّرَةٌ وَرِضوانٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بَصيرٌ بِالعِبادِ
blank: qul ʾ-ʾunabbiʾukum b-khayr m dhālikum l-lladhīn ttaqaw ʿind rabbihim jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā w-ʾazwāj muṭahharat w-riḍwān min llāh w-llāh baṣīr b-l-ʿibād
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Shall I inform you of something better than that? For those who fear Allah will be gardens in the presence of their Lord beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally, and purified spouses and approval from Allah. And Allah is Seeing of His servants

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَقولونَ رَبَّنا إِنَّنا آمَنّا فَاغفِر لَنا ذُنوبَنا وَقِنا عَذابَ النّارِ
blank: alladhīn yaqūlūn rabbanā ʾinnanā ʾāmannā f-ghfir lanā dhunūbanā w-qinā ʿadhāb n-nār
english_saheeh_international: Those who say, "Our Lord, indeed we have believed, so forgive us our sins and protect us from the punishment of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: الصّابِرينَ وَالصّادِقينَ وَالقانِتينَ وَالمُنفِقينَ وَالمُستَغفِرينَ بِالأَسحارِ
blank: aṣ-ṣābirīn w-ṣ-ṣādiqīn w-l-qānitīn w-l-munfiqīn w-l-mustaghfirīn b-l-ʾasḥār
english_saheeh_international: The patient, the true, the obedient, those who spend in the way of Allah, and those who seek forgiveness before dawn

arabic_uthmani: شَهِدَ اللَّهُ أَنَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ وَالمَلائِكَةُ وَأُولُو العِلمِ قائِمًا بِالقِسطِ ۚ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: shahid llāh ʾannahū lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw w-l-malāʾikat w-ʾulūl-ʿilm qāʾim b-l-qisṭ lā ʾilāh ʾillā huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah witnesses that there is no deity except Him, and so do the angels and those of knowledge - that He is maintaining creation in justice. There is no deity except Him, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الدّينَ عِندَ اللَّهِ الإِسلامُ ۗ وَمَا اختَلَفَ الَّذينَ أوتُوا الكِتابَ إِلّا مِن بَعدِ ما جاءَهُمُ العِلمُ بَغيًا بَينَهُم ۗ وَمَن يَكفُر بِآياتِ اللَّهِ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ سَريعُ الحِسابِ
blank: ʾinn d-dīn ʿind llāhil-ʾislām w-mā khtalafalladhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb ʾillā m baʿd mā jāʾahumul-ʿilm baghy baynahum w-m yakfur b-ʾāyāt llāh f-ʾinn llāh sarīʿul-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the religion in the sight of Allah is Islam. And those who were given the Scripture did not differ except after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. And whoever disbelieves in the verses of Allah, then indeed, Allah is swift in taking account

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن حاجّوكَ فَقُل أَسلَمتُ وَجهِيَ لِلَّهِ وَمَنِ اتَّبَعَنِ ۗ وَقُل لِلَّذينَ أوتُوا الكِتابَ وَالأُمِّيّينَ أَأَسلَمتُم ۚ فَإِن أَسلَموا فَقَدِ اهتَدَوا ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَإِنَّما عَلَيكَ البَلاغُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بَصيرٌ بِالعِبادِ
blank: f-ʾ ḥājjūk f-qul ʾaslamt wajhiy l-llāh w-man ttabaʿan w-qul l-lladhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb w-l-ʾummiyyīn ʾ-ʾaslamtum f-ʾ ʾaslamū f-qad htadaw w-ʾ tawallaw f-ʾinnamā ʿalaykal-balāgh w-llāh baṣīr b-l-ʿibād
english_saheeh_international: So if they argue with you, say, "I have submitted myself to Allah in Islam, and so have those who follow me." And say to those who were given the Scripture and to the unlearned, "Have you submitted yourselves?" And if they submit in Islam, they are rightly guided; but if they turn away - then upon you is only the duty of notification. And Allah is Seeing of His servants

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَكفُرونَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ وَيَقتُلونَ النَّبِيّينَ بِغَيرِ حَقٍّ وَيَقتُلونَ الَّذينَ يَأمُرونَ بِالقِسطِ مِنَ النّاسِ فَبَشِّرهُم بِعَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yakfurūn b-ʾāyāt llāh w-yaqtulūn n-nabiyyīn b-ghayr ḥaqq w-yaqtulūnalladhīn yaʾmurūn b-l-qisṭ min n-nās f-bashshirhum b-ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Those who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and kill the prophets without right and kill those who order justice from among the people - give them tidings of a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ حَبِطَت أَعمالُهُم فِي الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةِ وَما لَهُم مِن ناصِرينَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn ḥabiṭat ʾaʿmāluhum fī d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat w-mā lahum m nāṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: They are the ones whose deeds have become worthless in this world and the Hereafter, and for them there will be no helpers

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ إِلَى الَّذينَ أوتوا نَصيبًا مِنَ الكِتابِ يُدعَونَ إِلىٰ كِتابِ اللَّهِ لِيَحكُمَ بَينَهُم ثُمَّ يَتَوَلّىٰ فَريقٌ مِنهُم وَهُم مُعرِضونَ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾilālladhīn ʾūtū naṣībam-minal-kitāb yudʿawn ʾilā kitāb llāh l-yaḥkum baynahum thumm yatawallā farīq minhum w-hum muʿriḍūn
english_saheeh_international: Do you not consider, O Muhammad, those who were given a portion of the Scripture? They are invited to the Scripture of Allah that it should arbitrate between them; then a party of them turns away, and they are refusing

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم قالوا لَن تَمَسَّنَا النّارُ إِلّا أَيّامًا مَعدوداتٍ ۖ وَغَرَّهُم في دينِهِم ما كانوا يَفتَرونَ
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahum qālū l tamassanā n-nār ʾillā ʾayyāmam-maʿdūdāt w-gharrahum fī dīnihim mā kānū yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: That is because they say, "Never will the Fire touch us except for a few numbered days," and because they were deluded in their religion by what they were inventing

arabic_uthmani: فَكَيفَ إِذا جَمَعناهُم لِيَومٍ لا رَيبَ فيهِ وَوُفِّيَت كُلُّ نَفسٍ ما كَسَبَت وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: f-kayf ʾidhā jamaʿnāhum l-yawm lā rayb fīh w-wuffiyat kull nafs mā kasabat w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So how will it be when We assemble them for a Day about which there is no doubt? And each soul will be compensated in full for what it earned, and they will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ اللَّهُمَّ مالِكَ المُلكِ تُؤتِي المُلكَ مَن تَشاءُ وَتَنزِعُ المُلكَ مِمَّن تَشاءُ وَتُعِزُّ مَن تَشاءُ وَتُذِلُّ مَن تَشاءُ ۖ بِيَدِكَ الخَيرُ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: qul llāhumm mālikal-mulk tuʾtīl-mulk m tashāʾ w-tanziʿul-mulk mimm tashāʾ w-tuʿizz m tashāʾ w-tudhill m tashāʾ b-yadikal-khayr ʾinnak ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O Allah, Owner of Sovereignty, You give sovereignty to whom You will and You take sovereignty away from whom You will. You honor whom You will and You humble whom You will. In Your hand is all good. Indeed, You are over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: تولِجُ اللَّيلَ فِي النَّهارِ وَتولِجُ النَّهارَ فِي اللَّيلِ ۖ وَتُخرِجُ الحَيَّ مِنَ المَيِّتِ وَتُخرِجُ المَيِّتَ مِنَ الحَيِّ ۖ وَتَرزُقُ مَن تَشاءُ بِغَيرِ حِسابٍ
blank: tūlijul-layl fī n-nahār w-tūlij n-nahār fīl-layl w-tukhrijul-ḥayy minal-mayyit w-tukhrijul-mayyit minal-ḥayy w-tarzuq m tashāʾ b-ghayr ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: You cause the night to enter the day, and You cause the day to enter the night; and You bring the living out of the dead, and You bring the dead out of the living. And You give provision to whom You will without account

arabic_uthmani: لا يَتَّخِذِ المُؤمِنونَ الكافِرينَ أَولِياءَ مِن دونِ المُؤمِنينَ ۖ وَمَن يَفعَل ذٰلِكَ فَلَيسَ مِنَ اللَّهِ في شَيءٍ إِلّا أَن تَتَّقوا مِنهُم تُقاةً ۗ وَيُحَذِّرُكُمُ اللَّهُ نَفسَهُ ۗ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ المَصيرُ
blank: lā yattakhidhil-muʾminūnal-kāfirīn ʾawliyāʾ m dūnil-muʾminīn w-m yafʿal dhālik f-lays min llāh fī shayʾ ʾillā ʾ tattaqū minhum tuqāt w-yuḥadhdhirukum llāh nafsahū w-ʾilā llāhil-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Let not believers take disbelievers as allies rather than believers. And whoever of you does that has nothing with Allah, except when taking precaution against them in prudence. And Allah warns you of Himself, and to Allah is the final destination

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِن تُخفوا ما في صُدورِكُم أَو تُبدوهُ يَعلَمهُ اللَّهُ ۗ وَيَعلَمُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: qul ʾ tukhfū mā fī ṣudūrikum ʾaw tubdūh yaʿlamh llāh w-yaʿlam mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Whether you conceal what is in your breasts or reveal it, Allah knows it. And He knows that which is in the heavens and that which is on the earth. And Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تَجِدُ كُلُّ نَفسٍ ما عَمِلَت مِن خَيرٍ مُحضَرًا وَما عَمِلَت مِن سوءٍ تَوَدُّ لَو أَنَّ بَينَها وَبَينَهُ أَمَدًا بَعيدًا ۗ وَيُحَذِّرُكُمُ اللَّهُ نَفسَهُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ رَءوفٌ بِالعِبادِ
blank: yawm tajid kull nafs mā ʿamilat m khayr muḥḍar w-mā ʿamilat m sūʾ tawadd law ʾann baynahā w-baynahū ʾamad baʿīd w-yuḥadhdhirukum llāh nafsahū w-llāh raʾūf b-l-ʿibād
english_saheeh_international: The Day every soul will find what it has done of good present before it and what it has done of evil, it will wish that between itself and that evil was a great distance. And Allah warns you of Himself, and Allah is Kind to His servants

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِن كُنتُم تُحِبّونَ اللَّهَ فَاتَّبِعوني يُحبِبكُمُ اللَّهُ وَيَغفِر لَكُم ذُنوبَكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: qul ʾ kuntum tuḥibbūn llāh f-ttabiʿūnī yuḥbibkum llāh w-yaghfir lakum dhunūbakum w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "If you should love Allah, then follow me, so Allah will love you and forgive you your sins. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَالرَّسولَ ۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُحِبُّ الكافِرينَ
blank: qul ʾaṭīʿū llāh w-r-rasūl f-ʾ tawallaw f-ʾinn llāh lā yuḥibbul-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Obey Allah and the Messenger." But if they turn away - then indeed, Allah does not like the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ اللَّهَ اصطَفىٰ آدَمَ وَنوحًا وَآلَ إِبراهيمَ وَآلَ عِمرانَ عَلَى العالَمينَ
blank: ʾinn llāh ṣṭafā ʾādam w-nūḥ w-ʾāl ʾibrāhīm w-ʾāl ʿimrān ʿalāl-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah chose Adam and Noah and the family of Abraham and the family of 'Imran over the worlds

arabic_uthmani: ذُرِّيَّةً بَعضُها مِن بَعضٍ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: dhurriyyat baʿḍuhā m baʿḍ w-llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Descendants, some of them from others. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَتِ امرَأَتُ عِمرانَ رَبِّ إِنّي نَذَرتُ لَكَ ما في بَطني مُحَرَّرًا فَتَقَبَّل مِنّي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: ʾidh qālat mraʾat ʿimrān rabb ʾinnī nadhart lak mā fī baṭnī muḥarrar f-taqabbal minnī ʾinnak ʾant s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Mention, O Muhammad, when the wife of 'Imran said, "My Lord, indeed I have pledged to You what is in my womb, consecrated for Your service, so accept this from me. Indeed, You are the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا وَضَعَتها قالَت رَبِّ إِنّي وَضَعتُها أُنثىٰ وَاللَّهُ أَعلَمُ بِما وَضَعَت وَلَيسَ الذَّكَرُ كَالأُنثىٰ ۖ وَإِنّي سَمَّيتُها مَريَمَ وَإِنّي أُعيذُها بِكَ وَذُرِّيَّتَها مِنَ الشَّيطانِ الرَّجيمِ
blank: f-lammā waḍaʿathā qālat rabb ʾinnī waḍaʿtuhā ʾunthā w-llāh ʾaʿlam b-mā waḍaʿat w-lays dh-dhakar k-l-ʾunthā w-ʾinnī sammaytuhā maryam w-ʾinnī ʾuʿīdhuhā bik w-dhurriyyatahā min sh-shayṭān r-rajīm
english_saheeh_international: But when she delivered her, she said, "My Lord, I have delivered a female." And Allah was most knowing of what she delivered, "And the male is not like the female. And I have named her Mary, and I seek refuge for her in You and for her descendants from Satan, the expelled from the mercy of Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَتَقَبَّلَها رَبُّها بِقَبولٍ حَسَنٍ وَأَنبَتَها نَباتًا حَسَنًا وَكَفَّلَها زَكَرِيّا ۖ كُلَّما دَخَلَ عَلَيها زَكَرِيَّا المِحرابَ وَجَدَ عِندَها رِزقًا ۖ قالَ يا مَريَمُ أَنّىٰ لَكِ هٰذا ۖ قالَت هُوَ مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَرزُقُ مَن يَشاءُ بِغَيرِ حِسابٍ
blank: f-taqabbalahā rabbuhā b-qabūl ḥasan w-ʾanbatahā nabāt ḥasan w-kaffalahā zakariyyā kullamā dakhal ʿalayhā zakariyyāl-miḥrāb wajad ʿindahā rizq qāl yā-maryam ʾannā lak hādhā qālat huw m ʿind llāh ʾinn llāh yarzuq m yashāʾ b-ghayr ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: So her Lord accepted her with good acceptance and caused her to grow in a good manner and put her in the care of Zechariah. Every time Zechariah entered upon her in the prayer chamber, he found with her provision. He said, "O Mary, from where is this coming to you?" She said, "It is from Allah. Indeed, Allah provides for whom He wills without account

arabic_uthmani: هُنالِكَ دَعا زَكَرِيّا رَبَّهُ ۖ قالَ رَبِّ هَب لي مِن لَدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً ۖ إِنَّكَ سَميعُ الدُّعاءِ
blank: hunālik daʿā zakariyyā rabbahū qāl rabb hab lī m ladunk dhurriyyat ṭayyibat ʾinnak samīʿ d-duʿāʾ
english_saheeh_international: At that, Zechariah called upon his Lord, saying, "My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication
