arabic_uthmani: فَنادَتهُ المَلائِكَةُ وَهُوَ قائِمٌ يُصَلّي فِي المِحرابِ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يُبَشِّرُكَ بِيَحيىٰ مُصَدِّقًا بِكَلِمَةٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَسَيِّدًا وَحَصورًا وَنَبِيًّا مِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: f-nādathul-malāʾikat w-huw qāʾim yuṣallī fīl-miḥrāb ʾann llāh yubashshiruk b-yaḥyā muṣaddiq b-kalimat min llāh w-sayyid w-ḥaṣūr w-nabiyyam-min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: So the angels called him while he was standing in prayer in the chamber, "Indeed, Allah gives you good tidings of John, confirming a word from Allah and who will be honorable, abstaining from women, and a prophet from among the righteous

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ أَنّىٰ يَكونُ لي غُلامٌ وَقَد بَلَغَنِيَ الكِبَرُ وَامرَأَتي عاقِرٌ ۖ قالَ كَذٰلِكَ اللَّهُ يَفعَلُ ما يَشاءُ
blank: qāl rabb ʾannā yakūn lī ghulām w-qad balaghaniyal-kibar w-mraʾatī ʿāqir qāl k-dhālik llāh yafʿal mā yashāʾ
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, how will I have a boy when I have reached old age and my wife is barren?" The angel said, "Such is Allah; He does what He wills

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ اجعَل لي آيَةً ۖ قالَ آيَتُكَ أَلّا تُكَلِّمَ النّاسَ ثَلاثَةَ أَيّامٍ إِلّا رَمزًا ۗ وَاذكُر رَبَّكَ كَثيرًا وَسَبِّح بِالعَشِيِّ وَالإِبكارِ
blank: qāl rabb jʿal lī ʾāyat qāl ʾāyatuk ʾallā tukallim n-nās thalāthat ʾayyām ʾillā ramz w-dhkur rabbak kathīr w-sabbiḥ b-l-ʿashiyy w-l-ʾibkār
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, make for me a sign." He Said, "Your sign is that you will not be able to speak to the people for three days except by gesture. And remember your Lord much and exalt Him with praise in the evening and the morning

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَتِ المَلائِكَةُ يا مَريَمُ إِنَّ اللَّهَ اصطَفاكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَاصطَفاكِ عَلىٰ نِساءِ العالَمينَ
blank: w-ʾidh qālatil-malāʾikat yā-maryam ʾinn llāh ṣṭafāk w-ṭahharak w-ṣṭafāk ʿalā nisāʾil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention when the angels said, "O Mary, indeed Allah has chosen you and purified you and chosen you above the women of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: يا مَريَمُ اقنُتي لِرَبِّكِ وَاسجُدي وَاركَعي مَعَ الرّاكِعينَ
blank: yā-maryam qnutī l-rabbik wasjudī w-rkaʿī maʿ r-rākiʿīn
english_saheeh_international: O Mary, be devoutly obedient to your Lord and prostrate and bow with those who bow in prayer

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ مِن أَنباءِ الغَيبِ نوحيهِ إِلَيكَ ۚ وَما كُنتَ لَدَيهِم إِذ يُلقونَ أَقلامَهُم أَيُّهُم يَكفُلُ مَريَمَ وَما كُنتَ لَدَيهِم إِذ يَختَصِمونَ
blank: dhālik m ʾanbāʾil-ghayb nūḥīh ʾilayk w-mā kunt ladayhim ʾidh yulqūn ʾaqlāmahum ʾayyuhum yakful maryam w-mā kunt ladayhim ʾidh yakhtaṣimūn
english_saheeh_international: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal to you, O Muhammad. And you were not with them when they cast their pens as to which of them should be responsible for Mary. Nor were you with them when they disputed

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَتِ المَلائِكَةُ يا مَريَمُ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُبَشِّرُكِ بِكَلِمَةٍ مِنهُ اسمُهُ المَسيحُ عيسَى ابنُ مَريَمَ وَجيهًا فِي الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةِ وَمِنَ المُقَرَّبينَ
blank: ʾidh qālatil-malāʾikat yā-maryam ʾinn llāh yubashshiruk b-kalimat minh smuhul-masīḥ ʿīsā bn maryam wajīh fī d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat w-minal-muqarrabīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention when the angels said, "O Mary, indeed Allah gives you good tidings of a word from Him, whose name will be the Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary - distinguished in this world and the Hereafter and among those brought near to Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَيُكَلِّمُ النّاسَ فِي المَهدِ وَكَهلًا وَمِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: w-yukallim n-nās fīl-mahd w-kahl w-min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: He will speak to the people in the cradle and in maturity and will be of the righteous

arabic_uthmani: قالَت رَبِّ أَنّىٰ يَكونُ لي وَلَدٌ وَلَم يَمسَسني بَشَرٌ ۖ قالَ كَذٰلِكِ اللَّهُ يَخلُقُ ما يَشاءُ ۚ إِذا قَضىٰ أَمرًا فَإِنَّما يَقولُ لَهُ كُن فَيَكونُ
blank: qālat rabb ʾannā yakūn lī walad w-lam yamsasnī bashar qāl k-dhālik llāh yakhluq mā yashāʾ ʾidhā qaḍā ʾamr f-ʾinnamā yaqūl lahū k f-yakūn
english_saheeh_international: She said, "My Lord, how will I have a child when no man has touched me?" The angel said, "Such is Allah; He creates what He wills. When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, 'Be,' and it is

arabic_uthmani: وَيُعَلِّمُهُ الكِتابَ وَالحِكمَةَ وَالتَّوراةَ وَالإِنجيلَ
blank: w-yuʿallimuhul-kitāb w-l-ḥikmat w-t-tawrāt w-l-ʾinjīl
english_saheeh_international: And He will teach him writing and wisdom and the Torah and the Gospel

arabic_uthmani: وَرَسولًا إِلىٰ بَني إِسرائيلَ أَنّي قَد جِئتُكُم بِآيَةٍ مِن رَبِّكُم ۖ أَنّي أَخلُقُ لَكُم مِنَ الطّينِ كَهَيئَةِ الطَّيرِ فَأَنفُخُ فيهِ فَيَكونُ طَيرًا بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ ۖ وَأُبرِئُ الأَكمَهَ وَالأَبرَصَ وَأُحيِي المَوتىٰ بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ ۖ وَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِما تَأكُلونَ وَما تَدَّخِرونَ في بُيوتِكُم ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لَكُم إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-rasūl ʾilā banī ʾisrāʾīl ʾannī qad jiʾtukum b-ʾāyat m rabbikum ʾannī ʾakhluq lakum min ṭ-ṭīn k-hayʾat ṭ-ṭayr f-ʾanfukh fīh f-yakūn ṭayr b-ʾidhn llāh w-ʾubriʾul-ʾakmah w-l-ʾabraṣ w-ʾuḥyil-mawtā b-ʾidhn llāh w-ʾunabbiʾukum b-mā taʾkulūn w-mā taddakhirūn fī buyūtikum ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat lakum ʾ kuntum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And make him a messenger to the Children of Israel, who will say, 'Indeed I have come to you with a sign from your Lord in that I design for you from clay that which is like the form of a bird, then I breathe into it and it becomes a bird by permission of Allah. And I cure the blind and the leper, and I give life to the dead - by permission of Allah. And I inform you of what you eat and what you store in your houses. Indeed in that is a sign for you, if you are believers

arabic_uthmani: وَمُصَدِّقًا لِما بَينَ يَدَيَّ مِنَ التَّوراةِ وَلِأُحِلَّ لَكُم بَعضَ الَّذي حُرِّمَ عَلَيكُم ۚ وَجِئتُكُم بِآيَةٍ مِن رَبِّكُم فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطيعونِ
blank: w-muṣaddiq l-mā bayn yadayy min t-tawrāt w-l-ʾuḥill lakum baʿḍalladhī ḥurrim ʿalaykum w-jiʾtukum b-ʾāyat m rabbikum f-ttaqū llāh w-ʾaṭīʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And I have come confirming what was before me of the Torah and to make lawful for you some of what was forbidden to you. And I have come to you with a sign from your Lord, so fear Allah and obey me

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ رَبّي وَرَبُّكُم فَاعبُدوهُ ۗ هٰذا صِراطٌ مُستَقيمٌ
blank: ʾinn llāh rabbī w-rabbukum f-ʿbudūh hādhā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is the straight path

arabic_uthmani: ۞ فَلَمّا أَحَسَّ عيسىٰ مِنهُمُ الكُفرَ قالَ مَن أَنصاري إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ قالَ الحَوارِيّونَ نَحنُ أَنصارُ اللَّهِ آمَنّا بِاللَّهِ وَاشهَد بِأَنّا مُسلِمونَ
blank: f-lammā ʾaḥass ʿīsā minhumul-kufr qāl m ʾanṣārī ʾilā llāh qālal-ḥawāriyyūn naḥn ʾanṣār llāh ʾāmannā b-llāh w-shhad b-ʾannā muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: But when Jesus felt persistence in disbelief from them, he said, "Who are my supporters for the cause of Allah?" The disciples said, "We are supporters for Allah. We have believed in Allah and testify that we are Muslims submitting to Him

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا آمَنّا بِما أَنزَلتَ وَاتَّبَعنَا الرَّسولَ فَاكتُبنا مَعَ الشّاهِدينَ
blank: rabbanā ʾāmannā b-mā ʾanzalt w-ttabaʿnā r-rasūl f-ktubnā maʿ sh-shāhidīn
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, we have believed in what You revealed and have followed the messenger Jesus, so register us among the witnesses to truth

arabic_uthmani: وَمَكَروا وَمَكَرَ اللَّهُ ۖ وَاللَّهُ خَيرُ الماكِرينَ
blank: w-makarū w-makar llāh w-llāh khayrul-mākirīn
english_saheeh_international: And the disbelievers planned, but Allah planned. And Allah is the best of planners

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَ اللَّهُ يا عيسىٰ إِنّي مُتَوَفّيكَ وَرافِعُكَ إِلَيَّ وَمُطَهِّرُكَ مِنَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَجاعِلُ الَّذينَ اتَّبَعوكَ فَوقَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا إِلىٰ يَومِ القِيامَةِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيَّ مَرجِعُكُم فَأَحكُمُ بَينَكُم فيما كُنتُم فيهِ تَختَلِفونَ
blank: ʾidh qāl llāh yā-ʿīsā ʾinnī mutawaffīk w-rāfiʿuk ʾilayy w-muṭahhiruk minalladhīn kafarū w-jāʿilulladhīn ttabaʿūk fawqalladhīn kafarū ʾilā yawmil-qiyāmat thumm ʾilayy marjiʿukum f-ʾaḥkum baynakum fī-mā kuntum fīh takhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: Mention when Allah said, "O Jesus, indeed I will take you and raise you to Myself and purify you from those who disbelieve and make those who follow you in submission to Allah alone superior to those who disbelieve until the Day of Resurrection. Then to Me is your return, and I will judge between you concerning that in which you used to differ

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمَّا الَّذينَ كَفَروا فَأُعَذِّبُهُم عَذابًا شَديدًا فِي الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةِ وَما لَهُم مِن ناصِرينَ
blank: f-ʾammālladhīn kafarū f-ʾuʿadhdhibuhum ʿadhāb shadīd fī d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat w-mā lahum m nāṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: And as for those who disbelieved, I will punish them with a severe punishment in this world and the Hereafter, and they will have no helpers

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ فَيُوَفّيهِم أُجورَهُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-ʾammālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt f-yuwaffīhim ʾujūrahum w-llāh lā yuḥibb ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: But as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, He will give them in full their rewards, and Allah does not like the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ نَتلوهُ عَلَيكَ مِنَ الآياتِ وَالذِّكرِ الحَكيمِ
blank: dhālik natlūh ʿalayk minal-ʾāyāt w-dh-dhikril-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: This is what We recite to you, O Muhammad, of Our verses and the precise and wise message

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ مَثَلَ عيسىٰ عِندَ اللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ آدَمَ ۖ خَلَقَهُ مِن تُرابٍ ثُمَّ قالَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكونُ
blank: ʾinn mathal ʿīsā ʿind llāh k-mathal ʾādam khalaqahū m turāb thumm qāl lahū k f-yakūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the example of Jesus to Allah is like that of Adam. He created Him from dust; then He said to him, "Be," and he was

arabic_uthmani: الحَقُّ مِن رَبِّكَ فَلا تَكُن مِنَ المُمتَرينَ
blank: al-ḥaqq m rabbik f-lā tak minal-mumtarīn
english_saheeh_international: The truth is from your Lord, so do not be among the doubters

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن حاجَّكَ فيهِ مِن بَعدِ ما جاءَكَ مِنَ العِلمِ فَقُل تَعالَوا نَدعُ أَبناءَنا وَأَبناءَكُم وَنِساءَنا وَنِساءَكُم وَأَنفُسَنا وَأَنفُسَكُم ثُمَّ نَبتَهِل فَنَجعَل لَعنَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَى الكاذِبينَ
blank: f-m ḥājjak fīh m baʿd mā jāʾak minal-ʿilm f-qul taʿālaw nadʿ ʾabnāʾanā w-ʾabnāʾakum w-nisāʾanā w-nisāʾakum w-ʾanfusanā w-ʾanfusakum thumm nabtahil f-najʿal laʿnat llāh ʿalāl-kādhibīn
english_saheeh_international: Then whoever argues with you about it after this knowledge has come to you - say, "Come, let us call our sons and your sons, our women and your women, ourselves and yourselves, then supplicate earnestly together and invoke the curse of Allah upon the liars among us

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذا لَهُوَ القَصَصُ الحَقُّ ۚ وَما مِن إِلٰهٍ إِلَّا اللَّهُ ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: ʾinn hādhā l-huwal-qaṣaṣul-ḥaqq w-mā m ʾilāh ʾillā llāh w-ʾinn llāh l-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, this is the true narration. And there is no deity except Allah. And indeed, Allah is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ بِالمُفسِدينَ
blank: f-ʾ tawallaw f-ʾinn llāh ʿalīm b-l-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: But if they turn away, then indeed - Allah is Knowing of the corrupters

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا أَهلَ الكِتابِ تَعالَوا إِلىٰ كَلِمَةٍ سَواءٍ بَينَنا وَبَينَكُم أَلّا نَعبُدَ إِلَّا اللَّهَ وَلا نُشرِكَ بِهِ شَيئًا وَلا يَتَّخِذَ بَعضُنا بَعضًا أَربابًا مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَقولُوا اشهَدوا بِأَنّا مُسلِمونَ
blank: qul yā-ʾahlal-kitāb taʿālaw ʾilā kalimat sawāʾ baynanā w-baynakum ʾallā naʿbud ʾillā llāh w-lā nushrik bihī shayʾ w-lā yattakhidh baʿḍunā baʿḍ ʾarbābam-m dūn llāh f-ʾ tawallaw f-qūlū shhadū b-ʾannā muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O People of the Scripture, come to a word that is equitable between us and you - that we will not worship except Allah and not associate anything with Him and not take one another as lords instead of Allah." But if they turn away, then say, "Bear witness that we are Muslims submitting to Him

arabic_uthmani: يا أَهلَ الكِتابِ لِمَ تُحاجّونَ في إِبراهيمَ وَما أُنزِلَتِ التَّوراةُ وَالإِنجيلُ إِلّا مِن بَعدِهِ ۚ أَفَلا تَعقِلونَ
blank: yā-ʾahlal-kitāb l-m tuḥājjūn fī ʾibrāhīm w-mā ʾunzilat t-tawrāt w-l-ʾinjīl ʾillā m baʿdihī ʾ-f-lā taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: O People of the Scripture, why do you argue about Abraham while the Torah and the Gospel were not revealed until after him? Then will you not reason

arabic_uthmani: ها أَنتُم هٰؤُلاءِ حاجَجتُم فيما لَكُم بِهِ عِلمٌ فَلِمَ تُحاجّونَ فيما لَيسَ لَكُم بِهِ عِلمٌ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ وَأَنتُم لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: hā-ʾantum hāʾulāʾ ḥājajtum fī-mā lakum bihī ʿilm f-l-m tuḥājjūn fī-mā lays lakum bihī ʿilm w-llāh yaʿlam w-ʾantum lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Here you are - those who have argued about that of which you have some knowledge, but why do you argue about that of which you have no knowledge? And Allah knows, while you know not

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ إِبراهيمُ يَهودِيًّا وَلا نَصرانِيًّا وَلٰكِن كانَ حَنيفًا مُسلِمًا وَما كانَ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: mā kān ʾibrāhīm yahūdiyy w-lā naṣrāniyy w-lāk kān ḥanīfam-muslim w-mā kān minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Abraham was neither a Jew nor a Christian, but he was one inclining toward truth, a Muslim submitting to Allah. And he was not of the polytheists

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ أَولَى النّاسِ بِإِبراهيمَ لَلَّذينَ اتَّبَعوهُ وَهٰذَا النَّبِيُّ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا ۗ وَاللَّهُ وَلِيُّ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinn ʾawlā n-nās b-ʾibrāhīm l-lladhīn ttabaʿūh w-hādhā n-nabiyy w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-llāh waliyyul-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the most worthy of Abraham among the people are those who followed him in submission to Allah and this prophet, and those who believe in his message. And Allah is the ally of the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَدَّت طائِفَةٌ مِن أَهلِ الكِتابِ لَو يُضِلّونَكُم وَما يُضِلّونَ إِلّا أَنفُسَهُم وَما يَشعُرونَ
blank: waddat ṭāʾifat m ʾahlil-kitāb law yuḍillūnakum w-mā yuḍillūn ʾillā ʾanfusahum w-mā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: A faction of the people of the Scripture wish they could mislead you. But they do not mislead except themselves, and they perceive it not

arabic_uthmani: يا أَهلَ الكِتابِ لِمَ تَكفُرونَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ وَأَنتُم تَشهَدونَ
blank: yā-ʾahlal-kitāb l-m takfurūn b-ʾāyāt llāh w-ʾantum tashhadūn
english_saheeh_international: O People of the Scripture, why do you disbelieve in the verses of Allah while you witness to their truth

arabic_uthmani: يا أَهلَ الكِتابِ لِمَ تَلبِسونَ الحَقَّ بِالباطِلِ وَتَكتُمونَ الحَقَّ وَأَنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: yā-ʾahlal-kitāb l-m talbisūnal-ḥaqq b-l-bāṭil w-taktumūnal-ḥaqq w-ʾantum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: O People of the Scripture, why do you confuse the truth with falsehood and conceal the truth while you know it

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَت طائِفَةٌ مِن أَهلِ الكِتابِ آمِنوا بِالَّذي أُنزِلَ عَلَى الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَجهَ النَّهارِ وَاكفُروا آخِرَهُ لَعَلَّهُم يَرجِعونَ
blank: w-qālat ṭāʾifat m ʾahlil-kitāb ʾāminū b-lladhī ʾunzil ʿalālladhīn ʾāmanū wajh n-nahār w-kfurū ʾākhirahū laʿallahum yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And a faction of the People of the Scripture say to each other, "Believe in that which was revealed to the believers at the beginning of the day and reject it at its end that perhaps they will abandon their religion

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تُؤمِنوا إِلّا لِمَن تَبِعَ دينَكُم قُل إِنَّ الهُدىٰ هُدَى اللَّهِ أَن يُؤتىٰ أَحَدٌ مِثلَ ما أوتيتُم أَو يُحاجّوكُم عِندَ رَبِّكُم ۗ قُل إِنَّ الفَضلَ بِيَدِ اللَّهِ يُؤتيهِ مَن يَشاءُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ واسِعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-lā tuʾminū ʾillā l-m tabiʿ dīnakum qul ʾinnal-hudā hudā llāh ʾ yuʾtā ʾaḥad mithl mā ʾūtītum ʾaw yuḥājjūkum ʿind rabbikum qul ʾinnal-faḍl b-yad llāh yuʾtīh m yashāʾ w-llāh wāsiʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And do not trust except those who follow your religion." Say, "Indeed, the true guidance is the guidance of Allah. Do you fear lest someone be given knowledge like you were given or that they would thereby argue with you before your Lord?" Say, "Indeed, all bounty is in the hand of Allah - He grants it to whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: يَختَصُّ بِرَحمَتِهِ مَن يَشاءُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الفَضلِ العَظيمِ
blank: yakhtaṣṣ b-raḥmatihī m yashāʾ w-llāh dhūl-faḍlil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: He selects for His mercy whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَمِن أَهلِ الكِتابِ مَن إِن تَأمَنهُ بِقِنطارٍ يُؤَدِّهِ إِلَيكَ وَمِنهُم مَن إِن تَأمَنهُ بِدينارٍ لا يُؤَدِّهِ إِلَيكَ إِلّا ما دُمتَ عَلَيهِ قائِمًا ۗ ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم قالوا لَيسَ عَلَينا فِي الأُمِّيّينَ سَبيلٌ وَيَقولونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ الكَذِبَ وَهُم يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-m ʾahlil-kitāb m ʾ taʾmanh b-qinṭār yuʾaddihī ʾilayk w-minhum m ʾ taʾmanh b-dīnār lā yuʾaddihī ʾilayk ʾillā mā dumt ʿalayh qāʾim dhālik b-ʾannahum qālū lays ʿalaynā fīl-ʾummiyyīn sabīl w-yaqūlūn ʿalā llāhil-kadhib w-hum yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And among the People of the Scripture is he who, if you entrust him with a great amount of wealth, he will return it to you. And among them is he who, if you entrust him with a single silver coin, he will not return it to you unless you are constantly standing over him demanding it. That is because they say, "There is no blame upon us concerning the unlearned." And they speak untruth about Allah while they know it

arabic_uthmani: بَلىٰ مَن أَوفىٰ بِعَهدِهِ وَاتَّقىٰ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ المُتَّقينَ
blank: balā m ʾawfā b-ʿahdihī w-ttaqā f-ʾinn llāh yuḥibbul-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: But yes, whoever fulfills his commitment and fears Allah - then indeed, Allah loves those who fear Him

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَشتَرونَ بِعَهدِ اللَّهِ وَأَيمانِهِم ثَمَنًا قَليلًا أُولٰئِكَ لا خَلاقَ لَهُم فِي الآخِرَةِ وَلا يُكَلِّمُهُمُ اللَّهُ وَلا يَنظُرُ إِلَيهِم يَومَ القِيامَةِ وَلا يُزَكّيهِم وَلَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yashtarūn b-ʿahd llāh w-ʾaymānihim thaman qalīl ʾulāʾik lā khalāq lahum fīl-ʾākhirat w-lā yukallimuhum llāh w-lā yanẓur ʾilayhim yawmal-qiyāmat w-lā yuzakkīhim w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who exchange the covenant of Allah and their own oaths for a small price will have no share in the Hereafter, and Allah will not speak to them or look at them on the Day of Resurrection, nor will He purify them; and they will have a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ مِنهُم لَفَريقًا يَلوونَ أَلسِنَتَهُم بِالكِتابِ لِتَحسَبوهُ مِنَ الكِتابِ وَما هُوَ مِنَ الكِتابِ وَيَقولونَ هُوَ مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ وَما هُوَ مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ وَيَقولونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ الكَذِبَ وَهُم يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾinn minhum l-farīq yalwūn ʾalsinatahum b-l-kitāb l-taḥsabūh minal-kitāb w-mā huw minal-kitāb w-yaqūlūn huw m ʿind llāh w-mā huw m ʿind llāh w-yaqūlūn ʿalā llāhil-kadhib w-hum yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, there is among them a party who alter the Scripture with their tongues so you may think it is from the Scripture, but it is not from the Scripture. And they say, "This is from Allah," but it is not from Allah. And they speak untruth about Allah while they know

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ لِبَشَرٍ أَن يُؤتِيَهُ اللَّهُ الكِتابَ وَالحُكمَ وَالنُّبُوَّةَ ثُمَّ يَقولَ لِلنّاسِ كونوا عِبادًا لي مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَلٰكِن كونوا رَبّانِيّينَ بِما كُنتُم تُعَلِّمونَ الكِتابَ وَبِما كُنتُم تَدرُسونَ
blank: mā kān l-bashar ʾ yuʾtiyah llāhul-kitāb w-l-ḥukm w-n-nubuwwat thumm yaqūl l-n-nās kūnū ʿibād lī m dūn llāh w-lāk kūnū rabbāniyyīn b-mā kuntum tuʿallimūnal-kitāb w-b-mā kuntum tadrusūn
english_saheeh_international: It is not for a human prophet that Allah should give him the Scripture and authority and prophethood and then he would say to the people, "Be servants to me rather than Allah," but instead, he would say, "Be pious scholars of the Lord because of what you have taught of the Scripture and because of what you have studied

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَأمُرَكُم أَن تَتَّخِذُوا المَلائِكَةَ وَالنَّبِيّينَ أَربابًا ۗ أَيَأمُرُكُم بِالكُفرِ بَعدَ إِذ أَنتُم مُسلِمونَ
blank: w-lā yaʾmurakum ʾ tattakhidhūl-malāʾikat w-n-nabiyyīn ʾarbāb ʾ-yaʾmurukum b-l-kufr baʿd ʾidh ʾantum muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: Nor could he order you to take the angels and prophets as lords. Would he order you to disbelief after you had been Muslims

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ أَخَذَ اللَّهُ ميثاقَ النَّبِيّينَ لَما آتَيتُكُم مِن كِتابٍ وَحِكمَةٍ ثُمَّ جاءَكُم رَسولٌ مُصَدِّقٌ لِما مَعَكُم لَتُؤمِنُنَّ بِهِ وَلَتَنصُرُنَّهُ ۚ قالَ أَأَقرَرتُم وَأَخَذتُم عَلىٰ ذٰلِكُم إِصري ۖ قالوا أَقرَرنا ۚ قالَ فَاشهَدوا وَأَنا مَعَكُم مِنَ الشّاهِدينَ
blank: w-ʾidh ʾakhadh llāh mīthāq n-nabiyyīn l-mā ʾātaytukum m kitāb w-ḥikmat thumm jāʾakum rasūl muṣaddiq l-mā maʿakum l-tuʾminunn bihī w-l-tanṣurunnahū qāl ʾ-ʾaqrartum w-ʾakhadhtum ʿalā dhālikum ʾiṣrī qālū ʾaqrarnā qāl f-shhadū w-ʾan maʿakum min sh-shāhidīn
english_saheeh_international: And recall, O People of the Scripture, when Allah took the covenant of the prophets, saying, "Whatever I give you of the Scripture and wisdom and then there comes to you a messenger confirming what is with you, you must believe in him and support him." Allah said, "Have you acknowledged and taken upon that My commitment?" They said, "We have acknowledged it." He said, "Then bear witness, and I am with you among the witnesses

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن تَوَلّىٰ بَعدَ ذٰلِكَ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الفاسِقونَ
blank: f-m tawallā baʿd dhālik f-ʾulāʾik humul-fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: And whoever turned away after that - they were the defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: أَفَغَيرَ دينِ اللَّهِ يَبغونَ وَلَهُ أَسلَمَ مَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ طَوعًا وَكَرهًا وَإِلَيهِ يُرجَعونَ
blank: ʾ-f-ghayr dīn llāh yabghūn w-lahū ʾaslam m fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ṭawʿ w-karh w-ʾilayh yurjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: So is it other than the religion of Allah they desire, while to Him have submitted all those within the heavens and earth, willingly or by compulsion, and to Him they will be returned

arabic_uthmani: قُل آمَنّا بِاللَّهِ وَما أُنزِلَ عَلَينا وَما أُنزِلَ عَلىٰ إِبراهيمَ وَإِسماعيلَ وَإِسحاقَ وَيَعقوبَ وَالأَسباطِ وَما أوتِيَ موسىٰ وَعيسىٰ وَالنَّبِيّونَ مِن رَبِّهِم لا نُفَرِّقُ بَينَ أَحَدٍ مِنهُم وَنَحنُ لَهُ مُسلِمونَ
blank: qul ʾāmannā b-llāh w-mā ʾunzil ʿalaynā w-mā ʾunzil ʿalā ʾibrāhīm w-ʾismāʿīl w-ʾisḥāq w-yaʿqūb w-l-ʾasbāṭ w-mā ʾūtiy mūsā w-ʿīsā w-n-nabiyyūn m rabbihim lā nufarriq bayn ʾaḥad minhum w-naḥn lahū muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "We have believed in Allah and in what was revealed to us and what was revealed to Abraham, Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, and the Descendants, and in what was given to Moses and Jesus and to the prophets from their Lord. We make no distinction between any of them, and we are Muslims submitting to Him

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن يَبتَغِ غَيرَ الإِسلامِ دينًا فَلَن يُقبَلَ مِنهُ وَهُوَ فِي الآخِرَةِ مِنَ الخاسِرينَ
blank: w-m yabtagh ghayral-ʾislām dīn f-l yuqbal minh w-huw fīl-ʾākhirat minal-khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: And whoever desires other than Islam as religion - never will it be accepted from him, and he, in the Hereafter, will be among the losers

arabic_uthmani: كَيفَ يَهدِي اللَّهُ قَومًا كَفَروا بَعدَ إيمانِهِم وَشَهِدوا أَنَّ الرَّسولَ حَقٌّ وَجاءَهُمُ البَيِّناتُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: kayf yahdī llāh qawm kafarū baʿd ʾīmānihim w-shahidū ʾann r-rasūl ḥaqq w-jāʾahumul-bayyināt w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: How shall Allah guide a people who disbelieved after their belief and had witnessed that the Messenger is true and clear signs had come to them? And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ جَزاؤُهُم أَنَّ عَلَيهِم لَعنَةَ اللَّهِ وَالمَلائِكَةِ وَالنّاسِ أَجمَعينَ
blank: ʾulāʾik jazāʾuhum ʾann ʿalayhim laʿnat llāh w-l-malāʾikat w-n-nās ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Those - their recompense will be that upon them is the curse of Allah and the angels and the people, all together

arabic_uthmani: خالِدينَ فيها لا يُخَفَّفُ عَنهُمُ العَذابُ وَلا هُم يُنظَرونَ
blank: khālidīn fīhā lā yukhaffaf ʿanhumul-ʿadhāb w-lā hum yunẓarūn
english_saheeh_international: Abiding eternally therein. The punishment will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا الَّذينَ تابوا مِن بَعدِ ذٰلِكَ وَأَصلَحوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: ʾillālladhīn tābū m baʿd dhālik w-ʾaṣlaḥū f-ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Except for those who repent after that and correct themselves. For indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا بَعدَ إيمانِهِم ثُمَّ ازدادوا كُفرًا لَن تُقبَلَ تَوبَتُهُم وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الضّالّونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū baʿd ʾīmānihim thumm zdādū kufr l tuqbal tawbatuhum w-ʾulāʾik hum ḍ-ḍāllūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who reject the message after their belief and then increase in disbelief - never will their claimed repentance be accepted, and they are the ones astray

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَماتوا وَهُم كُفّارٌ فَلَن يُقبَلَ مِن أَحَدِهِم مِلءُ الأَرضِ ذَهَبًا وَلَوِ افتَدىٰ بِهِ ۗ أُولٰئِكَ لَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ وَما لَهُم مِن ناصِرينَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū w-mātū w-hum kuffār f-l yuqbal m ʾaḥadihim milʾul-ʾarḍ dhahab w-law ftadā bihī ʾulāʾik lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm w-mā lahum m nāṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who disbelieve and die while they are disbelievers - never would the whole capacity of the earth in gold be accepted from one of them if he would seek to ransom himself with it. For those there will be a painful punishment, and they will have no helpers

arabic_uthmani: لَن تَنالُوا البِرَّ حَتّىٰ تُنفِقوا مِمّا تُحِبّونَ ۚ وَما تُنفِقوا مِن شَيءٍ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِهِ عَليمٌ
blank: l tanālūl-birr ḥattā tunfiqū mimmā tuḥibbūn w-mā tunfiqū m shayʾ f-ʾinn llāh bihī ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Never will you attain the good reward until you spend in the way of Allah from that which you love. And whatever you spend - indeed, Allah is Knowing of it

arabic_uthmani: ۞ كُلُّ الطَّعامِ كانَ حِلًّا لِبَني إِسرائيلَ إِلّا ما حَرَّمَ إِسرائيلُ عَلىٰ نَفسِهِ مِن قَبلِ أَن تُنَزَّلَ التَّوراةُ ۗ قُل فَأتوا بِالتَّوراةِ فَاتلوها إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: kull ṭ-ṭaʿām kān ḥill l-banī ʾisrāʾīl ʾillā mā ḥarram ʾisrāʾīl ʿalā nafsihī m qabl ʾ tunazzal t-tawrāt qul f-ʾtū b-t-tawrāt f-tlūhā ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: All food was lawful to the Children of Israel except what Israel had made unlawful to himself before the Torah was revealed. Say, O Muhammad, "So bring the Torah and recite it, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: فَمَنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ الكَذِبَ مِن بَعدِ ذٰلِكَ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: f-man ftarā ʿalā llāhil-kadhib m baʿd dhālik f-ʾulāʾik hum ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: And whoever invents about Allah untruth after that - then those are truly the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: قُل صَدَقَ اللَّهُ ۗ فَاتَّبِعوا مِلَّةَ إِبراهيمَ حَنيفًا وَما كانَ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: qul ṣadaq llāh f-ttabiʿū millat ʾibrāhīm ḥanīf w-mā kān minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Allah has told the truth. So follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of the polytheists

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ أَوَّلَ بَيتٍ وُضِعَ لِلنّاسِ لَلَّذي بِبَكَّةَ مُبارَكًا وَهُدًى لِلعالَمينَ
blank: ʾinn ʾawwal bayt wuḍiʿ l-n-nās l-lladhī b-bakkat mubārak w-hud l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the first House of worship established for mankind was that at Makkah - blessed and a guidance for the worlds

arabic_uthmani: فيهِ آياتٌ بَيِّناتٌ مَقامُ إِبراهيمَ ۖ وَمَن دَخَلَهُ كانَ آمِنًا ۗ وَلِلَّهِ عَلَى النّاسِ حِجُّ البَيتِ مَنِ استَطاعَ إِلَيهِ سَبيلًا ۚ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنِ العالَمينَ
blank: fīh ʾāyāt bayyināt maqām ʾibrāhīm w-m dakhalahū kān ʾāmin w-l-llāh ʿalā n-nās ḥijjul-bayt man staṭāʿ ʾilayh sabīl w-m kafar f-ʾinn llāh ghaniyy ʿanil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: In it are clear signs such as the standing place of Abraham. And whoever enters it shall be safe. And due to Allah from the people is a pilgrimage to the House - for whoever is able to find thereto a way. But whoever disbelieves - then indeed, Allah is free from need of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا أَهلَ الكِتابِ لِمَ تَكفُرونَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ شَهيدٌ عَلىٰ ما تَعمَلونَ
blank: qul yā-ʾahlal-kitāb l-m takfurūn b-ʾāyāt llāh w-llāh shahīd ʿalā mā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O People of the Scripture, why do you disbelieve in the verses of Allah while Allah is Witness over what you do

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا أَهلَ الكِتابِ لِمَ تَصُدّونَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ مَن آمَنَ تَبغونَها عِوَجًا وَأَنتُم شُهَداءُ ۗ وَمَا اللَّهُ بِغافِلٍ عَمّا تَعمَلونَ
blank: qul yā-ʾahlal-kitāb l-m taṣuddūn ʿ sabīl llāh m ʾāman tabghūnahā ʿiwaj w-ʾantum shuhadāʾ w-mā llāh b-ghāfil ʿammā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O People of the Scripture, why do you avert from the way of Allah those who believe, seeking to make it seem deviant, while you are witnesses to the truth? And Allah is not unaware of what you do

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِن تُطيعوا فَريقًا مِنَ الَّذينَ أوتُوا الكِتابَ يَرُدّوكُم بَعدَ إيمانِكُم كافِرينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾ tuṭīʿū farīqam-minalladhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb yaruddūkum baʿd ʾīmānikum kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, if you obey a party of those who were given the Scripture, they would turn you back, after your belief, to being unbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَكَيفَ تَكفُرونَ وَأَنتُم تُتلىٰ عَلَيكُم آياتُ اللَّهِ وَفيكُم رَسولُهُ ۗ وَمَن يَعتَصِم بِاللَّهِ فَقَد هُدِيَ إِلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: w-kayf takfurūn w-ʾantum tutlā ʿalaykum ʾāyāt llāh w-fīkum rasūluhū w-m yaʿtaṣim b-llāh f-qad hudiy ʾilā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And how could you disbelieve while to you are being recited the verses of Allah and among you is His Messenger? And whoever holds firmly to Allah has indeed been guided to a straight path

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ حَقَّ تُقاتِهِ وَلا تَموتُنَّ إِلّا وَأَنتُم مُسلِمونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ttaqū llāh ḥaqq tuqātihī w-lā tamūtunn ʾillā w-ʾantum muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, fear Allah as He should be feared and do not die except as Muslims in submission to Him

arabic_uthmani: وَاعتَصِموا بِحَبلِ اللَّهِ جَميعًا وَلا تَفَرَّقوا ۚ وَاذكُروا نِعمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيكُم إِذ كُنتُم أَعداءً فَأَلَّفَ بَينَ قُلوبِكُم فَأَصبَحتُم بِنِعمَتِهِ إِخوانًا وَكُنتُم عَلىٰ شَفا حُفرَةٍ مِنَ النّارِ فَأَنقَذَكُم مِنها ۗ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُم آياتِهِ لَعَلَّكُم تَهتَدونَ
blank: w-ʿtaṣimū b-ḥabl llāh jamīʿ w-lā tafarraqū w-dhkurū niʿmat llāh ʿalaykum ʾidh kuntum ʾaʿdāʾ f-ʾallaf bayn qulūbikum f-ʾaṣbaḥtum b-niʿmatihī ʾikhwān w-kuntum ʿalā shafā ḥufrat min n-nār f-ʾanqadhakum minhā k-dhālik yubayyin llāh lakum ʾāyātihī laʿallakum tahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And hold firmly to the rope of Allah all together and do not become divided. And remember the favor of Allah upon you - when you were enemies and He brought your hearts together and you became, by His favor, brothers. And you were on the edge of a pit of the Fire, and He saved you from it. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses that you may be guided

arabic_uthmani: وَلتَكُن مِنكُم أُمَّةٌ يَدعونَ إِلَى الخَيرِ وَيَأمُرونَ بِالمَعروفِ وَيَنهَونَ عَنِ المُنكَرِ ۚ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: w-l-tak minkum ʾummat yadʿūn ʾilāl-khayr w-yaʾmurūn b-l-maʿrūf w-yanhawn ʿanil-munkar w-ʾulāʾik humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And let there be arising from you a nation inviting to all that is good, enjoining what is right and forbidding what is wrong, and those will be the successful

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَكونوا كَالَّذينَ تَفَرَّقوا وَاختَلَفوا مِن بَعدِ ما جاءَهُمُ البَيِّناتُ ۚ وَأُولٰئِكَ لَهُم عَذابٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: w-lā takūnū k-lladhīn tafarraqū w-khtalafū m baʿd mā jāʾahumul-bayyināt w-ʾulāʾik lahum ʿadhāb ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And do not be like the ones who became divided and differed after the clear proofs had come to them. And those will have a great punishment

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تَبيَضُّ وُجوهٌ وَتَسوَدُّ وُجوهٌ ۚ فَأَمَّا الَّذينَ اسوَدَّت وُجوهُهُم أَكَفَرتُم بَعدَ إيمانِكُم فَذوقُوا العَذابَ بِما كُنتُم تَكفُرونَ
blank: yawm tabyaḍḍ wujūh w-taswadd wujūh f-ʾammālladhīn swaddat wujūhuhum ʾ-kafartum baʿd ʾīmānikum f-dhūqūl-ʿadhāb b-mā kuntum takfurūn
english_saheeh_international: On the Day some faces will turn white and some faces will turn black. As for those whose faces turn black, to them it will be said, "Did you disbelieve after your belief? Then taste the punishment for what you used to reject

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمَّا الَّذينَ ابيَضَّت وُجوهُهُم فَفي رَحمَةِ اللَّهِ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: w-ʾammālladhīn byaḍḍat wujūhuhum f-fī raḥmat llāh hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: But as for those whose faces will turn white, they will be within the mercy of Allah. They will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: تِلكَ آياتُ اللَّهِ نَتلوها عَلَيكَ بِالحَقِّ ۗ وَمَا اللَّهُ يُريدُ ظُلمًا لِلعالَمينَ
blank: tilk ʾāyāt llāh natlūhā ʿalayk b-l-ḥaqq w-mā llāh yurīd ẓulm l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: These are the verses of Allah. We recite them to you, O Muhammad, in truth; and Allah wants no injustice to the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرجَعُ الأُمورُ
blank: w-l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-ʾilā llāh turjaʿul-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And to Allah will all matters be returned

arabic_uthmani: كُنتُم خَيرَ أُمَّةٍ أُخرِجَت لِلنّاسِ تَأمُرونَ بِالمَعروفِ وَتَنهَونَ عَنِ المُنكَرِ وَتُؤمِنونَ بِاللَّهِ ۗ وَلَو آمَنَ أَهلُ الكِتابِ لَكانَ خَيرًا لَهُم ۚ مِنهُمُ المُؤمِنونَ وَأَكثَرُهُمُ الفاسِقونَ
blank: kuntum khayr ʾummat ʾukhrijat l-n-nās taʾmurūn b-l-maʿrūf w-tanhawn ʿanil-munkar w-tuʾminūn b-l-llāh w-law ʾāman ʾahlul-kitāb l-kān khayr lahum minhumul-muʾminūn w-ʾaktharuhumul-fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: You are the best nation produced as an example for mankind. You enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong and believe in Allah. If only the People of the Scripture had believed, it would have been better for them. Among them are believers, but most of them are defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: لَن يَضُرّوكُم إِلّا أَذًى ۖ وَإِن يُقاتِلوكُم يُوَلّوكُمُ الأَدبارَ ثُمَّ لا يُنصَرونَ
blank: l yaḍurrūkum ʾillā ʾadh w-ʾ yuqātilūkum yuwallūkumul-ʾadbār thumm lā yunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: They will not harm you except for some annoyance. And if they fight you, they will show you their backs; then they will not be aided

arabic_uthmani: ضُرِبَت عَلَيهِمُ الذِّلَّةُ أَينَ ما ثُقِفوا إِلّا بِحَبلٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَحَبلٍ مِنَ النّاسِ وَباءوا بِغَضَبٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَضُرِبَت عَلَيهِمُ المَسكَنَةُ ۚ ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم كانوا يَكفُرونَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ وَيَقتُلونَ الأَنبِياءَ بِغَيرِ حَقٍّ ۚ ذٰلِكَ بِما عَصَوا وَكانوا يَعتَدونَ
blank: ḍuribat ʿalayhim dh-dhillat ʾayn mā thuqifū ʾillā b-ḥabl min llāh w-ḥabl min n-nās w-bāʾū b-ghaḍab min llāh w-ḍuribat ʿalayhimul-maskanat dhālik b-ʾannahum kānū yakfurūn b-ʾāyāt llāh w-yaqtulūnal-ʾanbiyāʾ b-ghayr ḥaqq dhālik b-mā ʿaṣaw w-kānū yaʿtadūn
english_saheeh_international: They have been put under humiliation by Allah wherever they are overtaken, except for a covenant from Allah and a rope from the Muslims. And they have drawn upon themselves anger from Allah and have been put under destitution. That is because they disbelieved in the verses of Allah and killed the prophets without right. That is because they disobeyed and habitually transgressed

arabic_uthmani: ۞ لَيسوا سَواءً ۗ مِن أَهلِ الكِتابِ أُمَّةٌ قائِمَةٌ يَتلونَ آياتِ اللَّهِ آناءَ اللَّيلِ وَهُم يَسجُدونَ
blank: laysū sawāʾam-m ʾahlil-kitāb ʾummat qāʾimat yatlūn ʾāyāt llāh ʾānāʾal-layl w-hum yasjudūn
english_saheeh_international: They are not all the same; among the People of the Scripture is a community standing in obedience, reciting the verses of Allah during periods of the night and prostrating in prayer

arabic_uthmani: يُؤمِنونَ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ وَيَأمُرونَ بِالمَعروفِ وَيَنهَونَ عَنِ المُنكَرِ وَيُسارِعونَ فِي الخَيراتِ وَأُولٰئِكَ مِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: yuʾminūn b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-yaʾmurūn b-l-maʿrūf w-yanhawn ʿanil-munkar w-yusāriʿūn fīl-khayrāt w-ʾulāʾik min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: They believe in Allah and the Last Day, and they enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong and hasten to good deeds. And those are among the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَفعَلوا مِن خَيرٍ فَلَن يُكفَروهُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ بِالمُتَّقينَ
blank: w-mā yafʿalū m khayr f-l yukfarūh w-llāh ʿalīm b-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: And whatever good they do - never will it be removed from them. And Allah is Knowing of the righteous

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لَن تُغنِيَ عَنهُم أَموالُهُم وَلا أَولادُهُم مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيئًا ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ النّارِ ۚ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū l tughniy ʿanhum ʾamwāluhum w-lā ʾawlāduhum min llāh shayʾ w-ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥāb n-nār hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who disbelieve - never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all, and those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: مَثَلُ ما يُنفِقونَ في هٰذِهِ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا كَمَثَلِ ريحٍ فيها صِرٌّ أَصابَت حَرثَ قَومٍ ظَلَموا أَنفُسَهُم فَأَهلَكَتهُ ۚ وَما ظَلَمَهُمُ اللَّهُ وَلٰكِن أَنفُسَهُم يَظلِمونَ
blank: mathal mā yunfiqūn fī hādhihil-ḥayāt d-dunyā k-mathal rīḥ fīhā ṣirr ʾaṣābat ḥarth qawm ẓalamū ʾanfusahum f-ʾahlakath w-mā ẓalamahum llāh w-lāk ʾanfusahum yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: The example of what they spend in this worldly life is like that of a wind containing frost which strikes the harvest of a people who have wronged themselves and destroys it. And Allah has not wronged them, but they wrong themselves

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَتَّخِذوا بِطانَةً مِن دونِكُم لا يَألونَكُم خَبالًا وَدّوا ما عَنِتُّم قَد بَدَتِ البَغضاءُ مِن أَفواهِهِم وَما تُخفي صُدورُهُم أَكبَرُ ۚ قَد بَيَّنّا لَكُمُ الآياتِ ۖ إِن كُنتُم تَعقِلونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā tattakhidhū biṭānatam-m dūnikum lā yaʾlūnakum khabāl waddū mā ʿanittum qad badatil-baghḍāʾ m ʾafwāhihim w-mā tukhfī ṣudūruhum ʾakbar qad bayyannā lakumul-ʾāyāt ʾ kuntum taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not take as intimates those other than yourselves, for they will not spare you any ruin. They wish you would have hardship. Hatred has already appeared from their mouths, and what their breasts conceal is greater. We have certainly made clear to you the signs, if you will use reason

arabic_uthmani: ها أَنتُم أُولاءِ تُحِبّونَهُم وَلا يُحِبّونَكُم وَتُؤمِنونَ بِالكِتابِ كُلِّهِ وَإِذا لَقوكُم قالوا آمَنّا وَإِذا خَلَوا عَضّوا عَلَيكُمُ الأَنامِلَ مِنَ الغَيظِ ۚ قُل موتوا بِغَيظِكُم ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: hā-ʾantum ʾulāʾ tuḥibbūnahum w-lā yuḥibbūnakum w-tuʾminūn b-l-kitāb kullihī w-ʾidhā laqūkum qālū ʾāmannā w-ʾidhā khalaw ʿaḍḍū ʿalaykumul-ʾanāmil minal-ghayẓ qul mūtū b-ghayẓikum ʾinn llāh ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: Here you are loving them but they are not loving you, while you believe in the Scripture - all of it. And when they meet you, they say, "We believe." But when they are alone, they bite their fingertips at you in rage. Say, "Die in your rage. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: إِن تَمسَسكُم حَسَنَةٌ تَسُؤهُم وَإِن تُصِبكُم سَيِّئَةٌ يَفرَحوا بِها ۖ وَإِن تَصبِروا وَتَتَّقوا لا يَضُرُّكُم كَيدُهُم شَيئًا ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِما يَعمَلونَ مُحيطٌ
blank: ʾ tamsaskum ḥasanat tasuʾhum w-ʾ tuṣibkum sayyiʾat yafraḥū bihā w-ʾ taṣbirū w-tattaqū lā yaḍurrukum kayduhum shayʾ ʾinn llāh b-mā yaʿmalūn muḥīṭ
english_saheeh_international: If good touches you, it distresses them; but if harm strikes you, they rejoice at it. And if you are patient and fear Allah, their plot will not harm you at all. Indeed, Allah is encompassing of what they do

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ غَدَوتَ مِن أَهلِكَ تُبَوِّئُ المُؤمِنينَ مَقاعِدَ لِلقِتالِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-ʾidh ghadawt m ʾahlik tubawwiʾul-muʾminīn maqāʿid l-l-qitāl w-llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And remember when you, O Muhammad, left your family in the morning to post the believers at their stations for the battle of Uhud - and Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: إِذ هَمَّت طائِفَتانِ مِنكُم أَن تَفشَلا وَاللَّهُ وَلِيُّهُما ۗ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَليَتَوَكَّلِ المُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾidh hammat ṭāʾifatān minkum ʾ tafshalā w-llāh waliyyuhumā w-ʿalā llāh f-l-yatawakkalil-muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: When two parties among you were about to lose courage, but Allah was their ally; and upon Allah the believers should rely

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد نَصَرَكُمُ اللَّهُ بِبَدرٍ وَأَنتُم أَذِلَّةٌ ۖ فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: w-l-qad naṣarakum llāh b-badr w-ʾantum ʾadhillat f-ttaqū llāh laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And already had Allah given you victory at the battle of Badr while you were few in number. Then fear Allah; perhaps you will be grateful

arabic_uthmani: إِذ تَقولُ لِلمُؤمِنينَ أَلَن يَكفِيَكُم أَن يُمِدَّكُم رَبُّكُم بِثَلاثَةِ آلافٍ مِنَ المَلائِكَةِ مُنزَلينَ
blank: ʾidh taqūl l-l-muʾminīn ʾ-l yakfiyakum ʾ yumiddakum rabbukum b-thalāthat ʾālāf minal-malāʾikat munzalīn
english_saheeh_international: Remember when you said to the believers, "Is it not sufficient for you that your Lord should reinforce you with three thousand angels sent down

arabic_uthmani: بَلىٰ ۚ إِن تَصبِروا وَتَتَّقوا وَيَأتوكُم مِن فَورِهِم هٰذا يُمدِدكُم رَبُّكُم بِخَمسَةِ آلافٍ مِنَ المَلائِكَةِ مُسَوِّمينَ
blank: balā ʾ taṣbirū w-tattaqū w-yaʾtūkum m fawrihim hādhā yumdidkum rabbukum b-khamsat ʾālāf minal-malāʾikat musawwimīn
english_saheeh_international: Yes, if you remain patient and conscious of Allah and the enemy come upon you attacking in rage, your Lord will reinforce you with five thousand angels having marks of distinction

arabic_uthmani: وَما جَعَلَهُ اللَّهُ إِلّا بُشرىٰ لَكُم وَلِتَطمَئِنَّ قُلوبُكُم بِهِ ۗ وَمَا النَّصرُ إِلّا مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ العَزيزِ الحَكيمِ
blank: w-mā jaʿalah llāh ʾillā bushrā lakum w-l-taṭmaʾinn qulūbukum bihī w-mā n-naṣr ʾillā m ʿind llāhil-ʿazīzil-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And Allah made it not except as a sign of good tidings for you and to reassure your hearts thereby. And victory is not except from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: لِيَقطَعَ طَرَفًا مِنَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا أَو يَكبِتَهُم فَيَنقَلِبوا خائِبينَ
blank: l-yaqṭaʿ ṭarafam-minalladhīn kafarū ʾaw yakbitahum f-yanqalibū khāʾibīn
english_saheeh_international: That He might cut down a section of the disbelievers or suppress them so that they turn back disappointed

arabic_uthmani: لَيسَ لَكَ مِنَ الأَمرِ شَيءٌ أَو يَتوبَ عَلَيهِم أَو يُعَذِّبَهُم فَإِنَّهُم ظالِمونَ
blank: lays lak minal-ʾamr shayʾ ʾaw yatūb ʿalayhim ʾaw yuʿadhdhibahum f-ʾinnahum ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: Not for you, O Muhammad, but for Allah, is the decision whether He should cut them down or forgive them or punish them, for indeed, they are wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۚ يَغفِرُ لِمَن يَشاءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ yaghfir l-m yashāʾ w-yuʿadhdhib m yashāʾ w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَأكُلُوا الرِّبا أَضعافًا مُضاعَفَةً ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُم تُفلِحونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā taʾkulū r-ribā ʾaḍʿāfam-muḍāʿafat w-ttaqū llāh laʿallakum tufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not consume usury, doubled and multiplied, but fear Allah that you may be successful

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّقُوا النّارَ الَّتي أُعِدَّت لِلكافِرينَ
blank: w-ttaqū n-nār llatī ʾuʿiddat l-l-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And fear the Fire, which has been prepared for the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَأَطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَالرَّسولَ لَعَلَّكُم تُرحَمونَ
blank: w-ʾaṭīʿū llāh w-r-rasūl laʿallakum turḥamūn
english_saheeh_international: And obey Allah and the Messenger that you may obtain mercy

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَسارِعوا إِلىٰ مَغفِرَةٍ مِن رَبِّكُم وَجَنَّةٍ عَرضُهَا السَّماواتُ وَالأَرضُ أُعِدَّت لِلمُتَّقينَ
blank: w-sāriʿū ʾilā maghfirat m rabbikum w-jannat ʿarḍuhā s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ʾuʿiddat l-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: And hasten to forgiveness from your Lord and a garden as wide as the heavens and earth, prepared for the righteous

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُنفِقونَ فِي السَّرّاءِ وَالضَّرّاءِ وَالكاظِمينَ الغَيظَ وَالعافينَ عَنِ النّاسِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يُحِبُّ المُحسِنينَ
blank: alladhīn yunfiqūn fī s-sarrāʾ w-ḍ-ḍarrāʾ w-l-kāẓimīnal-ghayẓ w-l-ʿāfīn ʿan n-nās w-llāh yuḥibbul-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: Who spend in the cause of Allah during ease and hardship and who restrain anger and who pardon the people - and Allah loves the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ إِذا فَعَلوا فاحِشَةً أَو ظَلَموا أَنفُسَهُم ذَكَرُوا اللَّهَ فَاستَغفَروا لِذُنوبِهِم وَمَن يَغفِرُ الذُّنوبَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَلَم يُصِرّوا عَلىٰ ما فَعَلوا وَهُم يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾidhā faʿalū fāḥishat ʾaw ẓalamū ʾanfusahum dhakarū llāh f-staghfarū l-dhunūbihim w-m yaghfir dh-dhunūb ʾillā llāh w-lam yuṣirrū ʿalā mā faʿalū w-hum yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who, when they commit an immorality or wrong themselves by transgression, remember Allah and seek forgiveness for their sins - and who can forgive sins except Allah? - and who do not persist in what they have done while they know

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ جَزاؤُهُم مَغفِرَةٌ مِن رَبِّهِم وَجَنّاتٌ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها ۚ وَنِعمَ أَجرُ العامِلينَ
blank: ʾulāʾik jazāʾuhum maghfirat m rabbihim w-jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā w-niʿm ʾajrul-ʿāmilīn
english_saheeh_international: Those - their reward is forgiveness from their Lord and gardens beneath which rivers flow in Paradise, wherein they will abide eternally; and excellent is the reward of the righteous workers

arabic_uthmani: قَد خَلَت مِن قَبلِكُم سُنَنٌ فَسيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَانظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُكَذِّبينَ
blank: qad khalat m qablikum sunan f-sīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-nẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mukadhdhibīn
english_saheeh_international: Similar situations as yours have passed on before you, so proceed throughout the earth and observe how was the end of those who denied

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا بَيانٌ لِلنّاسِ وَهُدًى وَمَوعِظَةٌ لِلمُتَّقينَ
blank: hādhā bayān l-n-nās w-hud w-mawʿiẓat l-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: This Qur'an is a clear statement to all the people and a guidance and instruction for those conscious of Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَهِنوا وَلا تَحزَنوا وَأَنتُمُ الأَعلَونَ إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-lā tahinū w-lā taḥzanū w-ʾantumul-ʾaʿlawn ʾ kuntum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: So do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are true believers

arabic_uthmani: إِن يَمسَسكُم قَرحٌ فَقَد مَسَّ القَومَ قَرحٌ مِثلُهُ ۚ وَتِلكَ الأَيّامُ نُداوِلُها بَينَ النّاسِ وَلِيَعلَمَ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَيَتَّخِذَ مِنكُم شُهَداءَ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ الظّالِمينَ
blank: ʾ yamsaskum qarḥ f-qad massal-qawm qarḥ mithluhū w-tilkal-ʾayyām nudāwiluhā bayn n-nās w-l-yaʿlam llāhulladhīn ʾāmanū w-yattakhidh minkum shuhadāʾ w-llāh lā yuḥibb ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: If a wound should touch you - there has already touched the opposing people a wound similar to it. And these days of varying conditions We alternate among the people so that Allah may make evident those who believe and may take to Himself from among you martyrs - and Allah does not like the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَيَمحَقَ الكافِرينَ
blank: w-l-yumaḥḥiṣ llāhulladhīn ʾāmanū w-yamḥaqal-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And that Allah may purify the believers through trials and destroy the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: أَم حَسِبتُم أَن تَدخُلُوا الجَنَّةَ وَلَمّا يَعلَمِ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ جاهَدوا مِنكُم وَيَعلَمَ الصّابِرينَ
blank: ʾam ḥasibtum ʾ tadkhulūl-jannat w-lammā yaʿlam llāhulladhīn jāhadū minkum w-yaʿlam ṣ-ṣābirīn
english_saheeh_international: Or do you think that you will enter Paradise while Allah has not yet made evident those of you who fight in His cause and made evident those who are steadfast

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد كُنتُم تَمَنَّونَ المَوتَ مِن قَبلِ أَن تَلقَوهُ فَقَد رَأَيتُموهُ وَأَنتُم تَنظُرونَ
blank: w-l-qad kuntum tamannawnal-mawt m qabl ʾ talqawh f-qad raʾaytumūh w-ʾantum tanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: And you had certainly wished for martyrdom before you encountered it, and you have now seen it before you while you were looking on

arabic_uthmani: وَما مُحَمَّدٌ إِلّا رَسولٌ قَد خَلَت مِن قَبلِهِ الرُّسُلُ ۚ أَفَإِن ماتَ أَو قُتِلَ انقَلَبتُم عَلىٰ أَعقابِكُم ۚ وَمَن يَنقَلِب عَلىٰ عَقِبَيهِ فَلَن يَضُرَّ اللَّهَ شَيئًا ۗ وَسَيَجزِي اللَّهُ الشّاكِرينَ
blank: w-mā muḥammad ʾillā rasūl qad khalat m qablih r-rusul ʾ-f-ʾ māt ʾaw qutil nqalabtum ʿalā ʾaʿqābikum w-m yanqalib ʿalā ʿaqibayh f-l yaḍurr llāh shayʾ w-s-yajzī llāh sh-shākirīn
english_saheeh_international: Muhammad is not but a messenger. Other messengers have passed on before him. So if he was to die or be killed, would you turn back on your heels to unbelief? And he who turns back on his heels will never harm Allah at all; but Allah will reward the grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ لِنَفسٍ أَن تَموتَ إِلّا بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ كِتابًا مُؤَجَّلًا ۗ وَمَن يُرِد ثَوابَ الدُّنيا نُؤتِهِ مِنها وَمَن يُرِد ثَوابَ الآخِرَةِ نُؤتِهِ مِنها ۚ وَسَنَجزِي الشّاكِرينَ
blank: w-mā kān l-nafs ʾ tamūt ʾillā b-ʾidhn llāh kitābam-muʾajjal w-m yurid thawāb d-dunyā nuʾtihī minhā w-m yurid thawābal-ʾākhirat nuʾtihī minhā w-s-najzī sh-shākirīn
english_saheeh_international: And it is not possible for one to die except by permission of Allah at a decree determined. And whoever desires the reward of this world - We will give him thereof; and whoever desires the reward of the Hereafter - We will give him thereof. And we will reward the grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَكَأَيِّن مِن نَبِيٍّ قاتَلَ مَعَهُ رِبِّيّونَ كَثيرٌ فَما وَهَنوا لِما أَصابَهُم في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَما ضَعُفوا وَمَا استَكانوا ۗ وَاللَّهُ يُحِبُّ الصّابِرينَ
blank: w-k-ʾayy m nabiyy qātal maʿahū ribbiyyūn kathīr f-mā wahanū l-mā ʾaṣābahum fī sabīl llāh w-mā ḍaʿufū w-mā stakānū w-llāh yuḥibb ṣ-ṣābirīn
english_saheeh_international: And how many a prophet fought and with him fought many religious scholars. But they never lost assurance due to what afflicted them in the cause of Allah, nor did they weaken or submit. And Allah loves the steadfast

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ قَولَهُم إِلّا أَن قالوا رَبَّنَا اغفِر لَنا ذُنوبَنا وَإِسرافَنا في أَمرِنا وَثَبِّت أَقدامَنا وَانصُرنا عَلَى القَومِ الكافِرينَ
blank: w-mā kān qawlahum ʾillā ʾ qālū rabbanā ghfir lanā dhunūbanā w-ʾisrāfanā fī ʾamrinā w-thabbit ʾaqdāmanā w-nṣurnā ʿalāl-qawmil-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And their words were not but that they said, "Our Lord, forgive us our sins and the excess committed in our affairs and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people

arabic_uthmani: فَآتاهُمُ اللَّهُ ثَوابَ الدُّنيا وَحُسنَ ثَوابِ الآخِرَةِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يُحِبُّ المُحسِنينَ
blank: f-ʾātāhum llāh thawāb d-dunyā w-ḥusn thawābil-ʾākhirat w-llāh yuḥibbul-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: So Allah gave them the reward of this world and the good reward of the Hereafter. And Allah loves the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِن تُطيعُوا الَّذينَ كَفَروا يَرُدّوكُم عَلىٰ أَعقابِكُم فَتَنقَلِبوا خاسِرينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾ tuṭīʿūlladhīn kafarū yaruddūkum ʿalā ʾaʿqābikum f-tanqalibū khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, if you obey those who disbelieve, they will turn you back on your heels, and you will then become losers

arabic_uthmani: بَلِ اللَّهُ مَولاكُم ۖ وَهُوَ خَيرُ النّاصِرينَ
blank: bal llāh mawlākum w-huw khayr n-nāṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: But Allah is your protector, and He is the best of helpers

arabic_uthmani: سَنُلقي في قُلوبِ الَّذينَ كَفَرُوا الرُّعبَ بِما أَشرَكوا بِاللَّهِ ما لَم يُنَزِّل بِهِ سُلطانًا ۖ وَمَأواهُمُ النّارُ ۚ وَبِئسَ مَثوَى الظّالِمينَ
blank: s-nulqī fī qulūbilladhīn kafarū r-ruʿb b-mā ʾashrakū b-llāh mā lam yunazzil bihī sulṭān w-maʾwāhum n-nār w-biʾs mathwā ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: We will cast terror into the hearts of those who disbelieve for what they have associated with Allah of which He had not sent down any authority. And their refuge will be the Fire, and wretched is the residence of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد صَدَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ وَعدَهُ إِذ تَحُسّونَهُم بِإِذنِهِ ۖ حَتّىٰ إِذا فَشِلتُم وَتَنازَعتُم فِي الأَمرِ وَعَصَيتُم مِن بَعدِ ما أَراكُم ما تُحِبّونَ ۚ مِنكُم مَن يُريدُ الدُّنيا وَمِنكُم مَن يُريدُ الآخِرَةَ ۚ ثُمَّ صَرَفَكُم عَنهُم لِيَبتَلِيَكُم ۖ وَلَقَد عَفا عَنكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ ذو فَضلٍ عَلَى المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-l-qad ṣadaqakum llāh waʿdahū ʾidh taḥussūnahum b-ʾidhnihī ḥattā ʾidhā fashiltum w-tanāzaʿtum fīl-ʾamr w-ʿaṣaytum m baʿd mā ʾarākum mā tuḥibbūn minkum m yurīd d-dunyā w-minkum m yurīdul-ʾākhirat thumm ṣarafakum ʿanhum l-yabtaliyakum w-l-qad ʿafā ʿankum w-llāh dhū faḍl ʿalāl-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah had certainly fulfilled His promise to you when you were killing the enemy by His permission until the time when you lost courage and fell to disputing about the order given by the Prophet and disobeyed after He had shown you that which you love. Among you are some who desire this world, and among you are some who desire the Hereafter. Then he turned you back from them defeated that He might test you. And He has already forgiven you, and Allah is the possessor of bounty for the believers

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِذ تُصعِدونَ وَلا تَلوونَ عَلىٰ أَحَدٍ وَالرَّسولُ يَدعوكُم في أُخراكُم فَأَثابَكُم غَمًّا بِغَمٍّ لِكَيلا تَحزَنوا عَلىٰ ما فاتَكُم وَلا ما أَصابَكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ خَبيرٌ بِما تَعمَلونَ
blank: ʾidh tuṣʿidūn w-lā talwūn ʿalā ʾaḥad w-r-rasūl yadʿūkum fī ʾukhrākum f-ʾathābakum ghamm b-ghamm l-kay-lā taḥzanū ʿalā mā fātakum w-lā mā ʾaṣābakum w-llāh khabīr b-mā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Remember when you fled and climbed the mountain without looking aside at anyone while the Messenger was calling you from behind. So Allah repaid you with distress upon distress so you would not grieve for that which had escaped you of victory and spoils of war or for that which had befallen you of injury and death. And Allah is fully Acquainted with what you do

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ عَلَيكُم مِن بَعدِ الغَمِّ أَمَنَةً نُعاسًا يَغشىٰ طائِفَةً مِنكُم ۖ وَطائِفَةٌ قَد أَهَمَّتهُم أَنفُسُهُم يَظُنّونَ بِاللَّهِ غَيرَ الحَقِّ ظَنَّ الجاهِلِيَّةِ ۖ يَقولونَ هَل لَنا مِنَ الأَمرِ مِن شَيءٍ ۗ قُل إِنَّ الأَمرَ كُلَّهُ لِلَّهِ ۗ يُخفونَ في أَنفُسِهِم ما لا يُبدونَ لَكَ ۖ يَقولونَ لَو كانَ لَنا مِنَ الأَمرِ شَيءٌ ما قُتِلنا هاهُنا ۗ قُل لَو كُنتُم في بُيوتِكُم لَبَرَزَ الَّذينَ كُتِبَ عَلَيهِمُ القَتلُ إِلىٰ مَضاجِعِهِم ۖ وَلِيَبتَلِيَ اللَّهُ ما في صُدورِكُم وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ما في قُلوبِكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: thumm ʾanzal ʿalaykum m baʿdil-ghamm ʾamanat nuʿās yaghshā ṭāʾifatam-minkum w-ṭāʾifat qad ʾahammathum ʾanfusuhum yaẓunnūn b-llāh ghayral-ḥaqq ẓannal-jāhiliyyat yaqūlūn hal lanā minal-ʾamr m shayʾ qul ʾinnal-ʾamr kullahū l-llāh yukhfūn fī ʾanfusihim mā lā yubdūn lak yaqūlūn law kān lanā minal-ʾamr shayʾ mā qutilnā hāhunā qul law kuntum fī buyūtikum l-barazalladhīn kutib ʿalayhimul-qatl ʾilā maḍājiʿihim w-l-yabtaliy llāh mā fī ṣudūrikum w-l-yumaḥḥiṣ mā fī qulūbikum w-llāh ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: Then after distress, He sent down upon you security in the form of drowsiness, overcoming a faction of you, while another faction worried about themselves, thinking of Allah other than the truth - the thought of ignorance, saying, "Is there anything for us to have done in this matter?" Say, "Indeed, the matter belongs completely to Allah." They conceal within themselves what they will not reveal to you. They say, "If there was anything we could have done in the matter, some of us would not have been killed right here." Say, "Even if you had been inside your houses, those decreed to be killed would have come out to their death beds." It was so that Allah might test what is in your breasts and purify what is in your hearts. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ تَوَلَّوا مِنكُم يَومَ التَقَى الجَمعانِ إِنَّمَا استَزَلَّهُمُ الشَّيطانُ بِبَعضِ ما كَسَبوا ۖ وَلَقَد عَفَا اللَّهُ عَنهُم ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ حَليمٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn tawallaw minkum yawm ltaqāl-jamʿān ʾinnamā stazallahum sh-shayṭān b-baʿḍ mā kasabū w-l-qad ʿafā llāh ʿanhum ʾinn llāh ghafūr ḥalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those of you who turned back on the day the two armies met, it was Satan who caused them to slip because of some blame they had earned. But Allah has already forgiven them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَكونوا كَالَّذينَ كَفَروا وَقالوا لِإِخوانِهِم إِذا ضَرَبوا فِي الأَرضِ أَو كانوا غُزًّى لَو كانوا عِندَنا ما ماتوا وَما قُتِلوا لِيَجعَلَ اللَّهُ ذٰلِكَ حَسرَةً في قُلوبِهِم ۗ وَاللَّهُ يُحيي وَيُميتُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā takūnū k-lladhīn kafarū w-qālū l-ʾikhwānihim ʾidhā ḍarabū fīl-ʾarḍ ʾaw kānū ghuzz law kānū ʿindanā mā mātū w-mā qutilū l-yajʿal llāh dhālik ḥasrat fī qulūbihim w-llāh yuḥyī w-yumīt w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not be like those who disbelieved and said about their brothers when they traveled through the land or went out to fight, "If they had been with us, they would not have died or have been killed," so Allah makes that misconception a regret within their hearts. And it is Allah who gives life and causes death, and Allah is Seeing of what you do

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن قُتِلتُم في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ أَو مُتُّم لَمَغفِرَةٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرَحمَةٌ خَيرٌ مِمّا يَجمَعونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ qutiltum fī sabīl llāh ʾaw muttum l-maghfirat min llāh w-raḥmat khayr mimmā yajmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you are killed in the cause of Allah or die - then forgiveness from Allah and mercy are better than whatever they accumulate in this world

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن مُتُّم أَو قُتِلتُم لَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُحشَرونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ muttum ʾaw qutiltum l-ʾilā llāh tuḥsharūn
english_saheeh_international: And whether you die or are killed, unto Allah you will be gathered

arabic_uthmani: فَبِما رَحمَةٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ لِنتَ لَهُم ۖ وَلَو كُنتَ فَظًّا غَليظَ القَلبِ لَانفَضّوا مِن حَولِكَ ۖ فَاعفُ عَنهُم وَاستَغفِر لَهُم وَشاوِرهُم فِي الأَمرِ ۖ فَإِذا عَزَمتَ فَتَوَكَّل عَلَى اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ المُتَوَكِّلينَ
blank: f-b-mā raḥmat min llāh lint lahum w-law kunt faẓẓ ghalīẓal-qalb l-nfaḍḍū m ḥawlik f-ʿf ʿanhum w-staghfir lahum w-shāwirhum fīl-ʾamr f-ʾidhā ʿazamt f-tawakkal ʿalā llāh ʾinn llāh yuḥibbul-mutawakkilīn
english_saheeh_international: So by mercy from Allah, O Muhammad, you were lenient with them. And if you had been rude in speech and harsh in heart, they would have disbanded from about you. So pardon them and ask forgiveness for them and consult them in the matter. And when you have decided, then rely upon Allah. Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him

arabic_uthmani: إِن يَنصُركُمُ اللَّهُ فَلا غالِبَ لَكُم ۖ وَإِن يَخذُلكُم فَمَن ذَا الَّذي يَنصُرُكُم مِن بَعدِهِ ۗ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَليَتَوَكَّلِ المُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾ yanṣurkum llāh f-lā ghālib lakum w-ʾ yakhdhulkum f-m dhālladhī yanṣurukum m baʿdihī w-ʿalā llāh f-l-yatawakkalil-muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: If Allah should aid you, no one can overcome you; but if He should forsake you, who is there that can aid you after Him? And upon Allah let the believers rely

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ لِنَبِيٍّ أَن يَغُلَّ ۚ وَمَن يَغلُل يَأتِ بِما غَلَّ يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۚ ثُمَّ تُوَفّىٰ كُلُّ نَفسٍ ما كَسَبَت وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: w-mā kān l-nabiyy ʾ yaghull w-m yaghlul yaʾt b-mā ghall yawmal-qiyāmat thumm tuwaffā kull nafs mā kasabat w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: It is not attributable to any prophet that he would act unfaithfully in regard to war booty. And whoever betrays, taking unlawfully, will come with what he took on the Day of Resurrection. Then will every soul be fully compensated for what it earned, and they will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَنِ اتَّبَعَ رِضوانَ اللَّهِ كَمَن باءَ بِسَخَطٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَمَأواهُ جَهَنَّمُ ۚ وَبِئسَ المَصيرُ
blank: ʾ-f-man ttabaʿ riḍwān llāh k-m bāʾ b-sakhaṭ min llāh w-maʾwāh jahannam w-biʾsal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: So is one who pursues the pleasure of Allah like one who brings upon himself the anger of Allah and whose refuge is Hell? And wretched is the destination

arabic_uthmani: هُم دَرَجاتٌ عِندَ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بَصيرٌ بِما يَعمَلونَ
blank: hum darajāt ʿind llāh w-llāh baṣīr b-mā yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: They are varying degrees in the sight of Allah, and Allah is Seeing of whatever they do

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد مَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَى المُؤمِنينَ إِذ بَعَثَ فيهِم رَسولًا مِن أَنفُسِهِم يَتلو عَلَيهِم آياتِهِ وَيُزَكّيهِم وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ الكِتابَ وَالحِكمَةَ وَإِن كانوا مِن قَبلُ لَفي ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: l-qad mann llāh ʿalāl-muʾminīn ʾidh baʿath fīhim rasūlam-m ʾanfusihim yatlū ʿalayhim ʾāyātihī w-yuzakkīhim w-yuʿallimuhumul-kitāb w-l-ḥikmat w-ʾ kānū m qabl l-fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Certainly did Allah confer great favor upon the believers when He sent among them a Messenger from themselves, reciting to them His verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and wisdom, although they had been before in manifest error

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَمّا أَصابَتكُم مُصيبَةٌ قَد أَصَبتُم مِثلَيها قُلتُم أَنّىٰ هٰذا ۖ قُل هُوَ مِن عِندِ أَنفُسِكُم ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: ʾ-w-lammā ʾaṣābatkum muṣībat qad ʾaṣabtum mithlayhā qultum ʾannā hādhā qul huw m ʿind ʾanfusikum ʾinn llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Why is it that when a single disaster struck you on the day of Uhud, although you had struck the enemy in the battle of Badr with one twice as great, you said, "From where is this?" Say, "It is from yourselves." Indeed, Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَصابَكُم يَومَ التَقَى الجَمعانِ فَبِإِذنِ اللَّهِ وَلِيَعلَمَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-mā ʾaṣābakum yawm ltaqāl-jamʿān f-b-ʾidhn llāh w-l-yaʿlamal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And what struck you on the day the two armies met was by permission of Allah that He might make evident the true believers

arabic_uthmani: وَلِيَعلَمَ الَّذينَ نافَقوا ۚ وَقيلَ لَهُم تَعالَوا قاتِلوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ أَوِ ادفَعوا ۖ قالوا لَو نَعلَمُ قِتالًا لَاتَّبَعناكُم ۗ هُم لِلكُفرِ يَومَئِذٍ أَقرَبُ مِنهُم لِلإيمانِ ۚ يَقولونَ بِأَفواهِهِم ما لَيسَ في قُلوبِهِم ۗ وَاللَّهُ أَعلَمُ بِما يَكتُمونَ
blank: w-l-yaʿlamalladhīn nāfaqū w-qīl lahum taʿālaw qātilū fī sabīl llāh ʾaw dfaʿū qālū law naʿlam qitāl l-ttabaʿnākum hum l-l-kufr yawmaʾidh ʾaqrab minhum l-l-ʾīmān yaqūlūn b-ʾafwāhihim mā lays fī qulūbihim w-llāh ʾaʿlam b-mā yaktumūn
english_saheeh_international: And that He might make evident those who are hypocrites. For it was said to them, "Come, fight in the way of Allah or at least defend." They said, "If we had known there would be fighting, we would have followed you." They were nearer to disbelief that day than to faith, saying with their mouths what was not in their hearts. And Allah is most Knowing of what they conceal

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ قالوا لِإِخوانِهِم وَقَعَدوا لَو أَطاعونا ما قُتِلوا ۗ قُل فَادرَءوا عَن أَنفُسِكُمُ المَوتَ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: alladhīn qālū l-ʾikhwānihim w-qaʿadū law ʾaṭāʿūnā mā qutilū qul f-draʾū ʿ ʾanfusikumul-mawt ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Those who said about their brothers while sitting at home, "If they had obeyed us, they would not have been killed." Say, "Then prevent death from yourselves, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَحسَبَنَّ الَّذينَ قُتِلوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ أَمواتًا ۚ بَل أَحياءٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِم يُرزَقونَ
blank: w-lā taḥsabannalladhīn qutilū fī sabīl llāh ʾamwāt bal ʾaḥyāʾ ʿind rabbihim yurzaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And never think of those who have been killed in the cause of Allah as dead. Rather, they are alive with their Lord, receiving provision

arabic_uthmani: فَرِحينَ بِما آتاهُمُ اللَّهُ مِن فَضلِهِ وَيَستَبشِرونَ بِالَّذينَ لَم يَلحَقوا بِهِم مِن خَلفِهِم أَلّا خَوفٌ عَلَيهِم وَلا هُم يَحزَنونَ
blank: fariḥīn b-mā ʾātāhum llāh m faḍlihī w-yastabshirūn b-lladhīn lam yalḥaqū bihim m khalfihim ʾallā khawf ʿalayhim w-lā hum yaḥzanūn
english_saheeh_international: Rejoicing in what Allah has bestowed upon them of His bounty, and they receive good tidings about those to be martyred after them who have not yet joined them - that there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve

arabic_uthmani: ۞ يَستَبشِرونَ بِنِعمَةٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَفَضلٍ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُضيعُ أَجرَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: yastabshirūn b-niʿmat min llāh w-faḍl w-ʾann llāh lā yuḍīʿ ʾajral-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: They receive good tidings of favor from Allah and bounty and of the fact that Allah does not allow the reward of believers to be lost

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ استَجابوا لِلَّهِ وَالرَّسولِ مِن بَعدِ ما أَصابَهُمُ القَرحُ ۚ لِلَّذينَ أَحسَنوا مِنهُم وَاتَّقَوا أَجرٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: alladhīn stajābū l-llāh w-r-rasūl m baʿd mā ʾaṣābahumul-qarḥ l-lladhīn ʾaḥsanū minhum w-ttaqaw ʾajr ʿaẓīm-
english_saheeh_international: Those believers who responded to Allah and the Messenger after injury had struck them. For those who did good among them and feared Allah is a great reward

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ قالَ لَهُمُ النّاسُ إِنَّ النّاسَ قَد جَمَعوا لَكُم فَاخشَوهُم فَزادَهُم إيمانًا وَقالوا حَسبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعمَ الوَكيلُ
blank: alladhīn qāl lahum n-nās ʾinn n-nās qad jamaʿū lakum f-khshawhum f-zādahum ʾīmān w-qālū ḥasbunā llāh w-niʿmal-wakīl
english_saheeh_international: Those to whom hypocrites said, "Indeed, the people have gathered against you, so fear them." But it merely increased them in faith, and they said, "Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs

arabic_uthmani: فَانقَلَبوا بِنِعمَةٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَفَضلٍ لَم يَمسَسهُم سوءٌ وَاتَّبَعوا رِضوانَ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ ذو فَضلٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: f-nqalabū b-niʿmat min llāh w-faḍl lam yamsashum sūʾ w-ttabaʿū riḍwān llāh w-llāh dhū faḍl ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: So they returned with favor from Allah and bounty, no harm having touched them. And they pursued the pleasure of Allah, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما ذٰلِكُمُ الشَّيطانُ يُخَوِّفُ أَولِياءَهُ فَلا تَخافوهُم وَخافونِ إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinnamā dhālikum sh-shayṭān yukhawwif ʾawliyāʾahū f-lā takhāfūhum w-khāfūn ʾ kuntum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: That is only Satan who frightens you of his supporters. So fear them not, but fear Me, if you are indeed believers

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَحزُنكَ الَّذينَ يُسارِعونَ فِي الكُفرِ ۚ إِنَّهُم لَن يَضُرُّوا اللَّهَ شَيئًا ۗ يُريدُ اللَّهُ أَلّا يَجعَلَ لَهُم حَظًّا فِي الآخِرَةِ ۖ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: w-lā yaḥzunkalladhīn yusāriʿūn fīl-kufr ʾinnahum l yaḍurrū llāh shayʾ yurīd llāh ʾallā yajʿal lahum ḥaẓẓ fīl-ʾākhirat w-lahum ʿadhāb ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And do not be grieved, O Muhammad, by those who hasten into disbelief. Indeed, they will never harm Allah at all. Allah intends that He should give them no share in the Hereafter, and for them is a great punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ اشتَرَوُا الكُفرَ بِالإيمانِ لَن يَضُرُّوا اللَّهَ شَيئًا وَلَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn shtarawul-kufr b-l-ʾīmān l yaḍurrū llāh shayʾ w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who purchase disbelief in exchange for faith - never will they harm Allah at all, and for them is a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَحسَبَنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا أَنَّما نُملي لَهُم خَيرٌ لِأَنفُسِهِم ۚ إِنَّما نُملي لَهُم لِيَزدادوا إِثمًا ۚ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ مُهينٌ
blank: w-lā yaḥsabannalladhīn kafarū ʾannamā numlī lahum khayr l-ʾanfusihim ʾinnamā numlī lahum l-yazdādū ʾithm w-lahum ʿadhāb muhīn
english_saheeh_international: And let not those who disbelieve ever think that because We extend their time of enjoyment it is better for them. We only extend it for them so that they may increase in sin, and for them is a humiliating punishment

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ اللَّهُ لِيَذَرَ المُؤمِنينَ عَلىٰ ما أَنتُم عَلَيهِ حَتّىٰ يَميزَ الخَبيثَ مِنَ الطَّيِّبِ ۗ وَما كانَ اللَّهُ لِيُطلِعَكُم عَلَى الغَيبِ وَلٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ يَجتَبي مِن رُسُلِهِ مَن يَشاءُ ۖ فَآمِنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِ ۚ وَإِن تُؤمِنوا وَتَتَّقوا فَلَكُم أَجرٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: mā kān llāh l-yadharal-muʾminīn ʿalā mā ʾantum ʿalayh ḥattā yamīzal-khabīth min ṭ-ṭayyib w-mā kān llāh l-yuṭliʿakum ʿalāl-ghayb w-lākinn llāh yajtabī m rusulihī m yashāʾ f-ʾāminū b-llāh w-rusulihī w-ʾ tuʾminū w-tattaqū f-lakum ʾajr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah would not leave the believers in that state you are in presently until He separates the evil from the good. Nor would Allah reveal to you the unseen. But instead, Allah chooses of His messengers whom He wills, so believe in Allah and His messengers. And if you believe and fear Him, then for you is a great reward

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَحسَبَنَّ الَّذينَ يَبخَلونَ بِما آتاهُمُ اللَّهُ مِن فَضلِهِ هُوَ خَيرًا لَهُم ۖ بَل هُوَ شَرٌّ لَهُم ۖ سَيُطَوَّقونَ ما بَخِلوا بِهِ يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ ميراثُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ خَبيرٌ
blank: w-lā yaḥsabannalladhīn yabkhalūn b-mā ʾātāhum llāh m faḍlihī huw khayr lahum bal huw sharr lahum s-yuṭawwaqūn mā bakhilū bihī yawmal-qiyāmat w-l-llāh mīrāth s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And let not those who greedily withhold what Allah has given them of His bounty ever think that it is better for them. Rather, it is worse for them. Their necks will be encircled by what they withheld on the Day of Resurrection. And to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, with what you do, is fully Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد سَمِعَ اللَّهُ قَولَ الَّذينَ قالوا إِنَّ اللَّهَ فَقيرٌ وَنَحنُ أَغنِياءُ ۘ سَنَكتُبُ ما قالوا وَقَتلَهُمُ الأَنبِياءَ بِغَيرِ حَقٍّ وَنَقولُ ذوقوا عَذابَ الحَريقِ
blank: l-qad samiʿ llāh qawlalladhīn qālū ʾinn llāh faqīr w-naḥn ʾaghniyāʾ s-naktub mā qālū w-qatlahumul-ʾanbiyāʾ b-ghayr ḥaqq w-naqūl dhūqū ʿadhābal-ḥarīq
english_saheeh_international: Allah has certainly heard the statement of those Jews who said, "Indeed, Allah is poor, while we are rich." We will record what they said and their killing of the prophets without right and will say, "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِما قَدَّمَت أَيديكُم وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ لَيسَ بِظَلّامٍ لِلعَبيدِ
blank: dhālik b-mā qaddamat ʾaydīkum w-ʾann llāh lays b-ẓallām l-l-ʿabīd
english_saheeh_international: That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to His servants

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ قالوا إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَهِدَ إِلَينا أَلّا نُؤمِنَ لِرَسولٍ حَتّىٰ يَأتِيَنا بِقُربانٍ تَأكُلُهُ النّارُ ۗ قُل قَد جاءَكُم رُسُلٌ مِن قَبلي بِالبَيِّناتِ وَبِالَّذي قُلتُم فَلِمَ قَتَلتُموهُم إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: alladhīn qālū ʾinn llāh ʿahid ʾilaynā ʾallā nuʾmin l-rasūl ḥattā yaʾtiyanā b-qurbān taʾkuluh n-nār qul qad jāʾakum rusul m qablī b-l-bayyināt w-b-lladhī qultum f-l-m qataltumūhum ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: They are those who said, "Indeed, Allah has taken our promise not to believe any messenger until he brings us an offering which fire from heaven will consume." Say, "There have already come to you messengers before me with clear proofs and even that of which you speak. So why did you kill them, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن كَذَّبوكَ فَقَد كُذِّبَ رُسُلٌ مِن قَبلِكَ جاءوا بِالبَيِّناتِ وَالزُّبُرِ وَالكِتابِ المُنيرِ
blank: f-ʾ kadhdhabūk f-qad kudhdhib rusul m qablik jāʾū b-l-bayyināt w-z-zubur w-l-kitābil-munīr
english_saheeh_international: Then if they deny you, O Muhammad - so were messengers denied before you, who brought clear proofs and written ordinances and the enlightening Scripture

arabic_uthmani: كُلُّ نَفسٍ ذائِقَةُ المَوتِ ۗ وَإِنَّما تُوَفَّونَ أُجورَكُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۖ فَمَن زُحزِحَ عَنِ النّارِ وَأُدخِلَ الجَنَّةَ فَقَد فازَ ۗ وَمَا الحَياةُ الدُّنيا إِلّا مَتاعُ الغُرورِ
blank: kull nafs dhāʾiqatul-mawt w-ʾinnamā tuwaffawn ʾujūrakum yawmal-qiyāmat f-m zuḥziḥ ʿan n-nār w-ʾudkhilal-jannat f-qad fāz w-māl-ḥayāt d-dunyā ʾillā matāʿul-ghurūr
english_saheeh_international: Every soul will taste death, and you will only be given your full compensation on the Day of Resurrection. So he who is drawn away from the Fire and admitted to Paradise has attained his desire. And what is the life of this world except the enjoyment of delusion

arabic_uthmani: ۞ لَتُبلَوُنَّ في أَموالِكُم وَأَنفُسِكُم وَلَتَسمَعُنَّ مِنَ الَّذينَ أوتُوا الكِتابَ مِن قَبلِكُم وَمِنَ الَّذينَ أَشرَكوا أَذًى كَثيرًا ۚ وَإِن تَصبِروا وَتَتَّقوا فَإِنَّ ذٰلِكَ مِن عَزمِ الأُمورِ
blank: l-tublawunn fī ʾamwālikum w-ʾanfusikum w-l-tasmaʿunn minalladhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb m qablikum w-minalladhīn ʾashrakū ʾadh kathīr w-ʾ taṣbirū w-tattaqū f-ʾinn dhālik m ʿazmil-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: You will surely be tested in your possessions and in yourselves. And you will surely hear from those who were given the Scripture before you and from those who associate others with Allah much abuse. But if you are patient and fear Allah - indeed, that is of the matters worthy of determination

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ أَخَذَ اللَّهُ ميثاقَ الَّذينَ أوتُوا الكِتابَ لَتُبَيِّنُنَّهُ لِلنّاسِ وَلا تَكتُمونَهُ فَنَبَذوهُ وَراءَ ظُهورِهِم وَاشتَرَوا بِهِ ثَمَنًا قَليلًا ۖ فَبِئسَ ما يَشتَرونَ
blank: w-ʾidh ʾakhadh llāh mīthāqalladhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb l-tubayyinunnahū l-n-nās w-lā taktumūnahū f-nabadhūh warāʾ ẓuhūrihim w-shtaraw bihī thaman qalīl f-biʾs mā yashtarūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when Allah took a covenant from those who were given the Scripture, saying, "You must make it clear to the people and not conceal it." But they threw it away behind their backs and exchanged it for a small price. And wretched is that which they purchased

arabic_uthmani: لا تَحسَبَنَّ الَّذينَ يَفرَحونَ بِما أَتَوا وَيُحِبّونَ أَن يُحمَدوا بِما لَم يَفعَلوا فَلا تَحسَبَنَّهُم بِمَفازَةٍ مِنَ العَذابِ ۖ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: lā taḥsabannalladhīn yafraḥūn b-mā ʾataw w-yuḥibbūn ʾ yuḥmadū b-mā lam yafʿalū f-lā taḥsabannahum b-mafāzat minal-ʿadhāb w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And never think that those who rejoice in what they have perpetrated and like to be praised for what they did not do - never think them to be in safety from the punishment, and for them is a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: w-l-llāh mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في خَلقِ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَاختِلافِ اللَّيلِ وَالنَّهارِ لَآياتٍ لِأُولِي الأَلبابِ
blank: ʾinn fī khalq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-khtilāfil-layl w-n-nahār l-ʾāyāt l-ʾulīl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَذكُرونَ اللَّهَ قِيامًا وَقُعودًا وَعَلىٰ جُنوبِهِم وَيَتَفَكَّرونَ في خَلقِ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ رَبَّنا ما خَلَقتَ هٰذا باطِلًا سُبحانَكَ فَقِنا عَذابَ النّارِ
blank: alladhīn yadhkurūn llāh qiyām w-quʿūd w-ʿalā junūbihim w-yatafakkarūn fī khalq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ rabbanā mā khalaqt hādhā bāṭil subḥānak f-qinā ʿadhāb n-nār
english_saheeh_international: Who remember Allah while standing or sitting or lying on their sides and give thought to the creation of the heavens and the earth, saying, "Our Lord, You did not create this aimlessly; exalted are You above such a thing; then protect us from the punishment of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا إِنَّكَ مَن تُدخِلِ النّارَ فَقَد أَخزَيتَهُ ۖ وَما لِلظّالِمينَ مِن أَنصارٍ
blank: rabbanā ʾinnak m tudkhil n-nār f-qad ʾakhzaytahū w-mā l-ẓ-ẓālimīn m ʾanṣār
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, indeed whoever You admit to the Fire - You have disgraced him, and for the wrongdoers there are no helpers

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا إِنَّنا سَمِعنا مُنادِيًا يُنادي لِلإيمانِ أَن آمِنوا بِرَبِّكُم فَآمَنّا ۚ رَبَّنا فَاغفِر لَنا ذُنوبَنا وَكَفِّر عَنّا سَيِّئَاتِنا وَتَوَفَّنا مَعَ الأَبرارِ
blank: rabbanā ʾinnanā samiʿnā munādiy yunādī l-l-ʾīmān ʾ ʾāminū b-rabbikum f-ʾāmannā rabbanā f-ghfir lanā dhunūbanā w-kaffir ʿannā sayyiʾātinā w-tawaffanā maʿal-ʾabrār
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, indeed we have heard a caller calling to faith, saying, 'Believe in your Lord,' and we have believed. Our Lord, so forgive us our sins and remove from us our misdeeds and cause us to die with the righteous

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا وَآتِنا ما وَعَدتَنا عَلىٰ رُسُلِكَ وَلا تُخزِنا يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۗ إِنَّكَ لا تُخلِفُ الميعادَ
blank: rabbanā w-ʾātinā mā waʿadtanā ʿalā rusulik w-lā tukhzinā yawmal-qiyāmat ʾinnak lā tukhliful-mīʿād
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, and grant us what You promised us through Your messengers and do not disgrace us on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed, You do not fail in Your promise

arabic_uthmani: فَاستَجابَ لَهُم رَبُّهُم أَنّي لا أُضيعُ عَمَلَ عامِلٍ مِنكُم مِن ذَكَرٍ أَو أُنثىٰ ۖ بَعضُكُم مِن بَعضٍ ۖ فَالَّذينَ هاجَروا وَأُخرِجوا مِن دِيارِهِم وَأوذوا في سَبيلي وَقاتَلوا وَقُتِلوا لَأُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنهُم سَيِّئَاتِهِم وَلَأُدخِلَنَّهُم جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ ثَوابًا مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عِندَهُ حُسنُ الثَّوابِ
blank: f-stajāb lahum rabbuhum ʾannī lā ʾuḍīʿ ʿamal ʾāmil minkum m dhakar ʾaw ʾunthā baʿḍukum m baʿḍ f-lladhīn hājarū w-ʾukhrijū m diyārihim w-ʾūdhū fī sabīlī w-qātalū w-qutilū l-ʾukaffirann ʿanhum sayyiʾātihim w-l-ʾudkhilannahum jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār thawābam-m ʿind llāh w-llāh ʿindahū ḥusn th-thawāb
english_saheeh_international: And their Lord responded to them, "Never will I allow to be lost the work of any worker among you, whether male or female; you are of one another. So those who emigrated or were evicted from their homes or were harmed in My cause or fought or were killed - I will surely remove from them their misdeeds, and I will surely admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow as reward from Allah, and Allah has with Him the best reward

arabic_uthmani: لا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا فِي البِلادِ
blank: lā yaghurrannak taqallubulladhīn kafarū fīl-bilād
english_saheeh_international: Be not deceived by the uninhibited movement of the disbelievers throughout the land
