blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾinnamāl-khamr w-l-maysir w-l-ʾanṣāb w-l-ʾazlām rijs m ʿamal sh-shayṭān f-jtanibūh laʿallakum tufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, indeed, intoxicants, gambling, sacrificing on stone alters to other than Allah, and divining arrows are but defilement from the work of Satan, so avoid it that you may be successful

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما يُريدُ الشَّيطانُ أَن يوقِعَ بَينَكُمُ العَداوَةَ وَالبَغضاءَ فِي الخَمرِ وَالمَيسِرِ وَيَصُدَّكُم عَن ذِكرِ اللَّهِ وَعَنِ الصَّلاةِ ۖ فَهَل أَنتُم مُنتَهونَ
blank: ʾinnamā yurīd sh-shayṭān ʾ yūqiʿ baynakumul-ʿadāwat w-l-baghḍāʾ fīl-khamr w-l-maysir w-yaṣuddakum ʿ dhikr llāh w-ʿan ṣ-ṣalāt f-hal ʾantum muntahūn
english_saheeh_international: Satan only wants to cause between you animosity and hatred through intoxicants and gambling and to avert you from the remembrance of Allah and from prayer. So will you not desist

arabic_uthmani: وَأَطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطيعُوا الرَّسولَ وَاحذَروا ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيتُم فَاعلَموا أَنَّما عَلىٰ رَسولِنَا البَلاغُ المُبينُ
blank: w-ʾaṭīʿū llāh w-ʾaṭīʿū r-rasūl w-ḥdharū f-ʾ tawallaytum f-ʿlamū ʾannamā ʿalā rasūlināl-balāghul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger and beware. And if you turn away - then know that upon Our Messenger is only the responsibility for clear notification

arabic_uthmani: لَيسَ عَلَى الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ جُناحٌ فيما طَعِموا إِذا مَا اتَّقَوا وَآمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ ثُمَّ اتَّقَوا وَآمَنوا ثُمَّ اتَّقَوا وَأَحسَنوا ۗ وَاللَّهُ يُحِبُّ المُحسِنينَ
blank: lays ʿalālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt junāḥ fī-mā ṭaʿimū ʾidhā mā ttaqaw w-ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt thumm ttaqaw w-ʾāmanū thumm ttaqaw w-ʾaḥsanū w-llāh yuḥibbul-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: There is not upon those who believe and do righteousness any blame concerning what they have eaten in the past if they now fear Allah and believe and do righteous deeds, and then fear Allah and believe, and then fear Allah and do good; and Allah loves the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لَيَبلُوَنَّكُمُ اللَّهُ بِشَيءٍ مِنَ الصَّيدِ تَنالُهُ أَيديكُم وَرِماحُكُم لِيَعلَمَ اللَّهُ مَن يَخافُهُ بِالغَيبِ ۚ فَمَنِ اعتَدىٰ بَعدَ ذٰلِكَ فَلَهُ عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū l-yabluwannakum llāh b-shayʾ min ṣ-ṣayd tanāluhū ʾaydīkum w-rimāḥukum l-yaʿlam llāh m yakhāfuhū b-l-ghayb f-man ʿtadā baʿd dhālik f-lahū ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, Allah will surely test you through something of the game that your hands and spears can reach, that Allah may make evident those who fear Him unseen. And whoever transgresses after that - for him is a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَقتُلُوا الصَّيدَ وَأَنتُم حُرُمٌ ۚ وَمَن قَتَلَهُ مِنكُم مُتَعَمِّدًا فَجَزاءٌ مِثلُ ما قَتَلَ مِنَ النَّعَمِ يَحكُمُ بِهِ ذَوا عَدلٍ مِنكُم هَديًا بالِغَ الكَعبَةِ أَو كَفّارَةٌ طَعامُ مَساكينَ أَو عَدلُ ذٰلِكَ صِيامًا لِيَذوقَ وَبالَ أَمرِهِ ۗ عَفَا اللَّهُ عَمّا سَلَفَ ۚ وَمَن عادَ فَيَنتَقِمُ اللَّهُ مِنهُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَزيزٌ ذُو انتِقامٍ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā taqtulū ṣ-ṣayd w-ʾantum ḥurum w-m qatalahū minkum mutaʿammid f-jazāʾ mithl mā qatal min n-naʿam yaḥkum bihī dhawā ʿadl minkum hady bālighal-kaʿbat ʾaw kaffārat ṭaʿām masākīn ʾaw ʿadl dhālik ṣiyām l-yadhūq wabāl ʾamrihī ʿafā llāh ʿammā salaf w-m ʿād f-yantaqim llāh minh w-llāh ʿazīz dhū ntiqām
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not kill game while you are in the state of ihram. And whoever of you kills it intentionally - the penalty is an equivalent from sacrificial animals to what he killed, as judged by two just men among you as an offering to Allah delivered to the Ka'bah, or an expiation: the feeding of needy people or the equivalent of that in fasting, that he may taste the consequence of his deed. Allah has pardoned what is past; but whoever returns to violation, then Allah will take retribution from him. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution

arabic_uthmani: أُحِلَّ لَكُم صَيدُ البَحرِ وَطَعامُهُ مَتاعًا لَكُم وَلِلسَّيّارَةِ ۖ وَحُرِّمَ عَلَيكُم صَيدُ البَرِّ ما دُمتُم حُرُمًا ۗ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ الَّذي إِلَيهِ تُحشَرونَ
blank: ʾuḥill lakum ṣaydul-baḥr w-ṭaʿāmuhū matāʿ lakum w-l-s-sayyārat w-ḥurrim ʿalaykum ṣaydul-barr mā dumtum ḥurum w-ttaqū llāhalladhī ʾilayh tuḥsharūn
english_saheeh_international: Lawful to you is game from the sea and its food as provision for you and the travelers, but forbidden to you is game from the land as long as you are in the state of ihram. And fear Allah to whom you will be gathered

arabic_uthmani: ۞ جَعَلَ اللَّهُ الكَعبَةَ البَيتَ الحَرامَ قِيامًا لِلنّاسِ وَالشَّهرَ الحَرامَ وَالهَديَ وَالقَلائِدَ ۚ ذٰلِكَ لِتَعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعلَمُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: jaʿal llāhul-kaʿbatal-baytal-ḥarām qiyām l-n-nās w-sh-shahral-ḥarām w-l-hady w-l-qalāʾid dhālik l-taʿlamū ʾann llāh yaʿlam mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-ʾann llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm-
english_saheeh_international: Allah has made the Ka'bah, the Sacred House, standing for the people and has sanctified the sacred months and the sacrificial animals and the garlands by which they are identified. That is so you may know that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is in the earth and that Allah is Knowing of all things

arabic_uthmani: اعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَديدُ العِقابِ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: iʿlamū ʾann llāh shadīdul-ʿiqāb w-ʾann llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Know that Allah is severe in penalty and that Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: ما عَلَى الرَّسولِ إِلَّا البَلاغُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ ما تُبدونَ وَما تَكتُمونَ
blank: mā ʿalā r-rasūl ʾillāl-balāgh w-llāh yaʿlam mā tubdūn w-mā taktumūn
english_saheeh_international: Not upon the Messenger is responsibility except for notification. And Allah knows whatever you reveal and whatever you conceal

arabic_uthmani: قُل لا يَستَوِي الخَبيثُ وَالطَّيِّبُ وَلَو أَعجَبَكَ كَثرَةُ الخَبيثِ ۚ فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ يا أُولِي الأَلبابِ لَعَلَّكُم تُفلِحونَ
blank: qul lā yastawīl-khabīth w-ṭ-ṭayyib w-law ʾaʿjabak kathratul-khabīth f-ttaqū llāh yā-ʾulīl-ʾalbāb laʿallakum tufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Not equal are the evil and the good, although the abundance of evil might impress you." So fear Allah, O you of understanding, that you may be successful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَسأَلوا عَن أَشياءَ إِن تُبدَ لَكُم تَسُؤكُم وَإِن تَسأَلوا عَنها حينَ يُنَزَّلُ القُرآنُ تُبدَ لَكُم عَفَا اللَّهُ عَنها ۗ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ حَليمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā tasʾalū ʿ ʾashyāʾ ʾ tubd lakum tasuʾkum w-ʾ tasʾalū ʿanhā ḥīn yunazzalul-qurʾān tubd lakum ʿafā llāh ʿanhā w-llāh ghafūr ḥalīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not ask about things which, if they are shown to you, will distress you. But if you ask about them while the Qur'an is being revealed, they will be shown to you. Allah has pardoned that which is past; and Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing

arabic_uthmani: قَد سَأَلَها قَومٌ مِن قَبلِكُم ثُمَّ أَصبَحوا بِها كافِرينَ
blank: qad saʾalahā qawm m qablikum thumm ʾaṣbaḥū bihā kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: A people asked such questions before you; then they became thereby disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: ما جَعَلَ اللَّهُ مِن بَحيرَةٍ وَلا سائِبَةٍ وَلا وَصيلَةٍ وَلا حامٍ ۙ وَلٰكِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا يَفتَرونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ الكَذِبَ ۖ وَأَكثَرُهُم لا يَعقِلونَ
blank: mā jaʿal llāh m baḥīrat w-lā sāʾibat w-lā waṣīlat w-lā ḥām w-lākinnalladhīn kafarū yaftarūn ʿalā llāhil-kadhib w-ʾaktharuhum lā yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah has not appointed such innovations as bahirah or sa'ibah or wasilah or ham. But those who disbelieve invent falsehood about Allah, and most of them do not reason

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُم تَعالَوا إِلىٰ ما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ وَإِلَى الرَّسولِ قالوا حَسبُنا ما وَجَدنا عَلَيهِ آباءَنا ۚ أَوَلَو كانَ آباؤُهُم لا يَعلَمونَ شَيئًا وَلا يَهتَدونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lahum taʿālaw ʾilā mā ʾanzal llāh w-ʾilā r-rasūl qālū ḥasbunā mā wajadnā ʿalayh ʾābāʾanā ʾ-w-law kān ʾābāʾuhum lā yaʿlamūn shayʾ w-lā yahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And when it is said to them, "Come to what Allah has revealed and to the Messenger," they say, "Sufficient for us is that upon which we found our fathers." Even though their fathers knew nothing, nor were they guided

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا عَلَيكُم أَنفُسَكُم ۖ لا يَضُرُّكُم مَن ضَلَّ إِذَا اهتَدَيتُم ۚ إِلَى اللَّهِ مَرجِعُكُم جَميعًا فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʿalaykum ʾanfusakum lā yaḍurrukum m ḍall ʾidhā htadaytum ʾilā llāh marjiʿukum jamīʿ f-yunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, upon you is responsibility for yourselves. Those who have gone astray will not harm you when you have been guided. To Allah is you return all together; then He will inform you of what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا شَهادَةُ بَينِكُم إِذا حَضَرَ أَحَدَكُمُ المَوتُ حينَ الوَصِيَّةِ اثنانِ ذَوا عَدلٍ مِنكُم أَو آخَرانِ مِن غَيرِكُم إِن أَنتُم ضَرَبتُم فِي الأَرضِ فَأَصابَتكُم مُصيبَةُ المَوتِ ۚ تَحبِسونَهُما مِن بَعدِ الصَّلاةِ فَيُقسِمانِ بِاللَّهِ إِنِ ارتَبتُم لا نَشتَري بِهِ ثَمَنًا وَلَو كانَ ذا قُربىٰ ۙ وَلا نَكتُمُ شَهادَةَ اللَّهِ إِنّا إِذًا لَمِنَ الآثِمينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū shahādat baynikum ʾidhā ḥaḍar ʾaḥadakumul-mawt ḥīnal-waṣiyyat thnān dhawā ʿadl minkum ʾaw ʾākharān m ghayrikum ʾ ʾantum ḍarabtum fīl-ʾarḍ f-ʾaṣābatkum muṣībatul-mawt taḥbisūnahumā m baʿd ṣ-ṣalāt f-yuqsimān b-llāh ʾin rtabtum lā nashtarī bihī thaman w-law kān dhā qurbā w-lā naktum sh-shahādat llāh ʾinnā ʾidh l-minal-ʾāthimīn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, testimony should be taken among you when death approaches one of you at the time of bequest - that of two just men from among you or two others from outside if you are traveling through the land and the disaster of death should strike you. Detain them after the prayer and let them both swear by Allah if you doubt their testimony, saying, "We will not exchange our oath for a price, even if he should be a near relative, and we will not withhold the testimony of Allah. Indeed, we would then be of the sinful

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن عُثِرَ عَلىٰ أَنَّهُمَا استَحَقّا إِثمًا فَآخَرانِ يَقومانِ مَقامَهُما مِنَ الَّذينَ استَحَقَّ عَلَيهِمُ الأَولَيانِ فَيُقسِمانِ بِاللَّهِ لَشَهادَتُنا أَحَقُّ مِن شَهادَتِهِما وَمَا اعتَدَينا إِنّا إِذًا لَمِنَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: f-ʾ ʿuthir ʿalā ʾannahumā staḥaqqā ʾithm f-ʾākharān yaqūmān maqāmahumā minalladhīn staḥaqq ʿalayhimul-ʾawlayān f-yuqsimān b-llāh l-sh-shahādatunā ʾaḥaqq m shahādatihimā w-mā ʿtadaynā ʾinnā ʾidh l-min ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: But if it is found that those two were guilty of perjury, let two others stand in their place who are foremost in claim from those who have a lawful right. And let them swear by Allah, "Our testimony is truer than their testimony, and we have not transgressed. Indeed, we would then be of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ أَدنىٰ أَن يَأتوا بِالشَّهادَةِ عَلىٰ وَجهِها أَو يَخافوا أَن تُرَدَّ أَيمانٌ بَعدَ أَيمانِهِم ۗ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاسمَعوا ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الفاسِقينَ
blank: dhālik ʾadnā ʾ yaʾtū b-sh-shahādat ʿalā wajhihā ʾaw yakhāfū ʾ turadd ʾaymān baʿd ʾaymānihim w-ttaqū llāh w-smaʿū w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawmal-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: That is more likely that they will give testimony according to its true objective, or at least they would fear that other oaths might be taken after their oaths. And fear Allah and listen; and Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people

arabic_uthmani: ۞ يَومَ يَجمَعُ اللَّهُ الرُّسُلَ فَيَقولُ ماذا أُجِبتُم ۖ قالوا لا عِلمَ لَنا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ عَلّامُ الغُيوبِ
blank: yawm yajmaʿ llāh r-rusul f-yaqūl mādhā ʾujibtum qālū lā ʿilm lanā ʾinnak ʾant ʿallāmul-ghuyūb
english_saheeh_international: Be warned of the Day when Allah will assemble the messengers and say, "What was the response you received?" They will say, "We have no knowledge. Indeed, it is You who is Knower of the unseen

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَ اللَّهُ يا عيسَى ابنَ مَريَمَ اذكُر نِعمَتي عَلَيكَ وَعَلىٰ والِدَتِكَ إِذ أَيَّدتُكَ بِروحِ القُدُسِ تُكَلِّمُ النّاسَ فِي المَهدِ وَكَهلًا ۖ وَإِذ عَلَّمتُكَ الكِتابَ وَالحِكمَةَ وَالتَّوراةَ وَالإِنجيلَ ۖ وَإِذ تَخلُقُ مِنَ الطّينِ كَهَيئَةِ الطَّيرِ بِإِذني فَتَنفُخُ فيها فَتَكونُ طَيرًا بِإِذني ۖ وَتُبرِئُ الأَكمَهَ وَالأَبرَصَ بِإِذني ۖ وَإِذ تُخرِجُ المَوتىٰ بِإِذني ۖ وَإِذ كَفَفتُ بَني إِسرائيلَ عَنكَ إِذ جِئتَهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ فَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِنهُم إِن هٰذا إِلّا سِحرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: ʾidh qāl llāh yā-ʿīsā bn maryam dhkur niʿmatī ʿalayk w-ʿalā wālidatik ʾidh ʾayyadtuk b-rūḥil-qudus tukallim n-nās fīl-mahd w-kahl w-ʾidh ʿallamtukal-kitāb w-l-ḥikmat w-t-tawrāt w-l-ʾinjīl w-ʾidh takhluq min ṭ-ṭīn k-hayʾat ṭ-ṭayr b-ʾidhnī f-tanfukh fīhā f-takūn ṭayr b-ʾidhnī w-tubriʾul-ʾakmah w-l-ʾabraṣ b-ʾidhnī w-ʾidh tukhrijul-mawtā b-ʾidhnī w-ʾidh kafaft banī ʾisrāʾīl ʿank ʾidh jiʾtahum b-l-bayyināt f-qālalladhīn kafarū minhum ʾ hādhā ʾillā siḥr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: The Day when Allah will say, "O Jesus, Son of Mary, remember My favor upon you and upon your mother when I supported you with the Pure Spirit and you spoke to the people in the cradle and in maturity; and remember when I taught you writing and wisdom and the Torah and the Gospel; and when you designed from clay what was like the form of a bird with My permission, then you breathed into it, and it became a bird with My permission; and you healed the blind and the leper with My permission; and when you brought forth the dead with My permission; and when I restrained the Children of Israel from killing you when you came to them with clear proofs and those who disbelieved among them said, "This is not but obvious magic

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ أَوحَيتُ إِلَى الحَوارِيّينَ أَن آمِنوا بي وَبِرَسولي قالوا آمَنّا وَاشهَد بِأَنَّنا مُسلِمونَ
blank: w-ʾidh ʾawḥayt ʾilāl-ḥawāriyyīn ʾ ʾāminū bī w-b-rasūlī qālū ʾāmannā w-shhad b-ʾannanā muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: And remember when I inspired to the disciples, "Believe in Me and in My messenger Jesus." They said, "We have believed, so bear witness that indeed we are Muslims in submission to Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَ الحَوارِيّونَ يا عيسَى ابنَ مَريَمَ هَل يَستَطيعُ رَبُّكَ أَن يُنَزِّلَ عَلَينا مائِدَةً مِنَ السَّماءِ ۖ قالَ اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾidh qālal-ḥawāriyyūn yā-ʿīsā bn maryam hal yastaṭīʿ rabbuk ʾ yunazzil ʿalaynā māʾidatam-min s-samāʾ qāl ttaqū llāh ʾ kuntum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And remember when the disciples said, "O Jesus, Son of Mary, can your Lord send down to us a table spread with food from the heaven? Jesus said," Fear Allah, if you should be believers

arabic_uthmani: قالوا نُريدُ أَن نَأكُلَ مِنها وَتَطمَئِنَّ قُلوبُنا وَنَعلَمَ أَن قَد صَدَقتَنا وَنَكونَ عَلَيها مِنَ الشّاهِدينَ
blank: qālū nurīd ʾ naʾkul minhā w-taṭmaʾinn qulūbunā w-naʿlam ʾ qad ṣadaqtanā w-nakūn ʿalayhā min sh-shāhidīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We wish to eat from it and let our hearts be reassured and know that you have been truthful to us and be among its witnesses

arabic_uthmani: قالَ عيسَى ابنُ مَريَمَ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنا أَنزِل عَلَينا مائِدَةً مِنَ السَّماءِ تَكونُ لَنا عيدًا لِأَوَّلِنا وَآخِرِنا وَآيَةً مِنكَ ۖ وَارزُقنا وَأَنتَ خَيرُ الرّازِقينَ
blank: qāl ʿīsā bn maryam llāhumm rabbanā ʾanzil ʿalaynā māʾidatam-min s-samāʾ takūn lanā ʿīd l-ʾawwalinā w-ʾākhirinā w-ʾāyatam-mink w-rzuqnā w-ʾant khayr r-rāziqīn
english_saheeh_international: Said Jesus, the son of Mary, "O Allah, our Lord, send down to us a table spread with food from the heaven to be for us a festival for the first of us and the last of us and a sign from You. And provide for us, and You are the best of providers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ اللَّهُ إِنّي مُنَزِّلُها عَلَيكُم ۖ فَمَن يَكفُر بَعدُ مِنكُم فَإِنّي أُعَذِّبُهُ عَذابًا لا أُعَذِّبُهُ أَحَدًا مِنَ العالَمينَ
blank: qāl llāh ʾinnī munazziluhā ʿalaykum f-m yakfur baʿd minkum f-ʾinnī ʾuʿadhdhibuhū ʿadhāb lā ʾuʿadhdhibuhū ʾaḥadam-minal-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Indeed, I will sent it down to you, but whoever disbelieves afterwards from among you - then indeed will I punish him with a punishment by which I have not punished anyone among the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ اللَّهُ يا عيسَى ابنَ مَريَمَ أَأَنتَ قُلتَ لِلنّاسِ اتَّخِذوني وَأُمِّيَ إِلٰهَينِ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ۖ قالَ سُبحانَكَ ما يَكونُ لي أَن أَقولَ ما لَيسَ لي بِحَقٍّ ۚ إِن كُنتُ قُلتُهُ فَقَد عَلِمتَهُ ۚ تَعلَمُ ما في نَفسي وَلا أَعلَمُ ما في نَفسِكَ ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ عَلّامُ الغُيوبِ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl llāh yā-ʿīsā bn maryam ʾ-ʾant qult l-n-nās ttakhidhūnī w-ʾummī ʾilāhayn m dūn llāh qāl subḥānak mā yakūn lī ʾ ʾaqūl mā lays lī b-ḥaqq ʾ kunt qultuhū f-qad ʿalimtahū taʿlam mā fī nafsī w-lā ʾaʿlam mā fī nafsik ʾinnak ʾant ʿallāmul-ghuyūb
english_saheeh_international: And beware the Day when Allah will say, "O Jesus, Son of Mary, did you say to the people, 'Take me and my mother as deities besides Allah?'" He will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for me to say that to which I have no right. If I had said it, You would have known it. You know what is within myself, and I do not know what is within Yourself. Indeed, it is You who is Knower of the unseen

arabic_uthmani: ما قُلتُ لَهُم إِلّا ما أَمَرتَني بِهِ أَنِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ رَبّي وَرَبَّكُم ۚ وَكُنتُ عَلَيهِم شَهيدًا ما دُمتُ فيهِم ۖ فَلَمّا تَوَفَّيتَني كُنتَ أَنتَ الرَّقيبَ عَلَيهِم ۚ وَأَنتَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ شَهيدٌ
blank: mā qult lahum ʾillā mā ʾamartanī bihī ʾan ʿbudū llāh rabbī w-rabbakum w-kunt ʿalayhim shahīdam-mā dumt fīhim f-lammā tawaffaytanī kunt ʾant r-raqīb ʿalayhim w-ʾant ʿalā kull shayʾ shahīd
english_saheeh_international: I said not to them except what You commanded me - to worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord. And I was a witness over them as long as I was among them; but when You took me up, You were the Observer over them, and You are, over all things, Witness

arabic_uthmani: إِن تُعَذِّبهُم فَإِنَّهُم عِبادُكَ ۖ وَإِن تَغفِر لَهُم فَإِنَّكَ أَنتَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: ʾ tuʿadhdhibhum f-ʾinnahum ʿibāduk w-ʾ taghfir lahum f-ʾinnak ʾantal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: If You should punish them - indeed they are Your servants; but if You forgive them - indeed it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: قالَ اللَّهُ هٰذا يَومُ يَنفَعُ الصّادِقينَ صِدقُهُم ۚ لَهُم جَنّاتٌ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها أَبَدًا ۚ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنهُم وَرَضوا عَنهُ ۚ ذٰلِكَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: qāl llāh hādhā yawm yanfaʿ ṣ-ṣādiqīn ṣidquhum lahum jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā ʾabad raḍiy llāh ʿanhum w-raḍū ʿanh dhālikal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah will say, "This is the Day when the truthful will benefit from their truthfulness." For them are gardens in Paradise beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them, and they with Him. That is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: لِلَّهِ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَما فيهِنَّ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: l-llāh mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā fīhinn w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is within them. And He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَجَعَلَ الظُّلُماتِ وَالنّورَ ۖ ثُمَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا بِرَبِّهِم يَعدِلونَ
blank: al-ḥamd l-llāhilladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-jaʿal ẓ-ẓulumāt w-n-nūr thummalladhīn kafarū b-rabbihim yaʿdilūn
english_saheeh_international: All praise is due to Allah, who created the heavens and the earth and made the darkness and the light. Then those who disbelieve equate others with their Lord

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَكُم مِن طينٍ ثُمَّ قَضىٰ أَجَلًا ۖ وَأَجَلٌ مُسَمًّى عِندَهُ ۖ ثُمَّ أَنتُم تَمتَرونَ
blank: huwalladhī khalaqakum m ṭīn thumm qaḍā ʾajal w-ʾajal musamm ʿindahū thumm ʾantum tamtarūn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who created you from clay and then decreed a term and a specified time known to Him; then still you are in dispute

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ اللَّهُ فِي السَّماواتِ وَفِي الأَرضِ ۖ يَعلَمُ سِرَّكُم وَجَهرَكُم وَيَعلَمُ ما تَكسِبونَ
blank: w-huw llāh fī s-samāwāt w-fīl-ʾarḍ yaʿlam sirrakum w-jahrakum w-yaʿlam mā taksibūn
english_saheeh_international: And He is Allah, the only deity in the heavens and the earth. He knows your secret and what you make public, and He knows that which you earn

arabic_uthmani: وَما تَأتيهِم مِن آيَةٍ مِن آياتِ رَبِّهِم إِلّا كانوا عَنها مُعرِضينَ
blank: w-mā taʾtīhim m ʾāyat m ʾāyāt rabbihim ʾillā kānū ʿanhā muʿriḍīn
english_saheeh_international: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they turn away therefrom

arabic_uthmani: فَقَد كَذَّبوا بِالحَقِّ لَمّا جاءَهُم ۖ فَسَوفَ يَأتيهِم أَنباءُ ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: f-qad kadhdhabū b-l-ḥaqq lammā jāʾahum f-sawf yaʾtīhim ʾanbāʾ mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: For they had denied the truth when it came to them, but there is going to reach them the news of what they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَرَوا كَم أَهلَكنا مِن قَبلِهِم مِن قَرنٍ مَكَّنّاهُم فِي الأَرضِ ما لَم نُمَكِّن لَكُم وَأَرسَلنَا السَّماءَ عَلَيهِم مِدرارًا وَجَعَلنَا الأَنهارَ تَجري مِن تَحتِهِم فَأَهلَكناهُم بِذُنوبِهِم وَأَنشَأنا مِن بَعدِهِم قَرنًا آخَرينَ
blank: ʾ-lam yaraw kam ʾahlaknā m qablihim m qarn makkannāhum fīl-ʾarḍ mā lam numakk lakum w-ʾarsalnā s-samāʾ ʿalayhim midrār w-jaʿalnāl-ʾanhār tajrī m taḥtihim f-ʾahlaknāhum b-dhunūbihim w-ʾanshaʾnā m baʿdihim qarn ʾākharīn
english_saheeh_international: Have they not seen how many generations We destroyed before them which We had established upon the earth as We have not established you? And We sent rain from the sky upon them in showers and made rivers flow beneath them; then We destroyed them for their sins and brought forth after them a generation of others

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو نَزَّلنا عَلَيكَ كِتابًا في قِرطاسٍ فَلَمَسوهُ بِأَيديهِم لَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا إِن هٰذا إِلّا سِحرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-law nazzalnā ʿalayk kitāb fī qirṭās f-lamasūh b-ʾaydīhim l-qālalladhīn kafarū ʾ hādhā ʾillā siḥr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And even if We had sent down to you, O Muhammad, a written scripture on a page and they touched it with their hands, the disbelievers would say, "This is not but obvious magic

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لَولا أُنزِلَ عَلَيهِ مَلَكٌ ۖ وَلَو أَنزَلنا مَلَكًا لَقُضِيَ الأَمرُ ثُمَّ لا يُنظَرونَ
blank: w-qālū law-lā ʾunzil ʿalayh malak w-law ʾanzalnā malak l-quḍiyal-ʾamr thumm lā yunẓarūn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "Why was there not sent down to him an angel?" But if We had sent down an angel, the matter would have been decided; then they would not be reprieved

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو جَعَلناهُ مَلَكًا لَجَعَلناهُ رَجُلًا وَلَلَبَسنا عَلَيهِم ما يَلبِسونَ
blank: w-law jaʿalnāh malak l-jaʿalnāh rajul w-l-labasnā ʿalayhim mā yalbisūn
english_saheeh_international: And if We had made him an angel, We would have made him appear as a man, and We would have covered them with that in which they cover themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَدِ استُهزِئَ بِرُسُلٍ مِن قَبلِكَ فَحاقَ بِالَّذينَ سَخِروا مِنهُم ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-l-qad stuhziʾ b-rusul m qablik f-ḥāq b-lladhīn sakhirū minhum mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by that which they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: قُل سيروا فِي الأَرضِ ثُمَّ انظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُكَذِّبينَ
blank: qul sīrū fīl-ʾarḍ thumm nẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mukadhdhibīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Travel through the land; then observe how was the end of the deniers

arabic_uthmani: قُل لِمَن ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ قُل لِلَّهِ ۚ كَتَبَ عَلىٰ نَفسِهِ الرَّحمَةَ ۚ لَيَجمَعَنَّكُم إِلىٰ يَومِ القِيامَةِ لا رَيبَ فيهِ ۚ الَّذينَ خَسِروا أَنفُسَهُم فَهُم لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: qul l-mam-mā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ qul l-llāh katab ʿalā nafsih r-raḥmat l-yajmaʿannakum ʾilā yawmil-qiyāmat lā rayb fīhilladhīn khasirū ʾanfusahum f-hum lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "To whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth?" Say, "To Allah." He has decreed upon Himself mercy. He will surely assemble you for the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt. Those who will lose themselves that Day do not believe

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَهُ ما سَكَنَ فِي اللَّيلِ وَالنَّهارِ ۚ وَهُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: w-lahū mā sakan fīl-layl w-n-nahār w-huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And to Him belongs that which reposes by night and by day, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَغَيرَ اللَّهِ أَتَّخِذُ وَلِيًّا فاطِرِ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَهُوَ يُطعِمُ وَلا يُطعَمُ ۗ قُل إِنّي أُمِرتُ أَن أَكونَ أَوَّلَ مَن أَسلَمَ ۖ وَلا تَكونَنَّ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: qul ʾ-ghayr llāh ʾattakhidh waliyy fāṭir s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-huw yuṭʿim w-lā yuṭʿam qul ʾinnī ʾumirt ʾ ʾakūn ʾawwal m ʾaslam w-lā takūnann minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Is it other than Allah I should take as a protector, Creator of the heavens and the earth, while it is He who feeds and is not fed?" Say, O Muhammad, "Indeed, I have been commanded to be the first among you who submit to Allah and was commanded, 'Do not ever be of the polytheists

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنّي أَخافُ إِن عَصَيتُ رَبّي عَذابَ يَومٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: qul ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʾ ʿaṣayt rabb ʿadhāb yawm ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day

arabic_uthmani: مَن يُصرَف عَنهُ يَومَئِذٍ فَقَد رَحِمَهُ ۚ وَذٰلِكَ الفَوزُ المُبينُ
blank: m yuṣraf ʿanh yawmaʾidh f-qad raḥimahū w-dhālikal-fawzul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: He from whom it is averted that Day - Allah has granted him mercy. And that is the clear attainment

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن يَمسَسكَ اللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلا كاشِفَ لَهُ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ وَإِن يَمسَسكَ بِخَيرٍ فَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: w-ʾ yamsask llāh b-ḍurr f-lā kāshif lahū ʾillā huw w-ʾ yamsask b-khayr f-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him. And if He touches you with good - then He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ القاهِرُ فَوقَ عِبادِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ الحَكيمُ الخَبيرُ
blank: w-huwal-qāhir fawq ʿibādihī w-huwal-ḥakīmul-khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And He is the subjugator over His servants. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted with all

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَيُّ شَيءٍ أَكبَرُ شَهادَةً ۖ قُلِ اللَّهُ ۖ شَهيدٌ بَيني وَبَينَكُم ۚ وَأوحِيَ إِلَيَّ هٰذَا القُرآنُ لِأُنذِرَكُم بِهِ وَمَن بَلَغَ ۚ أَئِنَّكُم لَتَشهَدونَ أَنَّ مَعَ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً أُخرىٰ ۚ قُل لا أَشهَدُ ۚ قُل إِنَّما هُوَ إِلٰهٌ واحِدٌ وَإِنَّني بَريءٌ مِمّا تُشرِكونَ
blank: qul ʾayy shayʾ ʾakbar shahādat qul llāh shahīd baynī w-baynakum w-ʾūḥiy ʾilayy hādhāl-qurʾān l-ʾundhirakum bihī w-m balagh ʾ-ʾinnakum l-tashhadūn ʾann maʿ llāh ʾālihat ʾukhrā qul lā ʾashhad qul ʾinnamā huw ʾilāh wāḥid w-ʾinnanī barīʾ mimmā tushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "What thing is greatest in testimony?" Say, "Allah is witness between me and you. And this Qur'an was revealed to me that I may warn you thereby and whomever it reaches. Do you truly testify that with Allah there are other deities?" Say, "I will not testify with you." Say, "Indeed, He is but one God, and indeed, I am free of what you associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ آتَيناهُمُ الكِتابَ يَعرِفونَهُ كَما يَعرِفونَ أَبناءَهُمُ ۘ الَّذينَ خَسِروا أَنفُسَهُم فَهُم لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: alladhīn ʾātaynāhumul-kitāb yaʿrifūnahū k-mā yaʿrifūn ʾabnāʾahum alladhīn khasirū ʾanfusahum f-hum lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Those to whom We have given the Scripture recognize it as they recognize their own sons. Those who will lose themselves in the Hereafter do not believe

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَو كَذَّبَ بِآياتِهِ ۗ إِنَّهُ لا يُفلِحُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: w-m ʾaẓlam mimman ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib ʾaw kadhdhab b-ʾāyātihī ʾinnahū lā yufliḥ ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie or denies His verses? Indeed, the wrongdoers will not succeed

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ نَحشُرُهُم جَميعًا ثُمَّ نَقولُ لِلَّذينَ أَشرَكوا أَينَ شُرَكاؤُكُمُ الَّذينَ كُنتُم تَزعُمونَ
blank: w-yawm naḥshuruhum jamīʿ thumm naqūl l-lladhīn ʾashrakū ʾayn shurakāʾukumulladhīn kuntum tazʿumūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, the Day We will gather them all together; then We will say to those who associated others with Allah, "Where are your 'partners' that you used to claim with Him

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ لَم تَكُن فِتنَتُهُم إِلّا أَن قالوا وَاللَّهِ رَبِّنا ما كُنّا مُشرِكينَ
blank: thumm lam tak fitnatuhum ʾillā ʾ qālū w-llāh rabbinā mā kunnā mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Then there will be no excuse upon examination except they will say, "By Allah, our Lord, we were not those who associated

arabic_uthmani: انظُر كَيفَ كَذَبوا عَلىٰ أَنفُسِهِم ۚ وَضَلَّ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَفتَرونَ
blank: unẓur kayf kadhabū ʿalā ʾanfusihim w-ḍall ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: See how they will lie about themselves. And lost from them will be what they used to invent

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنهُم مَن يَستَمِعُ إِلَيكَ ۖ وَجَعَلنا عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفقَهوهُ وَفي آذانِهِم وَقرًا ۚ وَإِن يَرَوا كُلَّ آيَةٍ لا يُؤمِنوا بِها ۚ حَتّىٰ إِذا جاءوكَ يُجادِلونَكَ يَقولُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا إِن هٰذا إِلّا أَساطيرُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: w-minhum m yastamiʿ ʾilayk w-jaʿalnā ʿalā qulūbihim ʾakinnat ʾ yafqahūh w-fī ʾādhānihim waqr w-ʾ yaraw kull ʾāyat lā yuʾminū bihā ḥattā ʾidhā jāʾūk yujādilūnak yaqūlulladhīn kafarū ʾ hādhā ʾillā ʾasāṭīrul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: And among them are those who listen to you, but We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And if they should see every sign, they will not believe in it. Even when they come to you arguing with you, those who disbelieve say, "This is not but legends of the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: وَهُم يَنهَونَ عَنهُ وَيَنأَونَ عَنهُ ۖ وَإِن يُهلِكونَ إِلّا أَنفُسَهُم وَما يَشعُرونَ
blank: w-hum yanhawn ʿanh w-yanʾawn ʿanh w-ʾ yuhlikūn ʾillā ʾanfusahum w-mā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: And they prevent others from him and are themselves remote from him. And they do not destroy except themselves, but they perceive it not

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو تَرىٰ إِذ وُقِفوا عَلَى النّارِ فَقالوا يا لَيتَنا نُرَدُّ وَلا نُكَذِّبَ بِآياتِ رَبِّنا وَنَكونَ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-law tarā ʾidh wuqifū ʿalā n-nār f-qālū yā-laytanā nuradd w-lā nukadhdhib b-ʾāyāt rabbinā w-nakūn minal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: If you could but see when they are made to stand before the Fire and will say, "Oh, would that we could be returned to life on earth and not deny the signs of our Lord and be among the believers

arabic_uthmani: بَل بَدا لَهُم ما كانوا يُخفونَ مِن قَبلُ ۖ وَلَو رُدّوا لَعادوا لِما نُهوا عَنهُ وَإِنَّهُم لَكاذِبونَ
blank: bal badā lahum mā kānū yukhfūn m qabl w-law ruddū l-ʿādū l-mā nuhū ʿanh w-ʾinnahum l-kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: But what they concealed before has now appeared to them. And even if they were returned, they would return to that which they were forbidden; and indeed, they are liars

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا إِن هِيَ إِلّا حَياتُنَا الدُّنيا وَما نَحنُ بِمَبعوثينَ
blank: w-qālū ʾ hiy ʾillā ḥayātunā d-dunyā w-mā naḥn b-mabʿūthīn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "There is none but our worldly life, and we will not be resurrected

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو تَرىٰ إِذ وُقِفوا عَلىٰ رَبِّهِم ۚ قالَ أَلَيسَ هٰذا بِالحَقِّ ۚ قالوا بَلىٰ وَرَبِّنا ۚ قالَ فَذوقُوا العَذابَ بِما كُنتُم تَكفُرونَ
blank: w-law tarā ʾidh wuqifū ʿalā rabbihim qāl ʾ-lays hādhā b-l-ḥaqq qālū balā w-rabbinā qāl f-dhūqūl-ʿadhāb b-mā kuntum takfurūn
english_saheeh_international: If you could but see when they will be made to stand before their Lord. He will say, "Is this not the truth?" They will say, "Yes, by our Lord." He will then say, "So taste the punishment because you used to disbelieve

arabic_uthmani: قَد خَسِرَ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِلِقاءِ اللَّهِ ۖ حَتّىٰ إِذا جاءَتهُمُ السّاعَةُ بَغتَةً قالوا يا حَسرَتَنا عَلىٰ ما فَرَّطنا فيها وَهُم يَحمِلونَ أَوزارَهُم عَلىٰ ظُهورِهِم ۚ أَلا ساءَ ما يَزِرونَ
blank: qad khasiralladhīn kadhdhabū b-liqāʾ llāh ḥattā ʾidhā jāʾathum s-sāʿat baghtat qālū yā-ḥasratanā ʿalā mā farraṭnā fīhā w-hum yaḥmilūn ʾawzārahum ʿalā ẓuhūrihim ʾ-lā sāʾ mā yazirūn
english_saheeh_international: Those will have lost who deny the meeting with Allah, until when the Hour of resurrection comes upon them unexpectedly, they will say, "Oh, how great is our regret over what we neglected concerning it," while they bear their burdens on their backs. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear

arabic_uthmani: وَمَا الحَياةُ الدُّنيا إِلّا لَعِبٌ وَلَهوٌ ۖ وَلَلدّارُ الآخِرَةُ خَيرٌ لِلَّذينَ يَتَّقونَ ۗ أَفَلا تَعقِلونَ
blank: w-māl-ḥayāt d-dunyā ʾillā laʿib w-lahw w-l-d-dārul-ʾākhirat khayr l-lladhīn yattaqūn ʾ-f-lā taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And the worldly life is not but amusement and diversion; but the home of the Hereafter is best for those who fear Allah, so will you not reason

arabic_uthmani: قَد نَعلَمُ إِنَّهُ لَيَحزُنُكَ الَّذي يَقولونَ ۖ فَإِنَّهُم لا يُكَذِّبونَكَ وَلٰكِنَّ الظّالِمينَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ يَجحَدونَ
blank: qad naʿlam ʾinnahū l-yaḥzunukalladhī yaqūlūn f-ʾinnahum lā yukadhdhibūnak w-lākinn ẓ-ẓālimīn b-ʾāyāt llāh yajḥadūn
english_saheeh_international: We know that you, O Muhammad, are saddened by what they say. And indeed, they do not call you untruthful, but it is the verses of Allah that the wrongdoers reject

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد كُذِّبَت رُسُلٌ مِن قَبلِكَ فَصَبَروا عَلىٰ ما كُذِّبوا وَأوذوا حَتّىٰ أَتاهُم نَصرُنا ۚ وَلا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِماتِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَلَقَد جاءَكَ مِن نَبَإِ المُرسَلينَ
blank: w-l-qad kudhdhibat rusul m qablik f-ṣabarū ʿalā mā kudhdhibū w-ʾūdhū ḥattā ʾatāhum naṣrunā w-lā mubaddil l-kalimāt llāh w-l-qad jāʾak m nabaʾil-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: And certainly were messengers denied before you, but they were patient over the effects of denial, and they were harmed until Our victory came to them. And none can alter the words of Allah. And there has certainly come to you some information about the previous messengers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيكَ إِعراضُهُم فَإِنِ استَطَعتَ أَن تَبتَغِيَ نَفَقًا فِي الأَرضِ أَو سُلَّمًا فِي السَّماءِ فَتَأتِيَهُم بِآيَةٍ ۚ وَلَو شاءَ اللَّهُ لَجَمَعَهُم عَلَى الهُدىٰ ۚ فَلا تَكونَنَّ مِنَ الجاهِلينَ
blank: w-ʾ kān kabur ʿalayk ʾiʿrāḍuhum f-ʾin staṭaʿt ʾ tabtaghiy nafaq fīl-ʾarḍ ʾaw sullam fī s-samāʾ f-taʾtiyahum b-ʾāyat w-law shāʾ llāh l-jamaʿahum ʿalāl-hudā f-lā takūnann minal-jāhilīn
english_saheeh_international: And if their evasion is difficult for you, then if you are able to seek a tunnel into the earth or a stairway into the sky to bring them a sign, then do so. But if Allah had willed, He would have united them upon guidance. So never be of the ignorant

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّما يَستَجيبُ الَّذينَ يَسمَعونَ ۘ وَالمَوتىٰ يَبعَثُهُمُ اللَّهُ ثُمَّ إِلَيهِ يُرجَعونَ
blank: ʾinnamā yastajībulladhīn yasmaʿūn w-l-mawtā yabʿathuhum llāh thumm ʾilayh yurjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Only those who hear will respond. But the dead - Allah will resurrect them; then to Him they will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لَولا نُزِّلَ عَلَيهِ آيَةٌ مِن رَبِّهِ ۚ قُل إِنَّ اللَّهَ قادِرٌ عَلىٰ أَن يُنَزِّلَ آيَةً وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-qālū law-lā nuzzil ʿalayh ʾāyat m rabbihī qul ʾinn llāh qādir ʿalā ʾ yunazzil ʾāyat w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "Indeed, Allah is Able to send down a sign, but most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَما مِن دابَّةٍ فِي الأَرضِ وَلا طائِرٍ يَطيرُ بِجَناحَيهِ إِلّا أُمَمٌ أَمثالُكُم ۚ ما فَرَّطنا فِي الكِتابِ مِن شَيءٍ ۚ ثُمَّ إِلىٰ رَبِّهِم يُحشَرونَ
blank: w-mā m dābbat fīl-ʾarḍ w-lā ṭāʾir yaṭīr b-janāḥayh ʾillā ʾumam ʾamthālukum mā farraṭnā fīl-kitāb m shayʾ thumm ʾilā rabbihim yuḥsharūn
english_saheeh_international: And there is no creature on or within the earth or bird that flies with its wings except that they are communities like you. We have not neglected in the Register a thing. Then unto their Lord they will be gathered

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا صُمٌّ وَبُكمٌ فِي الظُّلُماتِ ۗ مَن يَشَإِ اللَّهُ يُضلِلهُ وَمَن يَشَأ يَجعَلهُ عَلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: w-lladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā ṣumm w-bukm fī ẓ-ẓulumāt m yashaʾ llāh yuḍlilh w-m yashaʾ yajʿalh ʿalā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: But those who deny Our verses are deaf and dumb within darknesses. Whomever Allah wills - He leaves astray; and whomever He wills - He puts him on a straight path

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتَكُم إِن أَتاكُم عَذابُ اللَّهِ أَو أَتَتكُمُ السّاعَةُ أَغَيرَ اللَّهِ تَدعونَ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytakum ʾ ʾatākum ʿadhāb llāh ʾaw ʾatatkum s-sāʿat ʾ-ghayr llāh tadʿūn ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered: if there came to you the punishment of Allah or there came to you the Hour - is it other than Allah you would invoke, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: بَل إِيّاهُ تَدعونَ فَيَكشِفُ ما تَدعونَ إِلَيهِ إِن شاءَ وَتَنسَونَ ما تُشرِكونَ
blank: bal ʾiyyāh tadʿūn f-yakshif mā tadʿūn ʾilayh ʾ shāʾ w-tansawn mā tushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: No, it is Him alone you would invoke, and He would remove that for which you invoked Him if He willed, and you would forget what you associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا إِلىٰ أُمَمٍ مِن قَبلِكَ فَأَخَذناهُم بِالبَأساءِ وَالضَّرّاءِ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَضَرَّعونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā ʾilā ʾumam m qablik f-ʾakhadhnāhum b-l-baʾsāʾ w-ḍ-ḍarrāʾ laʿallahum yataḍarraʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have already sent messengers to nations before you, O Muhammad; then We seized them with poverty and hardship that perhaps they might humble themselves to Us

arabic_uthmani: فَلَولا إِذ جاءَهُم بَأسُنا تَضَرَّعوا وَلٰكِن قَسَت قُلوبُهُم وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الشَّيطانُ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: f-law-lā ʾidh jāʾahum baʾsunā taḍarraʿū w-lāk qasat qulūbuhum w-zayyan lahum sh-shayṭān mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Then why, when Our punishment came to them, did they not humble themselves? But their hearts became hardened, and Satan made attractive to them that which they were doing

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا نَسوا ما ذُكِّروا بِهِ فَتَحنا عَلَيهِم أَبوابَ كُلِّ شَيءٍ حَتّىٰ إِذا فَرِحوا بِما أوتوا أَخَذناهُم بَغتَةً فَإِذا هُم مُبلِسونَ
blank: f-lammā nasū mā dhukkirū bihī fataḥnā ʿalayhim ʾabwāb kull shayʾ ḥattā ʾidhā fariḥū b-mā ʾūtū ʾakhadhnāhum baghtat f-ʾidhā hum mublisūn
english_saheeh_international: So when they forgot that by which they had been reminded, We opened to them the doors of every good thing until, when they rejoiced in that which they were given, We seized them suddenly, and they were then in despair

arabic_uthmani: فَقُطِعَ دابِرُ القَومِ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا ۚ وَالحَمدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: f-quṭiʿ dābirul-qawmilladhīn ẓalamū w-l-ḥamd l-llāh rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: So the people that committed wrong were eliminated. And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم إِن أَخَذَ اللَّهُ سَمعَكُم وَأَبصارَكُم وَخَتَمَ عَلىٰ قُلوبِكُم مَن إِلٰهٌ غَيرُ اللَّهِ يَأتيكُم بِهِ ۗ انظُر كَيفَ نُصَرِّفُ الآياتِ ثُمَّ هُم يَصدِفونَ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ ʾakhadh llāh samʿakum w-ʾabṣārakum w-khatam ʿalā qulūbikum m ʾilāh ghayr llāh yaʾtīkum bih nẓur kayf nuṣarriful-ʾāyāt thumm hum yaṣdifūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should take away your hearing and your sight and set a seal upon your hearts, which deity other than Allah could bring them back to you?" Look how we diversify the verses; then they still turn away

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتَكُم إِن أَتاكُم عَذابُ اللَّهِ بَغتَةً أَو جَهرَةً هَل يُهلَكُ إِلَّا القَومُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytakum ʾ ʾatākum ʿadhāb llāh baghtat ʾaw jahrat hal yuhlak ʾillāl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered: if the punishment of Allah should come to you unexpectedly or manifestly, will any be destroyed but the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: وَما نُرسِلُ المُرسَلينَ إِلّا مُبَشِّرينَ وَمُنذِرينَ ۖ فَمَن آمَنَ وَأَصلَحَ فَلا خَوفٌ عَلَيهِم وَلا هُم يَحزَنونَ
blank: w-mā nursilul-mursalīn ʾillā mubashshirīn w-mundhirīn f-m ʾāman w-ʾaṣlaḥ f-lā khawf ʿalayhim w-lā hum yaḥzanūn
english_saheeh_international: And We send not the messengers except as bringers of good tidings and warners. So whoever believes and reforms - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا يَمَسُّهُمُ العَذابُ بِما كانوا يَفسُقونَ
blank: w-lladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā yamassuhumul-ʿadhāb b-mā kānū yafsuqūn
english_saheeh_international: But those who deny Our verses - the punishment will touch them for their defiant disobedience

arabic_uthmani: قُل لا أَقولُ لَكُم عِندي خَزائِنُ اللَّهِ وَلا أَعلَمُ الغَيبَ وَلا أَقولُ لَكُم إِنّي مَلَكٌ ۖ إِن أَتَّبِعُ إِلّا ما يوحىٰ إِلَيَّ ۚ قُل هَل يَستَوِي الأَعمىٰ وَالبَصيرُ ۚ أَفَلا تَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: qul lā ʾaqūl lakum ʿindī khazāʾin llāh w-lā ʾaʿlamul-ghayb w-lā ʾaqūl lakum ʾinnī malak ʾ ʾattabiʿ ʾillā mā yūḥā ʾilayy qul hal yastawīl-ʾaʿmā w-l-baṣīr ʾ-f-lā tatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "I do not tell you that I have the depositories containing the provision of Allah or that I know the unseen, nor do I tell you that I am an angel. I only follow what is revealed to me." Say, "Is the blind equivalent to the seeing? Then will you not give thought

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنذِر بِهِ الَّذينَ يَخافونَ أَن يُحشَروا إِلىٰ رَبِّهِم ۙ لَيسَ لَهُم مِن دونِهِ وَلِيٌّ وَلا شَفيعٌ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَّقونَ
blank: w-ʾandhir bihilladhīn yakhāfūn ʾ yuḥsharū ʾilā rabbihim lays lahum m dūnihī waliyy w-lā shafīʿ laʿallahum yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And warn by the Qur'an those who fear that they will be gathered before their Lord - for them besides Him will be no protector and no intercessor - that they might become righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَطرُدِ الَّذينَ يَدعونَ رَبَّهُم بِالغَداةِ وَالعَشِيِّ يُريدونَ وَجهَهُ ۖ ما عَلَيكَ مِن حِسابِهِم مِن شَيءٍ وَما مِن حِسابِكَ عَلَيهِم مِن شَيءٍ فَتَطرُدَهُم فَتَكونَ مِنَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-lā taṭrudilladhīn yadʿūn rabbahum b-l-ghadāt w-l-ʿashiyy yurīdūn wajhahū mā ʿalayk m ḥisābihim m shayʾ w-mā m ḥisābik ʿalayhim m shayʾ f-taṭrudahum f-takūn min ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And do not send away those who call upon their Lord morning and afternoon, seeking His countenance. Not upon you is anything of their account and not upon them is anything of your account. So were you to send them away, you would then be of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ فَتَنّا بَعضَهُم بِبَعضٍ لِيَقولوا أَهٰؤُلاءِ مَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيهِم مِن بَينِنا ۗ أَلَيسَ اللَّهُ بِأَعلَمَ بِالشّاكِرينَ
blank: w-k-dhālik fatannā baʿḍahum b-baʿḍ l-yaqūlū ʾ-hāʾulāʾ mann llāh ʿalayhim m bayninā ʾ-lays llāh b-ʾaʿlam b-sh-shākirīn
english_saheeh_international: And thus We have tried some of them through others that the disbelievers might say, "Is it these whom Allah has favored among us?" Is not Allah most knowing of those who are grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا جاءَكَ الَّذينَ يُؤمِنونَ بِآياتِنا فَقُل سَلامٌ عَلَيكُم ۖ كَتَبَ رَبُّكُم عَلىٰ نَفسِهِ الرَّحمَةَ ۖ أَنَّهُ مَن عَمِلَ مِنكُم سوءًا بِجَهالَةٍ ثُمَّ تابَ مِن بَعدِهِ وَأَصلَحَ فَأَنَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-ʾidhā jāʾakalladhīn yuʾminūn b-ʾāyātinā f-qul salām ʿalaykum katab rabbukum ʿalā nafsih r-raḥmat ʾannahū m ʿamil minkum sūʾ b-jahālat thumm tāb m baʿdihī w-ʾaṣlaḥ f-ʾannahū ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And when those come to you who believe in Our verses, say, "Peace be upon you. Your Lord has decreed upon Himself mercy: that any of you who does wrong out of ignorance and then repents after that and corrects himself - indeed, He is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ الآياتِ وَلِتَستَبينَ سَبيلُ المُجرِمينَ
blank: w-k-dhālik nufaṣṣilul-ʾāyāt w-l-tastabīn sabīlul-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: And thus do We detail the verses, and thus the way of the criminals will become evident

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنّي نُهيتُ أَن أَعبُدَ الَّذينَ تَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ۚ قُل لا أَتَّبِعُ أَهواءَكُم ۙ قَد ضَلَلتُ إِذًا وَما أَنا مِنَ المُهتَدينَ
blank: qul ʾinnī nuhīt ʾ ʾaʿbudalladhīn tadʿūn m dūn llāh qul lā ʾattabiʿ ʾahwāʾakum qad ḍalalt ʾidh w-mā ʾan minal-muhtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, I have been forbidden to worship those you invoke besides Allah." Say, "I will not follow your desires, for I would then have gone astray, and I would not be of the rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنّي عَلىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِن رَبّي وَكَذَّبتُم بِهِ ۚ ما عِندي ما تَستَعجِلونَ بِهِ ۚ إِنِ الحُكمُ إِلّا لِلَّهِ ۖ يَقُصُّ الحَقَّ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيرُ الفاصِلينَ
blank: qul ʾinnī ʿalā bayyinat m rabbī w-kadhdhabtum bihī mā ʿindī mā tastaʿjilūn bihī ʾinil-ḥukm ʾillā l-llāh yaquṣṣul-ḥaqq w-huw khayrul-fāṣilīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, I am on clear evidence from my Lord, and you have denied it. I do not have that for which you are impatient. The decision is only for Allah. He relates the truth, and He is the best of deciders

arabic_uthmani: قُل لَو أَنَّ عِندي ما تَستَعجِلونَ بِهِ لَقُضِيَ الأَمرُ بَيني وَبَينَكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ أَعلَمُ بِالظّالِمينَ
blank: qul law ʾann ʿindī mā tastaʿjilūn bihī l-quḍiyal-ʾamr baynī w-baynakum w-llāh ʾaʿlam b-ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "If I had that for which you are impatient, the matter would have been decided between me and you, but Allah is most knowing of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَعِندَهُ مَفاتِحُ الغَيبِ لا يَعلَمُها إِلّا هُوَ ۚ وَيَعلَمُ ما فِي البَرِّ وَالبَحرِ ۚ وَما تَسقُطُ مِن وَرَقَةٍ إِلّا يَعلَمُها وَلا حَبَّةٍ في ظُلُماتِ الأَرضِ وَلا رَطبٍ وَلا يابِسٍ إِلّا في كِتابٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-ʿindahū mafātiḥul-ghayb lā yaʿlamuhā ʾillā huw w-yaʿlam mā fīl-barr w-l-baḥr w-mā tasquṭ m waraqat ʾillā yaʿlamuhā w-lā ḥabbat fī ẓulumātil-ʾarḍ w-lā raṭb w-lā yābis ʾillā fī kitāb mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And with Him are the keys of the unseen; none knows them except Him. And He knows what is on the land and in the sea. Not a leaf falls but that He knows it. And no grain is there within the darknesses of the earth and no moist or dry thing but that it is written in a clear record

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي يَتَوَفّاكُم بِاللَّيلِ وَيَعلَمُ ما جَرَحتُم بِالنَّهارِ ثُمَّ يَبعَثُكُم فيهِ لِيُقضىٰ أَجَلٌ مُسَمًّى ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيهِ مَرجِعُكُم ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-huwalladhī yatawaffākum b-l-layl w-yaʿlam mā jaraḥtum b-n-nahār thumm yabʿathukum fīh l-yuqḍā ʾajal musamm thumm ʾilayh marjiʿukum thumm yunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who takes your souls by night and knows what you have committed by day. Then He revives you therein that a specified term may be fulfilled. Then to Him will be your return; then He will inform you about what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ القاهِرُ فَوقَ عِبادِهِ ۖ وَيُرسِلُ عَلَيكُم حَفَظَةً حَتّىٰ إِذا جاءَ أَحَدَكُمُ المَوتُ تَوَفَّتهُ رُسُلُنا وَهُم لا يُفَرِّطونَ
blank: w-huwal-qāhir fawq ʿibādihī w-yursil ʿalaykum ḥafaẓat ḥattā ʾidhā jāʾ ʾaḥadakumul-mawt tawaffath rusulunā w-hum lā yufarriṭūn
english_saheeh_international: And He is the subjugator over His servants, and He sends over you guardian-angels until, when death comes to one of you, Our messengers take him, and they do not fail in their duties

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ رُدّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ مَولاهُمُ الحَقِّ ۚ أَلا لَهُ الحُكمُ وَهُوَ أَسرَعُ الحاسِبينَ
blank: thumm ruddū ʾilā llāh mawlāhumul-ḥaqq ʾ-lā lahul-ḥukm w-huw ʾasraʿul-ḥāsibīn
english_saheeh_international: Then they His servants are returned to Allah, their true Lord. Unquestionably, His is the judgement, and He is the swiftest of accountants

arabic_uthmani: قُل مَن يُنَجّيكُم مِن ظُلُماتِ البَرِّ وَالبَحرِ تَدعونَهُ تَضَرُّعًا وَخُفيَةً لَئِن أَنجانا مِن هٰذِهِ لَنَكونَنَّ مِنَ الشّاكِرينَ
blank: qul m yunajjīkum m ẓulumātil-barr w-l-baḥr tadʿūnahū taḍarruʿ w-khufyat l-ʾ ʾanjānā m hādhihī l-nakūnann min sh-shākirīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Who rescues you from the darknesses of the land and sea when you call upon Him imploring aloud and privately, 'If He should save us from this crisis, we will surely be among the thankful

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ اللَّهُ يُنَجّيكُم مِنها وَمِن كُلِّ كَربٍ ثُمَّ أَنتُم تُشرِكونَ
blank: qul llāh yunajjīkum minhā w-m kull karb thumm ʾantum tushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "It is Allah who saves you from it and from every distress; then you still associate others with Him

arabic_uthmani: قُل هُوَ القادِرُ عَلىٰ أَن يَبعَثَ عَلَيكُم عَذابًا مِن فَوقِكُم أَو مِن تَحتِ أَرجُلِكُم أَو يَلبِسَكُم شِيَعًا وَيُذيقَ بَعضَكُم بَأسَ بَعضٍ ۗ انظُر كَيفَ نُصَرِّفُ الآياتِ لَعَلَّهُم يَفقَهونَ
blank: qul huwal-qādir ʿalā ʾ yabʿath ʿalaykum ʿadhābam-m fawqikum ʾaw m taḥt ʾarjulikum ʾaw yalbisakum shiyaʿ w-yudhīq baʿḍakum baʾs baʿḍ- nẓur kayf nuṣarriful-ʾāyāt laʿallahum yafqahūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "He is the one Able to send upon you affliction from above you or from beneath your feet or to confuse you so you become sects and make you taste the violence of one another." Look how We diversify the signs that they might understand

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِ قَومُكَ وَهُوَ الحَقُّ ۚ قُل لَستُ عَلَيكُم بِوَكيلٍ
blank: w-kadhdhab bihī qawmuk w-huwal-ḥaqq qul last ʿalaykum b-wakīl
english_saheeh_international: But your people have denied it while it is the truth. Say, "I am not over you a manager

arabic_uthmani: لِكُلِّ نَبَإٍ مُستَقَرٌّ ۚ وَسَوفَ تَعلَمونَ
blank: l-kull nabaʾ mustaqarr w-sawf taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: For every happening is a finality; and you are going to know

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا رَأَيتَ الَّذينَ يَخوضونَ في آياتِنا فَأَعرِض عَنهُم حَتّىٰ يَخوضوا في حَديثٍ غَيرِهِ ۚ وَإِمّا يُنسِيَنَّكَ الشَّيطانُ فَلا تَقعُد بَعدَ الذِّكرىٰ مَعَ القَومِ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾaytalladhīn yakhūḍūn fī ʾāyātinā f-ʾaʿriḍ ʿanhum ḥattā yakhūḍū fī ḥadīth ghayrihī w-ʾimmā yunsiyannak sh-shayṭān f-lā taqʿud baʿd dh-dhikrā maʿal-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And when you see those who engage in offensive discourse concerning Our verses, then turn away from them until they enter into another conversation. And if Satan should cause you to forget, then do not remain after the reminder with the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: وَما عَلَى الَّذينَ يَتَّقونَ مِن حِسابِهِم مِن شَيءٍ وَلٰكِن ذِكرىٰ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَّقونَ
blank: w-mā ʿalālladhīn yattaqūn m ḥisābihim m shayʾ w-lāk dhikrā laʿallahum yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who fear Allah are not held accountable for the disbelievers at all, but only for a reminder - that perhaps they will fear Him

arabic_uthmani: وَذَرِ الَّذينَ اتَّخَذوا دينَهُم لَعِبًا وَلَهوًا وَغَرَّتهُمُ الحَياةُ الدُّنيا ۚ وَذَكِّر بِهِ أَن تُبسَلَ نَفسٌ بِما كَسَبَت لَيسَ لَها مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَلِيٌّ وَلا شَفيعٌ وَإِن تَعدِل كُلَّ عَدلٍ لا يُؤخَذ مِنها ۗ أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ أُبسِلوا بِما كَسَبوا ۖ لَهُم شَرابٌ مِن حَميمٍ وَعَذابٌ أَليمٌ بِما كانوا يَكفُرونَ
blank: w-dharilladhīn ttakhadhū dīnahum laʿib w-lahw w-gharrathumul-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-dhakkir bihī ʾ tubsal nafs b-mā kasabat lays lahā m dūn llāh waliyy w-lā shafīʿ w-ʾ taʿdil kull ʿadl lā yuʾkhadh minhā ʾulāʾikalladhīn ʾubsilū b-mā kasabū lahum sharāb m ḥamīm w-ʿadhāb ʾalīm b-mā kānū yakfurūn
english_saheeh_international: And leave those who take their religion as amusement and diversion and whom the worldly life has deluded. But remind with the Qur'an, lest a soul be given up to destruction for what it earned; it will have other than Allah no protector and no intercessor. And if it should offer every compensation, it would not be taken from it. Those are the ones who are given to destruction for what they have earned. For them will be a drink of scalding water and a painful punishment because they used to disbelieve

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَنَدعو مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ما لا يَنفَعُنا وَلا يَضُرُّنا وَنُرَدُّ عَلىٰ أَعقابِنا بَعدَ إِذ هَدانَا اللَّهُ كَالَّذِي استَهوَتهُ الشَّياطينُ فِي الأَرضِ حَيرانَ لَهُ أَصحابٌ يَدعونَهُ إِلَى الهُدَى ائتِنا ۗ قُل إِنَّ هُدَى اللَّهِ هُوَ الهُدىٰ ۖ وَأُمِرنا لِنُسلِمَ لِرَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: qul ʾ-nadʿū m dūn llāh mā lā yanfaʿunā w-lā yaḍurrunā w-nuradd ʿalā ʾaʿqābinā baʿd ʾidh hadānā llāh k-lladhī stahwath sh-shayāṭīn fīl-ʾarḍ ḥayrān lahū ʾaṣḥāb yadʿūnahū ʾilāl-hudā ʾtinā qul ʾinn hudā llāh huwal-hudā w-ʾumirnā l-nuslim l-rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Shall we invoke instead of Allah that which neither benefits us nor harms us and be turned back on our heels after Allah has guided us? We would then be like one whom the devils enticed to wander upon the earth confused, while he has companions inviting him to guidance, calling, 'Come to us.' " Say, "Indeed, the guidance of Allah is the only guidance; and we have been commanded to submit to the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَأَن أَقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ وَاتَّقوهُ ۚ وَهُوَ الَّذي إِلَيهِ تُحشَرونَ
blank: w-ʾ ʾaqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ttaqūh w-huwalladhī ʾilayh tuḥsharūn
english_saheeh_international: And to establish prayer and fear Him." And it is He to whom you will be gathered

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ بِالحَقِّ ۖ وَيَومَ يَقولُ كُن فَيَكونُ ۚ قَولُهُ الحَقُّ ۚ وَلَهُ المُلكُ يَومَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصّورِ ۚ عالِمُ الغَيبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ ۚ وَهُوَ الحَكيمُ الخَبيرُ
blank: w-huwalladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ b-l-ḥaqq w-yawm yaqūl k f-yakūn qawluhul-ḥaqq w-lahul-mulk yawm yunfakh fī ṣ-ṣūr ʿālimul-ghayb w-sh-shahādat w-huwal-ḥakīmul-khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who created the heavens and earth in truth. And the day He says, "Be," and it is, His word is the truth. And His is the dominion on the Day the Horn is blown. He is Knower of the unseen and the witnessed; and He is the Wise, the Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِذ قالَ إِبراهيمُ لِأَبيهِ آزَرَ أَتَتَّخِذُ أَصنامًا آلِهَةً ۖ إِنّي أَراكَ وَقَومَكَ في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl ʾibrāhīm l-ʾabīh ʾāzar ʾ-tattakhidh ʾaṣnām ʾālihat ʾinnī ʾarāk w-qawmak fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when Abraham said to his father Azar, "Do you take idols as deities? Indeed, I see you and your people to be in manifest error

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ نُري إِبراهيمَ مَلَكوتَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَلِيَكونَ مِنَ الموقِنينَ
blank: w-k-dhālik nurī ʾibrāhīm malakūt s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-l-yakūn minal-mūqinīn
english_saheeh_international: And thus did We show Abraham the realm of the heavens and the earth that he would be among the certain in faith

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جَنَّ عَلَيهِ اللَّيلُ رَأىٰ كَوكَبًا ۖ قالَ هٰذا رَبّي ۖ فَلَمّا أَفَلَ قالَ لا أُحِبُّ الآفِلينَ
blank: f-lammā jann ʿalayhil-layl raʾā kawkab qāl hādhā rabbī f-lammā ʾafal qāl lā ʾuḥibbul-ʾāfilīn
english_saheeh_international: So when the night covered him with darkness, he saw a star. He said, "This is my lord." But when it set, he said, "I like not those that disappear

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا رَأَى القَمَرَ بازِغًا قالَ هٰذا رَبّي ۖ فَلَمّا أَفَلَ قالَ لَئِن لَم يَهدِني رَبّي لَأَكونَنَّ مِنَ القَومِ الضّالّينَ
blank: f-lammā raʾāl-qamar bāzigh qāl hādhā rabbī f-lammā ʾafal qāl laʾil-lam yahdinī rabbī l-ʾakūnann minal-qawm ḍ-ḍāllīn
english_saheeh_international: And when he saw the moon rising, he said, "This is my lord." But when it set, he said, "Unless my Lord guides me, I will surely be among the people gone astray

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا رَأَى الشَّمسَ بازِغَةً قالَ هٰذا رَبّي هٰذا أَكبَرُ ۖ فَلَمّا أَفَلَت قالَ يا قَومِ إِنّي بَريءٌ مِمّا تُشرِكونَ
blank: f-lammā raʾā sh-shams bāzighat qāl hādhā rabbī hādhā ʾakbar f-lammā ʾafalat qāl yā-qawm ʾinnī barīʾ mimmā tushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: And when he saw the sun rising, he said, "This is my lord; this is greater." But when it set, he said, "O my people, indeed I am free from what you associate with Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِنّي وَجَّهتُ وَجهِيَ لِلَّذي فَطَرَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ حَنيفًا ۖ وَما أَنا مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: ʾinnī wajjaht wajhiy l-lladhī faṭar s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ḥanīf w-mā ʾan minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, I have turned my face toward He who created the heavens and the earth, inclining toward truth, and I am not of those who associate others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَحاجَّهُ قَومُهُ ۚ قالَ أَتُحاجّونّي فِي اللَّهِ وَقَد هَدانِ ۚ وَلا أَخافُ ما تُشرِكونَ بِهِ إِلّا أَن يَشاءَ رَبّي شَيئًا ۗ وَسِعَ رَبّي كُلَّ شَيءٍ عِلمًا ۗ أَفَلا تَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-ḥājjahū qawmuhū qāl ʾ-tuḥājjūnnī fī llāh w-qad hadān w-lā ʾakhāf mā tushrikūn bihī ʾillā ʾ yashāʾ rabbī shayʾ wasiʿ rabbī kull shayʾ ʿilm ʾ-f-lā tatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And his people argued with him. He said, "Do you argue with me concerning Allah while He has guided me? And I fear not what you associate with Him and will not be harmed unless my Lord should will something. My Lord encompasses all things in knowledge; then will you not remember

arabic_uthmani: وَكَيفَ أَخافُ ما أَشرَكتُم وَلا تَخافونَ أَنَّكُم أَشرَكتُم بِاللَّهِ ما لَم يُنَزِّل بِهِ عَلَيكُم سُلطانًا ۚ فَأَيُّ الفَريقَينِ أَحَقُّ بِالأَمنِ ۖ إِن كُنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-kayf ʾakhāf mā ʾashraktum w-lā takhāfūn ʾannakum ʾashraktum b-llāh mā lam yunazzil bihī ʿalaykum sulṭān f-ʾayyul-farīqayn ʾaḥaqq b-l-ʾamn ʾ kuntum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And how should I fear what you associate while you do not fear that you have associated with Allah that for which He has not sent down to you any authority? So which of the two parties has more right to security, if you should know

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَلَم يَلبِسوا إيمانَهُم بِظُلمٍ أُولٰئِكَ لَهُمُ الأَمنُ وَهُم مُهتَدونَ
blank: alladhīn ʾāmanū w-lam yalbisū ʾīmānahum b-ẓulm ʾulāʾik lahumul-ʾamn w-hum muhtadūn
english_saheeh_international: They who believe and do not mix their belief with injustice - those will have security, and they are rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: وَتِلكَ حُجَّتُنا آتَيناها إِبراهيمَ عَلىٰ قَومِهِ ۚ نَرفَعُ دَرَجاتٍ مَن نَشاءُ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكيمٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-tilk ḥujjatunā ʾātaynāhā ʾibrāhīm ʿalā qawmihī narfaʿ darajāt m nashāʾ ʾinn rabbak ḥakīm ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And that was Our conclusive argument which We gave Abraham against his people. We raise by degrees whom We will. Indeed, your Lord is Wise and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَوَهَبنا لَهُ إِسحاقَ وَيَعقوبَ ۚ كُلًّا هَدَينا ۚ وَنوحًا هَدَينا مِن قَبلُ ۖ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِ داوودَ وَسُلَيمانَ وَأَيّوبَ وَيوسُفَ وَموسىٰ وَهارونَ ۚ وَكَذٰلِكَ نَجزِي المُحسِنينَ
blank: w-wahabnā lahū ʾisḥāq w-yaʿqūb kull hadaynā w-nuḥ hadaynā m qabl w-m dhurriyyatihī dāwūd w-sulaymān w-ʾayyūb w-yūsuf w-mūsā w-hārūn w-k-dhālik najzīl-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: And We gave to Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - all of them We guided. And Noah, We guided before; and among his descendants, David and Solomon and Job and Joseph and Moses and Aaron. Thus do We reward the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: وَزَكَرِيّا وَيَحيىٰ وَعيسىٰ وَإِلياسَ ۖ كُلٌّ مِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: w-zakariyyā w-yaḥyā w-ʿīsā w-ʾilyās kull min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And Zechariah and John and Jesus and Elias - and all were of the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَإِسماعيلَ وَاليَسَعَ وَيونُسَ وَلوطًا ۚ وَكُلًّا فَضَّلنا عَلَى العالَمينَ
blank: w-ʾismāʿīl w-l-yasaʿ w-yūnus w-lūṭ w-kull faḍḍalnā ʿalāl-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And Ishmael and Elisha and Jonah and Lot - and all of them We preferred over the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آبائِهِم وَذُرِّيّاتِهِم وَإِخوانِهِم ۖ وَاجتَبَيناهُم وَهَدَيناهُم إِلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: w-m ʾābāʾihim w-dhurriyyātihim w-ʾikhwānihim w-jtabaynāhum w-hadaynāhum ʾilā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And some among their fathers and their descendants and their brothers - and We chose them and We guided them to a straight path

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ هُدَى اللَّهِ يَهدي بِهِ مَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ ۚ وَلَو أَشرَكوا لَحَبِطَ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: dhālik hudā llāh yahdī bihī m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī w-law ʾashrakū l-ḥabiṭ ʿanhum mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whomever He wills of His servants. But if they had associated others with Allah, then worthless for them would be whatever they were doing

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ آتَيناهُمُ الكِتابَ وَالحُكمَ وَالنُّبُوَّةَ ۚ فَإِن يَكفُر بِها هٰؤُلاءِ فَقَد وَكَّلنا بِها قَومًا لَيسوا بِها بِكافِرينَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn ʾātaynāhumul-kitāb w-l-ḥukm w-n-nubuwwat f-ʾ yakfur bihā hāʾulāʾ f-qad wakkalnā bihā qawm laysū bihā b-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the ones to whom We gave the Scripture and authority and prophethood. But if the disbelievers deny it, then We have entrusted it to a people who are not therein disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ هَدَى اللَّهُ ۖ فَبِهُداهُمُ اقتَدِه ۗ قُل لا أَسأَلُكُم عَلَيهِ أَجرًا ۖ إِن هُوَ إِلّا ذِكرىٰ لِلعالَمينَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn hadā llāh f-b-hudāhum qtadih qul lā ʾasʾalukum ʿalayh ʾajr ʾ huw ʾillā dhikrā l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the ones whom Allah has guided, so from their guidance take an example. Say, "I ask of you for this message no payment. It is not but a reminder for the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَما قَدَرُوا اللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدرِهِ إِذ قالوا ما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ بَشَرٍ مِن شَيءٍ ۗ قُل مَن أَنزَلَ الكِتابَ الَّذي جاءَ بِهِ موسىٰ نورًا وَهُدًى لِلنّاسِ ۖ تَجعَلونَهُ قَراطيسَ تُبدونَها وَتُخفونَ كَثيرًا ۖ وَعُلِّمتُم ما لَم تَعلَموا أَنتُم وَلا آباؤُكُم ۖ قُلِ اللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ ذَرهُم في خَوضِهِم يَلعَبونَ
blank: w-mā qadarū llāh ḥaqq qadrihī ʾidh qālū mā ʾanzal llāh ʿalā bashar m shayʾ qul m ʾanzalal-kitāballadhī jāʾ bihī mūsā nūr w-hud l-n-nās tajʿalūnahū qarāṭīs tubdūnahā w-tukhfūn kathīr w-ʿullimtum mā lam taʿlamū ʾantum w-lā ʾābāʾukum qul llāh thumm dharhum fī khawḍihim yalʿabūn
english_saheeh_international: And they did not appraise Allah with true appraisal when they said, "Allah did not reveal to a human being anything." Say, "Who revealed the Scripture that Moses brought as light and guidance to the people? You Jews make it into pages, disclosing some of it and concealing much. And you were taught that which you knew not - neither you nor your fathers." Say, "Allah revealed it." Then leave them in their empty discourse, amusing themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَهٰذا كِتابٌ أَنزَلناهُ مُبارَكٌ مُصَدِّقُ الَّذي بَينَ يَدَيهِ وَلِتُنذِرَ أُمَّ القُرىٰ وَمَن حَولَها ۚ وَالَّذينَ يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ يُؤمِنونَ بِهِ ۖ وَهُم عَلىٰ صَلاتِهِم يُحافِظونَ
blank: w-hādhā kitāb ʾanzalnāh mubārak muṣaddiqulladhī bayn yadayh w-l-tundhir ʾummal-qurā w-m ḥawlahā w-lladhīn yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat yuʾminūn bihī w-hum ʿalā ṣalātihim yuḥāfiẓūn
english_saheeh_international: And this is a Book which We have sent down, blessed and confirming what was before it, that you may warn the Mother of Cities and those around it. Those who believe in the Hereafter believe in it, and they are maintaining their prayers

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَو قالَ أوحِيَ إِلَيَّ وَلَم يوحَ إِلَيهِ شَيءٌ وَمَن قالَ سَأُنزِلُ مِثلَ ما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ ۗ وَلَو تَرىٰ إِذِ الظّالِمونَ في غَمَراتِ المَوتِ وَالمَلائِكَةُ باسِطو أَيديهِم أَخرِجوا أَنفُسَكُمُ ۖ اليَومَ تُجزَونَ عَذابَ الهونِ بِما كُنتُم تَقولونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ غَيرَ الحَقِّ وَكُنتُم عَن آياتِهِ تَستَكبِرونَ
blank: w-m ʾaẓlam mimman ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib ʾaw qāl ʾūḥiy ʾilayy w-lam yūḥ ʾilayh shayʾ w-m qāl s-ʾunzil mithl mā ʾanzal llāh w-law tarā ʾidh ẓ-ẓālimūn fī ghamarātil-mawt w-l-malāʾikat bāsiṭū ʾaydīhim ʾakhrijū ʾanfusakumul-yawm tujzawn ʿadhābal-hūn b-mā kuntum taqūlūn ʿalā llāh ghayral-ḥaqq w-kuntum ʿ ʾāyātihī tastakbirūn
english_saheeh_international: And who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah or says, "It has been inspired to me," while nothing has been inspired to him, and one who says, "I will reveal something like what Allah revealed." And if you could but see when the wrongdoers are in the overwhelming pangs of death while the angels extend their hands, saying, "Discharge your souls! Today you will be awarded the punishment of extreme humiliation for what you used to say against Allah other than the truth and that you were, toward His verses, being arrogant

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد جِئتُمونا فُرادىٰ كَما خَلَقناكُم أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَتَرَكتُم ما خَوَّلناكُم وَراءَ ظُهورِكُم ۖ وَما نَرىٰ مَعَكُم شُفَعاءَكُمُ الَّذينَ زَعَمتُم أَنَّهُم فيكُم شُرَكاءُ ۚ لَقَد تَقَطَّعَ بَينَكُم وَضَلَّ عَنكُم ما كُنتُم تَزعُمونَ
blank: w-l-qad jiʾtumūnā furādā k-mā khalaqnākum ʾawwal marrat w-taraktum mā khawwalnākum warāʾ ẓuhūrikum w-mā narā maʿakum shufaʿāʾakumulladhīn zaʿamtum ʾannahum fīkum shurakāʾ l-qad taqaṭṭaʿ baynakum w-ḍall ʿankum mā kuntum tazʿumūn
english_saheeh_international: It will be said to them, "And you have certainly come to Us alone as We created you the first time, and you have left whatever We bestowed upon you behind you. And We do not see with you your 'intercessors' which you claimed that they were among you associates of Allah. It has all been severed between you, and lost from you is what you used to claim

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ اللَّهَ فالِقُ الحَبِّ وَالنَّوىٰ ۖ يُخرِجُ الحَيَّ مِنَ المَيِّتِ وَمُخرِجُ المَيِّتِ مِنَ الحَيِّ ۚ ذٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ ۖ فَأَنّىٰ تُؤفَكونَ
blank: ʾinn llāh fāliqul-ḥabb w-n-nawā yukhrijul-ḥayy minal-mayyit w-mukhrijul-mayyit minal-ḥayy dhālikum llāh f-ʾannā tuʾfakūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah is the cleaver of grain and date seeds. He brings the living out of the dead and brings the dead out of the living. That is Allah; so how are you deluded

arabic_uthmani: فالِقُ الإِصباحِ وَجَعَلَ اللَّيلَ سَكَنًا وَالشَّمسَ وَالقَمَرَ حُسبانًا ۚ ذٰلِكَ تَقديرُ العَزيزِ العَليمِ
blank: fāliqul-ʾiṣbāḥ w-jaʿalal-layl sakan w-sh-shams w-l-qamar ḥusbān dhālik taqdīrul-ʿazīzil-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: He is the cleaver of daybreak and has made the night for rest and the sun and moon for calculation. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ النُّجومَ لِتَهتَدوا بِها في ظُلُماتِ البَرِّ وَالبَحرِ ۗ قَد فَصَّلنَا الآياتِ لِقَومٍ يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-huwalladhī jaʿal lakum n-nujūm l-tahtadū bihā fī ẓulumātil-barr w-l-baḥr qad faṣṣalnāl-ʾāyāt l-qawm yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who placed for you the stars that you may be guided by them through the darknesses of the land and sea. We have detailed the signs for a people who know

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي أَنشَأَكُم مِن نَفسٍ واحِدَةٍ فَمُستَقَرٌّ وَمُستَودَعٌ ۗ قَد فَصَّلنَا الآياتِ لِقَومٍ يَفقَهونَ
blank: w-huwalladhī ʾanshaʾakum m nafs wāḥidat f-mustaqarr w-mustawdaʿ qad faṣṣalnāl-ʾāyāt l-qawm yafqahūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who produced you from one soul and gave you a place of dwelling and of storage. We have detailed the signs for a people who understand

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَأَخرَجنا بِهِ نَباتَ كُلِّ شَيءٍ فَأَخرَجنا مِنهُ خَضِرًا نُخرِجُ مِنهُ حَبًّا مُتَراكِبًا وَمِنَ النَّخلِ مِن طَلعِها قِنوانٌ دانِيَةٌ وَجَنّاتٍ مِن أَعنابٍ وَالزَّيتونَ وَالرُّمّانَ مُشتَبِهًا وَغَيرَ مُتَشابِهٍ ۗ انظُروا إِلىٰ ثَمَرِهِ إِذا أَثمَرَ وَيَنعِهِ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكُم لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: w-huwalladhī ʾanzal min s-samāʾ māʾ f-ʾakhrajnā bihī nabāt kull shayʾ f-ʾakhrajnā minh khaḍir nukhrij minh ḥabbam-mutarākib w-min n-nakhl m talʿihā qinwān dāniyat w-jannāt m ʾaʿnāb w-z-zaytūn w-r-rummān mushtabih w-ghayr mutashābih- nẓurū ʾilā thamarihī ʾidhā ʾathmar w-yanʿihī ʾinn fī dhālikum l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who sends down rain from the sky, and We produce thereby the growth of all things. We produce from it greenery from which We produce grains arranged in layers. And from the palm trees - of its emerging fruit are clusters hanging low. And We produce gardens of grapevines and olives and pomegranates, similar yet varied. Look at each of its fruit when it yields and at its ripening. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلوا لِلَّهِ شُرَكاءَ الجِنَّ وَخَلَقَهُم ۖ وَخَرَقوا لَهُ بَنينَ وَبَناتٍ بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ ۚ سُبحانَهُ وَتَعالىٰ عَمّا يَصِفونَ
blank: w-jaʿalū l-llāh shurakāʾal-jinn w-khalaqahum w-kharaqū lahū banīn w-banāt b-ghayr ʿilm subḥānahū w-taʿālā ʿammā yaṣifūn
english_saheeh_international: But they have attributed to Allah partners - the jinn, while He has created them - and have fabricated for Him sons and daughters. Exalted is He and high above what they describe

arabic_uthmani: بَديعُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ أَنّىٰ يَكونُ لَهُ وَلَدٌ وَلَم تَكُن لَهُ صاحِبَةٌ ۖ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَيءٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: badīʿ s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ʾannā yakūn lahū walad w-lam tak lahū ṣāḥibat w-khalaq kull shayʾ w-huw b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: He is Originator of the heavens and the earth. How could He have a son when He does not have a companion and He created all things? And He is, of all things, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُم ۖ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ خالِقُ كُلِّ شَيءٍ فَاعبُدوهُ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ وَكيلٌ
blank: dhālikum llāh rabbukum lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw khāliq kull shayʾ f-ʿbudūh w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ wakīl
english_saheeh_international: That is Allah, your Lord; there is no deity except Him, the Creator of all things, so worship Him. And He is Disposer of all things

arabic_uthmani: لا تُدرِكُهُ الأَبصارُ وَهُوَ يُدرِكُ الأَبصارَ ۖ وَهُوَ اللَّطيفُ الخَبيرُ
blank: lā tudrikuhul-ʾabṣār w-huw yudrikul-ʾabṣār w-huwal-laṭīful-khabīr
english_saheeh_international: Vision perceives Him not, but He perceives all vision; and He is the Subtle, the Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: قَد جاءَكُم بَصائِرُ مِن رَبِّكُم ۖ فَمَن أَبصَرَ فَلِنَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن عَمِيَ فَعَلَيها ۚ وَما أَنا عَلَيكُم بِحَفيظٍ
blank: qad jāʾakum baṣāʾir m rabbikum f-m ʾabṣar f-l-nafsihī w-m ʿamiy f-ʿalayhā w-mā ʾan ʿalaykum b-ḥafīẓ
english_saheeh_international: There has come to you enlightenment from your Lord. So whoever will see does so for the benefit of his soul, and whoever is blind does harm against it. And say, "I am not a guardian over you

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ الآياتِ وَلِيَقولوا دَرَستَ وَلِنُبَيِّنَهُ لِقَومٍ يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-k-dhālik nuṣarriful-ʾāyāt w-l-yaqūlū darast w-l-nubayyinahū l-qawm yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And thus do We diversify the verses so the disbelievers will say, "You have studied," and so We may make the Qur'an clear for a people who know

arabic_uthmani: اتَّبِع ما أوحِيَ إِلَيكَ مِن رَبِّكَ ۖ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ وَأَعرِض عَنِ المُشرِكينَ
blank: ittabiʿ mā ʾūḥiy ʾilayk m rabbik lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw w-ʾaʿriḍ ʿanil-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Follow, O Muhammad, what has been revealed to you from your Lord - there is no deity except Him - and turn away from those who associate others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو شاءَ اللَّهُ ما أَشرَكوا ۗ وَما جَعَلناكَ عَلَيهِم حَفيظًا ۖ وَما أَنتَ عَلَيهِم بِوَكيلٍ
blank: w-law shāʾ llāh mā ʾashrakū w-mā jaʿalnāk ʿalayhim ḥafīẓ w-mā ʾant ʿalayhim b-wakīl
english_saheeh_international: But if Allah had willed, they would not have associated. And We have not appointed you over them as a guardian, nor are you a manager over them

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَسُبُّوا الَّذينَ يَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ فَيَسُبُّوا اللَّهَ عَدوًا بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ ۗ كَذٰلِكَ زَيَّنّا لِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ عَمَلَهُم ثُمَّ إِلىٰ رَبِّهِم مَرجِعُهُم فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: w-lā tasubbūlladhīn yadʿūn m dūn llāh f-yasubbū llāh ʿadw b-ghayr ʿilm k-dhālik zayyannā l-kull ʾummat ʿamalahum thumm ʾilā rabbihim marjiʿuhum f-yunabbiʾuhum b-mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not insult those they invoke other than Allah, lest they insult Allah in enmity without knowledge. Thus We have made pleasing to every community their deeds. Then to their Lord is their return, and He will inform them about what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَأَقسَموا بِاللَّهِ جَهدَ أَيمانِهِم لَئِن جاءَتهُم آيَةٌ لَيُؤمِنُنَّ بِها ۚ قُل إِنَّمَا الآياتُ عِندَ اللَّهِ ۖ وَما يُشعِرُكُم أَنَّها إِذا جاءَت لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: w-ʾaqsamū b-llāh jahd ʾaymānihim l-ʾ jāʾathum ʾāyat l-yuʾminunn bihā qul ʾinnamāl-ʾāyāt ʿind llāh w-mā yushʿirukum ʾannahā ʾidhā jāʾat lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths that if a sign came to them, they would surely believe in it. Say, "The signs are only with Allah." And what will make you perceive that even if a sign came, they would not believe

arabic_uthmani: وَنُقَلِّبُ أَفئِدَتَهُم وَأَبصارَهُم كَما لَم يُؤمِنوا بِهِ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَنَذَرُهُم في طُغيانِهِم يَعمَهونَ
blank: w-nuqallib ʾafʾidatahum w-ʾabṣārahum k-mā lam yuʾminū bihī ʾawwal marrat w-nadharuhum fī ṭughyānihim yaʿmahūn
english_saheeh_international: And We will turn away their hearts and their eyes just as they refused to believe in it the first time. And We will leave them in their transgression, wandering blindly

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَو أَنَّنا نَزَّلنا إِلَيهِمُ المَلائِكَةَ وَكَلَّمَهُمُ المَوتىٰ وَحَشَرنا عَلَيهِم كُلَّ شَيءٍ قُبُلًا ما كانوا لِيُؤمِنوا إِلّا أَن يَشاءَ اللَّهُ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم يَجهَلونَ
blank: w-law ʾannanā nazzalnā ʾilayhimul-malāʾikat w-kallamahumul-mawtā w-ḥasharnā ʿalayhim kull shayʾ qubulam-mā kānū l-yuʾminū ʾillā ʾ yashāʾ llāh w-lākinn ʾaktharahum yajhalūn
english_saheeh_international: And even if We had sent down to them the angels with the message and the dead spoke to them of it and We gathered together every created thing in front of them, they would not believe unless Allah should will. But most of them, of that, are ignorant

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ جَعَلنا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوًّا شَياطينَ الإِنسِ وَالجِنِّ يوحي بَعضُهُم إِلىٰ بَعضٍ زُخرُفَ القَولِ غُرورًا ۚ وَلَو شاءَ رَبُّكَ ما فَعَلوهُ ۖ فَذَرهُم وَما يَفتَرونَ
blank: w-k-dhālik jaʿalnā l-kull nabiyy ʿaduww shayāṭīnal-ʾins w-l-jinn yūḥī baʿḍuhum ʾilā baʿḍ zukhrufal-qawl ghurūr w-law shāʾ rabbuk mā faʿalūh f-dharhum w-mā yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: And thus We have made for every prophet an enemy - devils from mankind and jinn, inspiring to one another decorative speech in delusion. But if your Lord had willed, they would not have done it, so leave them and that which they invent

arabic_uthmani: وَلِتَصغىٰ إِلَيهِ أَفئِدَةُ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ وَلِيَرضَوهُ وَلِيَقتَرِفوا ما هُم مُقتَرِفونَ
blank: w-l-taṣghā ʾilayh ʾafʾidatulladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat w-l-yarḍawh w-l-yaqtarifū mā hum muqtarifūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is so the hearts of those who disbelieve in the Hereafter will incline toward it and that they will be satisfied with it and that they will commit that which they are committing

arabic_uthmani: أَفَغَيرَ اللَّهِ أَبتَغي حَكَمًا وَهُوَ الَّذي أَنزَلَ إِلَيكُمُ الكِتابَ مُفَصَّلًا ۚ وَالَّذينَ آتَيناهُمُ الكِتابَ يَعلَمونَ أَنَّهُ مُنَزَّلٌ مِن رَبِّكَ بِالحَقِّ ۖ فَلا تَكونَنَّ مِنَ المُمتَرينَ
blank: ʾ-f-ghayr llāh ʾabtaghī ḥakam w-huwalladhī ʾanzal ʾilaykumul-kitāb mufaṣṣal w-lladhīn ʾātaynāhumul-kitāb yaʿlamūn ʾannahū munazzal m rabbik b-l-ḥaqq f-lā takūnann minal-mumtarīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Then is it other than Allah I should seek as judge while it is He who has revealed to you the Book explained in detail?" And those to whom We previously gave the Scripture know that it is sent down from your Lord in truth, so never be among the doubters

arabic_uthmani: وَتَمَّت كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِدقًا وَعَدلًا ۚ لا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِماتِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: w-tammat kalimat rabbik ṣidq w-ʿadl lā mubaddil l-kalimātihī w-huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And the word of your Lord has been fulfilled in truth and in justice. None can alter His words, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن تُطِع أَكثَرَ مَن فِي الأَرضِ يُضِلّوكَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَإِن هُم إِلّا يَخرُصونَ
blank: w-ʾ tuṭiʿ ʾakthar m fīl-ʾarḍ yuḍillūk ʿ sabīl llāh ʾ yattabiʿūn ʾillā ẓ-ẓann w-ʾ hum ʾillā yakhruṣūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you obey most of those upon the earth, they will mislead you from the way of Allah. They follow not except assumption, and they are not but falsifying

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعلَمُ مَن يَضِلُّ عَن سَبيلِهِ ۖ وَهُوَ أَعلَمُ بِالمُهتَدينَ
blank: ʾinn rabbak huw ʾaʿlam m yaḍill ʿ sabīlihī w-huw ʾaʿlam b-l-muhtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of the rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: فَكُلوا مِمّا ذُكِرَ اسمُ اللَّهِ عَلَيهِ إِن كُنتُم بِآياتِهِ مُؤمِنينَ
blank: f-kulū mimmā dhukir sm llāh ʿalayh ʾ kuntum b-ʾāyātihī muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: So eat of that meat upon which the name of Allah has been mentioned, if you are believers in His verses

arabic_uthmani: وَما لَكُم أَلّا تَأكُلوا مِمّا ذُكِرَ اسمُ اللَّهِ عَلَيهِ وَقَد فَصَّلَ لَكُم ما حَرَّمَ عَلَيكُم إِلّا مَا اضطُرِرتُم إِلَيهِ ۗ وَإِنَّ كَثيرًا لَيُضِلّونَ بِأَهوائِهِم بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعلَمُ بِالمُعتَدينَ
blank: w-mā lakum ʾallā taʾkulū mimmā dhukir sm llāh ʿalayh w-qad faṣṣal lakum mā ḥarram ʿalaykum ʾillā mā ḍṭurirtum ʾilayh w-ʾinn kathīr l-yuḍillūn b-ʾahwāʾihim b-ghayr ʿilm ʾinn rabbak huw ʾaʿlam b-l-muʿtadīn
english_saheeh_international: And why should you not eat of that upon which the name of Allah has been mentioned while He has explained in detail to you what He has forbidden you, excepting that to which you are compelled. And indeed do many lead others astray through their own inclinations without knowledge. Indeed, your Lord - He is most knowing of the transgressors

arabic_uthmani: وَذَروا ظاهِرَ الإِثمِ وَباطِنَهُ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَكسِبونَ الإِثمَ سَيُجزَونَ بِما كانوا يَقتَرِفونَ
blank: w-dharū ẓāhiral-ʾithm w-bāṭinahū ʾinnalladhīn yaksibūnal-ʾithm s-yujzawn b-mā kānū yaqtarifūn
english_saheeh_international: And leave what is apparent of sin and what is concealed thereof. Indeed, those who earn blame for sin will be recompensed for that which they used to commit

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَأكُلوا مِمّا لَم يُذكَرِ اسمُ اللَّهِ عَلَيهِ وَإِنَّهُ لَفِسقٌ ۗ وَإِنَّ الشَّياطينَ لَيوحونَ إِلىٰ أَولِيائِهِم لِيُجادِلوكُم ۖ وَإِن أَطَعتُموهُم إِنَّكُم لَمُشرِكونَ
blank: w-lā taʾkulū mimmā lam yudhkar sm llāh ʿalayh w-ʾinnahū l-fisq w-ʾinn sh-shayāṭīn l-yūḥūn ʾilā ʾawliyāʾihim l-yujādilūkum w-ʾ ʾaṭaʿtumūhum ʾinnakum l-mushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not eat of that upon which the name of Allah has not been mentioned, for indeed, it is grave disobedience. And indeed do the devils inspire their allies among men to dispute with you. And if you were to obey them, indeed, you would be associators of others with Him

arabic_uthmani: أَوَمَن كانَ مَيتًا فَأَحيَيناهُ وَجَعَلنا لَهُ نورًا يَمشي بِهِ فِي النّاسِ كَمَن مَثَلُهُ فِي الظُّلُماتِ لَيسَ بِخارِجٍ مِنها ۚ كَذٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلكافِرينَ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
