blank: ʾ-w-m kān mayt f-ʾaḥyaynāh w-jaʿalnā lahū nūr yamshī bihī fī n-nās k-mam-mathaluhū fī ẓ-ẓulumāt lays b-khārij minhā k-dhālik zuyyin l-l-kāfirīn mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And is one who was dead and We gave him life and made for him light by which to walk among the people like one who is in darkness, never to emerge therefrom? Thus it has been made pleasing to the disbelievers that which they were doing

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ جَعَلنا في كُلِّ قَريَةٍ أَكابِرَ مُجرِميها لِيَمكُروا فيها ۖ وَما يَمكُرونَ إِلّا بِأَنفُسِهِم وَما يَشعُرونَ
blank: w-k-dhālik jaʿalnā fī kull qaryat ʾakābir mujrimīhā l-yamkurū fīhā w-mā yamkurūn ʾillā b-ʾanfusihim w-mā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: And thus We have placed within every city the greatest of its criminals to conspire therein. But they conspire not except against themselves, and they perceive it not

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا جاءَتهُم آيَةٌ قالوا لَن نُؤمِنَ حَتّىٰ نُؤتىٰ مِثلَ ما أوتِيَ رُسُلُ اللَّهِ ۘ اللَّهُ أَعلَمُ حَيثُ يَجعَلُ رِسالَتَهُ ۗ سَيُصيبُ الَّذينَ أَجرَموا صَغارٌ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَعَذابٌ شَديدٌ بِما كانوا يَمكُرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā jāʾathum ʾāyat qālū l nuʾmin ḥattā nuʾtā mithl mā ʾūtiy rusul llāh allāh ʾaʿlam ḥayth yajʿal risālatahū s-yuṣībulladhīn ʾajramū ṣaghār ʿind llāh w-ʿadhāb shadīd b-mā kānū yamkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And when a sign comes to them, they say, "Never will we believe until we are given like that which was given to the messengers of Allah." Allah is most knowing of where He places His message. There will afflict those who committed crimes debasement before Allah and severe punishment for what they used to conspire

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن يُرِدِ اللَّهُ أَن يَهدِيَهُ يَشرَح صَدرَهُ لِلإِسلامِ ۖ وَمَن يُرِد أَن يُضِلَّهُ يَجعَل صَدرَهُ ضَيِّقًا حَرَجًا كَأَنَّما يَصَّعَّدُ فِي السَّماءِ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يَجعَلُ اللَّهُ الرِّجسَ عَلَى الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: f-m yurid llāh ʾ yahdiyahū yashraḥ ṣadrahū l-l-ʾislām w-m yurid ʾ yuḍillahū yajʿal ṣadrahū ḍayyiq ḥaraj k-ʾannamā yaṣṣaʿʿad fī s-samāʾ k-dhālik yajʿal llāh r-rijs ʿalālladhīn lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: So whoever Allah wants to guide - He expands his breast to contain Islam; and whoever He wants to misguide - He makes his breast tight and constricted as though he were climbing into the sky. Thus does Allah place defilement upon those who do not believe

arabic_uthmani: وَهٰذا صِراطُ رَبِّكَ مُستَقيمًا ۗ قَد فَصَّلنَا الآياتِ لِقَومٍ يَذَّكَّرونَ
blank: w-hādhā ṣirāṭ rabbik mustaqīm qad faṣṣalnāl-ʾāyāt l-qawm yadhdhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And this is the path of your Lord, leading straight. We have detailed the verses for a people who remember

arabic_uthmani: ۞ لَهُم دارُ السَّلامِ عِندَ رَبِّهِم ۖ وَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُم بِما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: lahum dār s-salām ʿind rabbihim w-huw waliyyuhum b-mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: For them will be the Home of Peace with their Lord. And He will be their protecting friend because of what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يَحشُرُهُم جَميعًا يا مَعشَرَ الجِنِّ قَدِ استَكثَرتُم مِنَ الإِنسِ ۖ وَقالَ أَولِياؤُهُم مِنَ الإِنسِ رَبَّنَا استَمتَعَ بَعضُنا بِبَعضٍ وَبَلَغنا أَجَلَنَا الَّذي أَجَّلتَ لَنا ۚ قالَ النّارُ مَثواكُم خالِدينَ فيها إِلّا ما شاءَ اللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكيمٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-yawm yaḥshuruhum jamīʿ yā-maʿsharal-jinn qad stakthartum minal-ʾins w-qāl ʾawliyāʾuhum minal-ʾins rabbanā stamtaʿ baʿḍunā b-baʿḍ w-balaghnā ʾajalanālladhī ʾajjalt lanā qāl n-nār mathwākum khālidīn fīhā ʾillā mā shāʾ llāh ʾinn rabbak ḥakīm ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, the Day when He will gather them together and say, "O company of jinn, you have misled many of mankind." And their allies among mankind will say, "Our Lord, some of us made use of others, and we have now reached our term, which you appointed for us." He will say, "The Fire is your residence, wherein you will abide eternally, except for what Allah wills. Indeed, your Lord is Wise and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ نُوَلّي بَعضَ الظّالِمينَ بَعضًا بِما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: w-k-dhālik nuwallī baʿḍ ẓ-ẓālimīn baʿḍ b-mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: And thus will We make some of the wrongdoers allies of others for what they used to earn

arabic_uthmani: يا مَعشَرَ الجِنِّ وَالإِنسِ أَلَم يَأتِكُم رُسُلٌ مِنكُم يَقُصّونَ عَلَيكُم آياتي وَيُنذِرونَكُم لِقاءَ يَومِكُم هٰذا ۚ قالوا شَهِدنا عَلىٰ أَنفُسِنا ۖ وَغَرَّتهُمُ الحَياةُ الدُّنيا وَشَهِدوا عَلىٰ أَنفُسِهِم أَنَّهُم كانوا كافِرينَ
blank: yā-maʿsharal-jinn w-l-ʾins ʾ-lam yaʾtikum rusul minkum yaquṣṣūn ʿalaykum ʾāyātī w-yundhirūnakum liqāʾ yawmikum hādhā qālū shahidnā ʿalā ʾanfusinā w-gharrathumul-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-shahidū ʿalā ʾanfusihim ʾannahum kānū kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: O company of jinn and mankind, did there not come to you messengers from among you, relating to you My verses and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say, "We bear witness against ourselves"; and the worldly life had deluded them, and they will bear witness against themselves that they were disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ أَن لَم يَكُن رَبُّكَ مُهلِكَ القُرىٰ بِظُلمٍ وَأَهلُها غافِلونَ
blank: dhālik ʾ lam yak rabbuk muhlikal-qurā b-ẓulm w-ʾahluhā ghāfilūn
english_saheeh_international: That is because your Lord would not destroy the cities for wrongdoing while their people were unaware

arabic_uthmani: وَلِكُلٍّ دَرَجاتٌ مِمّا عَمِلوا ۚ وَما رَبُّكَ بِغافِلٍ عَمّا يَعمَلونَ
blank: w-l-kull darajāt mimmā ʿamilū w-mā rabbuk b-ghāfil ʿammā yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And for all are degrees from what they have done. And your Lord is not unaware of what they do

arabic_uthmani: وَرَبُّكَ الغَنِيُّ ذُو الرَّحمَةِ ۚ إِن يَشَأ يُذهِبكُم وَيَستَخلِف مِن بَعدِكُم ما يَشاءُ كَما أَنشَأَكُم مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ قَومٍ آخَرينَ
blank: w-rabbukal-ghaniyy dhū r-raḥmat ʾ yashaʾ yudhhibkum w-yastakhlif m baʿdikum mā yashāʾ k-mā ʾanshaʾakum m dhurriyyat qawm ʾākharīn
english_saheeh_international: And your Lord is the Free of need, the possessor of mercy. If He wills, he can do away with you and give succession after you to whomever He wills, just as He produced you from the descendants of another people

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ ما توعَدونَ لَآتٍ ۖ وَما أَنتُم بِمُعجِزينَ
blank: ʾinn mā tūʿadūn l-ʾāt w-mā ʾantum b-muʿjizīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, what you are promised is coming, and you will not cause failure to Allah

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا قَومِ اعمَلوا عَلىٰ مَكانَتِكُم إِنّي عامِلٌ ۖ فَسَوفَ تَعلَمونَ مَن تَكونُ لَهُ عاقِبَةُ الدّارِ ۗ إِنَّهُ لا يُفلِحُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: qul yā-qawm ʿmalū ʿalā makānatikum ʾinnī ʿāmil f-sawf taʿlamūn m takūn lahū ʿāqibat d-dār ʾinnahū lā yufliḥ ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O my people, work according to your position; for indeed, I am working. And you are going to know who will have succession in the home. Indeed, the wrongdoers will not succeed

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلوا لِلَّهِ مِمّا ذَرَأَ مِنَ الحَرثِ وَالأَنعامِ نَصيبًا فَقالوا هٰذا لِلَّهِ بِزَعمِهِم وَهٰذا لِشُرَكائِنا ۖ فَما كانَ لِشُرَكائِهِم فَلا يَصِلُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَما كانَ لِلَّهِ فَهُوَ يَصِلُ إِلىٰ شُرَكائِهِم ۗ ساءَ ما يَحكُمونَ
blank: w-jaʿalū l-llāh mimmā dharaʾ minal-ḥarth w-l-ʾanʿām naṣīb f-qālū hādhā l-llāh b-zaʿmihim w-hādhā l-shurakāʾinā f-mā kān l-shurakāʾihim f-lā yaṣil ʾilā llāh w-mā kān l-llāh f-huw yaṣil ʾilā shurakāʾihim sāʾ mā yaḥkumūn
english_saheeh_international: And the polytheists assign to Allah from that which He created of crops and livestock a share and say, "This is for Allah," by their claim, "and this is for our partners associated with Him." But what is for their "partners" does not reach Allah, while what is for Allah - this reaches their "partners." Evil is that which they rule

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ زَيَّنَ لِكَثيرٍ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ قَتلَ أَولادِهِم شُرَكاؤُهُم لِيُردوهُم وَلِيَلبِسوا عَلَيهِم دينَهُم ۖ وَلَو شاءَ اللَّهُ ما فَعَلوهُ ۖ فَذَرهُم وَما يَفتَرونَ
blank: w-k-dhālik zayyan l-kathīr minal-mushrikīn qatl ʾawlādihim shurakāʾuhum l-yurdūhum w-l-yalbisū ʿalayhim dīnahum w-law shāʾ llāh mā faʿalūh f-dharhum w-mā yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: And likewise, to many of the polytheists their partners have made to seem pleasing the killing of their children in order to bring about their destruction and to cover them with confusion in their religion. And if Allah had willed, they would not have done so. So leave them and that which they invent

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا هٰذِهِ أَنعامٌ وَحَرثٌ حِجرٌ لا يَطعَمُها إِلّا مَن نَشاءُ بِزَعمِهِم وَأَنعامٌ حُرِّمَت ظُهورُها وَأَنعامٌ لا يَذكُرونَ اسمَ اللَّهِ عَلَيهَا افتِراءً عَلَيهِ ۚ سَيَجزيهِم بِما كانوا يَفتَرونَ
blank: w-qālū hādhihī ʾanʿām w-ḥarth ḥijr lā yaṭʿamuhā ʾillā m nashāʾ b-zaʿmihim w-ʾanʿām ḥurrimat ẓuhūruhā w-ʾanʿām lā yadhkurūn sm llāh ʿalayhā ftirāʾ ʿalayh s-yajzīhim b-mā kānū yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "These animals and crops are forbidden; no one may eat from them except whom we will," by their claim. And there are those camels whose backs are forbidden by them and those upon which the name of Allah is not mentioned - all of this an invention of untruth about Him. He will punish them for what they were inventing

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا ما في بُطونِ هٰذِهِ الأَنعامِ خالِصَةٌ لِذُكورِنا وَمُحَرَّمٌ عَلىٰ أَزواجِنا ۖ وَإِن يَكُن مَيتَةً فَهُم فيهِ شُرَكاءُ ۚ سَيَجزيهِم وَصفَهُم ۚ إِنَّهُ حَكيمٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-qālū mā fī buṭūn hādhihil-ʾanʿām khāliṣat l-dhukūrinā w-muḥarram ʿalā ʾazwājinā w-ʾ yak maytat f-hum fīh shurakāʾ s-yajzīhim waṣfahum ʾinnahū ḥakīm ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "What is in the bellies of these animals is exclusively for our males and forbidden to our females. But if it is born dead, then all of them have shares therein." He will punish them for their description. Indeed, He is Wise and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: قَد خَسِرَ الَّذينَ قَتَلوا أَولادَهُم سَفَهًا بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ وَحَرَّموا ما رَزَقَهُمُ اللَّهُ افتِراءً عَلَى اللَّهِ ۚ قَد ضَلّوا وَما كانوا مُهتَدينَ
blank: qad khasiralladhīn qatalū ʾawlādahum safah b-ghayr ʿilm w-ḥarramū mā razaqahum llāh ftirāʾ ʿalā llāh qad ḍallū w-mā kānū muhtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Those will have lost who killed their children in foolishness without knowledge and prohibited what Allah had provided for them, inventing untruth about Allah. They have gone astray and were not rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَهُوَ الَّذي أَنشَأَ جَنّاتٍ مَعروشاتٍ وَغَيرَ مَعروشاتٍ وَالنَّخلَ وَالزَّرعَ مُختَلِفًا أُكُلُهُ وَالزَّيتونَ وَالرُّمّانَ مُتَشابِهًا وَغَيرَ مُتَشابِهٍ ۚ كُلوا مِن ثَمَرِهِ إِذا أَثمَرَ وَآتوا حَقَّهُ يَومَ حَصادِهِ ۖ وَلا تُسرِفوا ۚ إِنَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ المُسرِفينَ
blank: w-huwalladhī ʾanshaʾ jannāt maʿrūshāt w-ghayr maʿrūshāt w-n-nakhl w-z-zarʿ mukhtalif ʾukuluhū w-z-zaytūn w-r-rummān mutashābih w-ghayr mutashābih kulū m thamarihī ʾidhā ʾathmar w-ʾātū ḥaqqahū yawm ḥaṣādihī w-lā tusrifū ʾinnahū lā yuḥibbul-musrifīn
english_saheeh_international: And He it is who causes gardens to grow, both trellised and untrellised, and palm trees and crops of different kinds of food and olives and pomegranates, similar and dissimilar. Eat of each of its fruit when it yields and give its due zakah on the day of its harvest. And be not excessive. Indeed, He does not like those who commit excess

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ الأَنعامِ حَمولَةً وَفَرشًا ۚ كُلوا مِمّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ وَلا تَتَّبِعوا خُطُواتِ الشَّيطانِ ۚ إِنَّهُ لَكُم عَدُوٌّ مُبينٌ
blank: w-minal-ʾanʿām ḥamūlat w-farsh kulū mimmā razaqakum llāh w-lā tattabiʿū khuṭuwāt sh-shayṭān ʾinnahū lakum ʿaduww mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And of the grazing livestock are carriers of burdens and those too small. Eat of what Allah has provided for you and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy

arabic_uthmani: ثَمانِيَةَ أَزواجٍ ۖ مِنَ الضَّأنِ اثنَينِ وَمِنَ المَعزِ اثنَينِ ۗ قُل آلذَّكَرَينِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ الأُنثَيَينِ أَمَّا اشتَمَلَت عَلَيهِ أَرحامُ الأُنثَيَينِ ۖ نَبِّئوني بِعِلمٍ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: thamāniyat ʾazwāj min ḍ-ḍaʾn thnayn w-minal-maʿz thnayn qul ʾādh-dhakarayn ḥarram ʾamil-ʾunthayayn ʾammā shtamalat ʿalayh ʾarḥāmul-ʾunthayayn nabbiʾūnī b-ʿilm ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: They are eight mates - of the sheep, two and of the goats, two. Say, "Is it the two males He has forbidden or the two females or that which the wombs of the two females contain? Inform me with knowledge, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ الإِبِلِ اثنَينِ وَمِنَ البَقَرِ اثنَينِ ۗ قُل آلذَّكَرَينِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ الأُنثَيَينِ أَمَّا اشتَمَلَت عَلَيهِ أَرحامُ الأُنثَيَينِ ۖ أَم كُنتُم شُهَداءَ إِذ وَصّاكُمُ اللَّهُ بِهٰذا ۚ فَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا لِيُضِلَّ النّاسَ بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-minal-ʾibil thnayn w-minal-baqar thnayn qul ʾādh-dhakarayn ḥarram ʾamil-ʾunthayayn ʾammā shtamalat ʿalayh ʾarḥāmul-ʾunthayayn ʾam kuntum shuhadāʾ ʾidh waṣṣākum llāh b-hādhā f-m ʾaẓlam mimman ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib l-yuḍill n-nās b-ghayr ʿilm ʾinn llāh lā yahdīl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And of the camels, two and of the cattle, two. Say, "Is it the two males He has forbidden or the two females or that which the wombs of the two females contain? Or were you witnesses when Allah charged you with this? Then who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah to mislead the people by something other than knowledge? Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: قُل لا أَجِدُ في ما أوحِيَ إِلَيَّ مُحَرَّمًا عَلىٰ طاعِمٍ يَطعَمُهُ إِلّا أَن يَكونَ مَيتَةً أَو دَمًا مَسفوحًا أَو لَحمَ خِنزيرٍ فَإِنَّهُ رِجسٌ أَو فِسقًا أُهِلَّ لِغَيرِ اللَّهِ بِهِ ۚ فَمَنِ اضطُرَّ غَيرَ باغٍ وَلا عادٍ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: qul lā ʾajid fī mā ʾūḥiy ʾilayy muḥarram ʿalā ṭāʿim yaṭʿamuhū ʾillā ʾ yakūn maytat ʾaw damam-masfūḥ ʾaw laḥm khinzīr f-ʾinnahū rijs ʾaw fisq ʾuhill l-ghayr llāh bihī f-man ḍṭurr ghayr bāgh w-lā ʿād f-ʾinn rabbak ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, "I do not find within that which was revealed to me anything forbidden to one who would eat it unless it be a dead animal or blood spilled out or the flesh of swine - for indeed, it is impure - or it be that slaughtered in disobedience, dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced by necessity, neither desiring it nor transgressing its limit, then indeed, your Lord is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَعَلَى الَّذينَ هادوا حَرَّمنا كُلَّ ذي ظُفُرٍ ۖ وَمِنَ البَقَرِ وَالغَنَمِ حَرَّمنا عَلَيهِم شُحومَهُما إِلّا ما حَمَلَت ظُهورُهُما أَوِ الحَوايا أَو مَا اختَلَطَ بِعَظمٍ ۚ ذٰلِكَ جَزَيناهُم بِبَغيِهِم ۖ وَإِنّا لَصادِقونَ
blank: w-ʿalālladhīn hādū ḥarramnā kull dhī ẓufur w-minal-baqar w-l-ghanam ḥarramnā ʿalayhim shuḥūmahumā ʾillā mā ḥamalat ẓuhūruhumā ʾawil-ḥawāyā ʾaw mā khtalaṭ b-ʿaẓm dhālik jazaynāhum b-baghyihim w-ʾinnā l-ṣādiqūn
english_saheeh_international: And to those who are Jews We prohibited every animal of uncloven hoof; and of the cattle and the sheep We prohibited to them their fat, except what adheres to their backs or the entrails or what is joined with bone. By that We repaid them for their injustice. And indeed, We are truthful

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن كَذَّبوكَ فَقُل رَبُّكُم ذو رَحمَةٍ واسِعَةٍ وَلا يُرَدُّ بَأسُهُ عَنِ القَومِ المُجرِمينَ
blank: f-ʾ kadhdhabūk f-qul rabbukum dhū raḥmat wāsiʿat w-lā yuradd baʾsuhū ʿanil-qawmil-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: So if they deny you, O Muhammad, say, "Your Lord is the possessor of vast mercy; but His punishment cannot be repelled from the people who are criminals

arabic_uthmani: سَيَقولُ الَّذينَ أَشرَكوا لَو شاءَ اللَّهُ ما أَشرَكنا وَلا آباؤُنا وَلا حَرَّمنا مِن شَيءٍ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ كَذَّبَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم حَتّىٰ ذاقوا بَأسَنا ۗ قُل هَل عِندَكُم مِن عِلمٍ فَتُخرِجوهُ لَنا ۖ إِن تَتَّبِعونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَإِن أَنتُم إِلّا تَخرُصونَ
blank: s-yaqūlulladhīn ʾashrakū law shāʾ llāh mā ʾashraknā w-lā ʾābāʾunā w-lā ḥarramnā m shayʾ k-dhālik kadhdhaballadhīn m qablihim ḥattā dhāqū baʾsanā qul hal ʿindakum m ʿilm f-tukhrijūh lanā ʾ tattabiʿūn ʾillā ẓ-ẓann w-ʾ ʾantum ʾillā takhruṣūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who associated with Allah will say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have associated anything and neither would our fathers, nor would we have prohibited anything." Likewise did those before deny until they tasted Our punishment. Say, "Do you have any knowledge that you can produce for us? You follow not except assumption, and you are not but falsifying

arabic_uthmani: قُل فَلِلَّهِ الحُجَّةُ البالِغَةُ ۖ فَلَو شاءَ لَهَداكُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: qul f-l-llāhil-ḥujjatul-bālighat f-law shāʾ l-hadākum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "With Allah is the far-reaching argument. If He had willed, He would have guided you all

arabic_uthmani: قُل هَلُمَّ شُهَداءَكُمُ الَّذينَ يَشهَدونَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ حَرَّمَ هٰذا ۖ فَإِن شَهِدوا فَلا تَشهَد مَعَهُم ۚ وَلا تَتَّبِع أَهواءَ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا وَالَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ وَهُم بِرَبِّهِم يَعدِلونَ
blank: qul halumm shuhadāʾakumulladhīn yashhadūn ʾann llāh ḥarram hādhā f-ʾ shahidū f-lā tashhad maʿahum w-lā tattabiʿ ʾahwāʾalladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā w-lladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat w-hum b-rabbihim yaʿdilūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Bring forward your witnesses who will testify that Allah has prohibited this." And if they testify, do not testify with them. And do not follow the desires of those who deny Our verses and those who do not believe in the Hereafter, while they equate others with their Lord

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قُل تَعالَوا أَتلُ ما حَرَّمَ رَبُّكُم عَلَيكُم ۖ أَلّا تُشرِكوا بِهِ شَيئًا ۖ وَبِالوالِدَينِ إِحسانًا ۖ وَلا تَقتُلوا أَولادَكُم مِن إِملاقٍ ۖ نَحنُ نَرزُقُكُم وَإِيّاهُم ۖ وَلا تَقرَبُوا الفَواحِشَ ما ظَهَرَ مِنها وَما بَطَنَ ۖ وَلا تَقتُلُوا النَّفسَ الَّتي حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ إِلّا بِالحَقِّ ۚ ذٰلِكُم وَصّاكُم بِهِ لَعَلَّكُم تَعقِلونَ
blank: qul taʿālaw ʾatl mā ḥarram rabbukum ʿalaykum ʾallā tushrikū bihī shayʾ w-b-l-wālidayn ʾiḥsān w-lā taqtulū ʾawlādakum m ʾimlāq naḥn narzuqukum w-ʾiyyāhum w-lā taqrabūl-fawāḥish mā ẓahar minhā w-mā baṭan w-lā taqtulū n-nafs llatī ḥarram llāh ʾillā b-l-ḥaqq dhālikum waṣṣākum bihī laʿallakum taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Come, I will recite what your Lord has prohibited to you. He commands that you not associate anything with Him, and to parents, good treatment, and do not kill your children out of poverty; We will provide for you and them. And do not approach immoralities - what is apparent of them and what is concealed. And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden to be killed except by legal right. This has He instructed you that you may use reason

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَقرَبوا مالَ اليَتيمِ إِلّا بِالَّتي هِيَ أَحسَنُ حَتّىٰ يَبلُغَ أَشُدَّهُ ۖ وَأَوفُوا الكَيلَ وَالميزانَ بِالقِسطِ ۖ لا نُكَلِّفُ نَفسًا إِلّا وُسعَها ۖ وَإِذا قُلتُم فَاعدِلوا وَلَو كانَ ذا قُربىٰ ۖ وَبِعَهدِ اللَّهِ أَوفوا ۚ ذٰلِكُم وَصّاكُم بِهِ لَعَلَّكُم تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-lā taqrabū mālal-yatīm ʾillā b-llatī hiy ʾaḥsan ḥattā yablugh ʾashuddahū w-ʾawfūl-kayl w-l-mīzān b-l-qisṭ lā nukallif nafs ʾillā wusʿahā w-ʾidhā qultum f-ʿdilū w-law kān dhā qurbā w-b-ʿahd llāh ʾawfū dhālikum waṣṣākum bihī laʿallakum tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not approach the orphan's property except in a way that is best until he reaches maturity. And give full measure and weight in justice. We do not charge any soul except with that within its capacity. And when you testify, be just, even if it concerns a near relative. And the covenant of Allah fulfill. This has He instructed you that you may remember

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّ هٰذا صِراطي مُستَقيمًا فَاتَّبِعوهُ ۖ وَلا تَتَّبِعُوا السُّبُلَ فَتَفَرَّقَ بِكُم عَن سَبيلِهِ ۚ ذٰلِكُم وَصّاكُم بِهِ لَعَلَّكُم تَتَّقونَ
blank: w-ʾann hādhā ṣirāṭī mustaqīm f-ttabiʿūh w-lā tattabiʿū s-subul f-tafarraq bikum ʿ sabīlihī dhālikum waṣṣākum bihī laʿallakum tattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And, moreover, this is My path, which is straight, so follow it; and do not follow other ways, for you will be separated from His way. This has He instructed you that you may become righteous

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ آتَينا موسَى الكِتابَ تَمامًا عَلَى الَّذي أَحسَنَ وَتَفصيلًا لِكُلِّ شَيءٍ وَهُدًى وَرَحمَةً لَعَلَّهُم بِلِقاءِ رَبِّهِم يُؤمِنونَ
blank: thumm ʾātaynā mūsāl-kitāb tamām ʿalālladhī ʾaḥsan w-tafṣīl l-kull shayʾ w-hud w-raḥmat laʿallahum b-liqāʾ rabbihim yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Then We gave Moses the Scripture, making complete Our favor upon the one who did good and as a detailed explanation of all things and as guidance and mercy that perhaps in the matter of the meeting with their Lord they would believe

arabic_uthmani: وَهٰذا كِتابٌ أَنزَلناهُ مُبارَكٌ فَاتَّبِعوهُ وَاتَّقوا لَعَلَّكُم تُرحَمونَ
blank: w-hādhā kitāb ʾanzalnāh mubārak f-ttabiʿūh w-ttaqū laʿallakum turḥamūn
english_saheeh_international: And this Qur'an is a Book We have revealed which is blessed, so follow it and fear Allah that you may receive mercy

arabic_uthmani: أَن تَقولوا إِنَّما أُنزِلَ الكِتابُ عَلىٰ طائِفَتَينِ مِن قَبلِنا وَإِن كُنّا عَن دِراسَتِهِم لَغافِلينَ
blank: ʾ taqūlū ʾinnamā ʾunzilal-kitāb ʿalā ṭāʾifatayn m qablinā w-ʾ kunnā ʿ dirāsatihim l-ghāfilīn
english_saheeh_international: We revealed it lest you say, "The Scripture was only sent down to two groups before us, but we were of their study unaware

arabic_uthmani: أَو تَقولوا لَو أَنّا أُنزِلَ عَلَينَا الكِتابُ لَكُنّا أَهدىٰ مِنهُم ۚ فَقَد جاءَكُم بَيِّنَةٌ مِن رَبِّكُم وَهُدًى وَرَحمَةٌ ۚ فَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَّبَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ وَصَدَفَ عَنها ۗ سَنَجزِي الَّذينَ يَصدِفونَ عَن آياتِنا سوءَ العَذابِ بِما كانوا يَصدِفونَ
blank: ʾaw taqūlū law ʾannā ʾunzil ʿalaynāl-kitāb l-kunnā ʾahdā minhum f-qad jāʾakum bayyinat m rabbikum w-hud w-raḥmat f-m ʾaẓlam mimm kadhdhab b-ʾāyāt llāh w-ṣadaf ʿanhā s-najzīlladhīn yaṣdifūn ʿ ʾāyātinā sūʾal-ʿadhāb b-mā kānū yaṣdifūn
english_saheeh_international: Or lest you say, "If only the Scripture had been revealed to us, we would have been better guided than they." So there has now come to you a clear evidence from your Lord and a guidance and mercy. Then who is more unjust than one who denies the verses of Allah and turns away from them? We will recompense those who turn away from Our verses with the worst of punishment for their having turned away

arabic_uthmani: هَل يَنظُرونَ إِلّا أَن تَأتِيَهُمُ المَلائِكَةُ أَو يَأتِيَ رَبُّكَ أَو يَأتِيَ بَعضُ آياتِ رَبِّكَ ۗ يَومَ يَأتي بَعضُ آياتِ رَبِّكَ لا يَنفَعُ نَفسًا إيمانُها لَم تَكُن آمَنَت مِن قَبلُ أَو كَسَبَت في إيمانِها خَيرًا ۗ قُلِ انتَظِروا إِنّا مُنتَظِرونَ
blank: hal yanẓurūn ʾillā ʾ taʾtiyahumul-malāʾikat ʾaw yaʾtiy rabbuk ʾaw yaʾtiy baʿḍ ʾāyāt rabbik yawm yaʾtī baʿḍ ʾāyāt rabbik lā yanfaʿ nafs ʾīmānuhā lam tak ʾāmanat m qabl ʾaw kasabat fī ʾīmānihā khayr qul ntaẓirū ʾinnā muntaẓirūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they then wait for anything except that the angels should come to them or your Lord should come or that there come some of the signs of your Lord? The Day that some of the signs of your Lord will come no soul will benefit from its faith as long as it had not believed before or had earned through its faith some good. Say, "Wait. Indeed, we also are waiting

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ فَرَّقوا دينَهُم وَكانوا شِيَعًا لَستَ مِنهُم في شَيءٍ ۚ إِنَّما أَمرُهُم إِلَى اللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِما كانوا يَفعَلونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn farraqū dīnahum w-kānū shiyaʿ last minhum fī shayʾ ʾinnamā ʾamruhum ʾilā llāh thumm yunabbiʾuhum b-mā kānū yafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who have divided their religion and become sects - you, O Muhammad, are not associated with them in anything. Their affair is only left to Allah; then He will inform them about what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: مَن جاءَ بِالحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُ عَشرُ أَمثالِها ۖ وَمَن جاءَ بِالسَّيِّئَةِ فَلا يُجزىٰ إِلّا مِثلَها وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: m jāʾ b-l-ḥasanat f-lahū ʿashr ʾamthālihā w-m jāʾ b-s-sayyiʾat f-lā yujzā ʾillā mithlahā w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever comes on the Day of Judgement with a good deed will have ten times the like thereof to his credit, and whoever comes with an evil deed will not be recompensed except the like thereof; and they will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّني هَداني رَبّي إِلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ دينًا قِيَمًا مِلَّةَ إِبراهيمَ حَنيفًا ۚ وَما كانَ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: qul ʾinnanī hadānī rabbī ʾilā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm dīn qiyamam-millat ʾibrāhīm ḥanīf w-mā kān minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, my Lord has guided me to a straight path - a correct religion - the way of Abraham, inclining toward truth. And he was not among those who associated others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّ صَلاتي وَنُسُكي وَمَحيايَ وَمَماتي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: qul ʾinn ṣalātī w-nusukī w-maḥyāy w-mamātī l-llāh rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: لا شَريكَ لَهُ ۖ وَبِذٰلِكَ أُمِرتُ وَأَنا أَوَّلُ المُسلِمينَ
blank: lā sharīk lahū w-b-dhālik ʾumirt w-ʾan ʾawwalul-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: No partner has He. And this I have been commanded, and I am the first among you of the Muslims

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَغَيرَ اللَّهِ أَبغي رَبًّا وَهُوَ رَبُّ كُلِّ شَيءٍ ۚ وَلا تَكسِبُ كُلُّ نَفسٍ إِلّا عَلَيها ۚ وَلا تَزِرُ وازِرَةٌ وِزرَ أُخرىٰ ۚ ثُمَّ إِلىٰ رَبِّكُم مَرجِعُكُم فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم فيهِ تَختَلِفونَ
blank: qul ʾ-ghayr llāh ʾabghī rabb w-huw rabb kull shayʾ w-lā taksib kull nafs ʾillā ʿalayhā w-lā tazir wāzirat wizr ʾukhrā thumm ʾilā rabbikum marjiʿukum f-yunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum fīh takhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Is it other than Allah I should desire as a lord while He is the Lord of all things? And every soul earns not blame except against itself, and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you concerning that over which you used to differ

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي جَعَلَكُم خَلائِفَ الأَرضِ وَرَفَعَ بَعضَكُم فَوقَ بَعضٍ دَرَجاتٍ لِيَبلُوَكُم في ما آتاكُم ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ سَريعُ العِقابِ وَإِنَّهُ لَغَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-huwalladhī jaʿalakum khalāʾifal-ʾarḍ w-rafaʿ baʿḍakum fawq baʿḍ darajāt l-yabluwakum fī mā ʾātākum ʾinn rabbak sarīʿul-ʿiqāb w-ʾinnahū l-ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who has made you successors upon the earth and has raised some of you above others in degrees of rank that He may try you through what He has given you. Indeed, your Lord is swift in penalty; but indeed, He is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: المص
blank: -l-m-ṣ (ʾalif lām mīm ṣād)
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Meem, Sad

arabic_uthmani: كِتابٌ أُنزِلَ إِلَيكَ فَلا يَكُن في صَدرِكَ حَرَجٌ مِنهُ لِتُنذِرَ بِهِ وَذِكرىٰ لِلمُؤمِنينَ
blank: kitāb ʾunzil ʾilayk f-lā yak fī ṣadrik ḥaraj minh l-tundhir bihī w-dhikrā l-l-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: This is a Book revealed to you, O Muhammad - so let there not be in your breast distress therefrom - that you may warn thereby and as a reminder to the believers

arabic_uthmani: اتَّبِعوا ما أُنزِلَ إِلَيكُم مِن رَبِّكُم وَلا تَتَّبِعوا مِن دونِهِ أَولِياءَ ۗ قَليلًا ما تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: ittabiʿū mā ʾunzil ʾilaykum m rabbikum w-lā tattabiʿū m dūnihī ʾawliyāʾ qalīlam-mā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Follow, O mankind, what has been revealed to you from your Lord and do not follow other than Him any allies. Little do you remember

arabic_uthmani: وَكَم مِن قَريَةٍ أَهلَكناها فَجاءَها بَأسُنا بَياتًا أَو هُم قائِلونَ
blank: w-kam m qaryat ʾahlaknāhā f-jāʾahā baʾsunā bayāt ʾaw hum qāʾilūn
english_saheeh_international: And how many cities have We destroyed, and Our punishment came to them at night or while they were sleeping at noon

arabic_uthmani: فَما كانَ دَعواهُم إِذ جاءَهُم بَأسُنا إِلّا أَن قالوا إِنّا كُنّا ظالِمينَ
blank: f-mā kān daʿwāhum ʾidh jāʾahum baʾsunā ʾillā ʾ qālū ʾinnā kunnā ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And their declaration when Our punishment came to them was only that they said, "Indeed, we were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَلَنَسأَلَنَّ الَّذينَ أُرسِلَ إِلَيهِم وَلَنَسأَلَنَّ المُرسَلينَ
blank: f-l-nasʾalannalladhīn ʾursil ʾilayhim w-l-nasʾalannal-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We will surely question those to whom a message was sent, and We will surely question the messengers

arabic_uthmani: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيهِم بِعِلمٍ ۖ وَما كُنّا غائِبينَ
blank: f-l-naquṣṣann ʿalayhim b-ʿilm w-mā kunnā ghāʾibīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We will surely relate their deeds to them with knowledge, and We were not at all absent

arabic_uthmani: وَالوَزنُ يَومَئِذٍ الحَقُّ ۚ فَمَن ثَقُلَت مَوازينُهُ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: w-l-wazn yawmaʾidh-il-ḥaqq f-m thaqulat mawāzīnuhū f-ʾulāʾik humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And the weighing of deeds that Day will be the truth. So those whose scales are heavy - it is they who will be the successful

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن خَفَّت مَوازينُهُ فَأُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ خَسِروا أَنفُسَهُم بِما كانوا بِآياتِنا يَظلِمونَ
blank: w-m khaffat mawāzīnuhū f-ʾulāʾikalladhīn khasirū ʾanfusahum b-mā kānū b-ʾāyātinā yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: And those whose scales are light - they are the ones who will lose themselves for what injustice they were doing toward Our verses

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد مَكَّنّاكُم فِي الأَرضِ وَجَعَلنا لَكُم فيها مَعايِشَ ۗ قَليلًا ما تَشكُرونَ
blank: w-l-qad makkannākum fīl-ʾarḍ w-jaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyish qalīlam-mā tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly established you upon the earth and made for you therein ways of livelihood. Little are you grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد خَلَقناكُم ثُمَّ صَوَّرناكُم ثُمَّ قُلنا لِلمَلائِكَةِ اسجُدوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدوا إِلّا إِبليسَ لَم يَكُن مِنَ السّاجِدينَ
blank: w-l-qad khalaqnākum thumm ṣawwarnākum thumm qulnā l-l-malāʾikat sjudū l-ʾādam f-sajadū ʾillā ʾiblīs lam yak min s-sājidīn
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly created you, O Mankind, and given you human form. Then We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam"; so they prostrated, except for Iblees. He was not of those who prostrated

arabic_uthmani: قالَ ما مَنَعَكَ أَلّا تَسجُدَ إِذ أَمَرتُكَ ۖ قالَ أَنا خَيرٌ مِنهُ خَلَقتَني مِن نارٍ وَخَلَقتَهُ مِن طينٍ
blank: qāl mā manaʿak ʾallā tasjud ʾidh ʾamartuk qāl ʾan khayr minh khalaqtanī m nār w-khalaqtahū m ṭīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "What prevented you from prostrating when I commanded you?" Satan said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَاهبِط مِنها فَما يَكونُ لَكَ أَن تَتَكَبَّرَ فيها فَاخرُج إِنَّكَ مِنَ الصّاغِرينَ
blank: qāl f-hbiṭ minhā f-mā yakūn lak ʾ tatakabbar fīhā f-khruj ʾinnak min ṣ-ṣāghirīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Descend from Paradise, for it is not for you to be arrogant therein. So get out; indeed, you are of the debased

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَنظِرني إِلىٰ يَومِ يُبعَثونَ
blank: qāl ʾanẓirnī ʾilā yawm yubʿathūn
english_saheeh_international: Satan said, "Reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِنَّكَ مِنَ المُنظَرينَ
blank: qāl ʾinnak minal-munẓarīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Indeed, you are of those reprieved

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَبِما أَغوَيتَني لَأَقعُدَنَّ لَهُم صِراطَكَ المُستَقيمَ
blank: qāl f-b-mā ʾaghwaytanī l-ʾaqʿudann lahum ṣirāṭakal-mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: Satan said, "Because You have put me in error, I will surely sit in wait for them on Your straight path

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ لَآتِيَنَّهُم مِن بَينِ أَيديهِم وَمِن خَلفِهِم وَعَن أَيمانِهِم وَعَن شَمائِلِهِم ۖ وَلا تَجِدُ أَكثَرَهُم شاكِرينَ
blank: thumm l-ʾātiyannahum m bayn ʾaydīhim w-m khalfihim w-ʿ ʾaymānihim w-ʿ shamāʾilihim w-lā tajid ʾaktharahum shākirīn
english_saheeh_international: Then I will come to them from before them and from behind them and on their right and on their left, and You will not find most of them grateful to You

arabic_uthmani: قالَ اخرُج مِنها مَذءومًا مَدحورًا ۖ لَمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنهُم لَأَملَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: qāl khruj minhā madhʾūmam-madḥūr l-m tabiʿak minhum l-ʾamlaʾann jahannam minkum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Get out of Paradise, reproached and expelled. Whoever follows you among them - I will surely fill Hell with you, all together

arabic_uthmani: وَيا آدَمُ اسكُن أَنتَ وَزَوجُكَ الجَنَّةَ فَكُلا مِن حَيثُ شِئتُما وَلا تَقرَبا هٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكونا مِنَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-yā-ʾādam sk ʾant w-zawjukal-jannat f-kulā m ḥayth shiʾtumā w-lā taqrabā hādhih sh-shajarat f-takūnā min ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And "O Adam, dwell, you and your wife, in Paradise and eat from wherever you will but do not approach this tree, lest you be among the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَوَسوَسَ لَهُمَا الشَّيطانُ لِيُبدِيَ لَهُما ما وورِيَ عَنهُما مِن سَوآتِهِما وَقالَ ما نَهاكُما رَبُّكُما عَن هٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةِ إِلّا أَن تَكونا مَلَكَينِ أَو تَكونا مِنَ الخالِدينَ
blank: f-waswas lahumā sh-shayṭān l-yubdiy lahumā mā wūriy ʿanhumā m sawʾātihimā w-qāl mā nahākumā rabbukumā ʿ hādhih sh-shajarat ʾillā ʾ takūnā malakayn ʾaw takūnā minal-khālidīn
english_saheeh_international: But Satan whispered to them to make apparent to them that which was concealed from them of their private parts. He said, "Your Lord did not forbid you this tree except that you become angels or become of the immortal

arabic_uthmani: وَقاسَمَهُما إِنّي لَكُما لَمِنَ النّاصِحينَ
blank: w-qāsamahumā ʾinnī lakumā l-min n-nāṣiḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And he swore by Allah to them, "Indeed, I am to you from among the sincere advisors

arabic_uthmani: فَدَلّاهُما بِغُرورٍ ۚ فَلَمّا ذاقَا الشَّجَرَةَ بَدَت لَهُما سَوآتُهُما وَطَفِقا يَخصِفانِ عَلَيهِما مِن وَرَقِ الجَنَّةِ ۖ وَناداهُما رَبُّهُما أَلَم أَنهَكُما عَن تِلكُمَا الشَّجَرَةِ وَأَقُل لَكُما إِنَّ الشَّيطانَ لَكُما عَدُوٌّ مُبينٌ
blank: f-dallāhumā b-ghurūr f-lammā dhāqā sh-shajarat badat lahumā sawʾātuhumā w-ṭafiqā yakhṣifān ʿalayhimā m waraqil-jannat w-nādāhumā rabbuhumā ʾ-lam ʾanhakumā ʿ tilkumā sh-shajarat w-ʾaqul lakumā ʾinn sh-shayṭān lakumā ʿaduww mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So he made them fall, through deception. And when they tasted of the tree, their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten together over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And their Lord called to them, "Did I not forbid you from that tree and tell you that Satan is to you a clear enemy

arabic_uthmani: قالا رَبَّنا ظَلَمنا أَنفُسَنا وَإِن لَم تَغفِر لَنا وَتَرحَمنا لَنَكونَنَّ مِنَ الخاسِرينَ
blank: qālā rabbanā ẓalamnā ʾanfusanā w-ʾ lam taghfir lanā w-tarḥamnā l-nakūnann minal-khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ اهبِطوا بَعضُكُم لِبَعضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ وَلَكُم فِي الأَرضِ مُستَقَرٌّ وَمَتاعٌ إِلىٰ حينٍ
blank: qāl hbiṭū baʿḍukum l-baʿḍ ʿaduww w-lakum fīl-ʾarḍ mustaqarr w-matāʿ ʾilā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Descend, being to one another enemies. And for you on the earth is a place of settlement and enjoyment for a time

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فيها تَحيَونَ وَفيها تَموتونَ وَمِنها تُخرَجونَ
blank: qāl fīhā taḥyawn w-fīhā tamūtūn w-minhā tukhrajūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Therein you will live, and therein you will die, and from it you will be brought forth

arabic_uthmani: يا بَني آدَمَ قَد أَنزَلنا عَلَيكُم لِباسًا يُواري سَوآتِكُم وَريشًا ۖ وَلِباسُ التَّقوىٰ ذٰلِكَ خَيرٌ ۚ ذٰلِكَ مِن آياتِ اللَّهِ لَعَلَّهُم يَذَّكَّرونَ
blank: yā-banī ʾādam qad ʾanzalnā ʿalaykum libās yuwārī sawʾātikum w-rīsh w-libās t-taqwā dhālik khayr dhālik m ʾāyāt llāh laʿallahum yadhdhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: O children of Adam, We have bestowed upon you clothing to conceal your private parts and as adornment. But the clothing of righteousness - that is best. That is from the signs of Allah that perhaps they will remember

arabic_uthmani: يا بَني آدَمَ لا يَفتِنَنَّكُمُ الشَّيطانُ كَما أَخرَجَ أَبَوَيكُم مِنَ الجَنَّةِ يَنزِعُ عَنهُما لِباسَهُما لِيُرِيَهُما سَوآتِهِما ۗ إِنَّهُ يَراكُم هُوَ وَقَبيلُهُ مِن حَيثُ لا تَرَونَهُم ۗ إِنّا جَعَلنَا الشَّياطينَ أَولِياءَ لِلَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: yā-banī ʾādam lā yaftinannakum sh-shayṭān k-mā ʾakhraj ʾabawaykum minal-jannat yanziʿ ʿanhumā libāsahumā l-yuriyahumā sawʾātihimā ʾinnahū yarākum huw w-qabīluhū m ḥayth lā tarawnahum ʾinnā jaʿalnā sh-shayāṭīn ʾawliyāʾ l-lladhīn lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: O children of Adam, let not Satan tempt you as he removed your parents from Paradise, stripping them of their clothing to show them their private parts. Indeed, he sees you, he and his tribe, from where you do not see them. Indeed, We have made the devils allies to those who do not believe

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا فَعَلوا فاحِشَةً قالوا وَجَدنا عَلَيها آباءَنا وَاللَّهُ أَمَرَنا بِها ۗ قُل إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَأمُرُ بِالفَحشاءِ ۖ أَتَقولونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ ما لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā faʿalū fāḥishat qālū wajadnā ʿalayhā ʾābāʾanā w-llāh ʾamaranā bihā qul ʾinn llāh lā yaʾmur b-l-faḥshāʾ ʾ-taqūlūn ʿalā llāh mā lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And when they commit an immorality, they say, "We found our fathers doing it, and Allah has ordered us to do it." Say, "Indeed, Allah does not order immorality. Do you say about Allah that which you do not know

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَمَرَ رَبّي بِالقِسطِ ۖ وَأَقيموا وُجوهَكُم عِندَ كُلِّ مَسجِدٍ وَادعوهُ مُخلِصينَ لَهُ الدّينَ ۚ كَما بَدَأَكُم تَعودونَ
blank: qul ʾamar rabbī b-l-qisṭ w-ʾaqīmū wujūhakum ʿind kull masjid w-dʿūh mukhliṣīn lah d-dīn k-mā badaʾakum taʿūdūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "My Lord has ordered justice and that you maintain yourselves in worship of Him at every place or time of prostration, and invoke Him, sincere to Him in religion." Just as He originated you, you will return to life

arabic_uthmani: فَريقًا هَدىٰ وَفَريقًا حَقَّ عَلَيهِمُ الضَّلالَةُ ۗ إِنَّهُمُ اتَّخَذُوا الشَّياطينَ أَولِياءَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَيَحسَبونَ أَنَّهُم مُهتَدونَ
blank: farīq hadā w-farīq ḥaqq ʿalayhim ḍ-ḍalālat ʾinnahum ttakhadhū sh-shayāṭīn ʾawliyāʾ m dūn llāh w-yaḥsabūn ʾannahum muhtadūn
english_saheeh_international: A group of you He guided, and a group deserved to be in error. Indeed, they had taken the devils as allies instead of Allah while they thought that they were guided

arabic_uthmani: ۞ يا بَني آدَمَ خُذوا زينَتَكُم عِندَ كُلِّ مَسجِدٍ وَكُلوا وَاشرَبوا وَلا تُسرِفوا ۚ إِنَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ المُسرِفينَ
blank: yā-banī ʾādam khudhū zīnatakum ʿind kull masjid w-kulū w-shrabū w-lā tusrifū ʾinnahū lā yuḥibbul-musrifīn
english_saheeh_international: O children of Adam, take your adornment at every masjid, and eat and drink, but be not excessive. Indeed, He likes not those who commit excess

arabic_uthmani: قُل مَن حَرَّمَ زينَةَ اللَّهِ الَّتي أَخرَجَ لِعِبادِهِ وَالطَّيِّباتِ مِنَ الرِّزقِ ۚ قُل هِيَ لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا خالِصَةً يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۗ كَذٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ الآياتِ لِقَومٍ يَعلَمونَ
blank: qul m ḥarram zīnat llāh llatī ʾakhraj l-ʿibādihī w-ṭ-ṭayyibāt min r-rizq qul hiy l-lladhīn ʾāmanū fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā khāliṣat yawmal-qiyāmat k-dhālik nufaṣṣilul-ʾāyāt l-qawm yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Who has forbidden the adornment of Allah which He has produced for His servants and the good lawful things of provision?" Say, "They are for those who believe during the worldly life but exclusively for them on the Day of Resurrection." Thus do We detail the verses for a people who know

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّما حَرَّمَ رَبِّيَ الفَواحِشَ ما ظَهَرَ مِنها وَما بَطَنَ وَالإِثمَ وَالبَغيَ بِغَيرِ الحَقِّ وَأَن تُشرِكوا بِاللَّهِ ما لَم يُنَزِّل بِهِ سُلطانًا وَأَن تَقولوا عَلَى اللَّهِ ما لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: qul ʾinnamā ḥarram rabbiyal-fawāḥish mā ẓahar minhā w-mā baṭan w-l-ʾithm w-l-baghy b-ghayril-ḥaqq w-ʾ tushrikū b-llāh mā lam yunazzil bihī sulṭān w-ʾ taqūlū ʿalā llāh mā lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "My Lord has only forbidden immoralities - what is apparent of them and what is concealed - and sin, and oppression without right, and that you associate with Allah that for which He has not sent down authority, and that you say about Allah that which you do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٌ ۖ فَإِذا جاءَ أَجَلُهُم لا يَستَأخِرونَ ساعَةً ۖ وَلا يَستَقدِمونَ
blank: w-l-kull ʾummat ʾajal f-ʾidhā jāʾ ʾajaluhum lā yastaʾkhirūn sāʿat w-lā yastaqdimūn
english_saheeh_international: And for every nation is a specified term. So when their time has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede it

arabic_uthmani: يا بَني آدَمَ إِمّا يَأتِيَنَّكُم رُسُلٌ مِنكُم يَقُصّونَ عَلَيكُم آياتي ۙ فَمَنِ اتَّقىٰ وَأَصلَحَ فَلا خَوفٌ عَلَيهِم وَلا هُم يَحزَنونَ
blank: yā-banī ʾādam ʾimmā yaʾtiyannakum rusul minkum yaquṣṣūn ʿalaykum ʾāyātī f-man ttaqā w-ʾaṣlaḥ f-lā khawf ʿalayhim w-lā hum yaḥzanūn
english_saheeh_international: O children of Adam, if there come to you messengers from among you relating to you My verses, then whoever fears Allah and reforms - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا وَاستَكبَروا عَنها أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ النّارِ ۖ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: w-lladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā w-stakbarū ʿanhā ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥāb n-nār hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: But the ones who deny Our verses and are arrogant toward them - those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَو كَذَّبَ بِآياتِهِ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ يَنالُهُم نَصيبُهُم مِنَ الكِتابِ ۖ حَتّىٰ إِذا جاءَتهُم رُسُلُنا يَتَوَفَّونَهُم قالوا أَينَ ما كُنتُم تَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ۖ قالوا ضَلّوا عَنّا وَشَهِدوا عَلىٰ أَنفُسِهِم أَنَّهُم كانوا كافِرينَ
blank: f-m ʾaẓlam mimman ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib ʾaw kadhdhab b-ʾāyātihī ʾulāʾik yanāluhum naṣībuhum minal-kitāb ḥattā ʾidhā jāʾathum rusulunā yatawaffawnahum qālū ʾayn mā kuntum tadʿūn m dūn llāh qālū ḍallū ʿannā w-shahidū ʿalā ʾanfusihim ʾannahum kānū kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie or denies His verses? Those will attain their portion of the decree until when Our messengers come to them to take them in death, they will say, "Where are those you used to invoke besides Allah?" They will say, "They have departed from us," and will bear witness against themselves that they were disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ ادخُلوا في أُمَمٍ قَد خَلَت مِن قَبلِكُم مِنَ الجِنِّ وَالإِنسِ فِي النّارِ ۖ كُلَّما دَخَلَت أُمَّةٌ لَعَنَت أُختَها ۖ حَتّىٰ إِذَا ادّارَكوا فيها جَميعًا قالَت أُخراهُم لِأولاهُم رَبَّنا هٰؤُلاءِ أَضَلّونا فَآتِهِم عَذابًا ضِعفًا مِنَ النّارِ ۖ قالَ لِكُلٍّ ضِعفٌ وَلٰكِن لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: qāl dkhulū fī ʾumam qad khalat m qablikum minal-jinn w-l-ʾins fī n-nār kullamā dakhalat ʾummat laʿanat ʾukhtahā ḥattā ʾidhā ddārakū fīhā jamīʿ qālat ʾukhrāhum l-ʾūlāhum rabbanā hāʾulāʾ ʾaḍallūnā f-ʾātihim ʿadhāb ḍiʿfam-min n-nār qāl l-kull ḍiʿf w-lāk lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah will say, "Enter among nations which had passed on before you of jinn and mankind into the Fire." Every time a nation enters, it will curse its sister until, when they have all overtaken one another therein, the last of them will say about the first of them "Our Lord, these had misled us, so give them a double punishment of the Fire. He will say, "For each is double, but you do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَت أولاهُم لِأُخراهُم فَما كانَ لَكُم عَلَينا مِن فَضلٍ فَذوقُوا العَذابَ بِما كُنتُم تَكسِبونَ
blank: w-qālat ʾūlāhum l-ʾukhrāhum f-mā kān lakum ʿalaynā m faḍl f-dhūqūl-ʿadhāb b-mā kuntum taksibūn
english_saheeh_international: And the first of them will say to the last of them, "Then you had not any favor over us, so taste the punishment for what you used to earn

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا وَاستَكبَروا عَنها لا تُفَتَّحُ لَهُم أَبوابُ السَّماءِ وَلا يَدخُلونَ الجَنَّةَ حَتّىٰ يَلِجَ الجَمَلُ في سَمِّ الخِياطِ ۚ وَكَذٰلِكَ نَجزِي المُجرِمينَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā w-stakbarū ʿanhā lā tufattaḥ lahum ʾabwāb s-samāʾ w-lā yadkhulūnal-jannat ḥattā yalijal-jamal fī sammil-khiyāṭ w-k-dhālik najzīl-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who deny Our verses and are arrogant toward them - the gates of Heaven will not be opened for them, nor will they enter Paradise until a camel enters into the eye of a needle. And thus do We recompense the criminals

arabic_uthmani: لَهُم مِن جَهَنَّمَ مِهادٌ وَمِن فَوقِهِم غَواشٍ ۚ وَكَذٰلِكَ نَجزِي الظّالِمينَ
blank: lahum m jahannam mihād w-m fawqihim ghawāsh w-k-dhālik najzī ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: They will have from Hell a bed and over them coverings of fire. And thus do We recompense the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ لا نُكَلِّفُ نَفسًا إِلّا وُسعَها أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ الجَنَّةِ ۖ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt lā nukallif nafs ʾillā wusʿahā ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥābul-jannat hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: But those who believed and did righteous deeds - We charge no soul except within its capacity. Those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: وَنَزَعنا ما في صُدورِهِم مِن غِلٍّ تَجري مِن تَحتِهِمُ الأَنهارُ ۖ وَقالُوا الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذي هَدانا لِهٰذا وَما كُنّا لِنَهتَدِيَ لَولا أَن هَدانَا اللَّهُ ۖ لَقَد جاءَت رُسُلُ رَبِّنا بِالحَقِّ ۖ وَنودوا أَن تِلكُمُ الجَنَّةُ أورِثتُموها بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-nazaʿnā mā fī ṣudūrihim m ghill tajrī m taḥtihimul-ʾanhār w-qālūl-ḥamd l-llāhilladhī hadānā l-hādhā w-mā kunnā l-nahtadiy law-lā ʾ hadānā llāh l-qad jāʾat rusul rabbinā b-l-ḥaqq w-nūdū ʾ tilkumul-jannat ʾūrithtumūhā b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And We will have removed whatever is within their breasts of resentment, while flowing beneath them are rivers. And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has guided us to this; and we would never have been guided if Allah had not guided us. Certainly the messengers of our Lord had come with the truth." And they will be called, "This is Paradise, which you have been made to inherit for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَنادىٰ أَصحابُ الجَنَّةِ أَصحابَ النّارِ أَن قَد وَجَدنا ما وَعَدَنا رَبُّنا حَقًّا فَهَل وَجَدتُم ما وَعَدَ رَبُّكُم حَقًّا ۖ قالوا نَعَم ۚ فَأَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌ بَينَهُم أَن لَعنَةُ اللَّهِ عَلَى الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-nādā ʾaṣḥābul-jannat ʾaṣḥāb n-nār ʾ qad wajadnā mā waʿadanā rabbunā ḥaqq f-hal wajadtum mā waʿad rabbukum ḥaqq qālū naʿam f-ʾadhdhan muʾadhdhin baynahum ʾ laʿnat llāh ʿalā ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And the companions of Paradise will call out to the companions of the Fire, "We have already found what our Lord promised us to be true. Have you found what your Lord promised to be true?" They will say, "Yes." Then an announcer will announce among them, "The curse of Allah shall be upon the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَصُدّونَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَيَبغونَها عِوَجًا وَهُم بِالآخِرَةِ كافِرونَ
blank: alladhīn yaṣuddūn ʿ sabīl llāh w-yabghūnahā ʿiwaj w-hum b-l-ʾākhirat kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: Who averted people from the way of Allah and sought to make it seem deviant while they were, concerning the Hereafter, disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَبَينَهُما حِجابٌ ۚ وَعَلَى الأَعرافِ رِجالٌ يَعرِفونَ كُلًّا بِسيماهُم ۚ وَنادَوا أَصحابَ الجَنَّةِ أَن سَلامٌ عَلَيكُم ۚ لَم يَدخُلوها وَهُم يَطمَعونَ
blank: w-baynahumā ḥijāb w-ʿalāl-ʾaʿrāf rijāl yaʿrifūn kull b-sīmāhum w-nādaw ʾaṣḥābal-jannat ʾ salām ʿalaykum lam yadkhulūhā w-hum yaṭmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And between them will be a partition, and on its elevations are men who recognize all by their mark. And they call out to the companions of Paradise, "Peace be upon you." They have not yet entered it, but they long intensely

english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your Lord is Allah, who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. Unquestionably, His is the creation and the command; blessed is Allah, Lord of the worlds

blank: udʿū rabbakum taḍarruʿ w-khufyat ʾinnahū lā yuḥibbul-muʿtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Call upon your Lord in humility and privately; indeed, He does not like transgressors

english_saheeh_international: And cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. And invoke Him in fear and aspiration. Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good

english_saheeh_international: Hud said, "Already have defilement and anger fallen upon you from your Lord. Do you dispute with me concerning mere names you have named them, you and your fathers, for which Allah has not sent down any authority? Then wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait

english_saheeh_international: So We saved him and those with him by mercy from Us. And We eliminated those who denied Our signs, and they were not at all believers

blank: w-dhkurū ʾidh jaʿalakum khulafāʾ m baʿd ʿād w-bawwaʾakum fīl-ʾarḍ tattakhidhūn m suhūlihā quṣūr w-tanḥitūnal-jibāl buyūt f-dhkurū ʾālāʾ llāh w-lā taʿthaw fīl-ʾarḍ mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And remember when He made you successors after the 'Aad and settled you in the land, and you take for yourselves palaces from its plains and carve from the mountains, homes. Then remember the favors of Allah and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption

arabic_uthmani: قالَ المَلَأُ الَّذينَ استَكبَروا مِن قَومِهِ لِلَّذينَ استُضعِفوا لِمَن آمَنَ مِنهُم أَتَعلَمونَ أَنَّ صالِحًا مُرسَلٌ مِن رَبِّهِ ۚ قالوا إِنّا بِما أُرسِلَ بِهِ مُؤمِنونَ
blank: qālal-malaʾulladhīn stakbarū m qawmihī l-lladhīn stuḍʿifū l-m ʾāman minhum ʾ-taʿlamūn ʾann ṣāliḥam-mursal m rabbihī qālū ʾinnā b-mā ʾursil bihī muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Said the eminent ones who were arrogant among his people to those who were oppressed - to those who believed among them, "Do you actually know that Salih is sent from his Lord?" They said, "Indeed we, in that with which he was sent, are believers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ الَّذينَ استَكبَروا إِنّا بِالَّذي آمَنتُم بِهِ كافِرونَ
blank: qālalladhīn stakbarū ʾinnā b-lladhī ʾāmantum bihī kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: Said those who were arrogant, "Indeed we, in that which you have believed, are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: فَعَقَرُوا النّاقَةَ وَعَتَوا عَن أَمرِ رَبِّهِم وَقالوا يا صالِحُ ائتِنا بِما تَعِدُنا إِن كُنتَ مِنَ المُرسَلينَ
blank: f-ʿaqarū n-nāqat w-ʿataw ʿ ʾamr rabbihim w-qālū yā-ṣāliḥ ʾtinā b-mā taʿidunā ʾ kunt minal-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: So they hamstrung the she-camel and were insolent toward the command of their Lord and said, "O Salih, bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the messengers

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخَذَتهُمُ الرَّجفَةُ فَأَصبَحوا في دارِهِم جاثِمينَ
blank: f-ʾakhadhathum r-rajfat f-ʾaṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīn
english_saheeh_international: So the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home corpses fallen prone

arabic_uthmani: فَتَوَلّىٰ عَنهُم وَقالَ يا قَومِ لَقَد أَبلَغتُكُم رِسالَةَ رَبّي وَنَصَحتُ لَكُم وَلٰكِن لا تُحِبّونَ النّاصِحينَ
blank: f-tawallā ʿanhum w-qāl yā-qawm l-qad ʾablaghtukum risālat rabbī w-naṣaḥt lakum w-lāk lā tuḥibbūn n-nāṣiḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And he turned away from them and said, "O my people, I had certainly conveyed to you the message of my Lord and advised you, but you do not like advisors

arabic_uthmani: وَلوطًا إِذ قالَ لِقَومِهِ أَتَأتونَ الفاحِشَةَ ما سَبَقَكُم بِها مِن أَحَدٍ مِنَ العالَمينَ
blank: w-lūṭ ʾidh qāl l-qawmihī ʾ-taʾtūnal-fāḥishat mā sabaqakum bihā m ʾaḥad minal-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And We had sent Lot when he said to his people, "Do you commit such immorality as no one has preceded you with from among the worlds

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّكُم لَتَأتونَ الرِّجالَ شَهوَةً مِن دونِ النِّساءِ ۚ بَل أَنتُم قَومٌ مُسرِفونَ
blank: ʾinnakum l-taʾtūn r-rijāl shahwatam-m dūn n-nisāʾ bal ʾantum qawm musrifūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, you approach men with desire, instead of women. Rather, you are a transgressing people

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ جَوابَ قَومِهِ إِلّا أَن قالوا أَخرِجوهُم مِن قَريَتِكُم ۖ إِنَّهُم أُناسٌ يَتَطَهَّرونَ
blank: w-mā kān jawāb qawmihī ʾillā ʾ qālū ʾakhrijūhum m qaryatikum ʾinnahum ʾunās yataṭahharūn
english_saheeh_international: But the answer of his people was only that they said, "Evict them from your city! Indeed, they are men who keep themselves pure

arabic_uthmani: فَأَنجَيناهُ وَأَهلَهُ إِلَّا امرَأَتَهُ كانَت مِنَ الغابِرينَ
blank: f-ʾanjaynāh w-ʾahlahū ʾillā mraʾatahū kānat minal-ghābirīn
english_saheeh_international: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; she was of those who remained with the evildoers

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمطَرنا عَلَيهِم مَطَرًا ۖ فَانظُر كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُجرِمينَ
blank: w-ʾamṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭar f-nẓur kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: And We rained upon them a rain of stones. Then see how was the end of the criminals

arabic_uthmani: وَإِلىٰ مَديَنَ أَخاهُم شُعَيبًا ۗ قالَ يا قَومِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ ما لَكُم مِن إِلٰهٍ غَيرُهُ ۖ قَد جاءَتكُم بَيِّنَةٌ مِن رَبِّكُم ۖ فَأَوفُوا الكَيلَ وَالميزانَ وَلا تَبخَسُوا النّاسَ أَشياءَهُم وَلا تُفسِدوا فِي الأَرضِ بَعدَ إِصلاحِها ۚ ذٰلِكُم خَيرٌ لَكُم إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-ʾilā madyan ʾakhāhum shuʿayb qāl yā-qawm ʿbudū llāh mā lakum m ʾilāh ghayruhū qad jāʾatkum bayyinat m rabbikum f-ʾawfūl-kayl w-l-mīzān w-lā tabkhasū n-nās ʾashyāʾahum w-lā tufsidū fīl-ʾarḍ baʿd ʾiṣlāḥihā dhālikum khayr lakum ʾ kuntum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And to the people of Madyan We sent their brother Shu'ayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So fulfill the measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is better for you, if you should be believers

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَقعُدوا بِكُلِّ صِراطٍ توعِدونَ وَتَصُدّونَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ مَن آمَنَ بِهِ وَتَبغونَها عِوَجًا ۚ وَاذكُروا إِذ كُنتُم قَليلًا فَكَثَّرَكُم ۖ وَانظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُفسِدينَ
blank: w-lā taqʿudū b-kull ṣirāṭ tūʿidūn w-taṣuddūn ʿ sabīl llāh m ʾāman bihī w-tabghūnahā ʿiwaj w-dhkurū ʾidh kuntum qalīl f-kaththarakum w-nẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And do not sit on every path, threatening and averting from the way of Allah those who believe in Him, seeking to make it seem deviant. And remember when you were few and He increased you. And see how was the end of the corrupters

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كانَ طائِفَةٌ مِنكُم آمَنوا بِالَّذي أُرسِلتُ بِهِ وَطائِفَةٌ لَم يُؤمِنوا فَاصبِروا حَتّىٰ يَحكُمَ اللَّهُ بَينَنا ۚ وَهُوَ خَيرُ الحاكِمينَ
blank: w-ʾ kān ṭāʾifat minkum ʾāmanū b-lladhī ʾursilt bihī w-ṭāʾifat lam yuʾminū f-ṣbirū ḥattā yaḥkum llāh baynanā w-huw khayrul-ḥākimīn
english_saheeh_international: And if there should be a group among you who has believed in that with which I have been sent and a group that has not believed, then be patient until Allah judges between us. And He is the best of judges

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قالَ المَلَأُ الَّذينَ استَكبَروا مِن قَومِهِ لَنُخرِجَنَّكَ يا شُعَيبُ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مَعَكَ مِن قَريَتِنا أَو لَتَعودُنَّ في مِلَّتِنا ۚ قالَ أَوَلَو كُنّا كارِهينَ
blank: qālal-malaʾulladhīn stakbarū m qawmihī l-nukhrijannak yā-shuʿayb w-lladhīn ʾāmanū maʿak m qaryatinā ʾaw l-taʿūdunn fī millatinā qāl ʾ-w-law kunnā kārihīn
english_saheeh_international: Said the eminent ones who were arrogant among his people, "We will surely evict you, O Shu'ayb, and those who have believed with you from our city, or you must return to our religion." He said, "Even if we were unwilling

arabic_uthmani: قَدِ افتَرَينا عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا إِن عُدنا في مِلَّتِكُم بَعدَ إِذ نَجّانَا اللَّهُ مِنها ۚ وَما يَكونُ لَنا أَن نَعودَ فيها إِلّا أَن يَشاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّنا ۚ وَسِعَ رَبُّنا كُلَّ شَيءٍ عِلمًا ۚ عَلَى اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلنا ۚ رَبَّنَا افتَح بَينَنا وَبَينَ قَومِنا بِالحَقِّ وَأَنتَ خَيرُ الفاتِحينَ
blank: qad ftaraynā ʿalā llāh kadhib ʾ ʿudnā fī millatikum baʿd ʾidh najjānā llāh minhā w-mā yakūn lanā ʾ naʿūd fīhā ʾillā ʾ yashāʾ llāh rabbunā wasiʿ rabbunā kull shayʾ ʿilm ʿalā llāh tawakkalnā rabbanā ftaḥ baynanā w-bayn qawminā b-l-ḥaqq w-ʾant khayrul-fātiḥīn
english_saheeh_international: We would have invented against Allah a lie if we returned to your religion after Allah had saved us from it. And it is not for us to return to it except that Allah, our Lord, should will. Our Lord has encompassed all things in knowledge. Upon Allah we have relied. Our Lord, decide between us and our people in truth, and You are the best of those who give decision

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ المَلَأُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِن قَومِهِ لَئِنِ اتَّبَعتُم شُعَيبًا إِنَّكُم إِذًا لَخاسِرونَ
blank: w-qālal-malaʾulladhīn kafarū m qawmihī l-ʾin ttabaʿtum shuʿayb ʾinnakum ʾidh l-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: Said the eminent ones who disbelieved among his people, "If you should follow Shu'ayb, indeed, you would then be losers

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخَذَتهُمُ الرَّجفَةُ فَأَصبَحوا في دارِهِم جاثِمينَ
blank: f-ʾakhadhathum r-rajfat f-ʾaṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīn
english_saheeh_international: So the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home corpses fallen prone

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا شُعَيبًا كَأَن لَم يَغنَوا فيهَا ۚ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا شُعَيبًا كانوا هُمُ الخاسِرينَ
blank: alladhīn kadhdhabū shuʿayb k-ʾ lam yaghnaw fīhālladhīn kadhdhabū shuʿayb kānū humul-khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: Those who denied Shu'ayb - it was as though they had never resided there. Those who denied Shu'ayb - it was they who were the losers

arabic_uthmani: فَتَوَلّىٰ عَنهُم وَقالَ يا قَومِ لَقَد أَبلَغتُكُم رِسالاتِ رَبّي وَنَصَحتُ لَكُم ۖ فَكَيفَ آسىٰ عَلىٰ قَومٍ كافِرينَ
blank: f-tawallā ʿanhum w-qāl yā-qawm l-qad ʾablaghtukum risālāt rabbī w-naṣaḥt lakum f-kayf ʾāsā ʿalā qawm kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And he turned away from them and said, "O my people, I had certainly conveyed to you the messages of my Lord and advised you, so how could I grieve for a disbelieving people

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلنا في قَريَةٍ مِن نَبِيٍّ إِلّا أَخَذنا أَهلَها بِالبَأساءِ وَالضَّرّاءِ لَعَلَّهُم يَضَّرَّعونَ
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnā fī qaryat m nabiyy ʾillā ʾakhadhnā ʾahlahā b-l-baʾsāʾ w-ḍ-ḍarrāʾ laʿallahum yaḍḍarraʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And We sent to no city a prophet who was denied except that We seized its people with poverty and hardship that they might humble themselves to Allah

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ بَدَّلنا مَكانَ السَّيِّئَةِ الحَسَنَةَ حَتّىٰ عَفَوا وَقالوا قَد مَسَّ آباءَنَا الضَّرّاءُ وَالسَّرّاءُ فَأَخَذناهُم بَغتَةً وَهُم لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: thumm baddalnā makān s-sayyiʾatil-ḥasanat ḥattā ʿafaw w-qālū qad mass ʾābāʾanā ḍ-ḍarrāʾ w-s-sarrāʾ f-ʾakhadhnāhum baghtat w-hum lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: Then We exchanged in place of the bad condition, good, until they increased and prospered and said, "Our fathers also were touched with hardship and ease." So We seized them suddenly while they did not perceive

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو أَنَّ أَهلَ القُرىٰ آمَنوا وَاتَّقَوا لَفَتَحنا عَلَيهِم بَرَكاتٍ مِنَ السَّماءِ وَالأَرضِ وَلٰكِن كَذَّبوا فَأَخَذناهُم بِما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: w-law ʾann ʾahlal-qurā ʾāmanū w-ttaqaw l-fataḥnā ʿalayhim barakāt min s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ w-lāk kadhdhabū f-ʾakhadhnāhum b-mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: And if only the people of the cities had believed and feared Allah, We would have opened upon them blessings from the heaven and the earth; but they denied the messengers, so We seized them for what they were earning

arabic_uthmani: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهلُ القُرىٰ أَن يَأتِيَهُم بَأسُنا بَياتًا وَهُم نائِمونَ
blank: ʾ-f-ʾamin ʾahlul-qurā ʾ yaʾtiyahum baʾsunā bayāt w-hum nāʾimūn
english_saheeh_international: Then, did the people of the cities feel secure from Our punishment coming to them at night while they were asleep

arabic_uthmani: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهلُ القُرىٰ أَن يَأتِيَهُم بَأسُنا ضُحًى وَهُم يَلعَبونَ
blank: ʾaw ʾamin ʾahlul-qurā ʾ yaʾtiyahum baʾsunā ḍuḥ w-hum yalʿabūn
english_saheeh_international: Or did the people of the cities feel secure from Our punishment coming to them in the morning while they were at play

arabic_uthmani: أَفَأَمِنوا مَكرَ اللَّهِ ۚ فَلا يَأمَنُ مَكرَ اللَّهِ إِلَّا القَومُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: ʾ-f-ʾaminū makr llāh f-lā yaʾman makr llāh ʾillāl-qawmul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: Then did they feel secure from the plan of Allah? But no one feels secure from the plan of Allah except the losing people

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَهدِ لِلَّذينَ يَرِثونَ الأَرضَ مِن بَعدِ أَهلِها أَن لَو نَشاءُ أَصَبناهُم بِذُنوبِهِم ۚ وَنَطبَعُ عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم فَهُم لا يَسمَعونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yahd l-lladhīn yarithūnal-ʾarḍ m baʿd ʾahlihā ʾ law nashāʾ ʾaṣabnāhum b-dhunūbihim w-naṭbaʿ ʿalā qulūbihim f-hum lā yasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Has it not become clear to those who inherited the earth after its previous people that if We willed, We could afflict them for their sins? But We seal over their hearts so they do not hear

arabic_uthmani: تِلكَ القُرىٰ نَقُصُّ عَلَيكَ مِن أَنبائِها ۚ وَلَقَد جاءَتهُم رُسُلُهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ فَما كانوا لِيُؤمِنوا بِما كَذَّبوا مِن قَبلُ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يَطبَعُ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ قُلوبِ الكافِرينَ
blank: tilkal-qurā naquṣṣ ʿalayk m ʾanbāʾihā w-l-qad jāʾathum rusuluhum b-l-bayyināt f-mā kānū l-yuʾminū b-mā kadhdhabū m qabl k-dhālik yaṭbaʿ llāh ʿalā qulūbil-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Those cities - We relate to you, O Muhammad, some of their news. And certainly did their messengers come to them with clear proofs, but they were not to believe in that which they had denied before. Thus does Allah seal over the hearts of the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَما وَجَدنا لِأَكثَرِهِم مِن عَهدٍ ۖ وَإِن وَجَدنا أَكثَرَهُم لَفاسِقينَ
blank: w-mā wajadnā l-ʾaktharihim m ʿahd w-ʾ wajadnā ʾaktharahum l-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not find for most of them any covenant; but indeed, We found most of them defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ بَعَثنا مِن بَعدِهِم موسىٰ بِآياتِنا إِلىٰ فِرعَونَ وَمَلَئِهِ فَظَلَموا بِها ۖ فَانظُر كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُفسِدينَ
blank: thumm baʿathnā m baʿdihim mūsā b-ʾāyātinā ʾilā firʿawn w-malaʾihī f-ẓalamū bihā f-nẓur kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We sent after them Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were unjust toward them. So see how was the end of the corrupters

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ موسىٰ يا فِرعَونُ إِنّي رَسولٌ مِن رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: w-qāl mūsā yā-firʿawn ʾinnī rasūl m rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And Moses said, "O Pharaoh, I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: حَقيقٌ عَلىٰ أَن لا أَقولَ عَلَى اللَّهِ إِلَّا الحَقَّ ۚ قَد جِئتُكُم بِبَيِّنَةٍ مِن رَبِّكُم فَأَرسِل مَعِيَ بَني إِسرائيلَ
blank: ḥaqīq ʿalā ʾ lā ʾaqūl ʿalā llāh ʾillāl-ḥaqq qad jiʾtukum b-bayyinat m rabbikum f-ʾarsil maʿiy banī ʾisrāʾīl
english_saheeh_international: Who is obligated not to say about Allah except the truth. I have come to you with clear evidence from your Lord, so send with me the Children of Israel

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئتَ بِآيَةٍ فَأتِ بِها إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصّادِقينَ
blank: qāl ʾ kunt jiʾt b-ʾāyat f-ʾt bihā ʾ kunt min ṣ-ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Pharaoh said, "If you have come with a sign, then bring it forth, if you should be of the truthful

blank: f-ʾalqā ʿaṣāh f-ʾidhā hiy thuʿbān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So Moses threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent, manifest

english_saheeh_international: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white with radiance for the observers

blank: qālal-malaʾ m qawm firʿawn ʾinn hādhā l-sāḥir ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Said the eminent among the people of Pharaoh, "Indeed, this is a learned magician

blank: yurīd ʾ yukhrijakum m ʾarḍikum f-mādhā taʾmurūn
english_saheeh_international: Who wants to expel you from your land through magic, so what do you instruct

english_saheeh_international: They said, "Postpone the matter of him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers

blank: yaʾtūk b-kull sāḥir ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Who will bring you every learned magician

arabic_uthmani: وَجاءَ السَّحَرَةُ فِرعَونَ قالوا إِنَّ لَنا لَأَجرًا إِن كُنّا نَحنُ الغالِبينَ
blank: w-jāʾ s-saḥarat firʿawn qālū ʾinn lanā l-ʾajr ʾ kunnā naḥnul-ghālibīn
english_saheeh_international: And the magicians came to Pharaoh. They said, "Indeed for us is a reward if we are the predominant

arabic_uthmani: قالَ نَعَم وَإِنَّكُم لَمِنَ المُقَرَّبينَ
blank: qāl naʿam w-ʾinnakum l-minal-muqarrabīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Yes, and, moreover, you will be among those made near to me

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا موسىٰ إِمّا أَن تُلقِيَ وَإِمّا أَن نَكونَ نَحنُ المُلقينَ
blank: qālū yā-mūsā ʾimmā ʾ tulqiy w-ʾimmā ʾ nakūn naḥnul-mulqīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "O Moses, either you throw your staff, or we will be the ones to throw first

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَلقوا ۖ فَلَمّا أَلقَوا سَحَروا أَعيُنَ النّاسِ وَاستَرهَبوهُم وَجاءوا بِسِحرٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: qāl ʾalqū f-lammā ʾalqaw saḥarū ʾaʿyun n-nās w-starhabūhum w-jāʾū b-siḥr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Throw," and when they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people and struck terror into them, and they presented a great feat of magic

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَأَوحَينا إِلىٰ موسىٰ أَن أَلقِ عَصاكَ ۖ فَإِذا هِيَ تَلقَفُ ما يَأفِكونَ
blank: w-ʾawḥaynā ʾilā mūsā ʾ ʾalq ʿaṣāk f-ʾidhā hiy talqaf mā yaʾfikūn
english_saheeh_international: And We inspired to Moses, "Throw your staff," and at once it devoured what they were falsifying

blank: f-waqaʿal-ḥaqq w-baṭal mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: So the truth was established, and abolished was what they were doing

arabic_uthmani: فَغُلِبوا هُنالِكَ وَانقَلَبوا صاغِرينَ
blank: f-ghulibū hunālik w-nqalabū ṣāghirīn
english_saheeh_international: And Pharaoh and his people were overcome right there and became debased

arabic_uthmani: وَأُلقِيَ السَّحَرَةُ ساجِدينَ
blank: w-ʾulqiy s-saḥarat sājidīn
english_saheeh_international: And the magicians fell down in prostration to Allah

arabic_uthmani: قالوا آمَنّا بِرَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: qālū ʾāmannā b-rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: رَبِّ موسىٰ وَهارونَ
blank: rabb mūsā w-hārūn
english_saheeh_international: The Lord of Moses and Aaron

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فِرعَونُ آمَنتُم بِهِ قَبلَ أَن آذَنَ لَكُم ۖ إِنَّ هٰذا لَمَكرٌ مَكَرتُموهُ فِي المَدينَةِ لِتُخرِجوا مِنها أَهلَها ۖ فَسَوفَ تَعلَمونَ
blank: qāl firʿawn ʾāmantum bihī qabl ʾ ʾādhan lakum ʾinn hādhā l-makr makartumūh fīl-madīnat l-tukhrijū minhā ʾahlahā f-sawf taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Said Pharaoh, "You believed in him before I gave you permission. Indeed, this is a conspiracy which you conspired in the city to expel therefrom its people. But you are going to know

arabic_uthmani: لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيدِيَكُم وَأَرجُلَكُم مِن خِلافٍ ثُمَّ لَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: l-ʾuqaṭṭiʿann ʾaydiyakum w-ʾarjulakum m khilāf thumm l-ʾuṣallibannakum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides; then I will surely crucify you all

arabic_uthmani: قالوا إِنّا إِلىٰ رَبِّنا مُنقَلِبونَ
blank: qālū ʾinnā ʾilā rabbinā munqalibūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Indeed, to our Lord we will return

arabic_uthmani: وَما تَنقِمُ مِنّا إِلّا أَن آمَنّا بِآياتِ رَبِّنا لَمّا جاءَتنا ۚ رَبَّنا أَفرِغ عَلَينا صَبرًا وَتَوَفَّنا مُسلِمينَ
blank: w-mā tanqim minnā ʾillā ʾ ʾāmannā b-ʾāyāt rabbinā lammā jāʾatnā rabbanā ʾafrigh ʿalaynā ṣabr w-tawaffanā muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And you do not resent us except because we believed in the signs of our Lord when they came to us. Our Lord, pour upon us patience and let us die as Muslims in submission to You

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ المَلَأُ مِن قَومِ فِرعَونَ أَتَذَرُ موسىٰ وَقَومَهُ لِيُفسِدوا فِي الأَرضِ وَيَذَرَكَ وَآلِهَتَكَ ۚ قالَ سَنُقَتِّلُ أَبناءَهُم وَنَستَحيي نِساءَهُم وَإِنّا فَوقَهُم قاهِرونَ
blank: w-qālal-malaʾ m qawm firʿawn ʾ-tadhar mūsā w-qawmahū l-yufsidū fīl-ʾarḍ w-yadharak w-ʾālihatak qāl s-nuqattil ʾabnāʾahum w-nastaḥyī nisāʾahum w-ʾinnā fawqahum qāhirūn
english_saheeh_international: And the eminent among the people of Pharaoh said," Will you leave Moses and his people to cause corruption in the land and abandon you and your gods?" Pharaoh said, "We will kill their sons and keep their women alive; and indeed, we are subjugators over them

arabic_uthmani: قالَ موسىٰ لِقَومِهِ استَعينوا بِاللَّهِ وَاصبِروا ۖ إِنَّ الأَرضَ لِلَّهِ يورِثُها مَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ ۖ وَالعاقِبَةُ لِلمُتَّقينَ
blank: qāl mūsā l-qawmih staʿīnū b-llāh w-ṣbirū ʾinnal-ʾarḍ l-llāh yūrithuhā m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī w-l-ʿāqibat l-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Said Moses to his people, "Seek help through Allah and be patient. Indeed, the earth belongs to Allah. He causes to inherit it whom He wills of His servants. And the best outcome is for the righteous

arabic_uthmani: قالوا أوذينا مِن قَبلِ أَن تَأتِيَنا وَمِن بَعدِ ما جِئتَنا ۚ قالَ عَسىٰ رَبُّكُم أَن يُهلِكَ عَدُوَّكُم وَيَستَخلِفَكُم فِي الأَرضِ فَيَنظُرَ كَيفَ تَعمَلونَ
blank: qālū ʾūdhīnā m qabl ʾ taʾtiyanā w-m baʿd mā jiʾtanā qāl ʿasā rabbukum ʾ yuhlik ʿaduwwakum w-yastakhlifakum fīl-ʾarḍ f-yanẓur kayf taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We have been harmed before you came to us and after you have come to us." He said, "Perhaps your Lord will destroy your enemy and grant you succession in the land and see how you will do

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَخَذنا آلَ فِرعَونَ بِالسِّنينَ وَنَقصٍ مِنَ الثَّمَراتِ لَعَلَّهُم يَذَّكَّرونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾakhadhnā ʾāl firʿawn b-s-sinīn w-naqṣ min th-thamarāt laʿallahum yadhdhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly seized the people of Pharaoh with years of famine and a deficiency in fruits that perhaps they would be reminded

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا جاءَتهُمُ الحَسَنَةُ قالوا لَنا هٰذِهِ ۖ وَإِن تُصِبهُم سَيِّئَةٌ يَطَّيَّروا بِموسىٰ وَمَن مَعَهُ ۗ أَلا إِنَّما طائِرُهُم عِندَ اللَّهِ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-ʾidhā jāʾathumul-ḥasanat qālū lanā hādhihī w-ʾ tuṣibhum sayyiʾat yaṭṭayyarū b-mūsā w-mam-maʿahū ʾ-lā ʾinnamā ṭāʾiruhum ʿind llāh w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: But when good came to them, they said, "This is ours by right." And if a bad condition struck them, they saw an evil omen in Moses and those with him. Unquestionably, their fortune is with Allah, but most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا مَهما تَأتِنا بِهِ مِن آيَةٍ لِتَسحَرَنا بِها فَما نَحنُ لَكَ بِمُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-qālū mahmā taʾtinā bihī m ʾāyat l-tasḥaranā bihā f-mā naḥn lak b-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And they said, "No matter what sign you bring us with which to bewitch us, we will not be believers in you

arabic_uthmani: فَأَرسَلنا عَلَيهِمُ الطّوفانَ وَالجَرادَ وَالقُمَّلَ وَالضَّفادِعَ وَالدَّمَ آياتٍ مُفَصَّلاتٍ فَاستَكبَروا وَكانوا قَومًا مُجرِمينَ
blank: f-ʾarsalnā ʿalayhim ṭ-ṭūfān w-l-jarād w-l-qummal w-ḍ-ḍafādiʿ w-d-dam ʾāyāt mufaṣṣalāt f-stakbarū w-kānū qawmam-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: So We sent upon them the flood and locusts and lice and frogs and blood as distinct signs, but they were arrogant and were a criminal people

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا وَقَعَ عَلَيهِمُ الرِّجزُ قالوا يا موسَى ادعُ لَنا رَبَّكَ بِما عَهِدَ عِندَكَ ۖ لَئِن كَشَفتَ عَنَّا الرِّجزَ لَنُؤمِنَنَّ لَكَ وَلَنُرسِلَنَّ مَعَكَ بَني إِسرائيلَ
blank: w-lammā waqaʿ ʿalayhim r-rijz qālū yā-mūsā dʿ lanā rabbak b-mā ʿahid ʿindak l-ʾ kashaft ʿannā r-rijz l-nuʾminann lak w-l-nursilann maʿak banī ʾisrāʾīl
english_saheeh_international: And when the punishment descended upon them, they said, "O Moses, invoke for us your Lord by what He has promised you. If you can remove the punishment from us, we will surely believe you, and we will send with you the Children of Israel

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا كَشَفنا عَنهُمُ الرِّجزَ إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ هُم بالِغوهُ إِذا هُم يَنكُثونَ
blank: f-lammā kashafnā ʿanhum r-rijz ʾilā ʾajal hum bālighūh ʾidhā hum yankuthūn
english_saheeh_international: But when We removed the punishment from them until a term which they were to reach, then at once they broke their word

arabic_uthmani: فَانتَقَمنا مِنهُم فَأَغرَقناهُم فِي اليَمِّ بِأَنَّهُم كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا وَكانوا عَنها غافِلينَ
blank: f-ntaqamnā minhum f-ʾaghraqnāhum fīl-yamm b-ʾannahum kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā w-kānū ʿanhā ghāfilīn
english_saheeh_international: So We took retribution from them, and We drowned them in the sea because they denied Our signs and were heedless of them

arabic_uthmani: وَأَورَثنَا القَومَ الَّذينَ كانوا يُستَضعَفونَ مَشارِقَ الأَرضِ وَمَغارِبَهَا الَّتي بارَكنا فيها ۖ وَتَمَّت كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ الحُسنىٰ عَلىٰ بَني إِسرائيلَ بِما صَبَروا ۖ وَدَمَّرنا ما كانَ يَصنَعُ فِرعَونُ وَقَومُهُ وَما كانوا يَعرِشونَ
blank: w-ʾawrathnāl-qawmalladhīn kānū yustaḍʿafūn mashāriqal-ʾarḍ w-maghāribahā llatī bāraknā fīhā w-tammat kalimat rabbikal-ḥusnā ʿalā banī ʾisrāʾīl b-mā ṣabarū w-dammarnā mā kān yaṣnaʿ firʿawn w-qawmuhū w-mā kānū yaʿrishūn
english_saheeh_international: And We caused the people who had been oppressed to inherit the eastern regions of the land and the western ones, which We had blessed. And We destroyed all that Pharaoh and his people were producing and what they had been building

arabic_uthmani: وَجاوَزنا بِبَني إِسرائيلَ البَحرَ فَأَتَوا عَلىٰ قَومٍ يَعكُفونَ عَلىٰ أَصنامٍ لَهُم ۚ قالوا يا موسَى اجعَل لَنا إِلٰهًا كَما لَهُم آلِهَةٌ ۚ قالَ إِنَّكُم قَومٌ تَجهَلونَ
blank: w-jāwaznā b-banī ʾisrāʾīlal-baḥr f-ʾataw ʿalā qawm yaʿkufūn ʿalā ʾaṣnām lahum qālū yā-mūsā jʿal lanā ʾilāh k-mā lahum ʾālihat qāl ʾinnakum qawm tajhalūn
english_saheeh_international: And We took the Children of Israel across the sea; then they came upon a people intent in devotion to some idols of theirs. They said, "O Moses, make for us a god just as they have gods." He said, "Indeed, you are a people behaving ignorantly

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰؤُلاءِ مُتَبَّرٌ ما هُم فيهِ وَباطِلٌ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: ʾinn hāʾulāʾ mutabbar mā hum fīh w-bāṭil mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those worshippers - destroyed is that in which they are engaged, and worthless is whatever they were doing

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَغَيرَ اللَّهِ أَبغيكُم إِلٰهًا وَهُوَ فَضَّلَكُم عَلَى العالَمينَ
blank: qāl ʾ-ghayr llāh ʾabghīkum ʾilāh w-huw faḍḍalakum ʿalāl-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Is it other than Allah I should desire for you as a god while He has preferred you over the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ أَنجَيناكُم مِن آلِ فِرعَونَ يَسومونَكُم سوءَ العَذابِ ۖ يُقَتِّلونَ أَبناءَكُم وَيَستَحيونَ نِساءَكُم ۚ وَفي ذٰلِكُم بَلاءٌ مِن رَبِّكُم عَظيمٌ
blank: w-ʾidh ʾanjaynākum m ʾāl firʿawn yasūmūnakum sūʾal-ʿadhāb yuqattilūn ʾabnāʾakum w-yastaḥyūn nisāʾakum w-fī dhālikum balāʾ m rabbikum ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And recall, O Children of Israel, when We saved you from the people of Pharaoh, who were afflicting you with the worst torment - killing your sons and keeping your women alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَواعَدنا موسىٰ ثَلاثينَ لَيلَةً وَأَتمَمناها بِعَشرٍ فَتَمَّ ميقاتُ رَبِّهِ أَربَعينَ لَيلَةً ۚ وَقالَ موسىٰ لِأَخيهِ هارونَ اخلُفني في قَومي وَأَصلِح وَلا تَتَّبِع سَبيلَ المُفسِدينَ
blank: w-wāʿadnā mūsā thalāthīn laylat w-ʾatmamnāhā b-ʿashr f-tamm mīqāt rabbihī ʾarbaʿīn laylat w-qāl mūsā l-ʾakhīh hārūn khlufnī fī qawmī w-ʾaṣliḥ w-lā tattabiʿ sabīlal-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And We made an appointment with Moses for thirty nights and perfected them by the addition of ten; so the term of his Lord was completed as forty nights. And Moses said to his brother Aaron, "Take my place among my people, do right by them, and do not follow the way of the corrupters

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا جاءَ موسىٰ لِميقاتِنا وَكَلَّمَهُ رَبُّهُ قالَ رَبِّ أَرِني أَنظُر إِلَيكَ ۚ قالَ لَن تَراني وَلٰكِنِ انظُر إِلَى الجَبَلِ فَإِنِ استَقَرَّ مَكانَهُ فَسَوفَ تَراني ۚ فَلَمّا تَجَلّىٰ رَبُّهُ لِلجَبَلِ جَعَلَهُ دَكًّا وَخَرَّ موسىٰ صَعِقًا ۚ فَلَمّا أَفاقَ قالَ سُبحانَكَ تُبتُ إِلَيكَ وَأَنا أَوَّلُ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-lammā jāʾ mūsā l-mīqātinā w-kallamahū rabbuhū qāl rabb ʾarinī ʾanẓur ʾilayk qāl l tarānī w-lākin nẓur ʾilāl-jabal f-ʾin staqarr makānahū f-sawf tarānī f-lammā tajallā rabbuhū l-l-jabal jaʿalahū dakk w-kharr mūsā ṣaʿiq f-lammā ʾafāq qāl subḥānak tubt ʾilayk w-ʾan ʾawwalul-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And when Moses arrived at Our appointed time and his Lord spoke to him, he said, "My Lord, show me Yourself that I may look at You." Allah said, "You will not see Me, but look at the mountain; if it should remain in place, then you will see Me." But when his Lord appeared to the mountain, He rendered it level, and Moses fell unconscious. And when he awoke, he said, "Exalted are You! I have repented to You, and I am the first of the believers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا موسىٰ إِنِّي اصطَفَيتُكَ عَلَى النّاسِ بِرِسالاتي وَبِكَلامي فَخُذ ما آتَيتُكَ وَكُن مِنَ الشّاكِرينَ
blank: qāl yā-mūsā ʾinnī ṣṭafaytuk ʿalā n-nās b-risālātī w-b-kalāmī f-khudh mā ʾātaytuk w-k min sh-shākirīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "O Moses, I have chosen you over the people with My messages and My words to you. So take what I have given you and be among the grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَكَتَبنا لَهُ فِي الأَلواحِ مِن كُلِّ شَيءٍ مَوعِظَةً وَتَفصيلًا لِكُلِّ شَيءٍ فَخُذها بِقُوَّةٍ وَأمُر قَومَكَ يَأخُذوا بِأَحسَنِها ۚ سَأُريكُم دارَ الفاسِقينَ
blank: w-katabnā lahū fīl-ʾalwāḥ m kull shayʾ mawʿiẓat w-tafṣīl l-kull shayʾ f-khudhhā b-quwwat w-ʾmur qawmak yaʾkhudhū b-ʾaḥsanihā s-ʾurīkum dāral-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And We wrote for him on the tablets something of all things - instruction and explanation for all things, saying, "Take them with determination and order your people to take the best of it. I will show you the home of the defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: سَأَصرِفُ عَن آياتِيَ الَّذينَ يَتَكَبَّرونَ فِي الأَرضِ بِغَيرِ الحَقِّ وَإِن يَرَوا كُلَّ آيَةٍ لا يُؤمِنوا بِها وَإِن يَرَوا سَبيلَ الرُّشدِ لا يَتَّخِذوهُ سَبيلًا وَإِن يَرَوا سَبيلَ الغَيِّ يَتَّخِذوهُ سَبيلًا ۚ ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا وَكانوا عَنها غافِلينَ
blank: s-ʾaṣrif ʿ ʾāyātiyalladhīn yatakabbarūn fīl-ʾarḍ b-ghayril-ḥaqq w-ʾ yaraw kull ʾāyat lā yuʾminū bihā w-ʾ yaraw sabīl r-rushd lā yattakhidhūh sabīl w-ʾ yaraw sabīlal-ghayy yattakhidhūh sabīl dhālik b-ʾannahum kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā w-kānū ʿanhā ghāfilīn
english_saheeh_international: I will turn away from My signs those who are arrogant upon the earth without right; and if they should see every sign, they will not believe in it. And if they see the way of consciousness, they will not adopt it as a way; but if they see the way of error, they will adopt it as a way. That is because they have denied Our signs and they were heedless of them

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا وَلِقاءِ الآخِرَةِ حَبِطَت أَعمالُهُم ۚ هَل يُجزَونَ إِلّا ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: w-lladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā w-liqāʾil-ʾākhirat ḥabiṭat ʾaʿmāluhum hal yujzawn ʾillā mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who denied Our signs and the meeting of the Hereafter - their deeds have become worthless. Are they recompensed except for what they used to do
