arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّخَذَ قَومُ موسىٰ مِن بَعدِهِ مِن حُلِيِّهِم عِجلًا جَسَدًا لَهُ خُوارٌ ۚ أَلَم يَرَوا أَنَّهُ لا يُكَلِّمُهُم وَلا يَهديهِم سَبيلًا ۘ اتَّخَذوهُ وَكانوا ظالِمينَ
blank: w-ttakhadh qawm mūsā m baʿdihī m ḥuliyyihim ʿijl jasad lahū khuwār ʾ-lam yaraw ʾannahū lā yukallimuhum w-lā yahdīhim sabīl- ittakhadhūh w-kānū ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And the people of Moses made, after his departure, from their ornaments a calf - an image having a lowing sound. Did they not see that it could neither speak to them nor guide them to a way? They took it for worship, and they were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا سُقِطَ في أَيديهِم وَرَأَوا أَنَّهُم قَد ضَلّوا قالوا لَئِن لَم يَرحَمنا رَبُّنا وَيَغفِر لَنا لَنَكونَنَّ مِنَ الخاسِرينَ
blank: w-lammā suqiṭ fī ʾaydīhim w-raʾaw ʾannahum qad ḍallū qālū laʾil-lam yarḥamnā rabbunā w-yaghfir lanā l-nakūnann minal-khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: And when regret overcame them and they saw that they had gone astray, they said, "If our Lord does not have mercy upon us and forgive us, we will surely be among the losers

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا رَجَعَ موسىٰ إِلىٰ قَومِهِ غَضبانَ أَسِفًا قالَ بِئسَما خَلَفتُموني مِن بَعدي ۖ أَعَجِلتُم أَمرَ رَبِّكُم ۖ وَأَلقَى الأَلواحَ وَأَخَذَ بِرَأسِ أَخيهِ يَجُرُّهُ إِلَيهِ ۚ قالَ ابنَ أُمَّ إِنَّ القَومَ استَضعَفوني وَكادوا يَقتُلونَني فَلا تُشمِت بِيَ الأَعداءَ وَلا تَجعَلني مَعَ القَومِ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-lammā rajaʿ mūsā ʾilā qawmihī ghaḍbān ʾasif qāl biʾsamā khalaftumūnī m baʿdī ʾ-ʿajiltum ʾamr rabbikum w-ʾalqāl-ʾalwāḥ w-ʾakhadh b-raʾs ʾakhīh yajurruhū ʾilayh qāl bn ʾumm ʾinnal-qawm staḍʿafūnī w-kādū yaqtulūnanī f-lā tushmit biyal-ʾaʿdāʾ w-lā tajʿalnī maʿal-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And when Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved, he said, "How wretched is that by which you have replaced me after my departure. Were you impatient over the matter of your Lord?" And he threw down the tablets and seized his brother by the hair of his head, pulling him toward him. Aaron said, "O son of my mother, indeed the people oppressed me and were about to kill me, so let not the enemies rejoice over me and do not place me among the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ اغفِر لي وَلِأَخي وَأَدخِلنا في رَحمَتِكَ ۖ وَأَنتَ أَرحَمُ الرّاحِمينَ
blank: qāl rabb ghfir lī w-l-ʾakhī w-ʾadkhilnā fī raḥmatik w-ʾant ʾarḥam r-rāḥimīn
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "My Lord, forgive me and my brother and admit us into Your mercy, for You are the most merciful of the merciful

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ اتَّخَذُوا العِجلَ سَيَنالُهُم غَضَبٌ مِن رَبِّهِم وَذِلَّةٌ فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ۚ وَكَذٰلِكَ نَجزِي المُفتَرينَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ttakhadhūl-ʿijl s-yanāluhum ghaḍab m rabbihim w-dhillat fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-k-dhālik najzīl-muftarīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who took the calf for worship will obtain anger from their Lord and humiliation in the life of this world, and thus do We recompense the inventors of falsehood

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ عَمِلُوا السَّيِّئَاتِ ثُمَّ تابوا مِن بَعدِها وَآمَنوا إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِن بَعدِها لَغَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-lladhīn ʿamilū s-sayyiʾāt thumm tābū m baʿdihā w-ʾāmanū ʾinn rabbak m baʿdihā l-ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: But those who committed misdeeds and then repented after them and believed - indeed your Lord, thereafter, is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا سَكَتَ عَن موسَى الغَضَبُ أَخَذَ الأَلواحَ ۖ وَفي نُسخَتِها هُدًى وَرَحمَةٌ لِلَّذينَ هُم لِرَبِّهِم يَرهَبونَ
blank: w-lammā sakat ʿam-mūsāl-ghaḍab ʾakhadhal-ʾalwāḥ w-fī nuskhatihā hud w-raḥmat l-lladhīn hum l-rabbihim yarhabūn
english_saheeh_international: And when the anger subsided in Moses, he took up the tablets; and in their inscription was guidance and mercy for those who are fearful of their Lord

arabic_uthmani: وَاختارَ موسىٰ قَومَهُ سَبعينَ رَجُلًا لِميقاتِنا ۖ فَلَمّا أَخَذَتهُمُ الرَّجفَةُ قالَ رَبِّ لَو شِئتَ أَهلَكتَهُم مِن قَبلُ وَإِيّايَ ۖ أَتُهلِكُنا بِما فَعَلَ السُّفَهاءُ مِنّا ۖ إِن هِيَ إِلّا فِتنَتُكَ تُضِلُّ بِها مَن تَشاءُ وَتَهدي مَن تَشاءُ ۖ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنا فَاغفِر لَنا وَارحَمنا ۖ وَأَنتَ خَيرُ الغافِرينَ
blank: w-khtār mūsā qawmahū sabʿīn rajul l-mīqātinā f-lammā ʾakhadhathum r-rajfat qāl rabb law shiʾt ʾahlaktahum m qabl w-ʾiyyāy ʾ-tuhlikunā b-mā faʿal s-sufahāʾ minnā ʾ hiy ʾillā fitnatuk tuḍill bihā m tashāʾ w-tahdī m tashāʾ ʾant waliyyunā f-ghfir lanā w-rḥamnā w-ʾant khayrul-ghāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And Moses chose from his people seventy men for Our appointment. And when the earthquake seized them, he said, "My Lord, if You had willed, You could have destroyed them before and me as well. Would You destroy us for what the foolish among us have done? This is not but Your trial by which You send astray whom You will and guide whom You will. You are our Protector, so forgive us and have mercy upon us; and You are the best of forgivers

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَاكتُب لَنا في هٰذِهِ الدُّنيا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ إِنّا هُدنا إِلَيكَ ۚ قالَ عَذابي أُصيبُ بِهِ مَن أَشاءُ ۖ وَرَحمَتي وَسِعَت كُلَّ شَيءٍ ۚ فَسَأَكتُبُها لِلَّذينَ يَتَّقونَ وَيُؤتونَ الزَّكاةَ وَالَّذينَ هُم بِآياتِنا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: w-ktub lanā fī hādhih d-dunyā ḥasanat w-fīl-ʾākhirat ʾinnā hudnā ʾilayk qāl ʿadhābī ʾuṣīb bihī m ʾashāʾ w-raḥmatī wasiʿat kull shayʾ f-s-ʾaktubuhā l-lladhīn yattaqūn w-yuʾtūn z-zakāt w-lladhīn hum b-ʾāyātinā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And decree for us in this world that which is good and also in the Hereafter; indeed, we have turned back to You." Allah said, "My punishment - I afflict with it whom I will, but My mercy encompasses all things." So I will decree it especially for those who fear Me and give zakah and those who believe in Our verses

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَتَّبِعونَ الرَّسولَ النَّبِيَّ الأُمِّيَّ الَّذي يَجِدونَهُ مَكتوبًا عِندَهُم فِي التَّوراةِ وَالإِنجيلِ يَأمُرُهُم بِالمَعروفِ وَيَنهاهُم عَنِ المُنكَرِ وَيُحِلُّ لَهُمُ الطَّيِّباتِ وَيُحَرِّمُ عَلَيهِمُ الخَبائِثَ وَيَضَعُ عَنهُم إِصرَهُم وَالأَغلالَ الَّتي كانَت عَلَيهِم ۚ فَالَّذينَ آمَنوا بِهِ وَعَزَّروهُ وَنَصَروهُ وَاتَّبَعُوا النّورَ الَّذي أُنزِلَ مَعَهُ ۙ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: alladhīn yattabiʿūn r-rasūl n-nabiyyal-ʾummiyyalladhī yajidūnahū maktūb ʿindahum fī t-tawrāt w-l-ʾinjīl yaʾmuruhum b-l-maʿrūf w-yanhāhum ʿanil-munkar w-yuḥill lahum ṭ-ṭayyibāt w-yuḥarrim ʿalayhimul-khabāʾith w-yaḍaʿ ʿanhum ʾiṣrahum w-l-ʾaghlāl llatī kānat ʿalayhim f-lladhīn ʾāmanū bihī w-ʿazzarūh w-naṣarūh w-ttabaʿū n-nūralladhī ʾunzil maʿahū ʾulāʾik humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who follow the Messenger, the unlettered prophet, whom they find written in what they have of the Torah and the Gospel, who enjoins upon them what is right and forbids them what is wrong and makes lawful for them the good things and prohibits for them the evil and relieves them of their burden and the shackles which were upon them. So they who have believed in him, honored him, supported him and followed the light which was sent down with him - it is those who will be the successful

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ إِنّي رَسولُ اللَّهِ إِلَيكُم جَميعًا الَّذي لَهُ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ يُحيي وَيُميتُ ۖ فَآمِنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ النَّبِيِّ الأُمِّيِّ الَّذي يُؤمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَكَلِماتِهِ وَاتَّبِعوهُ لَعَلَّكُم تَهتَدونَ
blank: qul yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ʾinnī rasūl llāh ʾilaykum jamīʿ-illadhī lahū mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw yuḥyī w-yumīt f-ʾāminū b-llāh w-rasūlih n-nabiyyil-ʾummiyyilladhī yuʾmin b-llāh w-kalimātihī w-ttabiʿūh laʿallakum tahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "O mankind, indeed I am the Messenger of Allah to you all, from Him to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death." So believe in Allah and His Messenger, the unlettered prophet, who believes in Allah and His words, and follow him that you may be guided

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن قَومِ موسىٰ أُمَّةٌ يَهدونَ بِالحَقِّ وَبِهِ يَعدِلونَ
blank: w-m qawm mūsā ʾummat yahdūn b-l-ḥaqq w-bihī yaʿdilūn
english_saheeh_international: And among the people of Moses is a community which guides by truth and by it establishes justice

arabic_uthmani: وَقَطَّعناهُمُ اثنَتَي عَشرَةَ أَسباطًا أُمَمًا ۚ وَأَوحَينا إِلىٰ موسىٰ إِذِ استَسقاهُ قَومُهُ أَنِ اضرِب بِعَصاكَ الحَجَرَ ۖ فَانبَجَسَت مِنهُ اثنَتا عَشرَةَ عَينًا ۖ قَد عَلِمَ كُلُّ أُناسٍ مَشرَبَهُم ۚ وَظَلَّلنا عَلَيهِمُ الغَمامَ وَأَنزَلنا عَلَيهِمُ المَنَّ وَالسَّلوىٰ ۖ كُلوا مِن طَيِّباتِ ما رَزَقناكُم ۚ وَما ظَلَمونا وَلٰكِن كانوا أَنفُسَهُم يَظلِمونَ
blank: w-qaṭṭaʿnāhum thnatay ʿashrat ʾasbāṭ ʾumam w-ʾawḥaynā ʾilā mūsā ʾidh stasqāh qawmuhū ʾan ḍrib b-ʿaṣākal-ḥajar f-nbajasat minh thnatā ʿashrat ʿayn qad ʿalim kull ʾunās mashrabahum w-ẓallalnā ʿalayhimul-ghamām w-ʾanzalnā ʿalayhimul-mann w-s-salwā kulū m ṭayyibātimā razaqnākum w-mā ẓalamūnā w-lāk kānū ʾanfusahum yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: And We divided them into twelve descendant tribes as distinct nations. And We inspired to Moses when his people implored him for water, "Strike with your staff the stone," and there gushed forth from it twelve springs. Every people knew its watering place. And We shaded them with clouds and sent down upon them manna and quails, saying, "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you." And they wronged Us not, but they were only wronging themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قيلَ لَهُمُ اسكُنوا هٰذِهِ القَريَةَ وَكُلوا مِنها حَيثُ شِئتُم وَقولوا حِطَّةٌ وَادخُلُوا البابَ سُجَّدًا نَغفِر لَكُم خَطيئَاتِكُم ۚ سَنَزيدُ المُحسِنينَ
blank: w-ʾidh qīl lahum skunū hādhihil-qaryat w-kulū minhā ḥayth shiʾtum w-qūlū ḥiṭṭat w-dkhulūl-bāb sujjad naghfir lakum khaṭīʾātikum s-nazīdul-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when it was said to them, "Dwell in this city and eat from it wherever you will and say, 'Relieve us of our burdens,' and enter the gate bowing humbly; We will then forgive you your sins. We will increase the doers of good in goodness and reward

arabic_uthmani: فَبَدَّلَ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا مِنهُم قَولًا غَيرَ الَّذي قيلَ لَهُم فَأَرسَلنا عَلَيهِم رِجزًا مِنَ السَّماءِ بِما كانوا يَظلِمونَ
blank: f-baddalalladhīn ẓalamū minhum qawl ghayralladhī qīl lahum f-ʾarsalnā ʿalayhim rijzam-min s-samāʾ b-mā kānū yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: But those who wronged among them changed the words to a statement other than that which had been said to them. So We sent upon them a punishment from the sky for the wrong that they were doing

arabic_uthmani: وَاسأَلهُم عَنِ القَريَةِ الَّتي كانَت حاضِرَةَ البَحرِ إِذ يَعدونَ فِي السَّبتِ إِذ تَأتيهِم حيتانُهُم يَومَ سَبتِهِم شُرَّعًا وَيَومَ لا يَسبِتونَ ۙ لا تَأتيهِم ۚ كَذٰلِكَ نَبلوهُم بِما كانوا يَفسُقونَ
blank: w-sʾalhum ʿanil-qaryat llatī kānat ḥāḍiratal-baḥr ʾidh yaʿdūn fī s-sabt ʾidh taʾtīhim ḥītānuhum yawm sabtihim shurraʿ w-yawm lā yasbitūn lā taʾtīhim k-dhālik nablūhum b-mā kānū yafsuqūn
english_saheeh_international: And ask them about the town that was by the sea - when they transgressed in the matter of the sabbath - when their fish came to them openly on their sabbath day, and the day they had no sabbath they did not come to them. Thus did We give them trial because they were defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَت أُمَّةٌ مِنهُم لِمَ تَعِظونَ قَومًا ۙ اللَّهُ مُهلِكُهُم أَو مُعَذِّبُهُم عَذابًا شَديدًا ۖ قالوا مَعذِرَةً إِلىٰ رَبِّكُم وَلَعَلَّهُم يَتَّقونَ
blank: w-ʾidh qālat ʾummat minhum l-m taʿiẓūn qawm- llāh muhlikuhum ʾaw muʿadhdhibuhum ʿadhāb shadīd qālū maʿdhirat ʾilā rabbikum w-laʿallahum yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And when a community among them said, "Why do you advise or warn a people whom Allah is about to destroy or to punish with a severe punishment?" they the advisors said, "To be absolved before your Lord and perhaps they may fear Him

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا نَسوا ما ذُكِّروا بِهِ أَنجَينَا الَّذينَ يَنهَونَ عَنِ السّوءِ وَأَخَذنَا الَّذينَ ظَلَموا بِعَذابٍ بَئيسٍ بِما كانوا يَفسُقونَ
blank: f-lammā nasū mā dhukkirū bihī ʾanjaynālladhīn yanhawn ʿan s-sūʾ w-ʾakhadhnālladhīn ẓalamū b-ʿadhāb baʾīs b-mā kānū yafsuqūn
english_saheeh_international: And when they forgot that by which they had been reminded, We saved those who had forbidden evil and seized those who wronged, with a wretched punishment, because they were defiantly disobeying

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا عَتَوا عَن ما نُهوا عَنهُ قُلنا لَهُم كونوا قِرَدَةً خاسِئينَ
blank: f-lammā ʿataw ʿam-mā nuhū ʿanh qulnā lahum kūnū qiradat khāsiʾīn
english_saheeh_international: So when they were insolent about that which they had been forbidden, We said to them, "Be apes, despised

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكَ لَيَبعَثَنَّ عَلَيهِم إِلىٰ يَومِ القِيامَةِ مَن يَسومُهُم سوءَ العَذابِ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَسَريعُ العِقابِ ۖ وَإِنَّهُ لَغَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-ʾidh taʾadhdhan rabbuk l-yabʿathann ʿalayhim ʾilā yawmil-qiyāmat m yasūmuhum sūʾal-ʿadhāb ʾinn rabbak l-sarīʿul-ʿiqāb w-ʾinnahū l-ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And mention when your Lord declared that He would surely continue to send upon them until the Day of Resurrection those who would afflict them with the worst torment. Indeed, your Lord is swift in penalty; but indeed, He is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَقَطَّعناهُم فِي الأَرضِ أُمَمًا ۖ مِنهُمُ الصّالِحونَ وَمِنهُم دونَ ذٰلِكَ ۖ وَبَلَوناهُم بِالحَسَناتِ وَالسَّيِّئَاتِ لَعَلَّهُم يَرجِعونَ
blank: w-qaṭṭaʿnāhum fīl-ʾarḍ ʾumamam-minhum ṣ-ṣāliḥūn w-minhum dūn dhālik w-balawnāhum b-l-ḥasanāt w-s-sayyiʾāt laʿallahum yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And We divided them throughout the earth into nations. Of them some were righteous, and of them some were otherwise. And We tested them with good times and bad that perhaps they would return to obedience

arabic_uthmani: فَخَلَفَ مِن بَعدِهِم خَلفٌ وَرِثُوا الكِتابَ يَأخُذونَ عَرَضَ هٰذَا الأَدنىٰ وَيَقولونَ سَيُغفَرُ لَنا وَإِن يَأتِهِم عَرَضٌ مِثلُهُ يَأخُذوهُ ۚ أَلَم يُؤخَذ عَلَيهِم ميثاقُ الكِتابِ أَن لا يَقولوا عَلَى اللَّهِ إِلَّا الحَقَّ وَدَرَسوا ما فيهِ ۗ وَالدّارُ الآخِرَةُ خَيرٌ لِلَّذينَ يَتَّقونَ ۗ أَفَلا تَعقِلونَ
blank: f-khalaf m baʿdihim khalf warithūl-kitāb yaʾkhudhūn ʿaraḍ hādhāl-ʾadnā w-yaqūlūn s-yughfar lanā w-ʾ yaʾtihim ʿaraḍ mithluhū yaʾkhudhūh ʾ-lam yuʾkhadh ʿalayhim mīthāqul-kitāb ʾ lā yaqūlū ʿalā llāh ʾillāl-ḥaqq w-darasū mā fīh w-d-dārul-ʾākhirat khayr l-lladhīn yattaqūn ʾ-f-lā taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And there followed them successors who inherited the Scripture while taking the commodities of this lower life and saying, "It will be forgiven for us." And if an offer like it comes to them, they will again take it. Was not the covenant of the Scripture taken from them that they would not say about Allah except the truth, and they studied what was in it? And the home of the Hereafter is better for those who fear Allah, so will you not use reason

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يُمَسِّكونَ بِالكِتابِ وَأَقامُوا الصَّلاةَ إِنّا لا نُضيعُ أَجرَ المُصلِحينَ
blank: w-lladhīn yumassikūn b-l-kitāb w-ʾaqāmū ṣ-ṣalāt ʾinnā lā nuḍīʿ ʾajral-muṣliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: But those who hold fast to the Book and establish prayer - indeed, We will not allow to be lost the reward of the reformers

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِذ نَتَقنَا الجَبَلَ فَوقَهُم كَأَنَّهُ ظُلَّةٌ وَظَنّوا أَنَّهُ واقِعٌ بِهِم خُذوا ما آتَيناكُم بِقُوَّةٍ وَاذكُروا ما فيهِ لَعَلَّكُم تَتَّقونَ
blank: w-ʾidh nataqnāl-jabal fawqahum k-ʾannahū ẓullat w-ẓannū ʾannahū wāqiʿ bihim khudhū mā ʾātaynākum b-quwwat w-dhkurū mā fīh laʿallakum tattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention when We raised the mountain above them as if it was a dark cloud and they were certain that it would fall upon them, and Allah said, "Take what We have given you with determination and remember what is in it that you might fear Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِن بَني آدَمَ مِن ظُهورِهِم ذُرِّيَّتَهُم وَأَشهَدَهُم عَلىٰ أَنفُسِهِم أَلَستُ بِرَبِّكُم ۖ قالوا بَلىٰ ۛ شَهِدنا ۛ أَن تَقولوا يَومَ القِيامَةِ إِنّا كُنّا عَن هٰذا غافِلينَ
blank: w-ʾidh ʾakhadh rabbuk m banī ʾādam m ẓuhūrihim dhurriyyatahum w-ʾashhadahum ʿalā ʾanfusihim ʾ-last b-rabbikum qālū balā shahidnā ʾ taqūlū yawmal-qiyāmat ʾinnā kunnā ʿ hādhā ghāfilīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention when your Lord took from the children of Adam - from their loins - their descendants and made them testify of themselves, saying to them, "Am I not your Lord?" They said, "Yes, we have testified." This - lest you should say on the day of Resurrection, "Indeed, we were of this unaware

arabic_uthmani: أَو تَقولوا إِنَّما أَشرَكَ آباؤُنا مِن قَبلُ وَكُنّا ذُرِّيَّةً مِن بَعدِهِم ۖ أَفَتُهلِكُنا بِما فَعَلَ المُبطِلونَ
blank: ʾaw taqūlū ʾinnamā ʾashrak ʾābāʾunā m qabl w-kunnā dhurriyyatam-m baʿdihim ʾ-f-tuhlikunā b-mā faʿalal-mubṭilūn
english_saheeh_international: Or lest you say, "It was only that our fathers associated others in worship with Allah before, and we were but descendants after them. Then would You destroy us for what the falsifiers have done

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ الآياتِ وَلَعَلَّهُم يَرجِعونَ
blank: w-k-dhālik nufaṣṣilul-ʾāyāt w-laʿallahum yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And thus do We explain in detail the verses, and perhaps they will return

arabic_uthmani: وَاتلُ عَلَيهِم نَبَأَ الَّذي آتَيناهُ آياتِنا فَانسَلَخَ مِنها فَأَتبَعَهُ الشَّيطانُ فَكانَ مِنَ الغاوينَ
blank: w-tl ʿalayhim nabaʾalladhī ʾātaynāh ʾāyātinā f-nsalakh minhā f-ʾatbaʿah sh-shayṭān f-kān minal-ghāwīn
english_saheeh_international: And recite to them, O Muhammad, the news of him to whom we gave knowledge of Our signs, but he detached himself from them; so Satan pursued him, and he became of the deviators

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو شِئنا لَرَفَعناهُ بِها وَلٰكِنَّهُ أَخلَدَ إِلَى الأَرضِ وَاتَّبَعَ هَواهُ ۚ فَمَثَلُهُ كَمَثَلِ الكَلبِ إِن تَحمِل عَلَيهِ يَلهَث أَو تَترُكهُ يَلهَث ۚ ذٰلِكَ مَثَلُ القَومِ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا ۚ فَاقصُصِ القَصَصَ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: w-law shiʾnā l-rafaʿnāh bihā w-lākinnahū ʾakhlad ʾilāl-ʾarḍ w-ttabaʿ hawāh f-mathaluhū k-mathalil-kalb ʾ taḥmil ʿalayh yalhath ʾaw tatrukh yalhath dhālik mathalul-qawmilladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā f-qṣuṣil-qaṣaṣ laʿallahum yatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And if We had willed, we could have elevated him thereby, but he adhered instead to the earth and followed his own desire. So his example is like that of the dog: if you chase him, he pants, or if you leave him, he still pants. That is the example of the people who denied Our signs. So relate the stories that perhaps they will give thought

arabic_uthmani: ساءَ مَثَلًا القَومُ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا وَأَنفُسَهُم كانوا يَظلِمونَ
blank: sāʾ mathal-il-qawmulladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā w-ʾanfusahum kānū yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: How evil an example is that of the people who denied Our signs and used to wrong themselves

arabic_uthmani: مَن يَهدِ اللَّهُ فَهُوَ المُهتَدي ۖ وَمَن يُضلِل فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: m yahd llāh f-huwal-muhtadī w-m yuḍlil f-ʾulāʾik humul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever Allah guides - he is the rightly guided; and whoever He sends astray - it is those who are the losers

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد ذَرَأنا لِجَهَنَّمَ كَثيرًا مِنَ الجِنِّ وَالإِنسِ ۖ لَهُم قُلوبٌ لا يَفقَهونَ بِها وَلَهُم أَعيُنٌ لا يُبصِرونَ بِها وَلَهُم آذانٌ لا يَسمَعونَ بِها ۚ أُولٰئِكَ كَالأَنعامِ بَل هُم أَضَلُّ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الغافِلونَ
blank: w-l-qad dharaʾnā l-jahannam kathīram-minal-jinn w-l-ʾins lahum qulūb lā yafqahūn bihā w-lahum ʾaʿyun lā yubṣirūn bihā w-lahum ʾādhān lā yasmaʿūn bihā ʾulāʾik k-l-ʾanʿām bal hum ʾaḍall ʾulāʾik humul-ghāfilūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly created for Hell many of the jinn and mankind. They have hearts with which they do not understand, they have eyes with which they do not see, and they have ears with which they do not hear. Those are like livestock; rather, they are more astray. It is they who are the heedless

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ الأَسماءُ الحُسنىٰ فَادعوهُ بِها ۖ وَذَرُوا الَّذينَ يُلحِدونَ في أَسمائِهِ ۚ سَيُجزَونَ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: w-l-llāhil-ʾasmāʾul-ḥusnā f-dʿūh bihā w-dharūlladhīn yulḥidūn fī ʾasmāʾihī s-yujzawn mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And to Allah belong the best names, so invoke Him by them. And leave the company of those who practice deviation concerning His names. They will be recompensed for what they have been doing

arabic_uthmani: وَمِمَّن خَلَقنا أُمَّةٌ يَهدونَ بِالحَقِّ وَبِهِ يَعدِلونَ
blank: w-mimm khalaqnā ʾummat yahdūn b-l-ḥaqq w-bihī yaʿdilūn
english_saheeh_international: And among those We created is a community which guides by truth and thereby establishes justice

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا سَنَستَدرِجُهُم مِن حَيثُ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-lladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā s-nastadrijuhum m hayth lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: But those who deny Our signs - We will progressively lead them to destruction from where they do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَأُملي لَهُم ۚ إِنَّ كَيدي مَتينٌ
blank: w-ʾumlī lahum ʾinn kaydī matīn
english_saheeh_international: And I will give them time. Indeed, my plan is firm

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَتَفَكَّروا ۗ ما بِصاحِبِهِم مِن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِن هُوَ إِلّا نَذيرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yatafakkarū mā b-ṣāḥibihim m jinnat ʾ huw ʾillā nadhīr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Then do they not give thought? There is in their companion Muhammad no madness. He is not but a clear warner

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَنظُروا في مَلَكوتِ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَما خَلَقَ اللَّهُ مِن شَيءٍ وَأَن عَسىٰ أَن يَكونَ قَدِ اقتَرَبَ أَجَلُهُم ۖ فَبِأَيِّ حَديثٍ بَعدَهُ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yanẓurū fī malakūt s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā khalaq llāh m shayʾ w-ʾ ʿasā ʾ yakūn qad qtarab ʾajaluhum f-b-ʾayy ḥadīth baʿdahū yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they not look into the realm of the heavens and the earth and everything that Allah has created and think that perhaps their appointed time has come near? So in what statement hereafter will they believe

arabic_uthmani: مَن يُضلِلِ اللَّهُ فَلا هادِيَ لَهُ ۚ وَيَذَرُهُم في طُغيانِهِم يَعمَهونَ
blank: m yuḍlil llāh f-lā hādiy lahū w-yadharuhum fī ṭughyānihim yaʿmahūn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever Allah sends astray - there is no guide for him. And He leaves them in their transgression, wandering blindly

arabic_uthmani: يَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ السّاعَةِ أَيّانَ مُرساها ۖ قُل إِنَّما عِلمُها عِندَ رَبّي ۖ لا يُجَلّيها لِوَقتِها إِلّا هُوَ ۚ ثَقُلَت فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ لا تَأتيكُم إِلّا بَغتَةً ۗ يَسأَلونَكَ كَأَنَّكَ حَفِيٌّ عَنها ۖ قُل إِنَّما عِلمُها عِندَ اللَّهِ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: yasʾalūnak ʿan s-sāʿat ʾayyān mursāhā qul ʾinnamā ʿilmuhā ʿind rabbī lā yujallīhā l-waqtihā ʾillā huw thaqulat fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ lā taʾtīkum ʾillā baghtat yasʾalūnak k-ʾannak ḥafiyy ʿanhā qul ʾinnamā ʿilmuhā ʿind llāh w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: They ask you, O Muhammad, about the Hour: when is its arrival? Say, "Its knowledge is only with my Lord. None will reveal its time except Him. It lays heavily upon the heavens and the earth. It will not come upon you except unexpectedly." They ask you as if you are familiar with it. Say, "Its knowledge is only with Allah, but most of the people do not know

arabic_uthmani: قُل لا أَملِكُ لِنَفسي نَفعًا وَلا ضَرًّا إِلّا ما شاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ وَلَو كُنتُ أَعلَمُ الغَيبَ لَاستَكثَرتُ مِنَ الخَيرِ وَما مَسَّنِيَ السّوءُ ۚ إِن أَنا إِلّا نَذيرٌ وَبَشيرٌ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: qul lā ʾamlik l-nafsī nafʿ w-lā ḍarr ʾillā mā shāʾ llāh w-law kunt ʾaʿlamul-ghayb l-stakthart minal-khayr w-mā massaniy s-sūʾ ʾ ʾan ʾillā nadhīr w-bashīr l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "I hold not for myself the power of benefit or harm, except what Allah has willed. And if I knew the unseen, I could have acquired much wealth, and no harm would have touched me. I am not except a warner and a bringer of good tidings to a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: ۞ هُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَكُم مِن نَفسٍ واحِدَةٍ وَجَعَلَ مِنها زَوجَها لِيَسكُنَ إِلَيها ۖ فَلَمّا تَغَشّاها حَمَلَت حَملًا خَفيفًا فَمَرَّت بِهِ ۖ فَلَمّا أَثقَلَت دَعَوَا اللَّهَ رَبَّهُما لَئِن آتَيتَنا صالِحًا لَنَكونَنَّ مِنَ الشّاكِرينَ
blank: huwalladhī khalaqakum m nafs wāḥidat w-jaʿal minhā zawjahā l-yaskun ʾilayhā f-lammā taghashshāhā ḥamalat ḥaml khafīf f-marrat bihī f-lammā ʾathqalat daʿawā llāh rabbahumā l-ʾ ʾātaytanā ṣāliḥ l-nakūnann min sh-shākirīn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who created you from one soul and created from it its mate that he might dwell in security with her. And when he covers her, she carries a light burden and continues therein. And when it becomes heavy, they both invoke Allah, their Lord, "If You should give us a good child, we will surely be among the grateful

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا آتاهُما صالِحًا جَعَلا لَهُ شُرَكاءَ فيما آتاهُما ۚ فَتَعالَى اللَّهُ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: f-lammā ʾātāhumā ṣāliḥ jaʿalā lahū shurakāʾ fī-mā ʾātāhumā f-taʿālā llāh ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: But when He gives them a good child, they ascribe partners to Him concerning that which He has given them. Exalted is Allah above what they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: أَيُشرِكونَ ما لا يَخلُقُ شَيئًا وَهُم يُخلَقونَ
blank: ʾ-yushrikūn mā lā yakhluq shayʾ w-hum yukhlaqūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they associate with Him those who create nothing and they are themselves created

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَستَطيعونَ لَهُم نَصرًا وَلا أَنفُسَهُم يَنصُرونَ
blank: w-lā yastaṭīʿūn lahum naṣr w-lā ʾanfusahum yanṣurūn
english_saheeh_international: And the false deities are unable to give them help, nor can they help themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن تَدعوهُم إِلَى الهُدىٰ لا يَتَّبِعوكُم ۚ سَواءٌ عَلَيكُم أَدَعَوتُموهُم أَم أَنتُم صامِتونَ
blank: w-ʾ tadʿūhum ʾilāl-hudā lā yattabiʿūkum sawāʾ ʿalaykum ʾ-daʿawtumūhum ʾam ʾantum ṣāmitūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you believers invite them to guidance, they will not follow you. It is all the same for you whether you invite them or you are silent

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ تَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ عِبادٌ أَمثالُكُم ۖ فَادعوهُم فَليَستَجيبوا لَكُم إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn tadʿūn m dūn llāh ʿibād ʾamthālukum f-dʿūhum f-l-yastajībū lakum ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those you polytheists call upon besides Allah are servants like you. So call upon them and let them respond to you, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: أَلَهُم أَرجُلٌ يَمشونَ بِها ۖ أَم لَهُم أَيدٍ يَبطِشونَ بِها ۖ أَم لَهُم أَعيُنٌ يُبصِرونَ بِها ۖ أَم لَهُم آذانٌ يَسمَعونَ بِها ۗ قُلِ ادعوا شُرَكاءَكُم ثُمَّ كيدونِ فَلا تُنظِرونِ
blank: ʾ-lahum ʾarjul yamshūn bihā ʾam lahum ʾayd yabṭishūn bihā ʾam lahum ʾaʿyun yubṣirūn bihā ʾam lahum ʾādhān yasmaʿūn bihā qul dʿū shurakāʾakum thumm kīdūn f-lā tunẓirūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they have feet by which they walk? Or do they have hands by which they strike? Or do they have eyes by which they see? Or do they have ears by which they hear? Say, O Muhammad, "Call your 'partners' and then conspire against me and give me no respite

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ وَلِيِّيَ اللَّهُ الَّذي نَزَّلَ الكِتابَ ۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى الصّالِحينَ
blank: ʾinn waliyyiy llāhulladhī nazzalal-kitāb w-huw yatawallā ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, my protector is Allah, who has sent down the Book; and He is an ally to the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ تَدعونَ مِن دونِهِ لا يَستَطيعونَ نَصرَكُم وَلا أَنفُسَهُم يَنصُرونَ
blank: w-lladhīn tadʿūn m dūnihī lā yastaṭīʿūn naṣrakum w-lā ʾanfusahum yanṣurūn
english_saheeh_international: And those you call upon besides Him are unable to help you, nor can they help themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن تَدعوهُم إِلَى الهُدىٰ لا يَسمَعوا ۖ وَتَراهُم يَنظُرونَ إِلَيكَ وَهُم لا يُبصِرونَ
blank: w-ʾ tadʿūhum ʾilāl-hudā lā yasmaʿū w-tarāhum yanẓurūn ʾilayk w-hum lā yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you invite them to guidance, they do not hear; and you see them looking at you while they do not see

arabic_uthmani: خُذِ العَفوَ وَأمُر بِالعُرفِ وَأَعرِض عَنِ الجاهِلينَ
blank: khudhil-ʿafw w-ʾmur b-l-ʿurf w-ʾaʿriḍ ʿanil-jāhilīn
english_saheeh_international: Take what is given freely, enjoin what is good, and turn away from the ignorant

arabic_uthmani: وَإِمّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ الشَّيطانِ نَزغٌ فَاستَعِذ بِاللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-ʾimmā yanzaghannak min sh-shayṭān nazgh f-staʿidh b-llāh ʾinnahū samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And if an evil suggestion comes to you from Satan, then seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, He is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ اتَّقَوا إِذا مَسَّهُم طائِفٌ مِنَ الشَّيطانِ تَذَكَّروا فَإِذا هُم مُبصِرونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ttaqaw ʾidhā massahum ṭāʾif min sh-shayṭān tadhakkarū f-ʾidhā hum mubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who fear Allah - when an impulse touches them from Satan, they remember Him and at once they have insight

arabic_uthmani: وَإِخوانُهُم يَمُدّونَهُم فِي الغَيِّ ثُمَّ لا يُقصِرونَ
blank: w-ʾikhwānuhum yamuddūnahum fīl-ghayy thumm lā yuqṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: But their brothers - the devils increase them in error; then they do not stop short

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا لَم تَأتِهِم بِآيَةٍ قالوا لَولَا اجتَبَيتَها ۚ قُل إِنَّما أَتَّبِعُ ما يوحىٰ إِلَيَّ مِن رَبّي ۚ هٰذا بَصائِرُ مِن رَبِّكُم وَهُدًى وَرَحمَةٌ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā lam taʾtihim b-ʾāyat qālū law-lā jtabaytahā qul ʾinnamā ʾattabiʿ mā yūḥā ʾilayy m rabbī hādhā baṣāʾir m rabbikum w-hud w-raḥmat l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And when you, O Muhammad, do not bring them a sign, they say, "Why have you not contrived it?" Say, "I only follow what is revealed to me from my Lord. This Qur'an is enlightenment from your Lord and guidance and mercy for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قُرِئَ القُرآنُ فَاستَمِعوا لَهُ وَأَنصِتوا لَعَلَّكُم تُرحَمونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā quriʾal-qurʾān f-stamiʿū lahū w-ʾanṣitū laʿallakum turḥamūn
english_saheeh_international: So when the Qur'an is recited, then listen to it and pay attention that you may receive mercy

arabic_uthmani: وَاذكُر رَبَّكَ في نَفسِكَ تَضَرُّعًا وَخيفَةً وَدونَ الجَهرِ مِنَ القَولِ بِالغُدُوِّ وَالآصالِ وَلا تَكُن مِنَ الغافِلينَ
blank: w-dhkur rabbak fī nafsik taḍarruʿ w-khīfat w-dūnal-jahr minal-qawl b-l-ghuduww w-l-ʾāṣāl w-lā tak minal-ghāfilīn
english_saheeh_international: And remember your Lord within yourself in humility and in fear without being apparent in speech - in the mornings and the evenings. And do not be among the heedless

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لا يَستَكبِرونَ عَن عِبادَتِهِ وَيُسَبِّحونَهُ وَلَهُ يَسجُدونَ ۩
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʿind rabbik lā yastakbirūn ʿ ʿibādatihī w-yusabbiḥūnahū w-lahū yasjudūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who are near your Lord are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, and they exalt Him, and to Him they prostrate

arabic_uthmani: يَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ الأَنفالِ ۖ قُلِ الأَنفالُ لِلَّهِ وَالرَّسولِ ۖ فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَصلِحوا ذاتَ بَينِكُم ۖ وَأَطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: yasʾalūnak ʿanil-ʾanfāl qulil-ʾanfāl l-llāh w-r-rasūl f-ttaqū llāh w-ʾaṣliḥū dhāt baynikum w-ʾaṭīʿū llāh w-rasūlahū ʾ kuntum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: They ask you, O Muhammad, about the bounties of war. Say, "The decision concerning bounties is for Allah and the Messenger." So fear Allah and amend that which is between you and obey Allah and His Messenger, if you should be believers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّمَا المُؤمِنونَ الَّذينَ إِذا ذُكِرَ اللَّهُ وَجِلَت قُلوبُهُم وَإِذا تُلِيَت عَلَيهِم آياتُهُ زادَتهُم إيمانًا وَعَلىٰ رَبِّهِم يَتَوَكَّلونَ
blank: ʾinnamāl-muʾminūnalladhīn ʾidhā dhukir llāh wajilat qulūbuhum w-ʾidhā tuliyat ʿalayhim ʾāyātuhū zādathum ʾīmān w-ʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūn
english_saheeh_international: The believers are only those who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts become fearful, and when His verses are recited to them, it increases them in faith; and upon their Lord they rely

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُقيمونَ الصَّلاةَ وَمِمّا رَزَقناهُم يُنفِقونَ
blank: alladhīn yuqīmūn ṣ-ṣalāt w-mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: The ones who establish prayer, and from what We have provided them, they spend

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُؤمِنونَ حَقًّا ۚ لَهُم دَرَجاتٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِم وَمَغفِرَةٌ وَرِزقٌ كَريمٌ
blank: ʾulāʾik humul-muʾminūn ḥaqq lahum darajāt ʿind rabbihim w-maghfirat w-rizq karīm
english_saheeh_international: Those are the believers, truly. For them are degrees of high position with their Lord and forgiveness and noble provision

arabic_uthmani: كَما أَخرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِن بَيتِكَ بِالحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَريقًا مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ لَكارِهونَ
blank: k-mā ʾakhrajak rabbuk m baytik b-l-ḥaqq w-ʾinn farīqam-minal-muʾminīn l-kārihūn
english_saheeh_international: It is just as when your Lord brought you out of your home for the battle of Badr in truth, while indeed, a party among the believers were unwilling

arabic_uthmani: يُجادِلونَكَ فِي الحَقِّ بَعدَما تَبَيَّنَ كَأَنَّما يُساقونَ إِلَى المَوتِ وَهُم يَنظُرونَ
blank: yujādilūnak fīl-ḥaqq baʿd mā tabayyan k-ʾannamā yusāqūn ʾilāl-mawt w-hum yanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: Arguing with you concerning the truth after it had become clear, as if they were being driven toward death while they were looking on

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ يَعِدُكُمُ اللَّهُ إِحدَى الطّائِفَتَينِ أَنَّها لَكُم وَتَوَدّونَ أَنَّ غَيرَ ذاتِ الشَّوكَةِ تَكونُ لَكُم وَيُريدُ اللَّهُ أَن يُحِقَّ الحَقَّ بِكَلِماتِهِ وَيَقطَعَ دابِرَ الكافِرينَ
blank: w-ʾidh yaʿidukum llāh ʾiḥdā ṭ-ṭāʾifatayn ʾannahā lakum w-tawaddūn ʾann ghayr dhāt sh-shawkat takūn lakum w-yurīd llāh ʾ yuḥiqqal-ḥaqq b-kalimātihī w-yaqṭaʿ dābiral-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Remember, O believers, when Allah promised you one of the two groups - that it would be yours - and you wished that the unarmed one would be yours. But Allah intended to establish the truth by His words and to eliminate the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: لِيُحِقَّ الحَقَّ وَيُبطِلَ الباطِلَ وَلَو كَرِهَ المُجرِمونَ
blank: l-yuḥiqqal-ḥaqq w-yubṭilal-bāṭil w-law karihal-mujrimūn
english_saheeh_international: That He should establish the truth and abolish falsehood, even if the criminals disliked it

arabic_uthmani: إِذ تَستَغيثونَ رَبَّكُم فَاستَجابَ لَكُم أَنّي مُمِدُّكُم بِأَلفٍ مِنَ المَلائِكَةِ مُردِفينَ
blank: ʾidh tastaghīthūn rabbakum f-stajāb lakum ʾannī mumiddukum b-ʾalf minal-malāʾikat murdifīn
english_saheeh_international: Remember when you asked help of your Lord, and He answered you, "Indeed, I will reinforce you with a thousand from the angels, following one another

arabic_uthmani: وَما جَعَلَهُ اللَّهُ إِلّا بُشرىٰ وَلِتَطمَئِنَّ بِهِ قُلوبُكُم ۚ وَمَا النَّصرُ إِلّا مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-mā jaʿalah llāh ʾillā bushrā w-l-taṭmaʾinn bihī qulūbukum w-mā n-naṣr ʾillā m ʿind llāh ʾinn llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And Allah made it not but good tidings and so that your hearts would be assured thereby. And victory is not but from Allah. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: إِذ يُغَشّيكُمُ النُّعاسَ أَمَنَةً مِنهُ وَيُنَزِّلُ عَلَيكُم مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً لِيُطَهِّرَكُم بِهِ وَيُذهِبَ عَنكُم رِجزَ الشَّيطانِ وَلِيَربِطَ عَلىٰ قُلوبِكُم وَيُثَبِّتَ بِهِ الأَقدامَ
blank: ʾidh yughashshīkum n-nuʿās ʾamanatam-minh w-yunazzil ʿalaykum min s-samāʾ māʾ l-yuṭahhirakum bihī w-yudhhib ʿankum rijz sh-shayṭān w-l-yarbiṭ ʿalā qulūbikum w-yuthabbit bihil-ʾaqdām
english_saheeh_international: Remember when He overwhelmed you with drowsiness giving security from Him and sent down upon you from the sky, rain by which to purify you and remove from you the evil suggestions of Satan and to make steadfast your hearts and plant firmly thereby your feet

arabic_uthmani: إِذ يوحي رَبُّكَ إِلَى المَلائِكَةِ أَنّي مَعَكُم فَثَبِّتُوا الَّذينَ آمَنوا ۚ سَأُلقي في قُلوبِ الَّذينَ كَفَرُوا الرُّعبَ فَاضرِبوا فَوقَ الأَعناقِ وَاضرِبوا مِنهُم كُلَّ بَنانٍ
blank: ʾidh yūḥī rabbuk ʾilāl-malāʾikat ʾannī maʿakum f-thabbitūlladhīn ʾāmanū s-ʾulqī fī qulūbilladhīn kafarū r-ruʿb f-ḍribū fawqal-ʾaʿnāq w-ḍribū minhum kull banān
english_saheeh_international: Remember when your Lord inspired to the angels, "I am with you, so strengthen those who have believed. I will cast terror into the hearts of those who disbelieved, so strike them upon the necks and strike from them every fingertip

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم شاقُّوا اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ ۚ وَمَن يُشاقِقِ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahum shāqqū llāh w-rasūlahū w-m yushāqiq llāh w-rasūlahū f-ʾinn llāh shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger - indeed, Allah is severe in penalty

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكُم فَذوقوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلكافِرينَ عَذابَ النّارِ
blank: dhālikum f-dhūqūh w-ʾann l-l-kāfirīn ʿadhāb n-nār
english_saheeh_international: That is yours, so taste it." And indeed for the disbelievers is the punishment of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِذا لَقيتُمُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا زَحفًا فَلا تُوَلّوهُمُ الأَدبارَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾidhā laqītumulladhīn kafarū zaḥf f-lā tuwallūhumul-ʾadbār
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, when you meet those who disbelieve advancing for battle, do not turn to them your backs in flight

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن يُوَلِّهِم يَومَئِذٍ دُبُرَهُ إِلّا مُتَحَرِّفًا لِقِتالٍ أَو مُتَحَيِّزًا إِلىٰ فِئَةٍ فَقَد باءَ بِغَضَبٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَمَأواهُ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئسَ المَصيرُ
blank: w-m yuwallihim yawmaʾidh duburahū ʾillā mutaḥarrif l-qitāl ʾaw mutaḥayyiz ʾilā fiʾat f-qad bāʾ b-ghaḍab min llāh w-maʾwāh jahannam w-biʾsal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And whoever turns his back to them on such a day, unless swerving as a strategy for war or joining another company, has certainly returned with anger upon him from Allah, and his refuge is Hell - and wretched is the destination

arabic_uthmani: فَلَم تَقتُلوهُم وَلٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ قَتَلَهُم ۚ وَما رَمَيتَ إِذ رَمَيتَ وَلٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ رَمىٰ ۚ وَلِيُبلِيَ المُؤمِنينَ مِنهُ بَلاءً حَسَنًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: f-lam taqtulūhum w-lākinn llāh qatalahum w-mā ramayt ʾidh ramayt w-lākinn llāh ramā w-l-yubliyal-muʾminīn minh balāʾ ḥasan ʾinn llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And you did not kill them, but it was Allah who killed them. And you threw not, O Muhammad, when you threw, but it was Allah who threw that He might test the believers with a good test. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكُم وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ موهِنُ كَيدِ الكافِرينَ
blank: dhālikum w-ʾann llāh mūhin kaydil-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: That is so, and also that Allah will weaken the plot of the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: إِن تَستَفتِحوا فَقَد جاءَكُمُ الفَتحُ ۖ وَإِن تَنتَهوا فَهُوَ خَيرٌ لَكُم ۖ وَإِن تَعودوا نَعُد وَلَن تُغنِيَ عَنكُم فِئَتُكُم شَيئًا وَلَو كَثُرَت وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾ tastaftiḥū f-qad jāʾakumul-fatḥ w-ʾ tantahū f-huw khayr lakum w-ʾ taʿūdū naʿud w-l tughniy ʿankum fiʾatukum shayʾ w-law kathurat w-ʾann llāh maʿal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: If you disbelievers seek the victory - the defeat has come to you. And if you desist from hostilities, it is best for you; but if you return to war, We will return, and never will you be availed by your large company at all, even if it should increase; and that is because Allah is with the believers

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا أَطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ وَلا تَوَلَّوا عَنهُ وَأَنتُم تَسمَعونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾaṭīʿū llāh w-rasūlahū w-lā tawallaw ʿanh w-ʾantum tasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, obey Allah and His Messenger and do not turn from him while you hear his order

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَكونوا كَالَّذينَ قالوا سَمِعنا وَهُم لا يَسمَعونَ
blank: w-lā takūnū k-lladhīn qālū samiʿnā w-hum lā yasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not be like those who say, "We have heard," while they do not hear

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ شَرَّ الدَّوابِّ عِندَ اللَّهِ الصُّمُّ البُكمُ الَّذينَ لا يَعقِلونَ
blank: ʾinn sharr d-dawābb ʿind llāh ṣ-ṣummul-bukmulladhīn lā yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allah are the deaf and dumb who do not use reason

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو عَلِمَ اللَّهُ فيهِم خَيرًا لَأَسمَعَهُم ۖ وَلَو أَسمَعَهُم لَتَوَلَّوا وَهُم مُعرِضونَ
blank: w-law ʿalim llāh fīhim khayr l-ʾasmaʿahum w-law ʾasmaʿahum l-tawallaw w-hum muʿriḍūn
english_saheeh_international: Had Allah known any good in them, He would have made them hear. And if He had made them hear, they would still have turned away, while they were refusing

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا استَجيبوا لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسولِ إِذا دَعاكُم لِما يُحييكُم ۖ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَحولُ بَينَ المَرءِ وَقَلبِهِ وَأَنَّهُ إِلَيهِ تُحشَرونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū stajībū l-llāh w-l-r-rasūl ʾidhā daʿākum l-mā yuḥyīkum w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh yaḥūl baynal-marʾ w-qalbihī w-ʾannahū ʾilayh tuḥsharūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, respond to Allah and to the Messenger when he calls you to that which gives you life. And know that Allah intervenes between a man and his heart and that to Him you will be gathered

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّقوا فِتنَةً لا تُصيبَنَّ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا مِنكُم خاصَّةً ۖ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: w-ttaqū fitnat lā tuṣībannalladhīn ẓalamū minkum khāṣṣat w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: And fear a trial which will not strike those who have wronged among you exclusively, and know that Allah is severe in penalty

arabic_uthmani: وَاذكُروا إِذ أَنتُم قَليلٌ مُستَضعَفونَ فِي الأَرضِ تَخافونَ أَن يَتَخَطَّفَكُمُ النّاسُ فَآواكُم وَأَيَّدَكُم بِنَصرِهِ وَرَزَقَكُم مِنَ الطَّيِّباتِ لَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: w-dhkurū ʾidh ʾantum qalīl mustaḍʿafūn fīl-ʾarḍ takhāfūn ʾ yatakhaṭṭafakum n-nās f-ʾāwākum w-ʾayyadakum b-naṣrihī w-razaqakum min ṭ-ṭayyibāt laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And remember when you were few and oppressed in the land, fearing that people might abduct you, but He sheltered you, supported you with His victory, and provided you with good things - that you might be grateful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَخونُوا اللَّهَ وَالرَّسولَ وَتَخونوا أَماناتِكُم وَأَنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā takhūnū llāh w-r-rasūl w-takhūnū ʾamānātikum w-ʾantum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not betray Allah and the Messenger or betray your trusts while you know the consequence

arabic_uthmani: وَاعلَموا أَنَّما أَموالُكُم وَأَولادُكُم فِتنَةٌ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ عِندَهُ أَجرٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: w-ʿlamū ʾannamā ʾamwālukum w-ʾawlādukum fitnat w-ʾann llāh ʿindahū ʾajr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And know that your properties and your children are but a trial and that Allah has with Him a great reward

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِن تَتَّقُوا اللَّهَ يَجعَل لَكُم فُرقانًا وَيُكَفِّر عَنكُم سَيِّئَاتِكُم وَيَغفِر لَكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الفَضلِ العَظيمِ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾ tattaqū llāh yajʿal lakum furqān w-yukaffir ʿankum sayyiʾātikum w-yaghfir lakum w-llāh dhūl-faḍlil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, if you fear Allah, He will grant you a criterion and will remove from you your misdeeds and forgive you. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ يَمكُرُ بِكَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لِيُثبِتوكَ أَو يَقتُلوكَ أَو يُخرِجوكَ ۚ وَيَمكُرونَ وَيَمكُرُ اللَّهُ ۖ وَاللَّهُ خَيرُ الماكِرينَ
blank: w-ʾidh yamkur bikalladhīn kafarū l-yuthbitūk ʾaw yaqtulūk ʾaw yukhrijūk w-yamkurūn w-yamkur llāh w-llāh khayrul-mākirīn
english_saheeh_international: And remember, O Muhammad, when those who disbelieved plotted against you to restrain you or kill you or evict you from Makkah. But they plan, and Allah plans. And Allah is the best of planners

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا تُتلىٰ عَلَيهِم آياتُنا قالوا قَد سَمِعنا لَو نَشاءُ لَقُلنا مِثلَ هٰذا ۙ إِن هٰذا إِلّا أَساطيرُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā tutlā ʿalayhim ʾāyātunā qālū qad samiʿnā law nashāʾ l-qulnā mithl hādhā ʾ hādhā ʾillā ʾasāṭīrul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: And when Our verses are recited to them, they say, "We have heard. If we willed, we could say something like this. This is not but legends of the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالُوا اللَّهُمَّ إِن كانَ هٰذا هُوَ الحَقَّ مِن عِندِكَ فَأَمطِر عَلَينا حِجارَةً مِنَ السَّماءِ أَوِ ائتِنا بِعَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: w-ʾidh qālū llāhumm ʾ kān hādhā huwal-ḥaqq m ʿindik f-ʾamṭir ʿalaynā ḥijāratam-min s-samāʾ ʾaw ʾtinā b-ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And remember when they said, "O Allah, if this should be the truth from You, then rain down upon us stones from the sky or bring us a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ اللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُم وَأَنتَ فيهِم ۚ وَما كانَ اللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُم وَهُم يَستَغفِرونَ
blank: w-mā kān llāh l-yuʿadhdhibahum w-ʾant fīhim w-mā kān llāh muʿadhdhibahum w-hum yastaghfirūn
english_saheeh_international: But Allah would not punish them while you, O Muhammad, are among them, and Allah would not punish them while they seek forgiveness

arabic_uthmani: وَما لَهُم أَلّا يُعَذِّبَهُمُ اللَّهُ وَهُم يَصُدّونَ عَنِ المَسجِدِ الحَرامِ وَما كانوا أَولِياءَهُ ۚ إِن أَولِياؤُهُ إِلَّا المُتَّقونَ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-mā lahum ʾallā yuʿadhdhibahum llāh w-hum yaṣuddūn ʿanil-masjidil-ḥarām w-mā kānū ʾawliyāʾahū ʾ ʾawliyāʾuhū ʾillāl-muttaqūn w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: But why should Allah not punish them while they obstruct people from al-Masjid al- Haram and they were not fit to be its guardians? Its true guardians are not but the righteous, but most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ صَلاتُهُم عِندَ البَيتِ إِلّا مُكاءً وَتَصدِيَةً ۚ فَذوقُوا العَذابَ بِما كُنتُم تَكفُرونَ
blank: w-mā kān ṣalātuhum ʿindal-bayt ʾillā mukāʾ w-taṣdiyat f-dhūqūl-ʿadhāb b-mā kuntum takfurūn
english_saheeh_international: And their prayer at the House was not except whistling and handclapping. So taste the punishment for what you disbelieved

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا يُنفِقونَ أَموالَهُم لِيَصُدّوا عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَسَيُنفِقونَها ثُمَّ تَكونُ عَلَيهِم حَسرَةً ثُمَّ يُغلَبونَ ۗ وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا إِلىٰ جَهَنَّمَ يُحشَرونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū yunfiqūn ʾamwālahum l-yaṣuddū ʿ sabīl llāh f-s-yunfiqūnahā thūmm takūn ʿalayhim ḥasrat thumm yughlabūn w-lladhīn kafarū ʾilā jahannam yuḥsharūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who disbelieve spend their wealth to avert people from the way of Allah. So they will spend it; then it will be for them a source of regret; then they will be overcome. And those who have disbelieved - unto Hell they will be gathered

arabic_uthmani: لِيَميزَ اللَّهُ الخَبيثَ مِنَ الطَّيِّبِ وَيَجعَلَ الخَبيثَ بَعضَهُ عَلىٰ بَعضٍ فَيَركُمَهُ جَميعًا فَيَجعَلَهُ في جَهَنَّمَ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: l-yamīz llāhul-khabīth min ṭ-ṭayyib w-yajʿalal-khabīth baʿḍahū ʿalā baʿḍ f-yarkumahū jamīʿ f-yajʿalahū fī jahannam ʾulāʾik humul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: This is so that Allah may distinguish the wicked from the good and place the wicked some of them upon others and heap them all together and put them into Hell. It is those who are the losers

arabic_uthmani: قُل لِلَّذينَ كَفَروا إِن يَنتَهوا يُغفَر لَهُم ما قَد سَلَفَ وَإِن يَعودوا فَقَد مَضَت سُنَّتُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: qul l-lladhīn kafarū ʾ yantahū yughfar lahum mā qad salaf w-ʾ yaʿūdū f-qad maḍat sunnatul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: Say to those who have disbelieved that if they cease, what has previously occurred will be forgiven for them. But if they return to hostility - then the precedent of the former rebellious peoples has already taken place

arabic_uthmani: وَقاتِلوهُم حَتّىٰ لا تَكونَ فِتنَةٌ وَيَكونَ الدّينُ كُلُّهُ لِلَّهِ ۚ فَإِنِ انتَهَوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِما يَعمَلونَ بَصيرٌ
blank: w-qātilūhum ḥattā lā takūn fitnat w-yakūn d-dīn kulluhū l-llāh f-ʾin ntahaw f-ʾinn llāh b-mā yaʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And fight them until there is no fitnah and until the religion, all of it, is for Allah. And if they cease - then indeed, Allah is Seeing of what they do

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ مَولاكُم ۚ نِعمَ المَولىٰ وَنِعمَ النَّصيرُ
blank: w-ʾ tawallaw f-ʿlamū ʾann llāh mawlākum niʿmal-mawlā w-niʿm n-naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: But if they turn away - then know that Allah is your protector. Excellent is the protector, and Excellent is the helper

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَاعلَموا أَنَّما غَنِمتُم مِن شَيءٍ فَأَنَّ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُ وَلِلرَّسولِ وَلِذِي القُربىٰ وَاليَتامىٰ وَالمَساكينِ وَابنِ السَّبيلِ إِن كُنتُم آمَنتُم بِاللَّهِ وَما أَنزَلنا عَلىٰ عَبدِنا يَومَ الفُرقانِ يَومَ التَقَى الجَمعانِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: w-ʿlamū ʾannamā ghanimtum m shayʾ f-ʾann l-llāh khumusahū w-l-r-rasūl w-l-dhīl-qurbā w-l-yatāmā w-l-masākīn w-bn s-sabīl ʾ kuntum ʾāmantum b-llāh w-mā ʾanzalnā ʿalā ʿabdinā yawmal-furqān yawm ltaqāl-jamʿān w-llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And know that anything you obtain of war booty - then indeed, for Allah is one fifth of it and for the Messenger and for his near relatives and the orphans, the needy, and the stranded traveler, if you have believed in Allah and in that which We sent down to Our Servant on the day of criterion - the day when the two armies met. And Allah, over all things, is competent

arabic_uthmani: إِذ أَنتُم بِالعُدوَةِ الدُّنيا وَهُم بِالعُدوَةِ القُصوىٰ وَالرَّكبُ أَسفَلَ مِنكُم ۚ وَلَو تَواعَدتُم لَاختَلَفتُم فِي الميعادِ ۙ وَلٰكِن لِيَقضِيَ اللَّهُ أَمرًا كانَ مَفعولًا لِيَهلِكَ مَن هَلَكَ عَن بَيِّنَةٍ وَيَحيىٰ مَن حَيَّ عَن بَيِّنَةٍ ۗ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَسَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: ʾidh ʾantum b-l-ʿudwat d-dunyā w-hum b-l-ʿudwatil-quṣwā w-r-rakb ʾasfal minkum w-law tawāʿadtum l-khtalaftum fīl-mīʿād w-lāk l-yaqḍiy llāh ʾamr kān mafʿūl l-yahlik m halak ʿ bayyinat w-yaḥyā m ḥayy ʿ bayyinat w-ʾinn llāh l-samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Remember when you were on the near side of the valley, and they were on the farther side, and the caravan was lower in position than you. If you had made an appointment to meet, you would have missed the appointment. But it was so that Allah might accomplish a matter already destined - that those who perished through disbelief would perish upon evidence and those who lived in faith would live upon evidence; and indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: إِذ يُريكَهُمُ اللَّهُ في مَنامِكَ قَليلًا ۖ وَلَو أَراكَهُم كَثيرًا لَفَشِلتُم وَلَتَنازَعتُم فِي الأَمرِ وَلٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ سَلَّمَ ۗ إِنَّهُ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: ʾidh yurīkahum llāh fī manāmik qalīl w-law ʾarākahum kathīr l-fashiltum w-l-tanāzaʿtum fīl-ʾamr w-lākinn llāh sallam ʾinnahū ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: Remember, O Muhammad, when Allah showed them to you in your dream as few; and if He had shown them to you as many, you believers would have lost courage and would have disputed in the matter of whether to fight, but Allah saved you from that. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ يُريكُموهُم إِذِ التَقَيتُم في أَعيُنِكُم قَليلًا وَيُقَلِّلُكُم في أَعيُنِهِم لِيَقضِيَ اللَّهُ أَمرًا كانَ مَفعولًا ۗ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرجَعُ الأُمورُ
blank: w-ʾidh yurīkumūhum ʾidh ltaqaytum fī ʾaʿyunikum qalīl w-yuqallilukum fī ʾaʿyunihim l-yaqḍiy llāh ʾamr kān mafʿūl w-ʾilā llāh turjaʿul-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: And remember when He showed them to you, when you met, as few in your eyes, and He made you appear as few in their eyes so that Allah might accomplish a matter already destined. And to Allah are all matters returned

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِذا لَقيتُم فِئَةً فَاثبُتوا وَاذكُرُوا اللَّهَ كَثيرًا لَعَلَّكُم تُفلِحونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾidhā laqītum fiʾat f-thbutū w-dhkurū llāh kathīr laʿallakum tufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, when you encounter a company from the enemy forces, stand firm and remember Allah much that you may be successful

arabic_uthmani: وَأَطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ وَلا تَنازَعوا فَتَفشَلوا وَتَذهَبَ ريحُكُم ۖ وَاصبِروا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصّابِرينَ
blank: w-ʾaṭīʿū llāh w-rasūlahū w-lā tanāzaʿū f-tafshalū w-tadhhab rīḥukum w-ṣbirū ʾinn llāh maʿ ṣ-ṣābirīn
english_saheeh_international: And obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not dispute and thus lose courage and then your strength would depart; and be patient. Indeed, Allah is with the patient

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَكونوا كَالَّذينَ خَرَجوا مِن دِيارِهِم بَطَرًا وَرِئَاءَ النّاسِ وَيَصُدّونَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِما يَعمَلونَ مُحيطٌ
blank: w-lā takūnū k-lladhīn kharajū m diyārihim baṭar w-riʾāʾ n-nās w-yaṣuddūn ʿ sabīl llāh w-llāh b-mā yaʿmalūn muḥīṭ
english_saheeh_international: And do not be like those who came forth from their homes insolently and to be seen by people and avert them from the way of Allah. And Allah is encompassing of what they do

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ زَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الشَّيطانُ أَعمالَهُم وَقالَ لا غالِبَ لَكُمُ اليَومَ مِنَ النّاسِ وَإِنّي جارٌ لَكُم ۖ فَلَمّا تَراءَتِ الفِئَتانِ نَكَصَ عَلىٰ عَقِبَيهِ وَقالَ إِنّي بَريءٌ مِنكُم إِنّي أَرىٰ ما لا تَرَونَ إِنّي أَخافُ اللَّهَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: w-ʾidh zayyan lahum sh-shayṭān ʾaʿmālahum w-qāl lā ghālib lakumul-yawm min n-nās w-ʾinnī jār lakum f-lammā tarāʾatil-fiʾatān nakaṣ ʿalā ʿaqibayh w-qāl ʾinnī barīʾ minkum ʾinnī ʾarā mā lā tarawn ʾinnī ʾakhāf llāh w-llāh shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: And remember when Satan made their deeds pleasing to them and said, "No one can overcome you today from among the people, and indeed, I am your protector." But when the two armies sighted each other, he turned on his heels and said, "Indeed, I am disassociated from you. Indeed, I see what you do not see; indeed I fear Allah. And Allah is severe in penalty

arabic_uthmani: إِذ يَقولُ المُنافِقونَ وَالَّذينَ في قُلوبِهِم مَرَضٌ غَرَّ هٰؤُلاءِ دينُهُم ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّل عَلَى اللَّهِ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: ʾidh yaqūlul-munāfiqūn w-lladhīn fī qulūbihim maraḍ gharr hāʾulāʾ dīnuhum w-m yatawakkal ʿalā llāh f-ʾinn llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Remember when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts was disease said, "Their religion has deluded those Muslims." But whoever relies upon Allah - then indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو تَرىٰ إِذ يَتَوَفَّى الَّذينَ كَفَرُوا ۙ المَلائِكَةُ يَضرِبونَ وُجوهَهُم وَأَدبارَهُم وَذوقوا عَذابَ الحَريقِ
blank: w-law tarā ʾidh yatawaffālladhīn kafarūl-malāʾikat yaḍribūn wujūhahum w-ʾadbārahum w-dhūqū ʿadhābal-ḥarīq
english_saheeh_international: And if you could but see when the angels take the souls of those who disbelieved... They are striking their faces and their backs and saying, "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِما قَدَّمَت أَيديكُم وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ لَيسَ بِظَلّامٍ لِلعَبيدِ
blank: dhālik b-mā qaddamat ʾaydīkum w-ʾann llāh lays b-ẓallām l-l-ʿabīd
english_saheeh_international: That is for what your hands have put forth of evil and because Allah is not ever unjust to His servants

arabic_uthmani: كَدَأبِ آلِ فِرعَونَ ۙ وَالَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ كَفَروا بِآياتِ اللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ اللَّهُ بِذُنوبِهِم ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: k-daʾb ʾāl firʿawn w-lladhīn m qablihim kafarū b-ʾāyāt llāh f-ʾakhadhahum llāh b-dhunūbihim ʾinn llāh qawiyy shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: Theirs is like the custom of the people of Pharaoh and of those before them. They disbelieved in the signs of Allah, so Allah seized them for their sins. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and severe in penalty

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ لَم يَكُ مُغَيِّرًا نِعمَةً أَنعَمَها عَلىٰ قَومٍ حَتّىٰ يُغَيِّروا ما بِأَنفُسِهِم ۙ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: dhālik b-ʾann llāh lam yak mughayyir niʿmat ʾanʿamahā ʿalā qawm ḥattā yughayyirū mā b-ʾanfusihim w-ʾann llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: That is because Allah would not change a favor which He had bestowed upon a people until they change what is within themselves. And indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: كَدَأبِ آلِ فِرعَونَ ۙ وَالَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِ رَبِّهِم فَأَهلَكناهُم بِذُنوبِهِم وَأَغرَقنا آلَ فِرعَونَ ۚ وَكُلٌّ كانوا ظالِمينَ
blank: k-daʾb ʾāl firʿawn w-lladhīn m qablihim kadhdhabū b-ʾāyāt rabbihim f-ʾahlaknāhum b-dhunūbihim w-ʾaghraqnā ʾāl firʿawn w-kull kānū ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Theirs is like the custom of the people of Pharaoh and of those before them. They denied the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh. And all of them were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ شَرَّ الدَّوابِّ عِندَ اللَّهِ الَّذينَ كَفَروا فَهُم لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾinn sharr d-dawābb ʿind llāhilladhīn kafarū f-hum lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allah are those who have disbelieved, and they will not ever believe

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ عاهَدتَ مِنهُم ثُمَّ يَنقُضونَ عَهدَهُم في كُلِّ مَرَّةٍ وَهُم لا يَتَّقونَ
blank: alladhīn ʿāhadt minhum thumm yanquḍūn ʿahdahum fī kull marrat w-hum lā yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: The ones with whom you made a treaty but then they break their pledge every time, and they do not fear Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَإِمّا تَثقَفَنَّهُم فِي الحَربِ فَشَرِّد بِهِم مَن خَلفَهُم لَعَلَّهُم يَذَّكَّرونَ
blank: f-ʾimmā tathqafannahum fīl-ḥarb f-sharrid bihim m khalfahum laʿallahum yadhdhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: So if you, O Muhammad, gain dominance over them in war, disperse by means of them those behind them that perhaps they will be reminded

arabic_uthmani: وَإِمّا تَخافَنَّ مِن قَومٍ خِيانَةً فَانبِذ إِلَيهِم عَلىٰ سَواءٍ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُحِبُّ الخائِنينَ
blank: w-ʾimmā takhāfann m qawm khiyānat f-nbidh ʾilayhim ʿalā sawāʾ ʾinn llāh lā yuḥibbul-khāʾinīn
english_saheeh_international: If you have reason to fear from a people betrayal, throw their treaty back to them, putting you on equal terms. Indeed, Allah does not like traitors

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَحسَبَنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا سَبَقوا ۚ إِنَّهُم لا يُعجِزونَ
blank: w-lā yaḥsabannalladhīn kafarū sabaqū ʾinnahum lā yuʿjizūn
english_saheeh_international: And let not those who disbelieve think they will escape. Indeed, they will not cause failure to Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَأَعِدّوا لَهُم مَا استَطَعتُم مِن قُوَّةٍ وَمِن رِباطِ الخَيلِ تُرهِبونَ بِهِ عَدُوَّ اللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُم وَآخَرينَ مِن دونِهِم لا تَعلَمونَهُمُ اللَّهُ يَعلَمُهُم ۚ وَما تُنفِقوا مِن شَيءٍ في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ يُوَفَّ إِلَيكُم وَأَنتُم لا تُظلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾaʿiddū lahum mā staṭaʿtum m quwwat w-m ribāṭil-khayl turhibūn bihī ʿaduww llāh w-ʿaduwwakum w-ʾākharīn m dūnihim lā taʿlamūnahum llāh yaʿlamuhum w-mā tunfiqū m shayʾ fī sabīl llāh yuwaff ʾilaykum w-ʾantum lā tuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And prepare against them whatever you are able of power and of steeds of war by which you may terrify the enemy of Allah and your enemy and others besides them whom you do not know but whom Allah knows. And whatever you spend in the cause of Allah will be fully repaid to you, and you will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِن جَنَحوا لِلسَّلمِ فَاجنَح لَها وَتَوَكَّل عَلَى اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: w-ʾ janaḥū l-s-salm f-jnaḥ lahā w-tawakkal ʿalā llāh ʾinnahū huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And if they incline to peace, then incline to it also and rely upon Allah. Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن يُريدوا أَن يَخدَعوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسبَكَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ الَّذي أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصرِهِ وَبِالمُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-ʾ yurīdū ʾ yakhdaʿūk f-ʾinn ḥasbak llāh huwalladhī ʾayyadak b-naṣrihī w-b-l-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: But if they intend to deceive you - then sufficient for you is Allah. It is He who supported you with His help and with the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَأَلَّفَ بَينَ قُلوبِهِم ۚ لَو أَنفَقتَ ما فِي الأَرضِ جَميعًا ما أَلَّفتَ بَينَ قُلوبِهِم وَلٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ أَلَّفَ بَينَهُم ۚ إِنَّهُ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-ʾallaf bayn qulūbihim law ʾanfaqt mā fīl-ʾarḍ jamīʿam-mā ʾallaft bayn qulūbihim w-lākinn llāh ʾallaf baynahum ʾinnahū ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And brought together their hearts. If you had spent all that is in the earth, you could not have brought their hearts together; but Allah brought them together. Indeed, He is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ حَسبُكَ اللَّهُ وَمَنِ اتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy ḥasbuk llāh w-man ttabaʿak minal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, sufficient for you is Allah and for whoever follows you of the believers

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ حَرِّضِ المُؤمِنينَ عَلَى القِتالِ ۚ إِن يَكُن مِنكُم عِشرونَ صابِرونَ يَغلِبوا مِائَتَينِ ۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِنكُم مِائَةٌ يَغلِبوا أَلفًا مِنَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا بِأَنَّهُم قَومٌ لا يَفقَهونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy ḥarriḍil-muʾminīn ʿalāl-qitāl ʾ yak minkum ʿishrūn ṣābirūn yaghlibū miʾatayn w-ʾ yak minkum miʾat yaghlibū ʾalfam-minalladhīn kafarū b-ʾannahum qawm lā yafqahūn
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, urge the believers to battle. If there are among you twenty who are steadfast, they will overcome two hundred. And if there are among you one hundred who are steadfast, they will overcome a thousand of those who have disbelieved because they are a people who do not understand

arabic_uthmani: الآنَ خَفَّفَ اللَّهُ عَنكُم وَعَلِمَ أَنَّ فيكُم ضَعفًا ۚ فَإِن يَكُن مِنكُم مِائَةٌ صابِرَةٌ يَغلِبوا مِائَتَينِ ۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِنكُم أَلفٌ يَغلِبوا أَلفَينِ بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ مَعَ الصّابِرينَ
blank: al-ʾān khaffaf llāh ʿankum w-ʿalim ʾann fīkum ḍaʿf f-ʾ yak minkum miʾat ṣābirat yaghlibū miʾatayn w-ʾ yak minkum ʾalf yaghlibū ʾalfayn b-ʾidhn llāh w-llāh maʿ ṣ-ṣābirīn
english_saheeh_international: Now, Allah has lightened the hardship for you, and He knows that among you is weakness. So if there are from you one hundred who are steadfast, they will overcome two hundred. And if there are among you a thousand, they will overcome two thousand by permission of Allah. And Allah is with the steadfast

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ لِنَبِيٍّ أَن يَكونَ لَهُ أَسرىٰ حَتّىٰ يُثخِنَ فِي الأَرضِ ۚ تُريدونَ عَرَضَ الدُّنيا وَاللَّهُ يُريدُ الآخِرَةَ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: mā kān l-nabiyy ʾ yakūn lahū ʾasrā ḥattā yuthkhin fīl-ʾarḍ turīdūn ʿaraḍ d-dunyā w-llāh yurīdul-ʾākhirat w-llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: It is not for a prophet to have captives of war until he inflicts a massacre upon Allah 's enemies in the land. Some Muslims desire the commodities of this world, but Allah desires for you the Hereafter. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: لَولا كِتابٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُم فيما أَخَذتُم عَذابٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: law-lā kitāb min llāh sabaq l-massakum fī-mā ʾakhadhtum ʿadhāb ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: If not for a decree from Allah that preceded, you would have been touched for what you took by a great punishment

arabic_uthmani: فَكُلوا مِمّا غَنِمتُم حَلالًا طَيِّبًا ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: f-kulū mimmā ghanimtum ḥalāl ṭayyib w-ttaqū llāh ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: So consume what you have taken of war booty as being lawful and good, and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ قُل لِمَن في أَيديكُم مِنَ الأَسرىٰ إِن يَعلَمِ اللَّهُ في قُلوبِكُم خَيرًا يُؤتِكُم خَيرًا مِمّا أُخِذَ مِنكُم وَيَغفِر لَكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy qul l-m fī ʾaydīkum minal-ʾasrā ʾ yaʿlam llāh fī qulūbikum khayr yuʾtikum khayram-mimmā ʾukhidh minkum w-yaghfir lakum w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, say to whoever is in your hands of the captives, "If Allah knows any good in your hearts, He will give you something better than what was taken from you, and He will forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن يُريدوا خِيانَتَكَ فَقَد خانُوا اللَّهَ مِن قَبلُ فَأَمكَنَ مِنهُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-ʾ yurīdū khiyānatak f-qad khānū llāh m qabl f-ʾamkan minhum w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: But if they intend to betray you - then they have already betrayed Allah before, and He empowered you over them. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَهاجَروا وَجاهَدوا بِأَموالِهِم وَأَنفُسِهِم في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَالَّذينَ آوَوا وَنَصَروا أُولٰئِكَ بَعضُهُم أَولِياءُ بَعضٍ ۚ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَلَم يُهاجِروا ما لَكُم مِن وَلايَتِهِم مِن شَيءٍ حَتّىٰ يُهاجِروا ۚ وَإِنِ استَنصَروكُم فِي الدّينِ فَعَلَيكُمُ النَّصرُ إِلّا عَلىٰ قَومٍ بَينَكُم وَبَينَهُم ميثاقٌ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾāmanū w-hājarū w-jāhadū b-ʾamwālihim w-ʾanfusihim fī sabīl llāh w-lladhīn ʾāwaw w-naṣarū ʾulāʾik baʿḍuhum ʾawliyāʾ baʿḍ w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-lam yuhājirū mā lakum m walāyatihim m shayʾ ḥattā yuhājirū w-ʾin stanṣarūkum fī d-dīn f-ʿalaykum n-naṣr ʾillā ʿalā qawm baynakum w-baynahum mīthāq w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who have believed and emigrated and fought with their wealth and lives in the cause of Allah and those who gave shelter and aided - they are allies of one another. But those who believed and did not emigrate - for you there is no guardianship of them until they emigrate. And if they seek help of you for the religion, then you must help, except against a people between yourselves and whom is a treaty. And Allah is Seeing of what you do

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا بَعضُهُم أَولِياءُ بَعضٍ ۚ إِلّا تَفعَلوهُ تَكُن فِتنَةٌ فِي الأَرضِ وَفَسادٌ كَبيرٌ
blank: w-lladhīn kafarū baʿḍuhum ʾawliyāʾ baʿḍ ʾillā tafʿalūh tak fitnat fīl-ʾarḍ w-fasād kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieved are allies of one another. If you do not do so, there will be fitnah on earth and great corruption

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَهاجَروا وَجاهَدوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَالَّذينَ آوَوا وَنَصَروا أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُؤمِنونَ حَقًّا ۚ لَهُم مَغفِرَةٌ وَرِزقٌ كَريمٌ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-hājarū w-jāhadū fī sabīl llāh w-lladhīn ʾāwaw w-naṣarū ʾulāʾik humul-muʾminūn ḥaqq lahum maghfirat w-rizq karīm
english_saheeh_international: But those who have believed and emigrated and fought in the cause of Allah and those who gave shelter and aided - it is they who are the believers, truly. For them is forgiveness and noble provision

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مِن بَعدُ وَهاجَروا وَجاهَدوا مَعَكُم فَأُولٰئِكَ مِنكُم ۚ وَأُولُو الأَرحامِ بَعضُهُم أَولىٰ بِبَعضٍ في كِتابِ اللَّهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾāmanū m baʿd w-hājarū w-jāhadū maʿakum f-ʾulāʾik minkum w-ʾulūl-ʾarḥām baʿḍuhum ʾawlā b-baʿḍ fī kitāb llāh ʾinn llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And those who believed after the initial emigration and emigrated and fought with you - they are of you. But those of blood relationship are more entitled to inheritance in the decree of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of all things

arabic_uthmani: بَراءَةٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ إِلَى الَّذينَ عاهَدتُم مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: barāʾat min llāh w-rasūlihī ʾilālladhīn ʿāhadtum minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: This is a declaration of disassociation, from Allah and His Messenger, to those with whom you had made a treaty among the polytheists

arabic_uthmani: فَسيحوا فِي الأَرضِ أَربَعَةَ أَشهُرٍ وَاعلَموا أَنَّكُم غَيرُ مُعجِزِي اللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ مُخزِي الكافِرينَ
blank: f-sīḥū fīl-ʾarḍ ʾarbaʿat ʾashhur w-ʿlamū ʾannakum ghayr muʿjizī llāh w-ʾann llāh mukhzīl-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: So travel freely, O disbelievers, throughout the land during four months but know that you cannot cause failure to Allah and that Allah will disgrace the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَأَذانٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ إِلَى النّاسِ يَومَ الحَجِّ الأَكبَرِ أَنَّ اللَّهَ بَريءٌ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ ۙ وَرَسولُهُ ۚ فَإِن تُبتُم فَهُوَ خَيرٌ لَكُم ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّيتُم فَاعلَموا أَنَّكُم غَيرُ مُعجِزِي اللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ الَّذينَ كَفَروا بِعَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: w-ʾadhān min llāh w-rasūlihī ʾilā n-nās yawmal-ḥajjil-ʾakbar ʾann llāh barīʾ minal-mushrikīn w-rasūluhū f-ʾ tubtum f-huw khayr lakum w-ʾ tawallaytum f-ʿlamū ʾannakum ghayr muʿjizī llāh w-bashshirilladhīn kafarū b-ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And it is an announcement from Allah and His Messenger to the people on the day of the greater pilgrimage that Allah is disassociated from the disbelievers, and so is His Messenger. So if you repent, that is best for you; but if you turn away - then know that you will not cause failure to Allah. And give tidings to those who disbelieve of a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا الَّذينَ عاهَدتُم مِنَ المُشرِكينَ ثُمَّ لَم يَنقُصوكُم شَيئًا وَلَم يُظاهِروا عَلَيكُم أَحَدًا فَأَتِمّوا إِلَيهِم عَهدَهُم إِلىٰ مُدَّتِهِم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ المُتَّقينَ
blank: ʾillālladhīn ʿāhadtum minal-mushrikīn thumm lam yanquṣūkum shayʾ w-lam yuẓāhirū ʿalaykum ʾaḥad f-ʾatimmū ʾilayhim ʿahdahum ʾilā muddatihim ʾinn llāh yuḥibbul-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Excepted are those with whom you made a treaty among the polytheists and then they have not been deficient toward you in anything or supported anyone against you; so complete for them their treaty until their term has ended. Indeed, Allah loves the righteous who fear Him

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذَا انسَلَخَ الأَشهُرُ الحُرُمُ فَاقتُلُوا المُشرِكينَ حَيثُ وَجَدتُموهُم وَخُذوهُم وَاحصُروهُم وَاقعُدوا لَهُم كُلَّ مَرصَدٍ ۚ فَإِن تابوا وَأَقامُوا الصَّلاةَ وَآتَوُا الزَّكاةَ فَخَلّوا سَبيلَهُم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: f-ʾidhā nsalakhal-ʾashhurul-ḥurum f-qtulūl-mushrikīn ḥayth wajadtumūhum w-khudhūhum w-ḥṣurūhum w-qʿudū lahum kull marṣad f-ʾ tābū w-ʾaqāmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātaw z-zakāt f-khallū sabīlahum ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And when the sacred months have passed, then kill the polytheists wherever you find them and capture them and besiege them and sit in wait for them at every place of ambush. But if they should repent, establish prayer, and give zakah, let them go on their way. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن أَحَدٌ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ استَجارَكَ فَأَجِرهُ حَتّىٰ يَسمَعَ كَلامَ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ أَبلِغهُ مَأمَنَهُ ۚ ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم قَومٌ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾ ʾaḥad minal-mushrikīn stajārak f-ʾajirh ḥattā yasmaʿ kalām llāh thumm ʾablighh maʾmanahū dhālik b-ʾannahum qawm lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And if any one of the polytheists seeks your protection, then grant him protection so that he may hear the words of Allah. Then deliver him to his place of safety. That is because they are a people who do not know

arabic_uthmani: كَيفَ يَكونُ لِلمُشرِكينَ عَهدٌ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَعِندَ رَسولِهِ إِلَّا الَّذينَ عاهَدتُم عِندَ المَسجِدِ الحَرامِ ۖ فَمَا استَقاموا لَكُم فَاستَقيموا لَهُم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ المُتَّقينَ
blank: kayf yakūn l-l-mushrikīn ʿahd ʿind llāh w-ʿind rasūlihī ʾillālladhīn ʿāhadtum ʿindal-masjidil-ḥarām f-mā staqāmū lakum f-staqīmū lahum ʾinn llāh yuḥibbul-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: How can there be for the polytheists a treaty in the sight of Allah and with His Messenger, except for those with whom you made a treaty at al-Masjid al-Haram? So as long as they are upright toward you, be upright toward them. Indeed, Allah loves the righteous who fear Him

arabic_uthmani: كَيفَ وَإِن يَظهَروا عَلَيكُم لا يَرقُبوا فيكُم إِلًّا وَلا ذِمَّةً ۚ يُرضونَكُم بِأَفواهِهِم وَتَأبىٰ قُلوبُهُم وَأَكثَرُهُم فاسِقونَ
blank: kayf w-ʾ yaẓharū ʿalaykum lā yarqubū fīkum ʾill w-lā dhimmat yurḍūnakum b-ʾafwāhihim w-taʾbā qulūbuhum w-ʾaktharuhum fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: How can there be a treaty while, if they gain dominance over you, they do not observe concerning you any pact of kinship or covenant of protection? They satisfy you with their mouths, but their hearts refuse compliance, and most of them are defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: اشتَرَوا بِآياتِ اللَّهِ ثَمَنًا قَليلًا فَصَدّوا عَن سَبيلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُم ساءَ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: ishtaraw b-ʾāyāt llāh thaman qalīl f-ṣaddū ʿ sabīlihī ʾinnahum sāʾ mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: They have exchanged the signs of Allah for a small price and averted people from His way. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing

arabic_uthmani: لا يَرقُبونَ في مُؤمِنٍ إِلًّا وَلا ذِمَّةً ۚ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُعتَدونَ
blank: lā yarqubūn fī muʾmin ʾill w-lā dhimmat w-ʾulāʾik humul-muʿtadūn
english_saheeh_international: They do not observe toward a believer any pact of kinship or covenant of protection. And it is they who are the transgressors

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن تابوا وَأَقامُوا الصَّلاةَ وَآتَوُا الزَّكاةَ فَإِخوانُكُم فِي الدّينِ ۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ الآياتِ لِقَومٍ يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-ʾ tābū w-ʾaqāmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātaw z-zakāt f-ʾikhwānukum fī d-dīn w-nufaṣṣilul-ʾāyāt l-qawm yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: But if they repent, establish prayer, and give zakah, then they are your brothers in religion; and We detail the verses for a people who know

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن نَكَثوا أَيمانَهُم مِن بَعدِ عَهدِهِم وَطَعَنوا في دينِكُم فَقاتِلوا أَئِمَّةَ الكُفرِ ۙ إِنَّهُم لا أَيمانَ لَهُم لَعَلَّهُم يَنتَهونَ
blank: w-ʾ nakathū ʾaymānahum m baʿd ʿahdihim w-ṭaʿanū fī dīnikum f-qātilū ʾaʾimmatal-kufr ʾinnahum lā ʾaymān lahum laʿallahum yantahūn
english_saheeh_international: And if they break their oaths after their treaty and defame your religion, then fight the leaders of disbelief, for indeed, there are no oaths sacred to them; fight them that they might cease

arabic_uthmani: أَلا تُقاتِلونَ قَومًا نَكَثوا أَيمانَهُم وَهَمّوا بِإِخراجِ الرَّسولِ وَهُم بَدَءوكُم أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۚ أَتَخشَونَهُم ۚ فَاللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخشَوهُ إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾ-lā tuqātilūn qawm nakathū ʾaymānahum w-hammū b-ʾikhrāj r-rasūl w-hum badaʾūkum ʾawwal marrat ʾ-takhshawnahum f-llāh ʾaḥaqq ʾ takhshawh ʾ kuntum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Would you not fight a people who broke their oaths and determined to expel the Messenger, and they had begun the attack upon you the first time? Do you fear them? But Allah has more right that you should fear Him, if you are truly believers

arabic_uthmani: قاتِلوهُم يُعَذِّبهُمُ اللَّهُ بِأَيديكُم وَيُخزِهِم وَيَنصُركُم عَلَيهِم وَيَشفِ صُدورَ قَومٍ مُؤمِنينَ
blank: qātilūhum yuʿadhdhibhum llāh b-ʾaydīkum w-yukhzihim w-yanṣurkum ʿalayhim w-yashf ṣudūr qawm muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Fight them; Allah will punish them by your hands and will disgrace them and give you victory over them and satisfy the breasts of a believing people

arabic_uthmani: وَيُذهِب غَيظَ قُلوبِهِم ۗ وَيَتوبُ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ مَن يَشاءُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-yudhhib ghayẓ qulūbihim w-yatūb llāh ʿalā m yashāʾ w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And remove the fury in the believers' hearts. And Allah turns in forgiveness to whom He wills; and Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: أَم حَسِبتُم أَن تُترَكوا وَلَمّا يَعلَمِ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ جاهَدوا مِنكُم وَلَم يَتَّخِذوا مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَلا رَسولِهِ وَلَا المُؤمِنينَ وَليجَةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ خَبيرٌ بِما تَعمَلونَ
blank: ʾam ḥasibtum ʾ tutrakū w-lammā yaʿlam llāhulladhīn jāhadū minkum w-lam yattakhidhū m dūn llāh w-lā rasūlihī w-lāl-muʾminīn walījat w-llāh khabīr b-mā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Do you think that you will be left as you are while Allah has not yet made evident those among you who strive for His cause and do not take other than Allah, His Messenger and the believers as intimates? And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ لِلمُشرِكينَ أَن يَعمُروا مَساجِدَ اللَّهِ شاهِدينَ عَلىٰ أَنفُسِهِم بِالكُفرِ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ حَبِطَت أَعمالُهُم وَفِي النّارِ هُم خالِدونَ
blank: mā kān l-l-mushrikīn ʾ yaʿmurū masājid llāh shāhidīn ʿalā ʾanfusihim b-l-kufr ʾulāʾik ḥabiṭat ʾaʿmāluhum w-fī n-nār hum khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: It is not for the polytheists to maintain the mosques of Allah while witnessing against themselves with disbelief. For those, their deeds have become worthless, and in the Fire they will abide eternally

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما يَعمُرُ مَساجِدَ اللَّهِ مَن آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ وَأَقامَ الصَّلاةَ وَآتَى الزَّكاةَ وَلَم يَخشَ إِلَّا اللَّهَ ۖ فَعَسىٰ أُولٰئِكَ أَن يَكونوا مِنَ المُهتَدينَ
blank: ʾinnamā yaʿmur masājid llāh m ʾāman b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-ʾaqām ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātā z-zakāt w-lam yakhsh ʾillā llāh f-ʿasā ʾulāʾik ʾ yakūnū minal-muhtadīn
english_saheeh_international: The mosques of Allah are only to be maintained by those who believe in Allah and the Last Day and establish prayer and give zakah and do not fear except Allah, for it is expected that those will be of the rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَجَعَلتُم سِقايَةَ الحاجِّ وَعِمارَةَ المَسجِدِ الحَرامِ كَمَن آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ وَجاهَدَ في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ لا يَستَوونَ عِندَ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: ʾ-jaʿaltum siqāyatal-ḥājj w-ʿimāratal-masjidil-ḥarām k-m ʾāman b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-jāhad fī sabīl llāh lā yastawūn ʿind llāh w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Have you made the providing of water for the pilgrim and the maintenance of al-Masjid al-Haram equal to the deeds of one who believes in Allah and the Last Day and strives in the cause of Allah? They are not equal in the sight of Allah. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَهاجَروا وَجاهَدوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ بِأَموالِهِم وَأَنفُسِهِم أَعظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ اللَّهِ ۚ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الفائِزونَ
blank: alladhīn ʾāmanū w-hājarū w-jāhadū fī sabīl llāh b-ʾamwālihim w-ʾanfusihim ʾaʿẓam darajat ʿind llāh w-ʾulāʾik humul-fāʾizūn
english_saheeh_international: The ones who have believed, emigrated and striven in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives are greater in rank in the sight of Allah. And it is those who are the attainers of success

arabic_uthmani: يُبَشِّرُهُم رَبُّهُم بِرَحمَةٍ مِنهُ وَرِضوانٍ وَجَنّاتٍ لَهُم فيها نَعيمٌ مُقيمٌ
blank: yubashshiruhum rabbuhum b-raḥmat minh w-riḍwān w-jannāt lahum fīhā naʿīm muqīm
english_saheeh_international: Their Lord gives them good tidings of mercy from Him and approval and of gardens for them wherein is enduring pleasure

arabic_uthmani: خالِدينَ فيها أَبَدًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عِندَهُ أَجرٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: khālidīn fīhā ʾabad ʾinn llāh ʿindahū ʾajr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: They will be abiding therein forever. Indeed, Allah has with Him a great reward

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَتَّخِذوا آباءَكُم وَإِخوانَكُم أَولِياءَ إِنِ استَحَبُّوا الكُفرَ عَلَى الإيمانِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّهُم مِنكُم فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā tattakhidhū ʾābāʾakum w-ʾikhwānakum ʾawliyāʾ ʾin staḥabbūl-kufr ʿalāl-ʾīmān w-m yatawallahum minkum f-ʾulāʾik hum ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not take your fathers or your brothers as allies if they have preferred disbelief over belief. And whoever does so among you - then it is those who are the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِن كانَ آباؤُكُم وَأَبناؤُكُم وَإِخوانُكُم وَأَزواجُكُم وَعَشيرَتُكُم وَأَموالٌ اقتَرَفتُموها وَتِجارَةٌ تَخشَونَ كَسادَها وَمَساكِنُ تَرضَونَها أَحَبَّ إِلَيكُم مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ وَجِهادٍ في سَبيلِهِ فَتَرَبَّصوا حَتّىٰ يَأتِيَ اللَّهُ بِأَمرِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الفاسِقينَ
