blank: qul ʾ kān ʾābāʾukum w-ʾabnāʾukum w-ʾikhwānukum w-ʾazwājukum w-ʿashīratukum w-ʾamwāl- qtaraftumūhā w-tijārat takhshawn kasādahā w-masākin tarḍawnahā ʾaḥabb ʾilaykum min llāh w-rasūlihī w-jihād fī sabīlihī f-tarabbaṣū ḥattā yaʾtiy llāh b-ʾamrihī w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawmal-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "If your fathers, your sons, your brothers, your wives, your relatives, wealth which you have obtained, commerce wherein you fear decline, and dwellings with which you are pleased are more beloved to you than Allah and His Messenger and jihad in His cause, then wait until Allah executes His command. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد نَصَرَكُمُ اللَّهُ في مَواطِنَ كَثيرَةٍ ۙ وَيَومَ حُنَينٍ ۙ إِذ أَعجَبَتكُم كَثرَتُكُم فَلَم تُغنِ عَنكُم شَيئًا وَضاقَت عَلَيكُمُ الأَرضُ بِما رَحُبَت ثُمَّ وَلَّيتُم مُدبِرينَ
blank: l-qad naṣarakum llāh fī mawāṭin kathīrat w-yawm ḥunayn ʾidh ʾaʿjabatkum kathratukum f-lam tughn ʿankum shayʾ w-ḍāqat ʿalaykumul-ʾarḍ b-mā raḥubat thumm wallaytum mudbirīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah has already given you victory in many regions and even on the day of Hunayn, when your great number pleased you, but it did not avail you at all, and the earth was confining for you with its vastness; then you turned back, fleeing

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ سَكينَتَهُ عَلىٰ رَسولِهِ وَعَلَى المُؤمِنينَ وَأَنزَلَ جُنودًا لَم تَرَوها وَعَذَّبَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا ۚ وَذٰلِكَ جَزاءُ الكافِرينَ
blank: thumm ʾanzal llāh sakīnatahū ʿalā rasūlihī w-ʿalāl-muʾminīn w-ʾanzal junūd lam tarawhā w-ʿadhdhaballadhīn kafarū w-dhālik jazāʾul-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Then Allah sent down His tranquillity upon His Messenger and upon the believers and sent down soldiers angels whom you did not see and punished those who disbelieved. And that is the recompense of the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ يَتوبُ اللَّهُ مِن بَعدِ ذٰلِكَ عَلىٰ مَن يَشاءُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: thumm yatūb llāh m baʿd dhālik ʿalā m yashāʾ w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Then Allah will accept repentance after that for whom He wills; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِنَّمَا المُشرِكونَ نَجَسٌ فَلا يَقرَبُوا المَسجِدَ الحَرامَ بَعدَ عامِهِم هٰذا ۚ وَإِن خِفتُم عَيلَةً فَسَوفَ يُغنيكُمُ اللَّهُ مِن فَضلِهِ إِن شاءَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾinnamāl-mushrikūn najas f-lā yaqrabūl-masjidal-ḥarām baʿd ʿāmihim hādhā w-ʾ khiftum ʿaylat f-sawf yughnīkum llāh m faḍlihī ʾ shāʾ ʾinn llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, indeed the polytheists are unclean, so let them not approach al-Masjid al-Haram after this, their final year. And if you fear privation, Allah will enrich you from His bounty if He wills. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: قاتِلُوا الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِاللَّهِ وَلا بِاليَومِ الآخِرِ وَلا يُحَرِّمونَ ما حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ وَرَسولُهُ وَلا يَدينونَ دينَ الحَقِّ مِنَ الَّذينَ أوتُوا الكِتابَ حَتّىٰ يُعطُوا الجِزيَةَ عَن يَدٍ وَهُم صاغِرونَ
blank: qātilūlladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-llāh w-lā b-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-lā yuḥarrimūn mā ḥarram llāh w-rasūluhū w-lā yadīnūn dīnal-ḥaqq minalladhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb ḥattā yuʿṭūl-jizyat ʿ yad w-hum ṣāghirūn
english_saheeh_international: Fight those who do not believe in Allah or in the Last Day and who do not consider unlawful what Allah and His Messenger have made unlawful and who do not adopt the religion of truth from those who were given the Scripture - fight until they give the jizyah willingly while they are humbled

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَتِ اليَهودُ عُزَيرٌ ابنُ اللَّهِ وَقالَتِ النَّصارَى المَسيحُ ابنُ اللَّهِ ۖ ذٰلِكَ قَولُهُم بِأَفواهِهِم ۖ يُضاهِئونَ قَولَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِن قَبلُ ۚ قاتَلَهُمُ اللَّهُ ۚ أَنّىٰ يُؤفَكونَ
blank: w-qālatil-yahūd ʿuzayr- bn llāh w-qālat n-naṣārāl-masīḥ bn llāh dhālik qawluhum b-ʾafwāhihim yuḍāhiʾūn qawlalladhīn kafarū m qabl qātalahum llāh ʾannā yuʾfakūn
english_saheeh_international: The Jews say, "Ezra is the son of Allah "; and the Christians say, "The Messiah is the son of Allah." That is their statement from their mouths; they imitate the saying of those who disbelieved before them. May Allah destroy them; how are they deluded

arabic_uthmani: اتَّخَذوا أَحبارَهُم وَرُهبانَهُم أَربابًا مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَالمَسيحَ ابنَ مَريَمَ وَما أُمِروا إِلّا لِيَعبُدوا إِلٰهًا واحِدًا ۖ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۚ سُبحانَهُ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: ittakhadhū ʾaḥbārahum w-ruhbānahum ʾarbābam-m dūn llāh w-l-masīḥ bn maryam w-mā ʾumirū ʾillā l-yaʿbudū ʾilāh wāḥid lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw subḥānahū ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah, and also the Messiah, the son of Mary. And they were not commanded except to worship one God; there is no deity except Him. Exalted is He above whatever they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: يُريدونَ أَن يُطفِئوا نورَ اللَّهِ بِأَفواهِهِم وَيَأبَى اللَّهُ إِلّا أَن يُتِمَّ نورَهُ وَلَو كَرِهَ الكافِرونَ
blank: yurīdūn ʾ yuṭfiʾū nūr llāh b-ʾafwāhihim w-yaʾbā llāh ʾillā ʾ yutimm nūrahū w-law karihal-kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah refuses except to perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي أَرسَلَ رَسولَهُ بِالهُدىٰ وَدينِ الحَقِّ لِيُظهِرَهُ عَلَى الدّينِ كُلِّهِ وَلَو كَرِهَ المُشرِكونَ
blank: huwalladhī ʾarsal rasūlahū b-l-hudā w-dīnil-ḥaqq l-yuẓhirahū ʿalā d-dīn kullihī w-law karihal-mushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who has sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although they who associate others with Allah dislike it

arabic_uthmani: ۞ يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِنَّ كَثيرًا مِنَ الأَحبارِ وَالرُّهبانِ لَيَأكُلونَ أَموالَ النّاسِ بِالباطِلِ وَيَصُدّونَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَالَّذينَ يَكنِزونَ الذَّهَبَ وَالفِضَّةَ وَلا يُنفِقونَها في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ فَبَشِّرهُم بِعَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾinn kathīram-minal-ʾaḥbār w-r-ruhbān l-yaʾkulūn ʾamwāl n-nās b-l-bāṭil w-yaṣuddūn ʿ sabīl llāh w-lladhīn yaknizūn dh-dhahab w-l-fiḍḍat w-lā yunfiqūnahā fī sabīl llāh f-bashshirhum b-ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, indeed many of the scholars and the monks devour the wealth of people unjustly and avert them from the way of Allah. And those who hoard gold and silver and spend it not in the way of Allah - give them tidings of a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يُحمىٰ عَلَيها في نارِ جَهَنَّمَ فَتُكوىٰ بِها جِباهُهُم وَجُنوبُهُم وَظُهورُهُم ۖ هٰذا ما كَنَزتُم لِأَنفُسِكُم فَذوقوا ما كُنتُم تَكنِزونَ
blank: yawm yuḥmā ʿalayhā fī nār jahannam f-tukwā bihā jibāhuhum w-junūbuhum w-ẓuhūruhum hādhā mā kanaztum l-ʾanfusikum f-dhūqū mā kuntum taknizūn
english_saheeh_international: The Day when it will be heated in the fire of Hell and seared therewith will be their foreheads, their flanks, and their backs, it will be said, "This is what you hoarded for yourselves, so taste what you used to hoard

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ عِدَّةَ الشُّهورِ عِندَ اللَّهِ اثنا عَشَرَ شَهرًا في كِتابِ اللَّهِ يَومَ خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ مِنها أَربَعَةٌ حُرُمٌ ۚ ذٰلِكَ الدّينُ القَيِّمُ ۚ فَلا تَظلِموا فيهِنَّ أَنفُسَكُم ۚ وَقاتِلُوا المُشرِكينَ كافَّةً كَما يُقاتِلونَكُم كافَّةً ۚ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ المُتَّقينَ
blank: ʾinn ʿiddat sh-shuhūr ʿind llāh thnā ʿashar shahr fī kitāb llāh yawm khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ minhā ʾarbaʿat ḥurum dhālik d-dīnul-qayyim f-lā taẓlimū fīhinn ʾanfusakum w-qātilūl-mushrikīn kāffat k-mā yuqātilūnakum kāffat w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh maʿal-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the number of months with Allah is twelve lunar months in the register of Allah from the day He created the heavens and the earth; of these, four are sacred. That is the correct religion, so do not wrong yourselves during them. And fight against the disbelievers collectively as they fight against you collectively. And know that Allah is with the righteous who fear Him

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّمَا النَّسيءُ زِيادَةٌ فِي الكُفرِ ۖ يُضَلُّ بِهِ الَّذينَ كَفَروا يُحِلّونَهُ عامًا وَيُحَرِّمونَهُ عامًا لِيُواطِئوا عِدَّةَ ما حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ فَيُحِلّوا ما حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ ۚ زُيِّنَ لَهُم سوءُ أَعمالِهِم ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الكافِرينَ
blank: ʾinnamā n-nasīʾ ziyādat fīl-kufr yuḍall bihilladhīn kafarū yuḥillūnahū ʿām w-yuḥarrimūnahū ʿām l-yuwāṭiʾū ʿiddat mā ḥarram llāh f-yuḥillū mā ḥarram llāh zuyyin lahum sūʾ ʾaʿmālihim w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawmal-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the postponing of restriction within sacred months is an increase in disbelief by which those who have disbelieved are led further astray. They make it lawful one year and unlawful another year to correspond to the number made unlawful by Allah and thus make lawful what Allah has made unlawful. Made pleasing to them is the evil of their deeds; and Allah does not guide the disbelieving people

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا ما لَكُم إِذا قيلَ لَكُمُ انفِروا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ اثّاقَلتُم إِلَى الأَرضِ ۚ أَرَضيتُم بِالحَياةِ الدُّنيا مِنَ الآخِرَةِ ۚ فَما مَتاعُ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا فِي الآخِرَةِ إِلّا قَليلٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū mā lakum ʾidhā qīl lakum nfirū fī sabīl llāh ththāqaltum ʾilāl-ʾarḍ ʾ-raḍītum b-l-ḥayāt d-dunyā minal-ʾākhirat f-mā matāʿul-ḥayāt d-dunyā fīl-ʾākhirat ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, what is the matter with you that, when you are told to go forth in the cause of Allah, you adhere heavily to the earth? Are you satisfied with the life of this world rather than the Hereafter? But what is the enjoyment of worldly life compared to the Hereafter except a very little

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا تَنفِروا يُعَذِّبكُم عَذابًا أَليمًا وَيَستَبدِل قَومًا غَيرَكُم وَلا تَضُرّوهُ شَيئًا ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: ʾillā tanfirū yuʿadhdhibkum ʿadhāb ʾalīm w-yastabdil qawm ghayrakum w-lā taḍurrūh shayʾ w-llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: If you do not go forth, He will punish you with a painful punishment and will replace you with another people, and you will not harm Him at all. And Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا تَنصُروهُ فَقَد نَصَرَهُ اللَّهُ إِذ أَخرَجَهُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا ثانِيَ اثنَينِ إِذ هُما فِي الغارِ إِذ يَقولُ لِصاحِبِهِ لا تَحزَن إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَنا ۖ فَأَنزَلَ اللَّهُ سَكينَتَهُ عَلَيهِ وَأَيَّدَهُ بِجُنودٍ لَم تَرَوها وَجَعَلَ كَلِمَةَ الَّذينَ كَفَرُوا السُّفلىٰ ۗ وَكَلِمَةُ اللَّهِ هِيَ العُليا ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: ʾillā tanṣurūh f-qad naṣarah llāh ʾidh ʾakhrajahulladhīn kafarū thāniy thnayn ʾidh humā fīl-ghār ʾidh yaqūl l-ṣāḥibihī lā taḥz ʾinn llāh maʿanā f-ʾanzal llāh sakīnatahū ʿalayh w-ʾayyadahū b-junūd lam tarawhā w-jaʿal kalimatalladhīn kafarū s-suflā w-kalimat llāh hiyal-ʿulyā w-llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm-
english_saheeh_international: If you do not aid the Prophet - Allah has already aided him when those who disbelieved had driven him out of Makkah as one of two, when they were in the cave and he said to his companion, "Do not grieve; indeed Allah is with us." And Allah sent down his tranquillity upon him and supported him with angels you did not see and made the word of those who disbelieved the lowest, while the word of Allah - that is the highest. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: انفِروا خِفافًا وَثِقالًا وَجاهِدوا بِأَموالِكُم وَأَنفُسِكُم في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذٰلِكُم خَيرٌ لَكُم إِن كُنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: infirū khifāf w-thiqāl w-jāhidū b-ʾamwālikum w-ʾanfusikum fī sabīl llāh dhālikum khayr lakum ʾ kuntum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Go forth, whether light or heavy, and strive with your wealth and your lives in the cause of Allah. That is better for you, if you only knew

arabic_uthmani: لَو كانَ عَرَضًا قَريبًا وَسَفَرًا قاصِدًا لَاتَّبَعوكَ وَلٰكِن بَعُدَت عَلَيهِمُ الشُّقَّةُ ۚ وَسَيَحلِفونَ بِاللَّهِ لَوِ استَطَعنا لَخَرَجنا مَعَكُم يُهلِكونَ أَنفُسَهُم وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ إِنَّهُم لَكاذِبونَ
blank: law kān ʿaraḍ qarīb w-safar qāṣid l-ttabaʿūk w-lāk baʿudat ʿalayhim sh-shuqqat w-s-yaḥlifūn b-llāh law staṭaʿnā l-kharajnā maʿakum yuhlikūn ʾanfusahum w-llāh yaʿlam ʾinnahum l-kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: Had it been an easy gain and a moderate trip, the hypocrites would have followed you, but distant to them was the journey. And they will swear by Allah, "If we were able, we would have gone forth with you," destroying themselves through false oaths, and Allah knows that indeed they are liars

arabic_uthmani: عَفَا اللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُم حَتّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ الَّذينَ صَدَقوا وَتَعلَمَ الكاذِبينَ
blank: ʿafā llāh ʿank l-m ʾadhint lahum ḥattā yatabayyan lakalladhīn ṣadaqū w-taʿlamal-kādhibīn
english_saheeh_international: May Allah pardon you, O Muhammad; why did you give them permission to remain behind? You should not have until it was evident to you who were truthful and you knew who were the liars

arabic_uthmani: لا يَستَأذِنُكَ الَّذينَ يُؤمِنونَ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ أَن يُجاهِدوا بِأَموالِهِم وَأَنفُسِهِم ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ بِالمُتَّقينَ
blank: lā yastaʾdhinukalladhīn yuʾminūn b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir ʾ yujāhidū b-ʾamwālihim w-ʾanfusihim w-llāh ʿalīm b-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Those who believe in Allah and the Last Day would not ask permission of you to be excused from striving with their wealth and their lives. And Allah is Knowing of those who fear Him

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما يَستَأذِنُكَ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ وَارتابَت قُلوبُهُم فَهُم في رَيبِهِم يَتَرَدَّدونَ
blank: ʾinnamā yastaʾdhinukalladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-rtābat qulūbuhum f-hum fī raybihim yataraddadūn
english_saheeh_international: Only those would ask permission of you who do not believe in Allah and the Last Day and whose hearts have doubted, and they, in their doubt, are hesitating

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَو أَرادُوا الخُروجَ لَأَعَدّوا لَهُ عُدَّةً وَلٰكِن كَرِهَ اللَّهُ انبِعاثَهُم فَثَبَّطَهُم وَقيلَ اقعُدوا مَعَ القاعِدينَ
blank: w-law ʾarādūl-khurūj l-ʾaʿaddū lahū ʿuddat w-lāk karih llāh nbiʿāthahum f-thabbaṭahum w-qīl qʿudū maʿal-qāʿidīn
english_saheeh_international: And if they had intended to go forth, they would have prepared for it some preparation. But Allah disliked their being sent, so He kept them back, and they were told, "Remain behind with those who remain

arabic_uthmani: لَو خَرَجوا فيكُم ما زادوكُم إِلّا خَبالًا وَلَأَوضَعوا خِلالَكُم يَبغونَكُمُ الفِتنَةَ وَفيكُم سَمّاعونَ لَهُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ بِالظّالِمينَ
blank: law kharajū fīkum mā zādūkum ʾillā khabāl w-l-ʾawḍaʿū khilālakum yabghūnakumul-fitnat w-fīkum sammāʿūn lahum w-llāh ʿalīm b-ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Had they gone forth with you, they would not have increased you except in confusion, and they would have been active among you, seeking to cause you fitnah. And among you are avid listeners to them. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: لَقَدِ ابتَغَوُا الفِتنَةَ مِن قَبلُ وَقَلَّبوا لَكَ الأُمورَ حَتّىٰ جاءَ الحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ أَمرُ اللَّهِ وَهُم كارِهونَ
blank: l-qad btaghawul-fitnat m qabl w-qallabū lakal-ʾumūr ḥattā jāʾal-ḥaqq w-ẓahar ʾamr llāh w-hum kārihūn
english_saheeh_international: They had already desired dissension before and had upset matters for you until the truth came and the ordinance of Allah appeared, while they were averse

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنهُم مَن يَقولُ ائذَن لي وَلا تَفتِنّي ۚ أَلا فِي الفِتنَةِ سَقَطوا ۗ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحيطَةٌ بِالكافِرينَ
blank: w-minhum m yaqūl ʾdh lī w-lā taftinnī ʾ-lā fīl-fitnat saqaṭū w-ʾinn jahannam l-muḥīṭat b-l-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And among them is he who says, "Permit me to remain at home and do not put me to trial." Unquestionably, into trial they have fallen. And indeed, Hell will encompass the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: إِن تُصِبكَ حَسَنَةٌ تَسُؤهُم ۖ وَإِن تُصِبكَ مُصيبَةٌ يَقولوا قَد أَخَذنا أَمرَنا مِن قَبلُ وَيَتَوَلَّوا وَهُم فَرِحونَ
blank: ʾ tuṣibk ḥasanat tasuʾhum w-ʾ tuṣibk muṣībat yaqūlū qad ʾakhadhnā ʾamranā m qabl w-yatawallaw w-hum fariḥūn
english_saheeh_international: If good befalls you, it distresses them; but if disaster strikes you, they say, "We took our matter in hand before," and turn away while they are rejoicing

arabic_uthmani: قُل لَن يُصيبَنا إِلّا ما كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنا هُوَ مَولانا ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَليَتَوَكَّلِ المُؤمِنونَ
blank: qul l yuṣībanā ʾillā mā katab llāh lanā huw mawlānā w-ʿalā llāh f-l-yatawakkalil-muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us; He is our protector." And upon Allah let the believers rely

arabic_uthmani: قُل هَل تَرَبَّصونَ بِنا إِلّا إِحدَى الحُسنَيَينِ ۖ وَنَحنُ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُم أَن يُصيبَكُمُ اللَّهُ بِعَذابٍ مِن عِندِهِ أَو بِأَيدينا ۖ فَتَرَبَّصوا إِنّا مَعَكُم مُتَرَبِّصونَ
blank: qul hal tarabbaṣūn binā ʾillā ʾiḥdāl-ḥusnayayn w-naḥn natarabbaṣ bikum ʾ yuṣībakum llāh b-ʿadhāb m ʿindihī ʾaw b-ʾaydīnā f-tarabbaṣū ʾinnā maʿakum mutarabbiṣūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Do you await for us except one of the two best things while we await for you that Allah will afflict you with punishment from Himself or at our hands? So wait; indeed we, along with you, are waiting

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَنفِقوا طَوعًا أَو كَرهًا لَن يُتَقَبَّلَ مِنكُم ۖ إِنَّكُم كُنتُم قَومًا فاسِقينَ
blank: qul ʾanfiqū ṭawʿ ʾaw karh l yutaqabbal minkum ʾinnakum kuntum qawm fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Spend willingly or unwillingly; never will it be accepted from you. Indeed, you have been a defiantly disobedient people

arabic_uthmani: وَما مَنَعَهُم أَن تُقبَلَ مِنهُم نَفَقاتُهُم إِلّا أَنَّهُم كَفَروا بِاللَّهِ وَبِرَسولِهِ وَلا يَأتونَ الصَّلاةَ إِلّا وَهُم كُسالىٰ وَلا يُنفِقونَ إِلّا وَهُم كارِهونَ
blank: w-mā manaʿahum ʾ tuqbal minhum nafaqātuhum ʾillā ʾannahum kafarū b-llāh w-b-rasūlihī w-lā yaʾtūn ṣ-ṣalāt ʾillā w-hum kusālā w-lā yunfiqūn ʾillā w-hum kārihūn
english_saheeh_international: And what prevents their expenditures from being accepted from them but that they have disbelieved in Allah and in His Messenger and that they come not to prayer except while they are lazy and that they do not spend except while they are unwilling

arabic_uthmani: فَلا تُعجِبكَ أَموالُهُم وَلا أَولادُهُم ۚ إِنَّما يُريدُ اللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُم بِها فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَتَزهَقَ أَنفُسُهُم وَهُم كافِرونَ
blank: f-lā tuʿjibk ʾamwāluhum w-lā ʾawlāduhum ʾinnamā yurīd llāh l-yuʿadhdhibahum bihā fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-tazhaq ʾanfusuhum w-hum kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: So let not their wealth or their children impress you. Allah only intends to punish them through them in worldly life and that their souls should depart at death while they are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَيَحلِفونَ بِاللَّهِ إِنَّهُم لَمِنكُم وَما هُم مِنكُم وَلٰكِنَّهُم قَومٌ يَفرَقونَ
blank: w-yaḥlifūn b-llāh ʾinnahum l-minkum w-mā hum minkum w-lākinnahum qawm yafraqūn
english_saheeh_international: And they swear by Allah that they are from among you while they are not from among you; but they are a people who are afraid

arabic_uthmani: لَو يَجِدونَ مَلجَأً أَو مَغاراتٍ أَو مُدَّخَلًا لَوَلَّوا إِلَيهِ وَهُم يَجمَحونَ
blank: law yajidūn maljaʾ ʾaw maghārāt ʾaw muddakhal l-wallaw ʾilayh w-hum yajmaḥūn
english_saheeh_international: If they could find a refuge or some caves or any place to enter and hide, they would turn to it while they run heedlessly

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنهُم مَن يَلمِزُكَ فِي الصَّدَقاتِ فَإِن أُعطوا مِنها رَضوا وَإِن لَم يُعطَوا مِنها إِذا هُم يَسخَطونَ
blank: w-minhum m yalmizuk fī ṣ-ṣadaqāt f-ʾ ʾuʿṭū minhā raḍū w-ʾ lam yuʿṭaw minhā ʾidhā hum yaskhaṭūn
english_saheeh_international: And among them are some who criticize you concerning the distribution of charities. If they are given from them, they approve; but if they are not given from them, at once they become angry

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو أَنَّهُم رَضوا ما آتاهُمُ اللَّهُ وَرَسولُهُ وَقالوا حَسبُنَا اللَّهُ سَيُؤتينَا اللَّهُ مِن فَضلِهِ وَرَسولُهُ إِنّا إِلَى اللَّهِ راغِبونَ
blank: w-law ʾannahum raḍū mā ʾātāhum llāh w-rasūluhū w-qālū ḥasbunā llāh s-yuʾtīnā llāh m faḍlihī w-rasūluhū ʾinnā ʾilā llāh rāghibūn
english_saheeh_international: If only they had been satisfied with what Allah and His Messenger gave them and said, "Sufficient for us is Allah; Allah will give us of His bounty, and so will His Messenger; indeed, we are desirous toward Allah," it would have been better for them

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّمَا الصَّدَقاتُ لِلفُقَراءِ وَالمَساكينِ وَالعامِلينَ عَلَيها وَالمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلوبُهُم وَفِي الرِّقابِ وَالغارِمينَ وَفي سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَابنِ السَّبيلِ ۖ فَريضَةً مِنَ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: ʾinnamā ṣ-ṣadaqāt l-l-fuqarāʾ w-l-masākīn w-l-ʿāmilīn ʿalayhā w-l-muʾallafat qulūbuhum w-fī r-riqāb w-l-ghārimīn w-fī sabīl llāh w-bn s-sabīl farīḍatam-min llāh w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Zakah expenditures are only for the poor and for the needy and for those employed to collect zakah and for bringing hearts together for Islam and for freeing captives or slaves and for those in debt and for the cause of Allah and for the stranded traveler - an obligation imposed by Allah. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنهُمُ الَّذينَ يُؤذونَ النَّبِيَّ وَيَقولونَ هُوَ أُذُنٌ ۚ قُل أُذُنُ خَيرٍ لَكُم يُؤمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَيُؤمِنُ لِلمُؤمِنينَ وَرَحمَةٌ لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا مِنكُم ۚ وَالَّذينَ يُؤذونَ رَسولَ اللَّهِ لَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: w-minhumulladhīn yuʾdhūn n-nabiyy w-yaqūlūn huw ʾudhun qul ʾudhun khayr lakum yuʾmin b-llāh w-yuʾmin l-l-muʾminīn w-raḥmat l-lladhīn ʾāmanū minkum w-lladhīn yuʾdhūn rasūl llāh lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And among them are those who abuse the Prophet and say, "He is an ear." Say, "It is an ear of goodness for you that believes in Allah and believes the believers and is a mercy to those who believe among you." And those who abuse the Messenger of Allah - for them is a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: يَحلِفونَ بِاللَّهِ لَكُم لِيُرضوكُم وَاللَّهُ وَرَسولُهُ أَحَقُّ أَن يُرضوهُ إِن كانوا مُؤمِنينَ
blank: yaḥlifūn b-llāh lakum l-yurḍūkum w-llāh w-rasūluhū ʾaḥaqq ʾ yurḍūh ʾ kānū muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: They swear by Allah to you Muslims to satisfy you. But Allah and His Messenger are more worthy for them to satisfy, if they should be believers

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَعلَموا أَنَّهُ مَن يُحادِدِ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ فَأَنَّ لَهُ نارَ جَهَنَّمَ خالِدًا فيها ۚ ذٰلِكَ الخِزيُ العَظيمُ
blank: ʾ-lam yaʿlamū ʾannahū m yuḥādid llāh w-rasūlahū f-ʾann lahū nār jahannam khālid fīhā dhālikal-khizyul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Do they not know that whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger - that for him is the fire of Hell, wherein he will abide eternally? That is the great disgrace

arabic_uthmani: يَحذَرُ المُنافِقونَ أَن تُنَزَّلَ عَلَيهِم سورَةٌ تُنَبِّئُهُم بِما في قُلوبِهِم ۚ قُلِ استَهزِئوا إِنَّ اللَّهَ مُخرِجٌ ما تَحذَرونَ
blank: yaḥdharul-munāfiqūn ʾ tunazzal ʿalayhim sūrat tunabbiʾuhum b-mā fī qulūbihim qul stahziʾū ʾinn llāh mukhrij mā taḥdharūn
english_saheeh_international: They hypocrites are apprehensive lest a surah be revealed about them, informing them of what is in their hearts. Say, "Mock as you wish; indeed, Allah will expose that which you fear

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن سَأَلتَهُم لَيَقولُنَّ إِنَّما كُنّا نَخوضُ وَنَلعَبُ ۚ قُل أَبِاللَّهِ وَآياتِهِ وَرَسولِهِ كُنتُم تَستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ saʾaltahum l-yaqūlunn ʾinnamā kunnā nakhūḍ w-nalʿab qul ʾ-b-llāh w-ʾāyātihī w-rasūlihī kuntum tastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you ask them, they will surely say, "We were only conversing and playing." Say, "Is it Allah and His verses and His Messenger that you were mocking

arabic_uthmani: لا تَعتَذِروا قَد كَفَرتُم بَعدَ إيمانِكُم ۚ إِن نَعفُ عَن طائِفَةٍ مِنكُم نُعَذِّب طائِفَةً بِأَنَّهُم كانوا مُجرِمينَ
blank: lā taʿtadhirū qad kafartum baʿd ʾīmānikum ʾ naʿf ʿ ṭāʾifat minkum nuʿadhdhib ṭāʾifat b-ʾannahum kānū mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Make no excuse; you have disbelieved after your belief. If We pardon one faction of you - We will punish another faction because they were criminals

arabic_uthmani: المُنافِقونَ وَالمُنافِقاتُ بَعضُهُم مِن بَعضٍ ۚ يَأمُرونَ بِالمُنكَرِ وَيَنهَونَ عَنِ المَعروفِ وَيَقبِضونَ أَيدِيَهُم ۚ نَسُوا اللَّهَ فَنَسِيَهُم ۗ إِنَّ المُنافِقينَ هُمُ الفاسِقونَ
blank: al-munāfiqūn w-l-munāfiqāt baʿḍuhum m baʿḍ yaʾmurūn b-l-munkar w-yanhawn ʿanil-maʿrūf w-yaqbiḍūn ʾaydiyahum nasū llāh f-nasiyahum ʾinnal-munāfiqīn humul-fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: The hypocrite men and hypocrite women are of one another. They enjoin what is wrong and forbid what is right and close their hands. They have forgotten Allah, so He has forgotten them accordingly. Indeed, the hypocrites - it is they who are the defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: وَعَدَ اللَّهُ المُنافِقينَ وَالمُنافِقاتِ وَالكُفّارَ نارَ جَهَنَّمَ خالِدينَ فيها ۚ هِيَ حَسبُهُم ۚ وَلَعَنَهُمُ اللَّهُ ۖ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ مُقيمٌ
blank: waʿad llāhul-munāfiqīn w-l-munāfiqāt w-l-kuffār nār jahannam khālidīn fīhā hiy ḥasbuhum w-laʿanahum llāh w-lahum ʿadhāb muqīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah has promised the hypocrite men and hypocrite women and the disbelievers the fire of Hell, wherein they will abide eternally. It is sufficient for them. And Allah has cursed them, and for them is an enduring punishment

arabic_uthmani: كَالَّذينَ مِن قَبلِكُم كانوا أَشَدَّ مِنكُم قُوَّةً وَأَكثَرَ أَموالًا وَأَولادًا فَاستَمتَعوا بِخَلاقِهِم فَاستَمتَعتُم بِخَلاقِكُم كَمَا استَمتَعَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِكُم بِخَلاقِهِم وَخُضتُم كَالَّذي خاضوا ۚ أُولٰئِكَ حَبِطَت أَعمالُهُم فِي الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةِ ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: k-lladhīn m qablikum kānū ʾashadd minkum quwwat w-ʾakthar ʾamwāl w-ʾawlād f-stamtaʿū b-khalāqihim f-stamtaʿtum b-khalāqikum k-mā stamtaʿalladhīn m qablikum b-khalāqihim w-khuḍtum k-lladhī khāḍū ʾulāʾik ḥabiṭat ʾaʿmāluhum fī d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat w-ʾulāʾik humul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: You disbelievers are like those before you; they were stronger than you in power and more abundant in wealth and children. They enjoyed their portion of worldly enjoyment, and you have enjoyed your portion as those before you enjoyed their portion, and you have engaged in vanities like that in which they engaged. It is those whose deeds have become worthless in this world and in the Hereafter, and it is they who are the losers

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَأتِهِم نَبَأُ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم قَومِ نوحٍ وَعادٍ وَثَمودَ وَقَومِ إِبراهيمَ وَأَصحابِ مَديَنَ وَالمُؤتَفِكاتِ ۚ أَتَتهُم رُسُلُهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ ۖ فَما كانَ اللَّهُ لِيَظلِمَهُم وَلٰكِن كانوا أَنفُسَهُم يَظلِمونَ
blank: ʾ-lam yaʾtihim nabaʾulladhīn m qablihim qawm nūḥ w-ʿād w-thamūd w-qawm ʾibrāhīm w-ʾaṣḥāb madyan w-l-muʾtafikāt ʾatathum rusuluhum b-l-bayyināt f-mā kān llāh l-yaẓlimahum w-lāk kānū ʾanfusahum yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: Has there not reached them the news of those before them - the people of Noah and the tribes of 'Aad and Thamud and the people of Abraham and the companions of Madyan and the towns overturned? Their messengers came to them with clear proofs. And Allah would never have wronged them, but they were wronging themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَالمُؤمِنونَ وَالمُؤمِناتُ بَعضُهُم أَولِياءُ بَعضٍ ۚ يَأمُرونَ بِالمَعروفِ وَيَنهَونَ عَنِ المُنكَرِ وَيُقيمونَ الصَّلاةَ وَيُؤتونَ الزَّكاةَ وَيُطيعونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ سَيَرحَمُهُمُ اللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-l-muʾminūn w-l-muʾmināt baʿḍuhum ʾawliyāʾ baʿḍ yaʾmurūn b-l-maʿrūf w-yanhawn ʿanil-munkar w-yuqīmūn ṣ-ṣalāt w-yuʾtūn z-zakāt w-yuṭīʿūn llāh w-rasūlahū ʾulāʾik s-yarḥamuhum llāh ʾinn llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: The believing men and believing women are allies of one another. They enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong and establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. Those - Allah will have mercy upon them. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَعَدَ اللَّهُ المُؤمِنينَ وَالمُؤمِناتِ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها وَمَساكِنَ طَيِّبَةً في جَنّاتِ عَدنٍ ۚ وَرِضوانٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ أَكبَرُ ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: waʿad llāhul-muʾminīn w-l-muʾmināt jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā w-masākin ṭayyibat fī jannāt ʿadn w-riḍwān min llāh ʾakbar dhālik huwal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah has promised the believing men and believing women gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally, and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence; but approval from Allah is greater. It is that which is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ جاهِدِ الكُفّارَ وَالمُنافِقينَ وَاغلُظ عَلَيهِم ۚ وَمَأواهُم جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئسَ المَصيرُ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy jāhidil-kuffār w-l-munāfiqīn w-ghluẓ ʿalayhim w-maʾwāhum jahannam w-biʾsal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, fight against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination

arabic_uthmani: يَحلِفونَ بِاللَّهِ ما قالوا وَلَقَد قالوا كَلِمَةَ الكُفرِ وَكَفَروا بَعدَ إِسلامِهِم وَهَمّوا بِما لَم يَنالوا ۚ وَما نَقَموا إِلّا أَن أَغناهُمُ اللَّهُ وَرَسولُهُ مِن فَضلِهِ ۚ فَإِن يَتوبوا يَكُ خَيرًا لَهُم ۖ وَإِن يَتَوَلَّوا يُعَذِّبهُمُ اللَّهُ عَذابًا أَليمًا فِي الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةِ ۚ وَما لَهُم فِي الأَرضِ مِن وَلِيٍّ وَلا نَصيرٍ
blank: yaḥlifūn b-llāh mā qālū w-l-qad qālū kalimatal-kufr w-kafarū baʿd ʾislāmihim w-hammū b-mā lam yanālū w-mā naqamū ʾillā ʾ ʾaghnāhum llāh w-rasūluhū m faḍlihī f-ʾ yatūbū yak khayr lahum w-ʾ yatawallaw yuʿadhdhibhum llāh ʿadhāb ʾalīm fī d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat w-mā lahum fīl-ʾarḍ m waliyy w-lā naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: They swear by Allah that they did not say anything against the Prophet while they had said the word of disbelief and disbelieved after their pretense of Islam and planned that which they were not to attain. And they were not resentful except for the fact that Allah and His Messenger had enriched them of His bounty. So if they repent, it is better for them; but if they turn away, Allah will punish them with a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. And there will not be for them on earth any protector or helper

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَمِنهُم مَن عاهَدَ اللَّهَ لَئِن آتانا مِن فَضلِهِ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكونَنَّ مِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: w-minhum m ʿāhad llāh l-ʾ ʾātānā m faḍlihī l-naṣṣaddaqann w-l-nakūnann min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And among them are those who made a covenant with Allah, saying, "If He should give us from His bounty, we will surely spend in charity, and we will surely be among the righteous

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا آتاهُم مِن فَضلِهِ بَخِلوا بِهِ وَتَوَلَّوا وَهُم مُعرِضونَ
blank: f-lammā ʾātāhum m faḍlihī bakhilū bihī w-tawallaw w-hum muʿriḍūn
english_saheeh_international: But when he gave them from His bounty, they were stingy with it and turned away while they refused

arabic_uthmani: فَأَعقَبَهُم نِفاقًا في قُلوبِهِم إِلىٰ يَومِ يَلقَونَهُ بِما أَخلَفُوا اللَّهَ ما وَعَدوهُ وَبِما كانوا يَكذِبونَ
blank: f-ʾaʿqabahum nifāq fī qulūbihim ʾilā yawm yalqawnahū b-mā ʾakhlafū llāh mā waʿadūh w-b-mā kānū yakdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: So He penalized them with hypocrisy in their hearts until the Day they will meet Him - because they failed Allah in what they promised Him and because they habitually used to lie

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعلَمُ سِرَّهُم وَنَجواهُم وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ عَلّامُ الغُيوبِ
blank: ʾ-lam yaʿlamū ʾann llāh yaʿlam sirrahum w-najwāhum w-ʾann llāh ʿallāmul-ghuyūb
english_saheeh_international: Did they not know that Allah knows their secrets and their private conversations and that Allah is the Knower of the unseen

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَلمِزونَ المُطَّوِّعينَ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ فِي الصَّدَقاتِ وَالَّذينَ لا يَجِدونَ إِلّا جُهدَهُم فَيَسخَرونَ مِنهُم ۙ سَخِرَ اللَّهُ مِنهُم وَلَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: alladhīn yalmizūnal-muṭṭawwiʿīn minal-muʾminīn fī ṣ-ṣadaqāt w-lladhīn lā yajidūn ʾillā juhdahum f-yaskharūn minhum sakhir llāh minhum w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm-
english_saheeh_international: Those who criticize the contributors among the believers concerning their charities and criticize the ones who find nothing to spend except their effort, so they ridicule them - Allah will ridicule them, and they will have a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: استَغفِر لَهُم أَو لا تَستَغفِر لَهُم إِن تَستَغفِر لَهُم سَبعينَ مَرَّةً فَلَن يَغفِرَ اللَّهُ لَهُم ۚ ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم كَفَروا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الفاسِقينَ
blank: istaghfir lahum ʾaw lā tastaghfir lahum ʾ tastaghfir lahum sabʿīn marrat f-l yaghfir llāh lahum dhālik b-ʾannahum kafarū b-llāh w-rasūlihī w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawmal-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Ask forgiveness for them, O Muhammad, or do not ask forgiveness for them. If you should ask forgiveness for them seventy times - never will Allah forgive them. That is because they disbelieved in Allah and His Messenger, and Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people

arabic_uthmani: فَرِحَ المُخَلَّفونَ بِمَقعَدِهِم خِلافَ رَسولِ اللَّهِ وَكَرِهوا أَن يُجاهِدوا بِأَموالِهِم وَأَنفُسِهِم في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَقالوا لا تَنفِروا فِي الحَرِّ ۗ قُل نارُ جَهَنَّمَ أَشَدُّ حَرًّا ۚ لَو كانوا يَفقَهونَ
blank: fariḥal-mukhallafūn b-maqʿadihim khilāf rasūl llāh w-karihū ʾ yujāhidū b-ʾamwālihim w-ʾanfusihim fī sabīl llāh w-qālū lā tanfirū fīl-ḥarr qul nār jahannam ʾashadd ḥarr law kānū yafqahūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who remained behind rejoiced in their staying at home after the departure of the Messenger of Allah and disliked to strive with their wealth and their lives in the cause of Allah and said, "Do not go forth in the heat." Say, "The fire of Hell is more intensive in heat" - if they would but understand

arabic_uthmani: فَليَضحَكوا قَليلًا وَليَبكوا كَثيرًا جَزاءً بِما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: f-l-yaḍḥakū qalīl w-l-yabkū kathīr jazāʾ b-mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: So let them laugh a little and then weep much as recompense for what they used to earn

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن رَجَعَكَ اللَّهُ إِلىٰ طائِفَةٍ مِنهُم فَاستَأذَنوكَ لِلخُروجِ فَقُل لَن تَخرُجوا مَعِيَ أَبَدًا وَلَن تُقاتِلوا مَعِيَ عَدُوًّا ۖ إِنَّكُم رَضيتُم بِالقُعودِ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ فَاقعُدوا مَعَ الخالِفينَ
blank: f-ʾ rajaʿak llāh ʾilā ṭāʾifat minhum f-staʾdhanūk l-l-khurūj f-qul l takhrujū maʿiy ʾabad w-l tuqātilū maʿiy ʿaduww ʾinnakum raḍītum b-l-quʿūd ʾawwal marrat f-qʿudū maʿal-khālifīn
english_saheeh_international: If Allah should return you to a faction of them after the expedition and then they ask your permission to go out to battle, say, "You will not go out with me, ever, and you will never fight with me an enemy. Indeed, you were satisfied with sitting at home the first time, so sit now with those who stay behind

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تُصَلِّ عَلىٰ أَحَدٍ مِنهُم ماتَ أَبَدًا وَلا تَقُم عَلىٰ قَبرِهِ ۖ إِنَّهُم كَفَروا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ وَماتوا وَهُم فاسِقونَ
blank: w-lā tuṣall ʿalā ʾaḥad minhum māt ʾabad w-lā taqum ʿalā qabrihī ʾinnahum kafarū b-llāh w-rasūlihī w-mātū w-hum fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not pray the funeral prayer, O Muhammad, over any of them who has died - ever - or stand at his grave. Indeed, they disbelieved in Allah and His Messenger and died while they were defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تُعجِبكَ أَموالُهُم وَأَولادُهُم ۚ إِنَّما يُريدُ اللَّهُ أَن يُعَذِّبَهُم بِها فِي الدُّنيا وَتَزهَقَ أَنفُسُهُم وَهُم كافِرونَ
blank: w-lā tuʿjibk ʾamwāluhum w-ʾawlāduhum ʾinnamā yurīd llāh ʾ yuʿadhdhibahum bihā fī d-dunyā w-tazhaq ʾanfusuhum w-hum kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: And let not their wealth and their children impress you. Allah only intends to punish them through them in this world and that their souls should depart at death while they are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا أُنزِلَت سورَةٌ أَن آمِنوا بِاللَّهِ وَجاهِدوا مَعَ رَسولِهِ استَأذَنَكَ أُولُو الطَّولِ مِنهُم وَقالوا ذَرنا نَكُن مَعَ القاعِدينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā ʾunzilat sūrat ʾ ʾāminū b-llāh w-jāhidū maʿ rasūlih staʾdhanak ʾulū ṭ-ṭawl minhum w-qālū dharnā nak maʿal-qāʿidīn
english_saheeh_international: And when a surah was revealed enjoining them to believe in Allah and to fight with His Messenger, those of wealth among them asked your permission to stay back and said, "Leave us to be with them who sit at home

arabic_uthmani: رَضوا بِأَن يَكونوا مَعَ الخَوالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم فَهُم لا يَفقَهونَ
blank: raḍū b-ʾ yakūnū maʿal-khawālif w-ṭubiʿ ʿalā qulūbihim f-hum lā yafqahūn
english_saheeh_international: They were satisfied to be with those who stay behind, and their hearts were sealed over, so they do not understand

arabic_uthmani: لٰكِنِ الرَّسولُ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مَعَهُ جاهَدوا بِأَموالِهِم وَأَنفُسِهِم ۚ وَأُولٰئِكَ لَهُمُ الخَيراتُ ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: lākin r-rasūl w-lladhīn ʾāmanū maʿahū jāhadū b-ʾamwālihim w-ʾanfusihim w-ʾulāʾik lahumul-khayrāt w-ʾulāʾik humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: But the Messenger and those who believed with him fought with their wealth and their lives. Those will have all that is good, and it is those who are the successful

arabic_uthmani: أَعَدَّ اللَّهُ لَهُم جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها ۚ ذٰلِكَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: ʾaʿadd llāh lahum jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā dhālikal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah has prepared for them gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally. That is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: وَجاءَ المُعَذِّرونَ مِنَ الأَعرابِ لِيُؤذَنَ لَهُم وَقَعَدَ الَّذينَ كَذَبُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ ۚ سَيُصيبُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِنهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: w-jāʾal-muʿadhdhirūn minal-ʾaʿrāb l-yuʾdhan lahum w-qaʿadalladhīn kadhabū llāh w-rasūlahū s-yuṣībulladhīn kafarū minhum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And those with excuses among the bedouins came to be permitted to remain, and they who had lied to Allah and His Messenger sat at home. There will strike those who disbelieved among them a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: لَيسَ عَلَى الضُّعَفاءِ وَلا عَلَى المَرضىٰ وَلا عَلَى الَّذينَ لا يَجِدونَ ما يُنفِقونَ حَرَجٌ إِذا نَصَحوا لِلَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ ۚ ما عَلَى المُحسِنينَ مِن سَبيلٍ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: lays ʿalā ḍ-ḍuʿafāʾ w-lā ʿalāl-marḍā w-lā ʿalālladhīn lā yajidūn mā yunfiqūn ḥaraj ʾidhā naṣaḥū l-llāh w-rasūlihī mā ʿalāl-muḥsinīn m sabīl w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: There is not upon the weak or upon the ill or upon those who do not find anything to spend any discomfort when they are sincere to Allah and His Messenger. There is not upon the doers of good any cause for blame. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَلا عَلَى الَّذينَ إِذا ما أَتَوكَ لِتَحمِلَهُم قُلتَ لا أَجِدُ ما أَحمِلُكُم عَلَيهِ تَوَلَّوا وَأَعيُنُهُم تَفيضُ مِنَ الدَّمعِ حَزَنًا أَلّا يَجِدوا ما يُنفِقونَ
blank: w-lā ʿalālladhīn ʾidhā mā ʾatawk l-taḥmilahum qult lā ʾajid mā ʾaḥmilukum ʿalayh tawallaw w-ʾaʿyunuhum tafīḍ min d-damʿ ḥazan ʾallā yajidū mā yunfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Nor is there blame upon those who, when they came to you that you might give them mounts, you said, "I can find nothing for you to ride upon." They turned back while their eyes overflowed with tears out of grief that they could not find something to spend for the cause of Allah

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّمَا السَّبيلُ عَلَى الَّذينَ يَستَأذِنونَكَ وَهُم أَغنِياءُ ۚ رَضوا بِأَن يَكونوا مَعَ الخَوالِفِ وَطَبَعَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم فَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: ʾinnamā s-sabīl ʿalālladhīn yastaʾdhinūnak w-hum ʾaghniyāʾ raḍū b-ʾ yakūnū maʿal-khawālif w-ṭabaʿ llāh ʿalā qulūbihim f-hum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: The cause for blame is only upon those who ask permission of you while they are rich. They are satisfied to be with those who stay behind, and Allah has sealed over their hearts, so they do not know

arabic_uthmani: يَعتَذِرونَ إِلَيكُم إِذا رَجَعتُم إِلَيهِم ۚ قُل لا تَعتَذِروا لَن نُؤمِنَ لَكُم قَد نَبَّأَنَا اللَّهُ مِن أَخبارِكُم ۚ وَسَيَرَى اللَّهُ عَمَلَكُم وَرَسولُهُ ثُمَّ تُرَدّونَ إِلىٰ عالِمِ الغَيبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: yaʿtadhirūn ʾilaykum ʾidhā rajaʿtum ʾilayhim qul lā taʿtadhirū l nuʾmin lakum qad nabbaʾanā llāh m ʾakhbārikum w-s-yarā llāh ʿamalakum w-rasūluhū thumm turaddūn ʾilā ʿālimil-ghayb w-sh-shahādat f-yunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: They will make excuses to you when you have returned to them. Say, "Make no excuse - never will we believe you. Allah has already informed us of your news. And Allah will observe your deeds, and so will His Messenger; then you will be taken back to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you of what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: سَيَحلِفونَ بِاللَّهِ لَكُم إِذَا انقَلَبتُم إِلَيهِم لِتُعرِضوا عَنهُم ۖ فَأَعرِضوا عَنهُم ۖ إِنَّهُم رِجسٌ ۖ وَمَأواهُم جَهَنَّمُ جَزاءً بِما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: s-yaḥlifūn b-llāh lakum ʾidhā nqalabtum ʾilayhim l-tuʿriḍū ʿanhum f-ʾaʿriḍū ʿanhum ʾinnahum rijs w-maʾwāhum jahannam jazāʾ b-mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: They will swear by Allah to you when you return to them that you would leave them alone. So leave them alone; indeed they are evil; and their refuge is Hell as recompense for what they had been earning

arabic_uthmani: يَحلِفونَ لَكُم لِتَرضَوا عَنهُم ۖ فَإِن تَرضَوا عَنهُم فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَرضىٰ عَنِ القَومِ الفاسِقينَ
blank: yaḥlifūn lakum l-tarḍaw ʿanhum f-ʾ tarḍaw ʿanhum f-ʾinn llāh lā yarḍā ʿanil-qawmil-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: They swear to you so that you might be satisfied with them. But if you should be satisfied with them - indeed, Allah is not satisfied with a defiantly disobedient people

arabic_uthmani: الأَعرابُ أَشَدُّ كُفرًا وَنِفاقًا وَأَجدَرُ أَلّا يَعلَموا حُدودَ ما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ رَسولِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: al-ʾaʿrāb ʾashadd kufr w-nifāq w-ʾajdar ʾallā yaʿlamū ḥudūd mā ʾanzal llāh ʿalā rasūlihī w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: The bedouins are stronger in disbelief and hypocrisy and more likely not to know the limits of what laws Allah has revealed to His Messenger. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ الأَعرابِ مَن يَتَّخِذُ ما يُنفِقُ مَغرَمًا وَيَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمُ الدَّوائِرَ ۚ عَلَيهِم دائِرَةُ السَّوءِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-minal-ʾaʿrāb m yattakhidh mā yunfiq maghram w-yatarabbaṣ bikum d-dawāʾir ʿalayhim dāʾirat s-sawʾ w-llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And among the bedouins are some who consider what they spend as a loss and await for you turns of misfortune. Upon them will be a misfortune of evil. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ الأَعرابِ مَن يُؤمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ وَيَتَّخِذُ ما يُنفِقُ قُرُباتٍ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَصَلَواتِ الرَّسولِ ۚ أَلا إِنَّها قُربَةٌ لَهُم ۚ سَيُدخِلُهُمُ اللَّهُ في رَحمَتِهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-minal-ʾaʿrāb m yuʾmin b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-yattakhidh mā yunfiq qurubāt ʿind lāh w-ṣalawāt r-rasūl ʾ-lā ʾinnahā qurbat lahum s-yudkhiluhum llāh fī raḥmatihī ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: But among the bedouins are some who believe in Allah and the Last Day and consider what they spend as means of nearness to Allah and of obtaining invocations of the Messenger. Unquestionably, it is a means of nearness for them. Allah will admit them to His mercy. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَالسّابِقونَ الأَوَّلونَ مِنَ المُهاجِرينَ وَالأَنصارِ وَالَّذينَ اتَّبَعوهُم بِإِحسانٍ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنهُم وَرَضوا عَنهُ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُم جَنّاتٍ تَجري تَحتَهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها أَبَدًا ۚ ذٰلِكَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: w-s-sābiqūnal-ʾawwalūn minal-muhājirīn w-l-ʾanṣār w-lladhīn ttabaʿūhum b-ʾiḥsān raḍiy llāh ʿanhum w-raḍū ʿanh w-ʾaʿadd lahum jannāt tajrī taḥtahāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā ʾabad dhālikal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And the first forerunners in the faith among the Muhajireen and the Ansar and those who followed them with good conduct - Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him, and He has prepared for them gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: وَمِمَّن حَولَكُم مِنَ الأَعرابِ مُنافِقونَ ۖ وَمِن أَهلِ المَدينَةِ ۖ مَرَدوا عَلَى النِّفاقِ لا تَعلَمُهُم ۖ نَحنُ نَعلَمُهُم ۚ سَنُعَذِّبُهُم مَرَّتَينِ ثُمَّ يُرَدّونَ إِلىٰ عَذابٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: w-mimm ḥawlakum minal-ʾaʿrāb munāfiqūn w-m ʾahlil-madīnat maradū ʿalā n-nifāq lā taʿlamuhum naḥn naʿlamuhum s-nuʿadhdhibuhum marratayn thumm yuraddūn ʾilā ʿadhāb ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And among those around you of the bedouins are hypocrites, and also from the people of Madinah. They have become accustomed to hypocrisy. You, O Muhammad, do not know them, but We know them. We will punish them twice in this world; then they will be returned to a great punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَآخَرونَ اعتَرَفوا بِذُنوبِهِم خَلَطوا عَمَلًا صالِحًا وَآخَرَ سَيِّئًا عَسَى اللَّهُ أَن يَتوبَ عَلَيهِم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-ʾākharūn ʿtarafū b-dhunūbihim khalaṭū ʿamal ṣāliḥ w-ʾākhar sayyiʾ ʿasā llāh ʾ yatūb ʿalayhim ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And there are others who have acknowledged their sins. They had mixed a righteous deed with another that was bad. Perhaps Allah will turn to them in forgiveness. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: خُذ مِن أَموالِهِم صَدَقَةً تُطَهِّرُهُم وَتُزَكّيهِم بِها وَصَلِّ عَلَيهِم ۖ إِنَّ صَلاتَكَ سَكَنٌ لَهُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: khudh m ʾamwālihim ṣadaqat tuṭahhiruhum w-tuzakkīhim bihā w-ṣall ʿalayhim ʾinn ṣalātak sakan lahum w-llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Take, O, Muhammad, from their wealth a charity by which you purify them and cause them increase, and invoke Allah 's blessings upon them. Indeed, your invocations are reassurance for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ يَقبَلُ التَّوبَةَ عَن عِبادِهِ وَيَأخُذُ الصَّدَقاتِ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ التَّوّابُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: ʾ-lam yaʿlamū ʾann llāh huw yaqbal t-tawbat ʿ ʿibādihī w-yaʾkhudh ṣ-ṣadaqāt w-ʾann llāh huw t-tawwāb r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Do they not know that it is Allah who accepts repentance from His servants and receives charities and that it is Allah who is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَقُلِ اعمَلوا فَسَيَرَى اللَّهُ عَمَلَكُم وَرَسولُهُ وَالمُؤمِنونَ ۖ وَسَتُرَدّونَ إِلىٰ عالِمِ الغَيبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-qul ʿmalū f-s-yarā llāh ʿamalakum w-rasūluhū w-l-muʾminūn w-s-turaddūn ʾilā ʿālimil-ghayb w-sh-shahādat f-yunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And say, "Do as you will, for Allah will see your deeds, and so, will His Messenger and the believers. And you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you of what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَآخَرونَ مُرجَونَ لِأَمرِ اللَّهِ إِمّا يُعَذِّبُهُم وَإِمّا يَتوبُ عَلَيهِم ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-ʾākharūn murjawn l-ʾamr llāh ʾimmā yuʿadhdhibuhum w-ʾimmā yatūb ʿalayhim w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And there are others deferred until the command of Allah - whether He will punish them or whether He will forgive them. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ اتَّخَذوا مَسجِدًا ضِرارًا وَكُفرًا وَتَفريقًا بَينَ المُؤمِنينَ وَإِرصادًا لِمَن حارَبَ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ مِن قَبلُ ۚ وَلَيَحلِفُنَّ إِن أَرَدنا إِلَّا الحُسنىٰ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَشهَدُ إِنَّهُم لَكاذِبونَ
blank: w-lladhīn ttakhadhū masjid ḍirār w-kufr w-tafrīq baynal-muʾminīn w-ʾirṣād l-m ḥārab llāh w-rasūlahū m qabl w-l-yaḥlifunn ʾ ʾaradnā ʾillāl-ḥusnā w-llāh yashhad ʾinnahum l-kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: And there are those hypocrites who took for themselves a mosque for causing harm and disbelief and division among the believers and as a station for whoever had warred against Allah and His Messenger before. And they will surely swear, "We intended only the best." And Allah testifies that indeed they are liars

arabic_uthmani: لا تَقُم فيهِ أَبَدًا ۚ لَمَسجِدٌ أُسِّسَ عَلَى التَّقوىٰ مِن أَوَّلِ يَومٍ أَحَقُّ أَن تَقومَ فيهِ ۚ فيهِ رِجالٌ يُحِبّونَ أَن يَتَطَهَّروا ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُحِبُّ المُطَّهِّرينَ
blank: lā taqum fīh ʾabad l-masjid ʾussis ʿalā t-taqwā m ʾawwal yawm ʾaḥaqq ʾ taqūm fīh fīh rijāl yuḥibbūn ʾ yataṭahharū w-llāh yuḥibbul-muṭṭahhirīn
english_saheeh_international: Do not stand for prayer within it - ever. A mosque founded on righteousness from the first day is more worthy for you to stand in. Within it are men who love to purify themselves; and Allah loves those who purify themselves

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن أَسَّسَ بُنيانَهُ عَلىٰ تَقوىٰ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضوانٍ خَيرٌ أَم مَن أَسَّسَ بُنيانَهُ عَلىٰ شَفا جُرُفٍ هارٍ فَانهارَ بِهِ في نارِ جَهَنَّمَ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: ʾ-f-m ʾassas bunyānahū ʿalā taqwā min llāh w-riḍwān khayr ʾam m ʾassas bunyānahū ʿalā shafā juruf hār f-nhār bihī fī nār jahanamm w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Then is one who laid the foundation of his building on righteousness with fear from Allah and seeking His approval better or one who laid the foundation of his building on the edge of a bank about to collapse, so it collapsed with him into the fire of Hell? And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: لا يَزالُ بُنيانُهُمُ الَّذي بَنَوا ريبَةً في قُلوبِهِم إِلّا أَن تَقَطَّعَ قُلوبُهُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: lā yazāl bunyānuhumulladhī banaw rībat fī qulūbihim ʾillā ʾ taqaṭṭaʿ qulūbuhum w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Their building which they built will not cease to be a cause of skepticism in their hearts until their hearts are stopped. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ اللَّهَ اشتَرىٰ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ أَنفُسَهُم وَأَموالَهُم بِأَنَّ لَهُمُ الجَنَّةَ ۚ يُقاتِلونَ في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ فَيَقتُلونَ وَيُقتَلونَ ۖ وَعدًا عَلَيهِ حَقًّا فِي التَّوراةِ وَالإِنجيلِ وَالقُرآنِ ۚ وَمَن أَوفىٰ بِعَهدِهِ مِنَ اللَّهِ ۚ فَاستَبشِروا بِبَيعِكُمُ الَّذي بايَعتُم بِهِ ۚ وَذٰلِكَ هُوَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: ʾinn llāh shtarā minal-muʾminīn ʾanfusahum w-ʾamwālahum b-ʾann lahumul-jannat yuqātilūn fī sabīl llāh f-yaqtulūn w-yuqtalūn waʿd ʿalayh ḥaqq fī t-tawrāt w-l-ʾinjīl w-l-qurʾān w-m ʾawfā b-ʿahdihī min llāh f-stabshirū b-bayʿikumulladhī bāyaʿtum bihī w-dhālik huwal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah has purchased from the believers their lives and their properties in exchange for that they will have Paradise. They fight in the cause of Allah, so they kill and are killed. It is a true promise binding upon Him in the Torah and the Gospel and the Qur'an. And who is truer to his covenant than Allah? So rejoice in your transaction which you have contracted. And it is that which is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: التّائِبونَ العابِدونَ الحامِدونَ السّائِحونَ الرّاكِعونَ السّاجِدونَ الآمِرونَ بِالمَعروفِ وَالنّاهونَ عَنِ المُنكَرِ وَالحافِظونَ لِحُدودِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: at-tāʾibūnal-ʿābidūnal-ḥāmidūn s-sāʾiḥūn r-rākiʿūn s-sājidūnal-ʾāmirūn b-l-maʿrūf w-n-nāhūn ʿanil-munkar w-l-ḥāfiẓūn l-ḥudūd llāh w-bashshiril-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Such believers are the repentant, the worshippers, the praisers of Allah, the travelers for His cause, those who bow and prostrate in prayer, those who enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong, and those who observe the limits set by Allah. And give good tidings to the believers

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ لِلنَّبِيِّ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا أَن يَستَغفِروا لِلمُشرِكينَ وَلَو كانوا أُولي قُربىٰ مِن بَعدِ ما تَبَيَّنَ لَهُم أَنَّهُم أَصحابُ الجَحيمِ
blank: mā kān l-n-nabiyy w-lladhīn ʾāmanū ʾ yastaghfirū l-l-mushrikīn w-law kānū ʾulī qurbā m baʿd mā tabayyan lahum ʾannahum ʾaṣḥābul-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: It is not for the Prophet and those who have believed to ask forgiveness for the polytheists, even if they were relatives, after it has become clear to them that they are companions of Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ استِغفارُ إِبراهيمَ لِأَبيهِ إِلّا عَن مَوعِدَةٍ وَعَدَها إِيّاهُ فَلَمّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ أَنَّهُ عَدُوٌّ لِلَّهِ تَبَرَّأَ مِنهُ ۚ إِنَّ إِبراهيمَ لَأَوّاهٌ حَليمٌ
blank: w-mā kān stighfār ʾibrāhīm l-ʾabīh ʾillā ʿam-mawʿidat waʿadahā ʾiyyāh f-lammā tabayyan lahū ʾannahū ʿaduww l-llāh tabarraʾ minh ʾinn ʾibrāhīm l-ʾawwāh ḥalīm
english_saheeh_international: And the request of forgiveness of Abraham for his father was only because of a promise he had made to him. But when it became apparent to Abraham that his father was an enemy to Allah, he disassociated himself from him. Indeed was Abraham compassionate and patient

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ اللَّهُ لِيُضِلَّ قَومًا بَعدَ إِذ هَداهُم حَتّىٰ يُبَيِّنَ لَهُم ما يَتَّقونَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: w-mā kān llāh l-yuḍill qawm baʿd ʾidh hadāhum ḥattā yubayyin lahum mā yattaqūn ʾinn llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And Allah would not let a people stray after He has guided them until He makes clear to them what they should avoid. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of all things

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَهُ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ يُحيي وَيُميتُ ۚ وَما لَكُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ مِن وَلِيٍّ وَلا نَصيرٍ
blank: ʾinn llāh lahū mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ yuḥyī w-yumīt w-mā lakum m dūn llāh m waliyy w-lā naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He gives life and causes death. And you have not besides Allah any protector or any helper

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد تابَ اللَّهُ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ وَالمُهاجِرينَ وَالأَنصارِ الَّذينَ اتَّبَعوهُ في ساعَةِ العُسرَةِ مِن بَعدِ ما كادَ يَزيغُ قُلوبُ فَريقٍ مِنهُم ثُمَّ تابَ عَلَيهِم ۚ إِنَّهُ بِهِم رَءوفٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: l-qad tāb llāh ʿalā n-nabiyy w-l-muhājirīn w-l-ʾanṣārilladhīn ttabaʿūh fī sāʿatil-ʿusrat m baʿd mā kād yazīgh qulūb farīq minhum thumm tāb ʿalayhim ʾinnahū bihim raʾūf raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah has already forgiven the Prophet and the Muhajireen and the Ansar who followed him in the hour of difficulty after the hearts of a party of them had almost inclined to doubt, and then He forgave them. Indeed, He was to them Kind and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَعَلَى الثَّلاثَةِ الَّذينَ خُلِّفوا حَتّىٰ إِذا ضاقَت عَلَيهِمُ الأَرضُ بِما رَحُبَت وَضاقَت عَلَيهِم أَنفُسُهُم وَظَنّوا أَن لا مَلجَأَ مِنَ اللَّهِ إِلّا إِلَيهِ ثُمَّ تابَ عَلَيهِم لِيَتوبوا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ التَّوّابُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: w-ʿalā th-thalāthatilladhīn khullifū ḥattā ʾidhā ḍāqat ʿalayhimul-ʾarḍ b-mā raḥubat w-ḍāqat ʿalayhim ʾanfusuhum w-ẓannū ʾ lā maljaʾ min llāh ʾillā ʾilayh thumm tāb ʿalayhim l-yatūbū ʾinn llāh huw t-tawwāb r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And He also forgave the three who were left behind and regretted their error to the point that the earth closed in on them in spite of its vastness and their souls confined them and they were certain that there is no refuge from Allah except in Him. Then He turned to them so they could repent. Indeed, Allah is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَكونوا مَعَ الصّادِقينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ttaqū llāh w-kūnū maʿ ṣ-ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, fear Allah and be with those who are true

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ لِأَهلِ المَدينَةِ وَمَن حَولَهُم مِنَ الأَعرابِ أَن يَتَخَلَّفوا عَن رَسولِ اللَّهِ وَلا يَرغَبوا بِأَنفُسِهِم عَن نَفسِهِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم لا يُصيبُهُم ظَمَأٌ وَلا نَصَبٌ وَلا مَخمَصَةٌ في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَلا يَطَئونَ مَوطِئًا يَغيظُ الكُفّارَ وَلا يَنالونَ مِن عَدُوٍّ نَيلًا إِلّا كُتِبَ لَهُم بِهِ عَمَلٌ صالِحٌ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُضيعُ أَجرَ المُحسِنينَ
blank: mā kān l-ʾahlil-madīnat w-m ḥawlahum minal-ʾaʿrāb ʾ yatakhallafū ʿ rasūl llāh w-lā yarghabū b-ʾanfusihim ʿ nafsihī dhālik b-ʾannahum lā yuṣībuhum ẓamaʾ w-lā naṣab w-lā makhmaṣat fī sabīl llāh w-lā yaṭaʾūn mawṭiʾ yaghīẓul-kuffār w-lā yanālūn m ʿaduww nayl ʾillā kutib lahum bihī ʿamal ṣāliḥ ʾinn llāh lā yuḍīʿ ʾajral-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: It was not proper for the people of Madinah and those surrounding them of the bedouins that they remain behind after the departure of the Messenger of Allah or that they prefer themselves over his self. That is because they are not afflicted by thirst or fatigue or hunger in the cause of Allah, nor do they tread on any ground that enrages the disbelievers, nor do they inflict upon an enemy any infliction but that is registered for them as a righteous deed. Indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يُنفِقونَ نَفَقَةً صَغيرَةً وَلا كَبيرَةً وَلا يَقطَعونَ وادِيًا إِلّا كُتِبَ لَهُم لِيَجزِيَهُمُ اللَّهُ أَحسَنَ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: w-lā yunfiqūn nafaqat ṣaghīrat w-lā kabīrat w-lā yaqṭaʿūn wādiy ʾillā kutib lahum l-yajziyahum llāh ʾaḥsan mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Nor do they spend an expenditure, small or large, or cross a valley but that it is registered for them that Allah may reward them for the best of what they were doing

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَما كانَ المُؤمِنونَ لِيَنفِروا كافَّةً ۚ فَلَولا نَفَرَ مِن كُلِّ فِرقَةٍ مِنهُم طائِفَةٌ لِيَتَفَقَّهوا فِي الدّينِ وَلِيُنذِروا قَومَهُم إِذا رَجَعوا إِلَيهِم لَعَلَّهُم يَحذَرونَ
blank: w-mā kānal-muʾminūn l-yanfirū kāffat f-law-lā nafar m kull firqat minhum ṭāʾifat l-yatafaqqahū fī d-dīn w-l-yundhirū qawmahum ʾidhā rajaʿū ʾilayhim laʿallahum yaḥdharūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is not for the believers to go forth to battle all at once. For there should separate from every division of them a group remaining to obtain understanding in the religion and warn their people when they return to them that they might be cautious

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا قاتِلُوا الَّذينَ يَلونَكُم مِنَ الكُفّارِ وَليَجِدوا فيكُم غِلظَةً ۚ وَاعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ المُتَّقينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū qātilūlladhīn yalūnakum minal-kuffār w-l-yajidū fīkum ghilẓat w-ʿlamū ʾann llāh maʿal-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, fight those adjacent to you of the disbelievers and let them find in you harshness. And know that Allah is with the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا ما أُنزِلَت سورَةٌ فَمِنهُم مَن يَقولُ أَيُّكُم زادَتهُ هٰذِهِ إيمانًا ۚ فَأَمَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا فَزادَتهُم إيمانًا وَهُم يَستَبشِرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā mā ʾunzilat sūrat f-minhum m yaqūl ʾayyukum zādath hādhihī ʾīmān f-ʾammālladhīn ʾāmanū f-zādathum ʾīmān w-hum yastabshirūn
english_saheeh_international: And whenever a surah is revealed, there are among the hypocrites those who say, "Which of you has this increased faith?" As for those who believed, it has increased them in faith, while they are rejoicing

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمَّا الَّذينَ في قُلوبِهِم مَرَضٌ فَزادَتهُم رِجسًا إِلىٰ رِجسِهِم وَماتوا وَهُم كافِرونَ
blank: w-ʾammālladhīn fī qulūbihim maraḍ f-zādathum rijs ʾilā rijsihim w-mātū w-hum kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: But as for those in whose hearts is disease, it has only increased them in evil in addition to their evil. And they will have died while they are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلا يَرَونَ أَنَّهُم يُفتَنونَ في كُلِّ عامٍ مَرَّةً أَو مَرَّتَينِ ثُمَّ لا يَتوبونَ وَلا هُم يَذَّكَّرونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lā yarawn ʾannahum yuftanūn fī kull ʿām marrat ʾaw marratayn thumm lā yatūbūn w-lā hum yadhdhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they not see that they are tried every year once or twice but then they do not repent nor do they remember

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا ما أُنزِلَت سورَةٌ نَظَرَ بَعضُهُم إِلىٰ بَعضٍ هَل يَراكُم مِن أَحَدٍ ثُمَّ انصَرَفوا ۚ صَرَفَ اللَّهُ قُلوبَهُم بِأَنَّهُم قَومٌ لا يَفقَهونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā mā ʾunzilat sūrat naẓar baʿḍuhum ʾilā baʿḍ hal yarākum m ʾaḥad thumm nṣarafū ṣaraf llāh qulūbahum b-ʾannahum qawm lā yafqahūn
english_saheeh_international: And whenever a surah is revealed, they look at each other, saying, "Does anyone see you?" and then they dismiss themselves. Allah has dismissed their hearts because they are a people who do not understand

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد جاءَكُم رَسولٌ مِن أَنفُسِكُم عَزيزٌ عَلَيهِ ما عَنِتُّم حَريصٌ عَلَيكُم بِالمُؤمِنينَ رَءوفٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: l-qad jāʾakum rasūl m ʾanfusikum ʿazīz ʿalayh mā ʿanittum ḥarīṣ ʿalaykum b-l-muʾminīn raʾūf raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: There has certainly come to you a Messenger from among yourselves. Grievous to him is what you suffer; he is concerned over you and to the believers is kind and merciful

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَقُل حَسبِيَ اللَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ عَلَيهِ تَوَكَّلتُ ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ العَرشِ العَظيمِ
blank: f-ʾ tawallaw f-qul ḥasbiy llāh lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw ʿalayh tawakkalt w-huw rabbul-ʿarshil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: But if they turn away, O Muhammad, say, "Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne

arabic_uthmani: الر ۚ تِلكَ آياتُ الكِتابِ الحَكيمِ
blank: -l-r (ʾalif lām rā) tilk ʾāyātul-kitābil-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the wise Book

arabic_uthmani: أَكانَ لِلنّاسِ عَجَبًا أَن أَوحَينا إِلىٰ رَجُلٍ مِنهُم أَن أَنذِرِ النّاسَ وَبَشِّرِ الَّذينَ آمَنوا أَنَّ لَهُم قَدَمَ صِدقٍ عِندَ رَبِّهِم ۗ قالَ الكافِرونَ إِنَّ هٰذا لَساحِرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: ʾ-kān l-n-nās ʿajab ʾ ʾawḥaynā ʾilā rajul minhum ʾ ʾandhir n-nās w-bashshirilladhīn ʾāmanū ʾann lahum qadam ṣidq ʿind rabbihim qālal-kāfirūn ʾinn hādhā l-sāḥir mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Have the people been amazed that We revealed revelation to a man from among them, saying, "Warn mankind and give good tidings to those who believe that they will have a firm precedence of honor with their Lord"? But the disbelievers say, "Indeed, this is an obvious magician

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ اللَّهُ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ في سِتَّةِ أَيّامٍ ثُمَّ استَوىٰ عَلَى العَرشِ ۖ يُدَبِّرُ الأَمرَ ۖ ما مِن شَفيعٍ إِلّا مِن بَعدِ إِذنِهِ ۚ ذٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُم فَاعبُدوهُ ۚ أَفَلا تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: ʾinn rabbakum llāhulladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ fī sittat ʾayyām thumm stawā ʿalāl-ʿarsh yudabbirul-ʾamr mā m shafīʿ ʾillā m baʿd ʾidhnihī dhālikum llāh rabbukum f-ʿbudūh ʾ-f-lā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your Lord is Allah, who created the heavens and the earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne, arranging the matter of His creation. There is no intercessor except after His permission. That is Allah, your Lord, so worship Him. Then will you not remember

arabic_uthmani: إِلَيهِ مَرجِعُكُم جَميعًا ۖ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقًّا ۚ إِنَّهُ يَبدَأُ الخَلقَ ثُمَّ يُعيدُهُ لِيَجزِيَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ بِالقِسطِ ۚ وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا لَهُم شَرابٌ مِن حَميمٍ وَعَذابٌ أَليمٌ بِما كانوا يَكفُرونَ
blank: ʾilayh marjiʿukum jamīʿ waʿd llāh ḥaqq ʾinnahū yabdaʾul-khalq thumm yuʿīduhū l-yajziyalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt b-l-qisṭ w-lladhīn kafarū lahum sharāb m ḥamīm w-ʿadhāb ʾalīm b-mā kānū yakfurūn
english_saheeh_international: To Him is your return all together. It is the promise of Allah which is truth. Indeed, He begins the process of creation and then repeats it that He may reward those who have believed and done righteous deeds, in justice. But those who disbelieved will have a drink of scalding water and a painful punishment for what they used to deny

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي جَعَلَ الشَّمسَ ضِياءً وَالقَمَرَ نورًا وَقَدَّرَهُ مَنازِلَ لِتَعلَموا عَدَدَ السِّنينَ وَالحِسابَ ۚ ما خَلَقَ اللَّهُ ذٰلِكَ إِلّا بِالحَقِّ ۚ يُفَصِّلُ الآياتِ لِقَومٍ يَعلَمونَ
blank: huwalladhī jaʿal sh-shams ḍiyāʾ w-l-qamar nūr w-qaddarahū manāzil l-taʿlamū ʿadad s-sinīn w-l-ḥisāb mā khalaq llāh dhālik ʾillā b-l-ḥaqq yufaṣṣilul-ʾāyāt l-qawm yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who made the sun a shining light and the moon a derived light and determined for it phases - that you may know the number of years and account of time. Allah has not created this except in truth. He details the signs for a people who know

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ فِي اختِلافِ اللَّيلِ وَالنَّهارِ وَما خَلَقَ اللَّهُ فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يَتَّقونَ
blank: ʾinn fī khtilāfil-layl w-n-nahār w-mā khalaq llāh fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, in the alternation of the night and the day and in what Allah has created in the heavens and the earth are signs for a people who fear Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ لا يَرجونَ لِقاءَنا وَرَضوا بِالحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَاطمَأَنّوا بِها وَالَّذينَ هُم عَن آياتِنا غافِلونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn lā yarjūn liqāʾanā w-raḍū b-l-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-ṭmaʾannū bihā w-lladhīn hum ʿ ʾāyātinā ghāfilūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who do not expect the meeting with Us and are satisfied with the life of this world and feel secure therein and those who are heedless of Our signs

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ مَأواهُمُ النّارُ بِما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: ʾulāʾik maʾwāhum n-nār b-mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: For those their refuge will be the Fire because of what they used to earn

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ يَهديهِم رَبُّهُم بِإيمانِهِم ۖ تَجري مِن تَحتِهِمُ الأَنهارُ في جَنّاتِ النَّعيمِ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt yahdīhim rabbuhum b-ʾīmānihim tajrī m taḥtihimul-ʾanhār fī jannāt n-naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - their Lord will guide them because of their faith. Beneath them rivers will flow in the Gardens of Pleasure

arabic_uthmani: دَعواهُم فيها سُبحانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَتَحِيَّتُهُم فيها سَلامٌ ۚ وَآخِرُ دَعواهُم أَنِ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: daʿwāhum fīhā subḥānak llāhumm w-taḥiyyatuhum fīhā salām w-ʾākhir daʿwāhum ʾanil-ḥamd l-llāh rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Their call therein will be, "Exalted are You, O Allah," and their greeting therein will be, "Peace." And the last of their call will be, "Praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَو يُعَجِّلُ اللَّهُ لِلنّاسِ الشَّرَّ استِعجالَهُم بِالخَيرِ لَقُضِيَ إِلَيهِم أَجَلُهُم ۖ فَنَذَرُ الَّذينَ لا يَرجونَ لِقاءَنا في طُغيانِهِم يَعمَهونَ
blank: w-law yuʿajjil llāh l-n-nās sh-sharr stiʿjālahum b-l-khayr l-quḍiy ʾilayhim ʾajaluhum f-nadharulladhīn lā yarjūn liqāʾanā fī ṭughyānihim yaʿmahūn
english_saheeh_international: And if Allah was to hasten for the people the evil they invoke as He hastens for them the good, their term would have been ended for them. But We leave the ones who do not expect the meeting with Us, in their transgression, wandering blindly

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا مَسَّ الإِنسانَ الضُّرُّ دَعانا لِجَنبِهِ أَو قاعِدًا أَو قائِمًا فَلَمّا كَشَفنا عَنهُ ضُرَّهُ مَرَّ كَأَن لَم يَدعُنا إِلىٰ ضُرٍّ مَسَّهُ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلمُسرِفينَ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā massal-ʾinsān ḍ-ḍurr daʿānā l-janbihī ʾaw qāʿid ʾaw qāʾim f-lammā kashafnā ʿanh ḍurrahū marr k-ʾ lam yadʿunā ʾilā ḍurr massahū k-dhālik zuyyin l-l-musrifīn mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And when affliction touches man, he calls upon Us, whether lying on his side or sitting or standing; but when We remove from him his affliction, he continues in disobedience as if he had never called upon Us to remove an affliction that touched him. Thus is made pleasing to the transgressors that which they have been doing

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَهلَكنَا القُرونَ مِن قَبلِكُم لَمّا ظَلَموا ۙ وَجاءَتهُم رُسُلُهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ وَما كانوا لِيُؤمِنوا ۚ كَذٰلِكَ نَجزِي القَومَ المُجرِمينَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾahlaknāl-qurūn m qablikum lammā ẓalamū w-jāʾathum rusuluhum b-l-bayyināt w-mā kānū l-yuʾminū k-dhālik najzīl-qawmal-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: And We had already destroyed generations before you when they wronged, and their messengers had come to them with clear proofs, but they were not to believe. Thus do We recompense the criminal people

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ جَعَلناكُم خَلائِفَ فِي الأَرضِ مِن بَعدِهِم لِنَنظُرَ كَيفَ تَعمَلونَ
blank: thumm jaʿalnākum khalāʾif fīl-ʾarḍ m baʿdihim l-nanẓur kayf taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Then We made you successors in the land after them so that We may observe how you will do

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا تُتلىٰ عَلَيهِم آياتُنا بَيِّناتٍ ۙ قالَ الَّذينَ لا يَرجونَ لِقاءَنَا ائتِ بِقُرآنٍ غَيرِ هٰذا أَو بَدِّلهُ ۚ قُل ما يَكونُ لي أَن أُبَدِّلَهُ مِن تِلقاءِ نَفسي ۖ إِن أَتَّبِعُ إِلّا ما يوحىٰ إِلَيَّ ۖ إِنّي أَخافُ إِن عَصَيتُ رَبّي عَذابَ يَومٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: w-ʾidhā tutlā ʿalayhim ʾāyātunā bayyināt qālalladhīn lā yarjūn liqāʾanā ʾt b-qurʾān ghayr hādhā ʾaw baddilh qul mā yakūn lī ʾ ʾubaddilahū m tilqāʾī nafsī ʾ ʾattabiʿ ʾillā mā yūḥā ʾilayy ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʾ ʿaṣayt rabbī ʿadhāb yawm ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Bring us a Qur'an other than this or change it." Say, O Muhammad, "It is not for me to change it on my own accord. I only follow what is revealed to me. Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day

arabic_uthmani: قُل لَو شاءَ اللَّهُ ما تَلَوتُهُ عَلَيكُم وَلا أَدراكُم بِهِ ۖ فَقَد لَبِثتُ فيكُم عُمُرًا مِن قَبلِهِ ۚ أَفَلا تَعقِلونَ
blank: qul law shāʾ llāh mā talawtuhū ʿalaykum w-lā ʾadrākum bihī f-qad labitht fīkum ʿumuram-m qablihī ʾ-f-lā taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had remained among you a lifetime before it. Then will you not reason

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَو كَذَّبَ بِآياتِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ لا يُفلِحُ المُجرِمونَ
blank: f-m ʾaẓlam mimman ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib ʾaw kadhdhab b-ʾāyātihī ʾinnahū lā yufliḥul-mujrimūn
english_saheeh_international: So who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah or denies His signs? Indeed, the criminals will not succeed

arabic_uthmani: وَيَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ما لا يَضُرُّهُم وَلا يَنفَعُهُم وَيَقولونَ هٰؤُلاءِ شُفَعاؤُنا عِندَ اللَّهِ ۚ قُل أَتُنَبِّئونَ اللَّهَ بِما لا يَعلَمُ فِي السَّماواتِ وَلا فِي الأَرضِ ۚ سُبحانَهُ وَتَعالىٰ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: w-yaʿbudūn m dūn llāh mā lā yaḍurruhum w-lā yanfaʿuhum w-yaqūlūn hāʾulāʾ shufaʿāʾunā ʿind llāh qul ʾ-tunabbiʾūn llāh b-mā lā yaʿlam fī s-samāwāt w-lā fīl-ʾarḍ subḥānahū w-taʿālā ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: And they worship other than Allah that which neither harms them nor benefits them, and they say, "These are our intercessors with Allah " Say, "Do you inform Allah of something He does not know in the heavens or on the earth?" Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ النّاسُ إِلّا أُمَّةً واحِدَةً فَاختَلَفوا ۚ وَلَولا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَت مِن رَبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَينَهُم فيما فيهِ يَختَلِفونَ
blank: w-mā kān n-nās ʾillā ʾummat wāḥidat f-khtalafū w-law-lā kalimat sabaqat m rabbik l-quḍiy baynahum fī-mā fīh yakhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: And mankind was not but one community united in religion, but then they differed. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been judged between them immediately concerning that over which they differ

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ لَولا أُنزِلَ عَلَيهِ آيَةٌ مِن رَبِّهِ ۖ فَقُل إِنَّمَا الغَيبُ لِلَّهِ فَانتَظِروا إِنّي مَعَكُم مِنَ المُنتَظِرينَ
blank: w-yaqūlūn law-lā ʾunzil ʿalayh ʾāyat m rabbihī f-qul ʾinnamāl-ghayb l-llāh f-ntaẓirū ʾinnī maʿakum minal-muntaẓirīn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "Why is a sign not sent down to him from his Lord?" So say, "The unseen is only for Allah to administer, so wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا أَذَقنَا النّاسَ رَحمَةً مِن بَعدِ ضَرّاءَ مَسَّتهُم إِذا لَهُم مَكرٌ في آياتِنا ۚ قُلِ اللَّهُ أَسرَعُ مَكرًا ۚ إِنَّ رُسُلَنا يَكتُبونَ ما تَمكُرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā ʾadhaqnā n-nās raḥmatam-m baʿd ḍarrāʾ massathum ʾidhā lahum makr fī ʾāyātinā qul llāh ʾasraʿ makr ʾinn rusulanā yaktubūn mā tamkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And when We give the people a taste of mercy after adversity has touched them, at once they conspire against Our verses. Say, "Allah is swifter in strategy." Indeed, Our messengers record that which you conspire

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي يُسَيِّرُكُم فِي البَرِّ وَالبَحرِ ۖ حَتّىٰ إِذا كُنتُم فِي الفُلكِ وَجَرَينَ بِهِم بِريحٍ طَيِّبَةٍ وَفَرِحوا بِها جاءَتها ريحٌ عاصِفٌ وَجاءَهُمُ المَوجُ مِن كُلِّ مَكانٍ وَظَنّوا أَنَّهُم أُحيطَ بِهِم ۙ دَعَوُا اللَّهَ مُخلِصينَ لَهُ الدّينَ لَئِن أَنجَيتَنا مِن هٰذِهِ لَنَكونَنَّ مِنَ الشّاكِرينَ
blank: huwalladhī yusayyirukum fīl-barr w-l-baḥr ḥattā ʾidhā kuntum fīl-fulk w-jarayn bihim b-rīḥ ṭayyibat w-fariḥū bihā jāʾathā rīḥ ʿāṣif w-jāʾahumul-mawj m kull makān w-ẓannū ʾannahum ʾuḥīṭ bihim daʿaw llāh mukhliṣīn lah d-dīn l-ʾ ʾanjaytanā m hādhihī l-nakūnann min sh-shākirīn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who enables you to travel on land and sea until, when you are in ships and they sail with them by a good wind and they rejoice therein, there comes a storm wind and the waves come upon them from everywhere and they assume that they are surrounded, supplicating Allah, sincere to Him in religion, "If You should save us from this, we will surely be among the thankful

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا أَنجاهُم إِذا هُم يَبغونَ فِي الأَرضِ بِغَيرِ الحَقِّ ۗ يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ إِنَّما بَغيُكُم عَلىٰ أَنفُسِكُم ۖ مَتاعَ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَينا مَرجِعُكُم فَنُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: f-lammā ʾanjāhum ʾidhā hum yabghūn fīl-ʾarḍ b-ghayril-ḥaqq yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ʾinnamā baghyukum ʿalā ʾanfusikum matāʿal-ḥayāt d-dunyā thumm ʾilaynā marjiʿukum f-nunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: But when He saves them, at once they commit injustice upon the earth without right. O mankind, your injustice is only against yourselves, being merely the enjoyment of worldly life. Then to Us is your return, and We will inform you of what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما مَثَلُ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا كَماءٍ أَنزَلناهُ مِنَ السَّماءِ فَاختَلَطَ بِهِ نَباتُ الأَرضِ مِمّا يَأكُلُ النّاسُ وَالأَنعامُ حَتّىٰ إِذا أَخَذَتِ الأَرضُ زُخرُفَها وَازَّيَّنَت وَظَنَّ أَهلُها أَنَّهُم قادِرونَ عَلَيها أَتاها أَمرُنا لَيلًا أَو نَهارًا فَجَعَلناها حَصيدًا كَأَن لَم تَغنَ بِالأَمسِ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ الآياتِ لِقَومٍ يَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: ʾinnamā mathalul-ḥayāt d-dunyā k-māʾ ʾanzalnāh min s-samāʾ f-khtalaṭ bihī nabātul-ʾarḍ mimmā yaʾkul n-nās w-l-ʾanʿām ḥattā ʾidhā ʾakhadhatil-ʾarḍ zukhrufahā w-zzayyanat w-ẓann ʾahluhā ʾannahum qādirūn ʿalayhā ʾatāhā ʾamrunā layl ʾaw nahār f-jaʿalnāhā ḥaṣīd k-ʾ lam taghn b-l-ʾams k-dhālik nufaṣṣilul-ʾāyāt l-qawm yatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: The example of this worldly life is but like rain which We have sent down from the sky that the plants of the earth absorb - those from which men and livestock eat - until, when the earth has taken on its adornment and is beautified and its people suppose that they have capability over it, there comes to it Our command by night or by day, and We make it as a harvest, as if it had not flourished yesterday. Thus do We explain in detail the signs for a people who give thought

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ يَدعو إِلىٰ دارِ السَّلامِ وَيَهدي مَن يَشاءُ إِلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: w-llāh yadʿū ʾilā dār s-salām w-yahdī m yashāʾ ʾilā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And Allah invites to the Home of Peace and guides whom He wills to a straight path

arabic_uthmani: ۞ لِلَّذينَ أَحسَنُوا الحُسنىٰ وَزِيادَةٌ ۖ وَلا يَرهَقُ وُجوهَهُم قَتَرٌ وَلا ذِلَّةٌ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ الجَنَّةِ ۖ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: l-lladhīn ʾaḥsanūl-ḥusnā w-ziyādat w-lā yarhaq wujūhahum qatar w-lā dhillat ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥābul-jannat hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: For them who have done good is the best reward and extra. No darkness will cover their faces, nor humiliation. Those are companions of Paradise; they will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَسَبُوا السَّيِّئَاتِ جَزاءُ سَيِّئَةٍ بِمِثلِها وَتَرهَقُهُم ذِلَّةٌ ۖ ما لَهُم مِنَ اللَّهِ مِن عاصِمٍ ۖ كَأَنَّما أُغشِيَت وُجوهُهُم قِطَعًا مِنَ اللَّيلِ مُظلِمًا ۚ أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ النّارِ ۖ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: w-lladhīn kasabū s-sayyiʾāt jazāʾ sayyiʾat b-mithlihā w-tarhaquhum dhillat mā lahum min llāh m ʿāṣim k-ʾannamā ʾughshiyat wujūhuhum qiṭaʿam-minal-layl muẓlim ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥāb n-nār hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: But they who have earned blame for evil doings - the recompense of an evil deed is its equivalent, and humiliation will cover them. They will have from Allah no protector. It will be as if their faces are covered with pieces of the night - so dark are they. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ نَحشُرُهُم جَميعًا ثُمَّ نَقولُ لِلَّذينَ أَشرَكوا مَكانَكُم أَنتُم وَشُرَكاؤُكُم ۚ فَزَيَّلنا بَينَهُم ۖ وَقالَ شُرَكاؤُهُم ما كُنتُم إِيّانا تَعبُدونَ
blank: w-yawm naḥshuruhum jamīʿ thumm naqūl l-lladhīn ʾashrakū makānakum ʾantum w-shurakāʾukum f-zayyalnā baynahum w-qāl shurakāʾuhum mā kuntum ʾiyyānā taʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, the Day We will gather them all together - then We will say to those who associated others with Allah, "Remain in your place, you and your 'partners.' " Then We will separate them, and their "partners" will say, "You did not used to worship us

arabic_uthmani: فَكَفىٰ بِاللَّهِ شَهيدًا بَينَنا وَبَينَكُم إِن كُنّا عَن عِبادَتِكُم لَغافِلينَ
blank: f-kafā b-llāh shahīd baynanā w-baynakum ʾ kunnā ʿ ʿibādatikum l-ghāfilīn
english_saheeh_international: And sufficient is Allah as a witness between us and you that we were of your worship unaware

arabic_uthmani: هُنالِكَ تَبلو كُلُّ نَفسٍ ما أَسلَفَت ۚ وَرُدّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ مَولاهُمُ الحَقِّ ۖ وَضَلَّ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَفتَرونَ
blank: hunālik tablū kull nafs mā ʾaslafat w-ruddū ʾilā llāh mawlāhumul-ḥaqq w-ḍall ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: There, on that Day, every soul will be put to trial for what it did previously, and they will be returned to Allah, their master, the Truth, and lost from them is whatever they used to invent

arabic_uthmani: قُل مَن يَرزُقُكُم مِنَ السَّماءِ وَالأَرضِ أَمَّن يَملِكُ السَّمعَ وَالأَبصارَ وَمَن يُخرِجُ الحَيَّ مِنَ المَيِّتِ وَيُخرِجُ المَيِّتَ مِنَ الحَيِّ وَمَن يُدَبِّرُ الأَمرَ ۚ فَسَيَقولونَ اللَّهُ ۚ فَقُل أَفَلا تَتَّقونَ
blank: qul m yarzuqukum min s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ ʾam-m yamlik s-samʿ w-l-ʾabṣār w-m yukhrijul-ḥayy minal-mayyit w-yukhrijul-mayyit minal-ḥayy w-m yudabbirul-ʾamr f-s-yaqūlūn llāh f-qul ʾ-f-lā tattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Who provides for you from the heaven and the earth? Or who controls hearing and sight and who brings the living out of the dead and brings the dead out of the living and who arranges every matter?" They will say, "Allah," so say, "Then will you not fear Him

arabic_uthmani: فَذٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ الحَقُّ ۖ فَماذا بَعدَ الحَقِّ إِلَّا الضَّلالُ ۖ فَأَنّىٰ تُصرَفونَ
blank: f-dhālikum llāh rabbukumul-ḥaqq f-mādhā baʿdal-ḥaqq ʾillā ḍ-ḍalāl f-ʾannā tuṣrafūn
english_saheeh_international: For that is Allah, your Lord, the Truth. And what can be beyond truth except error? So how are you averted

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ حَقَّت كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى الَّذينَ فَسَقوا أَنَّهُم لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: k-dhālik ḥaqqat kalimat rabbik ʿalālladhīn fasaqū ʾannahum lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Thus the word of your Lord has come into effect upon those who defiantly disobeyed - that they will not believe
