arabic_uthmani: قُل هَل مِن شُرَكائِكُم مَن يَبدَأُ الخَلقَ ثُمَّ يُعيدُهُ ۚ قُلِ اللَّهُ يَبدَأُ الخَلقَ ثُمَّ يُعيدُهُ ۖ فَأَنّىٰ تُؤفَكونَ
blank: qul hal m shurakāʾikum m yabdaʾul-khalq thumm yuʿīduhū qul llāh yabdaʾul-khalq thumm yuʿīduhū f-ʾannā tuʾfakūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Are there of your 'partners' any who begins creation and then repeats it?" Say, "Allah begins creation and then repeats it, so how are you deluded

arabic_uthmani: قُل هَل مِن شُرَكائِكُم مَن يَهدي إِلَى الحَقِّ ۚ قُلِ اللَّهُ يَهدي لِلحَقِّ ۗ أَفَمَن يَهدي إِلَى الحَقِّ أَحَقُّ أَن يُتَّبَعَ أَمَّن لا يَهِدّي إِلّا أَن يُهدىٰ ۖ فَما لَكُم كَيفَ تَحكُمونَ
blank: qul hal m shurakāʾikum m yahdī ʾilāl-ḥaqq qul llāh yahdī l-l-ḥaqq ʾ-f-m yahdī ʾilāl-ḥaqq ʾaḥaqq ʾ yuttabaʿ ʾam-m lā yahiddī ʾillā ʾ yuhdā f-mā lakum kayf taḥkumūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Are there of your 'partners' any who guides to the truth?" Say, "Allah guides to the truth. So is He who guides to the truth more worthy to be followed or he who guides not unless he is guided? Then what is wrong with you - how do you judge

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَتَّبِعُ أَكثَرُهُم إِلّا ظَنًّا ۚ إِنَّ الظَّنَّ لا يُغني مِنَ الحَقِّ شَيئًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ بِما يَفعَلونَ
blank: w-mā yattabiʿ ʾaktharuhum ʾillā ẓann ʾinn ẓ-ẓann lā yughnī minal-ḥaqq shayʾ ʾinn llāh ʿalīm b-mā yafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: And most of them follow not except assumption. Indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ هٰذَا القُرآنُ أَن يُفتَرىٰ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَلٰكِن تَصديقَ الَّذي بَينَ يَدَيهِ وَتَفصيلَ الكِتابِ لا رَيبَ فيهِ مِن رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: w-mā kān hādhāl-qurʾān ʾ yuftarā m dūn llāh w-lāk taṣdīq llādhī bayn yadayh w-tafṣīlal-kitāb lā rayb fīh m rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And it was not possible for this Qur'an to be produced by other than Allah, but it is a confirmation of what was before it and a detailed explanation of the former Scripture, about which there is no doubt, from the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَقولونَ افتَراهُ ۖ قُل فَأتوا بِسورَةٍ مِثلِهِ وَادعوا مَنِ استَطَعتُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: ʾam yaqūlūn ftarāh qul f-ʾtū b-sūrat mithlihī w-dʿū man staṭaʿtum m dūn llāh ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they say about the Prophet, "He invented it?" Say, "Then bring forth a surah like it and call upon for assistance whomever you can besides Allah, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: بَل كَذَّبوا بِما لَم يُحيطوا بِعِلمِهِ وَلَمّا يَأتِهِم تَأويلُهُ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ كَذَّبَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۖ فَانظُر كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ الظّالِمينَ
blank: bal kadhdhabū b-mā lam yuḥīṭū b-ʿilmihī w-lammā yaʾtihim taʾwīluhū k-dhālik kadhdhaballadhīn m qablihim f-nẓur kayf kān ʿāqibat ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, they have denied that which they encompass not in knowledge and whose interpretation has not yet come to them. Thus did those before them deny. Then observe how was the end of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنهُم مَن يُؤمِنُ بِهِ وَمِنهُم مَن لا يُؤمِنُ بِهِ ۚ وَرَبُّكَ أَعلَمُ بِالمُفسِدينَ
blank: w-minhum m yuʾmin bihī w-minhum m lā yuʾmin bihī w-rabbuk ʾaʿlam b-l-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And of them are those who believe in it, and of them are those who do not believe in it. And your Lord is most knowing of the corrupters

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كَذَّبوكَ فَقُل لي عَمَلي وَلَكُم عَمَلُكُم ۖ أَنتُم بَريئونَ مِمّا أَعمَلُ وَأَنا بَريءٌ مِمّا تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-ʾ kadhdhabūk f-qul lī ʿamalī w-lakum ʿamalukum ʾantum barīʾūn mimmā ʾaʿmal w-ʾan barīʾ mimmā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And if they deny you, O Muhammad, then say, "For me are my deeds, and for you are your deeds. You are disassociated from what I do, and I am disassociated from what you do

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنهُم مَن يَستَمِعونَ إِلَيكَ ۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُسمِعُ الصُّمَّ وَلَو كانوا لا يَعقِلونَ
blank: w-minhum m yastamiʿūn ʾilayk ʾ-f-ʾant tusmiʿ ṣ-ṣumm w-law kānū lā yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And among them are those who listen to you. But can you cause the deaf to hear, although they will not use reason

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنهُم مَن يَنظُرُ إِلَيكَ ۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهدِي العُميَ وَلَو كانوا لا يُبصِرونَ
blank: w-minhum m yanẓur ʾilayk ʾ-f-ʾant tahdīl-ʿumy w-law kānū lā yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And among them are those who look at you. But can you guide the blind although they will not attempt to see

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَظلِمُ النّاسَ شَيئًا وَلٰكِنَّ النّاسَ أَنفُسَهُم يَظلِمونَ
blank: ʾinn llāh lā yaẓlim n-nās shayʾ w-lākinn n-nās ʾanfusahum yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah does not wrong the people at all, but it is the people who are wronging themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يَحشُرُهُم كَأَن لَم يَلبَثوا إِلّا ساعَةً مِنَ النَّهارِ يَتَعارَفونَ بَينَهُم ۚ قَد خَسِرَ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِلِقاءِ اللَّهِ وَما كانوا مُهتَدينَ
blank: w-yawm yaḥshuruhum k-ʾ lam yalbathū ʾillā sāʿatam-min n-nahār yataʿārafūn baynahum qad khasiralladhīn kadhdhabū b-liqāʾ llāh w-mā kānū muhtadīn
english_saheeh_international: And on the Day when He will gather them, it will be as if they had not remained in the world but an hour of the day, and they will know each other. Those will have lost who denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided

arabic_uthmani: وَإِمّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعضَ الَّذي نَعِدُهُم أَو نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَينا مَرجِعُهُم ثُمَّ اللَّهُ شَهيدٌ عَلىٰ ما يَفعَلونَ
blank: w-ʾimmā nuriyannak baʿḍalladhī naʿiduhum ʾaw natawaffayannak f-ʾilaynā marjiʿuhum thumm llāh shahīd ʿalā mā yafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: And whether We show you some of what We promise them, O Muhammad, or We take you in death, to Us is their return; then, either way, Allah is a witness concerning what they are doing

arabic_uthmani: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ رَسولٌ ۖ فَإِذا جاءَ رَسولُهُم قُضِيَ بَينَهُم بِالقِسطِ وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: w-l-kull ʾummat rasūl f-ʾidhā jāʾ rasūluhum quḍiy baynahum b-l-qisṭ w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And for every nation is a messenger. So when their messenger comes, it will be judged between them in justice, and they will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ مَتىٰ هٰذَا الوَعدُ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-yaqūlūn matā hādhāl-waʿd ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "When is the fulfillment of this promise, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: قُل لا أَملِكُ لِنَفسي ضَرًّا وَلا نَفعًا إِلّا ما شاءَ اللَّهُ ۗ لِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٌ ۚ إِذا جاءَ أَجَلُهُم فَلا يَستَأخِرونَ ساعَةً ۖ وَلا يَستَقدِمونَ
blank: qul lā ʾamlik l-nafsī ḍarr w-lā nafʿ ʾillā mā shāʾ llāh l-kull ʾummat ʾajal ʾidhā jāʾ ʾajaluhum f-lā yastaʾkhirūn sāʿat w-lā yastaqdimūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "I possess not for myself any harm or benefit except what Allah should will. For every nation is a specified term. When their time has come, then they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede it

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم إِن أَتاكُم عَذابُهُ بَياتًا أَو نَهارًا ماذا يَستَعجِلُ مِنهُ المُجرِمونَ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ ʾatākum ʿadhābuhū bayāt ʾaw nahāram-mādhā yastaʿjil minhul-mujrimūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered: if His punishment should come to you by night or by day - for which aspect of it would the criminals be impatient

arabic_uthmani: أَثُمَّ إِذا ما وَقَعَ آمَنتُم بِهِ ۚ آلآنَ وَقَد كُنتُم بِهِ تَستَعجِلونَ
blank: ʾ-thumm ʾidhā mā waqaʿ ʾāmantum bihī ʾāl-ʾān w-qad kuntum bihī tastaʿjilūn
english_saheeh_international: Then is it that when it has actually occurred you will believe in it? Now? And you were once for it impatient

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ قيلَ لِلَّذينَ ظَلَموا ذوقوا عَذابَ الخُلدِ هَل تُجزَونَ إِلّا بِما كُنتُم تَكسِبونَ
blank: thumm qīl l-lladhīn ẓalamū dhūqū ʿadhābal-khuld hal tujzawn ʾillā b-mā kuntum taksibūn
english_saheeh_international: Then it will be said to those who had wronged, "Taste the punishment of eternity; are you being recompensed except for what you used to earn

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَيَستَنبِئونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَ ۖ قُل إي وَرَبّي إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ ۖ وَما أَنتُم بِمُعجِزينَ
blank: w-yastanbiʾūnak ʾ-ḥaqq huw qul ʾī w-rabbī ʾinnahū l-ḥaqq w-mā ʾantum b-muʿjizīn
english_saheeh_international: And they ask information of you, O Muhammad, "Is it true?" Say, "Yes, by my Lord. Indeed, it is truth; and you will not cause failure to Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو أَنَّ لِكُلِّ نَفسٍ ظَلَمَت ما فِي الأَرضِ لَافتَدَت بِهِ ۗ وَأَسَرُّوا النَّدامَةَ لَمّا رَأَوُا العَذابَ ۖ وَقُضِيَ بَينَهُم بِالقِسطِ ۚ وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: w-law ʾann l-kull nafs ẓalamat mā fīl-ʾarḍ l-ftadat bihī w-ʾasarrū n-nadāmat lammā raʾawul-ʿadhāb w-quḍiy baynahum b-l-qisṭ w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And if each soul that wronged had everything on earth, it would offer it in ransom. And they will confide regret when they see the punishment; and they will be judged in justice, and they will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: أَلا إِنَّ لِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۗ أَلا إِنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: ʾ-lā ʾinn l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ʾ-lā ʾinn waʿd llāh ḥaqq w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. Unquestionably, the promise of Allah is truth, but most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ يُحيي وَيُميتُ وَإِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: huw yuḥyī w-yumīt w-ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: He gives life and causes death, and to Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ قَد جاءَتكُم مَوعِظَةٌ مِن رَبِّكُم وَشِفاءٌ لِما فِي الصُّدورِ وَهُدًى وَرَحمَةٌ لِلمُؤمِنينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās qad jāʾatkum mawʿiẓat m rabbikum w-shifāʾ l-mā fī ṣ-ṣudūr w-hud w-raḥmat l-l-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, there has to come to you instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts and guidance and mercy for the believers

arabic_uthmani: قُل بِفَضلِ اللَّهِ وَبِرَحمَتِهِ فَبِذٰلِكَ فَليَفرَحوا هُوَ خَيرٌ مِمّا يَجمَعونَ
blank: qul b-faḍl llāh w-b-raḥmatihī f-b-dhālik f-l-yafraḥū huw khayr mimmā yajmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy - in that let them rejoice; it is better than what they accumulate

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم ما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ لَكُم مِن رِزقٍ فَجَعَلتُم مِنهُ حَرامًا وَحَلالًا قُل آللَّهُ أَذِنَ لَكُم ۖ أَم عَلَى اللَّهِ تَفتَرونَ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum mā ʾanzal llāh lakum m rizq f-jaʿaltum minh ḥarām w-ḥalāl qul ʾāllāh ʾadhin lakum ʾam ʿalā llāh taftarūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you seen what Allah has sent down to you of provision of which you have made some lawful and some unlawful?" Say, "Has Allah permitted you to do so, or do you invent something about Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَما ظَنُّ الَّذينَ يَفتَرونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ الكَذِبَ يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَذو فَضلٍ عَلَى النّاسِ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَشكُرونَ
blank: w-mā ẓannulladhīn yaftarūn ʿalā llāhil-kadhib yawmal-qiyāmat ʾinn llāh l-dhū faḍl ʿalā n-nās w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And what will be the supposition of those who invent falsehood about Allah on the Day of Resurrection? Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of them are not grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَما تَكونُ في شَأنٍ وَما تَتلو مِنهُ مِن قُرآنٍ وَلا تَعمَلونَ مِن عَمَلٍ إِلّا كُنّا عَلَيكُم شُهودًا إِذ تُفيضونَ فيهِ ۚ وَما يَعزُبُ عَن رَبِّكَ مِن مِثقالِ ذَرَّةٍ فِي الأَرضِ وَلا فِي السَّماءِ وَلا أَصغَرَ مِن ذٰلِكَ وَلا أَكبَرَ إِلّا في كِتابٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-mā takūn fī shaʾn w-mā tatlū minh m qurʾān w-lā taʿmalūn m ʿamal ʾillā kunnā ʿalaykum shuhūd ʾidh tufīḍūn fīh w-mā yaʿzub ʿ rabbik m mithqāl dharrat fīl-ʾarḍ w-lā fī s-samāʾ w-lā ʾaṣghar m dhālik w-lā ʾakbar ʾillā fī kitāb mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And, O Muhammad, you are not engaged in any matter or recite any of the Qur'an and you people do not do any deed except that We are witness over you when you are involved in it. And not absent from your Lord is any part of an atom's weight within the earth or within the heaven or anything smaller than that or greater but that it is in a clear register

arabic_uthmani: أَلا إِنَّ أَولِياءَ اللَّهِ لا خَوفٌ عَلَيهِم وَلا هُم يَحزَنونَ
blank: ʾ-lā ʾinn ʾawliyāʾ llāh lā khawf ʿalayhim w-lā hum yaḥzanūn
english_saheeh_international: Unquestionably, for the allies of Allah there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَكانوا يَتَّقونَ
blank: alladhīn ʾāmanū w-kānū yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who believed and were fearing Allah

arabic_uthmani: لَهُمُ البُشرىٰ فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَفِي الآخِرَةِ ۚ لا تَبديلَ لِكَلِماتِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: lahumul-bushrā fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-fīl-ʾākhirat lā tabdīl l-kalimāt llāh dhālik huwal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: For them are good tidings in the worldly life and in the Hereafter. No change is there in the words of Allah. That is what is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَحزُنكَ قَولُهُم ۘ إِنَّ العِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَميعًا ۚ هُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: w-lā yaḥzunk qawluhum ʾinnal-ʿizzat l-llāh jamīʿ huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, honor due to power belongs to Allah entirely. He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: أَلا إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَمَن فِي الأَرضِ ۗ وَما يَتَّبِعُ الَّذينَ يَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ شُرَكاءَ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَإِن هُم إِلّا يَخرُصونَ
blank: ʾ-lā ʾinn l-llāh m fī s-samāwāt w-m fīl-ʾarḍ w-mā yattabiʿulladhīn yadʿūn m dūn llāh shurakāʾ ʾ yattabiʿūn ʾillā ẓ-ẓann w-ʾ hum ʾillā yakhruṣūn
english_saheeh_international: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth. And those who invoke other than Allah do not actually follow His "partners." They follow not except assumption, and they are not but falsifying

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ اللَّيلَ لِتَسكُنوا فيهِ وَالنَّهارَ مُبصِرًا ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يَسمَعونَ
blank: huwalladhī jaʿal lakumul-layl l-taskunū fīh w-n-nahār mubṣir ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who made for you the night to rest therein and the day, giving sight. Indeed in that are signs for a people who listen

arabic_uthmani: قالُوا اتَّخَذَ اللَّهُ وَلَدًا ۗ سُبحانَهُ ۖ هُوَ الغَنِيُّ ۖ لَهُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۚ إِن عِندَكُم مِن سُلطانٍ بِهٰذا ۚ أَتَقولونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ ما لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: qālū ttakhadh llāh walad subḥānahū huwal-ghaniyy lahū mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ ʾ ʿindakum m sulṭān b-hādhā ʾ-taqūlūn ʿalā llāh mā lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: They have said, "Allah has taken a son." Exalted is He; He is the one Free of need. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth. You have no authority for this claim. Do you say about Allah that which you do not know

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَفتَرونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ الكَذِبَ لا يُفلِحونَ
blank: qul ʾinnalladhīn yaftarūn ʿalā llāhil-kadhib lā yufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed

arabic_uthmani: مَتاعٌ فِي الدُّنيا ثُمَّ إِلَينا مَرجِعُهُم ثُمَّ نُذيقُهُمُ العَذابَ الشَّديدَ بِما كانوا يَكفُرونَ
blank: matāʿ fī d-dunyā thumm ʾilaynā marjiʿuhum thumm nudhīquhumul-ʿadhāb sh-shadīd b-mā kānū yakfurūn
english_saheeh_international: For them is brief enjoyment in this world; then to Us is their return; then We will make them taste the severe punishment because they used to disbelieve

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَاتلُ عَلَيهِم نَبَأَ نوحٍ إِذ قالَ لِقَومِهِ يا قَومِ إِن كانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيكُم مَقامي وَتَذكيري بِآياتِ اللَّهِ فَعَلَى اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلتُ فَأَجمِعوا أَمرَكُم وَشُرَكاءَكُم ثُمَّ لا يَكُن أَمرُكُم عَلَيكُم غُمَّةً ثُمَّ اقضوا إِلَيَّ وَلا تُنظِرونِ
blank: w-tl ʿalayhim nabaʾ nūḥ ʾidh qāl l-qawmihī yā-qawm ʾ kān kabur ʿalaykum maqāmī w-tadhkīrī b-ʾāyāt llāh f-ʿalā llāh tawakkalt f-ʾajmiʿū ʾamrakum w-shurakāʾakum thumm lā yak ʾamrukum ʿalaykum ghummat thumm qḍū ʾilayy w-lā tunẓirūn
english_saheeh_international: And recite to them the news of Noah, when he said to his people, "O my people, if my residence and my reminding of the signs of Allah has become burdensome upon you - then I have relied upon Allah. So resolve upon your plan and call upon your associates. Then let not your plan be obscure to you. Then carry it out upon me and do not give me respite

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن تَوَلَّيتُم فَما سَأَلتُكُم مِن أَجرٍ ۖ إِن أَجرِيَ إِلّا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَأُمِرتُ أَن أَكونَ مِنَ المُسلِمينَ
blank: f-ʾ tawallaytum f-mā saʾaltukum m ʾajr ʾ ʾajriy ʾillā ʿalā llāh w-ʾumirt ʾ ʾakūn minal-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And if you turn away from my advice then no payment have I asked of you. My reward is only from Allah, and I have been commanded to be of the Muslims

arabic_uthmani: فَكَذَّبوهُ فَنَجَّيناهُ وَمَن مَعَهُ فِي الفُلكِ وَجَعَلناهُم خَلائِفَ وَأَغرَقنَا الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا ۖ فَانظُر كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُنذَرينَ
blank: f-kadhdhabūh f-najjaynāh w-mam-maʿahū fīl-fulk w-jaʿalnāhum khalāʾif w-ʾaghraqnālladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā f-nẓur kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mundharīn
english_saheeh_international: And they denied him, so We saved him and those with him in the ship and made them successors, and We drowned those who denied Our signs. Then see how was the end of those who were warned

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ بَعَثنا مِن بَعدِهِ رُسُلًا إِلىٰ قَومِهِم فَجاءوهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ فَما كانوا لِيُؤمِنوا بِما كَذَّبوا بِهِ مِن قَبلُ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ نَطبَعُ عَلىٰ قُلوبِ المُعتَدينَ
blank: thumm baʿathnā m baʿdihī rusul ʾilā qawmihim f-jāʾūhum b-l-bayyināt f-mā kānū l-yuʾminū b-mā kadhdhabū bihī m qabl k-dhālik naṭbaʿ ʿalā qulūbil-muʿtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We sent after him messengers to their peoples, and they came to them with clear proofs. But they were not to believe in that which they had denied before. Thus We seal over the hearts of the transgressors

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ بَعَثنا مِن بَعدِهِم موسىٰ وَهارونَ إِلىٰ فِرعَونَ وَمَلَئِهِ بِآياتِنا فَاستَكبَروا وَكانوا قَومًا مُجرِمينَ
blank: thumm baʿathnā m baʿdihim mūsā w-hārūn ʾilā firʿawn w-malaʾihī b-ʾāyātinā f-stakbarū w-kānū qawmam-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We sent after them Moses and Aaron to Pharaoh and his establishment with Our signs, but they behaved arrogantly and were a criminal people

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَهُمُ الحَقُّ مِن عِندِنا قالوا إِنَّ هٰذا لَسِحرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: f-lammā jāʾahumul-ḥaqq m ʿindinā qālū ʾinn hādhā l-siḥr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So when there came to them the truth from Us, they said, "Indeed, this is obvious magic

arabic_uthmani: قالَ موسىٰ أَتَقولونَ لِلحَقِّ لَمّا جاءَكُم ۖ أَسِحرٌ هٰذا وَلا يُفلِحُ السّاحِرونَ
blank: qāl mūsā ʾ-taqūlūn l-l-ḥaqq lammā jāʾakum ʾ-siḥr hādhā w-lā yufliḥ s-sāḥirūn
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "Do you say thus about the truth when it has come to you? Is this magic? But magicians will not succeed

arabic_uthmani: قالوا أَجِئتَنا لِتَلفِتَنا عَمّا وَجَدنا عَلَيهِ آباءَنا وَتَكونَ لَكُمَا الكِبرِياءُ فِي الأَرضِ وَما نَحنُ لَكُما بِمُؤمِنينَ
blank: qālū ʾ-jiʾtanā l-talfitanā ʿammā wajadnā ʿalayh ʾābāʾanā w-takūn lakumāl-kibriyāʾ fīl-ʾarḍ w-mā naḥn lakumā b-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Have you come to us to turn us away from that upon which we found our fathers and so that you two may have grandeur in the land? And we are not believers in you

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ فِرعَونُ ائتوني بِكُلِّ ساحِرٍ عَليمٍ
blank: w-qāl firʿawn ʾtūnī b-kull sāḥir ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And Pharaoh said, "Bring to me every learned magician

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَ السَّحَرَةُ قالَ لَهُم موسىٰ أَلقوا ما أَنتُم مُلقونَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾ s-saḥarat qāl lahum mūsā ʾalqū mā ʾantum mulqūn
english_saheeh_international: So when the magicians came, Moses said to them, "Throw down whatever you will throw

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا أَلقَوا قالَ موسىٰ ما جِئتُم بِهِ السِّحرُ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَيُبطِلُهُ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُصلِحُ عَمَلَ المُفسِدينَ
blank: f-lammā ʾalqaw qāl mūsā mā jiʾtum bihī s-siḥr ʾinn llāh s-yubṭiluhū ʾinn llāh lā yuṣliḥ ʿamalal-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And when they had thrown, Moses said, "What you have brought is only magic. Indeed, Allah will expose its worthlessness. Indeed, Allah does not amend the work of corrupters

arabic_uthmani: وَيُحِقُّ اللَّهُ الحَقَّ بِكَلِماتِهِ وَلَو كَرِهَ المُجرِمونَ
blank: w-yuḥiqq llāhul-ḥaqq b-kalimātihī w-law karihal-mujrimūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah will establish the truth by His words, even if the criminals dislike it

arabic_uthmani: فَما آمَنَ لِموسىٰ إِلّا ذُرِّيَّةٌ مِن قَومِهِ عَلىٰ خَوفٍ مِن فِرعَونَ وَمَلَئِهِم أَن يَفتِنَهُم ۚ وَإِنَّ فِرعَونَ لَعالٍ فِي الأَرضِ وَإِنَّهُ لَمِنَ المُسرِفينَ
blank: f-mā ʾāman l-mūsā ʾillā dhurriyyat m qawmihī ʿalā khawf m firʿawn w-malaʾihim ʾ yaftinahum w-ʾinn firʿawn l-ʿāl fīl-ʾarḍ w-ʾinnahū l-minal-musrifīn
english_saheeh_international: But no one believed Moses, except some youths among his people, for fear of Pharaoh and his establishment that they would persecute them. And indeed, Pharaoh was haughty within the land, and indeed, he was of the transgressors

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ موسىٰ يا قَومِ إِن كُنتُم آمَنتُم بِاللَّهِ فَعَلَيهِ تَوَكَّلوا إِن كُنتُم مُسلِمينَ
blank: w-qāl mūsā yā-qawm ʾ kuntum ʾāmantum b-llāh f-ʿalayh tawakkalū ʾ kuntum muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And Moses said, "O my people, if you have believed in Allah, then rely upon Him, if you should be Muslims

arabic_uthmani: فَقالوا عَلَى اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلنا رَبَّنا لا تَجعَلنا فِتنَةً لِلقَومِ الظّالِمينَ
blank: f-qālū ʿalā llāh tawakkalnā rabbanā lā tajʿalnā fitnat l-l-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: So they said, "Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not objects of trial for the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: وَنَجِّنا بِرَحمَتِكَ مِنَ القَومِ الكافِرينَ
blank: w-najjinā b-raḥmatik minal-qawmil-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people

arabic_uthmani: وَأَوحَينا إِلىٰ موسىٰ وَأَخيهِ أَن تَبَوَّآ لِقَومِكُما بِمِصرَ بُيوتًا وَاجعَلوا بُيوتَكُم قِبلَةً وَأَقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-ʾawḥaynā ʾilā mūsā w-ʾakhīh ʾ tabawwaʾā l-qawmikumā b-miṣr buyūt w-jʿalū buyūtakum qiblat w-ʾaqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-bashshiril-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And We inspired to Moses and his brother, "Settle your people in Egypt in houses and make your houses facing the qiblah and establish prayer and give good tidings to the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ موسىٰ رَبَّنا إِنَّكَ آتَيتَ فِرعَونَ وَمَلَأَهُ زينَةً وَأَموالًا فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا رَبَّنا لِيُضِلّوا عَن سَبيلِكَ ۖ رَبَّنَا اطمِس عَلىٰ أَموالِهِم وَاشدُد عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم فَلا يُؤمِنوا حَتّىٰ يَرَوُا العَذابَ الأَليمَ
blank: w-qāl mūsā rabbanā ʾinnak ʾātayt firʿawn w-malaʾahū zīnat w-ʾamwāl fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā rabbanā l-yuḍillū ʿ sabīlik rabbanā ṭmis ʿalā ʾamwālihim w-shdud ʿalā qulūbihim f-lā yuʾminū ḥattā yarawul-ʿadhābal-ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And Moses said, "Our Lord, indeed You have given Pharaoh and his establishment splendor and wealth in the worldly life, our Lord, that they may lead men astray from Your way. Our Lord, obliterate their wealth and harden their hearts so that they will not believe until they see the painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: قالَ قَد أُجيبَت دَعوَتُكُما فَاستَقيما وَلا تَتَّبِعانِّ سَبيلَ الَّذينَ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: qāl qad ʾujībat daʿwatukumā f-staqīmā w-lā tattabiʿānn sabīlalladhīn lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Your supplication has been answered." So remain on a right course and follow not the way of those who do not know

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَجاوَزنا بِبَني إِسرائيلَ البَحرَ فَأَتبَعَهُم فِرعَونُ وَجُنودُهُ بَغيًا وَعَدوًا ۖ حَتّىٰ إِذا أَدرَكَهُ الغَرَقُ قالَ آمَنتُ أَنَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا الَّذي آمَنَت بِهِ بَنو إِسرائيلَ وَأَنا مِنَ المُسلِمينَ
blank: w-jāwaznā b-banī ʾisrāʾīlal-baḥr f-ʾatbaʿahum firʿawn w-junūduhū baghy w-ʿadw ḥattā ʾidhā ʾadrakahul-gharaq qāl ʾāmant ʾannahū lā ʾilāh ʾillālladhī ʾāmanat bihī banū ʾisrāʾīl w-ʾan minal-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And We took the Children of Israel across the sea, and Pharaoh and his soldiers pursued them in tyranny and enmity until, when drowning overtook him, he said, "I believe that there is no deity except that in whom the Children of Israel believe, and I am of the Muslims

arabic_uthmani: آلآنَ وَقَد عَصَيتَ قَبلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ المُفسِدينَ
blank: ʾāl-ʾān w-qad ʿaṣayt qabl w-kunt minal-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: Now? And you had disobeyed Him before and were of the corrupters

arabic_uthmani: فَاليَومَ نُنَجّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكونَ لِمَن خَلفَكَ آيَةً ۚ وَإِنَّ كَثيرًا مِنَ النّاسِ عَن آياتِنا لَغافِلونَ
blank: f-l-yawm nunajjīk b-badanik l-takūn l-m khalfak ʾāyat w-ʾinn kathīram-min n-nās ʿ ʾāyātinā l-ghāfilūn
english_saheeh_international: So today We will save you in body that you may be to those who succeed you a sign. And indeed, many among the people, of Our signs, are heedless

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد بَوَّأنا بَني إِسرائيلَ مُبَوَّأَ صِدقٍ وَرَزَقناهُم مِنَ الطَّيِّباتِ فَمَا اختَلَفوا حَتّىٰ جاءَهُمُ العِلمُ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقضي بَينَهُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ فيما كانوا فيهِ يَختَلِفونَ
blank: w-l-qad bawwaʾnā banī ʾisrāʾīl mubawwaʾ ṣidq w-razaqnāhum min ṭ-ṭayyibāt f-mā khtalafū ḥattā jāʾahumul-ʿilm ʾinn rabbak yaqḍī baynahum yawmal-qiyāmat fī-mā kānū fīh yakhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainty settled the Children of Israel in an agreeable settlement and provided them with good things. And they did not differ until after knowledge had come to them. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن كُنتَ في شَكٍّ مِمّا أَنزَلنا إِلَيكَ فَاسأَلِ الَّذينَ يَقرَءونَ الكِتابَ مِن قَبلِكَ ۚ لَقَد جاءَكَ الحَقُّ مِن رَبِّكَ فَلا تَكونَنَّ مِنَ المُمتَرينَ
blank: f-ʾ kunt fī shakk mimmā ʾanzalnā ʾilayk f-sʾalilladhīn yaqraʾūnal-kitāb m qablik l-qad jāʾakal-ḥaqq m rabbik f-lā takūnann minal-mumtarīn
english_saheeh_international: So if you are in doubt, O Muhammad, about that which We have revealed to you, then ask those who have been reading the Scripture before you. The truth has certainly come to you from your Lord, so never be among the doubters

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَكونَنَّ مِنَ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِ اللَّهِ فَتَكونَ مِنَ الخاسِرينَ
blank: w-lā takūnann minalladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyāt llāh f-takūn minal-khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: And never be of those who deny the signs of Allah and thus be among the losers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ حَقَّت عَلَيهِم كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ḥaqqat ʿalayhim kalimat rabbik lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those upon whom the word of your Lord has come into effect will not believe

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو جاءَتهُم كُلُّ آيَةٍ حَتّىٰ يَرَوُا العَذابَ الأَليمَ
blank: w-law jāʾathum kull ʾāyat ḥattā yarawul-ʿadhābal-ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Even if every sign should come to them, until they see the painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: فَلَولا كانَت قَريَةٌ آمَنَت فَنَفَعَها إيمانُها إِلّا قَومَ يونُسَ لَمّا آمَنوا كَشَفنا عَنهُم عَذابَ الخِزيِ فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَمَتَّعناهُم إِلىٰ حينٍ
blank: f-law-lā kānat qaryat ʾāmanat f-nafaʿahā ʾīmānuhā ʾillā qawm yūnus lammā ʾāmanū kashafnā ʿanhum ʿadhābal-khizy fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-mattaʿnāhum ʾilā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: Then has there not been a single city that believed so its faith benefited it except the people of Jonah? When they believed, We removed from them the punishment of disgrace in worldly life and gave them enjoyment for a time

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو شاءَ رَبُّكَ لَآمَنَ مَن فِي الأَرضِ كُلُّهُم جَميعًا ۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُكرِهُ النّاسَ حَتّىٰ يَكونوا مُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-law shāʾ rabbuk l-ʾāman m fīl-ʾarḍ kulluhum jamīʿ ʾ-f-ʾant tukrih n-nās ḥattā yakūnū muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And had your Lord willed, those on earth would have believed - all of them entirely. Then, O Muhammad, would you compel the people in order that they become believers

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ لِنَفسٍ أَن تُؤمِنَ إِلّا بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَيَجعَلُ الرِّجسَ عَلَى الَّذينَ لا يَعقِلونَ
blank: w-mā kān l-nafs ʾ tuʾmin ʾillā b-ʾidhn llāh w-yajʿal r-rijs ʿalālladhīn lā yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is not for a soul to believe except by permission of Allah, and He will place defilement upon those who will not use reason

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ انظُروا ماذا فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَما تُغنِي الآياتُ وَالنُّذُرُ عَن قَومٍ لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: qul nẓurū mādhā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā tughnīl-ʾāyāt w-n-nudhur ʿ qawm lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Observe what is in the heavens and earth." But of no avail will be signs or warners to a people who do not believe

arabic_uthmani: فَهَل يَنتَظِرونَ إِلّا مِثلَ أَيّامِ الَّذينَ خَلَوا مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ قُل فَانتَظِروا إِنّي مَعَكُم مِنَ المُنتَظِرينَ
blank: f-hal yantaẓirūn ʾillā mithl ʾayyāmilladhīn khalaw m qablihim qul f-ntaẓirū ʾinnī maʿakum minal-muntaẓirīn
english_saheeh_international: So do they wait except for like what occurred in the days of those who passed on before them? Say, "Then wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ نُنَجّي رُسُلَنا وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا ۚ كَذٰلِكَ حَقًّا عَلَينا نُنجِ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: thumm nunajjī rusulanā w-lladhīn ʾāmanū k-dhālik ḥaqq ʿalaynā nunjil-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We will save our messengers and those who have believed. Thus, it is an obligation upon Us that We save the believers

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ إِن كُنتُم في شَكٍّ مِن ديني فَلا أَعبُدُ الَّذينَ تَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَلٰكِن أَعبُدُ اللَّهَ الَّذي يَتَوَفّاكُم ۖ وَأُمِرتُ أَن أَكونَ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: qul yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ʾ kuntum fī shakk m dīnī f-lā ʾaʿbudulladhīn taʿbudūn m dūn llāh w-lāk ʾaʿbud llāhalladhī yatawaffākum w-ʾumirt ʾ ʾakūn minal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "O people, if you are in doubt as to my religion - then I do not worship those which you worship besides Allah; but I worship Allah, who causes your death. And I have been commanded to be of the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَأَن أَقِم وَجهَكَ لِلدّينِ حَنيفًا وَلا تَكونَنَّ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: w-ʾ ʾaqim wajhak l-d-dīn ḥanīf w-lā takūnann minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: And commanded, 'Direct your face toward the religion, inclining to truth, and never be of those who associate others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَدعُ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ما لا يَنفَعُكَ وَلا يَضُرُّكَ ۖ فَإِن فَعَلتَ فَإِنَّكَ إِذًا مِنَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-lā tadʿ m dūn llāh mā lā yanfaʿuk w-lā yaḍurruk f-ʾ faʿalt f-ʾinnak ʾidham-min ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And do not invoke besides Allah that which neither benefits you nor harms you, for if you did, then indeed you would be of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن يَمسَسكَ اللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلا كاشِفَ لَهُ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ وَإِن يُرِدكَ بِخَيرٍ فَلا رادَّ لِفَضلِهِ ۚ يُصيبُ بِهِ مَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ الغَفورُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: w-ʾ yamsask llāh b-ḍurr f-lā kāshif lahū ʾillā huw w-ʾ yuridk b-khayr f-lā rādd l-faḍlihī yuṣīb bihī m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī w-huwal-ghafūr r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him; and if He intends for you good, then there is no repeller of His bounty. He causes it to reach whom He wills of His servants. And He is the Forgiving, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ قَد جاءَكُمُ الحَقُّ مِن رَبِّكُم ۖ فَمَنِ اهتَدىٰ فَإِنَّما يَهتَدي لِنَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّما يَضِلُّ عَلَيها ۖ وَما أَنا عَلَيكُم بِوَكيلٍ
blank: qul yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās qad jāʾakumul-ḥaqq m rabbikum f-man htadā f-ʾinnamā yahtadī l-nafsihī w-m ḍall f-ʾinnamā yaḍill ʿalayhā w-mā ʾan ʿalaykum b-wakīl
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O mankind, the truth has come to you from your Lord, so whoever is guided is only guided for the benefit of his soul, and whoever goes astray only goes astray in violation against it. And I am not over you a manager

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّبِع ما يوحىٰ إِلَيكَ وَاصبِر حَتّىٰ يَحكُمَ اللَّهُ ۚ وَهُوَ خَيرُ الحاكِمينَ
blank: w-ttabiʿ mā yūḥā ʾilayk w-ṣbir ḥattā yaḥkum llāh w-huw khayrul-ḥākimīn
english_saheeh_international: And follow what is revealed to you, O Muhammad, and be patient until Allah will judge. And He is the best of judges

arabic_uthmani: الر ۚ كِتابٌ أُحكِمَت آياتُهُ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَت مِن لَدُن حَكيمٍ خَبيرٍ
blank: -l-r (ʾalif lām rā) kitāb ʾuḥkimat ʾāyātuhū thumm fuṣṣilat m lad ḥakīm khabīr
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Ra. This is a Book whose verses are perfected and then presented in detail from one who is Wise and Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: أَلّا تَعبُدوا إِلَّا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّني لَكُم مِنهُ نَذيرٌ وَبَشيرٌ
blank: ʾallā taʿbudū ʾillā llāh ʾinnanī lakum minh nadhīr w-bashīr
english_saheeh_international: Through a messenger, saying, "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a warner and a bringer of good tidings

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنِ استَغفِروا رَبَّكُم ثُمَّ توبوا إِلَيهِ يُمَتِّعكُم مَتاعًا حَسَنًا إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى وَيُؤتِ كُلَّ ذي فَضلٍ فَضلَهُ ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَإِنّي أَخافُ عَلَيكُم عَذابَ يَومٍ كَبيرٍ
blank: w-ʾan staghfirū rabbakum thumm tūbū ʾilayh yumattiʿkum matāʿ ḥasan ʾilā ʾajal musamm w-yuʾt kull dhī faḍl faḍlahū w-ʾ tawallaw f-ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʿalaykum ʿadhāb yawm kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And saying, "Seek forgiveness of your Lord and repent to Him, and He will let you enjoy a good provision for a specified term and give every doer of favor his favor. But if you turn away, then indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a great Day

arabic_uthmani: إِلَى اللَّهِ مَرجِعُكُم ۖ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: ʾilā llāh marjiʿukum w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: To Allah is your return, and He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: أَلا إِنَّهُم يَثنونَ صُدورَهُم لِيَستَخفوا مِنهُ ۚ أَلا حينَ يَستَغشونَ ثِيابَهُم يَعلَمُ ما يُسِرّونَ وَما يُعلِنونَ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: ʾ-lā ʾinnahum yathnūn ṣudūrahum l-yastakhfū minh ʾ-lā ḥīn yastaghshūn thiyābahum yaʿlam mā yusirrūn w-mā yuʿlinūn ʾinnahū ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: Unquestionably, they the disbelievers turn away their breasts to hide themselves from Him. Unquestionably, even when they cover themselves in their clothing, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَما مِن دابَّةٍ فِي الأَرضِ إِلّا عَلَى اللَّهِ رِزقُها وَيَعلَمُ مُستَقَرَّها وَمُستَودَعَها ۚ كُلٌّ في كِتابٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-mā m dābbat fīl-ʾarḍ ʾillā ʿalā llāh rizquhā w-yaʿlam mustaqarrahā w-mustawdaʿahā kull fī kitāb mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And there is no creature on earth but that upon Allah is its provision, and He knows its place of dwelling and place of storage. All is in a clear register

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ في سِتَّةِ أَيّامٍ وَكانَ عَرشُهُ عَلَى الماءِ لِيَبلُوَكُم أَيُّكُم أَحسَنُ عَمَلًا ۗ وَلَئِن قُلتَ إِنَّكُم مَبعوثونَ مِن بَعدِ المَوتِ لَيَقولَنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا إِن هٰذا إِلّا سِحرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-huwalladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ fī sittat ʾayyām w-kān ʿarshuhū ʿalāl-māʾ l-yabluwakum ʾayyukum ʾaḥsan ʿamal w-l-ʾ qult ʾinnakum mabʿūthūn m baʿdil-mawt l-yaqūlannalladhīn kafarū ʾ hādhā ʾillā siḥr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who created the heavens and the earth in six days - and His Throne had been upon water - that He might test you as to which of you is best in deed. But if you say, "Indeed, you are resurrected after death," those who disbelieve will surely say, "This is not but obvious magic

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن أَخَّرنا عَنهُمُ العَذابَ إِلىٰ أُمَّةٍ مَعدودَةٍ لَيَقولُنَّ ما يَحبِسُهُ ۗ أَلا يَومَ يَأتيهِم لَيسَ مَصروفًا عَنهُم وَحاقَ بِهِم ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ ʾakhkharnā ʿanhumul-ʿadhāb ʾilā ʾummat maʿdūdat l-yaqūlunn mā yaḥbisuhū ʾ-lā yawm yaʾtīhim lays maṣrūf ʿanhum w-ḥāq bihim mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And if We hold back from them the punishment for a limited time, they will surely say, "What detains it?" Unquestionably, on the Day it comes to them, it will not be averted from them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن أَذَقنَا الإِنسانَ مِنّا رَحمَةً ثُمَّ نَزَعناها مِنهُ إِنَّهُ لَيَئوسٌ كَفورٌ
blank: w-l-ʾ ʾadhaqnāl-ʾinsān minnā raḥmat thumm nazaʿnāhā minh ʾinnahū l-yaʾūs kafūr
english_saheeh_international: And if We give man a taste of mercy from Us and then We withdraw it from him, indeed, he is despairing and ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن أَذَقناهُ نَعماءَ بَعدَ ضَرّاءَ مَسَّتهُ لَيَقولَنَّ ذَهَبَ السَّيِّئَاتُ عَنّي ۚ إِنَّهُ لَفَرِحٌ فَخورٌ
blank: w-l-ʾ ʾadhaqnāh naʿmāʾ baʿd ḍarrāʾ massath l-yaqūlann dhahab s-sayyiʾāt ʿannī ʾinnahū l-fariḥ fakhūr
english_saheeh_international: But if We give him a taste of favor after hardship has touched him, he will surely say, "Bad times have left me." Indeed, he is exultant and boastful

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا الَّذينَ صَبَروا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ أُولٰئِكَ لَهُم مَغفِرَةٌ وَأَجرٌ كَبيرٌ
blank: ʾillālladhīn ṣabarū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt ʾulāʾik lahum maghfirat w-ʾajr kabīr
english_saheeh_international: Except for those who are patient and do righteous deeds; those will have forgiveness and great reward

arabic_uthmani: فَلَعَلَّكَ تارِكٌ بَعضَ ما يوحىٰ إِلَيكَ وَضائِقٌ بِهِ صَدرُكَ أَن يَقولوا لَولا أُنزِلَ عَلَيهِ كَنزٌ أَو جاءَ مَعَهُ مَلَكٌ ۚ إِنَّما أَنتَ نَذيرٌ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ وَكيلٌ
blank: f-laʿallak tārik baʿḍ mā yūḥā ʾilayk w-ḍāʾiq bihī ṣadruk ʾ yaqūlū law-lā ʾunzil ʿalayh kanz ʾaw jāʾ maʿahū malak ʾinnamā ʾant nadhīr w-llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ wakīl
english_saheeh_international: Then would you possibly leave out some of what is revealed to you, or is your breast constrained by it because they say, "Why has there not been sent down to him a treasure or come with him an angel?" But you are only a warner. And Allah is Disposer of all things

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَقولونَ افتَراهُ ۖ قُل فَأتوا بِعَشرِ سُوَرٍ مِثلِهِ مُفتَرَياتٍ وَادعوا مَنِ استَطَعتُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: ʾam yaqūlūn ftarāh qul f-ʾtū b-ʿashr suwar mithlihī muftarayāt w-dʿū man staṭaʿtum m dūn llāh ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Say, "Then bring ten surahs like it that have been invented and call upon for assistance whomever you can besides Allah, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: فَإِلَّم يَستَجيبوا لَكُم فَاعلَموا أَنَّما أُنزِلَ بِعِلمِ اللَّهِ وَأَن لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ فَهَل أَنتُم مُسلِمونَ
blank: f-ʾillam yastajībū lakum f-ʿlamū ʾannamā ʾunzil b-ʿilm llāh w-ʾ lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw f-hal ʾantum muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: And if they do not respond to you - then know that the Qur'an was revealed with the knowledge of Allah and that there is no deity except Him. Then, would you not be Muslims

arabic_uthmani: مَن كانَ يُريدُ الحَياةَ الدُّنيا وَزينَتَها نُوَفِّ إِلَيهِم أَعمالَهُم فيها وَهُم فيها لا يُبخَسونَ
blank: m kān yurīdul-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-zīnatahā nuwaff ʾilayhim ʾaʿmālahum fīhā w-hum fīhā lā yubkhasūn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever desires the life of this world and its adornments - We fully repay them for their deeds therein, and they therein will not be deprived

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ لَيسَ لَهُم فِي الآخِرَةِ إِلَّا النّارُ ۖ وَحَبِطَ ما صَنَعوا فيها وَباطِلٌ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn lays lahum fīl-ʾākhirat ʾillā n-nār w-ḥabiṭ mā ṣanaʿū fīhā w-bāṭil mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the ones for whom there is not in the Hereafter but the Fire. And lost is what they did therein, and worthless is what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن كانَ عَلىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِن رَبِّهِ وَيَتلوهُ شاهِدٌ مِنهُ وَمِن قَبلِهِ كِتابُ موسىٰ إِمامًا وَرَحمَةً ۚ أُولٰئِكَ يُؤمِنونَ بِهِ ۚ وَمَن يَكفُر بِهِ مِنَ الأَحزابِ فَالنّارُ مَوعِدُهُ ۚ فَلا تَكُ في مِريَةٍ مِنهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ الحَقُّ مِن رَبِّكَ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾ-f-m kān ʿalā bayyinat m rabbihī w-yatlūh shāhid minh w-m qablihī kitāb mūsā ʾimām w-raḥmat ʾulāʾik yuʾminūn bihī w-m yakfur bihī minal-ʾaḥzāb f-n-nār mawʿiduhū f-lā tak fī miryat minh ʾinnahul-ḥaqq m rabbik w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: So is one who stands upon a clear evidence from his Lord like the aforementioned? And a witness from Him follows it, and before it was the Scripture of Moses to lead and as mercy. Those believers in the former revelations believe in the Qur'an. But whoever disbelieves in it from the various factions - the Fire is his promised destination. So be not in doubt about it. Indeed, it is the truth from your Lord, but most of the people do not believe

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا ۚ أُولٰئِكَ يُعرَضونَ عَلىٰ رَبِّهِم وَيَقولُ الأَشهادُ هٰؤُلاءِ الَّذينَ كَذَبوا عَلىٰ رَبِّهِم ۚ أَلا لَعنَةُ اللَّهِ عَلَى الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-m ʾaẓlam mimman ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib ʾulāʾik yuʿraḍūn ʿalā rabbihim w-yaqūlul-ʾashhād hāʾulāʾilladhīn kadhabū ʿalā rabbihim ʾ-lā laʿnat llāh ʿalā ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah? Those will be presented before their Lord, and the witnesses will say, "These are the ones who lied against their Lord." Unquestionably, the curse of Allah is upon the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَصُدّونَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَيَبغونَها عِوَجًا وَهُم بِالآخِرَةِ هُم كافِرونَ
blank: alladhīn yaṣuddūn ʿ sabīl llāh w-yabghūnahā ʿiwaj w-hum b-l-ʾākhirat hum kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: Who averted people from the way of Allah and sought to make it seem deviant while they, concerning the Hereafter, were disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ لَم يَكونوا مُعجِزينَ فِي الأَرضِ وَما كانَ لَهُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ مِن أَولِياءَ ۘ يُضاعَفُ لَهُمُ العَذابُ ۚ ما كانوا يَستَطيعونَ السَّمعَ وَما كانوا يُبصِرونَ
blank: ʾulāʾik lam yakūnū muʿjizīn fīl-ʾarḍ w-mā kān lahum m dūn llāh m ʾawliyāʾ yuḍāʿaf lahumul-ʿadhāb mā kānū yastaṭīʿūn s-samʿ w-mā kānū yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: Those were not causing failure to Allah on earth, nor did they have besides Allah any protectors. For them the punishment will be multiplied. They were not able to hear, nor did they see

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ خَسِروا أَنفُسَهُم وَضَلَّ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَفتَرونَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn khasirū ʾanfusahum w-ḍall ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the ones who will have lost themselves, and lost from them is what they used to invent

arabic_uthmani: لا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُم فِي الآخِرَةِ هُمُ الأَخسَرونَ
blank: lā jaram ʾannahum fīl-ʾākhirat humul-ʾakhsarūn
english_saheeh_international: Assuredly, it is they in the Hereafter who will be the greatest losers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ وَأَخبَتوا إِلىٰ رَبِّهِم أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ الجَنَّةِ ۖ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-ʾakhbatū ʾilā rabbihim ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥābul-jannat hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds and humbled themselves to their Lord - those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide eternally therein

arabic_uthmani: ۞ مَثَلُ الفَريقَينِ كَالأَعمىٰ وَالأَصَمِّ وَالبَصيرِ وَالسَّميعِ ۚ هَل يَستَوِيانِ مَثَلًا ۚ أَفَلا تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: mathalul-farīqayn k-l-ʾaʿmā w-l-ʾaṣamm w-l-baṣīr w-s-samīʿ hal yastawiyān mathal ʾ-f-lā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: The example of the two parties is like the blind and deaf, and the seeing and hearing. Are they equal in comparison? Then, will you not remember

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا نوحًا إِلىٰ قَومِهِ إِنّي لَكُم نَذيرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā nūḥ ʾilā qawmihī ʾinnī lakum nadhīr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, saying, "Indeed, I am to you a clear warner

arabic_uthmani: أَن لا تَعبُدوا إِلَّا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنّي أَخافُ عَلَيكُم عَذابَ يَومٍ أَليمٍ
blank: ʾ lā taʿbudū ʾillā llāh ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʿalaykum ʿadhāb yawm ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: That you not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a painful day

arabic_uthmani: فَقالَ المَلَأُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِن قَومِهِ ما نَراكَ إِلّا بَشَرًا مِثلَنا وَما نَراكَ اتَّبَعَكَ إِلَّا الَّذينَ هُم أَراذِلُنا بادِيَ الرَّأيِ وَما نَرىٰ لَكُم عَلَينا مِن فَضلٍ بَل نَظُنُّكُم كاذِبينَ
blank: f-qālal-malaʾulladhīn kafarū m qawmihī mā narāk ʾillā basharam-mithlanā w-mā narāk ttabaʿak ʾillālladhīn hum ʾarādhilunā bādiy r-raʾy w-mā narā lakum ʿalaynā m faḍl bal naẓunnukum kādhibīn
english_saheeh_international: So the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "We do not see you but as a man like ourselves, and we do not see you followed except by those who are the lowest of us and at first suggestion. And we do not see in you over us any merit; rather, we think you are liars

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا قَومِ أَرَأَيتُم إِن كُنتُ عَلىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِن رَبّي وَآتاني رَحمَةً مِن عِندِهِ فَعُمِّيَت عَلَيكُم أَنُلزِمُكُموها وَأَنتُم لَها كارِهونَ
blank: qāl yā-qawm ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ kunt ʿalā bayyinat m rabbī w-ʾātānī raḥmatam-m ʿindihī f-ʿummiyat ʿalaykum ʾ-nulzimukumūhā w-ʾantum lahā kārihūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "O my people have you considered: if I should be upon clear evidence from my Lord while He has given me mercy from Himself but it has been made unapparent to you, should we force it upon you while you are averse to it

arabic_uthmani: وَيا قَومِ لا أَسأَلُكُم عَلَيهِ مالًا ۖ إِن أَجرِيَ إِلّا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۚ وَما أَنا بِطارِدِ الَّذينَ آمَنوا ۚ إِنَّهُم مُلاقو رَبِّهِم وَلٰكِنّي أَراكُم قَومًا تَجهَلونَ
blank: w-yā-qawm lā ʾasʾalukum ʿalayh māl ʾ ʾajriy ʾillā ʿalā llāh w-mā ʾan b-ṭāridilladhīn ʾāmanū ʾinnahum mulāqū rabbihim w-lākinnī ʾarākum qawm tajhalūn
english_saheeh_international: And O my people, I ask not of you for it any wealth. My reward is not but from Allah. And I am not one to drive away those who have believed. Indeed, they will meet their Lord, but I see that you are a people behaving ignorantly

arabic_uthmani: وَيا قَومِ مَن يَنصُرُني مِنَ اللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُهُم ۚ أَفَلا تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-yā-qawm m yanṣurunī min llāh ʾ ṭaradtuhum ʾ-f-lā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And O my people, who would protect me from Allah if I drove them away? Then will you not be reminded

arabic_uthmani: وَلا أَقولُ لَكُم عِندي خَزائِنُ اللَّهِ وَلا أَعلَمُ الغَيبَ وَلا أَقولُ إِنّي مَلَكٌ وَلا أَقولُ لِلَّذينَ تَزدَري أَعيُنُكُم لَن يُؤتِيَهُمُ اللَّهُ خَيرًا ۖ اللَّهُ أَعلَمُ بِما في أَنفُسِهِم ۖ إِنّي إِذًا لَمِنَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-lā ʾaqūl lakum ʿindī khazāʾin llāh w-lā ʾaʿlamul-ghayb w-lā ʾaqūl ʾinnī malak w-lā ʾaqūl l-lladhīn tazdarī ʾaʿyunukum l yuʾtiyahum llāh khayr- llāh ʾaʿlam b-mā fī ʾanfusihim ʾinnī ʾidh l-min ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And I do not tell you that I have the depositories containing the provision of Allah or that I know the unseen, nor do I tell you that I am an angel, nor do I say of those upon whom your eyes look down that Allah will never grant them any good. Allah is most knowing of what is within their souls. Indeed, I would then be among the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا نوحُ قَد جادَلتَنا فَأَكثَرتَ جِدالَنا فَأتِنا بِما تَعِدُنا إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصّادِقينَ
blank: qālū yā-nūḥ qad jādaltanā f-ʾakthart jidālanā f-ʾtinā b-mā taʿidunā ʾ kunt min ṣ-ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "O Noah, you have disputed us and been frequent in dispute of us. So bring us what you threaten us, if you should be of the truthful

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِنَّما يَأتيكُم بِهِ اللَّهُ إِن شاءَ وَما أَنتُم بِمُعجِزينَ
blank: qāl ʾinnamā yaʾtīkum bih llāh ʾ shāʾ w-mā ʾantum b-muʿjizīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Allah will only bring it to you if He wills, and you will not cause Him failure

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَنفَعُكُم نُصحي إِن أَرَدتُ أَن أَنصَحَ لَكُم إِن كانَ اللَّهُ يُريدُ أَن يُغوِيَكُم ۚ هُوَ رَبُّكُم وَإِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: w-lā yanfaʿukum nuṣḥī ʾ ʾaradt ʾ ʾanṣaḥ lakum ʾ kān llāh yurīd ʾ yughwiyakum huw rabbukum w-ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And my advice will not benefit you - although I wished to advise you - If Allah should intend to put you in error. He is your Lord, and to Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَقولونَ افتَراهُ ۖ قُل إِنِ افتَرَيتُهُ فَعَلَيَّ إِجرامي وَأَنا بَريءٌ مِمّا تُجرِمونَ
blank: ʾam yaqūlūn ftarāh qul ʾin ftaraytuhū f-ʿalayy ʾijrāmī w-ʾan barīʾ mimmā tujrimūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they say about Prophet Muhammad, "He invented it"? Say, "If I have invented it, then upon me is the consequence of my crime; but I am innocent of what crimes you commit

arabic_uthmani: وَأوحِيَ إِلىٰ نوحٍ أَنَّهُ لَن يُؤمِنَ مِن قَومِكَ إِلّا مَن قَد آمَنَ فَلا تَبتَئِس بِما كانوا يَفعَلونَ
blank: w-ʾūḥiy ʾilā nūḥ ʾannahū l yuʾmin m qawmik ʾillā m qad ʾāman f-lā tabtaʾis b-mā kānū yafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: And it was revealed to Noah that, "No one will believe from your people except those who have already believed, so do not be distressed by what they have been doing

arabic_uthmani: وَاصنَعِ الفُلكَ بِأَعيُنِنا وَوَحيِنا وَلا تُخاطِبني فِي الَّذينَ ظَلَموا ۚ إِنَّهُم مُغرَقونَ
blank: w-ṣnaʿil-fulk b-ʾaʿyuninā w-waḥyinā w-lā tukhāṭibnī fīlladhīn ẓalamū ʾinnahum mughraqūn
english_saheeh_international: And construct the ship under Our observation and Our inspiration and do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned

arabic_uthmani: وَيَصنَعُ الفُلكَ وَكُلَّما مَرَّ عَلَيهِ مَلَأٌ مِن قَومِهِ سَخِروا مِنهُ ۚ قالَ إِن تَسخَروا مِنّا فَإِنّا نَسخَرُ مِنكُم كَما تَسخَرونَ
blank: w-yaṣnaʿul-fulk w-kullamā marr ʿalayh malaʾ m qawmihī sakhirū minh qāl ʾ taskharū minnā f-ʾinnā naskhar minkum k-mā taskharūn
english_saheeh_international: And he constructed the ship, and whenever an assembly of the eminent of his people passed by him, they ridiculed him. He said, "If you ridicule us, then we will ridicule you just as you ridicule

arabic_uthmani: فَسَوفَ تَعلَمونَ مَن يَأتيهِ عَذابٌ يُخزيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيهِ عَذابٌ مُقيمٌ
blank: f-sawf taʿlamūn m yaʾtīh ʿadhāb yukhzīh w-yaḥill ʿalayh ʿadhāb muqīm
english_saheeh_international: And you are going to know who will get a punishment that will disgrace him on earth and upon whom will descend an enduring punishment in the Hereafter

arabic_uthmani: حَتّىٰ إِذا جاءَ أَمرُنا وَفارَ التَّنّورُ قُلنَا احمِل فيها مِن كُلٍّ زَوجَينِ اثنَينِ وَأَهلَكَ إِلّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيهِ القَولُ وَمَن آمَنَ ۚ وَما آمَنَ مَعَهُ إِلّا قَليلٌ
blank: ḥattā ʾidhā jāʾ ʾamrunā w-fār t-tannūr qulnā ḥmil fīhā m kull zawjayn thnayn w-ʾahlak ʾillā m sabaq ʿalayhil-qawl w-m ʾāman w-mā ʾāman maʿahū ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: So it was, until when Our command came and the oven overflowed, We said, "Load upon the ship of each creature two mates and your family, except those about whom the word has preceded, and include whoever has believed." But none had believed with him, except a few

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَقالَ اركَبوا فيها بِسمِ اللَّهِ مَجراها وَمُرساها ۚ إِنَّ رَبّي لَغَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-qāl rkabū fīhā bismillāh majrāhā w-mursāhā ʾinn rabbī l-ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And Noah said, "Embark therein; in the name of Allah is its course and its anchorage. Indeed, my Lord is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَهِيَ تَجري بِهِم في مَوجٍ كَالجِبالِ وَنادىٰ نوحٌ ابنَهُ وَكانَ في مَعزِلٍ يا بُنَيَّ اركَب مَعَنا وَلا تَكُن مَعَ الكافِرينَ
blank: w-hiy tajrī bihim fī mawj k-l-jibāl w-nādā nūḥ- bnahū w-kān fī maʿzil yā-bunayy rkab maʿanā w-lā tak maʿal-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And it sailed with them through waves like mountains, and Noah called to his son who was apart from them, "O my son, come aboard with us and be not with the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ سَآوي إِلىٰ جَبَلٍ يَعصِمُني مِنَ الماءِ ۚ قالَ لا عاصِمَ اليَومَ مِن أَمرِ اللَّهِ إِلّا مَن رَحِمَ ۚ وَحالَ بَينَهُمَا المَوجُ فَكانَ مِنَ المُغرَقينَ
blank: qāl s-ʾāwī ʾilā jabal yaʿṣimunī minal-māʾ qāl lā ʿāṣimal-yawm m ʾamr llāh ʾillā m raḥim w-ḥāl baynahumāl-mawj f-kān minal-mughraqīn
english_saheeh_international: But he said, "I will take refuge on a mountain to protect me from the water." Noah said, "There is no protector today from the decree of Allah, except for whom He gives mercy." And the waves came between them, and he was among the drowned

arabic_uthmani: وَقيلَ يا أَرضُ ابلَعي ماءَكِ وَيا سَماءُ أَقلِعي وَغيضَ الماءُ وَقُضِيَ الأَمرُ وَاستَوَت عَلَى الجودِيِّ ۖ وَقيلَ بُعدًا لِلقَومِ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-qīl yā-ʾarḍ blaʿī māʾak w-yā-samāʾ ʾaqliʿī w-ghīḍal-māʾ w-quḍiyal-ʾamr w-stawat ʿalāl-jūdiyy w-qīl buʿd l-l-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And it was said, "O earth, swallow your water, and O sky, withhold your rain." And the water subsided, and the matter was accomplished, and the ship came to rest on the mountain of Judiyy. And it was said, "Away with the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: وَنادىٰ نوحٌ رَبَّهُ فَقالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ ابني مِن أَهلي وَإِنَّ وَعدَكَ الحَقُّ وَأَنتَ أَحكَمُ الحاكِمينَ
blank: w-nādā nūḥ rabbahū f-qāl rabb ʾinn bnī m ʾahlī w-ʾinn waʿdakal-ḥaqq w-ʾant ʾaḥkamul-ḥākimīn
english_saheeh_international: And Noah called to his Lord and said, "My Lord, indeed my son is of my family; and indeed, Your promise is true; and You are the most just of judges

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا نوحُ إِنَّهُ لَيسَ مِن أَهلِكَ ۖ إِنَّهُ عَمَلٌ غَيرُ صالِحٍ ۖ فَلا تَسأَلنِ ما لَيسَ لَكَ بِهِ عِلمٌ ۖ إِنّي أَعِظُكَ أَن تَكونَ مِنَ الجاهِلينَ
blank: qāl yā-nūḥ ʾinnahū lays m ʾahlik ʾinnahū ʿamal ghayr ṣāliḥ f-lā tasʾaln mā lays lak bihī ʿilm ʾinnī ʾaʿiẓuk ʾ takūn minal-jāhilīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "O Noah, indeed he is not of your family; indeed, he is one whose work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge. Indeed, I advise you, lest you be among the ignorant

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ إِنّي أَعوذُ بِكَ أَن أَسأَلَكَ ما لَيسَ لي بِهِ عِلمٌ ۖ وَإِلّا تَغفِر لي وَتَرحَمني أَكُن مِنَ الخاسِرينَ
blank: qāl rabb ʾinnī ʾaʿūdh bik ʾ ʾasʾalak mā lays lī bihī ʿilm w-ʾillā taghfir lī w-tarḥamnī ʾak minal-khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: Noah said, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from asking that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have mercy upon me, I will be among the losers

arabic_uthmani: قيلَ يا نوحُ اهبِط بِسَلامٍ مِنّا وَبَرَكاتٍ عَلَيكَ وَعَلىٰ أُمَمٍ مِمَّن مَعَكَ ۚ وَأُمَمٌ سَنُمَتِّعُهُم ثُمَّ يَمَسُّهُم مِنّا عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: qīl yā-nūḥ hbiṭ b-salām minnā w-barakāt ʿalayk w-ʿalā ʾumam mimmam-maʿak w-ʾumam s-numattiʿuhum thumm yamassuhum minnā ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: It was said, "O Noah, disembark in security from Us and blessings upon you and upon nations descending from those with you. But other nations of them We will grant enjoyment; then there will touch them from Us a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: تِلكَ مِن أَنباءِ الغَيبِ نوحيها إِلَيكَ ۖ ما كُنتَ تَعلَمُها أَنتَ وَلا قَومُكَ مِن قَبلِ هٰذا ۖ فَاصبِر ۖ إِنَّ العاقِبَةَ لِلمُتَّقينَ
blank: tilk m ʾanbāʾil-ghayb nūḥīhā ʾilayk mā kunt taʿlamuhā ʾant w-lā qawmuk m qabl hādhā f-ṣbir ʾinnal-ʿāqibat l-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal to you, O Muhammad. You knew it not, neither you nor your people, before this. So be patient; indeed, the best outcome is for the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَإِلىٰ عادٍ أَخاهُم هودًا ۚ قالَ يا قَومِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ ما لَكُم مِن إِلٰهٍ غَيرُهُ ۖ إِن أَنتُم إِلّا مُفتَرونَ
blank: w-ʾilā ʿād ʾakhāhum hūd qāl yā-qawm ʿbudū llāh mā lakum m ʾilāh ghayruhū ʾ ʾantum ʾillā muftarūn
english_saheeh_international: And to 'Aad We sent their brother Hud. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. You are not but inventors of falsehood

arabic_uthmani: يا قَومِ لا أَسأَلُكُم عَلَيهِ أَجرًا ۖ إِن أَجرِيَ إِلّا عَلَى الَّذي فَطَرَني ۚ أَفَلا تَعقِلونَ
blank: yā-qawm lā ʾasʾalukum ʿalayh ʾajr ʾ ʾajriy ʾillā ʿalālladhī faṭaranī ʾ-f-lā taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: O my people, I do not ask you for it any reward. My reward is only from the one who created me. Then will you not reason

arabic_uthmani: وَيا قَومِ استَغفِروا رَبَّكُم ثُمَّ توبوا إِلَيهِ يُرسِلِ السَّماءَ عَلَيكُم مِدرارًا وَيَزِدكُم قُوَّةً إِلىٰ قُوَّتِكُم وَلا تَتَوَلَّوا مُجرِمينَ
blank: w-yā-qawm staghfirū rabbakum thumm tūbū ʾilayh yursil s-samāʾ ʿalaykum midrār w-yazidkum quwwat ʾilā quwwatikum w-lā tatawallaw mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: And O my people, ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. He will send rain from the sky upon you in showers and increase you in strength added to your strength. And do not turn away, being criminals

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا هودُ ما جِئتَنا بِبَيِّنَةٍ وَما نَحنُ بِتارِكي آلِهَتِنا عَن قَولِكَ وَما نَحنُ لَكَ بِمُؤمِنينَ
blank: qālū yā-hūd mā jiʾtanā b-bayyinat w-mā naḥn b-tārikī ʾālihatinā ʿ qawlik w-mā naḥn lak b-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "O Hud, you have not brought us clear evidence, and we are not ones to leave our gods on your say-so. Nor are we believers in you

arabic_uthmani: إِن نَقولُ إِلَّا اعتَراكَ بَعضُ آلِهَتِنا بِسوءٍ ۗ قالَ إِنّي أُشهِدُ اللَّهَ وَاشهَدوا أَنّي بَريءٌ مِمّا تُشرِكونَ
blank: ʾ naqūl ʾillā ʿtarāk baʿḍ ʾālihatinā b-sūʾ qāl ʾinnī ʾushhid llāh w-shhadū ʾannī barīʾ mimmā tushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: We only say that some of our gods have possessed you with evil." He said, "Indeed, I call Allah to witness, and witness yourselves that I am free from whatever you associate with Allah

arabic_uthmani: مِن دونِهِ ۖ فَكيدوني جَميعًا ثُمَّ لا تُنظِرونِ
blank: m dūnihī f-kīdūnī jamīʿ thumm lā tunẓirūn
english_saheeh_international: Other than Him. So plot against me all together; then do not give me respite

arabic_uthmani: إِنّي تَوَكَّلتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ رَبّي وَرَبِّكُم ۚ ما مِن دابَّةٍ إِلّا هُوَ آخِذٌ بِناصِيَتِها ۚ إِنَّ رَبّي عَلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: ʾinnī tawakkalt ʿalā llāh rabbī w-rabbikum mā m dābbat ʾillā huw ʾākhidh b-nāṣiyatihā ʾinn rabbī ʿalā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, I have relied upon Allah, my Lord and your Lord. There is no creature but that He holds its forelock. Indeed, my Lord is on a path that is straight

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَقَد أَبلَغتُكُم ما أُرسِلتُ بِهِ إِلَيكُم ۚ وَيَستَخلِفُ رَبّي قَومًا غَيرَكُم وَلا تَضُرّونَهُ شَيئًا ۚ إِنَّ رَبّي عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ حَفيظٌ
blank: f-ʾ tawallaw f-qad ʾablaghtukum mā ʾursilt bihī ʾilaykum w-yastakhlif rabbī qawm ghayrakum w-lā taḍurrūnahū shayʾ ʾinn rabbī ʿalā kull shayʾ ḥafīẓ
english_saheeh_international: But if they turn away, say, "I have already conveyed that with which I was sent to you. My Lord will give succession to a people other than you, and you will not harm Him at all. Indeed my Lord is, over all things, Guardian

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا جاءَ أَمرُنا نَجَّينا هودًا وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مَعَهُ بِرَحمَةٍ مِنّا وَنَجَّيناهُم مِن عَذابٍ غَليظٍ
blank: w-lammā jāʾ ʾamrunā najjaynā hūd w-lladhīn ʾāmanū maʿahū b-raḥmat minnā w-najjaynāhum m ʿadhāb ghalīẓ
english_saheeh_international: And when Our command came, We saved Hud and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us; and We saved them from a harsh punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَتِلكَ عادٌ ۖ جَحَدوا بِآياتِ رَبِّهِم وَعَصَوا رُسُلَهُ وَاتَّبَعوا أَمرَ كُلِّ جَبّارٍ عَنيدٍ
blank: w-tilk ʿād jaḥadū b-ʾāyāt rabbihim w-ʿaṣaw rusulahū w-ttabaʿū ʾamr kull jabbār ʿanīd
english_saheeh_international: And that was 'Aad, who rejected the signs of their Lord and disobeyed His messengers and followed the order of every obstinate tyrant

arabic_uthmani: وَأُتبِعوا في هٰذِهِ الدُّنيا لَعنَةً وَيَومَ القِيامَةِ ۗ أَلا إِنَّ عادًا كَفَروا رَبَّهُم ۗ أَلا بُعدًا لِعادٍ قَومِ هودٍ
blank: w-ʾutbiʿū fī hādhih d-dunyā laʿnat w-yawmal-qiyāmat ʾ-lā ʾinn ʿād kafarū rabbahum ʾ-lā buʿd l-ʾād qawm hūd
english_saheeh_international: And they were therefore followed in this world with a curse and as well on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, 'Aad denied their Lord; then away with 'Aad, the people of Hud

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِلىٰ ثَمودَ أَخاهُم صالِحًا ۚ قالَ يا قَومِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ ما لَكُم مِن إِلٰهٍ غَيرُهُ ۖ هُوَ أَنشَأَكُم مِنَ الأَرضِ وَاستَعمَرَكُم فيها فَاستَغفِروهُ ثُمَّ توبوا إِلَيهِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبّي قَريبٌ مُجيبٌ
blank: w-ʾilā thamūd ʾakhāhum ṣāliḥ qāl yā-qawm ʿbudū llāh mā lakum m ʾilāh ghayruhū huw ʾanshaʾakum minal-ʾarḍ w-staʿmarakum fīhā f-staghfirūh thumm tūbū ʾilayh ʾinn rabbī qarīb mujīb
english_saheeh_international: And to Thamud We sent their brother Salih. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. He has produced you from the earth and settled you in it, so ask forgiveness of Him and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا صالِحُ قَد كُنتَ فينا مَرجُوًّا قَبلَ هٰذا ۖ أَتَنهانا أَن نَعبُدَ ما يَعبُدُ آباؤُنا وَإِنَّنا لَفي شَكٍّ مِمّا تَدعونا إِلَيهِ مُريبٍ
blank: qālū yā-ṣāliḥ qad kunt fīnā marjuww qabl hādhā ʾ-tanhānā ʾ naʿbud mā yaʿbud ʾābāʾunā w-ʾinnanā l-fī shakk mimmā tadʿūnā ʾilayh murīb
english_saheeh_international: They said, "O Salih, you were among us a man of promise before this. Do you forbid us to worship what our fathers worshipped? And indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا قَومِ أَرَأَيتُم إِن كُنتُ عَلىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِن رَبّي وَآتاني مِنهُ رَحمَةً فَمَن يَنصُرُني مِنَ اللَّهِ إِن عَصَيتُهُ ۖ فَما تَزيدونَني غَيرَ تَخسيرٍ
blank: qāl yā-qawm ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ kunt ʿalā bayyinat m rabbī w-ʾātānī minh raḥmat f-m yanṣurunī min llāh ʾ ʿaṣaytuhū f-mā tazīdūnanī ghayr takhsīr
english_saheeh_international: He said, "O my people, have you considered: if I should be upon clear evidence from my Lord and He has given me mercy from Himself, who would protect me from Allah if I disobeyed Him? So you would not increase me except in loss

blank: w-yā-qawm hādhihī nāqat llāh lakum ʾāyat f-dharūhā taʾkul fī ʾarḍ llāh w-lā tamassūhā b-sūʾ f-yaʾkhudhakum ʿadhāb qarīb
english_saheeh_international: And O my people, this is the she-camel of Allah - she is to you a sign. So let her feed upon Allah 's earth and do not touch her with harm, or you will be taken by an impending punishment

arabic_uthmani: فَعَقَروها فَقالَ تَمَتَّعوا في دارِكُم ثَلاثَةَ أَيّامٍ ۖ ذٰلِكَ وَعدٌ غَيرُ مَكذوبٍ
blank: f-ʿaqarūhā f-qāl tamattaʿū fī dārikum thalāthat ʾayyām dhālik waʿd ghayr makdhūb
english_saheeh_international: But they hamstrung her, so he said, "Enjoy yourselves in your homes for three days. That is a promise not to be denied

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَ أَمرُنا نَجَّينا صالِحًا وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مَعَهُ بِرَحمَةٍ مِنّا وَمِن خِزيِ يَومِئِذٍ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ القَوِيُّ العَزيزُ
blank: f-lammā jāʾ ʾamrunā najjaynā ṣāliḥ w-lladhīn ʾāmanū maʿahū b-raḥmat minnā w-m khizy yawmiʾidh ʾinn rabbak huwal-qawiyyul-ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: So when Our command came, We saved Salih and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us, and saved them from the disgrace of that day. Indeed, it is your Lord who is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might

arabic_uthmani: وَأَخَذَ الَّذينَ ظَلَمُوا الصَّيحَةُ فَأَصبَحوا في دِيارِهِم جاثِمينَ
blank: w-ʾakhadhalladhīn ẓalamū ṣ-ṣayḥat f-ʾaṣbaḥū fī diyārihim jāthimīn
english_saheeh_international: And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes corpses fallen prone

arabic_uthmani: كَأَن لَم يَغنَوا فيها ۗ أَلا إِنَّ ثَمودَ كَفَروا رَبَّهُم ۗ أَلا بُعدًا لِثَمودَ
blank: k-ʾ lam yaghnaw fīhā ʾ-lā ʾinn thamūd kafarū rabbahum ʾ-lā buʿd l-thamūd
english_saheeh_international: As if they had never prospered therein. Unquestionably, Thamud denied their Lord; then, away with Thamud

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد جاءَت رُسُلُنا إِبراهيمَ بِالبُشرىٰ قالوا سَلامًا ۖ قالَ سَلامٌ ۖ فَما لَبِثَ أَن جاءَ بِعِجلٍ حَنيذٍ
blank: w-l-qad jāʾat rusulunā ʾibrāhīm b-l-bushrā qālū salām qāl salām f-mā labith ʾ jāʾ b-ʿijl ḥanīdh
english_saheeh_international: And certainly did Our messengers come to Abraham with good tidings; they said, "Peace." He said, "Peace," and did not delay in bringing them a roasted calf

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا رَأىٰ أَيدِيَهُم لا تَصِلُ إِلَيهِ نَكِرَهُم وَأَوجَسَ مِنهُم خيفَةً ۚ قالوا لا تَخَف إِنّا أُرسِلنا إِلىٰ قَومِ لوطٍ
blank: f-lammā raʾā ʾaydiyahum lā taṣil ʾilayh nakirahum w-ʾawjas minhum khīfat qālū lā takhaf ʾinnā ʾursilnā ʾilā qawm lūṭ
english_saheeh_international: But when he saw their hands not reaching for it, he distrusted them and felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not. We have been sent to the people of Lot

arabic_uthmani: وَامرَأَتُهُ قائِمَةٌ فَضَحِكَت فَبَشَّرناها بِإِسحاقَ وَمِن وَراءِ إِسحاقَ يَعقوبَ
blank: w-mraʾatuhū qāʾimat f-ḍaḥikat f-bashsharnāhā b-ʾisḥāq w-m warāʾ ʾisḥāq yaʿqūb
english_saheeh_international: And his Wife was standing, and she smiled. Then We gave her good tidings of Isaac and after Isaac, Jacob

arabic_uthmani: قالَت يا وَيلَتىٰ أَأَلِدُ وَأَنا عَجوزٌ وَهٰذا بَعلي شَيخًا ۖ إِنَّ هٰذا لَشَيءٌ عَجيبٌ
blank: qālat yā-waylatā ʾ-ʾalid w-ʾan ʿajūz w-hādhā baʿlī shaykh ʾinn hādhā l-shayʾ ʿajīb
english_saheeh_international: She said, "Woe to me! Shall I give birth while I am an old woman and this, my husband, is an old man? Indeed, this is an amazing thing

arabic_uthmani: قالوا أَتَعجَبينَ مِن أَمرِ اللَّهِ ۖ رَحمَتُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ عَلَيكُم أَهلَ البَيتِ ۚ إِنَّهُ حَميدٌ مَجيدٌ
blank: qālū ʾ-taʿjabīn m ʾamr llāh raḥmat llāh w-barakātuhū ʿalaykum ʾahlal-bayt ʾinnahū ḥamīd majīd
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Are you amazed at the decree of Allah? May the mercy of Allah and His blessings be upon you, people of the house. Indeed, He is Praiseworthy and Honorable

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا ذَهَبَ عَن إِبراهيمَ الرَّوعُ وَجاءَتهُ البُشرىٰ يُجادِلُنا في قَومِ لوطٍ
blank: f-lammā dhahab ʿ ʾibrāhīm r-rawʿ w-jāʾathul-bushrā yujādilunā fī qawm lūṭ
english_saheeh_international: And when the fright had left Abraham and the good tidings had reached him, he began to argue with Us concerning the people of Lot

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ إِبراهيمَ لَحَليمٌ أَوّاهٌ مُنيبٌ
blank: ʾinn ʾibrāhīm l-ḥalīm ʾawwāh munīb
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Abraham was forbearing, grieving and frequently returning to Allah

arabic_uthmani: يا إِبراهيمُ أَعرِض عَن هٰذا ۖ إِنَّهُ قَد جاءَ أَمرُ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَإِنَّهُم آتيهِم عَذابٌ غَيرُ مَردودٍ
blank: yā-ʾibrāhīm ʾaʿriḍ ʿ hādhā ʾinnahū qad jāʾ ʾamr rabbik w-ʾinnahum ʾātīhim ʿadhāb ghayr mardūd
english_saheeh_international: The angels said, "O Abraham, give up this plea. Indeed, the command of your Lord has come, and indeed, there will reach them a punishment that cannot be repelled

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا جاءَت رُسُلُنا لوطًا سيءَ بِهِم وَضاقَ بِهِم ذَرعًا وَقالَ هٰذا يَومٌ عَصيبٌ
blank: w-lammā jāʾat rusulunā lūṭ sīʾ bihim w-ḍāq bihim dharʿ w-qāl hādhā yawm ʿaṣīb
english_saheeh_international: And when Our messengers, the angels, came to Lot, he was anguished for them and felt for them great discomfort and said, "This is a trying day

arabic_uthmani: وَجاءَهُ قَومُهُ يُهرَعونَ إِلَيهِ وَمِن قَبلُ كانوا يَعمَلونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ ۚ قالَ يا قَومِ هٰؤُلاءِ بَناتي هُنَّ أَطهَرُ لَكُم ۖ فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَلا تُخزونِ في ضَيفي ۖ أَلَيسَ مِنكُم رَجُلٌ رَشيدٌ
blank: w-jāʾahū qawmuhū yuhraʿūn ʾilayh w-m qabl kānū yaʿmalūn s-sayyiʾāt qāl yā-qawm hāʾulāʾ banātī hunn ʾaṭhar lakum f-ttaqū llāh w-lā tukhzūn fī ḍayfī ʾ-lays minkum rajul rashīd
english_saheeh_international: And his people came hastening to him, and before this they had been doing evil deeds. He said, "O my people, these are my daughters; they are purer for you. So fear Allah and do not disgrace me concerning my guests. Is there not among you a man of reason

arabic_uthmani: قالوا لَقَد عَلِمتَ ما لَنا في بَناتِكَ مِن حَقٍّ وَإِنَّكَ لَتَعلَمُ ما نُريدُ
blank: qālū l-qad ʿalimt mā lanā fī banātik m ḥaqq w-ʾinnak l-taʿlam mā nurīd
english_saheeh_international: They said, "You have already known that we have not concerning your daughters any claim, and indeed, you know what we want

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لَو أَنَّ لي بِكُم قُوَّةً أَو آوي إِلىٰ رُكنٍ شَديدٍ
blank: qāl law ʾann lī bikum quwwat ʾaw ʾāwī ʾilā rukn shadīd
english_saheeh_international: He said, "If only I had against you some power or could take refuge in a strong support

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا لوطُ إِنّا رُسُلُ رَبِّكَ لَن يَصِلوا إِلَيكَ ۖ فَأَسرِ بِأَهلِكَ بِقِطعٍ مِنَ اللَّيلِ وَلا يَلتَفِت مِنكُم أَحَدٌ إِلَّا امرَأَتَكَ ۖ إِنَّهُ مُصيبُها ما أَصابَهُم ۚ إِنَّ مَوعِدَهُمُ الصُّبحُ ۚ أَلَيسَ الصُّبحُ بِقَريبٍ
blank: qālū yā-lūṭ ʾinnā rusul rabbik l yaṣilū ʾilayk f-ʾasr b-ʾahlik b-qiṭʿ minal-layl w-lā yaltafit minkum ʾaḥad ʾillā mraʾatak ʾinnahū muṣībuhā mā ʾaṣābahum ʾinn mawʿidahum ṣ-ṣubḥ ʾ-lays ṣ-ṣubḥ b-qarīb
english_saheeh_international: The angels said, "O Lot, indeed we are messengers of your Lord; therefore, they will never reach you. So set out with your family during a portion of the night and let not any among you look back - except your wife; indeed, she will be struck by that which strikes them. Indeed, their appointment is for the morning. Is not the morning near

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَ أَمرُنا جَعَلنا عالِيَها سافِلَها وَأَمطَرنا عَلَيها حِجارَةً مِن سِجّيلٍ مَنضودٍ
blank: f-lammā jāʾ ʾamrunā jaʿalnā ʿāliyahā sāfilahā w-ʾamṭarnā ʿalayhā ḥijāratam-m sijjīl manḍūd
english_saheeh_international: So when Our command came, We made the highest part of the city its lowest and rained upon them stones of layered hard clay, which were

arabic_uthmani: مُسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَما هِيَ مِنَ الظّالِمينَ بِبَعيدٍ
blank: musawwamat ʿind rabbik w-mā hiy min ẓ-ẓālimīn b-baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: Marked from your Lord. And Allah 's punishment is not from the wrongdoers very far

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِلىٰ مَديَنَ أَخاهُم شُعَيبًا ۚ قالَ يا قَومِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ ما لَكُم مِن إِلٰهٍ غَيرُهُ ۖ وَلا تَنقُصُوا المِكيالَ وَالميزانَ ۚ إِنّي أَراكُم بِخَيرٍ وَإِنّي أَخافُ عَلَيكُم عَذابَ يَومٍ مُحيطٍ
blank: w-ʾilā madyan ʾakhāhum shuʿayb qāl yā-qawm ʿbudū llāh mā lakum m ʾilāh ghayruhū w-lā tanquṣūl-mikyāl w-l-mīzān ʾinnī ʾarākum b-khayr w-ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʿalaykum ʿadhāb yawm muḥīṭ
english_saheeh_international: And to Madyan We sent their brother Shu'ayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. And do not decrease from the measure and the scale. Indeed, I see you in prosperity, but indeed, I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing Day

arabic_uthmani: وَيا قَومِ أَوفُوا المِكيالَ وَالميزانَ بِالقِسطِ ۖ وَلا تَبخَسُوا النّاسَ أَشياءَهُم وَلا تَعثَوا فِي الأَرضِ مُفسِدينَ
blank: w-yā-qawm ʾawfūl-mikyāl w-l-mīzān b-l-qisṭ w-lā tabkhasū n-nās ʾashyāʾahum w-lā taʿthaw fīl-ʾarḍ mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And O my people, give full measure and weight in justice and do not deprive the people of their due and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption

arabic_uthmani: بَقِيَّتُ اللَّهِ خَيرٌ لَكُم إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ ۚ وَما أَنا عَلَيكُم بِحَفيظٍ
blank: baqiyyat llāh khayr lakum ʾ kuntum muʾminīn w-mā ʾan ʿalaykum b-ḥafīẓ
english_saheeh_international: What remains lawful from Allah is best for you, if you would be believers. But I am not a guardian over you

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا شُعَيبُ أَصَلاتُكَ تَأمُرُكَ أَن نَترُكَ ما يَعبُدُ آباؤُنا أَو أَن نَفعَلَ في أَموالِنا ما نَشاءُ ۖ إِنَّكَ لَأَنتَ الحَليمُ الرَّشيدُ
blank: qālū yā-shuʿayb ʾ-ṣalātuk taʾmuruk ʾ natruk mā yaʿbud ʾābāʾunā ʾaw ʾ nafʿal fī ʾamwālinā mā nashāʾ ʾinnak l-ʾantal-ḥalīm r-rashīd
english_saheeh_international: They said, "O Shu'ayb, does your prayer command you that we should leave what our fathers worship or not do with our wealth what we please? Indeed, you are the forbearing, the discerning

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا قَومِ أَرَأَيتُم إِن كُنتُ عَلىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِن رَبّي وَرَزَقَني مِنهُ رِزقًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَما أُريدُ أَن أُخالِفَكُم إِلىٰ ما أَنهاكُم عَنهُ ۚ إِن أُريدُ إِلَّا الإِصلاحَ مَا استَطَعتُ ۚ وَما تَوفيقي إِلّا بِاللَّهِ ۚ عَلَيهِ تَوَكَّلتُ وَإِلَيهِ أُنيبُ
blank: qāl yā-qawm ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ kunt ʿalā bayyinat m rabbī w-razaqanī minh rizq ḥasan w-mā ʾurīd ʾ ʾukhālifakum ʾilā mā ʾanhākum ʿanh ʾ ʾurīd ʾillāl-ʾiṣlāḥ mā staṭaʿt w-mā tawfīqī ʾillā b-llāh ʿalayh tawakkalt w-ʾilayh ʾunīb
english_saheeh_international: He said, "O my people, have you considered: if I am upon clear evidence from my Lord and He has provided me with a good provision from Him...? And I do not intend to differ from you in that which I have forbidden you; I only intend reform as much as I am able. And my success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return

arabic_uthmani: وَيا قَومِ لا يَجرِمَنَّكُم شِقاقي أَن يُصيبَكُم مِثلُ ما أَصابَ قَومَ نوحٍ أَو قَومَ هودٍ أَو قَومَ صالِحٍ ۚ وَما قَومُ لوطٍ مِنكُم بِبَعيدٍ
blank: w-yā-qawm lā yajrimannakum shiqāqī ʾ yuṣībakum mithl mā ʾaṣāb qawm nūḥ ʾaw qawm hūd ʾaw qawm ṣāliḥ w-mā qawm lūṭ minkum b-baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: And O my people, let not your dissension from me cause you to be struck by that similar to what struck the people of Noah or the people of Hud or the people of Salih. And the people of Lot are not from you far away

arabic_uthmani: وَاستَغفِروا رَبَّكُم ثُمَّ توبوا إِلَيهِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبّي رَحيمٌ وَدودٌ
blank: w-staghfirū rabbakum thumm tūbū ʾilāyh ʾinn rabbī raḥīm wadūd
english_saheeh_international: And ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is Merciful and Affectionate

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا شُعَيبُ ما نَفقَهُ كَثيرًا مِمّا تَقولُ وَإِنّا لَنَراكَ فينا ضَعيفًا ۖ وَلَولا رَهطُكَ لَرَجَمناكَ ۖ وَما أَنتَ عَلَينا بِعَزيزٍ
blank: qālū yā-shuʿayb mā nafqah kathīram-mimmā taqūl w-ʾinnā l-narāk fīnā ḍaʿīf w-law-lā rahṭuk l-rajamnāk w-mā ʾant ʿalaynā b-ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: They said, "O Shu'ayb, we do not understand much of what you say, and indeed, we consider you among us as weak. And if not for your family, we would have stoned you to death; and you are not to us one respected

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا قَومِ أَرَهطي أَعَزُّ عَلَيكُم مِنَ اللَّهِ وَاتَّخَذتُموهُ وَراءَكُم ظِهرِيًّا ۖ إِنَّ رَبّي بِما تَعمَلونَ مُحيطٌ
blank: qāl yā-qawm ʾ-rahṭī ʾaʿazz ʿalaykum min llāh w-ttakhadhtumūh warāʾakum ẓihriyy ʾinn rabbī b-mā taʿmalūn muḥīṭ
english_saheeh_international: He said, "O my people, is my family more respected for power by you than Allah? But you put Him behind your backs in neglect. Indeed, my Lord is encompassing of what you do

arabic_uthmani: وَيا قَومِ اعمَلوا عَلىٰ مَكانَتِكُم إِنّي عامِلٌ ۖ سَوفَ تَعلَمونَ مَن يَأتيهِ عَذابٌ يُخزيهِ وَمَن هُوَ كاذِبٌ ۖ وَارتَقِبوا إِنّي مَعَكُم رَقيبٌ
blank: w-yā-qawm ʿmalū ʿalā makānatikum ʾinnī ʿāmil sawf taʿlamūn m yaʾtīh ʿadhāb yukhzīh w-m huw kādhib w-rtaqibū ʾinnī maʿakum raqīb
english_saheeh_international: And O my people, work according to your position; indeed, I am working. You are going to know to whom will come a punishment that will disgrace him and who is a liar. So watch; indeed, I am with you a watcher, awaiting the outcome

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا جاءَ أَمرُنا نَجَّينا شُعَيبًا وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مَعَهُ بِرَحمَةٍ مِنّا وَأَخَذَتِ الَّذينَ ظَلَمُوا الصَّيحَةُ فَأَصبَحوا في دِيارِهِم جاثِمينَ
blank: w-lammā jāʾ ʾamrunā najjaynā shuʿayb w-lladhīn ʾāmanū maʿahū b-raḥmat minnā w-ʾakhadhatilladhīn ẓalamū ṣ-ṣayḥat f-ʾaṣbaḥū fī diyārihim jāthimīn
english_saheeh_international: And when Our command came, We saved Shu'ayb and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us. And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes corpses fallen prone

arabic_uthmani: كَأَن لَم يَغنَوا فيها ۗ أَلا بُعدًا لِمَديَنَ كَما بَعِدَت ثَمودُ
blank: k-ʾ lam yaghnaw fīhā ʾ-lā buʿd l-madyan k-mā baʿidat thamūd
english_saheeh_international: As if they had never prospered therein. Then, away with Madyan as Thamud was taken away

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا موسىٰ بِآياتِنا وَسُلطانٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā mūsā b-ʾāyātinā w-sulṭān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority

arabic_uthmani: إِلىٰ فِرعَونَ وَمَلَئِهِ فَاتَّبَعوا أَمرَ فِرعَونَ ۖ وَما أَمرُ فِرعَونَ بِرَشيدٍ
blank: ʾilā firʿawn w-malaʾihī f-ttabaʿū ʾamr firʿawn w-mā ʾamr firʿawn b-rashīd
english_saheeh_international: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they followed the command of Pharaoh, and the command of Pharaoh was not at all discerning

arabic_uthmani: يَقدُمُ قَومَهُ يَومَ القِيامَةِ فَأَورَدَهُمُ النّارَ ۖ وَبِئسَ الوِردُ المَورودُ
blank: yaqdum qawmahū yawmal-qiyāmat f-ʾawradahum n-nār w-biʾsal-wirdul-mawrūd
english_saheeh_international: He will precede his people on the Day of Resurrection and lead them into the Fire; and wretched is the place to which they are led

arabic_uthmani: وَأُتبِعوا في هٰذِهِ لَعنَةً وَيَومَ القِيامَةِ ۚ بِئسَ الرِّفدُ المَرفودُ
blank: w-ʾutbiʿū fī hādhihī laʿnat w-yawmal-qiyāmat biʾs r-rifdul-marfūd
english_saheeh_international: And they were followed in this world with a curse and on the Day of Resurrection. And wretched is the gift which is given

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ مِن أَنباءِ القُرىٰ نَقُصُّهُ عَلَيكَ ۖ مِنها قائِمٌ وَحَصيدٌ
blank: dhālik m ʾanbāʾil-qurā naquṣṣuhū ʿalayk minhā qāʾim w-ḥaṣīd
english_saheeh_international: That is from the news of the cities, which We relate to you; of them, some are still standing and some are as a harvest mowed down

arabic_uthmani: وَما ظَلَمناهُم وَلٰكِن ظَلَموا أَنفُسَهُم ۖ فَما أَغنَت عَنهُم آلِهَتُهُمُ الَّتي يَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ مِن شَيءٍ لَمّا جاءَ أَمرُ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَما زادوهُم غَيرَ تَتبيبٍ
blank: w-mā ẓalamnāhum w-lāk ẓalamū ʾanfusahum f-mā ʾaghnat ʿanhum ʾālihatuhum llatī yadʿūn m dūn llāh m shayʾ lammā jāʾ ʾamr rabbik w-mā zādūhum ghayr tatbīb
english_saheeh_international: And We did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves. And they were not availed at all by their gods which they invoked other than Allah when there came the command of your Lord. And they did not increase them in other than ruin

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ أَخذُ رَبِّكَ إِذا أَخَذَ القُرىٰ وَهِيَ ظالِمَةٌ ۚ إِنَّ أَخذَهُ أَليمٌ شَديدٌ
blank: w-k-dhālik ʾakhdh rabbik ʾidhā ʾakhadhal-qurā w-hiy ẓālimat ʾinn ʾakhdhahū ʾalīm shadīd
english_saheeh_international: And thus is the seizure of your Lord when He seizes the cities while they are committing wrong. Indeed, His seizure is painful and severe

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِمَن خافَ عَذابَ الآخِرَةِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ يَومٌ مَجموعٌ لَهُ النّاسُ وَذٰلِكَ يَومٌ مَشهودٌ
blank: ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-m khāf ʿadhābal-ʾākhirat dhālik yawm majmūʿ lah n-nās w-dhālik yawm mashhūd
english_saheeh_international: Indeed in that is a sign for those who fear the punishment of the Hereafter. That is a Day for which the people will be collected, and that is a Day which will be witnessed

arabic_uthmani: وَما نُؤَخِّرُهُ إِلّا لِأَجَلٍ مَعدودٍ
blank: w-mā nuʾakhkhiruhū ʾillā l-ʾajal maʿdūd
english_saheeh_international: And We do not delay it except for a limited term

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَأتِ لا تَكَلَّمُ نَفسٌ إِلّا بِإِذنِهِ ۚ فَمِنهُم شَقِيٌّ وَسَعيدٌ
blank: yawm yaʾt lā takallam nafs ʾillā b-ʾidhnihī f-minhum shaqiyy w-saʿīd
english_saheeh_international: The Day it comes no soul will speak except by His permission. And among them will be the wretched and the prosperous

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمَّا الَّذينَ شَقوا فَفِي النّارِ لَهُم فيها زَفيرٌ وَشَهيقٌ
