arabic_uthmani: وَإِن ما نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعضَ الَّذي نَعِدُهُم أَو نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِنَّما عَلَيكَ البَلاغُ وَعَلَينَا الحِسابُ
blank: w-ʾ mā nuriyannak baʿḍalladhī naʿiduhum ʾaw natawaffayannak f-ʾinnamā ʿalaykal-balāgh w-ʿalaynāl-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: And whether We show you part of what We promise them or take you in death, upon you is only the duty of notification, and upon Us is the account

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا أَنّا نَأتِي الأَرضَ نَنقُصُها مِن أَطرافِها ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَحكُمُ لا مُعَقِّبَ لِحُكمِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ سَريعُ الحِسابِ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾannā naʾtīl-ʾarḍ nanquṣuhā m ʾaṭrāfihā w-llāh yaḥkum lā muʿaqqib l-ḥukmihī w-huw sarīʿul-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: Have they not seen that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? And Allah decides; there is no adjuster of His decision. And He is swift in account

arabic_uthmani: وَقَد مَكَرَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم فَلِلَّهِ المَكرُ جَميعًا ۖ يَعلَمُ ما تَكسِبُ كُلُّ نَفسٍ ۗ وَسَيَعلَمُ الكُفّارُ لِمَن عُقبَى الدّارِ
blank: w-qad makaralladhīn m qablihim f-l-llāhil-makr jamīʿ yaʿlam mā taksib kull nafs w-s-yaʿlamul-kuffār l-m ʿuqbā d-dār
english_saheeh_international: And those before them had plotted, but to Allah belongs the plan entirely. He knows what every soul earns, and the disbelievers will know for whom is the final home

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لَستَ مُرسَلًا ۚ قُل كَفىٰ بِاللَّهِ شَهيدًا بَيني وَبَينَكُم وَمَن عِندَهُ عِلمُ الكِتابِ
blank: w-yaqūlulladhīn kafarū last mursal qul kafā b-llāh shahīd baynī w-baynakum w-m ʿindahū ʿilmul-kitāb
english_saheeh_international: And those who have disbelieved say, "You are not a messenger." Say, O Muhammad, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you, and the witness of whoever has knowledge of the Scripture

arabic_uthmani: الر ۚ كِتابٌ أَنزَلناهُ إِلَيكَ لِتُخرِجَ النّاسَ مِنَ الظُّلُماتِ إِلَى النّورِ بِإِذنِ رَبِّهِم إِلىٰ صِراطِ العَزيزِ الحَميدِ
blank: -l-r (ʾalif lām rā) kitāb ʾanzalnāh ʾilayk l-tukhrij n-nās min ẓ-ẓulumāt ʾilā n-nūr b-ʾidhn rabbihim ʾilā ṣirāṭil-ʿazīzil-ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Ra. This is a Book which We have revealed to you, O Muhammad, that you might bring mankind out of darknesses into the light by permission of their Lord - to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهِ الَّذي لَهُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۗ وَوَيلٌ لِلكافِرينَ مِن عَذابٍ شَديدٍ
blank: allāhilladhī lahū mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-wayl l-l-kāfirīn m ʿadhāb shadīd-
english_saheeh_international: Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And woe to the disbelievers from a severe punishment

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَستَحِبّونَ الحَياةَ الدُّنيا عَلَى الآخِرَةِ وَيَصُدّونَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَيَبغونَها عِوَجًا ۚ أُولٰئِكَ في ضَلالٍ بَعيدٍ
blank: alladhīn yastaḥibbūnal-ḥayāt d-dunyā ʿalāl-ʾākhirat w-yaṣuddūn ʿ sabīl llāh w-yabghūnahā ʿiwaj ʾulāʾik fī ḍalāl baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: The ones who prefer the worldly life over the Hereafter and avert people from the way of Allah, seeking to make it (seem) deviant. Those are in extreme error

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلنا مِن رَسولٍ إِلّا بِلِسانِ قَومِهِ لِيُبَيِّنَ لَهُم ۖ فَيُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَن يَشاءُ وَيَهدي مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnā m rasūl ʾillā b-lisān qawmihī l-yubayyin lahum f-yuḍill llāh m yashāʾ w-yahdī m yashāʾ w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And We did not send any messenger except speaking in the language of his people to state clearly for them, and Allah sends astray thereby whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا موسىٰ بِآياتِنا أَن أَخرِج قَومَكَ مِنَ الظُّلُماتِ إِلَى النّورِ وَذَكِّرهُم بِأَيّامِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِكُلِّ صَبّارٍ شَكورٍ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā mūsā b-ʾāyātinā ʾ ʾakhrij qawmak min ẓ-ẓulumāt ʾilā n-nūr w-dhakkirhum b-ʾayyām llāh ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-kull ṣabbār shakūr
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly sent Moses with Our signs, saying, "Bring out your people from darknesses into the light and remind them of the days of Allah." Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ موسىٰ لِقَومِهِ اذكُروا نِعمَةَ اللَّهِ عَلَيكُم إِذ أَنجاكُم مِن آلِ فِرعَونَ يَسومونَكُم سوءَ العَذابِ وَيُذَبِّحونَ أَبناءَكُم وَيَستَحيونَ نِساءَكُم ۚ وَفي ذٰلِكُم بَلاءٌ مِن رَبِّكُم عَظيمٌ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl mūsā l-qawmih dhkurū niʿmat llāh ʿalaykum ʾidh ʾanjākum m ʾāl firʿawn yasūmūnakum sūʾal-ʿadhāb w-yudhabbiḥūn ʾabnāʾakum w-yastaḥyūn nisāʾakum w-fī dhālikum balāʾ m rabbikum ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And recall, O Children of Israel, when Moses said to His people, "Remember the favor of Allah upon you when He saved you from the people of Pharaoh, who were afflicting you with the worst torment and were slaughtering your newborn sons and keeping your females alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكُم لَئِن شَكَرتُم لَأَزيدَنَّكُم ۖ وَلَئِن كَفَرتُم إِنَّ عَذابي لَشَديدٌ
blank: w-ʾidh taʾadhdhan rabbukum l-ʾ shakartum l-ʾazīdannakum w-l-ʾ kafartum ʾinn ʿadhābī l-shadīd
english_saheeh_international: And remember when your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will surely increase you in favor; but if you deny, indeed, My punishment is severe

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ موسىٰ إِن تَكفُروا أَنتُم وَمَن فِي الأَرضِ جَميعًا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ حَميدٌ
blank: w-qāl mūsā ʾ takfurū ʾantum w-m fīl-ʾarḍ jamīʿ f-ʾinn llāh l-ghaniyy ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: And Moses said, "If you should disbelieve, you and whoever is on the earth entirely - indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَأتِكُم نَبَأُ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِكُم قَومِ نوحٍ وَعادٍ وَثَمودَ ۛ وَالَّذينَ مِن بَعدِهِم ۛ لا يَعلَمُهُم إِلَّا اللَّهُ ۚ جاءَتهُم رُسُلُهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ فَرَدّوا أَيدِيَهُم في أَفواهِهِم وَقالوا إِنّا كَفَرنا بِما أُرسِلتُم بِهِ وَإِنّا لَفي شَكٍّ مِمّا تَدعونَنا إِلَيهِ مُريبٍ
blank: ʾ-lam yaʾtikum nabaʾulladhīn m qablikum qawm nūḥ w-ʿād w-thamūd w-lladhīn m baʿdihim lā yaʿlamuhum ʾillā llāh jāʾathum rusuluhum b-l-bayyināt f-raddū ʾaydiyahum fī ʾafwāhihim w-qālū ʾinnā kafarnā b-mā ʾursiltum bihī w-ʾinnā l-fī shakk mimmā tadʿūnanā ʾilayh murīb
english_saheeh_international: Has there not reached you the news of those before you - the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud and those after them? No one knows them but Allah. Their messengers brought them clear proofs, but they returned their hands to their mouths and said, "Indeed, we disbelieve in that with which you have been sent, and indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قالَت رُسُلُهُم أَفِي اللَّهِ شَكٌّ فاطِرِ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ يَدعوكُم لِيَغفِرَ لَكُم مِن ذُنوبِكُم وَيُؤَخِّرَكُم إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ قالوا إِن أَنتُم إِلّا بَشَرٌ مِثلُنا تُريدونَ أَن تَصُدّونا عَمّا كانَ يَعبُدُ آباؤُنا فَأتونا بِسُلطانٍ مُبينٍ
blank: qālat rusuluhum ʾ-fī llāh shakk fāṭir s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ yadʿūkum l-yaghfir lakum m dhunūbikum w-yuʾakhkhirakum ʾilā ʾajal musamm qālū ʾ ʾantum ʾillā bashar mithlunā turīdūn ʾ taṣuddūnā ʿammā kān yaʿbud ʾābāʾunā f-ʾtūnā b-sulṭān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Their messengers said, "Can there be doubt about Allah, Creator of the heavens and earth? He invites you that He may forgive you of your sins, and He delays your death for a specified term." They said, "You are not but men like us who wish to avert us from what our fathers were worshipping. So bring us a clear authority

arabic_uthmani: قالَت لَهُم رُسُلُهُم إِن نَحنُ إِلّا بَشَرٌ مِثلُكُم وَلٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ يَمُنُّ عَلىٰ مَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ ۖ وَما كانَ لَنا أَن نَأتِيَكُم بِسُلطانٍ إِلّا بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَليَتَوَكَّلِ المُؤمِنونَ
blank: qālat lahum rusuluhum ʾ naḥn ʾillā bashar mithlukum w-lākinn llāh yamunn ʿalā m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī w-mā kān lanā ʾ naʾtiyakum b-sulṭān ʾillā b-ʾidhn llāh w-ʿalā llāh f-l-yatawakkalil-muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Their messengers said to them, "We are only men like you, but Allah confers favor upon whom He wills of His servants. It has never been for us to bring you evidence except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely

arabic_uthmani: وَما لَنا أَلّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَقَد هَدانا سُبُلَنا ۚ وَلَنَصبِرَنَّ عَلىٰ ما آذَيتُمونا ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَليَتَوَكَّلِ المُتَوَكِّلونَ
blank: w-mā lanā ʾallā natawakkal ʿalā llāh w-qad hadānā subulanā w-l-naṣbirann ʿalā mā ʾādhaytumūnā w-ʿalā llāh f-l-yatawakkalil-mutawakkilūn
english_saheeh_international: And why should we not rely upon Allah while He has guided us to our good ways. And we will surely be patient against whatever harm you should cause us. And upon Allah let those who would rely indeed rely

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لِرُسُلِهِم لَنُخرِجَنَّكُم مِن أَرضِنا أَو لَتَعودُنَّ في مِلَّتِنا ۖ فَأَوحىٰ إِلَيهِم رَبُّهُم لَنُهلِكَنَّ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū l-rusulihim l-nukhrijannakum m ʾarḍinā ʾaw l-taʿūdunn fī millatinā f-ʾawḥā ʾilayhim rabbuhum l-nuhlikann ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieved said to their messengers, "We will surely drive you out of our land, or you must return to our religion." So their Lord inspired to them, "We will surely destroy the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَلَنُسكِنَنَّكُمُ الأَرضَ مِن بَعدِهِم ۚ ذٰلِكَ لِمَن خافَ مَقامي وَخافَ وَعيدِ
blank: w-l-nuskinannakumul-ʾarḍ m baʿdihim dhālik l-m khāf maqāmī w-khāf waʿīd
english_saheeh_international: And We will surely cause you to dwell in the land after them. That is for he who fears My position and fears My threat

arabic_uthmani: وَاستَفتَحوا وَخابَ كُلُّ جَبّارٍ عَنيدٍ
blank: w-staftaḥū w-khāb kull jabbār ʿanīd
english_saheeh_international: And they requested victory from Allah, and disappointed, therefore, was every obstinate tyrant

arabic_uthmani: مِن وَرائِهِ جَهَنَّمُ وَيُسقىٰ مِن ماءٍ صَديدٍ
blank: m warāʾihī jahannam w-yusqā m māʾ ṣadīd
english_saheeh_international: Before him is Hell, and he will be given a drink of purulent water

arabic_uthmani: يَتَجَرَّعُهُ وَلا يَكادُ يُسيغُهُ وَيَأتيهِ المَوتُ مِن كُلِّ مَكانٍ وَما هُوَ بِمَيِّتٍ ۖ وَمِن وَرائِهِ عَذابٌ غَليظٌ
blank: yatajarraʿuhū w-lā yakād yusīghuhū w-yaʾtīhil-mawt m kull makān w-mā huw b-mayyit w-m warāʾihī ʿadhāb ghalīẓ
english_saheeh_international: He will gulp it but will hardly be able to swallow it. And death will come to him from everywhere, but he is not to die. And before him is a massive punishment

arabic_uthmani: مَثَلُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا بِرَبِّهِم ۖ أَعمالُهُم كَرَمادٍ اشتَدَّت بِهِ الرّيحُ في يَومٍ عاصِفٍ ۖ لا يَقدِرونَ مِمّا كَسَبوا عَلىٰ شَيءٍ ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الضَّلالُ البَعيدُ
blank: mathalulladhīn kafarū b-rabbihim ʾaʿmāluhum k-ramād- shtaddat bih r-rīh fī yawm ʿāṣif lā yaqdirūn mimmā kasabū ʿalā shayʾ dhālik huw ḍ-ḍalālul-baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: The example of those who disbelieve in their Lord is that their deeds are like ashes which the wind blows forcefully on a stormy day; they are unable to keep from what they earned a single thing. That is what is extreme error

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ بِالحَقِّ ۚ إِن يَشَأ يُذهِبكُم وَيَأتِ بِخَلقٍ جَديدٍ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾann llāh khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ b-l-ḥaqq ʾ yashaʾ yudhhibkum w-yaʾt b-khalq jadīd
english_saheeh_international: Have you not seen that Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth? If He wills, He can do away with you and produce a new creation

arabic_uthmani: وَما ذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ بِعَزيزٍ
blank: w-mā dhālik ʿalā llāh b-ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: And that is not difficult for Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَبَرَزوا لِلَّهِ جَميعًا فَقالَ الضُّعَفاءُ لِلَّذينَ استَكبَروا إِنّا كُنّا لَكُم تَبَعًا فَهَل أَنتُم مُغنونَ عَنّا مِن عَذابِ اللَّهِ مِن شَيءٍ ۚ قالوا لَو هَدانَا اللَّهُ لَهَدَيناكُم ۖ سَواءٌ عَلَينا أَجَزِعنا أَم صَبَرنا ما لَنا مِن مَحيصٍ
blank: w-barazū l-llāh jamīʿ f-qāl ḍ-ḍuʿafāʾ l-lladhīn stakbarū ʾinnā kunnā lakum tabaʿ f-hal ʾantum mughnūn ʿannā m ʿadhāb llāh m shayʾ qālū law hadānā llāh l-hadaynākum sawāʾ ʿalaynā ʾ-jaziʿnā ʾam ṣabarnā mā lanā m maḥīṣ
english_saheeh_international: And they will come out for judgement before Allah all together, and the weak will say to those who were arrogant, "Indeed, we were your followers, so can you avail us anything against the punishment of Allah?" They will say, "If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you. It is all the same for us whether we show intolerance or are patient: there is for us no place of escape

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الشَّيطانُ لَمّا قُضِيَ الأَمرُ إِنَّ اللَّهَ وَعَدَكُم وَعدَ الحَقِّ وَوَعَدتُكُم فَأَخلَفتُكُم ۖ وَما كانَ لِيَ عَلَيكُم مِن سُلطانٍ إِلّا أَن دَعَوتُكُم فَاستَجَبتُم لي ۖ فَلا تَلوموني وَلوموا أَنفُسَكُم ۖ ما أَنا بِمُصرِخِكُم وَما أَنتُم بِمُصرِخِيَّ ۖ إِنّي كَفَرتُ بِما أَشرَكتُمونِ مِن قَبلُ ۗ إِنَّ الظّالِمينَ لَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: w-qāl sh-shayṭān lammā quḍiyal-ʾamr ʾinn llāh waʿadakum waʿdal-ḥaqq w-waʿadtukum f-ʾakhlaftukum w-mā kān liy ʿalaykum m sulṭān ʾillā ʾ daʿawtukum f-stajabtum lī f-lā talūmūnī w-lūmū ʾanfusakum mā ʾan b-muṣrikhikum w-mā ʾantum b-muṣrikhiyy ʾinnī kafart b-mā ʾashraktumūn m qabl ʾinn ẓ-ẓālimīn lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And Satan will say when the matter has been concluded, "Indeed, Allah had promised you the promise of truth. And I promised you, but I betrayed you. But I had no authority over you except that I invited you, and you responded to me. So do not blame me; but blame yourselves. I cannot be called to your aid, nor can you be called to my aid. Indeed, I deny your association of me with Allah before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَأُدخِلَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها بِإِذنِ رَبِّهِم ۖ تَحِيَّتُهُم فيها سَلامٌ
blank: w-ʾudkhilalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā b-ʾidhn rabbihim taḥiyyatuhum fīhā salām
english_saheeh_international: And those who believed and did righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein by permission of their Lord; and their greeting therein will be, "Peace

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ كَيفَ ضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا كَلِمَةً طَيِّبَةً كَشَجَرَةٍ طَيِّبَةٍ أَصلُها ثابِتٌ وَفَرعُها فِي السَّماءِ
blank: ʾ-lam tar kayf ḍarab llāh mathal kalimat ṭayyibat k-shajarat ṭayyibat ʾaṣluhā thābit w-farʿuhā fī s-samāʾ
english_saheeh_international: Have you not considered how Allah presents an example, making a good word like a good tree, whose root is firmly fixed and its branches high in the sky

arabic_uthmani: تُؤتي أُكُلَها كُلَّ حينٍ بِإِذنِ رَبِّها ۗ وَيَضرِبُ اللَّهُ الأَمثالَ لِلنّاسِ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: tuʾtī ʾukulahā kull ḥīn b-ʾidhn rabbihā w-yaḍrib llāhul-ʾamthāl l-n-nās laʿallahum yatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: It produces its fruit all the time, by permission of its Lord. And Allah presents examples for the people that perhaps they will be reminded

arabic_uthmani: وَمَثَلُ كَلِمَةٍ خَبيثَةٍ كَشَجَرَةٍ خَبيثَةٍ اجتُثَّت مِن فَوقِ الأَرضِ ما لَها مِن قَرارٍ
blank: w-mathal kalimat khabīthat k-shajarat khabīthat- jtuththat m fawqil-ʾarḍ mā lahā m qarār
english_saheeh_international: And the example of a bad word is like a bad tree, uprooted from the surface of the earth, not having any stability

arabic_uthmani: يُثَبِّتُ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا بِالقَولِ الثّابِتِ فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَفِي الآخِرَةِ ۖ وَيُضِلُّ اللَّهُ الظّالِمينَ ۚ وَيَفعَلُ اللَّهُ ما يَشاءُ
blank: yuthabbit llāhulladhīn ʾāmanū b-l-qawl th-thābit fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-fīl-ʾākhirat w-yuḍill llāh ẓ-ẓālimīn w-yafʿal llāh mā yashāʾ
english_saheeh_international: Allah keeps firm those who believe, with the firm word, in worldly life and in the Hereafter. And Allah sends astray the wrongdoers. And Allah does what He wills

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَلَم تَرَ إِلَى الَّذينَ بَدَّلوا نِعمَتَ اللَّهِ كُفرًا وَأَحَلّوا قَومَهُم دارَ البَوارِ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾilālladhīn baddalū niʿmat llāh kufr w-ʾaḥallū qawmahum dāral-bawār
english_saheeh_international: Have you not considered those who exchanged the favor of Allah for disbelief and settled their people in the home of ruin

arabic_uthmani: جَهَنَّمَ يَصلَونَها ۖ وَبِئسَ القَرارُ
blank: jahannam yaṣlawnahā w-biʾsal-qarār
english_saheeh_international: It is Hell, which they will enter to burn, and wretched is the settlement

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلوا لِلَّهِ أَندادًا لِيُضِلّوا عَن سَبيلِهِ ۗ قُل تَمَتَّعوا فَإِنَّ مَصيرَكُم إِلَى النّارِ
blank: w-jaʿalū l-llāh ʾandād l-yuḍillū ʿ sabīlihī qul tamattaʿū f-ʾinn maṣīrakum ʾilā n-nār
english_saheeh_international: And they have attributed to Allah equals to mislead people from His way. Say, "Enjoy yourselves, for indeed, your destination is the Fire

arabic_uthmani: قُل لِعِبادِيَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا يُقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ وَيُنفِقوا مِمّا رَزَقناهُم سِرًّا وَعَلانِيَةً مِن قَبلِ أَن يَأتِيَ يَومٌ لا بَيعٌ فيهِ وَلا خِلالٌ
blank: qul l-ʿibādiyalladhīn ʾāmanū yuqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-yunfiqū mimmā razaqnāhum sirr w-ʿalāniyatam-m qabl ʾ yaʾtiy yawm lā bayʿ fīh w-lā khilāl-
english_saheeh_international: O Muhammad, tell My servants who have believed to establish prayer and spend from what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, before a Day comes in which there will be no exchange, nor any friendships

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَأَخرَجَ بِهِ مِنَ الثَّمَراتِ رِزقًا لَكُم ۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ الفُلكَ لِتَجرِيَ فِي البَحرِ بِأَمرِهِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ الأَنهارَ
blank: allāhulladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-ʾanzal min s-samāʾ māʾ f-ʾakhraj bihī min th-thamarāt rizq lakum w-sakhkhar lakumul-fulk l-tajriy fīl-baḥr b-ʾamrihī w-sakhkhar lakumul-ʾanhār
english_saheeh_international: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and sent down rain from the sky and produced thereby some fruits as provision for you and subjected for you the ships to sail through the sea by His command and subjected for you the rivers

arabic_uthmani: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ الشَّمسَ وَالقَمَرَ دائِبَينِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ اللَّيلَ وَالنَّهارَ
blank: w-sakhkhar lakum sh-shams w-l-qamar dāʾibayn w-sakhkhar lakumul-layl w-n-nahār
english_saheeh_international: And He subjected for you the sun and the moon, continuous in orbit, and subjected for you the night and the day

arabic_uthmani: وَآتاكُم مِن كُلِّ ما سَأَلتُموهُ ۚ وَإِن تَعُدّوا نِعمَتَ اللَّهِ لا تُحصوها ۗ إِنَّ الإِنسانَ لَظَلومٌ كَفّارٌ
blank: w-ʾatākum m kull mā saʾaltumūh w-ʾ taʿuddū niʿmat llāh lā tuḥṣūhā ʾinnal-ʾinsān l-ẓalūm kaffār
english_saheeh_international: And He gave you from all you asked of Him. And if you should count the favor of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, mankind is generally most unjust and ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ إِبراهيمُ رَبِّ اجعَل هٰذَا البَلَدَ آمِنًا وَاجنُبني وَبَنِيَّ أَن نَعبُدَ الأَصنامَ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl ʾibrāhīm rabb jʿal hādhāl-balad ʾāmin w-jnubnī w-baniyy ʾ naʿbudal-ʾaṣnām
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this city Makkah secure and keep me and my sons away from worshipping idols

arabic_uthmani: رَبِّ إِنَّهُنَّ أَضلَلنَ كَثيرًا مِنَ النّاسِ ۖ فَمَن تَبِعَني فَإِنَّهُ مِنّي ۖ وَمَن عَصاني فَإِنَّكَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: rabb ʾinnahunn ʾaḍlaln kathīram-min n-nās f-m tabiʿanī f-ʾinnahū minnī w-m ʿaṣānī f-ʾinnak ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: My Lord, indeed they have led astray many among the people. So whoever follows me - then he is of me; and whoever disobeys me - indeed, You are yet Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا إِنّي أَسكَنتُ مِن ذُرِّيَّتي بِوادٍ غَيرِ ذي زَرعٍ عِندَ بَيتِكَ المُحَرَّمِ رَبَّنا لِيُقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ فَاجعَل أَفئِدَةً مِنَ النّاسِ تَهوي إِلَيهِم وَارزُقهُم مِنَ الثَّمَراتِ لَعَلَّهُم يَشكُرونَ
blank: rabbanā ʾinnī ʾaskant m dhurriyyatī b-wād ghayr dhī zarʿ ʿind baytikal-muḥarram rabbanā l-yuqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt f-jʿal ʾafʾidatam-min n-nās tahwī ʾilayhim w-rzuqhum min th-thamarāt laʿallahum yashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, I have settled some of my descendants in an uncultivated valley near Your sacred House, our Lord, that they may establish prayer. So make hearts among the people incline toward them and provide for them from the fruits that they might be grateful

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا إِنَّكَ تَعلَمُ ما نُخفي وَما نُعلِنُ ۗ وَما يَخفىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ مِن شَيءٍ فِي الأَرضِ وَلا فِي السَّماءِ
blank: rabbanā ʾinnak taʿlam mā nukhfī w-mā nuʿlin w-mā yakhfā ʿalā llāh m shayʾ fīl-ʾarḍ w-lā fī s-samāʾ
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, indeed You know what we conceal and what we declare, and nothing is hidden from Allah on the earth or in the heaven

arabic_uthmani: الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذي وَهَبَ لي عَلَى الكِبَرِ إِسماعيلَ وَإِسحاقَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبّي لَسَميعُ الدُّعاءِ
blank: al-ḥamd l-llāhilladhī wahab lī ʿalāl-kibar ʾismāʿīl w-ʾisḥāq ʾinn rabbī l-samīʿ d-duʿāʾ
english_saheeh_international: Praise to Allah, who has granted to me in old age Ishmael and Isaac. Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication

arabic_uthmani: رَبِّ اجعَلني مُقيمَ الصَّلاةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتي ۚ رَبَّنا وَتَقَبَّل دُعاءِ
blank: rabb jʿalnī muqīm ṣ-ṣalāt w-m dhurriyyatī rabbanā w-taqabbal duʿāʾ
english_saheeh_international: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and many from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنَا اغفِر لي وَلِوالِدَيَّ وَلِلمُؤمِنينَ يَومَ يَقومُ الحِسابُ
blank: rabbanā ghfir lī w-l-wālidayy w-l-l-muʾminīn yawm yaqūmul-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَحسَبَنَّ اللَّهَ غافِلًا عَمّا يَعمَلُ الظّالِمونَ ۚ إِنَّما يُؤَخِّرُهُم لِيَومٍ تَشخَصُ فيهِ الأَبصارُ
blank: w-lā taḥsabann llāh ghāfil ʿammā yaʿmal ẓ-ẓālimūn ʾinnamā yuʾakhkhiruhum l-yawm tashkhaṣ fīhil-ʾabṣār
english_saheeh_international: And never think that Allah is unaware of what the wrongdoers do. He only delays them for a Day when eyes will stare in horror

arabic_uthmani: مُهطِعينَ مُقنِعي رُءوسِهِم لا يَرتَدُّ إِلَيهِم طَرفُهُم ۖ وَأَفئِدَتُهُم هَواءٌ
blank: muhṭiʿīn muqniʿī ruʾūsihim lā yartadd ʾilayhim ṭarfuhum w-ʾafʾidatuhum hawāʾ
english_saheeh_international: Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not come back to them, and their hearts are void

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنذِرِ النّاسَ يَومَ يَأتيهِمُ العَذابُ فَيَقولُ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا رَبَّنا أَخِّرنا إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ قَريبٍ نُجِب دَعوَتَكَ وَنَتَّبِعِ الرُّسُلَ ۗ أَوَلَم تَكونوا أَقسَمتُم مِن قَبلُ ما لَكُم مِن زَوالٍ
blank: w-ʾandhir n-nās yawm yaʾtīhimul-ʿadhāb f-yaqūlulladhīn ẓalamū rabbanā ʾakhkhirnā ʾilā ʾajal qarīb nujib daʿwatak w-nattabiʿ r-rusul ʾ-w-lam takūnū ʾaqsamtum m qabl mā lakum m zawāl
english_saheeh_international: And, O Muhammad, warn the people of a Day when the punishment will come to them and those who did wrong will say, "Our Lord, delay us for a short term; we will answer Your call and follow the messengers." But it will be said, "Had you not sworn, before, that for you there would be no cessation

arabic_uthmani: وَسَكَنتُم في مَساكِنِ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا أَنفُسَهُم وَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُم كَيفَ فَعَلنا بِهِم وَضَرَبنا لَكُمُ الأَمثالَ
blank: w-sakantum fī masākinilladhīn ẓalamū ʾanfusahum w-tabayyan lakum kayf faʿalnā bihim w-ḍarabnā lakumul-ʾamthāl
english_saheeh_international: And you lived among the dwellings of those who wronged themselves, and it had become clear to you how We dealt with them. And We presented for you many examples

arabic_uthmani: وَقَد مَكَروا مَكرَهُم وَعِندَ اللَّهِ مَكرُهُم وَإِن كانَ مَكرُهُم لِتَزولَ مِنهُ الجِبالُ
blank: w-qad makarū makrahum w-ʿind llāh makruhum w-ʾ kān makruhum l-tazūl minhul-jibāl
english_saheeh_international: And they had planned their plan, but with Allah is recorded their plan, even if their plan had been sufficient to do away with the mountains

arabic_uthmani: فَلا تَحسَبَنَّ اللَّهَ مُخلِفَ وَعدِهِ رُسُلَهُ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزيزٌ ذُو انتِقامٍ
blank: f-lā taḥsabann llāh mukhlif waʿdihī rusulahū ʾinn llāh ʿazīz dhū ntiqām
english_saheeh_international: So never think that Allah will fail in His promise to His messengers. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تُبَدَّلُ الأَرضُ غَيرَ الأَرضِ وَالسَّماواتُ ۖ وَبَرَزوا لِلَّهِ الواحِدِ القَهّارِ
blank: yawm tubaddalul-ʾarḍ ghayral-ʾarḍ w-s-samāwāt w-barazū l-llāhil-wāḥidil-qahhār
english_saheeh_international: It will be on the Day the earth will be replaced by another earth, and the heavens as well, and all creatures will come out before Allah, the One, the Prevailing

arabic_uthmani: وَتَرَى المُجرِمينَ يَومَئِذٍ مُقَرَّنينَ فِي الأَصفادِ
blank: w-tarāl-mujrimīn yawmaʾidh muqarranīn fīl-ʾaṣfād
english_saheeh_international: And you will see the criminals that Day bound together in shackles

arabic_uthmani: سَرابيلُهُم مِن قَطِرانٍ وَتَغشىٰ وُجوهَهُمُ النّارُ
blank: sarābīluhum m qaṭirān w-taghshā wujūhahum n-nār
english_saheeh_international: Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered by the Fire

arabic_uthmani: لِيَجزِيَ اللَّهُ كُلَّ نَفسٍ ما كَسَبَت ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَريعُ الحِسابِ
blank: l-yajziy llāh kull nafs mā kasabat ʾinn llāh sarīʿul-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: So that Allah will recompense every soul for what it earned. Indeed, Allah is swift in account

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا بَلاغٌ لِلنّاسِ وَلِيُنذَروا بِهِ وَلِيَعلَموا أَنَّما هُوَ إِلٰهٌ واحِدٌ وَلِيَذَّكَّرَ أُولُو الأَلبابِ
blank: hādhā balāgh l-n-nās w-l-yundharū bihī w-l-yaʿlamū ʾannamā huw ʾilāh wāḥid w-l-yadhdhakkar ʾulūl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: This Qur'an is notification for the people that they may be warned thereby and that they may know that He is but one God and that those of understanding will be reminded

arabic_uthmani: الر ۚ تِلكَ آياتُ الكِتابِ وَقُرآنٍ مُبينٍ
blank: -l-r (ʾalif lām rā) tilk ʾāyātul-kitāb w-qurʾān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: رُبَما يَوَدُّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لَو كانوا مُسلِمينَ
blank: rubamā yawaddulladhīn kafarū law kānū muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims

arabic_uthmani: ذَرهُم يَأكُلوا وَيَتَمَتَّعوا وَيُلهِهِمُ الأَمَلُ ۖ فَسَوفَ يَعلَمونَ
blank: dharhum yaʾkulū w-yatamattaʿū w-yulhihimul-ʿamal f-sawf yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by false hope, for they are going to know

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَهلَكنا مِن قَريَةٍ إِلّا وَلَها كِتابٌ مَعلومٌ
blank: w-mā ʾahlaknā m qaryat ʾillā w-lahā kitāb maʿlūm
english_saheeh_international: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree

arabic_uthmani: ما تَسبِقُ مِن أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَها وَما يَستَأخِرونَ
blank: mā tasbiq m ʾummat ʾajalahā w-mā yastaʾkhirūn
english_saheeh_international: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا يا أَيُّهَا الَّذي نُزِّلَ عَلَيهِ الذِّكرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجنونٌ
blank: w-qālū yā-ʾayyuhālladhī nuzzil ʿalayh dh-dhikr ʾinnak l-majnūn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad

arabic_uthmani: لَو ما تَأتينا بِالمَلائِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصّادِقينَ
blank: law mā taʾtīnā b-l-malāʾikat ʾ kunt min ṣ-ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful

arabic_uthmani: ما نُنَزِّلُ المَلائِكَةَ إِلّا بِالحَقِّ وَما كانوا إِذًا مُنظَرينَ
blank: mā nunazzilul-malāʾikat ʾillā b-l-ḥaqq w-mā kānū ʾidham-munẓarīn
english_saheeh_international: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا نَحنُ نَزَّلنَا الذِّكرَ وَإِنّا لَهُ لَحافِظونَ
blank: ʾinnā naḥn nazzalnā dh-dhikr w-ʾinnā lahū l-ḥāfiẓūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا مِن قَبلِكَ في شِيَعِ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā m qablik fī shiyaʿil-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly sent messengers before you, O Muhammad, among the sects of the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَأتيهِم مِن رَسولٍ إِلّا كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-mā yaʾtīhim m rasūl ʾillā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ نَسلُكُهُ في قُلوبِ المُجرِمينَ
blank: k-dhālik naslukuhū fī qulūbil-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals

arabic_uthmani: لا يُؤمِنونَ بِهِ ۖ وَقَد خَلَت سُنَّةُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: lā yuʾminūn bihī w-qad khalat sunnatul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو فَتَحنا عَلَيهِم بابًا مِنَ السَّماءِ فَظَلّوا فيهِ يَعرُجونَ
blank: w-law fataḥnā ʿalayhim bābam-min s-samāʾ f-ẓallū fīh yaʿrujūn
english_saheeh_international: And even if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend

arabic_uthmani: لَقالوا إِنَّما سُكِّرَت أَبصارُنا بَل نَحنُ قَومٌ مَسحورونَ
blank: l-qālū ʾinnamā sukkirat ʾabṣārunā bal naḥn qawm masḥūrūn
english_saheeh_international: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد جَعَلنا فِي السَّماءِ بُروجًا وَزَيَّنّاها لِلنّاظِرينَ
blank: w-l-qad jaʿalnā fī s-samāʾ burūj w-zayyannāhā l-n-nāẓirīn
english_saheeh_international: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers

arabic_uthmani: وَحَفِظناها مِن كُلِّ شَيطانٍ رَجيمٍ
blank: w-ḥafiẓnāhā m kull shayṭān rajīm
english_saheeh_international: And We have protected it from every devil expelled from the mercy of Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا مَنِ استَرَقَ السَّمعَ فَأَتبَعَهُ شِهابٌ مُبينٌ
blank: ʾillā man staraq s-samʿ f-ʾatbaʿahū shihāb mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame

arabic_uthmani: وَالأَرضَ مَدَدناها وَأَلقَينا فيها رَواسِيَ وَأَنبَتنا فيها مِن كُلِّ شَيءٍ مَوزونٍ
blank: w-l-ʾarḍ madadnāhā w-ʾalqaynā fīhā rawāsiy w-ʾanbatnā fīhā m kull shayʾ mawzūn
english_saheeh_international: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein something of every well-balanced thing

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلنا لَكُم فيها مَعايِشَ وَمَن لَستُم لَهُ بِرازِقينَ
blank: w-jaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyish w-m lastum lahū b-rāziqīn
english_saheeh_international: And We have made for you therein means of living and for those for whom you are not providers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن مِن شَيءٍ إِلّا عِندَنا خَزائِنُهُ وَما نُنَزِّلُهُ إِلّا بِقَدَرٍ مَعلومٍ
blank: w-ʾ m shayʾ ʾillā ʿindanā khazāʾinuhū w-mā nunazziluhū ʾillā b-qadar maʿlūm
english_saheeh_international: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure

arabic_uthmani: وَأَرسَلنَا الرِّياحَ لَواقِحَ فَأَنزَلنا مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَأَسقَيناكُموهُ وَما أَنتُم لَهُ بِخازِنينَ
blank: w-ʾarsalnā r-riyāḥ lawāqiḥ f-ʾanzalnā min s-samāʾ māʾ f-ʾasqaynākumūh w-mā ʾantum lahū b-khāzinīn
english_saheeh_international: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّا لَنَحنُ نُحيي وَنُميتُ وَنَحنُ الوارِثونَ
blank: w-ʾinnā l-naḥn nuḥyī w-numīt w-naḥnul-wārithūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد عَلِمنَا المُستَقدِمينَ مِنكُم وَلَقَد عَلِمنَا المُستَأخِرينَ
blank: w-l-qad ʿalimnāl-mustaqdimīn minkum w-l-qad ʿalimnāl-mustaʾkhirīn
english_saheeh_international: And We have already known the preceding generations among you, and We have already known the later ones to come

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحشُرُهُم ۚ إِنَّهُ حَكيمٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-ʾinn rabbak huw yaḥshuruhum ʾinnahū ḥakīm ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد خَلَقنَا الإِنسانَ مِن صَلصالٍ مِن حَمَإٍ مَسنونٍ
blank: w-l-qad khalaqnāl-ʾinsān m ṣalṣāl m ḥamaʾ masnūn
english_saheeh_international: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud

arabic_uthmani: وَالجانَّ خَلَقناهُ مِن قَبلُ مِن نارِ السَّمومِ
blank: w-l-jānn khalaqnāh m qabl m nār s-samūm
english_saheeh_international: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ رَبُّكَ لِلمَلائِكَةِ إِنّي خالِقٌ بَشَرًا مِن صَلصالٍ مِن حَمَإٍ مَسنونٍ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl rabbuk l-l-malāʾikat ʾinnī khāliq basharam-m ṣalṣāl m ḥamaʾ masnūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا سَوَّيتُهُ وَنَفَختُ فيهِ مِن روحي فَقَعوا لَهُ ساجِدينَ
blank: f-ʾidhā sawwaytuhū w-nafakht fīh m rūḥī f-qaʿū lahū sājidīn
english_saheeh_international: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My created soul, then fall down to him in prostration

arabic_uthmani: فَسَجَدَ المَلائِكَةُ كُلُّهُم أَجمَعونَ
blank: f-sajadal-malāʾikat kulluhum ʾajmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا إِبليسَ أَبىٰ أَن يَكونَ مَعَ السّاجِدينَ
blank: ʾillā ʾiblīs ʾabā ʾ yakūn maʿ s-sājidīn
english_saheeh_international: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا إِبليسُ ما لَكَ أَلّا تَكونَ مَعَ السّاجِدينَ
blank: qāl yā-ʾiblīs mā lak ʾallā takūn maʿ s-sājidīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, O Iblees, what is the matter with you that you are not with those who prostrate

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لَم أَكُن لِأَسجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقتَهُ مِن صَلصالٍ مِن حَمَإٍ مَسنونٍ
blank: qāl lam ʾak l-ʾasjud l-bashar khalaqtahū m ṣalṣāl m ḥamaʾ masnūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَاخرُج مِنها فَإِنَّكَ رَجيمٌ
blank: qāl f-khruj minhā f-ʾinnak rajīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ عَلَيكَ اللَّعنَةَ إِلىٰ يَومِ الدّينِ
blank: w-ʾinn ʿalaykal-laʿnat ʾilā yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرني إِلىٰ يَومِ يُبعَثونَ
blank: qāl rabb f-ʾanẓirnī ʾilā yawm yubʿathūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ المُنظَرينَ
blank: qāl f-ʾinnak minal-munẓarīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

arabic_uthmani: إِلىٰ يَومِ الوَقتِ المَعلومِ
blank: ʾilā yawmil-waqtil-maʿlūm
english_saheeh_international: Until the Day of the time well-known

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ بِما أَغوَيتَني لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُم فِي الأَرضِ وَلَأُغوِيَنَّهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: qāl rabb b-mā ʾaghwaytanī l-ʾuzayyinann lahum fīl-ʾarḍ w-l-ʾughwiyannahum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Iblees said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make disobedience attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا عِبادَكَ مِنهُمُ المُخلَصينَ
blank: ʾillā ʿibādak minhumul-mukhlaṣīn
english_saheeh_international: Except, among them, Your chosen servants

arabic_uthmani: قالَ هٰذا صِراطٌ عَلَيَّ مُستَقيمٌ
blank: qāl hādhā ṣirāṭ ʿalayy mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "This is a path of return to Me that is straight

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ عِبادي لَيسَ لَكَ عَلَيهِم سُلطانٌ إِلّا مَنِ اتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ الغاوينَ
blank: ʾinn ʿibādī lays lak ʿalayhim sulṭān ʾillā man ttabaʿak minal-ghāwīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوعِدُهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: w-ʾinn jahannam l-mawʿiduhum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all

arabic_uthmani: لَها سَبعَةُ أَبوابٍ لِكُلِّ بابٍ مِنهُم جُزءٌ مَقسومٌ
blank: lahā sabʿat ʾabwāb l-kull bāb minhum juzʾ maqsūm
english_saheeh_international: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُتَّقينَ في جَنّاتٍ وَعُيونٍ
blank: ʾinnal-muttaqīn fī jannāt w-ʿuyūn-
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs

arabic_uthmani: ادخُلوها بِسَلامٍ آمِنينَ
blank: udkhulūhā b-salām ʾāminīn
english_saheeh_international: Having been told, "Enter it in peace, safe and secure

arabic_uthmani: وَنَزَعنا ما في صُدورِهِم مِن غِلٍّ إِخوانًا عَلىٰ سُرُرٍ مُتَقابِلينَ
blank: w-nazaʿnā mā fī ṣudūrihim m ghill ʾikhwān ʿalā surur mutaqābilīn
english_saheeh_international: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, so they will be brothers, on thrones facing each other

arabic_uthmani: لا يَمَسُّهُم فيها نَصَبٌ وَما هُم مِنها بِمُخرَجينَ
blank: lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣab w-mā hum minhā b-mukhrajīn
english_saheeh_international: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they ever be removed

arabic_uthmani: ۞ نَبِّئ عِبادي أَنّي أَنَا الغَفورُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: nabbiʾ ʿibādī ʾannī ʾanal-ghafūr r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O Muhammad, inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّ عَذابي هُوَ العَذابُ الأَليمُ
blank: w-ʾann ʿadhābī huwal-ʿadhābul-ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَنَبِّئهُم عَن ضَيفِ إِبراهيمَ
blank: w-nabbiʾhum ʿ ḍayf ʾibrāhīm
english_saheeh_international: And inform them about the guests of Abraham

arabic_uthmani: إِذ دَخَلوا عَلَيهِ فَقالوا سَلامًا قالَ إِنّا مِنكُم وَجِلونَ
blank: ʾidh dakhalū ʿalayh f-qālū salām qāl ʾinnā minkum wajilūn
english_saheeh_international: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." Abraham said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you

arabic_uthmani: قالوا لا تَوجَل إِنّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلامٍ عَليمٍ
blank: qālū lā tawjal ʾinnā nubashshiruk b-ghulām ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: The angels said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَبَشَّرتُموني عَلىٰ أَن مَسَّنِيَ الكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرونَ
blank: qāl ʾ-bashshartumūnī ʿalā ʾam-massaniyal-kibar f-b-m tubashshirūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what wonder do you inform

arabic_uthmani: قالوا بَشَّرناكَ بِالحَقِّ فَلا تَكُن مِنَ القانِطينَ
blank: qālū bashsharnāk b-l-ḥaqq f-lā tak minal-qāniṭīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing

arabic_uthmani: قالَ وَمَن يَقنَطُ مِن رَحمَةِ رَبِّهِ إِلَّا الضّالّونَ
blank: qāl w-m yaqnaṭ m raḥmat rabbihī ʾillā ḍ-ḍāllūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَما خَطبُكُم أَيُّهَا المُرسَلونَ
blank: qāl f-mā khaṭbukum ʾayyuhāl-mursalūn
english_saheeh_international: Abraham said, "Then what is your business here, O messengers

arabic_uthmani: قالوا إِنّا أُرسِلنا إِلىٰ قَومٍ مُجرِمينَ
blank: qālū ʾinnā ʾursilnā ʾilā qawm mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا آلَ لوطٍ إِنّا لَمُنَجّوهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: ʾillā ʾāl lūṭ ʾinnā l-munajjūhum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا امرَأَتَهُ قَدَّرنا ۙ إِنَّها لَمِنَ الغابِرينَ
blank: ʾillā mraʾatahū qaddarnā ʾinnahā l-minal-ghābirīn
english_saheeh_international: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَ آلَ لوطٍ المُرسَلونَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾ ʾāl lūṭ-il-mursalūn
english_saheeh_international: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِنَّكُم قَومٌ مُنكَرونَ
blank: qāl ʾinnakum qawm munkarūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown

arabic_uthmani: قالوا بَل جِئناكَ بِما كانوا فيهِ يَمتَرونَ
blank: qālū bal jiʾnāk b-mā kānū fīh yamtarūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing

arabic_uthmani: وَأَتَيناكَ بِالحَقِّ وَإِنّا لَصادِقونَ
blank: w-ʾataynāk b-l-ḥaqq w-ʾinnā l-ṣādiqūn
english_saheeh_international: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful

arabic_uthmani: فَأَسرِ بِأَهلِكَ بِقِطعٍ مِنَ اللَّيلِ وَاتَّبِع أَدبارَهُم وَلا يَلتَفِت مِنكُم أَحَدٌ وَامضوا حَيثُ تُؤمَرونَ
blank: f-ʾasr b-ʾahlik b-qiṭʿ minal-layl w-ttabiʿ ʾadbārahum w-lā yaltafit minkum ʾaḥad w-mḍū ḥayth tuʾmarūn
english_saheeh_international: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded

arabic_uthmani: وَقَضَينا إِلَيهِ ذٰلِكَ الأَمرَ أَنَّ دابِرَ هٰؤُلاءِ مَقطوعٌ مُصبِحينَ
blank: w-qaḍaynā ʾilayh dhālikal-ʾamr ʾann dābir hāʾulāʾ maqṭūʿ muṣbiḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And We conveyed to him the decree of that matter: that those sinners would be eliminated by early morning

arabic_uthmani: وَجاءَ أَهلُ المَدينَةِ يَستَبشِرونَ
blank: w-jāʾ ʾahlul-madīnat yastabshirūn
english_saheeh_international: And the people of the city came rejoicing

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِنَّ هٰؤُلاءِ ضَيفي فَلا تَفضَحونِ
blank: qāl ʾinn hāʾulāʾ ḍayfī f-lā tafḍaḥūn
english_saheeh_international: Lot said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَلا تُخزونِ
blank: w-ttaqū llāh w-lā tukhzūn
english_saheeh_international: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me

arabic_uthmani: قالوا أَوَلَم نَنهَكَ عَنِ العالَمينَ
blank: qālū ʾ-w-lam nanhak ʿanil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from protecting people

arabic_uthmani: قالَ هٰؤُلاءِ بَناتي إِن كُنتُم فاعِلينَ
blank: qāl hāʾulāʾ banātī ʾ kuntum fāʿilīn
english_saheeh_international: Lot said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers of lawful marriage

arabic_uthmani: لَعَمرُكَ إِنَّهُم لَفي سَكرَتِهِم يَعمَهونَ
blank: l-ʿamruk ʾinnahum l-fī sakratihim yaʿmahūn
english_saheeh_international: By your life, O Muhammad, indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخَذَتهُمُ الصَّيحَةُ مُشرِقينَ
blank: f-ʾakhadhathum ṣ-ṣayḥat mushriqīn
english_saheeh_international: So the shriek seized them at sunrise

arabic_uthmani: فَجَعَلنا عالِيَها سافِلَها وَأَمطَرنا عَلَيهِم حِجارَةً مِن سِجّيلٍ
blank: f-jaʿalnā ʿāliyahā sāfilahā w-ʾamṭarnā ʿalayhim ḥijāratam-m sijjīl
english_saheeh_international: And We made the highest part of the city its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِلمُتَوَسِّمينَ
blank: ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-l-mutawassimīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّها لَبِسَبيلٍ مُقيمٍ
blank: w-ʾinnahā l-b-sabīl muqīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, those cities are situated on an established road

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِلمُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-l-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كانَ أَصحابُ الأَيكَةِ لَظالِمينَ
blank: w-ʾ kān ʾaṣḥābul-ʾaykat l-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And the companions of the thicket were also wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَانتَقَمنا مِنهُم وَإِنَّهُما لَبِإِمامٍ مُبينٍ
blank: f-ntaqamnā minhum w-ʾinnahumā l-b-ʾimām mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both cities are on a clear highway

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد كَذَّبَ أَصحابُ الحِجرِ المُرسَلينَ
blank: w-l-qad kadhdhab ʾaṣḥābul-ḥijril-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers

arabic_uthmani: وَآتَيناهُم آياتِنا فَكانوا عَنها مُعرِضينَ
blank: w-ʾātaynāhum ʾāyātinā f-kānū ʿanhā muʿriḍīn
english_saheeh_international: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away

arabic_uthmani: وَكانوا يَنحِتونَ مِنَ الجِبالِ بُيوتًا آمِنينَ
blank: w-kānū yanḥitūn minal-jibāl buyūt ʾāminīn
english_saheeh_international: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخَذَتهُمُ الصَّيحَةُ مُصبِحينَ
blank: f-ʾakhadhathum ṣ-ṣayḥat muṣbiḥīn
english_saheeh_international: But the shriek seized them at early morning

arabic_uthmani: فَما أَغنىٰ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: f-mā ʾaghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: So nothing availed them from what they used to earn

arabic_uthmani: وَما خَلَقنَا السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَما بَينَهُما إِلّا بِالحَقِّ ۗ وَإِنَّ السّاعَةَ لَآتِيَةٌ ۖ فَاصفَحِ الصَّفحَ الجَميلَ
blank: w-mā khalaqnā s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā ʾillā b-l-ḥaqq w-ʾinn s-sāʿat l-ʾātiyat f-ṣfaḥ ṣ-ṣafḥal-jamīl
english_saheeh_international: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ الخَلّاقُ العَليمُ
blank: ʾinn rabbak huwal-khallāqul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَيناكَ سَبعًا مِنَ المَثاني وَالقُرآنَ العَظيمَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynāk sabʿam-minal-mathānī w-l-qurʾānal-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly given you, O Muhammad, seven of the often repeated verses and the great Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: لا تَمُدَّنَّ عَينَيكَ إِلىٰ ما مَتَّعنا بِهِ أَزواجًا مِنهُم وَلا تَحزَن عَلَيهِم وَاخفِض جَناحَكَ لِلمُؤمِنينَ
blank: lā tamuddann ʿaynayk ʾilā mā mattaʿnā bihī ʾazwājam-minhum w-lā taḥz ʿalayhim w-khfiḍ janāḥak l-l-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to certain categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَقُل إِنّي أَنَا النَّذيرُ المُبينُ
blank: w-qul ʾinnī ʾan n-nadhīrul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner

arabic_uthmani: كَما أَنزَلنا عَلَى المُقتَسِمينَ
blank: k-mā ʾanzalnā ʿalāl-muqtasimīn
english_saheeh_international: Just as We had revealed scriptures to the separators

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ جَعَلُوا القُرآنَ عِضينَ
blank: alladhīn jaʿalūl-qurʿān ʿiḍīn
english_saheeh_international: Who have made the Qur'an into portions

arabic_uthmani: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسأَلَنَّهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: f-w-rabbik l-nasʾalannahum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all

arabic_uthmani: عَمّا كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: ʿammā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: About what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: فَاصدَع بِما تُؤمَرُ وَأَعرِض عَنِ المُشرِكينَ
blank: f-ṣdaʿ b-mā tuʾmar w-ʾaʿriḍ ʿanil-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا كَفَيناكَ المُستَهزِئينَ
blank: ʾinnā kafaynākal-mustahziʾīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَجعَلونَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلٰهًا آخَرَ ۚ فَسَوفَ يَعلَمونَ
blank: alladhīn yajʿalūn maʿ llāh ʾilāh ʾākhar f-sawf yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Who make equal with Allah another deity. But they are going to know

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد نَعلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضيقُ صَدرُكَ بِما يَقولونَ
blank: w-l-qad naʿlam ʾannak yaḍīq ṣadruk b-mā yaqūlūn
english_saheeh_international: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say

arabic_uthmani: فَسَبِّح بِحَمدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِنَ السّاجِدينَ
blank: f-sabbiḥ b-ḥamd rabbik w-k min s-sājidīn
english_saheeh_international: So exalt Allah with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate to Him

arabic_uthmani: وَاعبُد رَبَّكَ حَتّىٰ يَأتِيَكَ اليَقينُ
blank: w-ʿbud rabbak ḥattā yaʾtiyakal-yaqīn
english_saheeh_international: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death)

arabic_uthmani: أَتىٰ أَمرُ اللَّهِ فَلا تَستَعجِلوهُ ۚ سُبحانَهُ وَتَعالىٰ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: ʾatā ʾamr llāh f-lā tastaʿjilūh subḥānahū w-taʿālā ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: يُنَزِّلُ المَلائِكَةَ بِالرّوحِ مِن أَمرِهِ عَلىٰ مَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ أَن أَنذِروا أَنَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا أَنا فَاتَّقونِ
blank: yunazzilul-malāʾikat b-r-rūḥ m ʾamrihī ʿalā m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī ʾ ʾandhirū ʾannahū lā ʾilāh ʾillā ʾan f-ttaqūn
english_saheeh_international: He sends down the angels, with the inspiration of His command, upon whom He wills of His servants, telling them, "Warn that there is no deity except Me; so fear Me

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ بِالحَقِّ ۚ تَعالىٰ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ b-l-ḥaqq taʿālā ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَ الإِنسانَ مِن نُطفَةٍ فَإِذا هُوَ خَصيمٌ مُبينٌ
blank: khalaqal-ʾinsān m nuṭfat f-ʾidhā huw khaṣīm mubīn
english_saheeh_international: He created man from a sperm-drop; then at once, he is a clear adversary

arabic_uthmani: وَالأَنعامَ خَلَقَها ۗ لَكُم فيها دِفءٌ وَمَنافِعُ وَمِنها تَأكُلونَ
blank: w-l-ʾanʿām khalaqahā lakum fīhā difʾ w-manāfiʿ w-minhā taʾkulūn
english_saheeh_international: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and numerous benefits, and from them you eat

arabic_uthmani: وَلَكُم فيها جَمالٌ حينَ تُريحونَ وَحينَ تَسرَحونَ
blank: w-lakum fīhā jamāl ḥīn turīḥūn w-ḥīn tasraḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And for you in them is the enjoyment of beauty when you bring them in for the evening and when you send them out to pasture

arabic_uthmani: وَتَحمِلُ أَثقالَكُم إِلىٰ بَلَدٍ لَم تَكونوا بالِغيهِ إِلّا بِشِقِّ الأَنفُسِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكُم لَرَءوفٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-taḥmil ʾathqālakum ʾilā balad lam takūnū bālighīh ʾillā b-shiqqil-ʾanfus ʾinn rabbakum l-raʾūf raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And they carry your loads to a land you could not have reached except with difficulty to yourselves. Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَالخَيلَ وَالبِغالَ وَالحَميرَ لِتَركَبوها وَزينَةً ۚ وَيَخلُقُ ما لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-l-khayl w-l-bighāl w-l-ḥamīr l-tarkabūhā w-zīnat w-yakhluq mā lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And He created the horses, mules and donkeys for you to ride and as adornment. And He creates that which you do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَعَلَى اللَّهِ قَصدُ السَّبيلِ وَمِنها جائِرٌ ۚ وَلَو شاءَ لَهَداكُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: w-ʿalā llāh qaṣd s-sabīl w-minhā jāʾir w-law shāʾ l-hadākum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: And upon Allah is the direction of the right way, and among the various paths are those deviating. And if He willed, He could have guided you all

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً ۖ لَكُم مِنهُ شَرابٌ وَمِنهُ شَجَرٌ فيهِ تُسيمونَ
blank: huwalladhī ʾanzal min s-samāʾ māʾ lakum minh sharāb w-minh shajar fīh tusīmūn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it is foliage in which you pasture animals

arabic_uthmani: يُنبِتُ لَكُم بِهِ الزَّرعَ وَالزَّيتونَ وَالنَّخيلَ وَالأَعنابَ وَمِن كُلِّ الثَّمَراتِ ۗ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِقَومٍ يَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: yunbit lakum bih z-zarʿ w-z-zaytūn w-n-nakhīl w-l-ʾaʿnāb w-m kull th-thamarāt ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-qawm yatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: He causes to grow for you thereby the crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and from all the fruits. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought

arabic_uthmani: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ اللَّيلَ وَالنَّهارَ وَالشَّمسَ وَالقَمَرَ ۖ وَالنُّجومُ مُسَخَّراتٌ بِأَمرِهِ ۗ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يَعقِلونَ
blank: w-sakhkhar lakumul-layl w-n-nahār w-sh-shams w-l-qamar w-n-nujūm musakhkharāt b-ʾamrihī ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And He has subjected for you the night and day and the sun and moon, and the stars are subjected by His command. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason

arabic_uthmani: وَما ذَرَأَ لَكُم فِي الأَرضِ مُختَلِفًا أَلوانُهُ ۗ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِقَومٍ يَذَّكَّرونَ
blank: w-mā dharaʾ lakum fīl-ʾarḍ mukhtalif ʾalwānuhū ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-qawm yadhdhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And He has subjected whatever He multiplied for you on the earth of varying colors. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who remember

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي سَخَّرَ البَحرَ لِتَأكُلوا مِنهُ لَحمًا طَرِيًّا وَتَستَخرِجوا مِنهُ حِليَةً تَلبَسونَها وَتَرَى الفُلكَ مَواخِرَ فيهِ وَلِتَبتَغوا مِن فَضلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: w-huwalladhī sakhkharal-baḥr l-taʾkulū minh laḥm ṭariyy w-tastakhrijū minh ḥilyat talbasūnahā w-tarāl-fulk mawākhir fīh w-l-tabtaghū m faḍlihī w-laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who subjected the sea for you to eat from it tender meat and to extract from it ornaments which you wear. And you see the ships plowing through it, and He subjected it that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَأَلقىٰ فِي الأَرضِ رَواسِيَ أَن تَميدَ بِكُم وَأَنهارًا وَسُبُلًا لَعَلَّكُم تَهتَدونَ
blank: w-ʾalqā fīl-ʾarḍ rawāsiy ʾ tamīd bikum w-ʾanhār w-subul laʿallakum tahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And He has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it shift with you, and made rivers and roads, that you may be guided

arabic_uthmani: وَعَلاماتٍ ۚ وَبِالنَّجمِ هُم يَهتَدونَ
blank: w-ʿalāmāt w-b-n-najm hum yahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And landmarks. And by the stars they are also guided

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن يَخلُقُ كَمَن لا يَخلُقُ ۗ أَفَلا تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: ʾ-f-m yakhluq k-m lā yakhluq ʾ-f-lā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Then is He who creates like one who does not create? So will you not be reminded

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن تَعُدّوا نِعمَةَ اللَّهِ لا تُحصوها ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَغَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-ʾ taʿuddū niʿmat llāh lā tuḥṣūhā ʾinn llāh l-ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ ما تُسِرّونَ وَما تُعلِنونَ
blank: w-llāh yaʿlam mā tusirrūn w-mā tuʿlinūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ لا يَخلُقونَ شَيئًا وَهُم يُخلَقونَ
blank: w-lladhīn yadʿūn m dūn llāh lā yakhluqūn shayʾ w-hum yukhlaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And those they invoke other than Allah create nothing, and they themselves are created

arabic_uthmani: أَمواتٌ غَيرُ أَحياءٍ ۖ وَما يَشعُرونَ أَيّانَ يُبعَثونَ
blank: ʾamwāt ghayr ʾaḥyāʾ w-mā yashʿurūn ʾayyān yubʿathūn
english_saheeh_international: They are, in fact, dead, not alive, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected

arabic_uthmani: إِلٰهُكُم إِلٰهٌ واحِدٌ ۚ فَالَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ قُلوبُهُم مُنكِرَةٌ وَهُم مُستَكبِرونَ
blank: ʾilāhukum ʾilāh wāḥid f-lladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat qulūbuhum munkirat w-hum mustakbirūn
english_saheeh_international: Your god is one God. But those who do not believe in the Hereafter - their hearts are disapproving, and they are arrogant

arabic_uthmani: لا جَرَمَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعلَمُ ما يُسِرّونَ وَما يُعلِنونَ ۚ إِنَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ المُستَكبِرينَ
blank: lā jaram ʾann llāh yaʿlam mā yusirrūn w-mā yuʿlinūn ʾinnahū lā yuḥibbul-mustakbirīn
english_saheeh_international: Assuredly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُم ماذا أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُم ۙ قالوا أَساطيرُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lahum mādhā ʾanzal rabbukum qālū ʾasāṭīrul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: لِيَحمِلوا أَوزارَهُم كامِلَةً يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۙ وَمِن أَوزارِ الَّذينَ يُضِلّونَهُم بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ ۗ أَلا ساءَ ما يَزِرونَ
blank: l-yaḥmilū ʾawzārahum kāmilat yawmal-qiyāmat w-m ʾawzārilladhīn yuḍillūnahum b-ghayr ʿilm ʾ-lā sāʾ mā yazirūn
english_saheeh_international: That they may bear their own burdens in full on the Day of Resurrection and some of the burdens of those whom they misguide without knowledge. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear

arabic_uthmani: قَد مَكَرَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم فَأَتَى اللَّهُ بُنيانَهُم مِنَ القَواعِدِ فَخَرَّ عَلَيهِمُ السَّقفُ مِن فَوقِهِم وَأَتاهُمُ العَذابُ مِن حَيثُ لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: qad makaralladhīn m qablihim f-ʾatā llāh bunyānahum minal-qawāʿid f-kharr ʿalayhim s-saqf m fawqihim w-ʾatāhumul-ʿadhāb m ḥayth lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: Those before them had already plotted, but Allah came at their building from the foundations, so the roof fell upon them from above them, and the punishment came to them from where they did not perceive

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ يَومَ القِيامَةِ يُخزيهِم وَيَقولُ أَينَ شُرَكائِيَ الَّذينَ كُنتُم تُشاقّونَ فيهِم ۚ قالَ الَّذينَ أوتُوا العِلمَ إِنَّ الخِزيَ اليَومَ وَالسّوءَ عَلَى الكافِرينَ
blank: thumm yawmal-qiyāmat yukhzīhim w-yaqūl ʾayn shurakāʾiyalladhīn kuntum tushāqqūn fīhim qālalladhīn ʾūtūl-ʿilm ʾinnal-khizyal-yawm w-s-sūʾ ʿalāl-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Then on the Day of Resurrection He will disgrace them and say, "Where are My 'partners' for whom you used to oppose the believers?" Those who were given knowledge will say, "Indeed disgrace, this Day, and evil are upon the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ تَتَوَفّاهُمُ المَلائِكَةُ ظالِمي أَنفُسِهِم ۖ فَأَلقَوُا السَّلَمَ ما كُنّا نَعمَلُ مِن سوءٍ ۚ بَلىٰ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: alladhīn tatawaffāhumul-malāʾikat ẓālimī ʾanfusihim f-ʾalqaw s-salam mā kunnā naʿmal m sūʾ balā ʾinn llāh ʿalīm b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: The ones whom the angels take in death while wronging themselves, and who then offer submission, saying, "We were not doing any evil." But, yes! Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: فَادخُلوا أَبوابَ جَهَنَّمَ خالِدينَ فيها ۖ فَلَبِئسَ مَثوَى المُتَكَبِّرينَ
blank: f-dkhulū ʾabwāb jahannam khālidīn fīhā f-l-biʾs mathwāl-mutakabbirīn
english_saheeh_international: So enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and how wretched is the residence of the arrogant

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَقيلَ لِلَّذينَ اتَّقَوا ماذا أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُم ۚ قالوا خَيرًا ۗ لِلَّذينَ أَحسَنوا في هٰذِهِ الدُّنيا حَسَنَةٌ ۚ وَلَدارُ الآخِرَةِ خَيرٌ ۚ وَلَنِعمَ دارُ المُتَّقينَ
blank: w-qīl l-lladhīn ttaqaw mādhā ʾanzal rabbukum qālū khayr l-lladhīn ʾaḥsanū fī hādhih d-dunyā ḥasanat w-l-dārul-ʾākhirat khayr w-l-niʿm dārul-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: And it will be said to those who feared Allah, "What did your Lord send down?" They will say, "That which is good." For those who do good in this world is good; and the home of the Hereafter is better. And how excellent is the home of the righteous

arabic_uthmani: جَنّاتُ عَدنٍ يَدخُلونَها تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ ۖ لَهُم فيها ما يَشاءونَ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يَجزِي اللَّهُ المُتَّقينَ
blank: jannāt ʿadn yadkhulūnahā tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār lahum fīhā mā yashāʾūn k-dhālik yajzī llāhul-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Gardens of perpetual residence, which they will enter, beneath which rivers flow. They will have therein whatever they wish. Thus does Allah reward the righteous

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ تَتَوَفّاهُمُ المَلائِكَةُ طَيِّبينَ ۙ يَقولونَ سَلامٌ عَلَيكُمُ ادخُلُوا الجَنَّةَ بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: alladhīn tatawaffāhumul-malāʾikat ṭayyibīn yaqūlūn salām ʿalaykum dkhulūl-jannat b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: The ones whom the angels take in death, being good and pure; the angels will say, "Peace be upon you. Enter Paradise for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: هَل يَنظُرونَ إِلّا أَن تَأتِيَهُمُ المَلائِكَةُ أَو يَأتِيَ أَمرُ رَبِّكَ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ فَعَلَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ وَما ظَلَمَهُمُ اللَّهُ وَلٰكِن كانوا أَنفُسَهُم يَظلِمونَ
blank: hal yanẓurūn ʾillā ʾ taʾtiyahumul-malāʾikat ʾaw yaʾtiy ʾamr rabbik k-dhālik faʿalalladhīn m qablihim w-mā ẓalamahum llāh w-lāk kānū ʾanfusahum yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: Do the disbelievers await anything except that the angels should come to them or there comes the command of your Lord? Thus did those do before them. And Allah wronged them not, but they had been wronging themselves

arabic_uthmani: فَأَصابَهُم سَيِّئَاتُ ما عَمِلوا وَحاقَ بِهِم ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: f-ʾaṣābahum sayyiʾāt mā ʿamilū w-ḥāq bihim mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: So they were struck by the evil consequences of what they did and were enveloped by what they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ أَشرَكوا لَو شاءَ اللَّهُ ما عَبَدنا مِن دونِهِ مِن شَيءٍ نَحنُ وَلا آباؤُنا وَلا حَرَّمنا مِن دونِهِ مِن شَيءٍ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ فَعَلَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ فَهَل عَلَى الرُّسُلِ إِلَّا البَلاغُ المُبينُ
blank: w-qālalladhīn ʾashrakū law shāʾ llāh mā ʿabadnā m dūnihī m shayʾ naḥn w-lā ʾābāʾunā w-lā ḥarramnā m dūnihī m shayʾ k-dhālik faʿalalladhīn m qablihim f-hal ʿalā r-rusul ʾillāl-balāghul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who associate others with Allah say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have worshipped anything other than Him, neither we nor our fathers, nor would we have forbidden anything through other than Him." Thus did those do before them. So is there upon the messengers except the duty of clear notification

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد بَعَثنا في كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ رَسولًا أَنِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاجتَنِبُوا الطّاغوتَ ۖ فَمِنهُم مَن هَدَى اللَّهُ وَمِنهُم مَن حَقَّت عَلَيهِ الضَّلالَةُ ۚ فَسيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَانظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُكَذِّبينَ
blank: w-l-qad baʿathnā fī kull ʾummat rasūl ʾan ʿbudū llāh w-jtanibū ṭ-ṭāghūt f-minhum m hadā llāh w-minhum m ḥaqqat ʿalayh ḍ-ḍalālat f-sīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-nẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mukadhdhibīn
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly sent into every nation a messenger, saying, "Worship Allah and avoid Taghut." And among them were those whom Allah guided, and among them were those upon whom error was deservedly decreed. So proceed through the earth and observe how was the end of the deniers

arabic_uthmani: إِن تَحرِص عَلىٰ هُداهُم فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهدي مَن يُضِلُّ ۖ وَما لَهُم مِن ناصِرينَ
blank: ʾ taḥriṣ ʿalā hudāhum f-ʾinn llāh lā yahdī m yuḍill w-mā lahum m nāṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: Even if you should strive for their guidance, O Muhammad, indeed, Allah does not guide those He sends astray, and they will have no helpers

arabic_uthmani: وَأَقسَموا بِاللَّهِ جَهدَ أَيمانِهِم ۙ لا يَبعَثُ اللَّهُ مَن يَموتُ ۚ بَلىٰ وَعدًا عَلَيهِ حَقًّا وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾaqsamū b-llāh jahd ʾaymānihim lā yabʿath llāh m yamūt balā waʿd ʿalayh ḥaqq w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths that Allah will not resurrect one who dies. But yes - it is a true promise binding upon Him, but most of the people do not know

arabic_uthmani: لِيُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ الَّذي يَختَلِفونَ فيهِ وَلِيَعلَمَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا أَنَّهُم كانوا كاذِبينَ
blank: l-yubayyin lahumulladhī yakhtalifūn fīh w-l-yaʿlamalladhīn kafarū ʾannahum kānū kādhibīn
english_saheeh_international: It is so He will make clear to them the truth of that wherein they differ and so those who have disbelieved may know that they were liars

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما قَولُنا لِشَيءٍ إِذا أَرَدناهُ أَن نَقولَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكونُ
blank: ʾinnamā qawlunā l-shayʾ ʾidhā ʾaradnāh ʾ naqūl lahū k f-yakūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Our word to a thing when We intend it is but that We say to it, "Be," and it is

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ هاجَروا فِي اللَّهِ مِن بَعدِ ما ظُلِموا لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُم فِي الدُّنيا حَسَنَةً ۖ وَلَأَجرُ الآخِرَةِ أَكبَرُ ۚ لَو كانوا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-lladhīn hājarū fī llāh m baʿd mā ẓulimū l-nubawwiʾannahum fī d-dunyā ḥasanat w-l-ʾajrul-ʾākhirat ʾakbar law kānū yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who emigrated for the cause of Allah after they had been wronged - We will surely settle them in this world in a good place; but the reward of the Hereafter is greater, if only they could know

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ صَبَروا وَعَلىٰ رَبِّهِم يَتَوَكَّلونَ
blank: alladhīn ṣabarū w-ʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūn
english_saheeh_international: They are those who endured patiently and upon their Lord relied

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلنا مِن قَبلِكَ إِلّا رِجالًا نوحي إِلَيهِم ۚ فَاسأَلوا أَهلَ الذِّكرِ إِن كُنتُم لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnā m qablik ʾillā rijāl nūḥī ʾilayhim f-sʾalū ʾahl dh-dhikr ʾ kuntum lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And We sent not before you except men to whom We revealed Our message. So ask the people of the message if you do not know

arabic_uthmani: بِالبَيِّناتِ وَالزُّبُرِ ۗ وَأَنزَلنا إِلَيكَ الذِّكرَ لِتُبَيِّنَ لِلنّاسِ ما نُزِّلَ إِلَيهِم وَلَعَلَّهُم يَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: b-l-bayyināt w-z-zubur w-ʾanzalnā ʾilayk dh-dhikr l-tubayyin l-n-nās mā nuzzil ʾilayhim w-laʿallahum yatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: We sent them with clear proofs and written ordinances. And We revealed to you the message that you may make clear to the people what was sent down to them and that they might give thought

arabic_uthmani: أَفَأَمِنَ الَّذينَ مَكَرُوا السَّيِّئَاتِ أَن يَخسِفَ اللَّهُ بِهِمُ الأَرضَ أَو يَأتِيَهُمُ العَذابُ مِن حَيثُ لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: ʾ-f-ʾaminalladhīn makarū s-sayyiʾāt ʾ yakhsif llāh bihimul-ʾarḍ ʾaw yaʾtiyahumul-ʿadhāb m ḥayth lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: Then, do those who have planned evil deeds feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them or that the punishment will not come upon them from where they do not perceive

arabic_uthmani: أَو يَأخُذَهُم في تَقَلُّبِهِم فَما هُم بِمُعجِزينَ
blank: ʾaw yaʾkhudhahum fī taqallubihim f-mā hum b-muʿjizīn
english_saheeh_international: Or that He would not seize them during their usual activity, and they could not cause failure

arabic_uthmani: أَو يَأخُذَهُم عَلىٰ تَخَوُّفٍ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُم لَرَءوفٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: ʾaw yaʾkhudhahum ʿalā takhawwuf f-ʾinn rabbakum l-raʾūf raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Or that He would not seize them gradually in a state of dread? But indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا إِلىٰ ما خَلَقَ اللَّهُ مِن شَيءٍ يَتَفَيَّأُ ظِلالُهُ عَنِ اليَمينِ وَالشَّمائِلِ سُجَّدًا لِلَّهِ وَهُم داخِرونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾilā mā khalaq llāh m shayʾ yatafayyaʾ ẓilāluhū ʿanil-yamīn w-sh-shamāʾil sujjad l-llāh w-hum dākhirūn
english_saheeh_international: Have they not considered what things Allah has created? Their shadows incline to the right and to the left, prostrating to Allah, while they are humble

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ يَسجُدُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ مِن دابَّةٍ وَالمَلائِكَةُ وَهُم لا يَستَكبِرونَ
blank: w-l-llāh yasjud mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ m dābbat w-l-malāʾikat w-hum lā yastakbirūn
english_saheeh_international: And to Allah prostrates whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth of creatures, and the angels as well, and they are not arrogant

arabic_uthmani: يَخافونَ رَبَّهُم مِن فَوقِهِم وَيَفعَلونَ ما يُؤمَرونَ ۩
blank: yakhāfūn rabbahum m fawqihim w-yafʿalūn mā yuʾmarūn
english_saheeh_international: They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَقالَ اللَّهُ لا تَتَّخِذوا إِلٰهَينِ اثنَينِ ۖ إِنَّما هُوَ إِلٰهٌ واحِدٌ ۖ فَإِيّايَ فَارهَبونِ
blank: w-qāl llāh lā tattakhidhū ʾilāhayn thnayn ʾinnamā huw ʾilāh wāḥid f-ʾiyyāy f-rhabūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah has said, "Do not take for yourselves two deities. He is but one God, so fear only Me

arabic_uthmani: وَلَهُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَلَهُ الدّينُ واصِبًا ۚ أَفَغَيرَ اللَّهِ تَتَّقونَ
blank: w-lahū mā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-lah d-dīn wāṣib ʾ-f-ghayr llāh tattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and to Him is due worship constantly. Then is it other than Allah that you fear

arabic_uthmani: وَما بِكُم مِن نِعمَةٍ فَمِنَ اللَّهِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِذا مَسَّكُمُ الضُّرُّ فَإِلَيهِ تَجأَرونَ
blank: w-mā bikum m niʿmat f-min llāh thumm ʾidhā massakum ḍ-ḍurr f-ʾilayh tajʾarūn
english_saheeh_international: And whatever you have of favor - it is from Allah. Then when adversity touches you, to Him you cry for help

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِذا كَشَفَ الضُّرَّ عَنكُم إِذا فَريقٌ مِنكُم بِرَبِّهِم يُشرِكونَ
blank: thumm ʾidhā kashaf ḍ-ḍurr ʿankum ʾidhā farīq minkum b-rabbihim yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: Then when He removes the adversity from you, at once a party of you associates others with their Lord

arabic_uthmani: لِيَكفُروا بِما آتَيناهُم ۚ فَتَمَتَّعوا ۖ فَسَوفَ تَعلَمونَ
blank: l-yakfurū b-mā ʾātaynāhum f-tamattaʿū f-sawf taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So they will deny what We have given them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know

arabic_uthmani: وَيَجعَلونَ لِما لا يَعلَمونَ نَصيبًا مِمّا رَزَقناهُم ۗ تَاللَّهِ لَتُسأَلُنَّ عَمّا كُنتُم تَفتَرونَ
blank: w-yajʿalūn l-mā lā yaʿlamūn naṣībam-mimmā razaqnāhum t-llāh l-tusʾalunn ʿammā kuntum taftarūn
english_saheeh_international: And they assign to what they do not know a portion of that which We have provided them. By Allah, you will surely be questioned about what you used to invent

arabic_uthmani: وَيَجعَلونَ لِلَّهِ البَناتِ سُبحانَهُ ۙ وَلَهُم ما يَشتَهونَ
blank: w-yajʿalūn l-llāhil-banāt subḥānahū w-lahum mā yashtahūn
english_saheeh_international: And they attribute to Allah daughters - exalted is He - and for them is what they desire

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُهُم بِالأُنثىٰ ظَلَّ وَجهُهُ مُسوَدًّا وَهُوَ كَظيمٌ
blank: w-ʾidhā bushshir ʾaḥaduhum b-l-ʾunthā ẓall wajhuhū muswadd w-huw kaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And when one of them is informed of the birth of a female, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief

arabic_uthmani: يَتَوارىٰ مِنَ القَومِ مِن سوءِ ما بُشِّرَ بِهِ ۚ أَيُمسِكُهُ عَلىٰ هونٍ أَم يَدُسُّهُ فِي التُّرابِ ۗ أَلا ساءَ ما يَحكُمونَ
blank: yatawārā minal-qawm m sūʾ mā bushshir bihī ʾ-yumsikuhū ʿalā hūn ʾam yadussuhū fī t-turāb ʾ-lā sāʾ mā yaḥkumūn
english_saheeh_international: He hides himself from the people because of the ill of which he has been informed. Should he keep it in humiliation or bury it in the ground? Unquestionably, evil is what they decide

arabic_uthmani: لِلَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ مَثَلُ السَّوءِ ۖ وَلِلَّهِ المَثَلُ الأَعلىٰ ۚ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: l-lladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat mathal s-sawʾ w-l-llāhil-mathalul-ʾaʿlā w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: For those who do not believe in the Hereafter is the description of evil; and for Allah is the highest attribute. And He is Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو يُؤاخِذُ اللَّهُ النّاسَ بِظُلمِهِم ما تَرَكَ عَلَيها مِن دابَّةٍ وَلٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُم إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذا جاءَ أَجَلُهُم لا يَستَأخِرونَ ساعَةً ۖ وَلا يَستَقدِمونَ
blank: w-law yuʾākhidh llāh n-nās b-ẓulmihim mā tarak ʿalayhā m dābbat w-lāk yuʾakhkhiruhum ʾilā ʾajal musamm f-ʾidhā jāʾ ʾajaluhum lā yastaʾkhirūn sāʿat w-lā yastaqdimūn
english_saheeh_international: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for their wrongdoing, He would not have left upon the earth any creature, but He defers them for a specified term. And when their term has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede it

arabic_uthmani: وَيَجعَلونَ لِلَّهِ ما يَكرَهونَ وَتَصِفُ أَلسِنَتُهُمُ الكَذِبَ أَنَّ لَهُمُ الحُسنىٰ ۖ لا جَرَمَ أَنَّ لَهُمُ النّارَ وَأَنَّهُم مُفرَطونَ
blank: w-yajʿalūn l-llāh mā yakrahūn w-taṣif ʾalsinatuhumul-kadhib ʾann lahumul-ḥusnā lā jaram ʾann lahum n-nār w-ʾannahum mufraṭūn
english_saheeh_international: And they attribute to Allah that which they dislike, and their tongues assert the lie that they will have the best from Him. Assuredly, they will have the Fire, and they will be therein neglected

arabic_uthmani: تَاللَّهِ لَقَد أَرسَلنا إِلىٰ أُمَمٍ مِن قَبلِكَ فَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الشَّيطانُ أَعمالَهُم فَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُمُ اليَومَ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: t-llāh l-qad ʾarsalnā ʾilā ʾumam m qablik f-zayyan lahum sh-shayṭān ʾaʿmālahum f-huw waliyyuhumul-yawm w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: By Allah, We did certainly send messengers to nations before you, but Satan made their deeds attractive to them. And he is the disbelievers' ally today as well, and they will have a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَنزَلنا عَلَيكَ الكِتابَ إِلّا لِتُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ الَّذِي اختَلَفوا فيهِ ۙ وَهُدًى وَرَحمَةً لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: w-mā ʾanzalnā ʿalaykal-kitāb ʾillā l-tubayyin lahumulladhī khtalafū fīh w-hud w-raḥmat l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have not revealed to you the Book, O Muhammad, except for you to make clear to them that wherein they have differed and as guidance and mercy for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَأَحيا بِهِ الأَرضَ بَعدَ مَوتِها ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِقَومٍ يَسمَعونَ
blank: w-llāh ʾanzal min s-samāʾ māʾ f-ʾaḥyā bihil-ʾarḍ baʿd mawtihā ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-qawm yasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah has sent down rain from the sky and given life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who listen

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لَكُم فِي الأَنعامِ لَعِبرَةً ۖ نُسقيكُم مِمّا في بُطونِهِ مِن بَينِ فَرثٍ وَدَمٍ لَبَنًا خالِصًا سائِغًا لِلشّارِبينَ
blank: w-ʾinn lakum fīl-ʾanʿām l-ʿibrat nusqīkum mimmā fī buṭūnihī m bayn farth w-dam laban khāliṣ sāʾigh l-sh-shāribīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, for you in grazing livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from what is in their bellies - between excretion and blood - pure milk, palatable to drinkers

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن ثَمَراتِ النَّخيلِ وَالأَعنابِ تَتَّخِذونَ مِنهُ سَكَرًا وَرِزقًا حَسَنًا ۗ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِقَومٍ يَعقِلونَ
blank: w-m thamarāt n-nakhīl w-l-ʾaʿnāb tattakhidhūn minh sakar w-rizq ḥasan ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-qawm yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And from the fruits of the palm trees and grapevines you take intoxicant and good provision. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who reason

arabic_uthmani: وَأَوحىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى النَّحلِ أَنِ اتَّخِذي مِنَ الجِبالِ بُيوتًا وَمِنَ الشَّجَرِ وَمِمّا يَعرِشونَ
blank: w-ʾawḥā rabbuk ʾilā n-naḥl ʾan ttakhidhī minal-jibāl buyūt w-min sh-shajar w-mimmā yaʿrishūn
english_saheeh_international: And your Lord inspired to the bee, "Take for yourself among the mountains, houses, and among the trees and in that which they construct

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ كُلي مِن كُلِّ الثَّمَراتِ فَاسلُكي سُبُلَ رَبِّكِ ذُلُلًا ۚ يَخرُجُ مِن بُطونِها شَرابٌ مُختَلِفٌ أَلوانُهُ فيهِ شِفاءٌ لِلنّاسِ ۗ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِقَومٍ يَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: thumm kulī m kull th-thamarāt f-slukī subul rabbik dhulul yakhruj m buṭūnihā sharāb mukhtalif ʾalwānuhū fīh shifāʾ l-n-nās ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-qawm yatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Then eat from all the fruits and follow the ways of your Lord laid down for you." There emerges from their bellies a drink, varying in colors, in which there is healing for people. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُم ثُمَّ يَتَوَفّاكُم ۚ وَمِنكُم مَن يُرَدُّ إِلىٰ أَرذَلِ العُمُرِ لِكَي لا يَعلَمَ بَعدَ عِلمٍ شَيئًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ قَديرٌ
blank: w-llāh khalaqakum thumm yatawaffākum w-minkum m yuradd ʾilā ʾardhalil-ʿumur l-kay lā yaʿlam baʿd ʿilm shayʾ ʾinn llāh ʿalīm qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And Allah created you; then He will take you in death. And among you is he who is reversed to the most decrepit old age so that he will not know, after having had knowledge, a thing. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Competent

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ فَضَّلَ بَعضَكُم عَلىٰ بَعضٍ فِي الرِّزقِ ۚ فَمَا الَّذينَ فُضِّلوا بِرادّي رِزقِهِم عَلىٰ ما مَلَكَت أَيمانُهُم فَهُم فيهِ سَواءٌ ۚ أَفَبِنِعمَةِ اللَّهِ يَجحَدونَ
blank: w-llāh faḍḍal baʿḍakum ʿalā baʿḍ fī r-rizq f-mālladhīn fuḍḍilū b-rāddī rizqihim ʿalā mā malakat ʾaymānuhum f-hum fīh sawāʾ ʾ-f-b-niʿmat llāh yajḥadūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah has favored some of you over others in provision. But those who were favored would not hand over their provision to those whom their right hands possess so they would be equal to them therein. Then is it the favor of Allah they reject

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِن أَنفُسِكُم أَزواجًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِن أَزواجِكُم بَنينَ وَحَفَدَةً وَرَزَقَكُم مِنَ الطَّيِّباتِ ۚ أَفَبِالباطِلِ يُؤمِنونَ وَبِنِعمَتِ اللَّهِ هُم يَكفُرونَ
blank: w-llāh jaʿal lakum m ʾanfusikum ʾazwāj w-jaʿal lakum m ʾazwājikum banīn w-ḥafadat w-razaqakum min ṭ-ṭayyibāt ʾ-f-b-l-bāṭil yuʾminūn w-b-niʿmat llāh hum yakfurūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah has made for you from yourselves mates and has made for you from your mates sons and grandchildren and has provided for you from the good things. Then in falsehood do they believe and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve

arabic_uthmani: وَيَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ما لا يَملِكُ لَهُم رِزقًا مِنَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ شَيئًا وَلا يَستَطيعونَ
blank: w-yaʿbudūn m dūn llāh mā lā yamlik lahum rizqam-min s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ shayʾ w-lā yastaṭīʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And they worship besides Allah that which does not possess for them the power of provision from the heavens and the earth at all, and in fact, they are unable

arabic_uthmani: فَلا تَضرِبوا لِلَّهِ الأَمثالَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعلَمُ وَأَنتُم لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: f-lā taḍribū l-llāhil-ʾamthāl ʾinn llāh yaʿlam w-ʾantum lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So do not assert similarities to Allah. Indeed, Allah knows and you do not know

arabic_uthmani: ۞ ضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا عَبدًا مَملوكًا لا يَقدِرُ عَلىٰ شَيءٍ وَمَن رَزَقناهُ مِنّا رِزقًا حَسَنًا فَهُوَ يُنفِقُ مِنهُ سِرًّا وَجَهرًا ۖ هَل يَستَوونَ ۚ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَل أَكثَرُهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: ḍarab llāh mathal ʿabdam-mamlūk lā yaqdir ʿalā shayʾ w-m razaqnāh minnā rizq ḥasan f-huw yunfiq minh sirr w-jahr hal yastawūnal-ḥamd l-llāh bal ʾaktharuhum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah presents an example: a slave who is owned and unable to do a thing and he to whom We have provided from Us good provision, so he spends from it secretly and publicly. Can they be equal? Praise to Allah! But most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا رَجُلَينِ أَحَدُهُما أَبكَمُ لا يَقدِرُ عَلىٰ شَيءٍ وَهُوَ كَلٌّ عَلىٰ مَولاهُ أَينَما يُوَجِّههُ لا يَأتِ بِخَيرٍ ۖ هَل يَستَوي هُوَ وَمَن يَأمُرُ بِالعَدلِ ۙ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: w-ḍarab llāh mathal rajulayn ʾaḥaduhumā ʾabkam lā yaqdir ʿalā shayʾ w-huw kall ʿalā mawlāh ʾaynamā yuwajjihh lā yaʾt b-khayr hal yastawī huw w-m yaʾmur b-l-ʿadl w-huw ʿalā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And Allah presents an example of two men, one of them dumb and unable to do a thing, while he is a burden to his guardian. Wherever he directs him, he brings no good. Is he equal to one who commands justice, while he is on a straight path
