arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ غَيبُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَما أَمرُ السّاعَةِ إِلّا كَلَمحِ البَصَرِ أَو هُوَ أَقرَبُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: w-l-llāh ghayb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā ʾamr s-sāʿat ʾillā k-lamḥil-baṣar ʾaw huw ʾaqrab ʾinn llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And to Allah belongs the unseen aspects of the heavens and the earth. And the command for the Hour is not but as a glance of the eye or even nearer. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ أَخرَجَكُم مِن بُطونِ أُمَّهاتِكُم لا تَعلَمونَ شَيئًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ السَّمعَ وَالأَبصارَ وَالأَفئِدَةَ ۙ لَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: w-llāh ʾakhrajakum m buṭūn ʾummahātikum lā taʿlamūn shayʾ w-jaʿal lakum s-samʿ w-l-ʾabṣār w-l-ʾafʾidat laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and intellect that perhaps you would be grateful

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَرَوا إِلَى الطَّيرِ مُسَخَّراتٍ في جَوِّ السَّماءِ ما يُمسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا اللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾ-lam yaraw ʾilā ṭ-ṭayr musakhkharāt fī jaww s-samāʾ mā yumsikuhunn ʾillā llāh ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they not see the birds controlled in the atmosphere of the sky? None holds them up except Allah. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِن بُيوتِكُم سَكَنًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِن جُلودِ الأَنعامِ بُيوتًا تَستَخِفّونَها يَومَ ظَعنِكُم وَيَومَ إِقامَتِكُم ۙ وَمِن أَصوافِها وَأَوبارِها وَأَشعارِها أَثاثًا وَمَتاعًا إِلىٰ حينٍ
blank: w-llāh jaʿal lakum m buyūtikum sakan w-jaʿal lakum m julūdil-ʾanʿām buyūt tastakhiffūnahā yawm ẓaʿnikum w-yawm ʾiqāmatikum w-m ʾaṣwāfihā w-ʾawbārihā w-ʾashʿārihā ʾathāth w-matāʿ ʾilā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah has made for you from your homes a place of rest and made for you from the hides of the animals tents which you find light on your day of travel and your day of encampment; and from their wool, fur and hair is furnishing and enjoyment for a time

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِمّا خَلَقَ ظِلالًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِنَ الجِبالِ أَكنانًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم سَرابيلَ تَقيكُمُ الحَرَّ وَسَرابيلَ تَقيكُم بَأسَكُم ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يُتِمُّ نِعمَتَهُ عَلَيكُم لَعَلَّكُم تُسلِمونَ
blank: w-llāh jaʿal lakum mimmā khalaq ẓilāl w-jaʿal lakum minal-jibāl ʾaknān w-jaʿal lakum sarābīl taqīkumul-ḥarr w-sarābīl taqīkum baʾsakum k-dhālik yutimm niʿmatahū ʿalaykum laʿallakum tuslimūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah has made for you, from that which He has created, shadows and has made for you from the mountains, shelters and has made for you garments which protect you from the heat and garments which protect you from your enemy in battle. Thus does He complete His favor upon you that you might submit to Him

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَإِنَّما عَلَيكَ البَلاغُ المُبينُ
blank: f-ʾ tawallaw f-ʾinnamā ʿalaykal-balāghul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: But if they turn away, O Muhammad - then only upon you is responsibility for clear notification

arabic_uthmani: يَعرِفونَ نِعمَتَ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنكِرونَها وَأَكثَرُهُمُ الكافِرونَ
blank: yaʿrifūn niʿmat llāh thumm yunkirūnahā w-ʾaktharuhumul-kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: They recognize the favor of Allah; then they deny it. And most of them are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ نَبعَثُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ شَهيدًا ثُمَّ لا يُؤذَنُ لِلَّذينَ كَفَروا وَلا هُم يُستَعتَبونَ
blank: w-yawm nabʿath m kull ʾummat shahīd thumm lā yuʾdhan l-lladhīn kafarū w-lā hum yustaʿtabūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention the Day when We will resurrect from every nation a witness. Then it will not be permitted to the disbelievers to apologize or make excuses, nor will they be asked to appease Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا رَأَى الَّذينَ ظَلَمُوا العَذابَ فَلا يُخَفَّفُ عَنهُم وَلا هُم يُنظَرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾālladhīn ẓalamūl-ʿadhāb f-lā yukhaffaf ʿanhum w-lā hum yunẓarūn
english_saheeh_international: And when those who wronged see the punishment, it will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا رَأَى الَّذينَ أَشرَكوا شُرَكاءَهُم قالوا رَبَّنا هٰؤُلاءِ شُرَكاؤُنَا الَّذينَ كُنّا نَدعو مِن دونِكَ ۖ فَأَلقَوا إِلَيهِمُ القَولَ إِنَّكُم لَكاذِبونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾālladhīn ʾashrakū shurakāʾahum qālū rabbanā hāʾulāʾ shurakāʾunālladhīn kunnā nadʿū m dūnik f-ʾalqaw ʾilayhimul-qawl ʾinnakum l-kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: And when those who associated others with Allah see their "partners," they will say," Our Lord, these are our partners to You whom we used to invoke besides You." But they will throw at them the statement, "Indeed, you are liars

arabic_uthmani: وَأَلقَوا إِلَى اللَّهِ يَومَئِذٍ السَّلَمَ ۖ وَضَلَّ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَفتَرونَ
blank: w-ʾalqaw ʾilā llāh yawmaʾidh- s-salam w-ḍall ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: And they will impart to Allah that Day their submission, and lost from them is what they used to invent

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَصَدّوا عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ زِدناهُم عَذابًا فَوقَ العَذابِ بِما كانوا يُفسِدونَ
blank: alladhīn kafarū w-ṣaddū ʿ sabīl llāh zidnāhum ʿadhāb fawqal-ʿadhāb b-mā kānū yufsidūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who disbelieved and averted others from the way of Allah - We will increase them in punishment over their punishment for what corruption they were causing

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ نَبعَثُ في كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ شَهيدًا عَلَيهِم مِن أَنفُسِهِم ۖ وَجِئنا بِكَ شَهيدًا عَلىٰ هٰؤُلاءِ ۚ وَنَزَّلنا عَلَيكَ الكِتابَ تِبيانًا لِكُلِّ شَيءٍ وَهُدًى وَرَحمَةً وَبُشرىٰ لِلمُسلِمينَ
blank: w-yawm nabʿath fī kull ʾummat shahīd ʿalayhim m ʾanfusihim w-jiʾnā bik shahīd ʿalā hāʾulāʾ w-nazzalnā ʿalaykal-kitāb tibyān l-kull shayʾ w-hud w-raḥmat w-bushrā l-l-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention the Day when We will resurrect among every nation a witness over them from themselves. And We will bring you, O Muhammad, as a witness over your nation. And We have sent down to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَأمُرُ بِالعَدلِ وَالإِحسانِ وَإيتاءِ ذِي القُربىٰ وَيَنهىٰ عَنِ الفَحشاءِ وَالمُنكَرِ وَالبَغيِ ۚ يَعِظُكُم لَعَلَّكُم تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: ʾinn llāh yaʾmur b-l-ʿadl w-l-ʾiḥsān w-ʾītāʾ dhīl-qurbā w-yanhā ʿanil-faḥshāʾ w-l-munkar w-l-baghy yaʿiẓukum laʿallakum tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality and bad conduct and oppression. He admonishes you that perhaps you will be reminded

arabic_uthmani: وَأَوفوا بِعَهدِ اللَّهِ إِذا عاهَدتُم وَلا تَنقُضُوا الأَيمانَ بَعدَ تَوكيدِها وَقَد جَعَلتُمُ اللَّهَ عَلَيكُم كَفيلًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعلَمُ ما تَفعَلونَ
blank: w-ʾawfū b-ʿahd llāh ʾidhā ʿāhadtum w-lā tanquḍūl-ʾaymān baʿd tawkīdihā w-qad jaʿaltum llāh ʿalaykum kafīl ʾinn llāh yaʿlam mā tafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it, O believers, and do not break oaths after their confirmation while you have made Allah, over you, a witness. Indeed, Allah knows what you do

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَكونوا كَالَّتي نَقَضَت غَزلَها مِن بَعدِ قُوَّةٍ أَنكاثًا تَتَّخِذونَ أَيمانَكُم دَخَلًا بَينَكُم أَن تَكونَ أُمَّةٌ هِيَ أَربىٰ مِن أُمَّةٍ ۚ إِنَّما يَبلوكُمُ اللَّهُ بِهِ ۚ وَلَيُبَيِّنَنَّ لَكُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ ما كُنتُم فيهِ تَختَلِفونَ
blank: w-lā takūnū k-llatī naqaḍat ghazlahā m baʿd quwwat ʾankāth tattakhidhūn ʾaymānakum dakhal baynakum ʾ takūn ʾummat hiy ʾarbā m ʾummat ʾinnamā yablūkum llāh bihī w-l-yubayyinann lakum yawmal-qiyāmatimā kuntum fīh takhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not be like she who untwisted her spun thread after it was strong by taking your oaths as means of deceit between you because one community is more plentiful in number or wealth than another community. Allah only tries you thereby. And He will surely make clear to you on the Day of Resurrection that over which you used to differ

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو شاءَ اللَّهُ لَجَعَلَكُم أُمَّةً واحِدَةً وَلٰكِن يُضِلُّ مَن يَشاءُ وَيَهدي مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَلَتُسأَلُنَّ عَمّا كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-law-shāʾ llāh l-jaʿalakum ʾummat wāḥidat w-lāk yuḍill m yashāʾ w-yahdī m yashāʾ w-l-tusʾalunn ʿammā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And if Allah had willed, He could have made you of one religion, but He causes to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And you will surely be questioned about what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَتَّخِذوا أَيمانَكُم دَخَلًا بَينَكُم فَتَزِلَّ قَدَمٌ بَعدَ ثُبوتِها وَتَذوقُوا السّوءَ بِما صَدَدتُم عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ وَلَكُم عَذابٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: w-lā tattakhidhū ʾaymānakum dakhal baynakum f-tazill qadam baʿd thubūtihā w-tadhūqū s-sūʾ b-mā ṣadadtum ʿ sabīl llāh w-lakum ʿadhāb ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And do not take your oaths as means of deceit between you, lest a foot slip after it was once firm, and you would taste evil in this world for what people you diverted from the way of Allah, and you would have in the Hereafter a great punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَشتَروا بِعَهدِ اللَّهِ ثَمَنًا قَليلًا ۚ إِنَّما عِندَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيرٌ لَكُم إِن كُنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-lā tashtarū b-ʿahd llāh thaman qalīl ʾinnamā ʿind llāh huw khayr lakum ʾ kuntum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not exchange the covenant of Allah for a small price. Indeed, what is with Allah is best for you, if only you could know

arabic_uthmani: ما عِندَكُم يَنفَدُ ۖ وَما عِندَ اللَّهِ باقٍ ۗ وَلَنَجزِيَنَّ الَّذينَ صَبَروا أَجرَهُم بِأَحسَنِ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: mā ʿindakum yanfad w-mā ʿind llāh bāq w-l-najziyannalladhīn ṣabarū ʾajrahum b-ʾaḥsan mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Whatever you have will end, but what Allah has is lasting. And We will surely give those who were patient their reward according to the best of what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: مَن عَمِلَ صالِحًا مِن ذَكَرٍ أَو أُنثىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤمِنٌ فَلَنُحيِيَنَّهُ حَياةً طَيِّبَةً ۖ وَلَنَجزِيَنَّهُم أَجرَهُم بِأَحسَنِ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: m ʿamil ṣāliḥam-m dhakar ʾaw ʾunthā w-huw muʾmin f-l-nuḥyiyannahū ḥayāt ṭayyibat w-l-najziyannahum ʾajrahum b-ʾaḥsan mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life, and We will surely give them their reward in the Hereafter according to the best of what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا قَرَأتَ القُرآنَ فَاستَعِذ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيطانِ الرَّجيمِ
blank: f-ʾidhā qaraʾtal-qurʿān f-staʿidh b-llāh min sh-shayṭān r-rajīm
english_saheeh_international: So when you recite the Qur'an, first seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled from His mercy

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ لَيسَ لَهُ سُلطانٌ عَلَى الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَلىٰ رَبِّهِم يَتَوَكَّلونَ
blank: ʾinnahū lays lahū sulṭān ʿalālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, there is for him no authority over those who have believed and rely upon their Lord

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما سُلطانُهُ عَلَى الَّذينَ يَتَوَلَّونَهُ وَالَّذينَ هُم بِهِ مُشرِكونَ
blank: ʾinnamā sulṭānuhū ʿalālladhīn yatawallawnahū w-lladhīn hum bihī mushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: His authority is only over those who take him as an ally and those who through him associate others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا بَدَّلنا آيَةً مَكانَ آيَةٍ ۙ وَاللَّهُ أَعلَمُ بِما يُنَزِّلُ قالوا إِنَّما أَنتَ مُفتَرٍ ۚ بَل أَكثَرُهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā baddalnā ʾāyatam-makān ʾāyat w-llāh ʾaʿlam b-mā yunazzil qālū ʾinnamā ʾant muftar bal ʾaktharuhum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And when We substitute a verse in place of a verse - and Allah is most knowing of what He sends down - they say, "You, O Muhammad, are but an inventor of lies." But most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: قُل نَزَّلَهُ روحُ القُدُسِ مِن رَبِّكَ بِالحَقِّ لِيُثَبِّتَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَهُدًى وَبُشرىٰ لِلمُسلِمينَ
blank: qul nazzalahū rūḥul-qudus m rabbik b-l-ḥaqq l-yuthabbitalladhīn ʾāmanū w-hud w-bushrā l-l-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "The Pure Spirit has brought it down from your Lord in truth to make firm those who believe and as guidance and good tidings to the Muslims

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد نَعلَمُ أَنَّهُم يَقولونَ إِنَّما يُعَلِّمُهُ بَشَرٌ ۗ لِسانُ الَّذي يُلحِدونَ إِلَيهِ أَعجَمِيٌّ وَهٰذا لِسانٌ عَرَبِيٌّ مُبينٌ
blank: w-l-qad naʿlam ʾannahum yaqūlūn ʾinnamā yuʿallimuhū bashar lisānulladhī yulḥidūn ʾilayh ʾaʿjamiyy w-hādhā lisān ʿarabiyy mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly know that they say, "It is only a human being who teaches the Prophet." The tongue of the one they refer to is foreign, and this Qur'an is in a clear Arabic language

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ لا يَهديهِمُ اللَّهُ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-ʾāyāt llāh lā yahdīhim llāh w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who do not believe in the verses of Allah - Allah will not guide them, and for them is a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما يَفتَرِي الكَذِبَ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الكاذِبونَ
blank: ʾinnamā yaftarīl-kadhiballadhīn lā yuʾminūn b-ʾāyāt llāh w-ʾulāʾik humul-kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: They only invent falsehood who do not believe in the verses of Allah, and it is those who are the liars

arabic_uthmani: مَن كَفَرَ بِاللَّهِ مِن بَعدِ إيمانِهِ إِلّا مَن أُكرِهَ وَقَلبُهُ مُطمَئِنٌّ بِالإيمانِ وَلٰكِن مَن شَرَحَ بِالكُفرِ صَدرًا فَعَلَيهِم غَضَبٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: m kafar b-llāh m baʿd ʾīmānihī ʾillā m ʾukrih w-qalbuhū muṭmaʾinn b-l-ʾīmān w-lāk m sharaḥ b-l-kufr ṣadr f-ʿalayhim ghaḍab min llāh w-lahum ʿadhāb ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Whoever disbelieves in Allah after his belief... except for one who is forced to renounce his religion while his heart is secure in faith. But those who willingly open their breasts to disbelief, upon them is wrath from Allah, and for them is a great punishment

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ استَحَبُّوا الحَياةَ الدُّنيا عَلَى الآخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الكافِرينَ
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahum staḥabbūl-ḥayāt d-dunyā ʿalāl-ʾākhirat w-ʾann llāh lā yahdīl-qawmal-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: That is because they preferred the worldly life over the Hereafter and that Allah does not guide the disbelieving people

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ طَبَعَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم وَسَمعِهِم وَأَبصارِهِم ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الغافِلونَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn ṭabaʿ llāh ʿalā qulūbihim w-samʿihim w-ʾabṣārihim w-ʾulāʾik humul-ghāfilūn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the ones over whose hearts and hearing and vision Allah has sealed, and it is those who are the heedless

arabic_uthmani: لا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُم فِي الآخِرَةِ هُمُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: lā jaram ʾannahum fīl-ʾākhirat humul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: Assuredly, it is they, in the Hereafter, who will be the losers

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذينَ هاجَروا مِن بَعدِ ما فُتِنوا ثُمَّ جاهَدوا وَصَبَروا إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِن بَعدِها لَغَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: thumm ʾinn rabbak l-lladhīn hājarū m baʿd mā futinū thumm jāhadū w-ṣabarū ʾinn rabbak m baʿdihā l-ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who emigrated after they had been compelled to renounce their religion and thereafter fought for the cause of Allah and were patient - indeed, your Lord, after that, is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: ۞ يَومَ تَأتي كُلُّ نَفسٍ تُجادِلُ عَن نَفسِها وَتُوَفّىٰ كُلُّ نَفسٍ ما عَمِلَت وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: yawm taʾtī kull nafs tujādil ʿ nafsihā w-tuwaffā kull nafs mā ʿamilat w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: On the Day when every soul will come disputing for itself, and every soul will be fully compensated for what it did, and they will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: وَضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا قَريَةً كانَت آمِنَةً مُطمَئِنَّةً يَأتيها رِزقُها رَغَدًا مِن كُلِّ مَكانٍ فَكَفَرَت بِأَنعُمِ اللَّهِ فَأَذاقَهَا اللَّهُ لِباسَ الجوعِ وَالخَوفِ بِما كانوا يَصنَعونَ
blank: w-ḍarab llāh mathal qaryat kānat ʾāminatam-muṭmaʾinnat yaʾtīhā rizquhā raghadam-m kull makān f-kafarat b-ʾanʿum llāh f-ʾadhāqahā llāh libāsal-jūʿ w-l-khawf b-mā kānū yaṣnaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah presents an example: a city which was safe and secure, its provision coming to it in abundance from every location, but it denied the favors of Allah. So Allah made it taste the envelopment of hunger and fear for what they had been doing

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد جاءَهُم رَسولٌ مِنهُم فَكَذَّبوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمُ العَذابُ وَهُم ظالِمونَ
blank: w-l-qad jāʾahum rasūl minhum f-kadhdhabūh f-ʾakhadhahumul-ʿadhāb w-hum ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: And there had certainly come to them a Messenger from among themselves, but they denied him; so punishment overtook them while they were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَكُلوا مِمّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ حَلالًا طَيِّبًا وَاشكُروا نِعمَتَ اللَّهِ إِن كُنتُم إِيّاهُ تَعبُدونَ
blank: f-kulū mimmā razaqakum llāh ḥalāl ṭayyib w-shkurū niʿmat llāh ʾ kuntum ʾiyyāh taʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: Then eat of what Allah has provided for you which is lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah, if it is indeed Him that you worship

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما حَرَّمَ عَلَيكُمُ المَيتَةَ وَالدَّمَ وَلَحمَ الخِنزيرِ وَما أُهِلَّ لِغَيرِ اللَّهِ بِهِ ۖ فَمَنِ اضطُرَّ غَيرَ باغٍ وَلا عادٍ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: ʾinnamā ḥarram ʿalaykumul-maytat w-d-dam w-laḥmal-khinzīr w-mā ʾuhill l-ghayr llāh bihī f-man ḍṭurr ghayr bāgh w-lā ʿād f-ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: He has only forbidden to you dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced by necessity, neither desiring it nor transgressing its limit - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَقولوا لِما تَصِفُ أَلسِنَتُكُمُ الكَذِبَ هٰذا حَلالٌ وَهٰذا حَرامٌ لِتَفتَروا عَلَى اللَّهِ الكَذِبَ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَفتَرونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ الكَذِبَ لا يُفلِحونَ
blank: w-lā taqūlū l-mā taṣif ʾalsinatukumul-kadhib hādhā ḥalāl w-hādhā ḥarām l-taftarū ʿalā llāhil-kadhib ʾinnalladhīn yaftarūn ʿalā llāhil-kadhib lā yufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah. Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed

arabic_uthmani: مَتاعٌ قَليلٌ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: matāʿ qalīl w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: It is but a brief enjoyment, and they will have a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَعَلَى الَّذينَ هادوا حَرَّمنا ما قَصَصنا عَلَيكَ مِن قَبلُ ۖ وَما ظَلَمناهُم وَلٰكِن كانوا أَنفُسَهُم يَظلِمونَ
blank: w-ʿalālladhīn hādū ḥarramnā mā qaṣaṣnā ʿalayk m qabl w-mā ẓalamnāhum w-lāk kānū ʾanfusahum yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: And to those who are Jews We have prohibited that which We related to you before. And We did not wrong them thereby, but they were wronging themselves

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذينَ عَمِلُوا السّوءَ بِجَهالَةٍ ثُمَّ تابوا مِن بَعدِ ذٰلِكَ وَأَصلَحوا إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِن بَعدِها لَغَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: thumm ʾinn rabbak l-lladhīn ʿamilū s-sūʾ b-jahālat thumm tābū m baʿd dhālik w-ʾaṣlaḥū ʾinn rabbak m baʿdihā l-ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who have done wrong out of ignorance and then repent after that and correct themselves - indeed, your Lord, thereafter, is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ إِبراهيمَ كانَ أُمَّةً قانِتًا لِلَّهِ حَنيفًا وَلَم يَكُ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: ʾinn ʾibrāhīm kān ʾummat qānit l-llāh ḥanīf w-lam yak minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Abraham was a comprehensive leader, devoutly obedient to Allah, inclining toward truth, and he was not of those who associate others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: شاكِرًا لِأَنعُمِهِ ۚ اجتَباهُ وَهَداهُ إِلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: shākir l-ʾanʿumih jtabāh w-hadāh ʾilā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: He was grateful for His favors. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path

arabic_uthmani: وَآتَيناهُ فِي الدُّنيا حَسَنَةً ۖ وَإِنَّهُ فِي الآخِرَةِ لَمِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: w-ʾātaynāh fī d-dunyā ḥasanat w-ʾinnahū fīl-ʾākhirat l-min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And We gave him good in this world, and indeed, in the Hereafter he will be among the righteous

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَوحَينا إِلَيكَ أَنِ اتَّبِع مِلَّةَ إِبراهيمَ حَنيفًا ۖ وَما كانَ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: thumm ʾawḥaynā ʾilayk ʾan ttabiʿ millat ʾibrāhīm ḥanīf w-mā kān minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We revealed to you, O Muhammad, to follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of those who associate with Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما جُعِلَ السَّبتُ عَلَى الَّذينَ اختَلَفوا فيهِ ۚ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَحكُمُ بَينَهُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ فيما كانوا فيهِ يَختَلِفونَ
blank: ʾinnamā juʿil s-sabt ʿalālladhīn khtalafū fīh w-ʾinn rabbak l-yaḥkum baynahum yawmal-qiyāmat fī-mā kānū fīh yakhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: The sabbath was only appointed for those who differed over it. And indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ

arabic_uthmani: ادعُ إِلىٰ سَبيلِ رَبِّكَ بِالحِكمَةِ وَالمَوعِظَةِ الحَسَنَةِ ۖ وَجادِلهُم بِالَّتي هِيَ أَحسَنُ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبيلِهِ ۖ وَهُوَ أَعلَمُ بِالمُهتَدينَ
blank: udʿ ʾilā sabīl rabbik b-l-ḥikmat w-l-mawʿiẓatil-ḥasanat w-jādilhum b-llatī hiy ʾaḥsan ʾinn rabbak huw ʾaʿlam b-m ḍall ʿ sabīlihī w-huw ʾaʿlam b-l-muhtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good instruction, and argue with them in a way that is best. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has strayed from His way, and He is most knowing of who is rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن عاقَبتُم فَعاقِبوا بِمِثلِ ما عوقِبتُم بِهِ ۖ وَلَئِن صَبَرتُم لَهُوَ خَيرٌ لِلصّابِرينَ
blank: w-ʾ ʿāqabtum f-ʿāqibū b-mithl mā ʿūqibtum bihī w-l-ʾ ṣabartum l-huw khayr l-ṣ-ṣābirīn
english_saheeh_international: And if you punish an enemy, O believers, punish with an equivalent of that with which you were harmed. But if you are patient - it is better for those who are patient

arabic_uthmani: وَاصبِر وَما صَبرُكَ إِلّا بِاللَّهِ ۚ وَلا تَحزَن عَلَيهِم وَلا تَكُ في ضَيقٍ مِمّا يَمكُرونَ
blank: w-ṣbir w-mā ṣabruk ʾillā b-llāh w-lā taḥz ʿalayhim w-lā tak fī ḍayq mimmā yamkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And be patient, O Muhammad, and your patience is not but through Allah. And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress over what they conspire

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الَّذينَ اتَّقَوا وَالَّذينَ هُم مُحسِنونَ
blank: ʾinn llāh maʿalladhīn ttaqaw w-lladhīn hum muḥsinūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good

arabic_uthmani: سُبحانَ الَّذي أَسرىٰ بِعَبدِهِ لَيلًا مِنَ المَسجِدِ الحَرامِ إِلَى المَسجِدِ الأَقصَى الَّذي بارَكنا حَولَهُ لِنُرِيَهُ مِن آياتِنا ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّميعُ البَصيرُ
blank: subḥānalladhī ʾasrā b-ʿabdihī laylam-minal-masjidil-ḥarām ʾilāl-masjidil-ʾaqṣālladhī bāraknā ḥawlahū l-nuriyahū m ʾāyātinā ʾinnahū huw s-samīʿul-baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Exalted is He who took His Servant by night from al-Masjid al-Haram to al-Masjid al-Aqsa, whose surroundings We have blessed, to show him of Our signs. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Seeing

arabic_uthmani: وَآتَينا موسَى الكِتابَ وَجَعَلناهُ هُدًى لِبَني إِسرائيلَ أَلّا تَتَّخِذوا مِن دوني وَكيلًا
blank: w-ʾātaynā mūsāl-kitāb w-jaʿalnāh hud l-banī ʾisrāʾīl ʾallā tattakhidhū m dūnī wakīl
english_saheeh_international: And We gave Moses the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel that you not take other than Me as Disposer of affairs

arabic_uthmani: ذُرِّيَّةَ مَن حَمَلنا مَعَ نوحٍ ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ عَبدًا شَكورًا
blank: dhurriyyat m ḥamalnā maʿ nūḥ ʾinnahū kān ʿabd shakūr
english_saheeh_international: O descendants of those We carried in the ship with Noah. Indeed, he was a grateful servant

arabic_uthmani: وَقَضَينا إِلىٰ بَني إِسرائيلَ فِي الكِتابِ لَتُفسِدُنَّ فِي الأَرضِ مَرَّتَينِ وَلَتَعلُنَّ عُلُوًّا كَبيرًا
blank: w-qaḍaynā ʾilā banī ʾisrāʾīl fīl-kitāb l-tufsidunn fīl-ʾarḍ marratayn w-l-taʿlunn ʿuluww kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And We conveyed to the Children of Israel in the Scripture that, "You will surely cause corruption on the earth twice, and you will surely reach a degree of great haughtiness

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا جاءَ وَعدُ أولاهُما بَعَثنا عَلَيكُم عِبادًا لَنا أُولي بَأسٍ شَديدٍ فَجاسوا خِلالَ الدِّيارِ ۚ وَكانَ وَعدًا مَفعولًا
blank: f-ʾidhā jāʾ waʿd ʾūlāhumā baʿathnā ʿalaykum ʿibād lanā ʾulī baʾs shadīd f-jāsū khilāl d-diyār w-kān waʿdam-mafʿūl
english_saheeh_international: So when the time of promise came for the first of them, We sent against you servants of Ours - those of great military might, and they probed even into the homes, and it was a promise fulfilled

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ رَدَدنا لَكُمُ الكَرَّةَ عَلَيهِم وَأَمدَدناكُم بِأَموالٍ وَبَنينَ وَجَعَلناكُم أَكثَرَ نَفيرًا
blank: thumm radadnā lakumul-karrat ʿalayhim w-ʾamdadnākum b-ʾamwāl w-banīn w-jaʿalnākum ʾakthar nafīr
english_saheeh_international: Then We gave back to you a return victory over them. And We reinforced you with wealth and sons and made you more numerous in manpower

arabic_uthmani: إِن أَحسَنتُم أَحسَنتُم لِأَنفُسِكُم ۖ وَإِن أَسَأتُم فَلَها ۚ فَإِذا جاءَ وَعدُ الآخِرَةِ لِيَسوءوا وُجوهَكُم وَلِيَدخُلُوا المَسجِدَ كَما دَخَلوهُ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَلِيُتَبِّروا ما عَلَوا تَتبيرًا
blank: ʾ ʾaḥsantum ʾaḥsantum l-ʾanfusikum w-ʾ ʾasaʾtum f-lahā f-ʾidhā jāʾ waʿdul-ʾākhirat l-yasūʾū wujūhakum w-l-yadkhulūl-masjid k-mā dakhalūh ʾawwal marrat w-l-yutabbirū mā ʿalaw tatbīr
english_saheeh_international: And said, "If you do good, you do good for yourselves; and if you do evil, you do it to yourselves." Then when the final promise came, We sent your enemies to sadden your faces and to enter the temple in Jerusalem, as they entered it the first time, and to destroy what they had taken over with total destruction

arabic_uthmani: عَسىٰ رَبُّكُم أَن يَرحَمَكُم ۚ وَإِن عُدتُم عُدنا ۘ وَجَعَلنا جَهَنَّمَ لِلكافِرينَ حَصيرًا
blank: ʿasā rabbukum ʾ yarḥamakum w-ʾ ʿudtum ʿudnā w-jaʿalnā jahannam l-l-kāfirīn ḥaṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Then Allah said, "It is expected, if you repent, that your Lord will have mercy upon you. But if you return to sin, We will return to punishment. And We have made Hell, for the disbelievers, a prison-bed

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذَا القُرآنَ يَهدي لِلَّتي هِيَ أَقوَمُ وَيُبَشِّرُ المُؤمِنينَ الَّذينَ يَعمَلونَ الصّالِحاتِ أَنَّ لَهُم أَجرًا كَبيرًا
blank: ʾinn hādhāl-qurʾān yahdī l-llatī hiy ʾaqwam w-yubashshirul-muʾminīnalladhīn yaʿmalūn ṣ-ṣāliḥāt ʾann lahum ʾajr kabīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, this Qur'an guides to that which is most suitable and gives good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a great reward

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ أَعتَدنا لَهُم عَذابًا أَليمًا
blank: w-ʾannalladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat ʾaʿtadnā lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And that those who do not believe in the Hereafter - We have prepared for them a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَيَدعُ الإِنسانُ بِالشَّرِّ دُعاءَهُ بِالخَيرِ ۖ وَكانَ الإِنسانُ عَجولًا
blank: w-yadʿul-ʾinsān b-sh-sharr duʿāʾahū b-l-khayr w-kānal-ʾinsān ʿajūl
english_saheeh_international: And man supplicates for evil as he supplicates for good, and man is ever hasty

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلنَا اللَّيلَ وَالنَّهارَ آيَتَينِ ۖ فَمَحَونا آيَةَ اللَّيلِ وَجَعَلنا آيَةَ النَّهارِ مُبصِرَةً لِتَبتَغوا فَضلًا مِن رَبِّكُم وَلِتَعلَموا عَدَدَ السِّنينَ وَالحِسابَ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيءٍ فَصَّلناهُ تَفصيلًا
blank: w-jaʿalnāl-layl w-n-nahār ʾāyatayn f-maḥawnā ʾāyatal-layl w-jaʿalnā ʾāyat n-nahār mubṣirat l-tabtaghū faḍlam-m rabbikum w-l-taʿlamū ʿadad s-sinīn w-l-ḥisāb w-kull shayʾ faṣṣalnāh tafṣīl
english_saheeh_international: And We have made the night and day two signs, and We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day visible that you may seek bounty from your Lord and may know the number of years and the account of time. And everything We have set out in detail

arabic_uthmani: وَكُلَّ إِنسانٍ أَلزَمناهُ طائِرَهُ في عُنُقِهِ ۖ وَنُخرِجُ لَهُ يَومَ القِيامَةِ كِتابًا يَلقاهُ مَنشورًا
blank: w-kull ʾinsān ʾalzamnāh ṭāʾirahū fī ʿunuqihī w-nukhrij lahū yawmal-qiyāmat kitāb yalqāh manshūr-
english_saheeh_international: And for every person We have imposed his fate upon his neck, and We will produce for him on the Day of Resurrection a record which he will encounter spread open

arabic_uthmani: اقرَأ كِتابَكَ كَفىٰ بِنَفسِكَ اليَومَ عَلَيكَ حَسيبًا
blank: iqraʾ kitābak kafā b-nafsikal-yawm ʿalayk ḥasīb
english_saheeh_international: It will be said, "Read your record. Sufficient is yourself against you this Day as accountant

arabic_uthmani: مَنِ اهتَدىٰ فَإِنَّما يَهتَدي لِنَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّما يَضِلُّ عَلَيها ۚ وَلا تَزِرُ وازِرَةٌ وِزرَ أُخرىٰ ۗ وَما كُنّا مُعَذِّبينَ حَتّىٰ نَبعَثَ رَسولًا
blank: man htadā f-ʾinnamā yahtadī l-nafsihī w-m ḍall f-ʾinnamā yaḍill ʿalayhā w-lā tazir wāzirat wizr ʾukhrā w-mā kunnā muʿadhdhibīn ḥattā nabʿath rasūl
english_saheeh_international: Whoever is guided is only guided for the benefit of his soul. And whoever errs only errs against it. And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And never would We punish until We sent a messenger

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا أَرَدنا أَن نُهلِكَ قَريَةً أَمَرنا مُترَفيها فَفَسَقوا فيها فَحَقَّ عَلَيهَا القَولُ فَدَمَّرناها تَدميرًا
blank: w-ʾidhā ʾaradnā ʾ nuhlik qaryat ʾamarnā mutrafīhā f-fasaqū fīhā f-ḥaqq ʿalayhāl-qawl f-dammarnāhā tadmīr
english_saheeh_international: And when We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein; so the word comes into effect upon it, and We destroy it with complete destruction

arabic_uthmani: وَكَم أَهلَكنا مِنَ القُرونِ مِن بَعدِ نوحٍ ۗ وَكَفىٰ بِرَبِّكَ بِذُنوبِ عِبادِهِ خَبيرًا بَصيرًا
blank: w-kam ʾahlaknā minal-qurūn m baʿd nūḥ w-kafā b-rabbik b-dhunūb ʿibādihī khabīr baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And how many have We destroyed from the generations after Noah. And sufficient is your Lord, concerning the sins of His servants, as Acquainted and Seeing

arabic_uthmani: مَن كانَ يُريدُ العاجِلَةَ عَجَّلنا لَهُ فيها ما نَشاءُ لِمَن نُريدُ ثُمَّ جَعَلنا لَهُ جَهَنَّمَ يَصلاها مَذمومًا مَدحورًا
blank: m kān yurīdul-ʿājilat ʿajjalnā lahū fīhā mā nashāʾ l-m nurīd thumm jaʿalnā lahū jahannam yaṣlāhā madhmūmam-madḥūr
english_saheeh_international: Whoever should desire the immediate - We hasten for him from it what We will to whom We intend. Then We have made for him Hell, which he will enter to burn, censured and banished

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَرادَ الآخِرَةَ وَسَعىٰ لَها سَعيَها وَهُوَ مُؤمِنٌ فَأُولٰئِكَ كانَ سَعيُهُم مَشكورًا
blank: w-m ʾarādal-ʾākhirat w-saʿā lahā saʿyahā w-huw muʾmin f-ʾulāʾik kān saʿyuhum mashkūr
english_saheeh_international: But whoever desires the Hereafter and exerts the effort due to it while he is a believer - it is those whose effort is ever appreciated by Allah

arabic_uthmani: كُلًّا نُمِدُّ هٰؤُلاءِ وَهٰؤُلاءِ مِن عَطاءِ رَبِّكَ ۚ وَما كانَ عَطاءُ رَبِّكَ مَحظورًا
blank: kull numidd hāʾulāʾ w-hāʾulāʾ m ʿaṭāʾ rabbik w-mā kān ʿaṭāʾ rabbik maḥẓūr-
english_saheeh_international: To each category We extend - to these and to those - from the gift of your Lord. And never has the gift of your Lord been restricted

arabic_uthmani: انظُر كَيفَ فَضَّلنا بَعضَهُم عَلىٰ بَعضٍ ۚ وَلَلآخِرَةُ أَكبَرُ دَرَجاتٍ وَأَكبَرُ تَفضيلًا
blank: unẓur kayf faḍḍalnā baʿḍahum ʿalā baʿḍ w-l-l-ʾākhirat ʾakbar darajāt w-ʾakbar tafḍīl
english_saheeh_international: Look how We have favored in provision some of them over others. But the Hereafter is greater in degrees of difference and greater in distinction

arabic_uthmani: لا تَجعَل مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلٰهًا آخَرَ فَتَقعُدَ مَذمومًا مَخذولًا
blank: lā tajʿal maʿ llāh ʾilāh ʾākhar f-taqʿud madhmūmam-makhdhūl
english_saheeh_international: Do not make as equal with Allah another deity and thereby become censured and forsaken

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَقَضىٰ رَبُّكَ أَلّا تَعبُدوا إِلّا إِيّاهُ وَبِالوالِدَينِ إِحسانًا ۚ إِمّا يَبلُغَنَّ عِندَكَ الكِبَرَ أَحَدُهُما أَو كِلاهُما فَلا تَقُل لَهُما أُفٍّ وَلا تَنهَرهُما وَقُل لَهُما قَولًا كَريمًا
blank: w-qaḍā rabbuk ʾallā taʿbudū ʾillā ʾiyyāh w-b-l-wālidayn ʾiḥsān ʾimmā yablughann ʿindakal-kibar ʾaḥaduhumā ʾaw kilāhumā f-lā taqul lahumā ʾuff w-lā tanharhumā w-qul lahumā qawl karīm
english_saheeh_international: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment. Whether one or both of them reach old age while with you, say not to them so much as, "uff," and do not repel them but speak to them a noble word

arabic_uthmani: وَاخفِض لَهُما جَناحَ الذُّلِّ مِنَ الرَّحمَةِ وَقُل رَبِّ ارحَمهُما كَما رَبَّياني صَغيرًا
blank: w-khfiḍ lahumā janāḥ dh-dhull min r-raḥmat w-qul rabb rḥamhumā k-mā rabbayānī ṣaghīr
english_saheeh_international: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, "My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up when I was small

arabic_uthmani: رَبُّكُم أَعلَمُ بِما في نُفوسِكُم ۚ إِن تَكونوا صالِحينَ فَإِنَّهُ كانَ لِلأَوّابينَ غَفورًا
blank: rabbukum ʾaʿlam b-mā fī nufūsikum ʾ takūnū ṣāliḥīn f-ʾinnahū kān l-l-ʾawwābīn ghafūr
english_saheeh_international: Your Lord is most knowing of what is within yourselves. If you should be righteous in intention - then indeed He is ever, to the often returning to Him, Forgiving

arabic_uthmani: وَآتِ ذَا القُربىٰ حَقَّهُ وَالمِسكينَ وَابنَ السَّبيلِ وَلا تُبَذِّر تَبذيرًا
blank: w-ʾāt dhāl-qurbā ḥaqqahū w-l-miskīn w-bn s-sabīl w-lā tubadhdhir tabdhīr
english_saheeh_international: And give the relative his right, and also the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُبَذِّرينَ كانوا إِخوانَ الشَّياطينِ ۖ وَكانَ الشَّيطانُ لِرَبِّهِ كَفورًا
blank: ʾinnal-mubadhdhirīn kānū ʾikhwān sh-shayāṭīn w-kān sh-shayṭān l-rabbihī kafūr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the wasteful are brothers of the devils, and ever has Satan been to his Lord ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِمّا تُعرِضَنَّ عَنهُمُ ابتِغاءَ رَحمَةٍ مِن رَبِّكَ تَرجوها فَقُل لَهُم قَولًا مَيسورًا
blank: w-ʾimmā tuʿriḍann ʿanhum btighāʾ raḥmat m rabbik tarjūhā f-qul lahum qawlam-maysūr
english_saheeh_international: And if you must turn away from the needy awaiting mercy from your Lord which you expect, then speak to them a gentle word

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَجعَل يَدَكَ مَغلولَةً إِلىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلا تَبسُطها كُلَّ البَسطِ فَتَقعُدَ مَلومًا مَحسورًا
blank: w-lā tajʿal yadak maghlūlat ʾilā ʿunuqik w-lā tabsuṭhā kullal-basṭ f-taqʿud malūmam-maḥsūr
english_saheeh_international: And do not make your hand as chained to your neck or extend it completely and thereby become blamed and insolvent

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَبسُطُ الرِّزقَ لِمَن يَشاءُ وَيَقدِرُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ بِعِبادِهِ خَبيرًا بَصيرًا
blank: ʾinn rabbak yabsuṭ r-rizq l-m yashāʾ w-yaqdir ʾinnahū kān b-ʿibādihī khabīr baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts it. Indeed He is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَقتُلوا أَولادَكُم خَشيَةَ إِملاقٍ ۖ نَحنُ نَرزُقُهُم وَإِيّاكُم ۚ إِنَّ قَتلَهُم كانَ خِطئًا كَبيرًا
blank: w-lā taqtulū ʾawlādakum khashyat ʾimlāq naḥn narzuquhum w-ʾiyyākum ʾinn qatlahum kān khiṭʾ kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for them and for you. Indeed, their killing is ever a great sin

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَقرَبُوا الزِّنا ۖ إِنَّهُ كانَ فاحِشَةً وَساءَ سَبيلًا
blank: w-lā taqrabū z-zinā ʾinnahū kān fāḥishat w-sāʾ sabīl
english_saheeh_international: And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse. Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَقتُلُوا النَّفسَ الَّتي حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ إِلّا بِالحَقِّ ۗ وَمَن قُتِلَ مَظلومًا فَقَد جَعَلنا لِوَلِيِّهِ سُلطانًا فَلا يُسرِف فِي القَتلِ ۖ إِنَّهُ كانَ مَنصورًا
blank: w-lā taqtulū n-nafs llatī ḥarram llāh ʾillā b-l-ḥaqq w-m qutil maẓlūm f-qad jaʿalnā l-waliyyihī sulṭān f-lā yusrif fīl-qatl ʾinnahū kān manṣūr
english_saheeh_international: And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right. And whoever is killed unjustly - We have given his heir authority, but let him not exceed limits in the matter of taking life. Indeed, he has been supported by the law

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَقرَبوا مالَ اليَتيمِ إِلّا بِالَّتي هِيَ أَحسَنُ حَتّىٰ يَبلُغَ أَشُدَّهُ ۚ وَأَوفوا بِالعَهدِ ۖ إِنَّ العَهدَ كانَ مَسئولًا
blank: w-lā taqrabū mālal-yatīm ʾillā b-llatī hiy ʾaḥsan ḥattā yablugh ʾashuddahū w-ʾawfū b-l-ʿahd ʾinnal-ʿahd kān masʾūl
english_saheeh_international: And do not approach the property of an orphan, except in the way that is best, until he reaches maturity. And fulfill every commitment. Indeed, the commitment is ever that about which one will be questioned

arabic_uthmani: وَأَوفُوا الكَيلَ إِذا كِلتُم وَزِنوا بِالقِسطاسِ المُستَقيمِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ خَيرٌ وَأَحسَنُ تَأويلًا
blank: w-ʾawfūl-kayl ʾidhā kiltum w-zinū b-l-qisṭāsil-mustaqīm dhālik khayr w-ʾaḥsan taʾwīl
english_saheeh_international: And give full measure when you measure, and weigh with an even balance. That is the best way and best in result

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَقفُ ما لَيسَ لَكَ بِهِ عِلمٌ ۚ إِنَّ السَّمعَ وَالبَصَرَ وَالفُؤادَ كُلُّ أُولٰئِكَ كانَ عَنهُ مَسئولًا
blank: w-lā taqf mā lays lak bihī ʿilm ʾinn s-samʿ w-l-baṣar w-l-fuʾād kull ʾulāʾik kān ʿanh masʾūl
english_saheeh_international: And do not pursue that of which you have no knowledge. Indeed, the hearing, the sight and the heart - about all those one will be questioned

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَمشِ فِي الأَرضِ مَرَحًا ۖ إِنَّكَ لَن تَخرِقَ الأَرضَ وَلَن تَبلُغَ الجِبالَ طولًا
blank: w-lā tamsh fīl-ʾarḍ maraḥ ʾinnak l takhriqal-ʾarḍ w-l tablughal-jibāl ṭūl
english_saheeh_international: And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth apart, and you will never reach the mountains in height

arabic_uthmani: كُلُّ ذٰلِكَ كانَ سَيِّئُهُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكروهًا
blank: kull dhālik kān sayyiʾuhū ʿind rabbik makrūh
english_saheeh_international: All that - its evil is ever, in the sight of your Lord, detested

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ مِمّا أَوحىٰ إِلَيكَ رَبُّكَ مِنَ الحِكمَةِ ۗ وَلا تَجعَل مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلٰهًا آخَرَ فَتُلقىٰ في جَهَنَّمَ مَلومًا مَدحورًا
blank: dhālik mimmā ʾawḥā ʾilayk rabbuk minal-ḥikmat w-lā tajʿal maʿ llāh ʾilāh ʾākhar f-tulqā fī jahannam malūmam-madḥūr
english_saheeh_international: That is from what your Lord has revealed to you, O Muhammad, of wisdom. And, O mankind, do not make as equal with Allah another deity, lest you be thrown into Hell, blamed and banished

arabic_uthmani: أَفَأَصفاكُم رَبُّكُم بِالبَنينَ وَاتَّخَذَ مِنَ المَلائِكَةِ إِناثًا ۚ إِنَّكُم لَتَقولونَ قَولًا عَظيمًا
blank: ʾ-f-ʾaṣfākum rabbukum b-l-banīn w-ttakhadh minal-malāʾikat ʾināth ʾinnakum l-taqūlūn qawl ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Then, has your Lord chosen you for having sons and taken from among the angels daughters? Indeed, you say a grave saying

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد صَرَّفنا في هٰذَا القُرآنِ لِيَذَّكَّروا وَما يَزيدُهُم إِلّا نُفورًا
blank: w-l-qad ṣarrafnā fī hādhāl-qurʾān l-yadhdhakkarū w-mā yazīduhum ʾillā nufūr
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly diversified the contents in this Qur'an that mankind may be reminded, but it does not increase the disbelievers except in aversion

arabic_uthmani: قُل لَو كانَ مَعَهُ آلِهَةٌ كَما يَقولونَ إِذًا لَابتَغَوا إِلىٰ ذِي العَرشِ سَبيلًا
blank: qul law kān maʿahū ʾālihat k-mā yaqūlūn ʾidh l-btaghaw ʾilā dhīl-ʿarsh sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "If there had been with Him other gods, as they say, then they each would have sought to the Owner of the Throne a way

arabic_uthmani: سُبحانَهُ وَتَعالىٰ عَمّا يَقولونَ عُلُوًّا كَبيرًا
blank: subḥānahū w-taʿālā ʿammā yaqūlūn ʿuluww kabīr
english_saheeh_international: Exalted is He and high above what they say by great sublimity

arabic_uthmani: تُسَبِّحُ لَهُ السَّماواتُ السَّبعُ وَالأَرضُ وَمَن فيهِنَّ ۚ وَإِن مِن شَيءٍ إِلّا يُسَبِّحُ بِحَمدِهِ وَلٰكِن لا تَفقَهونَ تَسبيحَهُم ۗ إِنَّهُ كانَ حَليمًا غَفورًا
blank: tusabbiḥ lah s-samāwāt s-sabʿ w-l-ʾarḍ w-m fīhinn w-ʾ m shayʾ ʾillā yusabbiḥ b-ḥamdihī w-lāk lā tafqahūn tasbīḥahum ʾinnahū kān ḥalīm ghafūr
english_saheeh_international: The seven heavens and the earth and whatever is in them exalt Him. And there is not a thing except that it exalts Allah by His praise, but you do not understand their way of exalting. Indeed, He is ever Forbearing and Forgiving

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قَرَأتَ القُرآنَ جَعَلنا بَينَكَ وَبَينَ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ حِجابًا مَستورًا
blank: w-ʾidhā qaraʾtal-qurʾān jaʿalnā baynak w-baynalladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat ḥijābam-mastūr
english_saheeh_international: And when you recite the Qur'an, We put between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter a concealed partition

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلنا عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفقَهوهُ وَفي آذانِهِم وَقرًا ۚ وَإِذا ذَكَرتَ رَبَّكَ فِي القُرآنِ وَحدَهُ وَلَّوا عَلىٰ أَدبارِهِم نُفورًا
blank: w-jaʿalnā ʿalā qulūbihim ʾakinnat ʾ yafqahūh w-fī ʾādhānihim waqr w-ʾidhā dhakart rabbak fīl-qurʾān waḥdahū wallaw ʿalā ʾadbārihim nufūr
english_saheeh_international: And We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And when you mention your Lord alone in the Qur'an, they turn back in aversion

arabic_uthmani: نَحنُ أَعلَمُ بِما يَستَمِعونَ بِهِ إِذ يَستَمِعونَ إِلَيكَ وَإِذ هُم نَجوىٰ إِذ يَقولُ الظّالِمونَ إِن تَتَّبِعونَ إِلّا رَجُلًا مَسحورًا
blank: naḥn ʾaʿlam b-mā yastamiʿūn bihī ʾidh yastamiʿūn ʾilayk w-ʾidh hum najwā ʾidh yaqūlū ẓ-ẓālimūn ʾ tattabiʿūn ʾillā rajulam-masḥūr-
english_saheeh_international: We are most knowing of how they listen to it when they listen to you and of when they are in private conversation, when the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic

arabic_uthmani: انظُر كَيفَ ضَرَبوا لَكَ الأَمثالَ فَضَلّوا فَلا يَستَطيعونَ سَبيلًا
blank: unẓur kayf ḍarabū lakal-ʾamthāl f-ḍallū f-lā yastaṭīʿūn sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot find a way

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا أَإِذا كُنّا عِظامًا وَرُفاتًا أَإِنّا لَمَبعوثونَ خَلقًا جَديدًا
blank: w-qālū ʾ-ʾidhā kunnā ʿiẓām w-rufāt ʾ-ʾinnā l-mabʿūthūn khalq jadīd
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we truly be resurrected as a new creation

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قُل كونوا حِجارَةً أَو حَديدًا
blank: qul kūnū ḥijārat ʾaw ḥadīd
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Be you stones or iron

arabic_uthmani: أَو خَلقًا مِمّا يَكبُرُ في صُدورِكُم ۚ فَسَيَقولونَ مَن يُعيدُنا ۖ قُلِ الَّذي فَطَرَكُم أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۚ فَسَيُنغِضونَ إِلَيكَ رُءوسَهُم وَيَقولونَ مَتىٰ هُوَ ۖ قُل عَسىٰ أَن يَكونَ قَريبًا
blank: ʾaw khalqam-mimmā yakbur fī ṣudūrikum f-s-yaqūlūn m yuʿīdunā qulilladhī faṭarakum ʾawwal marrat f-s-yunghiḍūn ʾilayk ruʾūsahum w-yaqūlūn matā huw qul ʿasā ʾ yakūn qarīb
english_saheeh_international: Or any creation of that which is great within your breasts." And they will say, "Who will restore us?" Say, "He who brought you forth the first time." Then they will nod their heads toward you and say, "When is that?" Say, "Perhaps it will be soon

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَدعوكُم فَتَستَجيبونَ بِحَمدِهِ وَتَظُنّونَ إِن لَبِثتُم إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: yawm yadʿūkum f-tastajībūn b-ḥamdihī w-taẓunnūn ʾ labithtum ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: On the Day He will call you and you will respond with praise of Him and think that you had not remained in the world except for a little

arabic_uthmani: وَقُل لِعِبادي يَقولُوا الَّتي هِيَ أَحسَنُ ۚ إِنَّ الشَّيطانَ يَنزَغُ بَينَهُم ۚ إِنَّ الشَّيطانَ كانَ لِلإِنسانِ عَدُوًّا مُبينًا
blank: w-qul l-ʿibādī yaqūlū llatī hiy ʾaḥsan ʾinn sh-shayṭān yanzagh baynahum ʾinn sh-shayṭān kān l-l-ʾinsān ʿaduwwam-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And tell My servants to say that which is best. Indeed, Satan induces dissension among them. Indeed Satan is ever, to mankind, a clear enemy

arabic_uthmani: رَبُّكُم أَعلَمُ بِكُم ۖ إِن يَشَأ يَرحَمكُم أَو إِن يَشَأ يُعَذِّبكُم ۚ وَما أَرسَلناكَ عَلَيهِم وَكيلًا
blank: rabbukum ʾaʿlam bikum ʾ yashaʾ yarḥamkum ʾaw ʾ yashaʾ yuʿadhdhibkum w-mā ʾarsalnāk ʿalayhim wakīl
english_saheeh_international: Your Lord is most knowing of you. If He wills, He will have mercy upon you; or if He wills, He will punish you. And We have not sent you, O Muhammad, over them as a manager

arabic_uthmani: وَرَبُّكَ أَعلَمُ بِمَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۗ وَلَقَد فَضَّلنا بَعضَ النَّبِيّينَ عَلىٰ بَعضٍ ۖ وَآتَينا داوودَ زَبورًا
blank: w-rabbuk ʾaʿlam b-m fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-l-qad faḍḍalnā baʿḍ n-nabiyyīn ʿalā baʿḍ w-ʾātaynā dāwūd zabūr
english_saheeh_international: And your Lord is most knowing of whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And We have made some of the prophets exceed others in various ways, and to David We gave the book of Psalms

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ ادعُوا الَّذينَ زَعَمتُم مِن دونِهِ فَلا يَملِكونَ كَشفَ الضُّرِّ عَنكُم وَلا تَحويلًا
blank: qul dʿūlladhīn zaʿamtum m dūnihī f-lā yamlikūn kashf ḍ-ḍurr ʿankum w-lā taḥwīl
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Invoke those you have claimed as gods besides Him, for they do not possess the ability for removal of adversity from you or for its transfer to someone else

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ يَدعونَ يَبتَغونَ إِلىٰ رَبِّهِمُ الوَسيلَةَ أَيُّهُم أَقرَبُ وَيَرجونَ رَحمَتَهُ وَيَخافونَ عَذابَهُ ۚ إِنَّ عَذابَ رَبِّكَ كانَ مَحذورًا
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn yadʿūn yabtaghūn ʾilā rabbihimul-wasīlat ʾayyuhum ʾaqrab w-yarjūn raḥmatahū w-yakhāfūn ʿadhābahū ʾinn ʿadhāb rabbik kān maḥdhūr
english_saheeh_international: Those whom they invoke seek means of access to their Lord, striving as to which of them would be nearest, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is ever feared

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن مِن قَريَةٍ إِلّا نَحنُ مُهلِكوها قَبلَ يَومِ القِيامَةِ أَو مُعَذِّبوها عَذابًا شَديدًا ۚ كانَ ذٰلِكَ فِي الكِتابِ مَسطورًا
blank: w-ʾ m qaryat ʾillā naḥn muhlikūhā qabl yawmil-qiyāmat ʾaw muʿadhdhibūhā ʿadhāb shadīd kān dhālik fīl-kitāb masṭūr
english_saheeh_international: And there is no city but that We will destroy it before the Day of Resurrection or punish it with a severe punishment. That has ever been in the Register inscribed

arabic_uthmani: وَما مَنَعَنا أَن نُرسِلَ بِالآياتِ إِلّا أَن كَذَّبَ بِهَا الأَوَّلونَ ۚ وَآتَينا ثَمودَ النّاقَةَ مُبصِرَةً فَظَلَموا بِها ۚ وَما نُرسِلُ بِالآياتِ إِلّا تَخويفًا
blank: w-mā manaʿanā ʾ nursil b-l-ʾāyāt ʾillā ʾ kadhdhab bihāl-ʾawwalūn w-ʾātaynā thamūd n-nāqat mubṣirat f-ẓalamū bihā w-mā nursil b-l-ʾāyāt ʾillā takhwīf
english_saheeh_international: And nothing has prevented Us from sending signs except that the former peoples denied them. And We gave Thamud the she-camel as a visible sign, but they wronged her. And We send not the signs except as a warning

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قُلنا لَكَ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ أَحاطَ بِالنّاسِ ۚ وَما جَعَلنَا الرُّؤيَا الَّتي أَرَيناكَ إِلّا فِتنَةً لِلنّاسِ وَالشَّجَرَةَ المَلعونَةَ فِي القُرآنِ ۚ وَنُخَوِّفُهُم فَما يَزيدُهُم إِلّا طُغيانًا كَبيرًا
blank: w-ʾidh qulnā lak ʾinn rabbak ʾaḥāṭ b-n-nās w-mā jaʿalnā r-ruʾyā llatī ʾaraynāk ʾillā fitnat l-n-nās w-sh-shajaratal-malʿūnat fīl-qurʾān w-nukhawwifuhum f-mā yazīduhum ʾillā ṭughyān kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And remember, O Muhammad, when We told you, "Indeed, your Lord has encompassed the people." And We did not make the sight which We showed you except as a trial for the people, as was the accursed tree mentioned in the Qur'an. And We threaten them, but it increases them not except in great transgression

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قُلنا لِلمَلائِكَةِ اسجُدوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدوا إِلّا إِبليسَ قالَ أَأَسجُدُ لِمَن خَلَقتَ طينًا
blank: w-ʾidh qulnā l-l-malāʾikat sjudū l-ʾādam f-sajadū ʾillā ʾiblīs qāl ʾ-ʾasjud l-m khalaqt ṭīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention when We said to the angles, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He said, "Should I prostrate to one You created from clay

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَرَأَيتَكَ هٰذَا الَّذي كَرَّمتَ عَلَيَّ لَئِن أَخَّرتَنِ إِلىٰ يَومِ القِيامَةِ لَأَحتَنِكَنَّ ذُرِّيَّتَهُ إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: qāl ʾ-raʾaytak hādhālladhī karramt ʿalayy l-ʾ ʾakhkhartan ʾilā yawmil-qiyāmat l-ʾaḥtanikann dhurriyyatahū ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: Iblees said, "Do You see this one whom You have honored above me? If You delay me until the Day of Resurrection, I will surely destroy his descendants, except for a few

arabic_uthmani: قالَ اذهَب فَمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنهُم فَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ جَزاؤُكُم جَزاءً مَوفورًا
blank: qāl dhhab f-m tabiʿak minhum f-ʾinn jahannam jazāʾukum jazāʾam-mawfūr
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Go, for whoever of them follows you, indeed Hell will be the recompense of you - an ample recompense

arabic_uthmani: وَاستَفزِز مَنِ استَطَعتَ مِنهُم بِصَوتِكَ وَأَجلِب عَلَيهِم بِخَيلِكَ وَرَجِلِكَ وَشارِكهُم فِي الأَموالِ وَالأَولادِ وَعِدهُم ۚ وَما يَعِدُهُمُ الشَّيطانُ إِلّا غُرورًا
blank: w-stafziz man staṭaʿt minhum b-ṣawtik w-ʾajlib ʿalayhim b-khaylik w-rajilik w-shārikhum fīl-ʾamwāl w-l-ʾawlād w-ʿidhum w-mā yaʿiduhum sh-shayṭān ʾillā ghurūr
english_saheeh_international: And incite to senselessness whoever you can among them with your voice and assault them with your horses and foot soldiers and become a partner in their wealth and their children and promise them." But Satan does not promise them except delusion

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ عِبادي لَيسَ لَكَ عَلَيهِم سُلطانٌ ۚ وَكَفىٰ بِرَبِّكَ وَكيلًا
blank: ʾinn ʿibādī lays lak ʿalayhim sulṭān w-kafā b-rabbik wakīl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, over My believing servants there is for you no authority. And sufficient is your Lord as Disposer of affairs

arabic_uthmani: رَبُّكُمُ الَّذي يُزجي لَكُمُ الفُلكَ فِي البَحرِ لِتَبتَغوا مِن فَضلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ بِكُم رَحيمًا
blank: rabbukumulladhī yuzjī lakumul-fulk fīl-baḥr l-tabtaghū m faḍlihī ʾinnahū kān bikum raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: It is your Lord who drives the ship for you through the sea that you may seek of His bounty. Indeed, He is ever, to you, Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا مَسَّكُمُ الضُّرُّ فِي البَحرِ ضَلَّ مَن تَدعونَ إِلّا إِيّاهُ ۖ فَلَمّا نَجّاكُم إِلَى البَرِّ أَعرَضتُم ۚ وَكانَ الإِنسانُ كَفورًا
blank: w-ʾidhā massakum ḍ-ḍurr fīl-baḥr ḍall m tadʿūn ʾillā ʾiyyāh f-lammā najjākum ʾilāl-barr ʾaʿraḍtum w-kānal-ʾinsān kafūr
english_saheeh_international: And when adversity touches you at sea, lost are all those you invoke except for Him. But when He delivers you to the land, you turn away from Him. And ever is man ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: أَفَأَمِنتُم أَن يَخسِفَ بِكُم جانِبَ البَرِّ أَو يُرسِلَ عَلَيكُم حاصِبًا ثُمَّ لا تَجِدوا لَكُم وَكيلًا
blank: ʾ-f-ʾamintum ʾ yakhsif bikum jānibal-barr ʾaw yursil ʿalaykum ḥāṣib thumm lā tajidū lakum wakīl
english_saheeh_international: Then do you feel secure that instead He will not cause a part of the land to swallow you or send against you a storm of stones? Then you would not find for yourselves an advocate

arabic_uthmani: أَم أَمِنتُم أَن يُعيدَكُم فيهِ تارَةً أُخرىٰ فَيُرسِلَ عَلَيكُم قاصِفًا مِنَ الرّيحِ فَيُغرِقَكُم بِما كَفَرتُم ۙ ثُمَّ لا تَجِدوا لَكُم عَلَينا بِهِ تَبيعًا
blank: ʾam ʾamintum ʾ yuʿīdakum fīh tārat ʾukhrā f-yursil ʿalaykum qāṣifam-min r-rīḥ f-yughriqakum b-mā kafartum thumm lā tajidū lakum ʿalaynā bihī tabīʿ
english_saheeh_international: Or do you feel secure that He will not send you back into the sea another time and send upon you a hurricane of wind and drown you for what you denied? Then you would not find for yourselves against Us an avenger

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَقَد كَرَّمنا بَني آدَمَ وَحَمَلناهُم فِي البَرِّ وَالبَحرِ وَرَزَقناهُم مِنَ الطَّيِّباتِ وَفَضَّلناهُم عَلىٰ كَثيرٍ مِمَّن خَلَقنا تَفضيلًا
blank: w-l-qad karramnā banī ʾādam w-ḥamalnāhum fīl-barr w-l-baḥr w-razaqnāhum min ṭ-ṭayyibāt w-faḍḍalnāhum ʿalā kathīr mimm khalaqnā tafḍīl
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam and carried them on the land and sea and provided for them of the good things and preferred them over much of what We have created, with definite preference

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ نَدعو كُلَّ أُناسٍ بِإِمامِهِم ۖ فَمَن أوتِيَ كِتابَهُ بِيَمينِهِ فَأُولٰئِكَ يَقرَءونَ كِتابَهُم وَلا يُظلَمونَ فَتيلًا
blank: yawm nadʿū kull ʾunās b-ʾimāmihim f-m ʾūtiy kitābahū b-yamīnihī f-ʾulāʾik yaqraʾūn kitābahum w-lā yuẓlamūn fatīl
english_saheeh_international: Mention, O Muhammad, the Day We will call forth every people with their record of deeds. Then whoever is given his record in his right hand - those will read their records, and injustice will not be done to them, even as much as a thread inside the date seed

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن كانَ في هٰذِهِ أَعمىٰ فَهُوَ فِي الآخِرَةِ أَعمىٰ وَأَضَلُّ سَبيلًا
blank: w-m kān fī hādhihī ʾaʿmā f-huw fīl-ʾākhirat ʾaʿmā w-ʾaḍall sabīl
english_saheeh_international: And whoever is blind in this life will be blind in the Hereafter and more astray in way

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كادوا لَيَفتِنونَكَ عَنِ الَّذي أَوحَينا إِلَيكَ لِتَفتَرِيَ عَلَينا غَيرَهُ ۖ وَإِذًا لَاتَّخَذوكَ خَليلًا
blank: w-ʾ kādū l-yaftinūnak ʿanilladhī ʾawḥaynā ʾilayk l-taftariy ʿalaynā ghayrahū w-ʾidh l-ttakhadhūk khalīl
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, they were about to tempt you away from that which We revealed to you in order to make you invent about Us something else; and then they would have taken you as a friend

arabic_uthmani: وَلَولا أَن ثَبَّتناكَ لَقَد كِدتَ تَركَنُ إِلَيهِم شَيئًا قَليلًا
blank: w-law-lā ʾ thabbatnāk l-qad kidt tarkan ʾilayhim shayʾ qalīl
english_saheeh_international: And if We had not strengthened you, you would have almost inclined to them a little

arabic_uthmani: إِذًا لَأَذَقناكَ ضِعفَ الحَياةِ وَضِعفَ المَماتِ ثُمَّ لا تَجِدُ لَكَ عَلَينا نَصيرًا
blank: ʾidh l-ʾadhaqnāk ḍiʿfal-ḥayāt w-ḍiʿfal-mamāt thumm lā tajid lak ʿalaynā naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Then if you had, We would have made you taste double punishment in life and double after death. Then you would not find for yourself against Us a helper

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كادوا لَيَستَفِزّونَكَ مِنَ الأَرضِ لِيُخرِجوكَ مِنها ۖ وَإِذًا لا يَلبَثونَ خِلافَكَ إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: w-ʾ kādū l-yastafizzūnak minal-ʾarḍ l-yukhrijūk minhā w-ʾidh lā yalbathūn khilāfak ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, they were about to drive you from the land to evict you therefrom. And then when they do, they will not remain there after you, except for a little

arabic_uthmani: سُنَّةَ مَن قَد أَرسَلنا قَبلَكَ مِن رُسُلِنا ۖ وَلا تَجِدُ لِسُنَّتِنا تَحويلًا
blank: sunnat m qad ʾarsalnā qablak m rusulinā w-lā tajid l-sunnatinā taḥwīl
english_saheeh_international: That is Our established way for those We had sent before you of Our messengers; and you will not find in Our way any alteration

arabic_uthmani: أَقِمِ الصَّلاةَ لِدُلوكِ الشَّمسِ إِلىٰ غَسَقِ اللَّيلِ وَقُرآنَ الفَجرِ ۖ إِنَّ قُرآنَ الفَجرِ كانَ مَشهودًا
blank: ʾaqim ṣ-ṣalāt l-dulūk sh-shams ʾilā ghasaqil-layl w-qurʾānal-fajr ʾinn qurʾānal-fajr kān mashhūd
english_saheeh_international: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun from its meridian until the darkness of the night and also the Qur'an of dawn. Indeed, the recitation of dawn is ever witnessed

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ اللَّيلِ فَتَهَجَّد بِهِ نافِلَةً لَكَ عَسىٰ أَن يَبعَثَكَ رَبُّكَ مَقامًا مَحمودًا
blank: w-minal-layl f-tahajjad bihī nāfilat lak ʿasā ʾ yabʿathak rabbuk maqāmam-maḥmūd
english_saheeh_international: And from part of the night, pray with it as additional worship for you; it is expected that your Lord will resurrect you to a praised station

arabic_uthmani: وَقُل رَبِّ أَدخِلني مُدخَلَ صِدقٍ وَأَخرِجني مُخرَجَ صِدقٍ وَاجعَل لي مِن لَدُنكَ سُلطانًا نَصيرًا
blank: w-qul rabb ʾadkhilnī mudkhal ṣidq w-ʾakhrijnī mukhraj ṣidq w-jʿal lī m ladunk sulṭān naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And say, "My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and to exit a sound exit and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority

arabic_uthmani: وَقُل جاءَ الحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ الباطِلُ ۚ إِنَّ الباطِلَ كانَ زَهوقًا
blank: w-qul jāʾal-ḥaqq w-zahaqal-bāṭil ʾinnal-bāṭil kān zahūq
english_saheeh_international: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, by nature, ever bound to depart

arabic_uthmani: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ القُرآنِ ما هُوَ شِفاءٌ وَرَحمَةٌ لِلمُؤمِنينَ ۙ وَلا يَزيدُ الظّالِمينَ إِلّا خَسارًا
blank: w-nunazzil minal-qurʾān mā huw shifāʾ w-raḥmat l-l-muʾminīn w-lā yazīd ẓ-ẓālimīn ʾillā khasār
english_saheeh_international: And We send down of the Qur'an that which is healing and mercy for the believers, but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا أَنعَمنا عَلَى الإِنسانِ أَعرَضَ وَنَأىٰ بِجانِبِهِ ۖ وَإِذا مَسَّهُ الشَّرُّ كانَ يَئوسًا
blank: w-ʾidhā ʾanʿamnā ʿalāl-ʾinsān ʾaʿraḍ w-naʾā b-jānibihī w-ʾidhā massah sh-sharr kān yaʾūs
english_saheeh_international: And when We bestow favor upon the disbeliever, he turns away and distances himself; and when evil touches him, he is ever despairing

arabic_uthmani: قُل كُلٌّ يَعمَلُ عَلىٰ شاكِلَتِهِ فَرَبُّكُم أَعلَمُ بِمَن هُوَ أَهدىٰ سَبيلًا
blank: qul kull yaʿmal ʿalā shākilatihī f-rabbukum ʾaʿlam b-m huw ʾahdā sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Each works according to his manner, but your Lord is most knowing of who is best guided in way

arabic_uthmani: وَيَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ الرّوحِ ۖ قُلِ الرّوحُ مِن أَمرِ رَبّي وَما أوتيتُم مِنَ العِلمِ إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: w-yasʾalūnak ʾan r-rūḥ qul r-rūḥ m ʾamr rabbī w-mā ʾūtītum minal-ʿilm ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: And they ask you, O Muhammad, about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord. And mankind have not been given of knowledge except a little

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن شِئنا لَنَذهَبَنَّ بِالَّذي أَوحَينا إِلَيكَ ثُمَّ لا تَجِدُ لَكَ بِهِ عَلَينا وَكيلًا
blank: w-l-ʾ shiʾnā l-nadhhabann b-lladhī ʾawḥaynā ʾilayk thumm lā tajid lak bihī ʿalaynā wakīl
english_saheeh_international: And if We willed, We could surely do away with that which We revealed to you. Then you would not find for yourself concerning it an advocate against Us

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا رَحمَةً مِن رَبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّ فَضلَهُ كانَ عَلَيكَ كَبيرًا
blank: ʾillā raḥmatam-m rabbik ʾinn faḍlahū kān ʿalayk kabīr
english_saheeh_international: Except We have left it with you as a mercy from your Lord. Indeed, His favor upon you has ever been great

arabic_uthmani: قُل لَئِنِ اجتَمَعَتِ الإِنسُ وَالجِنُّ عَلىٰ أَن يَأتوا بِمِثلِ هٰذَا القُرآنِ لا يَأتونَ بِمِثلِهِ وَلَو كانَ بَعضُهُم لِبَعضٍ ظَهيرًا
blank: qul l-ʾin jtamaʿatil-ʾins w-l-jinn ʿalā ʾ yaʾtū b-mithl hādhāl-qurʾān lā yaʾtūn b-mithlihī w-law kān baʿḍuhum l-baʿḍ ẓahīr
english_saheeh_international: Say, "If mankind and the jinn gathered in order to produce the like of this Qur'an, they could not produce the like of it, even if they were to each other assistants

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد صَرَّفنا لِلنّاسِ في هٰذَا القُرآنِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ فَأَبىٰ أَكثَرُ النّاسِ إِلّا كُفورًا
blank: w-l-qad ṣarrafnā l-n-nās fī hādhāl-qurʾān m kull mathal f-ʾabā ʾakthar n-nās ʾillā kufūr
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly diversified for the people in this Qur'an from every kind of example, but most of the people refused anything except disbelief

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لَن نُؤمِنَ لَكَ حَتّىٰ تَفجُرَ لَنا مِنَ الأَرضِ يَنبوعًا
blank: w-qālū l nuʾmin lak ḥattā tafjur lanā minal-ʾarḍ yanbūʿ
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "We will not believe you until you break open for us from the ground a spring

arabic_uthmani: أَو تَكونَ لَكَ جَنَّةٌ مِن نَخيلٍ وَعِنَبٍ فَتُفَجِّرَ الأَنهارَ خِلالَها تَفجيرًا
blank: ʾaw takūn lak jannat m nakhīl w-ʿinab f-tufajjiral-ʾanhār khilālahā tafjīr
english_saheeh_international: Or until you have a garden of palm tress and grapes and make rivers gush forth within them in force and abundance

arabic_uthmani: أَو تُسقِطَ السَّماءَ كَما زَعَمتَ عَلَينا كِسَفًا أَو تَأتِيَ بِاللَّهِ وَالمَلائِكَةِ قَبيلًا
blank: ʾaw tusqiṭ s-samāʾ k-mā zaʿamt ʿalaynā kisaf ʾaw taʾtiy b-llāh w-l-malāʾikat qabīl
english_saheeh_international: Or you make the heaven fall upon us in fragments as you have claimed or you bring Allah and the angels before us

arabic_uthmani: أَو يَكونَ لَكَ بَيتٌ مِن زُخرُفٍ أَو تَرقىٰ فِي السَّماءِ وَلَن نُؤمِنَ لِرُقِيِّكَ حَتّىٰ تُنَزِّلَ عَلَينا كِتابًا نَقرَؤُهُ ۗ قُل سُبحانَ رَبّي هَل كُنتُ إِلّا بَشَرًا رَسولًا
blank: ʾaw yakūn lak bayt m zukhruf ʾaw tarqā fī s-samāʾ w-l nuʾmin l-ruqiyyik ḥattā tunazzil ʿalaynā kitāb naqraʾuhū qul subḥān rabbī hal kunt ʾillā bashar rasūl
english_saheeh_international: Or you have a house of gold or you ascend into the sky. And even then, we will not believe in your ascension until you bring down to us a book we may read." Say, "Exalted is my Lord! Was I ever but a human messenger

arabic_uthmani: وَما مَنَعَ النّاسَ أَن يُؤمِنوا إِذ جاءَهُمُ الهُدىٰ إِلّا أَن قالوا أَبَعَثَ اللَّهُ بَشَرًا رَسولًا
blank: w-mā manaʿ n-nās ʾ yuʾminū ʾidh jāʾahumul-hudā ʾillā ʾ qālū ʾ-baʿath llāh bashar rasūl
english_saheeh_international: And what prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them except that they said, "Has Allah sent a human messenger

arabic_uthmani: قُل لَو كانَ فِي الأَرضِ مَلائِكَةٌ يَمشونَ مُطمَئِنّينَ لَنَزَّلنا عَلَيهِم مِنَ السَّماءِ مَلَكًا رَسولًا
blank: qul law kān fīl-ʾarḍ malāʾikat yamshūn muṭmaʾinnīn l-nazzalnā ʿalayhim min s-samāʾ malak rasūl
english_saheeh_international: Say, "If there were upon the earth angels walking securely, We would have sent down to them from the heaven an angel as a messenger

arabic_uthmani: قُل كَفىٰ بِاللَّهِ شَهيدًا بَيني وَبَينَكُم ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ بِعِبادِهِ خَبيرًا بَصيرًا
blank: qul kafā b-llāh shahīd baynī w-baynakum ʾinnahū kān b-ʿibādihī khabīr baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you. Indeed he is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن يَهدِ اللَّهُ فَهُوَ المُهتَدِ ۖ وَمَن يُضلِل فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُم أَولِياءَ مِن دونِهِ ۖ وَنَحشُرُهُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ عَلىٰ وُجوهِهِم عُميًا وَبُكمًا وَصُمًّا ۖ مَأواهُم جَهَنَّمُ ۖ كُلَّما خَبَت زِدناهُم سَعيرًا
blank: w-m yahdī llāh f-huwal-muhtad w-m yuḍlil f-l tajid lahum ʾawliyāʾ m dūnihī w-naḥshuruhum yawmal-qiyāmat ʿalā wujūhihim ʿumy w-bukm w-ṣummam-maʾwāhum jahannam kullamā khabat zidnāhum saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: And whoever Allah guides - he is the rightly guided; and whoever He sends astray - you will never find for them protectors besides Him, and We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection fallen on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf. Their refuge is Hell; every time it subsides We increase them in blazing fire

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ جَزاؤُهُم بِأَنَّهُم كَفَروا بِآياتِنا وَقالوا أَإِذا كُنّا عِظامًا وَرُفاتًا أَإِنّا لَمَبعوثونَ خَلقًا جَديدًا
blank: dhālik jazāʾuhum b-ʾannahum kafarū b-ʾāyātinā w-qālū ʾ-ʾidhā kunnā ʿiẓām w-rufāt ʾ-ʾinnā l-mabʿūthūn khalq jadīd
english_saheeh_international: That is their recompense because they disbelieved in Our verses and said, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we truly be resurrected in a new creation

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَوَلَم يَرَوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ قادِرٌ عَلىٰ أَن يَخلُقَ مِثلَهُم وَجَعَلَ لَهُم أَجَلًا لا رَيبَ فيهِ فَأَبَى الظّالِمونَ إِلّا كُفورًا
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾann llāhalladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ qādir ʿalā ʾ yakhluq mithlahum w-jaʿal lahum ʾajal lā rayb fīh f-ʾabā ẓ-ẓālimūn ʾillā kufūr
english_saheeh_international: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth, is the one Able to create the likes of them? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse anything except disbelief

arabic_uthmani: قُل لَو أَنتُم تَملِكونَ خَزائِنَ رَحمَةِ رَبّي إِذًا لَأَمسَكتُم خَشيَةَ الإِنفاقِ ۚ وَكانَ الإِنسانُ قَتورًا
blank: qul law ʾantum tamlikūn khazāʾin raḥmat rabbī ʾidh l-ʾamsaktum khashyatal-ʾinfāq w-kānal-ʾinsān qatūr
english_saheeh_international: Say to them, "If you possessed the depositories of the mercy of my Lord, then you would withhold out of fear of spending." And ever has man been stingy

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَينا موسىٰ تِسعَ آياتٍ بَيِّناتٍ ۖ فَاسأَل بَني إِسرائيلَ إِذ جاءَهُم فَقالَ لَهُ فِرعَونُ إِنّي لَأَظُنُّكَ يا موسىٰ مَسحورًا
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā mūsā tisʿ ʾāyāt bayyināt f-sʾal banī ʾisrāʾīl ʾidh jāʾahum f-qāl lahū firʿawn ʾinnī l-ʾaẓunnuk yā-mūsā masḥūr
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly given Moses nine evident signs, so ask the Children of Israel about when he came to them and Pharaoh said to him, "Indeed I think, O Moses, that you are affected by magic

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لَقَد عَلِمتَ ما أَنزَلَ هٰؤُلاءِ إِلّا رَبُّ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ بَصائِرَ وَإِنّي لَأَظُنُّكَ يا فِرعَونُ مَثبورًا
blank: qāl l-qad ʿalimt mā ʾanzal hāʾulāʾ ʾillā rabb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ baṣāʾir w-ʾinnī l-ʾaẓunnuk yā-firʿawn mathbūr
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "You have already known that none has sent down these signs except the Lord of the heavens and the earth as evidence, and indeed I think, O Pharaoh, that you are destroyed

arabic_uthmani: فَأَرادَ أَن يَستَفِزَّهُم مِنَ الأَرضِ فَأَغرَقناهُ وَمَن مَعَهُ جَميعًا
blank: f-ʾarād ʾ yastafizzahum minal-ʾarḍ f-ʾaghraqnāh w-mam-maʿahū jamīʿ
english_saheeh_international: So he intended to drive them from the land, but We drowned him and those with him all together

arabic_uthmani: وَقُلنا مِن بَعدِهِ لِبَني إِسرائيلَ اسكُنُوا الأَرضَ فَإِذا جاءَ وَعدُ الآخِرَةِ جِئنا بِكُم لَفيفًا
blank: w-qulnā m baʿdihī l-banī ʾisrāʾīl skunūl-ʾarḍ f-ʾidhā jāʾ waʿdul-ʾākhirat jiʾnā bikum lafīf
english_saheeh_international: And We said after Pharaoh to the Children of Israel, "Dwell in the land, and when there comes the promise of the Hereafter, We will bring you forth in one gathering

arabic_uthmani: وَبِالحَقِّ أَنزَلناهُ وَبِالحَقِّ نَزَلَ ۗ وَما أَرسَلناكَ إِلّا مُبَشِّرًا وَنَذيرًا
blank: w-b-l-ḥaqq ʾanzalnāh w-b-l-ḥaqq nazal w-mā ʾarsalnāk ʾillā mubashshir w-nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: And with the truth We have sent the Qur'an down, and with the truth it has descended. And We have not sent you, O Muhammad, except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner

arabic_uthmani: وَقُرآنًا فَرَقناهُ لِتَقرَأَهُ عَلَى النّاسِ عَلىٰ مُكثٍ وَنَزَّلناهُ تَنزيلًا
blank: w-qurʾān faraqnāh l-taqraʾahū ʿalā n-nās ʿalā mukth w-nazzalnāh tanzīl
english_saheeh_international: And it is a Qur'an which We have separated by intervals that you might recite it to the people over a prolonged period. And We have sent it down progressively

arabic_uthmani: قُل آمِنوا بِهِ أَو لا تُؤمِنوا ۚ إِنَّ الَّذينَ أوتُوا العِلمَ مِن قَبلِهِ إِذا يُتلىٰ عَلَيهِم يَخِرّونَ لِلأَذقانِ سُجَّدًا
blank: qul ʾāminū bihī ʾaw lā tuʾminū ʾinnalladhīn ʾūtūl-ʿilm m qablihī ʾidhā yutlā ʿalayhim yakhirrūn l-l-ʾadhqān sujjad
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Believe in it or do not believe. Indeed, those who were given knowledge before it - when it is recited to them, they fall upon their faces in prostration

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ سُبحانَ رَبِّنا إِن كانَ وَعدُ رَبِّنا لَمَفعولًا
blank: w-yaqūlūn subḥān rabbinā ʾ kān waʿd rabbinā l-mafʿūl
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, the promise of our Lord has been fulfilled

arabic_uthmani: وَيَخِرّونَ لِلأَذقانِ يَبكونَ وَيَزيدُهُم خُشوعًا ۩
blank: w-yakhirrūn l-l-ʾadhqān yabkūn w-yazīduhum khushūʿ
english_saheeh_international: And they fall upon their faces weeping, and the Qur'an increases them in humble submission

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ ادعُوا اللَّهَ أَوِ ادعُوا الرَّحمٰنَ ۖ أَيًّا ما تَدعوا فَلَهُ الأَسماءُ الحُسنىٰ ۚ وَلا تَجهَر بِصَلاتِكَ وَلا تُخافِت بِها وَابتَغِ بَينَ ذٰلِكَ سَبيلًا
blank: qul dʿū llāh ʾaw dʿū r-raḥmān ʾayyam-mā tadʿū f-lahul-ʾasmāʾul-ḥusnā w-lā tajhar b-ṣalātik w-lā tukhāfit bihā w-btagh bayn dhālik sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Call upon Allah or call upon the Most Merciful. Whichever name you call - to Him belong the best names." And do not recite too loudly in your prayer or too quietly but seek between that an intermediate way

arabic_uthmani: وَقُلِ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذي لَم يَتَّخِذ وَلَدًا وَلَم يَكُن لَهُ شَريكٌ فِي المُلكِ وَلَم يَكُن لَهُ وَلِيٌّ مِنَ الذُّلِّ ۖ وَكَبِّرهُ تَكبيرًا
blank: w-qulil-ḥamd l-llāhilladhī lam yattakhidh walad w-lam yak lahū sharīk fīl-mulk w-lam yak lahū waliyy min dh-dhull w-kabbirh takbīr
english_saheeh_international: And say, "Praise to Allah, who has not taken a son and has had no partner in His dominion and has no need of a protector out of weakness; and glorify Him with great glorification

arabic_uthmani: الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذي أَنزَلَ عَلىٰ عَبدِهِ الكِتابَ وَلَم يَجعَل لَهُ عِوَجًا ۜ
blank: al-ḥamd l-llāhilladhī ʾanzal ʿalā ʿabdihil-kitāb w-lam yajʿal lahū ʿiwajā
english_saheeh_international: All praise is due to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance

arabic_uthmani: قَيِّمًا لِيُنذِرَ بَأسًا شَديدًا مِن لَدُنهُ وَيُبَشِّرَ المُؤمِنينَ الَّذينَ يَعمَلونَ الصّالِحاتِ أَنَّ لَهُم أَجرًا حَسَنًا
blank: qayyim l-yundhir baʾs shadīdam-m ladunh w-yubashshiral-muʾminīnalladhīn yaʿmalūn ṣ-ṣāliḥāt ʾann lahum ʾajr ḥasan
english_saheeh_international: He has made it straight, to warn of severe punishment from Him and to give good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a good reward

arabic_uthmani: ماكِثينَ فيهِ أَبَدًا
blank: mākithīn fīh ʾabad
english_saheeh_international: In which they will remain forever

arabic_uthmani: وَيُنذِرَ الَّذينَ قالُوا اتَّخَذَ اللَّهُ وَلَدًا
blank: w-yundhiralladhīn qālū ttakhadh llāh walad
english_saheeh_international: And to warn those who say, "Allah has taken a son

arabic_uthmani: ما لَهُم بِهِ مِن عِلمٍ وَلا لِآبائِهِم ۚ كَبُرَت كَلِمَةً تَخرُجُ مِن أَفواهِهِم ۚ إِن يَقولونَ إِلّا كَذِبًا
blank: mā lahum bihī m ʿilm w-lā l-ʾābāʾihim kaburat kalimat takhruj m ʾafwāhihim ʾ yaqūlūn ʾillā kadhib
english_saheeh_international: They have no knowledge of it, nor had their fathers. Grave is the word that comes out of their mouths; they speak not except a lie

arabic_uthmani: فَلَعَلَّكَ باخِعٌ نَفسَكَ عَلىٰ آثارِهِم إِن لَم يُؤمِنوا بِهٰذَا الحَديثِ أَسَفًا
blank: f-laʿallak bākhiʿ nafsak ʿalā ʾāthārihim ʾ lam yuʾminū b-hādhāl-ḥadīth ʾasaf
english_saheeh_international: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, O Muhammad, if they do not believe in this message, and out of sorrow

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا جَعَلنا ما عَلَى الأَرضِ زينَةً لَها لِنَبلُوَهُم أَيُّهُم أَحسَنُ عَمَلًا
blank: ʾinnā jaʿalnā mā ʿalāl-ʾarḍ zīnat lahā l-nabluwahum ʾayyuhum ʾaḥsan ʿamal
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have made that which is on the earth adornment for it that We may test them as to which of them is best in deed

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّا لَجاعِلونَ ما عَلَيها صَعيدًا جُرُزًا
blank: w-ʾinnā l-jāʿilūn mā ʿalayhā ṣaʿīd juruz
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, We will make that which is upon it into a barren ground

arabic_uthmani: أَم حَسِبتَ أَنَّ أَصحابَ الكَهفِ وَالرَّقيمِ كانوا مِن آياتِنا عَجَبًا
blank: ʾam ḥasibt ʾann ʾaṣḥābal-kahf w-r-raqīm kānū m ʾāyātinā ʿajab
english_saheeh_international: Or have you thought that the companions of the cave and the inscription were, among Our signs, a wonder

arabic_uthmani: إِذ أَوَى الفِتيَةُ إِلَى الكَهفِ فَقالوا رَبَّنا آتِنا مِن لَدُنكَ رَحمَةً وَهَيِّئ لَنا مِن أَمرِنا رَشَدًا
blank: ʾidh ʾawāl-fityat ʾilāl-kahf f-qālū rabbanā ʾātinā m ladunk raḥmat w-hayyiʾ lanā m ʾamrinā rashad
english_saheeh_international: Mention when the youths retreated to the cave and said, "Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance

arabic_uthmani: فَضَرَبنا عَلىٰ آذانِهِم فِي الكَهفِ سِنينَ عَدَدًا
blank: f-ḍarabnā ʿalā ʾādhānihim fīl-kahf sinīn ʿadad
english_saheeh_international: So We cast a cover of sleep over their ears within the cave for a number of years

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ بَعَثناهُم لِنَعلَمَ أَيُّ الحِزبَينِ أَحصىٰ لِما لَبِثوا أَمَدًا
blank: thumm baʿathnāhum l-naʿlam ʾayyul-ḥizbayn ʾaḥṣā l-mā labithū ʾamad
english_saheeh_international: Then We awakened them that We might show which of the two factions was most precise in calculating what extent they had remained in time

arabic_uthmani: نَحنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيكَ نَبَأَهُم بِالحَقِّ ۚ إِنَّهُم فِتيَةٌ آمَنوا بِرَبِّهِم وَزِدناهُم هُدًى
blank: naḥn naquṣṣ ʿalayk nabaʾahum b-l-ḥaqq ʾinnahum fityat ʾāmanū b-rabbihim w-zidnāhum hud
english_saheeh_international: It is We who relate to you, O Muhammad, their story in truth. Indeed, they were youths who believed in their Lord, and We increased them in guidance

arabic_uthmani: وَرَبَطنا عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم إِذ قاموا فَقالوا رَبُّنا رَبُّ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ لَن نَدعُوَ مِن دونِهِ إِلٰهًا ۖ لَقَد قُلنا إِذًا شَطَطًا
blank: w-rabaṭnā ʿalā qulūbihim ʾidh qāmū f-qālū rabbunā rabb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ l nadʿuw m dūnihī ʾilāh l-qad qulnā ʾidh shaṭaṭ
english_saheeh_international: And We made firm their hearts when they stood up and said, "Our Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth. Never will we invoke besides Him any deity. We would have certainly spoken, then, an excessive transgression

arabic_uthmani: هٰؤُلاءِ قَومُنَا اتَّخَذوا مِن دونِهِ آلِهَةً ۖ لَولا يَأتونَ عَلَيهِم بِسُلطانٍ بَيِّنٍ ۖ فَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا
blank: hāʾulāʾ qawmunā ttakhadhū m dūnihī ʾālihat law-lā yaʾtūn ʿalayhim b-sulṭān bayyin f-m ʾaẓlam mimman ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib
english_saheeh_international: These, our people, have taken besides Him deities. Why do they not bring for worship of them a clear authority? And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذِ اعتَزَلتُموهُم وَما يَعبُدونَ إِلَّا اللَّهَ فَأووا إِلَى الكَهفِ يَنشُر لَكُم رَبُّكُم مِن رَحمَتِهِ وَيُهَيِّئ لَكُم مِن أَمرِكُم مِرفَقًا
blank: w-ʾidh ʿtazaltumūhum w-mā yaʿbudūn ʾillā llāh f-ʾwū ʾilāl-kahf yanshur lakum rabbukum m raḥmatihī w-yuhayyiʾ lakum m ʾamrikum mirfaq
english_saheeh_international: The youths said to one another, "And when you have withdrawn from them and that which they worship other than Allah, retreat to the cave. Your Lord will spread out for you of His mercy and will prepare for you from your affair facility

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَتَرَى الشَّمسَ إِذا طَلَعَت تَزاوَرُ عَن كَهفِهِم ذاتَ اليَمينِ وَإِذا غَرَبَت تَقرِضُهُم ذاتَ الشِّمالِ وَهُم في فَجوَةٍ مِنهُ ۚ ذٰلِكَ مِن آياتِ اللَّهِ ۗ مَن يَهدِ اللَّهُ فَهُوَ المُهتَدِ ۖ وَمَن يُضلِل فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُ وَلِيًّا مُرشِدًا
blank: w-tarā sh-shams ʾidhā ṭalaʿat tazāwar ʿ kahfihim dhātal-yamīn w-ʾidhā gharabat taqriḍuhum dhāt sh-shimāl w-hum fī fajwat minh dhālik m ʾāyāt llāh m yahd llāh f-huwal-muhtad w-m yuḍlil f-l tajid lahū waliyyam-murshid
english_saheeh_international: And had you been present, you would see the sun when it rose, inclining away from their cave on the right, and when it set, passing away from them on the left, while they were laying within an open space thereof. That was from the signs of Allah. He whom Allah guides is the rightly guided, but he whom He leaves astray - never will you find for him a protecting guide

arabic_uthmani: وَتَحسَبُهُم أَيقاظًا وَهُم رُقودٌ ۚ وَنُقَلِّبُهُم ذاتَ اليَمينِ وَذاتَ الشِّمالِ ۖ وَكَلبُهُم باسِطٌ ذِراعَيهِ بِالوَصيدِ ۚ لَوِ اطَّلَعتَ عَلَيهِم لَوَلَّيتَ مِنهُم فِرارًا وَلَمُلِئتَ مِنهُم رُعبًا
blank: w-taḥsabuhum ʾayqāẓ w-hum ruqūd w-nuqallibuhum dhātal-yamīn w-dhāt sh-shimāl w-kalbuhum bāsiṭ dhirāʿayh b-l-waṣīd law ṭṭalaʿt ʿalayhim l-wallayt minhum firār w-l-muliʾt minhum ruʿb
english_saheeh_international: And you would think them awake, while they were asleep. And We turned them to the right and to the left, while their dog stretched his forelegs at the entrance. If you had looked at them, you would have turned from them in flight and been filled by them with terror

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ بَعَثناهُم لِيَتَساءَلوا بَينَهُم ۚ قالَ قائِلٌ مِنهُم كَم لَبِثتُم ۖ قالوا لَبِثنا يَومًا أَو بَعضَ يَومٍ ۚ قالوا رَبُّكُم أَعلَمُ بِما لَبِثتُم فَابعَثوا أَحَدَكُم بِوَرِقِكُم هٰذِهِ إِلَى المَدينَةِ فَليَنظُر أَيُّها أَزكىٰ طَعامًا فَليَأتِكُم بِرِزقٍ مِنهُ وَليَتَلَطَّف وَلا يُشعِرَنَّ بِكُم أَحَدًا
blank: w-k-dhālik baʿathnāhum l-yatasāʾalū baynahum qāl qāʾil minhum kam labithtum qālū labithnā yawm ʾaw baʿḍ yawm qālū rabbukum ʾaʿlam b-mā labithtum f-bʿathū ʾaḥadakum b-wariqikum hādhihī ʾilāl-madīnat f-l-yanẓur ʾayyuhā ʾazkā ṭaʿām f-l-yaʾtikum b-rizq minh w-l-yatalaṭṭaf w-lā yushʿirann bikum ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: And similarly, We awakened them that they might question one another. Said a speaker from among them, "How long have you remained here?" They said, "We have remained a day or part of a day." They said, "Your Lord is most knowing of how long you remained. So send one of you with this silver coin of yours to the city and let him look to which is the best of food and bring you provision from it and let him be cautious. And let no one be aware of you

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُم إِن يَظهَروا عَلَيكُم يَرجُموكُم أَو يُعيدوكُم في مِلَّتِهِم وَلَن تُفلِحوا إِذًا أَبَدًا
blank: ʾinnahum ʾ yaẓharū ʿalaykum yarjumūkum ʾaw yuʿīdūkum fī millatihim w-l tufliḥū ʾidh ʾabad
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, if they come to know of you, they will stone you or return you to their religion. And never would you succeed, then - ever

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ أَعثَرنا عَلَيهِم لِيَعلَموا أَنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَأَنَّ السّاعَةَ لا رَيبَ فيها إِذ يَتَنازَعونَ بَينَهُم أَمرَهُم ۖ فَقالُوا ابنوا عَلَيهِم بُنيانًا ۖ رَبُّهُم أَعلَمُ بِهِم ۚ قالَ الَّذينَ غَلَبوا عَلىٰ أَمرِهِم لَنَتَّخِذَنَّ عَلَيهِم مَسجِدًا
blank: w-k-dhālik ʾaʿtharnā ʿalayhim l-yaʿlamū ʾann waʿd llāh ḥaqq w-ʾann s-sāʿat lā rayb fīhā ʾidh yatanāzaʿūn baynahum ʾamrahum f-qālū bnū ʿalayhim bunyān rabbuhum ʾaʿlam bihim qālalladhīn ghalabū ʿalā ʾamrihim l-nattakhidhann ʿalayhim masjid
english_saheeh_international: And similarly, We caused them to be found that they who found them would know that the promise of Allah is truth and that of the Hour there is no doubt. That was when they disputed among themselves about their affair and then said, "Construct over them a structure. Their Lord is most knowing about them." Said those who prevailed in the matter, "We will surely take for ourselves over them a masjid

arabic_uthmani: سَيَقولونَ ثَلاثَةٌ رابِعُهُم كَلبُهُم وَيَقولونَ خَمسَةٌ سادِسُهُم كَلبُهُم رَجمًا بِالغَيبِ ۖ وَيَقولونَ سَبعَةٌ وَثامِنُهُم كَلبُهُم ۚ قُل رَبّي أَعلَمُ بِعِدَّتِهِم ما يَعلَمُهُم إِلّا قَليلٌ ۗ فَلا تُمارِ فيهِم إِلّا مِراءً ظاهِرًا وَلا تَستَفتِ فيهِم مِنهُم أَحَدًا
blank: s-yaqūlūn thalāthat rābiʿuhum kalbuhum w-yaqūlūn khamsat sādisuhum kalbuhum rajm b-l-ghayb w-yaqūlūn sabʿat w-thāminuhum kalbuhum qul rabbī ʾaʿlam b-ʿiddatihim mā yaʿlamuhum ʾillā qalīl f-lā tumār fīhim ʾillā mirāʾ ẓāhir w-lā tastaft fīhim minhum ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: They will say there were three, the fourth of them being their dog; and they will say there were five, the sixth of them being their dog - guessing at the unseen; and they will say there were seven, and the eighth of them was their dog. Say, O Muhammad, "My Lord is most knowing of their number. None knows them except a few.
