english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior

arabic_uthmani: وَأَلقِ ما في يَمينِكَ تَلقَف ما صَنَعوا ۖ إِنَّما صَنَعوا كَيدُ ساحِرٍ ۖ وَلا يُفلِحُ السّاحِرُ حَيثُ أَتىٰ
blank: w-ʾalq mā fī yamīnik talqaf mā ṣanaʿū ʾinnamā ṣanaʿū kayd sāḥir w-lā yufliḥ s-sāḥir ḥayth ʾatā
english_saheeh_international: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is

arabic_uthmani: فَأُلقِيَ السَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدًا قالوا آمَنّا بِرَبِّ هارونَ وَموسىٰ
blank: f-ʾulqiy s-saḥarat sujjad qālū ʾāmannā b-rabb hārūn w-mūsā
english_saheeh_international: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses

arabic_uthmani: قالَ آمَنتُم لَهُ قَبلَ أَن آذَنَ لَكُم ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكَبيرُكُمُ الَّذي عَلَّمَكُمُ السِّحرَ ۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيدِيَكُم وَأَرجُلَكُم مِن خِلافٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُم في جُذوعِ النَّخلِ وَلَتَعلَمُنَّ أَيُّنا أَشَدُّ عَذابًا وَأَبقىٰ
blank: qāl ʾāmantum lahū qabl ʾ ʾādhan lakum ʾinnahū l-kabīrukumulladhī ʿallamakum s-siḥr f-l-ʾuqaṭṭiʿann ʾaydiyakum w-ʾarjulakum m khilāf w-l-ʾuṣallibannakum fī judhūʿ n-nakhl w-l-taʿlamunn ʾayyunā ʾashadd ʿadhāb w-ʾabqā
english_saheeh_international: Pharaoh said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in giving punishment and more enduring

arabic_uthmani: قالوا لَن نُؤثِرَكَ عَلىٰ ما جاءَنا مِنَ البَيِّناتِ وَالَّذي فَطَرَنا ۖ فَاقضِ ما أَنتَ قاضٍ ۖ إِنَّما تَقضي هٰذِهِ الحَياةَ الدُّنيا
blank: qālū l nuʾthirak ʿalā mā jāʾanā minal-bayyināt w-lladhī faṭaranā f-qḍ mā ʾant qāḍ ʾinnamā taqḍī hādhihil-ḥayāt d-dunyā
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and over He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا آمَنّا بِرَبِّنا لِيَغفِرَ لَنا خَطايانا وَما أَكرَهتَنا عَلَيهِ مِنَ السِّحرِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ خَيرٌ وَأَبقىٰ
blank: ʾinnā ʾāmannā b-rabbinā l-yaghfir lanā khaṭāyānā w-mā ʾakrahtanā ʿalayh min s-siḥr w-llāh khayr w-ʾabqā
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us to do of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ مَن يَأتِ رَبَّهُ مُجرِمًا فَإِنَّ لَهُ جَهَنَّمَ لا يَموتُ فيها وَلا يَحيىٰ
blank: ʾinnahū m yaʾt rabbahū mujrim f-ʾinn lahū jahannam lā yamūt fīhā w-lā yaḥyā
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن يَأتِهِ مُؤمِنًا قَد عَمِلَ الصّالِحاتِ فَأُولٰئِكَ لَهُمُ الدَّرَجاتُ العُلىٰ
blank: w-m yaʾtihī muʾmin qad ʿamil ṣ-ṣāliḥāt f-ʾulāʾik lahum d-darajātul-ʿulā
english_saheeh_international: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees in position

arabic_uthmani: جَنّاتُ عَدنٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها ۚ وَذٰلِكَ جَزاءُ مَن تَزَكّىٰ
blank: jannāt ʿadn tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā w-dhālik jazāʾ m tazakkā
english_saheeh_international: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَوحَينا إِلىٰ موسىٰ أَن أَسرِ بِعِبادي فَاضرِب لَهُم طَريقًا فِي البَحرِ يَبَسًا لا تَخافُ دَرَكًا وَلا تَخشىٰ
blank: w-l-qad ʾawḥaynā ʾilā mūsā ʾ ʾasr b-ʿibādī f-ḍrib lahum ṭarīq fīl-baḥr yabas lā takhāf darak w-lā takhshā
english_saheeh_international: And We had inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants and strike for them a dry path through the sea; you will not fear being overtaken by Pharaoh nor be afraid of drowning

arabic_uthmani: فَأَتبَعَهُم فِرعَونُ بِجُنودِهِ فَغَشِيَهُم مِنَ اليَمِّ ما غَشِيَهُم
blank: f-ʾatbaʿahum firʿawn b-junūdihī f-ghashiyahum minal-yamm mā ghashiyahum
english_saheeh_international: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them

arabic_uthmani: وَأَضَلَّ فِرعَونُ قَومَهُ وَما هَدىٰ
blank: w-ʾaḍall firʿawn qawmahū w-mā hadā
english_saheeh_international: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide them

arabic_uthmani: يا بَني إِسرائيلَ قَد أَنجَيناكُم مِن عَدُوِّكُم وَواعَدناكُم جانِبَ الطّورِ الأَيمَنَ وَنَزَّلنا عَلَيكُمُ المَنَّ وَالسَّلوىٰ
blank: yā-banī ʾisrāʾīl qad ʾanjaynākum m ʿaduwwikum w-wāʿadnākum jānib ṭ-ṭūril-ʾayman w-nazzalnā ʿalaykumul-mann w-s-salwā
english_saheeh_international: O Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you at the right side of the mount, and We sent down to you manna and quails

arabic_uthmani: كُلوا مِن طَيِّباتِ ما رَزَقناكُم وَلا تَطغَوا فيهِ فَيَحِلَّ عَلَيكُم غَضَبي ۖ وَمَن يَحلِل عَلَيهِ غَضَبي فَقَد هَوىٰ
blank: kulū m ṭayyibātimā razaqnākum w-lā taṭghaw fīh f-yaḥill ʿalaykum ghaḍabī w-m yaḥlil ʿalayh ghaḍabī f-qad hawā
english_saheeh_international: Saying, "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you and do not transgress or oppress others therein, lest My anger should descend upon you. And he upon whom My anger descends has certainly fallen

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّي لَغَفّارٌ لِمَن تابَ وَآمَنَ وَعَمِلَ صالِحًا ثُمَّ اهتَدىٰ
blank: w-ʾinnī l-ghaffār l-m tāb w-ʾāman w-ʿamil ṣāliḥ thumm htadā
english_saheeh_international: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَما أَعجَلَكَ عَن قَومِكَ يا موسىٰ
blank: w-mā ʾaʿjalak ʿ qawmik yā-mūsā
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses

arabic_uthmani: قالَ هُم أُولاءِ عَلىٰ أَثَري وَعَجِلتُ إِلَيكَ رَبِّ لِتَرضىٰ
blank: qāl hum ʾulāʾ ʿalā ʾatharī w-ʿajilt ʾilāyk rabb l-tarḍā
english_saheeh_international: He said, "They are close upon my tracks, and I hastened to You, my Lord, that You be pleased

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَإِنّا قَد فَتَنّا قَومَكَ مِن بَعدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ السّامِرِيُّ
blank: qāl f-ʾinnā qad fatannā qawmak m baʿdik w-ʾaḍallahum s-sāmiriyy
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you departed, and the Samiri has led them astray

arabic_uthmani: فَرَجَعَ موسىٰ إِلىٰ قَومِهِ غَضبانَ أَسِفًا ۚ قالَ يا قَومِ أَلَم يَعِدكُم رَبُّكُم وَعدًا حَسَنًا ۚ أَفَطالَ عَلَيكُمُ العَهدُ أَم أَرَدتُم أَن يَحِلَّ عَلَيكُم غَضَبٌ مِن رَبِّكُم فَأَخلَفتُم مَوعِدي
blank: f-rajaʿ mūsā ʾilā qawmihī ghaḍbān ʾasif qāl yā-qawm ʾ-lam yaʿidkum rabbukum waʿd ḥasan ʾ-f-ṭāl ʿalaykumul-ʿahd ʾam ʾaradtum ʾ yaḥill ʿalaykum ghaḍab m rabbikum f-ʾakhlaftum mawʿidī
english_saheeh_international: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, "O my people, did your Lord not make you a good promise? Then, was the time of its fulfillment too long for you, or did you wish that wrath from your Lord descend upon you, so you broke your promise of obedience to me

arabic_uthmani: قالوا ما أَخلَفنا مَوعِدَكَ بِمَلكِنا وَلٰكِنّا حُمِّلنا أَوزارًا مِن زينَةِ القَومِ فَقَذَفناها فَكَذٰلِكَ أَلقَى السّامِرِيُّ
blank: qālū mā ʾakhlafnā mawʿidak b-malkinā w-lākinnā ḥummilnā ʾawzāram-m zīnatil-qawm f-qadhafnāhā f-k-dhālik ʾalqā s-sāmiriyy
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We did not break our promise to you by our will, but we were made to carry burdens from the ornaments of the people of Pharaoh, so we threw them into the fire, and thus did the Samiri throw

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخرَجَ لَهُم عِجلًا جَسَدًا لَهُ خُوارٌ فَقالوا هٰذا إِلٰهُكُم وَإِلٰهُ موسىٰ فَنَسِيَ
blank: f-ʾakhraj lahum ʿijl jasad lahū khuwār f-qālū hādhā ʾilāhukum w-ʾilāh mūsā f-nasiy
english_saheeh_international: And he extracted for them the statue of a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot

arabic_uthmani: أَفَلا يَرَونَ أَلّا يَرجِعُ إِلَيهِم قَولًا وَلا يَملِكُ لَهُم ضَرًّا وَلا نَفعًا
blank: ʾ-f-lā yarawn ʾallā yarjiʿ ʾilayhim qawl w-lā yamlik lahum ḍarr w-lā nafʿ
english_saheeh_international: Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد قالَ لَهُم هارونُ مِن قَبلُ يا قَومِ إِنَّما فُتِنتُم بِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ الرَّحمٰنُ فَاتَّبِعوني وَأَطيعوا أَمري
blank: w-l-qad qāl lahum hārūn m qabl yā-qawm ʾinnamā futintum bihī w-ʾinn rabbakum r-raḥmān f-ttabiʿūnī w-ʾaṭīʿū ʾamrī
english_saheeh_international: And Aaron had already told them before the return of Moses, "O my people, you are only being tested by it, and indeed, your Lord is the Most Merciful, so follow me and obey my order

arabic_uthmani: قالوا لَن نَبرَحَ عَلَيهِ عاكِفينَ حَتّىٰ يَرجِعَ إِلَينا موسىٰ
blank: qālū l nabraḥ ʿalayh ʿākifīn ḥattā yarjiʿ ʾilaynā mūsā
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا هارونُ ما مَنَعَكَ إِذ رَأَيتَهُم ضَلّوا
blank: qāl yā-hārūn mā manaʿak ʾidh raʾaytahum ḍallū
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray

arabic_uthmani: أَلّا تَتَّبِعَنِ ۖ أَفَعَصَيتَ أَمري
blank: ʾallā tattabiʿan ʾ-f-ʿaṣayt ʾamrī
english_saheeh_international: From following me? Then have you disobeyed my order

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يَا ابنَ أُمَّ لا تَأخُذ بِلِحيَتي وَلا بِرَأسي ۖ إِنّي خَشيتُ أَن تَقولَ فَرَّقتَ بَينَ بَني إِسرائيلَ وَلَم تَرقُب قَولي
blank: qāl y-bn-ʾumm lā taʾkhudh b-liḥyatī w-lā b-raʾsī ʾinnī khashīt ʾ taqūl farraqt bayn banī ʾisrāʾīl w-lam tarqub qawlī
english_saheeh_international: Aaron said, "O son of my mother, do not seize me by my beard or by my head. Indeed, I feared that you would say, 'You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not observe or await my word

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَما خَطبُكَ يا سامِرِيُّ
blank: qāl f-mā khaṭbuk yā-sāmiriyy
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "And what is your case, O Samiri

arabic_uthmani: قالَ بَصُرتُ بِما لَم يَبصُروا بِهِ فَقَبَضتُ قَبضَةً مِن أَثَرِ الرَّسولِ فَنَبَذتُها وَكَذٰلِكَ سَوَّلَت لي نَفسي
blank: qāl baṣurt b-mā lam yabṣurū bihī f-qabaḍt qabḍatam-m ʾathar r-rasūl f-nabadhtuhā w-k-dhālik sawwalat lī nafsī
english_saheeh_international: He said, "I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful of dust from the track of the messenger and threw it, and thus did my soul entice me

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَاذهَب فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِي الحَياةِ أَن تَقولَ لا مِساسَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوعِدًا لَن تُخلَفَهُ ۖ وَانظُر إِلىٰ إِلٰهِكَ الَّذي ظَلتَ عَلَيهِ عاكِفًا ۖ لَنُحَرِّقَنَّهُ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُ فِي اليَمِّ نَسفًا
blank: qāl f-dhhab f-ʾinn lak fīl-ḥayāt ʾ taqūl lā misās w-ʾinn lak mawʿid l tukhlafahū w-nẓur ʾilā ʾilāhikalladhī ẓalt ʿalayh ʿākif l-nuḥarriqannahū thumm l-nansifannahū fīl-yamm nasf
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "Then go. And indeed, it is decreed for you in this life to say, 'No contact.' And indeed, you have an appointment in the Hereafter you will not fail to keep. And look at your 'god' to which you remained devoted. We will surely burn it and blow it into the sea with a blast

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما إِلٰهُكُمُ اللَّهُ الَّذي لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَيءٍ عِلمًا
blank: ʾinnamā ʾilāhukum llāhulladhī lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw wasiʿ kull shayʾ ʿilm
english_saheeh_international: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيكَ مِن أَنباءِ ما قَد سَبَقَ ۚ وَقَد آتَيناكَ مِن لَدُنّا ذِكرًا
blank: k-dhālik naquṣṣ ʿalayk m ʾanbāʾ mā qad sabaq w-qad ʾātaynāk m ladunnā dhikr
english_saheeh_international: Thus, O Muhammad, We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: مَن أَعرَضَ عَنهُ فَإِنَّهُ يَحمِلُ يَومَ القِيامَةِ وِزرًا
blank: m ʾaʿraḍ ʿanh f-ʾinnahū yaḥmil yawmal-qiyāmat wizr
english_saheeh_international: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden

arabic_uthmani: خالِدينَ فيهِ ۖ وَساءَ لَهُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ حِملًا
blank: khālidīn fīh w-sāʾ lahum yawmal-qiyāmat ḥiml
english_saheeh_international: Abiding eternally therein, and evil it is for them on the Day of Resurrection as a load

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصّورِ ۚ وَنَحشُرُ المُجرِمينَ يَومَئِذٍ زُرقًا
blank: yawm yunfakh fī ṣ-ṣūr w-naḥshurul-mujrimīn yawmaʾidh zurq
english_saheeh_international: The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed

arabic_uthmani: يَتَخافَتونَ بَينَهُم إِن لَبِثتُم إِلّا عَشرًا
blank: yatakhāfatūn baynahum ʾ labithtum ʾillā ʿashr
english_saheeh_international: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten days in the world

arabic_uthmani: نَحنُ أَعلَمُ بِما يَقولونَ إِذ يَقولُ أَمثَلُهُم طَريقَةً إِن لَبِثتُم إِلّا يَومًا
blank: naḥn ʾaʿlam b-mā yaqūlūn ʾidh yaqūl ʾamthaluhum ṭarīqat ʾ labithtum ʾillā yawm
english_saheeh_international: We are most knowing of what they say when the best of them in manner will say, "You remained not but one day

arabic_uthmani: وَيَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ الجِبالِ فَقُل يَنسِفُها رَبّي نَسفًا
blank: w-yasʾalūnak ʿanil-jibāl f-qul yansifuhā rabbī nasf
english_saheeh_international: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast

arabic_uthmani: فَيَذَرُها قاعًا صَفصَفًا
blank: f-yadharuhā qāʿ ṣafṣaf
english_saheeh_international: And He will leave the earth a level plain

arabic_uthmani: لا تَرىٰ فيها عِوَجًا وَلا أَمتًا
blank: lā tarā fīhā ʿiwaj w-lā ʾamt
english_saheeh_international: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation

arabic_uthmani: يَومَئِذٍ يَتَّبِعونَ الدّاعِيَ لا عِوَجَ لَهُ ۖ وَخَشَعَتِ الأَصواتُ لِلرَّحمٰنِ فَلا تَسمَعُ إِلّا هَمسًا
blank: yawmaʾidh yattabiʿūn d-dāʿiy lā ʿiwaj lahū w-khashaʿatil-ʾaṣwāt l-r-raḥmān f-lā tasmaʿ ʾillā hams
english_saheeh_international: That Day, everyone will follow the call of the Caller with no deviation therefrom, and all voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful, so you will not hear except a whisper of footsteps

arabic_uthmani: يَومَئِذٍ لا تَنفَعُ الشَّفاعَةُ إِلّا مَن أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحمٰنُ وَرَضِيَ لَهُ قَولًا
blank: yawmaʾidh lā tanfaʿ sh-shafāʿat ʾillā m ʾadhin lah r-raḥmān w-raḍiy lahū qawl
english_saheeh_international: That Day, no intercession will benefit except that of one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word

arabic_uthmani: يَعلَمُ ما بَينَ أَيديهِم وَما خَلفَهُم وَلا يُحيطونَ بِهِ عِلمًا
blank: yaʿlam mā bayn ʾaydīhim w-mā khalfahum w-lā yuḥīṭūn bihī ʿilm
english_saheeh_international: Allah knows what is presently before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَعَنَتِ الوُجوهُ لِلحَيِّ القَيّومِ ۖ وَقَد خابَ مَن حَمَلَ ظُلمًا
blank: w-ʿanatil-wujūh l-l-ḥayyil-qayyūm w-qad khāb m ḥamal ẓulm
english_saheeh_international: And all faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he will have failed who carries injustice

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن يَعمَل مِنَ الصّالِحاتِ وَهُوَ مُؤمِنٌ فَلا يَخافُ ظُلمًا وَلا هَضمًا
blank: w-m yaʿmal min ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-huw muʾmin f-lā yakhāf ẓulm w-lā haḍm
english_saheeh_international: But he who does of righteous deeds while he is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ أَنزَلناهُ قُرآنًا عَرَبِيًّا وَصَرَّفنا فيهِ مِنَ الوَعيدِ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَّقونَ أَو يُحدِثُ لَهُم ذِكرًا
blank: w-k-dhālik ʾanzalnāh qurʾān ʿarabiyy w-ṣarrafnā fīh minal-waʿīd laʿallahum yattaqūn ʾaw yuḥdith lahum dhikr
english_saheeh_international: And thus We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an and have diversified therein the warnings that perhaps they will avoid sin or it would cause them remembrance

arabic_uthmani: فَتَعالَى اللَّهُ المَلِكُ الحَقُّ ۗ وَلا تَعجَل بِالقُرآنِ مِن قَبلِ أَن يُقضىٰ إِلَيكَ وَحيُهُ ۖ وَقُل رَبِّ زِدني عِلمًا
blank: f-taʿālā llāhul-malikul-ḥaqq w-lā taʿjal b-l-qurʾān m qabl ʾ yuqḍā ʾilayk waḥyuhū w-qul rabb zidnī ʿilm
english_saheeh_international: So high above all is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth. And, O Muhammad, do not hasten with recitation of the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you, and say, "My Lord, increase me in knowledge

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد عَهِدنا إِلىٰ آدَمَ مِن قَبلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَم نَجِد لَهُ عَزمًا
blank: w-l-qad ʿahidnā ʾilā ʾādam m qabl f-nasiy w-lam najid lahū ʿazm
english_saheeh_international: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قُلنا لِلمَلائِكَةِ اسجُدوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدوا إِلّا إِبليسَ أَبىٰ
blank: w-ʾidh qulnā l-l-malāʾikat sjudū l-ʾādam f-sajadū ʾillā ʾiblīs ʾabā
english_saheeh_international: And mention when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused

arabic_uthmani: فَقُلنا يا آدَمُ إِنَّ هٰذا عَدُوٌّ لَكَ وَلِزَوجِكَ فَلا يُخرِجَنَّكُما مِنَ الجَنَّةِ فَتَشقىٰ
blank: f-qulnā yā-ʾādam ʾinn hādhā ʿaduww lak w-l-zawjik f-lā yukhrijannakumā minal-jannat f-tashqā
english_saheeh_international: So We said, "O Adam, indeed this is an enemy to you and to your wife. Then let him not remove you from Paradise so you would suffer

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلّا تَجوعَ فيها وَلا تَعرىٰ
blank: ʾinn lak ʾallā tajūʿ fīhā w-lā taʿrā
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, it is promised for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّكَ لا تَظمَأُ فيها وَلا تَضحىٰ
blank: w-ʾannak lā taẓmaʿ fīhā w-lā taḍḥā
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun

arabic_uthmani: فَوَسوَسَ إِلَيهِ الشَّيطانُ قالَ يا آدَمُ هَل أَدُلُّكَ عَلىٰ شَجَرَةِ الخُلدِ وَمُلكٍ لا يَبلىٰ
blank: f-waswas ʾilayh sh-shayṭān qāl yā-ʾādam hal ʾadulluk ʿalā shajaratil-khuld w-mulk lā yablā
english_saheeh_international: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate

arabic_uthmani: فَأَكَلا مِنها فَبَدَت لَهُما سَوآتُهُما وَطَفِقا يَخصِفانِ عَلَيهِما مِن وَرَقِ الجَنَّةِ ۚ وَعَصىٰ آدَمُ رَبَّهُ فَغَوىٰ
blank: f-ʾakalā minhā f-badat lahumā sawʾātuhumā w-ṭafiqā yakhṣifān ʿalayhimā m waraqil-jannat w-ʿaṣā ʾādam rabbahū f-ghawā
english_saheeh_international: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ اجتَباهُ رَبُّهُ فَتابَ عَلَيهِ وَهَدىٰ
blank: thumm jtabāh rabbuhū f-tāb ʿalayh w-hadā
english_saheeh_international: Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided him

arabic_uthmani: قالَ اهبِطا مِنها جَميعًا ۖ بَعضُكُم لِبَعضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ فَإِمّا يَأتِيَنَّكُم مِنّي هُدًى فَمَنِ اتَّبَعَ هُدايَ فَلا يَضِلُّ وَلا يَشقىٰ
blank: qāl hbiṭā minhā jamīʿ baʿḍukum l-baʿḍ ʿaduww f-ʾimmā yaʾtiyannakum minnī hud f-man ttabaʿ hudāy f-lā yaḍill w-lā yashqā
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Descend from Paradise - all, your descendants being enemies to one another. And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray in the world nor suffer in the Hereafter

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَعرَضَ عَن ذِكري فَإِنَّ لَهُ مَعيشَةً ضَنكًا وَنَحشُرُهُ يَومَ القِيامَةِ أَعمىٰ
blank: w-m ʾaʿraḍ ʿ dhikrī f-ʾinn lahū maʿīshat ḍank w-naḥshuruhū yawmal-qiyāmat ʾaʿmā
english_saheeh_international: And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life, and We will gather him on the Day of Resurrection blind

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرتَني أَعمىٰ وَقَد كُنتُ بَصيرًا
blank: qāl rabb l-m ḥashartanī ʾaʿmā w-qad kunt baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was once seeing

arabic_uthmani: قالَ كَذٰلِكَ أَتَتكَ آياتُنا فَنَسيتَها ۖ وَكَذٰلِكَ اليَومَ تُنسىٰ
blank: qāl k-dhālik ʾatatk ʾāyātunā f-nasītahā w-k-dhālikal-yawm tunsā
english_saheeh_international: Allah will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ نَجزي مَن أَسرَفَ وَلَم يُؤمِن بِآياتِ رَبِّهِ ۚ وَلَعَذابُ الآخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبقىٰ
blank: w-k-dhālik najzī m ʾasraf w-lam yuʾm b-ʾāyāt rabbihī w-l-ʿadhābul-ʾākhirat ʾashadd w-ʾabqā
english_saheeh_international: And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring

arabic_uthmani: أَفَلَم يَهدِ لَهُم كَم أَهلَكنا قَبلَهُم مِنَ القُرونِ يَمشونَ في مَساكِنِهِم ۗ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِأُولِي النُّهىٰ
blank: ʾ-f-lam yahd lahum kam ʾahlaknā qablahum minal-qurūn yamshūn fī masākinihim ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-ʾulī n-nuhā
english_saheeh_international: Then, has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence

arabic_uthmani: وَلَولا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَت مِن رَبِّكَ لَكانَ لِزامًا وَأَجَلٌ مُسَمًّى
blank: w-law-lā kalimat sabaqat m rabbik l-kān lizām w-ʾajal musamm
english_saheeh_international: And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, punishment would have been an obligation due immediately, and if not for a specified term decreed

arabic_uthmani: فَاصبِر عَلىٰ ما يَقولونَ وَسَبِّح بِحَمدِ رَبِّكَ قَبلَ طُلوعِ الشَّمسِ وَقَبلَ غُروبِها ۖ وَمِن آناءِ اللَّيلِ فَسَبِّح وَأَطرافَ النَّهارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرضىٰ
blank: f-ṣbir ʿalā mā yaqūlūn w-sabbiḥ b-ḥamd rabbik qabl ṭulūʿ sh-shams w-qabl ghurūbihā w-m ʾānāʾil-layl f-sabbiḥ w-ʾaṭrāf n-nahār laʿallak tarḍā
english_saheeh_international: So be patient over what they say and exalt Allah with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and during periods of the night exalt Him and at the ends of the day, that you may be satisfied

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَمُدَّنَّ عَينَيكَ إِلىٰ ما مَتَّعنا بِهِ أَزواجًا مِنهُم زَهرَةَ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا لِنَفتِنَهُم فيهِ ۚ وَرِزقُ رَبِّكَ خَيرٌ وَأَبقىٰ
blank: w-lā tamuddann ʿaynayk ʾilā mā mattaʿnā bihī ʾazwājam-minhum zahratal-ḥayāt d-dunyā l-naftinahum fīh w-rizq rabbik khayr w-ʾabqā
english_saheeh_international: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to some categories of them, its being but the splendor of worldly life by which We test them. And the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring

arabic_uthmani: وَأمُر أَهلَكَ بِالصَّلاةِ وَاصطَبِر عَلَيها ۖ لا نَسأَلُكَ رِزقًا ۖ نَحنُ نَرزُقُكَ ۗ وَالعاقِبَةُ لِلتَّقوىٰ
blank: w-ʾmur ʾahlak b-ṣ-ṣalāt w-ṣṭabir ʿalayhā lā nasʾaluk rizq naḥn narzuquk w-l-ʿāqibat l-t-taqwā
english_saheeh_international: And enjoin prayer upon your family and people and be steadfast therein. We ask you not for provision; We provide for you, and the best outcome is for those of righteousness

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لَولا يَأتينا بِآيَةٍ مِن رَبِّهِ ۚ أَوَلَم تَأتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ ما فِي الصُّحُفِ الأولىٰ
blank: w-qālū law-lā yaʾtīnā b-ʾāyat m rabbihī ʾ-w-lam taʾtihim bayyinat mā fī ṣ-ṣuḥufil-ʾūlā
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has there not come to them evidence of what was in the former scriptures

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو أَنّا أَهلَكناهُم بِعَذابٍ مِن قَبلِهِ لَقالوا رَبَّنا لَولا أَرسَلتَ إِلَينا رَسولًا فَنَتَّبِعَ آياتِكَ مِن قَبلِ أَن نَذِلَّ وَنَخزىٰ
blank: w-law ʾannā ʾahlaknāhum b-ʿadhāb m qablihī l-qālū rabbanā law-lā ʾarsalt ʾilaynā rasūl f-nattabiʿ ʾāyātik m qabl ʾ nadhill w-nakhzā
english_saheeh_international: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before him, they would have said, "Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses before we were humiliated and disgraced

arabic_uthmani: قُل كُلٌّ مُتَرَبِّصٌ فَتَرَبَّصوا ۖ فَسَتَعلَمونَ مَن أَصحابُ الصِّراطِ السَّوِيِّ وَمَنِ اهتَدىٰ
blank: qul kull mutarabbiṣ f-tarabbaṣū f-s-taʿlamūn m ʾaṣḥāb ṣ-ṣirāṭ s-sawiyy w-man htadā
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Each of us is waiting; so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided

arabic_uthmani: اقتَرَبَ لِلنّاسِ حِسابُهُم وَهُم في غَفلَةٍ مُعرِضونَ
blank: iqtarab l-n-nās ḥisābuhum w-hum fī ghaflat muʿriḍūn
english_saheeh_international: The time of their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away

arabic_uthmani: ما يَأتيهِم مِن ذِكرٍ مِن رَبِّهِم مُحدَثٍ إِلَّا استَمَعوهُ وَهُم يَلعَبونَ
blank: mā yaʾtīhim m dhikr m rabbihim muḥdath ʾillā stamaʿūh w-hum yalʿabūn
english_saheeh_international: No mention comes to them anew from their Lord except that they listen to it while they are at play

arabic_uthmani: لاهِيَةً قُلوبُهُم ۗ وَأَسَرُّوا النَّجوَى الَّذينَ ظَلَموا هَل هٰذا إِلّا بَشَرٌ مِثلُكُم ۖ أَفَتَأتونَ السِّحرَ وَأَنتُم تُبصِرونَ
blank: lāhiyat qulūbuhum w-ʾasarrū n-najwālladhīn ẓalamū hal hādhā ʾillā bashar mithlukum ʾ-f-taʾtūn s-siḥr w-ʾantum tubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: With their hearts distracted. And those who do wrong conceal their private conversation, saying, "Is this Prophet except a human being like you? So would you approach magic while you are aware of it

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبّي يَعلَمُ القَولَ فِي السَّماءِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ وَهُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: qāl rabbī yaʿlamul-qawl fī s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ w-huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: The Prophet said, "My Lord knows whatever is said throughout the heaven and earth, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: بَل قالوا أَضغاثُ أَحلامٍ بَلِ افتَراهُ بَل هُوَ شاعِرٌ فَليَأتِنا بِآيَةٍ كَما أُرسِلَ الأَوَّلونَ
blank: bal qālū ʾaḍghāth ʾaḥlām bal ftarāh bal huw shāʿir f-l-yaʾtinā b-ʾāyat k-mā ʾursilal-ʾawwalūn
english_saheeh_international: But they say, "The revelation is but a mixture of false dreams; rather, he has invented it; rather, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign just as the previous messengers were sent with miracles

arabic_uthmani: ما آمَنَت قَبلَهُم مِن قَريَةٍ أَهلَكناها ۖ أَفَهُم يُؤمِنونَ
blank: mā ʾāmanat qablahum m qaryat ʾahlaknāhā ʾ-f-hum yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Not a single city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلنا قَبلَكَ إِلّا رِجالًا نوحي إِلَيهِم ۖ فَاسأَلوا أَهلَ الذِّكرِ إِن كُنتُم لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnā qablak ʾillā rijāl nūḥī ʾilayhim f-sʾalū ʾahl dh-dhikr ʾ kuntum lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And We sent not before you, O Muhammad, except men to whom We revealed the message, so ask the people of the message if you do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَما جَعَلناهُم جَسَدًا لا يَأكُلونَ الطَّعامَ وَما كانوا خالِدينَ
blank: w-mā jaʿalnāhum jasad lā yaʾkulūn ṭ-ṭaʿām w-mā kānū khālidīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not make the prophets forms not eating food, nor were they immortal on earth

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ صَدَقناهُمُ الوَعدَ فَأَنجَيناهُم وَمَن نَشاءُ وَأَهلَكنَا المُسرِفينَ
blank: thumm ṣadaqnāhumul-waʿd f-ʾanjaynāhum w-m nashāʾ w-ʾahlaknāl-musrifīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد أَنزَلنا إِلَيكُم كِتابًا فيهِ ذِكرُكُم ۖ أَفَلا تَعقِلونَ
blank: l-qad ʾanzalnā ʾilaykum kitāb fīh dhikrukum ʾ-f-lā taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: We have certainly sent down to you a Book in which is your mention. Then will you not reason

arabic_uthmani: وَكَم قَصَمنا مِن قَريَةٍ كانَت ظالِمَةً وَأَنشَأنا بَعدَها قَومًا آخَرينَ
blank: w-kam qaṣamnā m qaryat kānat ẓālimat w-ʾanshaʾnā baʿdahā qawm ʾākharīn
english_saheeh_international: And how many a city which was unjust have We shattered and produced after it another people

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا أَحَسّوا بَأسَنا إِذا هُم مِنها يَركُضونَ
blank: f-lammā ʾaḥassū baʾsanā ʾidhā hum minhā yarkuḍūn
english_saheeh_international: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it

arabic_uthmani: لا تَركُضوا وَارجِعوا إِلىٰ ما أُترِفتُم فيهِ وَمَساكِنِكُم لَعَلَّكُم تُسأَلونَ
blank: lā tarkuḍū w-rjiʿū ʾilā mā ʾutriftum fīh w-masākinikum laʿallakum tusʾalūn
english_saheeh_international: Some angels said, "Do not flee but return to where you were given luxury and to your homes - perhaps you will be questioned

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا وَيلَنا إِنّا كُنّا ظالِمينَ
blank: qālū yā-waylanā ʾinnā kunnā ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "O woe to us! Indeed, we were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَما زالَت تِلكَ دَعواهُم حَتّىٰ جَعَلناهُم حَصيدًا خامِدينَ
blank: f-mā zālat tilk daʿwāhum ḥattā jaʿalnāhum ḥaṣīd khāmidīn
english_saheeh_international: And that declaration of theirs did not cease until We made them as a harvest mowed down, extinguished like a fire

arabic_uthmani: وَما خَلَقنَا السَّماءَ وَالأَرضَ وَما بَينَهُما لاعِبينَ
blank: w-mā khalaqnā s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā lāʿibīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play

arabic_uthmani: لَو أَرَدنا أَن نَتَّخِذَ لَهوًا لَاتَّخَذناهُ مِن لَدُنّا إِن كُنّا فاعِلينَ
blank: law ʾaradnā ʾ nattakhidh lahw l-ttakhadhnāh m ladunnā ʾ kunnā fāʿilīn
english_saheeh_international: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from what is with Us - if indeed We were to do so

arabic_uthmani: بَل نَقذِفُ بِالحَقِّ عَلَى الباطِلِ فَيَدمَغُهُ فَإِذا هُوَ زاهِقٌ ۚ وَلَكُمُ الوَيلُ مِمّا تَصِفونَ
blank: bal naqdhif b-l-ḥaqq ʿalāl-bāṭil f-yadmaghuhū f-ʾidhā huw zāhiq w-lakumul-wayl mimmā taṣifūn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe

arabic_uthmani: وَلَهُ مَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَمَن عِندَهُ لا يَستَكبِرونَ عَن عِبادَتِهِ وَلا يَستَحسِرونَ
blank: w-lahū m fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-m ʿindahū lā yastakbirūn ʿ ʿibādatihī w-lā yastaḥsirūn
english_saheeh_international: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire

arabic_uthmani: يُسَبِّحونَ اللَّيلَ وَالنَّهارَ لا يَفتُرونَ
blank: yusabbiḥūnal-layl w-n-nahār lā yafturūn
english_saheeh_international: They exalt Him night and day and do not slacken

arabic_uthmani: أَمِ اتَّخَذوا آلِهَةً مِنَ الأَرضِ هُم يُنشِرونَ
blank: ʾam ttakhadhū ʾālihatam-minal-ʾarḍ hum yunshirūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect the dead

arabic_uthmani: لَو كانَ فيهِما آلِهَةٌ إِلَّا اللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتا ۚ فَسُبحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ العَرشِ عَمّا يَصِفونَ
blank: law kān fīhimā ʾālihat ʾillā llāh l-fasadatā f-subḥān llāh rabbil-ʿarsh ʿammā yaṣifūn
english_saheeh_international: Had there been within the heavens and earth gods besides Allah, they both would have been ruined. So exalted is Allah, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe

arabic_uthmani: لا يُسأَلُ عَمّا يَفعَلُ وَهُم يُسأَلونَ
blank: lā yusʾal ʿammā yafʿal w-hum yusʾalūn
english_saheeh_international: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned

arabic_uthmani: أَمِ اتَّخَذوا مِن دونِهِ آلِهَةً ۖ قُل هاتوا بُرهانَكُم ۖ هٰذا ذِكرُ مَن مَعِيَ وَذِكرُ مَن قَبلي ۗ بَل أَكثَرُهُم لا يَعلَمونَ الحَقَّ ۖ فَهُم مُعرِضونَ
blank: ʾam ttakhadhū m dūnihī ʾālihat qul hātū burhānakum hādhā dhikr mam-maʿiy w-dhikr m qablī bal ʾaktharuhum lā yaʿlamūnal-ḥaqq f-hum muʿriḍūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, O Muhammad, "Produce your proof. This Qur'an is the message for those with me and the message of those before me." But most of them do not know the truth, so they are turning away

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلنا مِن قَبلِكَ مِن رَسولٍ إِلّا نوحي إِلَيهِ أَنَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا أَنا فَاعبُدونِ
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnā m qablik m rasūl ʾillā nūḥī ʾilayh ʾannahū lā ʾilāh ʾillā ʾan f-ʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me

arabic_uthmani: وَقالُوا اتَّخَذَ الرَّحمٰنُ وَلَدًا ۗ سُبحانَهُ ۚ بَل عِبادٌ مُكرَمونَ
blank: w-qālū ttakhadh r-raḥmān walad subḥānahū bal ʿibād mukramūn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, they are but honored servants

arabic_uthmani: لا يَسبِقونَهُ بِالقَولِ وَهُم بِأَمرِهِ يَعمَلونَ
blank: lā yasbiqūnahū b-l-qawl w-hum b-ʾamrihī yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command

arabic_uthmani: يَعلَمُ ما بَينَ أَيديهِم وَما خَلفَهُم وَلا يَشفَعونَ إِلّا لِمَنِ ارتَضىٰ وَهُم مِن خَشيَتِهِ مُشفِقونَ
blank: yaʿlam mā bayn ʾaydīhim w-mā khalfahum w-lā yashfaʿūn ʾillā l-man rtaḍā w-hum m khashyatihī mushfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: He knows what is presently before them and what will be after them, and they cannot intercede except on behalf of one whom He approves. And they, from fear of Him, are apprehensive

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَمَن يَقُل مِنهُم إِنّي إِلٰهٌ مِن دونِهِ فَذٰلِكَ نَجزيهِ جَهَنَّمَ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ نَجزِي الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-m yaqul minhum ʾinnī ʾilāh m dūnihī f-dhālik najzīh jahannam k-dhālik najzī ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا أَنَّ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ كانَتا رَتقًا فَفَتَقناهُما ۖ وَجَعَلنا مِنَ الماءِ كُلَّ شَيءٍ حَيٍّ ۖ أَفَلا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaralladhīn kafarū ʾann s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ kānatā ratq f-fataqnāhumā w-jaʿalnā minal-māʾ kull shayʾ ḥayy ʾ-f-lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Have those who disbelieved not considered that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity, and We separated them and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلنا فِي الأَرضِ رَواسِيَ أَن تَميدَ بِهِم وَجَعَلنا فيها فِجاجًا سُبُلًا لَعَلَّهُم يَهتَدونَ
blank: w-jaʿalnā fīl-ʾarḍ rawāsiy ʾ tamīd bihim w-jaʿalnā fīhā fijāj subul laʿallahum yahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And We placed within the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with them, and We made therein mountain passes as roads that they might be guided

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلنَا السَّماءَ سَقفًا مَحفوظًا ۖ وَهُم عَن آياتِها مُعرِضونَ
blank: w-jaʿalnā s-samāʾ saqfam-maḥfūẓ w-hum ʿ ʾāyātihā muʿriḍūn
english_saheeh_international: And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs, are turning away

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَ اللَّيلَ وَالنَّهارَ وَالشَّمسَ وَالقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ في فَلَكٍ يَسبَحونَ
blank: w-huwalladhī khalaqal-layl w-n-nahār w-sh-shams w-l-qamar kull fī falak yasbaḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon; all heavenly bodies in an orbit are swimming

arabic_uthmani: وَما جَعَلنا لِبَشَرٍ مِن قَبلِكَ الخُلدَ ۖ أَفَإِن مِتَّ فَهُمُ الخالِدونَ
blank: w-mā jaʿalnā l-bashar m qablikal-khuld ʾ-f-ʾ mitt f-humul-khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not grant to any man before you eternity on earth; so if you die - would they be eternal

arabic_uthmani: كُلُّ نَفسٍ ذائِقَةُ المَوتِ ۗ وَنَبلوكُم بِالشَّرِّ وَالخَيرِ فِتنَةً ۖ وَإِلَينا تُرجَعونَ
blank: kull nafs dhāʾiqatul-mawt w-nablūkum b-sh-sharr w-l-khayr fitnat w-ʾilaynā turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا رَآكَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا إِن يَتَّخِذونَكَ إِلّا هُزُوًا أَهٰذَا الَّذي يَذكُرُ آلِهَتَكُم وَهُم بِذِكرِ الرَّحمٰنِ هُم كافِرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾākalladhīn kafarū ʾ yattakhidhūnak ʾillā huzuw ʾ-hādhālladhī yadhkur ʾālihatakum w-hum b-dhikr r-raḥmān hum kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: And when those who disbelieve see you, O Muhammad, they take you not except in ridicule, saying, "Is this the one who insults your gods?" And they are, at the mention of the Most Merciful, disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: خُلِقَ الإِنسانُ مِن عَجَلٍ ۚ سَأُريكُم آياتي فَلا تَستَعجِلونِ
blank: khuliqal-ʾinsān m ʿajal s-ʾurīkum ʾāyātī f-lā tastaʿjilūn
english_saheeh_international: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ مَتىٰ هٰذَا الوَعدُ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-yaqūlūn matā hādhāl-waʿd ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: لَو يَعلَمُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا حينَ لا يَكُفّونَ عَن وُجوهِهِمُ النّارَ وَلا عَن ظُهورِهِم وَلا هُم يُنصَرونَ
blank: law yaʿlamulladhīn kafarū ḥīn lā yakuffūn ʿ wujūhihim n-nār w-lā ʿ ẓuhūrihim w-lā hum yunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: If those who disbelieved but knew the time when they will not avert the Fire from their faces or from their backs and they will not be aided

arabic_uthmani: بَل تَأتيهِم بَغتَةً فَتَبهَتُهُم فَلا يَستَطيعونَ رَدَّها وَلا هُم يُنظَرونَ
blank: bal taʾtīhim baghtat f-tabhatuhum f-lā yastaṭīʿūn raddahā w-lā hum yunẓarūn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَدِ استُهزِئَ بِرُسُلٍ مِن قَبلِكَ فَحاقَ بِالَّذينَ سَخِروا مِنهُم ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-l-qad stuhziʾ b-rusul m qablik f-ḥāq b-lladhīn sakhirū minhum mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: قُل مَن يَكلَؤُكُم بِاللَّيلِ وَالنَّهارِ مِنَ الرَّحمٰنِ ۗ بَل هُم عَن ذِكرِ رَبِّهِم مُعرِضونَ
blank: qul m yaklaʾukum b-l-layl w-n-nahār min r-raḥmān bal hum ʿ dhikr rabbihim muʿriḍūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Who can protect you at night or by day from the Most Merciful?" But they are, from the remembrance of their Lord, turning away

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَهُم آلِهَةٌ تَمنَعُهُم مِن دونِنا ۚ لا يَستَطيعونَ نَصرَ أَنفُسِهِم وَلا هُم مِنّا يُصحَبونَ
blank: ʾam lahum ʾālihat tamnaʿuhum m dūninā lā yastaṭīʿūn naṣr ʾanfusihim w-lā hum minnā yuṣḥabūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they have gods to defend them other than Us? They are unable even to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us

arabic_uthmani: بَل مَتَّعنا هٰؤُلاءِ وَآباءَهُم حَتّىٰ طالَ عَلَيهِمُ العُمُرُ ۗ أَفَلا يَرَونَ أَنّا نَأتِي الأَرضَ نَنقُصُها مِن أَطرافِها ۚ أَفَهُمُ الغالِبونَ
blank: bal mattaʿnā hāʾulāʾ w-ʾābāʾahum ḥattā ṭāl ʿalayhimul-ʿumur ʾ-f-lā yarawn ʾannā naʾtīl-ʾarḍ nanquṣuhā m ʾaṭrāfihā ʾ-f-humul-ghālibūn
english_saheeh_international: But, on the contrary, We have provided good things for these disbelievers and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّما أُنذِرُكُم بِالوَحيِ ۚ وَلا يَسمَعُ الصُّمُّ الدُّعاءَ إِذا ما يُنذَرونَ
blank: qul ʾinnamā ʾundhirukum b-l-waḥy w-lā yasmaʿ ṣ-ṣumm d-duʿāʾ ʾidhā mā yundharūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن مَسَّتهُم نَفحَةٌ مِن عَذابِ رَبِّكَ لَيَقولُنَّ يا وَيلَنا إِنّا كُنّا ظالِمينَ
blank: w-l-ʾ massathum nafḥat m ʿadhāb rabbik l-yaqūlunn yā-waylanā ʾinnā kunnā ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And if as much as a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَنَضَعُ المَوازينَ القِسطَ لِيَومِ القِيامَةِ فَلا تُظلَمُ نَفسٌ شَيئًا ۖ وَإِن كانَ مِثقالَ حَبَّةٍ مِن خَردَلٍ أَتَينا بِها ۗ وَكَفىٰ بِنا حاسِبينَ
blank: w-naḍaʿul-mawāzīnal-qisṭ l-yawmil-qiyāmat f-lā tuẓlam nafs shayʾ w-ʾ kān mithqāl ḥabbat m khardal ʾataynā bihā w-kafā binā ḥāsibīn
english_saheeh_international: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so no soul will be treated unjustly at all. And if there is even the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as accountant

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَينا موسىٰ وَهارونَ الفُرقانَ وَضِياءً وَذِكرًا لِلمُتَّقينَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā mūsā w-hārūnal-furqān w-ḍiyāʾ w-dhikr l-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَخشَونَ رَبَّهُم بِالغَيبِ وَهُم مِنَ السّاعَةِ مُشفِقونَ
blank: alladhīn yakhshawn rabbahum b-l-ghayb w-hum min s-sāʿat mushfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Who fear their Lord unseen, while they are of the Hour apprehensive

arabic_uthmani: وَهٰذا ذِكرٌ مُبارَكٌ أَنزَلناهُ ۚ أَفَأَنتُم لَهُ مُنكِرونَ
blank: w-hādhā dhikr mubārak ʾanzalnāh ʾ-f-ʾantum lahū munkirūn
english_saheeh_international: And this Qur'an is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَقَد آتَينا إِبراهيمَ رُشدَهُ مِن قَبلُ وَكُنّا بِهِ عالِمينَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā ʾibrāhīm rushdahū m qabl w-kunnā bihī ʿālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَ لِأَبيهِ وَقَومِهِ ما هٰذِهِ التَّماثيلُ الَّتي أَنتُم لَها عاكِفونَ
blank: ʾidh qāl l-ʾabīh w-qawmihī mā hādhih t-tamāthīl llatī ʾantum lahā ʿākifūn
english_saheeh_international: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted

arabic_uthmani: قالوا وَجَدنا آباءَنا لَها عابِدينَ
blank: qālū wajadnā ʾābāʾanā lahā ʿābidīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لَقَد كُنتُم أَنتُم وَآباؤُكُم في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: qāl l-qad kuntum ʾantum w-ʾābāʾukum fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error

arabic_uthmani: قالوا أَجِئتَنا بِالحَقِّ أَم أَنتَ مِنَ اللّاعِبينَ
blank: qālū ʾ-jiʾtanā b-l-ḥaqq ʾam ʾant minal-lāʿibīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest

arabic_uthmani: قالَ بَل رَبُّكُم رَبُّ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ الَّذي فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنا عَلىٰ ذٰلِكُم مِنَ الشّاهِدينَ
blank: qāl bal rabbukum rabb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍilladhī faṭarahunn w-ʾan ʿalā dhālikum min sh-shāhidīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "No, rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify

arabic_uthmani: وَتَاللَّهِ لَأَكيدَنَّ أَصنامَكُم بَعدَ أَن تُوَلّوا مُدبِرينَ
blank: w-t-llāh l-ʾakīdann ʾaṣnāmakum baʿd ʾ tuwallū mudbirīn
english_saheeh_international: And I swear by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away

arabic_uthmani: فَجَعَلَهُم جُذاذًا إِلّا كَبيرًا لَهُم لَعَلَّهُم إِلَيهِ يَرجِعونَ
blank: f-jaʿalahum judhādh ʾillā kabīr lahum laʿallahum ʾilayh yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it and question

arabic_uthmani: قالوا مَن فَعَلَ هٰذا بِآلِهَتِنا إِنَّهُ لَمِنَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: qālū m faʿal hādhā b-ʾālihatinā ʾinnahū l-min ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: قالوا سَمِعنا فَتًى يَذكُرُهُم يُقالُ لَهُ إِبراهيمُ
blank: qālū samiʿnā fat yadhkuruhum yuqāl lahū ʾibrāhīm
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham

arabic_uthmani: قالوا فَأتوا بِهِ عَلىٰ أَعيُنِ النّاسِ لَعَلَّهُم يَشهَدونَ
blank: qālū f-ʾtū bihī ʿalā ʾaʿyun n-nās laʿallahum yashhadūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify

arabic_uthmani: قالوا أَأَنتَ فَعَلتَ هٰذا بِآلِهَتِنا يا إِبراهيمُ
blank: qālū ʾ-ʾant faʿalt hādhā b-ʾālihatinā yā-ʾibrāhīm
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham

arabic_uthmani: قالَ بَل فَعَلَهُ كَبيرُهُم هٰذا فَاسأَلوهُم إِن كانوا يَنطِقونَ
blank: qāl bal faʿalahū kabīruhum hādhā f-sʾalūhum ʾ kānū yanṭiqūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should be able to speak

arabic_uthmani: فَرَجَعوا إِلىٰ أَنفُسِهِم فَقالوا إِنَّكُم أَنتُمُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: f-rajaʿū ʾilā ʾanfusihim f-qālū ʾinnakum ʾantum ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: So they returned to blaming themselves and said to each other, "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ نُكِسوا عَلىٰ رُءوسِهِم لَقَد عَلِمتَ ما هٰؤُلاءِ يَنطِقونَ
blank: thumm nukisū ʿalā ruʾūsihim l-qad ʿalimt mā hāʾulāʾ yanṭiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Then they reversed themselves, saying, "You have already known that these do not speak

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَفَتَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ما لا يَنفَعُكُم شَيئًا وَلا يَضُرُّكُم
blank: qāl ʾ-f-taʿbudūn m dūn llāh mā lā yanfaʿukum shayʾ w-lā yaḍurrukum
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you

arabic_uthmani: أُفٍّ لَكُم وَلِما تَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ۖ أَفَلا تَعقِلونَ
blank: ʾuff lakum w-l-mā taʿbudūn m dūn llāh ʾ-f-lā taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason

arabic_uthmani: قالوا حَرِّقوهُ وَانصُروا آلِهَتَكُم إِن كُنتُم فاعِلينَ
blank: qālū ḥarriqūh w-nṣurū ʾālihatakum ʾ kuntum fāʿilīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act

arabic_uthmani: قُلنا يا نارُ كوني بَردًا وَسَلامًا عَلىٰ إِبراهيمَ
blank: qulnā yā-nār kūnī bard w-salām ʿalā ʾibrāhīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham

arabic_uthmani: وَأَرادوا بِهِ كَيدًا فَجَعَلناهُمُ الأَخسَرينَ
blank: w-ʾarādū bihī kayd f-jaʿalnāhumul-ʾakhsarīn
english_saheeh_international: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers

arabic_uthmani: وَنَجَّيناهُ وَلوطًا إِلَى الأَرضِ الَّتي بارَكنا فيها لِلعالَمينَ
blank: w-najjaynāh w-lūṭ ʾilāl-ʾarḍ llatī bāraknā fīhā l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَوَهَبنا لَهُ إِسحاقَ وَيَعقوبَ نافِلَةً ۖ وَكُلًّا جَعَلنا صالِحينَ
blank: w-wahabnā lahū ʾisḥāq w-yaʿqūb nāfilat w-kull jaʿalnā ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all of them We made righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلناهُم أَئِمَّةً يَهدونَ بِأَمرِنا وَأَوحَينا إِلَيهِم فِعلَ الخَيراتِ وَإِقامَ الصَّلاةِ وَإيتاءَ الزَّكاةِ ۖ وَكانوا لَنا عابِدينَ
blank: w-jaʿalnāhum ʾaʾimmat yahdūn b-ʾamrinā w-ʾawḥaynā ʾilayhim fiʿlal-khayrāt w-ʾiqām ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾītāʾ z-zakāt w-kānū lanā ʿābidīn
english_saheeh_international: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us

arabic_uthmani: وَلوطًا آتَيناهُ حُكمًا وَعِلمًا وَنَجَّيناهُ مِنَ القَريَةِ الَّتي كانَت تَعمَلُ الخَبائِثَ ۗ إِنَّهُم كانوا قَومَ سَوءٍ فاسِقينَ
blank: w-lūṭ ʾātaynāh ḥukm w-ʿilm w-najjaynāh minal-qaryat llatī kānat taʿmalul-khabāʾith ʾinnahum kānū qawm sawʾ fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: وَأَدخَلناهُ في رَحمَتِنا ۖ إِنَّهُ مِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: w-ʾadkhalnāh fī raḥmatinā ʾinnahū min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَنوحًا إِذ نادىٰ مِن قَبلُ فَاستَجَبنا لَهُ فَنَجَّيناهُ وَأَهلَهُ مِنَ الكَربِ العَظيمِ
blank: w-nūḥ ʾidh nādā m qabl f-stajabnā lahū f-najjaynāh w-ʾahlahū minal-karbil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And mention Noah, when he called to Allah before that time, so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood

arabic_uthmani: وَنَصَرناهُ مِنَ القَومِ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا ۚ إِنَّهُم كانوا قَومَ سَوءٍ فَأَغرَقناهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: w-naṣarnāh minal-qawmilladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā ʾinnahum kānū qawm sawʾ f-ʾaghraqnāhum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together

arabic_uthmani: وَداوودَ وَسُلَيمانَ إِذ يَحكُمانِ فِي الحَرثِ إِذ نَفَشَت فيهِ غَنَمُ القَومِ وَكُنّا لِحُكمِهِم شاهِدينَ
blank: w-dāwūd w-sulaymān ʾidh yaḥkumān fīl-ḥarth ʾidh nafashat fīh ghanamul-qawm w-kunnā l-ḥukmihim shāhidīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it at night, and We were witness to their judgement

arabic_uthmani: فَفَهَّمناها سُلَيمانَ ۚ وَكُلًّا آتَينا حُكمًا وَعِلمًا ۚ وَسَخَّرنا مَعَ داوودَ الجِبالَ يُسَبِّحنَ وَالطَّيرَ ۚ وَكُنّا فاعِلينَ
blank: f-fahhamnāhā sulaymān w-kull ʾātaynā ḥukm w-ʿilm w-sakhkharnā maʿ dāwūdal-jibāl yusabbiḥn w-ṭ-ṭayr w-kunnā fāʿilīn
english_saheeh_international: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each of them We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt Us, along with David and also the birds. And We were doing that

arabic_uthmani: وَعَلَّمناهُ صَنعَةَ لَبوسٍ لَكُم لِتُحصِنَكُم مِن بَأسِكُم ۖ فَهَل أَنتُم شاكِرونَ
blank: w-ʿallamnāh ṣanʿat labūs lakum l-tuḥṣinakum m baʾsikum f-hal ʾantum shākirūn
english_saheeh_international: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your enemy in battle. So will you then be grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَلِسُلَيمانَ الرّيحَ عاصِفَةً تَجري بِأَمرِهِ إِلَى الأَرضِ الَّتي بارَكنا فيها ۚ وَكُنّا بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عالِمينَ
blank: w-l-sulaymān r-rīḥ ʿāṣifat tajrī b-ʾamrihī ʾilāl-ʾarḍ llatī bāraknā fīhā w-kunnā b-kull shayʾ ʿālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And to Solomon We subjected the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ الشَّياطينِ مَن يَغوصونَ لَهُ وَيَعمَلونَ عَمَلًا دونَ ذٰلِكَ ۖ وَكُنّا لَهُم حافِظينَ
blank: w-min sh-shayāṭīn m yaghūṣūn lahū w-yaʿmalūn ʿamal dūn dhālik w-kunnā lahum ḥāfiẓīn
english_saheeh_international: And of the devils were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَأَيّوبَ إِذ نادىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنّي مَسَّنِيَ الضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرحَمُ الرّاحِمينَ
blank: w-ʾayyūb ʾidh nādā rabbahū ʾannī massaniy ḍ-ḍurr w-ʾant ʾarḥam r-rāḥimīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful

arabic_uthmani: فَاستَجَبنا لَهُ فَكَشَفنا ما بِهِ مِن ضُرٍّ ۖ وَآتَيناهُ أَهلَهُ وَمِثلَهُم مَعَهُم رَحمَةً مِن عِندِنا وَذِكرىٰ لِلعابِدينَ
blank: f-stajabnā lahū f-kashafnā mā bihī m ḍurr w-ʾātaynāh ʾahlahū w-mithlahum maʿahum raḥmatam-m ʿindinā w-dhikrā l-l-ʿābidīn
english_saheeh_international: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity. And We gave him back his family and the like thereof with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for the worshippers of Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَإِسماعيلَ وَإِدريسَ وَذَا الكِفلِ ۖ كُلٌّ مِنَ الصّابِرينَ
blank: w-ʾismāʿīl w-ʾidrīs w-dhāl-kifl kull min ṣ-ṣābirīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient

arabic_uthmani: وَأَدخَلناهُم في رَحمَتِنا ۖ إِنَّهُم مِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: w-ʾadkhalnāhum fī raḥmatinā ʾinnahum min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَذَا النّونِ إِذ ذَهَبَ مُغاضِبًا فَظَنَّ أَن لَن نَقدِرَ عَلَيهِ فَنادىٰ فِي الظُّلُماتِ أَن لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا أَنتَ سُبحانَكَ إِنّي كُنتُ مِنَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-dhā n-nūn ʾidh dhahab mughāḍib f-ẓann ʾ l naqdir ʿalayh f-nādā fī ẓ-ẓulumāt ʾ lā ʾilāh ʾillā ʾant subḥānak ʾinnī kunt min ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree anything upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَاستَجَبنا لَهُ وَنَجَّيناهُ مِنَ الغَمِّ ۚ وَكَذٰلِكَ نُنجِي المُؤمِنينَ
blank: f-stajabnā lahū w-najjaynāh minal-ghamm w-k-dhālik nunjīl-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَزَكَرِيّا إِذ نادىٰ رَبَّهُ رَبِّ لا تَذَرني فَردًا وَأَنتَ خَيرُ الوارِثينَ
blank: w-zakariyyā ʾidh nādā rabbahū rabb lā tadharnī fard w-ʾant khayrul-wārithīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone with no heir, while you are the best of inheritors

arabic_uthmani: فَاستَجَبنا لَهُ وَوَهَبنا لَهُ يَحيىٰ وَأَصلَحنا لَهُ زَوجَهُ ۚ إِنَّهُم كانوا يُسارِعونَ فِي الخَيراتِ وَيَدعونَنا رَغَبًا وَرَهَبًا ۖ وَكانوا لَنا خاشِعينَ
blank: f-stajabnā lahū w-wahabnā lahū yaḥyā w-ʾaṣlaḥnā lahū zawjahū ʾinnahum kānū yusāriʿūn fīl-khayrāt w-yadʿūnanā raghab w-rahab w-kānū lanā khāshiʿīn
english_saheeh_international: So We responded to him, and We gave to him John, and amended for him his wife. Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were to Us humbly submissive

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّتي أَحصَنَت فَرجَها فَنَفَخنا فيها مِن روحِنا وَجَعَلناها وَابنَها آيَةً لِلعالَمينَ
blank: w-llatī ʾaḥṣanat farjahā f-nafakhnā fīhā m rūḥinā w-jaʿalnāhā w-bnahā ʾāyat l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her garment through Our angel Gabriel, and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذِهِ أُمَّتُكُم أُمَّةً واحِدَةً وَأَنا رَبُّكُم فَاعبُدونِ
blank: ʾinn hādhihī ʾummatukum ʾummat wāḥidat w-ʾan rabbukum f-ʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me

arabic_uthmani: وَتَقَطَّعوا أَمرَهُم بَينَهُم ۖ كُلٌّ إِلَينا راجِعونَ
blank: w-taqaṭṭaʿū ʾamrahum baynahum kull ʾilaynā rājiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And yet they divided their affair among themselves, but all to Us will return

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن يَعمَل مِنَ الصّالِحاتِ وَهُوَ مُؤمِنٌ فَلا كُفرانَ لِسَعيِهِ وَإِنّا لَهُ كاتِبونَ
blank: f-m yaʿmal min ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-huw muʾmin f-lā kufrān l-saʿyihī w-ʾinnā lahū kātibūn
english_saheeh_international: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders

arabic_uthmani: وَحَرامٌ عَلىٰ قَريَةٍ أَهلَكناها أَنَّهُم لا يَرجِعونَ
blank: w-ḥarām ʿalā qaryat ʾahlaknāhā ʾannahum lā yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And there is prohibition upon the people of a city which We have destroyed that they will ever return

arabic_uthmani: حَتّىٰ إِذا فُتِحَت يَأجوجُ وَمَأجوجُ وَهُم مِن كُلِّ حَدَبٍ يَنسِلونَ
blank: ḥattā ʾidhā futiḥat yaʾjūj w-maʾjūj w-hum m kull ḥadab yansilūn
english_saheeh_international: Until when the dam of Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend

arabic_uthmani: وَاقتَرَبَ الوَعدُ الحَقُّ فَإِذا هِيَ شاخِصَةٌ أَبصارُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا يا وَيلَنا قَد كُنّا في غَفلَةٍ مِن هٰذا بَل كُنّا ظالِمينَ
blank: w-qtarabal-waʿdul-ḥaqq f-ʾidhā hiy shākhiṣat ʾabṣārulladhīn kafarū yā-waylanā qad kunnā fī ghaflat m hādhā bal kunnā ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And when the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring in horror, while they say, "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّكُم وَما تَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُم لَها وارِدونَ
blank: ʾinnakum w-mā taʿbudūn m dūn llāh ḥaṣab jahannam ʾantum lahā wāridūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, you disbelievers and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to enter it

arabic_uthmani: لَو كانَ هٰؤُلاءِ آلِهَةً ما وَرَدوها ۖ وَكُلٌّ فيها خالِدونَ
blank: law kān hāʾulāʾ ʾālihatam-mā waradūhā w-kull fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: Had these false deities been actual gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein

arabic_uthmani: لَهُم فيها زَفيرٌ وَهُم فيها لا يَسمَعونَ
blank: lahum fīhā zafīr w-hum fīhā lā yasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ سَبَقَت لَهُم مِنَّا الحُسنىٰ أُولٰئِكَ عَنها مُبعَدونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn sabaqat lahum minnāl-ḥusnā ʾulāʾik ʿanhā mubʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those for whom the best reward has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed

arabic_uthmani: لا يَسمَعونَ حَسيسَها ۖ وَهُم في مَا اشتَهَت أَنفُسُهُم خالِدونَ
blank: lā yasmaʿūn ḥasīsahā w-hum fī mā shtahat ʾanfusuhum khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally

arabic_uthmani: لا يَحزُنُهُمُ الفَزَعُ الأَكبَرُ وَتَتَلَقّاهُمُ المَلائِكَةُ هٰذا يَومُكُمُ الَّذي كُنتُم توعَدونَ
blank: lā yaḥzunuhumul-fazaʿul-ʾakbar w-tatalaqqāhumul-malāʾikat hādhā yawmukumulladhī kuntum tūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: They will not be grieved by the greatest terror, and the angels will meet them, saying, "This is your Day which you have been promised

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ نَطوِي السَّماءَ كَطَيِّ السِّجِلِّ لِلكُتُبِ ۚ كَما بَدَأنا أَوَّلَ خَلقٍ نُعيدُهُ ۚ وَعدًا عَلَينا ۚ إِنّا كُنّا فاعِلينَ
blank: yawm naṭwī s-samāʾ k-ṭayy s-sijill l-l-kutub k-mā badaʾnā ʾawwal khalq nuʿīduhū waʿd ʿalaynā ʾinnā kunnā fāʿilīn
english_saheeh_international: The Day when We will fold the heaven like the folding of a written sheet for the records. As We began the first creation, We will repeat it. That is a promise binding upon Us. Indeed, We will do it

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد كَتَبنا فِي الزَّبورِ مِن بَعدِ الذِّكرِ أَنَّ الأَرضَ يَرِثُها عِبادِيَ الصّالِحونَ
blank: w-l-qad katabnā fī z-zabūr m baʿd dh-dhikr ʾannal-ʾarḍ yarithuhā ʿibādiy ṣ-ṣāliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have already written in the book of Psalms after the previous mention that the land of Paradise is inherited by My righteous servants

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في هٰذا لَبَلاغًا لِقَومٍ عابِدينَ
blank: ʾinn fī hādhā l-balāgh l-qawm ʿābidīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, in this Qur'an is notification for a worshipping people

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلناكَ إِلّا رَحمَةً لِلعالَمينَ
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnāk ʾillā raḥmat l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And We have not sent you, O Muhammad, except as a mercy to the worlds

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّما يوحىٰ إِلَيَّ أَنَّما إِلٰهُكُم إِلٰهٌ واحِدٌ ۖ فَهَل أَنتُم مُسلِمونَ
blank: qul ʾinnamā yūḥā ʾilayy ʾannamā ʾilāhukum ʾilāh wāḥid f-hal ʾantum muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims in submission to Him

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن تَوَلَّوا فَقُل آذَنتُكُم عَلىٰ سَواءٍ ۖ وَإِن أَدري أَقَريبٌ أَم بَعيدٌ ما توعَدونَ
blank: f-ʾ tawallaw f-qul ʾādhantukum ʿalā sawāʾ w-ʾ ʾadrī ʾ-qarīb ʾam baʿīd mā tūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to all of you equally. And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ يَعلَمُ الجَهرَ مِنَ القَولِ وَيَعلَمُ ما تَكتُمونَ
blank: ʾinnahū yaʿlamul-jahr minal-qawl w-yaʿlam mā taktumūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن أَدري لَعَلَّهُ فِتنَةٌ لَكُم وَمَتاعٌ إِلىٰ حينٍ
blank: w-ʾ ʾadrī laʿallahū fitnat lakum w-matāʿ ʾilā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And I know not; perhaps it is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ احكُم بِالحَقِّ ۗ وَرَبُّنَا الرَّحمٰنُ المُستَعانُ عَلىٰ ما تَصِفونَ
blank: qāl rabb ḥkum b-l-ḥaqq w-rabbunā r-raḥmānul-mustaʿān ʿalā mā taṣifūn
english_saheeh_international: The Prophet has said, "My Lord, judge between us in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ اتَّقوا رَبَّكُم ۚ إِنَّ زَلزَلَةَ السّاعَةِ شَيءٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ttaqū rabbakum ʾinn zalzalat s-sāʿat shayʾ ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, fear your Lord. Indeed, the convulsion of the final Hour is a terrible thing

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تَرَونَها تَذهَلُ كُلُّ مُرضِعَةٍ عَمّا أَرضَعَت وَتَضَعُ كُلُّ ذاتِ حَملٍ حَملَها وَتَرَى النّاسَ سُكارىٰ وَما هُم بِسُكارىٰ وَلٰكِنَّ عَذابَ اللَّهِ شَديدٌ
blank: yawm tarawnahā tadhhal kull murḍiʿat ʿammā ʾarḍaʿat w-taḍaʿ kull dhāt ḥaml ḥamlahā w-tarā n-nās sukārā w-mā hum b-sukārā w-lākinn ʿadhāb llāh shadīd
english_saheeh_international: On the Day you see it every nursing mother will be distracted from that child she was nursing, and every pregnant woman will abort her pregnancy, and you will see the people appearing intoxicated while they are not intoxicated; but the punishment of Allah is severe

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يُجادِلُ فِي اللَّهِ بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ وَيَتَّبِعُ كُلَّ شَيطانٍ مَريدٍ
blank: w-min n-nās m yujādil fī llāh b-ghayr ʿilm w-yattabiʿ kull shayṭān marīd
english_saheeh_international: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil

arabic_uthmani: كُتِبَ عَلَيهِ أَنَّهُ مَن تَوَلّاهُ فَأَنَّهُ يُضِلُّهُ وَيَهديهِ إِلىٰ عَذابِ السَّعيرِ
blank: kutib ʿalayh ʾannahū m tawallāh f-ʾannahū yuḍilluhū w-yahdīh ʾilā ʿadhāb s-saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: It has been decreed for every devil that whoever turns to him - he will misguide him and will lead him to the punishment of the Blaze

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ إِن كُنتُم في رَيبٍ مِنَ البَعثِ فَإِنّا خَلَقناكُم مِن تُرابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُطفَةٍ ثُمَّ مِن عَلَقَةٍ ثُمَّ مِن مُضغَةٍ مُخَلَّقَةٍ وَغَيرِ مُخَلَّقَةٍ لِنُبَيِّنَ لَكُم ۚ وَنُقِرُّ فِي الأَرحامِ ما نَشاءُ إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ثُمَّ نُخرِجُكُم طِفلًا ثُمَّ لِتَبلُغوا أَشُدَّكُم ۖ وَمِنكُم مَن يُتَوَفّىٰ وَمِنكُم مَن يُرَدُّ إِلىٰ أَرذَلِ العُمُرِ لِكَيلا يَعلَمَ مِن بَعدِ عِلمٍ شَيئًا ۚ وَتَرَى الأَرضَ هامِدَةً فَإِذا أَنزَلنا عَلَيهَا الماءَ اهتَزَّت وَرَبَت وَأَنبَتَت مِن كُلِّ زَوجٍ بَهيجٍ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ʾ kuntum fī rayb minal-baʿth f-ʾinnā khalaqnākum m turāb thumm m nuṭfat thumm m ʿalaqat thumm m muḍghat mukhallaqat w-ghayr mukhallaqat l-nubayyin lakum w-nuqirr fīl-ʾarḥām mā nashāʾ ʾilā ʾajal musamm thumm nukhrijukum ṭifl thumm l-tablughū ʾashuddakum w-minkum m yutawaffā w-minkum m yuradd ʾilā ʾardhalil-ʿumur l-kay-lā yaʿlam m baʿd ʿilm shayʾ w-tarāl-ʾarḍ hāmidat f-ʾidhā ʾanzalnā ʿalayhāl-māʾ htazzat w-rabat w-ʾanbatat m kull zawj bahīj
english_saheeh_international: O People, if you should be in doubt about the Resurrection, then consider that indeed, We created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, and then from a lump of flesh, formed and unformed - that We may show you. And We settle in the wombs whom We will for a specified term, then We bring you out as a child, and then We develop you that you may reach your time of maturity. And among you is he who is taken in early death, and among you is he who is returned to the most decrepit old age so that he knows, after once having knowledge, nothing. And you see the earth barren, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and swells and grows something of every beautiful kind

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُ يُحيِي المَوتىٰ وَأَنَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: dhālik b-ʾann llāh huwal-ḥaqq w-ʾannahū yuḥyil-mawtā w-ʾannahū ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّ السّاعَةَ آتِيَةٌ لا رَيبَ فيها وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَبعَثُ مَن فِي القُبورِ
blank: w-ʾann s-sāʿat ʾātiyat lā rayb fīhā w-ʾann llāh yabʿath m fīl-qubūr
english_saheeh_international: And that they may know that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allah will resurrect those in the graves

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يُجادِلُ فِي اللَّهِ بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ وَلا هُدًى وَلا كِتابٍ مُنيرٍ
blank: w-min n-nās m yujādil fī llāh b-ghayr ʿilm w-lā hud w-lā kitāb munīr
english_saheeh_international: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening book from Him

arabic_uthmani: ثانِيَ عِطفِهِ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ لَهُ فِي الدُّنيا خِزيٌ ۖ وَنُذيقُهُ يَومَ القِيامَةِ عَذابَ الحَريقِ
blank: thāniy ʿiṭfihī l-yuḍill ʿ sabīl llāh lahū fī d-dunyā khizy w-nudhīquhū yawmal-qiyāmat ʿadhābal-ḥarīq
english_saheeh_international: Twisting his neck in arrogance to mislead people from the way of Allah. For him in the world is disgrace, and We will make him taste on the Day of Resurrection the punishment of the Burning Fire while it is said

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِما قَدَّمَت يَداكَ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ لَيسَ بِظَلّامٍ لِلعَبيدِ
blank: dhālik b-mā qaddamat yadāk w-ʾann llāh lays b-ẓallām l-l-ʿabīd
english_saheeh_international: That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to His servants

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يَعبُدُ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ حَرفٍ ۖ فَإِن أَصابَهُ خَيرٌ اطمَأَنَّ بِهِ ۖ وَإِن أَصابَتهُ فِتنَةٌ انقَلَبَ عَلىٰ وَجهِهِ خَسِرَ الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةَ ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الخُسرانُ المُبينُ
blank: w-min n-nās m yaʿbud llāh ʿalā ḥarf f-ʾ ʾaṣābahū khayr ʾiṭmaʾann bihī w-ʾ ʾaṣābath fitnat- nqalab ʿalā wajhihī khasir d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat dhālik huwal-khusrānul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And of the people is he who worships Allah on an edge. If he is touched by good, he is reassured by it; but if he is struck by trial, he turns on his face to the other direction. He has lost this world and the Hereafter. That is what is the manifest loss

arabic_uthmani: يَدعو مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ما لا يَضُرُّهُ وَما لا يَنفَعُهُ ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الضَّلالُ البَعيدُ
blank: yadʿū m dūn llāh mā lā yaḍurruhū w-mā lā yanfaʿuhū dhālik huw ḍ-ḍalālul-baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: He invokes instead of Allah that which neither harms him nor benefits him. That is what is the extreme error

arabic_uthmani: يَدعو لَمَن ضَرُّهُ أَقرَبُ مِن نَفعِهِ ۚ لَبِئسَ المَولىٰ وَلَبِئسَ العَشيرُ
blank: yadʿū l-m ḍarruhū ʾaqrab m nafʿihī l-biʾsal-mawlā w-l-biʾsal-ʿashīr
english_saheeh_international: He invokes one whose harm is closer than his benefit - how wretched the protector and how wretched the associate

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدخِلُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَفعَلُ ما يُريدُ
blank: ʾinn llāh yudkhilulladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār ʾinn llāh yafʿal mā yurīd
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. Indeed, Allah does what He intends

arabic_uthmani: مَن كانَ يَظُنُّ أَن لَن يَنصُرَهُ اللَّهُ فِي الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةِ فَليَمدُد بِسَبَبٍ إِلَى السَّماءِ ثُمَّ ليَقطَع فَليَنظُر هَل يُذهِبَنَّ كَيدُهُ ما يَغيظُ
blank: m kān yaẓunn ʾ l yanṣurah llāh fī d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat f-l-yamdud b-sabab ʾilā s-samāʾ thummal-yaqṭaʿ f-l-yanẓur hal yudhhibann kayduhū mā yaghīẓ
english_saheeh_international: Whoever should think that Allah will not support Prophet Muhammad in this world and the Hereafter - let him extend a rope to the ceiling, then cut off his breath, and let him see: will his effort remove that which enrages him

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ أَنزَلناهُ آياتٍ بَيِّناتٍ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَهدي مَن يُريدُ
blank: w-k-dhālik ʾanzalnāh ʾāyāt bayyināt w-ʾann llāh yahdī m yurīd
english_saheeh_international: And thus have We sent the Qur'an down as verses of clear evidence and because Allah guides whom He intends

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَالَّذينَ هادوا وَالصّابِئينَ وَالنَّصارىٰ وَالمَجوسَ وَالَّذينَ أَشرَكوا إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَفصِلُ بَينَهُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ شَهيدٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾāmanū w-lladhīn hādū w-ṣ-ṣābiʾīn w-n-naṣārā w-l-majūs w-lladhīn ʾashrakū ʾinn llāh yafṣil baynahum yawmal-qiyāmat ʾinn llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ shahīd
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associated with Allah - Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, over all things, Witness

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَسجُدُ لَهُ مَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَمَن فِي الأَرضِ وَالشَّمسُ وَالقَمَرُ وَالنُّجومُ وَالجِبالُ وَالشَّجَرُ وَالدَّوابُّ وَكَثيرٌ مِنَ النّاسِ ۖ وَكَثيرٌ حَقَّ عَلَيهِ العَذابُ ۗ وَمَن يُهِنِ اللَّهُ فَما لَهُ مِن مُكرِمٍ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَفعَلُ ما يَشاءُ ۩
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾann llāh yasjud lahū m fī s-samāwāt w-m fīl-ʾarḍ w-sh-shams w-l-qamar w-n-nujūm w-l-jibāl w-sh-shajar w-d-dawābb w-kathīr min n-nās w-kathīr ḥaqq ʿalayhil-ʿadhāb w-m yuhin llāh f-mā lahū m mukrim ʾinn llāh yafʿal mā yashāʾ
english_saheeh_international: Do you not see that to Allah prostrates whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures and many of the people? But upon many the punishment has been justified. And he whom Allah humiliates - for him there is no bestower of honor. Indeed, Allah does what He wills

arabic_uthmani: ۞ هٰذانِ خَصمانِ اختَصَموا في رَبِّهِم ۖ فَالَّذينَ كَفَروا قُطِّعَت لَهُم ثِيابٌ مِن نارٍ يُصَبُّ مِن فَوقِ رُءوسِهِمُ الحَميمُ
blank: hādhān khaṣmān khtaṣamū fī rabbihim f-lladhīn kafarū quṭṭiʿat lahum thiyāb m nār yuṣabb m fawq ruʾūsihimul-ḥamīm
english_saheeh_international: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But those who disbelieved will have cut out for them garments of fire. Poured upon their heads will be scalding water

arabic_uthmani: يُصهَرُ بِهِ ما في بُطونِهِم وَالجُلودُ
blank: yuṣhar bihī mā fī buṭūnihim w-l-julūd
english_saheeh_international: By which is melted that within their bellies and their skins

arabic_uthmani: وَلَهُم مَقامِعُ مِن حَديدٍ
blank: w-lahum maqāmiʿ m ḥadīd
english_saheeh_international: And for striking them are maces of iron

arabic_uthmani: كُلَّما أَرادوا أَن يَخرُجوا مِنها مِن غَمٍّ أُعيدوا فيها وَذوقوا عَذابَ الحَريقِ
blank: kullamā ʾarādū ʾ yakhrujū minhā m ghamm ʾuʿīdū fīhā w-dhūqū ʿadhābal-ḥarīq
english_saheeh_international: Every time they want to get out of Hellfire from anguish, they will be returned to it, and it will be said, "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدخِلُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ يُحَلَّونَ فيها مِن أَساوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤلُؤًا ۖ وَلِباسُهُم فيها حَريرٌ
blank: ʾinn llāh yudkhilulladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār yuḥallawn fīhā m ʾasāwir m dhahab w-luʾluʾ w-libāsuhum fīhā ḥarīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk

arabic_uthmani: وَهُدوا إِلَى الطَّيِّبِ مِنَ القَولِ وَهُدوا إِلىٰ صِراطِ الحَميدِ
blank: w-hudū ʾilā ṭ-ṭayyib minal-qawl w-hudū ʾilā ṣirāṭil-ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: And they had been guided in worldly life to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَيَصُدّونَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَالمَسجِدِ الحَرامِ الَّذي جَعَلناهُ لِلنّاسِ سَواءً العاكِفُ فيهِ وَالبادِ ۚ وَمَن يُرِد فيهِ بِإِلحادٍ بِظُلمٍ نُذِقهُ مِن عَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū w-yaṣuddūn ʿ sabīl llāh w-l-masjidil-ḥarāmilladhī jaʿalnāh l-n-nās sawāʾ-il-ʿākif fīh w-l-bād w-m yurid fīh b-ʾilḥād b-ẓulm nudhiqh m ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who have disbelieved and avert people from the way of Allah and from al-Masjid al-Haram, which We made for the people - equal are the resident therein and one from outside; and also whoever intends a deed therein of deviation in religion or wrongdoing - We will make him taste of a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ بَوَّأنا لِإِبراهيمَ مَكانَ البَيتِ أَن لا تُشرِك بي شَيئًا وَطَهِّر بَيتِيَ لِلطّائِفينَ وَالقائِمينَ وَالرُّكَّعِ السُّجودِ
blank: w-ʾidh bawwaʾnā l-ʾibrāhīm makānal-bayt ʾ lā tushrik bī shayʾ w-ṭahhir baytiy l-ṭ-ṭāʾifīn w-l-qāʾimīn w-r-rukkaʿ s-sujūd
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when We designated for Abraham the site of the House, saying, "Do not associate anything with Me and purify My House for those who perform Tawaf and those who stand in prayer and those who bow and prostrate

arabic_uthmani: وَأَذِّن فِي النّاسِ بِالحَجِّ يَأتوكَ رِجالًا وَعَلىٰ كُلِّ ضامِرٍ يَأتينَ مِن كُلِّ فَجٍّ عَميقٍ
blank: w-ʾadhdh fī n-nās b-l-ḥajj yaʾtūk rijāl w-ʿalā kull ḍāmir yaʾtīn m kull fajj ʿamīq
english_saheeh_international: And proclaim to the people the Hajj pilgrimage; they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel; they will come from every distant pass

arabic_uthmani: لِيَشهَدوا مَنافِعَ لَهُم وَيَذكُرُوا اسمَ اللَّهِ في أَيّامٍ مَعلوماتٍ عَلىٰ ما رَزَقَهُم مِن بَهيمَةِ الأَنعامِ ۖ فَكُلوا مِنها وَأَطعِمُوا البائِسَ الفَقيرَ
blank: l-yashhadū manāfiʿ lahum w-yadhkurū sm llāh fī ʾayyām maʿlūmāt ʿalā mā razaqahum m bahīmatil-ʾanʿām f-kulū minhā w-ʾaṭʿimūl-bāʾisal-faqīr
english_saheeh_international: That they may witness benefits for themselves and mention the name of Allah on known days over what He has provided for them of sacrificial animals. So eat of them and feed the miserable and poor

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ ليَقضوا تَفَثَهُم وَليوفوا نُذورَهُم وَليَطَّوَّفوا بِالبَيتِ العَتيقِ
blank: thummal-yaqḍū tafathahum w-l-yūfū nudhūrahum w-l-yaṭṭawwafū b-l-baytil-ʿatīq
english_saheeh_international: Then let them end their untidiness and fulfill their vows and perform Tawaf around the ancient House

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ وَمَن يُعَظِّم حُرُماتِ اللَّهِ فَهُوَ خَيرٌ لَهُ عِندَ رَبِّهِ ۗ وَأُحِلَّت لَكُمُ الأَنعامُ إِلّا ما يُتلىٰ عَلَيكُم ۖ فَاجتَنِبُوا الرِّجسَ مِنَ الأَوثانِ وَاجتَنِبوا قَولَ الزّورِ
blank: dhālik w-m yuʿaẓẓim ḥurumāt llāh f-huw khayr lahū ʿind rabbihī w-ʾuḥillat lakumul-ʾanʿām ʾillā mā yutlā ʿalaykum f-jtanibū r-rijs minal-ʾawthān w-jtanibū qawl z-zūr
english_saheeh_international: That has been commanded, and whoever honors the sacred ordinances of Allah - it is best for him in the sight of his Lord. And permitted to you are the grazing livestock, except what is recited to you. So avoid the uncleanliness of idols and avoid false statement

arabic_uthmani: حُنَفاءَ لِلَّهِ غَيرَ مُشرِكينَ بِهِ ۚ وَمَن يُشرِك بِاللَّهِ فَكَأَنَّما خَرَّ مِنَ السَّماءِ فَتَخطَفُهُ الطَّيرُ أَو تَهوي بِهِ الرّيحُ في مَكانٍ سَحيقٍ
blank: ḥunafāʾ l-llāh ghayr mushrikīn bihī w-m yushrik b-llāh f-k-ʾannamā kharr min s-samāʾ f-takhṭafuh ṭ-ṭayr ʾaw tahwī bih r-rīḥ fī makān saḥīq
english_saheeh_international: Inclining only to Allah, not associating anything with Him. And he who associates with Allah - it is as though he had fallen from the sky and was snatched by the birds or the wind carried him down into a remote place

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ وَمَن يُعَظِّم شَعائِرَ اللَّهِ فَإِنَّها مِن تَقوَى القُلوبِ
blank: dhālik w-m yuʿaẓẓim shaʿāʾir llāh f-ʾinnahā m taqwāl-qulūb
english_saheeh_international: That is so. And whoever honors the symbols of Allah - indeed, it is from the piety of hearts

arabic_uthmani: لَكُم فيها مَنافِعُ إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّها إِلَى البَيتِ العَتيقِ
blank: lakum fīhā manāfiʿ ʾilā ʾajal musamm thumm maḥilluhā ʾilāl-baytil-ʿatīq
english_saheeh_international: For you the animals marked for sacrifice are benefits for a specified term; then their place of sacrifice is at the ancient House

arabic_uthmani: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ جَعَلنا مَنسَكًا لِيَذكُرُوا اسمَ اللَّهِ عَلىٰ ما رَزَقَهُم مِن بَهيمَةِ الأَنعامِ ۗ فَإِلٰهُكُم إِلٰهٌ واحِدٌ فَلَهُ أَسلِموا ۗ وَبَشِّرِ المُخبِتينَ
blank: w-l-kull ʾummat jaʿalnā mansak l-yadhkurū sm llāh ʿalā mā razaqahum m bahīmatil-ʾanʿām f-ʾilāhukum ʾilāh wāḥid f-lahū ʾaslimū w-bashshiril-mukhbitīn
english_saheeh_international: And for all religion We have appointed a rite of sacrifice that they may mention the name of Allah over what He has provided for them of sacrificial animals. For your god is one God, so to Him submit. And, O Muhammad, give good tidings to the humble before their Lord

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ إِذا ذُكِرَ اللَّهُ وَجِلَت قُلوبُهُم وَالصّابِرينَ عَلىٰ ما أَصابَهُم وَالمُقيمِي الصَّلاةِ وَمِمّا رَزَقناهُم يُنفِقونَ
blank: alladhīn ʾidhā dhukir llāh wajilat qulūbuhum w-ṣ-ṣābirīn ʿalā mā ʾaṣābahum w-l-muqīmī ṣ-ṣalāt w-mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts are fearful, and to the patient over what has afflicted them, and the establishers of prayer and those who spend from what We have provided them

arabic_uthmani: وَالبُدنَ جَعَلناها لَكُم مِن شَعائِرِ اللَّهِ لَكُم فيها خَيرٌ ۖ فَاذكُرُوا اسمَ اللَّهِ عَلَيها صَوافَّ ۖ فَإِذا وَجَبَت جُنوبُها فَكُلوا مِنها وَأَطعِمُوا القانِعَ وَالمُعتَرَّ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ سَخَّرناها لَكُم لَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: w-l-budn jaʿalnāhā lakum m shaʿāʾir llāh lakum fīhā khayr f-dhkurū sm llāh ʿalayhā ṣawāff f-ʾidhā wajabat junūbuhā f-kulū minhā w-ʾaṭʿimūl-qāniʿ w-l-muʿtarr k-dhālik sakhkharnāhā lakum laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And the camels and cattle We have appointed for you as among the symbols of Allah; for you therein is good. So mention the name of Allah upon them when lined up for sacrifice; and when they are lifeless on their sides, then eat from them and feed the needy and the beggar. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may be grateful

arabic_uthmani: لَن يَنالَ اللَّهَ لُحومُها وَلا دِماؤُها وَلٰكِن يَنالُهُ التَّقوىٰ مِنكُم ۚ كَذٰلِكَ سَخَّرَها لَكُم لِتُكَبِّرُوا اللَّهَ عَلىٰ ما هَداكُم ۗ وَبَشِّرِ المُحسِنينَ
blank: l yanāl llāh luḥūmuhā w-lā dimāʾuhā w-lāk yanāluh t-taqwā minkum k-dhālik sakhkharahā lakum l-tukabbirū llāh ʿalā mā hadākum w-bashshiril-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: Their meat will not reach Allah, nor will their blood, but what reaches Him is piety from you. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may glorify Allah for that to which He has guided you; and give good tidings to the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدافِعُ عَنِ الَّذينَ آمَنوا ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوّانٍ كَفورٍ
blank: ʾinn llāh yudāfiʿ ʿanilladhīn ʾāmanū ʾinn llāh lā yuḥibb kull khawwān kafūr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone treacherous and ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: أُذِنَ لِلَّذينَ يُقاتَلونَ بِأَنَّهُم ظُلِموا ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ نَصرِهِم لَقَديرٌ
blank: ʾudhin l-lladhīn yuqātalūn b-ʾannahum ẓulimū w-ʾinn llāh ʿalā naṣrihim l-qadīr-
english_saheeh_international: Permission to fight has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory
