arabic_uthmani: وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا مِنكُم وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ لَيَستَخلِفَنَّهُم فِي الأَرضِ كَمَا استَخلَفَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم وَلَيُمَكِّنَنَّ لَهُم دينَهُمُ الَّذِي ارتَضىٰ لَهُم وَلَيُبَدِّلَنَّهُم مِن بَعدِ خَوفِهِم أَمنًا ۚ يَعبُدونَني لا يُشرِكونَ بي شَيئًا ۚ وَمَن كَفَرَ بَعدَ ذٰلِكَ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الفاسِقونَ
blank: waʿad llāhulladhīn ʾāmanū minkum w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt l-yastakhlifannahum fīl-ʾarḍ k-mā stakhlafalladhīn m qablihim w-l-yumakkinann lahum dīnahumulladhī rtaḍā lahum w-l-yubaddilannahum m baʿd khawfihim ʾamn yaʿbudūnanī lā yushrikūn bī shayʾ w-m kafar baʿd dhālik f-ʾulāʾik humul-fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah has promised those who have believed among you and done righteous deeds that He will surely grant them succession to authority upon the earth just as He granted it to those before them and that He will surely establish for them therein their religion which He has preferred for them and that He will surely substitute for them, after their fear, security, for they worship Me, not associating anything with Me. But whoever disbelieves after that - then those are the defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: وَأَقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكاةَ وَأَطيعُوا الرَّسولَ لَعَلَّكُم تُرحَمونَ
blank: w-ʾaqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātū z-zakāt w-ʾaṭīʿū r-rasūl laʿallakum turḥamūn
english_saheeh_international: And establish prayer and give zakah and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy

arabic_uthmani: لا تَحسَبَنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مُعجِزينَ فِي الأَرضِ ۚ وَمَأواهُمُ النّارُ ۖ وَلَبِئسَ المَصيرُ
blank: lā taḥsabannalladhīn kafarū muʿjizīn fīl-ʾarḍ w-maʾwāhum n-nār w-l-biʾsal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Never think that the disbelievers are causing failure to Allah upon the earth. Their refuge will be the Fire - and how wretched the destination

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لِيَستَأذِنكُمُ الَّذينَ مَلَكَت أَيمانُكُم وَالَّذينَ لَم يَبلُغُوا الحُلُمَ مِنكُم ثَلاثَ مَرّاتٍ ۚ مِن قَبلِ صَلاةِ الفَجرِ وَحينَ تَضَعونَ ثِيابَكُم مِنَ الظَّهيرَةِ وَمِن بَعدِ صَلاةِ العِشاءِ ۚ ثَلاثُ عَوراتٍ لَكُم ۚ لَيسَ عَلَيكُم وَلا عَلَيهِم جُناحٌ بَعدَهُنَّ ۚ طَوّافونَ عَلَيكُم بَعضُكُم عَلىٰ بَعضٍ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الآياتِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū l-yastaʾdhinkumulladhīn malakat ʾaymānukum w-lladhīn lam yablughūl-ḥulum minkum thalāth marrāt m qabl ṣalātil-fajr w-ḥīn taḍaʿūn thiyābakum min ẓ-ẓahīrat w-m baʿd ṣalātil-ʿishāʾ thalāth ʿawrāt lakum lays ʿalaykum w-lā ʿalayhim junāḥ baʿdahunn ṭawwāfūn ʿalaykum baʿḍukum ʿalā baʿḍ k-dhālik yubayyin llāh lakumul-ʾāyāt w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, let those whom your right hands possess and those who have not yet reached puberty among you ask permission of you before entering at three times: before the dawn prayer and when you put aside your clothing for rest at noon and after the night prayer. These are three times of privacy for you. There is no blame upon you nor upon them beyond these periods, for they continually circulate among you - some of you, among others. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا بَلَغَ الأَطفالُ مِنكُمُ الحُلُمَ فَليَستَأذِنوا كَمَا استَأذَنَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُم آياتِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-ʾidhā balaghal-ʾaṭfāl minkumul-ḥulum f-l-yastaʾdhinū k-mā staʾdhanalladhīn m qablihim k-dhālik yubayyin llāh lakum ʾāyātihī w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And when the children among you reach puberty, let them ask permission at all times as those before them have done. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَالقَواعِدُ مِنَ النِّساءِ اللّاتي لا يَرجونَ نِكاحًا فَلَيسَ عَلَيهِنَّ جُناحٌ أَن يَضَعنَ ثِيابَهُنَّ غَيرَ مُتَبَرِّجاتٍ بِزينَةٍ ۖ وَأَن يَستَعفِفنَ خَيرٌ لَهُنَّ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: w-l-qawāʿid min n-nisāʾ llātī lā yarjūn nikāḥ f-lays ʿalayhinn junāḥ ʾ yaḍaʿn thiyābahunn ghayr mutabarrijāt b-zīnat w-ʾ yastaʿfifn khayr lahunn w-llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And women of post-menstrual age who have no desire for marriage - there is no blame upon them for putting aside their outer garments but not displaying adornment. But to modestly refrain from that is better for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: لَيسَ عَلَى الأَعمىٰ حَرَجٌ وَلا عَلَى الأَعرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلا عَلَى المَريضِ حَرَجٌ وَلا عَلىٰ أَنفُسِكُم أَن تَأكُلوا مِن بُيوتِكُم أَو بُيوتِ آبائِكُم أَو بُيوتِ أُمَّهاتِكُم أَو بُيوتِ إِخوانِكُم أَو بُيوتِ أَخَواتِكُم أَو بُيوتِ أَعمامِكُم أَو بُيوتِ عَمّاتِكُم أَو بُيوتِ أَخوالِكُم أَو بُيوتِ خالاتِكُم أَو ما مَلَكتُم مَفاتِحَهُ أَو صَديقِكُم ۚ لَيسَ عَلَيكُم جُناحٌ أَن تَأكُلوا جَميعًا أَو أَشتاتًا ۚ فَإِذا دَخَلتُم بُيوتًا فَسَلِّموا عَلىٰ أَنفُسِكُم تَحِيَّةً مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ مُبارَكَةً طَيِّبَةً ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الآياتِ لَعَلَّكُم تَعقِلونَ
blank: lays ʿalāl-ʾaʿmā ḥaraj w-lā ʿalāl-ʾaʿraj ḥaraj w-lā ʿalāl-marīḍ ḥaraj w-lā ʿalā ʾanfusikum ʾ taʾkulū m buyūtikum ʾaw buyūt ʾābāʾikum ʾaw buyūt ʾummahātikum ʾaw buyūt ʾikhwānikum ʾaw buyūt ʾakhawātikum ʾaw buyūt ʾaʿmāmikum ʾaw buyūt ʿammātikum ʾaw buyūt ʾakhwālikum ʾaw buyūt khālātikum ʾaw mā malaktum mafātiḥahū ʾaw ṣadīqikum lays ʿalaykum junāḥ ʾ taʾkulū jamīʿ ʾaw ʾashtāt f-ʾidhā dakhaltum buyūt f-sallimū ʿalā ʾanfusikum taḥiyyatam-m ʿind llāh mubārakat ṭayyibat k-dhālik yubayyin llāh lakumul-ʾāyāt laʿallakum taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: There is not upon the blind any constraint nor upon the lame constraint nor upon the ill constraint nor upon yourselves when you eat from your own houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your father's brothers or the houses of your father's sisters or the houses of your mother's brothers or the houses of your mother's sisters or from houses whose keys you possess or from the house of your friend. There is no blame upon you whether you eat together or separately. But when you enter houses, give greetings of peace upon each other - a greeting from Allah, blessed and good. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses of ordinance that you may understand

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّمَا المُؤمِنونَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ وَإِذا كانوا مَعَهُ عَلىٰ أَمرٍ جامِعٍ لَم يَذهَبوا حَتّىٰ يَستَأذِنوهُ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَستَأذِنونَكَ أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ يُؤمِنونَ بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ ۚ فَإِذَا استَأذَنوكَ لِبَعضِ شَأنِهِم فَأذَن لِمَن شِئتَ مِنهُم وَاستَغفِر لَهُمُ اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: ʾinnamāl-muʾminūnalladhīn ʾāmanū b-llāh w-rasūlihī w-ʾidhā kānū maʿahū ʿalā ʾamr jāmiʿ lam yadhhabū ḥattā yastaʾdhinūh ʾinnalladhīn yastaʾdhinūnak ʾulāʾikalladhīn yuʾminūn b-llāh w-rasūlihī f-ʾidhā staʾdhanūk l-baʿḍ shaʾnihim f-ʾdh l-m shiʾt minhum w-staghfir lahum llāh ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: The believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and, when they are meeting with him for a matter of common interest, do not depart until they have asked his permission. Indeed, those who ask your permission, O Muhammad - those are the ones who believe in Allah and His Messenger. So when they ask your permission for something of their affairs, then give permission to whom you will among them and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: لا تَجعَلوا دُعاءَ الرَّسولِ بَينَكُم كَدُعاءِ بَعضِكُم بَعضًا ۚ قَد يَعلَمُ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ يَتَسَلَّلونَ مِنكُم لِواذًا ۚ فَليَحذَرِ الَّذينَ يُخالِفونَ عَن أَمرِهِ أَن تُصيبَهُم فِتنَةٌ أَو يُصيبَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: lā tajʿalū duʿāʾ r-rasūl baynakum k-duʿāʾ baʿḍikum baʿḍ qad yaʿlam llāhulladhīn yatasallalūn minkum liwādh f-l-yaḥdharilladhīn yukhālifūn ʿ ʾamrihī ʾ tuṣībahum fitnat ʾaw yuṣībahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Do not make your calling of the Messenger among yourselves as the call of one of you to another. Already Allah knows those of you who slip away, concealed by others. So let those beware who dissent from the Prophet's order, lest fitnah strike them or a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: أَلا إِنَّ لِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ قَد يَعلَمُ ما أَنتُم عَلَيهِ وَيَومَ يُرجَعونَ إِلَيهِ فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِما عَمِلوا ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: ʾ-lā ʾinn l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ qad yaʿlam mā ʾantum ʿalayh w-yawm yurjaʿūn ʾilayh f-yunabbiʾuhum b-mā ʿamilū w-llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Already He knows that upon which you stand and knows the Day when they will be returned to Him and He will inform them of what they have done. And Allah is Knowing of all things

arabic_uthmani: تَبارَكَ الَّذي نَزَّلَ الفُرقانَ عَلىٰ عَبدِهِ لِيَكونَ لِلعالَمينَ نَذيرًا
blank: tabārakalladhī nazzalal-furqān ʿalā ʿabdihī l-yakūn l-l-ʿālamīn nadhīr-
english_saheeh_international: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي لَهُ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَلَم يَتَّخِذ وَلَدًا وَلَم يَكُن لَهُ شَريكٌ فِي المُلكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَيءٍ فَقَدَّرَهُ تَقديرًا
blank: alladhī lahū mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-lam yattakhidh walad w-lam yak lahū sharīk fīl-mulk w-khalaq kull shayʾ f-qaddarahū taqdīr
english_saheeh_international: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and who has not taken a son and has not had a partner in dominion and has created each thing and determined it with precise determination

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّخَذوا مِن دونِهِ آلِهَةً لا يَخلُقونَ شَيئًا وَهُم يُخلَقونَ وَلا يَملِكونَ لِأَنفُسِهِم ضَرًّا وَلا نَفعًا وَلا يَملِكونَ مَوتًا وَلا حَياةً وَلا نُشورًا
blank: w-ttakhadhū m dūnihī ʾālihat lā yakhluqūn shayʾ w-hum yukhlaqūn w-lā yamlikūn l-ʾanfusihim ḍarr w-lā nafʿ w-lā yamlikūn mawt w-lā ḥayāt w-lā nushūr
english_saheeh_international: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not power to cause death or life or resurrection

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا إِن هٰذا إِلّا إِفكٌ افتَراهُ وَأَعانَهُ عَلَيهِ قَومٌ آخَرونَ ۖ فَقَد جاءوا ظُلمًا وَزورًا
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū ʾ hādhā ʾillā ʾifk- ftarāh w-ʾaʿānahū ʿalayh qawm ʾākharūn f-qad jāʾū ẓulm w-zūr
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieve say, "This Qur'an is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا أَساطيرُ الأَوَّلينَ اكتَتَبَها فَهِيَ تُملىٰ عَلَيهِ بُكرَةً وَأَصيلًا
blank: w-qālū ʾasāṭīrul-ʾawwalīn ktatabahā f-hiy tumlā ʿalayh bukrat w-ʾaṣīl
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَنزَلَهُ الَّذي يَعلَمُ السِّرَّ فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ غَفورًا رَحيمًا
blank: qul ʾanzalahulladhī yaʿlam s-sirr fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ʾinnahū kān ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "It has been revealed by He who knows every secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا مالِ هٰذَا الرَّسولِ يَأكُلُ الطَّعامَ وَيَمشي فِي الأَسواقِ ۙ لَولا أُنزِلَ إِلَيهِ مَلَكٌ فَيَكونَ مَعَهُ نَذيرًا
blank: w-qālū mā-l hādhā r-rasūl yaʾkul ṭ-ṭaʿām w-yamshī fīl-ʾaswāq law-lā ʾunzil ʾilayh malak f-yakūn maʿahū nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner

arabic_uthmani: أَو يُلقىٰ إِلَيهِ كَنزٌ أَو تَكونُ لَهُ جَنَّةٌ يَأكُلُ مِنها ۚ وَقالَ الظّالِمونَ إِن تَتَّبِعونَ إِلّا رَجُلًا مَسحورًا
blank: ʾaw yulqā ʾilayh kanz ʾaw takūn lahū jannat yaʾkul minhā w-qāl ẓ-ẓālimūn ʾ tattabiʿūn ʾillā rajulam-masḥūr-
english_saheeh_international: Or why is not a treasure presented to him from heaven, or does he not have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic

arabic_uthmani: انظُر كَيفَ ضَرَبوا لَكَ الأَمثالَ فَضَلّوا فَلا يَستَطيعونَ سَبيلًا
blank: unẓur kayf ḍarabū lakal-ʾamthāl f-ḍallū f-lā yastaṭīʿūn sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot find a way

arabic_uthmani: تَبارَكَ الَّذي إِن شاءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيرًا مِن ذٰلِكَ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ وَيَجعَل لَكَ قُصورًا
blank: tabārakalladhī ʾ shāʾ jaʿal lak khayram-m dhālik jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār w-yajʿal lak quṣūr
english_saheeh_international: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you something better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces

arabic_uthmani: بَل كَذَّبوا بِالسّاعَةِ ۖ وَأَعتَدنا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِالسّاعَةِ سَعيرًا
blank: bal kadhdhabū b-s-sāʿat w-ʾaʿtadnā l-m kadhdhab b-s-sāʿat saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze

arabic_uthmani: إِذا رَأَتهُم مِن مَكانٍ بَعيدٍ سَمِعوا لَها تَغَيُّظًا وَزَفيرًا
blank: ʾidhā raʾathum m makān baʿīd samiʿū lahā taghayyuẓ w-zafīr
english_saheeh_international: When the Hellfire sees them from a distant place, they will hear its fury and roaring

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا أُلقوا مِنها مَكانًا ضَيِّقًا مُقَرَّنينَ دَعَوا هُنالِكَ ثُبورًا
blank: w-ʾidhā ʾulqū minhā makān ḍayyiqam-muqarranīn daʿaw hunālik thubūr
english_saheeh_international: And when they are thrown into a narrow place therein bound in chains, they will cry out thereupon for destruction

arabic_uthmani: لا تَدعُوا اليَومَ ثُبورًا واحِدًا وَادعوا ثُبورًا كَثيرًا
blank: lā tadʿūl-yawm thubūr wāḥid w-dʿū thubūr kathīr
english_saheeh_international: They will be told, "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَذٰلِكَ خَيرٌ أَم جَنَّةُ الخُلدِ الَّتي وُعِدَ المُتَّقونَ ۚ كانَت لَهُم جَزاءً وَمَصيرًا
blank: qul ʾ-dhālik khayr ʾam jannatul-khuld llatī wuʿidal-muttaqūn kānat lahum jazāʾ w-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination

arabic_uthmani: لَهُم فيها ما يَشاءونَ خالِدينَ ۚ كانَ عَلىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعدًا مَسئولًا
blank: lahum fīhā mā yashāʾūn khālidīn kān ʿalā rabbik waʿdam-masʾūl
english_saheeh_international: For them therein is whatever they wish, while abiding eternally. It is ever upon your Lord a promise worthy to be requested

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يَحشُرُهُم وَما يَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ فَيَقولُ أَأَنتُم أَضلَلتُم عِبادي هٰؤُلاءِ أَم هُم ضَلُّوا السَّبيلَ
blank: w-yawm yaḥshuruhum w-mā yaʿbudūn m dūn llāh f-yaqūl ʾ-ʾantum ʾaḍlaltum ʿibādī hāʾulāʾ ʾam hum ḍallū s-sabīl
english_saheeh_international: And mention the Day He will gather them and that which they worship besides Allah and will say, "Did you mislead these, My servants, or did they themselves stray from the way

arabic_uthmani: قالوا سُبحانَكَ ما كانَ يَنبَغي لَنا أَن نَتَّخِذَ مِن دونِكَ مِن أَولِياءَ وَلٰكِن مَتَّعتَهُم وَآباءَهُم حَتّىٰ نَسُوا الذِّكرَ وَكانوا قَومًا بورًا
blank: qālū subḥānak mā kān yanbaghī lanā ʾ nattakhidh m dūnik m ʾawliyāʾ w-lāk mattaʿtahum w-ʾābāʾahum ḥattā nasū dh-dhikr w-kānū qawm būr
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for us to take besides You any allies. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot the message and became a people ruined

arabic_uthmani: فَقَد كَذَّبوكُم بِما تَقولونَ فَما تَستَطيعونَ صَرفًا وَلا نَصرًا ۚ وَمَن يَظلِم مِنكُم نُذِقهُ عَذابًا كَبيرًا
blank: f-qad kadhdhabūkum b-mā taqūlūn f-mā tastaṭīʿūn ṣarf w-lā naṣr w-m yaẓlim minkum nudhiqh ʿadhāb kabīr
english_saheeh_international: So they will deny you, disbelievers, in what you say, and you cannot avert punishment or find help. And whoever commits injustice among you - We will make him taste a great punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلنا قَبلَكَ مِنَ المُرسَلينَ إِلّا إِنَّهُم لَيَأكُلونَ الطَّعامَ وَيَمشونَ فِي الأَسواقِ ۗ وَجَعَلنا بَعضَكُم لِبَعضٍ فِتنَةً أَتَصبِرونَ ۗ وَكانَ رَبُّكَ بَصيرًا
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnā qablak minal-mursalīn ʾillā ʾinnahum l-yaʾkulūn ṭ-ṭaʿām w-yamshūn fīl-ʾaswāq w-jaʿalnā baʿḍakum l-baʿḍ fitnat ʾ-taṣbirūn w-kān rabbuk baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And We did not send before you, O Muhammad, any of the messengers except that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We have made some of you people as trial for others - will you have patience? And ever is your Lord, Seeing

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَقالَ الَّذينَ لا يَرجونَ لِقاءَنا لَولا أُنزِلَ عَلَينَا المَلائِكَةُ أَو نَرىٰ رَبَّنا ۗ لَقَدِ استَكبَروا في أَنفُسِهِم وَعَتَوا عُتُوًّا كَبيرًا
blank: w-qālalladhīn lā yarjūn liqāʾanā law-lā ʾunzil ʿalaynāl-malāʾikat ʾaw narā rabbanā l-qad stakbarū fī ʾanfusihim w-ʿataw ʿutuww kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Why were not angels sent down to us, or why do we not see our Lord?" They have certainly become arrogant within themselves and become insolent with great insolence

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَرَونَ المَلائِكَةَ لا بُشرىٰ يَومَئِذٍ لِلمُجرِمينَ وَيَقولونَ حِجرًا مَحجورًا
blank: yawm yarawnal-malāʾikat lā bushrā yawmaʾidh l-l-mujrimīn w-yaqūlūn ḥijram-maḥjūr
english_saheeh_international: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and the angels will say, "Prevented and inaccessible

arabic_uthmani: وَقَدِمنا إِلىٰ ما عَمِلوا مِن عَمَلٍ فَجَعَلناهُ هَباءً مَنثورًا
blank: w-qadimnā ʾilā mā ʿamilū m ʿamal f-jaʿalnāh habāʾam-manthūr
english_saheeh_international: And We will regard what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed

arabic_uthmani: أَصحابُ الجَنَّةِ يَومَئِذٍ خَيرٌ مُستَقَرًّا وَأَحسَنُ مَقيلًا
blank: ʾaṣḥābul-jannat yawmaʾidh khayr mustaqarr w-ʾaḥsan maqīl
english_saheeh_international: The companions of Paradise, that Day, are in a better settlement and better resting place

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ تَشَقَّقُ السَّماءُ بِالغَمامِ وَنُزِّلَ المَلائِكَةُ تَنزيلًا
blank: w-yawm tashaqqaq s-samāʾ b-l-ghamām w-nuzzilal-malāʾikat tanzīl-
english_saheeh_international: And mention the Day when the heaven will split open with emerging clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive descent

arabic_uthmani: المُلكُ يَومَئِذٍ الحَقُّ لِلرَّحمٰنِ ۚ وَكانَ يَومًا عَلَى الكافِرينَ عَسيرًا
blank: al-mulk yawmaʾidh-il-ḥaqq l-r-raḥmān w-kān yawm ʿalāl-kāfirīn ʿasīr
english_saheeh_international: True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful. And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يَعَضُّ الظّالِمُ عَلىٰ يَدَيهِ يَقولُ يا لَيتَنِي اتَّخَذتُ مَعَ الرَّسولِ سَبيلًا
blank: w-yawm yaʿaḍḍ ẓ-ẓālim ʿalā yadayh yaqūl yā-laytanī ttakhadht maʿ r-rasūl sabīl
english_saheeh_international: And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands in regret he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way

arabic_uthmani: يا وَيلَتىٰ لَيتَني لَم أَتَّخِذ فُلانًا خَليلًا
blank: yā-waylatā laytanī lam ʾattakhidh fulān khalīl
english_saheeh_international: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد أَضَلَّني عَنِ الذِّكرِ بَعدَ إِذ جاءَني ۗ وَكانَ الشَّيطانُ لِلإِنسانِ خَذولًا
blank: l-qad ʾaḍallanī ʿan dh-dhikr baʿd ʾidh jāʾanī w-kān sh-shayṭān l-l-ʾinsān khadhūl
english_saheeh_international: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الرَّسولُ يا رَبِّ إِنَّ قَومِي اتَّخَذوا هٰذَا القُرآنَ مَهجورًا
blank: w-qāl r-rasūl yā-rabb ʾinn qawmī ttakhadhū hādhāl-qurʾān mahjūr
english_saheeh_international: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as a thing abandoned

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ جَعَلنا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوًّا مِنَ المُجرِمينَ ۗ وَكَفىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هادِيًا وَنَصيرًا
blank: w-k-dhālik jaʿalnā l-kull nabiyy ʿaduwwam-minal-mujrimīn w-kafā b-rabbik hādiy w-naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And thus have We made for every prophet an enemy from among the criminals. But sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a helper

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لَولا نُزِّلَ عَلَيهِ القُرآنُ جُملَةً واحِدَةً ۚ كَذٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِ فُؤادَكَ ۖ وَرَتَّلناهُ تَرتيلًا
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū law-lā nuzzil ʿalayhil-qurʾān jumlat wāḥidat k-dhālik l-nuthabbit bihī fuʾādak w-rattalnāh tartīl
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur'an not revealed to him all at once?" Thus it is that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَأتونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلّا جِئناكَ بِالحَقِّ وَأَحسَنَ تَفسيرًا
blank: w-lā yaʾtūnak b-mathal ʾillā jiʾnāk b-l-ḥaqq w-ʾaḥsan tafsīr-
english_saheeh_international: And they do not come to you with an argument except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُحشَرونَ عَلىٰ وُجوهِهِم إِلىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُولٰئِكَ شَرٌّ مَكانًا وَأَضَلُّ سَبيلًا
blank: alladhīn yuḥsharūn ʿalā wujūhihim ʾilā jahannam ʾulāʾik sharr makān w-ʾaḍall sabīl
english_saheeh_international: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in their way

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَينا موسَى الكِتابَ وَجَعَلنا مَعَهُ أَخاهُ هارونَ وَزيرًا
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā mūsāl-kitāb w-jaʿalnā maʿahū ʾakhāh hārūn wazīr
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant

arabic_uthmani: فَقُلنَا اذهَبا إِلَى القَومِ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا فَدَمَّرناهُم تَدميرًا
blank: f-qulnā dhhabā ʾilāl-qawmilladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā f-dammarnāhum tadmīr
english_saheeh_international: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with complete destruction

arabic_uthmani: وَقَومَ نوحٍ لَمّا كَذَّبُوا الرُّسُلَ أَغرَقناهُم وَجَعَلناهُم لِلنّاسِ آيَةً ۖ وَأَعتَدنا لِلظّالِمينَ عَذابًا أَليمًا
blank: w-qawm nūḥ lammā kadhdhabū r-rusul ʾaghraqnāhum w-jaʿalnāhum l-n-nās ʾāyat w-ʾaʿtadnā l-ẓ-ẓālimīn ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَعادًا وَثَمودَ وَأَصحابَ الرَّسِّ وَقُرونًا بَينَ ذٰلِكَ كَثيرًا
blank: w-ʿād w-thamūd w-ʾaṣḥāb r-rass w-qurūn bayn dhālik kathīr
english_saheeh_international: And We destroyed 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them

arabic_uthmani: وَكُلًّا ضَرَبنا لَهُ الأَمثالَ ۖ وَكُلًّا تَبَّرنا تَتبيرًا
blank: w-kull ḍarabnā lahul-ʾamthāl w-kull tabbarnā tatbīr
english_saheeh_international: And for each We presented examples as warnings, and each We destroyed with total destruction

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَتَوا عَلَى القَريَةِ الَّتي أُمطِرَت مَطَرَ السَّوءِ ۚ أَفَلَم يَكونوا يَرَونَها ۚ بَل كانوا لا يَرجونَ نُشورًا
blank: w-l-qad ʾataw ʿalāl-qaryat llatī ʾumṭirat maṭar s-sawʾ ʾ-f-lam yakūnū yarawnahā bal kānū lā yarjūn nushūr
english_saheeh_international: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا رَأَوكَ إِن يَتَّخِذونَكَ إِلّا هُزُوًا أَهٰذَا الَّذي بَعَثَ اللَّهُ رَسولًا
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾawk ʾ yattakhidhūnak ʾillā huzuw ʾ-hādhālladhī baʿath llāh rasūl
english_saheeh_international: And when they see you, O Muhammad, they take you not except in ridicule, saying, "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger

arabic_uthmani: إِن كادَ لَيُضِلُّنا عَن آلِهَتِنا لَولا أَن صَبَرنا عَلَيها ۚ وَسَوفَ يَعلَمونَ حينَ يَرَونَ العَذابَ مَن أَضَلُّ سَبيلًا
blank: ʾ kād l-yuḍillunā ʿ ʾālihatinā law-lā ʾ ṣabarnā ʿalayhā w-sawf yaʿlamūn ḥīn yarawnal-ʿadhāb m ʾaḍall sabīl
english_saheeh_international: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in worship of them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in his way

arabic_uthmani: أَرَأَيتَ مَنِ اتَّخَذَ إِلٰهَهُ هَواهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكونُ عَلَيهِ وَكيلًا
blank: ʾ-raʾayt man ttakhadh ʾilāhahū hawāh ʾ-f-ʾant takūn ʿalayh wakīl
english_saheeh_international: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him

arabic_uthmani: أَم تَحسَبُ أَنَّ أَكثَرَهُم يَسمَعونَ أَو يَعقِلونَ ۚ إِن هُم إِلّا كَالأَنعامِ ۖ بَل هُم أَضَلُّ سَبيلًا
blank: ʾam taḥsab ʾann ʾaktharahum yasmaʿūn ʾaw yaʿqilūn ʾ hum ʾillā k-l-ʾanʿām bal hum ʾaḍall sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are even more astray in their way

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ إِلىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيفَ مَدَّ الظِّلَّ وَلَو شاءَ لَجَعَلَهُ ساكِنًا ثُمَّ جَعَلنَا الشَّمسَ عَلَيهِ دَليلًا
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾilā rabbik kayf madd ẓ-ẓill w-law shāʾ l-jaʿalahū sākin thumm jaʿalnā sh-shams ʿalayh dalīl
english_saheeh_international: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ قَبَضناهُ إِلَينا قَبضًا يَسيرًا
blank: thumm qabaḍnāh ʾilaynā qabḍ yasīr
english_saheeh_international: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ اللَّيلَ لِباسًا وَالنَّومَ سُباتًا وَجَعَلَ النَّهارَ نُشورًا
blank: w-huwalladhī jaʿal lakumul-layl libās w-n-nawm subāt w-jaʿal n-nahār nushūr
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep a means for rest and has made the day a resurrection

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي أَرسَلَ الرِّياحَ بُشرًا بَينَ يَدَي رَحمَتِهِ ۚ وَأَنزَلنا مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً طَهورًا
blank: w-huwalladhī ʾarsal r-riyāḥ bushr bayn yaday raḥmatihī w-ʾanzalnā min s-samāʾ māʾ ṭahūr
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy, and We send down from the sky pure water

arabic_uthmani: لِنُحيِيَ بِهِ بَلدَةً مَيتًا وَنُسقِيَهُ مِمّا خَلَقنا أَنعامًا وَأَناسِيَّ كَثيرًا
blank: l-nuḥyiy bihī baldatam-mayt w-nusqiyahū mimmā khalaqnā ʾanʿām w-ʾanāsiyy kathīr
english_saheeh_international: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد صَرَّفناهُ بَينَهُم لِيَذَّكَّروا فَأَبىٰ أَكثَرُ النّاسِ إِلّا كُفورًا
blank: w-l-qad ṣarrafnāh baynahum l-yadhdhakkarū f-ʾabā ʾakthar n-nās ʾillā kufūr
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو شِئنا لَبَعَثنا في كُلِّ قَريَةٍ نَذيرًا
blank: w-law shiʾnā l-baʿathnā fī kull qaryat nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner

arabic_uthmani: فَلا تُطِعِ الكافِرينَ وَجاهِدهُم بِهِ جِهادًا كَبيرًا
blank: f-lā tuṭiʿil-kāfirīn w-jāhidhum bihī jihād kabīr
english_saheeh_international: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَهُوَ الَّذي مَرَجَ البَحرَينِ هٰذا عَذبٌ فُراتٌ وَهٰذا مِلحٌ أُجاجٌ وَجَعَلَ بَينَهُما بَرزَخًا وَحِجرًا مَحجورًا
blank: w-huwalladhī marajal-baḥrayn hādhā ʿadhb furāt w-hādhā milḥ ʾujāj w-jaʿal baynahumā barzakh w-ḥijram-maḥjūr
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who has released simultaneously the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَ مِنَ الماءِ بَشَرًا فَجَعَلَهُ نَسَبًا وَصِهرًا ۗ وَكانَ رَبُّكَ قَديرًا
blank: w-huwalladhī khalaq minal-māʾ bashar f-jaʿalahū nasab w-ṣihr w-kān rabbuk qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him a relative by lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent concerning creation

arabic_uthmani: وَيَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ما لا يَنفَعُهُم وَلا يَضُرُّهُم ۗ وَكانَ الكافِرُ عَلىٰ رَبِّهِ ظَهيرًا
blank: w-yaʿbudūn m dūn llāh mā lā yanfaʿuhum w-lā yaḍurruhum w-kānal-kāfir ʿalā rabbihī ẓahīr
english_saheeh_international: But they worship rather than Allah that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant to Satan

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلناكَ إِلّا مُبَشِّرًا وَنَذيرًا
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnāk ʾillā mubashshir w-nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: And We have not sent you, O Muhammad, except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner

arabic_uthmani: قُل ما أَسأَلُكُم عَلَيهِ مِن أَجرٍ إِلّا مَن شاءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبيلًا
blank: qul mā ʾasʾalukum ʿalayh m ʾajr ʾillā m shāʾ ʾ yattakhidh ʾilā rabbihī sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Say, "I do not ask of you for it any payment - only that whoever wills might take to his Lord a way

arabic_uthmani: وَتَوَكَّل عَلَى الحَيِّ الَّذي لا يَموتُ وَسَبِّح بِحَمدِهِ ۚ وَكَفىٰ بِهِ بِذُنوبِ عِبادِهِ خَبيرًا
blank: w-tawakkal ʿalāl-ḥayyilladhī lā yamūt w-sabbiḥ b-ḥamdihī w-kafā bihī b-dhunūb ʿibādihī khabīr-
english_saheeh_international: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt Allah with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَما بَينَهُما في سِتَّةِ أَيّامٍ ثُمَّ استَوىٰ عَلَى العَرشِ ۚ الرَّحمٰنُ فَاسأَل بِهِ خَبيرًا
blank: alladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā fī sittat ʾayyām thumm stawā ʿalāl-ʿarsh r-raḥmān f-sʾal bihī khabīr
english_saheeh_international: He who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne - the Most Merciful, so ask about Him one well informed

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُمُ اسجُدوا لِلرَّحمٰنِ قالوا وَمَا الرَّحمٰنُ أَنَسجُدُ لِما تَأمُرُنا وَزادَهُم نُفورًا ۩
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lahum sjudū l-r-raḥmān qālū w-mā r-raḥmān ʾ-nasjud l-mā taʾmurunā w-zādahum nufūr
english_saheeh_international: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate to the Most Merciful," they say, "And what is the Most Merciful? Should we prostrate to that which you order us?" And it increases them in aversion

arabic_uthmani: تَبارَكَ الَّذي جَعَلَ فِي السَّماءِ بُروجًا وَجَعَلَ فيها سِراجًا وَقَمَرًا مُنيرًا
blank: tabārakalladhī jaʿal fī s-samāʾ burūj w-jaʿal fīhā sirāj w-qamaram-munīr
english_saheeh_international: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a burning lamp and luminous moon

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي جَعَلَ اللَّيلَ وَالنَّهارَ خِلفَةً لِمَن أَرادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَو أَرادَ شُكورًا
blank: w-huwalladhī jaʿalal-layl w-n-nahār khilfat l-m ʾarād ʾ yadhdhakkar ʾaw ʾarād shukūr
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession for whoever desires to remember or desires gratitude

arabic_uthmani: وَعِبادُ الرَّحمٰنِ الَّذينَ يَمشونَ عَلَى الأَرضِ هَونًا وَإِذا خاطَبَهُمُ الجاهِلونَ قالوا سَلامًا
blank: w-ʿibād r-raḥmānilladhīn yamshūn ʿalāl-ʾarḍ hawn w-ʾidhā khāṭabahumul-jāhilūn qālū salām
english_saheeh_international: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them harshly, they say words of peace

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يَبيتونَ لِرَبِّهِم سُجَّدًا وَقِيامًا
blank: w-lladhīn yabītūn l-rabbihim sujjad w-qiyām
english_saheeh_international: And those who spend part of the night to their Lord prostrating and standing in prayer

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يَقولونَ رَبَّنَا اصرِف عَنّا عَذابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذابَها كانَ غَرامًا
blank: w-lladhīn yaqūlūn rabbanā ṣrif ʿannā ʿadhāb jahannam ʾinn ʿadhābahā kān gharām
english_saheeh_international: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّها ساءَت مُستَقَرًّا وَمُقامًا
blank: ʾinnahā sāʾat mustaqarr w-muqām
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ إِذا أَنفَقوا لَم يُسرِفوا وَلَم يَقتُروا وَكانَ بَينَ ذٰلِكَ قَوامًا
blank: w-lladhīn ʾidhā ʾanfaqū lam yusrifū w-lam yaqturū w-kān bayn dhālik qawām
english_saheeh_international: And they are those who, when they spend, do so not excessively or sparingly but are ever, between that, justly moderate

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ لا يَدعونَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلٰهًا آخَرَ وَلا يَقتُلونَ النَّفسَ الَّتي حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ إِلّا بِالحَقِّ وَلا يَزنونَ ۚ وَمَن يَفعَل ذٰلِكَ يَلقَ أَثامًا
blank: w-lladhīn lā yadʿūn maʿ llāh ʾilāh ʾākhar w-lā yaqtulūn n-nafs llatī ḥarram llāh ʾillā b-l-ḥaqq w-lā yaznūn w-m yafʿal dhālik yalq ʾathām
english_saheeh_international: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden to be killed, except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty

arabic_uthmani: يُضاعَف لَهُ العَذابُ يَومَ القِيامَةِ وَيَخلُد فيهِ مُهانًا
blank: yuḍāʿaf lahul-ʿadhāb yawmal-qiyāmat w-yakhlud fīh muhān
english_saheeh_international: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا مَن تابَ وَآمَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًا صالِحًا فَأُولٰئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ اللَّهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِم حَسَناتٍ ۗ وَكانَ اللَّهُ غَفورًا رَحيمًا
blank: ʾillā m tāb w-ʾāman w-ʿamil ʿamal ṣāliḥ f-ʾulāʾik yubaddil llāh sayyiʾātihim ḥasanāt w-kān llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن تابَ وَعَمِلَ صالِحًا فَإِنَّهُ يَتوبُ إِلَى اللَّهِ مَتابًا
blank: w-m tāb w-ʿamil ṣāliḥ f-ʾinnahū yatūb ʾilā llāh matāb
english_saheeh_international: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with accepted repentance

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ لا يَشهَدونَ الزّورَ وَإِذا مَرّوا بِاللَّغوِ مَرّوا كِرامًا
blank: w-lladhīn lā yashhadūn z-zūr w-ʾidhā marrū b-l-laghw marrū kirām
english_saheeh_international: And they are those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ إِذا ذُكِّروا بِآياتِ رَبِّهِم لَم يَخِرّوا عَلَيها صُمًّا وَعُميانًا
blank: w-lladhīn ʾidhā dhukkirū b-ʾāyāt rabbihim lam yakhirrū ʿalayhā ṣumm w-ʿumyān
english_saheeh_international: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يَقولونَ رَبَّنا هَب لَنا مِن أَزواجِنا وَذُرِّيّاتِنا قُرَّةَ أَعيُنٍ وَاجعَلنا لِلمُتَّقينَ إِمامًا
blank: w-lladhīn yaqūlūn rabbanā hab lanā m ʾazwājinā w-dhurriyyātinā qurrat ʾaʿyun w-jʿalnā l-l-muttaqīn ʾimām
english_saheeh_international: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ يُجزَونَ الغُرفَةَ بِما صَبَروا وَيُلَقَّونَ فيها تَحِيَّةً وَسَلامًا
blank: ʾulāʾik yujzawnal-ghurfat b-mā ṣabarū w-yulaqqawn fīhā taḥiyyat w-salām
english_saheeh_international: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and words of peace

arabic_uthmani: خالِدينَ فيها ۚ حَسُنَت مُستَقَرًّا وَمُقامًا
blank: khālidīn fīhā ḥasunat mustaqarr w-muqām
english_saheeh_international: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence

arabic_uthmani: قُل ما يَعبَأُ بِكُم رَبّي لَولا دُعاؤُكُم ۖ فَقَد كَذَّبتُم فَسَوفَ يَكونُ لِزامًا
blank: qul mā yaʿbaʾ bikum rabbī law-lā duʿāʾukum f-qad kadhdhabtum f-sawf yakūn lizām
english_saheeh_international: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you disbelievers have denied, so your denial is going to be adherent

arabic_uthmani: طسم
blank: ṭ-s-m (ṭā sīn mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Ta, Seen, Meem

arabic_uthmani: تِلكَ آياتُ الكِتابِ المُبينِ
blank: tilk ʾāyātul-kitābil-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: These are the verses of the clear Book

arabic_uthmani: لَعَلَّكَ باخِعٌ نَفسَكَ أَلّا يَكونوا مُؤمِنينَ
blank: laʿallak bākhiʿ nafsak ʾallā yakūnū muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Perhaps, O Muhammad, you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers

arabic_uthmani: إِن نَشَأ نُنَزِّل عَلَيهِم مِنَ السَّماءِ آيَةً فَظَلَّت أَعناقُهُم لَها خاضِعينَ
blank: ʾ nashaʾ nunazzil ʿalayhim min s-samāʾ ʾāyat f-ẓallat ʾaʿnāquhum lahā khāḍiʿīn
english_saheeh_international: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَأتيهِم مِن ذِكرٍ مِنَ الرَّحمٰنِ مُحدَثٍ إِلّا كانوا عَنهُ مُعرِضينَ
blank: w-mā yaʾtīhim m dhikr min r-raḥmān muḥdath ʾillā kānū ʿanh muʿriḍīn
english_saheeh_international: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it

arabic_uthmani: فَقَد كَذَّبوا فَسَيَأتيهِم أَنباءُ ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: f-qad kadhdhabū f-s-yaʾtīhim ʾanbāʾ mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا إِلَى الأَرضِ كَم أَنبَتنا فيها مِن كُلِّ زَوجٍ كَريمٍ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾilāl-ʾarḍ kam ʾanbatnā fīhā m kull zawj karīm
english_saheeh_international: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَما كانَ أَكثَرُهُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat w-mā kān ʾaktharuhum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ العَزيزُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: w-ʾinn rabbak l-huwal-ʿazīz r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ نادىٰ رَبُّكَ موسىٰ أَنِ ائتِ القَومَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-ʾidh nādā rabbuk mūsā ʾan ʾtil-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention when your Lord called Moses, saying, "Go to the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: قَومَ فِرعَونَ ۚ أَلا يَتَّقونَ
blank: qawm firʿawn ʾ-lā yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ إِنّي أَخافُ أَن يُكَذِّبونِ
blank: qāl rabb ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʾ yukadhdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me

arabic_uthmani: وَيَضيقُ صَدري وَلا يَنطَلِقُ لِساني فَأَرسِل إِلىٰ هارونَ
blank: w-yaḍīq ṣadrī w-lā yanṭaliq lisānī f-ʾarsil ʾilā hārūn
english_saheeh_international: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron

arabic_uthmani: وَلَهُم عَلَيَّ ذَنبٌ فَأَخافُ أَن يَقتُلونِ
blank: w-lahum ʿalayy dhanb f-ʾakhāf ʾ yaqtulūn
english_saheeh_international: And they have upon me a claim due to sin, so I fear that they will kill me

arabic_uthmani: قالَ كَلّا ۖ فَاذهَبا بِآياتِنا ۖ إِنّا مَعَكُم مُستَمِعونَ
blank: qāl kallā f-dhhabā b-ʾāyātinā ʾinnā maʿakum mustamiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening

arabic_uthmani: فَأتِيا فِرعَونَ فَقولا إِنّا رَسولُ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: f-ʾtiyā firʿawn f-qūlā ʾinnā rasūl rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: أَن أَرسِل مَعَنا بَني إِسرائيلَ
blank: ʾ ʾarsil maʿanā banī ʾisrāʾīl
english_saheeh_international: Commanded to say, "Send with us the Children of Israel

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَلَم نُرَبِّكَ فينا وَليدًا وَلَبِثتَ فينا مِن عُمُرِكَ سِنينَ
blank: qāl ʾ-lam nurabbik fīnā walīd w-labitht fīnā m ʿumurik sinīn
english_saheeh_international: Pharaoh said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life

arabic_uthmani: وَفَعَلتَ فَعلَتَكَ الَّتي فَعَلتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ الكافِرينَ
blank: w-faʿalt faʿlatak llatī faʿalt w-ʾant minal-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And then you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَعَلتُها إِذًا وَأَنا مِنَ الضّالّينَ
blank: qāl faʿaltuhā ʾidh w-ʾan min ḍ-ḍāllīn
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray

arabic_uthmani: فَفَرَرتُ مِنكُم لَمّا خِفتُكُم فَوَهَبَ لي رَبّي حُكمًا وَجَعَلَني مِنَ المُرسَلينَ
blank: f-farart minkum lammā khiftukum f-wahab lī rabbī ḥukm w-jaʿalanī minal-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me as one of the messengers

arabic_uthmani: وَتِلكَ نِعمَةٌ تَمُنُّها عَلَيَّ أَن عَبَّدتَ بَني إِسرائيلَ
blank: w-tilk niʿmat tamunnuhā ʿalayy ʾ ʿabbadt banī ʾisrāʾīl
english_saheeh_international: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فِرعَونُ وَما رَبُّ العالَمينَ
blank: qāl firʿawn w-mā rabbul-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبُّ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَما بَينَهُما ۖ إِن كُنتُم موقِنينَ
blank: qāl rabb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā ʾ kuntum mūqinīn
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لِمَن حَولَهُ أَلا تَستَمِعونَ
blank: qāl l-m ḥawlahū ʾ-lā tastamiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Pharaoh said to those around him, "Do you not hear

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبُّكُم وَرَبُّ آبائِكُمُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: qāl rabbukum w-rabb ʾābāʾikumul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِنَّ رَسولَكُمُ الَّذي أُرسِلَ إِلَيكُم لَمَجنونٌ
blank: qāl ʾinn rasūlakumulladhī ʾursil ʾilaykum l-majnūn
english_saheeh_international: Pharaoh said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبُّ المَشرِقِ وَالمَغرِبِ وَما بَينَهُما ۖ إِن كُنتُم تَعقِلونَ
blank: qāl rabbul-mashriq w-l-maghrib w-mā baynahumā ʾ kuntum taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لَئِنِ اتَّخَذتَ إِلٰهًا غَيري لَأَجعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ المَسجونينَ
blank: qāl l-ʾin ttakhadht ʾilāh ghayrī l-ʾajʿalannak minal-masjūnīn
english_saheeh_international: Pharaoh said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَوَلَو جِئتُكَ بِشَيءٍ مُبينٍ
blank: qāl ʾ-w-law jiʾtuk b-shayʾ mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَأتِ بِهِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصّادِقينَ
blank: qāl f-ʾt bihī ʾ kunt min ṣ-ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Pharaoh said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful

arabic_uthmani: فَأَلقىٰ عَصاهُ فَإِذا هِيَ ثُعبانٌ مُبينٌ
blank: f-ʾalqā ʿaṣāh f-ʾidhā hiy thuʿbān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So Moses threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest

arabic_uthmani: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُ فَإِذا هِيَ بَيضاءُ لِلنّاظِرينَ
blank: w-nazaʿ yadahū f-ʾidhā hiy bayḍāʾ l-n-nāẓirīn
english_saheeh_international: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لِلمَلَإِ حَولَهُ إِنَّ هٰذا لَساحِرٌ عَليمٌ
blank: qāl l-l-malaʾ ḥawlahū ʾinn hādhā l-sāḥir ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Pharaoh said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician

arabic_uthmani: يُريدُ أَن يُخرِجَكُم مِن أَرضِكُم بِسِحرِهِ فَماذا تَأمُرونَ
blank: yurīd ʾ yukhrijakum m ʾarḍikum b-siḥrihī f-mādhā taʾmurūn
english_saheeh_international: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise

arabic_uthmani: قالوا أَرجِه وَأَخاهُ وَابعَث فِي المَدائِنِ حاشِرينَ
blank: qālū ʾarjih w-ʾakhāh w-bʿath fīl-madāʾin ḥāshirīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Postpone the matter of him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers

arabic_uthmani: يَأتوكَ بِكُلِّ سَحّارٍ عَليمٍ
blank: yaʾtūk b-kull saḥḥār ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician

arabic_uthmani: فَجُمِعَ السَّحَرَةُ لِميقاتِ يَومٍ مَعلومٍ
blank: f-jumiʿ s-saḥarat l-mīqāt yawm maʿlūm
english_saheeh_international: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day

arabic_uthmani: وَقيلَ لِلنّاسِ هَل أَنتُم مُجتَمِعونَ
blank: w-qīl l-n-nās hal ʾantum mujtamiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate

arabic_uthmani: لَعَلَّنا نَتَّبِعُ السَّحَرَةَ إِن كانوا هُمُ الغالِبينَ
blank: laʿallanā nattabiʿ s-saḥarat ʾ kānū humul-ghālibīn
english_saheeh_international: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَ السَّحَرَةُ قالوا لِفِرعَونَ أَئِنَّ لَنا لَأَجرًا إِن كُنّا نَحنُ الغالِبينَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾ s-saḥarat qālū l-firʿawn ʾ-ʾinn lanā l-ʾajr ʾ kunnā naḥnul-ghālibīn
english_saheeh_international: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant

arabic_uthmani: قالَ نَعَم وَإِنَّكُم إِذًا لَمِنَ المُقَرَّبينَ
blank: qāl naʿam w-ʾinnakum ʾidh l-minal-muqarrabīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near to me

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لَهُم موسىٰ أَلقوا ما أَنتُم مُلقونَ
blank: qāl lahum mūsā ʾalqū mā ʾantum mulqūn
english_saheeh_international: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw

arabic_uthmani: فَأَلقَوا حِبالَهُم وَعِصِيَّهُم وَقالوا بِعِزَّةِ فِرعَونَ إِنّا لَنَحنُ الغالِبونَ
blank: f-ʾalqaw ḥibālahum w-ʿiṣiyyahum w-qālū b-ʿizzat firʿawn ʾinnā l-naḥnul-ghālibūn
english_saheeh_international: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant

arabic_uthmani: فَأَلقىٰ موسىٰ عَصاهُ فَإِذا هِيَ تَلقَفُ ما يَأفِكونَ
blank: f-ʾalqā mūsā ʿaṣāh f-ʾidhā hiy talqaf mā yaʾfikūn
english_saheeh_international: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified

arabic_uthmani: فَأُلقِيَ السَّحَرَةُ ساجِدينَ
blank: f-ʾulqiy s-saḥarat sājidīn
english_saheeh_international: So the magicians fell down in prostration to Allah

arabic_uthmani: قالوا آمَنّا بِرَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: qālū ʾāmannā b-rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: رَبِّ موسىٰ وَهارونَ
blank: rabb mūsā w-hārūn
english_saheeh_international: The Lord of Moses and Aaron

arabic_uthmani: قالَ آمَنتُم لَهُ قَبلَ أَن آذَنَ لَكُم ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكَبيرُكُمُ الَّذي عَلَّمَكُمُ السِّحرَ فَلَسَوفَ تَعلَمونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيدِيَكُم وَأَرجُلَكُم مِن خِلافٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: qāl ʾāmantum lahū qabl ʾ ʾādhan lakum ʾinnahū l-kabīrukumulladhī ʿallamakum s-siḥr f-l sawf taʿlamūn l-ʾuqaṭṭiʿann ʾaydiyakum w-ʾarjulakum m khilāf w-l-ʾuṣallibannakum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Pharaoh said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all

arabic_uthmani: قالوا لا ضَيرَ ۖ إِنّا إِلىٰ رَبِّنا مُنقَلِبونَ
blank: qālū lā ḍayr ʾinnā ʾilā rabbinā munqalibūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا نَطمَعُ أَن يَغفِرَ لَنا رَبُّنا خَطايانا أَن كُنّا أَوَّلَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinnā naṭmaʿ ʾ yaghfir lanā rabbunā khaṭāyānā ʾ kunnā ʾawwalal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَأَوحَينا إِلىٰ موسىٰ أَن أَسرِ بِعِبادي إِنَّكُم مُتَّبَعونَ
blank: w-ʾawḥaynā ʾilā mūsā ʾ ʾasr b-ʿibādī ʾinnakum muttabaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued

arabic_uthmani: فَأَرسَلَ فِرعَونُ فِي المَدائِنِ حاشِرينَ
blank: f-ʾarsal firʿawn fīl-madāʾin ḥāshirīn
english_saheeh_international: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰؤُلاءِ لَشِرذِمَةٌ قَليلونَ
blank: ʾinn hāʾulāʾ l-shirdhimat qalīlūn
english_saheeh_international: And said, "Indeed, those are but a small band

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُم لَنا لَغائِظونَ
blank: w-ʾinnahum lanā l-ghāʾiẓūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, they are enraging us

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّا لَجَميعٌ حاذِرونَ
blank: w-ʾinnā l-jamīʿ ḥādhirūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, we are a cautious society

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخرَجناهُم مِن جَنّاتٍ وَعُيونٍ
blank: f-ʾakhrajnāhum m jannāt w-ʿuyūn
english_saheeh_international: So We removed them from gardens and springs

arabic_uthmani: وَكُنوزٍ وَمَقامٍ كَريمٍ
blank: w-kunūz w-maqām karīm
english_saheeh_international: And treasures and honorable station

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ وَأَورَثناها بَني إِسرائيلَ
blank: k-dhālik w-ʾawrathnāhā banī ʾisrāʾīl
english_saheeh_international: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel

arabic_uthmani: فَأَتبَعوهُم مُشرِقينَ
blank: f-ʾatbaʿūhum mushriqīn
english_saheeh_international: So they pursued them at sunrise

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا تَراءَى الجَمعانِ قالَ أَصحابُ موسىٰ إِنّا لَمُدرَكونَ
blank: f-lammā tarāʾal-jamʿān qāl ʾaṣḥāb mūsā ʾinnā l-mudrakūn
english_saheeh_international: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken

arabic_uthmani: قالَ كَلّا ۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبّي سَيَهدينِ
blank: qāl kallā ʾinn maʿiy rabbī s-yahdīn
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me

arabic_uthmani: فَأَوحَينا إِلىٰ موسىٰ أَنِ اضرِب بِعَصاكَ البَحرَ ۖ فَانفَلَقَ فَكانَ كُلُّ فِرقٍ كَالطَّودِ العَظيمِ
blank: f-ʾawḥaynā ʾilā mūsā ʾan ḍrib b-ʿaṣākal-baḥr f-nfalaq f-kān kull firq k-ṭ-ṭawdil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain

arabic_uthmani: وَأَزلَفنا ثَمَّ الآخَرينَ
blank: w-ʾazlafnā thammal-ʾākharīn
english_saheeh_international: And We advanced thereto the pursuers

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنجَينا موسىٰ وَمَن مَعَهُ أَجمَعينَ
blank: w-ʾanjaynā mūsā w-mam-maʿahū ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَغرَقنَا الآخَرينَ
blank: thumm ʾaghraqnāl-ʾākharīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We drowned the others

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَما كانَ أَكثَرُهُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat w-mā kān ʾaktharuhum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ العَزيزُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: w-ʾinn rabbak l-huwal-ʿazīz r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَاتلُ عَلَيهِم نَبَأَ إِبراهيمَ
blank: w-tl ʿalayhim nabaʾ ʾibrāhīm
english_saheeh_international: And recite to them the news of Abraham

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَ لِأَبيهِ وَقَومِهِ ما تَعبُدونَ
blank: ʾidh qāl l-ʾabīh w-qawmihī mā taʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship

arabic_uthmani: قالوا نَعبُدُ أَصنامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَها عاكِفينَ
blank: qālū naʿbud ʾaṣnām f-naẓall lahā ʿākifīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted

arabic_uthmani: قالَ هَل يَسمَعونَكُم إِذ تَدعونَ
blank: qāl hal yasmaʿūnakum ʾidh tadʿūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate

arabic_uthmani: أَو يَنفَعونَكُم أَو يَضُرّونَ
blank: ʾaw yanfaʿūnakum ʾaw yaḍurrūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm

arabic_uthmani: قالوا بَل وَجَدنا آباءَنا كَذٰلِكَ يَفعَلونَ
blank: qālū bal wajadnā ʾābāʾanā k-dhālik yafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَفَرَأَيتُم ما كُنتُم تَعبُدونَ
blank: qāl ʾ-f-raʾaytum mā kuntum taʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping

arabic_uthmani: أَنتُم وَآباؤُكُمُ الأَقدَمونَ
blank: ʾantum w-ʾābāʾukumul-ʾaqdamūn
english_saheeh_international: You and your ancient forefathers

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّهُم عَدُوٌّ لي إِلّا رَبَّ العالَمينَ
blank: f-ʾinnahum ʿaduww lī ʾillā rabbal-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي خَلَقَني فَهُوَ يَهدينِ
blank: alladhī khalaqanī f-huw yahdīn
english_saheeh_international: Who created me, and He it is who guides me

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذي هُوَ يُطعِمُني وَيَسقينِ
blank: w-lladhī huw yuṭʿimunī w-yasqīn
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا مَرِضتُ فَهُوَ يَشفينِ
blank: w-ʾidhā mariḍt f-huw yashfīn
english_saheeh_international: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذي يُميتُني ثُمَّ يُحيينِ
blank: w-lladhī yumītunī thumm yuḥyīn
english_saheeh_international: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذي أَطمَعُ أَن يَغفِرَ لي خَطيئَتي يَومَ الدّينِ
blank: w-lladhī ʾaṭmaʿ ʾ yaghfir lī khaṭīʾatī yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: رَبِّ هَب لي حُكمًا وَأَلحِقني بِالصّالِحينَ
blank: rabb hab lī ḥukm w-ʾalḥiqnī b-ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And he said, "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَاجعَل لي لِسانَ صِدقٍ فِي الآخِرينَ
blank: w-jʿal lī lisān ṣidq fīl-ʾākhirīn
english_saheeh_international: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations

arabic_uthmani: وَاجعَلني مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ النَّعيمِ
blank: w-jʿalnī m warathat jannat n-naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure

arabic_uthmani: وَاغفِر لِأَبي إِنَّهُ كانَ مِنَ الضّالّينَ
blank: w-ghfir l-ʾabī ʾinnahū kān min ḍ-ḍāllīn
english_saheeh_international: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تُخزِني يَومَ يُبعَثونَ
blank: w-lā tukhzinī yawm yubʿathūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are all resurrected

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ لا يَنفَعُ مالٌ وَلا بَنونَ
blank: yawm lā yanfaʿ māl w-lā banūn
english_saheeh_international: The Day when there will not benefit anyone wealth or children

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا مَن أَتَى اللَّهَ بِقَلبٍ سَليمٍ
blank: ʾillā m ʾatā llāh b-qalb salīm
english_saheeh_international: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart

arabic_uthmani: وَأُزلِفَتِ الجَنَّةُ لِلمُتَّقينَ

blank: qāl ʾinnī l-ʿamalikum minal-qālīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest it

arabic_uthmani: رَبِّ نَجِّني وَأَهلي مِمّا يَعمَلونَ
blank: rabb najjinī w-ʾahlī mimmā yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: My Lord, save me and my family from the consequence of what they do

arabic_uthmani: فَنَجَّيناهُ وَأَهلَهُ أَجمَعينَ
blank: f-najjaynāh w-ʾahlahū ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: So We saved him and his family, all

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا عَجوزًا فِي الغابِرينَ
blank: ʾillā ʿajūz fīl-ghābirīn
english_saheeh_international: Except an old woman among those who remained behind

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ دَمَّرنَا الآخَرينَ
blank: thumm dammarnāl-ʾākharīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We destroyed the others

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمطَرنا عَلَيهِم مَطَرًا ۖ فَساءَ مَطَرُ المُنذَرينَ
blank: w-ʾamṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭar f-sāʾ maṭarul-mundharīn
english_saheeh_international: And We rained upon them a rain of stones, and evil was the rain of those who were warned

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَما كانَ أَكثَرُهُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat w-mā kān ʾaktharuhum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ العَزيزُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: w-ʾinn rabbak l-huwal-ʿazīz r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَ أَصحابُ الأَيكَةِ المُرسَلينَ
blank: kadhdhab ʾaṣḥābul-ʾaykatil-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَ لَهُم شُعَيبٌ أَلا تَتَّقونَ
blank: ʾidh qāl lahum shuʿayb ʾ-lā tattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِنّي لَكُم رَسولٌ أَمينٌ
blank: ʾinnī lakum rasūl ʾamīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger

arabic_uthmani: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطيعونِ
blank: f-ttaqū llāh w-ʾaṭīʿūn
english_saheeh_international: So fear Allah and obey me

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَسأَلُكُم عَلَيهِ مِن أَجرٍ ۖ إِن أَجرِيَ إِلّا عَلىٰ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: w-mā ʾasʾalukum ʿalayh m ʾajr ʾ ʾajriy ʾillā ʿalā rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَوفُوا الكَيلَ وَلا تَكونوا مِنَ المُخسِرينَ
blank: ʾawfūl-kayl w-lā takūnū minal-mukhsirīn
english_saheeh_international: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss

arabic_uthmani: وَزِنوا بِالقِسطاسِ المُستَقيمِ
blank: w-zinū b-l-qisṭāsil-mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And weigh with an even balance

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَبخَسُوا النّاسَ أَشياءَهُم وَلا تَعثَوا فِي الأَرضِ مُفسِدينَ
blank: w-lā tabkhasū n-nās ʾashyāʾahum w-lā taʿthaw fīl-ʾarḍ mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّقُوا الَّذي خَلَقَكُم وَالجِبِلَّةَ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: w-ttaqūlladhī khalaqakum w-l-jibillatal-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: And fear He who created you and the former creation

arabic_uthmani: قالوا إِنَّما أَنتَ مِنَ المُسَحَّرينَ
blank: qālū ʾinnamā ʾant minal-musaḥḥarīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَنتَ إِلّا بَشَرٌ مِثلُنا وَإِن نَظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ الكاذِبينَ
blank: w-mā ʾant ʾillā bashar mithlunā w-ʾ naẓunnuk l-minal-kādhibīn
english_saheeh_international: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars

arabic_uthmani: فَأَسقِط عَلَينا كِسَفًا مِنَ السَّماءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصّادِقينَ
blank: f-ʾasqiṭ ʿalaynā kisafam-min s-samāʾ ʾ kunt min ṣ-ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبّي أَعلَمُ بِما تَعمَلونَ
blank: qāl rabbī ʾaʿlam b-mā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do

arabic_uthmani: فَكَذَّبوهُ فَأَخَذَهُم عَذابُ يَومِ الظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ عَذابَ يَومٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: f-kadhdhabūh f-ʾakhadhahum ʿadhāb yawm ẓ-ẓullat ʾinnahū kān ʿadhāb yawm ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَما كانَ أَكثَرُهُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat w-mā kān ʾaktharuhum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ العَزيزُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: w-ʾinn rabbak l-huwal-ʿazīz r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لَتَنزيلُ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-tanzīl rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: نَزَلَ بِهِ الرّوحُ الأَمينُ
blank: nazal bih r-rūḥul-ʾamīn
english_saheeh_international: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down

arabic_uthmani: عَلىٰ قَلبِكَ لِتَكونَ مِنَ المُنذِرينَ
blank: ʿalā qalbik l-takūn minal-mundhirīn
english_saheeh_international: Upon your heart, O Muhammad - that you may be of the warners

arabic_uthmani: بِلِسانٍ عَرَبِيٍّ مُبينٍ
blank: b-lisān ʿarabiyy mubīn
english_saheeh_international: In a clear Arabic language

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لَفي زُبُرِ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-fī zuburil-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, it is mentioned in the scriptures of former peoples

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَكُن لَهُم آيَةً أَن يَعلَمَهُ عُلَماءُ بَني إِسرائيلَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yak lahum ʾāyat ʾ yaʿlamahū ʿulamāʾ banī ʾisrāʾīl
english_saheeh_international: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو نَزَّلناهُ عَلىٰ بَعضِ الأَعجَمينَ
blank: w-law nazzalnāh ʿalā baʿḍil-ʾaʿjamīn
english_saheeh_international: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners

arabic_uthmani: فَقَرَأَهُ عَلَيهِم ما كانوا بِهِ مُؤمِنينَ
blank: f-qaraʾahū ʿalayhim mā kānū bihī muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And he had recited it to them perfectly, they would still not have been believers in it

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ سَلَكناهُ في قُلوبِ المُجرِمينَ
blank: k-dhālik salaknāh fī qulūbil-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals

arabic_uthmani: لا يُؤمِنونَ بِهِ حَتّىٰ يَرَوُا العَذابَ الأَليمَ
blank: lā yuʾminūn bihī ḥattā yarawul-ʿadhābal-ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: فَيَأتِيَهُم بَغتَةً وَهُم لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: f-yaʾtiyahum baghtat w-hum lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive it not

arabic_uthmani: فَيَقولوا هَل نَحنُ مُنظَرونَ
blank: f-yaqūlū hal naḥn munẓarūn
english_saheeh_international: And they will say, "May we be reprieved

arabic_uthmani: أَفَبِعَذابِنا يَستَعجِلونَ
blank: ʾ-f-b-ʿadhābinā yastaʿjilūn
english_saheeh_international: So for Our punishment are they impatient

arabic_uthmani: أَفَرَأَيتَ إِن مَتَّعناهُم سِنينَ
blank: ʾ-f-raʾayt ʾ mattaʿnāhum sinīn
english_saheeh_international: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ جاءَهُم ما كانوا يوعَدونَ
blank: thumm jāʾahum mā kānū yūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: And then there came to them that which they were promised

arabic_uthmani: ما أَغنىٰ عَنهُم ما كانوا يُمَتَّعونَ
blank: mā ʾaghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَهلَكنا مِن قَريَةٍ إِلّا لَها مُنذِرونَ
blank: w-mā ʾahlaknā m qaryat ʾillā lahā mundhirūn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners

arabic_uthmani: ذِكرىٰ وَما كُنّا ظالِمينَ
blank: dhikrā w-mā kunnā ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust

arabic_uthmani: وَما تَنَزَّلَت بِهِ الشَّياطينُ
blank: w-mā tanazzalat bih sh-shayāṭīn
english_saheeh_international: And the devils have not brought the revelation down

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَنبَغي لَهُم وَما يَستَطيعونَ
blank: w-mā yanbaghī lahum w-mā yastaṭīʿūn
english_saheeh_international: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُم عَنِ السَّمعِ لَمَعزولونَ
blank: ʾinnahum ʿan s-samʿ l-maʿzūlūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed they, from its hearing, are removed

arabic_uthmani: فَلا تَدعُ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلٰهًا آخَرَ فَتَكونَ مِنَ المُعَذَّبينَ
blank: f-lā tadʿ maʿ llāh ʾilāh ʾākhar f-takūn minal-muʿadhdhabīn
english_saheeh_international: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and thus be among the punished

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنذِر عَشيرَتَكَ الأَقرَبينَ
blank: w-ʾandhir ʿashīratakal-ʾaqrabīn
english_saheeh_international: And warn, O Muhammad, your closest kindred

arabic_uthmani: وَاخفِض جَناحَكَ لِمَنِ اتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-khfiḍ janāḥak l-man ttabaʿak minal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن عَصَوكَ فَقُل إِنّي بَريءٌ مِمّا تَعمَلونَ
blank: f-ʾ ʿaṣawk f-qul ʾinnī barīʾ mimmā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing

arabic_uthmani: وَتَوَكَّل عَلَى العَزيزِ الرَّحيمِ
blank: w-tawakkal ʿalāl-ʿazīz r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي يَراكَ حينَ تَقومُ
blank: alladhī yarāk ḥīn taqūm
english_saheeh_international: Who sees you when you arise

arabic_uthmani: وَتَقَلُّبَكَ فِي السّاجِدينَ
blank: w-taqallubak fī s-sājidīn
english_saheeh_international: And your movement among those who prostrate

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: ʾinnahū huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: هَل أُنَبِّئُكُم عَلىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ الشَّياطينُ
blank: hal ʾunabbiʾukum ʿalā m tanazzal sh-shayāṭīn
english_saheeh_international: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend

arabic_uthmani: تَنَزَّلُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ أَفّاكٍ أَثيمٍ
blank: tanazzal ʿalā kull ʾaffāk ʾathīm
english_saheeh_international: They descend upon every sinful liar

arabic_uthmani: يُلقونَ السَّمعَ وَأَكثَرُهُم كاذِبونَ
blank: yulqūn s-samʿ w-ʾaktharuhum kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars

arabic_uthmani: وَالشُّعَراءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ الغاوونَ
blank: w-sh-shuʿarāʾ yattabiʿuhumul-ghāwūn
english_saheeh_international: And the poets - only the deviators follow them

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ أَنَّهُم في كُلِّ وادٍ يَهيمونَ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾannahum fī kull wād yahīmūn
english_saheeh_international: Do you not see that in every valley they roam

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُم يَقولونَ ما لا يَفعَلونَ
blank: w-ʾannahum yaqūlūn mā lā yafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: And that they say what they do not do

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ وَذَكَرُوا اللَّهَ كَثيرًا وَانتَصَروا مِن بَعدِ ما ظُلِموا ۗ وَسَيَعلَمُ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا أَيَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبونَ
blank: ʾillālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-dhakarū llāh kathīr w-ntaṣarū m baʿd mā ẓulimū w-s-yaʿlamulladhīn ẓalamū ʾayy munqalab yanqalibūn
english_saheeh_international: Except those poets who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend the Muslims after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what kind of return they will be returned

arabic_uthmani: طس ۚ تِلكَ آياتُ القُرآنِ وَكِتابٍ مُبينٍ
blank: ṭ-s (ṭā sīn) tilk ʾāyātul-qurʾān w-kitāb mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Ta, Seen. These are the verses of the Qur'an and a clear Book

arabic_uthmani: هُدًى وَبُشرىٰ لِلمُؤمِنينَ
blank: hud w-bushrā l-l-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: As guidance and good tidings for the believers

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُقيمونَ الصَّلاةَ وَيُؤتونَ الزَّكاةَ وَهُم بِالآخِرَةِ هُم يوقِنونَ
blank: alladhīn yuqīmūn ṣ-ṣalāt w-yuʾtūn z-zakāt w-hum b-l-ʾākhirat hum yūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and of the Hereafter they are certain in faith

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ زَيَّنّا لَهُم أَعمالَهُم فَهُم يَعمَهونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat zayyannā lahum ʾaʿmālahum f-hum yaʿmahūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made pleasing to them their deeds, so they wander blindly

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ لَهُم سوءُ العَذابِ وَهُم فِي الآخِرَةِ هُمُ الأَخسَرونَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn lahum sūʾul-ʿadhāb w-hum fīl-ʾākhirat humul-ʾakhsarūn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the ones for whom there will be the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they are the greatest losers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى القُرآنَ مِن لَدُن حَكيمٍ عَليمٍ
blank: w-ʾinnak l-tulaqqāl-qurʾān m lad ḥakīm ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, O Muhammad, you receive the Qur'an from one Wise and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَ موسىٰ لِأَهلِهِ إِنّي آنَستُ نارًا سَآتيكُم مِنها بِخَبَرٍ أَو آتيكُم بِشِهابٍ قَبَسٍ لَعَلَّكُم تَصطَلونَ
blank: ʾidh qāl mūsā l-ʾahlihī ʾinnī ʾānast nār s-ʾātīkum minhā b-khabar ʾaw ʾātīkum b-shihāb qabas laʿallakum taṣṭalūn
english_saheeh_international: Mention when Moses said to his family, "Indeed, I have perceived a fire. I will bring you from there information or will bring you a burning torch that you may warm yourselves

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَها نودِيَ أَن بورِكَ مَن فِي النّارِ وَمَن حَولَها وَسُبحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾahā nūdiy ʾ būrik m fī n-nār w-m ḥawlahā w-subḥān llāh rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: But when he came to it, he was called, "Blessed is whoever is at the fire and whoever is around it. And exalted is Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: يا موسىٰ إِنَّهُ أَنَا اللَّهُ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: yā-mūsā ʾinnahū ʾan llāhul-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: O Moses, indeed it is I - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَأَلقِ عَصاكَ ۚ فَلَمّا رَآها تَهتَزُّ كَأَنَّها جانٌّ وَلّىٰ مُدبِرًا وَلَم يُعَقِّب ۚ يا موسىٰ لا تَخَف إِنّي لا يَخافُ لَدَيَّ المُرسَلونَ
blank: w-ʾalq ʿaṣāk f-lammā raʾāhā tahtazz k-ʾannahā jānn wallā mudbir w-lam yuʿaqqib yā-mūsā lā takhaf ʾinnī lā yakhāf ladayyal-mursalūn
english_saheeh_international: And he was told, "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it were a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. Allah said, "O Moses, fear not. Indeed, in My presence the messengers do not fear

blank: ʾillā m ẓalam thumm baddal ḥusn baʿd sūʾ f-ʾinnī ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Otherwise, he who wrongs, then substitutes good after evil - indeed, I am Forgiving and Merciful

blank: w-ʾadkhil yadak fī jaybik takhruj bayḍāʾ m ghayr sūʾ fī tisʿ ʾāyāt ʾilā firʿawn w-qawmihī ʾinnahum kānū qawm fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And put your hand into the opening of your garment at the breast; it will come out white without disease. These are among the nine signs you will take to Pharaoh and his people. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient

blank: f-lammā jāʾathum ʾāyātunā mubṣirat qālū hādhā siḥr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: But when there came to them Our visible signs, they said, "This is obvious magic

arabic_uthmani: وَجَحَدوا بِها وَاستَيقَنَتها أَنفُسُهُم ظُلمًا وَعُلُوًّا ۚ فَانظُر كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُفسِدينَ
blank: w-jaḥadū bihā w-stayqanathā ʾanfusuhum ẓulm w-ʿuluww f-nẓur kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And they rejected them, while their inner selves were convinced thereof, out of injustice and haughtiness. So see how was the end of the corrupters

blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā dāwūd w-sulaymān ʿilm w-qālāl-ḥamd l-llāhilladhī faḍḍalanā ʿalā kathīr m ʿibādihil-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly given to David and Solomon knowledge, and they said, "Praise is due to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants

arabic_uthmani: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيمانُ داوودَ ۖ وَقالَ يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ عُلِّمنا مَنطِقَ الطَّيرِ وَأوتينا مِن كُلِّ شَيءٍ ۖ إِنَّ هٰذا لَهُوَ الفَضلُ المُبينُ
blank: w-warith sulaymān dāwūd w-qāl yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ʿullimnāmanṭiq ṭ-ṭayr w-ʾūtīnā m kull shayʾ ʾinn hādhā l-huwal-faḍlul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And Solomon inherited David. He said, "O people, we have been taught the language of birds, and we have been given from all things. Indeed, this is evident bounty

arabic_uthmani: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيمانَ جُنودُهُ مِنَ الجِنِّ وَالإِنسِ وَالطَّيرِ فَهُم يوزَعونَ
blank: w-ḥushir l-sulaymān junūduhū minal-jinn w-l-ʾins w-ṭ-ṭayr f-hum yūzaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And gathered for Solomon were his soldiers of the jinn and men and birds, and they were marching in rows

arabic_uthmani: حَتّىٰ إِذا أَتَوا عَلىٰ وادِ النَّملِ قالَت نَملَةٌ يا أَيُّهَا النَّملُ ادخُلوا مَساكِنَكُم لا يَحطِمَنَّكُم سُلَيمانُ وَجُنودُهُ وَهُم لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: ḥattā ʾidhā ʾataw ʿalā wād n-naml qālat namlat yā-ʾayyuhā n-naml dkhulū masākinakum lā yaḥṭimannakum sulaymān w-junūduhū w-hum lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: Until, when they came upon the valley of the ants, an ant said, "O ants, enter your dwellings that you not be crushed by Solomon and his soldiers while they perceive not

arabic_uthmani: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضاحِكًا مِن قَولِها وَقالَ رَبِّ أَوزِعني أَن أَشكُرَ نِعمَتَكَ الَّتي أَنعَمتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلىٰ والِدَيَّ وَأَن أَعمَلَ صالِحًا تَرضاهُ وَأَدخِلني بِرَحمَتِكَ في عِبادِكَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: f-tabassam ḍāḥikam-m qawlihā w-qāl rabb ʾawziʿnī ʾ ʾashkur niʿmatak llatī ʾanʿamt ʿalayy w-ʿalā wālidayy w-ʾ ʾaʿmal ṣāliḥ tarḍāh w-ʾadkhilnī b-raḥmatik fī ʿibādik ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: So Solomon smiled, amused at her speech, and said, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into the ranks of Your righteous servants

arabic_uthmani: وَتَفَقَّدَ الطَّيرَ فَقالَ ما لِيَ لا أَرَى الهُدهُدَ أَم كانَ مِنَ الغائِبينَ
blank: w-tafaqqad ṭ-ṭayr f-qāl mā liy lā ʾarāl-hudhud ʾam kān minal-ghāʾibīn
english_saheeh_international: And he took attendance of the birds and said, "Why do I not see the hoopoe - or is he among the absent

arabic_uthmani: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُ عَذابًا شَديدًا أَو لَأَذبَحَنَّهُ أَو لَيَأتِيَنّي بِسُلطانٍ مُبينٍ
blank: l-ʾuʿadhdhibannahū ʿadhāb shadīd ʾaw l-ʾadhbaḥannahū ʾaw l-yaʾtiyannī b-sulṭān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: I will surely punish him with a severe punishment or slaughter him unless he brings me clear authorization

arabic_uthmani: فَمَكَثَ غَيرَ بَعيدٍ فَقالَ أَحَطتُ بِما لَم تُحِط بِهِ وَجِئتُكَ مِن سَبَإٍ بِنَبَإٍ يَقينٍ
blank: f-makath ghayr baʿīd f-qāl ʾaḥaṭt b-mā lam tuḥiṭ bihī w-jiʾtuk m sabaʾ b-nabaʾ yaqīn
english_saheeh_international: But the hoopoe stayed not long and said, "I have encompassed in knowledge that which you have not encompassed, and I have come to you from Sheba with certain news

arabic_uthmani: إِنّي وَجَدتُ امرَأَةً تَملِكُهُم وَأوتِيَت مِن كُلِّ شَيءٍ وَلَها عَرشٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: ʾinnī wajadt mraʾat tamlikuhum w-ʾūtiyat m kull shayʾ w-lahā ʿarsh ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, I found there a woman ruling them, and she has been given of all things, and she has a great throne

arabic_uthmani: وَجَدتُها وَقَومَها يَسجُدونَ لِلشَّمسِ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الشَّيطانُ أَعمالَهُم فَصَدَّهُم عَنِ السَّبيلِ فَهُم لا يَهتَدونَ
blank: wajadtuhā w-qawmahā yasjudūn l-sh-shams m dūn llāh w-zayyan lahum sh-shayṭān ʾaʿmālahum f-ṣaddahum ʿan s-sabīl f-hum lā yahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of Allah, and Satan has made their deeds pleasing to them and averted them from His way, so they are not guided

arabic_uthmani: أَلّا يَسجُدوا لِلَّهِ الَّذي يُخرِجُ الخَبءَ فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَيَعلَمُ ما تُخفونَ وَما تُعلِنونَ
blank: ʾallā yasjudū l-llāhilladhī yukhrijul-khabʾ fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-yaʿlam mā tukhfūn w-mā tuʿlinūn
english_saheeh_international: And so they do not prostrate to Allah, who brings forth what is hidden within the heavens and the earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ رَبُّ العَرشِ العَظيمِ ۩
blank: allāh lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw rabbul-ʿarshil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah - there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Great Throne

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقتَ أَم كُنتَ مِنَ الكاذِبينَ
blank: qāl s-nanẓur ʾ-ṣadaqt ʾam kunt minal-kādhibīn
english_saheeh_international: Solomon said, "We will see whether you were truthful or were of the liars

arabic_uthmani: اذهَب بِكِتابي هٰذا فَأَلقِه إِلَيهِم ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنهُم فَانظُر ماذا يَرجِعونَ
blank: idhhab b-kitābī hādhā f-ʾalqih ʾilayhim thumm tawall ʿanhum f-nẓur mādhā yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them. Then leave them and see what answer they will return

arabic_uthmani: قالَت يا أَيُّهَا المَلَأُ إِنّي أُلقِيَ إِلَيَّ كِتابٌ كَريمٌ
blank: qālat yā-ʾayyuhāl-malaʾ ʾinnī ʾulqiy ʾilayy kitāb karīm
english_saheeh_international: She said, "O eminent ones, indeed, to me has been delivered a noble letter

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ مِن سُلَيمانَ وَإِنَّهُ بِسمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحمٰنِ الرَّحيمِ
blank: ʾinnahū m sulaymān w-ʾinnahū bismillāh r-raḥmānir-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, it is from Solomon, and indeed, it reads: 'In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful

blank: ʾallā taʿlū ʿalayy w-ʾtūnī muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: Be not haughty with me but come to me in submission as Muslims

arabic_uthmani: قالَت يا أَيُّهَا المَلَأُ أَفتوني في أَمري ما كُنتُ قاطِعَةً أَمرًا حَتّىٰ تَشهَدونِ
blank: qālat yā-ʾayyuhāl-malaʾ ʾaftūnī fī ʾamrī mā kunt qāṭiʿat ʾamr ḥattā tashhadūn
english_saheeh_international: She said, "O eminent ones, advise me in my affair. I would not decide a matter until you witness for me

arabic_uthmani: قالوا نَحنُ أُولو قُوَّةٍ وَأُولو بَأسٍ شَديدٍ وَالأَمرُ إِلَيكِ فَانظُري ماذا تَأمُرينَ
blank: qālū naḥn ʾulū quwwat w-ʾulū baʾs shadīd w-l-ʾamr ʾilayk f-nẓurī mādhā taʾmurīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We are men of strength and of great military might, but the command is yours, so see what you will command

arabic_uthmani: قالَت إِنَّ المُلوكَ إِذا دَخَلوا قَريَةً أَفسَدوها وَجَعَلوا أَعِزَّةَ أَهلِها أَذِلَّةً ۖ وَكَذٰلِكَ يَفعَلونَ

english_saheeh_international: She said, "Indeed kings - when they enter a city, they ruin it and render the honored of its people humbled. And thus do they do

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّي مُرسِلَةٌ إِلَيهِم بِهَدِيَّةٍ فَناظِرَةٌ بِمَ يَرجِعُ المُرسَلونَ
blank: w-ʾinnī mursilat ʾilayhim b-hadiyyat f-nāẓirat b-m yarjiʿul-mursalūn
english_saheeh_international: But indeed, I will send to them a gift and see with what reply the messengers will return

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَ سُلَيمانَ قالَ أَتُمِدّونَنِ بِمالٍ فَما آتانِيَ اللَّهُ خَيرٌ مِمّا آتاكُم بَل أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُم تَفرَحونَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾ sulaymān qāl ʾ-tumiddūnan b-māl f-mā ʾātāniy llāh khayr mimmā ʾātākum bal ʾantum b-hadiyyatikum tafraḥūn
english_saheeh_international: So when they came to Solomon, he said, "Do you provide me with wealth? But what Allah has given me is better than what He has given you. Rather, it is you who rejoice in your gift

arabic_uthmani: ارجِع إِلَيهِم فَلَنَأتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنودٍ لا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِها وَلَنُخرِجَنَّهُم مِنها أَذِلَّةً وَهُم صاغِرونَ
blank: irjiʿ ʾilayhim f-l-naʾtiyannahum b-junūd lā qibal lahum bihā w-l-nukhrijannahum minhā ʾadhillat w-hum ṣāghirūn
english_saheeh_international: Return to them, for we will surely come to them with soldiers that they will be powerless to encounter, and we will surely expel them therefrom in humiliation, and they will be debased

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا أَيُّهَا المَلَأُ أَيُّكُم يَأتيني بِعَرشِها قَبلَ أَن يَأتوني مُسلِمينَ
blank: qāl yā-ʾayyuhāl-malaʾ ʾayyukum yaʾtīnī b-ʿarshihā qabl ʾ yaʾtūnī muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: Solomon said, "O assembly of jinn, which of you will bring me her throne before they come to me in submission

arabic_uthmani: قالَ عِفريتٌ مِنَ الجِنِّ أَنا آتيكَ بِهِ قَبلَ أَن تَقومَ مِن مَقامِكَ ۖ وَإِنّي عَلَيهِ لَقَوِيٌّ أَمينٌ
