blank: qāl ʿifrīt minal-jinn ʾan ʾātīk bihī qabl ʾ taqūm m maqāmik w-ʾinnī ʿalayh l-qawiyy ʾamīn
english_saheeh_international: A powerful one from among the jinn said, "I will bring it to you before you rise from your place, and indeed, I am for this task strong and trustworthy

arabic_uthmani: قالَ الَّذي عِندَهُ عِلمٌ مِنَ الكِتابِ أَنا آتيكَ بِهِ قَبلَ أَن يَرتَدَّ إِلَيكَ طَرفُكَ ۚ فَلَمّا رَآهُ مُستَقِرًّا عِندَهُ قالَ هٰذا مِن فَضلِ رَبّي لِيَبلُوَني أَأَشكُرُ أَم أَكفُرُ ۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّما يَشكُرُ لِنَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبّي غَنِيٌّ كَريمٌ
blank: qālalladhī ʿindahū ʿilm minal-kitāb ʾan ʾātīk bihī qabl ʾ yartadd ʾilayk ṭarfuk f-lammā raʾāh mustaqirr ʿindahū qāl hādhā m faḍl rabbī l-yabluwanī ʾ-ʾashkur ʾam ʾakfur w-m shakar f-ʾinnamā yashkur l-nafsihī w-m kafar f-ʾinn rabbī ghaniyy karīm
english_saheeh_international: Said one who had knowledge from the Scripture, "I will bring it to you before your glance returns to you." And when Solomon saw it placed before him, he said, "This is from the favor of my Lord to test me whether I will be grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful - his gratitude is only for the benefit of himself. And whoever is ungrateful - then indeed, my Lord is Free of need and Generous

arabic_uthmani: قالَ نَكِّروا لَها عَرشَها نَنظُر أَتَهتَدي أَم تَكونُ مِنَ الَّذينَ لا يَهتَدونَ
blank: qāl nakkirū lahā ʿarshahā nanẓur ʾ-tahtadī ʾam takūn minalladhīn lā yahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Disguise for her her throne; we will see whether she will be guided to truth or will be of those who is not guided

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَت قيلَ أَهٰكَذا عَرشُكِ ۖ قالَت كَأَنَّهُ هُوَ ۚ وَأوتينَا العِلمَ مِن قَبلِها وَكُنّا مُسلِمينَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾat qīl ʾ-hākadhā ʿarshuk qālat k-ʾannahū huw w-ʾūtīnāl-ʿilm m qablihā w-kunnā muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: So when she arrived, it was said to her, "Is your throne like this?" She said, "It is as though it was it." Solomon said, "And we were given knowledge before her, and we have been Muslims in submission to Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَصَدَّها ما كانَت تَعبُدُ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّها كانَت مِن قَومٍ كافِرينَ
blank: w-ṣaddahā mā kānat taʿbud m dūn llāh ʾinnahā kānat m qawm kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And that which she was worshipping other than Allah had averted her from submission to Him. Indeed, she was from a disbelieving people

arabic_uthmani: قيلَ لَهَا ادخُلِي الصَّرحَ ۖ فَلَمّا رَأَتهُ حَسِبَتهُ لُجَّةً وَكَشَفَت عَن ساقَيها ۚ قالَ إِنَّهُ صَرحٌ مُمَرَّدٌ مِن قَواريرَ ۗ قالَت رَبِّ إِنّي ظَلَمتُ نَفسي وَأَسلَمتُ مَعَ سُلَيمانَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: qīl lahā dkhulī ṣ-ṣarḥ f-lammā raʾath ḥasibath lujjat w-kashafat ʿ sāqayhā qāl ʾinnahū ṣarḥ mumarrad m qawārīr qālat rabb ʾinnī ẓalamt nafsī w-ʾaslamt maʿ sulaymān l-llāh rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: She was told, "Enter the palace." But when she saw it, she thought it was a body of water and uncovered her shins to wade through. He said, "Indeed, it is a palace whose floor is made smooth with glass." She said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, and I submit with Solomon to Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا إِلىٰ ثَمودَ أَخاهُم صالِحًا أَنِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ فَإِذا هُم فَريقانِ يَختَصِمونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā ʾilā thamūd ʾakhāhum ṣāliḥ ʾan ʿbudū llāh f-ʾidhā hum farīqān yakhtaṣimūn
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly sent to Thamud their brother Salih, saying, "Worship Allah," and at once they were two parties conflicting

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا قَومِ لِمَ تَستَعجِلونَ بِالسَّيِّئَةِ قَبلَ الحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَولا تَستَغفِرونَ اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُم تُرحَمونَ
blank: qāl yā-qawm l-m tastaʿjilūn b-s-sayyiʾat qablal-ḥasanat law-lā tastaghfirūn llāh laʿallakum turḥamūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "O my people, why are you impatient for evil instead of good? Why do you not seek forgiveness of Allah that you may receive mercy

arabic_uthmani: قالُوا اطَّيَّرنا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَعَكَ ۚ قالَ طائِرُكُم عِندَ اللَّهِ ۖ بَل أَنتُم قَومٌ تُفتَنونَ
blank: qālū ṭṭayyarnā bik w-b-mam-maʿak qāl ṭāʾirukum ʿind llāh bal ʾantum qawm tuftanūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "We consider you a bad omen, you and those with you." He said, "Your omen is with Allah. Rather, you are a people being tested

arabic_uthmani: وَكانَ فِي المَدينَةِ تِسعَةُ رَهطٍ يُفسِدونَ فِي الأَرضِ وَلا يُصلِحونَ
blank: w-kān fīl-madīnat tisʿat rahṭ yufsidūn fīl-ʾarḍ w-lā yuṣliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And there were in the city nine family heads causing corruption in the land and not amending its affairs

arabic_uthmani: قالوا تَقاسَموا بِاللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُ وَأَهلَهُ ثُمَّ لَنَقولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِ ما شَهِدنا مَهلِكَ أَهلِهِ وَإِنّا لَصادِقونَ
blank: qālū taqāsamū b-llāh l-nubayyitannahū w-ʾahlahū thumm l-naqūlann l-waliyyihī mā shahidnā mahlik ʾahlihī w-ʾinnā l-ṣādiqūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Take a mutual oath by Allah that we will kill him by night, he and his family. Then we will say to his executor, 'We did not witness the destruction of his family, and indeed, we are truthful

arabic_uthmani: وَمَكَروا مَكرًا وَمَكَرنا مَكرًا وَهُم لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: w-makarū makr w-makarnā makr w-hum lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not

arabic_uthmani: فَانظُر كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ مَكرِهِم أَنّا دَمَّرناهُم وَقَومَهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: f-nẓur kayf kān ʿāqibat makrihim ʾannā dammarnāhum w-qawmahum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Then look how was the outcome of their plan - that We destroyed them and their people, all

arabic_uthmani: فَتِلكَ بُيوتُهُم خاوِيَةً بِما ظَلَموا ۗ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِقَومٍ يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-tilk buyūtuhum khāwiyat b-mā ẓalamū ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-qawm yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So those are their houses, desolate because of the wrong they had done. Indeed in that is a sign for people who know

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنجَينَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَكانوا يَتَّقونَ
blank: w-ʾanjaynālladhīn ʾāmanū w-kānū yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَلوطًا إِذ قالَ لِقَومِهِ أَتَأتونَ الفاحِشَةَ وَأَنتُم تُبصِرونَ
blank: w-lūṭ ʾidh qāl l-qawmihī ʾ-taʾtūnal-fāḥishat w-ʾantum tubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention Lot, when he said to his people, "Do you commit immorality while you are seeing

arabic_uthmani: أَئِنَّكُم لَتَأتونَ الرِّجالَ شَهوَةً مِن دونِ النِّساءِ ۚ بَل أَنتُم قَومٌ تَجهَلونَ
blank: ʾ-ʾinnakum l-taʾtūn r-rijāl shahwatam-m dūn n-nisāʾ bal ʾantum qawm tajhalūn
english_saheeh_international: Do you indeed approach men with desire instead of women? Rather, you are a people behaving ignorantly

arabic_uthmani: ۞ فَما كانَ جَوابَ قَومِهِ إِلّا أَن قالوا أَخرِجوا آلَ لوطٍ مِن قَريَتِكُم ۖ إِنَّهُم أُناسٌ يَتَطَهَّرونَ
blank: f-mā kān jawāb qawmihī ʾillā ʾ qālū ʾakhrijū ʾāl lūṭ m qaryatikum ʾinnahum ʾunās yataṭahharūn
english_saheeh_international: But the answer of his people was not except that they said, "Expel the family of Lot from your city. Indeed, they are people who keep themselves pure

arabic_uthmani: فَأَنجَيناهُ وَأَهلَهُ إِلَّا امرَأَتَهُ قَدَّرناها مِنَ الغابِرينَ
blank: f-ʾanjaynāh w-ʾahlahū ʾillā mraʾatahū qaddarnāhā minal-ghābirīn
english_saheeh_international: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; We destined her to be of those who remained behind

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمطَرنا عَلَيهِم مَطَرًا ۖ فَساءَ مَطَرُ المُنذَرينَ
blank: w-ʾamṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭar f-sāʾ maṭarul-mundharīn
english_saheeh_international: And We rained upon them a rain of stones, and evil was the rain of those who were warned

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلامٌ عَلىٰ عِبادِهِ الَّذينَ اصطَفىٰ ۗ آللَّهُ خَيرٌ أَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: qulil-ḥamd l-llāh w-salām ʿalā ʿibādihilladhīn ṣṭafā ʾāllāh khayr ʾammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Praise be to Allah, and peace upon His servants whom He has chosen. Is Allah better or what they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: أَمَّن خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَأَنبَتنا بِهِ حَدائِقَ ذاتَ بَهجَةٍ ما كانَ لَكُم أَن تُنبِتوا شَجَرَها ۗ أَإِلٰهٌ مَعَ اللَّهِ ۚ بَل هُم قَومٌ يَعدِلونَ
blank: ʾam-m khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-ʾanzal lakum min s-samāʾ māʾ f-ʾanbatnā bihī ḥadāʾiq dhāt bahjat mā kān lakum ʾ tunbitū shajarahā ʾ-ʾilāh maʿ llāh bal hum qawm yaʿdilūn
english_saheeh_international: More precisely, is He not best who created the heavens and the earth and sent down for you rain from the sky, causing to grow thereby gardens of joyful beauty which you could not otherwise have grown the trees thereof? Is there a deity with Allah? No, but they are a people who ascribe equals to Him

arabic_uthmani: أَمَّن جَعَلَ الأَرضَ قَرارًا وَجَعَلَ خِلالَها أَنهارًا وَجَعَلَ لَها رَواسِيَ وَجَعَلَ بَينَ البَحرَينِ حاجِزًا ۗ أَإِلٰهٌ مَعَ اللَّهِ ۚ بَل أَكثَرُهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: ʾam-m jaʿalal-ʾarḍ qarār w-jaʿal khilālahā ʾanhār w-jaʿal lahā rawāsiy w-jaʿal baynal-baḥrayn ḥājiz ʾ-ʾilāh maʿ llāh bal ʾaktharuhum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Is He not best who made the earth a stable ground and placed within it rivers and made for it firmly set mountains and placed between the two seas a barrier? Is there a deity with Allah? No, but most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: أَمَّن يُجيبُ المُضطَرَّ إِذا دَعاهُ وَيَكشِفُ السّوءَ وَيَجعَلُكُم خُلَفاءَ الأَرضِ ۗ أَإِلٰهٌ مَعَ اللَّهِ ۚ قَليلًا ما تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: ʾam-m yujībul-muḍṭarr ʾidhā daʿāh w-yakshif s-sūʾ w-yajʿalukum khulafāʾal-ʾarḍ ʾ-ʾilāh maʿ llāh qalīlam-mā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Is He not best who responds to the desperate one when he calls upon Him and removes evil and makes you inheritors of the earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Little do you remember

arabic_uthmani: أَمَّن يَهديكُم في ظُلُماتِ البَرِّ وَالبَحرِ وَمَن يُرسِلُ الرِّياحَ بُشرًا بَينَ يَدَي رَحمَتِهِ ۗ أَإِلٰهٌ مَعَ اللَّهِ ۚ تَعالَى اللَّهُ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: ʾam-m yahdīkum fī ẓulumātil-barr w-l-baḥr w-m yursil r-riyāḥ bushr bayn yaday raḥmatihī ʾ-ʾilāh maʿ llāh taʿālā llāh ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: Is He not best who guides you through the darknesses of the land and sea and who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy? Is there a deity with Allah? High is Allah above whatever they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: أَمَّن يَبدَأُ الخَلقَ ثُمَّ يُعيدُهُ وَمَن يَرزُقُكُم مِنَ السَّماءِ وَالأَرضِ ۗ أَإِلٰهٌ مَعَ اللَّهِ ۚ قُل هاتوا بُرهانَكُم إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: ʾam-m yabdaʾul-khalq thumm yuʿīduhū w-m yarzuqukum min s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ ʾ-ʾilāh maʿ llāh qul hātū burhānakum ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Is He not best who begins creation and then repeats it and who provides for you from the heaven and earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Say, "Produce your proof, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: قُل لا يَعلَمُ مَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ الغَيبَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ ۚ وَما يَشعُرونَ أَيّانَ يُبعَثونَ
blank: qul lā yaʿlam m fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍil-ghayb ʾillā llāh w-mā yashʿurūn ʾayyān yubʿathūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "None in the heavens and earth knows the unseen except Allah, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected

arabic_uthmani: بَلِ ادّارَكَ عِلمُهُم فِي الآخِرَةِ ۚ بَل هُم في شَكٍّ مِنها ۖ بَل هُم مِنها عَمونَ
blank: bal ddārak ʿilmuhum fīl-ʾākhirat bal hum fī shakk minhā bal hum minhā ʿamūn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, their knowledge is arrested concerning the Hereafter. Rather, they are in doubt about it. Rather, they are, concerning it, blind

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا أَإِذا كُنّا تُرابًا وَآباؤُنا أَئِنّا لَمُخرَجونَ
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū ʾ-ʾidhā kunnā turāb w-ʾābāʾunā ʾ-ʾinnā l-mukhrajūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieve say, "When we have become dust as well as our forefathers, will we indeed be brought out of the graves

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد وُعِدنا هٰذا نَحنُ وَآباؤُنا مِن قَبلُ إِن هٰذا إِلّا أَساطيرُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: l-qad wuʿidnā hādhā naḥn w-ʾābāʾunā m qabl ʾ hādhā ʾillā ʾasāṭīrul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before. This is not but legends of the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: قُل سيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَانظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُجرِمينَ
blank: qul sīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-nẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of the criminals

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَحزَن عَلَيهِم وَلا تَكُن في ضَيقٍ مِمّا يَمكُرونَ
blank: w-lā taḥz ʿalayhim w-lā tak fī ḍayq mimmā yamkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And grieve not over them or be in distress from what they conspire

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ مَتىٰ هٰذَا الوَعدُ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-yaqūlūn matā hādhāl-waʿd ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "When is the fulfillment of this promise, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: قُل عَسىٰ أَن يَكونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعضُ الَّذي تَستَعجِلونَ
blank: qul ʿasā ʾ yakūn radif lakum baʿḍulladhī tastaʿjilūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Perhaps it is close behind you - some of that for which you are impatient

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذو فَضلٍ عَلَى النّاسِ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَشكُرونَ
blank: w-ʾinn rabbak l-dhū faḍl ʿalā n-nās w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, your Lord is full of bounty for the people, but most of them do not show gratitude

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعلَمُ ما تُكِنُّ صُدورُهُم وَما يُعلِنونَ
blank: w-ʾinn rabbak l-yaʿlam mā tukinn ṣudūruhum w-mā yuʿlinūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare

arabic_uthmani: وَما مِن غائِبَةٍ فِي السَّماءِ وَالأَرضِ إِلّا في كِتابٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-mā m ghāʾibat fī s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ ʾillā fī kitāb mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And there is nothing concealed within the heaven and the earth except that it is in a clear Register

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذَا القُرآنَ يَقُصُّ عَلىٰ بَني إِسرائيلَ أَكثَرَ الَّذي هُم فيهِ يَختَلِفونَ
blank: ʾinn hādhāl-qurʾān yaquṣṣ ʿalā banī ʾisrāʾīl ʾaktharalladhī hum fīh yakhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, this Qur'an relates to the Children of Israel most of that over which they disagree

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لَهُدًى وَرَحمَةٌ لِلمُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-hud w-raḥmat l-l-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, it is guidance and mercy for the believers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقضي بَينَهُم بِحُكمِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ العَليمُ
blank: ʾinn rabbak yaqḍī baynahum b-ḥukmihī w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them by His wise judgement. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: فَتَوَكَّل عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى الحَقِّ المُبينِ
blank: f-tawakkal ʿalā llāh ʾinnak ʿalāl-ḥaqqil-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So rely upon Allah; indeed, you are upon the clear truth

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّكَ لا تُسمِعُ المَوتىٰ وَلا تُسمِعُ الصُّمَّ الدُّعاءَ إِذا وَلَّوا مُدبِرينَ
blank: ʾinnak lā tusmiʿul-mawtā w-lā tusmiʿ ṣ-ṣumm d-duʿāʾ ʾidhā wallaw mudbirīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, you will not make the dead hear, nor will you make the deaf hear the call when they have turned their backs retreating

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَنتَ بِهادِي العُميِ عَن ضَلالَتِهِم ۖ إِن تُسمِعُ إِلّا مَن يُؤمِنُ بِآياتِنا فَهُم مُسلِمونَ
blank: w-mā ʾant b-hādīl-ʿumy ʿ ḍalālatihim ʾ tusmiʿ ʾillā m yuʾmin b-ʾāyātinā f-hum muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: And you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You will only make hear those who believe in Our verses so they are Muslims submitting to Allah

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِذا وَقَعَ القَولُ عَلَيهِم أَخرَجنا لَهُم دابَّةً مِنَ الأَرضِ تُكَلِّمُهُم أَنَّ النّاسَ كانوا بِآياتِنا لا يوقِنونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā waqaʿal-qawl ʿalayhim ʾakhrajnā lahum dābbatam-minal-ʾarḍ tukallimuhum ʾann n-nās kānū b-ʾāyātinā lā yūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: And when the word befalls them, We will bring forth for them a creature from the earth speaking to them, saying that the people were, of Our verses, not certain in faith

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ نَحشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ فَوجًا مِمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِآياتِنا فَهُم يوزَعونَ
blank: w-yawm naḥshur m kull ʾummat fawjam-mimm yukadhdhib b-ʾāyātinā f-hum yūzaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And warn of the Day when We will gather from every nation a company of those who deny Our signs, and they will be driven in rows

arabic_uthmani: حَتّىٰ إِذا جاءوا قالَ أَكَذَّبتُم بِآياتي وَلَم تُحيطوا بِها عِلمًا أَمّاذا كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: ḥattā ʾidhā jāʾū qāl ʾ-kadhdhabtum b-ʾāyātī w-lam tuḥīṭū bihā ʿilm ʾammādhā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Until, when they arrive at the place of Judgement, He will say, "Did you deny My signs while you encompassed them not in knowledge, or what was it that you were doing

arabic_uthmani: وَوَقَعَ القَولُ عَلَيهِم بِما ظَلَموا فَهُم لا يَنطِقونَ
blank: w-waqaʿal-qawl ʿalayhim b-mā ẓalamū f-hum lā yanṭiqūn
english_saheeh_international: And the decree will befall them for the wrong they did, and they will not be able to speak

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَرَوا أَنّا جَعَلنَا اللَّيلَ لِيَسكُنوا فيهِ وَالنَّهارَ مُبصِرًا ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾ-lam yaraw ʾannā jaʿalnāl-layl l-yaskunū fīh w-n-nahār mubṣir ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they not see that We made the night that they may rest therein and the day giving sight? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَمَن فِي الأَرضِ إِلّا مَن شاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوهُ داخِرينَ
blank: w-yawm yunfakh fī ṣ-ṣūr f-faziʿ m fī s-samāwāt w-m fīl-ʾarḍ ʾillā m shāʾ llāh w-kull ʾatawh dākhirīn
english_saheeh_international: And warn of the Day the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will be terrified except whom Allah wills. And all will come to Him humbled

arabic_uthmani: وَتَرَى الجِبالَ تَحسَبُها جامِدَةً وَهِيَ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ السَّحابِ ۚ صُنعَ اللَّهِ الَّذي أَتقَنَ كُلَّ شَيءٍ ۚ إِنَّهُ خَبيرٌ بِما تَفعَلونَ
blank: w-tarāl-jibāl taḥsabuhā jāmidat w-hiy tamurr marr s-saḥāb ṣunʿ llāhilladhī ʾatqan kull shayʾ ʾinnahū khabīr b-mā tafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: And you see the mountains, thinking them rigid, while they will pass as the passing of clouds. It is the work of Allah, who perfected all things. Indeed, He is Acquainted with that which you do

arabic_uthmani: مَن جاءَ بِالحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُ خَيرٌ مِنها وَهُم مِن فَزَعٍ يَومَئِذٍ آمِنونَ
blank: m jāʾ b-l-ḥasanat f-lahū khayr minhā w-hum m fazaʿ yawmaʾidh ʾāminūn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever comes at Judgement with a good deed will have better than it, and they, from the terror of that Day, will be safe

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن جاءَ بِالسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّت وُجوهُهُم فِي النّارِ هَل تُجزَونَ إِلّا ما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-m jāʾ b-s-sayyiʾat f-kubbat wujūhuhum fī n-nār hal tujzawn ʾillā mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And whoever comes with an evil deed - their faces will be overturned into the Fire, and it will be said, "Are you recompensed except for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما أُمِرتُ أَن أَعبُدَ رَبَّ هٰذِهِ البَلدَةِ الَّذي حَرَّمَها وَلَهُ كُلُّ شَيءٍ ۖ وَأُمِرتُ أَن أَكونَ مِنَ المُسلِمينَ
blank: ʾinnamā ʾumirt ʾ ʾaʿbud rabb hādhihil-baldatilladhī ḥarramahā w-lahū kull shayʾ w-ʾumirt ʾ ʾakūn minal-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "I have only been commanded to worship the Lord of this city, who made it sacred and to whom belongs all things. And I am commanded to be of the Muslims those who submit to Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَأَن أَتلُوَ القُرآنَ ۖ فَمَنِ اهتَدىٰ فَإِنَّما يَهتَدي لِنَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُل إِنَّما أَنا مِنَ المُنذِرينَ
blank: w-ʾ ʾatluwal-qurʾān f-man htadā f-ʾinnamā yahtadī l-nafsihī w-m ḍall f-qul ʾinnamā ʾan minal-mundhirīn
english_saheeh_international: And to recite the Qur'an." And whoever is guided is only guided for the benefit of himself; and whoever strays - say, "I am only one of the warners

arabic_uthmani: وَقُلِ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ سَيُريكُم آياتِهِ فَتَعرِفونَها ۚ وَما رَبُّكَ بِغافِلٍ عَمّا تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-qulil-ḥamd l-llāh s-yurīkum ʾāyātihī f-taʿrifūnahā w-mā rabbuk b-ghāfil ʿammā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And say, "All praise is due to Allah. He will show you His signs, and you will recognize them. And your Lord is not unaware of what you do

arabic_uthmani: طسم
blank: ṭ-s-m (ṭā sīn mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Ta, Seen, Meem

arabic_uthmani: تِلكَ آياتُ الكِتابِ المُبينِ
blank: tilk ʾāyātul-kitābil-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: These are the verses of the clear Book

arabic_uthmani: نَتلو عَلَيكَ مِن نَبَإِ موسىٰ وَفِرعَونَ بِالحَقِّ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: natlū ʿalayk m nabaʾ mūsā w-firʿawn b-l-ḥaqq l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: We recite to you from the news of Moses and Pharaoh in truth for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ فِرعَونَ عَلا فِي الأَرضِ وَجَعَلَ أَهلَها شِيَعًا يَستَضعِفُ طائِفَةً مِنهُم يُذَبِّحُ أَبناءَهُم وَيَستَحيي نِساءَهُم ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ مِنَ المُفسِدينَ
blank: ʾinn firʿawn ʿalā fīl-ʾarḍ w-jaʿal ʾahlahā shiyaʿ yastaḍʿif ṭāʾifatam-minhum yudhabbiḥ ʾabnāʾahum w-yastaḥyī nisāʾahum ʾinnahū kān minal-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Pharaoh exalted himself in the land and made its people into factions, oppressing a sector among them, slaughtering their newborn sons and keeping their females alive. Indeed, he was of the corrupters

arabic_uthmani: وَنُريدُ أَن نَمُنَّ عَلَى الَّذينَ استُضعِفوا فِي الأَرضِ وَنَجعَلَهُم أَئِمَّةً وَنَجعَلَهُمُ الوارِثينَ
blank: w-nurīd ʾ namunn ʿalālladhīn stuḍʿifū fīl-ʾarḍ w-najʿalahum ʾaʾimmat w-najʿalahumul-wārithīn
english_saheeh_international: And We wanted to confer favor upon those who were oppressed in the land and make them leaders and make them inheritors

arabic_uthmani: وَنُمَكِّنَ لَهُم فِي الأَرضِ وَنُرِيَ فِرعَونَ وَهامانَ وَجُنودَهُما مِنهُم ما كانوا يَحذَرونَ
blank: w-numakkin lahum fīl-ʾarḍ w-nuriy firʿawn w-hāmān w-junūdahumā minhum mā kānū yaḥdharūn
english_saheeh_international: And establish them in the land and show Pharaoh and his minister Haman and their soldiers through them that which they had feared

arabic_uthmani: وَأَوحَينا إِلىٰ أُمِّ موسىٰ أَن أَرضِعيهِ ۖ فَإِذا خِفتِ عَلَيهِ فَأَلقيهِ فِي اليَمِّ وَلا تَخافي وَلا تَحزَني ۖ إِنّا رادّوهُ إِلَيكِ وَجاعِلوهُ مِنَ المُرسَلينَ
blank: w-ʾawḥaynā ʾilā ʾumm mūsā ʾ ʾarḍiʿīh f-ʾidhā khift ʿalayh f-ʾalqīh fīl-yamm w-lā takhāfī w-lā taḥzanī ʾinnā rāddūh ʾilayk w-jāʿilūh minal-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: And We inspired to the mother of Moses, "Suckle him; but when you fear for him, cast him into the river and do not fear and do not grieve. Indeed, We will return him to you and will make him one of the messengers

arabic_uthmani: فَالتَقَطَهُ آلُ فِرعَونَ لِيَكونَ لَهُم عَدُوًّا وَحَزَنًا ۗ إِنَّ فِرعَونَ وَهامانَ وَجُنودَهُما كانوا خاطِئينَ
blank: f-ltaqaṭahū ʾāl firʿawn l-yakūn lahum ʿaduww w-ḥazan ʾinn firʿawn w-hāmān w-junūdahumā kānū khāṭiʾīn
english_saheeh_international: And the family of Pharaoh picked him up out of the river so that he would become to them an enemy and a cause of grief. Indeed, Pharaoh and Haman and their soldiers were deliberate sinners

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَتِ امرَأَتُ فِرعَونَ قُرَّتُ عَينٍ لي وَلَكَ ۖ لا تَقتُلوهُ عَسىٰ أَن يَنفَعَنا أَو نَتَّخِذَهُ وَلَدًا وَهُم لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: w-qālat mraʾat firʿawn qurrat ʿayn lī w-lak lā taqtulūh ʿasā ʾ yanfaʿanā ʾaw nattakhidhahū walad w-hum lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: And the wife of Pharaoh said, "He will be a comfort of the eye for me and for you. Do not kill him; perhaps he may benefit us, or we may adopt him as a son." And they perceived not

arabic_uthmani: وَأَصبَحَ فُؤادُ أُمِّ موسىٰ فارِغًا ۖ إِن كادَت لَتُبدي بِهِ لَولا أَن رَبَطنا عَلىٰ قَلبِها لِتَكونَ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-ʾaṣbaḥ fuʾād ʾumm mūsā fārigh ʾ kādat l-tubdī bihī law-lā ʾ rabaṭnā ʿalā qalbihā l-takūn minal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And the heart of Moses' mother became empty of all else. She was about to disclose the matter concerning him had We not bound fast her heart that she would be of the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَت لِأُختِهِ قُصّيهِ ۖ فَبَصُرَت بِهِ عَن جُنُبٍ وَهُم لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: w-qālat l-ʾukhtihī quṣṣīh f-baṣurat bihī ʿ junub w-hum lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: And she said to his sister, "Follow him"; so she watched him from a distance while they perceived not

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَحَرَّمنا عَلَيهِ المَراضِعَ مِن قَبلُ فَقالَت هَل أَدُلُّكُم عَلىٰ أَهلِ بَيتٍ يَكفُلونَهُ لَكُم وَهُم لَهُ ناصِحونَ
blank: w-ḥarramnā ʿalayhil-marāḍiʿ m qabl f-qālat hal ʾadullukum ʿalā ʾahl bayt yakfulūnahū lakum w-hum lahū nāṣiḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And We had prevented from him all wet nurses before, so she said, "Shall I direct you to a household that will be responsible for him for you while they are to him for his upbringing sincere

arabic_uthmani: فَرَدَدناهُ إِلىٰ أُمِّهِ كَي تَقَرَّ عَينُها وَلا تَحزَنَ وَلِتَعلَمَ أَنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-radadnāh ʾilā ʾummihī kay taqarr ʿaynuhā w-lā taḥzan w-l-taʿlam ʾann waʿd llāh ḥaqq w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So We restored him to his mother that she might be content and not grieve and that she would know that the promise of Allah is true. But most of the people do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ وَاستَوىٰ آتَيناهُ حُكمًا وَعِلمًا ۚ وَكَذٰلِكَ نَجزِي المُحسِنينَ
blank: w-lammā balagh ʾashuddahū w-stawā ʾātaynāh ḥukm w-ʿilm w-k-dhālik najzīl-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: And when he attained his full strength and was mentally mature, We bestowed upon him judgement and knowledge. And thus do We reward the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: وَدَخَلَ المَدينَةَ عَلىٰ حينِ غَفلَةٍ مِن أَهلِها فَوَجَدَ فيها رَجُلَينِ يَقتَتِلانِ هٰذا مِن شيعَتِهِ وَهٰذا مِن عَدُوِّهِ ۖ فَاستَغاثَهُ الَّذي مِن شيعَتِهِ عَلَى الَّذي مِن عَدُوِّهِ فَوَكَزَهُ موسىٰ فَقَضىٰ عَلَيهِ ۖ قالَ هٰذا مِن عَمَلِ الشَّيطانِ ۖ إِنَّهُ عَدُوٌّ مُضِلٌّ مُبينٌ
blank: w-dakhalal-madīnat ʿalā ḥīn ghaflat m ʾahlihā f-wajad fīhā rajulayn yaqtatilān hādhā m shīʿatihī w-hādhā m ʿaduwwihī f-staghāthahulladhī m shīʿatihī ʿalālladhī m ʿaduwwihī f-wakazahū mūsā f-qaḍā ʿalayh qāl hādhā m ʿamal sh-shayṭān ʾinnahū ʿaduww muḍill mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And he entered the city at a time of inattention by its people and found therein two men fighting: one from his faction and one from among his enemy. And the one from his faction called for help to him against the one from his enemy, so Moses struck him and unintentionally killed him. Moses said, "This is from the work of Satan. Indeed, he is a manifest, misleading enemy

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ إِنّي ظَلَمتُ نَفسي فَاغفِر لي فَغَفَرَ لَهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الغَفورُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: qāl rabb ʾinnī ẓalamt nafsī faghfir lī f-ghafar lahū ʾinnahū huwal-ghafūr r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me," and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ بِما أَنعَمتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَن أَكونَ ظَهيرًا لِلمُجرِمينَ
blank: qāl rabb b-mā ʾanʿamt ʿalayy f-l ʾakūn ẓahīr l-l-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals

arabic_uthmani: فَأَصبَحَ فِي المَدينَةِ خائِفًا يَتَرَقَّبُ فَإِذَا الَّذِي استَنصَرَهُ بِالأَمسِ يَستَصرِخُهُ ۚ قالَ لَهُ موسىٰ إِنَّكَ لَغَوِيٌّ مُبينٌ
blank: f-ʾaṣbaḥ fīl-madīnat khāʾif yataraqqab f-ʾidhālladhī stanṣarahū b-l-ʾams yastaṣrikhuhū qāl lahū mūsā ʾinnak l-ghawiyy mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And he became inside the city fearful and anticipating exposure, when suddenly the one who sought his help the previous day cried out to him once again. Moses said to him, "Indeed, you are an evident, persistent deviator

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا أَن أَرادَ أَن يَبطِشَ بِالَّذي هُوَ عَدُوٌّ لَهُما قالَ يا موسىٰ أَتُريدُ أَن تَقتُلَني كَما قَتَلتَ نَفسًا بِالأَمسِ ۖ إِن تُريدُ إِلّا أَن تَكونَ جَبّارًا فِي الأَرضِ وَما تُريدُ أَن تَكونَ مِنَ المُصلِحينَ
blank: f-lammā ʾ ʾarād ʾ yabṭish b-lladhī huw ʿaduww lahumā qāl yā-mūsā ʾ-turīd ʾ taqtulanī k-mā qatalt nafs b-l-ʾams ʾ turīd ʾillā ʾ takūn jabbār fīl-ʾarḍ w-mā turīd ʾ takūn minal-muṣliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And when he wanted to strike the one who was an enemy to both of them, he said, "O Moses, do you intend to kill me as you killed someone yesterday? You only want to be a tyrant in the land and do not want to be of the amenders

arabic_uthmani: وَجاءَ رَجُلٌ مِن أَقصَى المَدينَةِ يَسعىٰ قالَ يا موسىٰ إِنَّ المَلَأَ يَأتَمِرونَ بِكَ لِيَقتُلوكَ فَاخرُج إِنّي لَكَ مِنَ النّاصِحينَ
blank: w-jāʾ rajul m ʾaqṣāl-madīnat yasʿā qāl yā-mūsā ʾinnal-malaʾ yaʾtamirūn bik l-yaqtulūk f-khruj ʾinnī lak min n-nāṣiḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And a man came from the farthest end of the city, running. He said, "O Moses, indeed the eminent ones are conferring over you intending to kill you, so leave the city; indeed, I am to you of the sincere advisors

arabic_uthmani: فَخَرَجَ مِنها خائِفًا يَتَرَقَّبُ ۖ قالَ رَبِّ نَجِّني مِنَ القَومِ الظّالِمينَ
blank: f-kharaj minhā khāʾif yataraqqab qāl rabb najjinī minal-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: So he left it, fearful and anticipating apprehension. He said, "My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلقاءَ مَديَنَ قالَ عَسىٰ رَبّي أَن يَهدِيَني سَواءَ السَّبيلِ
blank: w-lammā tawajjah tilqāʾ madyan qāl ʿasā rabbī ʾ yahdiyanī sawāʾ s-sabīl
english_saheeh_international: And when he directed himself toward Madyan, he said, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to the sound way

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا وَرَدَ ماءَ مَديَنَ وَجَدَ عَلَيهِ أُمَّةً مِنَ النّاسِ يَسقونَ وَوَجَدَ مِن دونِهِمُ امرَأَتَينِ تَذودانِ ۖ قالَ ما خَطبُكُما ۖ قالَتا لا نَسقي حَتّىٰ يُصدِرَ الرِّعاءُ ۖ وَأَبونا شَيخٌ كَبيرٌ
blank: w-lammā warad māʾ madyan wajad ʿalayh ʾummatam-min n-nās yasqūn w-wajad m dūnihim mraʾatayn tadhūdān qāl mā khaṭbukumā qālatā lā nasqī ḥattā yuṣdir r-riʿāʾ w-ʾabūnā shaykh kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And when he came to the well of Madyan, he found there a crowd of people watering their flocks, and he found aside from them two women driving back their flocks. He said, "What is your circumstance?" They said, "We do not water until the shepherds dispatch their flocks; and our father is an old man

arabic_uthmani: فَسَقىٰ لَهُما ثُمَّ تَوَلّىٰ إِلَى الظِّلِّ فَقالَ رَبِّ إِنّي لِما أَنزَلتَ إِلَيَّ مِن خَيرٍ فَقيرٌ
blank: f-saqā lahumā thumm tawallā ʾilā ẓ-ẓill f-qāl rabb ʾinnī l-mā ʾanzalt ʾilayy m khayr faqīr
english_saheeh_international: So he watered their flocks for them; then he went back to the shade and said, "My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need

arabic_uthmani: فَجاءَتهُ إِحداهُما تَمشي عَلَى استِحياءٍ قالَت إِنَّ أَبي يَدعوكَ لِيَجزِيَكَ أَجرَ ما سَقَيتَ لَنا ۚ فَلَمّا جاءَهُ وَقَصَّ عَلَيهِ القَصَصَ قالَ لا تَخَف ۖ نَجَوتَ مِنَ القَومِ الظّالِمينَ
blank: f-jāʾath ʾiḥdāhumā tamshī ʿalā stiḥyāʾ qālat ʾinn ʾabī yadʿūk l-yajziyak ʾajr mā saqayt lanā f-lammā jāʾahū w-qaṣṣ ʿalayhil-qaṣaṣ qāl lā takhaf najawt minal-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Then one of the two women came to him walking with shyness. She said, "Indeed, my father invites you that he may reward you for having watered for us." So when he came to him and related to him the story, he said, "Fear not. You have escaped from the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: قالَت إِحداهُما يا أَبَتِ استَأجِرهُ ۖ إِنَّ خَيرَ مَنِ استَأجَرتَ القَوِيُّ الأَمينُ
blank: qālat ʾiḥdāhumā yā-ʾabat staʾjirh ʾinn khayr man staʾjartal-qawiyyul-ʾamīn
english_saheeh_international: One of the women said, "O my father, hire him. Indeed, the best one you can hire is the strong and the trustworthy

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِنّي أُريدُ أَن أُنكِحَكَ إِحدَى ابنَتَيَّ هاتَينِ عَلىٰ أَن تَأجُرَني ثَمانِيَ حِجَجٍ ۖ فَإِن أَتمَمتَ عَشرًا فَمِن عِندِكَ ۖ وَما أُريدُ أَن أَشُقَّ عَلَيكَ ۚ سَتَجِدُني إِن شاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: qāl ʾinnī ʾurīd ʾ ʾunkiḥak ʾiḥdā bnatayy hātayn ʿalā ʾ taʾjuranī thamāniy ḥijaj f-ʾ ʾatmamt ʿashr f-m ʿindik w-mā ʾurīd ʾ ʾashuqq ʿalayk s-tajidunī ʾ shāʾ llāh min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Indeed, I wish to wed you one of these, my two daughters, on the condition that you serve me for eight years; but if you complete ten, it will be as a favor from you. And I do not wish to put you in difficulty. You will find me, if Allah wills, from among the righteous

arabic_uthmani: قالَ ذٰلِكَ بَيني وَبَينَكَ ۖ أَيَّمَا الأَجَلَينِ قَضَيتُ فَلا عُدوانَ عَلَيَّ ۖ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ ما نَقولُ وَكيلٌ
blank: qāl dhālik baynī w-baynak ʾayyamāl-ʾajalayn qaḍayt f-lā ʿudwān ʿalayy w-llāh ʿalā mā naqūl wakīl
english_saheeh_international: Moses said, "That is established between me and you. Whichever of the two terms I complete - there is no injustice to me, and Allah, over what we say, is Witness

arabic_uthmani: ۞ فَلَمّا قَضىٰ موسَى الأَجَلَ وَسارَ بِأَهلِهِ آنَسَ مِن جانِبِ الطّورِ نارًا قالَ لِأَهلِهِ امكُثوا إِنّي آنَستُ نارًا لَعَلّي آتيكُم مِنها بِخَبَرٍ أَو جَذوَةٍ مِنَ النّارِ لَعَلَّكُم تَصطَلونَ
blank: f-lammā qaḍā mūsāl-ʾajal w-sār b-ʾahlihī ʾānas m jānib ṭ-ṭūr nār qāl l-ʾahlih mkuthū ʾinnī ʾānast nār laʿallī ʾātīkum minhā b-khabar ʾaw jadhwat min n-nār laʿallakum taṣṭalūn
english_saheeh_international: And when Moses had completed the term and was traveling with his family, he perceived from the direction of the mount a fire. He said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire. Perhaps I will bring you from there some information or burning wood from the fire that you may warm yourselves

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا أَتاها نودِيَ مِن شاطِئِ الوادِ الأَيمَنِ فِي البُقعَةِ المُبارَكَةِ مِنَ الشَّجَرَةِ أَن يا موسىٰ إِنّي أَنَا اللَّهُ رَبُّ العالَمينَ
blank: f-lammā ʾatāhā nūdiy m shāṭiʾil-wādil-ʾayman fīl-buqʿatil-mubārakat min sh-shajarat ʾ yā-mūsā ʾinnī ʾan llāh rabbul-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: But when he came to it, he was called from the right side of the valley in a blessed spot - from the tree, "O Moses, indeed I am Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَأَن أَلقِ عَصاكَ ۖ فَلَمّا رَآها تَهتَزُّ كَأَنَّها جانٌّ وَلّىٰ مُدبِرًا وَلَم يُعَقِّب ۚ يا موسىٰ أَقبِل وَلا تَخَف ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنَ الآمِنينَ
blank: w-ʾ ʾalq ʿaṣāk f-lammā raʾāhā tahtazz k-ʾannahā jānn wallā mudbir w-lam yuʿaqqib yā-mūsā ʾaqbil w-lā takhaf ʾinnak minal-ʾāminīn
english_saheeh_international: And he was told, "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it was a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. Allah said, "O Moses, approach and fear not. Indeed, you are of the secure

arabic_uthmani: اسلُك يَدَكَ في جَيبِكَ تَخرُج بَيضاءَ مِن غَيرِ سوءٍ وَاضمُم إِلَيكَ جَناحَكَ مِنَ الرَّهبِ ۖ فَذانِكَ بُرهانانِ مِن رَبِّكَ إِلىٰ فِرعَونَ وَمَلَئِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُم كانوا قَومًا فاسِقينَ
blank: usluk yadak fī jaybik takhruj bayḍāʾ m ghayr sūʾ w-ḍmum ʾilayk janāḥak min r-rahb f-dhānik burhānān m rabbik ʾilā firʿawn w-malaʾihī ʾinnahum kānū qawm fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Insert your hand into the opening of your garment; it will come out white, without disease. And draw in your arm close to you as prevention from fear, for those are two proofs from your Lord to Pharaoh and his establishment. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ إِنّي قَتَلتُ مِنهُم نَفسًا فَأَخافُ أَن يَقتُلونِ
blank: qāl rabb ʾinnī qatalt minhum nafs f-ʾakhāf ʾ yaqtulūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, indeed, I killed from among them someone, and I fear they will kill me

arabic_uthmani: وَأَخي هارونُ هُوَ أَفصَحُ مِنّي لِسانًا فَأَرسِلهُ مَعِيَ رِدءًا يُصَدِّقُني ۖ إِنّي أَخافُ أَن يُكَذِّبونِ
blank: w-ʾakhī hārūn huw ʾafṣaḥ minnī lisān f-ʾarsilh maʿiy ridʾ yuṣaddiqunī ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʾ yukadhdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: And my brother Aaron is more fluent than me in tongue, so send him with me as support, verifying me. Indeed, I fear that they will deny me

arabic_uthmani: قالَ سَنَشُدُّ عَضُدَكَ بِأَخيكَ وَنَجعَلُ لَكُما سُلطانًا فَلا يَصِلونَ إِلَيكُما ۚ بِآياتِنا أَنتُما وَمَنِ اتَّبَعَكُمَا الغالِبونَ
blank: qāl s-nashudd ʿaḍudak b-ʾakhīk w-najʿal lakumā sulṭān f-lā yaṣilūn ʾilaykumā b-ʾāyātinā ʾantumā w-man ttabaʿakumāl-ghālibūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "We will strengthen your arm through your brother and grant you both supremacy so they will not reach you. It will be through Our signs; you and those who follow you will be the predominant

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَهُم موسىٰ بِآياتِنا بَيِّناتٍ قالوا ما هٰذا إِلّا سِحرٌ مُفتَرًى وَما سَمِعنا بِهٰذا في آبائِنَا الأَوَّلينَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾahum mūsā b-ʾāyātinā bayyināt qālū mā hādhā ʾillā siḥr muftar w-mā samiʿnā b-hādhā fī ʾābāʾināl-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: But when Moses came to them with Our signs as clear evidences, they said, "This is not except invented magic, and we have not heard of this religion among our forefathers

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ موسىٰ رَبّي أَعلَمُ بِمَن جاءَ بِالهُدىٰ مِن عِندِهِ وَمَن تَكونُ لَهُ عاقِبَةُ الدّارِ ۖ إِنَّهُ لا يُفلِحُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: w-qāl mūsā rabbī ʾaʿlam b-m jāʾ b-l-hudā m ʿindihī w-m takūn lahū ʿāqibat d-dār ʾinnahū lā yufliḥ ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: And Moses said, "My Lord is more knowing than we or you of who has come with guidance from Him and to whom will be succession in the home. Indeed, wrongdoers do not succeed

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ فِرعَونُ يا أَيُّهَا المَلَأُ ما عَلِمتُ لَكُم مِن إِلٰهٍ غَيري فَأَوقِد لي يا هامانُ عَلَى الطّينِ فَاجعَل لي صَرحًا لَعَلّي أَطَّلِعُ إِلىٰ إِلٰهِ موسىٰ وَإِنّي لَأَظُنُّهُ مِنَ الكاذِبينَ
blank: w-qāl firʿawn yā-ʾayyuhāl-malaʾ mā ʿalimt lakum m ʾilāh ghayrī f-ʾawqid lī yā-hāmān ʿalā ṭ-ṭīn f-jʿal lī ṣarḥ laʿallī ʾaṭṭaliʿ ʾilā ʾilāh mūsā w-ʾinnī l-ʾaẓunnuhū minal-kādhibīn
english_saheeh_international: And Pharaoh said, "O eminent ones, I have not known you to have a god other than me. Then ignite for me, O Haman, a fire upon the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses. And indeed, I do think he is among the liars

arabic_uthmani: وَاستَكبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنودُهُ فِي الأَرضِ بِغَيرِ الحَقِّ وَظَنّوا أَنَّهُم إِلَينا لا يُرجَعونَ
blank: w-stakbar huw w-junūduhū fīl-ʾarḍ b-ghayril-ḥaqq w-ẓannū ʾannahum ʾilaynā lā yurjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And he was arrogant, he and his soldiers, in the land, without right, and they thought that they would not be returned to Us

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخَذناهُ وَجُنودَهُ فَنَبَذناهُم فِي اليَمِّ ۖ فَانظُر كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ الظّالِمينَ
blank: f-ʾakhadhnāh w-junūdahū f-nabadhnāhum fīl-yamm f-nẓur kayf kān ʿāqibat ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: So We took him and his soldiers and threw them into the sea. So see how was the end of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلناهُم أَئِمَّةً يَدعونَ إِلَى النّارِ ۖ وَيَومَ القِيامَةِ لا يُنصَرونَ
blank: w-jaʿalnāhum ʾaʾimmat yadʿūn ʾilā n-nār w-yawmal-qiyāmat lā yunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: And We made them leaders inviting to the Fire, and on the Day of Resurrection they will not be helped

arabic_uthmani: وَأَتبَعناهُم في هٰذِهِ الدُّنيا لَعنَةً ۖ وَيَومَ القِيامَةِ هُم مِنَ المَقبوحينَ
blank: w-ʾatbaʿnāhum fī hādhih d-dunyā laʿnat w-yawmal-qiyāmat hum minal-maqbūḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And We caused to overtake them in this world a curse, and on the Day of Resurrection they will be of the despised

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَينا موسَى الكِتابَ مِن بَعدِ ما أَهلَكنَا القُرونَ الأولىٰ بَصائِرَ لِلنّاسِ وَهُدًى وَرَحمَةً لَعَلَّهُم يَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā mūsāl-kitāb m baʿd mā ʾahlaknāl-qurūnal-ʾūlā baṣāʾir l-n-nās w-hud w-raḥmat laʿallahum yatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And We gave Moses the Scripture, after We had destroyed the former generations, as enlightenment for the people and guidance and mercy that they might be reminded

arabic_uthmani: وَما كُنتَ بِجانِبِ الغَربِيِّ إِذ قَضَينا إِلىٰ موسَى الأَمرَ وَما كُنتَ مِنَ الشّاهِدينَ
blank: w-mā kunt b-jānibil-gharbiyy ʾidh qaḍaynā ʾilā mūsāl-ʾamr w-mā kunt min sh-shāhidīn
english_saheeh_international: And you, O Muhammad, were not on the western side of the mount when We revealed to Moses the command, and you were not among the witnesses to that

arabic_uthmani: وَلٰكِنّا أَنشَأنا قُرونًا فَتَطاوَلَ عَلَيهِمُ العُمُرُ ۚ وَما كُنتَ ثاوِيًا في أَهلِ مَديَنَ تَتلو عَلَيهِم آياتِنا وَلٰكِنّا كُنّا مُرسِلينَ
blank: w-lākinnā ʾanshaʾnā qurūn f-taṭāwal ʿalayhimul-ʿumur w-mā kunt thāwiy fī ʾahl madyan tatlū ʿalayhim ʾāyātinā w-lākinnā kunnā mursilīn
english_saheeh_international: But We produced many generations after Moses, and prolonged was their duration. And you were not a resident among the people of Madyan, reciting to them Our verses, but We were senders of this message

arabic_uthmani: وَما كُنتَ بِجانِبِ الطّورِ إِذ نادَينا وَلٰكِن رَحمَةً مِن رَبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَومًا ما أَتاهُم مِن نَذيرٍ مِن قَبلِكَ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-mā kunt b-jānib ṭ-ṭūr ʾidh nādaynā w-lāk raḥmatam-m rabbik l-tundhir qawmam-mā ʾatāhum m nadhīr m qablik laʿallahum yatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And you were not at the side of the mount when We called Moses but were sent as a mercy from your Lord to warn a people to whom no warner had come before you that they might be reminded

arabic_uthmani: وَلَولا أَن تُصيبَهُم مُصيبَةٌ بِما قَدَّمَت أَيديهِم فَيَقولوا رَبَّنا لَولا أَرسَلتَ إِلَينا رَسولًا فَنَتَّبِعَ آياتِكَ وَنَكونَ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-law-lā ʾ tuṣībahum muṣībat b-mā qaddamat ʾaydīhim f-yaqūlū rabbanā law-lā ʾarsalt ʾilaynā rasūl f-nattabiʿ ʾāyātik w-nakūn minal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And if not that a disaster should strike them for what their hands put forth of sins and they would say, "Our Lord, why did You not send us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses and been among the believers

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَهُمُ الحَقُّ مِن عِندِنا قالوا لَولا أوتِيَ مِثلَ ما أوتِيَ موسىٰ ۚ أَوَلَم يَكفُروا بِما أوتِيَ موسىٰ مِن قَبلُ ۖ قالوا سِحرانِ تَظاهَرا وَقالوا إِنّا بِكُلٍّ كافِرونَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾahumul-ḥaqq m ʿindinā qālū law-lā ʾūtiy mithl mā ʾūtiy mūsā ʾ-w-lam yakfurū b-mā ʾūtiy mūsā m qabl qālū siḥrān taẓāharā w-qālū ʾinnā b-kull kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: But when the truth came to them from Us, they said, "Why was he not given like that which was given to Moses?" Did they not disbelieve in that which was given to Moses before? They said, "They are but two works of magic supporting each other, and indeed we are, in both, disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: قُل فَأتوا بِكِتابٍ مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ هُوَ أَهدىٰ مِنهُما أَتَّبِعهُ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: qul f-ʾtū b-kitāb m ʿind llāh huw ʾahdā minhumā ʾattabiʿh ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Then bring a scripture from Allah which is more guiding than either of them that I may follow it, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن لَم يَستَجيبوا لَكَ فَاعلَم أَنَّما يَتَّبِعونَ أَهواءَهُم ۚ وَمَن أَضَلُّ مِمَّنِ اتَّبَعَ هَواهُ بِغَيرِ هُدًى مِنَ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: f-ʾ lam yastajībū lak f-ʿlam ʾannamā yattabiʿūn ʾahwāʾahum w-m ʾaḍall mimman ttabaʿ hawāh b-ghayr hudam-min llāh ʾinn llāh lā yahdīl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: But if they do not respond to you - then know that they only follow their own desires. And who is more astray than one who follows his desire without guidance from Allah? Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَقَد وَصَّلنا لَهُمُ القَولَ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-l-qad waṣṣalnā lahumul-qawl laʿallahum yatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have repeatedly conveyed to them the Qur'an that they might be reminded

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ آتَيناهُمُ الكِتابَ مِن قَبلِهِ هُم بِهِ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: alladhīn ʾātaynāhumul-kitāb m qablihī hum bihī yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Those to whom We gave the Scripture before it - they are believers in it

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا يُتلىٰ عَلَيهِم قالوا آمَنّا بِهِ إِنَّهُ الحَقُّ مِن رَبِّنا إِنّا كُنّا مِن قَبلِهِ مُسلِمينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā yutlā ʿalayhim qālū ʾāmannā bihī ʾinnahul-ḥaqq m rabbinā ʾinnā kunnā m qablihī muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And when it is recited to them, they say, "We have believed in it; indeed, it is the truth from our Lord. Indeed we were, even before it, Muslims submitting to Allah

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ يُؤتَونَ أَجرَهُم مَرَّتَينِ بِما صَبَروا وَيَدرَءونَ بِالحَسَنَةِ السَّيِّئَةَ وَمِمّا رَزَقناهُم يُنفِقونَ
blank: ʾulāʾik yuʾtawn ʾajrahum marratayn b-mā ṣabarū w-yadraʾūn b-l-ḥasanat s-sayyiʾat w-mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Those will be given their reward twice for what they patiently endured and because they avert evil through good, and from what We have provided them they spend

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا سَمِعُوا اللَّغوَ أَعرَضوا عَنهُ وَقالوا لَنا أَعمالُنا وَلَكُم أَعمالُكُم سَلامٌ عَلَيكُم لا نَبتَغِي الجاهِلينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā samiʿūl-laghw ʾaʿraḍū ʿanh w-qālū lanā ʾaʿmālunā w-lakum ʾaʿmālukum salām ʿalaykum lā nabtaghīl-jāhilīn
english_saheeh_international: And when they hear ill speech, they turn away from it and say, "For us are our deeds, and for you are your deeds. Peace will be upon you; we seek not the ignorant

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّكَ لا تَهدي مَن أَحبَبتَ وَلٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ يَهدي مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَهُوَ أَعلَمُ بِالمُهتَدينَ
blank: ʾinnak lā tahdī m ʾaḥbabt w-lākinn llāh yahdī m yashāʾ w-huw ʾaʿlam b-l-muhtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, O Muhammad, you do not guide whom you like, but Allah guides whom He wills. And He is most knowing of the rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا إِن نَتَّبِعِ الهُدىٰ مَعَكَ نُتَخَطَّف مِن أَرضِنا ۚ أَوَلَم نُمَكِّن لَهُم حَرَمًا آمِنًا يُجبىٰ إِلَيهِ ثَمَراتُ كُلِّ شَيءٍ رِزقًا مِن لَدُنّا وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-qālū ʾ nattabiʿil-hudā maʿak nutakhaṭṭaf m ʾarḍinā ʾ-w-lam numakk lahum ḥaram ʾāmin yujbā ʾilayh thamarāt kull shayʾ rizqam-m ladunnā w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "If we were to follow the guidance with you, we would be swept from our land." Have we not established for them a safe sanctuary to which are brought the fruits of all things as provision from Us? But most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَكَم أَهلَكنا مِن قَريَةٍ بَطِرَت مَعيشَتَها ۖ فَتِلكَ مَساكِنُهُم لَم تُسكَن مِن بَعدِهِم إِلّا قَليلًا ۖ وَكُنّا نَحنُ الوارِثينَ
blank: w-kam ʾahlaknā m qaryat baṭirat maʿīshatahā f-tilk masākinuhum lam tuskam-m baʿdihim ʾillā qalīl w-kunnā naḥnul-wārithīn
english_saheeh_international: And how many a city have We destroyed that was insolent in its way of living, and those are their dwellings which have not been inhabited after them except briefly. And it is We who were the inheritors

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ رَبُّكَ مُهلِكَ القُرىٰ حَتّىٰ يَبعَثَ في أُمِّها رَسولًا يَتلو عَلَيهِم آياتِنا ۚ وَما كُنّا مُهلِكِي القُرىٰ إِلّا وَأَهلُها ظالِمونَ
blank: w-mā kān rabbuk muhlikal-qurā ḥattā yabʿath fī ʾummihā rasūl yatlū ʿalayhim ʾāyātinā w-mā kunnā muhlikīl-qurā ʾillā w-ʾahluhā ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: And never would your Lord have destroyed the cities until He had sent to their mother a messenger reciting to them Our verses. And We would not destroy the cities except while their people were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَما أوتيتُم مِن شَيءٍ فَمَتاعُ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَزينَتُها ۚ وَما عِندَ اللَّهِ خَيرٌ وَأَبقىٰ ۚ أَفَلا تَعقِلونَ
blank: w-mā ʾūtītum m shayʾ f-matāʿul-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-zīnatuhā w-mā ʿind llāh khayr w-ʾabqā ʾ-f-lā taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And whatever thing you people have been given - it is only for the enjoyment of worldly life and its adornment. And what is with Allah is better and more lasting; so will you not use reason

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن وَعَدناهُ وَعدًا حَسَنًا فَهُوَ لاقيهِ كَمَن مَتَّعناهُ مَتاعَ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ثُمَّ هُوَ يَومَ القِيامَةِ مِنَ المُحضَرينَ
blank: ʾ-f-m waʿadnāh waʿd ḥasan f-huw lāqīh k-mam-mattaʿnāh matāʿal-ḥayāt d-dunyā thumm huw yawmal-qiyāmat minal-muḥḍarīn
english_saheeh_international: Then is he whom We have promised a good promise which he will obtain like he for whom We provided enjoyment of worldly life but then he is, on the Day of Resurrection, among those presented for punishment in Hell

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يُناديهِم فَيَقولُ أَينَ شُرَكائِيَ الَّذينَ كُنتُم تَزعُمونَ
blank: w-yawm yunādīhim f-yaqūl ʾayn shurakāʾiyalladhīn kuntum tazʿumūn
english_saheeh_international: And warn of the Day He will call them and say, "Where are My 'partners' which you used to claim

arabic_uthmani: قالَ الَّذينَ حَقَّ عَلَيهِمُ القَولُ رَبَّنا هٰؤُلاءِ الَّذينَ أَغوَينا أَغوَيناهُم كَما غَوَينا ۖ تَبَرَّأنا إِلَيكَ ۖ ما كانوا إِيّانا يَعبُدونَ
blank: qālalladhīn ḥaqq ʿalayhimul-qawl rabbanā hāʾulāʾilladhīn ʾaghwaynā ʾaghwaynāhum k-mā ghawaynā tabarraʾnā ʾilayk mā kānū ʾiyyānā yaʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: Those upon whom the word will have come into effect will say, "Our Lord, these are the ones we led to error. We led them to error just as we were in error. We declare our disassociation from them to You. They did not used to worship us

arabic_uthmani: وَقيلَ ادعوا شُرَكاءَكُم فَدَعَوهُم فَلَم يَستَجيبوا لَهُم وَرَأَوُا العَذابَ ۚ لَو أَنَّهُم كانوا يَهتَدونَ
blank: w-qīl dʿū shurakāʾakum f-daʿawhum f-lam yastajībū lahum w-raʾawul-ʿadhāb law ʾannahum kānū yahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And it will be said, "Invoke your 'partners' " and they will invoke them; but they will not respond to them, and they will see the punishment. If only they had followed guidance

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يُناديهِم فَيَقولُ ماذا أَجَبتُمُ المُرسَلينَ
blank: w-yawm yunādīhim f-yaqūl mādhā ʾajabtumul-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention the Day He will call them and say, "What did you answer the messengers

arabic_uthmani: فَعَمِيَت عَلَيهِمُ الأَنباءُ يَومَئِذٍ فَهُم لا يَتَساءَلونَ
blank: f-ʿamiyat ʿalayhimul-ʾanbāʾ yawmaʾidh f-hum lā yatasāʾalūn
english_saheeh_international: But the information will be unapparent to them that Day, so they will not be able to ask one another

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمّا مَن تابَ وَآمَنَ وَعَمِلَ صالِحًا فَعَسىٰ أَن يَكونَ مِنَ المُفلِحينَ
blank: f-ʾammā m tāb w-ʾāman w-ʿamil ṣāliḥ f-ʿasā ʾ yakūn minal-mufliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: But as for one who had repented, believed, and done righteousness, it is promised by Allah that he will be among the successful

arabic_uthmani: وَرَبُّكَ يَخلُقُ ما يَشاءُ وَيَختارُ ۗ ما كانَ لَهُمُ الخِيَرَةُ ۚ سُبحانَ اللَّهِ وَتَعالىٰ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: w-rabbuk yakhluq mā yashāʾ w-yakhtār mā kān lahumul-khiyarat subḥān llāh w-taʿālā ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: And your Lord creates what He wills and chooses; not for them was the choice. Exalted is Allah and high above what they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: وَرَبُّكَ يَعلَمُ ما تُكِنُّ صُدورُهُم وَما يُعلِنونَ
blank: w-rabbuk yaʿlam mā tukinn ṣudūruhum w-mā yuʿlinūn
english_saheeh_international: And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ اللَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ لَهُ الحَمدُ فِي الأولىٰ وَالآخِرَةِ ۖ وَلَهُ الحُكمُ وَإِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: w-huw llāh lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw lahul-ḥamd fīl-ʾūlā w-l-ʾākhirat w-lahul-ḥukm w-ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And He is Allah; there is no deity except Him. To Him is due all praise in the first life and the Hereafter. And His is the final decision, and to Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم إِن جَعَلَ اللَّهُ عَلَيكُمُ اللَّيلَ سَرمَدًا إِلىٰ يَومِ القِيامَةِ مَن إِلٰهٌ غَيرُ اللَّهِ يَأتيكُم بِضِياءٍ ۖ أَفَلا تَسمَعونَ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ jaʿal llāh ʿalaykumul-layl sarmad ʾilā yawmil-qiyāmat m ʾilāh ghayr llāh yaʾtīkum b-ḍiyāʾ ʾ-f-lā tasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should make for you the night continuous until the Day of Resurrection, what deity other than Allah could bring you light? Then will you not hear

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم إِن جَعَلَ اللَّهُ عَلَيكُمُ النَّهارَ سَرمَدًا إِلىٰ يَومِ القِيامَةِ مَن إِلٰهٌ غَيرُ اللَّهِ يَأتيكُم بِلَيلٍ تَسكُنونَ فيهِ ۖ أَفَلا تُبصِرونَ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ jaʿal llāh ʿalaykum n-nahār sarmad ʾilā yawmil-qiyāmat m ʾilāh ghayr llāh yaʾtīkum b-layl taskunūn fīh ʾ-f-lā tubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should make for you the day continuous until the Day of Resurrection, what deity other than Allah could bring you a night in which you may rest? Then will you not see

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن رَحمَتِهِ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ اللَّيلَ وَالنَّهارَ لِتَسكُنوا فيهِ وَلِتَبتَغوا مِن فَضلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: w-m raḥmatihī jaʿal lakumul-layl w-n-nahār l-taskunū fīh w-l-tabtaghū m faḍlihī w-laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And out of His mercy He made for you the night and the day that you may rest therein and by day seek from His bounty and that perhaps you will be grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يُناديهِم فَيَقولُ أَينَ شُرَكائِيَ الَّذينَ كُنتُم تَزعُمونَ
blank: w-yawm yunādīhim f-yaqūl ʾayn shurakāʾiyalladhīn kuntum tazʿumūn
english_saheeh_international: And warn of the Day He will call them and say, "Where are my 'partners' which you used to claim

arabic_uthmani: وَنَزَعنا مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ شَهيدًا فَقُلنا هاتوا بُرهانَكُم فَعَلِموا أَنَّ الحَقَّ لِلَّهِ وَضَلَّ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَفتَرونَ
blank: w-nazaʿnā m kull ʾummat shahīd f-qulnā hātū burhānakum f-ʿalimū ʾannal-ḥaqq l-llāh w-ḍall ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: And We will extract from every nation a witness and say, "Produce your proof," and they will know that the truth belongs to Allah, and lost from them is that which they used to invent

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ قارونَ كانَ مِن قَومِ موسىٰ فَبَغىٰ عَلَيهِم ۖ وَآتَيناهُ مِنَ الكُنوزِ ما إِنَّ مَفاتِحَهُ لَتَنوءُ بِالعُصبَةِ أُولِي القُوَّةِ إِذ قالَ لَهُ قَومُهُ لا تَفرَح ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُحِبُّ الفَرِحينَ
blank: ʾinn qārūn kān m qawm mūsā f-baghā ʿalayhim w-ʾātaynāh minal-kunūz mā ʾinn mafātiḥahū l-tanūʾ b-l-ʿuṣbat ʾulīl-quwwat ʾidh qāl lahū qawmuhū lā tafraḥ ʾinn llāh lā yuḥibbul-fariḥīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Qarun was from the people of Moses, but he tyrannized them. And We gave him of treasures whose keys would burden a band of strong men; thereupon his people said to him, "Do not exult. Indeed, Allah does not like the exultant

arabic_uthmani: وَابتَغِ فيما آتاكَ اللَّهُ الدّارَ الآخِرَةَ ۖ وَلا تَنسَ نَصيبَكَ مِنَ الدُّنيا ۖ وَأَحسِن كَما أَحسَنَ اللَّهُ إِلَيكَ ۖ وَلا تَبغِ الفَسادَ فِي الأَرضِ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُحِبُّ المُفسِدينَ
blank: w-btagh fī-mā ʾātāk llāh d-dāral-ʾākhirat w-lā tans naṣībak min d-dunyā w-ʾaḥs k-mā ʾaḥsan llāh ʾilayk w-lā tabghil-fasād fīl-ʾarḍ ʾinn llāh lā yuḥibbul-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: But seek, through that which Allah has given you, the home of the Hereafter; and yet, do not forget your share of the world. And do good as Allah has done good to you. And desire not corruption in the land. Indeed, Allah does not like corrupters

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِنَّما أوتيتُهُ عَلىٰ عِلمٍ عِندي ۚ أَوَلَم يَعلَم أَنَّ اللَّهَ قَد أَهلَكَ مِن قَبلِهِ مِنَ القُرونِ مَن هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنهُ قُوَّةً وَأَكثَرُ جَمعًا ۚ وَلا يُسأَلُ عَن ذُنوبِهِمُ المُجرِمونَ
blank: qāl ʾinnamā ʾūtītuhū ʿalā ʿilm ʿindī ʾ-w-lam yaʿlam ʾann llāh qad ʾahlak m qablihī minal-qurūn m huw ʾashadd minh quwwat w-ʾakthar jamʿ w-lā yusʾal ʿ dhunūbihimul-mujrimūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "I was only given it because of knowledge I have." Did he not know that Allah had destroyed before him of generations those who were greater than him in power and greater in accumulation of wealth? But the criminals, about their sins, will not be asked

arabic_uthmani: فَخَرَجَ عَلىٰ قَومِهِ في زينَتِهِ ۖ قالَ الَّذينَ يُريدونَ الحَياةَ الدُّنيا يا لَيتَ لَنا مِثلَ ما أوتِيَ قارونُ إِنَّهُ لَذو حَظٍّ عَظيمٍ
blank: f-kharaj ʿalā qawmihī fī zīnatihī qālalladhīn yurīdūnal-ḥayāt d-dunyā yā-layt lanā mithl mā ʾūtiy qārūn ʾinnahū l-dhū ḥaẓẓ ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: So he came out before his people in his adornment. Those who desired the worldly life said, "Oh, would that we had like what was given to Qarun. Indeed, he is one of great fortune

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ أوتُوا العِلمَ وَيلَكُم ثَوابُ اللَّهِ خَيرٌ لِمَن آمَنَ وَعَمِلَ صالِحًا وَلا يُلَقّاها إِلَّا الصّابِرونَ
blank: w-qālalladhīn ʾūtūl-ʿilm waylakum thawāb llāh khayr l-m ʾāman w-ʿamil ṣāliḥ w-lā yulaqqāhā ʾillā ṣ-ṣābirūn
english_saheeh_international: But those who had been given knowledge said, "Woe to you! The reward of Allah is better for he who believes and does righteousness. And none are granted it except the patient

arabic_uthmani: فَخَسَفنا بِهِ وَبِدارِهِ الأَرضَ فَما كانَ لَهُ مِن فِئَةٍ يَنصُرونَهُ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَما كانَ مِنَ المُنتَصِرينَ
blank: f-khasafnā bihī w-b-dārihil-ʾarḍ f-mā kān lahū m fiʾat yanṣurūnahū m dūn llāh w-mā kān minal-muntaṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: And We caused the earth to swallow him and his home. And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor was he of those who could defend themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَأَصبَحَ الَّذينَ تَمَنَّوا مَكانَهُ بِالأَمسِ يَقولونَ وَيكَأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَبسُطُ الرِّزقَ لِمَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ وَيَقدِرُ ۖ لَولا أَن مَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَينا لَخَسَفَ بِنا ۖ وَيكَأَنَّهُ لا يُفلِحُ الكافِرونَ
blank: w-ʾaṣbaḥalladhīn tamannaw makānahū b-l-ʾams yaqūlūn way-k-ʾann llāh yabsuṭ r-rizq l-m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī w-yaqdir law-lā ʾam-mann llāh ʿalaynā l-khasaf binā way-k-ʾannahū lā yufliḥul-kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who had wished for his position the previous day began to say, "Oh, how Allah extends provision to whom He wills of His servants and restricts it! If not that Allah had conferred favor on us, He would have caused it to swallow us. Oh, how the disbelievers do not succeed

arabic_uthmani: تِلكَ الدّارُ الآخِرَةُ نَجعَلُها لِلَّذينَ لا يُريدونَ عُلُوًّا فِي الأَرضِ وَلا فَسادًا ۚ وَالعاقِبَةُ لِلمُتَّقينَ
blank: tilk d-dārul-ʾākhirat najʿaluhā l-lladhīn lā yurīdūn ʿuluww fīl-ʾarḍ w-lā fasād w-l-ʿāqibat l-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: That home of the Hereafter We assign to those who do not desire exaltedness upon the earth or corruption. And the best outcome is for the righteous

arabic_uthmani: مَن جاءَ بِالحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُ خَيرٌ مِنها ۖ وَمَن جاءَ بِالسَّيِّئَةِ فَلا يُجزَى الَّذينَ عَمِلُوا السَّيِّئَاتِ إِلّا ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: m jāʾ b-l-ḥasanat f-lahū khayr minhā w-m jāʾ b-s-sayyiʾat f-lā yujzālladhīn ʿamilū s-sayyiʾāt ʾillā mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever comes on the Day of Judgement with a good deed will have better than it; and whoever comes with an evil deed - then those who did evil deeds will not be recompensed except as much as what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذي فَرَضَ عَلَيكَ القُرآنَ لَرادُّكَ إِلىٰ مَعادٍ ۚ قُل رَبّي أَعلَمُ مَن جاءَ بِالهُدىٰ وَمَن هُوَ في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: ʾinnalladhī faraḍ ʿalaykal-qurʾān l-rādduk ʾilā maʿād qul rabbī ʾaʿlam m jāʾ b-l-hudā w-m huw fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, O Muhammad, He who imposed upon you the Qur'an will take you back to a place of return. Say, "My Lord is most knowing of who brings guidance and who is in clear error

arabic_uthmani: وَما كُنتَ تَرجو أَن يُلقىٰ إِلَيكَ الكِتابُ إِلّا رَحمَةً مِن رَبِّكَ ۖ فَلا تَكونَنَّ ظَهيرًا لِلكافِرينَ
blank: w-mā kunt tarjū ʾ yulqā ʾilaykal-kitāb ʾillā raḥmatam-m rabbik f-lā takūnann ẓahīr l-l-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And you were not expecting that the Book would be conveyed to you, but it is a mercy from your Lord. So do not be an assistant to the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَن آياتِ اللَّهِ بَعدَ إِذ أُنزِلَت إِلَيكَ ۖ وَادعُ إِلىٰ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَلا تَكونَنَّ مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: w-lā yaṣuddunnak ʿ ʾāyāt llāh baʿd ʾidh ʾunzilat ʾilayk w-dʿ ʾilā rabbik w-lā takūnann minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: And never let them avert you from the verses of Allah after they have been revealed to you. And invite people to your Lord. And never be of those who associate others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَدعُ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلٰهًا آخَرَ ۘ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۚ كُلُّ شَيءٍ هالِكٌ إِلّا وَجهَهُ ۚ لَهُ الحُكمُ وَإِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: w-lā tadʿ maʿ llāh ʾilāh ʾākhar lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw kull shayʾ hālik ʾillā wajhahū lahul-ḥukm w-ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not invoke with Allah another deity. There is no deity except Him. Everything will be destroyed except His Face. His is the judgement, and to Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: الم
blank: -l-m (ʾalif lām mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Meem

arabic_uthmani: أَحَسِبَ النّاسُ أَن يُترَكوا أَن يَقولوا آمَنّا وَهُم لا يُفتَنونَ
blank: ʾ-ḥasib n-nās ʾ yutrakū ʾ yaqūlū ʾāmannā w-hum lā yuftanūn
english_saheeh_international: Do the people think that they will be left to say, "We believe" and they will not be tried

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد فَتَنَّا الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۖ فَلَيَعلَمَنَّ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ صَدَقوا وَلَيَعلَمَنَّ الكاذِبينَ
blank: w-l-qad fatannālladhīn m qablihim f-l-yaʿlamann llāhulladhīn ṣadaqū w-l-yaʿlamannal-kādhibīn
english_saheeh_international: But We have certainly tried those before them, and Allah will surely make evident those who are truthful, and He will surely make evident the liars

arabic_uthmani: أَم حَسِبَ الَّذينَ يَعمَلونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ أَن يَسبِقونا ۚ ساءَ ما يَحكُمونَ
blank: ʾam ḥasiballadhīn yaʿmalūn s-sayyiʾāt ʾ yasbiqūnā sāʾ mā yaḥkumūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do those who do evil deeds think they can outrun Us? Evil is what they judge

arabic_uthmani: مَن كانَ يَرجو لِقاءَ اللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ لَآتٍ ۚ وَهُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: m kān yarjū liqāʾ llāh f-ʾinn ʾajal llāh l-ʾāt w-huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Whoever should hope for the meeting with Allah - indeed, the term decreed by Allah is coming. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن جاهَدَ فَإِنَّما يُجاهِدُ لِنَفسِهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ العالَمينَ
blank: w-m jāhad f-ʾinnamā yujāhid l-nafsihī ʾinn llāh l-ghaniyy ʿanil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And whoever strives only strives for the benefit of himself. Indeed, Allah is free from need of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ لَنُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنهُم سَيِّئَاتِهِم وَلَنَجزِيَنَّهُم أَحسَنَ الَّذي كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt l-nukaffirann ʿanhum sayyiʾātihim w-l-najziyannahum ʾaḥsanalladhī kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely remove from them their misdeeds and will surely reward them according to the best of what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَوَصَّينَا الإِنسانَ بِوالِدَيهِ حُسنًا ۖ وَإِن جاهَداكَ لِتُشرِكَ بي ما لَيسَ لَكَ بِهِ عِلمٌ فَلا تُطِعهُما ۚ إِلَيَّ مَرجِعُكُم فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-waṣṣaynāl-ʾinsān b-wālidayh ḥusn w-ʾ jāhadāk l-tushrik bī mā lays lak bihī ʿilm f-lā tuṭiʿhumā ʾilayy marjiʿukum f-ʾunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have enjoined upon man goodness to parents. But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them. To Me is your return, and I will inform you about what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ لَنُدخِلَنَّهُم فِي الصّالِحينَ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt l-nudkhilannahum fī ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely admit them among the righteous into Paradise

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يَقولُ آمَنّا بِاللَّهِ فَإِذا أوذِيَ فِي اللَّهِ جَعَلَ فِتنَةَ النّاسِ كَعَذابِ اللَّهِ وَلَئِن جاءَ نَصرٌ مِن رَبِّكَ لَيَقولُنَّ إِنّا كُنّا مَعَكُم ۚ أَوَلَيسَ اللَّهُ بِأَعلَمَ بِما في صُدورِ العالَمينَ
blank: w-min n-nās m yaqūl ʾāmannā b-llāh f-ʾidhā ʾūdhiy fī llāh jaʿal fitnat n-nās k-ʿadhāb llāh w-l-ʾ jāʾ naṣr m rabbik l-yaqūlunn ʾinnā kunnā maʿakum ʾ-w-lays llāh b-ʾaʿlam b-mā fī ṣudūril-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allah," but when one of them is harmed for the cause of Allah, they consider the trial of the people as if it were the punishment of Allah. But if victory comes from your Lord, they say, "Indeed, We were with you." Is not Allah most knowing of what is within the breasts of all creatures

arabic_uthmani: وَلَيَعلَمَنَّ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَلَيَعلَمَنَّ المُنافِقينَ
blank: w-l-yaʿlamann llāhulladhīn ʾāmanū w-l-yaʿlamannal-munāfiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah will surely make evident those who believe, and He will surely make evident the hypocrites

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لِلَّذينَ آمَنُوا اتَّبِعوا سَبيلَنا وَلنَحمِل خَطاياكُم وَما هُم بِحامِلينَ مِن خَطاياهُم مِن شَيءٍ ۖ إِنَّهُم لَكاذِبونَ
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū l-lladhīn ʾāmanū ttabiʿū sabīlanā w-l-naḥmil khaṭāyākum w-mā hum b-ḥāmilīn m khaṭāyāhum m shayʾ ʾinnahum l-kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Follow our way, and we will carry your sins." But they will not carry anything of their sins. Indeed, they are liars

arabic_uthmani: وَلَيَحمِلُنَّ أَثقالَهُم وَأَثقالًا مَعَ أَثقالِهِم ۖ وَلَيُسأَلُنَّ يَومَ القِيامَةِ عَمّا كانوا يَفتَرونَ
blank: w-l-yaḥmilunn ʾathqālahum w-ʾathqālam-maʿ ʾathqālihim w-l-yusʾalunn yawmal-qiyāmat ʿammā kānū yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: But they will surely carry their own burdens and other burdens along with their burdens, and they will surely be questioned on the Day of Resurrection about what they used to invent

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا نوحًا إِلىٰ قَومِهِ فَلَبِثَ فيهِم أَلفَ سَنَةٍ إِلّا خَمسينَ عامًا فَأَخَذَهُمُ الطّوفانُ وَهُم ظالِمونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā nūḥ ʾilā qawmihī f-labith fīhim ʾalf sanat ʾillā khamsīn ʿām f-ʾakhadhahum ṭ-ṭūfān w-hum ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly sent Noah to his people, and he remained among them a thousand years minus fifty years, and the flood seized them while they were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَأَنجَيناهُ وَأَصحابَ السَّفينَةِ وَجَعَلناها آيَةً لِلعالَمينَ
blank: f-ʾanjaynāh w-ʾaṣḥāb s-safīnat w-jaʿalnāhā ʾāyat l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: But We saved him and the companions of the ship, and We made it a sign for the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَإِبراهيمَ إِذ قالَ لِقَومِهِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقوهُ ۖ ذٰلِكُم خَيرٌ لَكُم إِن كُنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾibrāhīm ʾidh qāl l-qawmih ʿbudū llāh w-ttaqūh dhālikum khayr lakum ʾ kuntum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And We sent Abraham, when he said to his people, "Worship Allah and fear Him. That is best for you, if you should know

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما تَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ أَوثانًا وَتَخلُقونَ إِفكًا ۚ إِنَّ الَّذينَ تَعبُدونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ لا يَملِكونَ لَكُم رِزقًا فَابتَغوا عِندَ اللَّهِ الرِّزقَ وَاعبُدوهُ وَاشكُروا لَهُ ۖ إِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: ʾinnamā taʿbudūn m dūn llāh ʾawthān w-takhluqūn ʾifk ʾinnalladhīn taʿbudūn m dūn llāh lā yamlikūn lakum rizq f-btaghū ʿind llāh r-rizq w-ʿbudūh w-shkurū lahū ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: You only worship, besides Allah, idols, and you produce a falsehood. Indeed, those you worship besides Allah do not possess for you the power of provision. So seek from Allah provision and worship Him and be grateful to Him. To Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن تُكَذِّبوا فَقَد كَذَّبَ أُمَمٌ مِن قَبلِكُم ۖ وَما عَلَى الرَّسولِ إِلَّا البَلاغُ المُبينُ
blank: w-ʾ tukadhdhibū f-qad kadhdhab ʾumam m qablikum w-mā ʿalā r-rasūl ʾillāl-balāghul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And if you people deny the message - already nations before you have denied. And there is not upon the Messenger except the duty of clear notification

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا كَيفَ يُبدِئُ اللَّهُ الخَلقَ ثُمَّ يُعيدُهُ ۚ إِنَّ ذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسيرٌ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw kayf yubdiʾ llāhul-khalq thumm yuʿīduhū ʾinn dhālik ʿalā llāh yasīr
english_saheeh_international: Have they not considered how Allah begins creation and then repeats it? Indeed that, for Allah, is easy

arabic_uthmani: قُل سيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَانظُروا كَيفَ بَدَأَ الخَلقَ ۚ ثُمَّ اللَّهُ يُنشِئُ النَّشأَةَ الآخِرَةَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: qul sīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-nẓurū kayf badaʾal-khalq thumm llāh yunshiʾ n-nashʾatal-ʾākhirat ʾinn llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Travel through the land and observe how He began creation. Then Allah will produce the final creation. Indeed Allah, over all things, is competent

arabic_uthmani: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشاءُ وَيَرحَمُ مَن يَشاءُ ۖ وَإِلَيهِ تُقلَبونَ
blank: yuʿadhdhib m yashāʾ w-yarḥam m yashāʾ w-ʾilayh tuqlabūn
english_saheeh_international: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy upon whom He wills, and to Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَنتُم بِمُعجِزينَ فِي الأَرضِ وَلا فِي السَّماءِ ۖ وَما لَكُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ مِن وَلِيٍّ وَلا نَصيرٍ
blank: w-mā ʾantum b-muʿjizīn fīl-ʾarḍ w-lā fī s-samāʾ w-mā lakum m dūn llāh m waliyy w-lā naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And you will not cause failure to Allah upon the earth or in the heaven. And you have not other than Allah any protector or any helper

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا بِآياتِ اللَّهِ وَلِقائِهِ أُولٰئِكَ يَئِسوا مِن رَحمَتي وَأُولٰئِكَ لَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: w-lladhīn kafarū b-ʾāyāt llāh w-liqāʾihī ʾulāʾik yaʾisū m raḥmatī w-ʾulāʾik lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And the ones who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and the meeting with Him - those have despaired of My mercy, and they will have a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: فَما كانَ جَوابَ قَومِهِ إِلّا أَن قالُوا اقتُلوهُ أَو حَرِّقوهُ فَأَنجاهُ اللَّهُ مِنَ النّارِ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: f-mā kān jawāb qawmihī ʾillā ʾ qālū qtulūh ʾaw ḥarriqūh f-ʾanjāh llāh min n-nār ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And the answer of Abraham's people was not but that they said, "Kill him or burn him," but Allah saved him from the fire. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ إِنَّمَا اتَّخَذتُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ أَوثانًا مَوَدَّةَ بَينِكُم فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ۖ ثُمَّ يَومَ القِيامَةِ يَكفُرُ بَعضُكُم بِبَعضٍ وَيَلعَنُ بَعضُكُم بَعضًا وَمَأواكُمُ النّارُ وَما لَكُم مِن ناصِرينَ
blank: w-qāl ʾinnamā ttakhadhtum m dūn llāh ʾawthānam-mawaddat baynikum fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā thumm yawmal-qiyāmat yakfur baʿḍukum b-baʿḍ w-yalʿan baʿḍukum baʿḍ w-maʾwākum n-nār w-mā lakum m nāṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: And Abraham said, "You have only taken, other than Allah, idols as a bond of affection among you in worldly life. Then on the Day of Resurrection you will deny one another and curse one another, and your refuge will be the Fire, and you will not have any helpers

arabic_uthmani: ۞ فَآمَنَ لَهُ لوطٌ ۘ وَقالَ إِنّي مُهاجِرٌ إِلىٰ رَبّي ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: f-ʾāman lahū lūṭ w-qāl ʾinnī muhājir ʾilā rabbī ʾinnahū huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And Lot believed him. Abraham said, "Indeed, I will emigrate to the service of my Lord. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَوَهَبنا لَهُ إِسحاقَ وَيَعقوبَ وَجَعَلنا في ذُرِّيَّتِهِ النُّبُوَّةَ وَالكِتابَ وَآتَيناهُ أَجرَهُ فِي الدُّنيا ۖ وَإِنَّهُ فِي الآخِرَةِ لَمِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: w-wahabnā lahū ʾisḥāq w-yaʿqūb w-jaʿalnā fī dhurriyyatih n-nubuwwat w-l-kitāb w-ʾātaynāh ʾajrahū fī d-dunyā w-ʾinnahū fīl-ʾākhirat l-min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And We gave to Him Isaac and Jacob and placed in his descendants prophethood and scripture. And We gave him his reward in this world, and indeed, he is in the Hereafter among the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَلوطًا إِذ قالَ لِقَومِهِ إِنَّكُم لَتَأتونَ الفاحِشَةَ ما سَبَقَكُم بِها مِن أَحَدٍ مِنَ العالَمينَ
blank: w-lūṭ ʾidh qāl l-qawmihī ʾinnakum l-taʾtūnal-fāḥishat mā sabaqakum bihā m ʾaḥad minal-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention Lot, when he said to his people, "Indeed, you commit such immorality as no one has preceded you with from among the worlds

arabic_uthmani: أَئِنَّكُم لَتَأتونَ الرِّجالَ وَتَقطَعونَ السَّبيلَ وَتَأتونَ في ناديكُمُ المُنكَرَ ۖ فَما كانَ جَوابَ قَومِهِ إِلّا أَن قالُوا ائتِنا بِعَذابِ اللَّهِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصّادِقينَ
blank: ʾ-ʾinnakum l-taʾtūn r-rijāl w-taqṭaʿūn s-sabīl w-taʾtūn fī nādīkumul-munkar f-mā kān jawāb qawmihī ʾillā ʾ qālū ʾtinā b-ʿadhāb llāh ʾ kunt min ṣ-ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, you approach men and obstruct the road and commit in your meetings every evil." And the answer of his people was not but they said, "Bring us the punishment of Allah, if you should be of the truthful

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ انصُرني عَلَى القَومِ المُفسِدينَ
blank: qāl rabb nṣurnī ʿalāl-qawmil-mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, support me against the corrupting people

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا جاءَت رُسُلُنا إِبراهيمَ بِالبُشرىٰ قالوا إِنّا مُهلِكو أَهلِ هٰذِهِ القَريَةِ ۖ إِنَّ أَهلَها كانوا ظالِمينَ
blank: w-lammā jāʾat rusulunā ʾibrāhīm b-l-bushrā qālū ʾinnā muhlikū ʾahl hādhihil-qaryat ʾinn ʾahlahā kānū ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And when Our messengers came to Abraham with the good tidings, they said, "Indeed, we will destroy the people of that Lot's city. Indeed, its people have been wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِنَّ فيها لوطًا ۚ قالوا نَحنُ أَعلَمُ بِمَن فيها ۖ لَنُنَجِّيَنَّهُ وَأَهلَهُ إِلَّا امرَأَتَهُ كانَت مِنَ الغابِرينَ
blank: qāl ʾinn fīhā lūṭ qālū naḥn ʾaʿlam b-m fīhā l-nunajjiyannahū w-ʾahlahū ʾillā mraʾatahū kānat minal-ghābirīn
english_saheeh_international: Abraham said, "Indeed, within it is Lot." They said, "We are more knowing of who is within it. We will surely save him and his family, except his wife. She is to be of those who remain behind

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا أَن جاءَت رُسُلُنا لوطًا سيءَ بِهِم وَضاقَ بِهِم ذَرعًا وَقالوا لا تَخَف وَلا تَحزَن ۖ إِنّا مُنَجّوكَ وَأَهلَكَ إِلَّا امرَأَتَكَ كانَت مِنَ الغابِرينَ
blank: w-lammā ʾ jāʾat rusulunā lūṭ sīʾ bihim w-ḍāq bihim dharʿ w-qālū lā takhaf w-lā taḥz ʾinnā munajjūk w-ʾahlak ʾillā mraʾatak kānat minal-ghābirīn
english_saheeh_international: And when Our messengers came to Lot, he was distressed for them and felt for them great discomfort. They said, "Fear not, nor grieve. Indeed, we will save you and your family, except your wife; she is to be of those who remain behind

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا مُنزِلونَ عَلىٰ أَهلِ هٰذِهِ القَريَةِ رِجزًا مِنَ السَّماءِ بِما كانوا يَفسُقونَ
blank: ʾinnā munzilūn ʿalā ʾahl hādhihil-qaryat rijzam-min s-samāʾ b-mā kānū yafsuqūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, we will bring down on the people of this city punishment from the sky because they have been defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد تَرَكنا مِنها آيَةً بَيِّنَةً لِقَومٍ يَعقِلونَ
blank: w-l-qad taraknā minhā ʾāyat bayyinat l-qawm yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly left of it a sign as clear evidence for a people who use reason

arabic_uthmani: وَإِلىٰ مَديَنَ أَخاهُم شُعَيبًا فَقالَ يا قَومِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَارجُوا اليَومَ الآخِرَ وَلا تَعثَوا فِي الأَرضِ مُفسِدينَ
blank: w-ʾilā madyan ʾakhāhum shuʿayb f-qāl yā-qawm ʿbudū llāh w-rjūl-yawmal-ʾākhir w-lā taʿthaw fīl-ʾarḍ mufsidīn
english_saheeh_international: And to Madyan We sent their brother Shu'ayb, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah and expect the Last Day and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption

arabic_uthmani: فَكَذَّبوهُ فَأَخَذَتهُمُ الرَّجفَةُ فَأَصبَحوا في دارِهِم جاثِمينَ
blank: f-kadhdhabūh f-ʾakhadhathum r-rajfat f-ʾaṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīn
english_saheeh_international: But they denied him, so the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home corpses fallen prone

arabic_uthmani: وَعادًا وَثَمودَ وَقَد تَبَيَّنَ لَكُم مِن مَساكِنِهِم ۖ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الشَّيطانُ أَعمالَهُم فَصَدَّهُم عَنِ السَّبيلِ وَكانوا مُستَبصِرينَ
blank: w-ʿād w-thamūd w-qad tabayyan lakum m masākinihim w-zayyan lahum sh-shayṭān ʾaʿmālahum f-ṣaddahum ʿan s-sabīl w-kānū mustabṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: And We destroyed 'Aad and Thamud, and it has become clear to you from their ruined dwellings. And Satan had made pleasing to them their deeds and averted them from the path, and they were endowed with perception

arabic_uthmani: وَقارونَ وَفِرعَونَ وَهامانَ ۖ وَلَقَد جاءَهُم موسىٰ بِالبَيِّناتِ فَاستَكبَروا فِي الأَرضِ وَما كانوا سابِقينَ
blank: w-qārūn w-firʿawn w-hāmān w-l-qad jāʾahum mūsā b-l-bayyināt f-stakbarū fīl-ʾarḍ w-mā kānū sābiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And We destroyed Qarun and Pharaoh and Haman. And Moses had already come to them with clear evidences, and they were arrogant in the land, but they were not outrunners of Our punishment

arabic_uthmani: فَكُلًّا أَخَذنا بِذَنبِهِ ۖ فَمِنهُم مَن أَرسَلنا عَلَيهِ حاصِبًا وَمِنهُم مَن أَخَذَتهُ الصَّيحَةُ وَمِنهُم مَن خَسَفنا بِهِ الأَرضَ وَمِنهُم مَن أَغرَقنا ۚ وَما كانَ اللَّهُ لِيَظلِمَهُم وَلٰكِن كانوا أَنفُسَهُم يَظلِمونَ
blank: f-kull ʾakhadhnā b-dhanbihī f-minhum m ʾarsalnā ʿalayh ḥāṣib w-minhum m ʾakhadhath ṣ-ṣayḥat w-minhum m khasafnā bihil-ʾarḍ w-minhum m ʾaghraqnā w-mā kān llāh l-yaẓlimahum w-lāk kānū ʾanfusahum yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: So each We seized for his sin; and among them were those upon whom We sent a storm of stones, and among them were those who were seized by the blast from the sky, and among them were those whom We caused the earth to swallow, and among them were those whom We drowned. And Allah would not have wronged them, but it was they who were wronging themselves

arabic_uthmani: مَثَلُ الَّذينَ اتَّخَذوا مِن دونِ اللَّهِ أَولِياءَ كَمَثَلِ العَنكَبوتِ اتَّخَذَت بَيتًا ۖ وَإِنَّ أَوهَنَ البُيوتِ لَبَيتُ العَنكَبوتِ ۖ لَو كانوا يَعلَمونَ
blank: mathalulladhīn ttakhadhū m dūn llāh ʾawliyāʾ k-mathalil-ʿankabūt ttakhadhat bayt w-ʾinn ʾawhanal-buyūt l-baytul-ʿankabūt law kānū yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: The example of those who take allies other than Allah is like that of the spider who takes a home. And indeed, the weakest of homes is the home of the spider, if they only knew

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعلَمُ ما يَدعونَ مِن دونِهِ مِن شَيءٍ ۚ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: ʾinn llāh yaʿlam mā yadʿūn m dūnihī m shayʾ w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah knows whatever thing they call upon other than Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَتِلكَ الأَمثالُ نَضرِبُها لِلنّاسِ ۖ وَما يَعقِلُها إِلَّا العالِمونَ
blank: w-tilkal-ʾamthāl naḍribuhā l-n-nās w-mā yaʿqiluhā ʾillāl-ʿālimūn
english_saheeh_international: And these examples We present to the people, but none will understand them except those of knowledge

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَ اللَّهُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ بِالحَقِّ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِلمُؤمِنينَ
blank: khalaq llāh s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ b-l-ḥaqq ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-l-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth. Indeed in that is a sign for the believers

arabic_uthmani: اتلُ ما أوحِيَ إِلَيكَ مِنَ الكِتابِ وَأَقِمِ الصَّلاةَ ۖ إِنَّ الصَّلاةَ تَنهىٰ عَنِ الفَحشاءِ وَالمُنكَرِ ۗ وَلَذِكرُ اللَّهِ أَكبَرُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ ما تَصنَعونَ
