blank: utl mā ʾūḥiy ʾilayk minal-kitāb w-ʾaqim ṣ-ṣalāt ʾinn ṣ-ṣalāt tanhā ʿanil-faḥshāʾ w-l-munkar w-l-dhikr llāh ʾakbar w-llāh yaʿlam mā taṣnaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Recite, O Muhammad, what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer. Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing, and the remembrance of Allah is greater. And Allah knows that which you do

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلا تُجادِلوا أَهلَ الكِتابِ إِلّا بِالَّتي هِيَ أَحسَنُ إِلَّا الَّذينَ ظَلَموا مِنهُم ۖ وَقولوا آمَنّا بِالَّذي أُنزِلَ إِلَينا وَأُنزِلَ إِلَيكُم وَإِلٰهُنا وَإِلٰهُكُم واحِدٌ وَنَحنُ لَهُ مُسلِمونَ
blank: w-lā tujādilū ʾahlal-kitāb ʾillā b-llatī hiy ʾaḥsan ʾillālladhīn ẓalamū minhum w-qūlū ʾāmannā b-lladhī ʾunzil ʾilaynā w-ʾunzil ʾilaykum w-ʾilāhunā w-ʾilāhukum wāḥid w-naḥn lahū muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: And do not argue with the People of the Scripture except in a way that is best, except for those who commit injustice among them, and say, "We believe in that which has been revealed to us and revealed to you. And our God and your God is one; and we are Muslims in submission to Him

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ أَنزَلنا إِلَيكَ الكِتابَ ۚ فَالَّذينَ آتَيناهُمُ الكِتابَ يُؤمِنونَ بِهِ ۖ وَمِن هٰؤُلاءِ مَن يُؤمِنُ بِهِ ۚ وَما يَجحَدُ بِآياتِنا إِلَّا الكافِرونَ
blank: w-k-dhālik ʾanzalnā ʾilaykal-kitāb f-lladhīn ʾātaynāhumul-kitāb yuʾminūn bihī w-m hāʾulāʾ m yuʾmin bihī w-mā yajḥad b-ʾāyātinā ʾillāl-kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: And thus We have sent down to you the Qur'an. And those to whom We previously gave the Scripture believe in it. And among these people of Makkah are those who believe in it. And none reject Our verses except the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَما كُنتَ تَتلو مِن قَبلِهِ مِن كِتابٍ وَلا تَخُطُّهُ بِيَمينِكَ ۖ إِذًا لَارتابَ المُبطِلونَ
blank: w-mā kunt tatlū m qablihī m kitāb w-lā takhuṭṭuhū b-yamīnik ʾidh l-rtābal-mubṭilūn
english_saheeh_international: And you did not recite before it any scripture, nor did you inscribe one with your right hand. Otherwise the falsifiers would have had cause for doubt

arabic_uthmani: بَل هُوَ آياتٌ بَيِّناتٌ في صُدورِ الَّذينَ أوتُوا العِلمَ ۚ وَما يَجحَدُ بِآياتِنا إِلَّا الظّالِمونَ
blank: bal huw ʾāyāt bayyināt fī ṣudūrilladhīn ʾūtūl-ʿilm w-mā yajḥad b-ʾāyātinā ʾillā ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, the Qur'an is distinct verses preserved within the breasts of those who have been given knowledge. And none reject Our verses except the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لَولا أُنزِلَ عَلَيهِ آياتٌ مِن رَبِّهِ ۖ قُل إِنَّمَا الآياتُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَإِنَّما أَنا نَذيرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-qālū law-lā ʾunzil ʿalayh ʾāyāt m rabbihī qul ʾinnamāl-ʾāyāt ʿind llāh w-ʾinnamā ʾan nadhīr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: But they say, "Why are not signs sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "The signs are only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَكفِهِم أَنّا أَنزَلنا عَلَيكَ الكِتابَ يُتلىٰ عَلَيهِم ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَرَحمَةً وَذِكرىٰ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yakfihim ʾannā ʾanzalnā ʿalaykal-kitāb yutlā ʿalayhim ʾinn fī dhālik l-raḥmat w-dhikrā l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And is it not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book which is recited to them? Indeed in that is a mercy and reminder for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: قُل كَفىٰ بِاللَّهِ بَيني وَبَينَكُم شَهيدًا ۖ يَعلَمُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۗ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا بِالباطِلِ وَكَفَروا بِاللَّهِ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: qul kafā b-llāh baynī w-baynakum shahīd yaʿlam mā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-lladhīn ʾāmanū b-l-bāṭil w-kafarū b-llāh ʾulāʾik humul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Sufficient is Allah between me and you as Witness. He knows what is in the heavens and earth. And they who have believed in falsehood and disbelieved in Allah - it is those who are the losers

arabic_uthmani: وَيَستَعجِلونَكَ بِالعَذابِ ۚ وَلَولا أَجَلٌ مُسَمًّى لَجاءَهُمُ العَذابُ وَلَيَأتِيَنَّهُم بَغتَةً وَهُم لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: w-yastaʿjilūnak b-l-ʿadhāb w-law-lā ʾajal musamm l-jāʾahumul-ʿadhāb w-l-yaʾtiyannahum baghtat w-hum lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. And if not for the decree of a specified term, punishment would have reached them. But it will surely come to them suddenly while they perceive not

arabic_uthmani: يَستَعجِلونَكَ بِالعَذابِ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحيطَةٌ بِالكافِرينَ
blank: yastaʿjilūnak b-l-ʿadhāb w-ʾinn jahannam l-muḥīṭat b-l-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: They urge you to hasten the punishment. And indeed, Hell will be encompassing of the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَغشاهُمُ العَذابُ مِن فَوقِهِم وَمِن تَحتِ أَرجُلِهِم وَيَقولُ ذوقوا ما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: yawm yaghshāhumul-ʿadhāb m fawqihim w-m taḥt ʾarjulihim w-yaqūl dhūqū mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: On the Day the punishment will cover them from above them and from below their feet and it is said, "Taste the result of what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: يا عِبادِيَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِنَّ أَرضي واسِعَةٌ فَإِيّايَ فَاعبُدونِ
blank: yā-ʿibādiyalladhīn ʾāmanū ʾinn ʾarḍī wāsiʿat f-ʾiyyāy f-ʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: O My servants who have believed, indeed My earth is spacious, so worship only Me

arabic_uthmani: كُلُّ نَفسٍ ذائِقَةُ المَوتِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَينا تُرجَعونَ
blank: kull nafs dhāʾiqatul-mawt thumm ʾilaynā turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us will you be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُم مِنَ الجَنَّةِ غُرَفًا تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها ۚ نِعمَ أَجرُ العامِلينَ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt l-nubawwiʾannahum minal-jannat ghuraf tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā niʿm ʾajrul-ʿāmilīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - We will surely assign to them of Paradise elevated chambers beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Excellent is the reward of the righteous workers

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ صَبَروا وَعَلىٰ رَبِّهِم يَتَوَكَّلونَ
blank: alladhīn ṣabarū w-ʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūn
english_saheeh_international: Who have been patient and upon their Lord rely

arabic_uthmani: وَكَأَيِّن مِن دابَّةٍ لا تَحمِلُ رِزقَهَا اللَّهُ يَرزُقُها وَإِيّاكُم ۚ وَهُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: w-k-ʾayy m dābbat lā taḥmil rizqahā llāh yarzuquhā w-ʾiyyākum w-huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And how many a creature carries not its own provision. Allah provides for it and for you. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن سَأَلتَهُم مَن خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمسَ وَالقَمَرَ لَيَقولُنَّ اللَّهُ ۖ فَأَنّىٰ يُؤفَكونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ saʾaltahum m khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-sakhkhar sh-shams w-l-qamar l-yaqūlunn llāh f-ʾannā yuʾfakūn
english_saheeh_international: If you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth and subjected the sun and the moon?" they would surely say, "Allah." Then how are they deluded

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ يَبسُطُ الرِّزقَ لِمَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ وَيَقدِرُ لَهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: allāh yabsuṭ r-rizq l-m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī w-yaqdir lahū ʾinn llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts for him. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن سَأَلتَهُم مَن نَزَّلَ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَأَحيا بِهِ الأَرضَ مِن بَعدِ مَوتِها لَيَقولُنَّ اللَّهُ ۚ قُلِ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَل أَكثَرُهُم لا يَعقِلونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ saʾaltahum m nazzal min s-samāʾ māʾ f-ʾaḥyā bihil-ʾarḍ m baʿd mawtihā l-yaqūlunn llāh qulil-ḥamd l-llāh bal ʾaktharuhum lā yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you asked them, "Who sends down rain from the sky and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness?" they would surely say " Allah." Say, "Praise to Allah "; but most of them do not reason

arabic_uthmani: وَما هٰذِهِ الحَياةُ الدُّنيا إِلّا لَهوٌ وَلَعِبٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ الدّارَ الآخِرَةَ لَهِيَ الحَيَوانُ ۚ لَو كانوا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-mā hādhihil-ḥayāt d-dunyā ʾillā lahw w-laʿib w-ʾinn d-dāral-ʾākhirat l-hiyal-ḥayawān law kānū yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And this worldly life is not but diversion and amusement. And indeed, the home of the Hereafter - that is the eternal life, if only they knew

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا رَكِبوا فِي الفُلكِ دَعَوُا اللَّهَ مُخلِصينَ لَهُ الدّينَ فَلَمّا نَجّاهُم إِلَى البَرِّ إِذا هُم يُشرِكونَ
blank: f-ʾidhā rakibū fīl-fulk daʿaw llāh mukhliṣīn lah d-dīn f-lammā najjāhum ʾilāl-barr ʾidhā hum yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: And when they board a ship, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, at once they associate others with Him

arabic_uthmani: لِيَكفُروا بِما آتَيناهُم وَلِيَتَمَتَّعوا ۖ فَسَوفَ يَعلَمونَ
blank: l-yakfurū b-mā ʾātaynāhum w-l-yatamattaʿū f-sawf yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So that they will deny what We have granted them, and they will enjoy themselves. But they are going to know

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا أَنّا جَعَلنا حَرَمًا آمِنًا وَيُتَخَطَّفُ النّاسُ مِن حَولِهِم ۚ أَفَبِالباطِلِ يُؤمِنونَ وَبِنِعمَةِ اللَّهِ يَكفُرونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾannā jaʿalnā ḥaram ʾāmin w-yutakhaṭṭaf n-nās m ḥawlihim ʾ-f-b-l-bāṭil yuʾminūn w-b-niʿmat llāh yakfurūn
english_saheeh_international: Have they not seen that We made Makkah a safe sanctuary, while people are being taken away all around them? Then in falsehood do they believe, and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَو كَذَّبَ بِالحَقِّ لَمّا جاءَهُ ۚ أَلَيسَ في جَهَنَّمَ مَثوًى لِلكافِرينَ
blank: w-m ʾaẓlam mimman ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib ʾaw kadhdhab b-l-ḥaqq lammā jāʾahū ʾ-lays fī jahannam mathw l-l-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah or denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a sufficient residence for the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ جاهَدوا فينا لَنَهدِيَنَّهُم سُبُلَنا ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَمَعَ المُحسِنينَ
blank: w-lladhīn jāhadū fīnā l-nahdiyannahum subulanā w-ʾinn llāh l-maʿal-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: الم
blank: -l-m (ʾalif lām mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Meem

arabic_uthmani: غُلِبَتِ الرّومُ
blank: ghulibat r-rūm
english_saheeh_international: The Byzantines have been defeated

arabic_uthmani: في أَدنَى الأَرضِ وَهُم مِن بَعدِ غَلَبِهِم سَيَغلِبونَ
blank: fī ʾadnāl-ʾarḍ w-hum m baʿd ghalabihim s-yaghlibūn
english_saheeh_international: In the nearest land. But they, after their defeat, will overcome

arabic_uthmani: في بِضعِ سِنينَ ۗ لِلَّهِ الأَمرُ مِن قَبلُ وَمِن بَعدُ ۚ وَيَومَئِذٍ يَفرَحُ المُؤمِنونَ
blank: fī biḍʿ sinīn l-llāhil-ʾamr m qabl w-m baʿd w-yawmaʾidh yafraḥul-muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Within three to nine years. To Allah belongs the command before and after. And that day the believers will rejoice

arabic_uthmani: بِنَصرِ اللَّهِ ۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشاءُ ۖ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: b-naṣr llāh yanṣur m yashāʾ w-huwal-ʿazīz r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: In the victory of Allah. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَعدَ اللَّهِ ۖ لا يُخلِفُ اللَّهُ وَعدَهُ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: waʿd llāh lā yukhlif llāh waʿdahū w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: It is the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in His promise, but most of the people do not know

arabic_uthmani: يَعلَمونَ ظاهِرًا مِنَ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَهُم عَنِ الآخِرَةِ هُم غافِلونَ
blank: yaʿlamūn ẓāhiram-minal-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-hum ʿanil-ʾākhirat hum ghāfilūn
english_saheeh_international: They know what is apparent of the worldly life, but they, of the Hereafter, are unaware

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَتَفَكَّروا في أَنفُسِهِم ۗ ما خَلَقَ اللَّهُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَما بَينَهُما إِلّا بِالحَقِّ وَأَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۗ وَإِنَّ كَثيرًا مِنَ النّاسِ بِلِقاءِ رَبِّهِم لَكافِرونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yatafakkarū fī ʾanfusihim mā khalaq llāh s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā ʾillā b-l-ḥaqq w-ʾajal musamm w-ʾinn kathīram-min n-nās b-liqāʾ rabbihim l-kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they not contemplate within themselves? Allah has not created the heavens and the earth and what is between them except in truth and for a specified term. And indeed, many of the people, in the matter of the meeting with their Lord, are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَسيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَيَنظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ كانوا أَشَدَّ مِنهُم قُوَّةً وَأَثارُوا الأَرضَ وَعَمَروها أَكثَرَ مِمّا عَمَروها وَجاءَتهُم رُسُلُهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ ۖ فَما كانَ اللَّهُ لِيَظلِمَهُم وَلٰكِن كانوا أَنفُسَهُم يَظلِمونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yasīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-yanẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatulladhīn m qablihim kānū ʾashadd minhum quwwat w-ʾathārūl-ʾarḍ w-ʿamarūhā ʾakthar mimmā ʿamarūhā w-jāʾathum rusuluhum b-l-bayyināt f-mā kān llāh l-yaẓlimahum w-lāk kānū ʾanfusahum yaẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: Have they not traveled through the earth and observed how was the end of those before them? They were greater than them in power, and they plowed the earth and built it up more than they have built it up, and their messengers came to them with clear evidences. And Allah would not ever have wronged them, but they were wronging themselves

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ كانَ عاقِبَةَ الَّذينَ أَساءُوا السّوأىٰ أَن كَذَّبوا بِآياتِ اللَّهِ وَكانوا بِها يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: thumm kān ʿāqibatalladhīn ʾasāʾū s-sūʾā ʾ kadhdhabū b-ʾāyāt llāh w-kānū bihā yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: Then the end of those who did evil was the worst consequence because they denied the signs of Allah and used to ridicule them

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ يَبدَأُ الخَلقَ ثُمَّ يُعيدُهُ ثُمَّ إِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: allāh yabdaʾul-khalq thumm yuʿīduhū thumm ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah begins creation; then He will repeat it; then to Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ تَقومُ السّاعَةُ يُبلِسُ المُجرِمونَ
blank: w-yawm taqūm s-sāʿat yublisul-mujrimūn
english_saheeh_international: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will be in despair

arabic_uthmani: وَلَم يَكُن لَهُم مِن شُرَكائِهِم شُفَعاءُ وَكانوا بِشُرَكائِهِم كافِرينَ
blank: w-lam yak lahum m shurakāʾihim shufaʿāʾ w-kānū b-shurakāʾihim kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And there will not be for them among their alleged partners any intercessors, and they will then be disbelievers in their partners

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ تَقومُ السّاعَةُ يَومَئِذٍ يَتَفَرَّقونَ
blank: w-yawm taqūm s-sāʿat yawmaʾidh yatafarraqūn
english_saheeh_international: And the Day the Hour appears - that Day they will become separated

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ فَهُم في رَوضَةٍ يُحبَرونَ
blank: f-ʾammālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt f-hum fī rawḍat yuḥbarūn
english_saheeh_international: And as for those who had believed and done righteous deeds, they will be in a garden of Paradise, delighted

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمَّا الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَكَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا وَلِقاءِ الآخِرَةِ فَأُولٰئِكَ فِي العَذابِ مُحضَرونَ
blank: w-ʾammālladhīn kafarū w-kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā w-liqāʾil-ʾākhirat f-ʾulāʾik fīl-ʿadhāb muḥḍarūn
english_saheeh_international: But as for those who disbelieved and denied Our verses and the meeting of the Hereafter, those will be brought into the punishment to remain

arabic_uthmani: فَسُبحانَ اللَّهِ حينَ تُمسونَ وَحينَ تُصبِحونَ
blank: f-subḥān llāh ḥīn tumsūn w-ḥīn tuṣbiḥūn
english_saheeh_international: So exalted is Allah when you reach the evening and when you reach the morning

arabic_uthmani: وَلَهُ الحَمدُ فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَعَشِيًّا وَحينَ تُظهِرونَ
blank: w-lahul-ḥamd fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-ʿashiyy w-ḥīn tuẓhirūn
english_saheeh_international: And to Him is due all praise throughout the heavens and the earth. And exalted is He at night and when you are at noon

arabic_uthmani: يُخرِجُ الحَيَّ مِنَ المَيِّتِ وَيُخرِجُ المَيِّتَ مِنَ الحَيِّ وَيُحيِي الأَرضَ بَعدَ مَوتِها ۚ وَكَذٰلِكَ تُخرَجونَ
blank: yukhrijul-ḥayy minal-mayyit w-yukhrijul-mayyit minal-ḥayy w-yuḥyil-ʾarḍ baʿd mawtihā w-k-dhālik tukhrajūn
english_saheeh_international: He brings the living out of the dead and brings the dead out of the living and brings to life the earth after its lifelessness. And thus will you be brought out

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ أَن خَلَقَكُم مِن تُرابٍ ثُمَّ إِذا أَنتُم بَشَرٌ تَنتَشِرونَ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihī ʾ khalaqakum m turāb thumm ʾidhā ʾantum bashar tantashirūn
english_saheeh_international: And of His signs is that He created you from dust; then, suddenly you were human beings dispersing throughout the earth

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ أَن خَلَقَ لَكُم مِن أَنفُسِكُم أَزواجًا لِتَسكُنوا إِلَيها وَجَعَلَ بَينَكُم مَوَدَّةً وَرَحمَةً ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihī ʾ khalaq lakum m ʾanfusikum ʾazwāj l-taskunū ʾilayhā w-jaʿal baynakum mawaddat w-raḥmat ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ خَلقُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَاختِلافُ أَلسِنَتِكُم وَأَلوانِكُم ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِلعالِمينَ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihī khalq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-khtilāf ʾalsinatikum w-ʾalwānikum ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-l-ʿālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And of His signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth and the diversity of your languages and your colors. Indeed in that are signs for those of knowledge

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ مَنامُكُم بِاللَّيلِ وَالنَّهارِ وَابتِغاؤُكُم مِن فَضلِهِ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يَسمَعونَ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihī manāmukum b-l-layl w-n-nahār w-btighāʾukum m faḍlihī ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And of His signs is your sleep by night and day and your seeking of His bounty. Indeed in that are signs for a people who listen

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ يُريكُمُ البَرقَ خَوفًا وَطَمَعًا وَيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَيُحيي بِهِ الأَرضَ بَعدَ مَوتِها ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يَعقِلونَ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihī yurīkumul-barq khawf w-ṭamaʿ w-yunazzil min s-samāʾ māʾ f-yuḥyī bihil-ʾarḍ baʿd mawtihā ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And of His signs is that He shows you the lightning causing fear and aspiration, and He sends down rain from the sky by which He brings to life the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that are signs for a people who use reason

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ أَن تَقومَ السَّماءُ وَالأَرضُ بِأَمرِهِ ۚ ثُمَّ إِذا دَعاكُم دَعوَةً مِنَ الأَرضِ إِذا أَنتُم تَخرُجونَ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihī ʾ taqūm s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ b-ʾamrihī thumm ʾidhā daʿākum daʿwatam-minal-ʾarḍ ʾidhā ʾantum takhrujūn
english_saheeh_international: And of His signs is that the heaven and earth remain by His command. Then when He calls you with a single call from the earth, immediately you will come forth

arabic_uthmani: وَلَهُ مَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ كُلٌّ لَهُ قانِتونَ
blank: w-lahū m fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ kull lahū qānitūn
english_saheeh_international: And to Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and earth. All are to Him devoutly obedient

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي يَبدَأُ الخَلقَ ثُمَّ يُعيدُهُ وَهُوَ أَهوَنُ عَلَيهِ ۚ وَلَهُ المَثَلُ الأَعلىٰ فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: w-huwalladhī yabdaʾul-khalq thumm yuʿīduhū w-huw ʾahwan ʿalayh w-lahul-mathalul-ʾaʿlā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who begins creation; then He repeats it, and that is even easier for Him. To Him belongs the highest attribute in the heavens and earth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: ضَرَبَ لَكُم مَثَلًا مِن أَنفُسِكُم ۖ هَل لَكُم مِن ما مَلَكَت أَيمانُكُم مِن شُرَكاءَ في ما رَزَقناكُم فَأَنتُم فيهِ سَواءٌ تَخافونَهُم كَخيفَتِكُم أَنفُسَكُم ۚ كَذٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ الآياتِ لِقَومٍ يَعقِلونَ
blank: ḍarab lakum mathalam-m ʾanfusikum hal lakum m mā malakat ʾaymānukum m shurakāʾ fī mā razaqnākum f-ʾantum fīh sawāʾ takhāfūnahum k-khīfatikum ʾanfusakum k-dhālik nufaṣṣilul-ʾāyāt l-qawm yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: He presents to you an example from yourselves. Do you have among those whom your right hands possess any partners in what We have provided for you so that you are equal therein and would fear them as your fear of one another within a partnership? Thus do We detail the verses for a people who use reason

arabic_uthmani: بَلِ اتَّبَعَ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا أَهواءَهُم بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ ۖ فَمَن يَهدي مَن أَضَلَّ اللَّهُ ۖ وَما لَهُم مِن ناصِرينَ
blank: bal ttabaʿalladhīn ẓalamū ʾahwāʾahum b-ghayr ʿilm f-m yahdī m ʾaḍall llāh w-mā lahum m nāṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: But those who wrong follow their own desires without knowledge. Then who can guide one whom Allah has sent astray? And for them there are no helpers

arabic_uthmani: فَأَقِم وَجهَكَ لِلدّينِ حَنيفًا ۚ فِطرَتَ اللَّهِ الَّتي فَطَرَ النّاسَ عَلَيها ۚ لا تَبديلَ لِخَلقِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ الدّينُ القَيِّمُ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-ʾaqim wajhak l-d-dīn ḥanīf fiṭrat llāh llatī faṭar n-nās ʿalayhā lā tabdīl l-khalq llāh dhālik d-dīnul-qayyim w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So direct your face toward the religion, inclining to truth. Adhere to the fitrah of Allah upon which He has created all people. No change should there be in the creation of Allah. That is the correct religion, but most of the people do not know

arabic_uthmani: ۞ مُنيبينَ إِلَيهِ وَاتَّقوهُ وَأَقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ وَلا تَكونوا مِنَ المُشرِكينَ
blank: munībīn ʾilayh w-ttaqūh w-ʾaqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-lā takūnū minal-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Adhere to it, turning in repentance to Him, and fear Him and establish prayer and do not be of those who associate others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: مِنَ الَّذينَ فَرَّقوا دينَهُم وَكانوا شِيَعًا ۖ كُلُّ حِزبٍ بِما لَدَيهِم فَرِحونَ
blank: minalladhīn farraqū dīnahum w-kānū shiyaʿ kull ḥizb b-mā ladayhim fariḥūn
english_saheeh_international: Or of those who have divided their religion and become sects, every faction rejoicing in what it has

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا مَسَّ النّاسَ ضُرٌّ دَعَوا رَبَّهُم مُنيبينَ إِلَيهِ ثُمَّ إِذا أَذاقَهُم مِنهُ رَحمَةً إِذا فَريقٌ مِنهُم بِرَبِّهِم يُشرِكونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā mass n-nās ḍurr daʿaw rabbahum munībīn ʾilayh thumm ʾidhā ʾadhāqahum minh raḥmat ʾidhā farīq minhum b-rabbihim yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: And when adversity touches the people, they call upon their Lord, turning in repentance to Him. Then when He lets them taste mercy from Him, at once a party of them associate others with their Lord

arabic_uthmani: لِيَكفُروا بِما آتَيناهُم ۚ فَتَمَتَّعوا فَسَوفَ تَعلَمونَ
blank: l-yakfurū b-mā ʾātaynāhum f-tamattaʿū f-sawf taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So that they will deny what We have granted them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know

arabic_uthmani: أَم أَنزَلنا عَلَيهِم سُلطانًا فَهُوَ يَتَكَلَّمُ بِما كانوا بِهِ يُشرِكونَ
blank: ʾam ʾanzalnā ʿalayhim sulṭān f-huw yatakallam b-mā kānū bihī yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have We sent down to them an authority, and it speaks of what they were associating with Him

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا أَذَقنَا النّاسَ رَحمَةً فَرِحوا بِها ۖ وَإِن تُصِبهُم سَيِّئَةٌ بِما قَدَّمَت أَيديهِم إِذا هُم يَقنَطونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā ʾadhaqnā n-nās raḥmat fariḥū bihā w-ʾ tuṣibhum sayyiʾat b-mā qaddamat ʾaydīhim ʾidhā hum yaqnaṭūn
english_saheeh_international: And when We let the people taste mercy, they rejoice therein, but if evil afflicts them for what their hands have put forth, immediately they despair

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَبسُطُ الرِّزقَ لِمَن يَشاءُ وَيَقدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾann llāh yabsuṭ r-rizq l-m yashāʾ w-yaqdir ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they not see that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts it? Indeed, in that are signs for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: فَآتِ ذَا القُربىٰ حَقَّهُ وَالمِسكينَ وَابنَ السَّبيلِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ خَيرٌ لِلَّذينَ يُريدونَ وَجهَ اللَّهِ ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: f-ʾāt dhāl-qurbā ḥaqqahū w-l-miskīn w-bn s-sabīl dhālik khayr l-lladhīn yurīdūn wajh llāh w-ʾulāʾik humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: So give the relative his right, as well as the needy and the traveler. That is best for those who desire the countenance of Allah, and it is they who will be the successful

arabic_uthmani: وَما آتَيتُم مِن رِبًا لِيَربُوَ في أَموالِ النّاسِ فَلا يَربو عِندَ اللَّهِ ۖ وَما آتَيتُم مِن زَكاةٍ تُريدونَ وَجهَ اللَّهِ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُضعِفونَ
blank: w-mā ʾātaytum m rib l-yarbuw fī ʾamwāl n-nās f-lā yarbū ʿind llāh w-mā ʾātaytum m zakāt turīdūn wajh llāh f-ʾulāʾik humul-muḍʿifūn
english_saheeh_international: And whatever you give for interest to increase within the wealth of people will not increase with Allah. But what you give in zakah, desiring the countenance of Allah - those are the multipliers

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ الَّذي خَلَقَكُم ثُمَّ رَزَقَكُم ثُمَّ يُميتُكُم ثُمَّ يُحييكُم ۖ هَل مِن شُرَكائِكُم مَن يَفعَلُ مِن ذٰلِكُم مِن شَيءٍ ۚ سُبحانَهُ وَتَعالىٰ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: allāhulladhī khalaqakum thumm razaqakum thumm yumītukum thumm yuḥyīkum hal m shurakāʾikum m yafʿal m dhālikum m shayʾ subḥānahū w-taʿālā ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah is the one who created you, then provided for you, then will cause you to die, and then will give you life. Are there any of your "partners" who does anything of that? Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: ظَهَرَ الفَسادُ فِي البَرِّ وَالبَحرِ بِما كَسَبَت أَيدِي النّاسِ لِيُذيقَهُم بَعضَ الَّذي عَمِلوا لَعَلَّهُم يَرجِعونَ
blank: ẓaharal-fasād fīl-barr w-l-baḥr b-mā kasabat ʾaydī n-nās l-yudhīqahum baʿḍalladhī ʿamilū laʿallahum yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Corruption has appeared throughout the land and sea by reason of what the hands of people have earned so He may let them taste part of the consequence of what they have done that perhaps they will return to righteousness

arabic_uthmani: قُل سيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَانظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلُ ۚ كانَ أَكثَرُهُم مُشرِكينَ
blank: qul sīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-nẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatulladhīn m qabl kān ʾaktharuhum mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of those before. Most of them were associators of others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَأَقِم وَجهَكَ لِلدّينِ القَيِّمِ مِن قَبلِ أَن يَأتِيَ يَومٌ لا مَرَدَّ لَهُ مِنَ اللَّهِ ۖ يَومَئِذٍ يَصَّدَّعونَ
blank: f-ʾaqim wajhak l-d-dīnil-qayyim m qabl ʾ yaʾtiy yawm lā maradd lahū min llāh yawmaʾidh yaṣṣaddaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: So direct your face toward the correct religion before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. That Day, they will be divided

arabic_uthmani: مَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيهِ كُفرُهُ ۖ وَمَن عَمِلَ صالِحًا فَلِأَنفُسِهِم يَمهَدونَ
blank: m kafar f-ʿalayh kufruhū w-m ʿamil ṣāliḥ f-l-ʾanfusihim yamhadūn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever disbelieves - upon him is the consequence of his disbelief. And whoever does righteousness - they are for themselves preparing

arabic_uthmani: لِيَجزِيَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ مِن فَضلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ الكافِرينَ
blank: l-yajziyalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt m faḍlihī ʾinnahū lā yuḥibbul-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: That He may reward those who have believed and done righteous deeds out of His bounty. Indeed, He does not like the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ أَن يُرسِلَ الرِّياحَ مُبَشِّراتٍ وَلِيُذيقَكُم مِن رَحمَتِهِ وَلِتَجرِيَ الفُلكُ بِأَمرِهِ وَلِتَبتَغوا مِن فَضلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihī ʾ yursil r-riyāḥ mubashshirāt w-l-yudhīqakum m raḥmatihī w-l-tajriyal-fulk b-ʾamrihī w-l-tabtaghū m faḍlihī w-laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And of His signs is that He sends the winds as bringers of good tidings and to let you taste His mercy and so the ships may sail at His command and so you may seek of His bounty, and perhaps you will be grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا مِن قَبلِكَ رُسُلًا إِلىٰ قَومِهِم فَجاءوهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ فَانتَقَمنا مِنَ الَّذينَ أَجرَموا ۖ وَكانَ حَقًّا عَلَينا نَصرُ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā m qablik rusul ʾilā qawmihim f-jāʾūhum b-l-bayyināt f-ntaqamnā minalladhīn ʾajramū w-kān ḥaqq ʿalaynā naṣrul-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And We have already sent messengers before you to their peoples, and they came to them with clear evidences; then We took retribution from those who committed crimes, and incumbent upon Us was support of the believers

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ الَّذي يُرسِلُ الرِّياحَ فَتُثيرُ سَحابًا فَيَبسُطُهُ فِي السَّماءِ كَيفَ يَشاءُ وَيَجعَلُهُ كِسَفًا فَتَرَى الوَدقَ يَخرُجُ مِن خِلالِهِ ۖ فَإِذا أَصابَ بِهِ مَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ إِذا هُم يَستَبشِرونَ
blank: allāhulladhī yursil r-riyāḥ f-tuthīr saḥāb f-yabsuṭuhū fī s-samāʾ kayf yashāʾ w-yajʿaluhū kisaf f-tarāl-wadq yakhruj m khilālihī f-ʾidhā ʾaṣāb bihī m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī ʾidhā hum yastabshirūn
english_saheeh_international: It is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds and spread them in the sky however He wills, and He makes them fragments so you see the rain emerge from within them. And when He causes it to fall upon whom He wills of His servants, immediately they rejoice

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كانوا مِن قَبلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيهِم مِن قَبلِهِ لَمُبلِسينَ
blank: w-ʾ kānū m qabl ʾ yunazzal ʿalayhim m qablihī l-mublisīn
english_saheeh_international: Although they were, before it was sent down upon them - before that, in despair

arabic_uthmani: فَانظُر إِلىٰ آثارِ رَحمَتِ اللَّهِ كَيفَ يُحيِي الأَرضَ بَعدَ مَوتِها ۚ إِنَّ ذٰلِكَ لَمُحيِي المَوتىٰ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: f-nẓur ʾilā ʾāthār raḥmat llāh kayf yuḥyil-ʾarḍ baʿd mawtihā ʾinn dhālik l-muḥyil-mawtā w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: So observe the effects of the mercy of Allah - how He gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed, that same one will give life to the dead, and He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن أَرسَلنا ريحًا فَرَأَوهُ مُصفَرًّا لَظَلّوا مِن بَعدِهِ يَكفُرونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ ʾarsalnā rīḥ f-raʾawh muṣfarr l-ẓallū m baʿdihī yakfurūn
english_saheeh_international: But if We should send a bad wind and they saw their crops turned yellow, they would remain thereafter disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّكَ لا تُسمِعُ المَوتىٰ وَلا تُسمِعُ الصُّمَّ الدُّعاءَ إِذا وَلَّوا مُدبِرينَ
blank: f-ʾinnak lā tusmiʿul-mawtā w-lā tusmiʿ ṣ-ṣumm d-duʿāʾ ʾidhā wallaw mudbirīn
english_saheeh_international: So indeed, you will not make the dead hear, nor will you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs, retreating

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَنتَ بِهادِ العُميِ عَن ضَلالَتِهِم ۖ إِن تُسمِعُ إِلّا مَن يُؤمِنُ بِآياتِنا فَهُم مُسلِمونَ
blank: w-mā ʾant b-hādil-ʿumy ʿ ḍalālatihim ʾ tusmiʿ ʾillā m yuʾmin b-ʾāyātinā f-hum muslimūn
english_saheeh_international: And you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You will only make hear those who believe in Our verses so they are Muslims in submission to Allah

arabic_uthmani: ۞ اللَّهُ الَّذي خَلَقَكُم مِن ضَعفٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِن بَعدِ ضَعفٍ قُوَّةً ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِن بَعدِ قُوَّةٍ ضَعفًا وَشَيبَةً ۚ يَخلُقُ ما يَشاءُ ۖ وَهُوَ العَليمُ القَديرُ
blank: allāhulladhī khalaqakum m ḍaʿf thumm jaʿal m baʿd ḍaʿf quwwat thumm jaʿal m baʿd quwwat ḍaʿf w-shaybat yakhluq mā yashāʾ w-huwal-ʿalīmul-qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Allah is the one who created you from weakness, then made after weakness strength, then made after strength weakness and white hair. He creates what He wills, and He is the Knowing, the Competent

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ تَقومُ السّاعَةُ يُقسِمُ المُجرِمونَ ما لَبِثوا غَيرَ ساعَةٍ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ كانوا يُؤفَكونَ
blank: w-yawm taqūm s-sāʿat yuqsimul-mujrimūn mā labithū ghayr sāʿat k-dhālik kānū yuʾfakūn
english_saheeh_international: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will swear they had remained but an hour. Thus they were deluded

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ أوتُوا العِلمَ وَالإيمانَ لَقَد لَبِثتُم في كِتابِ اللَّهِ إِلىٰ يَومِ البَعثِ ۖ فَهٰذا يَومُ البَعثِ وَلٰكِنَّكُم كُنتُم لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: w-qālalladhīn ʾūtūl-ʿilm w-l-ʾīmān l-qad labithtum fī kitāb llāh ʾilā yawmil-baʿth f-hādhā yawmul-baʿth w-lākinnakum kuntum lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: But those who were given knowledge and faith will say, "You remained the extent of Allah 's decree until the Day of Resurrection, and this is the Day of Resurrection, but you did not used to know

arabic_uthmani: فَيَومَئِذٍ لا يَنفَعُ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا مَعذِرَتُهُم وَلا هُم يُستَعتَبونَ
blank: f-yawmaʾidh lā yanfaʿulladhīn ẓalamū maʿdhiratuhum w-lā hum yustaʿtabūn
english_saheeh_international: So that Day, their excuse will not benefit those who wronged, nor will they be asked to appease Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد ضَرَبنا لِلنّاسِ في هٰذَا القُرآنِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ ۚ وَلَئِن جِئتَهُم بِآيَةٍ لَيَقولَنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا إِن أَنتُم إِلّا مُبطِلونَ
blank: w-l-qad ḍarabnā l-n-nās fī hādhāl-qurʾān m kull mathal w-l-ʾ jiʾtahum b-ʾāyat l-yaqūlannalladhīn kafarū ʾ ʾantum ʾillā mubṭilūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly presented to the people in this Qur'an from every kind of example. But, O Muhammad, if you should bring them a sign, the disbelievers will surely say, "You believers are but falsifiers

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ يَطبَعُ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ قُلوبِ الَّذينَ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: k-dhālik yaṭbaʿ llāh ʿalā qulūbilladhīn lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Thus does Allah seal the hearts of those who do not know

arabic_uthmani: فَاصبِر إِنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ وَلا يَستَخِفَّنَّكَ الَّذينَ لا يوقِنونَ
blank: f-ṣbir ʾinn waʿd llāh ḥaqq w-lā yastakhiffannakalladhīn lā yūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: So be patient. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And let them not disquiet you who are not certain in faith

arabic_uthmani: الم
blank: -l-m (ʾalif lām mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Meem

arabic_uthmani: تِلكَ آياتُ الكِتابِ الحَكيمِ
blank: tilk ʾāyātul-kitābil-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: These are verses of the wise Book

arabic_uthmani: هُدًى وَرَحمَةً لِلمُحسِنينَ
blank: hud w-raḥmat l-l-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: As guidance and mercy for the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُقيمونَ الصَّلاةَ وَيُؤتونَ الزَّكاةَ وَهُم بِالآخِرَةِ هُم يوقِنونَ
blank: alladhīn yuqīmūn ṣ-ṣalāt w-yuʾtūn z-zakāt w-hum b-l-ʾākhirat hum yūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and they, of the Hereafter, are certain in faith

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ عَلىٰ هُدًى مِن رَبِّهِم ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: ʾulāʾik ʿalā hudam-m rabbihim w-ʾulāʾik humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: Those are on right guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يَشتَري لَهوَ الحَديثِ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ وَيَتَّخِذَها هُزُوًا ۚ أُولٰئِكَ لَهُم عَذابٌ مُهينٌ
blank: w-min n-nās m yashtarī lahwal-ḥadīth l-yuḍill ʿ sabīl llāh b-ghayr ʿilm w-yattakhidhahā huzuw ʾulāʾik lahum ʿadhāb muhīn
english_saheeh_international: And of the people is he who buys the amusement of speech to mislead others from the way of Allah without knowledge and who takes it in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا تُتلىٰ عَلَيهِ آياتُنا وَلّىٰ مُستَكبِرًا كَأَن لَم يَسمَعها كَأَنَّ في أُذُنَيهِ وَقرًا ۖ فَبَشِّرهُ بِعَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: w-ʾidhā tutlā ʿalayh ʾāyātunā wallā mustakbir k-ʾ lam yasmaʿhā k-ʾann fī ʾudhunayh waqr f-bashshirh b-ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And when our verses are recited to him, he turns away arrogantly as if he had not heard them, as if there was in his ears deafness. So give him tidings of a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ لَهُم جَنّاتُ النَّعيمِ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt lahum jannāt n-naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them are the Gardens of Pleasure

arabic_uthmani: خالِدينَ فيها ۖ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقًّا ۚ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: khālidīn fīhā waʿd llāh ḥaqq w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Wherein they abide eternally; it is the promise of Allah which is truth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ بِغَيرِ عَمَدٍ تَرَونَها ۖ وَأَلقىٰ فِي الأَرضِ رَواسِيَ أَن تَميدَ بِكُم وَبَثَّ فيها مِن كُلِّ دابَّةٍ ۚ وَأَنزَلنا مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَأَنبَتنا فيها مِن كُلِّ زَوجٍ كَريمٍ
blank: khalaq s-samāwāt b-ghayr ʿamad tarawnahā w-ʾalqā fīl-ʾarḍ rawāsiy ʾ tamīd bikum w-bathth fīhā m kull dābbat w-ʾanzalnā min s-samāʾ māʾ f-ʾanbatnā fīhā m kull zawj karīm
english_saheeh_international: He created the heavens without pillars that you see and has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with you, and dispersed therein from every creature. And We sent down rain from the sky and made grow therein plants of every noble kind

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا خَلقُ اللَّهِ فَأَروني ماذا خَلَقَ الَّذينَ مِن دونِهِ ۚ بَلِ الظّالِمونَ في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: hādhā khalq llāh f-ʾarūnī mādhā khalaqalladhīn m dūnihī bal ẓ-ẓālimūn fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: This is the creation of Allah. So show Me what those other than Him have created. Rather, the wrongdoers are in clear error

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَينا لُقمانَ الحِكمَةَ أَنِ اشكُر لِلَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَشكُر فَإِنَّما يَشكُرُ لِنَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَميدٌ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā luqmānal-ḥikmat ʾan shkur l-llāh w-m yashkur f-ʾinnamā yashkur l-nafsihī w-m kafar f-ʾinn llāh ghaniyy ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly given Luqman wisdom and said, "Be grateful to Allah." And whoever is grateful is grateful for the benefit of himself. And whoever denies His favor - then indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ لُقمانُ لِابنِهِ وَهُوَ يَعِظُهُ يا بُنَيَّ لا تُشرِك بِاللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّ الشِّركَ لَظُلمٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl luqmān l-bnihī w-huw yaʿiẓuhū yā-bunayy lā tushrik b-llāh ʾinn sh-shirk l-ẓulm ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when Luqman said to his son while he was instructing him, "O my son, do not associate anything with Allah. Indeed, association with him is great injustice

arabic_uthmani: وَوَصَّينَا الإِنسانَ بِوالِدَيهِ حَمَلَتهُ أُمُّهُ وَهنًا عَلىٰ وَهنٍ وَفِصالُهُ في عامَينِ أَنِ اشكُر لي وَلِوالِدَيكَ إِلَيَّ المَصيرُ
blank: w-waṣṣaynāl-ʾinsān b-wālidayh ḥamalath ʾummuhū wahn ʿalā wahn w-fiṣāluhū fī ʿāmayn ʾan shkur lī w-l-wālidayk ʾilayyal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And We have enjoined upon man care for his parents. His mother carried him, increasing her in weakness upon weakness, and his weaning is in two years. Be grateful to Me and to your parents; to Me is the final destination

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن جاهَداكَ عَلىٰ أَن تُشرِكَ بي ما لَيسَ لَكَ بِهِ عِلمٌ فَلا تُطِعهُما ۖ وَصاحِبهُما فِي الدُّنيا مَعروفًا ۖ وَاتَّبِع سَبيلَ مَن أَنابَ إِلَيَّ ۚ ثُمَّ إِلَيَّ مَرجِعُكُم فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-ʾ jāhadāk ʿalā ʾ tushrik bī mā lays lak bihī ʿilm f-lā tuṭiʿhumā w-ṣāḥibhumā fī d-dunyā maʿrūf w-ttabiʿ sabīl m ʾanāb ʾilayy thumm ʾilayy marjiʿukum f-ʾunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them but accompany them in this world with appropriate kindness and follow the way of those who turn back to Me in repentance. Then to Me will be your return, and I will inform you about what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: يا بُنَيَّ إِنَّها إِن تَكُ مِثقالَ حَبَّةٍ مِن خَردَلٍ فَتَكُن في صَخرَةٍ أَو فِي السَّماواتِ أَو فِي الأَرضِ يَأتِ بِهَا اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَطيفٌ خَبيرٌ
blank: yā-bunayy ʾinnahā ʾ tak mithqāl ḥabbat m khardal f-tak fī ṣakhrat ʾaw fī s-samāwāt ʾaw fīl-ʾarḍ yaʾt bihā llāh ʾinn llāh laṭīf khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And Luqman said, "O my son, indeed if wrong should be the weight of a mustard seed and should be within a rock or anywhere in the heavens or in the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: يا بُنَيَّ أَقِمِ الصَّلاةَ وَأمُر بِالمَعروفِ وَانهَ عَنِ المُنكَرِ وَاصبِر عَلىٰ ما أَصابَكَ ۖ إِنَّ ذٰلِكَ مِن عَزمِ الأُمورِ
blank: yā-bunayy ʾaqim ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾmur b-l-maʿrūf w-nh ʿanil-munkar w-ṣbir ʿalā mā ʾaṣābak ʾinn dhālik m ʿazmil-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: O my son, establish prayer, enjoin what is right, forbid what is wrong, and be patient over what befalls you. Indeed, all that is of the matters requiring determination

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تُصَعِّر خَدَّكَ لِلنّاسِ وَلا تَمشِ فِي الأَرضِ مَرَحًا ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُختالٍ فَخورٍ
blank: w-lā tuṣaʿʿir khaddak l-n-nās w-lā tamsh fīl-ʾarḍ maraḥ ʾinn llāh lā yuḥibb kull mukhtāl fakhūr
english_saheeh_international: And do not turn your cheek in contempt toward people and do not walk through the earth exultantly. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful

arabic_uthmani: وَاقصِد في مَشيِكَ وَاغضُض مِن صَوتِكَ ۚ إِنَّ أَنكَرَ الأَصواتِ لَصَوتُ الحَميرِ
blank: w-qṣid fī mashyik w-ghḍuḍ m ṣawtik ʾinn ʾankaral-ʾaṣwāt l-ṣawtul-ḥamīr
english_saheeh_international: And be moderate in your pace and lower your voice; indeed, the most disagreeable of sounds is the voice of donkeys

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ وَأَسبَغَ عَلَيكُم نِعَمَهُ ظاهِرَةً وَباطِنَةً ۗ وَمِنَ النّاسِ مَن يُجادِلُ فِي اللَّهِ بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ وَلا هُدًى وَلا كِتابٍ مُنيرٍ
blank: ʾ-lam taraw ʾann llāh sakhkhar lakum mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-ʾasbagh ʿalaykum niʿamahū ẓāhirat w-bāṭinat w-min n-nās m yujādil fī llāh b-ghayr ʿilm w-lā hud w-lā kitāb munīr
english_saheeh_international: Do you not see that Allah has made subject to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth and amply bestowed upon you His favors, both apparent and unapparent? But of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening Book from Him

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّبِعوا ما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ قالوا بَل نَتَّبِعُ ما وَجَدنا عَلَيهِ آباءَنا ۚ أَوَلَو كانَ الشَّيطانُ يَدعوهُم إِلىٰ عَذابِ السَّعيرِ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lahum ttabiʿū mā ʾanzal llāh qālū bal nattabiʿ mā wajadnā ʿalayh ʾābāʾanā ʾ-w-law kān sh-shayṭān yadʿūhum ʾilā ʿadhāb s-saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: And when it is said to them, "Follow what Allah has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that upon which we found our fathers." Even if Satan was inviting them to the punishment of the Blaze

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَمَن يُسلِم وَجهَهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحسِنٌ فَقَدِ استَمسَكَ بِالعُروَةِ الوُثقىٰ ۗ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ عاقِبَةُ الأُمورِ
blank: w-m yuslim wajhahū ʾilā llāh w-huw muḥsin f-qad stamsak b-l-ʿurwatil-wuthqā w-ʾilā llāh ʿāqibatul-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: And whoever submits his face to Allah while he is a doer of good - then he has grasped the most trustworthy handhold. And to Allah will be the outcome of all matters

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن كَفَرَ فَلا يَحزُنكَ كُفرُهُ ۚ إِلَينا مَرجِعُهُم فَنُنَبِّئُهُم بِما عَمِلوا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: w-m kafar f-lā yaḥzunk kufruhū ʾilaynā marjiʿuhum f-nunabbiʾuhum b-mā ʿamilū ʾinn llāh ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: And whoever has disbelieved - let not his disbelief grieve you. To Us is their return, and We will inform them of what they did. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: نُمَتِّعُهُم قَليلًا ثُمَّ نَضطَرُّهُم إِلىٰ عَذابٍ غَليظٍ
blank: numattiʿuhum qalīl thumm naḍṭarruhum ʾilā ʿadhāb ghalīẓ
english_saheeh_international: We grant them enjoyment for a little; then We will force them to a massive punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن سَأَلتَهُم مَن خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ لَيَقولُنَّ اللَّهُ ۚ قُلِ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَل أَكثَرُهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ saʾaltahum m khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ l-yaqūlunn llāh qulil-ḥamd l-llāh bal ʾaktharuhum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "All praise is due to Allah "; but most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: لِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الغَنِيُّ الحَميدُ
blank: l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ʾinn llāh huwal-ghaniyyul-ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو أَنَّما فِي الأَرضِ مِن شَجَرَةٍ أَقلامٌ وَالبَحرُ يَمُدُّهُ مِن بَعدِهِ سَبعَةُ أَبحُرٍ ما نَفِدَت كَلِماتُ اللَّهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزيزٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-law ʾannamā fīl-ʾarḍ m shajarat ʾaqlām w-l-baḥr yamudduhū m baʿdihī sabʿat ʾabḥur mā nafidat kalimāt llāh ʾinn llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And if whatever trees upon the earth were pens and the sea was ink, replenished thereafter by seven more seas, the words of Allah would not be exhausted. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: ما خَلقُكُم وَلا بَعثُكُم إِلّا كَنَفسٍ واحِدَةٍ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَميعٌ بَصيرٌ
blank: mā khalqukum w-lā baʿthukum ʾillā k-nafs wāḥidat ʾinn llāh samīʿ baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Your creation and your resurrection will not be but as that of a single soul. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يولِجُ اللَّيلَ فِي النَّهارِ وَيولِجُ النَّهارَ فِي اللَّيلِ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمسَ وَالقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجري إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ بِما تَعمَلونَ خَبيرٌ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾann llāh yūlijul-layl fī n-nahār w-yūlij n-nahār fīl-layl w-sakhkhar sh-shams w-l-qamar kull yajrī ʾilā ʾajal musamm w-ʾann llāh b-mā taʿmalūn khabīr
english_saheeh_international: Do you not see that Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running its course for a specified term, and that Allah, with whatever you do, is Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الحَقُّ وَأَنَّ ما يَدعونَ مِن دونِهِ الباطِلُ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ العَلِيُّ الكَبيرُ
blank: dhālik b-ʾann llāh huwal-ḥaqq w-ʾann mā yadʿūn m dūnihil-bāṭil w-ʾann llāh huwal-ʿaliyyul-kabīr
english_saheeh_international: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that what they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ أَنَّ الفُلكَ تَجري فِي البَحرِ بِنِعمَتِ اللَّهِ لِيُرِيَكُم مِن آياتِهِ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِكُلِّ صَبّارٍ شَكورٍ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾannal-fulk tajrī fīl-baḥr b-niʿmat llāh l-yuriyakum m ʾāyātihī ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-kull ṣabbār shakūr
english_saheeh_international: Do you not see that ships sail through the sea by the favor of Allah that He may show you of His signs? Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا غَشِيَهُم مَوجٌ كَالظُّلَلِ دَعَوُا اللَّهَ مُخلِصينَ لَهُ الدّينَ فَلَمّا نَجّاهُم إِلَى البَرِّ فَمِنهُم مُقتَصِدٌ ۚ وَما يَجحَدُ بِآياتِنا إِلّا كُلُّ خَتّارٍ كَفورٍ
blank: w-ʾidhā ghashiyahum mawj k-ẓ-ẓulal daʿaw llāh mukhliṣīn lah d-dīn f-lammā najjāhum ʾilāl-barr f-minhum muqtaṣid w-mā yajḥad b-ʾāyātinā ʾillā kull khattār kafūr
english_saheeh_international: And when waves come over them like canopies, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, there are some of them who are moderate in faith. And none rejects Our signs except everyone treacherous and ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ اتَّقوا رَبَّكُم وَاخشَوا يَومًا لا يَجزي والِدٌ عَن وَلَدِهِ وَلا مَولودٌ هُوَ جازٍ عَن والِدِهِ شَيئًا ۚ إِنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ فَلا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ الحَياةُ الدُّنيا وَلا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِاللَّهِ الغَرورُ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ttaqū rabbakum w-khshaw yawm lā yajzī wālid ʿ waladihī w-lā mawlūd huw jāz ʿ wālidihī shayʾ ʾinn waʿd llāh ḥaqq f-lā taghurrannakumul-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-lā yaghurrannakum b-llāhil-gharūr
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, fear your Lord and fear a Day when no father will avail his son, nor will a son avail his father at all. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ عِندَهُ عِلمُ السّاعَةِ وَيُنَزِّلُ الغَيثَ وَيَعلَمُ ما فِي الأَرحامِ ۖ وَما تَدري نَفسٌ ماذا تَكسِبُ غَدًا ۖ وَما تَدري نَفسٌ بِأَيِّ أَرضٍ تَموتُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ خَبيرٌ
blank: ʾinn llāh ʿindahū ʿilm s-sāʿat w-yunazzilul-ghayth w-yaʿlam mā fīl-ʾarḥām w-mā tadrī nafs mādhā taksib ghad w-mā tadrī nafs b-ʾayy ʾarḍ tamūt ʾinn llāh ʿalīm khabīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah alone has knowledge of the Hour and sends down the rain and knows what is in the wombs. And no soul perceives what it will earn tomorrow, and no soul perceives in what land it will die. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: الم
blank: -l-m (ʾalif lām mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Alif, Lam, Meem

arabic_uthmani: تَنزيلُ الكِتابِ لا رَيبَ فيهِ مِن رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: tanzīlul-kitāb lā rayb fīh m rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: This is the revelation of the Book about which there is no doubt from the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَقولونَ افتَراهُ ۚ بَل هُوَ الحَقُّ مِن رَبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَومًا ما أَتاهُم مِن نَذيرٍ مِن قَبلِكَ لَعَلَّهُم يَهتَدونَ
blank: ʾam yaqūlūn ftarāh bal huwal-ḥaqq m rabbik l-tundhir qawmam-mā ʾatāhum m nadhīr m qablik laʿallahum yahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Rather, it is the truth from your Lord, O Muhammad, that you may warn a people to whom no warner has come before you so perhaps they will be guided

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَما بَينَهُما في سِتَّةِ أَيّامٍ ثُمَّ استَوىٰ عَلَى العَرشِ ۖ ما لَكُم مِن دونِهِ مِن وَلِيٍّ وَلا شَفيعٍ ۚ أَفَلا تَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: allāhulladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā fī sittat ʾayyām thumm stawā ʿalāl-ʿarsh mā lakum m dūnihī m waliyy w-lā shafīʿ ʾ-f-lā tatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them in six days; then He established Himself above the Throne. You have not besides Him any protector or any intercessor; so will you not be reminded

arabic_uthmani: يُدَبِّرُ الأَمرَ مِنَ السَّماءِ إِلَى الأَرضِ ثُمَّ يَعرُجُ إِلَيهِ في يَومٍ كانَ مِقدارُهُ أَلفَ سَنَةٍ مِمّا تَعُدّونَ
blank: yudabbirul-ʾamr min s-samāʾ ʾilāl-ʾarḍ thumm yaʿruj ʾilayh fī yawm kān miqdāruhū ʾalf sanat mimmā taʿuddūn
english_saheeh_international: He arranges each matter from the heaven to the earth; then it will ascend to Him in a Day, the extent of which is a thousand years of those which you count

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ عالِمُ الغَيبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ العَزيزُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: dhālik ʿālimul-ghayb w-sh-shahādatil-ʿazīz r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: That is the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي أَحسَنَ كُلَّ شَيءٍ خَلَقَهُ ۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلقَ الإِنسانِ مِن طينٍ
blank: alladhī ʾaḥsan kull shayʾ khalaqahū w-badaʾ khalqal-ʾinsān m ṭīn
english_saheeh_international: Who perfected everything which He created and began the creation of man from clay

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسلَهُ مِن سُلالَةٍ مِن ماءٍ مَهينٍ
blank: thumm jaʿal naslahū m sulālat m māʾ mahīn
english_saheeh_international: Then He made his posterity out of the extract of a liquid disdained

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ سَوّاهُ وَنَفَخَ فيهِ مِن روحِهِ ۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ السَّمعَ وَالأَبصارَ وَالأَفئِدَةَ ۚ قَليلًا ما تَشكُرونَ
blank: thumm sawwāh w-nafakh fīh m rūḥihī w-jaʿal lakum s-samʿ w-l-ʾabṣār w-l-ʾafʾidat qalīlam-mā tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: Then He proportioned him and breathed into him from His created soul and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا أَإِذا ضَلَلنا فِي الأَرضِ أَإِنّا لَفي خَلقٍ جَديدٍ ۚ بَل هُم بِلِقاءِ رَبِّهِم كافِرونَ
blank: w-qālū ʾ-ʾidhā ḍalalnā fīl-ʾarḍ ʾ-ʾinnā l-fī khalq jadīd bal hum b-liqāʾ rabbihim kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "When we are lost within the earth, will we indeed be recreated in a new creation?" Rather, they are, in the matter of the meeting with their Lord, disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قُل يَتَوَفّاكُم مَلَكُ المَوتِ الَّذي وُكِّلَ بِكُم ثُمَّ إِلىٰ رَبِّكُم تُرجَعونَ
blank: qul yatawaffākum malakul-mawtilladhī wukkil bikum thumm ʾilā rabbikum turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "The angel of death will take you who has been entrusted with you. Then to your Lord you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو تَرىٰ إِذِ المُجرِمونَ ناكِسو رُءوسِهِم عِندَ رَبِّهِم رَبَّنا أَبصَرنا وَسَمِعنا فَارجِعنا نَعمَل صالِحًا إِنّا موقِنونَ
blank: w-law tarā ʾidhil-mujrimūn nākisū ruʾūsihim ʿind rabbihim rabbanā ʾabṣarnā w-samiʿnā f-rjiʿnā naʿmal ṣāliḥ ʾinnā mūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: If you could but see when the criminals are hanging their heads before their Lord, saying, "Our Lord, we have seen and heard, so return us to the world; we will work righteousness. Indeed, we are now certain

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو شِئنا لَآتَينا كُلَّ نَفسٍ هُداها وَلٰكِن حَقَّ القَولُ مِنّي لَأَملَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ الجِنَّةِ وَالنّاسِ أَجمَعينَ
blank: w-law shiʾnā l-ʾātaynā kull nafs hudāhā w-lāk ḥaqqal-qawl minnī l-ʾamlaʾann jahannam minal-jinnat w-n-nās ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: And if We had willed, We could have given every soul its guidance, but the word from Me will come into effect that "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and people all together

arabic_uthmani: فَذوقوا بِما نَسيتُم لِقاءَ يَومِكُم هٰذا إِنّا نَسيناكُم ۖ وَذوقوا عَذابَ الخُلدِ بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: f-dhūqū b-mā nasītum liqāʾ yawmikum hādhā ʾinnā nasīnākum w-dhūqū ʿadhābal-khuld b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: So taste punishment because you forgot the meeting of this, your Day; indeed, We have accordingly forgotten you. And taste the punishment of eternity for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما يُؤمِنُ بِآياتِنَا الَّذينَ إِذا ذُكِّروا بِها خَرّوا سُجَّدًا وَسَبَّحوا بِحَمدِ رَبِّهِم وَهُم لا يَستَكبِرونَ ۩
blank: ʾinnamā yuʾmin b-ʾāyātinālladhīn ʾidhā dhukkirū bihā kharrū sujjad w-sabbaḥū b-ḥamd rabbihim w-hum lā yastakbirūn
english_saheeh_international: Only those believe in Our verses who, when they are reminded by them, fall down in prostration and exalt Allah with praise of their Lord, and they are not arrogant

arabic_uthmani: تَتَجافىٰ جُنوبُهُم عَنِ المَضاجِعِ يَدعونَ رَبَّهُم خَوفًا وَطَمَعًا وَمِمّا رَزَقناهُم يُنفِقونَ
blank: tatajāfā junūbuhum ʿanil-maḍājiʿ yadʿūn rabbahum khawf w-ṭamaʿ w-mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: They arise from their beds; they supplicate their Lord in fear and aspiration, and from what We have provided them, they spend

arabic_uthmani: فَلا تَعلَمُ نَفسٌ ما أُخفِيَ لَهُم مِن قُرَّةِ أَعيُنٍ جَزاءً بِما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: f-lā taʿlam nafs mā ʾukhfiy lahum m qurrat ʾaʿyun jazāʾ b-mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And no soul knows what has been hidden for them of comfort for eyes as reward for what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن كانَ مُؤمِنًا كَمَن كانَ فاسِقًا ۚ لا يَستَوونَ
blank: ʾ-f-m kān muʾmin k-m kān fāsiq lā yastawūn
english_saheeh_international: Then is one who was a believer like one who was defiantly disobedient? They are not equal

arabic_uthmani: أَمَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ فَلَهُم جَنّاتُ المَأوىٰ نُزُلًا بِما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: ʾammālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt f-lahum jannātul-maʾwā nuzul b-mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: As for those who believed and did righteous deeds, for them will be the Gardens of Refuge as accommodation for what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمَّا الَّذينَ فَسَقوا فَمَأواهُمُ النّارُ ۖ كُلَّما أَرادوا أَن يَخرُجوا مِنها أُعيدوا فيها وَقيلَ لَهُم ذوقوا عَذابَ النّارِ الَّذي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبونَ
blank: w-ʾammālladhīn fasaqū f-maʾwāhum n-nār kullamā ʾarādū ʾ yakhrujū minhā ʾuʿīdū fīhā w-qīl lahum dhūqū ʿadhāb n-nārilladhī kuntum bihī tukadhdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: But as for those who defiantly disobeyed, their refuge is the Fire. Every time they wish to emerge from it, they will be returned to it while it is said to them, "Taste the punishment of the Fire which you used to deny

arabic_uthmani: وَلَنُذيقَنَّهُم مِنَ العَذابِ الأَدنىٰ دونَ العَذابِ الأَكبَرِ لَعَلَّهُم يَرجِعونَ
blank: w-l-nudhīqannahum minal-ʿadhābil-ʾadnā dūnal-ʿadhābil-ʾakbar laʿallahum yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And we will surely let them taste the nearer punishment short of the greater punishment that perhaps they will repent

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِآياتِ رَبِّهِ ثُمَّ أَعرَضَ عَنها ۚ إِنّا مِنَ المُجرِمينَ مُنتَقِمونَ
blank: w-m ʾaẓlam mimm dhukkir b-ʾāyāt rabbihī thumm ʾaʿraḍ ʿanhā ʾinnā minal-mujrimīn muntaqimūn
english_saheeh_international: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord; then he turns away from them? Indeed We, from the criminals, will take retribution

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَينا موسَى الكِتابَ فَلا تَكُن في مِريَةٍ مِن لِقائِهِ ۖ وَجَعَلناهُ هُدًى لِبَني إِسرائيلَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā mūsāl-kitāb f-lā tak fī miryat m liqāʾihī w-jaʿalnāh hud l-banī ʾisrāʾīl
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so do not be in doubt over his meeting. And we made the Torah guidance for the Children of Israel

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلنا مِنهُم أَئِمَّةً يَهدونَ بِأَمرِنا لَمّا صَبَروا ۖ وَكانوا بِآياتِنا يوقِنونَ
blank: w-jaʿalnā minhum ʾaʾimmat yahdūn b-ʾamrinā lammā ṣabarū w-kānū b-ʾāyātinā yūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: And We made from among them leaders guiding by Our command when they were patient and when they were certain of Our signs

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَفصِلُ بَينَهُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ فيما كانوا فيهِ يَختَلِفونَ
blank: ʾinn rabbak huw yafṣil baynahum yawmal-qiyāmat fī-mā kānū fīh yakhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَهدِ لَهُم كَم أَهلَكنا مِن قَبلِهِم مِنَ القُرونِ يَمشونَ في مَساكِنِهِم ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ ۖ أَفَلا يَسمَعونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yahd lahum kam ʾahlaknā m qablihim minal-qurūn yamshūn fī masākinihim ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt ʾ-f-lā yasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them, as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs; then do they not hear

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا أَنّا نَسوقُ الماءَ إِلَى الأَرضِ الجُرُزِ فَنُخرِجُ بِهِ زَرعًا تَأكُلُ مِنهُ أَنعامُهُم وَأَنفُسُهُم ۖ أَفَلا يُبصِرونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾannā nasūqul-māʾ ʾilāl-ʾarḍil-juruz f-nukhrij bihī zarʿ taʾkul minh ʾanʿāmuhum w-ʾanfusuhum ʾ-f-lā yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: Have they not seen that We drive the water in clouds to barren land and bring forth thereby crops from which their livestock eat and they themselves? Then do they not see

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ مَتىٰ هٰذَا الفَتحُ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-yaqūlūn matā hādhāl-fatḥ ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "When will be this conquest, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: قُل يَومَ الفَتحِ لا يَنفَعُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا إيمانُهُم وَلا هُم يُنظَرونَ
blank: qul yawmal-fatḥ lā yanfaʿulladhīn kafarū ʾīmānuhum w-lā hum yunẓarūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "On the Day of Conquest the belief of those who had disbelieved will not benefit them, nor will they be reprieved

arabic_uthmani: فَأَعرِض عَنهُم وَانتَظِر إِنَّهُم مُنتَظِرونَ
blank: f-ʾaʿriḍ ʿanhum w-ntaẓir ʾinnahum muntaẓirūn
english_saheeh_international: So turn away from them and wait. Indeed, they are waiting

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ اتَّقِ اللَّهَ وَلا تُطِعِ الكافِرينَ وَالمُنافِقينَ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كانَ عَليمًا حَكيمًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy ttaq llāh w-lā tuṭiʿil-kāfirīn w-l-munāfiqīn ʾinn llāh kān ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, fear Allah and do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّبِع ما يوحىٰ إِلَيكَ مِن رَبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كانَ بِما تَعمَلونَ خَبيرًا
blank: w-ttabiʿ mā yūḥā ʾilayk m rabbik ʾinn llāh kān b-mā taʿmalūn khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: وَتَوَكَّل عَلَى اللَّهِ ۚ وَكَفىٰ بِاللَّهِ وَكيلًا
blank: w-tawakkal ʿalā llāh w-kafā b-llāh wakīl
english_saheeh_international: And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs

arabic_uthmani: ما جَعَلَ اللَّهُ لِرَجُلٍ مِن قَلبَينِ في جَوفِهِ ۚ وَما جَعَلَ أَزواجَكُمُ اللّائي تُظاهِرونَ مِنهُنَّ أُمَّهاتِكُم ۚ وَما جَعَلَ أَدعِياءَكُم أَبناءَكُم ۚ ذٰلِكُم قَولُكُم بِأَفواهِكُم ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَقولُ الحَقَّ وَهُوَ يَهدِي السَّبيلَ
blank: mā jaʿal llāh l-rajul m qalbayn fī jawfihī w-mā jaʿal ʾazwājakum llāʾī tuẓāhirūn minhunn ʾummahātikum w-mā jaʿal ʾadʿiyāʾakum ʾabnāʾakum dhālikum qawlukum b-ʾafwāhikum w-llāh yaqūlul-ḥaqq w-huw yahdī s-sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Allah has not made for a man two hearts in his interior. And He has not made your wives whom you declare unlawful your mothers. And he has not made your adopted sons your true sons. That is merely your saying by your mouths, but Allah says the truth, and He guides to the right way

arabic_uthmani: ادعوهُم لِآبائِهِم هُوَ أَقسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن لَم تَعلَموا آباءَهُم فَإِخوانُكُم فِي الدّينِ وَمَواليكُم ۚ وَلَيسَ عَلَيكُم جُناحٌ فيما أَخطَأتُم بِهِ وَلٰكِن ما تَعَمَّدَت قُلوبُكُم ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ غَفورًا رَحيمًا
blank: udʿūhum l-ʾābāʾihim huw ʾaqsaṭ ʿind llāh f-ʾ lam taʿlamū ʾābāʾahum f-ʾikhwānukum fī d-dīn w-mawālīkum w-lays ʿalaykum junāḥ fī-mā ʾakhṭaʾtum bihī w-lāk mā taʿammadat qulūbukum w-kān llāh ghafūr raḥīm-
english_saheeh_international: Call them by the names of their fathers; it is more just in the sight of Allah. But if you do not know their fathers - then they are still your brothers in religion and those entrusted to you. And there is no blame upon you for that in which you have erred but only for what your hearts intended. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: النَّبِيُّ أَولىٰ بِالمُؤمِنينَ مِن أَنفُسِهِم ۖ وَأَزواجُهُ أُمَّهاتُهُم ۗ وَأُولُو الأَرحامِ بَعضُهُم أَولىٰ بِبَعضٍ في كِتابِ اللَّهِ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ وَالمُهاجِرينَ إِلّا أَن تَفعَلوا إِلىٰ أَولِيائِكُم مَعروفًا ۚ كانَ ذٰلِكَ فِي الكِتابِ مَسطورًا
blank: -nabiyy ʾawlā b-l-muʾminīn m ʾanfusihim w-ʾazwājuhū ʾummahātuhum w-ʾulūl-ʾarḥām baʿḍuhum ʾawlā b-baʿḍ fī kitāb llāh minal-muʾminīn w-l-muhājirīn ʾillā ʾ tafʿalū ʾilā ʾawliyāʾikum maʿrūf kān dhālik fīl-kitāb masṭūr
english_saheeh_international: The Prophet is more worthy of the believers than themselves, and his wives are in the position of their mothers. And those of blood relationship are more entitled to inheritance in the decree of Allah than the other believers and the emigrants, except that you may do to your close associates a kindness through bequest. That was in the Book inscribed

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ أَخَذنا مِنَ النَّبِيّينَ ميثاقَهُم وَمِنكَ وَمِن نوحٍ وَإِبراهيمَ وَموسىٰ وَعيسَى ابنِ مَريَمَ ۖ وَأَخَذنا مِنهُم ميثاقًا غَليظًا
blank: w-ʾidh ʾakhadhnā min n-nabiyyīn mīthāqahum w-mink w-m nūḥ w-ʾibrāhīm w-mūsā w-ʿīsā bn maryam w-ʾakhadhnā minhum mīthāq ghalīẓ
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when We took from the prophets their covenant and from you and from Noah and Abraham and Moses and Jesus, the son of Mary; and We took from them a solemn covenant

arabic_uthmani: لِيَسأَلَ الصّادِقينَ عَن صِدقِهِم ۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلكافِرينَ عَذابًا أَليمًا
blank: l-yasʾal ṣ-ṣādiqīn ʿ ṣidqihim w-ʾaʿadd l-l-kāfirīn ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: That He may question the truthful about their truth. And He has prepared for the disbelievers a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اذكُروا نِعمَةَ اللَّهِ عَلَيكُم إِذ جاءَتكُم جُنودٌ فَأَرسَلنا عَلَيهِم ريحًا وَجُنودًا لَم تَرَوها ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū dhkurū niʿmat llāh ʿalaykum ʾidh jāʾatkum junūd f-ʾarsalnā ʿalayhim rīḥ w-junūd lam tarawhā w-kān llāh b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, remember the favor of Allah upon you when armies came to attack you and We sent upon them a wind and armies of angels you did not see. And ever is Allah, of what you do, Seeing

arabic_uthmani: إِذ جاءوكُم مِن فَوقِكُم وَمِن أَسفَلَ مِنكُم وَإِذ زاغَتِ الأَبصارُ وَبَلَغَتِ القُلوبُ الحَناجِرَ وَتَظُنّونَ بِاللَّهِ الظُّنونا
blank: ʾidh jāʾūkum m fawqikum w-m ʾasfal minkum w-ʾidh zāghatil-ʾabṣār w-balaghatil-qulūbul-ḥanājir w-taẓunnūn b-llāh ẓ-ẓunūn
english_saheeh_international: Remember when they came at you from above you and from below you, and when eyes shifted in fear, and hearts reached the throats and you assumed about Allah various assumptions

arabic_uthmani: هُنالِكَ ابتُلِيَ المُؤمِنونَ وَزُلزِلوا زِلزالًا شَديدًا
blank: hunālik btuliyal-muʾminūn w-zulzilū zilzāl shadīd
english_saheeh_international: There the believers were tested and shaken with a severe shaking

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ يَقولُ المُنافِقونَ وَالَّذينَ في قُلوبِهِم مَرَضٌ ما وَعَدَنَا اللَّهُ وَرَسولُهُ إِلّا غُرورًا
blank: w-ʾidh yaqūlul-munāfiqūn w-lladhīn fī qulūbihim maraḍ mā waʿadanā llāh w-rasūluhū ʾillā ghurūr
english_saheeh_international: And remember when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease said, "Allah and His Messenger did not promise us except delusion

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَت طائِفَةٌ مِنهُم يا أَهلَ يَثرِبَ لا مُقامَ لَكُم فَارجِعوا ۚ وَيَستَأذِنُ فَريقٌ مِنهُمُ النَّبِيَّ يَقولونَ إِنَّ بُيوتَنا عَورَةٌ وَما هِيَ بِعَورَةٍ ۖ إِن يُريدونَ إِلّا فِرارًا
blank: w-ʾidh qālat ṭāʾifat minhum yā-ʾahl yathrib lā muqām lakum f-rjiʿū w-yastaʾdhin farīq minhum n-nabiyy yaqūlūn ʾinn buyūtanā ʿawrat w-mā hiy b-ʿawrat ʾ yurīdūn ʾillā firār
english_saheeh_international: And when a faction of them said, "O people of Yathrib, there is no stability for you here, so return home." And a party of them asked permission of the Prophet, saying, "Indeed, our houses are unprotected," while they were not exposed. They did not intend except to flee

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو دُخِلَت عَلَيهِم مِن أَقطارِها ثُمَّ سُئِلُوا الفِتنَةَ لَآتَوها وَما تَلَبَّثوا بِها إِلّا يَسيرًا
blank: w-law dukhilat ʿalayhim m ʾaqṭārihā thumm suʾilūl-fitnat l-ʾātawhā w-mā talabbathū bihā ʾillā yasīr
english_saheeh_international: And if they had been entered upon from all its surrounding regions and fitnah had been demanded of them, they would have done it and not hesitated over it except briefly

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد كانوا عاهَدُوا اللَّهَ مِن قَبلُ لا يُوَلّونَ الأَدبارَ ۚ وَكانَ عَهدُ اللَّهِ مَسئولًا
blank: w-l-qad kānū ʿāhadū llāh m qabl lā yuwallūnal-ʾadbār w-kān ʿahd llāh masʾūl
english_saheeh_international: And they had already promised Allah before not to turn their backs and flee. And ever is the promise to Allah that about which one will be questioned

arabic_uthmani: قُل لَن يَنفَعَكُمُ الفِرارُ إِن فَرَرتُم مِنَ المَوتِ أَوِ القَتلِ وَإِذًا لا تُمَتَّعونَ إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: qul l yanfaʿakumul-firār ʾ farartum minal-mawt ʾawil-qatl w-ʾidh lā tumattaʿūn ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Never will fleeing benefit you if you should flee from death or killing; and then if you did, you would not be given enjoyment of life except for a little

arabic_uthmani: قُل مَن ذَا الَّذي يَعصِمُكُم مِنَ اللَّهِ إِن أَرادَ بِكُم سوءًا أَو أَرادَ بِكُم رَحمَةً ۚ وَلا يَجِدونَ لَهُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ وَلِيًّا وَلا نَصيرًا
blank: qul m dhālladhī yaʿṣimukum min llāh ʾ ʾarād bikum sūʾ ʾaw ʾarād bikum raḥmat w-lā yajidūn lahum m dūn llāh waliyy w-lā naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Who is it that can protect you from Allah if He intends for you an ill or intends for you a mercy?" And they will not find for themselves besides Allah any protector or any helper

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قَد يَعلَمُ اللَّهُ المُعَوِّقينَ مِنكُم وَالقائِلينَ لِإِخوانِهِم هَلُمَّ إِلَينا ۖ وَلا يَأتونَ البَأسَ إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: qad yaʿlam llāhul-muʿawwiqīn minkum w-l-qāʾilīn l-ʾikhwānihim halumm ʾilaynā w-lā yaʾtūnal-baʾs ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: Already Allah knows the hinderers among you and those hypocrites who say to their brothers, "Come to us," and do not go to battle, except for a few

arabic_uthmani: أَشِحَّةً عَلَيكُم ۖ فَإِذا جاءَ الخَوفُ رَأَيتَهُم يَنظُرونَ إِلَيكَ تَدورُ أَعيُنُهُم كَالَّذي يُغشىٰ عَلَيهِ مِنَ المَوتِ ۖ فَإِذا ذَهَبَ الخَوفُ سَلَقوكُم بِأَلسِنَةٍ حِدادٍ أَشِحَّةً عَلَى الخَيرِ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ لَم يُؤمِنوا فَأَحبَطَ اللَّهُ أَعمالَهُم ۚ وَكانَ ذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسيرًا
blank: ʾashiḥḥat ʿalaykum f-ʾidhā jāʾal-khawf raʾaytahum yanẓurūn ʾilayk tadūr ʾaʿyunuhum k-lladhī yughshā ʿalayh minal-mawt f-ʾidhā dhahabal-khawf salaqūkum b-ʾalsinat ḥidād ʾashiḥḥat ʿalāl-khayr ʾulāʾik lam yuʾminū f-ʾaḥbaṭ llāh ʾaʿmālahum w-kān dhālik ʿalā llāh yasīr
english_saheeh_international: Indisposed toward you. And when fear comes, you see them looking at you, their eyes revolving like one being overcome by death. But when fear departs, they lash you with sharp tongues, indisposed toward any good. Those have not believed, so Allah has rendered their deeds worthless, and ever is that, for Allah, easy

arabic_uthmani: يَحسَبونَ الأَحزابَ لَم يَذهَبوا ۖ وَإِن يَأتِ الأَحزابُ يَوَدّوا لَو أَنَّهُم بادونَ فِي الأَعرابِ يَسأَلونَ عَن أَنبائِكُم ۖ وَلَو كانوا فيكُم ما قاتَلوا إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: yaḥsabūnal-ʾaḥzāb lam yadhhabū w-ʾ yaʾtil-ʾaḥzāb yawaddū law ʾannahum bādūn fīl-ʾaʿrāb yasʾalūn ʿ ʾanbāʾikum w-law kānū fīkum mā qātalū ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: They think the companies have not yet withdrawn. And if the companies should come again, they would wish they were in the desert among the bedouins, inquiring from afar about your news. And if they should be among you, they would not fight except for a little

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد كانَ لَكُم في رَسولِ اللَّهِ أُسوَةٌ حَسَنَةٌ لِمَن كانَ يَرجُو اللَّهَ وَاليَومَ الآخِرَ وَذَكَرَ اللَّهَ كَثيرًا
blank: l-qad kān lakum fī rasūl llāh ʾuswat ḥasanat l-m kān yarjū llāh w-l-yawmal-ʾākhir w-dhakar llāh kathīr
english_saheeh_international: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day and who remembers Allah often

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا رَأَى المُؤمِنونَ الأَحزابَ قالوا هٰذا ما وَعَدَنَا اللَّهُ وَرَسولُهُ وَصَدَقَ اللَّهُ وَرَسولُهُ ۚ وَما زادَهُم إِلّا إيمانًا وَتَسليمًا
blank: w-lammā raʾāl-muʾminūnal-ʾaḥzāb qālū hādhā mā waʿadanā llāh w-rasūluhū w-ṣadaq llāh w-rasūluhū w-mā zādahum ʾillā ʾīmān w-taslīm
english_saheeh_international: And when the believers saw the companies, they said, "This is what Allah and His Messenger had promised us, and Allah and His Messenger spoke the truth." And it increased them only in faith and acceptance

arabic_uthmani: مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ رِجالٌ صَدَقوا ما عاهَدُوا اللَّهَ عَلَيهِ ۖ فَمِنهُم مَن قَضىٰ نَحبَهُ وَمِنهُم مَن يَنتَظِرُ ۖ وَما بَدَّلوا تَبديلًا
blank: minal-muʾminīn rijāl ṣadaqū mā ʿāhadū llāh ʿalayh f-minhum m qaḍā naḥbahū w-minhum m yantaẓir w-mā baddalū tabdīl
english_saheeh_international: Among the believers are men true to what they promised Allah. Among them is he who has fulfilled his vow to the death, and among them is he who awaits his chance. And they did not alter the terms of their commitment by any alteration

arabic_uthmani: لِيَجزِيَ اللَّهُ الصّادِقينَ بِصِدقِهِم وَيُعَذِّبَ المُنافِقينَ إِن شاءَ أَو يَتوبَ عَلَيهِم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كانَ غَفورًا رَحيمًا
blank: l-yajziy llāh ṣ-ṣādiqīn b-ṣidqihim w-yuʿadhdhibal-munāfiqīn ʾ shāʾ ʾaw yatūb ʿalayhim ʾinn llāh kān ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth and punish the hypocrites if He wills or accept their repentance. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَرَدَّ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا بِغَيظِهِم لَم يَنالوا خَيرًا ۚ وَكَفَى اللَّهُ المُؤمِنينَ القِتالَ ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ قَوِيًّا عَزيزًا
blank: w-radd llāhulladhīn kafarū b-ghayẓihim lam yanālū khayr w-kafā llāhul-muʾminīnal-qitāl w-kān llāh qawiyy ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: And Allah repelled those who disbelieved, in their rage, not having obtained any good. And sufficient was Allah for the believers in battle, and ever is Allah Powerful and Exalted in Might

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنزَلَ الَّذينَ ظاهَروهُم مِن أَهلِ الكِتابِ مِن صَياصيهِم وَقَذَفَ في قُلوبِهِمُ الرُّعبَ فَريقًا تَقتُلونَ وَتَأسِرونَ فَريقًا
blank: w-ʾanzalalladhīn ẓāharūhum m ʾahlil-kitāb m ṣayāṣīhim w-qadhaf fī qulūbihim r-ruʿb farīq taqtulūn w-taʾsirūn farīq
english_saheeh_international: And He brought down those who supported them among the People of the Scripture from their fortresses and cast terror into their hearts so that a party you killed, and you took captive a party

arabic_uthmani: وَأَورَثَكُم أَرضَهُم وَدِيارَهُم وَأَموالَهُم وَأَرضًا لَم تَطَئوها ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرًا
blank: w-ʾawrathakum ʾarḍahum w-diyārahum w-ʾamwālahum w-ʾarḍ lam taṭaʾūhā w-kān llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And He caused you to inherit their land and their homes and their properties and a land which you have not trodden. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ قُل لِأَزواجِكَ إِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدنَ الحَياةَ الدُّنيا وَزينَتَها فَتَعالَينَ أُمَتِّعكُنَّ وَأُسَرِّحكُنَّ سَراحًا جَميلًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy qul l-ʾazwājik ʾ kuntunn turidnal-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-zīnatahā f-taʿālayn ʾumattiʿkunn w-ʾusarriḥkunn sarāḥ jamīl
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, say to your wives, "If you should desire the worldly life and its adornment, then come, I will provide for you and give you a gracious release

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدنَ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ وَالدّارَ الآخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلمُحسِناتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجرًا عَظيمًا
blank: w-ʾ kuntunn turidn llāh w-rasūlahū w-d-dāral-ʾākhirat f-ʾinn llāh ʾaʿadd l-l-muḥsināt minkunn ʾajr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: But if you should desire Allah and His Messenger and the home of the Hereafter - then indeed, Allah has prepared for the doers of good among you a great reward

arabic_uthmani: يا نِساءَ النَّبِيِّ مَن يَأتِ مِنكُنَّ بِفاحِشَةٍ مُبَيِّنَةٍ يُضاعَف لَهَا العَذابُ ضِعفَينِ ۚ وَكانَ ذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسيرًا
blank: yā-nisāʾ n-nabiyy m yaʾt minkunn b-fāḥishat mubayyinat yuḍāʿaf lahāl-ʿadhāb ḍiʿfayn w-kān dhālik ʿalā llāh yasīr
english_saheeh_international: O wives of the Prophet, whoever of you should commit a clear immorality - for her the punishment would be doubled two fold, and ever is that, for Allah, easy

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَمَن يَقنُت مِنكُنَّ لِلَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ وَتَعمَل صالِحًا نُؤتِها أَجرَها مَرَّتَينِ وَأَعتَدنا لَها رِزقًا كَريمًا
blank: w-m yaqnut minkunn l-llāh w-rasūlihī w-taʿmal ṣāliḥ nuʾtihā ʾajrahā marratayn w-ʾaʿtadnā lahā rizq karīm
english_saheeh_international: And whoever of you devoutly obeys Allah and His Messenger and does righteousness - We will give her her reward twice; and We have prepared for her a noble provision

arabic_uthmani: يا نِساءَ النَّبِيِّ لَستُنَّ كَأَحَدٍ مِنَ النِّساءِ ۚ إِنِ اتَّقَيتُنَّ فَلا تَخضَعنَ بِالقَولِ فَيَطمَعَ الَّذي في قَلبِهِ مَرَضٌ وَقُلنَ قَولًا مَعروفًا
blank: yā-nisāʾ n-nabiyy lastunn k-ʾaḥad min n-nisāʾ ʾin ttaqaytunn f-lā takhḍaʿn b-l-qawl f-yaṭmaʿalladhī fī qalbihī maraḍ w-quln qawlam-maʿrūf
english_saheeh_international: O wives of the Prophet, you are not like anyone among women. If you fear Allah, then do not be soft in speech to men, lest he in whose heart is disease should covet, but speak with appropriate speech

arabic_uthmani: وَقَرنَ في بُيوتِكُنَّ وَلا تَبَرَّجنَ تَبَرُّجَ الجاهِلِيَّةِ الأولىٰ ۖ وَأَقِمنَ الصَّلاةَ وَآتينَ الزَّكاةَ وَأَطِعنَ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ ۚ إِنَّما يُريدُ اللَّهُ لِيُذهِبَ عَنكُمُ الرِّجسَ أَهلَ البَيتِ وَيُطَهِّرَكُم تَطهيرًا
blank: w-qarn fī buyūtikunn w-lā tabarrajn tabarrujal-jāhiliyyatil-ʾūlā w-ʾaqimn ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātīn z-zakāt w-ʾaṭiʿn llāh w-rasūlahū ʾinnamā yurīd llāh l-yudhhib ʿankum r-rijs ʾahlal-bayt w-yuṭahhirakum taṭhīr
english_saheeh_international: And abide in your houses and do not display yourselves as was the display of the former times of ignorance. And establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. Allah intends only to remove from you the impurity of sin, O people of the Prophet's household, and to purify you with extensive purification

arabic_uthmani: وَاذكُرنَ ما يُتلىٰ في بُيوتِكُنَّ مِن آياتِ اللَّهِ وَالحِكمَةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كانَ لَطيفًا خَبيرًا
blank: w-dhkurn mā yutlā fī buyūtikunn m ʾāyāt llāh w-l-ḥikmat ʾinn llāh kān laṭīf khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And remember what is recited in your houses of the verses of Allah and wisdom. Indeed, Allah is ever Subtle and Acquainted with all things

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُسلِمينَ وَالمُسلِماتِ وَالمُؤمِنينَ وَالمُؤمِناتِ وَالقانِتينَ وَالقانِتاتِ وَالصّادِقينَ وَالصّادِقاتِ وَالصّابِرينَ وَالصّابِراتِ وَالخاشِعينَ وَالخاشِعاتِ وَالمُتَصَدِّقينَ وَالمُتَصَدِّقاتِ وَالصّائِمينَ وَالصّائِماتِ وَالحافِظينَ فُروجَهُم وَالحافِظاتِ وَالذّاكِرينَ اللَّهَ كَثيرًا وَالذّاكِراتِ أَعَدَّ اللَّهُ لَهُم مَغفِرَةً وَأَجرًا عَظيمًا
blank: ʾinnal-muslimīn w-l-muslimāt w-l-muʾminīn w-l-muʾmināt w-l-qānitīn w-l-qānitāt w-ṣ-ṣādiqīn w-ṣ-ṣādiqāt w-ṣ-ṣābirīn w-ṣ-ṣābirāt w-l-khāshiʿīn w-l-khāshiʿāt w-l-mutaṣaddiqīn w-l-mutaṣaddiqāt w-ṣ-ṣāʾimīn w-ṣ-ṣāʾimāt w-l-ḥāfiẓīn furūjahum w-l-ḥāfiẓāt w-dh-dhākirīn llāh kathīr w-dh-dhākirāt ʾaʿadd llāh lahum maghfirat w-ʾajr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the Muslim men and Muslim women, the believing men and believing women, the obedient men and obedient women, the truthful men and truthful women, the patient men and patient women, the humble men and humble women, the charitable men and charitable women, the fasting men and fasting women, the men who guard their private parts and the women who do so, and the men who remember Allah often and the women who do so - for them Allah has prepared forgiveness and a great reward

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ لِمُؤمِنٍ وَلا مُؤمِنَةٍ إِذا قَضَى اللَّهُ وَرَسولُهُ أَمرًا أَن يَكونَ لَهُمُ الخِيَرَةُ مِن أَمرِهِم ۗ وَمَن يَعصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ فَقَد ضَلَّ ضَلالًا مُبينًا
blank: w-mā kān l-muʾmin w-lā muʾminat ʾidhā qaḍā llāh w-rasūluhū ʾamr ʾ yakūn lahumul-khiyarat m ʾamrihim w-m yaʿṣ llāh w-rasūlahū f-qad ḍall ḍalālam-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: It is not for a believing man or a believing woman, when Allah and His Messenger have decided a matter, that they should thereafter have any choice about their affair. And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly strayed into clear error
