arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ تَقولُ لِلَّذي أَنعَمَ اللَّهُ عَلَيهِ وَأَنعَمتَ عَلَيهِ أَمسِك عَلَيكَ زَوجَكَ وَاتَّقِ اللَّهَ وَتُخفي في نَفسِكَ مَا اللَّهُ مُبديهِ وَتَخشَى النّاسَ وَاللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخشاهُ ۖ فَلَمّا قَضىٰ زَيدٌ مِنها وَطَرًا زَوَّجناكَها لِكَي لا يَكونَ عَلَى المُؤمِنينَ حَرَجٌ في أَزواجِ أَدعِيائِهِم إِذا قَضَوا مِنهُنَّ وَطَرًا ۚ وَكانَ أَمرُ اللَّهِ مَفعولًا
blank: w-ʾidh taqūl l-lladhī ʾanʿam llāh ʿalayh w-ʾanʿamt ʿalayh ʾamsik ʿalayk zawjak w-ttaq llāh w-tukhfī fī nafsik mā llāh mubdīh w-takhshā n-nās w-llāh ʾaḥaqq ʾ takhshāh f-lammā qaḍā zayd minhā waṭar zawwajnākahā l-kay lā yakūn ʿalāl-muʾminīn ḥaraj fī ʾazwāj ʾadʿiyāʾihim ʾidhā qaḍaw minhunn waṭar w-kān ʾamr llāh mafʿūl
english_saheeh_international: And remember, O Muhammad, when you said to the one on whom Allah bestowed favor and you bestowed favor, "Keep your wife and fear Allah," while you concealed within yourself that which Allah is to disclose. And you feared the people, while Allah has more right that you fear Him. So when Zayd had no longer any need for her, We married her to you in order that there not be upon the believers any discomfort concerning the wives of their adopted sons when they no longer have need of them. And ever is the command of Allah accomplished

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ مِن حَرَجٍ فيما فَرَضَ اللَّهُ لَهُ ۖ سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ فِي الَّذينَ خَلَوا مِن قَبلُ ۚ وَكانَ أَمرُ اللَّهِ قَدَرًا مَقدورًا
blank: mā kān ʿalā n-nabiyy m ḥaraj fī-mā faraḍ llāh lahū sunnat llāh fīlladhīn khalaw m qabl w-kān ʾamr llāh qadaram-maqdūr-
english_saheeh_international: There is not to be upon the Prophet any discomfort concerning that which Allah has imposed upon him. This is the established way of Allah with those prophets who have passed on before. And ever is the command of Allah a destiny decreed

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُبَلِّغونَ رِسالاتِ اللَّهِ وَيَخشَونَهُ وَلا يَخشَونَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا اللَّهَ ۗ وَكَفىٰ بِاللَّهِ حَسيبًا
blank: alladhīn yuballighūn risālāt llāh w-yakhshawnahū w-lā yakhshawn ʾaḥad ʾillā llāh w-kafā b-llāh ḥasīb
english_saheeh_international: Allah praises those who convey the messages of Allah and fear Him and do not fear anyone but Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Accountant

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ مُحَمَّدٌ أَبا أَحَدٍ مِن رِجالِكُم وَلٰكِن رَسولَ اللَّهِ وَخاتَمَ النَّبِيّينَ ۗ وَكانَ اللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمًا
blank: mā kān muḥammad ʾabā ʾaḥad m rijālikum w-lāk rasūl llāh w-khātam n-nabiyyīn w-kān llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Muhammad is not the father of any one of your men, but he is the Messenger of Allah and last of the prophets. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اذكُرُوا اللَّهَ ذِكرًا كَثيرًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū dhkurū llāh dhikr kathīr
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, remember Allah with much remembrance

arabic_uthmani: وَسَبِّحوهُ بُكرَةً وَأَصيلًا
blank: w-sabbiḥūh bukrat w-ʾaṣīl
english_saheeh_international: And exalt Him morning and afternoon

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي يُصَلّي عَلَيكُم وَمَلائِكَتُهُ لِيُخرِجَكُم مِنَ الظُّلُماتِ إِلَى النّورِ ۚ وَكانَ بِالمُؤمِنينَ رَحيمًا
blank: huwalladhī yuṣallī ʿalaykum w-malāʾikatuhū l-yukhrijakum min ẓ-ẓulumāt ʾilā n-nūr w-kān b-l-muʾminīn raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: It is He who confers blessing upon you, and His angels ask Him to do so that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And ever is He, to the believers, Merciful

arabic_uthmani: تَحِيَّتُهُم يَومَ يَلقَونَهُ سَلامٌ ۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُم أَجرًا كَريمًا
blank: taḥiyyatuhum yawm yalqawnahū salām w-ʾaʿadd lahum ʾajr karīm
english_saheeh_international: Their greeting the Day they meet Him will be, "Peace." And He has prepared for them a noble reward

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ إِنّا أَرسَلناكَ شاهِدًا وَمُبَشِّرًا وَنَذيرًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy ʾinnā ʾarsalnāk shāhid w-mubashshir w-nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, indeed We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner

arabic_uthmani: وَداعِيًا إِلَى اللَّهِ بِإِذنِهِ وَسِراجًا مُنيرًا
blank: w-dāʿiy ʾilā llāh b-ʾidhnihī w-sirājam-munīr
english_saheeh_international: And one who invites to Allah, by His permission, and an illuminating lamp

arabic_uthmani: وَبَشِّرِ المُؤمِنينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِنَ اللَّهِ فَضلًا كَبيرًا
blank: w-bashshiril-muʾminīn b-ʾann lahum min llāh faḍl kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And give good tidings to the believers that they will have from Allah great bounty

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تُطِعِ الكافِرينَ وَالمُنافِقينَ وَدَع أَذاهُم وَتَوَكَّل عَلَى اللَّهِ ۚ وَكَفىٰ بِاللَّهِ وَكيلًا
blank: w-lā tuṭiʿil-kāfirīn w-l-munāfiqīn w-daʿ ʾadhāhum w-tawakkal ʿalā llāh w-kafā b-llāh wakīl
english_saheeh_international: And do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites but do not harm them, and rely upon Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِذا نَكَحتُمُ المُؤمِناتِ ثُمَّ طَلَّقتُموهُنَّ مِن قَبلِ أَن تَمَسّوهُنَّ فَما لَكُم عَلَيهِنَّ مِن عِدَّةٍ تَعتَدّونَها ۖ فَمَتِّعوهُنَّ وَسَرِّحوهُنَّ سَراحًا جَميلًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾidhā nakaḥtumul-muʾmināt thumm ṭallaqtumūhunn m qabl ʾ tamassūhunn f-mā lakum ʿalayhinn m ʿiddat taʿtaddūnahā f-mattiʿūhunn w-sarriḥūhunn sarāḥ jamīl
english_saheeh_international: O You who have believed, when you marry believing women and then divorce them before you have touched them, then there is not for you any waiting period to count concerning them. So provide for them and give them a gracious release

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ إِنّا أَحلَلنا لَكَ أَزواجَكَ اللّاتي آتَيتَ أُجورَهُنَّ وَما مَلَكَت يَمينُكَ مِمّا أَفاءَ اللَّهُ عَلَيكَ وَبَناتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَناتِ عَمّاتِكَ وَبَناتِ خالِكَ وَبَناتِ خالاتِكَ اللّاتي هاجَرنَ مَعَكَ وَامرَأَةً مُؤمِنَةً إِن وَهَبَت نَفسَها لِلنَّبِيِّ إِن أَرادَ النَّبِيُّ أَن يَستَنكِحَها خالِصَةً لَكَ مِن دونِ المُؤمِنينَ ۗ قَد عَلِمنا ما فَرَضنا عَلَيهِم في أَزواجِهِم وَما مَلَكَت أَيمانُهُم لِكَيلا يَكونَ عَلَيكَ حَرَجٌ ۗ وَكانَ اللَّهُ غَفورًا رَحيمًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy ʾinnā ʾaḥlalnā lak ʾazwājak llātī ʾātayt ʾujūrahunn w-mā malakat yamīnuk mimmā ʾafāʾ llāh ʿalayk w-banāt ʿammik w-banāt ʿammātik w-banāt khālik w-banāt khālātik llātī hājarn maʿak w-mraʾatam-muʾminat ʾ wahabat nafsahā l-n-nabiyy ʾ ʾarād n-nabiyy ʾ yastankiḥahā khāliṣat lak m dūnil-muʾminīn qad ʿalimnā mā faraḍnā ʿalayhim fī ʾazwājihim w-mā malakat ʾaymānuhum l-kay-lā yakūn ʿalayk ḥaraj w-kān llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, indeed We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you of captives and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet and if the Prophet wishes to marry her, this is only for you, excluding the other believers. We certainly know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and those their right hands possess, but this is for you in order that there will be upon you no discomfort. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: ۞ تُرجي مَن تَشاءُ مِنهُنَّ وَتُؤوي إِلَيكَ مَن تَشاءُ ۖ وَمَنِ ابتَغَيتَ مِمَّن عَزَلتَ فَلا جُناحَ عَلَيكَ ۚ ذٰلِكَ أَدنىٰ أَن تَقَرَّ أَعيُنُهُنَّ وَلا يَحزَنَّ وَيَرضَينَ بِما آتَيتَهُنَّ كُلُّهُنَّ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ ما في قُلوبِكُم ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ عَليمًا حَليمًا
blank: turjī m tashāʾ minhunn w-tuʾwī ʾilayk m tashāʾ w-man btaghayt mimm ʿazalt f-lā junāḥ ʿalayk dhālik ʾadnā ʾ taqarr ʾaʿyunuhunn w-lā yaḥzann w-yarḍayn b-mā ʾātaytahunn kulluhunn w-llāh yaʿlam mā fī qulūbikum w-kān llāh ʿalīm ḥalīm
english_saheeh_international: You, O Muhammad, may put aside whom you will of them or take to yourself whom you will. And any that you desire of those wives from whom you had temporarily separated - there is no blame upon you in returning her. That is more suitable that they should be content and not grieve and that they should be satisfied with what you have given them - all of them. And Allah knows what is in your hearts. And ever is Allah Knowing and Forbearing

arabic_uthmani: لا يَحِلُّ لَكَ النِّساءُ مِن بَعدُ وَلا أَن تَبَدَّلَ بِهِنَّ مِن أَزواجٍ وَلَو أَعجَبَكَ حُسنُهُنَّ إِلّا ما مَلَكَت يَمينُكَ ۗ وَكانَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ رَقيبًا
blank: lā yaḥill lak n-nisāʾ m baʿd w-lā ʾ tabaddal bihinn m ʾazwāj w-law ʾaʿjabak ḥusnuhunn ʾillā mā malakat yamīnuk w-kān llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ raqīb
english_saheeh_international: Not lawful to you, O Muhammad, are any additional women after this, nor is it for you to exchange them for other wives, even if their beauty were to please you, except what your right hand possesses. And ever is Allah, over all things, an Observer

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَدخُلوا بُيوتَ النَّبِيِّ إِلّا أَن يُؤذَنَ لَكُم إِلىٰ طَعامٍ غَيرَ ناظِرينَ إِناهُ وَلٰكِن إِذا دُعيتُم فَادخُلوا فَإِذا طَعِمتُم فَانتَشِروا وَلا مُستَأنِسينَ لِحَديثٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذٰلِكُم كانَ يُؤذِي النَّبِيَّ فَيَستَحيي مِنكُم ۖ وَاللَّهُ لا يَستَحيي مِنَ الحَقِّ ۚ وَإِذا سَأَلتُموهُنَّ مَتاعًا فَاسأَلوهُنَّ مِن وَراءِ حِجابٍ ۚ ذٰلِكُم أَطهَرُ لِقُلوبِكُم وَقُلوبِهِنَّ ۚ وَما كانَ لَكُم أَن تُؤذوا رَسولَ اللَّهِ وَلا أَن تَنكِحوا أَزواجَهُ مِن بَعدِهِ أَبَدًا ۚ إِنَّ ذٰلِكُم كانَ عِندَ اللَّهِ عَظيمًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā tadkhulū buyūt n-nabiyy ʾillā ʾ yuʾdhan lakum ʾilā ṭaʿām ghayr nāẓirīn ʾināh w-lāk ʾidhā duʿītum f-dkhulū f-ʾidhā ṭaʿimtum f-ntashirū w-lā mustaʾnisīn l-ḥadīth ʾinn dhālikum kān yuʾdhī n-nabiyy f-yastaḥyī minkum w-llāh lā yastaḥyī minal-ḥaqq w-ʾidhā saʾaltumūhunn matāʿ f-sʾalūhunn m warāʾ ḥijāb dhālikum ʾaṭhar l-qulūbikum w-qulūbihinn w-mā kān lakum ʾ tuʾdhū rasūl llāh w-lā ʾ tankiḥū ʾazwājahū m baʿdihī ʾabad ʾinn dhālikum kān ʿind llāh ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not enter the houses of the Prophet except when you are permitted for a meal, without awaiting its readiness. But when you are invited, then enter; and when you have eaten, disperse without seeking to remain for conversation. Indeed, that behavior was troubling the Prophet, and he is shy of dismissing you. But Allah is not shy of the truth. And when you ask his wives for something, ask them from behind a partition. That is purer for your hearts and their hearts. And it is not conceivable or lawful for you to harm the Messenger of Allah or to marry his wives after him, ever. Indeed, that would be in the sight of Allah an enormity

arabic_uthmani: إِن تُبدوا شَيئًا أَو تُخفوهُ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كانَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمًا
blank: ʾ tubdū shayʾ ʾaw tukhfūh f-ʾinn llāh kān b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Whether you reveal a thing or conceal it, indeed Allah is ever, of all things, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: لا جُناحَ عَلَيهِنَّ في آبائِهِنَّ وَلا أَبنائِهِنَّ وَلا إِخوانِهِنَّ وَلا أَبناءِ إِخوانِهِنَّ وَلا أَبناءِ أَخَواتِهِنَّ وَلا نِسائِهِنَّ وَلا ما مَلَكَت أَيمانُهُنَّ ۗ وَاتَّقينَ اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كانَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ شَهيدًا
blank: lā junāḥ ʿalayhinn fī ʾābāʾihinn w-lā ʾabnāʾihinn w-lā ʾikhwānihinn w-lā ʾabnāʾ ʾikhwānihinn w-lā ʾabnāʾ ʾakhawātihinn w-lā nisāʾihinn w-lā mā malakat ʾaymānuhunn w-ttaqīn llāh ʾinn llāh kān ʿalā kull shayʾ shahīd
english_saheeh_international: There is no blame upon women concerning their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their brothers' sons or their sisters' sons or their women or those their right hands possess. And fear Allah. Indeed Allah is ever, over all things, Witness

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ وَمَلائِكَتَهُ يُصَلّونَ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ ۚ يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا صَلّوا عَلَيهِ وَسَلِّموا تَسليمًا
blank: ʾinn llāh w-malāʾikatahū yuṣallūn ʿalā n-nabiyy yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ṣallū ʿalayh w-sallimū taslīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah confers blessing upon the Prophet, and His angels ask Him to do so. O you who have believed, ask Allah to confer blessing upon him and ask Allah to grant him peace

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يُؤذونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ لَعَنَهُمُ اللَّهُ فِي الدُّنيا وَالآخِرَةِ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُم عَذابًا مُهينًا
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yuʾdhūn llāh w-rasūlahū laʿanahum llāh fī d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat w-ʾaʿadd lahum ʿadhābam-muhīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who abuse Allah and His Messenger - Allah has cursed them in this world and the Hereafter and prepared for them a humiliating punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يُؤذونَ المُؤمِنينَ وَالمُؤمِناتِ بِغَيرِ مَا اكتَسَبوا فَقَدِ احتَمَلوا بُهتانًا وَإِثمًا مُبينًا
blank: w-lladhīn yuʾdhūnal-muʾminīn w-l-muʾmināt b-ghayr mā ktasabū f-qad ḥtamalū buhtān w-ʾithmam-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who harm believing men and believing women for something other than what they have earned have certainly born upon themselves a slander and manifest sin

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ قُل لِأَزواجِكَ وَبَناتِكَ وَنِساءِ المُؤمِنينَ يُدنينَ عَلَيهِنَّ مِن جَلابيبِهِنَّ ۚ ذٰلِكَ أَدنىٰ أَن يُعرَفنَ فَلا يُؤذَينَ ۗ وَكانَ اللَّهُ غَفورًا رَحيمًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy qul l-ʾazwājik w-banātik w-nisāʾil-muʾminīn yudnīn ʿalayhinn m jalābībihinn dhālik ʾadnā ʾ yuʿrafn f-lā yuʾdhayn w-kān llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, tell your wives and your daughters and the women of the believers to bring down over themselves part of their outer garments. That is more suitable that they will be known and not be abused. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: ۞ لَئِن لَم يَنتَهِ المُنافِقونَ وَالَّذينَ في قُلوبِهِم مَرَضٌ وَالمُرجِفونَ فِي المَدينَةِ لَنُغرِيَنَّكَ بِهِم ثُمَّ لا يُجاوِرونَكَ فيها إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: laʾil-lam yantahil-munāfiqūn w-lladhīn fī qulūbihim maraḍ w-l-murjifūn fīl-madīnat l-nughriyannak bihim thumm lā yujāwirūnak fīhā ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: If the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease and those who spread rumors in al-Madinah do not cease, We will surely incite you against them; then they will not remain your neighbors therein except for a little

arabic_uthmani: مَلعونينَ ۖ أَينَما ثُقِفوا أُخِذوا وَقُتِّلوا تَقتيلًا
blank: malʿūnīn ʾaynamā thuqifū ʾukhidhū w-quttilū taqtīl
english_saheeh_international: Accursed wherever they are found, being seized and massacred completely

arabic_uthmani: سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ فِي الَّذينَ خَلَوا مِن قَبلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ اللَّهِ تَبديلًا
blank: sunnat llāh fīlladhīn khalaw m qabl w-l tajid l-sunnat llāh tabdīl
english_saheeh_international: This is the established way of Allah with those who passed on before; and you will not find in the way of Allah any change

arabic_uthmani: يَسأَلُكَ النّاسُ عَنِ السّاعَةِ ۖ قُل إِنَّما عِلمُها عِندَ اللَّهِ ۚ وَما يُدريكَ لَعَلَّ السّاعَةَ تَكونُ قَريبًا
blank: yasʾaluk n-nās ʿan s-sāʿat qul ʾinnamā ʿilmuhā ʿind llāh w-mā yudrīk laʿall s-sāʿat takūn qarīb
english_saheeh_international: People ask you concerning the Hour. Say," Knowledge of it is only with Allah. And what may make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَعَنَ الكافِرينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُم سَعيرًا
blank: ʾinn llāh laʿanal-kāfirīn w-ʾaʿadd lahum saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah has cursed the disbelievers and prepared for them a Blaze

arabic_uthmani: خالِدينَ فيها أَبَدًا ۖ لا يَجِدونَ وَلِيًّا وَلا نَصيرًا
blank: khālidīn fīhā ʾabad lā yajidūn waliyy w-lā naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Abiding therein forever, they will not find a protector or a helper

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجوهُهُم فِي النّارِ يَقولونَ يا لَيتَنا أَطَعنَا اللَّهَ وَأَطَعنَا الرَّسولا
blank: yawm tuqallab wujūhuhum fī n-nār yaqūlūn yā-laytanā ʾaṭaʿnā llāh w-ʾaṭaʿnā r-rasūl
english_saheeh_international: The Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire, they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا رَبَّنا إِنّا أَطَعنا سادَتَنا وَكُبَراءَنا فَأَضَلّونَا السَّبيلا
blank: w-qālū rabbanā ʾinnā ʾaṭaʿnā sādatanā w-kubarāʾanā f-ʾaḍallūnā s-sabīl
english_saheeh_international: And they will say, "Our Lord, indeed we obeyed our masters and our dignitaries, and they led us astray from the right way

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا آتِهِم ضِعفَينِ مِنَ العَذابِ وَالعَنهُم لَعنًا كَبيرًا
blank: rabbanā ʾātihim ḍiʿfayn minal-ʿadhāb w-lʿanhum laʿn kabīr
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, give them double the punishment and curse them with a great curse

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَكونوا كَالَّذينَ آذَوا موسىٰ فَبَرَّأَهُ اللَّهُ مِمّا قالوا ۚ وَكانَ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَجيهًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā takūnū k-lladhīn ʾādhaw mūsā f-barraʾah llāh mimmā qālū w-kān ʿind llāh wajīh
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, be not like those who abused Moses; then Allah cleared him of what they said. And he, in the sight of Allah, was distinguished

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَقولوا قَولًا سَديدًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ttaqū llāh w-qūlū qawl sadīd
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, fear Allah and speak words of appropriate justice

arabic_uthmani: يُصلِح لَكُم أَعمالَكُم وَيَغفِر لَكُم ذُنوبَكُم ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ فَقَد فازَ فَوزًا عَظيمًا
blank: yuṣliḥ lakum ʾaʿmālakum w-yaghfir lakum dhunūbakum w-m yuṭiʿ llāh w-rasūlahū f-qad fāz fawz ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: He will then amend for you your deeds and forgive you your sins. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly attained a great attainment

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا عَرَضنَا الأَمانَةَ عَلَى السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَالجِبالِ فَأَبَينَ أَن يَحمِلنَها وَأَشفَقنَ مِنها وَحَمَلَهَا الإِنسانُ ۖ إِنَّهُ كانَ ظَلومًا جَهولًا
blank: ʾinnā ʿaraḍnāl-ʾamānat ʿalā s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-l-jibāl f-ʾabayn ʾ yaḥmilnahā w-ʾashfaqn minhā w-ḥamalahāl-ʾinsān ʾinnahū kān ẓalūm jahūl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, we offered the Trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains, and they declined to bear it and feared it; but man undertook to bear it. Indeed, he was unjust and ignorant

arabic_uthmani: لِيُعَذِّبَ اللَّهُ المُنافِقينَ وَالمُنافِقاتِ وَالمُشرِكينَ وَالمُشرِكاتِ وَيَتوبَ اللَّهُ عَلَى المُؤمِنينَ وَالمُؤمِناتِ ۗ وَكانَ اللَّهُ غَفورًا رَحيمًا
blank: l-yuʿadhdhib llāhul-munāfiqīn w-l-munāfiqāt w-l-mushrikīn w-l-mushrikāt w-yatūb llāh ʿalāl-muʾminīn w-l-muʾmināt w-kān llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: It was so that Allah may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women and the men and women who associate others with Him and that Allah may accept repentance from the believing men and believing women. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذي لَهُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ وَلَهُ الحَمدُ فِي الآخِرَةِ ۚ وَهُوَ الحَكيمُ الخَبيرُ
blank: al-ḥamd l-llāhilladhī lahū mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-lahul-ḥamd fīl-ʾākhirat w-huwal-ḥakīmul-khabīr
english_saheeh_international: All praise is due to Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and to Him belongs all praise in the Hereafter. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: يَعلَمُ ما يَلِجُ فِي الأَرضِ وَما يَخرُجُ مِنها وَما يَنزِلُ مِنَ السَّماءِ وَما يَعرُجُ فيها ۚ وَهُوَ الرَّحيمُ الغَفورُ
blank: yaʿlam mā yalij fīl-ʾarḍ w-mā yakhruj minhā w-mā yanzil min s-samāʾ w-mā yaʿruj fīhā w-huw r-raḥīmul-ghafūr
english_saheeh_international: He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein. And He is the Merciful, the Forgiving

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لا تَأتينَا السّاعَةُ ۖ قُل بَلىٰ وَرَبّي لَتَأتِيَنَّكُم عالِمِ الغَيبِ ۖ لا يَعزُبُ عَنهُ مِثقالُ ذَرَّةٍ فِي السَّماواتِ وَلا فِي الأَرضِ وَلا أَصغَرُ مِن ذٰلِكَ وَلا أَكبَرُ إِلّا في كِتابٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū lā taʾtīnā s-sāʿat qul balā w-rabbī l-taʾtiyannakum ʿālimil-ghayb lā yaʿzub ʿanh mithqāl dharrat fī s-samāwāt w-lā fīl-ʾarḍ w-lā ʾaṣghar m dhālik w-lā ʾakbar ʾillā fī kitāb mubīn
english_saheeh_international: But those who disbelieve say, "The Hour will not come to us." Say, "Yes, by my Lord, it will surely come to you. Allah is the Knower of the unseen." Not absent from Him is an atom's weight within the heavens or within the earth or what is smaller than that or greater, except that it is in a clear register

arabic_uthmani: لِيَجزِيَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ لَهُم مَغفِرَةٌ وَرِزقٌ كَريمٌ
blank: l-yajziyalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt ʾulāʾik lahum maghfirat w-rizq karīm
english_saheeh_international: That He may reward those who believe and do righteous deeds. Those will have forgiveness and noble provision

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ سَعَوا في آياتِنا مُعاجِزينَ أُولٰئِكَ لَهُم عَذابٌ مِن رِجزٍ أَليمٌ
blank: w-lladhīn saʿaw fī ʾāyātinā muʿājizīn ʾulāʾik lahum ʿadhāb m rijz ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: But those who strive against Our verses seeking to cause failure - for them will be a painful punishment of foul nature

arabic_uthmani: وَيَرَى الَّذينَ أوتُوا العِلمَ الَّذي أُنزِلَ إِلَيكَ مِن رَبِّكَ هُوَ الحَقَّ وَيَهدي إِلىٰ صِراطِ العَزيزِ الحَميدِ
blank: w-yarālladhīn ʾūtūl-ʿilmalladhī ʾunzil ʾilayk m rabbik huwal-ḥaqq w-yahdī ʾilā ṣirāṭil-ʿazīzil-ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: And those who have been given knowledge see that what is revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, and it guides to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا هَل نَدُلُّكُم عَلىٰ رَجُلٍ يُنَبِّئُكُم إِذا مُزِّقتُم كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ إِنَّكُم لَفي خَلقٍ جَديدٍ
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū hal nadullukum ʿalā rajul yunabbiʾukum ʾidhā muzziqtum kull mumazzaq ʾinnakum l-fī khalq jadīd
english_saheeh_international: But those who disbelieve say, "Shall we direct you to a man who will inform you that when you have disintegrated in complete disintegration, you will then be recreated in a new creation

arabic_uthmani: أَفتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَم بِهِ جِنَّةٌ ۗ بَلِ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ فِي العَذابِ وَالضَّلالِ البَعيدِ
blank: ʾ-ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib ʾam bihī jinnat balilladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat fīl-ʿadhāb w-ḍ-ḍalālil-baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: Has he invented about Allah a lie or is there in him madness?" Rather, they who do not believe in the Hereafter will be in the punishment and are in extreme error

arabic_uthmani: أَفَلَم يَرَوا إِلىٰ ما بَينَ أَيديهِم وَما خَلفَهُم مِنَ السَّماءِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ إِن نَشَأ نَخسِف بِهِمُ الأَرضَ أَو نُسقِط عَلَيهِم كِسَفًا مِنَ السَّماءِ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِكُلِّ عَبدٍ مُنيبٍ
blank: ʾ-f-lam yaraw ʾilā mā bayn ʾaydīhim w-mā khalfahum min s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ ʾ nashaʾ nakhsif bihimul-ʾarḍ ʾaw nusqiṭ ʿalayhim kisafam-min s-samāʾ ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyat l-kull ʿabd munīb
english_saheeh_international: Then, do they not look at what is before them and what is behind them of the heaven and earth? If We should will, We could cause the earth to swallow them or could let fall upon them fragments from the sky. Indeed in that is a sign for every servant turning back to Allah

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَقَد آتَينا داوودَ مِنّا فَضلًا ۖ يا جِبالُ أَوِّبي مَعَهُ وَالطَّيرَ ۖ وَأَلَنّا لَهُ الحَديدَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā dāwūd minnā faḍl yā-jibāl ʾawwibī maʿahū w-ṭ-ṭayr w-ʾalannā lahul-ḥadīd
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly gave David from Us bounty. We said, "O mountains, repeat Our praises with him, and the birds as well." And We made pliable for him iron

arabic_uthmani: أَنِ اعمَل سابِغاتٍ وَقَدِّر فِي السَّردِ ۖ وَاعمَلوا صالِحًا ۖ إِنّي بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرٌ
blank: ʾan ʿmal sābighāt w-qaddir fī s-sard w-ʿmalū ṣāliḥ ʾinnī b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Commanding him, "Make full coats of mail and calculate precisely the links, and work all of you righteousness. Indeed I, of what you do, am Seeing

arabic_uthmani: وَلِسُلَيمانَ الرّيحَ غُدُوُّها شَهرٌ وَرَواحُها شَهرٌ ۖ وَأَسَلنا لَهُ عَينَ القِطرِ ۖ وَمِنَ الجِنِّ مَن يَعمَلُ بَينَ يَدَيهِ بِإِذنِ رَبِّهِ ۖ وَمَن يَزِغ مِنهُم عَن أَمرِنا نُذِقهُ مِن عَذابِ السَّعيرِ
blank: w-l-sulaymān r-rīḥ ghuduwwuhā shahr w-rawāḥuhā shahr w-ʾasalnā lahū ʿaynal-qiṭr w-minal-jinn m yaʿmal bayn yadayh b-ʾidhn rabbihī w-m yazigh minhum ʿ ʾamrinā nudhiqh m ʿadhāb s-saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: And to Solomon We subjected the wind - its morning journey was that of a month - and its afternoon journey was that of a month, and We made flow for him a spring of liquid copper. And among the jinn were those who worked for him by the permission of his Lord. And whoever deviated among them from Our command - We will make him taste of the punishment of the Blaze

arabic_uthmani: يَعمَلونَ لَهُ ما يَشاءُ مِن مَحاريبَ وَتَماثيلَ وَجِفانٍ كَالجَوابِ وَقُدورٍ راسِياتٍ ۚ اعمَلوا آلَ داوودَ شُكرًا ۚ وَقَليلٌ مِن عِبادِيَ الشَّكورُ
blank: yaʿmalūn lahū mā yashāʾ m maḥārīb w-tamāthīl w-jifān k-l-jawāb w-qudūr rāsiyāt- ʿmalū ʾāl dāwūd shukr w-qalīl m ʿibādiy sh-shakūr
english_saheeh_international: They made for him what he willed of elevated chambers, statues, bowls like reservoirs, and stationary kettles. We said, "Work, O family of David, in gratitude." And few of My servants are grateful

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا قَضَينا عَلَيهِ المَوتَ ما دَلَّهُم عَلىٰ مَوتِهِ إِلّا دابَّةُ الأَرضِ تَأكُلُ مِنسَأَتَهُ ۖ فَلَمّا خَرَّ تَبَيَّنَتِ الجِنُّ أَن لَو كانوا يَعلَمونَ الغَيبَ ما لَبِثوا فِي العَذابِ المُهينِ
blank: f-lammā qaḍaynā ʿalayhil-mawt mā dallahum ʿalā mawtihī ʾillā dābbatul-ʾarḍ taʾkul minsaʾatahū f-lammā kharr tabayyanatil-jinn ʾ law kānū yaʿlamūnal-ghayb mā labithū fīl-ʿadhābil-muhīn
english_saheeh_international: And when We decreed for Solomon death, nothing indicated to the jinn his death except a creature of the earth eating his staff. But when he fell, it became clear to the jinn that if they had known the unseen, they would not have remained in humiliating punishment

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد كانَ لِسَبَإٍ في مَسكَنِهِم آيَةٌ ۖ جَنَّتانِ عَن يَمينٍ وَشِمالٍ ۖ كُلوا مِن رِزقِ رَبِّكُم وَاشكُروا لَهُ ۚ بَلدَةٌ طَيِّبَةٌ وَرَبٌّ غَفورٌ
blank: l-qad kān l-sabaʾ fī maskanihim ʾāyat jannatān ʿ yamīn w-shimāl kulū m rizq rabbikum w-shkurū lahū baldat ṭayyibat w-rabb ghafūr
english_saheeh_international: There was for the tribe of Saba' in their dwelling place a sign: two fields of gardens on the right and on the left. They were told, "Eat from the provisions of your Lord and be grateful to Him. A good land have you, and a forgiving Lord

arabic_uthmani: فَأَعرَضوا فَأَرسَلنا عَلَيهِم سَيلَ العَرِمِ وَبَدَّلناهُم بِجَنَّتَيهِم جَنَّتَينِ ذَواتَي أُكُلٍ خَمطٍ وَأَثلٍ وَشَيءٍ مِن سِدرٍ قَليلٍ
blank: f-ʾaʿraḍū f-ʾarsalnā ʿalayhim saylal-ʿarim w-baddalnāhum b-jannatayhim jannatayn dhawātay ʾukul khamṭ w-ʾathl w-shayʾ m sidr qalīl
english_saheeh_international: But they turned away refusing, so We sent upon them the flood of the dam, and We replaced their two fields of gardens with gardens of bitter fruit, tamarisks and something of sparse lote trees

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ جَزَيناهُم بِما كَفَروا ۖ وَهَل نُجازي إِلَّا الكَفورَ
blank: dhālik jazaynāhum b-mā kafarū w-hal nujāzī ʾillāl-kafūr
english_saheeh_international: By that We repaid them because they disbelieved. And do We thus repay except the ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلنا بَينَهُم وَبَينَ القُرَى الَّتي بارَكنا فيها قُرًى ظاهِرَةً وَقَدَّرنا فيهَا السَّيرَ ۖ سيروا فيها لَيالِيَ وَأَيّامًا آمِنينَ
blank: w-jaʿalnā baynahum w-baynal-qurā llatī bāraknā fīhā qur ẓāhirat w-qaddarnā fīhā s-sayr sīrū fīhā layāliy w-ʾayyām ʾāminīn
english_saheeh_international: And We placed between them and the cities which We had blessed many visible cities. And We determined between them the distances of journey, saying, "Travel between them by night or day in safety

arabic_uthmani: فَقالوا رَبَّنا باعِد بَينَ أَسفارِنا وَظَلَموا أَنفُسَهُم فَجَعَلناهُم أَحاديثَ وَمَزَّقناهُم كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِكُلِّ صَبّارٍ شَكورٍ
blank: f-qālū rabbanā bāʿid bayn ʾasfārinā w-ẓalamū ʾanfusahum f-jaʿalnāhum ʾaḥādīth w-mazzaqnāhum kull mumazzaq ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-kull ṣabbār shakūr
english_saheeh_international: But insolently they said, "Our Lord, lengthen the distance between our journeys," and wronged themselves, so We made them narrations and dispersed them in total dispersion. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد صَدَّقَ عَلَيهِم إِبليسُ ظَنَّهُ فَاتَّبَعوهُ إِلّا فَريقًا مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-l-qad ṣaddaq ʿalayhim ʾiblīs ẓannahū f-ttabaʿūh ʾillā farīqam-minal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And Iblees had already confirmed through them his assumption, so they followed him, except for a party of believers

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ لَهُ عَلَيهِم مِن سُلطانٍ إِلّا لِنَعلَمَ مَن يُؤمِنُ بِالآخِرَةِ مِمَّن هُوَ مِنها في شَكٍّ ۗ وَرَبُّكَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ حَفيظٌ
blank: w-mā kān lahū ʿalayhim m sulṭān ʾillā l-naʿlam m yuʾmin b-l-ʾākhirat mimm huw minhā fī shakk w-rabbuk ʿalā kull shayʾ ḥafīẓ
english_saheeh_international: And he had over them no authority except it was decreed that We might make evident who believes in the Hereafter from who is thereof in doubt. And your Lord, over all things, is Guardian

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ ادعُوا الَّذينَ زَعَمتُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ۖ لا يَملِكونَ مِثقالَ ذَرَّةٍ فِي السَّماواتِ وَلا فِي الأَرضِ وَما لَهُم فيهِما مِن شِركٍ وَما لَهُ مِنهُم مِن ظَهيرٍ
blank: qul dʿūlladhīn zaʿamtum m dūn llāh lā yamlikūn mithqāl dharrat fī s-samāwāt w-lā fīl-ʾarḍ w-mā lahum fīhimā m shirk w-mā lahū minhum m ẓahīr
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Invoke those you claim as deities besides Allah." They do not possess an atom's weight of ability in the heavens or on the earth, and they do not have therein any partnership with Him, nor is there for Him from among them any assistant

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَنفَعُ الشَّفاعَةُ عِندَهُ إِلّا لِمَن أَذِنَ لَهُ ۚ حَتّىٰ إِذا فُزِّعَ عَن قُلوبِهِم قالوا ماذا قالَ رَبُّكُم ۖ قالُوا الحَقَّ ۖ وَهُوَ العَلِيُّ الكَبيرُ
blank: w-lā tanfaʿ sh-shafāʿat ʿindahū ʾillā l-m ʾadhin lahū ḥattā ʾidhā fuzziʿ ʿ qulūbihim qālū mādhā qāl rabbukum qālūl-ḥaqq w-huwal-ʿaliyyul-kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And intercession does not benefit with Him except for one whom He permits. And those wait until, when terror is removed from their hearts, they will say to one another, "What has your Lord said?" They will say, "The truth." And He is the Most High, the Grand

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قُل مَن يَرزُقُكُم مِنَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ قُلِ اللَّهُ ۖ وَإِنّا أَو إِيّاكُم لَعَلىٰ هُدًى أَو في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: qul m yarzuqukum min s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ qul llāh w-ʾinnā ʾaw ʾiyyākum l-ʿalā hud ʾaw fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?" Say, "Allah. And indeed, we or you are either upon guidance or in clear error

arabic_uthmani: قُل لا تُسأَلونَ عَمّا أَجرَمنا وَلا نُسأَلُ عَمّا تَعمَلونَ
blank: qul lā tusʾalūn ʿammā ʾajramnā w-lā nusʾal ʿammā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "You will not be asked about what we committed, and we will not be asked about what you do

arabic_uthmani: قُل يَجمَعُ بَينَنا رَبُّنا ثُمَّ يَفتَحُ بَينَنا بِالحَقِّ وَهُوَ الفَتّاحُ العَليمُ
blank: qul yajmaʿ baynanā rabbunā thumm yaftaḥ baynanā b-l-ḥaqq w-huwal-fattāḥul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Our Lord will bring us together; then He will judge between us in truth. And He is the Knowing Judge

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرونِيَ الَّذينَ أَلحَقتُم بِهِ شُرَكاءَ ۖ كَلّا ۚ بَل هُوَ اللَّهُ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: qul ʾarūniyalladhīn ʾalḥaqtum bihī shurakāʾ kallā bal huw llāhul-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Show me those whom you have attached to Him as partners. No! Rather, He alone is Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلناكَ إِلّا كافَّةً لِلنّاسِ بَشيرًا وَنَذيرًا وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnāk ʾillā kāffat l-n-nās bashīr w-nadhīr w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have not sent you except comprehensively to mankind as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. But most of the people do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ مَتىٰ هٰذَا الوَعدُ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-yaqūlūn matā hādhāl-waʿd ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: قُل لَكُم ميعادُ يَومٍ لا تَستَأخِرونَ عَنهُ ساعَةً وَلا تَستَقدِمونَ
blank: qul lakum mīʿād yawm lā tastaʾkhirūn ʿanh sāʿat w-lā tastaqdimūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "For you is the appointment of a Day when you will not remain thereafter an hour, nor will you precede it

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لَن نُؤمِنَ بِهٰذَا القُرآنِ وَلا بِالَّذي بَينَ يَدَيهِ ۗ وَلَو تَرىٰ إِذِ الظّالِمونَ مَوقوفونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِم يَرجِعُ بَعضُهُم إِلىٰ بَعضٍ القَولَ يَقولُ الَّذينَ استُضعِفوا لِلَّذينَ استَكبَروا لَولا أَنتُم لَكُنّا مُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū l nuʾmin b-hādhāl-qurʾān w-lā b-lladhī bayn yadayh w-law tarā ʾidh ẓ-ẓālimūn mawqūfūn ʿind rabbihim yarjiʿ baʿḍuhum ʾilā baʿḍ-il-qawl yaqūlulladhīn stuḍʿifū l-lladhīn stakbarū law-lā ʾantum l-kunnā muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieve say, "We will never believe in this Qur'an nor in that before it." But if you could see when the wrongdoers are made to stand before their Lord, refuting each other's words... Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "If not for you, we would have been believers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ الَّذينَ استَكبَروا لِلَّذينَ استُضعِفوا أَنَحنُ صَدَدناكُم عَنِ الهُدىٰ بَعدَ إِذ جاءَكُم ۖ بَل كُنتُم مُجرِمينَ
blank: qālalladhīn stakbarū l-lladhīn stuḍʿifū ʾ-naḥn ṣadadnākum ʿanil-hudā baʿd ʾidh jāʾakum bal kuntum mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Those who were arrogant will say to those who were oppressed, "Did we avert you from guidance after it had come to you? Rather, you were criminals

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ استُضعِفوا لِلَّذينَ استَكبَروا بَل مَكرُ اللَّيلِ وَالنَّهارِ إِذ تَأمُرونَنا أَن نَكفُرَ بِاللَّهِ وَنَجعَلَ لَهُ أَندادًا ۚ وَأَسَرُّوا النَّدامَةَ لَمّا رَأَوُا العَذابَ وَجَعَلنَا الأَغلالَ في أَعناقِ الَّذينَ كَفَروا ۚ هَل يُجزَونَ إِلّا ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: w-qālalladhīn stuḍʿifū l-lladhīn stakbarū bal makrul-layl w-n-nahār ʾidh taʾmurūnanā ʾ nakfur b-llāh w-najʿal lahū ʾandād w-ʾasarrū n-nadāmat lammā raʾawul-ʿadhāb w-jaʿalnāl-ʾaghlāl fī ʾaʿnāqilladhīn kafarū hal yujzawn ʾillā mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "Rather, it was your conspiracy of night and day when you were ordering us to disbelieve in Allah and attribute to Him equals." But they will all confide regret when they see the punishment; and We will put shackles on the necks of those who disbelieved. Will they be recompensed except for what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَرسَلنا في قَريَةٍ مِن نَذيرٍ إِلّا قالَ مُترَفوها إِنّا بِما أُرسِلتُم بِهِ كافِرونَ
blank: w-mā ʾarsalnā fī qaryat m nadhīr ʾillā qāl mutrafūhā ʾinnā b-mā ʾursiltum bihī kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not send into a city any warner except that its affluent said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا نَحنُ أَكثَرُ أَموالًا وَأَولادًا وَما نَحنُ بِمُعَذَّبينَ
blank: w-qālū naḥn ʾakthar ʾamwāl w-ʾawlād w-mā naḥn b-muʿadhdhabīn
english_saheeh_international: And they said, "We are more than the believers in wealth and children, and we are not to be punished

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّ رَبّي يَبسُطُ الرِّزقَ لِمَن يَشاءُ وَيَقدِرُ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: qul ʾinn rabbī yabsuṭ r-rizq l-m yashāʾ w-yaqdir w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts it, but most of the people do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَموالُكُم وَلا أَولادُكُم بِالَّتي تُقَرِّبُكُم عِندَنا زُلفىٰ إِلّا مَن آمَنَ وَعَمِلَ صالِحًا فَأُولٰئِكَ لَهُم جَزاءُ الضِّعفِ بِما عَمِلوا وَهُم فِي الغُرُفاتِ آمِنونَ
blank: w-mā ʾamwālukum w-lā ʾawlādukum b-llatī tuqarribukum ʿindanā zulfā ʾillā m ʾāman w-ʿamil ṣāliḥ f-ʾulāʾik lahum jazāʾ ḍ-ḍiʿf b-mā ʿamilū w-hum fīl-ghurufāt ʾāminūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is not your wealth or your children that bring you nearer to Us in position, but it is by being one who has believed and done righteousness. For them there will be the double reward for what they did, and they will be in the upper chambers of Paradise, safe and secure

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يَسعَونَ في آياتِنا مُعاجِزينَ أُولٰئِكَ فِي العَذابِ مُحضَرونَ
blank: w-lladhīn yasʿawn fī ʾāyātinā muʿājizīn ʾulāʾik fīl-ʿadhāb muḥḍarūn
english_saheeh_international: And the ones who strive against Our verses to cause them failure - those will be brought into the punishment to remain

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّ رَبّي يَبسُطُ الرِّزقَ لِمَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ وَيَقدِرُ لَهُ ۚ وَما أَنفَقتُم مِن شَيءٍ فَهُوَ يُخلِفُهُ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيرُ الرّازِقينَ
blank: qul ʾinn rabbī yabsuṭ r-rizq l-m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī w-yaqdir lahū w-mā ʾanfaqtum m shayʾ f-huw yukhlifuhū w-huw khayr r-rāziqīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts it for him. But whatever thing you spend in His cause - He will compensate it; and He is the best of providers

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يَحشُرُهُم جَميعًا ثُمَّ يَقولُ لِلمَلائِكَةِ أَهٰؤُلاءِ إِيّاكُم كانوا يَعبُدونَ
blank: w-yawm yaḥshuruhum jamīʿ thumm yaqūl l-l-malāʾikat ʾ-hāʾulāʾ ʾiyyākum kānū yaʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention the Day when He will gather them all and then say to the angels, "Did these people used to worship you

arabic_uthmani: قالوا سُبحانَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنا مِن دونِهِم ۖ بَل كانوا يَعبُدونَ الجِنَّ ۖ أَكثَرُهُم بِهِم مُؤمِنونَ
blank: qālū subḥānak ʾant waliyyunā m dūnihim bal kānū yaʿbudūnal-jinn ʾaktharuhum bihim muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "Exalted are You! You, O Allah, are our benefactor not them. Rather, they used to worship the jinn; most of them were believers in them

arabic_uthmani: فَاليَومَ لا يَملِكُ بَعضُكُم لِبَعضٍ نَفعًا وَلا ضَرًّا وَنَقولُ لِلَّذينَ ظَلَموا ذوقوا عَذابَ النّارِ الَّتي كُنتُم بِها تُكَذِّبونَ
blank: f-l-yawm lā yamlik baʿḍukum l-baʿḍ nafʿ w-lā ḍarr w-naqūl l-lladhīn ẓalamū dhūqū ʿadhāb n-nār llatī kuntum bihā tukadhdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: But today you do not hold for one another the power of benefit or harm, and We will say to those who wronged, "Taste the punishment of the Fire, which you used to deny

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا تُتلىٰ عَلَيهِم آياتُنا بَيِّناتٍ قالوا ما هٰذا إِلّا رَجُلٌ يُريدُ أَن يَصُدَّكُم عَمّا كانَ يَعبُدُ آباؤُكُم وَقالوا ما هٰذا إِلّا إِفكٌ مُفتَرًى ۚ وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لِلحَقِّ لَمّا جاءَهُم إِن هٰذا إِلّا سِحرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-ʾidhā tutlā ʿalayhim ʾāyātunā bayyināt qālū mā hādhā ʾillā rajul yurīd ʾ yaṣuddakum ʿammā kān yaʿbud ʾābāʾukum w-qālū mā hādhā ʾillā ʾifk muftar w-qālalladhīn kafarū l-l-ḥaqq lammā jāʾahum ʾ hādhā ʾillā siḥr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And when our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, they say, "This is not but a man who wishes to avert you from that which your fathers were worshipping." And they say, "This is not except a lie invented." And those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is not but obvious magic

arabic_uthmani: وَما آتَيناهُم مِن كُتُبٍ يَدرُسونَها ۖ وَما أَرسَلنا إِلَيهِم قَبلَكَ مِن نَذيرٍ
blank: w-mā ʾātaynāhum m kutub yadrusūnahā w-mā ʾarsalnā ʾilayhim qablak m nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: And We had not given them any scriptures which they could study, and We had not sent to them before you, O Muhammad, any warner

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذَّبَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم وَما بَلَغوا مِعشارَ ما آتَيناهُم فَكَذَّبوا رُسُلي ۖ فَكَيفَ كانَ نَكيرِ
blank: w-kadhdhaballadhīn m qablihim w-mā balaghū miʿshār mā ʾātaynāhum f-kadhdhabū rusulī f-kayf kān nakīr
english_saheeh_international: And those before them denied, and the people of Makkah have not attained a tenth of what We had given them. But the former peoples denied My messengers, so how terrible was My reproach

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قُل إِنَّما أَعِظُكُم بِواحِدَةٍ ۖ أَن تَقوموا لِلَّهِ مَثنىٰ وَفُرادىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّروا ۚ ما بِصاحِبِكُم مِن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِن هُوَ إِلّا نَذيرٌ لَكُم بَينَ يَدَي عَذابٍ شَديدٍ
blank: qul ʾinnamā ʾaʿiẓukum b-wāḥidat ʾ taqūmū l-llāh mathnā w-furādā thumm tatafakkarū mā b-ṣāḥibikum m jinnat ʾ huw ʾillā nadhīr lakum bayn yaday ʿadhāb shadīd
english_saheeh_international: Say, "I only advise you of one thing - that you stand for Allah, seeking truth in pairs and individually, and then give thought." There is not in your companion any madness. He is only a warner to you before a severe punishment

arabic_uthmani: قُل ما سَأَلتُكُم مِن أَجرٍ فَهُوَ لَكُم ۖ إِن أَجرِيَ إِلّا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ شَهيدٌ
blank: qul mā saʾaltukum m ʾajr f-huw lakum ʾ ʾajriy ʾillā ʿalā llāh w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ shahīd
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Whatever payment I might have asked of you - it is yours. My payment is only from Allah, and He is, over all things, Witness

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّ رَبّي يَقذِفُ بِالحَقِّ عَلّامُ الغُيوبِ
blank: qul ʾinn rabbī yaqdhif b-l-ḥaqq ʿallāmul-ghuyūb
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, my Lord projects the truth. Knower of the unseen

arabic_uthmani: قُل جاءَ الحَقُّ وَما يُبدِئُ الباطِلُ وَما يُعيدُ
blank: qul jāʾal-ḥaqq w-mā yubdiʾul-bāṭil w-mā yuʿīd
english_saheeh_international: Say, "The truth has come, and falsehood can neither begin anything nor repeat it

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِن ضَلَلتُ فَإِنَّما أَضِلُّ عَلىٰ نَفسي ۖ وَإِنِ اهتَدَيتُ فَبِما يوحي إِلَيَّ رَبّي ۚ إِنَّهُ سَميعٌ قَريبٌ
blank: qul ʾ ḍalalt f-ʾinnamā ʾaḍill ʿalā nafsī w-ʾin htadayt f-b-mā yūḥī ʾilayy rabbī ʾinnahū samīʿ qarīb
english_saheeh_international: Say, "If I should err, I would only err against myself. But if I am guided, it is by what my Lord reveals to me. Indeed, He is Hearing and near

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو تَرىٰ إِذ فَزِعوا فَلا فَوتَ وَأُخِذوا مِن مَكانٍ قَريبٍ
blank: w-law tarā ʾidh faziʿū f-lā fawt w-ʾukhidhū m makān qarīb
english_saheeh_international: And if you could see when they are terrified but there is no escape, and they will be seized from a place nearby

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا آمَنّا بِهِ وَأَنّىٰ لَهُمُ التَّناوُشُ مِن مَكانٍ بَعيدٍ
blank: w-qālū ʾāmannā bihī w-ʾannā lahum t-tanāwush m makān baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: And they will then say, "We believe in it!" But how for them will be the taking of faith from a place far away

arabic_uthmani: وَقَد كَفَروا بِهِ مِن قَبلُ ۖ وَيَقذِفونَ بِالغَيبِ مِن مَكانٍ بَعيدٍ
blank: w-qad kafarū bihī m qabl w-yaqdhifūn b-l-ghayb m makān baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: And they had already disbelieved in it before and would assault the unseen from a place far away

arabic_uthmani: وَحيلَ بَينَهُم وَبَينَ ما يَشتَهونَ كَما فُعِلَ بِأَشياعِهِم مِن قَبلُ ۚ إِنَّهُم كانوا في شَكٍّ مُريبٍ
blank: w-ḥīl baynahum w-bayn mā yashtahūn k-mā fuʿil b-ʾashyāʿihim m qabl ʾinnahum kānū fī shakk murīb
english_saheeh_international: And prevention will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their kind before. Indeed, they were in disquieting denial

arabic_uthmani: الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ فاطِرِ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ جاعِلِ المَلائِكَةِ رُسُلًا أُولي أَجنِحَةٍ مَثنىٰ وَثُلاثَ وَرُباعَ ۚ يَزيدُ فِي الخَلقِ ما يَشاءُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: al-ḥamd l-llāh fāṭir s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ jāʿilil-malāʾikat rusul ʾulī ʾajniḥat mathnā w-thulāth w-rubāʿ yazīd fīl-khalq mā yashāʾ ʾinn llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: All praise is due to Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, who made the angels messengers having wings, two or three or four. He increases in creation what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: ما يَفتَحِ اللَّهُ لِلنّاسِ مِن رَحمَةٍ فَلا مُمسِكَ لَها ۖ وَما يُمسِك فَلا مُرسِلَ لَهُ مِن بَعدِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: mā yaftaḥ llāh l-n-nās m raḥmat f-lā mumsik lahā w-mā yumsik f-lā mursil lahū m baʿdihī w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Whatever Allah grants to people of mercy - none can withhold it; and whatever He withholds - none can release it thereafter. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ اذكُروا نِعمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيكُم ۚ هَل مِن خالِقٍ غَيرُ اللَّهِ يَرزُقُكُم مِنَ السَّماءِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنّىٰ تُؤفَكونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās dhkurū niʿmat llāh ʿalaykum hal m khāliq ghayr llāh yarzuqukum min s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw f-ʾannā tuʾfakūn
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, remember the favor of Allah upon you. Is there any creator other than Allah who provides for you from the heaven and earth? There is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن يُكَذِّبوكَ فَقَد كُذِّبَت رُسُلٌ مِن قَبلِكَ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرجَعُ الأُمورُ
blank: w-ʾ yukadhdhibūk f-qad kudhdhibat rusul m qablik w-ʾilā llāh turjaʿul-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: And if they deny you, O Muhammad - already were messengers denied before you. And to Allah are returned all matters

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ إِنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ فَلا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ الحَياةُ الدُّنيا ۖ وَلا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِاللَّهِ الغَرورُ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ʾinn waʿd llāh ḥaqq f-lā taghurrannakumul-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-lā yaghurrannakum b-llāhil-gharūr
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, indeed the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الشَّيطانَ لَكُم عَدُوٌّ فَاتَّخِذوهُ عَدُوًّا ۚ إِنَّما يَدعو حِزبَهُ لِيَكونوا مِن أَصحابِ السَّعيرِ
blank: ʾinn sh-shayṭān lakum ʿaduww f-ttakhidhūh ʿaduww ʾinnamā yadʿū ḥizbahū l-yakūnū m ʾaṣḥāb s-saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Satan is an enemy to you; so take him as an enemy. He only invites his party to be among the companions of the Blaze

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ كَفَروا لَهُم عَذابٌ شَديدٌ ۖ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ لَهُم مَغفِرَةٌ وَأَجرٌ كَبيرٌ
blank: alladhīn kafarū lahum ʿadhāb shadīd w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt lahum maghfirat w-ʾajr kabīr
english_saheeh_international: Those who disbelieve will have a severe punishment, and those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and great reward

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُ سوءُ عَمَلِهِ فَرَآهُ حَسَنًا ۖ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشاءُ وَيَهدي مَن يَشاءُ ۖ فَلا تَذهَب نَفسُكَ عَلَيهِم حَسَراتٍ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ بِما يَصنَعونَ
blank: ʾ-f-m zuyyin lahū sūʾ ʿamalihī f-raʾāh ḥasan f-ʾinn llāh yuḍill m yashāʾ w-yahdī m yashāʾ f-lā tadhhab nafsuk ʿalayhim ḥasarāt ʾinn llāh ʿalīm b-mā yaṣnaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Then is one to whom the evil of his deed has been made attractive so he considers it good like one rightly guided? For indeed, Allah sends astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. So do not let yourself perish over them in regret. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ الَّذي أَرسَلَ الرِّياحَ فَتُثيرُ سَحابًا فَسُقناهُ إِلىٰ بَلَدٍ مَيِّتٍ فَأَحيَينا بِهِ الأَرضَ بَعدَ مَوتِها ۚ كَذٰلِكَ النُّشورُ
blank: w-llāhulladhī ʾarsal r-riyāḥ f-tuthīr saḥāb f-suqnāh ʾilā balad mayyit f-ʾaḥyaynā bihil-ʾarḍ baʿd mawtihā k-dhālik n-nushūr
english_saheeh_international: And it is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds, and We drive them to a dead land and give life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Thus is the resurrection

arabic_uthmani: مَن كانَ يُريدُ العِزَّةَ فَلِلَّهِ العِزَّةُ جَميعًا ۚ إِلَيهِ يَصعَدُ الكَلِمُ الطَّيِّبُ وَالعَمَلُ الصّالِحُ يَرفَعُهُ ۚ وَالَّذينَ يَمكُرونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ لَهُم عَذابٌ شَديدٌ ۖ وَمَكرُ أُولٰئِكَ هُوَ يَبورُ
blank: m kān yurīdul-ʿizzat f-l-llāhil-ʿizzat jamīʿ ʾilayh yaṣʿadul-kalim ṭ-ṭayyib w-l-ʿamal ṣ-ṣāliḥ yarfaʿuhū w-lladhīn yamkurūn s-sayyiʾāt lahum ʿadhāb shadīd w-makr ʾulāʾik huw yabūr
english_saheeh_international: Whoever desires honor through power - then to Allah belongs all honor. To Him ascends good speech, and righteous work raises it. But they who plot evil deeds will have a severe punishment, and the plotting of those - it will perish

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُم مِن تُرابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُطفَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُم أَزواجًا ۚ وَما تَحمِلُ مِن أُنثىٰ وَلا تَضَعُ إِلّا بِعِلمِهِ ۚ وَما يُعَمَّرُ مِن مُعَمَّرٍ وَلا يُنقَصُ مِن عُمُرِهِ إِلّا في كِتابٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسيرٌ
blank: w-llāh khalaqakum m turāb thumm m nuṭfat thumm jaʿalakum ʾazwāj w-mā taḥmil m ʾunthā w-lā taḍaʿ ʾillā b-ʿilmihī w-mā yuʿammar m muʿammar w-lā yunqaṣ m ʿumurihī ʾillā fī kitāb ʾinn dhālik ʿalā llāh yasīr
english_saheeh_international: And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop; then He made you mates. And no female conceives nor does she give birth except with His knowledge. And no aged person is granted additional life nor is his lifespan lessened but that it is in a register. Indeed, that for Allah is easy

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَستَوِي البَحرانِ هٰذا عَذبٌ فُراتٌ سائِغٌ شَرابُهُ وَهٰذا مِلحٌ أُجاجٌ ۖ وَمِن كُلٍّ تَأكُلونَ لَحمًا طَرِيًّا وَتَستَخرِجونَ حِليَةً تَلبَسونَها ۖ وَتَرَى الفُلكَ فيهِ مَواخِرَ لِتَبتَغوا مِن فَضلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: w-mā yastawīl-baḥrān hādhā ʿadhb furāt sāʾigh sharābuhū w-hādhā milḥ ʾujāj w-m kull taʾkulūn laḥm ṭariyy w-tastakhrijūn ḥilyat talbasūnahā w-tarāl-fulk fīh mawākhir l-tabtaghū m faḍlihī w-laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And not alike are the two bodies of water. One is fresh and sweet, palatable for drinking, and one is salty and bitter. And from each you eat tender meat and extract ornaments which you wear, and you see the ships plowing through them that you might seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful

arabic_uthmani: يولِجُ اللَّيلَ فِي النَّهارِ وَيولِجُ النَّهارَ فِي اللَّيلِ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمسَ وَالقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجري لِأَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ ذٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُم لَهُ المُلكُ ۚ وَالَّذينَ تَدعونَ مِن دونِهِ ما يَملِكونَ مِن قِطميرٍ
blank: yūlijul-layl fī n-nahār w-yūlij n-nahār fīl-layl w-sakhkhar sh-shams w-l-qamar kull yajrī l-ʾajal musamm dhālikum llāh rabbukum lahul-mulk w-lladhīn tadʿūn m dūnihī mā yamlikūn m qiṭmīr
english_saheeh_international: He causes the night to enter the day, and He causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon - each running its course for a specified term. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. And those whom you invoke other than Him do not possess as much as the membrane of a date seed

arabic_uthmani: إِن تَدعوهُم لا يَسمَعوا دُعاءَكُم وَلَو سَمِعوا مَا استَجابوا لَكُم ۖ وَيَومَ القِيامَةِ يَكفُرونَ بِشِركِكُم ۚ وَلا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثلُ خَبيرٍ
blank: ʾ tadʿūhum lā yasmaʿū duʿāʾakum w-law samiʿū mā stajābū lakum w-yawmal-qiyāmat yakfurūn b-shirkikum w-lā yunabbiʾuk mithl khabīr
english_saheeh_international: If you invoke them, they do not hear your supplication; and if they heard, they would not respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your association. And none can inform you like one Acquainted with all matters

arabic_uthmani: ۞ يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ أَنتُمُ الفُقَراءُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ هُوَ الغَنِيُّ الحَميدُ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ʾantumul-fuqarāʾ ʾilā llāh w-llāh huwal-ghaniyyul-ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, you are those in need of Allah, while Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: إِن يَشَأ يُذهِبكُم وَيَأتِ بِخَلقٍ جَديدٍ
blank: ʾ yashaʾ yudhhibkum w-yaʾt b-khalq jadīd
english_saheeh_international: If He wills, He can do away with you and bring forth a new creation

arabic_uthmani: وَما ذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ بِعَزيزٍ
blank: w-mā dhālik ʿalā llāh b-ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: And that is for Allah not difficult

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَزِرُ وازِرَةٌ وِزرَ أُخرىٰ ۚ وَإِن تَدعُ مُثقَلَةٌ إِلىٰ حِملِها لا يُحمَل مِنهُ شَيءٌ وَلَو كانَ ذا قُربىٰ ۗ إِنَّما تُنذِرُ الَّذينَ يَخشَونَ رَبَّهُم بِالغَيبِ وَأَقامُوا الصَّلاةَ ۚ وَمَن تَزَكّىٰ فَإِنَّما يَتَزَكّىٰ لِنَفسِهِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ المَصيرُ
blank: w-lā tazir wāzirat wizr ʾukhrā w-ʾ tadʿ muthqalat ʾilā ḥimlihā lā yuḥmal minh shayʾ w-law kān dhā qurbā ʾinnamā tundhirulladhīn yakhshawn rabbahum b-l-ghayb w-ʾaqāmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-m tazakkā f-ʾinnamā yatazakkā l-nafsihī w-ʾilā llāhil-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And if a heavily laden soul calls another to carry some of its load, nothing of it will be carried, even if he should be a close relative. You can only warn those who fear their Lord unseen and have established prayer. And whoever purifies himself only purifies himself for the benefit of his soul. And to Allah is the final destination

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَستَوِي الأَعمىٰ وَالبَصيرُ
blank: w-mā yastawīl-ʾaʿmā w-l-baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Not equal are the blind and the seeing

arabic_uthmani: وَلَا الظُّلُماتُ وَلَا النّورُ
blank: w-lā ẓ-ẓulumāt w-lā n-nūr
english_saheeh_international: Nor are the darknesses and the light

arabic_uthmani: وَلَا الظِّلُّ وَلَا الحَرورُ
blank: w-lā ẓ-ẓill w-lāl-ḥarūr
english_saheeh_international: Nor are the shade and the heat

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَستَوِي الأَحياءُ وَلَا الأَمواتُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُسمِعُ مَن يَشاءُ ۖ وَما أَنتَ بِمُسمِعٍ مَن فِي القُبورِ
blank: w-mā yastawīl-ʾaḥyāʾ w-lāl-ʾamwāt ʾinn llāh yusmiʿ m yashāʾ w-mā ʾant b-musmiʿ m fīl-qubūr
english_saheeh_international: And not equal are the living and the dead. Indeed, Allah causes to hear whom He wills, but you cannot make hear those in the graves

arabic_uthmani: إِن أَنتَ إِلّا نَذيرٌ
blank: ʾ ʾant ʾillā nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: You, O Muhammad, are not but a warner

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَرسَلناكَ بِالحَقِّ بَشيرًا وَنَذيرًا ۚ وَإِن مِن أُمَّةٍ إِلّا خَلا فيها نَذيرٌ
blank: ʾinnā ʾarsalnāk b-l-ḥaqq bashīr w-nadhīr w-ʾ m ʾummat ʾillā khalā fīhā nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And there was no nation but that there had passed within it a warner

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن يُكَذِّبوكَ فَقَد كَذَّبَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم جاءَتهُم رُسُلُهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ وَبِالزُّبُرِ وَبِالكِتابِ المُنيرِ
blank: w-ʾ yukadhdhibūk f-qad kadhdhaballadhīn m qablihim jāʾathum rusuluhum b-l-bayyināt w-b-z-zubur w-b-l-kitābil-munīr
english_saheeh_international: And if they deny you - then already have those before them denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs and written ordinances and with the enlightening Scripture

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَخَذتُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا ۖ فَكَيفَ كانَ نَكيرِ
blank: thumm ʾakhadhtulladhīn kafarū f-kayf kān nakīr
english_saheeh_international: Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how terrible was My reproach

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَأَخرَجنا بِهِ ثَمَراتٍ مُختَلِفًا أَلوانُها ۚ وَمِنَ الجِبالِ جُدَدٌ بيضٌ وَحُمرٌ مُختَلِفٌ أَلوانُها وَغَرابيبُ سودٌ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾann llāh ʾanzal min s-samāʾ māʾ f-ʾakhrajnā bihī thamarāt mukhtalif ʾalwānuhā w-minal-jibāl judad bīḍ w-ḥumr mukhtalif ʾalwānuhā w-gharābīb sūd
english_saheeh_international: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and We produce thereby fruits of varying colors? And in the mountains are tracts, white and red of varying shades and some extremely black

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ النّاسِ وَالدَّوابِّ وَالأَنعامِ مُختَلِفٌ أَلوانُهُ كَذٰلِكَ ۗ إِنَّما يَخشَى اللَّهَ مِن عِبادِهِ العُلَماءُ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزيزٌ غَفورٌ
blank: w-min n-nās w-d-dawābb w-l-ʾanʿām mukhtalif ʾalwānuhū k-dhālik ʾinnamā yakhshā llāh m ʿibādihil-ʿulamāʾ ʾinn llāh ʿazīz ghafūr
english_saheeh_international: And among people and moving creatures and grazing livestock are various colors similarly. Only those fear Allah, from among His servants, who have knowledge. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Forgiving

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَتلونَ كِتابَ اللَّهِ وَأَقامُوا الصَّلاةَ وَأَنفَقوا مِمّا رَزَقناهُم سِرًّا وَعَلانِيَةً يَرجونَ تِجارَةً لَن تَبورَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yatlūn kitāb llāh w-ʾaqāmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾanfaqū mimmā razaqnāhum sirr w-ʿalāniyat yarjūn tijārat l tabūr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who recite the Book of Allah and establish prayer and spend in His cause out of what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, can expect a profit that will never perish

arabic_uthmani: لِيُوَفِّيَهُم أُجورَهُم وَيَزيدَهُم مِن فَضلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ غَفورٌ شَكورٌ
blank: l-yuwaffiyahum ʾujūrahum w-yazīdahum m faḍlihī ʾinnahū ghafūr shakūr
english_saheeh_international: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذي أَوحَينا إِلَيكَ مِنَ الكِتابِ هُوَ الحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِما بَينَ يَدَيهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِعِبادِهِ لَخَبيرٌ بَصيرٌ
blank: w-lladhī ʾawḥaynā ʾilayk minal-kitāb huwal-ḥaqq muṣaddiq l-mā bayn yadayh ʾinn llāh b-ʿibādihī l-khabīr baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And that which We have revealed to you, O Muhammad, of the Book is the truth, confirming what was before it. Indeed, Allah, of His servants, is Acquainted and Seeing

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَورَثنَا الكِتابَ الَّذينَ اصطَفَينا مِن عِبادِنا ۖ فَمِنهُم ظالِمٌ لِنَفسِهِ وَمِنهُم مُقتَصِدٌ وَمِنهُم سابِقٌ بِالخَيراتِ بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الفَضلُ الكَبيرُ
blank: thumm ʾawrathnāl-kitāballadhīn ṣṭafaynā m ʿibādinā f-minhum ẓālim l-nafsihī w-minhum muqtaṣid w-minhum sābiq b-l-khayrāt b-ʾidhn llāh dhālik huwal-faḍlul-kabīr
english_saheeh_international: Then we caused to inherit the Book those We have chosen of Our servants; and among them is he who wrongs himself, and among them is he who is moderate, and among them is he who is foremost in good deeds by permission of Allah. That inheritance is what is the great bounty

arabic_uthmani: جَنّاتُ عَدنٍ يَدخُلونَها يُحَلَّونَ فيها مِن أَساوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤلُؤًا ۖ وَلِباسُهُم فيها حَريرٌ
blank: jannāt ʿadn yadkhulūnahā yuḥallawn fīhā m ʾasāwir m dhahab w-luʾluʾ w-libāsuhum fīhā ḥarīr
english_saheeh_international: For them are gardens of perpetual residence which they will enter. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their garments therein will be silk

arabic_uthmani: وَقالُوا الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذي أَذهَبَ عَنَّا الحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنا لَغَفورٌ شَكورٌ
blank: w-qālūl-ḥamd l-llāhilladhī ʾadhhab ʿannāl-ḥazan ʾinn rabbanā l-ghafūr shakūr-
english_saheeh_international: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has removed from us all sorrow. Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي أَحَلَّنا دارَ المُقامَةِ مِن فَضلِهِ لا يَمَسُّنا فيها نَصَبٌ وَلا يَمَسُّنا فيها لُغوبٌ
blank: alladhī ʾaḥallanā dāral-muqāmat m faḍlihī lā yamassunā fīhā naṣab w-lā yamassunā fīhā lughūb
english_saheeh_international: He who has settled us in the home of duration out of His bounty. There touches us not in it any fatigue, and there touches us not in it weariness of mind

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا لَهُم نارُ جَهَنَّمَ لا يُقضىٰ عَلَيهِم فَيَموتوا وَلا يُخَفَّفُ عَنهُم مِن عَذابِها ۚ كَذٰلِكَ نَجزي كُلَّ كَفورٍ
blank: w-lladhīn kafarū lahum nār jahannam lā yuqḍā ʿalayhim f-yamūtū w-lā yukhaffaf ʿanhum m ʿadhābihā k-dhālik najzī kull kafūr
english_saheeh_international: And for those who disbelieve will be the fire of Hell. Death is not decreed for them so they may die, nor will its torment be lightened for them. Thus do we recompense every ungrateful one

arabic_uthmani: وَهُم يَصطَرِخونَ فيها رَبَّنا أَخرِجنا نَعمَل صالِحًا غَيرَ الَّذي كُنّا نَعمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَم نُعَمِّركُم ما يَتَذَكَّرُ فيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجاءَكُمُ النَّذيرُ ۖ فَذوقوا فَما لِلظّالِمينَ مِن نَصيرٍ
blank: w-hum yaṣṭarikhūn fīhā rabbanā ʾakhrijnā naʿmal ṣāliḥ ghayralladhī kunnā naʿmal ʾ-w-lam nuʿammirkum mā yatadhakkar fīh m tadhakkar w-jāʾakum n-nadhīr f-dhūqū f-mā l-ẓ-ẓālimīn m naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And they will cry out therein, "Our Lord, remove us; we will do righteousness - other than what we were doing!" But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you? So taste the punishment, for there is not for the wrongdoers any helper

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ عالِمُ غَيبِ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: ʾinn llāh ʿālim ghayb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ʾinnahū ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah is Knower of the unseen aspects of the heavens and earth. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي جَعَلَكُم خَلائِفَ فِي الأَرضِ ۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيهِ كُفرُهُ ۖ وَلا يَزيدُ الكافِرينَ كُفرُهُم عِندَ رَبِّهِم إِلّا مَقتًا ۖ وَلا يَزيدُ الكافِرينَ كُفرُهُم إِلّا خَسارًا
blank: huwalladhī jaʿalakum khalāʾif fīl-ʾarḍ f-m kafar f-ʿalayh kufruhū w-lā yazīdul-kāfirīn kufruhum ʿind rabbihim ʾillā maqt w-lā yazīdul-kāfirīn kufruhum ʾillā khasār
english_saheeh_international: It is He who has made you successors upon the earth. And whoever disbelieves - upon him will be the consequence of his disbelief. And the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them in the sight of their Lord except in hatred; and the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them except in loss

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم شُرَكاءَكُمُ الَّذينَ تَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ أَروني ماذا خَلَقوا مِنَ الأَرضِ أَم لَهُم شِركٌ فِي السَّماواتِ أَم آتَيناهُم كِتابًا فَهُم عَلىٰ بَيِّنَتٍ مِنهُ ۚ بَل إِن يَعِدُ الظّالِمونَ بَعضُهُم بَعضًا إِلّا غُرورًا
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum shurakāʾakumulladhīn tadʿūn m dūn llāh ʾarūnī mādhā khalaqū minal-ʾarḍ ʾam lahum shirk fī s-samāwāt ʾam ʾātaynāhum kitāb f-hum ʿalā bayyinat minh bal ʾ yaʿid ẓ-ẓālimūn baʿḍuhum baʿḍ ʾillā ghurūr
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered your 'partners' whom you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created from the earth, or have they partnership with Him in the heavens? Or have We given them a book so they are standing on evidence therefrom? No, rather, the wrongdoers do not promise each other except delusion

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُمسِكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ أَن تَزولا ۚ وَلَئِن زالَتا إِن أَمسَكَهُما مِن أَحَدٍ مِن بَعدِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ حَليمًا غَفورًا
blank: ʾinn llāh yumsik s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ʾ tazūlā w-l-ʾ zālatā ʾ ʾamsakahumā m ʾaḥad m baʿdihī ʾinnahū kān ḥalīm ghafūr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah holds the heavens and the earth, lest they cease. And if they should cease, no one could hold them in place after Him. Indeed, He is Forbearing and Forgiving

arabic_uthmani: وَأَقسَموا بِاللَّهِ جَهدَ أَيمانِهِم لَئِن جاءَهُم نَذيرٌ لَيَكونُنَّ أَهدىٰ مِن إِحدَى الأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمّا جاءَهُم نَذيرٌ ما زادَهُم إِلّا نُفورًا
blank: w-ʾaqsamū b-llāh jahd ʾaymānihim l-ʾ jāʾahum nadhīr l-yakūnunn ʾahdā m ʾiḥdāl-ʾumam f-lammā jāʾahum nadhīr mā zādahum ʾillā nufūr-
english_saheeh_international: And they swore by Allah their strongest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than any one of the previous nations. But when a warner came to them, it did not increase them except in aversion

arabic_uthmani: استِكبارًا فِي الأَرضِ وَمَكرَ السَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلا يَحيقُ المَكرُ السَّيِّئُ إِلّا بِأَهلِهِ ۚ فَهَل يَنظُرونَ إِلّا سُنَّتَ الأَوَّلينَ ۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَبديلًا ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَحويلًا
blank: istikbār fīl-ʾarḍ w-makr s-sayyiʾ w-lā yaḥīqul-makr s-sayyiʾ ʾillā b-ʾahlihī f-hal yanẓurūn ʾillā sunnatal-ʾawwalīn f-l tajid l-sunnat llāh tabdīl w-l tajid l-sunnat llāh taḥwīl
english_saheeh_international: Due to arrogance in the land and plotting of evil; but the evil plot does not encompass except its own people. Then do they await except the way of the former peoples? But you will never find in the way of Allah any change, and you will never find in the way of Allah any alteration

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَسيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَيَنظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم وَكانوا أَشَدَّ مِنهُم قُوَّةً ۚ وَما كانَ اللَّهُ لِيُعجِزَهُ مِن شَيءٍ فِي السَّماواتِ وَلا فِي الأَرضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ عَليمًا قَديرًا
blank: ʾ-w-lam yasīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-yanẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatulladhīn m qablihim w-kānū ʾashadd minhum quwwat w-mā kān llāh l-yuʿjizahū m shayʾ fī s-samāwāt w-lā fīl-ʾarḍ ʾinnahū kān ʿalīm qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? And they were greater than them in power. But Allah is not to be caused failure by anything in the heavens or on the earth. Indeed, He is ever Knowing and Competent

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو يُؤاخِذُ اللَّهُ النّاسَ بِما كَسَبوا ما تَرَكَ عَلىٰ ظَهرِها مِن دابَّةٍ وَلٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُم إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذا جاءَ أَجَلُهُم فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كانَ بِعِبادِهِ بَصيرًا
blank: w-law yuʾākhidh llāh n-nās b-mā kasabū mā tarak ʿalā ẓahrihā m dābbat w-lāk yuʾakhkhiruhum ʾilā ʾajal musamm f-ʾidhā jāʾ ʾajaluhum f-ʾinn llāh kān b-ʿibādihī baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon the earth any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed Allah has ever been, of His servants, Seeing

arabic_uthmani: يس
blank: y-s (yā sīn)
english_saheeh_international: Ya, Seen

arabic_uthmani: وَالقُرآنِ الحَكيمِ
blank: w-l-qurʾānil-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: By the wise Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ المُرسَلينَ
blank: ʾinnak l-minal-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed you, O Muhammad, are from among the messengers

arabic_uthmani: عَلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: ʿalā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: On a straight path

arabic_uthmani: تَنزيلَ العَزيزِ الرَّحيمِ
blank: tanzīlal-ʿazīz r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: This is a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: لِتُنذِرَ قَومًا ما أُنذِرَ آباؤُهُم فَهُم غافِلونَ
blank: l-tundhir qawmam-mā ʾundhir ʾābāʾuhum f-hum ghāfilūn
english_saheeh_international: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد حَقَّ القَولُ عَلىٰ أَكثَرِهِم فَهُم لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: l-qad ḥaqqal-qawl ʿalā ʾaktharihim f-hum lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا جَعَلنا في أَعناقِهِم أَغلالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الأَذقانِ فَهُم مُقمَحونَ
blank: ʾinnā jaʿalnā fī ʾaʿnāqihim ʾaghlāl f-hiy ʾilāl-ʾadhqān f-hum muqmaḥūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads kept aloft

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلنا مِن بَينِ أَيديهِم سَدًّا وَمِن خَلفِهِم سَدًّا فَأَغشَيناهُم فَهُم لا يُبصِرونَ
blank: w-jaʿalnā m bayn ʾaydīhim sadd w-m khalfihim sadd f-ʾaghshaynāhum f-hum lā yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see

arabic_uthmani: وَسَواءٌ عَلَيهِم أَأَنذَرتَهُم أَم لَم تُنذِرهُم لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: w-sawāʾ ʿalayhim ʾ-ʾandhartahum ʾam lam tundhirhum lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما تُنذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحمٰنَ بِالغَيبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرهُ بِمَغفِرَةٍ وَأَجرٍ كَريمٍ
blank: ʾinnamā tundhir man ttabaʿ dh-dhikr w-khashiy r-raḥmān b-l-ghayb f-bashshirh b-maghfirat w-ʾajr karīm
english_saheeh_international: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا نَحنُ نُحيِي المَوتىٰ وَنَكتُبُ ما قَدَّموا وَآثارَهُم ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيءٍ أَحصَيناهُ في إِمامٍ مُبينٍ
blank: ʾinnā naḥn nuḥyil-mawtā w-naktub mā qaddamū w-ʾāthārahum w-kull shayʾ ʾaḥṣaynāh fī ʾimām mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register

arabic_uthmani: وَاضرِب لَهُم مَثَلًا أَصحابَ القَريَةِ إِذ جاءَهَا المُرسَلونَ
blank: w-ḍrib lahum mathal ʾaṣḥābal-qaryat ʾidh jāʾahāl-mursalūn
english_saheeh_international: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it

arabic_uthmani: إِذ أَرسَلنا إِلَيهِمُ اثنَينِ فَكَذَّبوهُما فَعَزَّزنا بِثالِثٍ فَقالوا إِنّا إِلَيكُم مُرسَلونَ
blank: ʾidh ʾarsalnā ʾilayhim thnayn f-kadhdhabūhumā f-ʿazzaznā b-thālith f-qālū ʾinnā ʾilaykum mursalūn
english_saheeh_international: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you

arabic_uthmani: قالوا ما أَنتُم إِلّا بَشَرٌ مِثلُنا وَما أَنزَلَ الرَّحمٰنُ مِن شَيءٍ إِن أَنتُم إِلّا تَكذِبونَ
blank: qālū mā ʾantum ʾillā bashar mithlunā w-mā ʾanzal r-raḥmān m shayʾ ʾ ʾantum ʾillā takdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies

arabic_uthmani: قالوا رَبُّنا يَعلَمُ إِنّا إِلَيكُم لَمُرسَلونَ
blank: qālū rabbunā yaʿlam ʾinnā ʾilaykum l-mursalūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you

arabic_uthmani: وَما عَلَينا إِلَّا البَلاغُ المُبينُ
blank: w-mā ʿalaynā ʾillāl-balāghul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And we are not responsible except for clear notification

arabic_uthmani: قالوا إِنّا تَطَيَّرنا بِكُم ۖ لَئِن لَم تَنتَهوا لَنَرجُمَنَّكُم وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِنّا عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: qālū ʾinnā taṭayyarnā bikum laʾil-lam tantahū l-narjumannakum w-l-yamassannakum minnā ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: قالوا طائِرُكُم مَعَكُم ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرتُم ۚ بَل أَنتُم قَومٌ مُسرِفونَ
blank: qālū ṭāʾirukum maʿakum ʾ-ʾ dhukkirtum bal ʾantum qawm musrifūn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people

arabic_uthmani: وَجاءَ مِن أَقصَى المَدينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسعىٰ قالَ يا قَومِ اتَّبِعُوا المُرسَلينَ
blank: w-jāʾ m ʾaqṣāl-madīnat rajul yasʿā qāl yā-qawm ttabiʿūl-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers

arabic_uthmani: اتَّبِعوا مَن لا يَسأَلُكُم أَجرًا وَهُم مُهتَدونَ
blank: ittabiʿū m lā yasʾalukum ʾajr w-hum muhtadūn
english_saheeh_international: Follow those who do not ask of you any payment, and they are rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: وَما لِيَ لا أَعبُدُ الَّذي فَطَرَني وَإِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: w-mā liy lā ʾaʿbudulladhī faṭaranī w-ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دونِهِ آلِهَةً إِن يُرِدنِ الرَّحمٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لا تُغنِ عَنّي شَفاعَتُهُم شَيئًا وَلا يُنقِذونِ
blank: ʾ-ʾattakhidh m dūnihī ʾālihat ʾ yuridn r-raḥmān b-ḍurr lā tughn ʿannī shafāʿatuhum shayʾ w-lā yunqidhūn
english_saheeh_international: Should I take other than Him false deities while, if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me

arabic_uthmani: إِنّي إِذًا لَفي ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: ʾinnī ʾidh l-fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error

arabic_uthmani: إِنّي آمَنتُ بِرَبِّكُم فَاسمَعونِ
blank: ʾinnī ʾāmant b-rabbikum f-smaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me

arabic_uthmani: قيلَ ادخُلِ الجَنَّةَ ۖ قالَ يا لَيتَ قَومي يَعلَمونَ
blank: qīl dkhulil-jannat qāl yā-layt qawmī yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

arabic_uthmani: بِما غَفَرَ لي رَبّي وَجَعَلَني مِنَ المُكرَمينَ
blank: b-mā ghafar lī rabbī w-jaʿalanī minal-mukramīn
english_saheeh_international: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَما أَنزَلنا عَلىٰ قَومِهِ مِن بَعدِهِ مِن جُندٍ مِنَ السَّماءِ وَما كُنّا مُنزِلينَ
blank: w-mā ʾanzalnā ʿalā qawmihī m baʿdihī m jund min s-samāʾ w-mā kunnā munzilīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so

arabic_uthmani: إِن كانَت إِلّا صَيحَةً واحِدَةً فَإِذا هُم خامِدونَ
blank: ʾ kānat ʾillā ṣayḥat wāḥidat f-ʾidhā hum khāmidūn
english_saheeh_international: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished

arabic_uthmani: يا حَسرَةً عَلَى العِبادِ ۚ ما يَأتيهِم مِن رَسولٍ إِلّا كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: yā-ḥasrat ʿalāl-ʿibād mā yaʾtīhim m rasūl ʾillā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَرَوا كَم أَهلَكنا قَبلَهُم مِنَ القُرونِ أَنَّهُم إِلَيهِم لا يَرجِعونَ
blank: ʾ-lam yaraw kam ʾahlaknā qablahum minal-qurūn ʾannahum ʾilayhim lā yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَمّا جَميعٌ لَدَينا مُحضَرونَ
blank: w-ʾ kull lammā jamīʿ ladaynā muḥḍarūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us

arabic_uthmani: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمُ الأَرضُ المَيتَةُ أَحيَيناها وَأَخرَجنا مِنها حَبًّا فَمِنهُ يَأكُلونَ
blank: w-ʾāyat lahumul-ʾarḍul-maytat ʾaḥyaynāhā w-ʾakhrajnā minhā ḥabb f-minh yaʾkulūn
english_saheeh_international: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلنا فيها جَنّاتٍ مِن نَخيلٍ وَأَعنابٍ وَفَجَّرنا فيها مِنَ العُيونِ
blank: w-jaʿalnā fīhā jannāt m nakhīl w-ʾaʿnāb w-fajjarnā fīhā minal-ʿuyūn
english_saheeh_international: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs

arabic_uthmani: لِيَأكُلوا مِن ثَمَرِهِ وَما عَمِلَتهُ أَيديهِم ۖ أَفَلا يَشكُرونَ
blank: l-yaʾkulū m thamarihī w-mā ʿamilath ʾaydīhim ʾ-f-lā yashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful

arabic_uthmani: سُبحانَ الَّذي خَلَقَ الأَزواجَ كُلَّها مِمّا تُنبِتُ الأَرضُ وَمِن أَنفُسِهِم وَمِمّا لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: subḥānalladhī khalaqal-ʾazwāj kullahā mimmā tunbitul-ʾarḍ w-m ʾanfusihim w-mimmā lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمُ اللَّيلُ نَسلَخُ مِنهُ النَّهارَ فَإِذا هُم مُظلِمونَ
blank: w-ʾāyat lahumul-layl naslakh minh n-nahār f-ʾidhā hum muẓlimūn
english_saheeh_international: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it the light of day, so they are left in darkness

arabic_uthmani: وَالشَّمسُ تَجري لِمُستَقَرٍّ لَها ۚ ذٰلِكَ تَقديرُ العَزيزِ العَليمِ
blank: w-sh-shams tajrī l-mustaqarr lahā dhālik taqdīrul-ʿazīzil-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And the sun runs on course toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَالقَمَرَ قَدَّرناهُ مَنازِلَ حَتّىٰ عادَ كَالعُرجونِ القَديمِ
blank: w-l-qamar qaddarnāh manāzil ḥattā ʿād k-l-ʿurjūnil-qadīm
english_saheeh_international: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns appearing like the old date stalk

arabic_uthmani: لَا الشَّمسُ يَنبَغي لَها أَن تُدرِكَ القَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيلُ سابِقُ النَّهارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ في فَلَكٍ يَسبَحونَ
blank: lā sh-shams yanbaghī lahā ʾ tudrikal-qamar w-lāl-layl sābiq n-nahār w-kull fī falak yasbaḥūn
english_saheeh_international: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming

arabic_uthmani: وَآيَةٌ لَهُم أَنّا حَمَلنا ذُرِّيَّتَهُم فِي الفُلكِ المَشحونِ
blank: w-ʾāyat lahum ʾannā ḥamalnā dhurriyyatahum fīl-fulkil-mashḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship

arabic_uthmani: وَخَلَقنا لَهُم مِن مِثلِهِ ما يَركَبونَ
blank: w-khalaqnā lahum m mithlihī mā yarkabūn
english_saheeh_international: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن نَشَأ نُغرِقهُم فَلا صَريخَ لَهُم وَلا هُم يُنقَذونَ
blank: w-ʾ nashaʾ nughriqhum f-lā ṣarīkh lahum w-lā hum yunqadhūn
english_saheeh_international: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا رَحمَةً مِنّا وَمَتاعًا إِلىٰ حينٍ
blank: ʾillā raḥmatam-minnā w-matāʿ ʾilā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقوا ما بَينَ أَيديكُم وَما خَلفَكُم لَعَلَّكُم تُرحَمونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lahum ttaqū mā bayn ʾaydīkum w-mā khalfakum laʿallakum turḥamūn
english_saheeh_international: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy

arabic_uthmani: وَما تَأتيهِم مِن آيَةٍ مِن آياتِ رَبِّهِم إِلّا كانوا عَنها مُعرِضينَ
blank: w-mā taʾtīhim m ʾāyat m ʾāyāt rabbihim ʾillā kānū ʿanhā muʿriḍīn
english_saheeh_international: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُم أَنفِقوا مِمّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا أَنُطعِمُ مَن لَو يَشاءُ اللَّهُ أَطعَمَهُ إِن أَنتُم إِلّا في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lahum ʾanfiqū mimmā razaqakum llāh qālalladhīn kafarū l-lladhīn ʾāmanū ʾ-nuṭʿim m law yashāʾ llāh ʾaṭʿamahū ʾ ʾantum ʾillā fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ مَتىٰ هٰذَا الوَعدُ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-yaqūlūn matā hādhāl-waʿd ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: ما يَنظُرونَ إِلّا صَيحَةً واحِدَةً تَأخُذُهُم وَهُم يَخِصِّمونَ
blank: mā yanẓurūn ʾillā ṣayḥat wāḥidat taʾkhudhuhum w-hum yakhiṣṣimūn
english_saheeh_international: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing

arabic_uthmani: فَلا يَستَطيعونَ تَوصِيَةً وَلا إِلىٰ أَهلِهِم يَرجِعونَ
blank: f-lā yastaṭīʿūn tawṣiyat w-lā ʾilā ʾahlihim yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And they will not be able to give any instruction, nor to their people can they return

arabic_uthmani: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصّورِ فَإِذا هُم مِنَ الأَجداثِ إِلىٰ رَبِّهِم يَنسِلونَ
blank: w-nufikh fī ṣ-ṣūr f-ʾidhā hum minal-ʾajdāth ʾilā rabbihim yansilūn
english_saheeh_international: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا وَيلَنا مَن بَعَثَنا مِن مَرقَدِنا ۜ ۗ هٰذا ما وَعَدَ الرَّحمٰنُ وَصَدَقَ المُرسَلونَ
blank: qālū yā-waylanā m baʿathanā m marqadinā hādhā mā waʿad r-raḥmān w-ṣadaqal-mursalūn
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" The reply will be, "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth
