arabic_uthmani: إِن كانَت إِلّا صَيحَةً واحِدَةً فَإِذا هُم جَميعٌ لَدَينا مُحضَرونَ
blank: ʾ kānat ʾillā ṣayḥat wāḥidat f-ʾidhā hum jamīʿ ladaynā muḥḍarūn
english_saheeh_international: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us

arabic_uthmani: فَاليَومَ لا تُظلَمُ نَفسٌ شَيئًا وَلا تُجزَونَ إِلّا ما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: f-l-yawm lā tuẓlam nafs shayʾ w-lā tujzawn ʾillā mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ أَصحابَ الجَنَّةِ اليَومَ في شُغُلٍ فاكِهونَ
blank: ʾinn ʾaṣḥābal-jannatil-yawm fī shughul fākihūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in joyful occupation

arabic_uthmani: هُم وَأَزواجُهُم في ظِلالٍ عَلَى الأَرائِكِ مُتَّكِئونَ
blank: hum w-ʾazwājuhum fī ẓilāl ʿalāl-ʾarāʾik muttakiʾūn
english_saheeh_international: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches

arabic_uthmani: لَهُم فيها فاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم ما يَدَّعونَ
blank: lahum fīhā fākihat w-lahum mā yaddaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request or wish

arabic_uthmani: سَلامٌ قَولًا مِن رَبٍّ رَحيمٍ
blank: salām qawlam-m rabb raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord

arabic_uthmani: وَامتازُوا اليَومَ أَيُّهَا المُجرِمونَ
blank: w-mtāzūl-yawm ʾayyuhāl-mujrimūn
english_saheeh_international: Then He will say, "But stand apart today, you criminals

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَلَم أَعهَد إِلَيكُم يا بَني آدَمَ أَن لا تَعبُدُوا الشَّيطانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُم عَدُوٌّ مُبينٌ
blank: ʾ-lam ʾaʿhad ʾilaykum yā-banī ʾādam ʾ lā taʿbudū sh-shayṭān ʾinnahū lakum ʿaduww mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - for indeed, he is to you a clear enemy

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنِ اعبُدوني ۚ هٰذا صِراطٌ مُستَقيمٌ
blank: w-ʾan ʿbudūnī hādhā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And that you worship only Me? This is a straight path

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَضَلَّ مِنكُم جِبِلًّا كَثيرًا ۖ أَفَلَم تَكونوا تَعقِلونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾaḍall minkum jibill kathīr ʾ-f-lam takūnū taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason

arabic_uthmani: هٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتي كُنتُم توعَدونَ
blank: hādhihī jahannam llatī kuntum tūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: This is the Hellfire which you were promised

arabic_uthmani: اصلَوهَا اليَومَ بِما كُنتُم تَكفُرونَ
blank: iṣlawhāl-yawm b-mā kuntum takfurūn
english_saheeh_international: Enter to burn therein today for what you used to deny

arabic_uthmani: اليَومَ نَختِمُ عَلىٰ أَفواهِهِم وَتُكَلِّمُنا أَيديهِم وَتَشهَدُ أَرجُلُهُم بِما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: al-yawm nakhtim ʿalā ʾafwāhihim w-tukallimunā ʾaydīhim w-tashhad ʾarjuluhum b-mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو نَشاءُ لَطَمَسنا عَلىٰ أَعيُنِهِم فَاستَبَقُوا الصِّراطَ فَأَنّىٰ يُبصِرونَ
blank: w-law nashāʾ l-ṭamasnā ʿalā ʾaʿyunihim f-stabaqū ṣ-ṣirāṭ f-ʾannā yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to find the path, and how could they see

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو نَشاءُ لَمَسَخناهُم عَلىٰ مَكانَتِهِم فَمَا استَطاعوا مُضِيًّا وَلا يَرجِعونَ
blank: w-law nashāʾ l-masakhnāhum ʿalā makānatihim f-mā staṭāʿū muḍiyy w-lā yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, paralyzing them in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن نُعَمِّرهُ نُنَكِّسهُ فِي الخَلقِ ۖ أَفَلا يَعقِلونَ
blank: w-m nuʿammirh nunakkish fīl-khalq ʾ-f-lā yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand

arabic_uthmani: وَما عَلَّمناهُ الشِّعرَ وَما يَنبَغي لَهُ ۚ إِن هُوَ إِلّا ذِكرٌ وَقُرآنٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-mā ʿallamnāh sh-shiʿr w-mā yanbaghī lahū ʾ huw ʾillā dhikr w-qurʾān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: لِيُنذِرَ مَن كانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ القَولُ عَلَى الكافِرينَ
blank: l-yundhir m kān ḥayy w-yaḥiqqal-qawl ʿalāl-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا أَنّا خَلَقنا لَهُم مِمّا عَمِلَت أَيدينا أَنعامًا فَهُم لَها مالِكونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾannā khalaqnā lahum mimmā ʿamilat ʾaydīnā ʾanʿām f-hum lahā mālikūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and then they are their owners

arabic_uthmani: وَذَلَّلناها لَهُم فَمِنها رَكوبُهُم وَمِنها يَأكُلونَ
blank: w-dhallalnāhā lahum f-minhā rakūbuhum w-minhā yaʾkulūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat

arabic_uthmani: وَلَهُم فيها مَنافِعُ وَمَشارِبُ ۖ أَفَلا يَشكُرونَ
blank: w-lahum fīhā manāfiʿ w-mashārib ʾ-f-lā yashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And for them therein are other benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّخَذوا مِن دونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَعَلَّهُم يُنصَرونَ
blank: w-ttakhadhū m dūn llāh ʾālihat laʿallahum yunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: But they have taken besides Allah false deities that perhaps they would be helped

arabic_uthmani: لا يَستَطيعونَ نَصرَهُم وَهُم لَهُم جُندٌ مُحضَرونَ
blank: lā yastaṭīʿūn naṣrahum w-hum lahum jund muḥḍarūn
english_saheeh_international: They are not able to help them, and they themselves are for them soldiers in attendance

arabic_uthmani: فَلا يَحزُنكَ قَولُهُم ۘ إِنّا نَعلَمُ ما يُسِرّونَ وَما يُعلِنونَ
blank: f-lā yaḥzunk qawluhum ʾinnā naʿlam mā yusirrūn w-mā yuʿlinūn
english_saheeh_international: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَ الإِنسانُ أَنّا خَلَقناهُ مِن نُطفَةٍ فَإِذا هُوَ خَصيمٌ مُبينٌ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaral-ʾinsān ʾannā khalaqnāh m nuṭfat f-ʾidhā huw khaṣīm mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Does man not consider that We created him from a mere sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary

arabic_uthmani: وَضَرَبَ لَنا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلقَهُ ۖ قالَ مَن يُحيِي العِظامَ وَهِيَ رَميمٌ
blank: w-ḍarab lanā mathal w-nasiy khalqahū qāl m yuḥyil-ʿiẓām w-hiy ramīm
english_saheeh_international: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his own creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated

arabic_uthmani: قُل يُحييهَا الَّذي أَنشَأَها أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلقٍ عَليمٌ
blank: qul yuḥyīhālladhī ʾanshaʾahā ʾawwal marrat w-huw b-kull khalq ʿalīm-
english_saheeh_international: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِنَ الشَّجَرِ الأَخضَرِ نارًا فَإِذا أَنتُم مِنهُ توقِدونَ
blank: alladhī jaʿal lakum min sh-shajaril-ʾakhḍar nār f-ʾidhā ʾantum minh tūqidūn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَيسَ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ بِقادِرٍ عَلىٰ أَن يَخلُقَ مِثلَهُم ۚ بَلىٰ وَهُوَ الخَلّاقُ العَليمُ
blank: ʾ-w-laysalladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ b-qādir ʿalā ʾ yakhluq mithlahum balā w-huwal-khallāqul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, it is so; and He is the Knowing Creator

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما أَمرُهُ إِذا أَرادَ شَيئًا أَن يَقولَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكونُ
blank: ʾinnamā ʾamruhū ʾidhā ʾarād shayʾ ʾ yaqūl lahū k f-yakūn
english_saheeh_international: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is

arabic_uthmani: فَسُبحانَ الَّذي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكوتُ كُلِّ شَيءٍ وَإِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: f-subḥānalladhī b-yadihī malakūt kull shayʾ w-ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَالصّافّاتِ صَفًّا
blank: w-ṣ-ṣāffāt ṣaff
english_saheeh_international: By those angels lined up in rows

arabic_uthmani: فَالزّاجِراتِ زَجرًا
blank: f-z-zājirāt zajr
english_saheeh_international: And those who drive the clouds

arabic_uthmani: فَالتّالِياتِ ذِكرًا
blank: f-t-tāliyāt dhikr
english_saheeh_international: And those who recite the message

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ إِلٰهَكُم لَواحِدٌ
blank: ʾinn ʾilāhakum l-wāḥid
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your God is One

arabic_uthmani: رَبُّ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَما بَينَهُما وَرَبُّ المَشارِقِ
blank: rabb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā w-rabbul-mashāriq
english_saheeh_international: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا زَيَّنَّا السَّماءَ الدُّنيا بِزينَةٍ الكَواكِبِ
blank: ʾinnā zayyannā s-samāʾ d-dunyā b-zīnat-il-kawākib
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

arabic_uthmani: وَحِفظًا مِن كُلِّ شَيطانٍ مارِدٍ
blank: w-ḥifẓam-m kull shayṭān mārid
english_saheeh_international: And as protection against every rebellious devil

arabic_uthmani: لا يَسَّمَّعونَ إِلَى المَلَإِ الأَعلىٰ وَيُقذَفونَ مِن كُلِّ جانِبٍ
blank: lā yassammaʿūn ʾilāl-malaʾil-ʾaʿlā w-yuqdhafūn m kull jānib
english_saheeh_international: So they may not listen to the exalted assembly of angels and are pelted from every side

arabic_uthmani: دُحورًا ۖ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ واصِبٌ
blank: duḥūr w-lahum ʿadhāb wāṣib
english_saheeh_international: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا مَن خَطِفَ الخَطفَةَ فَأَتبَعَهُ شِهابٌ ثاقِبٌ
blank: ʾillā m khaṭifal-khaṭfat f-ʾatbaʿahū shihāb thāqib
english_saheeh_international: Except one who snatches some words by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing in brightness

arabic_uthmani: فَاستَفتِهِم أَهُم أَشَدُّ خَلقًا أَم مَن خَلَقنا ۚ إِنّا خَلَقناهُم مِن طينٍ لازِبٍ
blank: f-staftihim ʾ-hum ʾashadd khalq ʾam m khalaqnā ʾinnā khalaqnāhum m ṭīn lāzib
english_saheeh_international: Then inquire of them, O Muhammad, "Are they a stronger or more difficult creation or those others We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay

arabic_uthmani: بَل عَجِبتَ وَيَسخَرونَ
blank: bal ʿajibt w-yaskharūn
english_saheeh_international: But you wonder, while they mock

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا ذُكِّروا لا يَذكُرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā dhukkirū lā yadhkurūn
english_saheeh_international: And when they are reminded, they remember not

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا رَأَوا آيَةً يَستَسخِرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾaw ʾāyat yastaskhirūn
english_saheeh_international: And when they see a sign, they ridicule

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا إِن هٰذا إِلّا سِحرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-qālū ʾ hādhā ʾillā siḥr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And say, "This is not but obvious magic

arabic_uthmani: أَإِذا مِتنا وَكُنّا تُرابًا وَعِظامًا أَإِنّا لَمَبعوثونَ
blank: ʾ-ʾidhā mitnā w-kunnā turāb w-ʿiẓām ʾ-ʾinnā l-mabʿūthūn
english_saheeh_international: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected

arabic_uthmani: أَوَآباؤُنَا الأَوَّلونَ
blank: ʾ-w-ʾābāʾunāl-ʾawwalūn
english_saheeh_international: And our forefathers as well

arabic_uthmani: قُل نَعَم وَأَنتُم داخِرونَ
blank: qul naʿam w-ʾantum dākhirūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Yes, and you will be rendered contemptible

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّما هِيَ زَجرَةٌ واحِدَةٌ فَإِذا هُم يَنظُرونَ
blank: f-ʾinnamā hiy zajrat wāḥidat f-ʾidhā hum yanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا يا وَيلَنا هٰذا يَومُ الدّينِ
blank: w-qālū yā-waylanā hādhā yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا يَومُ الفَصلِ الَّذي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبونَ
blank: hādhā yawmul-faṣlilladhī kuntum bihī tukadhdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: They will be told, "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny

arabic_uthmani: ۞ احشُرُوا الَّذينَ ظَلَموا وَأَزواجَهُم وَما كانوا يَعبُدونَ
blank: uḥshurūlladhīn ẓalamū w-ʾazwājahum w-mā kānū yaʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: The angels will be ordered, "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship

arabic_uthmani: مِن دونِ اللَّهِ فَاهدوهُم إِلىٰ صِراطِ الجَحيمِ
blank: m dūn llāh f-hdūhum ʾilā ṣirāṭil-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: وَقِفوهُم ۖ إِنَّهُم مَسئولونَ
blank: w-qifūhum ʾinnahum masʾūlūn
english_saheeh_international: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned

arabic_uthmani: ما لَكُم لا تَناصَرونَ
blank: mā lakum lā tanāṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: They will be asked, "What is wrong with you? Why do you not help each other

arabic_uthmani: بَل هُمُ اليَومَ مُستَسلِمونَ
blank: bal humul-yawm mustaslimūn
english_saheeh_international: But they, that Day, are in surrender

arabic_uthmani: وَأَقبَلَ بَعضُهُم عَلىٰ بَعضٍ يَتَساءَلونَ
blank: w-ʾaqbal baʿḍuhum ʿalā baʿḍ yatasāʾalūn
english_saheeh_international: And they will approach one another blaming each other

arabic_uthmani: قالوا إِنَّكُم كُنتُم تَأتونَنا عَنِ اليَمينِ
blank: qālū ʾinnakum kuntum taʾtūnanā ʿanil-yamīn
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right

arabic_uthmani: قالوا بَل لَم تَكونوا مُؤمِنينَ
blank: qālū bal lam takūnū muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you yourselves were not believers

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ لَنا عَلَيكُم مِن سُلطانٍ ۖ بَل كُنتُم قَومًا طاغينَ
blank: w-mā kān lanā ʿalaykum m sulṭān bal kuntum qawm ṭāghīn
english_saheeh_international: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people

arabic_uthmani: فَحَقَّ عَلَينا قَولُ رَبِّنا ۖ إِنّا لَذائِقونَ
blank: f-ḥaqq ʿalaynā qawl rabbinā ʾinnā l-dhāʾiqūn
english_saheeh_international: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste punishment

arabic_uthmani: فَأَغوَيناكُم إِنّا كُنّا غاوينَ
blank: f-ʾaghwaynākum ʾinnā kunnā ghāwīn
english_saheeh_international: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّهُم يَومَئِذٍ فِي العَذابِ مُشتَرِكونَ
blank: f-ʾinnahum yawmaʾidh fīl-ʿadhāb mushtarikūn
english_saheeh_international: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا كَذٰلِكَ نَفعَلُ بِالمُجرِمينَ
blank: ʾinnā k-dhālik nafʿal b-l-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُم كانوا إِذا قيلَ لَهُم لا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَستَكبِرونَ
blank: ʾinnahum kānū ʾidhā qīl lahum lā ʾilāh ʾillā llāh yastakbirūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ أَئِنّا لَتارِكو آلِهَتِنا لِشاعِرٍ مَجنونٍ
blank: w-yaqūlūn ʾ-ʾinnā l-tārikū ʾālihatinā l-shāʿir majnūn
english_saheeh_international: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet

arabic_uthmani: بَل جاءَ بِالحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ المُرسَلينَ
blank: bal jāʾ b-l-ḥaqq w-ṣaddaqal-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the previous messengers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّكُم لَذائِقُو العَذابِ الأَليمِ
blank: ʾinnakum l-dhāʾiqūl-ʿadhābil-ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, you disbelievers will be tasters of the painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَما تُجزَونَ إِلّا ما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-mā tujzawn ʾillā mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا عِبادَ اللَّهِ المُخلَصينَ
blank: ʾillā ʿibād llāhil-mukhlaṣīn
english_saheeh_international: But not the chosen servants of Allah

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ لَهُم رِزقٌ مَعلومٌ
blank: ʾulāʾik lahum rizq maʿlūm
english_saheeh_international: Those will have a provision determined

arabic_uthmani: فَواكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُكرَمونَ
blank: fawākih w-hum mukramūn
english_saheeh_international: Fruits; and they will be honored

arabic_uthmani: في جَنّاتِ النَّعيمِ
blank: fī jannāt n-naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: In gardens of pleasure

arabic_uthmani: عَلىٰ سُرُرٍ مُتَقابِلينَ
blank: ʿalā surur mutaqābilīn
english_saheeh_international: On thrones facing one another

arabic_uthmani: يُطافُ عَلَيهِم بِكَأسٍ مِن مَعينٍ
blank: yuṭāf ʿalayhim b-kaʾs m maʿīn
english_saheeh_international: There will be circulated among them a cup of wine from a flowing spring

arabic_uthmani: بَيضاءَ لَذَّةٍ لِلشّارِبينَ
blank: bayḍāʾ ladhdhat l-sh-shāribīn
english_saheeh_international: White and delicious to the drinkers

arabic_uthmani: لا فيها غَولٌ وَلا هُم عَنها يُنزَفونَ
blank: lā fīhā ghawl w-lā hum ʿanhā yunzafūn
english_saheeh_international: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated

arabic_uthmani: وَعِندَهُم قاصِراتُ الطَّرفِ عينٌ
blank: w-ʿindahum qāṣirāt ṭ-ṭarf ʿīn
english_saheeh_international: And with them will be women limiting their glances, with large, beautiful eyes

arabic_uthmani: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيضٌ مَكنونٌ
blank: k-ʾannahunn bayḍ maknūn
english_saheeh_international: As if they were delicate eggs, well-protected

arabic_uthmani: فَأَقبَلَ بَعضُهُم عَلىٰ بَعضٍ يَتَساءَلونَ
blank: f-ʾaqbal baʿḍuhum ʿalā baʿḍ yatasāʾalūn
english_saheeh_international: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other

arabic_uthmani: قالَ قائِلٌ مِنهُم إِنّي كانَ لي قَرينٌ
blank: qāl qāʾil minhum ʾinnī kān lī qarīn
english_saheeh_international: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion on earth

arabic_uthmani: يَقولُ أَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ المُصَدِّقينَ
blank: yaqūl ʾ-ʾinnak l-minal-muṣaddiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

arabic_uthmani: أَإِذا مِتنا وَكُنّا تُرابًا وَعِظامًا أَإِنّا لَمَدينونَ
blank: ʾ-ʾidhā mitnā w-kunnā turāb w-ʿiẓām ʾ-ʾinnā l-madīnūn
english_saheeh_international: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed

arabic_uthmani: قالَ هَل أَنتُم مُطَّلِعونَ
blank: qāl hal ʾantum muṭṭaliʿūn
english_saheeh_international: He will say, "Would you care to look

arabic_uthmani: فَاطَّلَعَ فَرَآهُ في سَواءِ الجَحيمِ
blank: f-ṭṭalaʿ f-raʾāh fī sawāʾil-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: قالَ تَاللَّهِ إِن كِدتَ لَتُردينِ
blank: qāl t-llāh ʾ kidt l-turdīn
english_saheeh_international: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me

arabic_uthmani: وَلَولا نِعمَةُ رَبّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ المُحضَرينَ
blank: w-law-lā niʿmat rabbī l-kunt minal-muḥḍarīn
english_saheeh_international: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in to Hell

arabic_uthmani: أَفَما نَحنُ بِمَيِّتينَ
blank: ʾ-f-mā naḥn b-mayyitīn
english_saheeh_international: Then, are we not to die

blank: ʾillā mawtatanāl-ʾūlā w-mā naḥn b-muʿadhdhabīn

english_saheeh_international: While Allah created you and that which you do

blank: w-nādaynāh ʾ yā-ʾibrāhīm

english_saheeh_international: Indeed, this was the clear trial

english_saheeh_international: And We left for him favorable mention among later generations

english_saheeh_international: Peace upon Abraham

english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good

blank: allāh rabbakum w-rabb ʾābāʾikumul-ʾawwalīn

english_saheeh_international: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought for punishment

blank: ʾillā ʿibād llāhil-mukhlaṣīn
english_saheeh_international: Except the chosen servants of Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَتَرَكنا عَلَيهِ فِي الآخِرينَ
blank: w-taraknā ʿalayh fīl-ʾākhirīn

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا كَذٰلِكَ نَجزِي المُحسِنينَ
blank: ʾinnā k-dhālik najzīl-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ مِن عِبادِنَا المُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinnahū m ʿibādināl-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لوطًا لَمِنَ المُرسَلينَ
blank: w-ʾinn lūṭ l-minal-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers

blank: ʾidh najjaynāh w-ʾahlahū ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: So mention when We saved him and his family, all

english_saheeh_international: And at night. Then will you not use reason

arabic_uthmani: فَساهَمَ فَكانَ مِنَ المُدحَضينَ
blank: f-sāham f-kān minal-mudḥaḍīn
english_saheeh_international: And he drew lots and was among the losers

arabic_uthmani: فَالتَقَمَهُ الحوتُ وَهُوَ مُليمٌ
blank: f-ltaqamahul-ḥūt w-huw mulīm
english_saheeh_international: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy

arabic_uthmani: فَلَولا أَنَّهُ كانَ مِنَ المُسَبِّحينَ
blank: f-law-lā ʾannahū kān minal-musabbiḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah

arabic_uthmani: لَلَبِثَ في بَطنِهِ إِلىٰ يَومِ يُبعَثونَ
blank: l-labith fī baṭnihī ʾilā yawm yubʿathūn
english_saheeh_international: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected

arabic_uthmani: ۞ فَنَبَذناهُ بِالعَراءِ وَهُوَ سَقيمٌ
blank: f-nabadhnāh b-l-ʿarāʾ w-huw saqīm
english_saheeh_international: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنبَتنا عَلَيهِ شَجَرَةً مِن يَقطينٍ
blank: w-ʾanbatnā ʿalayh shajaratam-m yaqṭīn
english_saheeh_international: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine

arabic_uthmani: وَأَرسَلناهُ إِلىٰ مِائَةِ أَلفٍ أَو يَزيدونَ
blank: w-ʾarsalnāh ʾilā miʾat ʾalf ʾaw yazīdūn
english_saheeh_international: And We sent him to his people of a hundred thousand or more

arabic_uthmani: فَآمَنوا فَمَتَّعناهُم إِلىٰ حينٍ
blank: f-ʾāmanū f-mattaʿnāhum ʾilā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment of life for a time

arabic_uthmani: فَاستَفتِهِم أَلِرَبِّكَ البَناتُ وَلَهُمُ البَنونَ
blank: f-staftihim ʾ-l-rabbikal-banāt w-lahumul-banūn
english_saheeh_international: So inquire of them, O Muhammad, "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons

arabic_uthmani: أَم خَلَقنَا المَلائِكَةَ إِناثًا وَهُم شاهِدونَ
blank: ʾam khalaqnāl-malāʾikat ʾināth w-hum shāhidūn
english_saheeh_international: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses

arabic_uthmani: أَلا إِنَّهُم مِن إِفكِهِم لَيَقولونَ
blank: ʾ-lā ʾinnahum m ʾifkihim l-yaqūlūn
english_saheeh_international: Unquestionably, it is out of their invented falsehood that they say

arabic_uthmani: وَلَدَ اللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُم لَكاذِبونَ
blank: walad llāh w-ʾinnahum l-kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars

arabic_uthmani: أَصطَفَى البَناتِ عَلَى البَنينَ
blank: ʾ-ṣṭafāl-banāt ʿalāl-banīn
english_saheeh_international: Has He chosen daughters over sons

arabic_uthmani: ما لَكُم كَيفَ تَحكُمونَ
blank: mā lakum kayf taḥkumūn
english_saheeh_international: What is wrong with you? How do you make judgement

arabic_uthmani: أَفَلا تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: ʾ-f-lā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Then will you not be reminded

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَكُم سُلطانٌ مُبينٌ
blank: ʾam lakum sulṭān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Or do you have a clear authority

arabic_uthmani: فَأتوا بِكِتابِكُم إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: f-ʾtū b-kitābikum ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلوا بَينَهُ وَبَينَ الجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَد عَلِمَتِ الجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُم لَمُحضَرونَ
blank: w-jaʿalū baynahū w-baynal-jinnat nasab w-l-qad ʿalimatil-jinnat ʾinnahum l-muḥḍarūn
english_saheeh_international: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they who made such claims will be brought to punishment

arabic_uthmani: سُبحانَ اللَّهِ عَمّا يَصِفونَ
blank: subḥān llāh ʿammā yaṣifūn
english_saheeh_international: Exalted is Allah above what they describe

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا عِبادَ اللَّهِ المُخلَصينَ
blank: ʾillā ʿibād llāhil-mukhlaṣīn
english_saheeh_international: Except the chosen servants of Allah who do not share in that sin

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّكُم وَما تَعبُدونَ
blank: f-ʾinnakum w-mā taʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: So indeed, you disbelievers and whatever you worship

arabic_uthmani: ما أَنتُم عَلَيهِ بِفاتِنينَ
blank: mā ʾantum ʿalayh b-fātinīn
english_saheeh_international: You cannot tempt anyone away from Him

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا مَن هُوَ صالِ الجَحيمِ
blank: ʾillā m huw ṣālil-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Except he who is to enter and burn in the Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: وَما مِنّا إِلّا لَهُ مَقامٌ مَعلومٌ
blank: w-mā minnā ʾillā lahū maqām maʿlūm
english_saheeh_international: The angels say, "There is not among us any except that he has a known position

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّا لَنَحنُ الصّافّونَ
blank: w-ʾinnā l-naḥn ṣ-ṣāffūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, we are those who line up for prayer

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّا لَنَحنُ المُسَبِّحونَ
blank: w-ʾinnā l-naḥnul-musabbiḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن كانوا لَيَقولونَ
blank: w-ʾ kānū l-yaqūlūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say

arabic_uthmani: لَو أَنَّ عِندَنا ذِكرًا مِنَ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: law ʾann ʿindanā dhikram-minal-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: If we had a message from those of the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: لَكُنّا عِبادَ اللَّهِ المُخلَصينَ
blank: l-kunnā ʿibād llāhil-mukhlaṣīn
english_saheeh_international: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَكَفَروا بِهِ ۖ فَسَوفَ يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-kafarū bihī f-sawf yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد سَبَقَت كَلِمَتُنا لِعِبادِنَا المُرسَلينَ
blank: w-l-qad sabaqat kalimatunā l-ʿibādināl-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُم لَهُمُ المَنصورونَ
blank: ʾinnahum l-humul-manṣūrūn
english_saheeh_international: That indeed, they would be those given victory

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ جُندَنا لَهُمُ الغالِبونَ
blank: w-ʾinn jundanā l-humul-ghālibūn
english_saheeh_international: And that indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome

arabic_uthmani: فَتَوَلَّ عَنهُم حَتّىٰ حينٍ
blank: f-tawall ʿanhum ḥattā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: So, O Muhammad, leave them for a time

arabic_uthmani: وَأَبصِرهُم فَسَوفَ يُبصِرونَ
blank: w-ʾabṣirhum f-sawf yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And see what will befall them, for they are going to see

arabic_uthmani: أَفَبِعَذابِنا يَستَعجِلونَ
blank: ʾ-f-b-ʿadhābinā yastaʿjilūn
english_saheeh_international: Then for Our punishment are they impatient

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا نَزَلَ بِساحَتِهِم فَساءَ صَباحُ المُنذَرينَ
blank: f-ʾidhā nazal b-sāḥatihim f-sāʾ ṣabāḥul-mundharīn
english_saheeh_international: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned

arabic_uthmani: وَتَوَلَّ عَنهُم حَتّىٰ حينٍ
blank: w-tawall ʿanhum ḥattā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And leave them for a time

arabic_uthmani: وَأَبصِر فَسَوفَ يُبصِرونَ
blank: w-ʾabṣir f-sawf yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And see, for they are going to see

arabic_uthmani: سُبحانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ العِزَّةِ عَمّا يَصِفونَ
blank: subḥān rabbik rabbil-ʿizzat ʿammā yaṣifūn
english_saheeh_international: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe

arabic_uthmani: وَسَلامٌ عَلَى المُرسَلينَ
blank: w-salām ʿalāl-mursalīn
english_saheeh_international: And peace upon the messengers

arabic_uthmani: وَالحَمدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: w-l-ḥamd l-llāh rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: ص ۚ وَالقُرآنِ ذِي الذِّكرِ
blank: ṣ (ṣād) w-l-qurʾān dhī dh-dhikr
english_saheeh_international: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder

arabic_uthmani: بَلِ الَّذينَ كَفَروا في عِزَّةٍ وَشِقاقٍ
blank: balilladhīn kafarū fī ʿizzat w-shiqāq
english_saheeh_international: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension

arabic_uthmani: كَم أَهلَكنا مِن قَبلِهِم مِن قَرنٍ فَنادَوا وَلاتَ حينَ مَناصٍ
blank: kam ʾahlaknā m qablihim m qarn f-nādaw w-lāt ḥīn manāṣ
english_saheeh_international: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they then called out; but it was not a time for escape

arabic_uthmani: وَعَجِبوا أَن جاءَهُم مُنذِرٌ مِنهُم ۖ وَقالَ الكافِرونَ هٰذا ساحِرٌ كَذّابٌ
blank: w-ʿajibū ʾ jāʾahum mundhir minhum w-qālal-kāfirūn hādhā sāḥir kadhdhāb
english_saheeh_international: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar

arabic_uthmani: أَجَعَلَ الآلِهَةَ إِلٰهًا واحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هٰذا لَشَيءٌ عُجابٌ
blank: ʾ-jaʿalal-ʾālihat ʾilāh wāḥid ʾinn hādhā l-shayʾ ʿujāb
english_saheeh_international: Has he made the gods only one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing

arabic_uthmani: وَانطَلَقَ المَلَأُ مِنهُم أَنِ امشوا وَاصبِروا عَلىٰ آلِهَتِكُم ۖ إِنَّ هٰذا لَشَيءٌ يُرادُ
blank: w-nṭalaqal-malaʾ minhum ʾan mshū w-ṣbirū ʿalā ʾālihatikum ʾinn hādhā l-shayʾ yurād
english_saheeh_international: And the eminent among them went forth, saying, "Continue, and be patient over the defense of your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended

arabic_uthmani: ما سَمِعنا بِهٰذا فِي المِلَّةِ الآخِرَةِ إِن هٰذا إِلَّا اختِلاقٌ
blank: mā samiʿnā b-hādhā fīl-millatil-ʾākhirat ʾ hādhā ʾillā khtilāq
english_saheeh_international: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication

arabic_uthmani: أَأُنزِلَ عَلَيهِ الذِّكرُ مِن بَينِنا ۚ بَل هُم في شَكٍّ مِن ذِكري ۖ بَل لَمّا يَذوقوا عَذابِ
blank: ʾ-ʾunzil ʿalayh dh-dhikr m bayninā bal hum fī shakk m dhikrī bal lammā yadhūqū ʿadhāb
english_saheeh_international: Has the message been revealed to him out of all of us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment

arabic_uthmani: أَم عِندَهُم خَزائِنُ رَحمَةِ رَبِّكَ العَزيزِ الوَهّابِ
blank: ʾam ʿindahum khazāʾin raḥmat rabbikal-ʿazīzil-wahhāb
english_saheeh_international: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَهُم مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَما بَينَهُما ۖ فَليَرتَقوا فِي الأَسبابِ
blank: ʾam lahum mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā f-l-yartaqū fīl-ʾasbāb
english_saheeh_international: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through any ways of access

arabic_uthmani: جُندٌ ما هُنالِكَ مَهزومٌ مِنَ الأَحزابِ
blank: jund mā hunālik mahzūm minal-ʾaḥzāb
english_saheeh_international: They are but soldiers who will be defeated there among the companies of disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَت قَبلَهُم قَومُ نوحٍ وَعادٌ وَفِرعَونُ ذُو الأَوتادِ
blank: kadhdhabat qablahum qawm nūḥ w-ʿād w-firʿawn dhūl-ʾawtād
english_saheeh_international: The people of Noah denied before them, and the tribe of 'Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes

arabic_uthmani: وَثَمودُ وَقَومُ لوطٍ وَأَصحابُ الأَيكَةِ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ الأَحزابُ
blank: w-thamūd w-qawm lūṭ w-ʾaṣḥābul-ʾaykat ʾulāʾikal-ʾaḥzāb
english_saheeh_international: And the tribe of Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies

arabic_uthmani: إِن كُلٌّ إِلّا كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقابِ
blank: ʾ kull ʾillā kadhdhab r-rusul f-ḥaqq ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَنظُرُ هٰؤُلاءِ إِلّا صَيحَةً واحِدَةً ما لَها مِن فَواقٍ
blank: w-mā yanẓur hāʾulāʾ ʾillā ṣayḥat wāḥidatam-mā lahā m fawāq
english_saheeh_international: And these disbelievers await not but one blast of the Horn; for it there will be no delay

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا رَبَّنا عَجِّل لَنا قِطَّنا قَبلَ يَومِ الحِسابِ
blank: w-qālū rabbanā ʿajjil lanā qiṭṭanā qabl yawmil-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share of the punishment before the Day of Account

arabic_uthmani: اصبِر عَلىٰ ما يَقولونَ وَاذكُر عَبدَنا داوودَ ذَا الأَيدِ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوّابٌ
blank: iṣbir ʿalā mā yaqūlūn w-dhkur ʿabdanā dāwūd dhāl-ʾayd ʾinnahū ʾawwāb
english_saheeh_international: Be patient over what they say and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; indeed, he was one who repeatedly turned back to Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا سَخَّرنَا الجِبالَ مَعَهُ يُسَبِّحنَ بِالعَشِيِّ وَالإِشراقِ
blank: ʾinnā sakhkharnāl-jibāl maʿahū yusabbiḥn b-l-ʿashiyy w-l-ʾishrāq
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We subjected the mountains to praise with him, exalting Allah in the late afternoon and after sunrise

arabic_uthmani: وَالطَّيرَ مَحشورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَهُ أَوّابٌ
blank: w-ṭ-ṭayr maḥshūrat kull lahū ʾawwāb
english_saheeh_international: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating praises

arabic_uthmani: وَشَدَدنا مُلكَهُ وَآتَيناهُ الحِكمَةَ وَفَصلَ الخِطابِ
blank: w-shaddadnā mulkahū w-ʾātaynāhul-ḥikmat w-faṣlal-khiṭāb
english_saheeh_international: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَهَل أَتاكَ نَبَأُ الخَصمِ إِذ تَسَوَّرُوا المِحرابَ
blank: w-hal ʾatāk nabaʾul-khaṣm ʾidh tasawwarūl-miḥrāb
english_saheeh_international: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of his prayer chamber

arabic_uthmani: إِذ دَخَلوا عَلىٰ داوودَ فَفَزِعَ مِنهُم ۖ قالوا لا تَخَف ۖ خَصمانِ بَغىٰ بَعضُنا عَلىٰ بَعضٍ فَاحكُم بَينَنا بِالحَقِّ وَلا تُشطِط وَاهدِنا إِلىٰ سَواءِ الصِّراطِ
blank: ʾidh dakhalū ʿalā dāwūd f-faziʿ minhum qālū lā takhaf khaṣmān baghā baʿḍunā ʿalā baʿḍ f-ḥkum baynanā b-l-ḥaqq w-lā tushṭiṭ w-hdinā ʾilā sawāʾ ṣ-ṣirāṭ
english_saheeh_international: When they entered upon David and he was alarmed by them? They said, "Fear not. We are two adversaries, one of whom has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth and do not exceed it and guide us to the sound path

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذا أَخي لَهُ تِسعٌ وَتِسعونَ نَعجَةً وَلِيَ نَعجَةٌ واحِدَةٌ فَقالَ أَكفِلنيها وَعَزَّني فِي الخِطابِ
blank: ʾinn hādhā ʾakhī lahū tisʿ w-tisʿūn naʿjat w-liy naʿjat wāḥidat f-qāl ʾakfilnīhā w-ʿazzanī fīl-khitāb
english_saheeh_international: Indeed this, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said, 'Entrust her to me,' and he overpowered me in speech

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لَقَد ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤالِ نَعجَتِكَ إِلىٰ نِعاجِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثيرًا مِنَ الخُلَطاءِ لَيَبغي بَعضُهُم عَلىٰ بَعضٍ إِلَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ وَقَليلٌ ما هُم ۗ وَظَنَّ داوودُ أَنَّما فَتَنّاهُ فَاستَغفَرَ رَبَّهُ وَخَرَّ راكِعًا وَأَنابَ ۩
blank: qāl l-qad ẓalamak b-suʾāl naʿjatik ʾilā niʿājihī w-ʾinn kathīram-minal-khulaṭāʾ l-yabghī baʿḍuhum ʿalā baʿḍ ʾillālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-qalīl mā hum w-ẓann dāwūd ʾannamā fatannāh f-staghfar rabbahū w-kharr rākiʿ w-ʾanāb
english_saheeh_international: David said, "He has certainly wronged you in demanding your ewe in addition to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing in prostration and turned in repentance to Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَغَفَرنا لَهُ ذٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنا لَزُلفىٰ وَحُسنَ مَآبٍ
blank: f-ghafarnā lahū dhālik w-ʾinn lahū ʿindanā l-zulfā w-ḥusn maʾāb
english_saheeh_international: So We forgave him that; and indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return

arabic_uthmani: يا داوودُ إِنّا جَعَلناكَ خَليفَةً فِي الأَرضِ فَاحكُم بَينَ النّاسِ بِالحَقِّ وَلا تَتَّبِعِ الهَوىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَضِلّونَ عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ لَهُم عَذابٌ شَديدٌ بِما نَسوا يَومَ الحِسابِ
blank: yā-dāwūd ʾinnā jaʿalnāk khalīfat fīl-ʾarḍ f-ḥkum bayn n-nās b-l-ḥaqq w-lā tattabiʿil-hawā f-yuḍillak ʿ sabīl llāh ʾinnalladhīn yaḍillūn ʿ sabīl llāh lahum ʿadhāb shadīd b-mā nasū yawmal-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: We said, "O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth, so judge between the people in truth and do not follow your own desire, as it will lead you astray from the way of Allah." Indeed, those who go astray from the way of Allah will have a severe punishment for having forgotten the Day of Account

arabic_uthmani: وَما خَلَقنَا السَّماءَ وَالأَرضَ وَما بَينَهُما باطِلًا ۚ ذٰلِكَ ظَنُّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا ۚ فَوَيلٌ لِلَّذينَ كَفَروا مِنَ النّارِ
blank: w-mā khalaqnā s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā bāṭil dhālik ẓannulladhīn kafarū f-wayl l-lladhīn kafarū min n-nār
english_saheeh_international: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve, so woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire

arabic_uthmani: أَم نَجعَلُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ كَالمُفسِدينَ فِي الأَرضِ أَم نَجعَلُ المُتَّقينَ كَالفُجّارِ
blank: ʾam najʿalulladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt k-l-mufsidīn fīl-ʾarḍ ʾam najʿalul-muttaqīn k-l-fujjār
english_saheeh_international: Or should we treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like corrupters in the land? Or should We treat those who fear Allah like the wicked

arabic_uthmani: كِتابٌ أَنزَلناهُ إِلَيكَ مُبارَكٌ لِيَدَّبَّروا آياتِهِ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُولُو الأَلبابِ
blank: kitāb ʾanzalnāh ʾilayk mubārak l-yaddabbarū ʾāyātihī w-l-yatadhakkar ʾulūl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: This is a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, O Muhammad, that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded

arabic_uthmani: وَوَهَبنا لِداوودَ سُلَيمانَ ۚ نِعمَ العَبدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوّابٌ
blank: w-wahabnā l-dāwūd sulaymān niʿmal-ʿabd ʾinnahū ʾawwāb
english_saheeh_international: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back to Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِذ عُرِضَ عَلَيهِ بِالعَشِيِّ الصّافِناتُ الجِيادُ
blank: ʾidh ʿuriḍ ʿalayh b-l-ʿashiyy ṣ-ṣāfinātul-jiyād
english_saheeh_international: Mention when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon the poised standing racehorses

arabic_uthmani: فَقالَ إِنّي أَحبَبتُ حُبَّ الخَيرِ عَن ذِكرِ رَبّي حَتّىٰ تَوارَت بِالحِجابِ
blank: f-qāl ʾinnī ʾaḥbabt ḥubbal-khayr ʿ dhikr rabbī ḥattā tawārat b-l-ḥijāb
english_saheeh_international: And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good things over the remembrance of my Lord until the sun disappeared into the curtain of darkness

arabic_uthmani: رُدّوها عَلَيَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسحًا بِالسّوقِ وَالأَعناقِ
blank: ruddūhā ʿalayy f-ṭafiq masḥ b-s-sūq w-l-ʾaʿnāq
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Return them to me," and set about striking their legs and necks

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد فَتَنّا سُلَيمانَ وَأَلقَينا عَلىٰ كُرسِيِّهِ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنابَ
blank: w-l-qad fatannā sulaymān w-ʾalqaynā ʿalā kursiyyihī jasad thumm ʾanāb
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly tried Solomon and placed on his throne a body; then he returned

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ اغفِر لي وَهَب لي مُلكًا لا يَنبَغي لِأَحَدٍ مِن بَعدي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الوَهّابُ
blank: qāl rabb ghfir lī w-hab lī mulk lā yanbaghī l-ʾaḥad m baʿdī ʾinnak ʾantal-wahhāb
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower

arabic_uthmani: فَسَخَّرنا لَهُ الرّيحَ تَجري بِأَمرِهِ رُخاءً حَيثُ أَصابَ
blank: f-sakhkharnā lah r-rīḥ tajrī b-ʾamrihī rukhāʾ ḥayth ʾaṣāb
english_saheeh_international: So We subjected to him the wind blowing by his command, gently, wherever he directed

arabic_uthmani: وَالشَّياطينَ كُلَّ بَنّاءٍ وَغَوّاصٍ
blank: w-sh-shayāṭīn kull bannāʾ w-ghawwāṣ
english_saheeh_international: And also the devils of jinn - every builder and diver

arabic_uthmani: وَآخَرينَ مُقَرَّنينَ فِي الأَصفادِ
blank: w-ʾākharīn muqarranīn fīl-ʾaṣfād
english_saheeh_international: And others bound together in shackles

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا عَطاؤُنا فَامنُن أَو أَمسِك بِغَيرِ حِسابٍ
blank: hādhā ʿaṭāʾunā f-mn ʾaw ʾamsik b-ghayr ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: We said, "This is Our gift, so grant or withhold without account

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنا لَزُلفىٰ وَحُسنَ مَآبٍ
blank: w-ʾinn lahū ʿindanā l-zulfā w-ḥusn maʾāb
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return

arabic_uthmani: وَاذكُر عَبدَنا أَيّوبَ إِذ نادىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنّي مَسَّنِيَ الشَّيطانُ بِنُصبٍ وَعَذابٍ
blank: w-dhkur ʿabdanā ʾayyūb ʾidh nādā rabbahū ʾannī massaniy sh-shayṭān b-nuṣb w-ʿadhāb-
english_saheeh_international: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment

arabic_uthmani: اركُض بِرِجلِكَ ۖ هٰذا مُغتَسَلٌ بارِدٌ وَشَرابٌ
blank: urkuḍ b-rijlik hādhā mughtasal bārid w-sharāb
english_saheeh_international: So he was told, "Strike the ground with your foot; this is a spring for a cool bath and drink

arabic_uthmani: وَوَهَبنا لَهُ أَهلَهُ وَمِثلَهُم مَعَهُم رَحمَةً مِنّا وَذِكرىٰ لِأُولِي الأَلبابِ
blank: w-wahabnā lahū ʾahlahū w-mithlahum maʿahum raḥmatam-minnā w-dhikrā l-ʾulīl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: And We granted him his family and a like number with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding

arabic_uthmani: وَخُذ بِيَدِكَ ضِغثًا فَاضرِب بِهِ وَلا تَحنَث ۗ إِنّا وَجَدناهُ صابِرًا ۚ نِعمَ العَبدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوّابٌ
blank: w-khudh b-yadik ḍighth f-ḍrib bihī w-lā taḥnath ʾinnā wajadnāh ṣābir niʿmal-ʿabd ʾinnahū ʾawwāb
english_saheeh_international: We said, "And take in your hand a bunch of grass and strike with it and do not break your oath." Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back to Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَاذكُر عِبادَنا إِبراهيمَ وَإِسحاقَ وَيَعقوبَ أُولِي الأَيدي وَالأَبصارِ
blank: w-dhkur ʿibādanā ʾibrāhīm w-ʾisḥāq w-yaʿqūb ʾulīl-ʾaydī w-l-ʾabṣār
english_saheeh_international: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and religious vision

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَخلَصناهُم بِخالِصَةٍ ذِكرَى الدّارِ
blank: ʾinnā ʾakhlaṣnāhum b-khāliṣat dhikrā d-dār
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home of the Hereafter

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُم عِندَنا لَمِنَ المُصطَفَينَ الأَخيارِ
blank: w-ʾinnahum ʿindanā l-minal-muṣṭafaynal-ʾakhyār
english_saheeh_international: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding

arabic_uthmani: وَاذكُر إِسماعيلَ وَاليَسَعَ وَذَا الكِفلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِنَ الأَخيارِ
blank: w-dhkur ʾismāʿīl w-l-yasaʿ w-dhāl-kifl w-kull minal-ʾakhyār
english_saheeh_international: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا ذِكرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلمُتَّقينَ لَحُسنَ مَآبٍ
blank: hādhā dhikr w-ʾinn l-l-muttaqīn l-ḥusn maʾāb
english_saheeh_international: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return

arabic_uthmani: جَنّاتِ عَدنٍ مُفَتَّحَةً لَهُمُ الأَبوابُ
blank: jannāt ʿadn mufattaḥat lahumul-ʾabwāb
english_saheeh_international: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them

arabic_uthmani: مُتَّكِئينَ فيها يَدعونَ فيها بِفاكِهَةٍ كَثيرَةٍ وَشَرابٍ
blank: muttakiʾīn fīhā yadʿūn fīhā b-fākihat kathīrat w-sharāb
english_saheeh_international: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَعِندَهُم قاصِراتُ الطَّرفِ أَترابٌ
blank: w-ʿindahum qāṣirāt ṭ-ṭarf ʾatrāb
english_saheeh_international: And with them will be women limiting their glances and of equal age

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا ما توعَدونَ لِيَومِ الحِسابِ
blank: hādhā mā tūʿadūn l-yawmil-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: This is what you, the righteous, are promised for the Day of Account

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذا لَرِزقُنا ما لَهُ مِن نَفادٍ
blank: ʾinn hādhā l-rizqunā mā lahū m nafād
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطّاغينَ لَشَرَّ مَآبٍ
blank: hādhā w-ʾinn l-ṭ-ṭāghīn l-sharr maʾāb
english_saheeh_international: This is so. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return

arabic_uthmani: جَهَنَّمَ يَصلَونَها فَبِئسَ المِهادُ
blank: jahannam yaṣlawnahā f-biʾsal-mihād
english_saheeh_international: Hell, which they will enter to burn, and wretched is the resting place

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا فَليَذوقوهُ حَميمٌ وَغَسّاقٌ
blank: hādhā f-l-yadhūqūh ḥamīm w-ghassāq
english_saheeh_international: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and foul purulence

arabic_uthmani: وَآخَرُ مِن شَكلِهِ أَزواجٌ
blank: w-ʾākhar m shaklihī ʾazwāj
english_saheeh_international: And other punishments of its type in various kinds

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا فَوجٌ مُقتَحِمٌ مَعَكُم ۖ لا مَرحَبًا بِهِم ۚ إِنَّهُم صالُو النّارِ
blank: hādhā fawj muqtaḥim maʿakum lā marḥab bihim ʾinnahum ṣālū n-nār
english_saheeh_international: Its inhabitants will say, "This is a company bursting in with you. No welcome for them. Indeed, they will burn in the Fire

arabic_uthmani: قالوا بَل أَنتُم لا مَرحَبًا بِكُم ۖ أَنتُم قَدَّمتُموهُ لَنا ۖ فَبِئسَ القَرارُ
blank: qālū bal ʾantum lā marḥab bikum ʾantum qaddamtumūh lanā f-biʾsal-qarār
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, our leaders, brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement

arabic_uthmani: قالوا رَبَّنا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنا هٰذا فَزِدهُ عَذابًا ضِعفًا فِي النّارِ
blank: qālū rabbanā m qaddam lanā hādhā f-zidh ʿadhāb ḍiʿf fī n-nār
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا ما لَنا لا نَرىٰ رِجالًا كُنّا نَعُدُّهُم مِنَ الأَشرارِ
blank: w-qālū mā lanā lā narā rijāl kunnā naʿudduhum minal-ʾashrār
english_saheeh_international: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst

arabic_uthmani: أَتَّخَذناهُم سِخرِيًّا أَم زاغَت عَنهُمُ الأَبصارُ
blank: ʾ-ttakhadhnāhum sikhriyy ʾam zāghat ʿanhumul-ʾabṣār
english_saheeh_international: Is it because we took them in ridicule, or has our vision turned away from them

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ ذٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخاصُمُ أَهلِ النّارِ
blank: ʾinn dhālik l-ḥaqq takhāṣum ʾahl n-nār
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّما أَنا مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَما مِن إِلٰهٍ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الواحِدُ القَهّارُ
blank: qul ʾinnamā ʾan mundhir w-mā m ʾilāh ʾillā llāhul-wāḥidul-qahhār
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah, the One, the Prevailing

arabic_uthmani: رَبُّ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَما بَينَهُمَا العَزيزُ الغَفّارُ
blank: rabb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumāl-ʿazīzul-ghaffār
english_saheeh_international: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver

arabic_uthmani: قُل هُوَ نَبَأٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: qul huw nabaʾ ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, "It is great news

arabic_uthmani: أَنتُم عَنهُ مُعرِضونَ
blank: ʾantum ʿanh muʿriḍūn
english_saheeh_international: From which you turn away

arabic_uthmani: ما كانَ لِيَ مِن عِلمٍ بِالمَلَإِ الأَعلىٰ إِذ يَختَصِمونَ
blank: mā kān liy m ʿilm b-l-malaʾil-ʾaʿlā ʾidh yakhtaṣimūn
english_saheeh_international: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly of angels when they were disputing the creation of Adam

arabic_uthmani: إِن يوحىٰ إِلَيَّ إِلّا أَنَّما أَنا نَذيرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: ʾ yūḥā ʾilayy ʾillā ʾannamā ʾan nadhīr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner

arabic_uthmani: إِذ قالَ رَبُّكَ لِلمَلائِكَةِ إِنّي خالِقٌ بَشَرًا مِن طينٍ
blank: ʾidh qāl rabbuk l-l-malāʾikat ʾinnī khāliq basharam-m ṭīn
english_saheeh_international: So mention when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا سَوَّيتُهُ وَنَفَختُ فيهِ مِن روحي فَقَعوا لَهُ ساجِدينَ
blank: f-ʾidhā sawwaytuhū w-nafakht fīh m rūḥī f-qaʿū lahū sājidīn
english_saheeh_international: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My created soul, then fall down to him in prostration

arabic_uthmani: فَسَجَدَ المَلائِكَةُ كُلُّهُم أَجمَعونَ
blank: f-sajadal-malāʾikat kulluhum ʾajmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا إِبليسَ استَكبَرَ وَكانَ مِنَ الكافِرينَ
blank: ʾillā ʾiblīs stakbar w-kān minal-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا إِبليسُ ما مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسجُدَ لِما خَلَقتُ بِيَدَيَّ ۖ أَستَكبَرتَ أَم كُنتَ مِنَ العالينَ
blank: qāl yā-ʾiblīs mā manaʿak ʾ tasjud l-mā khalaqt b-yadayy ʾ-stakbart ʾam kunt minal-ʿālīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant then, or were you already among the haughty

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَنا خَيرٌ مِنهُ ۖ خَلَقتَني مِن نارٍ وَخَلَقتَهُ مِن طينٍ
blank: qāl ʾan khayr minh khalaqtanī m nār w-khalaqtahū m ṭīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَاخرُج مِنها فَإِنَّكَ رَجيمٌ
blank: qāl f-khruj minhā f-ʾinnak rajīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Then get out of Paradise, for indeed, you are expelled

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ عَلَيكَ لَعنَتي إِلىٰ يَومِ الدّينِ
blank: w-ʾinn ʿalayk laʿnatī ʾilā yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرني إِلىٰ يَومِ يُبعَثونَ
blank: qāl rabb f-ʾanẓirnī ʾilā yawm yubʿathūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ المُنظَرينَ
blank: qāl f-ʾinnak minal-munẓarīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

arabic_uthmani: إِلىٰ يَومِ الوَقتِ المَعلومِ
blank: ʾilā yawmil-waqtil-maʿlūm
english_saheeh_international: Until the Day of the time well-known

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغوِيَنَّهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: qāl f-b-ʿizzatik l-ʾughwiyannahum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Iblees said, "By your might, I will surely mislead them all

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا عِبادَكَ مِنهُمُ المُخلَصينَ
blank: ʾillā ʿibādak minhumul-mukhlaṣīn
english_saheeh_international: Except, among them, Your chosen servants

arabic_uthmani: قالَ فَالحَقُّ وَالحَقَّ أَقولُ
blank: qāl f-l-ḥaqq w-l-ḥaqq ʾaqūl
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "The truth is My oath, and the truth I say

arabic_uthmani: لَأَملَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: l-ʾamlaʾann jahannam mink w-mimm tabiʿak minhum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: That I will surely fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you all together

arabic_uthmani: قُل ما أَسأَلُكُم عَلَيهِ مِن أَجرٍ وَما أَنا مِنَ المُتَكَلِّفينَ
blank: qul mā ʾasʾalukum ʿalayh m ʾajr w-mā ʾan minal-mutakallifīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "I do not ask you for the Qur'an any payment, and I am not of the pretentious

arabic_uthmani: إِن هُوَ إِلّا ذِكرٌ لِلعالَمينَ
blank: ʾ huw ʾillā dhikr l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: It is but a reminder to the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَلَتَعلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُ بَعدَ حينٍ
blank: w-l-taʿlamunn nabaʾahū baʿd ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And you will surely know the truth of its information after a time

arabic_uthmani: تَنزيلُ الكِتابِ مِنَ اللَّهِ العَزيزِ الحَكيمِ
blank: tanzīlul-kitāb min llāhil-ʿazīzil-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: The revelation of the Qur'an is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَنزَلنا إِلَيكَ الكِتابَ بِالحَقِّ فَاعبُدِ اللَّهَ مُخلِصًا لَهُ الدّينَ
blank: ʾinnā ʾanzalnā ʾilaykal-kitāb b-l-ḥaqq f-ʿbud llāh mukhliṣ lah d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have sent down to you the Book, O Muhammad, in truth. So worship Allah, being sincere to Him in religion

arabic_uthmani: أَلا لِلَّهِ الدّينُ الخالِصُ ۚ وَالَّذينَ اتَّخَذوا مِن دونِهِ أَولِياءَ ما نَعبُدُهُم إِلّا لِيُقَرِّبونا إِلَى اللَّهِ زُلفىٰ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَحكُمُ بَينَهُم في ما هُم فيهِ يَختَلِفونَ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهدي مَن هُوَ كاذِبٌ كَفّارٌ
blank: ʾ-lā l-llāh d-dīnul-khāliṣ w-lladhīn ttakhadhū m dūnihī ʾawliyāʾ mā naʿbuduhum ʾillā l-yuqarribūnā ʾilā llāh zulfā ʾinn llāh yaḥkum baynahum fī mā hum fīh yakhtalifūn ʾinn llāh lā yahdī m huw kādhib kaffār
english_saheeh_international: Unquestionably, for Allah is the pure religion. And those who take protectors besides Him say, "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to Allah in position." Indeed, Allah will judge between them concerning that over which they differ. Indeed, Allah does not guide he who is a liar and confirmed disbeliever

arabic_uthmani: لَو أَرادَ اللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَاصطَفىٰ مِمّا يَخلُقُ ما يَشاءُ ۚ سُبحانَهُ ۖ هُوَ اللَّهُ الواحِدُ القَهّارُ
blank: law ʾarād llāh ʾ yattakhidh walad l-ṣṭafā mimmā yakhluq mā yashāʾ subḥānahū huw llāhul-wāḥidul-qahhār
english_saheeh_international: If Allah had intended to take a son, He could have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed. Exalted is He; He is Allah, the One, the Prevailing

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ بِالحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ اللَّيلَ عَلَى النَّهارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ النَّهارَ عَلَى اللَّيلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمسَ وَالقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجري لِأَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۗ أَلا هُوَ العَزيزُ الغَفّارُ
blank: khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ b-l-ḥaqq yukawwirul-layl ʿalā n-nahār w-yukawwir n-nahār ʿalāl-layl w-sakhkhar sh-shams w-l-qamar kull yajrī l-ʾajal musamm ʾ-lā huwal-ʿazīzul-ghaffār
english_saheeh_international: He created the heavens and earth in truth. He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running its course for a specified term. Unquestionably, He is the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَكُم مِن نَفسٍ واحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنها زَوجَها وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِنَ الأَنعامِ ثَمانِيَةَ أَزواجٍ ۚ يَخلُقُكُم في بُطونِ أُمَّهاتِكُم خَلقًا مِن بَعدِ خَلقٍ في ظُلُماتٍ ثَلاثٍ ۚ ذٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُم لَهُ المُلكُ ۖ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنّىٰ تُصرَفونَ
blank: khalaqakum m nafs wāḥidat thumm jaʿal minhā zawjahā w-ʾanzal lakum minal-ʾanʿām thamāniyat ʾazwāj yakhluqukum fī buṭūn ʾummahātikum khalqam-m baʿd khalq fī ẓulumāt thalāth dhālikum llāh rabbukum lahul-mulk lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw f-ʾannā tuṣrafūn
english_saheeh_international: He created you from one soul. Then He made from it its mate, and He produced for you from the grazing livestock eight mates. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, within three darknesses. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs dominion. There is no deity except Him, so how are you averted

arabic_uthmani: إِن تَكفُروا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنكُم ۖ وَلا يَرضىٰ لِعِبادِهِ الكُفرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشكُروا يَرضَهُ لَكُم ۗ وَلا تَزِرُ وازِرَةٌ وِزرَ أُخرىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلىٰ رَبِّكُم مَرجِعُكُم فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: ʾ takfurū f-ʾinn llāh ghaniyy ʿankum w-lā yarḍā l-ʿibādihil-kufr w-ʾ tashkurū yarḍah lakum w-lā tazir wāzirat wizr ʾukhrā thumm ʾilā rabbikum marjiʿukum f-yunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn ʾinnahū ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: If you disbelieve - indeed, Allah is Free from need of you. And He does not approve for His servants disbelief. And if you are grateful, He approves it for you; and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you about what you used to do. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِذا مَسَّ الإِنسانَ ضُرٌّ دَعا رَبَّهُ مُنيبًا إِلَيهِ ثُمَّ إِذا خَوَّلَهُ نِعمَةً مِنهُ نَسِيَ ما كانَ يَدعو إِلَيهِ مِن قَبلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندادًا لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبيلِهِ ۚ قُل تَمَتَّع بِكُفرِكَ قَليلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِن أَصحابِ النّارِ
blank: w-ʾidhā massal-ʾinsān ḍurr daʿā rabbahū munīb ʾilayh thumm ʾidhā khawwalahū niʿmatam-minh nasiy mā kān yadʿū ʾilayh m qabl w-jaʿal l-llāh ʾandād l-yuḍill ʿ sabīlihī qul tamattaʿ b-kufrik qalīl ʾinnak m ʾaṣḥāb n-nār
english_saheeh_international: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him alone; then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself, he forgets Him whom he called upon before, and he attributes to Allah equals to mislead people from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little; indeed, you are of the companions of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: أَمَّن هُوَ قانِتٌ آناءَ اللَّيلِ ساجِدًا وَقائِمًا يَحذَرُ الآخِرَةَ وَيَرجو رَحمَةَ رَبِّهِ ۗ قُل هَل يَستَوِي الَّذينَ يَعلَمونَ وَالَّذينَ لا يَعلَمونَ ۗ إِنَّما يَتَذَكَّرُ أُولُو الأَلبابِ
blank: ʾam-m huw qānit ʾānāʾal-layl sājid w-qāʾim yaḥdharul-ʾākhirat w-yarjū raḥmat rabbihī qul hal yastawīlladhīn yaʿlamūn w-lladhīn lā yaʿlamūn ʾinnamā yatadhakkar ʾulūl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: Is one who is devoutly obedient during periods of the night, prostrating and standing in prayer, fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, like one who does not? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only they will remember who are people of understanding

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا عِبادِ الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقوا رَبَّكُم ۚ لِلَّذينَ أَحسَنوا في هٰذِهِ الدُّنيا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرضُ اللَّهِ واسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّما يُوَفَّى الصّابِرونَ أَجرَهُم بِغَيرِ حِسابٍ
blank: qul yā-ʿibādilladhīn ʾāmanū ttaqū rabbakum l-lladhīn ʾaḥsanū fī hādhih d-dunyā ḥasanat w-ʾarḍ llāh wāsiʿat ʾinnamā yuwaffā ṣ-ṣābirūn ʾajrahum b-ghayr ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good, and the earth of Allah is spacious. Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنّي أُمِرتُ أَن أَعبُدَ اللَّهَ مُخلِصًا لَهُ الدّينَ
blank: qul ʾinnī ʾumirt ʾ ʾaʿbud llāh mukhliṣ lah d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah, being sincere to Him in religion

arabic_uthmani: وَأُمِرتُ لِأَن أَكونَ أَوَّلَ المُسلِمينَ
blank: w-ʾumirt l-ʾ ʾakūn ʾawwalal-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And I have been commanded to be the first among you of the Muslims

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنّي أَخافُ إِن عَصَيتُ رَبّي عَذابَ يَومٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: qul ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʾ ʿaṣayt rabbī ʿadhāb yawm ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ اللَّهَ أَعبُدُ مُخلِصًا لَهُ ديني
blank: qul llāh ʾaʿbud mukhliṣ lahū dīnī
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Allah alone do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion

arabic_uthmani: فَاعبُدوا ما شِئتُم مِن دونِهِ ۗ قُل إِنَّ الخاسِرينَ الَّذينَ خَسِروا أَنفُسَهُم وَأَهليهِم يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۗ أَلا ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الخُسرانُ المُبينُ
blank: f-ʿbudū mā shiʾtum m dūnihī qul ʾinnal-khāsirīnalladhīn khasirū ʾanfusahum w-ʾahlīhim yawmal-qiyāmat ʾ-lā dhālik huwal-khusrānul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss

arabic_uthmani: لَهُم مِن فَوقِهِم ظُلَلٌ مِنَ النّارِ وَمِن تَحتِهِم ظُلَلٌ ۚ ذٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ اللَّهُ بِهِ عِبادَهُ ۚ يا عِبادِ فَاتَّقونِ
blank: lahum m fawqihim ẓulal min n-nār w-m taḥtihim ẓulal dhālik yukhawwif llāh bihī ʿibādahū yā-ʿibād f-ttaqūn
english_saheeh_international: They will have canopies of fire above them and below them, canopies. By that Allah threatens His servants. O My servants, then fear Me

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ اجتَنَبُوا الطّاغوتَ أَن يَعبُدوها وَأَنابوا إِلَى اللَّهِ لَهُمُ البُشرىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّر عِبادِ
blank: w-lladhīn jtanabū ṭ-ṭāghūt ʾ yaʿbudūhā w-ʾanābū ʾilā llāh lahumul-bushrā f-bashshir ʿibād
english_saheeh_international: But those who have avoided Taghut, lest they worship it, and turned back to Allah - for them are good tidings. So give good tidings to My servants

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَستَمِعونَ القَولَ فَيَتَّبِعونَ أَحسَنَهُ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ هَداهُمُ اللَّهُ ۖ وَأُولٰئِكَ هُم أُولُو الأَلبابِ
blank: alladhīn yastamiʿūnal-qawl f-yattabiʿūn ʾaḥsanahū ʾulāʾikalladhīn hadāhum llāh w-ʾulāʾik hum ʾulūl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: Who listen to speech and follow the best of it. Those are the ones Allah has guided, and those are people of understanding

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن حَقَّ عَلَيهِ كَلِمَةُ العَذابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِي النّارِ
blank: ʾ-f-m ḥaqq ʿalayh kalimatul-ʿadhāb ʾ-f ʾant tunqidh m fī n-nār
english_saheeh_international: Then, is one who has deserved the decree of punishment to be guided? Then, can you save one who is in the Fire

arabic_uthmani: لٰكِنِ الَّذينَ اتَّقَوا رَبَّهُم لَهُم غُرَفٌ مِن فَوقِها غُرَفٌ مَبنِيَّةٌ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ ۖ وَعدَ اللَّهِ ۖ لا يُخلِفُ اللَّهُ الميعادَ
blank: lākinilladhīn ttaqaw rabbahum lahum ghuraf m fawqihā ghuraf mabniyyat tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār waʿd llāh lā yukhlif llāhul-mīʿād
english_saheeh_international: But those who have feared their Lord - for them are chambers, above them chambers built high, beneath which rivers flow. This is the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in His promise

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً فَسَلَكَهُ يَنابيعَ فِي الأَرضِ ثُمَّ يُخرِجُ بِهِ زَرعًا مُختَلِفًا أَلوانُهُ ثُمَّ يَهيجُ فَتَراهُ مُصفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَجعَلُهُ حُطامًا ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَذِكرىٰ لِأُولِي الأَلبابِ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾann llāh ʾanzal min s-samāʾ māʾ f-salakahū yanābīʿ fīl-ʾarḍ thumm yukhrij bihī zarʿam-mukhtalif ʾalwānuhū thumm yahīj f-tarāh muṣfarr thumm yajʿaluhū ḥuṭām ʾinn fī dhālik l-dhikrā l-ʾulīl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky and makes it flow as springs and rivers in the earth; then He produces thereby crops of varying colors; then they dry and you see them turned yellow; then He makes them scattered debris. Indeed in that is a reminder for those of understanding

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ اللَّهُ صَدرَهُ لِلإِسلامِ فَهُوَ عَلىٰ نورٍ مِن رَبِّهِ ۚ فَوَيلٌ لِلقاسِيَةِ قُلوبُهُم مِن ذِكرِ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: ʾ-f-m sharaḥ llāh ṣadrahū l-l-ʾislām f-huw ʿalā nūr m rabbihī f-wayl l-l-qāsiyat qulūbuhum m dhikr llāh ʾulāʾik fī ḍalāl mubīn-
english_saheeh_international: So is one whose breast Allah has expanded to accept Islam and he is upon a light from his Lord like one whose heart rejects it? Then woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of Allah. Those are in manifest error

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحسَنَ الحَديثِ كِتابًا مُتَشابِهًا مَثانِيَ تَقشَعِرُّ مِنهُ جُلودُ الَّذينَ يَخشَونَ رَبَّهُم ثُمَّ تَلينُ جُلودُهُم وَقُلوبُهُم إِلىٰ ذِكرِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُدَى اللَّهِ يَهدي بِهِ مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضلِلِ اللَّهُ فَما لَهُ مِن هادٍ
blank: allāh nazzal ʾaḥsanal-ḥadīth kitābam-mutashābiham-mathāniy taqshaʿirr minh julūdulladhīn yakhshawn rabbahum thumm talīn julūduhum w-qulūbuhum ʾilā dhikr llāh dhālik hudā llāh yahdī bihī m yashāʾ w-m yuḍlil llāh f-mā lahū m hād
english_saheeh_international: Allah has sent down the best statement: a consistent Book wherein is reiteration. The skins shiver therefrom of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts relax at the remembrance of Allah. That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whom He wills. And one whom Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن يَتَّقي بِوَجهِهِ سوءَ العَذابِ يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۚ وَقيلَ لِلظّالِمينَ ذوقوا ما كُنتُم تَكسِبونَ
blank: ʾ-f-m yattaqī b-wajhihī sūʾal-ʿadhāb yawmal-qiyāmat w-qīl l-ẓ-ẓālimīn dhūqū mā kuntum taksibūn
english_saheeh_international: Then is he who will shield with his face the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection like one secure from it? And it will be said to the wrongdoers, "Taste what you used to earn

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم فَأَتاهُمُ العَذابُ مِن حَيثُ لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: kadhdhaballadhīn m qablihim f-ʾatāhumul-ʿadhāb m ḥayth lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: Those before them denied, and punishment came upon them from where they did not perceive

arabic_uthmani: فَأَذاقَهُمُ اللَّهُ الخِزيَ فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ۖ وَلَعَذابُ الآخِرَةِ أَكبَرُ ۚ لَو كانوا يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-ʾadhāqahum llāhul-khizy fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-l-ʿadhābul-ʾākhirat ʾakbar law kānū yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So Allah made them taste disgrace in worldly life. But the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد ضَرَبنا لِلنّاسِ في هٰذَا القُرآنِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-l-qad ḍarabnā l-n-nās fī hādhāl-qurʾān m kull mathal laʿallahum yatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every kind of example - that they might remember

arabic_uthmani: قُرآنًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيرَ ذي عِوَجٍ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَّقونَ
blank: qurʾān ʿarabiyy ghayr dhī ʿiwaj laʿallahum yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: It is an Arabic Qur'an, without any deviance that they might become righteous

arabic_uthmani: ضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا رَجُلًا فيهِ شُرَكاءُ مُتَشاكِسونَ وَرَجُلًا سَلَمًا لِرَجُلٍ هَل يَستَوِيانِ مَثَلًا ۚ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَل أَكثَرُهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: ḍarab llāh mathal rajul fīh shurakāʾ mutashākisūn w-rajul salam l-rajul hal yastawiyān mathal-il-ḥamd l-llāh bal ʾaktharuhum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah presents an example: a slave owned by quarreling partners and another belonging exclusively to one man - are they equal in comparison? Praise be to Allah! But most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌ وَإِنَّهُم مَيِّتونَ
blank: ʾinnak mayyit w-ʾinnahum mayyitūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, you are to die, and indeed, they are to die

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُم تَختَصِمونَ
blank: thumm ʾinnakum yawmal-qiyāmat ʿind rabbikum takhtaṣimūn
english_saheeh_international: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord, will dispute

arabic_uthmani: ۞ فَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِالصِّدقِ إِذ جاءَهُ ۚ أَلَيسَ في جَهَنَّمَ مَثوًى لِلكافِرينَ
blank: f-m ʾaẓlam mimm kadhab ʿalā llāh w-kadhdhab b-ṣ-ṣidq ʾidh jāʾahū ʾ-lays fī jahannam mathw l-l-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: So who is more unjust than one who lies about Allah and denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a residence for the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذي جاءَ بِالصِّدقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِ ۙ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُتَّقونَ
blank: w-lladhī jāʾ b-ṣ-ṣidq w-ṣaddaq bihī ʾulāʾik humul-muttaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And the one who has brought the truth and they who believed in it - those are the righteous

arabic_uthmani: لَهُم ما يَشاءونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِم ۚ ذٰلِكَ جَزاءُ المُحسِنينَ
blank: lahum mā yashāʾūn ʿind rabbihim dhālik jazāʾul-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: لِيُكَفِّرَ اللَّهُ عَنهُم أَسوَأَ الَّذي عَمِلوا وَيَجزِيَهُم أَجرَهُم بِأَحسَنِ الَّذي كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: l-yukaffir llāh ʿanhum ʾaswaʾalladhī ʿamilū w-yajziyahum ʾajrahum b-ʾaḥsanilladhī kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: That Allah may remove from them the worst of what they did and reward them their due for the best of what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: أَلَيسَ اللَّهُ بِكافٍ عَبدَهُ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفونَكَ بِالَّذينَ مِن دونِهِ ۚ وَمَن يُضلِلِ اللَّهُ فَما لَهُ مِن هادٍ
blank: ʾ-lays llāh b-kāf ʿabdahū w-yukhawwifūnak b-lladhīn m dūnihī w-m yuḍlil llāh f-mā lahū m hād
english_saheeh_international: Is not Allah sufficient for His Servant Prophet Muhammad? And yet, they threaten you with those they worship other than Him. And whoever Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن يَهدِ اللَّهُ فَما لَهُ مِن مُضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيسَ اللَّهُ بِعَزيزٍ ذِي انتِقامٍ
blank: w-m yahd llāh f-mā lahū m muḍill ʾ-lays llāh b-ʿazīz dhī ntiqām
english_saheeh_international: And whoever Allah guides - for him there is no misleader. Is not Allah Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن سَأَلتَهُم مَن خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ لَيَقولُنَّ اللَّهُ ۚ قُل أَفَرَأَيتُم ما تَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ إِن أَرادَنِيَ اللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَل هُنَّ كاشِفاتُ ضُرِّهِ أَو أَرادَني بِرَحمَةٍ هَل هُنَّ مُمسِكاتُ رَحمَتِهِ ۚ قُل حَسبِيَ اللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ المُتَوَكِّلونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ saʾaltahum m khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ l-yaqūlunn llāh qul ʾ-f-raʾaytum mā tadʿūn m dūn llāh ʾ ʾarādaniy llāh b-ḍurr hal hunn kāshifāt ḍurrihī ʾaw ʾarādanī b-raḥmat hal hunn mumsikāt raḥmatihī qul ḥasbiy llāh ʿalayh yatawakkalul-mutawakkilūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "Then have you considered what you invoke besides Allah? If Allah intended me harm, are they removers of His harm; or if He intended me mercy, are they withholders of His mercy?" Say, "Sufficient for me is Allah; upon Him alone rely the wise reliers

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا قَومِ اعمَلوا عَلىٰ مَكانَتِكُم إِنّي عامِلٌ ۖ فَسَوفَ تَعلَمونَ
blank: qul yā-qawm ʿmalū ʿalā makānatikum ʾinnī ʿāmil f-sawf taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O my people, work according to your position, for indeed, I am working; and you are going to know

arabic_uthmani: مَن يَأتيهِ عَذابٌ يُخزيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيهِ عَذابٌ مُقيمٌ
blank: m yaʾtīh ʿadhāb yukhzīh w-yaḥill ʿalayh ʿadhāb muqīm
english_saheeh_international: To whom will come a torment disgracing him and on whom will descend an enduring punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَنزَلنا عَلَيكَ الكِتابَ لِلنّاسِ بِالحَقِّ ۖ فَمَنِ اهتَدىٰ فَلِنَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّما يَضِلُّ عَلَيها ۖ وَما أَنتَ عَلَيهِم بِوَكيلٍ
blank: ʾinnā ʾanzalnā ʿalaykal-kitāb l-n-nās b-l-ḥaqq f-man htadā f-l-nafsihī w-m ḍall f-ʾinnamā yaḍill ʿalayhā w-mā ʾant ʿalayhim b-wakīl-
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We sent down to you the Book for the people in truth. So whoever is guided - it is for the benefit of his soul; and whoever goes astray only goes astray to its detriment. And you are not a manager over them

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى الأَنفُسَ حينَ مَوتِها وَالَّتي لَم تَمُت في مَنامِها ۖ فَيُمسِكُ الَّتي قَضىٰ عَلَيهَا المَوتَ وَيُرسِلُ الأُخرىٰ إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: allāh yatawaffāl-ʾanfus ḥīn mawtihā w-llatī lam tamut fī manāmihā f-yumsik llatī qaḍā ʿalayhāl-mawt w-yursilul-ʾukhrā ʾilā ʾajal musamm ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah takes the souls at the time of their death, and those that do not die He takes during their sleep. Then He keeps those for which He has decreed death and releases the others for a specified term. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought

arabic_uthmani: أَمِ اتَّخَذوا مِن دونِ اللَّهِ شُفَعاءَ ۚ قُل أَوَلَو كانوا لا يَملِكونَ شَيئًا وَلا يَعقِلونَ
blank: ʾam ttakhadhū m dūn llāhī shufaʿāʾ qul ʾ-w-law kānū lā yamlikūn shayʾ w-lā yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have they taken other than Allah as intercessors? Say, "Even though they do not possess power over anything, nor do they reason

arabic_uthmani: قُل لِلَّهِ الشَّفاعَةُ جَميعًا ۖ لَهُ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: qul l-llāh sh-shafāʿat jamīʿ lahū mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ thumm ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "To Allah belongs the right to allow intercession entirely. To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا ذُكِرَ اللَّهُ وَحدَهُ اشمَأَزَّت قُلوبُ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ ۖ وَإِذا ذُكِرَ الَّذينَ مِن دونِهِ إِذا هُم يَستَبشِرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā dhukir llāh waḥdah shmaʾazzat qulūbulladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat w-ʾidhā dhukiralladhīn m dūnihī ʾidhā hum yastabshirūn
english_saheeh_international: And when Allah is mentioned alone, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with aversion, but when those worshipped other than Him are mentioned, immediately they rejoice

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ اللَّهُمَّ فاطِرَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ عالِمَ الغَيبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ أَنتَ تَحكُمُ بَينَ عِبادِكَ في ما كانوا فيهِ يَختَلِفونَ
blank: qul llāhumm fāṭir s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ʿālimal-ghayb w-sh-shahādat ʾant taḥkum bayn ʿibādik fī mā kānū fīh yakhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, You will judge between your servants concerning that over which they used to differ

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو أَنَّ لِلَّذينَ ظَلَموا ما فِي الأَرضِ جَميعًا وَمِثلَهُ مَعَهُ لَافتَدَوا بِهِ مِن سوءِ العَذابِ يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۚ وَبَدا لَهُم مِنَ اللَّهِ ما لَم يَكونوا يَحتَسِبونَ
blank: w-law ʾann l-lladhīn ẓalamū mā fīl-ʾarḍ jamīʿ w-mithlahū maʿahū l-ftadaw bihī m sūʾil-ʿadhāb yawmal-qiyāmat w-badā lahum min llāh mā lam yakūnū yaḥtasibūn
english_saheeh_international: And if those who did wrong had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would attempt to ransom themselves thereby from the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection. And there will appear to them from Allah that which they had not taken into account

arabic_uthmani: وَبَدا لَهُم سَيِّئَاتُ ما كَسَبوا وَحاقَ بِهِم ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-badā lahum sayyiʾāt mā kasabū w-ḥāq bihim mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And there will appear to them the evils they had earned, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا مَسَّ الإِنسانَ ضُرٌّ دَعانا ثُمَّ إِذا خَوَّلناهُ نِعمَةً مِنّا قالَ إِنَّما أوتيتُهُ عَلىٰ عِلمٍ ۚ بَل هِيَ فِتنَةٌ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-ʾidhā massal-ʾinsān ḍurr daʿānā thumm ʾidhā khawwalnāh niʿmatam-minnā qāl ʾinnamā ʾūtītuhū ʿalā ʿilm bal hiy fitnat w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon Us; then when We bestow on him a favor from Us, he says, "I have only been given it because of my knowledge." Rather, it is a trial, but most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: قَد قالَهَا الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم فَما أَغنىٰ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: qad qālahālladhīn m qablihim f-mā ʾaghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: Those before them had already said it, but they were not availed by what they used to earn

arabic_uthmani: فَأَصابَهُم سَيِّئَاتُ ما كَسَبوا ۚ وَالَّذينَ ظَلَموا مِن هٰؤُلاءِ سَيُصيبُهُم سَيِّئَاتُ ما كَسَبوا وَما هُم بِمُعجِزينَ
blank: f-ʾaṣābahum sayyiʾāt mā kasabū w-lladhīn ẓalamū m hāʾulāʾ s-yuṣībuhum sayyiʾāt mā kasabū w-mā hum b-muʿjizīn
english_saheeh_international: And the evil consequences of what they earned struck them. And those who have wronged of these people will be afflicted by the evil consequences of what they earned; and they will not cause failure

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَبسُطُ الرِّزقَ لِمَن يَشاءُ وَيَقدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaʿlamū ʾann llāh yabsuṭ r-rizq l-m yashāʾ w-yaqdir ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they not know that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts it? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قُل يا عِبادِيَ الَّذينَ أَسرَفوا عَلىٰ أَنفُسِهِم لا تَقنَطوا مِن رَحمَةِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَغفِرُ الذُّنوبَ جَميعًا ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الغَفورُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: qul yā-ʿibādiyalladhīn ʾasrafū ʿalā ʾanfusihim lā taqnaṭū m raḥmat llāh ʾinn llāh yaghfir dh-dhunūb jamīʿ ʾinnahū huwal-ghafūr r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O My servants who have transgressed against themselves by sinning, do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنيبوا إِلىٰ رَبِّكُم وَأَسلِموا لَهُ مِن قَبلِ أَن يَأتِيَكُمُ العَذابُ ثُمَّ لا تُنصَرونَ
blank: w-ʾanībū ʾilā rabbikum w-ʾaslimū lahū m qabl ʾ yaʾtiyakumul-ʿadhāb thumm lā tunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: And return in repentance to your Lord and submit to Him before the punishment comes upon you; then you will not be helped

arabic_uthmani: وَاتَّبِعوا أَحسَنَ ما أُنزِلَ إِلَيكُم مِن رَبِّكُم مِن قَبلِ أَن يَأتِيَكُمُ العَذابُ بَغتَةً وَأَنتُم لا تَشعُرونَ
blank: w-ttabiʿū ʾaḥsan mā ʾunzil ʾilaykum m rabbikum m qabl ʾ yaʾtiyakumul-ʿadhāb baghtat w-ʾantum lā tashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: And follow the best of what was revealed to you from your Lord before the punishment comes upon you suddenly while you do not perceive

arabic_uthmani: أَن تَقولَ نَفسٌ يا حَسرَتا عَلىٰ ما فَرَّطتُ في جَنبِ اللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ السّاخِرينَ
blank: ʾ taqūl nafs yā-ḥasratā ʿalā mā farraṭt fī janb llāh w-ʾ kunt l-min s-sākhirīn
english_saheeh_international: Lest a soul should say, "Oh how great is my regret over what I neglected in regard to Allah and that I was among the mockers

arabic_uthmani: أَو تَقولَ لَو أَنَّ اللَّهَ هَداني لَكُنتُ مِنَ المُتَّقينَ
blank: ʾaw taqūl law ʾann llāh hadānī l-kunt minal-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Or lest it say, "If only Allah had guided me, I would have been among the righteous

arabic_uthmani: أَو تَقولَ حينَ تَرَى العَذابَ لَو أَنَّ لي كَرَّةً فَأَكونَ مِنَ المُحسِنينَ
blank: ʾaw taqūl ḥīn tarāl-ʿadhāb law ʾann lī karrat f-ʾakūn minal-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: Or lest it say when it sees the punishment, "If only I had another turn so I could be among the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: بَلىٰ قَد جاءَتكَ آياتي فَكَذَّبتَ بِها وَاستَكبَرتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ الكافِرينَ
blank: balā qad jāʾatk ʾāyātī f-kadhdhabt bihā w-stakbart w-kunt minal-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: But yes, there had come to you My verses, but you denied them and were arrogant, and you were among the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ القِيامَةِ تَرَى الَّذينَ كَذَبوا عَلَى اللَّهِ وُجوهُهُم مُسوَدَّةٌ ۚ أَلَيسَ في جَهَنَّمَ مَثوًى لِلمُتَكَبِّرينَ
blank: w-yawmal-qiyāmat tarālladhīn kadhabū ʿalā llāh wujūhuhum muswaddat ʾ-lays fī jahannam mathw l-l-mutakabbirīn
english_saheeh_international: And on the Day of Resurrection you will see those who lied about Allah with their faces blackened. Is there not in Hell a residence for the arrogant

arabic_uthmani: وَيُنَجِّي اللَّهُ الَّذينَ اتَّقَوا بِمَفازَتِهِم لا يَمَسُّهُمُ السّوءُ وَلا هُم يَحزَنونَ
blank: w-yunajjī llāhulladhīn ttaqaw b-mafāzatihim lā yamassuhum s-sūʾ w-lā hum yaḥzanūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah will save those who feared Him by their attainment; no evil will touch them, nor will they grieve

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ خالِقُ كُلِّ شَيءٍ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ وَكيلٌ
blank: allāh khāliq kull shayʾ w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ wakīl
english_saheeh_international: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is, over all things, Disposer of affairs

arabic_uthmani: لَهُ مَقاليدُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۗ وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا بِآياتِ اللَّهِ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: lahū maqālīd s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-lladhīn kafarū b-ʾāyāt llāh ʾulāʾik humul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. And they who disbelieve in the verses of Allah - it is those who are the losers
