arabic_uthmani: قُل أَفَغَيرَ اللَّهِ تَأمُرونّي أَعبُدُ أَيُّهَا الجاهِلونَ
blank: qul ʾ-f-ghayr llāh taʾmurūnnī ʾaʿbud ʾayyuhāl-jāhilūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Is it other than Allah that you order me to worship, O ignorant ones

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أوحِيَ إِلَيكَ وَإِلَى الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِكَ لَئِن أَشرَكتَ لَيَحبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكونَنَّ مِنَ الخاسِرينَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾūḥiy ʾilayk w-ʾilālladhīn m qablik l-ʾ ʾashrakt l-yaḥbaṭann ʿamaluk w-l-takūnann minal-khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: And it was already revealed to you and to those before you that if you should associate anything with Allah, your work would surely become worthless, and you would surely be among the losers

arabic_uthmani: بَلِ اللَّهَ فَاعبُد وَكُن مِنَ الشّاكِرينَ
blank: bal llāh f-ʿbud w-k min sh-shākirīn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, worship only Allah and be among the grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَما قَدَرُوا اللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدرِهِ وَالأَرضُ جَميعًا قَبضَتُهُ يَومَ القِيامَةِ وَالسَّماواتُ مَطوِيّاتٌ بِيَمينِهِ ۚ سُبحانَهُ وَتَعالىٰ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: w-mā qadarū llāh ḥaqq qadrihī w-l-ʾarḍ jamīʿ qabḍatuhū yawmal-qiyāmat w-s-samāwāt maṭwiyyāt b-yamīnihī subḥānahū w-taʿālā ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal, while the earth entirely will be within His grip on the Day of Resurrection, and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَمَن فِي الأَرضِ إِلّا مَن شاءَ اللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فيهِ أُخرىٰ فَإِذا هُم قِيامٌ يَنظُرونَ
blank: w-nufikh fī ṣ-ṣūr f-ṣaʿiq m fī s-samāwāt w-m fīl-ʾarḍ ʾillā m shāʾ llāh thumm nufikh fīh ʾukhrā f-ʾidhā hum qiyām yanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: And the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will fall dead except whom Allah wills. Then it will be blown again, and at once they will be standing, looking on

arabic_uthmani: وَأَشرَقَتِ الأَرضُ بِنورِ رَبِّها وَوُضِعَ الكِتابُ وَجِيءَ بِالنَّبِيّينَ وَالشُّهَداءِ وَقُضِيَ بَينَهُم بِالحَقِّ وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾashraqatil-ʾarḍ b-n-nūr rabbihā w-wuḍiʿal-kitāb w-jīʾ b-n-nabiyyīn w-sh-shuhadāʾ w-quḍiy baynahum b-l-ḥaqq w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And the earth will shine with the light of its Lord, and the record of deeds will be placed, and the prophets and the witnesses will be brought, and it will be judged between them in truth, and they will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: وَوُفِّيَت كُلُّ نَفسٍ ما عَمِلَت وَهُوَ أَعلَمُ بِما يَفعَلونَ
blank: w-wuffiyat kull nafs mā ʿamilat w-huw ʾaʿlam b-mā yafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: And every soul will be fully compensated for what it did; and He is most knowing of what they do

arabic_uthmani: وَسيقَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا إِلىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتّىٰ إِذا جاءوها فُتِحَت أَبوابُها وَقالَ لَهُم خَزَنَتُها أَلَم يَأتِكُم رُسُلٌ مِنكُم يَتلونَ عَلَيكُم آياتِ رَبِّكُم وَيُنذِرونَكُم لِقاءَ يَومِكُم هٰذا ۚ قالوا بَلىٰ وَلٰكِن حَقَّت كَلِمَةُ العَذابِ عَلَى الكافِرينَ
blank: w-sīqalladhīn kafarū ʾilā jahannam zumar ḥattā ʾidhā jāʾūhā futiḥat ʾabwābuhā w-qāl lahum khazanatuhā ʾ-lam yaʾtikum rusul minkum yatlūn ʿalaykum ʾāyāt rabbikum w-yundhirūnakum liqāʾ yawmikum hādhā qālū balā w-lāk ḥaqqat kalimatul-ʿadhāb ʿalāl-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in groups until, when they reach it, its gates are opened and its keepers will say, "Did there not come to you messengers from yourselves, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say, "Yes, but the word of punishment has come into effect upon the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: قيلَ ادخُلوا أَبوابَ جَهَنَّمَ خالِدينَ فيها ۖ فَبِئسَ مَثوَى المُتَكَبِّرينَ
blank: qīl dkhulū ʾabwāb jahannam khālidīn fīhā f-biʾs mathwāl-mutakabbirīn
english_saheeh_international: To them it will be said, "Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant

arabic_uthmani: وَسيقَ الَّذينَ اتَّقَوا رَبَّهُم إِلَى الجَنَّةِ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتّىٰ إِذا جاءوها وَفُتِحَت أَبوابُها وَقالَ لَهُم خَزَنَتُها سَلامٌ عَلَيكُم طِبتُم فَادخُلوها خالِدينَ
blank: w-sīqalladhīn ttaqaw rabbahum ʾilāl-jannat zumar ḥattā ʾidhā jāʾūhā w-futiḥat ʾabwābuhā w-qāl lahum khazanatuhā salām ʿalaykum ṭibtum f-dkhulūhā khālidīn
english_saheeh_international: But those who feared their Lord will be driven to Paradise in groups until, when they reach it while its gates have been opened and its keepers say, "Peace be upon you; you have become pure; so enter it to abide eternally therein," they will enter

arabic_uthmani: وَقالُوا الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذي صَدَقَنا وَعدَهُ وَأَورَثَنَا الأَرضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ الجَنَّةِ حَيثُ نَشاءُ ۖ فَنِعمَ أَجرُ العامِلينَ
blank: w-qālūl-ḥamd l-llāhilladhī ṣadaqanā waʿdahū w-ʾawrathanāl-ʾarḍ natabawwaʾ minal-jannat ḥayth nashāʾ f-niʿm ʾajrul-ʿāmilīn
english_saheeh_international: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has fulfilled for us His promise and made us inherit the earth so we may settle in Paradise wherever we will. And excellent is the reward of righteous workers

arabic_uthmani: وَتَرَى المَلائِكَةَ حافّينَ مِن حَولِ العَرشِ يُسَبِّحونَ بِحَمدِ رَبِّهِم ۖ وَقُضِيَ بَينَهُم بِالحَقِّ وَقيلَ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: w-tarāl-malāʾikat ḥāffīn m ḥawlil-ʿarsh yusabbiḥūn b-ḥamd rabbihim w-quḍiy baynahum b-l-ḥaqq w-qīlal-ḥamd l-llāh rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And you will see the angels surrounding the Throne, exalting Allah with praise of their Lord. And it will be judged between them in truth, and it will be said, "All praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: حم
blank: ḥ-m (ḥā mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Ha, Meem

arabic_uthmani: تَنزيلُ الكِتابِ مِنَ اللَّهِ العَزيزِ العَليمِ
blank: tanzīlul-kitāb min llāhil-ʿazīzil-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: غافِرِ الذَّنبِ وَقابِلِ التَّوبِ شَديدِ العِقابِ ذِي الطَّولِ ۖ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ إِلَيهِ المَصيرُ
blank: ghāfir dh-dhanb w-qābil t-tawb shadīdil-ʿiqāb dhī ṭ-ṭawl lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw ʾilayhil-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: The forgiver of sin, acceptor of repentance, severe in punishment, owner of abundance. There is no deity except Him; to Him is the destination

arabic_uthmani: ما يُجادِلُ في آياتِ اللَّهِ إِلَّا الَّذينَ كَفَروا فَلا يَغرُركَ تَقَلُّبُهُم فِي البِلادِ
blank: mā yujādil fī ʾāyāt llāh ʾillālladhīn kafarū f-lā yaghrurk taqallubuhum fīl-bilād
english_saheeh_international: No one disputes concerning the signs of Allah except those who disbelieve, so be not deceived by their uninhibited movement throughout the land

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَت قَبلَهُم قَومُ نوحٍ وَالأَحزابُ مِن بَعدِهِم ۖ وَهَمَّت كُلُّ أُمَّةٍ بِرَسولِهِم لِيَأخُذوهُ ۖ وَجادَلوا بِالباطِلِ لِيُدحِضوا بِهِ الحَقَّ فَأَخَذتُهُم ۖ فَكَيفَ كانَ عِقابِ
blank: kadhdhabat qablahum qawm nūḥ w-l-ʾaḥzāb m baʿdihim w-hammat kull ʾummat b-rasūlihim l-yaʾkhudhūh w-jādalū b-l-bāṭil l-yudḥiḍū bihil-ḥaqq f-ʾakhadhtuhum f-kayf kān ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: The people of Noah denied before them and the disbelieving factions after them, and every nation intended a plot for their messenger to seize him, and they disputed by using falsehood to attempt to invalidate thereby the truth. So I seized them, and how terrible was My penalty

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ حَقَّت كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى الَّذينَ كَفَروا أَنَّهُم أَصحابُ النّارِ
blank: w-k-dhālik ḥaqqat kalimat rabbik ʿalālladhīn kafarū ʾannahum ʾaṣḥāb n-nār
english_saheeh_international: And thus has the word of your Lord come into effect upon those who disbelieved that they are companions of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَحمِلونَ العَرشَ وَمَن حَولَهُ يُسَبِّحونَ بِحَمدِ رَبِّهِم وَيُؤمِنونَ بِهِ وَيَستَغفِرونَ لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا رَبَّنا وَسِعتَ كُلَّ شَيءٍ رَحمَةً وَعِلمًا فَاغفِر لِلَّذينَ تابوا وَاتَّبَعوا سَبيلَكَ وَقِهِم عَذابَ الجَحيمِ
blank: alladhīn yaḥmilūnal-ʿarsh w-m ḥawlahū yusabbiḥūn b-ḥamd rabbihim w-yuʾminūn bihī w-yastaghfirūn l-lladhīn ʾāmanū rabbanā wasiʿt kull shayʾ raḥmat w-ʿilm f-ghfir l-lladhīn tābū w-ttabaʿū sabīlak w-qihim ʿadhābal-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Those angels who carry the Throne and those around it exalt Allah with praise of their Lord and believe in Him and ask forgiveness for those who have believed, saying, "Our Lord, You have encompassed all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who have repented and followed Your way and protect them from the punishment of Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا وَأَدخِلهُم جَنّاتِ عَدنٍ الَّتي وَعَدتَهُم وَمَن صَلَحَ مِن آبائِهِم وَأَزواجِهِم وَذُرِّيّاتِهِم ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: rabbanā w-ʾadkhilhum jannāt ʿadn- llatī waʿadtahum w-m ṣalaḥ m ʾābāʾihim w-ʾazwājihim w-dhurriyyātihim ʾinnak ʾantal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, and admit them to gardens of perpetual residence which You have promised them and whoever was righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their offspring. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَقِهِمُ السَّيِّئَاتِ ۚ وَمَن تَقِ السَّيِّئَاتِ يَومَئِذٍ فَقَد رَحِمتَهُ ۚ وَذٰلِكَ هُوَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: w-qihim s-sayyiʾāt w-m taq s-sayyiʾāt yawmaʾidh f-qad raḥimtahū w-dhālik huwal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And protect them from the evil consequences of their deeds. And he whom You protect from evil consequences that Day - You will have given him mercy. And that is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا يُنادَونَ لَمَقتُ اللَّهِ أَكبَرُ مِن مَقتِكُم أَنفُسَكُم إِذ تُدعَونَ إِلَى الإيمانِ فَتَكفُرونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū yunādawn l-maqt llāh ʾakbar m maqtikum ʾanfusakum ʾidh tudʿawn ʾilāl-ʾīmān f-takfurūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who disbelieve will be addressed, "The hatred of Allah for you was even greater than your hatred of yourselves this Day in Hell when you were invited to faith, but you refused

arabic_uthmani: قالوا رَبَّنا أَمَتَّنَا اثنَتَينِ وَأَحيَيتَنَا اثنَتَينِ فَاعتَرَفنا بِذُنوبِنا فَهَل إِلىٰ خُروجٍ مِن سَبيلٍ
blank: qālū rabbanā ʾamattanā thnatayn w-ʾaḥyaytanā thnatayn f-ʿtarafnā b-dhunūbinā f-hal ʾilā khurūj m sabīl
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "Our Lord, You made us lifeless twice and gave us life twice, and we have confessed our sins. So is there to an exit any way

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكُم بِأَنَّهُ إِذا دُعِيَ اللَّهُ وَحدَهُ كَفَرتُم ۖ وَإِن يُشرَك بِهِ تُؤمِنوا ۚ فَالحُكمُ لِلَّهِ العَلِيِّ الكَبيرِ
blank: dhālikum b-ʾannahū ʾidhā duʿiy llāh waḥdahū kafartum w-ʾ yushrak bihī tuʾminū f-l-ḥukm l-llāhil-ʿaliyyil-kabīr
english_saheeh_international: They will be told, "That is because, when Allah was called upon alone, you disbelieved; but if others were associated with Him, you believed. So the judgement is with Allah, the Most High, the Grand

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي يُريكُم آياتِهِ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِنَ السَّماءِ رِزقًا ۚ وَما يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلّا مَن يُنيبُ
blank: huwalladhī yurīkum ʾāyātihī w-yunazzil lakum min s-samāʾ rizq w-mā yatadhakkar ʾillā m yunīb
english_saheeh_international: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you from the sky, provision. But none will remember except he who turns back in repentance

arabic_uthmani: فَادعُوا اللَّهَ مُخلِصينَ لَهُ الدّينَ وَلَو كَرِهَ الكافِرونَ
blank: f-dʿū llāh mukhliṣīn lah d-dīn w-law karihal-kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: So invoke Allah, being sincere to Him in religion, although the disbelievers dislike it

arabic_uthmani: رَفيعُ الدَّرَجاتِ ذُو العَرشِ يُلقِي الرّوحَ مِن أَمرِهِ عَلىٰ مَن يَشاءُ مِن عِبادِهِ لِيُنذِرَ يَومَ التَّلاقِ
blank: rafīʿ d-darajāt dhūl-ʿarsh yulqī r-rūḥ m ʾamrihī ʿalā m yashāʾ m ʿibādihī l-yundhir yawm t-talāq
english_saheeh_international: He is the Exalted above all degrees, Owner of the Throne; He places the inspiration of His command upon whom He wills of His servants to warn of the Day of Meeting

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ هُم بارِزونَ ۖ لا يَخفىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ مِنهُم شَيءٌ ۚ لِمَنِ المُلكُ اليَومَ ۖ لِلَّهِ الواحِدِ القَهّارِ
blank: yawm hum bārizūn lā yakhfā ʿalā llāh minhum shayʾ l-manil-mulkul-yawm l-llāhil-wāḥidil-qahhār
english_saheeh_international: The Day they come forth nothing concerning them will be concealed from Allah. To whom belongs all sovereignty this Day? To Allah, the One, the Prevailing

arabic_uthmani: اليَومَ تُجزىٰ كُلُّ نَفسٍ بِما كَسَبَت ۚ لا ظُلمَ اليَومَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَريعُ الحِسابِ
blank: al-yawm tujzā kull nafs b-mā kasabat lā ẓulmal-yawm ʾinn llāh sarīʿul-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: This Day every soul will be recompensed for what it earned. No injustice today! Indeed, Allah is swift in account

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنذِرهُم يَومَ الآزِفَةِ إِذِ القُلوبُ لَدَى الحَناجِرِ كاظِمينَ ۚ ما لِلظّالِمينَ مِن حَميمٍ وَلا شَفيعٍ يُطاعُ
blank: w-ʾandhirhum yawmal-ʾāzifat ʾidhil-qulūb ladāl-ḥanājir kāẓimīn mā l-ẓ-ẓālimīn m ḥamīm w-lā shafīʿ yuṭāʿ
english_saheeh_international: And warn them, O Muhammad, of the Approaching Day, when hearts are at the throats, filled with distress. For the wrongdoers there will be no devoted friend and no intercessor who is obeyed

arabic_uthmani: يَعلَمُ خائِنَةَ الأَعيُنِ وَما تُخفِي الصُّدورُ
blank: yaʿlam khāʾinatal-ʾaʿyun w-mā tukhfī ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: He knows that which deceives the eyes and what the breasts conceal

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ يَقضي بِالحَقِّ ۖ وَالَّذينَ يَدعونَ مِن دونِهِ لا يَقضونَ بِشَيءٍ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ السَّميعُ البَصيرُ
blank: w-llāh yaqḍī b-l-ḥaqq w-lladhīn yadʿūn m dūnihī lā yaqḍūn b-shayʾ ʾinn llāh huw s-samīʿul-baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And Allah judges with truth, while those they invoke besides Him judge not with anything. Indeed, Allah - He is the Hearing, the Seeing

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَوَلَم يَسيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَيَنظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ الَّذينَ كانوا مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ كانوا هُم أَشَدَّ مِنهُم قُوَّةً وَآثارًا فِي الأَرضِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ اللَّهُ بِذُنوبِهِم وَما كانَ لَهُم مِنَ اللَّهِ مِن واقٍ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yasīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-yanẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatulladhīn kānū m qablihim kānū hum ʾashadd minhum quwwat w-ʾāthār fīl-ʾarḍ f-ʾakhadhahum llāh b-dhunūbihim w-mā kān lahum min llāh m wāq
english_saheeh_international: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those who were before them? They were greater than them in strength and in impression on the land, but Allah seized them for their sins. And they had not from Allah any protector

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم كانَت تَأتيهِم رُسُلُهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ فَكَفَروا فَأَخَذَهُمُ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ قَوِيٌّ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahum kānat taʾtīhim rusuluhum b-l-bayyināt f-kafarū f-ʾakhadhahum llāh ʾinnahū qawiyy shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: That was because their messengers were coming to them with clear proofs, but they disbelieved, so Allah seized them. Indeed, He is Powerful and severe in punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا موسىٰ بِآياتِنا وَسُلطانٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā mūsā b-ʾāyātinā w-sulṭān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority

arabic_uthmani: إِلىٰ فِرعَونَ وَهامانَ وَقارونَ فَقالوا ساحِرٌ كَذّابٌ
blank: ʾilā firʿawn w-hāmān w-qārūn f-qālū sāḥir kadhdhāb
english_saheeh_international: To Pharaoh, Haman and Qarun; but they said, "He is a magician and a liar

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَهُم بِالحَقِّ مِن عِندِنا قالُوا اقتُلوا أَبناءَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا مَعَهُ وَاستَحيوا نِساءَهُم ۚ وَما كَيدُ الكافِرينَ إِلّا في ضَلالٍ
blank: f-lammā jāʾahum b-l-ḥaqq m ʿindinā qālū qtulū ʾabnāʾalladhīn ʾāmanū maʿahū w-staḥyū nisāʾahum w-mā kaydul-kāfirīn ʾillā fī ḍalāl
english_saheeh_international: And when he brought them the truth from Us, they said, "Kill the sons of those who have believed with him and keep their women alive." But the plan of the disbelievers is not except in error

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ فِرعَونُ ذَروني أَقتُل موسىٰ وَليَدعُ رَبَّهُ ۖ إِنّي أَخافُ أَن يُبَدِّلَ دينَكُم أَو أَن يُظهِرَ فِي الأَرضِ الفَسادَ
blank: w-qāl firʿawn dharūnī ʾaqtul mūsā w-l-yadʿ rabbahū ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʾ yubaddil dīnakum ʾaw ʾ yuẓhir fīl-ʾarḍil-fasād
english_saheeh_international: And Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses and let him call upon his Lord. Indeed, I fear that he will change your religion or that he will cause corruption in the land

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ موسىٰ إِنّي عُذتُ بِرَبّي وَرَبِّكُم مِن كُلِّ مُتَكَبِّرٍ لا يُؤمِنُ بِيَومِ الحِسابِ
blank: w-qāl mūsā ʾinnī ʿudht b-rabbī w-rabbikum m kull mutakabbir lā yuʾmin b-yawmil-ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: But Moses said, "Indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Account

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ رَجُلٌ مُؤمِنٌ مِن آلِ فِرعَونَ يَكتُمُ إيمانَهُ أَتَقتُلونَ رَجُلًا أَن يَقولَ رَبِّيَ اللَّهُ وَقَد جاءَكُم بِالبَيِّناتِ مِن رَبِّكُم ۖ وَإِن يَكُ كاذِبًا فَعَلَيهِ كَذِبُهُ ۖ وَإِن يَكُ صادِقًا يُصِبكُم بَعضُ الَّذي يَعِدُكُم ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهدي مَن هُوَ مُسرِفٌ كَذّابٌ
blank: w-qāl rajul muʾmin m ʾāl firʿawn yaktum ʾīmānahū ʾ-taqtulūn rajul ʾ yaqūl rabbiy llāh w-qad jāʾakum b-l-bayyināt m rabbikum w-ʾ yak kādhib f-ʿalayh kadhibuhū w-ʾ yak ṣādiq yuṣibkum baʿḍulladhī yaʿidukum ʾinn llāh lā yahdī m huw musrif kadhdhāb
english_saheeh_international: And a believing man from the family of Pharaoh who concealed his faith said, "Do you kill a man merely because he says, 'My Lord is Allah' while he has brought you clear proofs from your Lord? And if he should be lying, then upon him is the consequence of his lie; but if he should be truthful, there will strike you some of what he promises you. Indeed, Allah does not guide one who is a transgressor and a liar

arabic_uthmani: يا قَومِ لَكُمُ المُلكُ اليَومَ ظاهِرينَ فِي الأَرضِ فَمَن يَنصُرُنا مِن بَأسِ اللَّهِ إِن جاءَنا ۚ قالَ فِرعَونُ ما أُريكُم إِلّا ما أَرىٰ وَما أَهديكُم إِلّا سَبيلَ الرَّشادِ
blank: yā-qawm lakumul-mulkul-yawm ẓāhirīn fīl-ʾarḍ f-m yanṣurunā m baʾs llāh ʾ jāʾanā qāl firʿawn mā ʾurīkum ʾillā mā ʾarā w-mā ʾahdīkum ʾillā sabīl r-rashād
english_saheeh_international: O my people, sovereignty is yours today, your being dominant in the land. But who would protect us from the punishment of Allah if it came to us?" Pharaoh said, "I do not show you except what I see, and I do not guide you except to the way of right conduct

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذي آمَنَ يا قَومِ إِنّي أَخافُ عَلَيكُم مِثلَ يَومِ الأَحزابِ
blank: w-qālalladhī ʾāman yā-qawm ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʿalaykum mithl yawmil-ʾaḥzāb
english_saheeh_international: And he who believed said, "O my people, indeed I fear for you a fate like the day of the companies

arabic_uthmani: مِثلَ دَأبِ قَومِ نوحٍ وَعادٍ وَثَمودَ وَالَّذينَ مِن بَعدِهِم ۚ وَمَا اللَّهُ يُريدُ ظُلمًا لِلعِبادِ
blank: mithl daʾb qawm nūḥ w-ʿād w-thamūd w-lladhīn m baʿdihim w-mā llāh yurīd ẓulm l-l-ʿibād
english_saheeh_international: Like the custom of the people of Noah and of 'Aad and Thamud and those after them. And Allah wants no injustice for His servants

arabic_uthmani: وَيا قَومِ إِنّي أَخافُ عَلَيكُم يَومَ التَّنادِ
blank: w-yā-qawm ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʿalaykum yawm t-tanād
english_saheeh_international: And O my people, indeed I fear for you the Day of Calling

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تُوَلّونَ مُدبِرينَ ما لَكُم مِنَ اللَّهِ مِن عاصِمٍ ۗ وَمَن يُضلِلِ اللَّهُ فَما لَهُ مِن هادٍ
blank: yawm tuwallūn mudbirīn mā lakum min llāh m ʿāṣim w-m yuḍlil llāh f-mā lahū m hād
english_saheeh_international: The Day you will turn your backs fleeing; there is not for you from Allah any protector. And whoever Allah leaves astray - there is not for him any guide

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد جاءَكُم يوسُفُ مِن قَبلُ بِالبَيِّناتِ فَما زِلتُم في شَكٍّ مِمّا جاءَكُم بِهِ ۖ حَتّىٰ إِذا هَلَكَ قُلتُم لَن يَبعَثَ اللَّهُ مِن بَعدِهِ رَسولًا ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَن هُوَ مُسرِفٌ مُرتابٌ
blank: w-l-qad jāʾakum yūsuf m qabl b-l-bayyināt f-mā ziltum fī shakk mimmā jāʾakum bihī ḥattā ʾidhā halak qultum l yabʿath llāh m baʿdihī rasūl k-dhālik yuḍill llāh m huw musrif murtāb-
english_saheeh_international: And Joseph had already come to you before with clear proofs, but you remained in doubt of that which he brought to you, until when he died, you said, 'Never will Allah send a messenger after him.' Thus does Allah leave astray he who is a transgressor and skeptic

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُجادِلونَ في آياتِ اللَّهِ بِغَيرِ سُلطانٍ أَتاهُم ۖ كَبُرَ مَقتًا عِندَ اللَّهِ وَعِندَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يَطبَعُ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ قَلبِ مُتَكَبِّرٍ جَبّارٍ
blank: alladhīn yujādilūn fī ʾāyāt llāh b-ghayr sulṭān ʾatāhum kabur maqt ʿind llāh w-ʿindalladhīn ʾāmanū k-dhālik yaṭbaʿ llāh ʿalā kull qalb mutakabbir jabbār
english_saheeh_international: Those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without an authority having come to them - great is hatred of them in the sight of Allah and in the sight of those who have believed. Thus does Allah seal over every heart belonging to an arrogant tyrant

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ فِرعَونُ يا هامانُ ابنِ لي صَرحًا لَعَلّي أَبلُغُ الأَسبابَ
blank: w-qāl firʿawn yā-hāmān bn lī ṣarḥ laʿallī ʾablughul-ʾasbāb
english_saheeh_international: And Pharaoh said, "O Haman, construct for me a tower that I might reach the ways

arabic_uthmani: أَسبابَ السَّماواتِ فَأَطَّلِعَ إِلىٰ إِلٰهِ موسىٰ وَإِنّي لَأَظُنُّهُ كاذِبًا ۚ وَكَذٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِفِرعَونَ سوءُ عَمَلِهِ وَصُدَّ عَنِ السَّبيلِ ۚ وَما كَيدُ فِرعَونَ إِلّا في تَبابٍ
blank: ʾasbāb s-samāwāt f-ʾaṭṭaliʿ ʾilā ʾilāh mūsā w-ʾinnī l-ʾaẓunnuhū kādhib w-k-dhālik zuyyin l-firʿawn sūʾ ʿamalihī w-ṣudd ʿan s-sabīl w-mā kayd firʿawn ʾillā fī tabāb
english_saheeh_international: The ways into the heavens - so that I may look at the deity of Moses; but indeed, I think he is a liar." And thus was made attractive to Pharaoh the evil of his deed, and he was averted from the right way. And the plan of Pharaoh was not except in ruin

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذي آمَنَ يا قَومِ اتَّبِعونِ أَهدِكُم سَبيلَ الرَّشادِ
blank: w-qālalladhī ʾāman yā-qawm ttabiʿūn ʾahdikum sabīl r-rashād
english_saheeh_international: And he who believed said, "O my people, follow me, I will guide you to the way of right conduct

arabic_uthmani: يا قَومِ إِنَّما هٰذِهِ الحَياةُ الدُّنيا مَتاعٌ وَإِنَّ الآخِرَةَ هِيَ دارُ القَرارِ
blank: yā-qawm ʾinnamā hādhihil-ḥayāt d-dunyā matāʿ w-ʾinnal-ʾākhirat hiy dārul-qarār
english_saheeh_international: O my people, this worldly life is only temporary enjoyment, and indeed, the Hereafter - that is the home of permanent settlement

arabic_uthmani: مَن عَمِلَ سَيِّئَةً فَلا يُجزىٰ إِلّا مِثلَها ۖ وَمَن عَمِلَ صالِحًا مِن ذَكَرٍ أَو أُنثىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤمِنٌ فَأُولٰئِكَ يَدخُلونَ الجَنَّةَ يُرزَقونَ فيها بِغَيرِ حِسابٍ
blank: m ʿamil sayyiʾat f-lā yujzā ʾillā mithlahā w-m ʿamil ṣāliḥam-m dhakar ʾaw ʾunthā w-huw muʾmin f-ʾulāʾik yadkhulūnal-jannat yurzaqūn fīhā b-ghayr ḥisāb
english_saheeh_international: Whoever does an evil deed will not be recompensed except by the like thereof; but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise, being given provision therein without account

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَيا قَومِ ما لي أَدعوكُم إِلَى النَّجاةِ وَتَدعونَني إِلَى النّارِ
blank: w-yā-qawm mā lī ʾadʿūkum ʾilā n-najāt w-tadʿūnanī ʾilā n-nār
english_saheeh_international: And O my people, how is it that I invite you to salvation while you invite me to the Fire

arabic_uthmani: تَدعونَني لِأَكفُرَ بِاللَّهِ وَأُشرِكَ بِهِ ما لَيسَ لي بِهِ عِلمٌ وَأَنا أَدعوكُم إِلَى العَزيزِ الغَفّارِ
blank: tadʿūnanī l-ʾakfur b-llāh w-ʾushrik bihī mā lays lī bihī ʿilm w-ʾan ʾadʿūkum ʾilāl-ʿazīzil-ghaffār
english_saheeh_international: You invite me to disbelieve in Allah and associate with Him that of which I have no knowledge, and I invite you to the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver

arabic_uthmani: لا جَرَمَ أَنَّما تَدعونَني إِلَيهِ لَيسَ لَهُ دَعوَةٌ فِي الدُّنيا وَلا فِي الآخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ مَرَدَّنا إِلَى اللَّهِ وَأَنَّ المُسرِفينَ هُم أَصحابُ النّارِ
blank: lā jaram ʾannamā tadʿūnanī ʾilayh lays lahū daʿwat fī d-dunyā w-lā fīl-ʾākhirat w-ʾann maraddanā ʾilā llāh w-ʾannal-musrifīn hum ʾaṣḥāb n-nār
english_saheeh_international: Assuredly, that to which you invite me has no response to a supplication in this world or in the Hereafter; and indeed, our return is to Allah, and indeed, the transgressors will be companions of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: فَسَتَذكُرونَ ما أَقولُ لَكُم ۚ وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمري إِلَى اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بَصيرٌ بِالعِبادِ
blank: f-s-tadhkurūn mā ʾaqūl lakum w-ʾufawwiḍ ʾamrī ʾilā llāh ʾinn llāh baṣīr b-l-ʿibād
english_saheeh_international: And you will remember what I now say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah. Indeed, Allah is Seeing of His servants

arabic_uthmani: فَوَقاهُ اللَّهُ سَيِّئَاتِ ما مَكَروا ۖ وَحاقَ بِآلِ فِرعَونَ سوءُ العَذابِ
blank: f-waqāh llāh sayyiʾātimā makarū w-ḥāq b-ʾāl firʿawn sūʾul-ʿadhāb
english_saheeh_international: So Allah protected him from the evils they plotted, and the people of Pharaoh were enveloped by the worst of punishment

arabic_uthmani: النّارُ يُعرَضونَ عَلَيها غُدُوًّا وَعَشِيًّا ۖ وَيَومَ تَقومُ السّاعَةُ أَدخِلوا آلَ فِرعَونَ أَشَدَّ العَذابِ
blank: -nār yuʿraḍūn ʿalayhā ghuduww w-ʿashiyy w-yawm taqūm s-sāʿat ʾadkhilū ʾāl firʿawn ʾashaddal-ʿadhāb
english_saheeh_international: The Fire, they are exposed to it morning and evening. And the Day the Hour appears it will be said, "Make the people of Pharaoh enter the severest punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ يَتَحاجّونَ فِي النّارِ فَيَقولُ الضُّعَفاءُ لِلَّذينَ استَكبَروا إِنّا كُنّا لَكُم تَبَعًا فَهَل أَنتُم مُغنونَ عَنّا نَصيبًا مِنَ النّارِ
blank: w-ʾidh yataḥājjūn fī n-nār f-yaqūl ḍ-ḍuʿafāʾ l-lladhīn stakbarū ʾinnā kunnā lakum tabaʿ f-hal ʾantum mughnūn ʿannā naṣībam-min n-nār
english_saheeh_international: And mention when they will argue within the Fire, and the weak will say to those who had been arrogant, "Indeed, we were only your followers, so will you relieve us of a share of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: قالَ الَّذينَ استَكبَروا إِنّا كُلٌّ فيها إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَد حَكَمَ بَينَ العِبادِ
blank: qālalladhīn stakbarū ʾinnā kull fīhā ʾinn llāh qad ḥakam baynal-ʿibād
english_saheeh_international: Those who had been arrogant will say, "Indeed, all of us are in it. Indeed, Allah has judged between the servants

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ فِي النّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ ادعوا رَبَّكُم يُخَفِّف عَنّا يَومًا مِنَ العَذابِ
blank: w-qālalladhīn fī n-nār l-khazanat jahannam dʿū rabbakum yukhaffif ʿannā yawmam-minal-ʿadhāb
english_saheeh_international: And those in the Fire will say to the keepers of Hell, "Supplicate your Lord to lighten for us a day from the punishment

arabic_uthmani: قالوا أَوَلَم تَكُ تَأتيكُم رُسُلُكُم بِالبَيِّناتِ ۖ قالوا بَلىٰ ۚ قالوا فَادعوا ۗ وَما دُعاءُ الكافِرينَ إِلّا في ضَلالٍ
blank: qālū ʾ-w-lam tak taʾtīkum rusulukum b-l-bayyināt qālū balā qālū f-dʿū w-mā duʿāʾul-kāfirīn ʾillā fī ḍalāl
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "Did there not come to you your messengers with clear proofs?" They will say, "Yes." They will reply, "Then supplicate yourselves, but the supplication of the disbelievers is not except in error

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا لَنَنصُرُ رُسُلَنا وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَيَومَ يَقومُ الأَشهادُ
blank: ʾinnā l-nanṣur rusulanā w-lladhīn ʾāmanū fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-yawm yaqūmul-ʾashhād
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe during the life of this world and on the Day when the witnesses will stand

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ لا يَنفَعُ الظّالِمينَ مَعذِرَتُهُم ۖ وَلَهُمُ اللَّعنَةُ وَلَهُم سوءُ الدّارِ
blank: yawm lā yanfaʿ ẓ-ẓālimīn maʿdhiratuhum w-lahumul-laʿnat w-lahum sūʾ d-dār
english_saheeh_international: The Day their excuse will not benefit the wrongdoers, and they will have the curse, and they will have the worst home

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَينا موسَى الهُدىٰ وَأَورَثنا بَني إِسرائيلَ الكِتابَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā mūsāl-hudā w-ʾawrathnā banī ʾisrāʾīlal-kitāb
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture

arabic_uthmani: هُدًى وَذِكرىٰ لِأُولِي الأَلبابِ
blank: hud w-dhikrā l-ʾulīl-ʾalbāb
english_saheeh_international: As guidance and a reminder for those of understanding

arabic_uthmani: فَاصبِر إِنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَاستَغفِر لِذَنبِكَ وَسَبِّح بِحَمدِ رَبِّكَ بِالعَشِيِّ وَالإِبكارِ
blank: f-ṣbir ʾinn waʿd llāh ḥaqq w-staghfir l-dhanbik w-sabbiḥ b-ḥamd rabbik b-l-ʿashiyy w-l-ʾibkār
english_saheeh_international: So be patient, O Muhammad. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And ask forgiveness for your sin and exalt Allah with praise of your Lord in the evening and the morning

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يُجادِلونَ في آياتِ اللَّهِ بِغَيرِ سُلطانٍ أَتاهُم ۙ إِن في صُدورِهِم إِلّا كِبرٌ ما هُم بِبالِغيهِ ۚ فَاستَعِذ بِاللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّميعُ البَصيرُ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yujādilūn fī ʾāyāt llāh b-ghayr sulṭān ʾatāhum ʾ fī ṣudūrihim ʾillā kibr mā hum b-bālighīh f-staʿidh b-llāh ʾinnahū huw s-samīʿul-baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without any authority having come to them - there is not within their breasts except pride, the extent of which they cannot reach. So seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Seeing

arabic_uthmani: لَخَلقُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ أَكبَرُ مِن خَلقِ النّاسِ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: l-khalq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ ʾakbar m khalq n-nās w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: The creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, but most of the people do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَستَوِي الأَعمىٰ وَالبَصيرُ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ وَلَا المُسيءُ ۚ قَليلًا ما تَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-mā yastawīl-ʾaʿmā w-l-baṣīr w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-lāl-musīʾ qalīlam-mā tatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And not equal are the blind and the seeing, nor are those who believe and do righteous deeds and the evildoer. Little do you remember

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ السّاعَةَ لَآتِيَةٌ لا رَيبَ فيها وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾinn s-sāʿat l-ʾātiyat lā rayb fīhā w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - but most of the people do not believe

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ رَبُّكُمُ ادعوني أَستَجِب لَكُم ۚ إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَستَكبِرونَ عَن عِبادَتي سَيَدخُلونَ جَهَنَّمَ داخِرينَ
blank: w-qāl rabbukum dʿūnī ʾastajib lakum ʾinnalladhīn yastakbirūn ʿ ʿibādatī s-yadkhulūn jahannam dākhirīn
english_saheeh_international: And your Lord says, "Call upon Me; I will respond to you." Indeed, those who disdain My worship will enter Hell rendered contemptible

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ اللَّيلَ لِتَسكُنوا فيهِ وَالنَّهارَ مُبصِرًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَذو فَضلٍ عَلَى النّاسِ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يَشكُرونَ
blank: allāhulladhī jaʿal lakumul-layl l-taskunū fīh w-n-nahār mubṣir ʾinn llāh l-dhū faḍl ʿalā n-nās w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: It is Allah who made for you the night that you may rest therein and the day giving sight. Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of the people are not grateful

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُم خالِقُ كُلِّ شَيءٍ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنّىٰ تُؤفَكونَ
blank: dhālikum llāh rabbukum khāliq kull shayʾ lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw f-ʾannā tuʾfakūn
english_saheeh_international: That is Allah, your Lord, Creator of all things; there is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ يُؤفَكُ الَّذينَ كانوا بِآياتِ اللَّهِ يَجحَدونَ
blank: k-dhālik yuʾfakulladhīn kānū b-ʾāyāt llāh yajḥadūn
english_saheeh_international: Thus were those before you deluded who were rejecting the signs of Allah

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الأَرضَ قَرارًا وَالسَّماءَ بِناءً وَصَوَّرَكُم فَأَحسَنَ صُوَرَكُم وَرَزَقَكُم مِنَ الطَّيِّباتِ ۚ ذٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُم ۖ فَتَبارَكَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ العالَمينَ
blank: allāhulladhī jaʿal lakumul-ʾarḍ qarār w-s-samāʾ bināʾ w-ṣawwarakum f-ʾaḥsan ṣuwarakum w-razaqakum min ṭ-ṭayyibāt dhālikum llāh rabbukum f-tabārak llāh rabbul-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: It is Allah who made for you the earth a place of settlement and the sky a ceiling and formed you and perfected your forms and provided you with good things. That is Allah, your Lord; then blessed is Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الحَيُّ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ فَادعوهُ مُخلِصينَ لَهُ الدّينَ ۗ الحَمدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: huwal-ḥayy lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw f-dʿūh mukhliṣīn lah d-dīnal-ḥamd l-llāh rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: He is the Ever-Living; there is no deity except Him, so call upon Him, being sincere to Him in religion. All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قُل إِنّي نُهيتُ أَن أَعبُدَ الَّذينَ تَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ لَمّا جاءَنِيَ البَيِّناتُ مِن رَبّي وَأُمِرتُ أَن أُسلِمَ لِرَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: qul ʾinnī nuhīt ʾ ʾaʿbudalladhīn tadʿūn m dūn llāh lammā jāʾaniyal-bayyināt m rabbī w-ʾumirt ʾ ʾuslim l-rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Indeed, I have been forbidden to worship those you call upon besides Allah once the clear proofs have come to me from my Lord, and I have been commanded to submit to the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَكُم مِن تُرابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُطفَةٍ ثُمَّ مِن عَلَقَةٍ ثُمَّ يُخرِجُكُم طِفلًا ثُمَّ لِتَبلُغوا أَشُدَّكُم ثُمَّ لِتَكونوا شُيوخًا ۚ وَمِنكُم مَن يُتَوَفّىٰ مِن قَبلُ ۖ وَلِتَبلُغوا أَجَلًا مُسَمًّى وَلَعَلَّكُم تَعقِلونَ
blank: huwalladhī khalaqakum m turāb thumm m nuṭfat thumm m ʿalaqat thumm yukhrijukum ṭifl thumm l-tablughū ʾashuddakum thumm l-takūnū shuyūkh w-minkum m yutawaffā m qabl w-l-tablughū ʾajalam-musamm w-laʿallakum taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then He develops you that you reach your time of maturity, then further that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before that, so that you reach a specified term; and perhaps you will use reason

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي يُحيي وَيُميتُ ۖ فَإِذا قَضىٰ أَمرًا فَإِنَّما يَقولُ لَهُ كُن فَيَكونُ
blank: huwalladhī yuḥyī w-yumīt f-ʾidhā qaḍā ʾamr f-ʾinnamā yaqūl lahū k f-yakūn
english_saheeh_international: He it is who gives life and causes death; and when He decrees a matter, He but says to it, "Be," and it is

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ إِلَى الَّذينَ يُجادِلونَ في آياتِ اللَّهِ أَنّىٰ يُصرَفونَ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾilālladhīn yujādilūn fī ʾāyāt llāh ʾannā yuṣrafūn
english_saheeh_international: Do you not consider those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah - how are they averted

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِالكِتابِ وَبِما أَرسَلنا بِهِ رُسُلَنا ۖ فَسَوفَ يَعلَمونَ
blank: alladhīn kadhdhabū b-l-kitāb w-b-mā ʾarsalnā bihī rusulanā f-sawf yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who deny the Book and that with which We sent Our messengers - they are going to know

arabic_uthmani: إِذِ الأَغلالُ في أَعناقِهِم وَالسَّلاسِلُ يُسحَبونَ
blank: ʾidhil-ʾaghlāl fī ʾaʿnāqihim w-s-salāsil yusḥabūn
english_saheeh_international: When the shackles are around their necks and the chains; they will be dragged

arabic_uthmani: فِي الحَميمِ ثُمَّ فِي النّارِ يُسجَرونَ
blank: fīl-ḥamīm thumm fī n-nār yusjarūn
english_saheeh_international: In boiling water; then in the Fire they will be filled with flame

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ قيلَ لَهُم أَينَ ما كُنتُم تُشرِكونَ
blank: thumm qīl lahum ʾayn mā kuntum tushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: Then it will be said to them, "Where is that which you used to associate with Him in worship

arabic_uthmani: مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ۖ قالوا ضَلّوا عَنّا بَل لَم نَكُن نَدعو مِن قَبلُ شَيئًا ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ الكافِرينَ
blank: m dūn llāh qālū ḍallū ʿannā bal lam nak nadʿū m qabl shayʾ k-dhālik yuḍill llāhul-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: Other than Allah?" They will say, "They have departed from us; rather, we did not used to invoke previously anything." Thus does Allah put astray the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكُم بِما كُنتُم تَفرَحونَ فِي الأَرضِ بِغَيرِ الحَقِّ وَبِما كُنتُم تَمرَحونَ
blank: dhālikum b-mā kuntum tafraḥūn fīl-ʾarḍ b-ghayril-ḥaqq w-b-mā kuntum tamraḥūn
english_saheeh_international: The angels will say, "That was because you used to exult upon the earth without right and you used to behave insolently

arabic_uthmani: ادخُلوا أَبوابَ جَهَنَّمَ خالِدينَ فيها ۖ فَبِئسَ مَثوَى المُتَكَبِّرينَ
blank: udkhulū ʾabwāb jahannam khālidīn fīhā f-biʾs mathwāl-mutakabbirīn
english_saheeh_international: Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant

arabic_uthmani: فَاصبِر إِنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۚ فَإِمّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعضَ الَّذي نَعِدُهُم أَو نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَينا يُرجَعونَ
blank: f-ṣbir ʾinn waʿd llāh ḥaqq f-ʾimmā nuriyannak baʿḍalladhī naʿiduhum ʾaw natawaffayannak f-ʾilaynā yurjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: So be patient, O Muhammad; indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And whether We show you some of what We have promised them or We take you in death, it is to Us they will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا رُسُلًا مِن قَبلِكَ مِنهُم مَن قَصَصنا عَلَيكَ وَمِنهُم مَن لَم نَقصُص عَلَيكَ ۗ وَما كانَ لِرَسولٍ أَن يَأتِيَ بِآيَةٍ إِلّا بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِذا جاءَ أَمرُ اللَّهِ قُضِيَ بِالحَقِّ وَخَسِرَ هُنالِكَ المُبطِلونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā rusulam-m qablik minhum m qaṣaṣnā ʿalayk w-minhum m lam naqṣuṣ ʿalayk w-mā kān l-rasūl ʾ yaʾtiy b-ʾāyat ʾillā b-ʾidhn llāh f-ʾidhā jāʾ ʾamr llāh quḍiy b-l-ḥaqq w-khasir hunālikal-mubṭilūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have already sent messengers before you. Among them are those whose stories We have related to you, and among them are those whose stories We have not related to you. And it was not for any messenger to bring a sign or verse except by permission of Allah. So when the command of Allah comes, it will be concluded in truth, and the falsifiers will thereupon lose all

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الأَنعامَ لِتَركَبوا مِنها وَمِنها تَأكُلونَ
blank: allāhulladhī jaʿal lakumul-ʾanʿām l-tarkabū minhā w-minhā taʾkulūn
english_saheeh_international: It is Allah who made for you the grazing animals upon which you ride, and some of them you eat

arabic_uthmani: وَلَكُم فيها مَنافِعُ وَلِتَبلُغوا عَلَيها حاجَةً في صُدورِكُم وَعَلَيها وَعَلَى الفُلكِ تُحمَلونَ
blank: w-lakum fīhā manāfiʿ w-l-tablughū ʿalayhā ḥājat fī ṣudūrikum w-ʿalayhā w-ʿalāl-fulk tuḥmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And for you therein are other benefits and that you may realize upon them a need which is in your breasts; and upon them and upon ships you are carried

arabic_uthmani: وَيُريكُم آياتِهِ فَأَيَّ آياتِ اللَّهِ تُنكِرونَ
blank: w-yurīkum ʾāyātihī f-ʾayy ʾāyāt llāh tunkirūn
english_saheeh_international: And He shows you His signs. So which of the signs of Allah do you deny

arabic_uthmani: أَفَلَم يَسيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَيَنظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ كانوا أَكثَرَ مِنهُم وَأَشَدَّ قُوَّةً وَآثارًا فِي الأَرضِ فَما أَغنىٰ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: ʾ-f-lam yasīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-yanẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatulladhīn m qablihim kānū ʾakthar minhum w-ʾashadd quwwat w-ʾāthār fīl-ʾarḍ f-mā ʾaghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? They were more numerous than themselves and greater in strength and in impression on the land, but they were not availed by what they used to earn

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَتهُم رُسُلُهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ فَرِحوا بِما عِندَهُم مِنَ العِلمِ وَحاقَ بِهِم ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾathum rusuluhum b-l-bayyināt fariḥū b-mā ʿindahum minal-ʿilm w-ḥāq bihim mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And when their messengers came to them with clear proofs, they merely rejoiced in what they had of knowledge, but they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا رَأَوا بَأسَنا قالوا آمَنّا بِاللَّهِ وَحدَهُ وَكَفَرنا بِما كُنّا بِهِ مُشرِكينَ
blank: f-lammā raʾaw baʾsanā qālū ʾāmannā b-llāh waḥdahū w-kafarnā b-mā kunnā bihī mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: And when they saw Our punishment, they said," We believe in Allah alone and disbelieve in that which we used to associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: فَلَم يَكُ يَنفَعُهُم إيمانُهُم لَمّا رَأَوا بَأسَنا ۖ سُنَّتَ اللَّهِ الَّتي قَد خَلَت في عِبادِهِ ۖ وَخَسِرَ هُنالِكَ الكافِرونَ
blank: f-lam yak yanfaʿuhum ʾīmānuhum lammā raʾaw baʾsanā sunnat llāh llatī qad khalat fī ʿibādihī w-khasir hunālikal-kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: But never did their faith benefit them once they saw Our punishment. It is the established way of Allah which has preceded among His servants. And the disbelievers thereupon lost all

arabic_uthmani: حم
blank: ḥ-m (ḥā mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Ha, Meem

arabic_uthmani: تَنزيلٌ مِنَ الرَّحمٰنِ الرَّحيمِ
blank: tanzīl min r-raḥmānir-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: This is a revelation from the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful

arabic_uthmani: كِتابٌ فُصِّلَت آياتُهُ قُرآنًا عَرَبِيًّا لِقَومٍ يَعلَمونَ
blank: kitāb fuṣṣilat ʾāyātuhū qurʾān ʿarabiyy l-qawm yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: A Book whose verses have been detailed, an Arabic Qur'an for a people who know

arabic_uthmani: بَشيرًا وَنَذيرًا فَأَعرَضَ أَكثَرُهُم فَهُم لا يَسمَعونَ
blank: bashīr w-nadhīr f-ʾaʿraḍ ʾaktharuhum f-hum lā yasmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: As a giver of good tidings and a warner; but most of them turn away, so they do not hear

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا قُلوبُنا في أَكِنَّةٍ مِمّا تَدعونا إِلَيهِ وَفي آذانِنا وَقرٌ وَمِن بَينِنا وَبَينِكَ حِجابٌ فَاعمَل إِنَّنا عامِلونَ
blank: w-qālū qulūbunā fī ʾakinnat mimmā tadʿūnā ʾilayh w-fī ʾādhāninā waqr w-m bayninā w-baynik ḥijāb f-ʿmal ʾinnanā ʿāmilūn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "Our hearts are within coverings from that to which you invite us, and in our ears is deafness, and between us and you is a partition, so work; indeed, we are working

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّما أَنا بَشَرٌ مِثلُكُم يوحىٰ إِلَيَّ أَنَّما إِلٰهُكُم إِلٰهٌ واحِدٌ فَاستَقيموا إِلَيهِ وَاستَغفِروهُ ۗ وَوَيلٌ لِلمُشرِكينَ
blank: qul ʾinnamā ʾan bashar mithlukum yūḥā ʾilayy ʾannamā ʾilāhukum ʾilāh wāḥid f-staqīmū ʾilayh w-staghfirūh w-wayl l-l-mushrikīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "I am only a man like you to whom it has been revealed that your god is but one God; so take a straight course to Him and seek His forgiveness." And woe to those who associate others with Allah

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ لا يُؤتونَ الزَّكاةَ وَهُم بِالآخِرَةِ هُم كافِرونَ
blank: alladhīn lā yuʾtūn z-zakāt w-hum b-l-ʾākhirat hum kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who do not give zakah, and in the Hereafter they are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ لَهُم أَجرٌ غَيرُ مَمنونٍ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt lahum ʾajr ghayr mamnūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them is a reward uninterrupted

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قُل أَئِنَّكُم لَتَكفُرونَ بِالَّذي خَلَقَ الأَرضَ في يَومَينِ وَتَجعَلونَ لَهُ أَندادًا ۚ ذٰلِكَ رَبُّ العالَمينَ
blank: qul ʾ-ʾinnakum l-takfurūn b-lladhī khalaqal-ʾarḍ fī yawmayn w-tajʿalūn lahū ʾandād dhālik rabbul-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Do you indeed disbelieve in He who created the earth in two days and attribute to Him equals? That is the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلَ فيها رَواسِيَ مِن فَوقِها وَبارَكَ فيها وَقَدَّرَ فيها أَقواتَها في أَربَعَةِ أَيّامٍ سَواءً لِلسّائِلينَ
blank: w-jaʿal fīhā rawāsiy m fawqihā w-bārak fīhā w-qaddar fīhā ʾaqwātahā fī ʾarbaʿat ʾayyām sawāʾ l-s-sāʾilīn
english_saheeh_international: And He placed on the earth firmly set mountains over its surface, and He blessed it and determined therein its creatures' sustenance in four days without distinction - for the information of those who ask

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ استَوىٰ إِلَى السَّماءِ وَهِيَ دُخانٌ فَقالَ لَها وَلِلأَرضِ ائتِيا طَوعًا أَو كَرهًا قالَتا أَتَينا طائِعينَ
blank: thumm stawā ʾilā s-samāʾ w-hiy dukhān f-qāl lahā w-l-l-ʾarḍ ʾtiyā ṭawʿ ʾaw karh qālatā ʾataynā ṭāʾiʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Then He directed Himself to the heaven while it was smoke and said to it and to the earth, "Come into being, willingly or by compulsion." They said, "We have come willingly

arabic_uthmani: فَقَضاهُنَّ سَبعَ سَماواتٍ في يَومَينِ وَأَوحىٰ في كُلِّ سَماءٍ أَمرَها ۚ وَزَيَّنَّا السَّماءَ الدُّنيا بِمَصابيحَ وَحِفظًا ۚ ذٰلِكَ تَقديرُ العَزيزِ العَليمِ
blank: f-qaḍāhunn sabʿ samāwāt fī yawmayn w-ʾawḥā fī kull samāʾ ʾamrahā w-zayyannā s-samāʾ d-dunyā b-maṣābīḥ w-ḥifẓ dhālik taqdīrul-ʿazīzil-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And He completed them as seven heavens within two days and inspired in each heaven its command. And We adorned the nearest heaven with lamps and as protection. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن أَعرَضوا فَقُل أَنذَرتُكُم صاعِقَةً مِثلَ صاعِقَةِ عادٍ وَثَمودَ
blank: f-ʾ ʾaʿraḍū f-qul ʾandhartukum ṣāʿiqatam-mithl ṣāʿiqat ʿād w-thamūd
english_saheeh_international: But if they turn away, then say, "I have warned you of a thunderbolt like the thunderbolt that struck 'Aad and Thamud

arabic_uthmani: إِذ جاءَتهُمُ الرُّسُلُ مِن بَينِ أَيديهِم وَمِن خَلفِهِم أَلّا تَعبُدوا إِلَّا اللَّهَ ۖ قالوا لَو شاءَ رَبُّنا لَأَنزَلَ مَلائِكَةً فَإِنّا بِما أُرسِلتُم بِهِ كافِرونَ
blank: ʾidh jāʾathum r-rusul m bayn ʾaydīhim w-m khalfihim ʾallā taʿbudū ʾillā llāh qālū law shāʾ rabbunā l-ʾanzal malāʾikat f-ʾinnā b-mā ʾursiltum bihī kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: That occurred when the messengers had come to them before them and after them, saying, "Worship not except Allah." They said, "If our Lord had willed, He would have sent down the angels, so indeed we, in that with which you have been sent, are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمّا عادٌ فَاستَكبَروا فِي الأَرضِ بِغَيرِ الحَقِّ وَقالوا مَن أَشَدُّ مِنّا قُوَّةً ۖ أَوَلَم يَرَوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ الَّذي خَلَقَهُم هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنهُم قُوَّةً ۖ وَكانوا بِآياتِنا يَجحَدونَ
blank: f-ʾammā ʿād f-stakbarū fīl-ʾarḍ b-ghayril-ḥaqq w-qālū m ʾashadd minnā quwwat ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾann llāhalladhī khalaqahum huw ʾashadd minhum quwwat w-kānū b-ʾāyātinā yajḥadūn
english_saheeh_international: As for 'Aad, they were arrogant upon the earth without right and said, "Who is greater than us in strength?" Did they not consider that Allah who created them was greater than them in strength? But they were rejecting Our signs

arabic_uthmani: فَأَرسَلنا عَلَيهِم ريحًا صَرصَرًا في أَيّامٍ نَحِساتٍ لِنُذيقَهُم عَذابَ الخِزيِ فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ۖ وَلَعَذابُ الآخِرَةِ أَخزىٰ ۖ وَهُم لا يُنصَرونَ
blank: f-ʾarsalnā ʿalayhim rīḥ ṣarṣar fī ʾayyām naḥisāt l-nudhīqahum ʿadhābal-khizy fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-l-ʿadhābul-ʾākhirat ʾakhzā w-hum lā yunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: So We sent upon them a screaming wind during days of misfortune to make them taste the punishment of disgrace in the worldly life; but the punishment of the Hereafter is more disgracing, and they will not be helped

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا ثَمودُ فَهَدَيناهُم فَاستَحَبُّوا العَمىٰ عَلَى الهُدىٰ فَأَخَذَتهُم صاعِقَةُ العَذابِ الهونِ بِما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: w-ʾammā thamūd f-hadaynāhum f-staḥabbūl-ʿamā ʿalāl-hudā f-ʾakhadhathum ṣāʿiqatul-ʿadhābil-hūn b-mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: And as for Thamud, We guided them, but they preferred blindness over guidance, so the thunderbolt of humiliating punishment seized them for what they used to earn

arabic_uthmani: وَنَجَّينَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَكانوا يَتَّقونَ
blank: w-najjaynālladhīn ʾāmanū w-kānū yattaqūn
english_saheeh_international: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يُحشَرُ أَعداءُ اللَّهِ إِلَى النّارِ فَهُم يوزَعونَ
blank: w-yawm yuḥshar ʾaʿdāʾ llāh ʾilā n-nār f-hum yūzaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, the Day when the enemies of Allah will be gathered to the Fire while they are driven assembled in rows

arabic_uthmani: حَتّىٰ إِذا ما جاءوها شَهِدَ عَلَيهِم سَمعُهُم وَأَبصارُهُم وَجُلودُهُم بِما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: ḥattā ʾidhā mā jāʾūhā shahid ʿalayhim samʿuhum w-ʾabṣāruhum w-julūduhum b-mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Until, when they reach it, their hearing and their eyes and their skins will testify against them of what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لِجُلودِهِم لِمَ شَهِدتُم عَلَينا ۖ قالوا أَنطَقَنَا اللَّهُ الَّذي أَنطَقَ كُلَّ شَيءٍ وَهُوَ خَلَقَكُم أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَإِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: w-qālū l-julūdihim l-m shahidtum ʿalaynā qālū ʾanṭaqanā llāhulladhī ʾanṭaq kull shayʾ w-huw khalaqakum ʾawwal marrat w-ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And they will say to their skins, "Why have you testified against us?" They will say, "We were made to speak by Allah, who has made everything speak; and He created you the first time, and to Him you are returned

arabic_uthmani: وَما كُنتُم تَستَتِرونَ أَن يَشهَدَ عَلَيكُم سَمعُكُم وَلا أَبصارُكُم وَلا جُلودُكُم وَلٰكِن ظَنَنتُم أَنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَعلَمُ كَثيرًا مِمّا تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-mā kuntum tastatirūn ʾ yashhad ʿalaykum samʿukum w-lā ʾabṣārukum w-lā julūdukum w-lāk ẓanantum ʾann llāh lā yaʿlam kathīram-mimmā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And you were not covering yourselves, lest your hearing testify against you or your sight or your skins, but you assumed that Allah does not know much of what you do

arabic_uthmani: وَذٰلِكُم ظَنُّكُمُ الَّذي ظَنَنتُم بِرَبِّكُم أَرداكُم فَأَصبَحتُم مِنَ الخاسِرينَ
blank: w-dhālikum ẓannukumulladhī ẓanantum b-rabbikum ʾardākum f-ʾaṣbaḥtum minal-khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: And that was your assumption which you assumed about your Lord. It has brought you to ruin, and you have become among the losers

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن يَصبِروا فَالنّارُ مَثوًى لَهُم ۖ وَإِن يَستَعتِبوا فَما هُم مِنَ المُعتَبينَ
blank: f-ʾ yaṣbirū f-n-nār mathw lahum w-ʾ yastaʿtibū f-mā hum minal-muʿtabīn
english_saheeh_international: So even if they are patient, the Fire is a residence for them; and if they ask to appease Allah, they will not be of those who are allowed to appease

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَقَيَّضنا لَهُم قُرَناءَ فَزَيَّنوا لَهُم ما بَينَ أَيديهِم وَما خَلفَهُم وَحَقَّ عَلَيهِمُ القَولُ في أُمَمٍ قَد خَلَت مِن قَبلِهِم مِنَ الجِنِّ وَالإِنسِ ۖ إِنَّهُم كانوا خاسِرينَ
blank: w-qayyaḍnā lahum quranāʾ f-zayyanū lahum mā bayn ʾaydīhim w-mā khalfahum w-ḥaqq ʿalayhimul-qawl fī ʾumam qad khalat m qablihim minal-jinn w-l-ʾins ʾinnahum kānū khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: And We appointed for them companions who made attractive to them what was before them and what was behind them of sin, and the word has come into effect upon them among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they all were losers

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لا تَسمَعوا لِهٰذَا القُرآنِ وَالغَوا فيهِ لَعَلَّكُم تَغلِبونَ
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū lā tasmaʿū l-hādhāl-qurʾān w-lghaw fīh laʿallakum taghlibūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieve say, "Do not listen to this Qur'an and speak noisily during the recitation of it that perhaps you will overcome

arabic_uthmani: فَلَنُذيقَنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا عَذابًا شَديدًا وَلَنَجزِيَنَّهُم أَسوَأَ الَّذي كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: f-l-nudhīqannalladhīn kafarū ʿadhāb shadīd w-l-najziyannahum ʾaswaʾalladhī kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: But We will surely cause those who disbelieve to taste a severe punishment, and We will surely recompense them for the worst of what they had been doing

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ جَزاءُ أَعداءِ اللَّهِ النّارُ ۖ لَهُم فيها دارُ الخُلدِ ۖ جَزاءً بِما كانوا بِآياتِنا يَجحَدونَ
blank: dhālik jazāʾ ʾaʿdāʾ llāh n-nār lahum fīhā dārul-khuld jazāʾ b-mā kānū b-ʾāyātinā yajḥadūn
english_saheeh_international: That is the recompense of the enemies of Allah - the Fire. For them therein is the home of eternity as recompense for what they, of Our verses, were rejecting

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا رَبَّنا أَرِنَا اللَّذَينِ أَضَلّانا مِنَ الجِنِّ وَالإِنسِ نَجعَلهُما تَحتَ أَقدامِنا لِيَكونا مِنَ الأَسفَلينَ
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū rabbanā ʾarinā lladhayn ʾaḍallānā minal-jinn w-l-ʾins najʿalhumā taḥt ʾaqdāminā l-yakūnā minal-ʾasfalīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieved will then say, "Our Lord, show us those who misled us of the jinn and men so we may put them under our feet that they will be among the lowest

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ قالوا رَبُّنَا اللَّهُ ثُمَّ استَقاموا تَتَنَزَّلُ عَلَيهِمُ المَلائِكَةُ أَلّا تَخافوا وَلا تَحزَنوا وَأَبشِروا بِالجَنَّةِ الَّتي كُنتُم توعَدونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn qālū rabbunā llāh thumm staqāmū tatanazzal ʿalayhimul-malāʾikat ʾallā takhāfū w-lā taḥzanū w-ʾabshirū b-l-jannat llatī kuntum tūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah " and then remained on a right course - the angels will descend upon them, saying, "Do not fear and do not grieve but receive good tidings of Paradise, which you were promised

arabic_uthmani: نَحنُ أَولِياؤُكُم فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا وَفِي الآخِرَةِ ۖ وَلَكُم فيها ما تَشتَهي أَنفُسُكُم وَلَكُم فيها ما تَدَّعونَ
blank: naḥn ʾawliyāʾukum fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-fīl-ʾākhirat w-lakum fīhā mā tashtahī ʾanfusukum w-lakum fīhā mā taddaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: We angels were your allies in worldly life and are so in the Hereafter. And you will have therein whatever your souls desire, and you will have therein whatever you request or wish

arabic_uthmani: نُزُلًا مِن غَفورٍ رَحيمٍ
blank: nuzulam-m ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: As accommodation from a Lord who is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَحسَنُ قَولًا مِمَّن دَعا إِلَى اللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صالِحًا وَقالَ إِنَّني مِنَ المُسلِمينَ
blank: w-m ʾaḥsan qawlam-mimm daʿā ʾilā llāh w-ʿamil ṣāliḥ w-qāl ʾinnanī minal-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And who is better in speech than one who invites to Allah and does righteousness and says, "Indeed, I am of the Muslims

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَستَوِي الحَسَنَةُ وَلَا السَّيِّئَةُ ۚ ادفَع بِالَّتي هِيَ أَحسَنُ فَإِذَا الَّذي بَينَكَ وَبَينَهُ عَداوَةٌ كَأَنَّهُ وَلِيٌّ حَميمٌ
blank: w-lā tastawīl-ḥasanat w-lā s-sayyiʾat dfaʿ b-llatī hiy ʾaḥsan f-ʾidhālladhī baynak w-baynahū ʿadāwat k-ʾannahū waliyy ḥamīm
english_saheeh_international: And not equal are the good deed and the bad. Repel evil by that deed which is better; and thereupon the one whom between you and him is enmity will become as though he was a devoted friend

arabic_uthmani: وَما يُلَقّاها إِلَّا الَّذينَ صَبَروا وَما يُلَقّاها إِلّا ذو حَظٍّ عَظيمٍ
blank: w-mā yulaqqāhā ʾillālladhīn ṣabarū w-mā yulaqqāhā ʾillā dhū ḥaẓẓ ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: But none is granted it except those who are patient, and none is granted it except one having a great portion of good

arabic_uthmani: وَإِمّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ الشَّيطانِ نَزغٌ فَاستَعِذ بِاللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: w-ʾimmā yanzaghannak min sh-shayṭān nazgh f-staʿidh b-llāh ʾinnahū huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And if there comes to you from Satan an evil suggestion, then seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ اللَّيلُ وَالنَّهارُ وَالشَّمسُ وَالقَمَرُ ۚ لا تَسجُدوا لِلشَّمسِ وَلا لِلقَمَرِ وَاسجُدوا لِلَّهِ الَّذي خَلَقَهُنَّ إِن كُنتُم إِيّاهُ تَعبُدونَ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihil-layl w-n-nahār w-sh-shams w-l-qamar lā tasjudū l-sh-shams w-lā l-l-qamar wasjudū l-llāhilladhī khalaqahunn ʾ kuntum ʾiyyāh taʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: And of His signs are the night and day and the sun and moon. Do not prostrate to the sun or to the moon, but prostate to Allah, who created them, if it should be Him that you worship

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنِ استَكبَروا فَالَّذينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ يُسَبِّحونَ لَهُ بِاللَّيلِ وَالنَّهارِ وَهُم لا يَسأَمونَ ۩
blank: f-ʾin stakbarū f-lladhīn ʿind rabbik yusabbiḥūn lahū b-l-layl w-n-nahār w-hum lā yasʾamūn
english_saheeh_international: But if they are arrogant - then those who are near your Lord exalt Him by night and by day, and they do not become weary

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ أَنَّكَ تَرَى الأَرضَ خاشِعَةً فَإِذا أَنزَلنا عَلَيهَا الماءَ اهتَزَّت وَرَبَت ۚ إِنَّ الَّذي أَحياها لَمُحيِي المَوتىٰ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihī ʾannak tarāl-ʾarḍ khāshiʿat f-ʾidhā ʾanzalnā ʿalayhāl-māʾ htazzat w-rabat ʾinnalladhī ʾaḥyāhā l-muḥyil-mawtā ʾinnahū ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And of His signs is that you see the earth stilled, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and grows. Indeed, He who has given it life is the Giver of Life to the dead. Indeed, He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يُلحِدونَ في آياتِنا لا يَخفَونَ عَلَينا ۗ أَفَمَن يُلقىٰ فِي النّارِ خَيرٌ أَم مَن يَأتي آمِنًا يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۚ اعمَلوا ما شِئتُم ۖ إِنَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yulḥidūn fī ʾāyātinā lā yakhfawn ʿalaynā ʾ-f-m yulqā fī n-nār khayr ʾam m yaʾtī ʾāmin yawmal-qiyāmat ʿmalū mā shiʾtum ʾinnahū b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who inject deviation into Our verses are not concealed from Us. So, is he who is cast into the Fire better or he who comes secure on the Day of Resurrection? Do whatever you will; indeed, He is Seeing of what you do

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا بِالذِّكرِ لَمّا جاءَهُم ۖ وَإِنَّهُ لَكِتابٌ عَزيزٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū b-dh-dhikr lammā jāʾahum w-ʾinnahū l-kitāb ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who disbelieve in the message after it has come to them... And indeed, it is a mighty Book

arabic_uthmani: لا يَأتيهِ الباطِلُ مِن بَينِ يَدَيهِ وَلا مِن خَلفِهِ ۖ تَنزيلٌ مِن حَكيمٍ حَميدٍ
blank: lā yaʾtīhil-bāṭil m bayn yadayh w-lā m khalfihī tanzīl m ḥakīm ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: Falsehood cannot approach it from before it or from behind it; it is a revelation from a Lord who is Wise and Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: ما يُقالُ لَكَ إِلّا ما قَد قيلَ لِلرُّسُلِ مِن قَبلِكَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذو مَغفِرَةٍ وَذو عِقابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: mā yuqāl lak ʾillā mā qad qīl l-r-rusul m qablik ʾinn rabbak l-dhū maghfirat w-dhū ʿiqāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Nothing is said to you, O Muhammad, except what was already said to the messengers before you. Indeed, your Lord is a possessor of forgiveness and a possessor of painful penalty

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو جَعَلناهُ قُرآنًا أَعجَمِيًّا لَقالوا لَولا فُصِّلَت آياتُهُ ۖ أَأَعجَمِيٌّ وَعَرَبِيٌّ ۗ قُل هُوَ لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا هُدًى وَشِفاءٌ ۖ وَالَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ في آذانِهِم وَقرٌ وَهُوَ عَلَيهِم عَمًى ۚ أُولٰئِكَ يُنادَونَ مِن مَكانٍ بَعيدٍ
blank: w-law jaʿalnāh qurʾān ʾaʿjamiyy l-qālū law-lā fuṣṣilat ʾāyātuhū ʾ-aʿjamiyy w-ʿarabiyy qul huw l-lladhīn ʾāmanū hud w-shifāʾ w-lladhīn lā yuʾminūn fī ʾādhānihim waqr w-huw ʿalayhim ʿam ʾulāʾik yunādawn m makān baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: And if We had made it a non-Arabic Qur'an, they would have said, "Why are its verses not explained in detail in our language? Is it a foreign recitation and an Arab messenger?" Say, "It is, for those who believe, a guidance and cure." And those who do not believe - in their ears is deafness, and it is upon them blindness. Those are being called from a distant place

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَينا موسَى الكِتابَ فَاختُلِفَ فيهِ ۗ وَلَولا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَت مِن رَبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَينَهُم ۚ وَإِنَّهُم لَفي شَكٍّ مِنهُ مُريبٍ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā mūsāl-kitāb f-khtulif fīh w-law-lā kalimat sabaqat m rabbik l-quḍiy baynahum w-ʾinnahum l-fī shakk minh murīb
english_saheeh_international: And We had already given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt

arabic_uthmani: مَن عَمِلَ صالِحًا فَلِنَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن أَساءَ فَعَلَيها ۗ وَما رَبُّكَ بِظَلّامٍ لِلعَبيدِ
blank: m ʿamil ṣāliḥ f-l-nafsihī w-m ʾasāʾ f-ʿalayhā w-mā rabbuk b-ẓallām l-l-ʿabīd
english_saheeh_international: Whoever does righteousness - it is for his own soul; and whoever does evil does so against it. And your Lord is not ever unjust to His servants

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِلَيهِ يُرَدُّ عِلمُ السّاعَةِ ۚ وَما تَخرُجُ مِن ثَمَراتٍ مِن أَكمامِها وَما تَحمِلُ مِن أُنثىٰ وَلا تَضَعُ إِلّا بِعِلمِهِ ۚ وَيَومَ يُناديهِم أَينَ شُرَكائي قالوا آذَنّاكَ ما مِنّا مِن شَهيدٍ
blank: ʾilayh yuradd ʿilm s-sāʿat w-mā takhruj m thamarāt m ʾakmāmihā w-mā taḥmil m ʾunthā w-lā taḍaʿ ʾillā b-ʿilmihī w-yawm yunādīhim ʾayn shurakāʾī qālū ʾādhannāk mā minnā m shahīd
english_saheeh_international: To him alone is attributed knowledge of the Hour. And fruits emerge not from their coverings nor does a female conceive or give birth except with His knowledge. And the Day He will call to them, "Where are My 'partners'?" they will say, "We announce to You that there is no longer among us any witness to that

arabic_uthmani: وَضَلَّ عَنهُم ما كانوا يَدعونَ مِن قَبلُ ۖ وَظَنّوا ما لَهُم مِن مَحيصٍ
blank: w-ḍall ʿanhum mā kānū yadʿūn m qabl w-ẓannū mā lahum m maḥīṣ
english_saheeh_international: And lost from them will be those they were invoking before, and they will be certain that they have no place of escape

arabic_uthmani: لا يَسأَمُ الإِنسانُ مِن دُعاءِ الخَيرِ وَإِن مَسَّهُ الشَّرُّ فَيَئوسٌ قَنوطٌ
blank: lā yasʾamul-ʾinsān m duʿāʾil-khayr w-ʾ massah sh-sharr f-yaʾūs qanūṭ
english_saheeh_international: Man is not weary of supplication for good things, but if evil touches him, he is hopeless and despairing

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن أَذَقناهُ رَحمَةً مِنّا مِن بَعدِ ضَرّاءَ مَسَّتهُ لَيَقولَنَّ هٰذا لي وَما أَظُنُّ السّاعَةَ قائِمَةً وَلَئِن رُجِعتُ إِلىٰ رَبّي إِنَّ لي عِندَهُ لَلحُسنىٰ ۚ فَلَنُنَبِّئَنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا بِما عَمِلوا وَلَنُذيقَنَّهُم مِن عَذابٍ غَليظٍ
blank: w-l-ʾ ʾadhaqnāh raḥmatam-minnā m baʿd ḍarrāʾ massath l-yaqūlann hādhā lī w-mā ʾaẓunn s-sāʿat qāʾimat w-l-ʾ rujiʿt ʾilā rabbī ʾinn lī ʿindahū l-l-ḥusnā f-l-nunabbiʾannalladhīn kafarū b-mā ʿamilū w-l-nudhīqannahum m ʿadhāb ghalīẓ
english_saheeh_international: And if We let him taste mercy from Us after an adversity which has touched him, he will surely say, "This is due to me, and I do not think the Hour will occur; and even if I should be returned to my Lord, indeed, for me there will be with Him the best." But We will surely inform those who disbelieved about what they did, and We will surely make them taste a massive punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا أَنعَمنا عَلَى الإِنسانِ أَعرَضَ وَنَأىٰ بِجانِبِهِ وَإِذا مَسَّهُ الشَّرُّ فَذو دُعاءٍ عَريضٍ
blank: w-ʾidhā ʾanʿamnā ʿalāl-ʾinsān ʾaʿraḍ w-naʾā b-jānibihī w-ʾidhā massah sh-sharr f-dhū duʿāʾ ʿarīḍ
english_saheeh_international: And when We bestow favor upon man, he turns away and distances himself; but when evil touches him, then he is full of extensive supplication

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم إِن كانَ مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ كَفَرتُم بِهِ مَن أَضَلُّ مِمَّن هُوَ في شِقاقٍ بَعيدٍ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ kān m ʿind llāh thumm kafartum bihī m ʾaḍall mimm huw fī shiqāq baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an is from Allah and you disbelieved in it, who would be more astray than one who is in extreme dissension

arabic_uthmani: سَنُريهِم آياتِنا فِي الآفاقِ وَفي أَنفُسِهِم حَتّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَهُم أَنَّهُ الحَقُّ ۗ أَوَلَم يَكفِ بِرَبِّكَ أَنَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ شَهيدٌ
blank: s-nurīhim ʾāyātinā fīl-ʾāfāq w-fī ʾanfusihim ḥattā yatabayyan lahum ʾannahul-ḥaqq ʾ-w-lam yakf b-rabbik ʾannahū ʿalā kull shayʾ shahīd
english_saheeh_international: We will show them Our signs in the horizons and within themselves until it becomes clear to them that it is the truth. But is it not sufficient concerning your Lord that He is, over all things, a Witness

arabic_uthmani: أَلا إِنَّهُم في مِريَةٍ مِن لِقاءِ رَبِّهِم ۗ أَلا إِنَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ مُحيطٌ
blank: ʾ-lā ʾinnahum fī miryat m liqāʾ rabbihim ʾ-lā ʾinnahū b-kull shayʾ muḥīṭ
english_saheeh_international: Unquestionably, they are in doubt about the meeting with their Lord. Unquestionably He is, of all things, encompassing

arabic_uthmani: حم
blank: ḥ-m (ḥā mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Ha, Meem

arabic_uthmani: عسق
blank: ʿ-s-q (ʿayn sīn qāf)
english_saheeh_international: Ayn, Seen, Qaf

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ يوحي إِلَيكَ وَإِلَى الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِكَ اللَّهُ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: k-dhālik yūḥī ʾilayk w-ʾilālladhīn m qablik llāhul-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Thus has He revealed to you, O Muhammad, and to those before you - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: لَهُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۖ وَهُوَ العَلِيُّ العَظيمُ
blank: lahū mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-huwal-ʿaliyyul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and He is the Most High, the Most Great

arabic_uthmani: تَكادُ السَّماواتُ يَتَفَطَّرنَ مِن فَوقِهِنَّ ۚ وَالمَلائِكَةُ يُسَبِّحونَ بِحَمدِ رَبِّهِم وَيَستَغفِرونَ لِمَن فِي الأَرضِ ۗ أَلا إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الغَفورُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: takād s-samāwāt yatafaṭṭarn m fawqihinn w-l-malāʾikat yusabbiḥūn b-ḥamd rabbihim w-yastaghfirūn l-m fīl-ʾarḍ ʾ-lā ʾinn llāh huwal-ghafūr r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: The heavens almost break from above them, and the angels exalt Allah with praise of their Lord and ask forgiveness for those on earth. Unquestionably, it is Allah who is the Forgiving, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ اتَّخَذوا مِن دونِهِ أَولِياءَ اللَّهُ حَفيظٌ عَلَيهِم وَما أَنتَ عَلَيهِم بِوَكيلٍ
blank: w-lladhīn ttakhadhū m dūnihī ʾawliyāʾ llāh ḥafīẓ ʿalayhim w-mā ʾant ʿalayhim b-wakīl
english_saheeh_international: And those who take as allies other than Him - Allah is yet Guardian over them; and you, O Muhammad, are not over them a manager

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ أَوحَينا إِلَيكَ قُرآنًا عَرَبِيًّا لِتُنذِرَ أُمَّ القُرىٰ وَمَن حَولَها وَتُنذِرَ يَومَ الجَمعِ لا رَيبَ فيهِ ۚ فَريقٌ فِي الجَنَّةِ وَفَريقٌ فِي السَّعيرِ
blank: w-k-dhālik ʾawḥaynā ʾilayk qurʾān ʿarabiyy l-tundhir ʾummal-qurā w-m ḥawlahā w-tundhir yawmal-jamʿ lā rayb fīh farīq fīl-jannat w-farīq fī s-saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: And thus We have revealed to you an Arabic Qur'an that you may warn the Mother of Cities Makkah and those around it and warn of the Day of Assembly, about which there is no doubt. A party will be in Paradise and a party in the Blaze

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو شاءَ اللَّهُ لَجَعَلَهُم أُمَّةً واحِدَةً وَلٰكِن يُدخِلُ مَن يَشاءُ في رَحمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظّالِمونَ ما لَهُم مِن وَلِيٍّ وَلا نَصيرٍ
blank: w-law shāʾ llāh l-jaʿalahum ʾummat wāḥidat w-lāk yudkhil m yashāʾ fī raḥmatihī w-ẓ-ẓālimūn mā lahum m waliyy w-lā naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And if Allah willed, He could have made them of one religion, but He admits whom He wills into His mercy. And the wrongdoers have not any protector or helper

arabic_uthmani: أَمِ اتَّخَذوا مِن دونِهِ أَولِياءَ ۖ فَاللَّهُ هُوَ الوَلِيُّ وَهُوَ يُحيِي المَوتىٰ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: ʾam ttakhadhū m dūnihī ʾawliyāʾ f-llāh huwal-waliyy w-huw yuḥyil-mawtā w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Or have they taken protectors or allies besides him? But Allah - He is the Protector, and He gives life to the dead, and He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: وَمَا اختَلَفتُم فيهِ مِن شَيءٍ فَحُكمُهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۚ ذٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبّي عَلَيهِ تَوَكَّلتُ وَإِلَيهِ أُنيبُ
blank: w-mā khtalaftum fīh m shayʾ f-ḥukmuhū ʾilā llāh dhālikum llāh rabbī ʿalayh tawakkalt w-ʾilayh ʾunīb
english_saheeh_international: And in anything over which you disagree - its ruling is to be referred to Allah. Say, "That is Allah, my Lord; upon Him I have relied, and to Him I turn back

arabic_uthmani: فاطِرُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِن أَنفُسِكُم أَزواجًا وَمِنَ الأَنعامِ أَزواجًا ۖ يَذرَؤُكُم فيهِ ۚ لَيسَ كَمِثلِهِ شَيءٌ ۖ وَهُوَ السَّميعُ البَصيرُ
blank: fāṭir s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ jaʿal lakum m ʾanfusikum ʾazwāj w-minal-ʾanʿām ʾazwāj yadhraʾukum fīh lays k-mithlihī shayʾ w-huw s-samīʿul-baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: He is Creator of the heavens and the earth. He has made for you from yourselves, mates, and among the cattle, mates; He multiplies you thereby. There is nothing like unto Him, and He is the Hearing, the Seeing

arabic_uthmani: لَهُ مَقاليدُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ يَبسُطُ الرِّزقَ لِمَن يَشاءُ وَيَقدِرُ ۚ إِنَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: lahū maqālīd s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ yabsuṭ r-rizq l-m yashāʾ w-yaqdir ʾinnahū b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. He extends provision for whom He wills and restricts it. Indeed He is, of all things, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: ۞ شَرَعَ لَكُم مِنَ الدّينِ ما وَصّىٰ بِهِ نوحًا وَالَّذي أَوحَينا إِلَيكَ وَما وَصَّينا بِهِ إِبراهيمَ وَموسىٰ وَعيسىٰ ۖ أَن أَقيمُوا الدّينَ وَلا تَتَفَرَّقوا فيهِ ۚ كَبُرَ عَلَى المُشرِكينَ ما تَدعوهُم إِلَيهِ ۚ اللَّهُ يَجتَبي إِلَيهِ مَن يَشاءُ وَيَهدي إِلَيهِ مَن يُنيبُ
blank: sharaʿ lakum min d-dīn mā waṣṣā bihī nūḥ w-lladhī ʾawḥaynā ʾilayk w-mā waṣṣaynā bihī ʾibrāhīm w-mūsā w-ʿīsā ʾ ʾaqīmū d-dīn w-lā tatafarraqū fīh kabur ʿalāl-mushrikīn mā tadʿūhum ʾilayh llāh yajtabī ʾilayh m yashāʾ w-yahdī ʾilayh m yunīb
english_saheeh_international: He has ordained for you of religion what He enjoined upon Noah and that which We have revealed to you, O Muhammad, and what We enjoined upon Abraham and Moses and Jesus - to establish the religion and not be divided therein. Difficult for those who associate others with Allah is that to which you invite them. Allah chooses for Himself whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back to Him

arabic_uthmani: وَما تَفَرَّقوا إِلّا مِن بَعدِ ما جاءَهُمُ العِلمُ بَغيًا بَينَهُم ۚ وَلَولا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَت مِن رَبِّكَ إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى لَقُضِيَ بَينَهُم ۚ وَإِنَّ الَّذينَ أورِثُوا الكِتابَ مِن بَعدِهِم لَفي شَكٍّ مِنهُ مُريبٍ
blank: w-mā tafarraqū ʾillā m baʿd mā jāʾahumul-ʿilm baghy baynahum w-law-lā kalimat sabaqat m rabbik ʾilā ʾajal musamm l-quḍiy baynahum w-ʾinnalladhīn ʾūrithūl-kitāb m baʿdihim l-fī shakk minh murīb
english_saheeh_international: And they did not become divided until after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord postponing the penalty until a specified time, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, those who were granted inheritance of the Scripture after them are, concerning it, in disquieting doubt

arabic_uthmani: فَلِذٰلِكَ فَادعُ ۖ وَاستَقِم كَما أُمِرتَ ۖ وَلا تَتَّبِع أَهواءَهُم ۖ وَقُل آمَنتُ بِما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ مِن كِتابٍ ۖ وَأُمِرتُ لِأَعدِلَ بَينَكُمُ ۖ اللَّهُ رَبُّنا وَرَبُّكُم ۖ لَنا أَعمالُنا وَلَكُم أَعمالُكُم ۖ لا حُجَّةَ بَينَنا وَبَينَكُمُ ۖ اللَّهُ يَجمَعُ بَينَنا ۖ وَإِلَيهِ المَصيرُ
blank: f-l-dhālik f-dʿ w-staqim k-mā ʾumirt w-lā tattabiʿ ʾahwāʾahum w-qul ʾāmant b-mā ʾanzal llāh m kitāb w-ʾumirt l-ʾaʿdil baynakum llāh rabbunā w-rabbukum lanā ʾaʿmālunā w-lakum ʾaʿmālukum lā ḥujjat baynanā w-baynakum llāh yajmaʿ baynanā w-ʾilayhil-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: So to that religion of Allah invite, O Muhammad, and remain on a right course as you are commanded and do not follow their inclinations but say, "I have believed in what Allah has revealed of the Qur'an, and I have been commanded to do justice among you. Allah is our Lord and your Lord. For us are our deeds, and for you your deeds. There is no need for argument between us and you. Allah will bring us together, and to Him is the final destination

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يُحاجّونَ فِي اللَّهِ مِن بَعدِ مَا استُجيبَ لَهُ حُجَّتُهُم داحِضَةٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِم وَعَلَيهِم غَضَبٌ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ شَديدٌ
blank: w-lladhīn yuḥājjūn fī llāh m baʿd mā stujīb lahū ḥujjatuhum dāḥiḍat ʿind rabbihim w-ʿalayhim ghaḍab w-lahum ʿadhāb shadīd-
english_saheeh_international: And those who argue concerning Allah after He has been responded to - their argument is invalid with their Lord, and upon them is His wrath, and for them is a severe punishment

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ الَّذي أَنزَلَ الكِتابَ بِالحَقِّ وَالميزانَ ۗ وَما يُدريكَ لَعَلَّ السّاعَةَ قَريبٌ
blank: allāhulladhī ʾanzalal-kitāb b-l-ḥaqq w-l-mīzān w-mā yudrīk laʿall s-sāʿat qarīb
english_saheeh_international: It is Allah who has sent down the Book in truth and also the balance. And what will make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near

arabic_uthmani: يَستَعجِلُ بِهَا الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِها ۖ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مُشفِقونَ مِنها وَيَعلَمونَ أَنَّهَا الحَقُّ ۗ أَلا إِنَّ الَّذينَ يُمارونَ فِي السّاعَةِ لَفي ضَلالٍ بَعيدٍ
blank: yastaʿjil bihālladhīn lā yuʾminūn bihā w-lladhīn ʾāmanū mushfiqūn minhā w-yaʿlamūn ʾannahāl-ḥaqq ʾ-lā ʾinnalladhīn yumārūn fī s-sāʿat l-fī ḍalāl baʿīd-
english_saheeh_international: Those who do not believe in it are impatient for it, but those who believe are fearful of it and know that it is the truth. Unquestionably, those who dispute concerning the Hour are in extreme error

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ لَطيفٌ بِعِبادِهِ يَرزُقُ مَن يَشاءُ ۖ وَهُوَ القَوِيُّ العَزيزُ
blank: allāh laṭīf b-ʿibādihī yarzuq m yashāʾ w-huwal-qawiyyul-ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: Allah is Subtle with His servants; He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might

arabic_uthmani: مَن كانَ يُريدُ حَرثَ الآخِرَةِ نَزِد لَهُ في حَرثِهِ ۖ وَمَن كانَ يُريدُ حَرثَ الدُّنيا نُؤتِهِ مِنها وَما لَهُ فِي الآخِرَةِ مِن نَصيبٍ
blank: m kān yurīd ḥarthal-ʾākhirat nazid lahū fī ḥarthihī w-m kān yurīd ḥarth d-dunyā nuʾtihī minhā w-mā lahū fīl-ʾākhirat m naṣīb
english_saheeh_international: Whoever desires the harvest of the Hereafter - We increase for him in his harvest. And whoever desires the harvest of this world - We give him thereof, but there is not for him in the Hereafter any share

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَهُم شُرَكاءُ شَرَعوا لَهُم مِنَ الدّينِ ما لَم يَأذَن بِهِ اللَّهُ ۚ وَلَولا كَلِمَةُ الفَصلِ لَقُضِيَ بَينَهُم ۗ وَإِنَّ الظّالِمينَ لَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: ʾam lahum shurakāʾ sharaʿū lahum min d-dīn mā lam yaʾdh bih llāh w-law-lā kalimatul-faṣl l-quḍiy baynahum w-ʾinn ẓ-ẓālimīn lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Or have they other deities who have ordained for them a religion to which Allah has not consented? But if not for the decisive word, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, the wrongdoers will have a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: تَرَى الظّالِمينَ مُشفِقينَ مِمّا كَسَبوا وَهُوَ واقِعٌ بِهِم ۗ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ في رَوضاتِ الجَنّاتِ ۖ لَهُم ما يَشاءونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِم ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الفَضلُ الكَبيرُ
blank: tarā ẓ-ẓālimīn mushfiqīn mimmā kasabū w-huw wāqiʿ bihim w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt fī rawḍātil-jannāt lahum mā yashāʾūn ʿind rabbihim dhālik huwal-faḍlul-kabīr
english_saheeh_international: You will see the wrongdoers fearful of what they have earned, and it will certainly befall them. And those who have believed and done righteous deeds will be in lush regions of the gardens in Paradise having whatever they will in the presence of their Lord. That is what is the great bounty

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ الَّذي يُبَشِّرُ اللَّهُ عِبادَهُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ ۗ قُل لا أَسأَلُكُم عَلَيهِ أَجرًا إِلَّا المَوَدَّةَ فِي القُربىٰ ۗ وَمَن يَقتَرِف حَسَنَةً نَزِد لَهُ فيها حُسنًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ شَكورٌ
blank: dhālikalladhī yubashshir llāh ʿibādahulladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt qul lā ʾasʾalukum ʿalayh ʾajr ʾillāl-mawaddat fīl-qurbā w-m yaqtarif ḥasanat nazid lahū fīhā ḥusn ʾinn llāh ghafūr shakūr
english_saheeh_international: It is that of which Allah gives good tidings to His servants who believe and do righteous deeds. Say, O Muhammad, "I do not ask you for this message any payment but only good will through kinship." And whoever commits a good deed - We will increase for him good therein. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Appreciative

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَقولونَ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا ۖ فَإِن يَشَإِ اللَّهُ يَختِم عَلىٰ قَلبِكَ ۗ وَيَمحُ اللَّهُ الباطِلَ وَيُحِقُّ الحَقَّ بِكَلِماتِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: ʾam yaqūlūn ftarā ʿalā llāh kadhib f-ʾ yashaʾ llāh yakhtim ʿalā qalbik w-yamḥ llāhul-bāṭil w-yuḥiqqul-ḥaqq b-kalimātihī ʾinnahū ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: Or do they say, "He has invented about Allah a lie"? But if Allah willed, He could seal over your heart. And Allah eliminates falsehood and establishes the truth by His words. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي يَقبَلُ التَّوبَةَ عَن عِبادِهِ وَيَعفو عَنِ السَّيِّئَاتِ وَيَعلَمُ ما تَفعَلونَ
blank: w-huwalladhī yaqbal t-tawbat ʿ ʿibādihī w-yaʿfū ʿan s-sayyiʾāt w-yaʿlam mā tafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who accepts repentance from his servants and pardons misdeeds, and He knows what you do

arabic_uthmani: وَيَستَجيبُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ وَيَزيدُهُم مِن فَضلِهِ ۚ وَالكافِرونَ لَهُم عَذابٌ شَديدٌ
blank: w-yastajībulladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-yazīduhum m faḍlihī w-l-kāfirūn lahum ʿadhāb shadīd
english_saheeh_international: And He answers the supplication of those who have believed and done righteous deeds and increases for them from His bounty. But the disbelievers will have a severe punishment

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَو بَسَطَ اللَّهُ الرِّزقَ لِعِبادِهِ لَبَغَوا فِي الأَرضِ وَلٰكِن يُنَزِّلُ بِقَدَرٍ ما يَشاءُ ۚ إِنَّهُ بِعِبادِهِ خَبيرٌ بَصيرٌ
blank: w-law basaṭ llāh r-rizq l-ʿibādihī l-baghaw fīl-ʾarḍ w-lāk yunazzil b-qadar mā yashāʾ ʾinnahū b-ʿibādihī khabīr baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And if Allah had extended excessively provision for His servants, they would have committed tyranny throughout the earth. But He sends it down in an amount which He wills. Indeed He is, of His servants, Acquainted and Seeing

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي يُنَزِّلُ الغَيثَ مِن بَعدِ ما قَنَطوا وَيَنشُرُ رَحمَتَهُ ۚ وَهُوَ الوَلِيُّ الحَميدُ
blank: w-huwalladhī yunazzilul-ghayth m baʿd mā qanaṭū w-yanshur raḥmatahū w-huwal-waliyyul-ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who sends down the rain after they had despaired and spreads His mercy. And He is the Protector, the Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ خَلقُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَما بَثَّ فيهِما مِن دابَّةٍ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ جَمعِهِم إِذا يَشاءُ قَديرٌ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihī khalq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā bathth fīhimā m dābbat w-huw ʿalā jamʿihim ʾidhā yashāʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And of his signs is the creation of the heavens and earth and what He has dispersed throughout them of creatures. And He, for gathering them when He wills, is competent

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَصابَكُم مِن مُصيبَةٍ فَبِما كَسَبَت أَيديكُم وَيَعفو عَن كَثيرٍ
blank: w-mā ʾaṣābakum m muṣībat f-b-mā kasabat ʾaydīkum w-yaʿfū ʿ kathīr
english_saheeh_international: And whatever strikes you of disaster - it is for what your hands have earned; but He pardons much

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَنتُم بِمُعجِزينَ فِي الأَرضِ ۖ وَما لَكُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ مِن وَلِيٍّ وَلا نَصيرٍ
blank: w-mā ʾantum b-muʿjizīn fīl-ʾarḍ w-mā lakum m dūn llāh m waliyy w-lā naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And you will not cause failure to Allah upon the earth. And you have not besides Allah any protector or helper

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن آياتِهِ الجَوارِ فِي البَحرِ كَالأَعلامِ
blank: w-m ʾāyātihil-jawār fīl-baḥr k-l-ʾaʿlām
