english_saheeh_international: And of His signs are the ships in the sea, like mountains

arabic_uthmani: إِن يَشَأ يُسكِنِ الرّيحَ فَيَظلَلنَ رَواكِدَ عَلىٰ ظَهرِهِ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِكُلِّ صَبّارٍ شَكورٍ
blank: ʾ yashaʾ yuskin r-rīḥ f-yaẓlaln rawākid ʿalā ẓahrihī ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-kull ṣabbār shakūr
english_saheeh_international: If He willed, He could still the wind, and they would remain motionless on its surface. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful

arabic_uthmani: أَو يوبِقهُنَّ بِما كَسَبوا وَيَعفُ عَن كَثيرٍ
blank: ʾaw yūbiqhunn b-mā kasabū w-yaʿf ʿ kathīr
english_saheeh_international: Or He could destroy them for what they earned; but He pardons much

arabic_uthmani: وَيَعلَمَ الَّذينَ يُجادِلونَ في آياتِنا ما لَهُم مِن مَحيصٍ
blank: w-yaʿlamalladhīn yujādilūn fī ʾāyātinā mā lahum m maḥīṣ
english_saheeh_international: And that is so those who dispute concerning Our signs may know that for them there is no place of escape

arabic_uthmani: فَما أوتيتُم مِن شَيءٍ فَمَتاعُ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ۖ وَما عِندَ اللَّهِ خَيرٌ وَأَبقىٰ لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَلىٰ رَبِّهِم يَتَوَكَّلونَ
blank: f-mā ʾūtītum m shayʾ f-matāʿul-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-mā ʿind llāh khayr w-ʾabqā l-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūn
english_saheeh_international: So whatever thing you have been given - it is but for enjoyment of the worldly life. But what is with Allah is better and more lasting for those who have believed and upon their Lord rely

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يَجتَنِبونَ كَبائِرَ الإِثمِ وَالفَواحِشَ وَإِذا ما غَضِبوا هُم يَغفِرونَ
blank: w-lladhīn yajtanibūn kabāʾiral-ʾithm w-l-fawāḥish w-ʾidhā mā ghaḍibū hum yaghfirūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, and when they are angry, they forgive

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ استَجابوا لِرَبِّهِم وَأَقامُوا الصَّلاةَ وَأَمرُهُم شورىٰ بَينَهُم وَمِمّا رَزَقناهُم يُنفِقونَ
blank: w-lladhīn stajābū l-rabbihim w-ʾaqāmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾamruhum shūrā baynahum w-mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who have responded to their lord and established prayer and whose affair is determined by consultation among themselves, and from what We have provided them, they spend

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ إِذا أَصابَهُمُ البَغيُ هُم يَنتَصِرونَ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾidhā ʾaṣābahumul-baghy hum yantaṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who, when tyranny strikes them, they defend themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَجَزاءُ سَيِّئَةٍ سَيِّئَةٌ مِثلُها ۖ فَمَن عَفا وَأَصلَحَ فَأَجرُهُ عَلَى اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-jazāʾ sayyiʾat sayyiʾat mithluhā f-m ʿafā w-ʾaṣlaḥ f-ʾajruhū ʿalā llāh ʾinnahū lā yuḥibb ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And the retribution for an evil act is an evil one like it, but whoever pardons and makes reconciliation - his reward is due from Allah. Indeed, He does not like wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمَنِ انتَصَرَ بَعدَ ظُلمِهِ فَأُولٰئِكَ ما عَلَيهِم مِن سَبيلٍ
blank: w-l-man ntaṣar baʿd ẓulmihī f-ʾulāʾik mā ʿalayhim m sabīl
english_saheeh_international: And whoever avenges himself after having been wronged - those have not upon them any cause for blame

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّمَا السَّبيلُ عَلَى الَّذينَ يَظلِمونَ النّاسَ وَيَبغونَ فِي الأَرضِ بِغَيرِ الحَقِّ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ لَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: ʾinnamā s-sabīl ʿalālladhīn yaẓlimūn n-nās w-yabghūn fīl-ʾarḍ b-ghayril-ḥaqq ʾulāʾik lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: The cause is only against the ones who wrong the people and tyrannize upon the earth without right. Those will have a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذٰلِكَ لَمِن عَزمِ الأُمورِ
blank: w-l-m ṣabar w-ghafar ʾinn dhālik l-m ʿazmil-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: And whoever is patient and forgives - indeed, that is of the matters requiring determination

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن يُضلِلِ اللَّهُ فَما لَهُ مِن وَلِيٍّ مِن بَعدِهِ ۗ وَتَرَى الظّالِمينَ لَمّا رَأَوُا العَذابَ يَقولونَ هَل إِلىٰ مَرَدٍّ مِن سَبيلٍ
blank: w-m yuḍlil llāh f-mā lahū m waliyy m baʿdihī w-tarā ẓ-ẓālimīn lammā raʾawul-ʿadhāb yaqūlūn hal ʾilā maradd m sabīl
english_saheeh_international: And he whom Allah sends astray - for him there is no protector beyond Him. And you will see the wrongdoers, when they see the punishment, saying, "Is there for return to the former world any way

arabic_uthmani: وَتَراهُم يُعرَضونَ عَلَيها خاشِعينَ مِنَ الذُّلِّ يَنظُرونَ مِن طَرفٍ خَفِيٍّ ۗ وَقالَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِنَّ الخاسِرينَ الَّذينَ خَسِروا أَنفُسَهُم وَأَهليهِم يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۗ أَلا إِنَّ الظّالِمينَ في عَذابٍ مُقيمٍ
blank: w-tarāhum yuʿraḍūn ʿalayhā khāshiʿīn min dh-dhull yanẓurūn m ṭarf khafiyy w-qālalladhīn ʾāmanū ʾinnal-khāsirīnalladhīn khasirū ʾanfusahum w-ʾahlīhim yawmal-qiyāmat ʾ-lā ʾinn ẓ-ẓālimīn fī ʿadhāb muqīm
english_saheeh_international: And you will see them being exposed to the Fire, humbled from humiliation, looking from behind a covert glance. And those who had believed will say, "Indeed, the true losers are the ones who lost themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, the wrongdoers are in an enduring punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَما كانَ لَهُم مِن أَولِياءَ يَنصُرونَهُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُضلِلِ اللَّهُ فَما لَهُ مِن سَبيلٍ
blank: w-mā kān lahum m ʾawliyāʾ yanṣurūnahum m dūn llāh w-m yuḍlil llāh f-mā lahū m sabīl-
english_saheeh_international: And there will not be for them any allies to aid them other than Allah. And whoever Allah sends astray - for him there is no way

arabic_uthmani: استَجيبوا لِرَبِّكُم مِن قَبلِ أَن يَأتِيَ يَومٌ لا مَرَدَّ لَهُ مِنَ اللَّهِ ۚ ما لَكُم مِن مَلجَإٍ يَومَئِذٍ وَما لَكُم مِن نَكيرٍ
blank: istajībū l-rabbikum m qabl ʾ yaʾtiy yawm lā maradd lahū min llāh mā lakum m maljaʾ yawmaʾidh w-mā lakum m nakīr
english_saheeh_international: Respond to your Lord before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. No refuge will you have that day, nor for you will there be any denial

arabic_uthmani: فَإِن أَعرَضوا فَما أَرسَلناكَ عَلَيهِم حَفيظًا ۖ إِن عَلَيكَ إِلَّا البَلاغُ ۗ وَإِنّا إِذا أَذَقنَا الإِنسانَ مِنّا رَحمَةً فَرِحَ بِها ۖ وَإِن تُصِبهُم سَيِّئَةٌ بِما قَدَّمَت أَيديهِم فَإِنَّ الإِنسانَ كَفورٌ
blank: f-ʾ ʾaʿraḍū f-mā ʾarsalnāk ʿalayhim ḥafīẓ ʾ ʿalayk ʾillāl-balāgh w-ʾinnā ʾidhā ʾadhaqnāl-ʾinsān minnā raḥmat fariḥ bihā w-ʾ tuṣibhum sayyiʾat b-mā qaddamat ʾaydīhim f-ʾinnal-ʾinsān kafūr
english_saheeh_international: But if they turn away - then We have not sent you, O Muhammad, over them as a guardian; upon you is only the duty of notification. And indeed, when We let man taste mercy from us, he rejoices in it; but if evil afflicts him for what his hands have put forth, then indeed, man is ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: لِلَّهِ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ يَخلُقُ ما يَشاءُ ۚ يَهَبُ لِمَن يَشاءُ إِناثًا وَيَهَبُ لِمَن يَشاءُ الذُّكورَ
blank: l-llāh mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ yakhluq mā yashāʾ yahab l-m yashāʾ ʾināth w-yahab l-m yashāʾ dh-dhukūr
english_saheeh_international: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He creates what he wills. He gives to whom He wills female children, and He gives to whom He wills males

arabic_uthmani: أَو يُزَوِّجُهُم ذُكرانًا وَإِناثًا ۖ وَيَجعَلُ مَن يَشاءُ عَقيمًا ۚ إِنَّهُ عَليمٌ قَديرٌ
blank: ʾaw yuzawwijuhum dhukrān w-ʾināth w-yajʿal m yashāʾ ʿaqīm ʾinnahū ʿalīm qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Or He makes them both males and females, and He renders whom He wills barren. Indeed, He is Knowing and Competent

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَما كانَ لِبَشَرٍ أَن يُكَلِّمَهُ اللَّهُ إِلّا وَحيًا أَو مِن وَراءِ حِجابٍ أَو يُرسِلَ رَسولًا فَيوحِيَ بِإِذنِهِ ما يَشاءُ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيٌّ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-mā kān l-bashar ʾ yukallimah llāh ʾillā waḥy ʾaw m warāʾ ḥijāb ʾaw yursil rasūl f-yūḥiy b-ʾidhnihī mā yashāʾ ʾinnahū ʿaliyy ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And it is not for any human being that Allah should speak to him except by revelation or from behind a partition or that He sends a messenger to reveal, by His permission, what He wills. Indeed, He is Most High and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ أَوحَينا إِلَيكَ روحًا مِن أَمرِنا ۚ ما كُنتَ تَدري مَا الكِتابُ وَلَا الإيمانُ وَلٰكِن جَعَلناهُ نورًا نَهدي بِهِ مَن نَشاءُ مِن عِبادِنا ۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَتَهدي إِلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: w-k-dhālik ʾawḥaynā ʾilayk rūḥam-m ʾamrinā mā kunt tadrī māl-kitāb w-lāl-ʾīmān w-lāk jaʿalnāh nūr nahdī bihī m nashāʾ m ʿibādinā w-ʾinnak l-tahdī ʾilā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And thus We have revealed to you an inspiration of Our command. You did not know what is the Book or what is faith, but We have made it a light by which We guide whom We will of Our servants. And indeed, O Muhammad, you guide to a straight path

arabic_uthmani: صِراطِ اللَّهِ الَّذي لَهُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۗ أَلا إِلَى اللَّهِ تَصيرُ الأُمورُ
blank: ṣirāṭ llāhilladhī lahū mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ ʾ-lā ʾilā llāh taṣīrul-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: The path of Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Unquestionably, to Allah do all matters evolve

arabic_uthmani: حم
blank: ḥ-m (ḥā mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Ha, Meem

arabic_uthmani: وَالكِتابِ المُبينِ
blank: w-l-kitābil-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: By the clear Book

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا جَعَلناهُ قُرآنًا عَرَبِيًّا لَعَلَّكُم تَعقِلونَ
blank: ʾinnā jaʿalnāh qurʾān ʿarabiyy laʿallakum taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have made it an Arabic Qur'an that you might understand

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ في أُمِّ الكِتابِ لَدَينا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكيمٌ
blank: w-ʾinnahū fī ʾummil-kitāb ladaynā l-ʿaliyy ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed it is, in the Mother of the Book with Us, exalted and full of wisdom

arabic_uthmani: أَفَنَضرِبُ عَنكُمُ الذِّكرَ صَفحًا أَن كُنتُم قَومًا مُسرِفينَ
blank: ʾ-f-naḍrib ʿankum dh-dhikr ṣafḥ ʾ kuntum qawmam-musrifīn
english_saheeh_international: Then should We turn the message away, disregarding you, because you are a transgressing people

arabic_uthmani: وَكَم أَرسَلنا مِن نَبِيٍّ فِي الأَوَّلينَ
blank: w-kam ʾarsalnā m nabiyy fīl-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: And how many a prophet We sent among the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَأتيهِم مِن نَبِيٍّ إِلّا كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-mā yaʾtīhim m nabiyy ʾillā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: But there would not come to them a prophet except that they used to ridicule him

arabic_uthmani: فَأَهلَكنا أَشَدَّ مِنهُم بَطشًا وَمَضىٰ مَثَلُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: f-ʾahlaknā ʾashadd minhum baṭsh w-maḍā mathalul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: And We destroyed greater than them in striking power, and the example of the former peoples has preceded

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن سَأَلتَهُم مَن خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ لَيَقولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ العَزيزُ العَليمُ
blank: w-l-ʾ saʾaltahum m khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ l-yaqūlunn khalaqahunnal-ʿazīzul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And if you should ask them, "Who has created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "They were created by the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الأَرضَ مَهدًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم فيها سُبُلًا لَعَلَّكُم تَهتَدونَ
blank: alladhī jaʿal lakumul-ʾarḍ mahd w-jaʿal lakum fīhā subul laʿallakum tahtadūn
english_saheeh_international: The one who has made for you the earth a bed and made for you upon it roads that you might be guided

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذي نَزَّلَ مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً بِقَدَرٍ فَأَنشَرنا بِهِ بَلدَةً مَيتًا ۚ كَذٰلِكَ تُخرَجونَ
blank: w-lladhī nazzal min s-samāʾ māʾ b-qadar f-ʾansharnā bihī baldatam-mayt k-dhālik tukhrajūn
english_saheeh_international: And who sends down rain from the sky in measured amounts, and We revive thereby a dead land - thus will you be brought forth

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذي خَلَقَ الأَزواجَ كُلَّها وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِنَ الفُلكِ وَالأَنعامِ ما تَركَبونَ
blank: w-lladhī khalaqal-ʾazwāj kullahā w-jaʿal lakum minal-fulk w-l-ʾanʿām mā tarkabūn
english_saheeh_international: And who created the species, all of them, and has made for you of ships and animals those which you mount

arabic_uthmani: لِتَستَووا عَلىٰ ظُهورِهِ ثُمَّ تَذكُروا نِعمَةَ رَبِّكُم إِذَا استَوَيتُم عَلَيهِ وَتَقولوا سُبحانَ الَّذي سَخَّرَ لَنا هٰذا وَما كُنّا لَهُ مُقرِنينَ
blank: l-tastawū ʿalā ẓuhūrihī thumm tadhkurū niʿmat rabbikum ʾidhā stawaytum ʿalayh w-taqūlū subḥānalladhī sakhkhar lanā hādhā w-mā kunnā lahū muqrinīn
english_saheeh_international: That you may settle yourselves upon their backs and then remember the favor of your Lord when you have settled upon them and say. "Exalted is He who has subjected this to us, and we could not have otherwise subdued it

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّا إِلىٰ رَبِّنا لَمُنقَلِبونَ
blank: w-ʾinnā ʾilā rabbinā l-munqalibūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed we, to our Lord, will surely return

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلوا لَهُ مِن عِبادِهِ جُزءًا ۚ إِنَّ الإِنسانَ لَكَفورٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-jaʿalū lahū m ʿibādihī juzʾ ʾinnal-ʾinsān l-kafūr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: But they have attributed to Him from His servants a portion. Indeed, man is clearly ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: أَمِ اتَّخَذَ مِمّا يَخلُقُ بَناتٍ وَأَصفاكُم بِالبَنينَ
blank: ʾam ttakhadh mimmā yakhluq banāt w-ʾaṣfākum b-l-banīn
english_saheeh_international: Or has He taken, out of what He has created, daughters and chosen you for having sons

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُهُم بِما ضَرَبَ لِلرَّحمٰنِ مَثَلًا ظَلَّ وَجهُهُ مُسوَدًّا وَهُوَ كَظيمٌ
blank: w-ʾidhā bushshir ʾaḥaduhum b-mā ḍarab l-r-raḥmān mathal ẓall wajhuhū muswadd w-huw kaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And when one of them is given good tidings of that which he attributes to the Most Merciful in comparison, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief

arabic_uthmani: أَوَمَن يُنَشَّأُ فِي الحِليَةِ وَهُوَ فِي الخِصامِ غَيرُ مُبينٍ
blank: ʾ-w-m yunashshaʾ fīl-ḥilyat w-huw fīl-khiṣām ghayr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So is one brought up in ornaments while being during conflict unevident attributed to Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلُوا المَلائِكَةَ الَّذينَ هُم عِبادُ الرَّحمٰنِ إِناثًا ۚ أَشَهِدوا خَلقَهُم ۚ سَتُكتَبُ شَهادَتُهُم وَيُسأَلونَ
blank: w-jaʿalūl-malāʾikatalladhīn hum ʿibād r-raḥmān ʾināth ʾ-shahidū khalqahum s-tuktab shahādatuhum w-yusʾalūn
english_saheeh_international: And they have made the angels, who are servants of the Most Merciful, females. Did they witness their creation? Their testimony will be recorded, and they will be questioned

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لَو شاءَ الرَّحمٰنُ ما عَبَدناهُم ۗ ما لَهُم بِذٰلِكَ مِن عِلمٍ ۖ إِن هُم إِلّا يَخرُصونَ
blank: w-qālū law shāʾ r-raḥmān mā ʿabadnāhum mā lahum b-dhālik m ʿilm ʾ hum ʾillā yakhruṣūn
english_saheeh_international: And they said, "If the Most Merciful had willed, we would not have worshipped them." They have of that no knowledge. They are not but falsifying

arabic_uthmani: أَم آتَيناهُم كِتابًا مِن قَبلِهِ فَهُم بِهِ مُستَمسِكونَ
blank: ʾam ʾātaynāhum kitābam-m qablihī f-hum bihī mustamsikūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have We given them a book before the Qur'an to which they are adhering

arabic_uthmani: بَل قالوا إِنّا وَجَدنا آباءَنا عَلىٰ أُمَّةٍ وَإِنّا عَلىٰ آثارِهِم مُهتَدونَ
blank: bal qālū ʾinnā wajadnā ʾābāʾanā ʿalā ʾummat w-ʾinnā ʿalā ʾāthārihim muhtadūn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, they say, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are in their footsteps rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذٰلِكَ ما أَرسَلنا مِن قَبلِكَ في قَريَةٍ مِن نَذيرٍ إِلّا قالَ مُترَفوها إِنّا وَجَدنا آباءَنا عَلىٰ أُمَّةٍ وَإِنّا عَلىٰ آثارِهِم مُقتَدونَ
blank: w-k-dhālik mā ʾarsalnā m qablik fī qaryat m nadhīr ʾillā qāl mutrafūhā ʾinnā wajadnā ʾābāʾanā ʿalā ʾummat w-ʾinnā ʿalā ʾāthārihim muqtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And similarly, We did not send before you any warner into a city except that its affluent said, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are, in their footsteps, following

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قالَ أَوَلَو جِئتُكُم بِأَهدىٰ مِمّا وَجَدتُم عَلَيهِ آباءَكُم ۖ قالوا إِنّا بِما أُرسِلتُم بِهِ كافِرونَ
blank: qāl ʾ-w-law jiʾtukum b-ʾahdā mimmā wajadtum ʿalayh ʾābāʾakum qālū ʾinnā b-mā ʾursiltum bihī kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: Each warner said, "Even if I brought you better guidance than that religion upon which you found your fathers?" They said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: فَانتَقَمنا مِنهُم ۖ فَانظُر كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ المُكَذِّبينَ
blank: f-ntaqamnā minhum f-nẓur kayf kān ʿāqibatul-mukadhdhibīn
english_saheeh_international: So we took retribution from them; then see how was the end of the deniers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ إِبراهيمُ لِأَبيهِ وَقَومِهِ إِنَّني بَراءٌ مِمّا تَعبُدونَ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl ʾibrāhīm l-ʾabīh w-qawmihī ʾinnanī barāʾ mimmā taʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when Abraham said to his father and his people, "Indeed, I am disassociated from that which you worship

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا الَّذي فَطَرَني فَإِنَّهُ سَيَهدينِ
blank: ʾillālladhī faṭaranī f-ʾinnahū s-yahdīn
english_saheeh_international: Except for He who created me; and indeed, He will guide me

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلَها كَلِمَةً باقِيَةً في عَقِبِهِ لَعَلَّهُم يَرجِعونَ
blank: w-jaʿalahā kalimat bāqiyat fī ʿaqibihī laʿallahum yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And he made it a word remaining among his descendants that they might return to it

arabic_uthmani: بَل مَتَّعتُ هٰؤُلاءِ وَآباءَهُم حَتّىٰ جاءَهُمُ الحَقُّ وَرَسولٌ مُبينٌ
blank: bal mattaʿt hāʾulāʾ w-ʾābāʾahum ḥattā jāʾahumul-ḥaqq w-rasūl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: However, I gave enjoyment to these people of Makkah and their fathers until there came to them the truth and a clear Messenger

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا جاءَهُمُ الحَقُّ قالوا هٰذا سِحرٌ وَإِنّا بِهِ كافِرونَ
blank: w-lammā jāʾahumul-ḥaqq qālū hādhā siḥr w-ʾinnā bihī kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: But when the truth came to them, they said, "This is magic, and indeed we are, concerning it, disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لَولا نُزِّلَ هٰذَا القُرآنُ عَلىٰ رَجُلٍ مِنَ القَريَتَينِ عَظيمٍ
blank: w-qālū law-lā nuzzil hādhāl-qurʾān ʿalā rajul minal-qaryatayn ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And they said, "Why was this Qur'an not sent down upon a great man from one of the two cities

arabic_uthmani: أَهُم يَقسِمونَ رَحمَتَ رَبِّكَ ۚ نَحنُ قَسَمنا بَينَهُم مَعيشَتَهُم فِي الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ۚ وَرَفَعنا بَعضَهُم فَوقَ بَعضٍ دَرَجاتٍ لِيَتَّخِذَ بَعضُهُم بَعضًا سُخرِيًّا ۗ وَرَحمَتُ رَبِّكَ خَيرٌ مِمّا يَجمَعونَ
blank: ʾ-hum yaqsimūn raḥmat rabbik naḥn qasamnā baynahum maʿīshatahum fīl-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-rafaʿnā baʿḍahum fawq baʿḍ darajāt l-yattakhidh baʿḍuhum baʿḍ sukhriyy w-raḥmat rabbik khayr mimmā yajmaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they distribute the mercy of your Lord? It is We who have apportioned among them their livelihood in the life of this world and have raised some of them above others in degrees of rank that they may make use of one another for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate

arabic_uthmani: وَلَولا أَن يَكونَ النّاسُ أُمَّةً واحِدَةً لَجَعَلنا لِمَن يَكفُرُ بِالرَّحمٰنِ لِبُيوتِهِم سُقُفًا مِن فِضَّةٍ وَمَعارِجَ عَلَيها يَظهَرونَ
blank: w-law-lā ʾ yakūn n-nās ʾummat wāḥidat l-jaʿalnā l-m yakfur b-r-raḥmān l-buyūtihim suqufam-m fiḍḍat w-maʿārij ʿalayhā yaẓharūn
english_saheeh_international: And if it were not that the people would become one community of disbelievers, We would have made for those who disbelieve in the Most Merciful - for their houses - ceilings and stairways of silver upon which to mount

arabic_uthmani: وَلِبُيوتِهِم أَبوابًا وَسُرُرًا عَلَيها يَتَّكِئونَ
blank: w-l-buyūtihim ʾabwāb w-surur ʿalayhā yattakiʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And for their houses - doors and couches of silver upon which to recline

arabic_uthmani: وَزُخرُفًا ۚ وَإِن كُلُّ ذٰلِكَ لَمّا مَتاعُ الحَياةِ الدُّنيا ۚ وَالآخِرَةُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلمُتَّقينَ
blank: w-zukhruf w-ʾ kull dhālik lammā matāʿul-ḥayāt d-dunyā w-l-ʾākhirat ʿind rabbik l-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: And gold ornament. But all that is not but the enjoyment of worldly life. And the Hereafter with your Lord is for the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن يَعشُ عَن ذِكرِ الرَّحمٰنِ نُقَيِّض لَهُ شَيطانًا فَهُوَ لَهُ قَرينٌ
blank: w-m yaʿsh ʿ dhikr r-raḥmān nuqayyiḍ lahū shayṭān f-huw lahū qarīn
english_saheeh_international: And whoever is blinded from remembrance of the Most Merciful - We appoint for him a devil, and he is to him a companion

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُم لَيَصُدّونَهُم عَنِ السَّبيلِ وَيَحسَبونَ أَنَّهُم مُهتَدونَ
blank: w-ʾinnahum l-yaṣuddūnahum ʿan s-sabīl w-yaḥsabūn ʾannahum muhtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, the devils avert them from the way of guidance while they think that they are rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: حَتّىٰ إِذا جاءَنا قالَ يا لَيتَ بَيني وَبَينَكَ بُعدَ المَشرِقَينِ فَبِئسَ القَرينُ
blank: ḥattā ʾidhā jāʾanā qāl yā-layt baynī w-baynak buʿdal-mashriqayn f-biʾsal-qarīn
english_saheeh_international: Until, when he comes to Us at Judgement, he says to his companion, "Oh, I wish there was between me and you the distance between the east and west - how wretched a companion

arabic_uthmani: وَلَن يَنفَعَكُمُ اليَومَ إِذ ظَلَمتُم أَنَّكُم فِي العَذابِ مُشتَرِكونَ
blank: w-l yanfaʿakumul-yawm ʾidh ẓalamtum ʾannakum fīl-ʿadhāb mushtarikūn
english_saheeh_international: And never will it benefit you that Day, when you have wronged, that you are all sharing in the punishment

arabic_uthmani: أَفَأَنتَ تُسمِعُ الصُّمَّ أَو تَهدِي العُميَ وَمَن كانَ في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: ʾ-f-ʾant tusmiʿ ṣ-ṣumm ʾaw tahdīl-ʿumy w-m kān fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Then will you make the deaf hear, O Muhammad, or guide the blind or he who is in clear error

arabic_uthmani: فَإِمّا نَذهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنّا مِنهُم مُنتَقِمونَ
blank: f-ʾimmā nadhhabann bik f-ʾinnā minhum muntaqimūn
english_saheeh_international: And whether or not We take you away in death, indeed, We will take retribution upon them

arabic_uthmani: أَو نُرِيَنَّكَ الَّذي وَعَدناهُم فَإِنّا عَلَيهِم مُقتَدِرونَ
blank: ʾaw nuriyannakalladhī waʿadnāhum f-ʾinnā ʿalayhim muqtadirūn
english_saheeh_international: Or whether or not We show you that which We have promised them, indeed, We are Perfect in Ability

arabic_uthmani: فَاستَمسِك بِالَّذي أوحِيَ إِلَيكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: f-stamsik b-lladhī ʾūḥiy ʾilayk ʾinnak ʿalā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: So adhere to that which is revealed to you. Indeed, you are on a straight path

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لَذِكرٌ لَكَ وَلِقَومِكَ ۖ وَسَوفَ تُسأَلونَ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-dhikr lak w-l-qawmik w-sawf tusʾalūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, it is a remembrance for you and your people, and you all are going to be questioned

arabic_uthmani: وَاسأَل مَن أَرسَلنا مِن قَبلِكَ مِن رُسُلِنا أَجَعَلنا مِن دونِ الرَّحمٰنِ آلِهَةً يُعبَدونَ
blank: w-sʾal m ʾarsalnā m qablik m rusulinā ʾ-jaʿalnā m dūn r-raḥmān ʾālihat yuʿbadūn
english_saheeh_international: And ask those We sent before you of Our messengers; have We made besides the Most Merciful deities to be worshipped

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا موسىٰ بِآياتِنا إِلىٰ فِرعَونَ وَمَلَئِهِ فَقالَ إِنّي رَسولُ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā mūsā b-ʾāyātinā ʾilā firʿawn w-malaʾihī f-qāl ʾinnī rasūl rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And certainly did We send Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his establishment, and he said, "Indeed, I am the messenger of the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا جاءَهُم بِآياتِنا إِذا هُم مِنها يَضحَكونَ
blank: f-lammā jāʾahum b-ʾāyātinā ʾidhā hum minhā yaḍḥakūn
english_saheeh_international: But when he brought them Our signs, at once they laughed at them

arabic_uthmani: وَما نُريهِم مِن آيَةٍ إِلّا هِيَ أَكبَرُ مِن أُختِها ۖ وَأَخَذناهُم بِالعَذابِ لَعَلَّهُم يَرجِعونَ
blank: w-mā nurīhim m ʾāyat ʾillā hiy ʾakbar m ʾukhtihā w-ʾakhadhnāhum b-l-ʿadhāb laʿallahum yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And We showed them not a sign except that it was greater than its sister, and We seized them with affliction that perhaps they might return to faith

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا يا أَيُّهَ السّاحِرُ ادعُ لَنا رَبَّكَ بِما عَهِدَ عِندَكَ إِنَّنا لَمُهتَدونَ
blank: w-qālū yā-ʾayyuh s-sāḥir dʿ lanā rabbak b-mā ʿahid ʿindak ʾinnanā l-muhtadūn
english_saheeh_international: And they said to Moses, "O magician, invoke for us your Lord by what He has promised you. Indeed, we will be guided

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا كَشَفنا عَنهُمُ العَذابَ إِذا هُم يَنكُثونَ
blank: f-lammā kashafnā ʿanhumul-ʿadhāb ʾidhā hum yankuthūn
english_saheeh_international: But when We removed from them the affliction, at once they broke their word

arabic_uthmani: وَنادىٰ فِرعَونُ في قَومِهِ قالَ يا قَومِ أَلَيسَ لي مُلكُ مِصرَ وَهٰذِهِ الأَنهارُ تَجري مِن تَحتي ۖ أَفَلا تُبصِرونَ
blank: w-nādā firʿawn fī qawmihī qāl yā-qawm ʾ-lays lī mulk miṣr w-hādhihil-ʾanhār tajrī m taḥtī ʾ-f-lā tubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And Pharaoh called out among his people; he said, "O my people, does not the kingdom of Egypt belong to me, and these rivers flowing beneath me; then do you not see

arabic_uthmani: أَم أَنا خَيرٌ مِن هٰذَا الَّذي هُوَ مَهينٌ وَلا يَكادُ يُبينُ
blank: ʾam ʾan khayr m hādhālladhī huw mahīn w-lā yakād yubīn
english_saheeh_international: Or am I not better than this one who is insignificant and hardly makes himself clear

arabic_uthmani: فَلَولا أُلقِيَ عَلَيهِ أَسوِرَةٌ مِن ذَهَبٍ أَو جاءَ مَعَهُ المَلائِكَةُ مُقتَرِنينَ
blank: f-law-lā ʾulqiy ʿalayh ʾaswirat m dhahab ʾaw jāʾ maʿahul-malāʾikat muqtarinīn
english_saheeh_international: Then why have there not been placed upon him bracelets of gold or come with him the angels in conjunction

arabic_uthmani: فَاستَخَفَّ قَومَهُ فَأَطاعوهُ ۚ إِنَّهُم كانوا قَومًا فاسِقينَ
blank: f-stakhaff qawmahū f-ʾaṭāʿūh ʾinnahum kānū qawm fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: So he bluffed his people, and they obeyed him. Indeed, they were themselves a people defiantly disobedient of Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا آسَفونَا انتَقَمنا مِنهُم فَأَغرَقناهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: f-lammā ʾāsafūnā ntaqamnā minhum f-ʾaghraqnāhum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all

arabic_uthmani: فَجَعَلناهُم سَلَفًا وَمَثَلًا لِلآخِرينَ
blank: f-jaʿalnāhum salaf w-mathal l-l-ʾākhirīn
english_saheeh_international: And We made them a precedent and an example for the later peoples

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَمّا ضُرِبَ ابنُ مَريَمَ مَثَلًا إِذا قَومُكَ مِنهُ يَصِدّونَ
blank: w-lammā ḍurib bn maryam mathal ʾidhā qawmuk minh yaṣiddūn
english_saheeh_international: And when the son of Mary was presented as an example, immediately your people laughed aloud

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا أَآلِهَتُنا خَيرٌ أَم هُوَ ۚ ما ضَرَبوهُ لَكَ إِلّا جَدَلًا ۚ بَل هُم قَومٌ خَصِمونَ
blank: w-qālū ʾ-ʾālihatunā khayr ʾam huw mā ḍarabūh lak ʾillā jadal bal hum qawm khaṣimūn
english_saheeh_international: And they said, "Are your gods better, or is he?" They did not present the comparison except for mere argument. But, in fact, they are a people prone to dispute

arabic_uthmani: إِن هُوَ إِلّا عَبدٌ أَنعَمنا عَلَيهِ وَجَعَلناهُ مَثَلًا لِبَني إِسرائيلَ
blank: ʾ huw ʾillā ʿabd ʾanʿamnā ʿalayh w-jaʿalnāh mathal l-banī ʾisrāʾīl
english_saheeh_international: Jesus was not but a servant upon whom We bestowed favor, and We made him an example for the Children of Israel

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو نَشاءُ لَجَعَلنا مِنكُم مَلائِكَةً فِي الأَرضِ يَخلُفونَ
blank: w-law nashāʾ l-jaʿalnā minkum malāʾikat fīl-ʾarḍ yakhlufūn
english_saheeh_international: And if We willed, We could have made instead of you angels succeeding one another on the earth

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لَعِلمٌ لِلسّاعَةِ فَلا تَمتَرُنَّ بِها وَاتَّبِعونِ ۚ هٰذا صِراطٌ مُستَقيمٌ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-ʿilm l-s-sāʿat f-lā tamtarunn bihā w-ttabiʿūn hādhā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, Jesus will be a sign for knowledge of the Hour, so be not in doubt of it, and follow Me. This is a straight path

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ الشَّيطانُ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُم عَدُوٌّ مُبينٌ
blank: w-lā yaṣuddannakum sh-shayṭān ʾinnahū lakum ʿaduww mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And never let Satan avert you. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy

arabic_uthmani: وَلَمّا جاءَ عيسىٰ بِالبَيِّناتِ قالَ قَد جِئتُكُم بِالحِكمَةِ وَلِأُبَيِّنَ لَكُم بَعضَ الَّذي تَختَلِفونَ فيهِ ۖ فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطيعونِ
blank: w-lammā jāʾ ʿīsā b-l-bayyināt qāl qad jiʾtukum b-l-ḥikmat w-l-ʾubayyin lakum baʿḍalladhī takhtalifūn fīh f-ttaqū llāh w-ʾaṭīʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And when Jesus brought clear proofs, he said, "I have come to you with wisdom and to make clear to you some of that over which you differ, so fear Allah and obey me

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ رَبّي وَرَبُّكُم فَاعبُدوهُ ۚ هٰذا صِراطٌ مُستَقيمٌ
blank: ʾinn llāh huw rabbī w-rabbukum f-ʿbudūh hādhā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path

arabic_uthmani: فَاختَلَفَ الأَحزابُ مِن بَينِهِم ۖ فَوَيلٌ لِلَّذينَ ظَلَموا مِن عَذابِ يَومٍ أَليمٍ
blank: f-khtalafal-ʾaḥzāb m baynihim f-wayl l-lladhīn ẓalamū m ʿadhāb yawm ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: But the denominations from among them differed and separated, so woe to those who have wronged from the punishment of a painful Day

arabic_uthmani: هَل يَنظُرونَ إِلَّا السّاعَةَ أَن تَأتِيَهُم بَغتَةً وَهُم لا يَشعُرونَ
blank: hal yanẓurūn ʾillā s-sāʿat ʾ taʾtiyahum baghtat w-hum lā yashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: Are they waiting except for the Hour to come upon them suddenly while they perceive not

arabic_uthmani: الأَخِلّاءُ يَومَئِذٍ بَعضُهُم لِبَعضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا المُتَّقينَ
blank: al-ʾakhillāʾ yawmaʾidh baʿḍuhum l-baʿḍ ʿaduww ʾillāl-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Close friends, that Day, will be enemies to each other, except for the righteous

arabic_uthmani: يا عِبادِ لا خَوفٌ عَلَيكُمُ اليَومَ وَلا أَنتُم تَحزَنونَ
blank: yā-ʿibād lā khawf ʿalaykumul-yawm w-lā ʾantum taḥzanūn
english_saheeh_international: To whom Allah will say, "O My servants, no fear will there be concerning you this Day, nor will you grieve

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ آمَنوا بِآياتِنا وَكانوا مُسلِمينَ
blank: alladhīn ʾāmanū b-ʾāyātinā w-kānū muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: You who believed in Our verses and were Muslims

arabic_uthmani: ادخُلُوا الجَنَّةَ أَنتُم وَأَزواجُكُم تُحبَرونَ
blank: udkhulūl-jannat ʾantum w-ʾazwājukum tuḥbarūn
english_saheeh_international: Enter Paradise, you and your kinds, delighted

arabic_uthmani: يُطافُ عَلَيهِم بِصِحافٍ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَأَكوابٍ ۖ وَفيها ما تَشتَهيهِ الأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ الأَعيُنُ ۖ وَأَنتُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: yuṭāf ʿalayhim b-ṣiḥāf m dhahab w-ʾakwāb w-fīhā mā tashtahīhil-ʾanfus w-taladhdhul-ʾaʿyun w-ʾantum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: Circulated among them will be plates and vessels of gold. And therein is whatever the souls desire and what delights the eyes, and you will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: وَتِلكَ الجَنَّةُ الَّتي أورِثتُموها بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-tilkal-jannat llatī ʾūrithtumūhā b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And that is Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: لَكُم فيها فاكِهَةٌ كَثيرَةٌ مِنها تَأكُلونَ
blank: lakum fīhā fākihat kathīrat minhā taʾkulūn
english_saheeh_international: For you therein is much fruit from which you will eat

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُجرِمينَ في عَذابِ جَهَنَّمَ خالِدونَ
blank: ʾinnal-mujrimīn fī ʿadhāb jahannam khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally

arabic_uthmani: لا يُفَتَّرُ عَنهُم وَهُم فيهِ مُبلِسونَ
blank: lā yufattar ʿanhum w-hum fīh mublisūn
english_saheeh_international: It will not be allowed to subside for them, and they, therein, are in despair

arabic_uthmani: وَما ظَلَمناهُم وَلٰكِن كانوا هُمُ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-mā ẓalamnāhum w-lāk kānū hum ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: وَنادَوا يا مالِكُ لِيَقضِ عَلَينا رَبُّكَ ۖ قالَ إِنَّكُم ماكِثونَ
blank: w-nādaw yā-mālik l-yaqḍ ʿalaynā rabbuk qāl ʾinnakum mākithūn
english_saheeh_international: And they will call, "O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will remain

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد جِئناكُم بِالحَقِّ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَكُم لِلحَقِّ كارِهونَ
blank: l-qad jiʾnākum b-l-ḥaqq w-lākinn ʾaktharakum l-l-ḥaqq kārihūn
english_saheeh_international: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse

arabic_uthmani: أَم أَبرَموا أَمرًا فَإِنّا مُبرِمونَ
blank: ʾam ʾabramū ʾamr f-ʾinnā mubrimūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have they devised some affair? But indeed, We are devising a plan

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَحسَبونَ أَنّا لا نَسمَعُ سِرَّهُم وَنَجواهُم ۚ بَلىٰ وَرُسُلُنا لَدَيهِم يَكتُبونَ
blank: ʾam yaḥsabūn ʾannā lā nasmaʿ sirrahum w-najwāhum balā w-rusulunā ladayhim yaktubūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private conversations? Yes, We do, and Our messengers are with them recording

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِن كانَ لِلرَّحمٰنِ وَلَدٌ فَأَنا أَوَّلُ العابِدينَ
blank: qul ʾ kān l-r-raḥmān walad f-ʾan ʾawwalul-ʿābidīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "If the Most Merciful had a son, then I would be the first of his worshippers

arabic_uthmani: سُبحانَ رَبِّ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ رَبِّ العَرشِ عَمّا يَصِفونَ
blank: subḥān rabb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ rabbil-ʿarsh ʿammā yaṣifūn
english_saheeh_international: Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe

arabic_uthmani: فَذَرهُم يَخوضوا وَيَلعَبوا حَتّىٰ يُلاقوا يَومَهُمُ الَّذي يوعَدونَ
blank: f-dharhum yakhūḍū w-yalʿabū ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumulladhī yūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي فِي السَّماءِ إِلٰهٌ وَفِي الأَرضِ إِلٰهٌ ۚ وَهُوَ الحَكيمُ العَليمُ
blank: w-huwalladhī fī s-samāʾ ʾilāh w-fīl-ʾarḍ ʾilāh w-huwal-ḥakīmul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And it is Allah who is the only deity in the heaven, and on the earth the only deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: وَتَبارَكَ الَّذي لَهُ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَما بَينَهُما وَعِندَهُ عِلمُ السّاعَةِ وَإِلَيهِ تُرجَعونَ
blank: w-tabārakalladhī lahū mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā w-ʿindahū ʿilm s-sāʿat w-ʾilayh turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And blessed is He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them and with whom is knowledge of the Hour and to whom you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَملِكُ الَّذينَ يَدعونَ مِن دونِهِ الشَّفاعَةَ إِلّا مَن شَهِدَ بِالحَقِّ وَهُم يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-lā yamlikulladhīn yadʿūn m dūnih sh-shafāʿat ʾillā m shahid b-l-ḥaqq w-hum yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And those they invoke besides Him do not possess power of intercession; but only those who testify to the truth can benefit, and they know

arabic_uthmani: وَلَئِن سَأَلتَهُم مَن خَلَقَهُم لَيَقولُنَّ اللَّهُ ۖ فَأَنّىٰ يُؤفَكونَ
blank: w-l-ʾ saʾaltahum m khalaqahum l-yaqūlunn llāh f-ʾannā yuʾfakūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, "Allah." So how are they deluded

arabic_uthmani: وَقيلِهِ يا رَبِّ إِنَّ هٰؤُلاءِ قَومٌ لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: w-qīlihī yā-rabb ʾinn hāʾulāʾ qawm lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah acknowledges his saying, "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe

arabic_uthmani: فَاصفَح عَنهُم وَقُل سَلامٌ ۚ فَسَوفَ يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-ṣfaḥ ʿanhum w-qul salām f-sawf yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So turn aside from them and say, "Peace." But they are going to know

arabic_uthmani: حم
blank: ḥ-m (ḥā mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Ha, Meem

arabic_uthmani: وَالكِتابِ المُبينِ
blank: w-l-kitābil-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: By the clear Book

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَنزَلناهُ في لَيلَةٍ مُبارَكَةٍ ۚ إِنّا كُنّا مُنذِرينَ
blank: ʾinnā ʾanzalnāh fī laylat mubārakat ʾinnā kunnā mundhirīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn mankind

arabic_uthmani: فيها يُفرَقُ كُلُّ أَمرٍ حَكيمٍ
blank: fīhā yufraq kull ʾamr ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: On that night is made distinct every precise matter

arabic_uthmani: أَمرًا مِن عِندِنا ۚ إِنّا كُنّا مُرسِلينَ
blank: ʾamram-m ʿindinā ʾinnā kunnā mursilīn
english_saheeh_international: Every matter proceeding from Us. Indeed, We were to send a messenger

arabic_uthmani: رَحمَةً مِن رَبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّميعُ العَليمُ
blank: raḥmatam-m rabbik ʾinnahū huw s-samīʿul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: رَبِّ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَما بَينَهُما ۖ إِن كُنتُم موقِنينَ
blank: rabb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā ʾ kuntum mūqinīn
english_saheeh_international: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain

arabic_uthmani: لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ يُحيي وَيُميتُ ۖ رَبُّكُم وَرَبُّ آبائِكُمُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw yuḥyī w-yumīt rabbukum w-rabb ʾābāʾikumul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. He is your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers

arabic_uthmani: بَل هُم في شَكٍّ يَلعَبونَ
blank: bal hum fī shakk yalʿabūn
english_saheeh_international: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves

arabic_uthmani: فَارتَقِب يَومَ تَأتِي السَّماءُ بِدُخانٍ مُبينٍ
blank: f-rtaqib yawm taʾtī s-samāʾ b-dukhān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke

arabic_uthmani: يَغشَى النّاسَ ۖ هٰذا عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: yaghshā n-nās hādhā ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Covering the people; this is a painful torment

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنَا اكشِف عَنَّا العَذابَ إِنّا مُؤمِنونَ
blank: rabbanā kshif ʿannāl-ʿadhāb ʾinnā muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers

arabic_uthmani: أَنّىٰ لَهُمُ الذِّكرىٰ وَقَد جاءَهُم رَسولٌ مُبينٌ
blank: ʾannā lahum dh-dhikrā w-qad jāʾahum rasūl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: How will there be for them a reminder at that time? And there had come to them a clear Messenger

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوا عَنهُ وَقالوا مُعَلَّمٌ مَجنونٌ
blank: thumm tawallaw ʿanh w-qālū muʿallam majnūn
english_saheeh_international: Then they turned away from him and said, "He was taught and is a madman

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا كاشِفُو العَذابِ قَليلًا ۚ إِنَّكُم عائِدونَ
blank: ʾinnā kāshifūl-ʿadhāb qalīl ʾinnakum ʿāʾidūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you disbelievers will return to disbelief

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ نَبطِشُ البَطشَةَ الكُبرىٰ إِنّا مُنتَقِمونَ
blank: yawm nabṭishul-baṭshatal-kubrā ʾinnā muntaqimūn
english_saheeh_international: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَلَقَد فَتَنّا قَبلَهُم قَومَ فِرعَونَ وَجاءَهُم رَسولٌ كَريمٌ
blank: w-l-qad fatannā qablahum qawm firʿawn w-jāʾahum rasūl karīm
english_saheeh_international: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger

arabic_uthmani: أَن أَدّوا إِلَيَّ عِبادَ اللَّهِ ۖ إِنّي لَكُم رَسولٌ أَمينٌ
blank: ʾ ʾaddū ʾilayy ʿibād llāh ʾinnī lakum rasūl ʾamīn
english_saheeh_international: Saying, "Render to me the servants of Allah. Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger

arabic_uthmani: وَأَن لا تَعلوا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنّي آتيكُم بِسُلطانٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-ʾ lā taʿlū ʿalā llāh ʾinnī ʾātīkum b-sulṭān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And saying, "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّي عُذتُ بِرَبّي وَرَبِّكُم أَن تَرجُمونِ
blank: w-ʾinnī ʿudht b-rabbī w-rabbikum ʾ tarjumūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن لَم تُؤمِنوا لي فَاعتَزِلونِ
blank: w-ʾ lam tuʾminū lī f-ʿtazilūn
english_saheeh_international: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone

arabic_uthmani: فَدَعا رَبَّهُ أَنَّ هٰؤُلاءِ قَومٌ مُجرِمونَ
blank: f-daʿā rabbahū ʾann hāʾulāʾ qawm mujrimūn
english_saheeh_international: And finally he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people

arabic_uthmani: فَأَسرِ بِعِبادي لَيلًا إِنَّكُم مُتَّبَعونَ
blank: f-ʾasr b-ʿibādī layl ʾinnakum muttabaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah said, "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued

arabic_uthmani: وَاترُكِ البَحرَ رَهوًا ۖ إِنَّهُم جُندٌ مُغرَقونَ
blank: w-trukil-baḥr rahw ʾinnahum jund mughraqūn
english_saheeh_international: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned

arabic_uthmani: كَم تَرَكوا مِن جَنّاتٍ وَعُيونٍ
blank: kam tarakū m jannāt w-ʿuyūn
english_saheeh_international: How much they left behind of gardens and springs

arabic_uthmani: وَزُروعٍ وَمَقامٍ كَريمٍ
blank: w-zurūʿ w-maqām karīm
english_saheeh_international: And crops and noble sites

arabic_uthmani: وَنَعمَةٍ كانوا فيها فاكِهينَ
blank: w-naʿmat kānū fīhā fākihīn
english_saheeh_international: And comfort wherein they were amused

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَورَثناها قَومًا آخَرينَ
blank: k-dhālik w-ʾawrathnāhā qawm ʾākharīn
english_saheeh_international: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people

arabic_uthmani: فَما بَكَت عَلَيهِمُ السَّماءُ وَالأَرضُ وَما كانوا مُنظَرينَ
blank: f-mā bakat ʿalayhim s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā kānū munẓarīn
english_saheeh_international: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد نَجَّينا بَني إِسرائيلَ مِنَ العَذابِ المُهينِ
blank: w-l-qad najjaynā banī ʾisrāʾīl minal-ʿadhābil-muhīn
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment

arabic_uthmani: مِن فِرعَونَ ۚ إِنَّهُ كانَ عالِيًا مِنَ المُسرِفينَ
blank: m firʿawn ʾinnahū kān ʿāliyam-minal-musrifīn
english_saheeh_international: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَدِ اختَرناهُم عَلىٰ عِلمٍ عَلَى العالَمينَ
blank: w-l-qad khtarnāhum ʿalā ʿilm ʿalāl-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over all the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَآتَيناهُم مِنَ الآياتِ ما فيهِ بَلاءٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-ʾātaynāhum minal-ʾāyātimā fīh balāʾ mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰؤُلاءِ لَيَقولونَ
blank: ʾinn hāʾulāʾ l-yaqūlūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, these disbelievers are saying

arabic_uthmani: إِن هِيَ إِلّا مَوتَتُنَا الأولىٰ وَما نَحنُ بِمُنشَرينَ
blank: ʾ hiy ʾillā mawtatunāl-ʾūlā w-mā naḥn b-munsharīn
english_saheeh_international: There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected

arabic_uthmani: فَأتوا بِآبائِنا إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: f-ʾtū b-ʾābāʾinā ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Then bring back our forefathers, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: أَهُم خَيرٌ أَم قَومُ تُبَّعٍ وَالَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ أَهلَكناهُم ۖ إِنَّهُم كانوا مُجرِمينَ
blank: ʾ-hum khayr ʾam qawm tubbaʿ w-lladhīn m qablihim ʾahlaknāhum ʾinnahum kānū mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, for indeed, they were criminals

arabic_uthmani: وَما خَلَقنَا السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَما بَينَهُما لاعِبينَ
blank: w-mā khalaqnā s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā lāʿibīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play

arabic_uthmani: ما خَلَقناهُما إِلّا بِالحَقِّ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: mā khalaqnāhumā ʾillā b-l-ḥaqq w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ يَومَ الفَصلِ ميقاتُهُم أَجمَعينَ
blank: ʾinn yawmal-faṣl mīqātuhum ʾajmaʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ لا يُغني مَولًى عَن مَولًى شَيئًا وَلا هُم يُنصَرونَ
blank: yawm lā yughnī mawl ʿam-mawl shayʾ w-lā hum yunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا مَن رَحِمَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ العَزيزُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: ʾillā m raḥim llāh ʾinnahū huwal-ʿazīz r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Except those believers on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ الزَّقّومِ
blank: ʾinn shajarat z-zaqqūm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the tree of zaqqum

arabic_uthmani: طَعامُ الأَثيمِ
blank: ṭaʿāmul-ʾathīm
english_saheeh_international: Is food for the sinful

arabic_uthmani: كَالمُهلِ يَغلي فِي البُطونِ
blank: k-l-muhl yaghlī fīl-buṭūn
english_saheeh_international: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies

arabic_uthmani: كَغَليِ الحَميمِ
blank: k-ghalyil-ḥamīm
english_saheeh_international: Like the boiling of scalding water

arabic_uthmani: خُذوهُ فَاعتِلوهُ إِلىٰ سَواءِ الجَحيمِ
blank: khudhūh f-ʿtilūh ʾilā sawāʾil-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: It will be commanded, "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ صُبّوا فَوقَ رَأسِهِ مِن عَذابِ الحَميمِ
blank: thumm ṣubbū fawq raʾsihī m ʿadhābil-ḥamīm
english_saheeh_international: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water

arabic_uthmani: ذُق إِنَّكَ أَنتَ العَزيزُ الكَريمُ
blank: dhuq ʾinnak ʾantal-ʿazīzul-karīm
english_saheeh_international: It will be said, "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذا ما كُنتُم بِهِ تَمتَرونَ
blank: ʾinn hādhā mā kuntum bihī tamtarūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُتَّقينَ في مَقامٍ أَمينٍ
blank: ʾinnal-muttaqīn fī maqām ʾamīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place

arabic_uthmani: في جَنّاتٍ وَعُيونٍ
blank: fī jannāt w-ʿuyūn
english_saheeh_international: Within gardens and springs

arabic_uthmani: يَلبَسونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِستَبرَقٍ مُتَقابِلينَ
blank: yalbasūn m sundus w-ʾistabraq mutaqābilīn
english_saheeh_international: Wearing garments of fine silk and brocade, facing each other

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجناهُم بِحورٍ عينٍ
blank: k-dhālik w-zawwajnāhum b-ḥūr ʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, beautiful eyes

arabic_uthmani: يَدعونَ فيها بِكُلِّ فاكِهَةٍ آمِنينَ
blank: yadʿūn fīhā b-kull fākihat ʾāminīn
english_saheeh_international: They will call therein for every kind of fruit - safe and secure

arabic_uthmani: لا يَذوقونَ فيهَا المَوتَ إِلَّا المَوتَةَ الأولىٰ ۖ وَوَقاهُم عَذابَ الجَحيمِ
blank: lā yadhūqūn fīhāl-mawt ʾillāl-mawtatal-ʾūlā w-waqāhum ʿadhābal-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: فَضلًا مِن رَبِّكَ ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: faḍlam-m rabbik dhālik huwal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّما يَسَّرناهُ بِلِسانِكَ لَعَلَّهُم يَتَذَكَّرونَ
blank: f-ʾinnamā yassarnāh b-lisānik laʿallahum yatadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, We have eased the Qur'an in your tongue that they might be reminded

arabic_uthmani: فَارتَقِب إِنَّهُم مُرتَقِبونَ
blank: f-rtaqib ʾinnahum murtaqibūn
english_saheeh_international: So watch, O Muhammad; indeed, they are watching for your end

arabic_uthmani: حم
blank: ḥ-m (ḥā mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Ha, Meem

arabic_uthmani: تَنزيلُ الكِتابِ مِنَ اللَّهِ العَزيزِ الحَكيمِ
blank: tanzīlul-kitāb min llāhil-ʿazīzil-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ لَآياتٍ لِلمُؤمِنينَ
blank: ʾinn fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ l-ʾāyāt l-l-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, within the heavens and earth are signs for the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَفي خَلقِكُم وَما يَبُثُّ مِن دابَّةٍ آياتٌ لِقَومٍ يوقِنونَ
blank: w-fī khalqikum w-mā yabuthth m dābbat ʾāyāt l-qawm yūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: And in the creation of yourselves and what He disperses of moving creatures are signs for people who are certain in faith

arabic_uthmani: وَاختِلافِ اللَّيلِ وَالنَّهارِ وَما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ مِنَ السَّماءِ مِن رِزقٍ فَأَحيا بِهِ الأَرضَ بَعدَ مَوتِها وَتَصريفِ الرِّياحِ آياتٌ لِقَومٍ يَعقِلونَ
blank: w-khtilāfil-layl w-n-nahār w-mā ʾanzal llāh min s-samāʾ m rizq f-ʾaḥyā bihil-ʾarḍ baʿd mawtihā w-taṣrīf r-riyāḥ ʾāyāt l-qawm yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: And in the alternation of night and day and in what Allah sends down from the sky of provision and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and in His directing of the winds are signs for a people who reason

arabic_uthmani: تِلكَ آياتُ اللَّهِ نَتلوها عَلَيكَ بِالحَقِّ ۖ فَبِأَيِّ حَديثٍ بَعدَ اللَّهِ وَآياتِهِ يُؤمِنونَ
blank: tilk ʾāyāt llāh natlūhā ʿalayk b-l-ḥaqq f-b-ʾayy ḥadīth baʿd llāh w-ʾāyātihī yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: These are the verses of Allah which We recite to you in truth. Then in what statement after Allah and His verses will they believe

arabic_uthmani: وَيلٌ لِكُلِّ أَفّاكٍ أَثيمٍ
blank: wayl l-kull ʾaffāk ʾathīm
english_saheeh_international: Woe to every sinful liar

arabic_uthmani: يَسمَعُ آياتِ اللَّهِ تُتلىٰ عَلَيهِ ثُمَّ يُصِرُّ مُستَكبِرًا كَأَن لَم يَسمَعها ۖ فَبَشِّرهُ بِعَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: yasmaʿ ʾāyāt llāh tutlā ʿalayh thumm yuṣirr mustakbir k-ʾ lam yasmaʿhā f-bashshirh b-ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Who hears the verses of Allah recited to him, then persists arrogantly as if he had not heard them. So give him tidings of a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا عَلِمَ مِن آياتِنا شَيئًا اتَّخَذَها هُزُوًا ۚ أُولٰئِكَ لَهُم عَذابٌ مُهينٌ
blank: w-ʾidhā ʿalim m ʾāyātinā shayʾ- ttakhadhahā huzuw ʾulāʾik lahum ʿadhāb muhīn
english_saheeh_international: And when he knows anything of Our verses, he takes them in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment

arabic_uthmani: مِن وَرائِهِم جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَلا يُغني عَنهُم ما كَسَبوا شَيئًا وَلا مَا اتَّخَذوا مِن دونِ اللَّهِ أَولِياءَ ۖ وَلَهُم عَذابٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: m warāʾihim jahannam w-lā yughnī ʿanhum mā kasabū shayʾ w-lā mā ttakhadhū m dūn llāh ʾawliyāʾ w-lahum ʿadhāb ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Before them is Hell, and what they had earned will not avail them at all nor what they had taken besides Allah as allies. And they will have a great punishment

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا هُدًى ۖ وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا بِآياتِ رَبِّهِم لَهُم عَذابٌ مِن رِجزٍ أَليمٌ
blank: hādhā hud w-lladhīn kafarū b-ʾāyāt rabbihim lahum ʿadhāb m rijz ʾalīm-
english_saheeh_international: This Qur'an is guidance. And those who have disbelieved in the verses of their Lord will have a painful punishment of foul nature

arabic_uthmani: ۞ اللَّهُ الَّذي سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ البَحرَ لِتَجرِيَ الفُلكُ فيهِ بِأَمرِهِ وَلِتَبتَغوا مِن فَضلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُم تَشكُرونَ
blank: allāhulladhī sakhkhar lakumul-baḥr l-tajriyal-fulk fīh b-ʾamrihī w-l tabtaghū m faḍlihī w-laʿallakum tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: It is Allah who subjected to you the sea so that ships may sail upon it by His command and that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ جَميعًا مِنهُ ۚ إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَآياتٍ لِقَومٍ يَتَفَكَّرونَ
blank: w-sakhkhar lakum mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ jamīʿam-minh ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʾāyāt l-qawm yatafakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And He has subjected to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth - all from Him. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought

arabic_uthmani: قُل لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا يَغفِروا لِلَّذينَ لا يَرجونَ أَيّامَ اللَّهِ لِيَجزِيَ قَومًا بِما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: qul l-lladhīn ʾāmanū yaghfirū l-lladhīn lā yarjūn ʾayyām llāh l-yajziy qawm b-mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, to those who have believed that they should forgive those who expect not the days of Allah so that He may recompense a people for what they used to earn

arabic_uthmani: مَن عَمِلَ صالِحًا فَلِنَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن أَساءَ فَعَلَيها ۖ ثُمَّ إِلىٰ رَبِّكُم تُرجَعونَ
blank: m ʿamil ṣāliḥ f-l-nafsihī w-m ʾasāʾ f-ʿalayhā thumm ʾilā rabbikum turjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever does a good deed - it is for himself; and whoever does evil - it is against the self. Then to your Lord you will be returned

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد آتَينا بَني إِسرائيلَ الكِتابَ وَالحُكمَ وَالنُّبُوَّةَ وَرَزَقناهُم مِنَ الطَّيِّباتِ وَفَضَّلناهُم عَلَى العالَمينَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾātaynā banī ʾisrāʾīlal-kitāb w-l-ḥukm w-n-nubuwwat w-razaqnāhum min ṭ-ṭayyibāt w-faḍḍalnāhum ʿalāl-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And We did certainly give the Children of Israel the Scripture and judgement and prophethood, and We provided them with good things and preferred them over the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَآتَيناهُم بَيِّناتٍ مِنَ الأَمرِ ۖ فَمَا اختَلَفوا إِلّا مِن بَعدِ ما جاءَهُمُ العِلمُ بَغيًا بَينَهُم ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقضي بَينَهُم يَومَ القِيامَةِ فيما كانوا فيهِ يَختَلِفونَ
blank: w-ʾātaynāhum bayyināt minal-ʾamr f-mā khtalafū ʾillā m baʿd mā jāʾahumul-ʿilm baghy baynahum ʾinn rabbak yaqḍī baynahum yawmal-qiyāmat fī-mā kānū fīh yakhtalifūn
english_saheeh_international: And We gave them clear proofs of the matter of religion. And they did not differ except after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ جَعَلناكَ عَلىٰ شَريعَةٍ مِنَ الأَمرِ فَاتَّبِعها وَلا تَتَّبِع أَهواءَ الَّذينَ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: thumm jaʿalnāk ʿalā sharīʿat minal-ʾamr f-ttabiʿhā w-lā tattabiʿ ʾahwāʾalladhīn lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Then We put you, O Muhammad, on an ordained way concerning the matter of religion; so follow it and do not follow the inclinations of those who do not know

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُم لَن يُغنوا عَنكَ مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيئًا ۚ وَإِنَّ الظّالِمينَ بَعضُهُم أَولِياءُ بَعضٍ ۖ وَاللَّهُ وَلِيُّ المُتَّقينَ
blank: ʾinnahum l yughnū ʿank min llāh shayʾ w-ʾinn ẓ-ẓālimīn baʿḍuhum ʾawliyāʾ baʿḍ w-llāh waliyyul-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, they will never avail you against Allah at all. And indeed, the wrongdoers are allies of one another; but Allah is the protector of the righteous

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا بَصائِرُ لِلنّاسِ وَهُدًى وَرَحمَةٌ لِقَومٍ يوقِنونَ
blank: hādhā baṣāʾir l-n-nās w-hud w-raḥmat l-qawm yūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: This Qur'an is enlightenment for mankind and guidance and mercy for a people who are certain in faith

arabic_uthmani: أَم حَسِبَ الَّذينَ اجتَرَحُوا السَّيِّئَاتِ أَن نَجعَلَهُم كَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ سَواءً مَحياهُم وَمَماتُهُم ۚ ساءَ ما يَحكُمونَ
blank: ʾam ḥasiballadhīn jtaraḥū s-sayyiʾāt ʾ najʿalahum k-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt sawāʾam-maḥyāhum w-mamātuhum sāʾ mā yaḥkumūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do those who commit evils think We will make them like those who have believed and done righteous deeds - make them equal in their life and their death? Evil is that which they judge

arabic_uthmani: وَخَلَقَ اللَّهُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ بِالحَقِّ وَلِتُجزىٰ كُلُّ نَفسٍ بِما كَسَبَت وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: w-khalaq llāh s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ b-l-ḥaqq w-l-tujzā kull nafs b-mā kasabat w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah created the heavens and earth in truth and so that every soul may be recompensed for what it has earned, and they will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: أَفَرَأَيتَ مَنِ اتَّخَذَ إِلٰهَهُ هَواهُ وَأَضَلَّهُ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ عِلمٍ وَخَتَمَ عَلىٰ سَمعِهِ وَقَلبِهِ وَجَعَلَ عَلىٰ بَصَرِهِ غِشاوَةً فَمَن يَهديهِ مِن بَعدِ اللَّهِ ۚ أَفَلا تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: ʾ-f-raʾayt man ttakhadh ʾilāhahū hawāh w-ʾaḍallah llāh ʿalā ʿilm w-khatam ʿalā samʿihī w-qalbihī w-jaʿal ʿalā baṣarihī ghishāwat f-m yahdīh m baʿd llāh ʾ-f-lā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Have you seen he who has taken as his god his own desire, and Allah has sent him astray due to knowledge and has set a seal upon his hearing and his heart and put over his vision a veil? So who will guide him after Allah? Then will you not be reminded

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا ما هِيَ إِلّا حَياتُنَا الدُّنيا نَموتُ وَنَحيا وَما يُهلِكُنا إِلَّا الدَّهرُ ۚ وَما لَهُم بِذٰلِكَ مِن عِلمٍ ۖ إِن هُم إِلّا يَظُنّونَ
blank: w-qālū mā hiy ʾillā ḥayātunā d-dunyā namūt w-naḥyā w-mā yuhlikunā ʾillā d-dahr w-mā lahum b-dhālik m ʿilm ʾ hum ʾillā yaẓunnūn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "There is not but our worldly life; we die and live, and nothing destroys us except time." And they have of that no knowledge; they are only assuming

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا تُتلىٰ عَلَيهِم آياتُنا بَيِّناتٍ ما كانَ حُجَّتَهُم إِلّا أَن قالُوا ائتوا بِآبائِنا إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā tutlā ʿalayhim ʾāyātunā bayyināt mā kān ḥujjatahum ʾillā ʾ qālū ʾtū b-ʾābāʾinā ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, their argument is only that they say, "Bring back our forefathers, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: قُلِ اللَّهُ يُحييكُم ثُمَّ يُميتُكُم ثُمَّ يَجمَعُكُم إِلىٰ يَومِ القِيامَةِ لا رَيبَ فيهِ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَ النّاسِ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: qul llāh yuḥyīkum thumm yumītukum thumm yajmaʿukum ʾilā yawmil-qiyāmat lā rayb fīh w-lākinn ʾakthar n-nās lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Allah causes you to live, then causes you to die; then He will assemble you for the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt, but most of the people do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَيَومَ تَقومُ السّاعَةُ يَومَئِذٍ يَخسَرُ المُبطِلونَ
blank: w-l-llāh mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-yawm taqūm s-sāʿat yawmaʾidh yakhsarul-mubṭilūn
english_saheeh_international: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And the Day the Hour appears - that Day the falsifiers will lose

arabic_uthmani: وَتَرىٰ كُلَّ أُمَّةٍ جاثِيَةً ۚ كُلُّ أُمَّةٍ تُدعىٰ إِلىٰ كِتابِهَا اليَومَ تُجزَونَ ما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-tarā kull ʾummat jāthiyat kull ʾummat tudʿā ʾilā kitābihāl-yawm tujzawn mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: And you will see every nation kneeling from fear. Every nation will be called to its record and told, "Today you will be recompensed for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا كِتابُنا يَنطِقُ عَلَيكُم بِالحَقِّ ۚ إِنّا كُنّا نَستَنسِخُ ما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: hādhā kitābunā yanṭiq ʿalaykum b-l-ḥaqq ʾinnā kunnā nastansikh mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: This, Our record, speaks about you in truth. Indeed, We were having transcribed whatever you used to do

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ فَيُدخِلُهُم رَبُّهُم في رَحمَتِهِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الفَوزُ المُبينُ
blank: f-ʾammālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt f-yudkhiluhum rabbuhum fī raḥmatihī dhālik huwal-fawzul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is what is the clear attainment

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمَّا الَّذينَ كَفَروا أَفَلَم تَكُن آياتي تُتلىٰ عَلَيكُم فَاستَكبَرتُم وَكُنتُم قَومًا مُجرِمينَ
blank: w-ʾammālladhīn kafarū ʾ-f-lam tak ʾāyātī tutlā ʿalaykum f-stakbartum w-kuntum qawmam-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: But as for those who disbelieved, it will be said, "Were not Our verses recited to you, but you were arrogant and became a people of criminals

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ إِنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَالسّاعَةُ لا رَيبَ فيها قُلتُم ما نَدري مَا السّاعَةُ إِن نَظُنُّ إِلّا ظَنًّا وَما نَحنُ بِمُستَيقِنينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl ʾinn waʿd llāh ḥaqq w-s-sāʿat lā rayb fīhā qultum mā nadrī mā s-sāʿat ʾ naẓunn ʾillā ẓann w-mā naḥn b-mustayqinīn
english_saheeh_international: And when it was said, 'Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth and the Hour is coming - no doubt about it,' you said, 'We know not what is the Hour. We assume only assumption, and we are not convinced

arabic_uthmani: وَبَدا لَهُم سَيِّئَاتُ ما عَمِلوا وَحاقَ بِهِم ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-badā lahum sayyiʾāt mā ʿamilū w-ḥāq bihim mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And the evil consequences of what they did will appear to them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: وَقيلَ اليَومَ نَنساكُم كَما نَسيتُم لِقاءَ يَومِكُم هٰذا وَمَأواكُمُ النّارُ وَما لَكُم مِن ناصِرينَ
blank: w-qīlal-yawm nansākum k-mā nasītum liqāʾ yawmikum hādhā w-maʾwākum n-nār w-mā lakum m nāṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: And it will be said, "Today We will forget you as you forgot the meeting of this Day of yours, and your refuge is the Fire, and for you there are no helpers

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ اتَّخَذتُم آياتِ اللَّهِ هُزُوًا وَغَرَّتكُمُ الحَياةُ الدُّنيا ۚ فَاليَومَ لا يُخرَجونَ مِنها وَلا هُم يُستَعتَبونَ
blank: dhālikum b-ʾannakum ttakhadhtum ʾāyāt llāh huzuw w-gharratkumul-ḥayāt d-dunyā f-l-yawm lā yukhrajūn minhā w-lā hum yustaʿtabūn
english_saheeh_international: That is because you took the verses of Allah in ridicule, and worldly life deluded you." So that Day they will not be removed from it, nor will they be asked to appease Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَلِلَّهِ الحَمدُ رَبِّ السَّماواتِ وَرَبِّ الأَرضِ رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: f-l-llāhil-ḥamd rabb s-samāwāt w-rabbil-ʾarḍ rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: Then, to Allah belongs all praise - Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَلَهُ الكِبرِياءُ فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: w-lahul-kibriyāʾ fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And to Him belongs all grandeur within the heavens and the earth, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: حم
blank: ḥ-m (ḥā mīm)
english_saheeh_international: Ha, Meem

arabic_uthmani: تَنزيلُ الكِتابِ مِنَ اللَّهِ العَزيزِ الحَكيمِ
blank: tanzīlul-kitāb min llāhil-ʿazīzil-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: ما خَلَقنَا السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَما بَينَهُما إِلّا بِالحَقِّ وَأَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا عَمّا أُنذِروا مُعرِضونَ
blank: mā khalaqnā s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā ʾillā b-l-ḥaqq w-ʾajal musamm w-lladhīn kafarū ʿammā ʾundhirū muʿriḍūn
english_saheeh_international: We did not create the heavens and earth and what is between them except in truth and for a specified term. But those who disbelieve, from that of which they are warned, are turning away

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم ما تَدعونَ مِن دونِ اللَّهِ أَروني ماذا خَلَقوا مِنَ الأَرضِ أَم لَهُم شِركٌ فِي السَّماواتِ ۖ ائتوني بِكِتابٍ مِن قَبلِ هٰذا أَو أَثارَةٍ مِن عِلمٍ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum mā tadʿūn m dūn llāh ʾarūnī mādhā khalaqū minal-ʾarḍ ʾam lahum shirk fī s-samāwāt ʾtūnī b-kitāb m qabl hādhā ʾaw ʾathārat m ʿilm ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Have you considered that which you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created of the earth; or did they have partnership in creation of the heavens? Bring me a scripture revealed before this or a remaining trace of knowledge, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَضَلُّ مِمَّن يَدعو مِن دونِ اللَّهِ مَن لا يَستَجيبُ لَهُ إِلىٰ يَومِ القِيامَةِ وَهُم عَن دُعائِهِم غافِلونَ
blank: w-m ʾaḍall mimm yadʿū m dūn llāh m lā yastajīb lahū ʾilā yawmil-qiyāmat w-hum ʿ duʿāʾihim ghāfilūn
english_saheeh_international: And who is more astray than he who invokes besides Allah those who will not respond to him until the Day of Resurrection, and they, of their invocation, are unaware

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا حُشِرَ النّاسُ كانوا لَهُم أَعداءً وَكانوا بِعِبادَتِهِم كافِرينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā ḥushir n-nās kānū lahum ʾaʿdāʾ w-kānū b-ʿibādatihim kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And when the people are gathered that Day, they who were invoked will be enemies to them, and they will be deniers of their worship

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا تُتلىٰ عَلَيهِم آياتُنا بَيِّناتٍ قالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لِلحَقِّ لَمّا جاءَهُم هٰذا سِحرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-ʾidhā tutlā ʿalayhim ʾāyātunā bayyināt qālalladhīn kafarū l-l-ḥaqq lammā jāʾahum hādhā ṣiḥr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is obvious magic

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَقولونَ افتَراهُ ۖ قُل إِنِ افتَرَيتُهُ فَلا تَملِكونَ لي مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيئًا ۖ هُوَ أَعلَمُ بِما تُفيضونَ فيهِ ۖ كَفىٰ بِهِ شَهيدًا بَيني وَبَينَكُم ۖ وَهُوَ الغَفورُ الرَّحيمُ
blank: ʾam yaqūlūn ftarāh qul ʾin ftaraytuhū f-lā tamlikūn lī min llāh shayʾ huw ʾaʿlam b-mā tufīḍūn fīh kafā bihī shahīd baynī w-baynakum w-huwal-ghafūr r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Or do they say, "He has invented it?" Say, "If I have invented it, you will not possess for me the power of protection from Allah at all. He is most knowing of that in which you are involved. Sufficient is He as Witness between me and you, and He is the Forgiving the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: قُل ما كُنتُ بِدعًا مِنَ الرُّسُلِ وَما أَدري ما يُفعَلُ بي وَلا بِكُم ۖ إِن أَتَّبِعُ إِلّا ما يوحىٰ إِلَيَّ وَما أَنا إِلّا نَذيرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: qul mā kunt bidʿam-min r-rusul w-mā ʾadrī mā yufʿal bī w-lā bikum ʾ ʾattabiʿ ʾillā mā yūḥā ʾilayy w-mā ʾan ʾillā nadhīr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "I am not something original among the messengers, nor do I know what will be done with me or with you. I only follow that which is revealed to me, and I am not but a clear warner

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم إِن كانَ مِن عِندِ اللَّهِ وَكَفَرتُم بِهِ وَشَهِدَ شاهِدٌ مِن بَني إِسرائيلَ عَلىٰ مِثلِهِ فَآمَنَ وَاستَكبَرتُم ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ kān m ʿind llāh w-kafartum bihī w-shahid shāhid m banī ʾisrāʾīl ʿalā mithlihī f-ʾāman w-stakbartum ʾinn llāh lā yahdīl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an was from Allah, and you disbelieved in it while a witness from the Children of Israel has testified to something similar and believed while you were arrogant...?" Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا لَو كانَ خَيرًا ما سَبَقونا إِلَيهِ ۚ وَإِذ لَم يَهتَدوا بِهِ فَسَيَقولونَ هٰذا إِفكٌ قَديمٌ
blank: w-qālalladhīn kafarū l-lladhīn ʾāmanū law kān khayram-mā sabaqūnā ʾilayh w-ʾidh lam yahtadū bihī f-s-yaqūlūn hādhā ʾifk qadīm
english_saheeh_international: And those who disbelieve say of those who believe, "If it had truly been good, they would not have preceded us to it." And when they are not guided by it, they will say, "This is an ancient falsehood

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن قَبلِهِ كِتابُ موسىٰ إِمامًا وَرَحمَةً ۚ وَهٰذا كِتابٌ مُصَدِّقٌ لِسانًا عَرَبِيًّا لِيُنذِرَ الَّذينَ ظَلَموا وَبُشرىٰ لِلمُحسِنينَ
blank: w-m qablihī kitāb mūsā ʾimām w-raḥmat w-hādhā kitāb muṣaddiq lisān ʿarabiyy l-yundhiralladhīn ẓalamū w-bushrā l-l-muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: And before it was the scripture of Moses to lead and as a mercy. And this is a confirming Book in an Arabic tongue to warn those who have wronged and as good tidings to the doers of good

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ قالوا رَبُّنَا اللَّهُ ثُمَّ استَقاموا فَلا خَوفٌ عَلَيهِم وَلا هُم يَحزَنونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn qālū rabbunā llāh thumm staqāmū f-lā khawf ʿalayhim w-lā hum yaḥzanūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah," and then remained on a right course - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ الجَنَّةِ خالِدينَ فيها جَزاءً بِما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥābul-jannat khālidīn fīhā jazāʾ b-mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the companions of Paradise, abiding eternally therein as reward for what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: وَوَصَّينَا الإِنسانَ بِوالِدَيهِ إِحسانًا ۖ حَمَلَتهُ أُمُّهُ كُرهًا وَوَضَعَتهُ كُرهًا ۖ وَحَملُهُ وَفِصالُهُ ثَلاثونَ شَهرًا ۚ حَتّىٰ إِذا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ وَبَلَغَ أَربَعينَ سَنَةً قالَ رَبِّ أَوزِعني أَن أَشكُرَ نِعمَتَكَ الَّتي أَنعَمتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلىٰ والِدَيَّ وَأَن أَعمَلَ صالِحًا تَرضاهُ وَأَصلِح لي في ذُرِّيَّتي ۖ إِنّي تُبتُ إِلَيكَ وَإِنّي مِنَ المُسلِمينَ
blank: w-waṣṣaynāl-ʾinsān b-wālidayh ʾiḥsān ḥamalath ʾummuhū kurh w-waḍaʿath kurh w-ḥamluhū w-fiṣāluhū thalāthūn shahr ḥattā ʾidhā balagh ʾashuddahū w-balagh ʾarbaʿīn sanat qāl rabb ʾawziʿnī ʾ ʾashkur niʿmatak llatī ʾanʿamt ʿalayy w-ʿalā wālidayy w-ʾ ʾaʿmal ṣāliḥ tarḍāh w-ʾaṣliḥ lī fī dhurriyyatī ʾinnī tubt ʾilayk w-ʾinnī minal-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And We have enjoined upon man, to his parents, good treatment. His mother carried him with hardship and gave birth to him with hardship, and his gestation and weaning period is thirty months. He grows until, when he reaches maturity and reaches the age of forty years, he says, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to work righteousness of which You will approve and make righteous for me my offspring. Indeed, I have repented to You, and indeed, I am of the Muslims

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ نَتَقَبَّلُ عَنهُم أَحسَنَ ما عَمِلوا وَنَتَجاوَزُ عَن سَيِّئَاتِهِم في أَصحابِ الجَنَّةِ ۖ وَعدَ الصِّدقِ الَّذي كانوا يوعَدونَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn nataqabbal ʿanhum ʾaḥsan mā ʿamilū w-natajāwaz ʿ sayyiʾātihim fī ʾaṣḥābil-jannat waʿd ṣ-ṣidqilladhī kānū yūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the ones from whom We will accept the best of what they did and overlook their misdeeds, their being among the companions of Paradise. That is the promise of truth which they had been promised

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذي قالَ لِوالِدَيهِ أُفٍّ لَكُما أَتَعِدانِني أَن أُخرَجَ وَقَد خَلَتِ القُرونُ مِن قَبلي وَهُما يَستَغيثانِ اللَّهَ وَيلَكَ آمِن إِنَّ وَعدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ فَيَقولُ ما هٰذا إِلّا أَساطيرُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: w-lladhī qāl l-wālidayh ʾuff lakumā ʾ-taʿidāninī ʾ ʾukhraj w-qad khalatil-qurūn m qablī w-humā yastaghīthān llāh waylak ʾām ʾinn waʿd llāh ḥaqq f-yaqūl mā hādhā ʾillā ʾasāṭīrul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: But one who says to his parents, "Uff to you; do you promise me that I will be brought forth from the earth when generations before me have already passed on into oblivion?" while they call to Allah for help and to their son, "Woe to you! Believe! Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth." But he says, "This is not but legends of the former people

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ حَقَّ عَلَيهِمُ القَولُ في أُمَمٍ قَد خَلَت مِن قَبلِهِم مِنَ الجِنِّ وَالإِنسِ ۖ إِنَّهُم كانوا خاسِرينَ
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn ḥaqq ʿalayhimul-qawl fī ʾumam qad khalat m qablihim minal-jinn w-l-ʾins ʾinnahum kānū khāsirīn
english_saheeh_international: Those are the ones upon whom the word has come into effect, who will be among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they all were losers

arabic_uthmani: وَلِكُلٍّ دَرَجاتٌ مِمّا عَمِلوا ۖ وَلِيُوَفِّيَهُم أَعمالَهُم وَهُم لا يُظلَمونَ
blank: w-l-kull darajāt mimmā ʿamilū w-l-yuwaffiyahum ʾaʿmālahum w-hum lā yuẓlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And for all there are degrees of reward and punishment for what they have done, and it is so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds, and they will not be wronged

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يُعرَضُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا عَلَى النّارِ أَذهَبتُم طَيِّباتِكُم في حَياتِكُمُ الدُّنيا وَاستَمتَعتُم بِها فَاليَومَ تُجزَونَ عَذابَ الهونِ بِما كُنتُم تَستَكبِرونَ فِي الأَرضِ بِغَيرِ الحَقِّ وَبِما كُنتُم تَفسُقونَ
blank: w-yawm yuʿraḍulladhīn kafarū ʿalā n-nār ʾadhhabtum ṭayyibātikum fī ḥayātikum d-dunyā w-stamtaʿtum bihā f-l-yawm tujzawn ʿadhābal-hūn b-mā kuntum tastakbirūn fīl-ʾarḍ b-ghayril-ḥaqq w-b-mā kuntum tafsuqūn
english_saheeh_international: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire it will be said, "You exhausted your pleasures during your worldly life and enjoyed them, so this Day you will be awarded the punishment of extreme humiliation because you were arrogant upon the earth without right and because you were defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَاذكُر أَخا عادٍ إِذ أَنذَرَ قَومَهُ بِالأَحقافِ وَقَد خَلَتِ النُّذُرُ مِن بَينِ يَدَيهِ وَمِن خَلفِهِ أَلّا تَعبُدوا إِلَّا اللَّهَ إِنّي أَخافُ عَلَيكُم عَذابَ يَومٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: w-dhkur ʾakhā ʿād ʾidh ʾandhar qawmahū b-l-ʾaḥqāf w-qad khalat n-nudhur m bayn yadayh w-m khalfihī ʾallā taʿbudū ʾillā llāh ʾinnī ʾakhāf ʿalaykum ʿadhāb yawm ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, the brother of 'Aad, when he warned his people in the region of al-Ahqaf - and warners had already passed on before him and after him - saying, "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day

arabic_uthmani: قالوا أَجِئتَنا لِتَأفِكَنا عَن آلِهَتِنا فَأتِنا بِما تَعِدُنا إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصّادِقينَ
blank: qālū ʾ-jiʾtanā l-taʾfikanā ʿ ʾālihatinā f-ʾtinā b-mā taʿidunā ʾ kunt min ṣ-ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Have you come to delude us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the truthful

arabic_uthmani: قالَ إِنَّمَا العِلمُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأُبَلِّغُكُم ما أُرسِلتُ بِهِ وَلٰكِنّي أَراكُم قَومًا تَجهَلونَ
blank: qāl ʾinnamāl-ʿilm ʿind llāh w-ʾuballighukum mā ʾursilt bihī w-lākinnī ʾarākum qawm tajhalūn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "Knowledge of its time is only with Allah, and I convey to you that with which I was sent; but I see you to be a people behaving ignorantly

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا رَأَوهُ عارِضًا مُستَقبِلَ أَودِيَتِهِم قالوا هٰذا عارِضٌ مُمطِرُنا ۚ بَل هُوَ مَا استَعجَلتُم بِهِ ۖ ريحٌ فيها عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: f-lammā raʾawh ʿāriḍam-mustaqbil ʾawdiyatihim qālū hādhā ʿāriḍ mumṭirunā bal huw mā staʿjaltum bihī rīh fīhā ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And when they saw it as a cloud approaching their valleys, they said, "This is a cloud bringing us rain!" Rather, it is that for which you were impatient: a wind, within it a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: تُدَمِّرُ كُلَّ شَيءٍ بِأَمرِ رَبِّها فَأَصبَحوا لا يُرىٰ إِلّا مَساكِنُهُم ۚ كَذٰلِكَ نَجزِي القَومَ المُجرِمينَ
blank: tudammir kull shayʾ b-ʾamr rabbihā f-ʾaṣbaḥū lā yurā ʾillā masākinuhum k-dhālik najzīl-qawmal-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Destroying everything by command of its Lord. And they became so that nothing was seen of them except their dwellings. Thus do We recompense the criminal people

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد مَكَّنّاهُم فيما إِن مَكَّنّاكُم فيهِ وَجَعَلنا لَهُم سَمعًا وَأَبصارًا وَأَفئِدَةً فَما أَغنىٰ عَنهُم سَمعُهُم وَلا أَبصارُهُم وَلا أَفئِدَتُهُم مِن شَيءٍ إِذ كانوا يَجحَدونَ بِآياتِ اللَّهِ وَحاقَ بِهِم ما كانوا بِهِ يَستَهزِئونَ
blank: w-l-qad makkannāhum fī-mā ʾ makkannākum fīh w-jaʿalnā lahum samʿ w-ʾabṣār w-ʾafʾidat f-mā ʾaghnā ʿanhum samʿuhum w-lā ʾabṣāruhum w-lā ʾafʾidatuhum m shayʾ ʾidh kānū yajḥadūn b-ʾāyāt llāh w-ḥāq bihim mā kānū bihī yastahziʾūn
english_saheeh_international: And We had certainly established them in such as We have not established you, and We made for them hearing and vision and hearts. But their hearing and vision and hearts availed them not from anything of the punishment when they were continually rejecting the signs of Allah; and they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَهلَكنا ما حَولَكُم مِنَ القُرىٰ وَصَرَّفنَا الآياتِ لَعَلَّهُم يَرجِعونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾahlaknā mā ḥawlakum minal-qurā w-ṣarrafnāl-ʾāyāt laʿallahum yarjiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have already destroyed what surrounds you of those cities, and We have diversified the signs or verses that perhaps they might return from disbelief

arabic_uthmani: فَلَولا نَصَرَهُمُ الَّذينَ اتَّخَذوا مِن دونِ اللَّهِ قُربانًا آلِهَةً ۖ بَل ضَلّوا عَنهُم ۚ وَذٰلِكَ إِفكُهُم وَما كانوا يَفتَرونَ
blank: f-law-lā naṣarahumulladhīn ttakhadhū m dūn llāh qurbān ʾālihat bal ḍallū ʿanhum w-dhālik ʾifkuhum w-mā kānū yaftarūn
english_saheeh_international: Then why did those they took besides Allah as deities by which to approach Him not aid them? But they had strayed from them. And that was their falsehood and what they were inventing

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ صَرَفنا إِلَيكَ نَفَرًا مِنَ الجِنِّ يَستَمِعونَ القُرآنَ فَلَمّا حَضَروهُ قالوا أَنصِتوا ۖ فَلَمّا قُضِيَ وَلَّوا إِلىٰ قَومِهِم مُنذِرينَ
blank: w-ʾidh ṣarafnā ʾilayk nafaram-minal-jinn yastamiʿūnal-qurʾān f-lammā ḥaḍarūh qālū ʾanṣitū f-lammā quḍiy wallaw ʾilā qawmihim mundhirīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when We directed to you a few of the jinn, listening to the Qur'an. And when they attended it, they said, "Listen quietly." And when it was concluded, they went back to their people as warners

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا قَومَنا إِنّا سَمِعنا كِتابًا أُنزِلَ مِن بَعدِ موسىٰ مُصَدِّقًا لِما بَينَ يَدَيهِ يَهدي إِلَى الحَقِّ وَإِلىٰ طَريقٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: qālū yā-qawmanā ʾinnā samiʿnā kitāb ʾunzil m baʿd mūsā muṣaddiq l-mā bayn yadayh yahdī ʾilāl-ḥaqq w-ʾilā ṭarīq mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: They said, "O our people, indeed we have heard a recited Book revealed after Moses confirming what was before it which guides to the truth and to a straight path

arabic_uthmani: يا قَومَنا أَجيبوا داعِيَ اللَّهِ وَآمِنوا بِهِ يَغفِر لَكُم مِن ذُنوبِكُم وَيُجِركُم مِن عَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: yā-qawmanā ʾajībū dāʿiy llāh w-ʾāminū bihī yaghfir lakum m dhunūbikum w-yujirkum m ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: O our people, respond to the Messenger of Allah and believe in him; Allah will forgive for you your sins and protect you from a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن لا يُجِب داعِيَ اللَّهِ فَلَيسَ بِمُعجِزٍ فِي الأَرضِ وَلَيسَ لَهُ مِن دونِهِ أَولِياءُ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-m lā yujib dāʿiy llāh f-lays b-muʿjiz fīl-ʾarḍ w-lays lahū m dūnihī ʾawliyāʾ ʾulāʾik fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: But he who does not respond to the Caller of Allah will not cause failure to Him upon earth, and he will not have besides Him any protectors. Those are in manifest error

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَلَم يَعيَ بِخَلقِهِنَّ بِقادِرٍ عَلىٰ أَن يُحيِيَ المَوتىٰ ۚ بَلىٰ إِنَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾann llāhalladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-lam yaʿy b-khalqihinn b-qādir ʿalā ʾ yuḥyiyal-mawtā balā ʾinnahū ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth and did not fail in their creation, is able to give life to the dead? Yes. Indeed, He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: وَيَومَ يُعرَضُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا عَلَى النّارِ أَلَيسَ هٰذا بِالحَقِّ ۖ قالوا بَلىٰ وَرَبِّنا ۚ قالَ فَذوقُوا العَذابَ بِما كُنتُم تَكفُرونَ
blank: w-yawm yuʿraḍulladhīn kafarū ʿalā n-nār ʾ-lays hādhā b-l-ḥaqq qālū balā w-rabbinā qāl f-dhūqūl-ʿadhāb b-mā kuntum takfurūn
english_saheeh_international: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire it will be said, "Is this not the truth?" They will say, "Yes, by our Lord." He will say, "Then taste the punishment because you used to disbelieve
