arabic_uthmani: فَاصبِر كَما صَبَرَ أُولُو العَزمِ مِنَ الرُّسُلِ وَلا تَستَعجِل لَهُم ۚ كَأَنَّهُم يَومَ يَرَونَ ما يوعَدونَ لَم يَلبَثوا إِلّا ساعَةً مِن نَهارٍ ۚ بَلاغٌ ۚ فَهَل يُهلَكُ إِلَّا القَومُ الفاسِقونَ
blank: f-ṣbir k-mā ṣabar ʾulūl-ʿazm min r-rusul w-lā tastaʿjil lahum k-ʾannahum yawm yarawn mā yūʿadūn lam yalbathū ʾillā sāʿatam-m nahār balāgh f-hal yuhlak ʾillāl-qawmul-fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: So be patient, O Muhammad, as were those of determination among the messengers and do not be impatient for them. It will be - on the Day they see that which they are promised - as though they had not remained in the world except an hour of a day. This is notification. And will any be destroyed except the defiantly disobedient people

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَصَدّوا عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعمالَهُم
blank: alladhīn kafarū w-ṣaddū ʿ sabīl llāh ʾaḍall ʾaʿmālahum
english_saheeh_international: Those who disbelieve and avert people from the way of Allah - He will waste their deeds

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ وَآمَنوا بِما نُزِّلَ عَلىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَهُوَ الحَقُّ مِن رَبِّهِم ۙ كَفَّرَ عَنهُم سَيِّئَاتِهِم وَأَصلَحَ بالَهُم
blank: w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-ʾāmanū b-mā nuzzil ʿalā muḥammad w-huwal-ḥaqq m rabbihim kaffar ʿanhum sayyiʾātihim w-ʾaṣlaḥ bālahum
english_saheeh_international: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what has been sent down upon Muhammad - and it is the truth from their Lord - He will remove from them their misdeeds and amend their condition

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَرُوا اتَّبَعُوا الباطِلَ وَأَنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اتَّبَعُوا الحَقَّ مِن رَبِّهِم ۚ كَذٰلِكَ يَضرِبُ اللَّهُ لِلنّاسِ أَمثالَهُم
blank: dhālik b-ʾannalladhīn kafarū ttabaʿūl-bāṭil w-ʾannalladhīn ʾāmanū ttabaʿūl-ḥaqq m rabbihim k-dhālik yaḍrib llāh l-n-nās ʾamthālahum
english_saheeh_international: That is because those who disbelieve follow falsehood, and those who believe follow the truth from their Lord. Thus does Allah present to the people their comparisons

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا لَقيتُمُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا فَضَربَ الرِّقابِ حَتّىٰ إِذا أَثخَنتُموهُم فَشُدُّوا الوَثاقَ فَإِمّا مَنًّا بَعدُ وَإِمّا فِداءً حَتّىٰ تَضَعَ الحَربُ أَوزارَها ۚ ذٰلِكَ وَلَو يَشاءُ اللَّهُ لَانتَصَرَ مِنهُم وَلٰكِن لِيَبلُوَ بَعضَكُم بِبَعضٍ ۗ وَالَّذينَ قُتِلوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ فَلَن يُضِلَّ أَعمالَهُم
blank: f-ʾidhā laqītumulladhīn kafarū f-ḍarb r-riqāb ḥattā ʾidhā ʾathkhantumūhum f-shuddūl-wathāq f-ʾimmā mann baʿd w-ʾimmā fidāʾ ḥattā taḍaʿal-ḥarb ʾawzārahā dhālik w-law yashāʾ llāh l-ntaṣar minhum w-lāk l-yabluw baʿḍakum b-baʿḍ w-lladhīn qutilū fī sabīl llāh f-l yuḍill ʾaʿmālahum
english_saheeh_international: So when you meet those who disbelieve in battle, strike their necks until, when you have inflicted slaughter upon them, then secure their bonds, and either confer favor afterwards or ransom them until the war lays down its burdens. That is the command. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken vengeance upon them Himself, but He ordered armed struggle to test some of you by means of others. And those who are killed in the cause of Allah - never will He waste their deeds

arabic_uthmani: سَيَهديهِم وَيُصلِحُ بالَهُم
blank: s-yahdīhim w-yuṣliḥ bālahum
english_saheeh_international: He will guide them and amend their condition

arabic_uthmani: وَيُدخِلُهُمُ الجَنَّةَ عَرَّفَها لَهُم
blank: w-yudkhiluhumul-jannat ʿarrafahā lahum
english_saheeh_international: And admit them to Paradise, which He has made known to them

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِن تَنصُرُوا اللَّهَ يَنصُركُم وَيُثَبِّت أَقدامَكُم
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾ tanṣurū llāh yanṣurkum w-yuthabbit ʾaqdāmakum
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, if you support Allah, He will support you and plant firmly your feet

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا فَتَعسًا لَهُم وَأَضَلَّ أَعمالَهُم
blank: w-lladhīn kafarū f-taʿs lahum w-ʾaḍall ʾaʿmālahum
english_saheeh_international: But those who disbelieve - for them is misery, and He will waste their deeds

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم كَرِهوا ما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ فَأَحبَطَ أَعمالَهُم
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahum karihū mā ʾanzal llāh f-ʾaḥbaṭ ʾaʿmālahum
english_saheeh_international: That is because they disliked what Allah revealed, so He rendered worthless their deeds

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَفَلَم يَسيروا فِي الأَرضِ فَيَنظُروا كَيفَ كانَ عاقِبَةُ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ دَمَّرَ اللَّهُ عَلَيهِم ۖ وَلِلكافِرينَ أَمثالُها
blank: ʾ-f-lam yasīrū fīl-ʾarḍ f-yanẓurū kayf kān ʿāqibatulladhīn m qablihim dammar llāh ʿalayhim w-l-l-kāfirīn ʾamthāluhā
english_saheeh_international: Have they not traveled through the land and seen how was the end of those before them? Allah destroyed everything over them, and for the disbelievers is something comparable

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ مَولَى الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَأَنَّ الكافِرينَ لا مَولىٰ لَهُم
blank: dhālik b-ʾann llāh mawlālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʾannal-kāfirīn lā mawlā lahum
english_saheeh_international: That is because Allah is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدخِلُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ ۖ وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا يَتَمَتَّعونَ وَيَأكُلونَ كَما تَأكُلُ الأَنعامُ وَالنّارُ مَثوًى لَهُم
blank: ʾinn llāh yudkhilulladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār w-lladhīn kafarū yatamattaʿūn w-yaʾkulūn k-mā taʾkulul-ʾanʿām w-n-nār mathw lahum
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow, but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat, and the Fire will be a residence for them

arabic_uthmani: وَكَأَيِّن مِن قَريَةٍ هِيَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةً مِن قَريَتِكَ الَّتي أَخرَجَتكَ أَهلَكناهُم فَلا ناصِرَ لَهُم
blank: w-k-ʾayy m qaryat hiy ʾashadd quwwatam-m qaryatik llatī ʾakhrajatk ʾahlaknāhum f-lā nāṣir lahum
english_saheeh_international: And how many a city was stronger than your city Makkah which drove you out? We destroyed them; and there was no helper for them

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن كانَ عَلىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِن رَبِّهِ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُ سوءُ عَمَلِهِ وَاتَّبَعوا أَهواءَهُم
blank: ʾ-f-m kān ʿalā bayyinat m rabbihī k-m zuyyin lahū sūʾ ʿamalihī w-ttabaʿū ʾahwāʾahum
english_saheeh_international: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their own desires

arabic_uthmani: مَثَلُ الجَنَّةِ الَّتي وُعِدَ المُتَّقونَ ۖ فيها أَنهارٌ مِن ماءٍ غَيرِ آسِنٍ وَأَنهارٌ مِن لَبَنٍ لَم يَتَغَيَّر طَعمُهُ وَأَنهارٌ مِن خَمرٍ لَذَّةٍ لِلشّارِبينَ وَأَنهارٌ مِن عَسَلٍ مُصَفًّى ۖ وَلَهُم فيها مِن كُلِّ الثَّمَراتِ وَمَغفِرَةٌ مِن رَبِّهِم ۖ كَمَن هُوَ خالِدٌ فِي النّارِ وَسُقوا ماءً حَميمًا فَقَطَّعَ أَمعاءَهُم
blank: mathalul-jannat llatī wuʿidal-muttaqūn fīhā ʾanhār m māʾ ghayr ʾāsin w-ʾanhār m laban lam yataghayyar ṭaʿmuhū w-ʾanhār m khamr ladhdhat l-sh-shāribīn w-ʾanhār m ʿasal muṣaff w-lahum fīhā m kull th-thamarāt w-maghfirat m rabbihim k-m huw khālid fī n-nār w-suqū māʾ ḥamīm f-qaṭṭaʿ ʾamʿāʾahum
english_saheeh_international: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered, rivers of milk the taste of which never changes, rivers of wine delicious to those who drink, and rivers of purified honey, in which they will have from all kinds of fruits and forgiveness from their Lord, like that of those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنهُم مَن يَستَمِعُ إِلَيكَ حَتّىٰ إِذا خَرَجوا مِن عِندِكَ قالوا لِلَّذينَ أوتُوا العِلمَ ماذا قالَ آنِفًا ۚ أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ طَبَعَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم وَاتَّبَعوا أَهواءَهُم
blank: w-minhum m yastamiʿ ʾilayk ḥattā ʾidhā kharajū m ʿindik qālū l-lladhīn ʾūtūl-ʿilm mādhā qāl ʾānif ʾulāʾikalladhīn ṭabaʿ llāh ʿalā qulūbihim w-ttabaʿū ʾahwāʾahum
english_saheeh_international: And among them, O Muhammad, are those who listen to you, until when they depart from you, they say to those who were given knowledge, "What has he said just now?" Those are the ones of whom Allah has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their own desires

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ اهتَدَوا زادَهُم هُدًى وَآتاهُم تَقواهُم
blank: w-lladhīn htadaw zādahum hud w-ʾātāhum taqwāhum
english_saheeh_international: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness

arabic_uthmani: فَهَل يَنظُرونَ إِلَّا السّاعَةَ أَن تَأتِيَهُم بَغتَةً ۖ فَقَد جاءَ أَشراطُها ۚ فَأَنّىٰ لَهُم إِذا جاءَتهُم ذِكراهُم
blank: f-hal yanẓurūn ʾillā s-sāʿat ʾ taʾtiyahum baghtat f-qad jāʾ ʾashrāṭuhā f-ʾannā lahum ʾidhā jāʾathum dhikrāhum
english_saheeh_international: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly? But already there have come some of its indications. Then what good to them, when it has come, will be their remembrance

arabic_uthmani: فَاعلَم أَنَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاستَغفِر لِذَنبِكَ وَلِلمُؤمِنينَ وَالمُؤمِناتِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُم وَمَثواكُم
blank: f-ʿlam ʾannahū lā ʾilāh ʾillā llāh w-staghfir l-dhanbik w-l-l-muʾminīn w-l-muʾmināt w-llāh yaʿlam mutaqallabakum w-mathwākum
english_saheeh_international: So know, O Muhammad, that there is no deity except Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women. And Allah knows of your movement and your resting place

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا لَولا نُزِّلَت سورَةٌ ۖ فَإِذا أُنزِلَت سورَةٌ مُحكَمَةٌ وَذُكِرَ فيهَا القِتالُ ۙ رَأَيتَ الَّذينَ في قُلوبِهِم مَرَضٌ يَنظُرونَ إِلَيكَ نَظَرَ المَغشِيِّ عَلَيهِ مِنَ المَوتِ ۖ فَأَولىٰ لَهُم
blank: w-yaqūlulladhīn ʾāmanū law-lā nuzzilat sūrat f-ʾidhā ʾunzilat sūrat muḥkamat w-dhukir fīhāl-qitāl raʾaytalladhīn fī qulūbihim maraḍ yanẓurūn ʾilayk naẓaral-maghshiyy ʿalayh minal-mawt f-ʾawlā lahum
english_saheeh_international: Those who believe say, "Why has a surah not been sent down? But when a precise surah is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein, you see those in whose hearts is hypocrisy looking at you with a look of one overcome by death. And more appropriate for them would have been

arabic_uthmani: طاعَةٌ وَقَولٌ مَعروفٌ ۚ فَإِذا عَزَمَ الأَمرُ فَلَو صَدَقُوا اللَّهَ لَكانَ خَيرًا لَهُم
blank: ṭāʿat w-qawl maʿrūf f-ʾidhā ʿazamal-ʾamr f-law ṣadaqū llāh l-kān khayr lahum
english_saheeh_international: Obedience and good words. And when the matter of fighting was determined, if they had been true to Allah, it would have been better for them

arabic_uthmani: فَهَل عَسَيتُم إِن تَوَلَّيتُم أَن تُفسِدوا فِي الأَرضِ وَتُقَطِّعوا أَرحامَكُم
blank: f-hal ʿasaytum ʾ tawallaytum ʾ tufsidū fīl-ʾarḍ w-tuqaṭṭiʿū ʾarḥāmakum
english_saheeh_international: So would you perhaps, if you turned away, cause corruption on earth and sever your ties of relationship

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ لَعَنَهُمُ اللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُم وَأَعمىٰ أَبصارَهُم
blank: ʾulāʾikalladhīn laʿanahum llāh f-ʾaṣammahum w-ʾaʿmā ʾabṣārahum
english_saheeh_international: Those who do so are the ones that Allah has cursed, so He deafened them and blinded their vision

arabic_uthmani: أَفَلا يَتَدَبَّرونَ القُرآنَ أَم عَلىٰ قُلوبٍ أَقفالُها
blank: ʾ-f-lā yatadabbarūnal-qurʾān ʾam ʿalā qulūb ʾaqfāluhā
english_saheeh_international: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an, or are there locks upon their hearts

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ ارتَدّوا عَلىٰ أَدبارِهِم مِن بَعدِ ما تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الهُدَى ۙ الشَّيطانُ سَوَّلَ لَهُم وَأَملىٰ لَهُم
blank: ʾinnalladhīn rtaddū ʿalā ʾadbārihim m baʿd mā tabayyan lahumul-hudā sh-shayṭān sawwal lahum w-ʾamlā lahum
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who reverted back to disbelief after guidance had become clear to them - Satan enticed them and prolonged hope for them

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم قالوا لِلَّذينَ كَرِهوا ما نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ سَنُطيعُكُم في بَعضِ الأَمرِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ إِسرارَهُم
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahum qālū l-lladhīn karihū mā nazzal llāh s-nuṭīʿukum fī baʿḍil-ʾamr w-llāh yaʿlam ʾisrārahum
english_saheeh_international: That is because they said to those who disliked what Allah sent down, "We will obey you in part of the matter." And Allah knows what they conceal

arabic_uthmani: فَكَيفَ إِذا تَوَفَّتهُمُ المَلائِكَةُ يَضرِبونَ وُجوهَهُم وَأَدبارَهُم
blank: f-kayf ʾidhā tawaffathumul-malāʾikat yaḍribūn wujūhahum w-ʾadbārahum
english_saheeh_international: Then how will it be when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ اتَّبَعوا ما أَسخَطَ اللَّهَ وَكَرِهوا رِضوانَهُ فَأَحبَطَ أَعمالَهُم
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahum ttabaʿū mā ʾaskhaṭ llāh w-karihū riḍwānahū f-ʾaḥbaṭ ʾaʿmālahum
english_saheeh_international: That is because they followed what angered Allah and disliked what earns His pleasure, so He rendered worthless their deeds

arabic_uthmani: أَم حَسِبَ الَّذينَ في قُلوبِهِم مَرَضٌ أَن لَن يُخرِجَ اللَّهُ أَضغانَهُم
blank: ʾam ḥasiballadhīn fī qulūbihim maraḍ ʾ l yukhrij llāh ʾaḍghānahum
english_saheeh_international: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their feelings of hatred

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو نَشاءُ لَأَرَيناكَهُم فَلَعَرَفتَهُم بِسيماهُم ۚ وَلَتَعرِفَنَّهُم في لَحنِ القَولِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ أَعمالَكُم
blank: w-law nashāʾ l-ʾaraynākahum f-l-ʿaraftahum b-sīmāhum w-l-taʿrifannahum fī laḥnil-qawl w-llāh yaʿlam ʾaʿmālakum
english_saheeh_international: And if We willed, We could show them to you, and you would know them by their mark; but you will surely know them by the tone of their speech. And Allah knows your deeds

arabic_uthmani: وَلَنَبلُوَنَّكُم حَتّىٰ نَعلَمَ المُجاهِدينَ مِنكُم وَالصّابِرينَ وَنَبلُوَ أَخبارَكُم
blank: w-l-nabluwannakum ḥattā naʿlamal-mujāhidīn minkum w-ṣ-ṣābirīn w-nabluw ʾakhbārakum
english_saheeh_international: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you for the cause of Allah and the patient, and We will test your affairs

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَصَدّوا عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَشاقُّوا الرَّسولَ مِن بَعدِ ما تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الهُدىٰ لَن يَضُرُّوا اللَّهَ شَيئًا وَسَيُحبِطُ أَعمالَهُم
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū w-ṣaddū ʿ sabīl llāh w-shāqqū r-rasūl m baʿd mā tabayyan lahumul-hudā l yaḍurrū llāh shayʾ w-s-yuḥbiṭ ʾaʿmālahum
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted people from the path of Allah and opposed the Messenger after guidance had become clear to them - never will they harm Allah at all, and He will render worthless their deeds

arabic_uthmani: ۞ يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا أَطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطيعُوا الرَّسولَ وَلا تُبطِلوا أَعمالَكُم
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾaṭīʿū llāh w-ʾaṭīʿū r-rasūl w-lā tubṭilū ʾaʿmālakum
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and do not invalidate your deeds

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَصَدّوا عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ ماتوا وَهُم كُفّارٌ فَلَن يَغفِرَ اللَّهُ لَهُم
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū w-ṣaddū ʿ sabīl llāh thumm mātū w-hum kuffār f-l yaghfir llāh lahum
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted people from the path of Allah and then died while they were disbelievers - never will Allah forgive them

arabic_uthmani: فَلا تَهِنوا وَتَدعوا إِلَى السَّلمِ وَأَنتُمُ الأَعلَونَ وَاللَّهُ مَعَكُم وَلَن يَتِرَكُم أَعمالَكُم
blank: f-lā tahinū w-tadʿū ʾilā s-salm w-ʾantumul-ʾaʿlawn w-llāh maʿakum w-l yatirakum ʾaʿmālakum
english_saheeh_international: So do not weaken and call for peace while you are superior; and Allah is with you and will never deprive you of the reward of your deeds

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّمَا الحَياةُ الدُّنيا لَعِبٌ وَلَهوٌ ۚ وَإِن تُؤمِنوا وَتَتَّقوا يُؤتِكُم أُجورَكُم وَلا يَسأَلكُم أَموالَكُم
blank: ʾinnamāl-ḥayāt d-dunyā laʿib w-lahw w-ʾ tuʾminū w-tattaqū yuʾtikum ʾujūrakum w-lā yasʾalkum ʾamwālakum
english_saheeh_international: This worldly life is only amusement and diversion. And if you believe and fear Allah, He will give you your rewards and not ask you for your properties

arabic_uthmani: إِن يَسأَلكُموها فَيُحفِكُم تَبخَلوا وَيُخرِج أَضغانَكُم
blank: ʾ yasʾalkumūhā f-yuḥfikum tabkhalū w-yukhrij ʾaḍghānakum
english_saheeh_international: If He should ask you for them and press you, you would withhold, and He would expose your unwillingness

arabic_uthmani: ها أَنتُم هٰؤُلاءِ تُدعَونَ لِتُنفِقوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَن يَبخَلُ ۖ وَمَن يَبخَل فَإِنَّما يَبخَلُ عَن نَفسِهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ الغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ الفُقَراءُ ۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوا يَستَبدِل قَومًا غَيرَكُم ثُمَّ لا يَكونوا أَمثالَكُم
blank: hā-ʾantum hāʾulāʾ tudʿawn l-tunfiqū fī sabīl llāh f-minkum m yabkhal w-m yabkhal f-ʾinnamā yabkhal ʿ nafsihī w-llāhul-ghaniyy w-ʾantumul-fuqarāʾ w-ʾ tatawallaw yastabdil qawm ghayrakum thumm lā yakūnū ʾamthālakum
english_saheeh_international: Here you are - those invited to spend in the cause of Allah - but among you are those who withhold out of greed. And whoever withholds only withholds benefit from himself; and Allah is the Free of need, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people; then they will not be the likes of you

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا فَتَحنا لَكَ فَتحًا مُبينًا
blank: ʾinnā fataḥnā lak fatḥam-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have given you, O Muhammad, a clear conquest

arabic_uthmani: لِيَغفِرَ لَكَ اللَّهُ ما تَقَدَّمَ مِن ذَنبِكَ وَما تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِمَّ نِعمَتَهُ عَلَيكَ وَيَهدِيَكَ صِراطًا مُستَقيمًا
blank: l-yaghfir lak llāh mā taqaddam m dhanbik w-mā taʾakhkhar w-yutimm niʿmatahū ʿalayk w-yahdiyak ṣirāṭam-mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: That Allah may forgive for you what preceded of your sin and what will follow and complete His favor upon you and guide you to a straight path

arabic_uthmani: وَيَنصُرَكَ اللَّهُ نَصرًا عَزيزًا
blank: w-yanṣurak llāh naṣr ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: And that Allah may aid you with a mighty victory

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي أَنزَلَ السَّكينَةَ في قُلوبِ المُؤمِنينَ لِيَزدادوا إيمانًا مَعَ إيمانِهِم ۗ وَلِلَّهِ جُنودُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ عَليمًا حَكيمًا
blank: huwalladhī ʾanzal s-sakīnat fī qulūbil-muʾminīn l-yazdādū ʾīmānam-maʿ ʾīmānihim w-l-llāh junūd s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-kān llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: It is He who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the believers that they would increase in faith along with their present faith. And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth, and ever is Allah Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: لِيُدخِلَ المُؤمِنينَ وَالمُؤمِناتِ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنهُم سَيِّئَاتِهِم ۚ وَكانَ ذٰلِكَ عِندَ اللَّهِ فَوزًا عَظيمًا
blank: l-yudkhilal-muʾminīn w-l-muʾmināt jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā w-yukaffir ʿanhum sayyiʾātihim w-kān dhālik ʿind llāh fawz ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And that He may admit the believing men and the believing women to gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein eternally and remove from them their misdeeds - and ever is that, in the sight of Allah, a great attainment

arabic_uthmani: وَيُعَذِّبَ المُنافِقينَ وَالمُنافِقاتِ وَالمُشرِكينَ وَالمُشرِكاتِ الظّانّينَ بِاللَّهِ ظَنَّ السَّوءِ ۚ عَلَيهِم دائِرَةُ السَّوءِ ۖ وَغَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيهِم وَلَعَنَهُم وَأَعَدَّ لَهُم جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَساءَت مَصيرًا
blank: w-yuʿadhdhibal-munāfiqīn w-l-munāfiqāt w-l-mushrikīn w-l-mushrikāt ẓ-ẓānnīn b-llāh ẓann s-sawʾ ʿalayhim dāʾirat s-sawʾ w-ghaḍib llāh ʿalayhim w-laʿanahum w-ʾaʿadd lahum jahannam w-sāʾat maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And that He may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and polytheist women - those who assume about Allah an assumption of evil nature. Upon them is a misfortune of evil nature; and Allah has become angry with them and has cursed them and prepared for them Hell, and evil it is as a destination

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ جُنودُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ عَزيزًا حَكيمًا
blank: w-l-llāh junūd s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-kān llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَرسَلناكَ شاهِدًا وَمُبَشِّرًا وَنَذيرًا
blank: ʾinnā ʾarsalnāk shāhid w-mubashshir w-nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner

arabic_uthmani: لِتُؤمِنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ وَتُعَزِّروهُ وَتُوَقِّروهُ وَتُسَبِّحوهُ بُكرَةً وَأَصيلًا
blank: l-tuʾminū b-llāh w-rasūlihī w-tuʿazzirūh w-tuwaqqirūh w-tusabbiḥūh bukrat w-ʾaṣīl
english_saheeh_international: That you people may believe in Allah and His Messenger and honor him and respect the Prophet and exalt Allah morning and afternoon

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يُبايِعونَكَ إِنَّما يُبايِعونَ اللَّهَ يَدُ اللَّهِ فَوقَ أَيديهِم ۚ فَمَن نَكَثَ فَإِنَّما يَنكُثُ عَلىٰ نَفسِهِ ۖ وَمَن أَوفىٰ بِما عاهَدَ عَلَيهُ اللَّهَ فَسَيُؤتيهِ أَجرًا عَظيمًا
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yubāyiʿūnak ʾinnamā yubāyiʿūn llāh yad llāh fawq ʾaydīhim f-m nakath f-ʾinnamā yankuth ʿalā nafsihī w-m ʾawfā b-mā ʿāhad ʿalayh llāh f-s-yuʾtīh ʾajr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who pledge allegiance to you, O Muhammad - they are actually pledging allegiance to Allah. The hand of Allah is over their hands. So he who breaks his word only breaks it to the detriment of himself. And he who fulfills that which he has promised Allah - He will give him a great reward

arabic_uthmani: سَيَقولُ لَكَ المُخَلَّفونَ مِنَ الأَعرابِ شَغَلَتنا أَموالُنا وَأَهلونا فَاستَغفِر لَنا ۚ يَقولونَ بِأَلسِنَتِهِم ما لَيسَ في قُلوبِهِم ۚ قُل فَمَن يَملِكُ لَكُم مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيئًا إِن أَرادَ بِكُم ضَرًّا أَو أَرادَ بِكُم نَفعًا ۚ بَل كانَ اللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ خَبيرًا
blank: s-yaqūl lakal-mukhallafūn minal-ʾaʿrāb shaghalatnā ʾamwālunā w-ʾahlūnā f-staghfir lanā yaqūlūn b-ʾalsinatihim mā lays fī qulūbihim qul f-m yamlik lakum min llāh shayʾ ʾ ʾarād bikum ḍarr ʾaw ʾarād bikum nafʿ bal kān llāh b-mā taʿmalūn khabīr
english_saheeh_international: Those who remained behind of the bedouins will say to you, "Our properties and our families occupied us, so ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not within their hearts. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He intended for you harm or intended for you benefit? Rather, ever is Allah, with what you do, Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: بَل ظَنَنتُم أَن لَن يَنقَلِبَ الرَّسولُ وَالمُؤمِنونَ إِلىٰ أَهليهِم أَبَدًا وَزُيِّنَ ذٰلِكَ في قُلوبِكُم وَظَنَنتُم ظَنَّ السَّوءِ وَكُنتُم قَومًا بورًا
blank: bal ẓanantum ʾ l yanqalib r-rasūl w-l-muʾminūn ʾilā ʾahlīhim ʾabad w-zuyyin dhālik fī qulūbikum w-ẓanantum ẓann s-sawʾ w-kuntum qawm būr
english_saheeh_international: But you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, ever, and that was made pleasing in your hearts. And you assumed an assumption of evil and became a people ruined

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن لَم يُؤمِن بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ فَإِنّا أَعتَدنا لِلكافِرينَ سَعيرًا
blank: w-m lam yuʾm b-llāh w-rasūlihī f-ʾinnā ʾaʿtadnā l-l-kāfirīn saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: And whoever has not believed in Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers a Blaze

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ يَغفِرُ لِمَن يَشاءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ غَفورًا رَحيمًا
blank: w-l-llāh mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ yaghfir l-m yashāʾ w-yuʿadhdhib m yashāʾ w-kān llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: سَيَقولُ المُخَلَّفونَ إِذَا انطَلَقتُم إِلىٰ مَغانِمَ لِتَأخُذوها ذَرونا نَتَّبِعكُم ۖ يُريدونَ أَن يُبَدِّلوا كَلامَ اللَّهِ ۚ قُل لَن تَتَّبِعونا كَذٰلِكُم قالَ اللَّهُ مِن قَبلُ ۖ فَسَيَقولونَ بَل تَحسُدونَنا ۚ بَل كانوا لا يَفقَهونَ إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: s-yaqūlul-mukhallafūn ʾidhā nṭalaqtum ʾilā maghānim l-taʾkhudhūhā dharūnā nattabiʿkum yurīdūn ʾ yubaddilū kalām llāh qul l tattabiʿūnā k-dhālikum qāl llāh m qabl f-s-yaqūlūn bal taḥsudūnanā bal kānū lā yafqahūn ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: Those who remained behind will say when you set out toward the war booty to take it, "Let us follow you." They wish to change the words of Allah. Say, "Never will you follow us. Thus did Allah say before." So they will say, "Rather, you envy us." But in fact they were not understanding except a little

arabic_uthmani: قُل لِلمُخَلَّفينَ مِنَ الأَعرابِ سَتُدعَونَ إِلىٰ قَومٍ أُولي بَأسٍ شَديدٍ تُقاتِلونَهُم أَو يُسلِمونَ ۖ فَإِن تُطيعوا يُؤتِكُمُ اللَّهُ أَجرًا حَسَنًا ۖ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوا كَما تَوَلَّيتُم مِن قَبلُ يُعَذِّبكُم عَذابًا أَليمًا
blank: qul l-l-mukhallafīn minal-ʾaʿrāb s-tudʿawn ʾilā qawm ʾulī baʾs shadīd tuqātilūnahum ʾaw yuslimūn f-ʾ tuṭīʿū yuʾtikum llāh ʾajr ḥasan w-ʾ tatawallaw k-mā tawallaytum m qabl yuʿadhdhibkum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Say to those who remained behind of the bedouins, "You will be called to face a people of great military might; you may fight them, or they will submit. So if you obey, Allah will give you a good reward; but if you turn away as you turned away before, He will punish you with a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: لَيسَ عَلَى الأَعمىٰ حَرَجٌ وَلا عَلَى الأَعرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلا عَلَى المَريضِ حَرَجٌ ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ يُدخِلهُ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ ۖ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّبهُ عَذابًا أَليمًا
blank: lays ʿalāl-ʾaʿmā ḥaraj w-lā ʿalāl-ʾaʿraj ḥaraj w-lā ʿalāl-marīḍ ḥaraj w-m yuṭiʿ llāh w-rasūlahū yudkhilh jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār w-m yatawall yuʿadhdhibh ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: There is not upon the blind any guilt or upon the lame any guilt or upon the ill any guilt for remaining behind. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger - He will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow; but whoever turns away - He will punish him with a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: ۞ لَقَد رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنِ المُؤمِنينَ إِذ يُبايِعونَكَ تَحتَ الشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ ما في قُلوبِهِم فَأَنزَلَ السَّكينَةَ عَلَيهِم وَأَثابَهُم فَتحًا قَريبًا
blank: l-qad raḍiy llāh ʿanil-muʾminīn ʾidh yubāyiʿūnak taḥt sh-shajarat f-ʿalim mā fī qulūbihim f-ʾanzal s-sakīnat ʿalayhim w-ʾathābahum fatḥ qarīb
english_saheeh_international: Certainly was Allah pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you, O Muhammad, under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquillity upon them and rewarded them with an imminent conquest

arabic_uthmani: وَمَغانِمَ كَثيرَةً يَأخُذونَها ۗ وَكانَ اللَّهُ عَزيزًا حَكيمًا
blank: w-maghānim kathīrat yaʾkhudhūnahā w-kān llāh ʿazīz ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And much war booty which they will take. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَعَدَكُمُ اللَّهُ مَغانِمَ كَثيرَةً تَأخُذونَها فَعَجَّلَ لَكُم هٰذِهِ وَكَفَّ أَيدِيَ النّاسِ عَنكُم وَلِتَكونَ آيَةً لِلمُؤمِنينَ وَيَهدِيَكُم صِراطًا مُستَقيمًا
blank: waʿadakum llāh maghānim kathīrat taʾkhudhūnahā f-ʿajjal lakum hādhihī w-kaff ʾaydiy n-nās ʿankum w-l-takūn ʾāyat l-l-muʾminīn w-yahdiyakum ṣirāṭam-mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah has promised you much booty that you will take in the future and has hastened for you this victory and withheld the hands of people from you - that it may be a sign for the believers and that He may guide you to a straight path

arabic_uthmani: وَأُخرىٰ لَم تَقدِروا عَلَيها قَد أَحاطَ اللَّهُ بِها ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرًا
blank: w-ʾukhrā lam taqdirū ʿalayhā qad ʾaḥāṭ llāh bihā w-kān llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And He promises other victories that you were so far unable to realize which Allah has already encompassed. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو قاتَلَكُمُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لَوَلَّوُا الأَدبارَ ثُمَّ لا يَجِدونَ وَلِيًّا وَلا نَصيرًا
blank: w-law qātalakumulladhīn kafarū l-wallawul-ʾadbār thumm lā yajidūn waliyy w-lā naṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And if those Makkans who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs in flight. Then they would not find a protector or a helper

arabic_uthmani: سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ الَّتي قَد خَلَت مِن قَبلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ اللَّهِ تَبديلًا
blank: sunnat llāh llatī qad khalat m qabl w-l tajid l-sunnat llāh tabdīl
english_saheeh_international: This is the established way of Allah which has occurred before. And never will you find in the way of Allah any change

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ الَّذي كَفَّ أَيدِيَهُم عَنكُم وَأَيدِيَكُم عَنهُم بِبَطنِ مَكَّةَ مِن بَعدِ أَن أَظفَرَكُم عَلَيهِم ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرًا
blank: w-huwalladhī kaff ʾaydiyahum ʿankum w-ʾaydiyakum ʿanhum b-baṭn makkat m baʿd ʾ ʾaẓfarakum ʿalayhim w-kān llāh b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And it is He who withheld their hands from you and your hands from them within the area of Makkah after He caused you to overcome them. And ever is Allah of what you do, Seeing

arabic_uthmani: هُمُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَصَدّوكُم عَنِ المَسجِدِ الحَرامِ وَالهَديَ مَعكوفًا أَن يَبلُغَ مَحِلَّهُ ۚ وَلَولا رِجالٌ مُؤمِنونَ وَنِساءٌ مُؤمِناتٌ لَم تَعلَموهُم أَن تَطَئوهُم فَتُصيبَكُم مِنهُم مَعَرَّةٌ بِغَيرِ عِلمٍ ۖ لِيُدخِلَ اللَّهُ في رَحمَتِهِ مَن يَشاءُ ۚ لَو تَزَيَّلوا لَعَذَّبنَا الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِنهُم عَذابًا أَليمًا
blank: humulladhīn kafarū w-ṣaddūkum ʿanil-masjidil-ḥarām w-l-hady maʿkūf ʾ yablugh maḥillahū w-law-lā rijāl muʾminūn w-nisāʾ muʾmināt lam taʿlamūhum ʾ taṭʾūhum f-tuṣībakum minhum maʿarrat b-ghayr ʿilm l-yudkhil llāh fī raḥmatihī m yashāʾ law tazayyalū l-ʾadhdhabnālladhīn kafarū minhum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: They are the ones who disbelieved and obstructed you from al-Masjid al-Haram while the offering was prevented from reaching its place of sacrifice. And if not for believing men and believing women whom you did not know - that you might trample them and there would befall you because of them dishonor without your knowledge - you would have been permitted to enter Makkah. This was so that Allah might admit to His mercy whom He willed. If they had been apart from them, We would have punished those who disbelieved among them with painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِذ جَعَلَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا في قُلوبِهِمُ الحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ الجاهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ اللَّهُ سَكينَتَهُ عَلىٰ رَسولِهِ وَعَلَى المُؤمِنينَ وَأَلزَمَهُم كَلِمَةَ التَّقوىٰ وَكانوا أَحَقَّ بِها وَأَهلَها ۚ وَكانَ اللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمًا
blank: ʾidh jaʿalalladhīn kafarū fī qulūbihimul-ḥamiyyat ḥamiyyatal-jāhiliyyat f-ʾanzal llāh sakīnatahū ʿalā rasūlihī w-ʿalāl-muʾminīn w-ʾalzamahum kalimat t-taqwā w-kānū ʾaḥaqq bihā w-ʾahlahā w-kān llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: When those who disbelieved had put into their hearts chauvinism - the chauvinism of the time of ignorance. But Allah sent down His tranquillity upon His Messenger and upon the believers and imposed upon them the word of righteousness, and they were more deserving of it and worthy of it. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد صَدَقَ اللَّهُ رَسولَهُ الرُّؤيا بِالحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدخُلُنَّ المَسجِدَ الحَرامَ إِن شاءَ اللَّهُ آمِنينَ مُحَلِّقينَ رُءوسَكُم وَمُقَصِّرينَ لا تَخافونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ ما لَم تَعلَموا فَجَعَلَ مِن دونِ ذٰلِكَ فَتحًا قَريبًا
blank: l-qad ṣadaq llāh rasūlah r-ruʾyā b-l-ḥaqq l-tadkhulunnal-masjidal-ḥarām ʾ shāʾ llāh ʾāminīn muḥalliqīn ruʾūsakum w-muqaṣṣirīn lā takhāfūn f-ʿalim mā lam taʿlamū f-jaʿal m dūn dhālik fatḥ qarīb
english_saheeh_international: Certainly has Allah showed to His Messenger the vision in truth. You will surely enter al-Masjid al-Haram, if Allah wills, in safety, with your heads shaved and hair shortened, not fearing anyone. He knew what you did not know and has arranged before that a conquest near at hand

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي أَرسَلَ رَسولَهُ بِالهُدىٰ وَدينِ الحَقِّ لِيُظهِرَهُ عَلَى الدّينِ كُلِّهِ ۚ وَكَفىٰ بِاللَّهِ شَهيدًا
blank: huwalladhī ʾarsal rasūlahū b-l-hudā w-dīnil-ḥaqq l-yuẓhirahū ʿalā d-dīn kullihī w-kafā b-llāh shahīd
english_saheeh_international: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion. And sufficient is Allah as Witness

arabic_uthmani: مُحَمَّدٌ رَسولُ اللَّهِ ۚ وَالَّذينَ مَعَهُ أَشِدّاءُ عَلَى الكُفّارِ رُحَماءُ بَينَهُم ۖ تَراهُم رُكَّعًا سُجَّدًا يَبتَغونَ فَضلًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضوانًا ۖ سيماهُم في وُجوهِهِم مِن أَثَرِ السُّجودِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُم فِي التَّوراةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُم فِي الإِنجيلِ كَزَرعٍ أَخرَجَ شَطأَهُ فَآزَرَهُ فَاستَغلَظَ فَاستَوىٰ عَلىٰ سوقِهِ يُعجِبُ الزُّرّاعَ لِيَغيظَ بِهِمُ الكُفّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ مِنهُم مَغفِرَةً وَأَجرًا عَظيمًا
blank: muḥammad rasūl llāh w-lladhīn maʿahū ʾashiddāʾ ʿalāl-kuffār ruḥamāʾ baynahum tarāhum rukkaʿ sujjad yabtaghūn faḍlam-min llāh w-riḍwān sīmāhum fī wujūhihim m ʾathar s-sujūd dhālik mathaluhum fī t-tawrāt w-mathaluhum fīl-ʾinjīl k-zarʿ ʾakhraj shaṭʾahū f-ʾāzarahū f-staghlaẓ f-stawā ʿalā sūqihī yuʿjib z-zurrāʿ l-yaghīẓ bihimul-kuffār waʿad llāhulladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt minhum maghfirat w-ʾajr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves. You see them bowing and prostrating in prayer, seeking bounty from Allah and His pleasure. Their mark is on their faces from the trace of prostration. That is their description in the Torah. And their description in the Gospel is as a plant which produces its offshoots and strengthens them so they grow firm and stand upon their stalks, delighting the sowers - so that Allah may enrage by them the disbelievers. Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds among them forgiveness and a great reward

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تُقَدِّموا بَينَ يَدَيِ اللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَميعٌ عَليمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā tuqaddimū bayn yaday llāh w-rasūlihī w-ttaqū llāh ʾinn llāh samīʿ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not put yourselves before Allah and His Messenger but fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَرفَعوا أَصواتَكُم فَوقَ صَوتِ النَّبِيِّ وَلا تَجهَروا لَهُ بِالقَولِ كَجَهرِ بَعضِكُم لِبَعضٍ أَن تَحبَطَ أَعمالُكُم وَأَنتُم لا تَشعُرونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā tarfaʿū ʾaṣwātakum fawq ṣawt n-nabiyy w-lā tajharū lahū b-l-qawl k-jahr baʿḍikum l-baʿḍ ʾ taḥbaṭ ʾaʿmālukum w-ʾantum lā tashʿurūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be loud to him in speech like the loudness of some of you to others, lest your deeds become worthless while you perceive not

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَغُضّونَ أَصواتَهُم عِندَ رَسولِ اللَّهِ أُولٰئِكَ الَّذينَ امتَحَنَ اللَّهُ قُلوبَهُم لِلتَّقوىٰ ۚ لَهُم مَغفِرَةٌ وَأَجرٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yaghuḍḍūn ʾaṣwātahum ʿind rasūl llāh ʾulāʾikalladhīn mtaḥan llāh qulūbahum l-t-taqwā lahum maghfirat w-ʾajr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who lower their voices before the Messenger of Allah - they are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for righteousness. For them is forgiveness and great reward

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يُنادونَكَ مِن وَراءِ الحُجُراتِ أَكثَرُهُم لا يَعقِلونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yunādūnak m warāʾil-ḥujurāt ʾaktharuhum lā yaʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who call you, O Muhammad, from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو أَنَّهُم صَبَروا حَتّىٰ تَخرُجَ إِلَيهِم لَكانَ خَيرًا لَهُم ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: w-law ʾannahum ṣabarū ḥattā takhruj ʾilayhim l-kān khayr lahum w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And if they had been patient until you could come out to them, it would have been better for them. But Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِن جاءَكُم فاسِقٌ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنوا أَن تُصيبوا قَومًا بِجَهالَةٍ فَتُصبِحوا عَلىٰ ما فَعَلتُم نادِمينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾ jāʾakum fāsiq b-nabaʾ f-tabayyanū ʾ tuṣībū qawm b-jahālat f-tuṣbiḥū ʿalā mā faʿaltum nādimīn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, if there comes to you a disobedient one with information, investigate, lest you harm a people out of ignorance and become, over what you have done, regretful

arabic_uthmani: وَاعلَموا أَنَّ فيكُم رَسولَ اللَّهِ ۚ لَو يُطيعُكُم في كَثيرٍ مِنَ الأَمرِ لَعَنِتُّم وَلٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيكُمُ الإيمانَ وَزَيَّنَهُ في قُلوبِكُم وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيكُمُ الكُفرَ وَالفُسوقَ وَالعِصيانَ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الرّاشِدونَ
blank: w-ʿlamū ʾann fīkum rasūl llāh law yuṭīʿukum fī kathīr minal-ʾamr l-ʿanittum w-lākinn llāh ḥabbab ʾilaykumul-ʾīmān w-zayyanahū fī qulūbikum w-karrah ʾilaykumul-kufr w-l-fusūq w-l-ʿiṣyān ʾulāʾik hum r-rāshidūn
english_saheeh_international: And know that among you is the Messenger of Allah. If he were to obey you in much of the matter, you would be in difficulty, but Allah has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience. Those are the rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: فَضلًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَنِعمَةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: faḍlam-min llāh w-niʿmat w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: It is as bounty from Allah and favor. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن طائِفَتانِ مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ اقتَتَلوا فَأَصلِحوا بَينَهُما ۖ فَإِن بَغَت إِحداهُما عَلَى الأُخرىٰ فَقاتِلُوا الَّتي تَبغي حَتّىٰ تَفيءَ إِلىٰ أَمرِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فاءَت فَأَصلِحوا بَينَهُما بِالعَدلِ وَأَقسِطوا ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ المُقسِطينَ
blank: w-ʾ ṭāʾifatān minal-muʾminīn qtatalū f-ʾaṣliḥū baynahumā f-ʾ baghat ʾiḥdāhumā ʿalāl-ʾukhrā f-qātilū llatī tabghī ḥattā tafīʾ ʾilā ʾamr llāh f-ʾ fāʾat f-ʾaṣliḥū baynahumā b-l-ʿadl w-ʾaqsiṭū ʾinn llāh yuḥibbul-muqsiṭīn
english_saheeh_international: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight against the one that oppresses until it returns to the ordinance of Allah. And if it returns, then make settlement between them in justice and act justly. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّمَا المُؤمِنونَ إِخوَةٌ فَأَصلِحوا بَينَ أَخَوَيكُم ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُم تُرحَمونَ
blank: ʾinnamāl-muʾminūn ʾikhwat f-ʾaṣliḥū bayn ʾakhawaykum w-ttaqū llāh laʿallakum turḥamūn
english_saheeh_international: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear Allah that you may receive mercy

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا يَسخَر قَومٌ مِن قَومٍ عَسىٰ أَن يَكونوا خَيرًا مِنهُم وَلا نِساءٌ مِن نِساءٍ عَسىٰ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيرًا مِنهُنَّ ۖ وَلا تَلمِزوا أَنفُسَكُم وَلا تَنابَزوا بِالأَلقابِ ۖ بِئسَ الِاسمُ الفُسوقُ بَعدَ الإيمانِ ۚ وَمَن لَم يَتُب فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā yaskhar qawm m qawm ʿasā ʾ yakūnū khayram-minhum w-lā nisāʾ m nisāʾ ʿasā ʾ yakunn khayram-minhunn w-lā talmizū ʾanfusakum w-lā tanābazū b-l-ʾalqāb biʾsal-ʾismul-fusūq baʿdal-ʾīmān w-m lam yatub f-ʾulāʾik hum ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule another people; perhaps they may be better than them; nor let women ridicule other women; perhaps they may be better than them. And do not insult one another and do not call each other by offensive nicknames. Wretched is the name of disobedience after one's faith. And whoever does not repent - then it is those who are the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اجتَنِبوا كَثيرًا مِنَ الظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعضَ الظَّنِّ إِثمٌ ۖ وَلا تَجَسَّسوا وَلا يَغتَب بَعضُكُم بَعضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُم أَن يَأكُلَ لَحمَ أَخيهِ مَيتًا فَكَرِهتُموهُ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَوّابٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū jtanibū kathīram-min ẓ-ẓann ʾinn baʿḍ ẓ-ẓann ʾithm w-lā tajassasū w-lā yaghtab baʿḍukum baʿḍ ʾ-yuḥibb ʾaḥadukum ʾ yaʾkul laḥm ʾakhīh mayt f-karihtumūh w-ttaqū llāh ʾinn llāh tawwāb raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, avoid much negative assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النّاسُ إِنّا خَلَقناكُم مِن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثىٰ وَجَعَلناكُم شُعوبًا وَقَبائِلَ لِتَعارَفوا ۚ إِنَّ أَكرَمَكُم عِندَ اللَّهِ أَتقاكُم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَليمٌ خَبيرٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nās ʾinnā khalaqnākum m dhakar w-ʾunthā w-jaʿalnākum shuʿūb w-qabāʾil l-taʿārafū ʾinn ʾakramakum ʿind llāh ʾatqākum ʾinn llāh ʿalīm khabīr
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قالَتِ الأَعرابُ آمَنّا ۖ قُل لَم تُؤمِنوا وَلٰكِن قولوا أَسلَمنا وَلَمّا يَدخُلِ الإيمانُ في قُلوبِكُم ۖ وَإِن تُطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ لا يَلِتكُم مِن أَعمالِكُم شَيئًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: qālatil-ʾaʿrāb ʾāmannā qul lam tuʾminū w-lāk qūlū ʾaslamnā w-lammā yadkhulil-ʾīmān fī qulūbikum w-ʾ tuṭīʿū llāh w-rasūlahū lā yalitkum m ʾaʿmālikum shayʾ ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not yet believed; but say instead, 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّمَا المُؤمِنونَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ ثُمَّ لَم يَرتابوا وَجاهَدوا بِأَموالِهِم وَأَنفُسِهِم في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الصّادِقونَ
blank: ʾinnamāl-muʾminūnalladhīn ʾāmanū b-llāh w-rasūlihī thumm lam yartābū w-jāhadū b-ʾamwālihim w-ʾanfusihim fī sabīl llāh ʾulāʾik hum ṣ-ṣādiqūn
english_saheeh_international: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah. It is those who are the truthful

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَتُعَلِّمونَ اللَّهَ بِدينِكُم وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: qul ʾ-tuʿallimūn llāh b-dīnikum w-llāh yaʿlam mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things

arabic_uthmani: يَمُنّونَ عَلَيكَ أَن أَسلَموا ۖ قُل لا تَمُنّوا عَلَيَّ إِسلامَكُم ۖ بَلِ اللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيكُم أَن هَداكُم لِلإيمانِ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: yamunnūn ʿalayk ʾ ʾaslamū qul lā tamunnū ʿalayy ʾislāmakum bal llāh yamunn ʿalaykum ʾ hadākum l-l-ʾīmān ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعلَمُ غَيبَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بَصيرٌ بِما تَعمَلونَ
blank: ʾinn llāh yaʿlam ghayb s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-llāh baṣīr b-mā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen aspects of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do

arabic_uthmani: ق ۚ وَالقُرآنِ المَجيدِ
blank: q (qāf) w-l-qurʾānil-majīd
english_saheeh_international: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: بَل عَجِبوا أَن جاءَهُم مُنذِرٌ مِنهُم فَقالَ الكافِرونَ هٰذا شَيءٌ عَجيبٌ
blank: bal ʿajibū ʾ jāʾahum mundhir minhum f-qālal-kāfirūn hādhā shayʾ ʿajīb
english_saheeh_international: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing

arabic_uthmani: أَإِذا مِتنا وَكُنّا تُرابًا ۖ ذٰلِكَ رَجعٌ بَعيدٌ
blank: ʾ-ʾidhā mitnā w-kunnā turāb dhālik rajʿ baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: When we have died and have become dust, we will return to life? That is a distant return

arabic_uthmani: قَد عَلِمنا ما تَنقُصُ الأَرضُ مِنهُم ۖ وَعِندَنا كِتابٌ حَفيظٌ
blank: qad ʿalimnā mā tanquṣul-ʾarḍ minhum w-ʿindanā kitāb ḥafīẓ
english_saheeh_international: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record

arabic_uthmani: بَل كَذَّبوا بِالحَقِّ لَمّا جاءَهُم فَهُم في أَمرٍ مَريجٍ
blank: bal kadhdhabū b-l-ḥaqq lammā jāʾahum f-hum fī ʾamr marīj
english_saheeh_international: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition

arabic_uthmani: أَفَلَم يَنظُروا إِلَى السَّماءِ فَوقَهُم كَيفَ بَنَيناها وَزَيَّنّاها وَما لَها مِن فُروجٍ
blank: ʾ-f-lam yanẓurū ʾilā s-samāʾ fawqahum kayf banaynāhā w-zayyannāhā w-mā lahā m furūj
english_saheeh_international: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and how it has no rifts

arabic_uthmani: وَالأَرضَ مَدَدناها وَأَلقَينا فيها رَواسِيَ وَأَنبَتنا فيها مِن كُلِّ زَوجٍ بَهيجٍ
blank: w-l-ʾarḍ madadnāhā w-ʾalqaynā fīhā rawāsiy w-ʾanbatnā fīhā m kull zawj bahīj
english_saheeh_international: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein something of every beautiful kind

arabic_uthmani: تَبصِرَةً وَذِكرىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبدٍ مُنيبٍ
blank: tabṣirat w-dhikrā l-kull ʿabd munīb
english_saheeh_international: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns to Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَنَزَّلنا مِنَ السَّماءِ ماءً مُبارَكًا فَأَنبَتنا بِهِ جَنّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الحَصيدِ
blank: w-nazzalnā min s-samāʾ māʾam-mubārak f-ʾanbatnā bihī jannāt w-ḥabbal-ḥaṣīd
english_saheeh_international: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

arabic_uthmani: وَالنَّخلَ باسِقاتٍ لَها طَلعٌ نَضيدٌ
blank: w-n-nakhl bāsiqāt lahā ṭalʿ naḍīd
english_saheeh_international: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers

arabic_uthmani: رِزقًا لِلعِبادِ ۖ وَأَحيَينا بِهِ بَلدَةً مَيتًا ۚ كَذٰلِكَ الخُروجُ
blank: rizq l-l-ʿibād w-ʾaḥyaynā bihī baldatam-mayt k-dhālikal-khurūj
english_saheeh_international: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَت قَبلَهُم قَومُ نوحٍ وَأَصحابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمودُ
blank: kadhdhabat qablahum qawm nūḥ w-ʾaṣḥāb r-rass w-thamūd
english_saheeh_international: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

arabic_uthmani: وَعادٌ وَفِرعَونُ وَإِخوانُ لوطٍ
blank: w-ʿād w-firʿawn w-ʾikhwān lūṭ
english_saheeh_international: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

arabic_uthmani: وَأَصحابُ الأَيكَةِ وَقَومُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعيدِ
blank: w-ʾaṣhābul-ʾaykat w-qawm tubbaʿ kull kadhdhab r-rusul f-ḥaqq waʿīd
english_saheeh_international: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled

arabic_uthmani: أَفَعَيينا بِالخَلقِ الأَوَّلِ ۚ بَل هُم في لَبسٍ مِن خَلقٍ جَديدٍ
blank: ʾ-f-ʿayīnā b-l-khalqil-ʾawwal bal hum fī labs m khalq jadīd
english_saheeh_international: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد خَلَقنَا الإِنسانَ وَنَعلَمُ ما تُوَسوِسُ بِهِ نَفسُهُ ۖ وَنَحنُ أَقرَبُ إِلَيهِ مِن حَبلِ الوَريدِ
blank: w-l-qad khalaqnāl-ʾinsān w-naʿlam mā tuwaswis bihī nafsuhū w-naḥn ʾaqrab ʾilayh m ḥablil-warīd
english_saheeh_international: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than his jugular vein

arabic_uthmani: إِذ يَتَلَقَّى المُتَلَقِّيانِ عَنِ اليَمينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمالِ قَعيدٌ
blank: ʾidh yatalaqqāl-mutalaqqiyān ʿanil-yamīn w-ʿan sh-shimāl qaʿīd
english_saheeh_international: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left

arabic_uthmani: ما يَلفِظُ مِن قَولٍ إِلّا لَدَيهِ رَقيبٌ عَتيدٌ
blank: mā yalfiẓ m qawl ʾillā ladayh raqīb ʿatīd
english_saheeh_international: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared to record

arabic_uthmani: وَجاءَت سَكرَةُ المَوتِ بِالحَقِّ ۖ ذٰلِكَ ما كُنتَ مِنهُ تَحيدُ
blank: w-jāʾat sakratul-mawt b-l-ḥaqq dhālik mā kunt minh taḥīd
english_saheeh_international: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid

arabic_uthmani: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصّورِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ يَومُ الوَعيدِ
blank: w-nufikh fī ṣ-ṣūr dhālik yawmul-waʿīd
english_saheeh_international: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of carrying out the threat

arabic_uthmani: وَجاءَت كُلُّ نَفسٍ مَعَها سائِقٌ وَشَهيدٌ
blank: w-jāʾat kull nafs maʿahā sāʾiq w-shahīd
english_saheeh_international: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد كُنتَ في غَفلَةٍ مِن هٰذا فَكَشَفنا عَنكَ غِطاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ اليَومَ حَديدٌ
blank: l-qad kunt fī ghaflat m hādhā f-kashafnā ʿank ghiṭāʾak f-baṣarukal-yawm ḥadīd
english_saheeh_international: It will be said, "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ قَرينُهُ هٰذا ما لَدَيَّ عَتيدٌ
blank: w-qāl qarīnuhū hādhā mā ladayy ʿatīd
english_saheeh_international: And his companion, the angel, will say, "This record is what is with me, prepared

arabic_uthmani: أَلقِيا في جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفّارٍ عَنيدٍ
blank: ʾalqiyā fī jahannam kull kaffār ʿanīd
english_saheeh_international: Allah will say, "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever

arabic_uthmani: مَنّاعٍ لِلخَيرِ مُعتَدٍ مُريبٍ
blank: mannāʿ l-l-khayr muʿtad murīb-
english_saheeh_international: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلٰهًا آخَرَ فَأَلقِياهُ فِي العَذابِ الشَّديدِ
blank: alladhī jaʿal maʿ llāh ʾilāh ʾākhar f-ʾalqiyāh fīl-ʿadhāb sh-shadīd
english_saheeh_international: Who made as equal with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قالَ قَرينُهُ رَبَّنا ما أَطغَيتُهُ وَلٰكِن كانَ في ضَلالٍ بَعيدٍ
blank: qāl qarīnuhū rabbanā mā ʾaṭghaytuhū w-lāk kān fī ḍalāl baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: His devil companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he himself was in extreme error

arabic_uthmani: قالَ لا تَختَصِموا لَدَيَّ وَقَد قَدَّمتُ إِلَيكُم بِالوَعيدِ
blank: qāl lā takhtaṣimū ladayy w-qad qaddamt ʾilaykum b-l-waʿīd
english_saheeh_international: Allah will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning

arabic_uthmani: ما يُبَدَّلُ القَولُ لَدَيَّ وَما أَنا بِظَلّامٍ لِلعَبيدِ
blank: mā yubaddalul-qawl ladayy w-mā ʾan b-ẓallām l-l-ʿabīd
english_saheeh_international: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ نَقولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امتَلَأتِ وَتَقولُ هَل مِن مَزيدٍ
blank: yawm naqūl l-jahannam hal mtalaʾt w-taqūl hal m mazīd
english_saheeh_international: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more

arabic_uthmani: وَأُزلِفَتِ الجَنَّةُ لِلمُتَّقينَ غَيرَ بَعيدٍ
blank: w-ʾuzlifatil-jannat l-l-muttaqīn ghayr baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا ما توعَدونَ لِكُلِّ أَوّابٍ حَفيظٍ
blank: hādhā mā tūʿadūn l-kull ʾawwāb ḥafīẓ
english_saheeh_international: It will be said, "This is what you were promised - for every returner to Allah and keeper of His covenant

arabic_uthmani: مَن خَشِيَ الرَّحمٰنَ بِالغَيبِ وَجاءَ بِقَلبٍ مُنيبٍ
blank: m khashiy r-raḥmān b-l-ghayb w-jāʾ b-qalb munīb-
english_saheeh_international: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning in repentance

arabic_uthmani: ادخُلوها بِسَلامٍ ۖ ذٰلِكَ يَومُ الخُلودِ
blank: udkhulūhā b-salām dhālik yawmul-khulūd
english_saheeh_international: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity

arabic_uthmani: لَهُم ما يَشاءونَ فيها وَلَدَينا مَزيدٌ
blank: lahum mā yashāʾūn fīhā w-ladaynā mazīd
english_saheeh_international: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more

arabic_uthmani: وَكَم أَهلَكنا قَبلَهُم مِن قَرنٍ هُم أَشَدُّ مِنهُم بَطشًا فَنَقَّبوا فِي البِلادِ هَل مِن مَحيصٍ
blank: w-kam ʾahlaknā qablahum m qarn hum ʾashadd minhum baṭsh f-naqqabū fīl-bilād hal m maḥīṣ
english_saheeh_international: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in striking power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَذِكرىٰ لِمَن كانَ لَهُ قَلبٌ أَو أَلقَى السَّمعَ وَهُوَ شَهيدٌ
blank: ʾinn fī dhālik l-dhikrā l-m kān lahū qalb ʾaw ʾalqā s-samʿ w-huw shahīd
english_saheeh_international: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present in mind

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد خَلَقنَا السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ وَما بَينَهُما في سِتَّةِ أَيّامٍ وَما مَسَّنا مِن لُغوبٍ
blank: w-l-qad khalaqnā s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā baynahumā fī sittat ʾayyām w-mā massanā m lughūb
english_saheeh_international: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness

arabic_uthmani: فَاصبِر عَلىٰ ما يَقولونَ وَسَبِّح بِحَمدِ رَبِّكَ قَبلَ طُلوعِ الشَّمسِ وَقَبلَ الغُروبِ
blank: f-ṣbir ʿalā mā yaqūlūn w-sabbiḥ b-ḥamd rabbik qabl ṭulūʿ sh-shams w-qablal-ghurūb
english_saheeh_international: So be patient, O Muhammad, over what they say and exalt Allah with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ اللَّيلِ فَسَبِّحهُ وَأَدبارَ السُّجودِ
blank: w-minal-layl f-sabbiḥh w-ʾadbār s-sujūd
english_saheeh_international: And in part of the night exalt Him and after prostration

arabic_uthmani: وَاستَمِع يَومَ يُنادِ المُنادِ مِن مَكانٍ قَريبٍ
blank: w-stamiʿ yawm yunādil-munād m makān qarīb
english_saheeh_international: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَسمَعونَ الصَّيحَةَ بِالحَقِّ ۚ ذٰلِكَ يَومُ الخُروجِ
blank: yawm yasmaʿūn ṣ-ṣayḥat b-l-ḥaqq dhālik yawmul-khurūj
english_saheeh_international: The Day they will hear the blast of the Horn in truth. That is the Day of Emergence from the graves

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا نَحنُ نُحيي وَنُميتُ وَإِلَينَا المَصيرُ
blank: ʾinnā naḥn nuḥyī w-numīt w-ʾilaynāl-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تَشَقَّقُ الأَرضُ عَنهُم سِراعًا ۚ ذٰلِكَ حَشرٌ عَلَينا يَسيرٌ
blank: yawm tashaqqaqul-ʾarḍ ʿanhum sirāʿ dhālik ḥashr ʿalaynā yasīr
english_saheeh_international: On the Day the earth breaks away from them and they emerge rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us

arabic_uthmani: نَحنُ أَعلَمُ بِما يَقولونَ ۖ وَما أَنتَ عَلَيهِم بِجَبّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّر بِالقُرآنِ مَن يَخافُ وَعيدِ
blank: naḥn ʾaʿlam b-mā yaqūlūn w-mā ʾant ʿalayhim b-jabbār f-dhakkir b-l-qurʾān m yakhāf waʿīd
english_saheeh_international: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat

arabic_uthmani: وَالذّارِياتِ ذَروًا
blank: w-dh-dhāriyāt dharw
english_saheeh_international: By those winds scattering dust dispersing

arabic_uthmani: فَالحامِلاتِ وِقرًا
blank: f-l-ḥāmilāt wiqr
english_saheeh_international: And those clouds carrying a load of water

arabic_uthmani: فَالجارِياتِ يُسرًا
blank: f-l-jāriyāt yusr
english_saheeh_international: And those ships sailing with ease

arabic_uthmani: فَالمُقَسِّماتِ أَمرًا
blank: f-l-muqassimāt ʾamr
english_saheeh_international: And those angels apportioning each matter

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما توعَدونَ لَصادِقٌ
blank: ʾinnamā tūʿadūn l-ṣādiq
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, what you are promised is true

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ الدّينَ لَواقِعٌ
blank: w-ʾinn d-dīn l-wāqiʿ
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, the recompense is to occur

arabic_uthmani: وَالسَّماءِ ذاتِ الحُبُكِ
blank: w-s-samāʾ dhātil-ḥubuk
english_saheeh_international: By the heaven containing pathways

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّكُم لَفي قَولٍ مُختَلِفٍ
blank: ʾinnakum l-fī qawl mukhtalif
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, you are in differing speech

arabic_uthmani: يُؤفَكُ عَنهُ مَن أُفِكَ
blank: yuʾfak ʿanh m ʾufik
english_saheeh_international: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded

arabic_uthmani: قُتِلَ الخَرّاصونَ
blank: qutil-l-kharrāṣūn
english_saheeh_international: Destroyed are the falsifiers

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ هُم في غَمرَةٍ ساهونَ
blank: alladhīn hum fī ghamrat sāhūn
english_saheeh_international: Who are within a flood of confusion and heedless

arabic_uthmani: يَسأَلونَ أَيّانَ يَومُ الدّينِ
blank: yasʾalūn ʾayyān yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ هُم عَلَى النّارِ يُفتَنونَ
blank: yawm hum ʿalā n-nār yuftanūn
english_saheeh_international: It is the Day they will be tormented over the Fire

arabic_uthmani: ذوقوا فِتنَتَكُم هٰذَا الَّذي كُنتُم بِهِ تَستَعجِلونَ
blank: dhūqū fitnatakum hādhālladhī kuntum bihī tastaʿjilūn
english_saheeh_international: And will be told, "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُتَّقينَ في جَنّاتٍ وَعُيونٍ
blank: ʾinnal-muttaqīn fī jannāt w-ʿuyūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs

arabic_uthmani: آخِذينَ ما آتاهُم رَبُّهُم ۚ إِنَّهُم كانوا قَبلَ ذٰلِكَ مُحسِنينَ
blank: ʾākhidhīn mā ʾātāhum rabbuhum ʾinnahum kānū qabl dhālik muḥsinīn
english_saheeh_international: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good

arabic_uthmani: كانوا قَليلًا مِنَ اللَّيلِ ما يَهجَعونَ
blank: kānū qalīlam-minal-layl mā yahjaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: They used to sleep but little of the night

arabic_uthmani: وَبِالأَسحارِ هُم يَستَغفِرونَ
blank: w-b-l-ʾasḥār hum yastaghfirūn
english_saheeh_international: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness

arabic_uthmani: وَفي أَموالِهِم حَقٌّ لِلسّائِلِ وَالمَحرومِ
blank: w-fī ʾamwālihim ḥaqq l-s-sāʾil w-l-maḥrūm
english_saheeh_international: And from their properties was given the right of the needy petitioner and the deprived

arabic_uthmani: وَفِي الأَرضِ آياتٌ لِلموقِنينَ
blank: w-fīl-ʾarḍ ʾāyāt l-l-mūqinīn
english_saheeh_international: And on the earth are signs for the certain in faith

arabic_uthmani: وَفي أَنفُسِكُم ۚ أَفَلا تُبصِرونَ
blank: w-fī ʾanfusikum ʾ-f-lā tubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And in yourselves. Then will you not see

arabic_uthmani: وَفِي السَّماءِ رِزقُكُم وَما توعَدونَ
blank: w-fī s-samāʾ rizqukum w-mā tūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised

arabic_uthmani: فَوَرَبِّ السَّماءِ وَالأَرضِ إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ مِثلَ ما أَنَّكُم تَنطِقونَ
blank: f-w-rabb s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ ʾinnahū l-ḥaqq mithl mā ʾannakum tanṭiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as sure as it is that you are speaking

arabic_uthmani: هَل أَتاكَ حَديثُ ضَيفِ إِبراهيمَ المُكرَمينَ
blank: hal ʾatāk ḥadīth ḍayf ʾibrāhīmal-mukramīn
english_saheeh_international: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham

arabic_uthmani: إِذ دَخَلوا عَلَيهِ فَقالوا سَلامًا ۖ قالَ سَلامٌ قَومٌ مُنكَرونَ
blank: ʾidh dakhalū ʿalayh f-qālū salām qāl salām qawm munkarūn
english_saheeh_international: When they entered upon him and said, "We greet you with peace." He answered, "And upon you peace, you are a people unknown

arabic_uthmani: فَراغَ إِلىٰ أَهلِهِ فَجاءَ بِعِجلٍ سَمينٍ
blank: f-rāgh ʾilā ʾahlihī f-jāʾ b-ʿijl samīn
english_saheeh_international: Then he went to his family and came with a fat roasted calf

arabic_uthmani: فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيهِم قالَ أَلا تَأكُلونَ
blank: f-qarrabahū ʾilayhim qāl ʾ-lā taʾkulūn
english_saheeh_international: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat

arabic_uthmani: فَأَوجَسَ مِنهُم خيفَةً ۖ قالوا لا تَخَف ۖ وَبَشَّروهُ بِغُلامٍ عَليمٍ
blank: f-ʾawjas minhum khīfat qālū lā takhaf w-bashsharūh b-ghulām ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy

arabic_uthmani: فَأَقبَلَتِ امرَأَتُهُ في صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّت وَجهَها وَقالَت عَجوزٌ عَقيمٌ
blank: f-ʾaqbalat mraʾatuhū fī ṣarrat f-ṣakkat wajhahā w-qālat ʿajūz ʿaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And his wife approached with a cry of alarm and struck her face and said, "I am a barren old woman

arabic_uthmani: قالوا كَذٰلِكِ قالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الحَكيمُ العَليمُ
blank: qālū k-dhālik qāl rabbuk ʾinnahū huwal-ḥakīmul-ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing

arabic_uthmani: ۞ قالَ فَما خَطبُكُم أَيُّهَا المُرسَلونَ
blank: qāl f-mā khaṭbukum ʾayyuhāl-mursalūn
english_saheeh_international: Abraham said, "Then what is your business here, O messengers

arabic_uthmani: قالوا إِنّا أُرسِلنا إِلىٰ قَومٍ مُجرِمينَ
blank: qālū ʾinnā ʾursilnā ʾilā qawm mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

arabic_uthmani: لِنُرسِلَ عَلَيهِم حِجارَةً مِن طينٍ
blank: l-nursil ʿalayhim ḥijāratam-m ṭīn
english_saheeh_international: To send down upon them stones of clay

arabic_uthmani: مُسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلمُسرِفينَ
blank: musawwamat ʿind rabbik l-l-musrifīn
english_saheeh_international: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخرَجنا مَن كانَ فيها مِنَ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: f-ʾakhrajnā m kān fīhā minal-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers

arabic_uthmani: فَما وَجَدنا فيها غَيرَ بَيتٍ مِنَ المُسلِمينَ
blank: f-mā wajadnā fīhā ghayr bayt minal-muslimīn
english_saheeh_international: And We found not within them other than a single house of Muslims

arabic_uthmani: وَتَرَكنا فيها آيَةً لِلَّذينَ يَخافونَ العَذابَ الأَليمَ
blank: w-taraknā fīhā ʾāyat l-lladhīn yakhāfūnal-ʿadhābal-ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَفي موسىٰ إِذ أَرسَلناهُ إِلىٰ فِرعَونَ بِسُلطانٍ مُبينٍ
blank: w-fī mūsā ʾidh ʾarsalnāh ʾilā firʿawn b-sulṭān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And in Moses was a sign, when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority

arabic_uthmani: فَتَوَلّىٰ بِرُكنِهِ وَقالَ ساحِرٌ أَو مَجنونٌ
blank: f-tawallā b-ruknihī w-qāl sāḥir ʾaw majnūn
english_saheeh_international: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخَذناهُ وَجُنودَهُ فَنَبَذناهُم فِي اليَمِّ وَهُوَ مُليمٌ
blank: f-ʾakhadhnāh w-junūdahū f-nabadhnāhum fīl-yamm w-huw mulīm
english_saheeh_international: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy

arabic_uthmani: وَفي عادٍ إِذ أَرسَلنا عَلَيهِمُ الرّيحَ العَقيمَ
blank: w-fī ʿād ʾidh ʾarsalnā ʿalayhim r-rīḥal-ʿaqīm
english_saheeh_international: And in 'Aad was a sign, when We sent against them the barren wind

arabic_uthmani: ما تَذَرُ مِن شَيءٍ أَتَت عَلَيهِ إِلّا جَعَلَتهُ كَالرَّميمِ
blank: mā tadhar m shayʾ ʾatat ʿalayh ʾillā jaʿalath k-r-ramīm
english_saheeh_international: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins

arabic_uthmani: وَفي ثَمودَ إِذ قيلَ لَهُم تَمَتَّعوا حَتّىٰ حينٍ
blank: w-fī thamūd ʾidh qīl lahum tamattaʿū ḥattā ḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time

arabic_uthmani: فَعَتَوا عَن أَمرِ رَبِّهِم فَأَخَذَتهُمُ الصّاعِقَةُ وَهُم يَنظُرونَ
blank: f-ʿataw ʿ ʾamr rabbihim f-ʾakhadhathum ṣ-ṣāʿiqat w-hum yanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on

arabic_uthmani: فَمَا استَطاعوا مِن قِيامٍ وَما كانوا مُنتَصِرينَ
blank: f-mā staṭāʿū m qiyām w-mā kānū muntaṣirīn
english_saheeh_international: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves

arabic_uthmani: وَقَومَ نوحٍ مِن قَبلُ ۖ إِنَّهُم كانوا قَومًا فاسِقينَ
blank: w-qawm nūḥ m qabl ʾinnahum kānū qawm fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And We destroyed the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: وَالسَّماءَ بَنَيناها بِأَيدٍ وَإِنّا لَموسِعونَ
blank: w-s-samāʾ banaynāhā b-ʾayd w-ʾinnā l-mūsiʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are its expander

arabic_uthmani: وَالأَرضَ فَرَشناها فَنِعمَ الماهِدونَ
blank: w-l-ʾarḍ farashnāhā f-niʿmal-māhidūn
english_saheeh_international: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer

arabic_uthmani: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيءٍ خَلَقنا زَوجَينِ لَعَلَّكُم تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-m kull shayʾ khalaqnā zawjayn laʿallakum tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember

arabic_uthmani: فَفِرّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنّي لَكُم مِنهُ نَذيرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: f-firrū ʾilā llāh ʾinnī lakum minh nadhīr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَجعَلوا مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلٰهًا آخَرَ ۖ إِنّي لَكُم مِنهُ نَذيرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-lā tajʿalū maʿ llāh ʾilāh ʾākhar ʾinnī lakum minh nadhīr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And do not make as equal with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ ما أَتَى الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم مِن رَسولٍ إِلّا قالوا ساحِرٌ أَو مَجنونٌ
blank: k-dhālik mā ʾatālladhīn m qablihim m rasūl ʾillā qālū sāḥir ʾaw majnūn
english_saheeh_international: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman

arabic_uthmani: أَتَواصَوا بِهِ ۚ بَل هُم قَومٌ طاغونَ
blank: ʾ-tawāṣaw bihī bal hum qawm ṭāghūn
english_saheeh_international: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they themselves are a transgressing people

arabic_uthmani: فَتَوَلَّ عَنهُم فَما أَنتَ بِمَلومٍ
blank: f-tawall ʿanhum f-mā ʾant b-malūm
english_saheeh_international: So leave them, O Muhammad, for you are not to be blamed

arabic_uthmani: وَذَكِّر فَإِنَّ الذِّكرىٰ تَنفَعُ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-dhakkir f-ʾinn dh-dhikrā tanfaʿul-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers

arabic_uthmani: وَما خَلَقتُ الجِنَّ وَالإِنسَ إِلّا لِيَعبُدونِ
blank: w-mā khalaqtul-jinn w-l-ʾins ʾillā l-yaʿbudūn
english_saheeh_international: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me

arabic_uthmani: ما أُريدُ مِنهُم مِن رِزقٍ وَما أُريدُ أَن يُطعِمونِ
blank: mā ʾurīd minhum m rizq w-mā ʾurīd ʾ yuṭʿimūn
english_saheeh_international: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزّاقُ ذُو القُوَّةِ المَتينُ
blank: ʾinn llāh huw r-razzāq dhūl-quwwatil-matīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, it is Allah who is the continual Provider, the firm possessor of strength

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذينَ ظَلَموا ذَنوبًا مِثلَ ذَنوبِ أَصحابِهِم فَلا يَستَعجِلونِ
blank: f-ʾinn l-lladhīn ẓalamū dhanūbam-mithl dhanūb ʾaṣḥābihim f-lā yastaʿjilūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion of punishment like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me

arabic_uthmani: فَوَيلٌ لِلَّذينَ كَفَروا مِن يَومِهِمُ الَّذي يوعَدونَ
blank: f-wayl l-lladhīn kafarū m yawmihimulladhī yūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised

arabic_uthmani: وَالطّورِ
blank: w-ṭ-ṭūr
english_saheeh_international: By the mount

arabic_uthmani: وَكِتابٍ مَسطورٍ
blank: w-kitāb masṭūr
english_saheeh_international: And by a Book inscribed

arabic_uthmani: في رَقٍّ مَنشورٍ
blank: fī raqq manshūr
english_saheeh_international: In parchment spread open

arabic_uthmani: وَالبَيتِ المَعمورِ
blank: w-l-baytil-maʿmūr
english_saheeh_international: And by the frequented House

arabic_uthmani: وَالسَّقفِ المَرفوعِ
blank: w-s-saqfil-marfūʿ
english_saheeh_international: And by the heaven raised high

arabic_uthmani: وَالبَحرِ المَسجورِ
blank: w-l-baḥril-masjūr
english_saheeh_international: And by the sea filled with fire

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ عَذابَ رَبِّكَ لَواقِعٌ
blank: ʾinn ʿadhāb rabbik l-wāqiʿ
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur

arabic_uthmani: ما لَهُ مِن دافِعٍ
blank: mā lahū m dāfiʿ
english_saheeh_international: Of it there is no preventer

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تَمورُ السَّماءُ مَورًا
blank: yawm tamūr s-samāʾ mawr
english_saheeh_international: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

arabic_uthmani: وَتَسيرُ الجِبالُ سَيرًا
blank: w-tasīrul-jibāl sayr
english_saheeh_international: And the mountains will pass on, departing

arabic_uthmani: فَوَيلٌ يَومَئِذٍ لِلمُكَذِّبينَ
blank: f-wayl yawmaʾidh l-l-mukadhdhibīn
english_saheeh_international: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ هُم في خَوضٍ يَلعَبونَ
blank: alladhīn hum fī khawḍ yalʿabūn
english_saheeh_international: Who are in empty discourse amusing themselves

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يُدَعّونَ إِلىٰ نارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
blank: yawm yudaʿʿūn ʾilā n-nār jahannam daʿʿ
english_saheeh_international: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a violent thrust, its angels will say

arabic_uthmani: هٰذِهِ النّارُ الَّتي كُنتُم بِها تُكَذِّبونَ
blank: hādhih n-nār llatī kuntum bihā tukadhdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: This is the Fire which you used to deny

arabic_uthmani: أَفَسِحرٌ هٰذا أَم أَنتُم لا تُبصِرونَ
blank: ʾ-f-siḥr hādhā ʾam ʾantum lā tubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: Then is this magic, or do you not see

arabic_uthmani: اصلَوها فَاصبِروا أَو لا تَصبِروا سَواءٌ عَلَيكُم ۖ إِنَّما تُجزَونَ ما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: iṣlawhā f-ṣbirū ʾaw lā taṣbirū sawāʾ ʿalaykum ʾinnamā tujzawn mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Enter to burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُتَّقينَ في جَنّاتٍ وَنَعيمٍ
blank: ʾinnal-muttaqīn fī jannāt w-naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure

arabic_uthmani: فاكِهينَ بِما آتاهُم رَبُّهُم وَوَقاهُم رَبُّهُم عَذابَ الجَحيمِ
blank: fākihīn b-mā ʾātāhum rabbuhum w-waqāhum rabbuhum ʿadhābal-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: كُلوا وَاشرَبوا هَنيئًا بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: kulū w-shrabū hanīʾ b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: They will be told, "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: مُتَّكِئينَ عَلىٰ سُرُرٍ مَصفوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجناهُم بِحورٍ عينٍ
blank: muttakiʾīn ʿalā surur maṣfūfat w-zawwajnāhum b-ḥūr ʿīn
english_saheeh_international: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, beautiful eyes

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا وَاتَّبَعَتهُم ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإيمانٍ أَلحَقنا بِهِم ذُرِّيَّتَهُم وَما أَلَتناهُم مِن عَمَلِهِم مِن شَيءٍ ۚ كُلُّ امرِئٍ بِما كَسَبَ رَهينٌ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾāmanū w-ttabaʿathum dhurriyyatuhum b-ʾīmān ʾalḥaqnā bihim dhurriyyatahum w-mā ʾalatnāhum m ʿamalihim m shayʾ kull mriʾ b-mā kasab rahīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمدَدناهُم بِفاكِهَةٍ وَلَحمٍ مِمّا يَشتَهونَ
blank: w-ʾamdadnāhum b-fākihat w-laḥm mimmā yashtahūn
english_saheeh_international: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire

arabic_uthmani: يَتَنازَعونَ فيها كَأسًا لا لَغوٌ فيها وَلا تَأثيمٌ
blank: yatanāzaʿūn fīhā kaʾs lā laghw fīhā w-lā taʾthīm
english_saheeh_international: They will exchange with one another a cup of wine wherein results no ill speech or commission of sin

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَيَطوفُ عَلَيهِم غِلمانٌ لَهُم كَأَنَّهُم لُؤلُؤٌ مَكنونٌ
blank: w-yaṭūf ʿalayhim ghilmān lahum k-ʾannahum luʾluʾ maknūn
english_saheeh_international: There will circulate among them servant boys especially for them, as if they were pearls well-protected

arabic_uthmani: وَأَقبَلَ بَعضُهُم عَلىٰ بَعضٍ يَتَساءَلونَ
blank: w-ʾaqbal baʿḍuhum ʿalā baʿḍ yatasāʾalūn
english_saheeh_international: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other

arabic_uthmani: قالوا إِنّا كُنّا قَبلُ في أَهلِنا مُشفِقينَ
blank: qālū ʾinnā kunnā qabl fī ʾahlinā mushfiqīn
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful of displeasing Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَمَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَينا وَوَقانا عَذابَ السَّمومِ
blank: f-mann llāh ʿalaynā w-waqānā ʿadhāb s-samūm
english_saheeh_international: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا كُنّا مِن قَبلُ نَدعوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ البَرُّ الرَّحيمُ
blank: ʾinnā kunnā m qabl nadʿūh ʾinnahū huwal-barr r-raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful

arabic_uthmani: فَذَكِّر فَما أَنتَ بِنِعمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكاهِنٍ وَلا مَجنونٍ
blank: f-dhakkir f-mā ʾant b-niʿmat rabbik b-kāhin w-lā majnūn
english_saheeh_international: So remind O Muhammad, for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَقولونَ شاعِرٌ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِهِ رَيبَ المَنونِ
blank: ʾam yaqūlūn shāʿir natarabbaṣ bihī raybal-manūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they say of you, "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time

arabic_uthmani: قُل تَرَبَّصوا فَإِنّي مَعَكُم مِنَ المُتَرَبِّصينَ
blank: qul tarabbaṣū f-ʾinnī maʿakum minal-mutarabbiṣīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters

arabic_uthmani: أَم تَأمُرُهُم أَحلامُهُم بِهٰذا ۚ أَم هُم قَومٌ طاغونَ
blank: ʾam taʿmuruhum ʾaḥlāmuhum b-hādhā ʾam hum qawm ṭāghūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do their minds command them to say this, or are they a transgressing people

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَقولونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ ۚ بَل لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾam yaqūlūn taqawwalahū bal lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe

arabic_uthmani: فَليَأتوا بِحَديثٍ مِثلِهِ إِن كانوا صادِقينَ
blank: f-l-yaʾtū b-ḥadīth mithlihī ʾ kānū ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: أَم خُلِقوا مِن غَيرِ شَيءٍ أَم هُمُ الخالِقونَ
blank: ʾam khuliqū m ghayr shayʾ ʾam humul-khāliqūn
english_saheeh_international: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators of themselves

arabic_uthmani: أَم خَلَقُوا السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ ۚ بَل لا يوقِنونَ
blank: ʾam khalaqū s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ bal lā yūqinūn
english_saheeh_international: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain

arabic_uthmani: أَم عِندَهُم خَزائِنُ رَبِّكَ أَم هُمُ المُصَيطِرونَ
blank: ʾam ʿindahum khazāʾin rabbik ʾam humul-muṣayṭirūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have they the depositories containing the provision of your Lord? Or are they the controllers of them

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَهُم سُلَّمٌ يَستَمِعونَ فيهِ ۖ فَليَأتِ مُستَمِعُهُم بِسُلطانٍ مُبينٍ
blank: ʾam lahum sullam yastamiʿūn fīh f-l-yaʾt mustamiʿuhum b-sulṭān mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Or have they a stairway into the heaven upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَهُ البَناتُ وَلَكُمُ البَنونَ
blank: ʾam lahul-banāt w-lakumul-banūn
english_saheeh_international: Or has He daughters while you have sons

arabic_uthmani: أَم تَسأَلُهُم أَجرًا فَهُم مِن مَغرَمٍ مُثقَلونَ
blank: ʾam tasʾaluhum ʾajr f-hum m maghram muthqalūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do you, O Muhammad, ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down

arabic_uthmani: أَم عِندَهُمُ الغَيبُ فَهُم يَكتُبونَ
blank: ʾam ʿindahumul-ghayb f-hum yaktubūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have they knowledge of the unseen, so they write it down

arabic_uthmani: أَم يُريدونَ كَيدًا ۖ فَالَّذينَ كَفَروا هُمُ المَكيدونَ
blank: ʾam yurīdūn kayd f-lladhīn kafarū humul-makīdūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَهُم إِلٰهٌ غَيرُ اللَّهِ ۚ سُبحانَ اللَّهِ عَمّا يُشرِكونَ
blank: ʾam lahum ʾilāh ghayr llāh subḥān llāh ʿammā yushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن يَرَوا كِسفًا مِنَ السَّماءِ ساقِطًا يَقولوا سَحابٌ مَركومٌ
blank: w-ʾ yaraw kisfam-min s-samāʾ sāqiṭ yaqūlū saḥāb markūm
english_saheeh_international: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "It is merely clouds heaped up

arabic_uthmani: فَذَرهُم حَتّىٰ يُلاقوا يَومَهُمُ الَّذي فيهِ يُصعَقونَ
blank: f-dharhum ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumulladhī fīh yuṣʿaqūn
english_saheeh_international: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ لا يُغني عَنهُم كَيدُهُم شَيئًا وَلا هُم يُنصَرونَ
blank: yawm lā yughnī ʿanhum kayduhum shayʾ w-lā hum yunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذينَ ظَلَموا عَذابًا دونَ ذٰلِكَ وَلٰكِنَّ أَكثَرَهُم لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: w-ʾinn l-lladhīn ẓalamū ʿadhāb dūn dhālik w-lākinn ʾaktharahum lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَاصبِر لِحُكمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعيُنِنا ۖ وَسَبِّح بِحَمدِ رَبِّكَ حينَ تَقومُ
blank: w-ṣbir l-ḥukm rabbik f-ʾinnak b-ʾaʿyuninā w-sabbiḥ b-ḥamd rabbik ḥīn taqūm
english_saheeh_international: And be patient, O Muhammad, for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt Allah with praise of your Lord when you arise

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ اللَّيلِ فَسَبِّحهُ وَإِدبارَ النُّجومِ
blank: w-minal-layl f-sabbiḥh w-ʾidbār n-nujūm
english_saheeh_international: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after the setting of the stars

arabic_uthmani: وَالنَّجمِ إِذا هَوىٰ
blank: w-n-najm ʾidhā hawā
english_saheeh_international: By the star when it descends

arabic_uthmani: ما ضَلَّ صاحِبُكُم وَما غَوىٰ
blank: mā ḍall ṣāḥibukum w-mā ghawā
english_saheeh_international: Your companion Muhammad has not strayed, nor has he erred

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَنطِقُ عَنِ الهَوىٰ
blank: w-mā yanṭiq ʿanil-hawā
english_saheeh_international: Nor does he speak from his own inclination

arabic_uthmani: إِن هُوَ إِلّا وَحيٌ يوحىٰ
blank: ʾ huw ʾillā waḥy yūḥā
english_saheeh_international: It is not but a revelation revealed

arabic_uthmani: عَلَّمَهُ شَديدُ القُوىٰ
blank: ʿallamahū shadīdul-quwā
english_saheeh_international: Taught to him by one intense in strength

arabic_uthmani: ذو مِرَّةٍ فَاستَوىٰ
blank: dhū mirrat f-stawā
english_saheeh_international: One of soundness. And he rose to his true form

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ بِالأُفُقِ الأَعلىٰ
blank: w-huw b-l-ʾufuqil-ʾaʿlā
