english_saheeh_international: While he was in the higher part of the horizon

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ دَنا فَتَدَلّىٰ
blank: thumm danā f-tadallā
english_saheeh_international: Then he approached and descended

arabic_uthmani: فَكانَ قابَ قَوسَينِ أَو أَدنىٰ
blank: f-kān qāb qawsayn ʾaw ʾadnā
english_saheeh_international: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer

arabic_uthmani: فَأَوحىٰ إِلىٰ عَبدِهِ ما أَوحىٰ
blank: f-ʾawḥā ʾilā ʿabdihī mā ʾawḥā
english_saheeh_international: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed

arabic_uthmani: ما كَذَبَ الفُؤادُ ما رَأىٰ
blank: mā kadhabal-fuʾād mā raʾā
english_saheeh_international: The heart did not lie about what it saw

arabic_uthmani: أَفَتُمارونَهُ عَلىٰ ما يَرىٰ
blank: ʾ-f-tumārūnahū ʿalā mā yarā
english_saheeh_international: So will you dispute with him over what he saw

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد رَآهُ نَزلَةً أُخرىٰ
blank: w-l-qad raʾāh nazlat ʾukhrā
english_saheeh_international: And he certainly saw him in another descent

arabic_uthmani: عِندَ سِدرَةِ المُنتَهىٰ
blank: ʿind sidratil-muntahā
english_saheeh_international: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary

arabic_uthmani: عِندَها جَنَّةُ المَأوىٰ
blank: ʿindahā jannatul-maʾwā
english_saheeh_international: Near it is the Garden of Refuge

arabic_uthmani: إِذ يَغشَى السِّدرَةَ ما يَغشىٰ
blank: ʾidh yaghshā s-sidrat mā yaghshā
english_saheeh_international: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered it

arabic_uthmani: ما زاغَ البَصَرُ وَما طَغىٰ
blank: mā zāghal-baṣar w-mā ṭaghā
english_saheeh_international: The sight of the Prophet did not swerve, nor did it transgress its limit

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد رَأىٰ مِن آياتِ رَبِّهِ الكُبرىٰ
blank: l-qad raʾā m ʾāyāt rabbihil-kubrā
english_saheeh_international: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord

arabic_uthmani: أَفَرَأَيتُمُ اللّاتَ وَالعُزّىٰ
blank: ʾ-f-raʾaytumul-lāt w-l-ʿuzzā
english_saheeh_international: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza

arabic_uthmani: وَمَناةَ الثّالِثَةَ الأُخرىٰ
blank: w-manāt th-thālithatal-ʾukhrā
english_saheeh_international: And Manat, the third - the other one

arabic_uthmani: أَلَكُمُ الذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ الأُنثىٰ
blank: ʾ-lakum dh-dhakar w-lahul-ʾunthā
english_saheeh_international: Is the male for you and for Him the female

arabic_uthmani: تِلكَ إِذًا قِسمَةٌ ضيزىٰ
blank: tilk ʾidh qismat ḍīzā
english_saheeh_international: That, then, is an unjust division

arabic_uthmani: إِن هِيَ إِلّا أَسماءٌ سَمَّيتُموها أَنتُم وَآباؤُكُم ما أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ بِها مِن سُلطانٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَما تَهوَى الأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَد جاءَهُم مِن رَبِّهِمُ الهُدىٰ
blank: ʾ hiy ʾillā ʾasmāʾ sammaytumūhā ʾantum w-ʾābāʾukum mā ʾanzal llāh bihā m sulṭān ʾ yattabiʿūn ʾillā ẓ-ẓann w-mā tahwāl-ʾanfus w-l-qad jāʾahum m rabbihimul-hudā
english_saheeh_international: They are not but mere names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what their souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance

arabic_uthmani: أَم لِلإِنسانِ ما تَمَنّىٰ
blank: ʾam l-l-ʾinsān mā tamannā
english_saheeh_international: Or is there for man whatever he wishes

arabic_uthmani: فَلِلَّهِ الآخِرَةُ وَالأولىٰ
blank: f-l-llāhil-ʾākhirat w-l-ʾūlā
english_saheeh_international: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first life

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَكَم مِن مَلَكٍ فِي السَّماواتِ لا تُغني شَفاعَتُهُم شَيئًا إِلّا مِن بَعدِ أَن يَأذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَن يَشاءُ وَيَرضىٰ
blank: w-kam m malak fī s-samāwāt lā tughnī shafāʿatuhum shayʾ ʾillā m baʿd ʾ yaʾdhan llāh l-m yashāʾ w-yarḍā
english_saheeh_international: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except only after Allah has permitted it to whom He wills and approves

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ لا يُؤمِنونَ بِالآخِرَةِ لَيُسَمّونَ المَلائِكَةَ تَسمِيَةَ الأُنثىٰ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn lā yuʾminūn b-l-ʾākhirat l-yusammūnal-malāʾikat tasmiyatal-ʾunthā
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names

arabic_uthmani: وَما لَهُم بِهِ مِن عِلمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ الظَّنَّ لا يُغني مِنَ الحَقِّ شَيئًا
blank: w-mā lahum bihī m ʿilm ʾ yattabiʿūn ʾillā ẓ-ẓann w-ʾinn ẓ-ẓann lā yughnī minal-ḥaqq shayʾ
english_saheeh_international: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all

arabic_uthmani: فَأَعرِض عَن مَن تَوَلّىٰ عَن ذِكرِنا وَلَم يُرِد إِلَّا الحَياةَ الدُّنيا
blank: f-ʾaʿriḍ ʿam-m tawallā ʿ dhikrinā w-lam yurid ʾillāl-ḥayāt d-dunyā
english_saheeh_international: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ مَبلَغُهُم مِنَ العِلمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعلَمُ بِمَنِ اهتَدىٰ
blank: dhālik mablaghuhum minal-ʿilm ʾinn rabbak huw ʾaʿlam b-m ḍall ʿ sabīlihī w-huw ʾaʿlam b-man htadā
english_saheeh_international: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ لِيَجزِيَ الَّذينَ أَساءوا بِما عَمِلوا وَيَجزِيَ الَّذينَ أَحسَنوا بِالحُسنَى
blank: w-l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ l-yajziyalladhīn ʾasāʾū b-mā ʿamilū w-yajziyalladhīn ʾaḥsanū b-l-ḥusnā
english_saheeh_international: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with the penalty of what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best reward

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَجتَنِبونَ كَبائِرَ الإِثمِ وَالفَواحِشَ إِلَّا اللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ واسِعُ المَغفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعلَمُ بِكُم إِذ أَنشَأَكُم مِنَ الأَرضِ وَإِذ أَنتُم أَجِنَّةٌ في بُطونِ أُمَّهاتِكُم ۖ فَلا تُزَكّوا أَنفُسَكُم ۖ هُوَ أَعلَمُ بِمَنِ اتَّقىٰ
blank: alladhīn yajtanibūn kabāʾiral-ʾithm w-l-fawāḥish ʾillāl-lamam ʾinn rabbak wāsiʿul-maghfirat huw ʾaʿlam bikum ʾidh ʾanshaʾakum minal-ʾarḍ w-ʾidh ʾantum ʾajinnat fī buṭūn ʾummahātikum f-lā tuzakkū ʾanfusakum huw ʾaʿlam b-man ttaqā
english_saheeh_international: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only committing slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him

arabic_uthmani: أَفَرَأَيتَ الَّذي تَوَلّىٰ
blank: ʾ-f-raʾaytalladhī tawallā
english_saheeh_international: Have you seen the one who turned away

arabic_uthmani: وَأَعطىٰ قَليلًا وَأَكدىٰ
blank: w-ʾaʿṭā qalīl w-ʾakdā
english_saheeh_international: And gave a little and then refrained

arabic_uthmani: أَعِندَهُ عِلمُ الغَيبِ فَهُوَ يَرىٰ
blank: ʾ-ʿindahū ʿilmul-ghayb f-huw yarā
english_saheeh_international: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَم يُنَبَّأ بِما في صُحُفِ موسىٰ
blank: ʾam lam yunabbaʾ b-mā fī ṣuḥuf mūsā
english_saheeh_international: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

arabic_uthmani: وَإِبراهيمَ الَّذي وَفّىٰ
blank: w-ʾibrāhīmalladhī waffā
english_saheeh_international: And of Abraham, who fulfilled his obligations

arabic_uthmani: أَلّا تَزِرُ وازِرَةٌ وِزرَ أُخرىٰ
blank: ʾallā tazir wāzirat wizr ʾukhrā
english_saheeh_international: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

arabic_uthmani: وَأَن لَيسَ لِلإِنسانِ إِلّا ما سَعىٰ
blank: w-ʾ lays l-l-ʾinsān ʾillā mā saʿā
english_saheeh_international: And that there is not for man except that good for which he strives

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّ سَعيَهُ سَوفَ يُرىٰ
blank: w-ʾann saʿyahū sawf yurā
english_saheeh_international: And that his effort is going to be seen

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ يُجزاهُ الجَزاءَ الأَوفىٰ
blank: thumm yujzāhul-jazāʾal-ʾawfā
english_saheeh_international: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّ إِلىٰ رَبِّكَ المُنتَهىٰ
blank: w-ʾann ʾilā rabbikal-muntahā
english_saheeh_international: And that to your Lord is the finality

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَضحَكَ وَأَبكىٰ
blank: w-ʾannahū huw ʾaḍḥak w-ʾabkā
english_saheeh_international: And that it is He who makes one laugh and weep

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَماتَ وَأَحيا
blank: w-ʾannahū huw ʾamāt w-ʾaḥyā
english_saheeh_international: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ خَلَقَ الزَّوجَينِ الذَّكَرَ وَالأُنثىٰ
blank: w-ʾannahū khalaq z-zawjayn dh-dhakar w-l-ʾunthā
english_saheeh_international: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female

arabic_uthmani: مِن نُطفَةٍ إِذا تُمنىٰ
blank: m nuṭfat ʾidhā tumnā
english_saheeh_international: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّ عَلَيهِ النَّشأَةَ الأُخرىٰ
blank: w-ʾann ʿalayh n-nashʾatal-ʾukhrā
english_saheeh_international: And that incumbent upon Him is the next creation

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَغنىٰ وَأَقنىٰ
blank: w-ʾannahū huw ʾaghnā w-ʾaqnā
english_saheeh_international: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّ الشِّعرىٰ
blank: w-ʾannahū huw rabb sh-shiʿrā
english_saheeh_international: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ أَهلَكَ عادًا الأولىٰ
blank: w-ʾannahū ʾahlak ʿād-il-ʾūlā
english_saheeh_international: And that He destroyed the first people of 'Aad

arabic_uthmani: وَثَمودَ فَما أَبقىٰ
blank: w-thamūd f-mā ʾabqā
english_saheeh_international: And Thamud - and He did not spare them

arabic_uthmani: وَقَومَ نوحٍ مِن قَبلُ ۖ إِنَّهُم كانوا هُم أَظلَمَ وَأَطغىٰ
blank: w-qawm nūḥ m qabl ʾinnahum kānū hum ʾaẓlam w-ʾaṭghā
english_saheeh_international: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were even more unjust and oppressing

arabic_uthmani: وَالمُؤتَفِكَةَ أَهوىٰ
blank: w-l-muʾtafikat ʾahwā
english_saheeh_international: And the overturned towns He hurled down

arabic_uthmani: فَغَشّاها ما غَشّىٰ
blank: f-ghashshāhā mā ghashshā
english_saheeh_international: And covered them by that which He covered

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمارىٰ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbik tatamārā
english_saheeh_international: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt

arabic_uthmani: هٰذا نَذيرٌ مِنَ النُّذُرِ الأولىٰ
blank: hādhā nadhīr min n-nudhuril-ʾūlā
english_saheeh_international: This Prophet is a warner like the former warners

arabic_uthmani: أَزِفَتِ الآزِفَةُ
blank: ʾazifatil-ʾāzifat
english_saheeh_international: The Approaching Day has approached

arabic_uthmani: لَيسَ لَها مِن دونِ اللَّهِ كاشِفَةٌ
blank: lays lahā m dūn llāh kāshifat
english_saheeh_international: Of it, from those besides Allah, there is no remover

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمِن هٰذَا الحَديثِ تَعجَبونَ
blank: ʾ-f-m hādhāl-ḥadīth taʿjabūn
english_saheeh_international: Then at this statement do you wonder

arabic_uthmani: وَتَضحَكونَ وَلا تَبكونَ
blank: w-taḍḥakūn w-lā tabkūn
english_saheeh_international: And you laugh and do not weep

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنتُم سامِدونَ
blank: w-ʾantum sāmidūn
english_saheeh_international: While you are proudly sporting

arabic_uthmani: فَاسجُدوا لِلَّهِ وَاعبُدوا ۩
blank: f-sjudū l-llāh w-ʿbudū
english_saheeh_international: So prostrate to Allah and worship Him

arabic_uthmani: اقتَرَبَتِ السّاعَةُ وَانشَقَّ القَمَرُ
blank: iqtarabat s-sāʿat w-nshaqqal-qamar
english_saheeh_international: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split in two

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن يَرَوا آيَةً يُعرِضوا وَيَقولوا سِحرٌ مُستَمِرٌّ
blank: w-ʾ yaraw ʾāyat yuʿriḍū w-yaqūlū siḥr mustamirr
english_saheeh_international: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذَّبوا وَاتَّبَعوا أَهواءَهُم ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمرٍ مُستَقِرٌّ
blank: w-kadhdhabū w-ttabaʿū ʾahwāʾahum w-kull ʾamr mustaqirr
english_saheeh_international: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a time of settlement

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد جاءَهُم مِنَ الأَنباءِ ما فيهِ مُزدَجَرٌ
blank: w-l-qad jāʾahum minal-ʾanbāʾ mā fīh muzdajar
english_saheeh_international: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence

arabic_uthmani: حِكمَةٌ بالِغَةٌ ۖ فَما تُغنِ النُّذُرُ
blank: ḥikmat bālighat f-mā tughn n-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail them

arabic_uthmani: فَتَوَلَّ عَنهُم ۘ يَومَ يَدعُ الدّاعِ إِلىٰ شَيءٍ نُكُرٍ
blank: f-tawall ʿanhum yawm yadʿ d-dāʿ ʾilā shayʾ nukur
english_saheeh_international: So leave them, O Muhammad. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding

arabic_uthmani: خُشَّعًا أَبصارُهُم يَخرُجونَ مِنَ الأَجداثِ كَأَنَّهُم جَرادٌ مُنتَشِرٌ
blank: khushshaʿ ʾabṣāruhum yakhrujūn minal-ʾajdāth k-ʾannahum jarād muntashir
english_saheeh_international: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading

arabic_uthmani: مُهطِعينَ إِلَى الدّاعِ ۖ يَقولُ الكافِرونَ هٰذا يَومٌ عَسِرٌ
blank: muhṭiʿīn ʾilā d-dāʿ yaqūlul-kāfirūn hādhā yawm ʿasir
english_saheeh_international: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day

arabic_uthmani: ۞ كَذَّبَت قَبلَهُم قَومُ نوحٍ فَكَذَّبوا عَبدَنا وَقالوا مَجنونٌ وَازدُجِرَ
blank: kadhdhabat qablahum qawm nūḥ f-kadhdhabū ʿabdanā w-qālū majnūn w-zdujir
english_saheeh_international: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled

arabic_uthmani: فَدَعا رَبَّهُ أَنّي مَغلوبٌ فَانتَصِر
blank: f-daʿā rabbahū ʾannī maghlūb f-ntaṣir
english_saheeh_international: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help

arabic_uthmani: فَفَتَحنا أَبوابَ السَّماءِ بِماءٍ مُنهَمِرٍ
blank: f-fataḥnā ʾabwāb s-samāʾ b-māʾ munhamir
english_saheeh_international: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

arabic_uthmani: وَفَجَّرنَا الأَرضَ عُيونًا فَالتَقَى الماءُ عَلىٰ أَمرٍ قَد قُدِرَ
blank: w-fajjarnāl-ʾarḍ ʿuyūn f-ltaqāl-māʾ ʿalā ʾamr qad qudir
english_saheeh_international: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined

arabic_uthmani: وَحَمَلناهُ عَلىٰ ذاتِ أَلواحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
blank: w-ḥamalnāh ʿalā dhāt ʾalwāḥ w-dusur
english_saheeh_international: And We carried him on a construction of planks and nails

arabic_uthmani: تَجري بِأَعيُنِنا جَزاءً لِمَن كانَ كُفِرَ
blank: tajrī b-ʾaʿyuninā jazāʾ l-m kān kufir
english_saheeh_international: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد تَرَكناها آيَةً فَهَل مِن مُدَّكِرٍ
blank: w-l-qad taraknāhā ʾāyat f-hal m muddakir
english_saheeh_international: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember

arabic_uthmani: فَكَيفَ كانَ عَذابي وَنُذُرِ
blank: f-kayf kān ʿadhābī w-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: And how severe were My punishment and warning

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد يَسَّرنَا القُرآنَ لِلذِّكرِ فَهَل مِن مُدَّكِرٍ
blank: w-l-qad yassarnāl-qurʾān l-dh-dhikr f-hal m muddakir
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَت عادٌ فَكَيفَ كانَ عَذابي وَنُذُرِ
blank: kadhdhabat ʿād f-kayf kān ʿadhābī w-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: Aad denied; and how severe were My punishment and warning

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَرسَلنا عَلَيهِم ريحًا صَرصَرًا في يَومِ نَحسٍ مُستَمِرٍّ
blank: ʾinnā ʾarsalnā ʿalayhim rīḥ ṣarṣar fī yawm naḥs mustamirr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune

arabic_uthmani: تَنزِعُ النّاسَ كَأَنَّهُم أَعجازُ نَخلٍ مُنقَعِرٍ
blank: tanziʿ n-nās k-ʾannahum ʾaʿjāz nakhl munqaʿir
english_saheeh_international: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted

arabic_uthmani: فَكَيفَ كانَ عَذابي وَنُذُرِ
blank: f-kayf kān ʿadhābī w-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: And how severe were My punishment and warning

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد يَسَّرنَا القُرآنَ لِلذِّكرِ فَهَل مِن مُدَّكِرٍ
blank: w-l-qad yassarnāl-qurʾān l-dh-dhikr f-hal m muddakir
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَت ثَمودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
blank: kadhdhabat thamūd b-n-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: Thamud denied the warning

arabic_uthmani: فَقالوا أَبَشَرًا مِنّا واحِدًا نَتَّبِعُهُ إِنّا إِذًا لَفي ضَلالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
blank: f-qālū ʾ-basharam-minnā wāḥid nattabiʿuhū ʾinnā ʾidh l-fī ḍalāl w-suʿur
english_saheeh_international: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness

arabic_uthmani: أَأُلقِيَ الذِّكرُ عَلَيهِ مِن بَينِنا بَل هُوَ كَذّابٌ أَشِرٌ
blank: ʾ-ʾulqiy dh-dhikr ʿalayh m bayninā bal huw kadhdhāb ʾashir
english_saheeh_international: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar

arabic_uthmani: سَيَعلَمونَ غَدًا مَنِ الكَذّابُ الأَشِرُ
blank: s-yaʿlamūn ghadam-manil-kadhdhābul-ʾashir
english_saheeh_international: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا مُرسِلُو النّاقَةِ فِتنَةً لَهُم فَارتَقِبهُم وَاصطَبِر
blank: ʾinnā mursilū n-nāqat fitnat lahum f-rtaqibhum w-ṣṭabir
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient

arabic_uthmani: وَنَبِّئهُم أَنَّ الماءَ قِسمَةٌ بَينَهُم ۖ كُلُّ شِربٍ مُحتَضَرٌ
blank: w-nabbiʾhum ʾannal-māʾ qismat baynahum kull shirb muḥtaḍar
english_saheeh_international: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each day of drink attended by turn

arabic_uthmani: فَنادَوا صاحِبَهُم فَتَعاطىٰ فَعَقَرَ
blank: f-nādaw ṣāḥibahum f-taʿāṭā f-ʿaqar
english_saheeh_international: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung her

arabic_uthmani: فَكَيفَ كانَ عَذابي وَنُذُرِ
blank: f-kayf kān ʿadhābī w-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: And how severe were My punishment and warning

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَرسَلنا عَلَيهِم صَيحَةً واحِدَةً فَكانوا كَهَشيمِ المُحتَظِرِ
blank: ʾinnā ʾarsalnā ʿalayhim ṣayḥat wāḥidat f-kānū k-hashīmil-muḥtaẓir
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an animal pen

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد يَسَّرنَا القُرآنَ لِلذِّكرِ فَهَل مِن مُدَّكِرٍ
blank: w-l-qad yassarnāl-qurʾān l-dh-dhikr f-hal m muddakir
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَت قَومُ لوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
blank: kadhdhabat qawm lūṭ b-n-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: The people of Lot denied the warning

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَرسَلنا عَلَيهِم حاصِبًا إِلّا آلَ لوطٍ ۖ نَجَّيناهُم بِسَحَرٍ
blank: ʾinnā ʾarsalnā ʿalayhim ḥāṣib ʾillā ʾāl lūṭ najjaynāhum b-saḥar
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

arabic_uthmani: نِعمَةً مِن عِندِنا ۚ كَذٰلِكَ نَجزي مَن شَكَرَ
blank: niʿmatam-m ʿindinā k-dhālik najzī m shakar
english_saheeh_international: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَنذَرَهُم بَطشَتَنا فَتَمارَوا بِالنُّذُرِ
blank: w-l-qad ʾandharahum baṭshatanā f-tamāraw b-n-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد راوَدوهُ عَن ضَيفِهِ فَطَمَسنا أَعيُنَهُم فَذوقوا عَذابي وَنُذُرِ
blank: w-l-qad rāwadūh ʿ ḍayfihī f-ṭamasnā ʾaʿyunahum f-dhūqū ʿadhābī w-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, saying, "Taste My punishment and warning

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد صَبَّحَهُم بُكرَةً عَذابٌ مُستَقِرٌّ
blank: w-l-qad ṣabbaḥahum bukrat ʿadhāb mustaqirr
english_saheeh_international: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment

arabic_uthmani: فَذوقوا عَذابي وَنُذُرِ
blank: f-dhūqū ʿadhābī w-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: So taste My punishment and warning

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد يَسَّرنَا القُرآنَ لِلذِّكرِ فَهَل مِن مُدَّكِرٍ
blank: w-l-qad yassarnāl-qurʾān l-dh-dhikr f-hal m muddakir
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد جاءَ آلَ فِرعَونَ النُّذُرُ
blank: w-l-qad jāʾ ʾāl firʿawn n-nudhur
english_saheeh_international: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا كُلِّها فَأَخَذناهُم أَخذَ عَزيزٍ مُقتَدِرٍ
blank: kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā kullihā f-ʾakhadhnāhum ʾakhdh ʿazīz muqtadir
english_saheeh_international: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability

arabic_uthmani: أَكُفّارُكُم خَيرٌ مِن أُولٰئِكُم أَم لَكُم بَراءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
blank: ʾ-kuffārukum khayr m ʾulāʾikum ʾam lakum barāʾat fī z-zubur
english_saheeh_international: Are your disbelievers better than those former ones, or have you immunity in the scripture

arabic_uthmani: أَم يَقولونَ نَحنُ جَميعٌ مُنتَصِرٌ
blank: ʾam yaqūlūn naḥn jamīʿ muntaṣir
english_saheeh_international: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting each other

arabic_uthmani: سَيُهزَمُ الجَمعُ وَيُوَلّونَ الدُّبُرَ
blank: s-yuhzamul-jamʿ w-yuwallūn d-dubur
english_saheeh_international: Their assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs in retreat

arabic_uthmani: بَلِ السّاعَةُ مَوعِدُهُم وَالسّاعَةُ أَدهىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
blank: bal s-sāʿat mawʿiduhum w-s-sāʿat ʾadhā w-ʾamarr
english_saheeh_international: But the Hour is their appointment for due punishment, and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُجرِمينَ في ضَلالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
blank: ʾinnal-mujrimīn fī ḍalāl w-suʿur
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يُسحَبونَ فِي النّارِ عَلىٰ وُجوهِهِم ذوقوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
blank: yawm yusḥabūn fī n-nār ʿalā wujūhihim dhūqū mass saqar
english_saheeh_international: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces it will be said, "Taste the touch of Saqar

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا كُلَّ شَيءٍ خَلَقناهُ بِقَدَرٍ
blank: ʾinnā kull shayʾ khalaqnāh b-qadar
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, all things We created with predestination

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَمرُنا إِلّا واحِدَةٌ كَلَمحٍ بِالبَصَرِ
blank: w-mā ʾamrunā ʾillā wāḥidat k-lamḥ b-l-baṣar
english_saheeh_international: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَهلَكنا أَشياعَكُم فَهَل مِن مُدَّكِرٍ
blank: w-l-qad ʾahlaknā ʾashyāʿakum f-hal m muddakir
english_saheeh_international: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember

arabic_uthmani: وَكُلُّ شَيءٍ فَعَلوهُ فِي الزُّبُرِ
blank: w-kull shayʾ faʿalūh fī z-zubur
english_saheeh_international: And everything they did is in written records

arabic_uthmani: وَكُلُّ صَغيرٍ وَكَبيرٍ مُستَطَرٌ
blank: w-kull ṣaghīr w-kabīr mustaṭar
english_saheeh_international: And every small and great thing is inscribed

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُتَّقينَ في جَنّاتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
blank: ʾinnal-muttaqīn fī jannāt w-nahar
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers

arabic_uthmani: في مَقعَدِ صِدقٍ عِندَ مَليكٍ مُقتَدِرٍ
blank: fī maqʿad ṣidq ʿind malīk muqtadir
english_saheeh_international: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability

arabic_uthmani: الرَّحمٰنُ
blank: ar-raḥmān
english_saheeh_international: The Most Merciful

arabic_uthmani: عَلَّمَ القُرآنَ
blank: ʿallamal-qurʾān
english_saheeh_international: Taught the Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَ الإِنسانَ
blank: khalaqal-ʾinsān
english_saheeh_international: Created man

arabic_uthmani: عَلَّمَهُ البَيانَ
blank: ʿallamahul-bayān
english_saheeh_international: And taught him eloquence

arabic_uthmani: الشَّمسُ وَالقَمَرُ بِحُسبانٍ
blank: ash-shams w-l-qamar b-ḥusbān
english_saheeh_international: The sun and the moon move by precise calculation

arabic_uthmani: وَالنَّجمُ وَالشَّجَرُ يَسجُدانِ
blank: w-n-najm w-sh-shajar yasjudān
english_saheeh_international: And the stars and trees prostrate

arabic_uthmani: وَالسَّماءَ رَفَعَها وَوَضَعَ الميزانَ
blank: w-s-samāʾ rafaʿahā w-waḍaʿal-mīzān
english_saheeh_international: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance

arabic_uthmani: أَلّا تَطغَوا فِي الميزانِ
blank: ʾallā taṭghaw fīl-mīzān
english_saheeh_international: That you not transgress within the balance

arabic_uthmani: وَأَقيمُوا الوَزنَ بِالقِسطِ وَلا تُخسِرُوا الميزانَ
blank: w-ʾaqīmūl-wazn b-l-qisṭ w-lā tukhsirūl-mīzān
english_saheeh_international: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance

arabic_uthmani: وَالأَرضَ وَضَعَها لِلأَنامِ
blank: w-l-ʾarḍ waḍaʿahā l-l-ʾanām
english_saheeh_international: And the earth He laid out for the creatures

arabic_uthmani: فيها فاكِهَةٌ وَالنَّخلُ ذاتُ الأَكمامِ
blank: fīhā fākihat w-n-nakhl dhātul-ʾakmām
english_saheeh_international: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths of dates

arabic_uthmani: وَالحَبُّ ذُو العَصفِ وَالرَّيحانُ
blank: w-l-ḥabb dhūl-ʿaṣf w-r-rayḥān
english_saheeh_international: And grain having husks and scented plants

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَ الإِنسانَ مِن صَلصالٍ كَالفَخّارِ
blank: khalaqal-ʾinsān m ṣalṣāl k-l-fakhkhār
english_saheeh_international: He created man from clay like that of pottery

arabic_uthmani: وَخَلَقَ الجانَّ مِن مارِجٍ مِن نارٍ
blank: w-khalaqal-jānn m mārij m nār
english_saheeh_international: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: رَبُّ المَشرِقَينِ وَرَبُّ المَغرِبَينِ
blank: rabbul-mashriqayn w-rabbul-maghribayn
english_saheeh_international: He is Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: مَرَجَ البَحرَينِ يَلتَقِيانِ
blank: marajal-baḥrayn yaltaqiyān
english_saheeh_international: He released the two seas, meeting side by side

arabic_uthmani: بَينَهُما بَرزَخٌ لا يَبغِيانِ
blank: baynahumā barzakh lā yabghiyān
english_saheeh_international: Between them is a barrier so neither of them transgresses

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: يَخرُجُ مِنهُمَا اللُّؤلُؤُ وَالمَرجانُ
blank: yakhruj minhumāl-luʾluʾ w-l-marjān
english_saheeh_international: From both of them emerge pearl and coral

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: وَلَهُ الجَوارِ المُنشَآتُ فِي البَحرِ كَالأَعلامِ
blank: w-lahul-jawāril-munshaʾāt fīl-baḥr k-l-ʾaʿlām
english_saheeh_international: And to Him belong the ships with sails elevated in the sea like mountains

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: كُلُّ مَن عَلَيها فانٍ
blank: kull m ʿalayhā fān
english_saheeh_international: Everyone upon the earth will perish

arabic_uthmani: وَيَبقىٰ وَجهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو الجَلالِ وَالإِكرامِ
blank: w-yabqā wajh rabbik dhūl-jalāl w-l-ʾikrām
english_saheeh_international: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: يَسأَلُهُ مَن فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَومٍ هُوَ في شَأنٍ
blank: yasʾaluhū m fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ kull yawm huw fī shaʾn
english_saheeh_international: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: سَنَفرُغُ لَكُم أَيُّهَ الثَّقَلانِ
blank: s-nafrugh lakum ʾayyuh th-thaqalān
english_saheeh_international: We will attend to you, O prominent beings

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: يا مَعشَرَ الجِنِّ وَالإِنسِ إِنِ استَطَعتُم أَن تَنفُذوا مِن أَقطارِ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ فَانفُذوا ۚ لا تَنفُذونَ إِلّا بِسُلطانٍ
blank: yā-maʿsharal-jinn w-l-ʾins ʾin staṭaʿtum ʾ tanfudhū m ʾaqṭār s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ f-nfudhū lā tanfudhūn ʾillā b-sulṭān
english_saheeh_international: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority from Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: يُرسَلُ عَلَيكُما شُواظٌ مِن نارٍ وَنُحاسٌ فَلا تَنتَصِرانِ
blank: yursal ʿalaykumā shuwāẓ m nār w-nuḥās f-lā tantaṣirān
english_saheeh_international: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذَا انشَقَّتِ السَّماءُ فَكانَت وَردَةً كَالدِّهانِ
blank: f-ʾidhā nshaqqat s-samāʾ f-kānat wardat k-d-dihān
english_saheeh_international: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: فَيَومَئِذٍ لا يُسأَلُ عَن ذَنبِهِ إِنسٌ وَلا جانٌّ
blank: f-yawmaʾidh lā yusʾal ʿ dhanbihī ʾins w-lā jānn
english_saheeh_international: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ
blank: f-b-ʾayy ʾālāʾ rabbikumā tukadhdhibān
english_saheeh_international: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

arabic_uthmani: يُعرَفُ المُجرِمونَ بِسيماهُم فَيُؤخَذُ بِالنَّواصي وَالأَقدامِ
blank: yuʿraful-mujrimūn b-sīmāhum f-yuʾkhadh b-n-nawāṣī w-l-ʾaqdām
english_saheeh_international: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet

arabic_uthmani: فَبِأَيِّ آلاءِ رَبِّكُما تُكَذِّبانِ

blank: naḥn khalaqnākum f-law-lā tuṣaddiqūn
english_saheeh_international: We have created you, so why do you not believe

arabic_uthmani: أَفَرَأَيتُم ما تُمنونَ
blank: ʾ-f-raʾaytum mā tumnūn
english_saheeh_international: Have you seen that which you emit

arabic_uthmani: أَأَنتُم تَخلُقونَهُ أَم نَحنُ الخالِقونَ
blank: ʾ-ʾantum takhluqūnahū ʾam naḥnul-khāliqūn
english_saheeh_international: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator

arabic_uthmani: نَحنُ قَدَّرنا بَينَكُمُ المَوتَ وَما نَحنُ بِمَسبوقينَ
blank: naḥn qaddarnā baynakumul-mawt w-mā naḥn b-masbūqīn
english_saheeh_international: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone

arabic_uthmani: عَلىٰ أَن نُبَدِّلَ أَمثالَكُم وَنُنشِئَكُم في ما لا تَعلَمونَ
blank: ʿalā ʾ nubaddil ʾamthālakum w-nunshiʾakum fī mā lā taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that form which you do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد عَلِمتُمُ النَّشأَةَ الأولىٰ فَلَولا تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʿalimtum n-nashʾatal-ʾūlā f-law-lā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember

arabic_uthmani: أَفَرَأَيتُم ما تَحرُثونَ
blank: ʾ-f-raʾaytum mā taḥruthūn
english_saheeh_international: And have you seen that seed which you sow

arabic_uthmani: أَأَنتُم تَزرَعونَهُ أَم نَحنُ الزّارِعونَ
blank: ʾ-ʾantum tazraʿūnahū ʾam naḥn z-zāriʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower

arabic_uthmani: لَو نَشاءُ لَجَعَلناهُ حُطامًا فَظَلتُم تَفَكَّهونَ
blank: law nashāʾ l-jaʿalnāh ḥuṭām f-ẓaltum tafakkahūn
english_saheeh_international: If We willed, We could make it dry debris, and you would remain in wonder

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا لَمُغرَمونَ
blank: ʾinnā l-mughramūn
english_saheeh_international: Saying, "Indeed, we are now in debt

arabic_uthmani: بَل نَحنُ مَحرومونَ
blank: bal naḥn maḥrūmūn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, we have been deprived

arabic_uthmani: أَفَرَأَيتُمُ الماءَ الَّذي تَشرَبونَ
blank: ʾ-f-raʾaytumul-māʾalladhī tashrabūn
english_saheeh_international: And have you seen the water that you drink

arabic_uthmani: أَأَنتُم أَنزَلتُموهُ مِنَ المُزنِ أَم نَحنُ المُنزِلونَ
blank: ʾ-ʾantum ʾanzaltumūh minal-muzn ʾam naḥnul-munzilūn
english_saheeh_international: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down

arabic_uthmani: لَو نَشاءُ جَعَلناهُ أُجاجًا فَلَولا تَشكُرونَ
blank: law nashāʾ jaʿalnāh ʾujāj f-law-lā tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful

arabic_uthmani: أَفَرَأَيتُمُ النّارَ الَّتي تورونَ
blank: ʾ-f-raʾaytum n-nār llatī tūrūn
english_saheeh_international: And have you seen the fire that you ignite

arabic_uthmani: أَأَنتُم أَنشَأتُم شَجَرَتَها أَم نَحنُ المُنشِئونَ
blank: ʾ-ʾantum ʾanshaʾtum shajaratahā ʾam naḥnul-munshiʾūn
english_saheeh_international: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer

arabic_uthmani: نَحنُ جَعَلناها تَذكِرَةً وَمَتاعًا لِلمُقوينَ
blank: naḥn jaʿalnāhā tadhkirat w-matāʿ l-l-muqwīn
english_saheeh_international: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers

arabic_uthmani: فَسَبِّح بِاسمِ رَبِّكَ العَظيمِ
blank: f-sabbiḥ bism rabbikal-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great

arabic_uthmani: ۞ فَلا أُقسِمُ بِمَواقِعِ النُّجومِ
blank: f-lā ʾuqsim b-mawāqiʿ n-nujūm
english_saheeh_international: Then I swear by the setting of the stars

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لَقَسَمٌ لَو تَعلَمونَ عَظيمٌ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-qasam law taʿlamūn ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - most great

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ لَقُرآنٌ كَريمٌ
blank: ʾinnahū l-qurʾān karīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: في كِتابٍ مَكنونٍ
blank: fī kitāb maknūn
english_saheeh_international: In a Register well-protected

arabic_uthmani: لا يَمَسُّهُ إِلَّا المُطَهَّرونَ
blank: lā yamassuhū ʾillāl-muṭahharūn
english_saheeh_international: None touch it except the purified

arabic_uthmani: تَنزيلٌ مِن رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: tanzīl m rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: It is a revelation from the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: أَفَبِهٰذَا الحَديثِ أَنتُم مُدهِنونَ
blank: ʾ-f-b-hādhāl-ḥadīth ʾantum mudhinūn
english_saheeh_international: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent

arabic_uthmani: وَتَجعَلونَ رِزقَكُم أَنَّكُم تُكَذِّبونَ
blank: w-tajʿalūn rizqakum ʾannakum tukadhdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: And make the thanks for your provision that you deny the Provider

arabic_uthmani: فَلَولا إِذا بَلَغَتِ الحُلقومَ
blank: f-law-lā ʾidhā balaghatil-ḥulqūm
english_saheeh_international: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنتُم حينَئِذٍ تَنظُرونَ
blank: w-ʾantum ḥīnaʾidh tanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: And you are at that time looking on

arabic_uthmani: وَنَحنُ أَقرَبُ إِلَيهِ مِنكُم وَلٰكِن لا تُبصِرونَ
blank: w-naḥn ʾaqrab ʾilayh minkum w-lāk lā tubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see

arabic_uthmani: فَلَولا إِن كُنتُم غَيرَ مَدينينَ
blank: f-law-lā ʾ kuntum ghayr madīnīn
english_saheeh_international: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed

arabic_uthmani: تَرجِعونَها إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: tarjiʿūnahā ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Bring it back, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمّا إِن كانَ مِنَ المُقَرَّبينَ
blank: f-ʾammā ʾ kān minal-muqarrabīn
english_saheeh_international: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَرَوحٌ وَرَيحانٌ وَجَنَّتُ نَعيمٍ
blank: f-rawḥ w-rayḥān w-jannat naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Then for him is rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا إِن كانَ مِن أَصحابِ اليَمينِ
blank: w-ʾammā ʾ kān m ʾaṣḥābil-yamīn
english_saheeh_international: And if he was of the companions of the right

arabic_uthmani: فَسَلامٌ لَكَ مِن أَصحابِ اليَمينِ
blank: f-salām lak m ʾaṣḥābil-yamīn
english_saheeh_international: Then the angels will say, "Peace for you; you are from the companions of the right

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا إِن كانَ مِنَ المُكَذِّبينَ الضّالّينَ
blank: w-ʾammā ʾ kān minal-mukadhdhibīn ḍ-ḍāllīn
english_saheeh_international: But if he was of the deniers who were astray

arabic_uthmani: فَنُزُلٌ مِن حَميمٍ
blank: f-nuzul m ḥamīm
english_saheeh_international: Then for him is accommodation of scalding water

arabic_uthmani: وَتَصلِيَةُ جَحيمٍ
blank: w-taṣliyat jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And burning in Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذا لَهُوَ حَقُّ اليَقينِ
blank: ʾinn hādhā l-huw ḥaqqul-yaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, this is the true certainty

arabic_uthmani: فَسَبِّح بِاسمِ رَبِّكَ العَظيمِ
blank: f-sabbiḥ bism rabbikal-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great

arabic_uthmani: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: sabbaḥ l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: لَهُ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۖ يُحيي وَيُميتُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: lahū mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ yuḥyī w-yumīt w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الأَوَّلُ وَالآخِرُ وَالظّاهِرُ وَالباطِنُ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: huwal-ʾawwal w-l-ʾākhir w-ẓ-ẓāhir w-l-bāṭin w-huw b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ في سِتَّةِ أَيّامٍ ثُمَّ استَوىٰ عَلَى العَرشِ ۚ يَعلَمُ ما يَلِجُ فِي الأَرضِ وَما يَخرُجُ مِنها وَما يَنزِلُ مِنَ السَّماءِ وَما يَعرُجُ فيها ۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُم أَينَ ما كُنتُم ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرٌ
blank: huwalladhī khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ fī sittat ʾayyām thumm stawā ʿalāl-ʿarsh yaʿlam mā yalij fīl-ʾarḍ w-mā yakhruj minhā w-mā yanzil min s-samāʾ w-mā yaʿruj fīhā w-huw maʿakum ʾayn mā kuntum w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing

arabic_uthmani: لَهُ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرجَعُ الأُمورُ
blank: lahū mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-ʾilā llāh turjaʿul-ʾumūr
english_saheeh_international: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned all matters

arabic_uthmani: يولِجُ اللَّيلَ فِي النَّهارِ وَيولِجُ النَّهارَ فِي اللَّيلِ ۚ وَهُوَ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: yūlijul-layl fī n-nahār w-yūlij n-nahār fīl-layl w-huw ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and he is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: آمِنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ وَأَنفِقوا مِمّا جَعَلَكُم مُستَخلَفينَ فيهِ ۖ فَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مِنكُم وَأَنفَقوا لَهُم أَجرٌ كَبيرٌ
blank: ʾāminū b-llāh w-rasūlihī w-ʾanfiqū mimmā jaʿalakum mustakhlafīn fīh f-lladhīn ʾāmanū minkum w-ʾanfaqū lahum ʾajr kabīr
english_saheeh_international: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend out of that in which He has made you successors. For those who have believed among you and spent, there will be a great reward

arabic_uthmani: وَما لَكُم لا تُؤمِنونَ بِاللَّهِ ۙ وَالرَّسولُ يَدعوكُم لِتُؤمِنوا بِرَبِّكُم وَقَد أَخَذَ ميثاقَكُم إِن كُنتُم مُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-mā lakum lā tuʾminūn b-llāh w-r-rasūl yadʿūkum l-tuʾminū b-rabbikum w-qad ʾakhadh mīthāqakum ʾ kuntum muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and He has taken your covenant, if you should truly be believers

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي يُنَزِّلُ عَلىٰ عَبدِهِ آياتٍ بَيِّناتٍ لِيُخرِجَكُم مِنَ الظُّلُماتِ إِلَى النّورِ ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُم لَرَءوفٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: huwalladhī yunazzil ʿalā ʿabdihī ʾāyāt bayyināt l-yukhrijakum min ẓ-ẓulumāt ʾilā n-nūr w-ʾinn llāh bikum l-raʾūf raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: It is He who sends down upon His Servant Muhammad verses of clear evidence that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And indeed, Allah is to you Kind and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: وَما لَكُم أَلّا تُنفِقوا في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ ميراثُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ لا يَستَوي مِنكُم مَن أَنفَقَ مِن قَبلِ الفَتحِ وَقاتَلَ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ أَعظَمُ دَرَجَةً مِنَ الَّذينَ أَنفَقوا مِن بَعدُ وَقاتَلوا ۚ وَكُلًّا وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الحُسنىٰ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ خَبيرٌ
blank: w-mā lakum ʾallā tunfiqū fī sabīl llāh w-l-llāh mīrāth s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ lā yastawī minkum m ʾanfaq m qablil-fatḥ w-qātal ʾulāʾik ʾaʿẓam darajatam-minalladhīn ʾanfaqū m baʿd w-qātalū w-kull waʿad llāhul-ḥusnā w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And why do you not spend in the cause of Allah while to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Not equal among you are those who spent before the conquest of Makkah and fought and those who did so after it. Those are greater in degree than they who spent afterwards and fought. But to all Allah has promised the best reward. And Allah, with what you do, is Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: مَن ذَا الَّذي يُقرِضُ اللَّهَ قَرضًا حَسَنًا فَيُضاعِفَهُ لَهُ وَلَهُ أَجرٌ كَريمٌ
blank: m dhālladhī yuqriḍ llāh qarḍ ḥasan f-yuḍāʿifahū lahū w-lahū ʾajr karīm
english_saheeh_international: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تَرَى المُؤمِنينَ وَالمُؤمِناتِ يَسعىٰ نورُهُم بَينَ أَيديهِم وَبِأَيمانِهِم بُشراكُمُ اليَومَ جَنّاتٌ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها ۚ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: yawm tarāl-muʾminīn w-l-muʾmināt yasʿā nūruhum bayn ʾaydīhim w-b-ʾaymānihim bushrākumul-yawm jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā dhālik huwal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, it will be said, "Your good tidings today are of gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَقولُ المُنافِقونَ وَالمُنافِقاتُ لِلَّذينَ آمَنُوا انظُرونا نَقتَبِس مِن نورِكُم قيلَ ارجِعوا وَراءَكُم فَالتَمِسوا نورًا فَضُرِبَ بَينَهُم بِسورٍ لَهُ بابٌ باطِنُهُ فيهِ الرَّحمَةُ وَظاهِرُهُ مِن قِبَلِهِ العَذابُ
blank: yawm yaqūlul-munāfiqūn w-l-munāfiqāt l-lladhīn ʾāmanū nẓurūnā naqtabis m nūrikum qīl rjiʿū warāʾakum f-ltamisū nūr f-ḍurib baynahum b-sūr lahū bāb bāṭinuhū fīh r-raḥmat w-ẓāhiruhū m qibalihil-ʿadhāb
english_saheeh_international: On the same Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment

arabic_uthmani: يُنادونَهُم أَلَم نَكُن مَعَكُم ۖ قالوا بَلىٰ وَلٰكِنَّكُم فَتَنتُم أَنفُسَكُم وَتَرَبَّصتُم وَارتَبتُم وَغَرَّتكُمُ الأَمانِيُّ حَتّىٰ جاءَ أَمرُ اللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِاللَّهِ الغَرورُ
blank: yunādūnahum ʾ-lam nak maʿakum qālū balā w-lākinnakum fatantum ʾanfusakum w-tarabbaṣtum w-rtabtum w-gharratkumul-ʾamāniyy ḥattā jāʾ ʾamr llāh w-gharrakum b-llāhil-gharūr
english_saheeh_international: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited misfortune for us and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَاليَومَ لا يُؤخَذُ مِنكُم فِديَةٌ وَلا مِنَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا ۚ مَأواكُمُ النّارُ ۖ هِيَ مَولاكُم ۖ وَبِئسَ المَصيرُ
blank: f-l-yawm lā yuʾkhadh minkum fidyat w-lā minalladhīn kafarū maʾwākum n-nār hiy mawlākum w-biʾsal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَلَم يَأنِ لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا أَن تَخشَعَ قُلوبُهُم لِذِكرِ اللَّهِ وَما نَزَلَ مِنَ الحَقِّ وَلا يَكونوا كَالَّذينَ أوتُوا الكِتابَ مِن قَبلُ فَطالَ عَلَيهِمُ الأَمَدُ فَقَسَت قُلوبُهُم ۖ وَكَثيرٌ مِنهُم فاسِقونَ
blank: ʾ-lam yaʾn l-lladhīn ʾāmanū ʾ takhshaʿ qulūbuhum l-dhikr llāh w-mā nazal minal-ḥaqq w-lā yakūnū k-lladhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb m qabl f-ṭāl ʿalayhimul-ʾamad f-qasat qulūbuhum w-kathīr minhum fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: اعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يُحيِي الأَرضَ بَعدَ مَوتِها ۚ قَد بَيَّنّا لَكُمُ الآياتِ لَعَلَّكُم تَعقِلونَ
blank: iʿlamū ʾann llāh yuḥyil-ʾarḍ baʿd mawtihā qad bayyannā lakumul-ʾāyāt laʿallakum taʿqilūn
english_saheeh_international: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ المُصَّدِّقينَ وَالمُصَّدِّقاتِ وَأَقرَضُوا اللَّهَ قَرضًا حَسَنًا يُضاعَفُ لَهُم وَلَهُم أَجرٌ كَريمٌ
blank: ʾinnal-muṣṣaddiqīn w-l-muṣṣaddiqāt w-ʾaqraḍū llāh qarḍ ḥasan yuḍāʿaf lahum w-lahum ʾajr karīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and they who have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الصِّدّيقونَ ۖ وَالشُّهَداءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِم لَهُم أَجرُهُم وَنورُهُم ۖ وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا وَكَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ الجَحيمِ
blank: w-lladhīn ʾāmanū b-llāh w-rusulihī ʾulāʾik hum ṣ-ṣiddīqūn w-sh-shuhadāʾ ʿind rabbihim lahum ʾajruhum w-nūruhum w-lladhīn kafarū w-kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥābul-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are in the ranks of the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: اعلَموا أَنَّمَا الحَياةُ الدُّنيا لَعِبٌ وَلَهوٌ وَزينَةٌ وَتَفاخُرٌ بَينَكُم وَتَكاثُرٌ فِي الأَموالِ وَالأَولادِ ۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيثٍ أَعجَبَ الكُفّارَ نَباتُهُ ثُمَّ يَهيجُ فَتَراهُ مُصفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَكونُ حُطامًا ۖ وَفِي الآخِرَةِ عَذابٌ شَديدٌ وَمَغفِرَةٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضوانٌ ۚ وَمَا الحَياةُ الدُّنيا إِلّا مَتاعُ الغُرورِ
blank: iʿlamū ʾannamāl-ḥayāt d-dunyā laʿib w-lahw w-zīnat w-tafākhur baynakum w-takāthur fīl-ʾamwāl w-l-ʾawlād k-mathal ghayth ʾaʿjabal-kuffār nabātuhū thumm yahīj f-tarāh muṣfarr thumm yakūn ḥuṭām w-fīl-ʾākhirat ʿadhāb shadīd w-maghfirat min llāh w-riḍwān w-māl-ḥayāt d-dunyā ʾillā matāʿul-ghurūr
english_saheeh_international: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose resulting plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes scattered debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion

arabic_uthmani: سابِقوا إِلىٰ مَغفِرَةٍ مِن رَبِّكُم وَجَنَّةٍ عَرضُها كَعَرضِ السَّماءِ وَالأَرضِ أُعِدَّت لِلَّذينَ آمَنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِ ۚ ذٰلِكَ فَضلُ اللَّهِ يُؤتيهِ مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الفَضلِ العَظيمِ
blank: sābiqū ʾilā maghfirat m rabbikum w-jannat ʿarḍuhā k-ʿarḍ s-samāʾ w-l-ʾarḍ ʾuʿiddat l-lladhīn ʾāmanū b-llāh w-rusulihī dhālik faḍl llāh yuʾtīh m yashāʾ w-llāh dhūl-faḍlil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty

arabic_uthmani: ما أَصابَ مِن مُصيبَةٍ فِي الأَرضِ وَلا في أَنفُسِكُم إِلّا في كِتابٍ مِن قَبلِ أَن نَبرَأَها ۚ إِنَّ ذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسيرٌ
blank: mā ʾaṣāb m muṣībat fīl-ʾarḍ w-lā fī ʾanfusikum ʾillā fī kitāb m qabl ʾ nabraʾahā ʾinn dhālik ʿalā llāh yasīr
english_saheeh_international: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah, is easy

arabic_uthmani: لِكَيلا تَأسَوا عَلىٰ ما فاتَكُم وَلا تَفرَحوا بِما آتاكُم ۗ وَاللَّهُ لا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُختالٍ فَخورٍ
blank: l-kay-lā taʾsaw ʿalā mā fātakum w-lā tafraḥū b-mā ʾātākum w-llāh lā yuḥibb kull mukhtāl fakhūr-
english_saheeh_international: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult in pride over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يَبخَلونَ وَيَأمُرونَ النّاسَ بِالبُخلِ ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الغَنِيُّ الحَميدُ
blank: alladhīn yabkhalūn w-yaʾmurūn n-nās b-l-bukhl w-m yatawall f-ʾinn llāh huwal-ghaniyyul-ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: Those who are stingy and enjoin upon people stinginess. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد أَرسَلنا رُسُلَنا بِالبَيِّناتِ وَأَنزَلنا مَعَهُمُ الكِتابَ وَالميزانَ لِيَقومَ النّاسُ بِالقِسطِ ۖ وَأَنزَلنَا الحَديدَ فيهِ بَأسٌ شَديدٌ وَمَنافِعُ لِلنّاسِ وَلِيَعلَمَ اللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُ وَرُسُلَهُ بِالغَيبِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزيزٌ
blank: l-qad ʾarsalnā rusulanā b-l-bayyināt w-ʾanzalnā maʿahumul-kitāb w-l-mīzān l-yaqūm n-nās b-l-qisṭ w-ʾanzalnāl-ḥadīd fīh baʾs shadīd w-manāfiʿ l-n-nās w-l-yaʿlam llāh m yanṣuruhū w-rusulahū b-l-ghayb ʾinn llāh qawiyy ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain their affairs in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد أَرسَلنا نوحًا وَإِبراهيمَ وَجَعَلنا في ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا النُّبُوَّةَ وَالكِتابَ ۖ فَمِنهُم مُهتَدٍ ۖ وَكَثيرٌ مِنهُم فاسِقونَ
blank: w-l-qad ʾarsalnā nūḥ w-ʾibrāhīm w-jaʿalnā fī dhurriyyatihimā n-nubuwwat w-l-kitāb f-minhum muhtad w-kathīr minhum fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ قَفَّينا عَلىٰ آثارِهِم بِرُسُلِنا وَقَفَّينا بِعيسَى ابنِ مَريَمَ وَآتَيناهُ الإِنجيلَ وَجَعَلنا في قُلوبِ الَّذينَ اتَّبَعوهُ رَأفَةً وَرَحمَةً وَرَهبانِيَّةً ابتَدَعوها ما كَتَبناها عَلَيهِم إِلَّا ابتِغاءَ رِضوانِ اللَّهِ فَما رَعَوها حَقَّ رِعايَتِها ۖ فَآتَينَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا مِنهُم أَجرَهُم ۖ وَكَثيرٌ مِنهُم فاسِقونَ
blank: thumm qaffaynā ʿalā ʾāthārihim b-rusulinā w-qaffaynā b-ʿīsā bn maryam w-ʾātaynāhul-ʾinjīl w-jaʿalnā fī qulūbilladhīn ttabaʿūh raʾfat w-raḥmat w-rahbāniyyat- btadaʿūhā mā katabnāhā ʿalayhim ʾillā btighāʾ riḍwān llāh f-mā raʿawhā ḥaqq riʿāyatihā f-ʾātaynālladhīn ʾāmanū minhum ʾajrahum w-kathīr minhum fāsiqūn
english_saheeh_international: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed them with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except that they did so seeking the approval of Allah. But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَآمِنوا بِرَسولِهِ يُؤتِكُم كِفلَينِ مِن رَحمَتِهِ وَيَجعَل لَكُم نورًا تَمشونَ بِهِ وَيَغفِر لَكُم ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ttaqū llāh w-ʾāminū b-rasūlihī yuʾtikum kiflayn m raḥmatihī w-yajʿal lakum nūr tamshūn bihī w-yaghfir lakum w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will then give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: لِئَلّا يَعلَمَ أَهلُ الكِتابِ أَلّا يَقدِرونَ عَلىٰ شَيءٍ مِن فَضلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ الفَضلَ بِيَدِ اللَّهِ يُؤتيهِ مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الفَضلِ العَظيمِ
blank: l-ʾallā yaʿlam ʾahlul-kitāb ʾallā yaqdirūn ʿalā shayʾ m faḍl llāh w-ʾannal-faḍl b-yad llāh yuʾtīh m yashāʾ w-llāh dhūl-faḍlil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: This is so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able to obtain anything from the bounty of Allah and that all bounty is in the hand of Allah; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty

arabic_uthmani: قَد سَمِعَ اللَّهُ قَولَ الَّتي تُجادِلُكَ في زَوجِها وَتَشتَكي إِلَى اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ يَسمَعُ تَحاوُرَكُما ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَميعٌ بَصيرٌ
blank: qad samiʿ llāh qawl llatī tujādiluk fī zawjihā w-tashtakī ʾilā llāh w-llāh yasmaʿ taḥāwurakumā ʾinn llāh samīʿ baṣīr-
english_saheeh_international: Certainly has Allah heard the speech of the one who argues with you, O Muhammad, concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah. And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُظاهِرونَ مِنكُم مِن نِسائِهِم ما هُنَّ أُمَّهاتِهِم ۖ إِن أُمَّهاتُهُم إِلَّا اللّائي وَلَدنَهُم ۚ وَإِنَّهُم لَيَقولونَ مُنكَرًا مِنَ القَولِ وَزورًا ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفورٌ
blank: alladhīn yuẓāhirūn minkum m nisāʾihim mā hunn ʾummahātihim ʾ ʾummahātuhum ʾillā llāʾī waladnahum w-ʾinnahum l-yaqūlūn munkaram-minal-qawl w-zūr w-ʾinn llāh l-ʿafuww ghafūr
english_saheeh_international: Those who pronounce thihar among you to separate from their wives - they are not consequently their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يُظاهِرونَ مِن نِسائِهِم ثُمَّ يَعودونَ لِما قالوا فَتَحريرُ رَقَبَةٍ مِن قَبلِ أَن يَتَماسّا ۚ ذٰلِكُم توعَظونَ بِهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ خَبيرٌ
blank: w-lladhīn yuẓāhirūn m nisāʾihim thumm yaʿūdūn l-mā qālū f-taḥrīr raqabat m qabl ʾ yatamāssā dhālikum tūʿaẓūn bihī w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then wish to go back on what they said - then there must be the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن لَم يَجِد فَصِيامُ شَهرَينِ مُتَتابِعَينِ مِن قَبلِ أَن يَتَماسّا ۖ فَمَن لَم يَستَطِع فَإِطعامُ سِتّينَ مِسكينًا ۚ ذٰلِكَ لِتُؤمِنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ ۚ وَتِلكَ حُدودُ اللَّهِ ۗ وَلِلكافِرينَ عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: f-m lam yajid f-ṣiyām shahrayn mutatābiʿayn m qabl ʾ yatamāssā f-m lam yastaṭiʿ f-ʾiṭʿām sittīn miskīn dhālik l-tuʾminū b-llāh w-rasūlihī w-tilk ḥudūd llāh w-l-l-kāfirīn ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And he who does not find a slave - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe completely in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits set by Allah. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يُحادّونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ كُبِتوا كَما كُبِتَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم ۚ وَقَد أَنزَلنا آياتٍ بَيِّناتٍ ۚ وَلِلكافِرينَ عَذابٌ مُهينٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yuḥāddūn llāh w-rasūlahū kubitū k-mā kubitalladhīn m qablihim w-qad ʾanzalnā ʾāyāt bayyināt w-l-l-kāfirīn ʿadhāb muhīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَبعَثُهُمُ اللَّهُ جَميعًا فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِما عَمِلوا ۚ أَحصاهُ اللَّهُ وَنَسوهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ شَهيدٌ
blank: yawm yabʿathuhum llāh jamīʿ f-yunabbiʾuhum b-mā ʿamilū ʾaḥṣāh llāh w-nasūh w-llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ shahīd
english_saheeh_international: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعلَمُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۖ ما يَكونُ مِن نَجوىٰ ثَلاثَةٍ إِلّا هُوَ رابِعُهُم وَلا خَمسَةٍ إِلّا هُوَ سادِسُهُم وَلا أَدنىٰ مِن ذٰلِكَ وَلا أَكثَرَ إِلّا هُوَ مَعَهُم أَينَ ما كانوا ۖ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِما عَمِلوا يَومَ القِيامَةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾann llāh yaʿlam mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ mā yakūn m najwā thalāthat ʾillā huw rābiʿuhum w-lā khamsat ʾillā huw sādisuhum w-lā ʾadnā m dhālik w-lā ʾakthar ʾillā huw maʿahum ʾayn mā kānū thumm yunabbiʾuhum b-mā ʿamilū yawmal-qiyāmat ʾinn llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them in knowledge wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ إِلَى الَّذينَ نُهوا عَنِ النَّجوىٰ ثُمَّ يَعودونَ لِما نُهوا عَنهُ وَيَتَناجَونَ بِالإِثمِ وَالعُدوانِ وَمَعصِيَتِ الرَّسولِ وَإِذا جاءوكَ حَيَّوكَ بِما لَم يُحَيِّكَ بِهِ اللَّهُ وَيَقولونَ في أَنفُسِهِم لَولا يُعَذِّبُنَا اللَّهُ بِما نَقولُ ۚ حَسبُهُم جَهَنَّمُ يَصلَونَها ۖ فَبِئسَ المَصيرُ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾilālladhīn nuhū ʿan n-najwā thumm yaʿūdūn l-mā nuhū ʿanh w-yatanājawn b-l-ʾithm w-l-ʿudwān w-maʿṣiyat r-rasūl w-ʾidhā jāʾūk ḥayyawk b-mā lam yuḥayyik bih llāh w-yaqūlūn fī ʾanfusihim law-lā yuʿadhdhibunā llāh b-mā naqūl ḥasbuhum jahannam yaṣlawnahā f-biʾsal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that word by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will enter to burn, and wretched is the destination

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِذا تَناجَيتُم فَلا تَتَناجَوا بِالإِثمِ وَالعُدوانِ وَمَعصِيَتِ الرَّسولِ وَتَناجَوا بِالبِرِّ وَالتَّقوىٰ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ الَّذي إِلَيهِ تُحشَرونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾidhā tanājaytum f-lā tatanājaw b-l-ʾithm w-l-ʿudwān w-maʿṣiyat r-rasūl w-tanājaw b-l-birr w-t-taqwā w-ttaqū llāhalladhī ʾilayh tuḥsharūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah, to whom you will be gathered

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّمَا النَّجوىٰ مِنَ الشَّيطانِ لِيَحزُنَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَلَيسَ بِضارِّهِم شَيئًا إِلّا بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَليَتَوَكَّلِ المُؤمِنونَ
blank: ʾinnamā n-najwā min sh-shayṭān l-yaḥzunalladhīn ʾāmanū w-lays b-ḍārrihim shayʾ ʾillā b-ʾidhn llāh w-ʿalā llāh f-l-yatawakkalil-muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِذا قيلَ لَكُم تَفَسَّحوا فِي المَجالِسِ فَافسَحوا يَفسَحِ اللَّهُ لَكُم ۖ وَإِذا قيلَ انشُزوا فَانشُزوا يَرفَعِ اللَّهُ الَّذينَ آمَنوا مِنكُم وَالَّذينَ أوتُوا العِلمَ دَرَجاتٍ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ خَبيرٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾidhā qīl lakum tafassaḥū fīl-majālis f-fsaḥū yafsaḥ llāh lakum w-ʾidhā qīl nshuzū f-nshuzū yarfaʿ llāhulladhīn ʾāmanū minkum w-lladhīn ʾūtūl-ʿilm darajāt w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn khabīr
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِذا ناجَيتُمُ الرَّسولَ فَقَدِّموا بَينَ يَدَي نَجواكُم صَدَقَةً ۚ ذٰلِكَ خَيرٌ لَكُم وَأَطهَرُ ۚ فَإِن لَم تَجِدوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾidhā nājaytum r-rasūl f-qaddimū bayn yaday najwākum ṣadaqat dhālik khayr lakum w-ʾaṭhar f-ʾ lam tajidū f-ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, when you wish to privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not the means - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: أَأَشفَقتُم أَن تُقَدِّموا بَينَ يَدَي نَجواكُم صَدَقاتٍ ۚ فَإِذ لَم تَفعَلوا وَتابَ اللَّهُ عَلَيكُم فَأَقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكاةَ وَأَطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ خَبيرٌ بِما تَعمَلونَ
blank: ʾ-ʾashfaqtum ʾ tuqaddimū bayn yaday najwākum ṣadaqāt f-ʾidh lam tafʿalū w-tāb llāh ʿalaykum f-ʾaqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātū z-zakāt w-ʾaṭīʿū llāh w-rasūlahū w-llāh khabīr b-mā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then at least establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَلَم تَرَ إِلَى الَّذينَ تَوَلَّوا قَومًا غَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيهِم ما هُم مِنكُم وَلا مِنهُم وَيَحلِفونَ عَلَى الكَذِبِ وَهُم يَعلَمونَ
blank: ʾ-lam tar ʾilālladhīn tawallaw qawm ghaḍib llāh ʿalayhim mā hum minkum w-lā minhum w-yaḥlifūn ʿalāl-kadhib w-hum yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know they are lying

arabic_uthmani: أَعَدَّ اللَّهُ لَهُم عَذابًا شَديدًا ۖ إِنَّهُم ساءَ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: ʾaʿadd llāh lahum ʿadhāb shadīd ʾinnahum sāʾ mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing

arabic_uthmani: اتَّخَذوا أَيمانَهُم جُنَّةً فَصَدّوا عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُم عَذابٌ مُهينٌ
blank: ittakhadhū ʾaymānahum junnat f-ṣaddū ʿ sabīl llāh f-lahum ʿadhāb muhīn
english_saheeh_international: They took their false oaths as a cover, so they averted people from the way of Allah, and for them is a humiliating punishment

arabic_uthmani: لَن تُغنِيَ عَنهُم أَموالُهُم وَلا أَولادُهُم مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيئًا ۚ أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ النّارِ ۖ هُم فيها خالِدونَ
blank: l tughniy ʿanhum ʾamwāluhum w-lā ʾawlāduhum min llāh shayʾ ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥāb n-nār hum fīhā khālidūn
english_saheeh_international: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَبعَثُهُمُ اللَّهُ جَميعًا فَيَحلِفونَ لَهُ كَما يَحلِفونَ لَكُم ۖ وَيَحسَبونَ أَنَّهُم عَلىٰ شَيءٍ ۚ أَلا إِنَّهُم هُمُ الكاذِبونَ
blank: yawm yabʿathuhum llāh jamīʿ f-yaḥlifūn lahū k-mā yaḥlifūn lakum w-yaḥsabūn ʾannahum ʿalā shayʾ ʾ-lā ʾinnahum humul-kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are standing on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars

arabic_uthmani: استَحوَذَ عَلَيهِمُ الشَّيطانُ فَأَنساهُم ذِكرَ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ حِزبُ الشَّيطانِ ۚ أَلا إِنَّ حِزبَ الشَّيطانِ هُمُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: istaḥwadh ʿalayhim sh-shayṭān f-ʾansāhum dhikr llāh ʾulāʾik ḥizb sh-shayṭān ʾ-lā ʾinn ḥizb sh-shayṭān humul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يُحادّونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ أُولٰئِكَ فِي الأَذَلّينَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yuḥāddūn llāh w-rasūlahū ʾulāʾik fīl-ʾadhallīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled

arabic_uthmani: كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَأَغلِبَنَّ أَنا وَرُسُلي ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزيزٌ
blank: katab llāh l-ʾaghlibann ʾan w-rusulī ʾinn llāh qawiyy ʿazīz
english_saheeh_international: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might

arabic_uthmani: لا تَجِدُ قَومًا يُؤمِنونَ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ يُوادّونَ مَن حادَّ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ وَلَو كانوا آباءَهُم أَو أَبناءَهُم أَو إِخوانَهُم أَو عَشيرَتَهُم ۚ أُولٰئِكَ كَتَبَ في قُلوبِهِمُ الإيمانَ وَأَيَّدَهُم بِروحٍ مِنهُ ۖ وَيُدخِلُهُم جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها ۚ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنهُم وَرَضوا عَنهُ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ حِزبُ اللَّهِ ۚ أَلا إِنَّ حِزبَ اللَّهِ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: lā tajid qawm yuʾminūn b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir yuwāddūn m ḥādd llāh w-rasūlahū w-law kānū ʾābāʾahum ʾaw ʾabnāʾahum ʾaw ʾikhwānahum ʾaw ʿashīratahum ʾulāʾik katab fī qulūbihimul-ʾīmān w-ʾayyadahum b-rūḥ minh w-yudkhiluhum jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā raḍiy llāh ʿanhum w-raḍū ʿanh ʾulāʾik ḥizb llāh ʾ-lā ʾinn ḥizb llāh humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. Those - He has decreed within their hearts faith and supported them with spirit from Him. And We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah. Unquestionably, the party of Allah - they are the successful

arabic_uthmani: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۖ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: sabbaḥ l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي أَخرَجَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِن أَهلِ الكِتابِ مِن دِيارِهِم لِأَوَّلِ الحَشرِ ۚ ما ظَنَنتُم أَن يَخرُجوا ۖ وَظَنّوا أَنَّهُم مانِعَتُهُم حُصونُهُم مِنَ اللَّهِ فَأَتاهُمُ اللَّهُ مِن حَيثُ لَم يَحتَسِبوا ۖ وَقَذَفَ في قُلوبِهِمُ الرُّعبَ ۚ يُخرِبونَ بُيوتَهُم بِأَيديهِم وَأَيدِي المُؤمِنينَ فَاعتَبِروا يا أُولِي الأَبصارِ
blank: huwalladhī ʾakhrajalladhīn kafarū m ʾahlil-kitāb m diyārihim l-ʾawwalil-ḥashr mā ẓanantum ʾ yakhrujū w-ẓannū ʾannahum māniʿatuhum ḥuṣūnuhum min llāh f-ʾatāhum llāh m ḥayth lam yaḥtasibū w-qadhaf fī qulūbihim r-ruʿb yukhribūn buyūtahum b-ʾaydīhim w-ʾaydīl-muʾminīn f-ʿtabirū yā-ʾulīl-ʾabṣār
english_saheeh_international: It is He who expelled the ones who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture from their homes at the first gathering. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but the decree of Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts so they destroyed their houses by their own hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision

arabic_uthmani: وَلَولا أَن كَتَبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيهِمُ الجَلاءَ لَعَذَّبَهُم فِي الدُّنيا ۖ وَلَهُم فِي الآخِرَةِ عَذابُ النّارِ
blank: w-law-lā ʾ katab llāh ʿalayhimul-jalāʾ l-ʿadhdhabahum fī d-dunyā w-lahum fīl-ʾākhirat ʿadhāb n-nār
english_saheeh_international: And if not that Allah had decreed for them evacuation, He would have punished them in this world, and for them in the Hereafter is the punishment of the Fire

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم شاقُّوا اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ ۖ وَمَن يُشاقِّ اللَّهَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahum shāqqū llāh w-rasūlahū w-m yushāqq llāh f-ʾinn llāh shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty

arabic_uthmani: ما قَطَعتُم مِن لينَةٍ أَو تَرَكتُموها قائِمَةً عَلىٰ أُصولِها فَبِإِذنِ اللَّهِ وَلِيُخزِيَ الفاسِقينَ
blank: mā qaṭaʿtum m līnat ʾaw taraktumūhā qāʾimat ʿalā ʾuṣūlihā f-b-ʾidhn llāh w-l-yukhziyal-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Whatever you have cut down of their palm trees or left standing on their trunks - it was by permission of Allah and so He would disgrace the defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَفاءَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ رَسولِهِ مِنهُم فَما أَوجَفتُم عَلَيهِ مِن خَيلٍ وَلا رِكابٍ وَلٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُ عَلىٰ مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: w-mā ʾafāʾ llāh ʿalā rasūlihī minhum f-mā ʾawjaftum ʿalayh m khayl w-lā rikāb w-lākinn llāh yusalliṭ rusulahū ʿalā m yashāʾ w-llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: And what Allah restored of property to His Messenger from them - you did not spur for it in an expedition any horses or camels, but Allah gives His messengers power over whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: ما أَفاءَ اللَّهُ عَلىٰ رَسولِهِ مِن أَهلِ القُرىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسولِ وَلِذِي القُربىٰ وَاليَتامىٰ وَالمَساكينِ وَابنِ السَّبيلِ كَي لا يَكونَ دولَةً بَينَ الأَغنِياءِ مِنكُم ۚ وَما آتاكُمُ الرَّسولُ فَخُذوهُ وَما نَهاكُم عَنهُ فَانتَهوا ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ شَديدُ العِقابِ
blank: mā ʾafāʾ llāh ʿalā rasūlihī m ʾahlil-qurā f-l-llāh w-l-r-rasūl w-l-dhīl-qurbā w-l-yatāmā w-l-masākīn w-bn s-sabīl kay lā yakūn dūlat baynal-ʾaghniyāʾ minkum w-mā ʾātākum r-rasūl f-khudhūh w-mā nahākum ʿanh f-ntahū w-ttaqū llāh ʾinn llāh shadīdul-ʿiqāb
english_saheeh_international: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for his near relatives and orphans and the stranded traveler - so that it will not be a perpetual distribution among the rich from among you. And whatever the Messenger has given you - take; and what he has forbidden you - refrain from. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty

arabic_uthmani: لِلفُقَراءِ المُهاجِرينَ الَّذينَ أُخرِجوا مِن دِيارِهِم وَأَموالِهِم يَبتَغونَ فَضلًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضوانًا وَيَنصُرونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ ۚ أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الصّادِقونَ
blank: l-l-fuqarāʾil-muhājirīnalladhīn ʾukhrijū m diyārihim w-ʾamwālihim yabtaghūn faḍlam-min llāh w-riḍwān w-yanṣurūn llāh w-rasūlahū ʾulāʾik hum ṣ-ṣādiqūn
english_saheeh_international: For the poor emigrants who were expelled from their homes and their properties, seeking bounty from Allah and His approval and supporting Allah and His Messenger, there is also a share. Those are the truthful

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ تَبَوَّءُوا الدّارَ وَالإيمانَ مِن قَبلِهِم يُحِبّونَ مَن هاجَرَ إِلَيهِم وَلا يَجِدونَ في صُدورِهِم حاجَةً مِمّا أوتوا وَيُؤثِرونَ عَلىٰ أَنفُسِهِم وَلَو كانَ بِهِم خَصاصَةٌ ۚ وَمَن يوقَ شُحَّ نَفسِهِ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: w-lladhīn tabawwaʾū d-dār w-l-ʾīmān m qablihim yuḥibbūn m hājar ʾilayhim w-lā yajidūn fī ṣudūrihim ḥājatam-mimmā ʾūtū w-yuʾthirūn ʿalā ʾanfusihim w-law kān bihim khaṣāṣat w-m yūq shuḥḥ nafsihī f-ʾulāʾik humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And also for those who were settled in al-Madinah and adopted the faith before them. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful

english_saheeh_international: And there is a share for those who came after them, saying, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and put not in our hearts any resentment toward those who have believed. Our Lord, indeed You are Kind and Merciful

english_saheeh_international: Have you not considered those who practice hypocrisy, saying to their brothers who have disbelieved among the People of the Scripture, "If you are expelled, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey, in regard to you, anyone - ever; and if you are fought, we will surely aid you." blank: l-ʾ ʾukhrijū lā yakhrujūn maʿahum w-l-ʾ qūtilū lā yanṣurūnahum w-l-ʾ naṣarūhum l-yuwallunnal-ʾadbār thumm lā yunṣarūn
english_saheeh_international: If they are expelled, they will not leave with them, and if they are fought, they will not aid them. And even if they should aid them, they will surely turn their backs; then thereafter they will not be aided

blank: l-ʾantum ʾashadd rahbat fī ṣudūrihim min llāh dhālik b-ʾannahum qawm lā yafqahūn
english_saheeh_international: You believers are more fearful within their breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who do not understand

english_saheeh_international: They will not fight you all except within fortified cities or from behind walls. Their violence among themselves is severe. You think they are together, but their hearts are diverse. That is because they are a people who do not reason

blank: k-mathalilladhīn m qablihim qarīb dhāqū wabāl ʾamrihim w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Theirs is like the example of those shortly before them: they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment

blank: k-mathal sh-shayṭān ʾidh qāl l-l-ʾinsān kfur f-lammā kafar qāl ʾinnī barīʾ mink ʾinnī ʾakhāf llāh rabbal-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: The hypocrites are like the example of Satan when he says to man, "Disbelieve." But when he disbelieves, he says, "Indeed, I am disassociated from you. Indeed, I fear Allah, Lord of the worlds

english_saheeh_international: So the outcome for both of them is that they will be in the Fire, abiding eternally therein. And that is the recompense of the wrong-doers

english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, fear Allah. And let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow - and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do

english_saheeh_international: And be not like those who forgot Allah, so He made them forget themselves. Those are the defiantly disobedient

arabic_uthmani: لا يَستَوي أَصحابُ النّارِ وَأَصحابُ الجَنَّةِ ۚ أَصحابُ الجَنَّةِ هُمُ الفائِزونَ

english_saheeh_international: Not equal are the companions of the Fire and the companions of Paradise. The companions of Paradise - they are the attainers of success

english_saheeh_international: If We had sent down this Qur'an upon a mountain, you would have seen it humbled and coming apart from fear of Allah. And these examples We present to the people that perhaps they will give thought

english_saheeh_international: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed. He is the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful

english_saheeh_international: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior. Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him

english_saheeh_international: He is Allah, the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner; to Him belong the best names. Whatever is in the heavens and earth is exalting Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā tattakhidhū ʿaduwwī w-ʿaduwwakum ʾawliyyāʾ tulqūn ʾilayhim b-l-mawaddat w-qad kafarū b-mā jāʾakum minal-ḥaqq yukhrijūn r-rasūl w-ʾiyyākum ʾ tuʾminū b-llāh rabbikum ʾ kuntum kharajtum jihād fī sabīlī w-btighāʾ marḍātī tusirrūn ʾilayhim b-l-mawaddat w-ʾan ʾaʿlam b-mā ʾakhfaytum w-mā ʾaʿlantum w-m yafʿalh minkum f-qad ḍall sawāʾ s-sabīl
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not take My enemies and your enemies as allies, extending to them affection while they have disbelieved in what came to you of the truth, having driven out the Prophet and yourselves only because you believe in Allah, your Lord. blank: ʾ yathqafūkum yakūnū lakum ʾaʿdāʾ w-yabsuṭū ʾilaykum ʾaydiyahum w-ʾalsinatahum b-s-sūʾ w-waddū law takfurūn
english_saheeh_international: If they gain dominance over you, they would be to you as enemies and extend against you their hands and their tongues with evil, and they wish you would disbelieve

blank: l tanfaʿakum ʾarḥāmukum w-lā ʾawlādukum yawmal-qiyāmat yafṣil baynakum w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Never will your relatives or your children benefit you; the Day of Resurrection He will judge between you. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing

blank: qad kānat lakum ʾuswat ḥasanat fī ʾibrāhīm w-lladhīn maʿahū ʾidh qālū l-qawmihim ʾinnā buraʾāʾ minkum w-mimmā taʿbudūn m dūn llāh kafarnā bikum w-badā baynanā w-baynakumul-ʿadāwat w-l-baghḍāʾ ʾabad ḥattā tuʾminū b-llāh waḥdahū ʾillā qawl ʾibrāhīm l-ʾabīh l-ʾastaghfirann lak w-mā ʾamlik lak min llāh m shayʾ rabbanā ʿalayk tawakkalnā w-ʾilayk ʾanabnā w-ʾilaykal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: There has already been for you an excellent pattern in Abraham and those with him, when they said to their people, "Indeed, we are disassociated from you and from whatever you worship other than Allah. Our Lord, upon You we have relied, and to You we have returned, and to You is the destination

arabic_uthmani: رَبَّنا لا تَجعَلنا فِتنَةً لِلَّذينَ كَفَروا وَاغفِر لَنا رَبَّنا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ

english_saheeh_international: Our Lord, make us not objects of torment for the disbelievers and forgive us, our Lord. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise
