blank: l-qad kān lakum fīhim ʾuswat ḥasanat l-m kān yarjū llāh w-l-yawmal-ʾākhir w-m yatawall f-ʾinn llāh huwal-ghaniyyul-ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: There has certainly been for you in them an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: ۞ عَسَى اللَّهُ أَن يَجعَلَ بَينَكُم وَبَينَ الَّذينَ عادَيتُم مِنهُم مَوَدَّةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ قَديرٌ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: ʿasā llāh ʿ yajʿal baynakum w-baynalladhīn ʿādaytum minhum mawaddat w-llāh qadīr w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Perhaps Allah will put, between you and those to whom you have been enemies among them, affection. And Allah is competent, and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: لا يَنهاكُمُ اللَّهُ عَنِ الَّذينَ لَم يُقاتِلوكُم فِي الدّينِ وَلَم يُخرِجوكُم مِن دِيارِكُم أَن تَبَرّوهُم وَتُقسِطوا إِلَيهِم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ المُقسِطينَ
blank: lā yanhākum llāh ʿanilladhīn lam yuqātilūkum fī d-dīn w-lam yukhrijūkum m diyārikum ʾ tabarrūhum w-tuqsiṭū ʾilayhim ʾinn llāh yuḥibbul-muqsiṭīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes - from being righteous toward them and acting justly toward them. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما يَنهاكُمُ اللَّهُ عَنِ الَّذينَ قاتَلوكُم فِي الدّينِ وَأَخرَجوكُم مِن دِيارِكُم وَظاهَروا عَلىٰ إِخراجِكُم أَن تَوَلَّوهُم ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّهُم فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الظّالِمونَ
blank: ʾinnamā yanhākum llāh ʿanilladhīn qātalūkum fī d-dīn w-ʾakhrajūkum m diyārikum w-ẓāharū ʿalā ʾikhrājikum ʾ tawallawhum w-m yatawallahum f-ʾulāʾik hum ẓ-ẓālimūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah only forbids you from those who fight you because of religion and expel you from your homes and aid in your expulsion - forbids that you make allies of them. And whoever makes allies of them, then it is those who are the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِذا جاءَكُمُ المُؤمِناتُ مُهاجِراتٍ فَامتَحِنوهُنَّ ۖ اللَّهُ أَعلَمُ بِإيمانِهِنَّ ۖ فَإِن عَلِمتُموهُنَّ مُؤمِناتٍ فَلا تَرجِعوهُنَّ إِلَى الكُفّارِ ۖ لا هُنَّ حِلٌّ لَهُم وَلا هُم يَحِلّونَ لَهُنَّ ۖ وَآتوهُم ما أَنفَقوا ۚ وَلا جُناحَ عَلَيكُم أَن تَنكِحوهُنَّ إِذا آتَيتُموهُنَّ أُجورَهُنَّ ۚ وَلا تُمسِكوا بِعِصَمِ الكَوافِرِ وَاسأَلوا ما أَنفَقتُم وَليَسأَلوا ما أَنفَقوا ۚ ذٰلِكُم حُكمُ اللَّهِ ۖ يَحكُمُ بَينَكُم ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ حَكيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾidhā jāʾakumul-muʾmināt muhājirāt f-mtaḥinūhunn llāh ʾaʿlam b-ʾīmānihinn f-ʾ ʿalimtumūhunn muʾmināt f-lā tarjiʿūhunn ʾilāl-kuffār lā hunn ḥill lahum w-lā hum yaḥillūn lahunn w-ʾātūhum mā ʾanfaqū w-lā junāḥ ʿalaykum ʾ tankiḥūhunn ʾidhā ʾātaytumūhunn ʾujūrahunn w-lā tumsikū b-ʿiṣamil-kawāfir w-sʾalū mā ʾanfaqtum w-l-yasʾalū mā ʾanfaqū dhālikum ḥukm llāh yaḥkum baynakum w-llāh ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, when the believing women come to you as emigrants, examine them. Allah is most knowing as to their faith. And if you know them to be believers, then do not return them to the disbelievers; they are not lawful wives for them, nor are they lawful husbands for them. But give the disbelievers what they have spent. And there is no blame upon you if you marry them when you have given them their due compensation. And hold not to marriage bonds with disbelieving women, but ask for what you have spent and let them ask for what they have spent. That is the judgement of Allah; He judges between you. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن فاتَكُم شَيءٌ مِن أَزواجِكُم إِلَى الكُفّارِ فَعاقَبتُم فَآتُوا الَّذينَ ذَهَبَت أَزواجُهُم مِثلَ ما أَنفَقوا ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ الَّذي أَنتُم بِهِ مُؤمِنونَ
blank: w-ʾ fātakum shayʾ m ʾazwājikum ʾilāl-kuffār f-ʿāqabtum f-ʾātūlladhīn dhahabat ʾazwājuhum mithl mā ʾanfaqū w-ttaqū llāhalladhī ʾantum bihī muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And if you have lost any of your wives to the disbelievers and you subsequently obtain something, then give those whose wives have gone the equivalent of what they had spent. And fear Allah, in whom you are believers

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ إِذا جاءَكَ المُؤمِناتُ يُبايِعنَكَ عَلىٰ أَن لا يُشرِكنَ بِاللَّهِ شَيئًا وَلا يَسرِقنَ وَلا يَزنينَ وَلا يَقتُلنَ أَولادَهُنَّ وَلا يَأتينَ بِبُهتانٍ يَفتَرينَهُ بَينَ أَيديهِنَّ وَأَرجُلِهِنَّ وَلا يَعصينَكَ في مَعروفٍ ۙ فَبايِعهُنَّ وَاستَغفِر لَهُنَّ اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy ʾidhā jāʾakal-muʾmināt yubāyiʿnak ʿalā ʾ lā yushrikn b-llāh shayʾ w-lā yasriqn w-lā yaznīn w-lā yaqtuln ʾawlādahunn w-lā yaʾtīn b-buhtān yaftarīnahū bayn ʾaydīhinn w-ʾarjulihinn w-lā yaʿṣīnak fī maʿrūf f-bāyiʿhunn w-staghfir lahunn llāh ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, when the believing women come to you pledging to you that they will not associate anything with Allah, nor will they steal, nor will they commit unlawful sexual intercourse, nor will they kill their children, nor will they bring forth a slander they have invented between their arms and legs, nor will they disobey you in what is right - then accept their pledge and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تَتَوَلَّوا قَومًا غَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيهِم قَد يَئِسوا مِنَ الآخِرَةِ كَما يَئِسَ الكُفّارُ مِن أَصحابِ القُبورِ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā tatawallaw qawm ghaḍib llāh ʿalayhim qad yaʾisū minal-ʾākhirat k-mā yaʾisal-kuffār m ʾaṣḥābil-qubūr
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, do not make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry. They have despaired of reward in the Hereafter just as the disbelievers have despaired of meeting the inhabitants of the graves

arabic_uthmani: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۖ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: sabbaḥ l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لِمَ تَقولونَ ما لا تَفعَلونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū l-m taqūlūn mā lā tafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, why do you say what you do not do

arabic_uthmani: كَبُرَ مَقتًا عِندَ اللَّهِ أَن تَقولوا ما لا تَفعَلونَ
blank: kabur maqt ʿind llāh ʾ taqūlū mā lā tafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: Great is hatred in the sight of Allah that you say what you do not do

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الَّذينَ يُقاتِلونَ في سَبيلِهِ صَفًّا كَأَنَّهُم بُنيانٌ مَرصوصٌ
blank: ʾinn llāh yuḥibbulladhīn yuqātilūn fī sabīlihī ṣaff k-ʾannahum bunyān marṣūṣ
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row as though they are a single structure joined firmly

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ موسىٰ لِقَومِهِ يا قَومِ لِمَ تُؤذونَني وَقَد تَعلَمونَ أَنّي رَسولُ اللَّهِ إِلَيكُم ۖ فَلَمّا زاغوا أَزاغَ اللَّهُ قُلوبَهُم ۚ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الفاسِقينَ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl mūsā l-qawmihī yā-qawm l-m tuʾdhūnanī w-qad taʿlamūn ʾannī rasūl llāh ʾilaykum f-lammā zāghū ʾazāgh llāh qulūbahum w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawmal-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention, O Muhammad, when Moses said to his people, "O my people, why do you harm me while you certainly know that I am the messenger of Allah to you?" And when they deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ قالَ عيسَى ابنُ مَريَمَ يا بَني إِسرائيلَ إِنّي رَسولُ اللَّهِ إِلَيكُم مُصَدِّقًا لِما بَينَ يَدَيَّ مِنَ التَّوراةِ وَمُبَشِّرًا بِرَسولٍ يَأتي مِن بَعدِي اسمُهُ أَحمَدُ ۖ فَلَمّا جاءَهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ قالوا هٰذا سِحرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: w-ʾidh qāl ʿīsā bn maryam yā-banī ʾisrāʾīl ʾinnī rasūl llāh ʾilaykum muṣaddiq l-mā bayn yadayy min t-tawrāt w-mubashshir b-rasūl yaʾtī m baʿdī smuhū ʾaḥmad f-lammā jāʾahum b-l-bayyināt qālū hādhā siḥr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And mention when Jesus, the son of Mary, said, "O children of Israel, indeed I am the messenger of Allah to you confirming what came before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad." But when he came to them with clear evidences, they said, "This is obvious magic

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن أَظلَمُ مِمَّنِ افتَرىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ الكَذِبَ وَهُوَ يُدعىٰ إِلَى الإِسلامِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-m ʾaẓlam mimman ftarā ʿalā llāhil-kadhib w-huw yudʿā ʾilāl-ʾislām w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah untruth while he is being invited to Islam. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: يُريدونَ لِيُطفِئوا نورَ اللَّهِ بِأَفواهِهِم وَاللَّهُ مُتِمُّ نورِهِ وَلَو كَرِهَ الكافِرونَ
blank: yurīdūn l-yuṭfiʾū nūr llāh b-ʾafwāhihim w-llāh mutimm nūrihī w-law karihal-kāfirūn
english_saheeh_international: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي أَرسَلَ رَسولَهُ بِالهُدىٰ وَدينِ الحَقِّ لِيُظهِرَهُ عَلَى الدّينِ كُلِّهِ وَلَو كَرِهَ المُشرِكونَ
blank: huwalladhī ʾarsal rasūlahū b-l-hudā w-dīnil-ḥaqq l-yuẓhirahū ʿalā d-dīn kullihī w-law karihal-mushrikūn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although those who associate others with Allah dislike it

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا هَل أَدُلُّكُم عَلىٰ تِجارَةٍ تُنجيكُم مِن عَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū hal ʾadullukum ʿalā tijārat tunjīkum m ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: تُؤمِنونَ بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ وَتُجاهِدونَ في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ بِأَموالِكُم وَأَنفُسِكُم ۚ ذٰلِكُم خَيرٌ لَكُم إِن كُنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: tuʾminūn b-llāh w-rasūlihī w-tujāhidūn fī sabīl llāh b-ʾamwālikum w-ʾanfusikum dhālikum khayr lakum ʾ kuntum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: It is that you believe in Allah and His Messenger and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives. That is best for you, if you should know

arabic_uthmani: يَغفِر لَكُم ذُنوبَكُم وَيُدخِلكُم جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ وَمَساكِنَ طَيِّبَةً في جَنّاتِ عَدنٍ ۚ ذٰلِكَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: yaghfir lakum dhunūbakum w-yudkhilkum jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār w-masākin ṭayyibat fī jannāt ʿadn dhālikal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: He will forgive for you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence. That is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: وَأُخرىٰ تُحِبّونَها ۖ نَصرٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَفَتحٌ قَريبٌ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ المُؤمِنينَ
blank: w-ʾukhrā tuḥibbūnahā naṣr min llāh w-fatḥ qarīb w-bashshiril-muʾminīn
english_saheeh_international: And you will obtain another favor that you love - victory from Allah and an imminent conquest; and give good tidings to the believers

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا كونوا أَنصارَ اللَّهِ كَما قالَ عيسَى ابنُ مَريَمَ لِلحَوارِيّينَ مَن أَنصاري إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ قالَ الحَوارِيّونَ نَحنُ أَنصارُ اللَّهِ ۖ فَآمَنَت طائِفَةٌ مِن بَني إِسرائيلَ وَكَفَرَت طائِفَةٌ ۖ فَأَيَّدنَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا عَلىٰ عَدُوِّهِم فَأَصبَحوا ظاهِرينَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū kūnū ʾanṣār llāh k-mā qāl ʿīsā bn maryam l-l-ḥawāriyyīn m ʾanṣārī ʾilā llāh qālal-ḥawāriyyūn naḥn ʾanṣār llāh f-ʾāmanat ṭāʾifat m banī ʾisrāʾīl w-kafarat ṭāʾifat f-ʾayyadnālladhīn ʾāmanū ʿalā ʿaduwwihim f-ʾaṣbaḥū ẓāhirīn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, be supporters of Allah, as when Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters for Allah?" The disciples said, "We are supporters of Allah." And a faction of the Children of Israel believed and a faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant

arabic_uthmani: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ المَلِكِ القُدّوسِ العَزيزِ الحَكيمِ
blank: yusabbiḥ l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍil-malikil-quddūsil-ʿazīzil-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي بَعَثَ فِي الأُمِّيّينَ رَسولًا مِنهُم يَتلو عَلَيهِم آياتِهِ وَيُزَكّيهِم وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ الكِتابَ وَالحِكمَةَ وَإِن كانوا مِن قَبلُ لَفي ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: huwalladhī baʿath fīl-ʾummiyyīn rasūlam-minhum yatlū ʿalayhim ʾāyātihī w-yuzakkīhim w-yuʿallimuhumul-kitāb w-l-ḥikmat w-ʾ kānū m qabl l-fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: It is He who has sent among the unlettered a Messenger from themselves reciting to them His verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and wisdom - although they were before in clear error

arabic_uthmani: وَآخَرينَ مِنهُم لَمّا يَلحَقوا بِهِم ۚ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: w-ʾākharīn minhum lammā yalḥaqū bihim w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And to others of them who have not yet joined them. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ فَضلُ اللَّهِ يُؤتيهِ مَن يَشاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الفَضلِ العَظيمِ
blank: dhālik faḍl llāh yuʾtīh m yashāʾ w-llāh dhūl-faḍlil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: That is the bounty of Allah, which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty

arabic_uthmani: مَثَلُ الَّذينَ حُمِّلُوا التَّوراةَ ثُمَّ لَم يَحمِلوها كَمَثَلِ الحِمارِ يَحمِلُ أَسفارًا ۚ بِئسَ مَثَلُ القَومِ الَّذينَ كَذَّبوا بِآياتِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الظّالِمينَ
blank: mathalulladhīn ḥummilū t-tawrāt thumm lam yaḥmilūhā k-mathalil-ḥimār yaḥmil ʾasfār biʾs mathalul-qawmilladhīn kadhdhabū b-ʾāyāt llāh w-llāh lā yahdīl-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: The example of those who were entrusted with the Torah and then did not take it on is like that of a donkey who carries volumes of books. Wretched is the example of the people who deny the signs of Allah. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: قُل يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ هادوا إِن زَعَمتُم أَنَّكُم أَولِياءُ لِلَّهِ مِن دونِ النّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُا المَوتَ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: qul yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn hādū ʾ zaʿamtum ʾannakum ʾawliyāʾ l-llāh m dūn n-nās f-tamannawul-mawt ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "O you who are Jews, if you claim that you are allies of Allah, excluding the other people, then wish for death, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَتَمَنَّونَهُ أَبَدًا بِما قَدَّمَت أَيديهِم ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ بِالظّالِمينَ
blank: w-lā yatamannawnahū ʾabad b-mā qaddamat ʾaydīhim w-llāh ʿalīm b-ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: But they will not wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّ المَوتَ الَّذي تَفِرّونَ مِنهُ فَإِنَّهُ مُلاقيكُم ۖ ثُمَّ تُرَدّونَ إِلىٰ عالِمِ الغَيبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: qul ʾinnal-mawtalladhī tafirrūn minh f-ʾinnahū mulāqīkum thumm turaddūn ʾilā ʿālimil-ghayb w-sh-shahādat f-yunabbiʾukum b-mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, the death from which you flee - indeed, it will meet you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you about what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِذا نودِيَ لِلصَّلاةِ مِن يَومِ الجُمُعَةِ فَاسعَوا إِلىٰ ذِكرِ اللَّهِ وَذَرُوا البَيعَ ۚ ذٰلِكُم خَيرٌ لَكُم إِن كُنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾidhā nūdiy l-ṣ-ṣalāt m yawmil-jumuʿat f-sʿaw ʾilā dhikr llāh w-dharūl-bayʿ dhālikum khayr lakum ʾ kuntum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, when the adhan is called for the prayer on the day of Jumu'ah Friday, then proceed to the remembrance of Allah and leave trade. That is better for you, if you only knew

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا قُضِيَتِ الصَّلاةُ فَانتَشِروا فِي الأَرضِ وَابتَغوا مِن فَضلِ اللَّهِ وَاذكُرُوا اللَّهَ كَثيرًا لَعَلَّكُم تُفلِحونَ
blank: f-ʾidhā quḍiyat ṣ-ṣalāt f-ntashirū fīl-ʾarḍ w-btaghū m faḍl llāh w-dhkurū llāh kathīr laʿallakum tufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: And when the prayer has been concluded, disperse within the land and seek from the bounty of Allah, and remember Allah often that you may succeed

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا رَأَوا تِجارَةً أَو لَهوًا انفَضّوا إِلَيها وَتَرَكوكَ قائِمًا ۚ قُل ما عِندَ اللَّهِ خَيرٌ مِنَ اللَّهوِ وَمِنَ التِّجارَةِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ خَيرُ الرّازِقينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾaw tijārat ʾaw lahw- nfaḍḍū ʾilayhā w-tarakūk qāʾim qul mā ʿind llāh khayr minal-lahw w-min t-tijārat w-llāh khayr r-rāziqīn
english_saheeh_international: But when they saw a transaction or a diversion, O Muhammad, they rushed to it and left you standing. Say, "What is with Allah is better than diversion and than a transaction, and Allah is the best of providers

arabic_uthmani: إِذا جاءَكَ المُنافِقونَ قالوا نَشهَدُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسولُ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعلَمُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسولُهُ وَاللَّهُ يَشهَدُ إِنَّ المُنافِقينَ لَكاذِبونَ
blank: ʾidhā jāʾakal-munāfiqūn qālū nashhad ʾinnak l-rasūl llāh w-llāh yaʿlam ʾinnak l-rasūluhū w-llāh yashhad ʾinnal-munāfiqīn l-kādhibūn
english_saheeh_international: When the hypocrites come to you, O Muhammad, they say, "We testify that you are the Messenger of Allah." And Allah knows that you are His Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are liars

arabic_uthmani: اتَّخَذوا أَيمانَهُم جُنَّةً فَصَدّوا عَن سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُم ساءَ ما كانوا يَعمَلونَ
blank: ittakhadhū ʾaymānahum junnat f-ṣaddū ʿ sabīl llāh ʾinnahum sāʾ mā kānū yaʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: They have taken their oaths as a cover, so they averted people from the way of Allah. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُم آمَنوا ثُمَّ كَفَروا فَطُبِعَ عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم فَهُم لا يَفقَهونَ
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahum ʾāmanū thumm kafarū f-ṭubiʿ ʿalā qulūbihim f-hum lā yafqahūn
english_saheeh_international: That is because they believed, and then they disbelieved; so their hearts were sealed over, and they do not understand

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَإِذا رَأَيتَهُم تُعجِبُكَ أَجسامُهُم ۖ وَإِن يَقولوا تَسمَع لِقَولِهِم ۖ كَأَنَّهُم خُشُبٌ مُسَنَّدَةٌ ۖ يَحسَبونَ كُلَّ صَيحَةٍ عَلَيهِم ۚ هُمُ العَدُوُّ فَاحذَرهُم ۚ قاتَلَهُمُ اللَّهُ ۖ أَنّىٰ يُؤفَكونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾaytahum tuʿjibuk ʾajsāmuhum w-ʾ yaqūlū tasmaʿ l-qawlihim k-ʾannahum khushub musannadat yaḥsabūn kull ṣayḥat ʿalayhim humul-ʿaduww f-ḥdharhum qātalahum llāh ʾannā yuʾfakūn
english_saheeh_international: And when you see them, their forms please you, and if they speak, you listen to their speech. They are as if they were pieces of wood propped up - they think that every shout is against them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May Allah destroy them; how are they deluded

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قيلَ لَهُم تَعالَوا يَستَغفِر لَكُم رَسولُ اللَّهِ لَوَّوا رُءوسَهُم وَرَأَيتَهُم يَصُدّونَ وَهُم مُستَكبِرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā qīl lahum taʿālaw yastaghfir lakum rasūl llāh lawwaw ruʾūsahum w-raʾaytahum yaṣuddūn w-hum mustakbirūn
english_saheeh_international: And when it is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of Allah will ask forgiveness for you," they turn their heads aside and you see them evading while they are arrogant

arabic_uthmani: سَواءٌ عَلَيهِم أَستَغفَرتَ لَهُم أَم لَم تَستَغفِر لَهُم لَن يَغفِرَ اللَّهُ لَهُم ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهدِي القَومَ الفاسِقينَ
blank: sawāʾ ʿalayhim ʾ-staghfart lahum ʾam lam tastaghfir lahum l yaghfir llāh lahum ʾinn llāh lā yahdīl-qawmal-fāsiqīn
english_saheeh_international: It is all the same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or do not ask forgiveness for them; never will Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people

arabic_uthmani: هُمُ الَّذينَ يَقولونَ لا تُنفِقوا عَلىٰ مَن عِندَ رَسولِ اللَّهِ حَتّىٰ يَنفَضّوا ۗ وَلِلَّهِ خَزائِنُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَلٰكِنَّ المُنافِقينَ لا يَفقَهونَ
blank: humulladhīn yaqūlūn lā tunfiqū ʿalā m ʿind rasūl llāh ḥattā yanfaḍḍū w-l-llāh khazāʾin s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-lākinnal-munāfiqīn lā yafqahūn
english_saheeh_international: They are the ones who say, "Do not spend on those who are with the Messenger of Allah until they disband." And to Allah belongs the depositories of the heavens and the earth, but the hypocrites do not understand

arabic_uthmani: يَقولونَ لَئِن رَجَعنا إِلَى المَدينَةِ لَيُخرِجَنَّ الأَعَزُّ مِنهَا الأَذَلَّ ۚ وَلِلَّهِ العِزَّةُ وَلِرَسولِهِ وَلِلمُؤمِنينَ وَلٰكِنَّ المُنافِقينَ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: yaqūlūn l-ʾ rajaʿnā ʾilāl-madīnat l-yukhrijannal-ʾaʿazz minhāl-ʾadhall w-l-llāhil-ʿizzat w-l-rasūlihī w-l-l-muʾminīn w-lākinnal-munāfiqīn lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: They say, "If we return to al-Madinah, the more honored for power will surely expel therefrom the more humble." And to Allah belongs all honor, and to His Messenger, and to the believers, but the hypocrites do not know

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا لا تُلهِكُم أَموالُكُم وَلا أَولادُكُم عَن ذِكرِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَفعَل ذٰلِكَ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الخاسِرونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū lā tulhikum ʾamwālukum w-lā ʾawlādukum ʿ dhikr llāh w-m yafʿal dhālik f-ʾulāʾik humul-khāsirūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, let not your wealth and your children divert you from remembrance of Allah. And whoever does that - then those are the losers

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنفِقوا مِن ما رَزَقناكُم مِن قَبلِ أَن يَأتِيَ أَحَدَكُمُ المَوتُ فَيَقولَ رَبِّ لَولا أَخَّرتَني إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ قَريبٍ فَأَصَّدَّقَ وَأَكُن مِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: w-ʾanfiqū m mā razaqnākum m qabl ʾ yaʾtiy ʾaḥadakumul-mawt f-yaqūl rabb law-lā ʾakhkhartanī ʾilā ʾajal qarīb f-ʾaṣṣaddaq w-ʾak min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And spend in the way of Allah from what We have provided you before death approaches one of you and he says, "My Lord, if only You would delay me for a brief term so I would give charity and be among the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ اللَّهُ نَفسًا إِذا جاءَ أَجَلُها ۚ وَاللَّهُ خَبيرٌ بِما تَعمَلونَ
blank: w-l yuʾakhkhir llāh nafs ʾidhā jāʾ ʾajaluhā w-llāh khabīr b-mā taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: But never will Allah delay a soul when its time has come. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

arabic_uthmani: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَما فِي الأَرضِ ۖ لَهُ المُلكُ وَلَهُ الحَمدُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: yusabbiḥ l-llāh mā fī s-samāwāt w-mā fīl-ʾarḍ lahul-mulk w-lahul-ḥamd w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah. To Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي خَلَقَكُم فَمِنكُم كافِرٌ وَمِنكُم مُؤمِنٌ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ بَصيرٌ
blank: huwalladhī khalaqakum f-minkum kāfir w-minkum muʾmin w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: It is He who created you, and among you is the disbeliever, and among you is the believer. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضَ بِالحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُم فَأَحسَنَ صُوَرَكُم ۖ وَإِلَيهِ المَصيرُ
blank: khalaq s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ b-l-ḥaqq w-ṣawwarakum f-ʾaḥsan ṣuwarakum w-ʾilayhil-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: He created the heavens and earth in truth and formed you and perfected your forms; and to Him is the final destination

arabic_uthmani: يَعلَمُ ما فِي السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ وَيَعلَمُ ما تُسِرّونَ وَما تُعلِنونَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: yaʿlam mā fī s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-yaʿlam mā tusirrūn w-mā tuʿlinūn w-llāh ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَأتِكُم نَبَأُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِن قَبلُ فَذاقوا وَبالَ أَمرِهِم وَلَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: ʾ-lam yaʾtikum nabaʾulladhīn kafarū m qabl f-dhāqū wabāl ʾamrihim w-lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Has there not come to you the news of those who disbelieved before? So they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُ كانَت تَأتيهِم رُسُلُهُم بِالبَيِّناتِ فَقالوا أَبَشَرٌ يَهدونَنا فَكَفَروا وَتَوَلَّوا ۚ وَاستَغنَى اللَّهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَنِيٌّ حَميدٌ
blank: dhālik b-ʾannahū kānat taʾtīhim rusuluhum b-l-bayyināt f-qālū ʾ-bashar yahdūnanā f-kafarū w-tawallaw w-staghnā llāh w-llāh ghaniyy ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: That is because their messengers used to come to them with clear evidences, but they said, "Shall human beings guide us?" and disbelieved and turned away. And Allah dispensed with them; and Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: زَعَمَ الَّذينَ كَفَروا أَن لَن يُبعَثوا ۚ قُل بَلىٰ وَرَبّي لَتُبعَثُنَّ ثُمَّ لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ بِما عَمِلتُم ۚ وَذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسيرٌ
blank: zaʿamalladhīn kafarū ʾ l yubʿathū qul balā w-rabbī l-tubʿathunn thumm l-tunabbaʾunn b-mā ʿamiltum w-dhālik ʿalā llāh yasīr
english_saheeh_international: Those who disbelieve have claimed that they will never be resurrected. Say, "Yes, by my Lord, you will surely be resurrected; then you will surely be informed of what you did. And that, for Allah, is easy

arabic_uthmani: فَآمِنوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسولِهِ وَالنّورِ الَّذي أَنزَلنا ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِما تَعمَلونَ خَبيرٌ
blank: f-ʾāminū b-llāh w-rasūlihī w-n-nūrilladhī ʾanzalnā w-llāh b-mā taʿmalūn khabīr
english_saheeh_international: So believe in Allah and His Messenger and the Qur'an which We have sent down. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَجمَعُكُم لِيَومِ الجَمعِ ۖ ذٰلِكَ يَومُ التَّغابُنِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤمِن بِاللَّهِ وَيَعمَل صالِحًا يُكَفِّر عَنهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِ وَيُدخِلهُ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها أَبَدًا ۚ ذٰلِكَ الفَوزُ العَظيمُ
blank: yawm yajmaʿukum l-yawmil-jamʿ dhālik yawm t-taghābun w-m yuʾm b-llāh w-yaʿmal ṣāliḥ yukaffir ʿanh sayyiʾātihī w-yudkhilh jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā ʾabad dhālikal-fawzul-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: The Day He will assemble you for the Day of Assembly - that is the Day of Deprivation. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove from him his misdeeds and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا وَكَذَّبوا بِآياتِنا أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ النّارِ خالِدينَ فيها ۖ وَبِئسَ المَصيرُ
blank: w-lladhīn kafarū w-kadhdhabū b-ʾāyātinā ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥāb n-nār khālidīn fīhā w-biʾsal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: But the ones who disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of the Fire, abiding eternally therein; and wretched is the destination

arabic_uthmani: ما أَصابَ مِن مُصيبَةٍ إِلّا بِإِذنِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤمِن بِاللَّهِ يَهدِ قَلبَهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَليمٌ
blank: mā ʾaṣāb m muṣībat ʾillā b-ʾidhn llāh w-m yuʾm b-llāh yahd qalbahū w-llāh b-kull shayʾ ʿalīm
english_saheeh_international: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things

arabic_uthmani: وَأَطيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطيعُوا الرَّسولَ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيتُم فَإِنَّما عَلىٰ رَسولِنَا البَلاغُ المُبينُ
blank: w-ʾaṭīʿū llāh w-ʾaṭīʿū r-rasūl f-ʾ tawallaytum f-ʾinnamā ʿalā rasūlināl-balāghul-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only the duty of clear notification

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَليَتَوَكَّلِ المُؤمِنونَ
blank: allāh lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw w-ʿalā llāh f-l-yatawakkalil-muʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah - there is no deity except Him. And upon Allah let the believers rely

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا إِنَّ مِن أَزواجِكُم وَأَولادِكُم عَدُوًّا لَكُم فَاحذَروهُم ۚ وَإِن تَعفوا وَتَصفَحوا وَتَغفِروا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū ʾinn m ʾazwājikum w-ʾawlādikum ʿaduww lakum f-ḥdharūhum w-ʾ taʿfū w-taṣfaḥū w-taghfirū f-ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, indeed, among your wives and your children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon and overlook and forgive - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما أَموالُكُم وَأَولادُكُم فِتنَةٌ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عِندَهُ أَجرٌ عَظيمٌ
blank: ʾinnamā ʾamwālukum w-ʾawlādukum fitnat w-llāh ʿindahū ʾajr ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward

arabic_uthmani: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ مَا استَطَعتُم وَاسمَعوا وَأَطيعوا وَأَنفِقوا خَيرًا لِأَنفُسِكُم ۗ وَمَن يوقَ شُحَّ نَفسِهِ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ المُفلِحونَ
blank: f-ttaqū llāh mā staṭaʿtum w-smaʿū w-ʾaṭīʿū w-ʾanfiqū khayr l-ʾanfusikum w-m yūq shuḥḥ nafsihī f-ʾulāʾik humul-mufliḥūn
english_saheeh_international: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend in the way of Allah; it is better for your selves. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful

arabic_uthmani: إِن تُقرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرضًا حَسَنًا يُضاعِفهُ لَكُم وَيَغفِر لَكُم ۚ وَاللَّهُ شَكورٌ حَليمٌ
blank: ʾ tuqriḍū llāh qarḍ ḥasan yuḍāʿifh lakum w-yaghfir lakum w-llāh shakūr ḥalīm
english_saheeh_international: If you loan Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing

arabic_uthmani: عالِمُ الغَيبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ العَزيزُ الحَكيمُ
blank: ʿālimul-ghayb w-ṣ-ṣahādatil-ʿazīzul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ إِذا طَلَّقتُمُ النِّساءَ فَطَلِّقوهُنَّ لِعِدَّتِهِنَّ وَأَحصُوا العِدَّةَ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ رَبَّكُم ۖ لا تُخرِجوهُنَّ مِن بُيوتِهِنَّ وَلا يَخرُجنَ إِلّا أَن يَأتينَ بِفاحِشَةٍ مُبَيِّنَةٍ ۚ وَتِلكَ حُدودُ اللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدودَ اللَّهِ فَقَد ظَلَمَ نَفسَهُ ۚ لا تَدري لَعَلَّ اللَّهَ يُحدِثُ بَعدَ ذٰلِكَ أَمرًا
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy ʾidhā ṭallaqtum n-nisāʾ f-ṭalliqūhunn l-ʿiddatihinn w-ʾaḥṣūl-ʿiddat w-ttaqū llāh rabbakum lā tukhrijūhunn m buyūtihinn w-lā yakhrujn ʾillā ʾ yaʾtīn b-fāḥishat mubayyinat w-tilk ḥudūd llāh w-m yataʿadd ḥudūd llāh f-qad ẓalam nafsahū lā tadrī laʿall llāh yuḥdith baʿd dhālik ʾamr
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, when you Muslims divorce women, divorce them for the commencement of their waiting period and keep count of the waiting period, and fear Allah, your Lord. Do not turn them out of their husbands' houses, nor should they themselves leave during that period unless they are committing a clear immorality. And those are the limits set by Allah. And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah has certainly wronged himself. You know not; perhaps Allah will bring about after that a different matter

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا بَلَغنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمسِكوهُنَّ بِمَعروفٍ أَو فارِقوهُنَّ بِمَعروفٍ وَأَشهِدوا ذَوَي عَدلٍ مِنكُم وَأَقيمُوا الشَّهادَةَ لِلَّهِ ۚ ذٰلِكُم يوعَظُ بِهِ مَن كانَ يُؤمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَاليَومِ الآخِرِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجعَل لَهُ مَخرَجًا
blank: f-ʾidhā balaghn ʾajalahunn f-ʾamsikūhunn b-maʿrūf ʾaw fāriqūhunn b-maʿrūf w-ʾashhidū dhaway ʿadl minkum w-ʾaqīmū sh-shahādat l-llāh dhālikum yūʿaẓ bihī m kān yuʾmin b-llāh w-l-yawmil-ʾākhir w-m yattaq llāh yajʿal lahū makhraj
english_saheeh_international: And when they have nearly fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or part with them according to acceptable terms. And bring to witness two just men from among you and establish the testimony for the acceptance of Allah. That is instructed to whoever should believe in Allah and the Last day. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out

arabic_uthmani: وَيَرزُقهُ مِن حَيثُ لا يَحتَسِبُ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّل عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسبُهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بالِغُ أَمرِهِ ۚ قَد جَعَلَ اللَّهُ لِكُلِّ شَيءٍ قَدرًا
blank: w-yarzuqh m ḥayth lā yaḥtasib w-m yatawakkal ʿalā llāh f-huw ḥasbuhū ʾinn llāh bāligh ʾamrihī qad jaʿal llāh l-kull shayʾ qadr
english_saheeh_international: And will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a decreed extent

arabic_uthmani: وَاللّائي يَئِسنَ مِنَ المَحيضِ مِن نِسائِكُم إِنِ ارتَبتُم فَعِدَّتُهُنَّ ثَلاثَةُ أَشهُرٍ وَاللّائي لَم يَحِضنَ ۚ وَأُولاتُ الأَحمالِ أَجَلُهُنَّ أَن يَضَعنَ حَملَهُنَّ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجعَل لَهُ مِن أَمرِهِ يُسرًا
blank: w-llāʾī yaʾisn minal-maḥīḍ m nisāʾikum ʾin rtabtum f-ʿiddatuhunn thalāthat ʾashhur w-llāʾī lam yaḥiḍn w-ʾulātul-ʾaḥmāl ʾajaluhunn ʾ yaḍaʿn ḥamlahunn w-m yattaq llāh yajʿal lahū m ʾamrihī yusr
english_saheeh_international: And those who no longer expect menstruation among your women - if you doubt, then their period is three months, and also for those who have not menstruated. And for those who are pregnant, their term is until they give birth. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him of his matter ease

arabic_uthmani: ذٰلِكَ أَمرُ اللَّهِ أَنزَلَهُ إِلَيكُم ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يُكَفِّر عَنهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِ وَيُعظِم لَهُ أَجرًا
blank: dhālik ʾamr llāh ʾanzalahū ʾilaykum w-m yattaq llāh yukaffir ʿanh sayyiʾātihī w-yuʿẓim lahū ʾajr
english_saheeh_international: That is the command of Allah, which He has sent down to you; and whoever fears Allah - He will remove for him his misdeeds and make great for him his reward

arabic_uthmani: أَسكِنوهُنَّ مِن حَيثُ سَكَنتُم مِن وُجدِكُم وَلا تُضارّوهُنَّ لِتُضَيِّقوا عَلَيهِنَّ ۚ وَإِن كُنَّ أُولاتِ حَملٍ فَأَنفِقوا عَلَيهِنَّ حَتّىٰ يَضَعنَ حَملَهُنَّ ۚ فَإِن أَرضَعنَ لَكُم فَآتوهُنَّ أُجورَهُنَّ ۖ وَأتَمِروا بَينَكُم بِمَعروفٍ ۖ وَإِن تَعاسَرتُم فَسَتُرضِعُ لَهُ أُخرىٰ
blank: ʾaskinūhunn m ḥayth sakantum m wujdikum w-lā tuḍārrūhunn l-tuḍayyiqū ʿalayhinn w-ʾ kunn ʾulāt ḥaml f-ʾanfiqū ʿalayhinn ḥattā yaḍaʿn ḥamlahunn f-ʾ ʾarḍaʿn lakum f-ʾātūhunn ʾujūrahunn w-ʾtamirū baynakum b-maʿrūf w-ʾ taʿāsartum f-s-turḍiʿ lahū ʾukhrā
english_saheeh_international: Lodge them in a section of where you dwell out of your means and do not harm them in order to oppress them. And if they should be pregnant, then spend on them until they give birth. And if they breastfeed for you, then give them their payment and confer among yourselves in the acceptable way; but if you are in discord, then there may breastfeed for the father another woman

arabic_uthmani: لِيُنفِق ذو سَعَةٍ مِن سَعَتِهِ ۖ وَمَن قُدِرَ عَلَيهِ رِزقُهُ فَليُنفِق مِمّا آتاهُ اللَّهُ ۚ لا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفسًا إِلّا ما آتاها ۚ سَيَجعَلُ اللَّهُ بَعدَ عُسرٍ يُسرًا
blank: l-yunfiq dhū saʿat m saʿatihī w-m qudir ʿalayh rizquhū f-l-yunfiq mimmā ʾātāh llāh lā yukallif llāh nafs ʾillā mā ʾātāhā s-yajʿal llāh baʿd ʿusr yusr
english_saheeh_international: Let a man of wealth spend from his wealth, and he whose provision is restricted - let him spend from what Allah has given him. Allah does not charge a soul except according to what He has given it. Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease

arabic_uthmani: وَكَأَيِّن مِن قَريَةٍ عَتَت عَن أَمرِ رَبِّها وَرُسُلِهِ فَحاسَبناها حِسابًا شَديدًا وَعَذَّبناها عَذابًا نُكرًا
blank: w-k-ʾayy m qaryat ʿatat ʿ ʾamr rabbihā w-rusulihī f-ḥāsabnāhā ḥisāb shadīd w-ʿadhdhabnāhā ʿadhāb nukr
english_saheeh_international: And how many a city was insolent toward the command of its Lord and His messengers, so We took it to severe account and punished it with a terrible punishment

arabic_uthmani: فَذاقَت وَبالَ أَمرِها وَكانَ عاقِبَةُ أَمرِها خُسرًا
blank: f-dhāqat wabāl ʾamrihā w-kān ʿāqibat ʾamrihā khusr
english_saheeh_international: And it tasted the bad consequence of its affair, and the outcome of its affair was loss

arabic_uthmani: أَعَدَّ اللَّهُ لَهُم عَذابًا شَديدًا ۖ فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ يا أُولِي الأَلبابِ الَّذينَ آمَنوا ۚ قَد أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ إِلَيكُم ذِكرًا
blank: ʾaʿadd llāh lahum ʿadhāb shadīd f-ttaqū llāh yā-ʾulīl-ʾalbābilladhīn ʾāmanū qad ʾanzal llāh ʾilaykum dhikr
english_saheeh_international: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment; so fear Allah, O you of understanding who have believed. Allah has sent down to you the Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: رَسولًا يَتلو عَلَيكُم آياتِ اللَّهِ مُبَيِّناتٍ لِيُخرِجَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ مِنَ الظُّلُماتِ إِلَى النّورِ ۚ وَمَن يُؤمِن بِاللَّهِ وَيَعمَل صالِحًا يُدخِلهُ جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها أَبَدًا ۖ قَد أَحسَنَ اللَّهُ لَهُ رِزقًا
blank: rasūl yatlū ʿalaykum ʾāyāt llāh mubayyināt l-yukhrijalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt min ẓ-ẓulumāt ʾilā n-nūr w-m yuʾm b-llāh w-yaʿmal ṣāliḥ yudkhilh jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā ʾabad qad ʾaḥsan llāh lahū rizq-
english_saheeh_international: He sent a Messenger Muhammad reciting to you the distinct verses of Allah that He may bring out those who believe and do righteous deeds from darknesses into the light. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will admit him into gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein forever. Allah will have perfected for him a provision

arabic_uthmani: اللَّهُ الَّذي خَلَقَ سَبعَ سَماواتٍ وَمِنَ الأَرضِ مِثلَهُنَّ يَتَنَزَّلُ الأَمرُ بَينَهُنَّ لِتَعلَموا أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ قَد أَحاطَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عِلمًا
blank: allāhulladhī khalaq sabʿ samāwāt w-minal-ʾarḍ mithlahunn yatanazzalul-ʾamr baynahunn l-taʿlamū ʾann llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr w-ʾann llāh qad ʾaḥāṭ b-kull shayʾ ʿilm
english_saheeh_international: It is Allah who has created seven heavens and of the earth, the like of them. His command descends among them so you may know that Allah is over all things competent and that Allah has encompassed all things in knowledge

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ ما أَحَلَّ اللَّهُ لَكَ ۖ تَبتَغي مَرضاتَ أَزواجِكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy l-m tuḥarrim mā ʾaḥall llāh lak tabtaghī marḍāt ʾazwājik w-llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, why do you prohibit yourself from what Allah has made lawful for you, seeking the approval of your wives? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: قَد فَرَضَ اللَّهُ لَكُم تَحِلَّةَ أَيمانِكُم ۚ وَاللَّهُ مَولاكُم ۖ وَهُوَ العَليمُ الحَكيمُ
blank: qad faraḍ llāh lakum taḥillat ʾaymānikum w-llāh mawlākum w-huwal-ʿalīmul-ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: Allah has already ordained for you Muslims the dissolution of your oaths. And Allah is your protector, and He is the Knowing, the Wise

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذ أَسَرَّ النَّبِيُّ إِلىٰ بَعضِ أَزواجِهِ حَديثًا فَلَمّا نَبَّأَت بِهِ وَأَظهَرَهُ اللَّهُ عَلَيهِ عَرَّفَ بَعضَهُ وَأَعرَضَ عَن بَعضٍ ۖ فَلَمّا نَبَّأَها بِهِ قالَت مَن أَنبَأَكَ هٰذا ۖ قالَ نَبَّأَنِيَ العَليمُ الخَبيرُ
blank: w-ʾidh ʾasarr n-nabiyy ʾilā baʿḍ ʾazwājihī ḥadīth f-lammā nabbaʾat bihī w-ʾaẓharah llāh ʿalayh ʿarraf baʿḍahū w-ʾaʿraḍ ʿ baʿḍ f-lammā nabbaʾahā bihī qālat m ʾanbaʾak hādhā qāl nabbaʾaniyal-ʿalīmul-khabīr
english_saheeh_international: And remember when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a statement; and when she informed another of it and Allah showed it to him, he made known part of it and ignored a part. And when he informed her about it, she said, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the Knowing, the Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: إِن تَتوبا إِلَى اللَّهِ فَقَد صَغَت قُلوبُكُما ۖ وَإِن تَظاهَرا عَلَيهِ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ مَولاهُ وَجِبريلُ وَصالِحُ المُؤمِنينَ ۖ وَالمَلائِكَةُ بَعدَ ذٰلِكَ ظَهيرٌ
blank: ʾ tatūbā ʾilā llāh f-qad ṣaghat qulūbukumā w-ʾ taẓāharā ʿalayh f-ʾinn llāh huw mawlāh w-jibrīl w-ṣāliḥul-muʾminīn w-l-malāʾikat baʿd dhālik ẓahīr
english_saheeh_international: If you two wives repent to Allah, it is best, for your hearts have deviated. But if you cooperate against him - then indeed Allah is his protector, and Gabriel and the righteous of the believers and the angels, moreover, are his assistants

arabic_uthmani: عَسىٰ رَبُّهُ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن يُبدِلَهُ أَزواجًا خَيرًا مِنكُنَّ مُسلِماتٍ مُؤمِناتٍ قانِتاتٍ تائِباتٍ عابِداتٍ سائِحاتٍ ثَيِّباتٍ وَأَبكارًا
blank: ʿasā rabbuhū ʾ ṭallaqakunn ʾ yubdilahū ʾazwāj khayram-minkunn muslimāt muʾmināt qānitāt tāʾibāt ʿābidāt sāʾiḥāt thayyibāt w-ʾabkār
english_saheeh_international: Perhaps his Lord, if he divorced you all, would substitute for him wives better than you - submitting to Allah, believing, devoutly obedient, repentant, worshipping, and traveling - ones previously married and virgins

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا قوا أَنفُسَكُم وَأَهليكُم نارًا وَقودُهَا النّاسُ وَالحِجارَةُ عَلَيها مَلائِكَةٌ غِلاظٌ شِدادٌ لا يَعصونَ اللَّهَ ما أَمَرَهُم وَيَفعَلونَ ما يُؤمَرونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū qū ʾanfusakum w-ʾahlīkum nār waqūduhā n-nās w-l-ḥijārat ʿalayhā malāʾikat ghilāẓ shidād lā yaʿṣūn llāh mā ʾamarahum w-yafʿalūn mā yuʾmarūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, over which are appointed angels, harsh and severe; they do not disobey Allah in what He commands them but do what they are commanded

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ كَفَروا لا تَعتَذِرُوا اليَومَ ۖ إِنَّما تُجزَونَ ما كُنتُم تَعمَلونَ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn kafarū lā taʿtadhirūl-yawm ʾinnamā tujzawn mā kuntum taʿmalūn
english_saheeh_international: O you who have disbelieved, make no excuses that Day. You will only be recompensed for what you used to do

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنوا توبوا إِلَى اللَّهِ تَوبَةً نَصوحًا عَسىٰ رَبُّكُم أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُم سَيِّئَاتِكُم وَيُدخِلَكُم جَنّاتٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ يَومَ لا يُخزِي اللَّهُ النَّبِيَّ وَالَّذينَ آمَنوا مَعَهُ ۖ نورُهُم يَسعىٰ بَينَ أَيديهِم وَبِأَيمانِهِم يَقولونَ رَبَّنا أَتمِم لَنا نورَنا وَاغفِر لَنا ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhālladhīn ʾāmanū tūbū ʾilā llāh tawbat naṣūḥ ʿasā rabbukum ʾ yukaffir ʿankum sayyiʾātikum w-yudkhilakum jannāt tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār yawm lā yukhzī llāh n-nabiyy w-lladhīn ʾāmanū maʿahū nūruhum yasʿā bayn ʾaydīhim w-b-ʾaymānihim yaqūlūn rabbanā ʾatmim lanā nūranā w-ghfir lanā ʾinnak ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr
english_saheeh_international: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance. Perhaps your Lord will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you into gardens beneath which rivers flow on the Day when Allah will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them and on their right; they will say, "Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ جاهِدِ الكُفّارَ وَالمُنافِقينَ وَاغلُظ عَلَيهِم ۚ وَمَأواهُم جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئسَ المَصيرُ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhā n-nabiyy jāhidil-kuffār w-l-munāfiqīn w-ghluẓ ʿalayhim w-maʾwāhum jahannam w-biʾsal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: O Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination

arabic_uthmani: ضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا لِلَّذينَ كَفَرُوا امرَأَتَ نوحٍ وَامرَأَتَ لوطٍ ۖ كانَتا تَحتَ عَبدَينِ مِن عِبادِنا صالِحَينِ فَخانَتاهُما فَلَم يُغنِيا عَنهُما مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيئًا وَقيلَ ادخُلَا النّارَ مَعَ الدّاخِلينَ
blank: ḍarab llāh mathal l-lladhīn kafarū mraʾat nūḥ w-mraʾat lūṭ kānatā taḥt ʿabdayn m ʿibādinā ṣāliḥayn f-khānatāhumā f-lam yughniyā ʿanhumā min llāh shayʾ w-qīl dkhulā n-nār maʿ d-dākhilīn
english_saheeh_international: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of Our righteous servants but betrayed them, so those prophets did not avail them from Allah at all, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who enter

arabic_uthmani: وَضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا لِلَّذينَ آمَنُوا امرَأَتَ فِرعَونَ إِذ قالَت رَبِّ ابنِ لي عِندَكَ بَيتًا فِي الجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّني مِن فِرعَونَ وَعَمَلِهِ وَنَجِّني مِنَ القَومِ الظّالِمينَ
blank: w-ḍarab llāh mathal l-lladhīn ʾāmanū mraʾat firʿawn ʾidh qālat rabb bn lī ʿindak bayt fīl-jannat w-najjinī m firʿawn w-ʿamalihī w-najjinī minal-qawm ẓ-ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah presents an example of those who believed: the wife of Pharaoh, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh and his deeds and save me from the wrongdoing people

arabic_uthmani: وَمَريَمَ ابنَتَ عِمرانَ الَّتي أَحصَنَت فَرجَها فَنَفَخنا فيهِ مِن روحِنا وَصَدَّقَت بِكَلِماتِ رَبِّها وَكُتُبِهِ وَكانَت مِنَ القانِتينَ
blank: w-maryam bnat ʿimrān llatī ʾaḥṣanat farjahā f-nafakhnā fīh m rūḥinā w-ṣaddaqat b-kalimāt rabbihā w-kutubihī w-kānat minal-qānitīn
english_saheeh_international: And the example of Mary, the daughter of 'Imran, who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her garment through Our angel, and she believed in the words of her Lord and His scriptures and was of the devoutly obedient

arabic_uthmani: تَبارَكَ الَّذي بِيَدِهِ المُلكُ وَهُوَ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ
blank: tabārakalladhī b-yadihil-mulk w-huw ʿalā kull shayʾ qadīr-
english_saheeh_international: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي خَلَقَ المَوتَ وَالحَياةَ لِيَبلُوَكُم أَيُّكُم أَحسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ العَزيزُ الغَفورُ
blank: alladhī khalaqal-mawt w-l-ḥayāt l-yabluwakum ʾayyukum ʾaḥsan ʿamal w-huwal-ʿazīzul-ghafūr
english_saheeh_international: He who created death and life to test you as to which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي خَلَقَ سَبعَ سَماواتٍ طِباقًا ۖ ما تَرىٰ في خَلقِ الرَّحمٰنِ مِن تَفاوُتٍ ۖ فَارجِعِ البَصَرَ هَل تَرىٰ مِن فُطورٍ
blank: alladhī khalaq sabʿ samāwāt ṭibāqam-mā tarā fī khalq r-raḥmān m tafāwut f-rjiʿil-baṣar hal tarā m fuṭūr
english_saheeh_international: And who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return your vision to the sky; do you see any breaks

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ ارجِعِ البَصَرَ كَرَّتَينِ يَنقَلِب إِلَيكَ البَصَرُ خاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسيرٌ
blank: thumm rjiʿil-baṣar karratayn yanqalib ʾilaykal-baṣar khāsiʾ w-huw ḥasīr
english_saheeh_international: Then return your vision twice again. Your vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد زَيَّنَّا السَّماءَ الدُّنيا بِمَصابيحَ وَجَعَلناها رُجومًا لِلشَّياطينِ ۖ وَأَعتَدنا لَهُم عَذابَ السَّعيرِ
blank: w-l-qad zayyannā s-samāʾ d-dunyā b-maṣābīḥ w-jaʿalnāhā rujūm l-sh-shayāṭīn w-ʾaʿtadnā lahum ʿadhāb s-saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made from them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze

arabic_uthmani: وَلِلَّذينَ كَفَروا بِرَبِّهِم عَذابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئسَ المَصيرُ
blank: w-l-lladhīn kafarū b-rabbihim ʿadhāb jahannam w-biʾsal-maṣīr
english_saheeh_international: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination

arabic_uthmani: إِذا أُلقوا فيها سَمِعوا لَها شَهيقًا وَهِيَ تَفورُ
blank: idhā ulqū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqaw-wa-hiya tafūr
english_saheeh_international: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a dreadful inhaling while it boils up

arabic_uthmani: تَكادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ الغَيظِ ۖ كُلَّما أُلقِيَ فيها فَوجٌ سَأَلَهُم خَزَنَتُها أَلَم يَأتِكُم نَذيرٌ
blank: takād tamayyaz minal-ghayẓ kullamā ʾulqiy fīhā fawj saʾalahum khazanatuhā ʾ-lam yaʾtikum nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner

arabic_uthmani: قالوا بَلىٰ قَد جاءَنا نَذيرٌ فَكَذَّبنا وَقُلنا ما نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ مِن شَيءٍ إِن أَنتُم إِلّا في ضَلالٍ كَبيرٍ
blank: qālū balā qad jāʾanā nadhīr f-kadhdhabnā w-qulnā mā nazzal llāh m shayʾ ʾ ʾantum ʾillā fī ḍalāl kabīr
english_saheeh_international: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لَو كُنّا نَسمَعُ أَو نَعقِلُ ما كُنّا في أَصحابِ السَّعيرِ
blank: w-qālū law kunnā nasmaʿ ʾaw naʿqil mā kunnā fī ʾaṣḥāb s-saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze

arabic_uthmani: فَاعتَرَفوا بِذَنبِهِم فَسُحقًا لِأَصحابِ السَّعيرِ
blank: f-ʿtarafū b-dhanbihim f-suḥq l-ʾaṣḥāb s-saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: And they will admit their sin, so it is alienation for the companions of the Blaze

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ يَخشَونَ رَبَّهُم بِالغَيبِ لَهُم مَغفِرَةٌ وَأَجرٌ كَبيرٌ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn yakhshawn rabbahum b-l-ghayb lahum maghfirat w-ʾajr kabīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward

arabic_uthmani: وَأَسِرّوا قَولَكُم أَوِ اجهَروا بِهِ ۖ إِنَّهُ عَليمٌ بِذاتِ الصُّدورِ
blank: w-ʾasirrū qawlakum ʾaw jharū bihī ʾinnahū ʿalīm b-dhāt ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts

arabic_uthmani: أَلا يَعلَمُ مَن خَلَقَ وَهُوَ اللَّطيفُ الخَبيرُ
blank: ʾ-lā yaʿlam m khalaq w-huwal-laṭīful-khabīr
english_saheeh_international: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: هُوَ الَّذي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الأَرضَ ذَلولًا فَامشوا في مَناكِبِها وَكُلوا مِن رِزقِهِ ۖ وَإِلَيهِ النُّشورُ
blank: huwalladhī jaʿal lakumul-ʾarḍ dhalūl f-mshū fī manākibihā w-kulū m rizqihī w-ʾilayh n-nushūr
english_saheeh_international: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection

arabic_uthmani: أَأَمِنتُم مَن فِي السَّماءِ أَن يَخسِفَ بِكُمُ الأَرضَ فَإِذا هِيَ تَمورُ
blank: ʾ-ʾamintum m fī s-samāʾ ʾ yakhsif bikumul-ʾarḍ f-ʾidhā hiy tamūr
english_saheeh_international: Do you feel secure that He who holds authority in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway

arabic_uthmani: أَم أَمِنتُم مَن فِي السَّماءِ أَن يُرسِلَ عَلَيكُم حاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعلَمونَ كَيفَ نَذيرِ
blank: ʾam-ʾamintum m fī s-samāʾ ʾ yursil ʿalaykum ḥāṣib f-s-taʿlamūn kayf nadhīr
english_saheeh_international: Or do you feel secure that He who holds authority in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how severe was My warning

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد كَذَّبَ الَّذينَ مِن قَبلِهِم فَكَيفَ كانَ نَكيرِ
blank: w-l-qad kadhdhaballadhīn m qablihim f-kayf kān nakīr
english_saheeh_international: And already had those before them denied, and how terrible was My reproach

arabic_uthmani: أَوَلَم يَرَوا إِلَى الطَّيرِ فَوقَهُم صافّاتٍ وَيَقبِضنَ ۚ ما يُمسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا الرَّحمٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ بَصيرٌ
blank: ʾ-w-lam yaraw ʾilā ṭ-ṭayr fawqahum ṣāffāt w-yaqbiḍn mā yumsikuhunn ʾillā r-raḥmān ʾinnahū b-kull shayʾ baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and sometimes folded in? None holds them aloft except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing

arabic_uthmani: أَمَّن هٰذَا الَّذي هُوَ جُندٌ لَكُم يَنصُرُكُم مِن دونِ الرَّحمٰنِ ۚ إِنِ الكافِرونَ إِلّا في غُرورٍ
blank: ʾam-m hādhālladhī huw jund lakum yanṣurukum m dūn r-raḥmān ʾinil-kāfirūn ʾillā fī ghurūr
english_saheeh_international: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion

arabic_uthmani: أَمَّن هٰذَا الَّذي يَرزُقُكُم إِن أَمسَكَ رِزقَهُ ۚ بَل لَجّوا في عُتُوٍّ وَنُفورٍ
blank: ʾam-m hādhālladhī yarzuqukum ʾ ʾamsak rizqahū bal lajjū fī ʿutuww w-nufūr
english_saheeh_international: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion

arabic_uthmani: أَفَمَن يَمشي مُكِبًّا عَلىٰ وَجهِهِ أَهدىٰ أَمَّن يَمشي سَوِيًّا عَلىٰ صِراطٍ مُستَقيمٍ
blank: ʾ-f-m yamshī mukibb ʿalā wajhihī ʾahdā ʾam-m yamshī sawiyy ʿalā ṣirāṭ mustaqīm
english_saheeh_international: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path

arabic_uthmani: قُل هُوَ الَّذي أَنشَأَكُم وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ السَّمعَ وَالأَبصارَ وَالأَفئِدَةَ ۖ قَليلًا ما تَشكُرونَ
blank: qul huwalladhī ʾanshaʾakum w-jaʿal lakum s-samʿ w-l-ʾabṣār w-l-ʾafʾidat qalīlam-mā tashkurūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful

arabic_uthmani: قُل هُوَ الَّذي ذَرَأَكُم فِي الأَرضِ وَإِلَيهِ تُحشَرونَ
blank: qul huwalladhī dharaʾakum fīl-ʾarḍ w-ʾilayh tuḥsharūn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered

arabic_uthmani: وَيَقولونَ مَتىٰ هٰذَا الوَعدُ إِن كُنتُم صادِقينَ
blank: w-yaqūlūn matā hādhāl-waʿd ʾ kuntum ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّمَا العِلمُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَإِنَّما أَنا نَذيرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: qul ʾinnamāl-ʿilm ʿind llāh w-ʾinnamā ʾan nadhīr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا رَأَوهُ زُلفَةً سيئَت وُجوهُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا وَقيلَ هٰذَا الَّذي كُنتُم بِهِ تَدَّعونَ
blank: f-lammā raʾawh zulfat sīʾat wujūhulladhīn kafarū w-qīl hādhālladhī kuntum bihī taddaʿūn
english_saheeh_international: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم إِن أَهلَكَنِيَ اللَّهُ وَمَن مَعِيَ أَو رَحِمَنا فَمَن يُجيرُ الكافِرينَ مِن عَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ ʾahlakaniy llāh w-mam-maʿiy ʾaw raḥimanā f-m yujīrul-kāfirīn m ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: قُل هُوَ الرَّحمٰنُ آمَنّا بِهِ وَعَلَيهِ تَوَكَّلنا ۖ فَسَتَعلَمونَ مَن هُوَ في ضَلالٍ مُبينٍ
blank: qul huw r-raḥmān ʾāmannā bihī w-ʿalayh tawakkalnā f-s-taʿlamūn m huw fī ḍalāl mubīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will come to know who it is that is in clear error

arabic_uthmani: قُل أَرَأَيتُم إِن أَصبَحَ ماؤُكُم غَورًا فَمَن يَأتيكُم بِماءٍ مَعينٍ
blank: qul ʾ-raʾaytum ʾ ʾaṣbaḥ māʾukum ghawr f-m yaʾtīkum b-māʾ maʿīn
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken into the earth, then who could bring you flowing water

arabic_uthmani: ن ۚ وَالقَلَمِ وَما يَسطُرونَ
blank: n (nūn) w-l-qalam w-mā yasṭurūn
english_saheeh_international: Nun. By the pen and what they inscribe

arabic_uthmani: ما أَنتَ بِنِعمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجنونٍ
blank: mā ʾant b-niʿmat rabbik b-majnūn
english_saheeh_international: You are not, O Muhammad, by the favor of your Lord, a madman

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجرًا غَيرَ مَمنونٍ
blank: w-ʾinn lak l-ʾajr ghayr mamnūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, for you is a reward uninterrupted

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: w-ʾinnak l-ʿalā khuluq ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, you are of a great moral character

arabic_uthmani: فَسَتُبصِرُ وَيُبصِرونَ
blank: f-s-tubṣir w-yubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: So you will see and they will see

arabic_uthmani: بِأَييِكُمُ المَفتونُ
blank: b-ʾayyikumul-maftūn
english_saheeh_international: Which of you is the afflicted by a devil

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعلَمُ بِالمُهتَدينَ
blank: ʾinn rabbak huw ʾaʿlam b-m ḍall ʿ sabīlihī w-huw ʾaʿlam b-l-muhtadīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the rightly guided

arabic_uthmani: فَلا تُطِعِ المُكَذِّبينَ
blank: f-lā tuṭiʿil-mukadhdhibīn
english_saheeh_international: Then do not obey the deniers

arabic_uthmani: وَدّوا لَو تُدهِنُ فَيُدهِنونَ
blank: waddū law tudhin f-yudhinūn
english_saheeh_international: They wish that you would soften in your position, so they would soften toward you

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تُطِع كُلَّ حَلّافٍ مَهينٍ
blank: w-lā tuṭiʿ kull ḥallāf mahīn
english_saheeh_international: And do not obey every worthless habitual swearer

arabic_uthmani: هَمّازٍ مَشّاءٍ بِنَميمٍ
blank: hammāz mashshāʾ b-namīm
english_saheeh_international: And scorner, going about with malicious gossip

arabic_uthmani: مَنّاعٍ لِلخَيرِ مُعتَدٍ أَثيمٍ
blank: mannāʿ l-l-khayr muʿtad ʾathīm
english_saheeh_international: A preventer of good, transgressing and sinful

arabic_uthmani: عُتُلٍّ بَعدَ ذٰلِكَ زَنيمٍ
blank: ʿutull baʿd dhālik zanīm
english_saheeh_international: Cruel, moreover, and an illegitimate pretender

arabic_uthmani: أَن كانَ ذا مالٍ وَبَنينَ
blank: ʾ kān dhā māl w-banīn
english_saheeh_international: Because he is a possessor of wealth and children

arabic_uthmani: إِذا تُتلىٰ عَلَيهِ آياتُنا قالَ أَساطيرُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: ʾidhā tutlā ʿalayh ʾāyātunā qāl ʾasāṭīrul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: سَنَسِمُهُ عَلَى الخُرطومِ
blank: s-nasimuhū ʿalāl-khurṭūm
english_saheeh_international: We will brand him upon the snout

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا بَلَوناهُم كَما بَلَونا أَصحابَ الجَنَّةِ إِذ أَقسَموا لَيَصرِمُنَّها مُصبِحينَ
blank: ʾinnā balawnāhum k-mā balawnā ʾaṣḥābal-jannat ʾidh ʾaqsamū l-yaṣrimunnahā muṣbiḥīn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have tried them as We tried the companions of the garden, when they swore to cut its fruit in the early morning

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَستَثنونَ
blank: w-lā yastathnūn
english_saheeh_international: Without making exception

arabic_uthmani: فَطافَ عَلَيها طائِفٌ مِن رَبِّكَ وَهُم نائِمونَ
blank: f-ṭāf ʿalayhā ṭāʾif m rabbik w-hum nāʾimūn
english_saheeh_international: So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep

arabic_uthmani: فَأَصبَحَت كَالصَّريمِ
blank: f-ʾaṣbaḥat k-ṣ-ṣarīm
english_saheeh_international: And it became as though reaped

arabic_uthmani: فَتَنادَوا مُصبِحينَ
blank: f-tanādaw muṣbiḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And they called one another at morning

arabic_uthmani: أَنِ اغدوا عَلىٰ حَرثِكُم إِن كُنتُم صارِمينَ
blank: ʾan ghdū ʿalā ḥarthikum ʾ kuntum ṣārimīn
english_saheeh_international: Saying, "Go early to your crop if you would cut the fruit

arabic_uthmani: فَانطَلَقوا وَهُم يَتَخافَتونَ
blank: f-nṭalaqū w-hum yatakhāfatūn
english_saheeh_international: So they set out, while lowering their voices

arabic_uthmani: أَن لا يَدخُلَنَّهَا اليَومَ عَلَيكُم مِسكينٌ
blank: ʾ lā yadkhulannahāl-yawm ʿalaykum miskīn
english_saheeh_international: Saying, "There will surely not enter it today upon you any poor person

arabic_uthmani: وَغَدَوا عَلىٰ حَردٍ قادِرينَ
blank: w-ghadaw ʿalā ḥard qādirīn
english_saheeh_international: And they went early in determination, assuming themselves able

arabic_uthmani: فَلَمّا رَأَوها قالوا إِنّا لَضالّونَ
blank: f-lammā raʾawhā qālū ʾinnā l-ḍāllūn
english_saheeh_international: But when they saw it, they said, "Indeed, we are lost

arabic_uthmani: بَل نَحنُ مَحرومونَ
blank: bal naḥn maḥrūmūn
english_saheeh_international: Rather, we have been deprived

arabic_uthmani: قالَ أَوسَطُهُم أَلَم أَقُل لَكُم لَولا تُسَبِّحونَ
blank: qāl ʾawsaṭuhum ʾ-lam ʾaqul lakum law-lā tusabbiḥūn
english_saheeh_international: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt Allah

arabic_uthmani: قالوا سُبحانَ رَبِّنا إِنّا كُنّا ظالِمينَ
blank: qālū subḥān rabbinā ʾinnā kunnā ẓālimīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers

arabic_uthmani: فَأَقبَلَ بَعضُهُم عَلىٰ بَعضٍ يَتَلاوَمونَ
blank: f-ʾaqbal baʿḍuhum ʿalā baʿḍ yatalāwamūn
english_saheeh_international: Then they approached one another, blaming each other

arabic_uthmani: قالوا يا وَيلَنا إِنّا كُنّا طاغينَ
blank: qālū yā-waylanā ʾinnā kunnā ṭāghīn
english_saheeh_international: They said, "O woe to us; indeed we were transgressors

arabic_uthmani: عَسىٰ رَبُّنا أَن يُبدِلَنا خَيرًا مِنها إِنّا إِلىٰ رَبِّنا راغِبونَ
blank: ʿasā rabbunā ʾ yubdilanā khayram-minhā ʾinnā ʾilā rabbinā rāghibūn
english_saheeh_international: Perhaps our Lord will substitute for us one better than it. Indeed, we are toward our Lord desirous

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ العَذابُ ۖ وَلَعَذابُ الآخِرَةِ أَكبَرُ ۚ لَو كانوا يَعلَمونَ
blank: k-dhālikal-ʿadhāb w-l-ʿadhābul-ʾākhirat ʾakbar law kānū yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Such is the punishment of this world. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ لِلمُتَّقينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِم جَنّاتِ النَّعيمِ
blank: ʾinn l-l-muttaqīn ʿind rabbihim jannāt n-naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure

arabic_uthmani: أَفَنَجعَلُ المُسلِمينَ كَالمُجرِمينَ
blank: ʾ-f-najʿalul-muslimīn k-l-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: Then will We treat the Muslims like the criminals

arabic_uthmani: ما لَكُم كَيفَ تَحكُمونَ
blank: mā lakum kayf taḥkumūn
english_saheeh_international: What is the matter with you? How do you judge

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَكُم كِتابٌ فيهِ تَدرُسونَ
blank: ʾam lakum kitāb fīh tadrusūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ لَكُم فيهِ لَما تَخَيَّرونَ
blank: ʾinn lakum fīh l-mā takhayyarūn
english_saheeh_international: That indeed for you is whatever you choose

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَكُم أَيمانٌ عَلَينا بالِغَةٌ إِلىٰ يَومِ القِيامَةِ ۙ إِنَّ لَكُم لَما تَحكُمونَ
blank: ʾam lakum ʾaymān ʿalaynā bālighat ʾilā yawmil-qiyāmat ʾinn lakum l-mā taḥkumūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do you have oaths binding upon Us, extending until the Day of Resurrection, that indeed for you is whatever you judge

arabic_uthmani: سَلهُم أَيُّهُم بِذٰلِكَ زَعيمٌ
blank: salhum ʾayyuhum b-dhālik zaʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Ask them which of them, for that claim, is responsible

arabic_uthmani: أَم لَهُم شُرَكاءُ فَليَأتوا بِشُرَكائِهِم إِن كانوا صادِقينَ
blank: ʾam lahum shurakāʾ f-l-yaʾtū b-shurakāʾihim ʾ kānū ṣādiqīn
english_saheeh_international: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يُكشَفُ عَن ساقٍ وَيُدعَونَ إِلَى السُّجودِ فَلا يَستَطيعونَ
blank: yawm yukshaf ʿ sāq w-yudʿawn ʾilā s-sujūd f-lā yastaṭīʿūn
english_saheeh_international: The Day the shin will be uncovered and they are invited to prostration but the disbelievers will not be able

arabic_uthmani: خاشِعَةً أَبصارُهُم تَرهَقُهُم ذِلَّةٌ ۖ وَقَد كانوا يُدعَونَ إِلَى السُّجودِ وَهُم سالِمونَ
blank: khāshiʿat ʾabṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillat w-qad kānū yudʿawn ʾilā s-sujūd w-hum sālimūn
english_saheeh_international: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound

arabic_uthmani: فَذَرني وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهٰذَا الحَديثِ ۖ سَنَستَدرِجُهُم مِن حَيثُ لا يَعلَمونَ
blank: f-dharnī w-m yukadhdhib b-hādhāl-ḥadīth s-nastadrijuhum m hayth lā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: So leave Me, O Muhammad, with the matter of whoever denies the Qur'an. We will progressively lead them to punishment from where they do not know

arabic_uthmani: وَأُملي لَهُم ۚ إِنَّ كَيدي مَتينٌ
blank: w-ʾumlī lahum ʾinn kaydī matīn
english_saheeh_international: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm

arabic_uthmani: أَم تَسأَلُهُم أَجرًا فَهُم مِن مَغرَمٍ مُثقَلونَ
blank: ʾam tasʾaluhum ʾajr f-hum m maghram muthqalūn
english_saheeh_international: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down

arabic_uthmani: أَم عِندَهُمُ الغَيبُ فَهُم يَكتُبونَ
blank: ʾam ʿindahumul-ghayb f-hum yaktubūn
english_saheeh_international: Or have they knowledge of the unseen, so they write it down

arabic_uthmani: فَاصبِر لِحُكمِ رَبِّكَ وَلا تَكُن كَصاحِبِ الحوتِ إِذ نادىٰ وَهُوَ مَكظومٌ
blank: f-ṣbir l-ḥukm rabbik w-lā tak k-ṣāḥibil-ḥūt ʾidh nādā w-huw makẓūm
english_saheeh_international: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, O Muhammad, and be not like the companion of the fish when he called out while he was distressed

arabic_uthmani: لَولا أَن تَدارَكَهُ نِعمَةٌ مِن رَبِّهِ لَنُبِذَ بِالعَراءِ وَهُوَ مَذمومٌ
blank: law-lā ʾ tadārakahū niʿmat m rabbihī l-nubidh b-l-ʿarāʾ w-huw madhmūm
english_saheeh_international: If not that a favor from his Lord overtook him, he would have been thrown onto the naked shore while he was censured

arabic_uthmani: فَاجتَباهُ رَبُّهُ فَجَعَلَهُ مِنَ الصّالِحينَ
blank: f-jtabāh rabbuhū f-jaʿalahū min ṣ-ṣāliḥīn
english_saheeh_international: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَإِن يَكادُ الَّذينَ كَفَروا لَيُزلِقونَكَ بِأَبصارِهِم لَمّا سَمِعُوا الذِّكرَ وَيَقولونَ إِنَّهُ لَمَجنونٌ
blank: w-ʾ yakādulladhīn kafarū l-yuzliqūnak b-ʾabṣārihim lammā samiʿū dh-dhikr w-yaqūlūn ʾinnahū l-majnūn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad

arabic_uthmani: وَما هُوَ إِلّا ذِكرٌ لِلعالَمينَ
blank: w-mā huw ʾillā dhikr l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds

arabic_uthmani: الحاقَّةُ
blank: al-ḥāqqat
english_saheeh_international: The Inevitable Reality

arabic_uthmani: مَا الحاقَّةُ
blank: māl-ḥāqqat
english_saheeh_international: What is the Inevitable Reality

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ مَا الحاقَّةُ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk māl-ḥāqqat
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَت ثَمودُ وَعادٌ بِالقارِعَةِ
blank: kadhdhabat thamūd w-ʿād b-l-qāriʿat
english_saheeh_international: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمّا ثَمودُ فَأُهلِكوا بِالطّاغِيَةِ
blank: f-ʾammā thamūd f-ʾuhlikū b-ṭ-ṭāghiyat
english_saheeh_international: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering blast

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا عادٌ فَأُهلِكوا بِريحٍ صَرصَرٍ عاتِيَةٍ
blank: w-ʾammā ʿād f-ʾuhlikū b-rīḥ ṣarṣar ʿātiyat
english_saheeh_international: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind

arabic_uthmani: سَخَّرَها عَلَيهِم سَبعَ لَيالٍ وَثَمانِيَةَ أَيّامٍ حُسومًا فَتَرَى القَومَ فيها صَرعىٰ كَأَنَّهُم أَعجازُ نَخلٍ خاوِيَةٍ
blank: sakhkharahā ʿalayhim sabʿ layāl w-thamāniyat ʾayyām ḥusūm f-tarāl-qawm fīhā ṣarʿā k-ʾannahum ʾaʿjāz nakhl khāwiyat
english_saheeh_international: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees

arabic_uthmani: فَهَل تَرىٰ لَهُم مِن باقِيَةٍ
blank: f-hal tarā lahum m bāqiyat
english_saheeh_international: Then do you see of them any remains

arabic_uthmani: وَجاءَ فِرعَونُ وَمَن قَبلَهُ وَالمُؤتَفِكاتُ بِالخاطِئَةِ
blank: w-jāʾ firʾawn w-m qablahū w-l-muʾtafikāt b-l-khāṭiʾat
english_saheeh_international: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin

arabic_uthmani: فَعَصَوا رَسولَ رَبِّهِم فَأَخَذَهُم أَخذَةً رابِيَةً
blank: f-ʿaṣaw rasūl rabbihim f-ʾakhadhahum ʾakhdhat rābiyat
english_saheeh_international: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding in severity

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا لَمّا طَغَى الماءُ حَمَلناكُم فِي الجارِيَةِ
blank: ʾinnā lammā ṭaghāl-māʾ ḥamalnākum fīl-jāriyat
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship

arabic_uthmani: لِنَجعَلَها لَكُم تَذكِرَةً وَتَعِيَها أُذُنٌ واعِيَةٌ
blank: l-najʿalahā lakum tadhkirat w-taʿiyahā ʾudhun wāʿiyat
english_saheeh_international: That We might make it for you a reminder and that a conscious ear would be conscious of it

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا نُفِخَ فِي الصّورِ نَفخَةٌ واحِدَةٌ
blank: f-ʾidhā nufikh fī ṣ-ṣūr nafkhat wāḥidat
english_saheeh_international: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast

arabic_uthmani: وَحُمِلَتِ الأَرضُ وَالجِبالُ فَدُكَّتا دَكَّةً واحِدَةً
blank: w-ḥumilatil-ʾarḍ w-l-jibāl f-dukkatā dakkat wāḥidat
english_saheeh_international: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow

arabic_uthmani: فَيَومَئِذٍ وَقَعَتِ الواقِعَةُ
blank: f-yawmaʾidh waqaʿatil-wāqiʿat
english_saheeh_international: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur

arabic_uthmani: وَانشَقَّتِ السَّماءُ فَهِيَ يَومَئِذٍ واهِيَةٌ
blank: w-nshaqqat s-samāʾ f-hiy yawmaʾidh wāhiyat
english_saheeh_international: And the heaven will split open, for that Day it is infirm

arabic_uthmani: وَالمَلَكُ عَلىٰ أَرجائِها ۚ وَيَحمِلُ عَرشَ رَبِّكَ فَوقَهُم يَومَئِذٍ ثَمانِيَةٌ
blank: w-l-malak ʿalā ʾarjāʾihā w-yaḥmil ʿarsh rabbik fawqahum yawmaʾidh thamāniyat
english_saheeh_international: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight of them

arabic_uthmani: يَومَئِذٍ تُعرَضونَ لا تَخفىٰ مِنكُم خافِيَةٌ
blank: yawmaʾidh tuʿraḍūn lā takhfā minkum khāfiyat
english_saheeh_international: That Day, you will be exhibited for judgement; not hidden among you is anything concealed

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمّا مَن أوتِيَ كِتابَهُ بِيَمينِهِ فَيَقولُ هاؤُمُ اقرَءوا كِتابِيَه
blank: f-ʾammā m ʾūtiy kitābahū b-yamīnihī f-yaqūl hāʾum qraʾū kitābiyah
english_saheeh_international: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record

arabic_uthmani: إِنّي ظَنَنتُ أَنّي مُلاقٍ حِسابِيَه
blank: ʾinnī ẓanant ʾannī mulāq ḥisābiyah
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account

arabic_uthmani: فَهُوَ في عيشَةٍ راضِيَةٍ
blank: f-huw fī ʿīshat rāḍiyat
english_saheeh_international: So he will be in a pleasant life

arabic_uthmani: في جَنَّةٍ عالِيَةٍ
blank: fī jannat ʿāliyat
english_saheeh_international: In an elevated garden

arabic_uthmani: قُطوفُها دانِيَةٌ
blank: quṭūfuhā dāniyat
english_saheeh_international: Its fruit to be picked hanging near

arabic_uthmani: كُلوا وَاشرَبوا هَنيئًا بِما أَسلَفتُم فِي الأَيّامِ الخالِيَةِ
blank: kulū w-shrabū hanīʾ b-mā ʾaslaftum fīl-ʾayyāmil-khāliyat
english_saheeh_international: They will be told, "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا مَن أوتِيَ كِتابَهُ بِشِمالِهِ فَيَقولُ يا لَيتَني لَم أوتَ كِتابِيَه
blank: w-ʾammā m ʾūtiy kitābahū b-shimālihī f-yaqūl yā-laytanī lam ʾūt kitābiyah
english_saheeh_international: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record

arabic_uthmani: وَلَم أَدرِ ما حِسابِيَه
blank: w-lam ʾadr mā ḥisābiyah
english_saheeh_international: And had not known what is my account

arabic_uthmani: يا لَيتَها كانَتِ القاضِيَةَ
blank: yā-laytahā kānatil-qāḍiyat
english_saheeh_international: I wish my death had been the decisive one

arabic_uthmani: ما أَغنىٰ عَنّي مالِيَه ۜ
blank: mā ʾaghnā ʿannī māliyah
english_saheeh_international: My wealth has not availed me

arabic_uthmani: هَلَكَ عَنّي سُلطانِيَه
blank: halak ʿannī sulṭāniyah
english_saheeh_international: Gone from me is my authority

arabic_uthmani: خُذوهُ فَغُلّوهُ
blank: khudhūh f-ghullūh
english_saheeh_international: Allah will say, "Seize him and shackle him

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ الجَحيمَ صَلّوهُ
blank: thummal-jaḥīm ṣallūh
english_saheeh_international: Then into Hellfire drive him

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ في سِلسِلَةٍ ذَرعُها سَبعونَ ذِراعًا فَاسلُكوهُ
blank: thumm fī silsilat dharʿuhā sabʿūn dhirāʿ f-slukūh
english_saheeh_international: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ كانَ لا يُؤمِنُ بِاللَّهِ العَظيمِ
blank: ʾinnahū kān lā yuʾmin b-llāhil-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَحُضُّ عَلىٰ طَعامِ المِسكينِ
blank: w-lā yaḥuḍḍ ʿalā ṭaʿāmil-miskīn
english_saheeh_international: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor

arabic_uthmani: فَلَيسَ لَهُ اليَومَ هاهُنا حَميمٌ
blank: f-lays lahul-yawm hāhunā ḥamīm
english_saheeh_international: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend

arabic_uthmani: وَلا طَعامٌ إِلّا مِن غِسلينٍ
blank: w-lā ṭaʿām ʾillā m ghislīn
english_saheeh_international: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds

arabic_uthmani: لا يَأكُلُهُ إِلَّا الخاطِئونَ
blank: lā yaʾkuluhū ʾillāl-khāṭiʾūn
english_saheeh_international: None will eat it except the sinners

arabic_uthmani: فَلا أُقسِمُ بِما تُبصِرونَ
blank: f-lā ʾuqsim b-mā tubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: So I swear by what you see

arabic_uthmani: وَما لا تُبصِرونَ
blank: w-mā lā tubṣirūn
english_saheeh_international: And what you do not see

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ لَقَولُ رَسولٍ كَريمٍ
blank: ʾinnahū l-qawl rasūl karīm
english_saheeh_international: That indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger

arabic_uthmani: وَما هُوَ بِقَولِ شاعِرٍ ۚ قَليلًا ما تُؤمِنونَ
blank: w-mā huw b-qawl shāʿir qalīlam-mā tuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe

arabic_uthmani: وَلا بِقَولِ كاهِنٍ ۚ قَليلًا ما تَذَكَّرونَ
blank: w-lā b-qawl kāhin qalīlam-mā tadhakkarūn
english_saheeh_international: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember

arabic_uthmani: تَنزيلٌ مِن رَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: tanzīl m rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: It is a revelation from the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو تَقَوَّلَ عَلَينا بَعضَ الأَقاويلِ
blank: w-law taqawwal ʿalaynā baʿḍal-ʾaqāwīl
english_saheeh_international: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some false sayings

arabic_uthmani: لَأَخَذنا مِنهُ بِاليَمينِ
blank: l-ʾakhadhnā minh b-l-yamīn
english_saheeh_international: We would have seized him by the right hand

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعنا مِنهُ الوَتينَ
blank: thumm l-qaṭaʿnā minhul-watīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We would have cut from him the aorta

arabic_uthmani: فَما مِنكُم مِن أَحَدٍ عَنهُ حاجِزينَ
blank: f-mā minkum m ʾaḥad ʿanh ḥājizīn
english_saheeh_international: And there is no one of you who could prevent Us from him

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لَتَذكِرَةٌ لِلمُتَّقينَ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-tadhkirat l-l-muttaqīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّا لَنَعلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُكَذِّبينَ
blank: w-ʾinnā l-naʿlam ʾann minkum mukadhdhibīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَسرَةٌ عَلَى الكافِرينَ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-ḥasrat ʿalāl-kāfirīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, it will be a cause of regret upon the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَقُّ اليَقينِ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-ḥaqqul-yaqīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty

arabic_uthmani: فَسَبِّح بِاسمِ رَبِّكَ العَظيمِ
blank: f-sabbiḥ bism rabbikal-ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great

arabic_uthmani: سَأَلَ سائِلٌ بِعَذابٍ واقِعٍ
blank: saʾal sāʾil b-ʿadhāb wāqiʿ
english_saheeh_international: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen

arabic_uthmani: لِلكافِرينَ لَيسَ لَهُ دافِعٌ
blank: l-l-kāfirīn lays lahū dāfiʿ
english_saheeh_international: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer

arabic_uthmani: مِنَ اللَّهِ ذِي المَعارِجِ
blank: min llāh dhīl-maʿārij
english_saheeh_international: It is from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent

arabic_uthmani: تَعرُجُ المَلائِكَةُ وَالرّوحُ إِلَيهِ في يَومٍ كانَ مِقدارُهُ خَمسينَ أَلفَ سَنَةٍ
blank: taʿrujul-malāʾikat w-r-rūḥ ʾilayh fī yawm kān miqdāruhū khamsīn ʾalf sanat
english_saheeh_international: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years

arabic_uthmani: فَاصبِر صَبرًا جَميلًا
blank: f-ṣbir ṣabr jamīl
english_saheeh_international: So be patient with gracious patience

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُم يَرَونَهُ بَعيدًا
blank: ʾinnahum yarawnahū baʿīd
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, they see it as distant

arabic_uthmani: وَنَراهُ قَريبًا
blank: w-narāh qarīb
english_saheeh_international: But We see it as near

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تَكونُ السَّماءُ كَالمُهلِ
blank: yawm takūn s-samāʾ k-l-muhl
english_saheeh_international: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil

arabic_uthmani: وَتَكونُ الجِبالُ كَالعِهنِ
blank: w-takūnul-jibāl k-l-ʿihn
english_saheeh_international: And the mountains will be like wool

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَسأَلُ حَميمٌ حَميمًا
blank: w-lā yasʾal ḥamīm ḥamīm
english_saheeh_international: And no friend will ask anything of a friend

arabic_uthmani: يُبَصَّرونَهُم ۚ يَوَدُّ المُجرِمُ لَو يَفتَدي مِن عَذابِ يَومِئِذٍ بِبَنيهِ
blank: yubaṣṣarūnahum yawaddul-mujrim law yaftadī m ʿadhāb yawmiʾidh b-banīh
english_saheeh_international: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children

arabic_uthmani: وَصاحِبَتِهِ وَأَخيهِ
blank: w-ṣāḥibatihī w-ʾakhīh
english_saheeh_international: And his wife and his brother

arabic_uthmani: وَفَصيلَتِهِ الَّتي تُؤويهِ
blank: w-faṣīlatih llatī tuʾwīh
english_saheeh_international: And his nearest kindred who shelter him

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن فِي الأَرضِ جَميعًا ثُمَّ يُنجيهِ
blank: w-m fīl-ʾarḍ jamīʿ thumm yunjīh
english_saheeh_international: And whoever is on earth entirely so then it could save him

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا ۖ إِنَّها لَظىٰ
blank: kallā ʾinnahā laẓā
english_saheeh_international: No! Indeed, it is the Flame of Hell

arabic_uthmani: نَزّاعَةً لِلشَّوىٰ
blank: nazzāʿat l-sh-shawā
english_saheeh_international: A remover of exteriors

arabic_uthmani: تَدعو مَن أَدبَرَ وَتَوَلّىٰ
blank: tadʿū m ʾadbar w-tawallā
english_saheeh_international: It invites he who turned his back on truth and went away from obedience

arabic_uthmani: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوعىٰ
blank: w-jamaʿ f-ʾawʿā
english_saheeh_international: And collected wealth and hoarded

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ الإِنسانَ خُلِقَ هَلوعًا
blank: ʾinnal-ʾinsān khuliq halūʿ
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, mankind was created anxious

arabic_uthmani: إِذا مَسَّهُ الشَّرُّ جَزوعًا
blank: ʾidhā massah sh-sharr jazūʿ
english_saheeh_international: When evil touches him, impatient

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا مَسَّهُ الخَيرُ مَنوعًا
blank: w-ʾidhā massahul-khayr manūʿ
english_saheeh_international: And when good touches him, withholding of it

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا المُصَلّينَ
blank: ʾillāl-muṣallīn
english_saheeh_international: Except the observers of prayer

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ هُم عَلىٰ صَلاتِهِم دائِمونَ
blank: alladhīn hum ʿalā ṣalātihim dāʾimūn
english_saheeh_international: Those who are constant in their prayer

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ في أَموالِهِم حَقٌّ مَعلومٌ
blank: w-lladhīn fī ʾamwālihim ḥaqq maʿlūm
english_saheeh_international: And those within whose wealth is a known right

arabic_uthmani: لِلسّائِلِ وَالمَحرومِ
blank: l-s-sāʾil w-l-maḥrūm
english_saheeh_international: For the petitioner and the deprived

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ يُصَدِّقونَ بِيَومِ الدّينِ
blank: w-lladhīn yuṣaddiqūn b-yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ هُم مِن عَذابِ رَبِّهِم مُشفِقونَ
blank: w-lladhīn hum m ʿadhāb rabbihim mushfiqūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ عَذابَ رَبِّهِم غَيرُ مَأمونٍ
