blank: ʾinn ʿadhāb rabbihim ghayr maʾmūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ هُم لِفُروجِهِم حافِظونَ
blank: w-lladhīn hum l-furūjihim ḥāfiẓūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who guard their private parts

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا عَلىٰ أَزواجِهِم أَو ما مَلَكَت أَيمانُهُم فَإِنَّهُم غَيرُ مَلومينَ
blank: illā ʿalā ʾazwājihim ʾaw mā malakat ʾaymānuhum f-ʾinnahum ghayr malūmīn
english_saheeh_international: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed

arabic_uthmani: فَمَنِ ابتَغىٰ وَراءَ ذٰلِكَ فَأُولٰئِكَ هُمُ العادونَ
blank: f-man btaghā warāʾ dhālik f-ʾulāʾik humul-ʿādūn
english_saheeh_international: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ هُم لِأَماناتِهِم وَعَهدِهِم راعونَ
blank: w-lladhīn hum l-ʾamānātihim w-ʿahdihim rāʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ هُم بِشَهاداتِهِم قائِمونَ
blank: w-lladhīn hum b-shahādātihim qāʾimūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who are in their testimonies upright

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ هُم عَلىٰ صَلاتِهِم يُحافِظونَ
blank: w-lladhīn hum ʿalā ṣalātihim yuḥāfiẓūn
english_saheeh_international: And those who carefully maintain their prayer

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ في جَنّاتٍ مُكرَمونَ
blank: ʾulāʾik fī jannāt mukramūn
english_saheeh_international: They will be in gardens, honored

arabic_uthmani: فَمالِ الَّذينَ كَفَروا قِبَلَكَ مُهطِعينَ
blank: f-mā-lilladhīn kafarū qibalak muhṭiʿīn
english_saheeh_international: So what is the matter with those who disbelieve, hastening from before you, O Muhammad

arabic_uthmani: عَنِ اليَمينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمالِ عِزينَ
blank: ʿanil-yamīn w-ʿan sh-shimāl ʿizīn
english_saheeh_international: To sit on your right and your left in separate groups

arabic_uthmani: أَيَطمَعُ كُلُّ امرِئٍ مِنهُم أَن يُدخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعيمٍ
blank: ʾ-yaṭmaʿ kull mriʾ minhum ʾ yudkhal jannat naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا ۖ إِنّا خَلَقناهُم مِمّا يَعلَمونَ
blank: kallā ʾinnā khalaqnāhum mimmā yaʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know

arabic_uthmani: فَلا أُقسِمُ بِرَبِّ المَشارِقِ وَالمَغارِبِ إِنّا لَقادِرونَ
blank: f-lā ʾuqsim b-rabbil-mashāriq w-l-maghārib ʾinnā l-qādirūn
english_saheeh_international: So I swear by the Lord of all risings and settings that indeed We are able

arabic_uthmani: عَلىٰ أَن نُبَدِّلَ خَيرًا مِنهُم وَما نَحنُ بِمَسبوقينَ
blank: ʿalā ʾ nubaddil khayram-minhum w-mā naḥn b-masbūqīn
english_saheeh_international: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone

arabic_uthmani: فَذَرهُم يَخوضوا وَيَلعَبوا حَتّىٰ يُلاقوا يَومَهُمُ الَّذي يوعَدونَ
blank: f-dharhum yakhūḍū w-yalʿabū ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumulladhī yūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَخرُجونَ مِنَ الأَجداثِ سِراعًا كَأَنَّهُم إِلىٰ نُصُبٍ يوفِضونَ
blank: yawm yakhrujūn minal-ʾajdāth sirāʿ k-ʾannahum ʾilā nuṣub yūfiḍūn
english_saheeh_international: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening

arabic_uthmani: خاشِعَةً أَبصارُهُم تَرهَقُهُم ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذٰلِكَ اليَومُ الَّذي كانوا يوعَدونَ
blank: khāshiʿat ʾabṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillat dhālikal-yawmulladhī kānū yūʿadūn
english_saheeh_international: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَرسَلنا نوحًا إِلىٰ قَومِهِ أَن أَنذِر قَومَكَ مِن قَبلِ أَن يَأتِيَهُم عَذابٌ أَليمٌ
blank: ʾinnā ʾarsalnā nūḥ ʾilā qawmihī ʾ ʾandhir qawmak m qabl ʾ yaʾtiyahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, saying, "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: قالَ يا قَومِ إِنّي لَكُم نَذيرٌ مُبينٌ
blank: qāl yā-qawm ʾinnī lakum nadhīr mubīn
english_saheeh_international: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner

arabic_uthmani: أَنِ اعبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقوهُ وَأَطيعونِ
blank: ʾan ʿbudū llāh w-ttaqūh w-ʾaṭīʿūn
english_saheeh_international: Saying, 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me

arabic_uthmani: يَغفِر لَكُم مِن ذُنوبِكُم وَيُؤَخِّركُم إِلىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذا جاءَ لا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَو كُنتُم تَعلَمونَ
blank: yaghfir lakum m dhunūbikum w-yuʾakhkhirkum ʾilā ʾajal musamm ʾinn ʾajal llāh ʾidhā jāʾ lā yuʾakhkhar law kuntum taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time set by Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew

arabic_uthmani: قالَ رَبِّ إِنّي دَعَوتُ قَومي لَيلًا وَنَهارًا
blank: qāl rabb ʾinnī daʿawt qawmī layl w-nahār
english_saheeh_international: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people to truth night and day

arabic_uthmani: فَلَم يَزِدهُم دُعائي إِلّا فِرارًا
blank: f-lam yazidhum duʿāʾī ʾillā firār
english_saheeh_international: But my invitation increased them not except in flight

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنّي كُلَّما دَعَوتُهُم لِتَغفِرَ لَهُم جَعَلوا أَصابِعَهُم في آذانِهِم وَاستَغشَوا ثِيابَهُم وَأَصَرّوا وَاستَكبَرُوا استِكبارًا
blank: w-ʾinnī kullamā daʿawtuhum l-taghfir lahum jaʿalū ʾaṣābiʿahum fī ʾādhānihim w-staghshaw thiyābahum w-ʾaṣarrū w-stakbarū stikbār
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with great arrogance

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنّي دَعَوتُهُم جِهارًا
blank: thumm ʾinnī daʿawtuhum jihār
english_saheeh_international: Then I invited them publicly

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنّي أَعلَنتُ لَهُم وَأَسرَرتُ لَهُم إِسرارًا
blank: thumm ʾinnī ʾaʿlant lahum w-ʾasrart lahum ʾisrār
english_saheeh_international: Then I announced to them and also confided to them secretly

arabic_uthmani: فَقُلتُ استَغفِروا رَبَّكُم إِنَّهُ كانَ غَفّارًا
blank: f-qult staghfirū rabbakum ʾinnahū kān ghaffār
english_saheeh_international: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver

arabic_uthmani: يُرسِلِ السَّماءَ عَلَيكُم مِدرارًا
blank: yursil s-samāʾ ʿalaykum midrār
english_saheeh_international: He will send rain from the sky upon you in continuing showers

arabic_uthmani: وَيُمدِدكُم بِأَموالٍ وَبَنينَ وَيَجعَل لَكُم جَنّاتٍ وَيَجعَل لَكُم أَنهارًا
blank: w-yumdidkum b-ʾamwāl w-banīn w-yajʿal lakum jannāt w-yajʿal lakum ʾanhār
english_saheeh_international: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers

arabic_uthmani: ما لَكُم لا تَرجونَ لِلَّهِ وَقارًا
blank: mā lakum lā tarjūn l-llāh waqār
english_saheeh_international: What is the matter with you that you do not attribute to Allah due grandeur

arabic_uthmani: وَقَد خَلَقَكُم أَطوارًا
blank: w-qad khalaqakum ʾaṭwār
english_saheeh_international: While He has created you in stages

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَوا كَيفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبعَ سَماواتٍ طِباقًا
blank: ʾ-lam taraw kayf khalaq llāh sabʿ samāwāt ṭibāq
english_saheeh_international: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلَ القَمَرَ فيهِنَّ نورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمسَ سِراجًا
blank: w-jaʿalal-qamar fīhinn nūr w-jaʿal sh-shams sirāj
english_saheeh_international: And made the moon therein a reflected light and made the sun a burning lamp

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ أَنبَتَكُم مِنَ الأَرضِ نَباتًا
blank: w-llāh ʾanbatakum minal-ʾarḍ nabāt
english_saheeh_international: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a progressive growth

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ يُعيدُكُم فيها وَيُخرِجُكُم إِخراجًا
blank: thumm yuʿīdukum fīhā w-yukhrijukum ʾikhrāj
english_saheeh_international: Then He will return you into it and extract you another extraction

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الأَرضَ بِساطًا
blank: w-llāh jaʿal lakumul-ʾarḍ bisāṭ
english_saheeh_international: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

arabic_uthmani: لِتَسلُكوا مِنها سُبُلًا فِجاجًا
blank: l-taslukū minhā subul fijāj
english_saheeh_international: That you may follow therein roads of passage

arabic_uthmani: قالَ نوحٌ رَبِّ إِنَّهُم عَصَوني وَاتَّبَعوا مَن لَم يَزِدهُ مالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلّا خَسارًا
blank: qāl nūḥ rabb ʾinnahum ʿaṣawnī w-ttabaʿū m lam yazidh māluhū w-waladuhū ʾillā khasār
english_saheeh_international: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss

arabic_uthmani: وَمَكَروا مَكرًا كُبّارًا
blank: w-makarū makr kubbār
english_saheeh_international: And they conspired an immense conspiracy

arabic_uthmani: وَقالوا لا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُم وَلا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلا سُواعًا وَلا يَغوثَ وَيَعوقَ وَنَسرًا
blank: w-qālū lā tadharunn ʾālihatakum w-lā tadharunn wadd w-lā suwāʿ w-lā yaghūth w-yaʿūq w-nasr
english_saheeh_international: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr

arabic_uthmani: وَقَد أَضَلّوا كَثيرًا ۖ وَلا تَزِدِ الظّالِمينَ إِلّا ضَلالًا
blank: w-qad ʾaḍallū kathīr w-lā tazid ẓ-ẓālimīn ʾillā ḍalāl
english_saheeh_international: And already they have misled many. And, my Lord, do not increase the wrongdoers except in error

arabic_uthmani: مِمّا خَطيئَاتِهِم أُغرِقوا فَأُدخِلوا نارًا فَلَم يَجِدوا لَهُم مِن دونِ اللَّهِ أَنصارًا
blank: mimmā khaṭīʾātihim ʾughriqū f-ʾudkhilū nār f-lam yajidū lahum m dūn llāh ʾanṣār
english_saheeh_international: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah any helpers

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ نوحٌ رَبِّ لا تَذَر عَلَى الأَرضِ مِنَ الكافِرينَ دَيّارًا
blank: w-qāl nūḥ rabb lā tadhar ʿalāl-ʾarḍ minal-kāfirīn dayyār
english_saheeh_international: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرهُم يُضِلّوا عِبادَكَ وَلا يَلِدوا إِلّا فاجِرًا كَفّارًا
blank: ʾinnak ʾ tadharhum yuḍillū ʿibādak w-lā yalidū ʾillā fājir kaffār
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except every wicked one and confirmed disbeliever

arabic_uthmani: رَبِّ اغفِر لي وَلِوالِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيتِيَ مُؤمِنًا وَلِلمُؤمِنينَ وَالمُؤمِناتِ وَلا تَزِدِ الظّالِمينَ إِلّا تَبارًا
blank: rabb ghfir lī w-l-wālidayy w-l-m dakhal baytiy muʾmin w-l-l-muʾminīn w-l-muʾmināt w-lā tazid ẓ-ẓālimīn ʾillā tabār
english_saheeh_international: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction

arabic_uthmani: قُل أوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ استَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِنَ الجِنِّ فَقالوا إِنّا سَمِعنا قُرآنًا عَجَبًا
blank: qul ʾūḥiy ʾilayy ʾannah stamaʿ nafar minal-jinn f-qālū ʾinnā samiʿnā qurʾān ʿajab
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: يَهدي إِلَى الرُّشدِ فَآمَنّا بِهِ ۖ وَلَن نُشرِكَ بِرَبِّنا أَحَدًا
blank: yahdī ʾilā r-rushd f-ʾāmannā bihī w-l nushrik b-rabbinā ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ تَعالىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنا مَا اتَّخَذَ صاحِبَةً وَلا وَلَدًا
blank: w-ʾannahū taʿālā jadd rabbinā mā ttakhadh ṣāḥibat w-lā walad
english_saheeh_international: And it teaches that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ كانَ يَقولُ سَفيهُنا عَلَى اللَّهِ شَطَطًا
blank: w-ʾannahū kān yaqūl safīhunā ʿalā llāh shaṭaṭ
english_saheeh_international: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنّا ظَنَنّا أَن لَن تَقولَ الإِنسُ وَالجِنُّ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا
blank: w-ʾannā ẓanannā ʾ l taqūlal-ʾins w-l-jinn ʿalā llāh kadhib
english_saheeh_international: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ كانَ رِجالٌ مِنَ الإِنسِ يَعوذونَ بِرِجالٍ مِنَ الجِنِّ فَزادوهُم رَهَقًا
blank: w-ʾannahū kān rijāl minal-ʾins yaʿūdhūn b-rijāl minal-jinn f-zādūhum rahaq
english_saheeh_international: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they only increased them in burden

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُم ظَنّوا كَما ظَنَنتُم أَن لَن يَبعَثَ اللَّهُ أَحَدًا
blank: w-ʾannahum ẓannū k-mā ẓanantum ʾ l yabʿath llāh ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone as a messenger

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنّا لَمَسنَا السَّماءَ فَوَجَدناها مُلِئَت حَرَسًا شَديدًا وَشُهُبًا
blank: w-ʾannā lamasnā s-samāʾ f-wajadnāhā muliʾat ḥaras shadīd w-shuhub
english_saheeh_international: And we have sought to reach the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنّا كُنّا نَقعُدُ مِنها مَقاعِدَ لِلسَّمعِ ۖ فَمَن يَستَمِعِ الآنَ يَجِد لَهُ شِهابًا رَصَدًا
blank: w-ʾannā kunnā naqʿud minhā maqāʿid l-s-samʿ f-m yastamiʿil-ʾān yajid lahū shihāb raṣad
english_saheeh_international: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنّا لا نَدري أَشَرٌّ أُريدَ بِمَن فِي الأَرضِ أَم أَرادَ بِهِم رَبُّهُم رَشَدًا
blank: w-ʾannā lā nadrī ʾ-sharr ʾurīd b-m fīl-ʾarḍ ʾam ʾarād bihim rabbuhum rashad
english_saheeh_international: And we do not know therefore whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنّا مِنَّا الصّالِحونَ وَمِنّا دونَ ذٰلِكَ ۖ كُنّا طَرائِقَ قِدَدًا
blank: w-ʾannā minnā ṣ-ṣāliḥūn w-minnā dūn dhālik kunnā ṭarāʾiq qidad
english_saheeh_international: And among us are the righteous, and among us are others not so; we were of divided ways

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنّا ظَنَنّا أَن لَن نُعجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الأَرضِ وَلَن نُعجِزَهُ هَرَبًا
blank: w-ʾannā ẓanannā ʾ l nuʿjiz llāh fīl-ʾarḍ w-l nuʿjizahū harab
english_saheeh_international: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنّا لَمّا سَمِعنَا الهُدىٰ آمَنّا بِهِ ۖ فَمَن يُؤمِن بِرَبِّهِ فَلا يَخافُ بَخسًا وَلا رَهَقًا
blank: w-ʾannā lammā samiʿnāl-hudā ʾāmannā bihī f-m yuʾm b-rabbihī f-lā yakhāf bakhs w-lā rahaq
english_saheeh_international: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنّا مِنَّا المُسلِمونَ وَمِنَّا القاسِطونَ ۖ فَمَن أَسلَمَ فَأُولٰئِكَ تَحَرَّوا رَشَدًا
blank: w-ʾannā minnāl-muslimūn w-minnāl-qāsiṭūn f-m ʾaslam f-ʾulāʾik taḥarraw rashad
english_saheeh_international: And among us are Muslims in submission to Allah, and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمَّا القاسِطونَ فَكانوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
blank: w-ʾammāl-qāsiṭūn f-kānū l-jahannam ḥaṭab
english_saheeh_international: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood

arabic_uthmani: وَأَن لَوِ استَقاموا عَلَى الطَّريقَةِ لَأَسقَيناهُم ماءً غَدَقًا
blank: w-ʾallaw staqāmū ʿalā ṭ-ṭarīqat l-ʾasqaynāhum māʾ ghadaq
english_saheeh_international: And Allah revealed that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

arabic_uthmani: لِنَفتِنَهُم فيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعرِض عَن ذِكرِ رَبِّهِ يَسلُكهُ عَذابًا صَعَدًا
blank: l-naftinahum fīh w-m yuʿriḍ ʿ dhikr rabbihī yaslukh ʿadhāb ṣaʿad
english_saheeh_international: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّ المَساجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلا تَدعوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا
blank: w-ʾannal-masājid l-llāh f-lā tadʿū maʿ llāh ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: And He revealed that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُ لَمّا قامَ عَبدُ اللَّهِ يَدعوهُ كادوا يَكونونَ عَلَيهِ لِبَدًا
blank: w-ʾannahū lammā qām ʿabd llāh yadʿūh kādū yakūnūn ʿalayh libad
english_saheeh_international: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنَّما أَدعو رَبّي وَلا أُشرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا
blank: qul ʾinnamā ʾadʿū rabbī w-lā ʾushrik bihī ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: Say, O Muhammad, "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنّي لا أَملِكُ لَكُم ضَرًّا وَلا رَشَدًا
blank: qul ʾinnī lā ʾamlik lakum ḍarr w-lā rashad
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you the power of harm or right direction

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِنّي لَن يُجيرَني مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَن أَجِدَ مِن دونِهِ مُلتَحَدًا
blank: qul ʾinnī l yujīranī min llāh ʾaḥad w-l ʾajid m dūnihī multaḥad
english_saheeh_international: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone if I should disobey, nor will I find in other than Him a refuge

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا بَلاغًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسالاتِهِ ۚ وَمَن يَعصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نارَ جَهَنَّمَ خالِدينَ فيها أَبَدًا
blank: ʾillā balāgham-min llāh w-risālātihī w-m yaʿṣ llāh w-rasūlahū f-ʾinn lahū nār jahannam khālidīn fīhā ʾabad
english_saheeh_international: But I have for you only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever

arabic_uthmani: حَتّىٰ إِذا رَأَوا ما يوعَدونَ فَسَيَعلَمونَ مَن أَضعَفُ ناصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
blank: ḥattā ʾidhā raʾaw mā yūʿadūn f-s-yaʿlamūn m ʾaḍʿaf nāṣir w-ʾaqall ʿadad
english_saheeh_international: The disbelievers continue until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number

arabic_uthmani: قُل إِن أَدري أَقَريبٌ ما توعَدونَ أَم يَجعَلُ لَهُ رَبّي أَمَدًا
blank: qul ʾ ʾadrī ʾ-qarīb mā tūʿadūn ʾam yajʿal lahū rabbī ʾamad
english_saheeh_international: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a long period

arabic_uthmani: عالِمُ الغَيبِ فَلا يُظهِرُ عَلىٰ غَيبِهِ أَحَدًا
blank: ʿālimul-ghayb f-lā yuẓhir ʿalā ghaybihī ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: He is Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His knowledge of the unseen to anyone

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا مَنِ ارتَضىٰ مِن رَسولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسلُكُ مِن بَينِ يَدَيهِ وَمِن خَلفِهِ رَصَدًا
blank: ʾillā man rtaḍā m rasūl f-ʾinnahū yasluk m bayn yadayh w-m khalfihī raṣad
english_saheeh_international: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers

arabic_uthmani: لِيَعلَمَ أَن قَد أَبلَغوا رِسالاتِ رَبِّهِم وَأَحاطَ بِما لَدَيهِم وَأَحصىٰ كُلَّ شَيءٍ عَدَدًا
blank: l-yaʿlam ʾ qad ʾablaghū risālāt rabbihim w-ʾaḥāṭ b-mā ladayhim w-ʾaḥṣā kull shayʾ ʿadad
english_saheeh_international: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا المُزَّمِّلُ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhāl-muzzammil
english_saheeh_international: O you who wraps himself in clothing

arabic_uthmani: قُمِ اللَّيلَ إِلّا قَليلًا
blank: qumil-layl ʾillā qalīl
english_saheeh_international: Arise to pray the night, except for a little

arabic_uthmani: نِصفَهُ أَوِ انقُص مِنهُ قَليلًا
blank: niṣfahū ʾaw nquṣ minh qalīl
english_saheeh_international: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

arabic_uthmani: أَو زِد عَلَيهِ وَرَتِّلِ القُرآنَ تَرتيلًا
blank: ʾaw zid ʿalayh w-rattilil-qurʾān tartīl
english_saheeh_international: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا سَنُلقي عَلَيكَ قَولًا ثَقيلًا
blank: ʾinnā s-nulqī ʿalayk qawl thaqīl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ ناشِئَةَ اللَّيلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطئًا وَأَقوَمُ قيلًا
blank: ʾinn nāshiʾatal-layl hiy ʾashadd waṭʾ w-ʾaqwam qīl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence of heart and tongue and more suitable for words

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهارِ سَبحًا طَويلًا
blank: ʾinn lak fī n-nahār sabḥ ṭawīl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation

arabic_uthmani: وَاذكُرِ اسمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّل إِلَيهِ تَبتيلًا
blank: w-dhkur sm rabbik w-tabattal ʾilayh tabtīl
english_saheeh_international: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with complete devotion

arabic_uthmani: رَبُّ المَشرِقِ وَالمَغرِبِ لا إِلٰهَ إِلّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذهُ وَكيلًا
blank: rabbul-mashriq w-l-maghrib lā ʾilāh ʾillā huw f-ttakhidhh wakīl
english_saheeh_international: He is the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of your affairs

arabic_uthmani: وَاصبِر عَلىٰ ما يَقولونَ وَاهجُرهُم هَجرًا جَميلًا
blank: w-sbir ʿalā mā yaqūlūn w-hjurhum hajr jamīl
english_saheeh_international: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance

arabic_uthmani: وَذَرني وَالمُكَذِّبينَ أُولِي النَّعمَةِ وَمَهِّلهُم قَليلًا
blank: w-dharnī w-l-mukadhdhibīn ʾulī n-naʿmat w-mahhilhum qalīl
english_saheeh_international: And leave Me with the matter of the deniers, those of ease in life, and allow them respite a little

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ لَدَينا أَنكالًا وَجَحيمًا
blank: ʾinn ladaynā ʾankāl w-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, with Us for them are shackles and burning fire

arabic_uthmani: وَطَعامًا ذا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذابًا أَليمًا
blank: w-ṭaʿām dhā ghuṣṣat w-ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: And food that chokes and a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ تَرجُفُ الأَرضُ وَالجِبالُ وَكانَتِ الجِبالُ كَثيبًا مَهيلًا
blank: yawm tarjuful-ʾarḍ w-l-jibāl w-kānatil-jibāl kathībam-mahīl
english_saheeh_international: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَرسَلنا إِلَيكُم رَسولًا شاهِدًا عَلَيكُم كَما أَرسَلنا إِلىٰ فِرعَونَ رَسولًا
blank: ʾinnā ʾarsalnā ʾilaykum rasūl shāhid ʿalaykum k-mā ʾarsalnā ʾilā firʿawn rasūl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger

arabic_uthmani: فَعَصىٰ فِرعَونُ الرَّسولَ فَأَخَذناهُ أَخذًا وَبيلًا
blank: f-ʿaṣā firʿawn r-rasūl f-ʾakhadhnāh ʾakhdh wabīl
english_saheeh_international: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure

arabic_uthmani: فَكَيفَ تَتَّقونَ إِن كَفَرتُم يَومًا يَجعَلُ الوِلدانَ شيبًا
blank: f-kayf tattaqūn ʾ kafartum yawm yajʿalul-wildān shīb-
english_saheeh_international: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired

arabic_uthmani: السَّماءُ مُنفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كانَ وَعدُهُ مَفعولًا
blank: as-samāʾ munfaṭir bihī kān waʿduhū mafʿūl
english_saheeh_international: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذِهِ تَذكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبيلًا
blank: ʾinn hādhihī tadhkirat f-m shāʾ ttakhadh ʾilā rabbihī sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way

arabic_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقومُ أَدنىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيلِ وَنِصفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطائِفَةٌ مِنَ الَّذينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيلَ وَالنَّهارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَن تُحصوهُ فَتابَ عَلَيكُم ۖ فَاقرَءوا ما تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ القُرآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكونُ مِنكُم مَرضىٰ ۙ وَآخَرونَ يَضرِبونَ فِي الأَرضِ يَبتَغونَ مِن فَضلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرونَ يُقاتِلونَ في سَبيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقرَءوا ما تَيَسَّرَ مِنهُ ۚ وَأَقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكاةَ وَأَقرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَما تُقَدِّموا لِأَنفُسِكُم مِن خَيرٍ تَجِدوهُ عِندَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيرًا وَأَعظَمَ أَجرًا ۚ وَاستَغفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفورٌ رَحيمٌ
blank: ʾinn rabbak yaʿlam ʾannak taqūm ʾadnā m thuluthayil-layl w-niṣfahū w-thuluthahū w-ṭāʾifat minalladhīn maʿak w-llāh yuqaddirul-layl w-n-nahār ʿalim ʾ l tuḥṣūh f-tāb ʿalaykum f-qraʾū mā tayassar minal-qurʾān ʿalim ʾ s-yakūn minkum marḍā w-ʾākharūn yaḍribūn fīl-ʾarḍ yabtaghūn m faḍl llāh w-ʾākharūn yuqātilūn fī sabīl llāh f-qraʾū mā tayassar minh w-ʾaqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-ʾātū z-zakāt w-ʾaqriḍū llāh qarḍ ḥasan w-mā tuqaddimū l-ʾanfusikum m khayr tajidūh ʿind llāh huw khayr w-ʾaʿẓam ʾajr w-staghfirū llāh ʾinn llāh ghafūr raḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your Lord knows, O Muhammad, that you stand in prayer almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and so do a group of those with you. And Allah determines the extent of the night and the day. He has known that you Muslims will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy for you of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking something of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا المُدَّثِّرُ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhāl-muddaththir
english_saheeh_international: O you who covers himself with a garment

arabic_uthmani: قُم فَأَنذِر
blank: qum f-ʾandhir
english_saheeh_international: Arise and warn

arabic_uthmani: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّر
blank: w-rabbak f-kabbir
english_saheeh_international: And your Lord glorify

arabic_uthmani: وَثِيابَكَ فَطَهِّر
blank: w-thiyābak f-ṭahhir
english_saheeh_international: And your clothing purify

arabic_uthmani: وَالرُّجزَ فَاهجُر
blank: w-r-rujz f-hjur
english_saheeh_international: And uncleanliness avoid

arabic_uthmani: وَلا تَمنُن تَستَكثِرُ
blank: w-lā tamn tastakthir
english_saheeh_international: And do not confer favor to acquire more

arabic_uthmani: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصبِر
blank: w-l-rabbik f-ṣbir
english_saheeh_international: But for your Lord be patient

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا نُقِرَ فِي النّاقورِ
blank: f-ʾidhā nuqir fī n-nāqūr
english_saheeh_international: And when the trumpet is blown

arabic_uthmani: فَذٰلِكَ يَومَئِذٍ يَومٌ عَسيرٌ
blank: f-dhālik yawmaʾidh yawm ʿasīr
english_saheeh_international: That Day will be a difficult day

arabic_uthmani: عَلَى الكافِرينَ غَيرُ يَسيرٍ
blank: ʿalāl-kāfirīn ghayr yasīr
english_saheeh_international: For the disbelievers - not easy

arabic_uthmani: ذَرني وَمَن خَلَقتُ وَحيدًا
blank: dharnī w-m khalaqt waḥīd
english_saheeh_international: Leave Me with the one I created alone

arabic_uthmani: وَجَعَلتُ لَهُ مالًا مَمدودًا
blank: w-jaʿalt lahū mālam-mamdūd
english_saheeh_international: And to whom I granted extensive wealth

arabic_uthmani: وَبَنينَ شُهودًا
blank: w-banīn shuhūd
english_saheeh_international: And children present with him

arabic_uthmani: وَمَهَّدتُ لَهُ تَمهيدًا
blank: w-mahhadt lahū tamhīd
english_saheeh_international: And spread everything before him, easing his life

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ يَطمَعُ أَن أَزيدَ
blank: thumm yaṭmaʿ ʾ ʾazīd
english_saheeh_international: Then he desires that I should add more

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كانَ لِآياتِنا عَنيدًا
blank: kallā ʾinnahū kān l-ʾāyātinā ʿanīd
english_saheeh_international: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate

arabic_uthmani: سَأُرهِقُهُ صَعودًا
blank: s-ʾurhiquhū ṣaʿūd
english_saheeh_international: I will cover him with arduous torment

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
blank: ʾinnahū fakkar w-qaddar
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, he thought and deliberated

arabic_uthmani: فَقُتِلَ كَيفَ قَدَّرَ
blank: f-qutil kayf qaddar
english_saheeh_international: So may he be destroyed for how he deliberated

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيفَ قَدَّرَ
blank: thumm qutil kayf qaddar
english_saheeh_international: Then may he be destroyed for how he deliberated

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
blank: thumm naẓar
english_saheeh_international: Then he considered again

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
blank: thumm ʿabas w-basar
english_saheeh_international: Then he frowned and scowled

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَدبَرَ وَاستَكبَرَ
blank: thumm ʾadbar w-stakbar
english_saheeh_international: Then he turned back and was arrogant

arabic_uthmani: فَقالَ إِن هٰذا إِلّا سِحرٌ يُؤثَرُ
blank: f-qāl ʾ hādhā ʾillā siḥr yuʾthar
english_saheeh_international: And said, "This is not but magic imitated from others

arabic_uthmani: إِن هٰذا إِلّا قَولُ البَشَرِ
blank: ʾ hādhā ʾillā qawlul-bashar
english_saheeh_international: This is not but the word of a human being

arabic_uthmani: سَأُصليهِ سَقَرَ
blank: s-ʾuṣlīh saqar
english_saheeh_international: I will drive him into Saqar

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ ما سَقَرُ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk mā saqar
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is Saqar

arabic_uthmani: لا تُبقي وَلا تَذَرُ
blank: lā tubqī w-lā tadhar
english_saheeh_international: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing unburned

arabic_uthmani: لَوّاحَةٌ لِلبَشَرِ

english_saheeh_international: Blackening the skins

arabic_uthmani: عَلَيها تِسعَةَ عَشَرَ

english_saheeh_international: Over it are nineteen angels

blank: w-mā jaʿalnā ʾaṣḥāb n-nār ʾillā malāʾikat w-mā jaʿalnā ʿiddatahum ʾillā fitnat l-lladhīn kafarū l-yastayqinalladhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb w-yazdādalladhīn ʾāmanū ʾīmān w-lā yartāballadhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb w-l-muʾminūn w-l-yaqūlalladhīn fī qulūbihim maraḍ w-l-kāfirūn mādhā ʾarād llāh b-hādhā mathal k-dhālik yuḍill llāh m yashāʾ w-yahdī m yashāʾ w-mā yaʿlam junūd rabbik ʾillā huw w-mā hiy ʾillā dhikrā l-l-bashar
english_saheeh_international: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا وَالقَمَرِ
blank: kallā w-l-qamar
english_saheeh_international: No! By the moon

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّيلِ إِذ أَدبَرَ
blank: w-l-layl ʾidh ʾadbar
english_saheeh_international: And by the night when it departs

arabic_uthmani: وَالصُّبحِ إِذا أَسفَرَ
blank: w-ṣ-ṣubḥ ʾidhā ʾasfar
english_saheeh_international: And by the morning when it brightens

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّها لَإِحدَى الكُبَرِ
blank: ʾinnahā l-ʾiḥdāl-kubar
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest afflictions

arabic_uthmani: نَذيرًا لِلبَشَرِ
blank: nadhīr l-l-bashar
english_saheeh_international: As a warning to humanity

arabic_uthmani: لِمَن شاءَ مِنكُم أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَو يَتَأَخَّرَ
blank: l-m shāʾ minkum ʾ yataqaddam ʾaw yataʾakhkhar
english_saheeh_international: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind

arabic_uthmani: كُلُّ نَفسٍ بِما كَسَبَت رَهينَةٌ
blank: kull nafs b-mā kasabat rahīnat
english_saheeh_international: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained

arabic_uthmani: إِلّا أَصحابَ اليَمينِ
blank: ʾillā ʾaṣḥābal-yamīn
english_saheeh_international: Except the companions of the right

arabic_uthmani: في جَنّاتٍ يَتَساءَلونَ
blank: fī jannāt yatasāʾalūn
english_saheeh_international: Who will be in gardens, questioning each other

arabic_uthmani: عَنِ المُجرِمينَ
blank: ʿanil-mujrimīn
english_saheeh_international: About the criminals

arabic_uthmani: ما سَلَكَكُم في سَقَرَ
blank: mā salakakum fī saqar
english_saheeh_international: And asking them, "What put you into Saqar

blank: qālū lam nak minal-muṣallīn
english_saheeh_international: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed

arabic_uthmani: وَلَم نَكُ نُطعِمُ المِسكينَ
blank: w-lam nak nuṭʿimul-miskīn
english_saheeh_international: Nor did we used to feed the poor

arabic_uthmani: وَكُنّا نَخوضُ مَعَ الخائِضينَ
blank: w-kunnā nakhūḍ maʿal-khāʾiḍīn
english_saheeh_international: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged in it

arabic_uthmani: وَكُنّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَومِ الدّينِ
blank: w-kunnā nukadhdhib b-yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: حَتّىٰ أَتانَا اليَقينُ
blank: ḥattā ʾatānāl-yaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Until there came to us the certainty

arabic_uthmani: فَما تَنفَعُهُم شَفاعَةُ الشّافِعينَ
blank: f-mā tanfaʿuhum shafāʿat sh-shāfiʿīn
english_saheeh_international: So there will not benefit them the intercession of any intercessors

arabic_uthmani: فَما لَهُم عَنِ التَّذكِرَةِ مُعرِضينَ
blank: f-mā lahum ʿan t-tadhkirat muʿriḍīn
english_saheeh_international: Then what is the matter with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

arabic_uthmani: كَأَنَّهُم حُمُرٌ مُستَنفِرَةٌ
blank: k-ʾannahum ḥumur mustanfirat
english_saheeh_international: As if they were alarmed donkeys

arabic_uthmani: فَرَّت مِن قَسوَرَةٍ
blank: farrat m qaswarat
english_saheeh_international: Fleeing from a lion

arabic_uthmani: بَل يُريدُ كُلُّ امرِئٍ مِنهُم أَن يُؤتىٰ صُحُفًا مُنَشَّرَةً
blank: bal yurīd kull mriʾ minhum ʾ yuʾtā ṣuḥufam-munashsharat
english_saheeh_international: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا ۖ بَل لا يَخافونَ الآخِرَةَ
blank: kallā bal lā yakhāfūnal-ʾākhirat
english_saheeh_international: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا إِنَّهُ تَذكِرَةٌ
blank: kallā ʾinnahū tadhkirat
english_saheeh_international: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن شاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
blank: f-m shāʾ dhakarahū
english_saheeh_international: Then whoever wills will remember it

arabic_uthmani: وَما يَذكُرونَ إِلّا أَن يَشاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهلُ التَّقوىٰ وَأَهلُ المَغفِرَةِ
blank: w-mā yadhkurūn ʾillā ʾ yashāʾ llāh huw ʾahl t-taqwā w-ʾahlul-maghfirat
english_saheeh_international: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for granting forgiveness

arabic_uthmani: لا أُقسِمُ بِيَومِ القِيامَةِ
blank: lā ʾuqsim b-yawmil-qiyāmat
english_saheeh_international: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

arabic_uthmani: وَلا أُقسِمُ بِالنَّفسِ اللَّوّامَةِ
blank: w-lā ʾuqsim b-n-nafsil-lawwāmat
english_saheeh_international: And I swear by the reproaching soul to the certainty of resurrection

arabic_uthmani: أَيَحسَبُ الإِنسانُ أَلَّن نَجمَعَ عِظامَهُ
blank: ʾ-yaḥsabul-ʾinsān ʾal-l najmaʿ ʿiẓāmahū
english_saheeh_international: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones

arabic_uthmani: بَلىٰ قادِرينَ عَلىٰ أَن نُسَوِّيَ بَنانَهُ
blank: balā qādirīn ʿalā ʾ nusawwiy banānahū
english_saheeh_international: Yes. We are Able even to proportion his fingertips

arabic_uthmani: بَل يُريدُ الإِنسانُ لِيَفجُرَ أَمامَهُ
blank: bal yurīdul-ʾinsān l-yafjur ʾamāmahū
english_saheeh_international: But man desires to continue in sin

arabic_uthmani: يَسأَلُ أَيّانَ يَومُ القِيامَةِ
blank: yasʾal ʾayyān yawmul-qiyāmat
english_saheeh_international: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا بَرِقَ البَصَرُ
blank: f-ʾidhā bariqal-baṣar
english_saheeh_international: So when vision is dazzled

arabic_uthmani: وَخَسَفَ القَمَرُ
blank: w-khasafal-qamar
english_saheeh_international: And the moon darkens

arabic_uthmani: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمسُ وَالقَمَرُ
blank: w-jumiʿ sh-shams w-l-qamar
english_saheeh_international: And the sun and the moon are joined

arabic_uthmani: يَقولُ الإِنسانُ يَومَئِذٍ أَينَ المَفَرُّ
blank: yaqūlul-ʾinsān yawmaʾidh ʾaynal-mafarr
english_saheeh_international: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the place of escape

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا لا وَزَرَ
blank: kallā lā wazar
english_saheeh_international: No! There is no refuge

arabic_uthmani: إِلىٰ رَبِّكَ يَومَئِذٍ المُستَقَرُّ
blank: ʾilā rabbik yawmaʾidh-il-mustaqarr
english_saheeh_international: To your Lord, that Day, is the place of permanence

arabic_uthmani: يُنَبَّأُ الإِنسانُ يَومَئِذٍ بِما قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
blank: yunabbaʾul-ʾinsān yawmaʾidh b-mā qaddam w-ʾakhkhar
english_saheeh_international: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back

arabic_uthmani: بَلِ الإِنسانُ عَلىٰ نَفسِهِ بَصيرَةٌ
blank: balil-ʾinsān ʿalā nafsihī baṣīrat
english_saheeh_international: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness

arabic_uthmani: وَلَو أَلقىٰ مَعاذيرَهُ
blank: w-law ʾalqā maʿādhīrahū
english_saheeh_international: Even if he presents his excuses

arabic_uthmani: لا تُحَرِّك بِهِ لِسانَكَ لِتَعجَلَ بِهِ
blank: lā tuḥarrik bihī lisānak l-taʿjal bihī
english_saheeh_international: Move not your tongue with it, O Muhammad, to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ عَلَينا جَمعَهُ وَقُرآنَهُ
blank: ʾinn ʿalaynā jamʿahū w-qurʾānahū
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, upon Us is its collection in your heart and to make possible its recitation

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا قَرَأناهُ فَاتَّبِع قُرآنَهُ
blank: f-ʾidhā qaraʾnāh f-ttabiʿ qurʾānahū
english_saheeh_international: So when We have recited it through Gabriel, then follow its recitation

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَينا بَيانَهُ
blank: thumm ʾinn ʿalaynā bayānahū
english_saheeh_international: Then upon Us is its clarification to you

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا بَل تُحِبّونَ العاجِلَةَ
blank: kallā bal tuḥibbūnal-ʿājilat
english_saheeh_international: No! But you love the immediate

arabic_uthmani: وَتَذَرونَ الآخِرَةَ
blank: w-tadharūnal-ʾākhirat
english_saheeh_international: And leave the Hereafter

arabic_uthmani: وُجوهٌ يَومَئِذٍ ناضِرَةٌ
blank: wujūh yawmaʾidh nāḍirat
english_saheeh_international: Some faces, that Day, will be radiant

arabic_uthmani: إِلىٰ رَبِّها ناظِرَةٌ
blank: ʾilā rabbihā nāẓirat
english_saheeh_international: Looking at their Lord

arabic_uthmani: وَوُجوهٌ يَومَئِذٍ باسِرَةٌ
blank: w-wujūh yawmaʾidh bāsirat
english_saheeh_international: And some faces, that Day, will be contorted

arabic_uthmani: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفعَلَ بِها فاقِرَةٌ
blank: taẓunn ʾ yufʿal bihā fāqirat
english_saheeh_international: Expecting that there will be done to them something backbreaking

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا إِذا بَلَغَتِ التَّراقِيَ
blank: kallā ʾidhā balaghat t-tarāqiy
english_saheeh_international: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones

arabic_uthmani: وَقيلَ مَن ۜ راقٍ
blank: w-qīl m rāq
english_saheeh_international: And it is said, "Who will cure him

arabic_uthmani: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الفِراقُ
blank: w-ẓann ʾannahul-firāq
english_saheeh_international: And the dying one is certain that it is the time of separation

arabic_uthmani: وَالتَفَّتِ السّاقُ بِالسّاقِ
blank: w-ltaffat s-sāq b-s-sāq
english_saheeh_international: And the leg is wound about the leg

arabic_uthmani: إِلىٰ رَبِّكَ يَومَئِذٍ المَساقُ
blank: ʾilā rabbik yawmaʾidh-il-masāq
english_saheeh_international: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession

arabic_uthmani: فَلا صَدَّقَ وَلا صَلّىٰ
blank: f-lā ṣaddaq w-lā ṣallā
english_saheeh_international: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed

arabic_uthmani: وَلٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلّىٰ
blank: w-lāk kadhdhab w-tawallā
english_saheeh_international: But instead, he denied and turned away

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلىٰ أَهلِهِ يَتَمَطّىٰ
blank: thumm dhahab ʾilā ʾahlihī yatamaṭṭā
english_saheeh_international: And then he went to his people, swaggering in pride

arabic_uthmani: أَولىٰ لَكَ فَأَولىٰ
blank: ʾawlā lak f-ʾawlā
english_saheeh_international: Woe to you, and woe

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَولىٰ لَكَ فَأَولىٰ
blank: thumm ʾawlā lak f-ʾawlā
english_saheeh_international: Then woe to you, and woe

arabic_uthmani: أَيَحسَبُ الإِنسانُ أَن يُترَكَ سُدًى
blank: ʾ-yaḥsabul-ʾinsān ʾ yutrak sud
english_saheeh_international: Does man think that he will be left neglected

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَكُ نُطفَةً مِن مَنِيٍّ يُمنىٰ
blank: ʾ-lam yak nuṭfatam-m maniyy yumnā
english_saheeh_international: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ كانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوّىٰ
blank: thumm kān ʿalaqat f-khalaq f-sawwā
english_saheeh_international: Then he was a clinging clot, and Allah created his form and proportioned him

arabic_uthmani: فَجَعَلَ مِنهُ الزَّوجَينِ الذَّكَرَ وَالأُنثىٰ
blank: f-jaʿal minh z-zawjayn dh-dhakar w-l-ʾunthā
english_saheeh_international: And made of him two mates, the male and the female

arabic_uthmani: أَلَيسَ ذٰلِكَ بِقادِرٍ عَلىٰ أَن يُحيِيَ المَوتىٰ
blank: ʾ-lays dhālik b-qādir ʿalā ʾ yuḥyiyal-mawtā
english_saheeh_international: Is not that Creator Able to give life to the dead

arabic_uthmani: هَل أَتىٰ عَلَى الإِنسانِ حينٌ مِنَ الدَّهرِ لَم يَكُن شَيئًا مَذكورًا
blank: hal ʾatā ʿalāl-ʾinsān ḥīn min d-dahr lam yak shayʾam-madhkūr
english_saheeh_international: Has there not come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing even mentioned

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا خَلَقنَا الإِنسانَ مِن نُطفَةٍ أَمشاجٍ نَبتَليهِ فَجَعَلناهُ سَميعًا بَصيرًا
blank: ʾinnā khalaqnāl-ʾinsān m nuṭfat ʾamshāj nabtalīh f-jaʿalnāh samīʿ baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا هَدَيناهُ السَّبيلَ إِمّا شاكِرًا وَإِمّا كَفورًا
blank: ʾinnā hadaynāh s-sabīl ʾimmā shākir w-ʾimmā kafūr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَعتَدنا لِلكافِرينَ سَلاسِلَ وَأَغلالًا وَسَعيرًا
blank: ʾinnā ʾaʿtadnā l-l-kāfirīn salāsil w-ʾaghlāl w-saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الأَبرارَ يَشرَبونَ مِن كَأسٍ كانَ مِزاجُها كافورًا
blank: ʾinnal-ʾabrār yashrabūn m kaʾs kān mizājuhā kāfūr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup of wine whose mixture is of Kafur

arabic_uthmani: عَينًا يَشرَبُ بِها عِبادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرونَها تَفجيرًا
blank: ʿayn yashrab bihā ʿibād llāh yufajjirūnahā tafjīr
english_saheeh_international: A spring of which the righteous servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force and abundance

arabic_uthmani: يوفونَ بِالنَّذرِ وَيَخافونَ يَومًا كانَ شَرُّهُ مُستَطيرًا
blank: yūfūn b-n-nadhr w-yakhāfūn yawm kān sharruhū mustaṭīr
english_saheeh_international: They are those who fulfill their vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread

arabic_uthmani: وَيُطعِمونَ الطَّعامَ عَلىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسكينًا وَيَتيمًا وَأَسيرًا
blank: w-yuṭʿimūn ṭ-ṭaʿām ʿalā ḥubbihī miskīn w-yatīm w-ʾasīr
english_saheeh_international: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما نُطعِمُكُم لِوَجهِ اللَّهِ لا نُريدُ مِنكُم جَزاءً وَلا شُكورًا
blank: ʾinnamā nuṭʿimukum l-wajh llāh lā nurīd minkum jazāʾ w-lā shukūr
english_saheeh_international: Saying, "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا نَخافُ مِن رَبِّنا يَومًا عَبوسًا قَمطَريرًا
blank: ʾinnā nakhāf m rabbinā yawm ʿabūs qamṭarīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful

arabic_uthmani: فَوَقاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذٰلِكَ اليَومِ وَلَقّاهُم نَضرَةً وَسُرورًا
blank: f-waqāhum llāh sharr dhālikal-yawm w-laqqāhum naḍrat w-surūr
english_saheeh_international: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

arabic_uthmani: وَجَزاهُم بِما صَبَروا جَنَّةً وَحَريرًا
blank: w-jazāhum b-mā ṣabarū jannat w-ḥarīr
english_saheeh_international: And will reward them for what they patiently endured with a garden in Paradise and silk garments

arabic_uthmani: مُتَّكِئينَ فيها عَلَى الأَرائِكِ ۖ لا يَرَونَ فيها شَمسًا وَلا زَمهَريرًا
blank: muttakiʾīn fīhā ʿalāl-ʾarāʾik lā yarawn fīhā shams w-lā zamharīr
english_saheeh_international: They will be reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any burning sun or freezing cold

arabic_uthmani: وَدانِيَةً عَلَيهِم ظِلالُها وَذُلِّلَت قُطوفُها تَذليلًا
blank: w-dāniyat ʿalayhim ẓilāluhā w-dhullilat quṭūfuhā tadhlīl
english_saheeh_international: And near above them are its shades, and its fruit to be picked will be lowered in compliance

arabic_uthmani: وَيُطافُ عَلَيهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكوابٍ كانَت قَواريرا
blank: w-yuṭāf ʿalayhim b-ʾāniyat m fiḍḍat w-ʾakwāb kānat qawārīr
english_saheeh_international: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been created clear as glass

arabic_uthmani: قَواريرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّروها تَقديرًا
blank: qawārīr m fiḍḍat qaddarūhā taqdīr
english_saheeh_international: Clear glasses made from silver of which they have determined the measure

arabic_uthmani: وَيُسقَونَ فيها كَأسًا كانَ مِزاجُها زَنجَبيلًا
blank: w-yusqawn fīhā kaʾs kān mizājuhā zanjabīl
english_saheeh_international: And they will be given to drink a cup of wine whose mixture is of ginger

arabic_uthmani: عَينًا فيها تُسَمّىٰ سَلسَبيلًا
blank: ʿayn fīhā tusammā salsabīl
english_saheeh_international: From a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel

arabic_uthmani: ۞ وَيَطوفُ عَلَيهِم وِلدانٌ مُخَلَّدونَ إِذا رَأَيتَهُم حَسِبتَهُم لُؤلُؤًا مَنثورًا
blank: w-yaṭūf ʿalayhim wildān mukhalladūn ʾidhā raʾaytahum ḥasibtahum luʾluʾam-manthūr
english_saheeh_international: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them as beautiful as scattered pearls

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا رَأَيتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيتَ نَعيمًا وَمُلكًا كَبيرًا
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾayt thamm raʾayt naʿīm w-mulk kabīr
english_saheeh_international: And when you look there in Paradise, you will see pleasure and great dominion

arabic_uthmani: عالِيَهُم ثِيابُ سُندُسٍ خُضرٌ وَإِستَبرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلّوا أَساوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقاهُم رَبُّهُم شَرابًا طَهورًا
blank: ʿāliyahum thiyāb sundus khuḍr w-ʾistabraq w-ḥullū ʾasāwir m fiḍḍat w-saqāhum rabbuhum sharāb ṭahūr
english_saheeh_international: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذا كانَ لَكُم جَزاءً وَكانَ سَعيُكُم مَشكورًا
blank: ʾinn hādhā kān lakum jazāʾ w-kān saʿyukum mashkūr
english_saheeh_international: And it will be said, "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا نَحنُ نَزَّلنا عَلَيكَ القُرآنَ تَنزيلًا
blank: ʾinnā naḥn nazzalnā ʿalaykal-qurʾān tanzīl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, O Muhammad, the Qur'an progressively

arabic_uthmani: فَاصبِر لِحُكمِ رَبِّكَ وَلا تُطِع مِنهُم آثِمًا أَو كَفورًا
blank: f-ṣbir l-ḥukm rabbik w-lā tuṭiʿ minhum ʾāthim ʾaw kafūr
english_saheeh_international: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful disbeliever

arabic_uthmani: وَاذكُرِ اسمَ رَبِّكَ بُكرَةً وَأَصيلًا
blank: w-dhkur sm rabbik bukrat w-ʾaṣīl
english_saheeh_international: And mention the name of your Lord in prayer morning and evening

arabic_uthmani: وَمِنَ اللَّيلِ فَاسجُد لَهُ وَسَبِّحهُ لَيلًا طَويلًا
blank: w-minal-layl f-sjud lahū w-sabbiḥh layl ṭawīl
english_saheeh_international: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long part of the night

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰؤُلاءِ يُحِبّونَ العاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرونَ وَراءَهُم يَومًا ثَقيلًا
blank: ʾinn hāʾulāʾ yuḥibbūnal-ʿājilat w-yadharūn warāʾahum yawm thaqīl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, these disbelievers love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day

arabic_uthmani: نَحنُ خَلَقناهُم وَشَدَدنا أَسرَهُم ۖ وَإِذا شِئنا بَدَّلنا أَمثالَهُم تَبديلًا
blank: naḥn khalaqnāhum w-shadadnā ʾasrahum w-ʾidhā shiʾnā baddalnā ʾamthālahum tabdīl
english_saheeh_international: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with complete alteration

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ هٰذِهِ تَذكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبيلًا
blank: ʾinn hādhihī tadhkirat f-m shāʾ ttakhadh ʾilā rabbihī sabīl
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way

arabic_uthmani: وَما تَشاءونَ إِلّا أَن يَشاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كانَ عَليمًا حَكيمًا
blank: w-mā tashāʾūn ʾillā ʾ yashāʾ llāh ʾinn llāh kān ʿalīm ḥakīm
english_saheeh_international: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise

arabic_uthmani: يُدخِلُ مَن يَشاءُ في رَحمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظّالِمينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُم عَذابًا أَليمًا
blank: yudkhil m yashāʾ fī raḥmatihī w-ẓ-ẓālimīn ʾaʿadd lahum ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَالمُرسَلاتِ عُرفًا
blank: w-l-mursalāt ʿurf
english_saheeh_international: By those winds sent forth in gusts

arabic_uthmani: فَالعاصِفاتِ عَصفًا
blank: f-l-ʿāṣifāt ʿaṣf
english_saheeh_international: And the winds that blow violently

arabic_uthmani: وَالنّاشِراتِ نَشرًا
blank: w-n-nāshirāt nashr
english_saheeh_international: And by the winds that spread clouds

arabic_uthmani: فَالفارِقاتِ فَرقًا
blank: f-l-fāriqāt farq
english_saheeh_international: And those angels who bring criterion

arabic_uthmani: فَالمُلقِياتِ ذِكرًا
blank: f-l-mulqiyāt dhikr
english_saheeh_international: And those angels who deliver a message

arabic_uthmani: عُذرًا أَو نُذرًا
blank: ʿudhr ʾaw nudhr
english_saheeh_international: As justification or warning

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما توعَدونَ لَواقِعٌ
blank: ʾinnamā tūʿadūn l-wāqiʿ
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذَا النُّجومُ طُمِسَت
blank: f-ʾidhā n-nujūm ṭumisat
english_saheeh_international: So when the stars are obliterated

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا السَّماءُ فُرِجَت
blank: w-ʾidhā s-samāʾ furijat
english_saheeh_international: And when the heaven is opened

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا الجِبالُ نُسِفَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-jibāl nusifat
english_saheeh_international: And when the mountains are blown away

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَت
blank: w-ʾidhā r-rusul ʾuqqitat
english_saheeh_international: And when the messengers' time has come

arabic_uthmani: لِأَيِّ يَومٍ أُجِّلَت
blank: l-ʾayy yawm ʾujjilat
english_saheeh_international: For what Day was it postponed

arabic_uthmani: لِيَومِ الفَصلِ
blank: l-yawmil-faṣl
english_saheeh_international: For the Day of Judgement

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ ما يَومُ الفَصلِ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk mā yawmul-faṣl
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement

arabic_uthmani: وَيلٌ يَومَئِذٍ لِلمُكَذِّبينَ
blank: wayl yawmaʾidh l-l-mukadhdhibīn
english_saheeh_international: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم نُهلِكِ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: ʾ-lam nuhlikil-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: Did We not destroy the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ نُتبِعُهُمُ الآخِرينَ
blank: thumm nutbiʿuhumul-ʾākhirīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We will follow them with the later ones

arabic_uthmani: كَذٰلِكَ نَفعَلُ بِالمُجرِمينَ

arabic_uthmani: وَيلٌ يَومَئِذٍ لِلمُكَذِّبينَ
blank: wayl yawmaʾidh l-l-mukadhdhibīn

arabic_uthmani: وَيلٌ يَومَئِذٍ لِلمُكَذِّبينَ
