english_saheeh_international: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear Him

arabic_uthmani: فَأَراهُ الآيَةَ الكُبرىٰ
blank: f-ʾarāhul-ʾāyatal-kubrā
english_saheeh_international: And he showed him the greatest sign

arabic_uthmani: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصىٰ
blank: f-kadhdhab w-ʿaṣā
english_saheeh_international: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَدبَرَ يَسعىٰ
blank: thumm ʾadbar yasʿā
english_saheeh_international: Then he turned his back, striving

arabic_uthmani: فَحَشَرَ فَنادىٰ
blank: f-ḥashar f-nādā
english_saheeh_international: And he gathered his people and called out

arabic_uthmani: فَقالَ أَنا رَبُّكُمُ الأَعلىٰ
blank: f-qāl ʾan rabbukumul-ʾaʿlā
english_saheeh_international: And said, "I am your most exalted lord

arabic_uthmani: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكالَ الآخِرَةِ وَالأولىٰ
blank: f-ʾakhadhah llāh nakālal-ʾākhirat w-l-ʾūlā
english_saheeh_international: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first transgression

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ في ذٰلِكَ لَعِبرَةً لِمَن يَخشىٰ
blank: ʾinn fī dhālik l-ʿibrat l-m yakhshā
english_saheeh_international: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear Allah

arabic_uthmani: أَأَنتُم أَشَدُّ خَلقًا أَمِ السَّماءُ ۚ بَناها
blank: ʾ-ʾantum ʾashadd khalq ʾam s-samāʾ banāhā
english_saheeh_international: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it

arabic_uthmani: رَفَعَ سَمكَها فَسَوّاها
blank: rafaʿ samkahā f-sawwāhā
english_saheeh_international: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it

arabic_uthmani: وَأَغطَشَ لَيلَها وَأَخرَجَ ضُحاها
blank: w-ʾaghṭash laylahā w-ʾakhraj ḍuḥāhā
english_saheeh_international: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness

arabic_uthmani: وَالأَرضَ بَعدَ ذٰلِكَ دَحاها
blank: w-l-ʾarḍ baʿd dhālik daḥāhā
english_saheeh_international: And after that He spread the earth

arabic_uthmani: أَخرَجَ مِنها ماءَها وَمَرعاها
blank: ʾakhraj minhā māʾahā w-marʿāhā
english_saheeh_international: He extracted from it its water and its pasture

arabic_uthmani: وَالجِبالَ أَرساها
blank: w-l-jibāl ʾarsāhā
english_saheeh_international: And the mountains He set firmly

arabic_uthmani: مَتاعًا لَكُم وَلِأَنعامِكُم
blank: matāʿ lakum w-l-ʾanʿāmikum
english_saheeh_international: As provision for you and your grazing livestock

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا جاءَتِ الطّامَّةُ الكُبرىٰ
blank: f-ʾidhā jāʾat ṭ-ṭāmmatul-kubrā
english_saheeh_international: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الإِنسانُ ما سَعىٰ
blank: yawm yatadhakkarul-ʾinsān mā saʿā
english_saheeh_international: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove

arabic_uthmani: وَبُرِّزَتِ الجَحيمُ لِمَن يَرىٰ
blank: w-burrizatil-jaḥīm l-m yarā
english_saheeh_international: And Hellfire will be exposed for all those who see

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمّا مَن طَغىٰ
blank: f-ʾammā m ṭaghā
english_saheeh_international: So as for he who transgressed

arabic_uthmani: وَآثَرَ الحَياةَ الدُّنيا
blank: w-ʾātharal-ḥayāt d-dunyā
english_saheeh_international: And preferred the life of the world

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّ الجَحيمَ هِيَ المَأوىٰ
blank: f-ʾinnal-jaḥīm hiyal-maʾwā
english_saheeh_international: Then indeed, Hellfire will be his refuge

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا مَن خافَ مَقامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفسَ عَنِ الهَوىٰ
blank: w-ʾammā m khāf maqām rabbihī w-nahā n-nafs ʿanil-hawā
english_saheeh_international: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from unlawful inclination

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّ الجَنَّةَ هِيَ المَأوىٰ
blank: f-ʾinnal-jannat hiyal-maʾwā
english_saheeh_international: Then indeed, Paradise will be his refuge

arabic_uthmani: يَسأَلونَكَ عَنِ السّاعَةِ أَيّانَ مُرساها
blank: yasʾalūnak ʿan s-sāʿat ʾayyān mursāhā
english_saheeh_international: They ask you, O Muhammad, about the Hour: when is its arrival

arabic_uthmani: فيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكراها
blank: fī-m ʾant m dhikrāhā
english_saheeh_international: In what position are you that you should mention it

arabic_uthmani: إِلىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهاها
blank: ʾilā rabbik muntahāhā
english_saheeh_international: To your Lord is its finality

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّما أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخشاها
blank: ʾinnamā ʾant mundhir m yakhshāhā
english_saheeh_international: You are only a warner for those who fear it

arabic_uthmani: كَأَنَّهُم يَومَ يَرَونَها لَم يَلبَثوا إِلّا عَشِيَّةً أَو ضُحاها
blank: k-ʾannahum yawm yarawnahā lam yalbathū ʾillā ʿashiyyat ʾaw ḍuḥāhā
english_saheeh_international: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained in the world except for an afternoon or a morning thereof

arabic_uthmani: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلّىٰ
blank: ʿabas w-tawallā
english_saheeh_international: The Prophet frowned and turned away

arabic_uthmani: أَن جاءَهُ الأَعمىٰ
blank: ʾ jāʾahul-ʾaʿmā
english_saheeh_international: Because there came to him the blind man, interrupting

arabic_uthmani: وَما يُدريكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكّىٰ
blank: w-mā yudrīk laʿallahū yazzakkā
english_saheeh_international: But what would make you perceive, O Muhammad, that perhaps he might be purified

arabic_uthmani: أَو يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكرىٰ
blank: ʾaw yadhdhakkar f-tanfaʿah dh-dhikrā
english_saheeh_international: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him

arabic_uthmani: أَمّا مَنِ استَغنىٰ
blank: ʾammā man staghnā
english_saheeh_international: As for he who thinks himself without need

arabic_uthmani: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدّىٰ
blank: f-ʾant lahū taṣaddā
english_saheeh_international: To him you give attention

arabic_uthmani: وَما عَلَيكَ أَلّا يَزَّكّىٰ
blank: w-mā ʿalayk ʾallā yazzakkā
english_saheeh_international: And not upon you is any blame if he will not be purified

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا مَن جاءَكَ يَسعىٰ
blank: w-ʾammā m jāʾak yasʿā
english_saheeh_international: But as for he who came to you striving for knowledge

arabic_uthmani: وَهُوَ يَخشىٰ
blank: w-huw yakhshā
english_saheeh_international: While he fears Allah

arabic_uthmani: فَأَنتَ عَنهُ تَلَهّىٰ
blank: f-ʾant ʿanh talahhā
english_saheeh_international: From him you are distracted

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا إِنَّها تَذكِرَةٌ
blank: kallā ʾinnahā tadhkirat
english_saheeh_international: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن شاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
blank: f-m shāʾ dhakarahū
english_saheeh_international: So whoever wills may remember it

arabic_uthmani: في صُحُفٍ مُكَرَّمَةٍ
blank: fī ṣuḥuf mukarramat
english_saheeh_international: It is recorded in honored sheets

arabic_uthmani: مَرفوعَةٍ مُطَهَّرَةٍ
blank: marfūʿat muṭahharat
english_saheeh_international: Exalted and purified

arabic_uthmani: بِأَيدي سَفَرَةٍ
blank: b-ʾaydī safarat
english_saheeh_international: Carried by the hands of messenger-angels

arabic_uthmani: كِرامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
blank: kirām bararat
english_saheeh_international: Noble and dutiful

arabic_uthmani: قُتِلَ الإِنسانُ ما أَكفَرَهُ
blank: qutilal-ʾinsān mā ʾakfarahū
english_saheeh_international: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he

arabic_uthmani: مِن أَيِّ شَيءٍ خَلَقَهُ
blank: m ʾayy shayʾ khalaqahū
english_saheeh_international: From what substance did He create him

arabic_uthmani: مِن نُطفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
blank: m nuṭfat khalaqahū f-qaddarahū
english_saheeh_international: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ السَّبيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
blank: thumm s-sabīl yassarahū
english_saheeh_international: Then He eased the way for him

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَماتَهُ فَأَقبَرَهُ
blank: thumm ʾamātahū f-ʾaqbarahū
english_saheeh_international: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِذا شاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
blank: thumm ʾidhā shāʾ ʾansharahū
english_saheeh_international: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا لَمّا يَقضِ ما أَمَرَهُ
blank: kallā lammā yaqḍ mā ʾamarahū
english_saheeh_international: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him

arabic_uthmani: فَليَنظُرِ الإِنسانُ إِلىٰ طَعامِهِ
blank: f-l-yanẓuril-ʾinsān ʾilā ṭaʿāmihī
english_saheeh_international: Then let mankind look at his food

arabic_uthmani: أَنّا صَبَبنَا الماءَ صَبًّا
blank: ʾannā ṣababnāl-māʾ ṣabb
english_saheeh_international: How We poured down water in torrents

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ شَقَقنَا الأَرضَ شَقًّا
blank: thumm shaqqaqnāl-ʾarḍ shaqq
english_saheeh_international: Then We broke open the earth, splitting it with sprouts

arabic_uthmani: فَأَنبَتنا فيها حَبًّا
blank: f-ʾanbatnā fīhā ḥabb
english_saheeh_international: And caused to grow within it grain

arabic_uthmani: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضبًا
blank: w-ʿinab w-qaḍb
english_saheeh_international: And grapes and herbage

arabic_uthmani: وَزَيتونًا وَنَخلًا
blank: w-zaytūn w-nakhl
english_saheeh_international: And olive and palm trees

arabic_uthmani: وَحَدائِقَ غُلبًا
blank: w-ḥadāʾiq ghulb
english_saheeh_international: And gardens of dense shrubbery

arabic_uthmani: وَفاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
blank: w-fākihat w-ʾabb
english_saheeh_international: And fruit and grass

arabic_uthmani: مَتاعًا لَكُم وَلِأَنعامِكُم
blank: matāʿ lakum w-l-ʾanʿāmikum
english_saheeh_international: As enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا جاءَتِ الصّاخَّةُ
blank: f-ʾidhā jāʾat ṣ-ṣākhkhat
english_saheeh_international: But when there comes the Deafening Blast

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَفِرُّ المَرءُ مِن أَخيهِ
blank: yawm yafirrul-marʾ m ʾakhīh
english_saheeh_international: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

arabic_uthmani: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبيهِ
blank: w-ʾummihī w-ʾabīh
english_saheeh_international: And his mother and his father

arabic_uthmani: وَصاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنيهِ
blank: w-ṣāḥibatihī w-banīh
english_saheeh_international: And his wife and his children

arabic_uthmani: لِكُلِّ امرِئٍ مِنهُم يَومَئِذٍ شَأنٌ يُغنيهِ
blank: l-kull mriʾ minhum yawmaʾidh shaʾn yughnīh
english_saheeh_international: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him

arabic_uthmani: وُجوهٌ يَومَئِذٍ مُسفِرَةٌ
blank: wujūh yawmaʾidh musfirat
english_saheeh_international: Some faces, that Day, will be bright

arabic_uthmani: ضاحِكَةٌ مُستَبشِرَةٌ
blank: ḍāḥikat mustabshirat
english_saheeh_international: Laughing, rejoicing at good news

arabic_uthmani: وَوُجوهٌ يَومَئِذٍ عَلَيها غَبَرَةٌ
blank: w-wujūh yawmaʾidh ʿalayhā ghabarat
english_saheeh_international: And other faces, that Day, will have upon them dust

arabic_uthmani: تَرهَقُها قَتَرَةٌ
blank: tarhaquhā qatarat
english_saheeh_international: Blackness will cover them

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ هُمُ الكَفَرَةُ الفَجَرَةُ
blank: ʾulāʾik humul-kafaratul-fajarat
english_saheeh_international: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones

arabic_uthmani: إِذَا الشَّمسُ كُوِّرَت
blank: ʾidhā sh-shams kuwwirat
english_saheeh_international: When the sun is wrapped up in darkness

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا النُّجومُ انكَدَرَت
blank: w-ʾidhā n-nujūm nkadarat
english_saheeh_international: And when the stars fall, dispersing

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا الجِبالُ سُيِّرَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-jibāl suyyirat
english_saheeh_international: And when the mountains are removed

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا العِشارُ عُطِّلَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-ʿishār ʿuṭṭilat
english_saheeh_international: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا الوُحوشُ حُشِرَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-wuḥūsh ḥushirat
english_saheeh_international: And when the wild beasts are gathered

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا البِحارُ سُجِّرَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-biḥār sujjirat
english_saheeh_international: And when the seas are filled with flame

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا النُّفوسُ زُوِّجَت
blank: w-ʾidhā n-nufūs zuwwijat
english_saheeh_international: And when the souls are paired

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا المَوءودَةُ سُئِلَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-mawʾūdat suʾilat
english_saheeh_international: And when the girl who was buried alive is asked

arabic_uthmani: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَت
blank: b-ʾayy dhanb qutilat
english_saheeh_international: For what sin she was killed

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَت
blank: w-ʾidhā ṣ-ṣuḥuf nushirat
english_saheeh_international: And when the pages are made public

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا السَّماءُ كُشِطَت
blank: w-ʾidhā s-samāʾ kushiṭat
english_saheeh_international: And when the sky is stripped away

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا الجَحيمُ سُعِّرَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-jaḥīm suʿʿirat
english_saheeh_international: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا الجَنَّةُ أُزلِفَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-jannat ʾuzlifat
english_saheeh_international: And when Paradise is brought near

arabic_uthmani: عَلِمَت نَفسٌ ما أَحضَرَت
blank: ʿalimat nafs mā ʾaḥḍarat
english_saheeh_international: A soul will then know what it has brought with it

arabic_uthmani: فَلا أُقسِمُ بِالخُنَّسِ
blank: f-lā ʾuqsim b-l-khunnas
english_saheeh_international: So I swear by the retreating stars

arabic_uthmani: الجَوارِ الكُنَّسِ
blank: al-jawāril-kunnas
english_saheeh_international: Those that run their courses and disappear

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّيلِ إِذا عَسعَسَ
blank: w-l-layl ʾidhā ʿasʿas
english_saheeh_international: And by the night as it closes in

arabic_uthmani: وَالصُّبحِ إِذا تَنَفَّسَ
blank: w-ṣ-ṣubḥ ʾidhā tanaffas
english_saheeh_international: And by the dawn when it breathes

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ لَقَولُ رَسولٍ كَريمٍ
blank: ʾinnahū l-qawl rasūl karīm
english_saheeh_international: That indeed, the Qur'an is a word conveyed by a noble messenger

arabic_uthmani: ذي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي العَرشِ مَكينٍ
blank: dhī quwwat ʿind dhīl-ʿarsh makīn
english_saheeh_international: Who is possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure in position

arabic_uthmani: مُطاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمينٍ
blank: muṭāʿ thamm ʾamīn
english_saheeh_international: Obeyed there in the heavens and trustworthy

arabic_uthmani: وَما صاحِبُكُم بِمَجنونٍ
blank: w-mā ṣāḥibukum b-majnūn
english_saheeh_international: And your companion is not at all mad

arabic_uthmani: وَلَقَد رَآهُ بِالأُفُقِ المُبينِ
blank: w-l-qad raʾāh b-l-ʾufuqil-mubīn
english_saheeh_international: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon

arabic_uthmani: وَما هُوَ عَلَى الغَيبِ بِضَنينٍ
blank: w-mā huw ʿalāl-ghayb b-ḍanīn
english_saheeh_international: And Muhammad is not a withholder of knowledge of the unseen

arabic_uthmani: وَما هُوَ بِقَولِ شَيطانٍ رَجيمٍ
blank: w-mā huw b-qawl shayṭān rajīm
english_saheeh_international: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled from the heavens

arabic_uthmani: فَأَينَ تَذهَبونَ
blank: f-ʾayn tadhhabūn
english_saheeh_international: So where are you going

arabic_uthmani: إِن هُوَ إِلّا ذِكرٌ لِلعالَمينَ
blank: ʾ huw ʾillā dhikr l-l-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

arabic_uthmani: لِمَن شاءَ مِنكُم أَن يَستَقيمَ
blank: l-m shāʾ minkum ʾ yastaqīm
english_saheeh_international: For whoever wills among you to take a right course

arabic_uthmani: وَما تَشاءونَ إِلّا أَن يَشاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ العالَمينَ
blank: w-mā tashāʾūn ʾillā ʾ yashāʾ llāh rabbul-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: إِذَا السَّماءُ انفَطَرَت
blank: ʾidhā s-samāʾ nfaṭarat
english_saheeh_international: When the sky breaks apart

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا الكَواكِبُ انتَثَرَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-kawākib ntatharat
english_saheeh_international: And when the stars fall, scattering

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا البِحارُ فُجِّرَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-biḥār fujjirat
english_saheeh_international: And when the seas are erupted

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا القُبورُ بُعثِرَت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-qubūr buʿthirat
english_saheeh_international: And when the contents of graves are scattered

arabic_uthmani: عَلِمَت نَفسٌ ما قَدَّمَت وَأَخَّرَت
blank: ʿalimat nafs mā qaddamat w-ʾakhkharat
english_saheeh_international: A soul will then know what it has put forth and kept back

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الإِنسانُ ما غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الكَريمِ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhāl-ʾinsān mā gharrak b-rabbikal-karīm
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
blank: alladhī khalaqak f-sawwāk f-ʿadalak
english_saheeh_international: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you

arabic_uthmani: في أَيِّ صورَةٍ ما شاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
blank: fī ʾayy ṣūrat mā shāʾ rakkabak
english_saheeh_international: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا بَل تُكَذِّبونَ بِالدّينِ
blank: kallā bal tukadhdhibūn b-d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: No! But you deny the Recompense

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ عَلَيكُم لَحافِظينَ
blank: w-ʾinn ʿalaykum l-ḥāfiẓīn
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, appointed over you are keepers

arabic_uthmani: كِرامًا كاتِبينَ
blank: kirām kātibīn
english_saheeh_international: Noble and recording

arabic_uthmani: يَعلَمونَ ما تَفعَلونَ
blank: yaʿlamūn mā tafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: They know whatever you do

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الأَبرارَ لَفي نَعيمٍ
blank: ʾinnal-ʾabrār l-fī naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ الفُجّارَ لَفي جَحيمٍ
blank: w-ʾinnal-fujjār l-fī jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: يَصلَونَها يَومَ الدّينِ
blank: yaṣlawnahā yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: They will enter to burn therein on the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: وَما هُم عَنها بِغائِبينَ
blank: w-mā hum ʿanhā b-ghāʾibīn
english_saheeh_international: And never therefrom will they be absent

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ ما يَومُ الدّينِ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk mā yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ ما أَدراكَ ما يَومُ الدّينِ
blank: thumm mā ʾadrāk mā yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ لا تَملِكُ نَفسٌ لِنَفسٍ شَيئًا ۖ وَالأَمرُ يَومَئِذٍ لِلَّهِ
blank: yawm lā tamlik nafs l-nafs shayʾ w-l-ʾamr yawmaʾidh l-llāh
english_saheeh_international: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul power to do a thing; and the command, that Day, is entirely with Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَيلٌ لِلمُطَفِّفينَ
blank: wayl l-l-muṭaffifīn
english_saheeh_international: Woe to those who give less than due

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ إِذَا اكتالوا عَلَى النّاسِ يَستَوفونَ
blank: alladhīn ʾidhā ktālū ʿalā n-nās yastawfūn
english_saheeh_international: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا كالوهُم أَو وَزَنوهُم يُخسِرونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā kālūhum ʾaw wazanūhum yukhsirūn
english_saheeh_international: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss

arabic_uthmani: أَلا يَظُنُّ أُولٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَبعوثونَ
blank: ʾ-lā yaẓunn ʾulāʾik ʾannahum mabʿūthūn
english_saheeh_international: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

arabic_uthmani: لِيَومٍ عَظيمٍ
blank: l-yawm ʿaẓīm
english_saheeh_international: For a tremendous Day

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَقومُ النّاسُ لِرَبِّ العالَمينَ
blank: yawm yaqūm n-nās l-rabbil-ʿālamīn
english_saheeh_international: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا إِنَّ كِتابَ الفُجّارِ لَفي سِجّينٍ
blank: kallā ʾinn kitābal-fujjār l-fī sijjīn
english_saheeh_international: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ ما سِجّينٌ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk mā sijjīn
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is sijjeen

arabic_uthmani: كِتابٌ مَرقومٌ
blank: kitāb marqūm
english_saheeh_international: It is their destination recorded in a register inscribed

arabic_uthmani: وَيلٌ يَومَئِذٍ لِلمُكَذِّبينَ
blank: wayl yawmaʾidh l-l-mukadhdhibīn
english_saheeh_international: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

arabic_uthmani: الَّذينَ يُكَذِّبونَ بِيَومِ الدّينِ
blank: alladhīn yukadhdhibūn b-yawm d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: Who deny the Day of Recompense

arabic_uthmani: وَما يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلّا كُلُّ مُعتَدٍ أَثيمٍ
blank: w-mā yukadhdhib bihī ʾillā kull muʿtad ʾathīm
english_saheeh_international: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor

arabic_uthmani: إِذا تُتلىٰ عَلَيهِ آياتُنا قالَ أَساطيرُ الأَوَّلينَ
blank: ʾidhā tutlā ʿalayh ʾāyātunā qāl ʾasāṭīrul-ʾawwalīn
english_saheeh_international: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا ۖ بَل ۜ رانَ عَلىٰ قُلوبِهِم ما كانوا يَكسِبونَ
blank: kallā bal rān ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūn
english_saheeh_international: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا إِنَّهُم عَن رَبِّهِم يَومَئِذٍ لَمَحجوبونَ
blank: kallā ʾinnahum ʿ rabbihim yawmaʾidh l-maḥjūbūn
english_saheeh_international: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُم لَصالُو الجَحيمِ
blank: thumm ʾinnahum l-ṣālūl-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: Then indeed, they will enter and burn in Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ يُقالُ هٰذَا الَّذي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبونَ
blank: thumm yuqāl hādhālladhī kuntum bihī tukadhdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: Then it will be said to them, "This is what you used to deny

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا إِنَّ كِتابَ الأَبرارِ لَفي عِلِّيّينَ
blank: kallā ʾinn kitābal-ʾabrār l-fī ʿilliyyīn
english_saheeh_international: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ ما عِلِّيّونَ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk mā ʿilliyyūn
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun

arabic_uthmani: كِتابٌ مَرقومٌ
blank: kitāb marqūm
english_saheeh_international: It is their destination recorded in a register inscribed

arabic_uthmani: يَشهَدُهُ المُقَرَّبونَ
blank: yashhaduhul-muqarrabūn
english_saheeh_international: Which is witnessed by those brought near to Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الأَبرارَ لَفي نَعيمٍ
blank: ʾinnal-ʾabrār l-fī naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

arabic_uthmani: عَلَى الأَرائِكِ يَنظُرونَ
blank: ʿalāl-ʾarāʾik yanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: On adorned couches, observing

arabic_uthmani: تَعرِفُ في وُجوهِهِم نَضرَةَ النَّعيمِ
blank: taʿrif fī wujūhihim naḍrat n-naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure

arabic_uthmani: يُسقَونَ مِن رَحيقٍ مَختومٍ
blank: yusqawn m raḥīq makhtūm
english_saheeh_international: They will be given to drink pure wine which was sealed

arabic_uthmani: خِتامُهُ مِسكٌ ۚ وَفي ذٰلِكَ فَليَتَنافَسِ المُتَنافِسونَ
blank: khitāmuhū misk w-fī dhālik f-l-yatanāfasil-mutanāfisūn
english_saheeh_international: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete

arabic_uthmani: وَمِزاجُهُ مِن تَسنيمٍ
blank: w-mizājuhū m tasnīm
english_saheeh_international: And its mixture is of Tasneem

arabic_uthmani: عَينًا يَشرَبُ بِهَا المُقَرَّبونَ
blank: ʿayn yashrab bihāl-muqarrabūn
english_saheeh_international: A spring from which those near to Allah drink

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ أَجرَموا كانوا مِنَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا يَضحَكونَ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾajramū kānū minalladhīn ʾāmanū yaḍḥakūn
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا مَرّوا بِهِم يَتَغامَزونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā marrū bihim yataghāmazūn
english_saheeh_international: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا انقَلَبوا إِلىٰ أَهلِهِمُ انقَلَبوا فَكِهينَ
blank: w-ʾidhā nqalabū ʾilā ʾahlihim nqalabū fakihīn
english_saheeh_international: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا رَأَوهُم قالوا إِنَّ هٰؤُلاءِ لَضالّونَ
blank: w-ʾidhā raʾawhum qālū ʾinn hāʾulāʾ l-ḍāllūn
english_saheeh_international: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost

arabic_uthmani: وَما أُرسِلوا عَلَيهِم حافِظينَ
blank: w-mā ʾursilū ʿalayhim ḥāfizīn
english_saheeh_international: But they had not been sent as guardians over them

arabic_uthmani: فَاليَومَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا مِنَ الكُفّارِ يَضحَكونَ
blank: f-l-yawmalladhīn ʾāmanū minal-kuffār yaḍḥakūn
english_saheeh_international: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers

arabic_uthmani: عَلَى الأَرائِكِ يَنظُرونَ
blank: ʿalāl-ʾarāʾik yanẓurūn
english_saheeh_international: On adorned couches, observing

arabic_uthmani: هَل ثُوِّبَ الكُفّارُ ما كانوا يَفعَلونَ
blank: hal thuwwibal-kuffār mā kānū yafʿalūn
english_saheeh_international: Have the disbelievers not been rewarded this Day for what they used to do

arabic_uthmani: إِذَا السَّماءُ انشَقَّت
blank: ʾidhā s-samāʾ nshaqqat
english_saheeh_international: When the sky has split open

arabic_uthmani: وَأَذِنَت لِرَبِّها وَحُقَّت
blank: w-ʾadhinat l-rabbihā w-ḥuqqat
english_saheeh_international: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated to do so

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذَا الأَرضُ مُدَّت
blank: w-ʾidhāl-ʾarḍ muddat
english_saheeh_international: And when the earth has been extended

arabic_uthmani: وَأَلقَت ما فيها وَتَخَلَّت
blank: w-ʾalqat mā fīhā w-takhallat
english_saheeh_international: And has cast out that within it and relinquished it

arabic_uthmani: وَأَذِنَت لِرَبِّها وَحُقَّت
blank: w-ʾadhinat l-rabbihā w-ḥuqqat
english_saheeh_international: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated to do so

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيُّهَا الإِنسانُ إِنَّكَ كادِحٌ إِلىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدحًا فَمُلاقيهِ
blank: yā-ʾayyuhāl-ʾinsān ʾinnak kādiḥ ʾilā rabbik kadḥ f-mulāqīh
english_saheeh_international: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with great exertion and will meet it

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمّا مَن أوتِيَ كِتابَهُ بِيَمينِهِ
blank: f-ʾammā m ʾūtiy kitābahū b-yamīnihī
english_saheeh_international: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand

arabic_uthmani: فَسَوفَ يُحاسَبُ حِسابًا يَسيرًا
blank: f-sawf yuḥāsab ḥisāb yasīr
english_saheeh_international: He will be judged with an easy account

arabic_uthmani: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلىٰ أَهلِهِ مَسرورًا
blank: w-yanqalib ʾilā ʾahlihī masrūr
english_saheeh_international: And return to his people in happiness

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا مَن أوتِيَ كِتابَهُ وَراءَ ظَهرِهِ
blank: w-ʾammā m ʾūtiy kitābahū warāʾ ẓahrihī
english_saheeh_international: But as for he who is given his record behind his back

arabic_uthmani: فَسَوفَ يَدعو ثُبورًا
blank: f-sawf yadʿū thubūr
english_saheeh_international: He will cry out for destruction

arabic_uthmani: وَيَصلىٰ سَعيرًا
blank: w-yaṣlā saʿīr
english_saheeh_international: And enter to burn in a Blaze

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ كانَ في أَهلِهِ مَسرورًا
blank: ʾinnahū kān fī ʾahlihī masrūr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, he had once been among his people in happiness

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَن يَحورَ
blank: ʾinnahū ẓann ʾ l yaḥūr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, he had thought he would never return to Allah

arabic_uthmani: بَلىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كانَ بِهِ بَصيرًا
blank: balā ʾinn rabbahū kān bihī baṣīr
english_saheeh_international: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing

arabic_uthmani: فَلا أُقسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
blank: f-lā ʾuqsim b-sh-shafaq
english_saheeh_international: So I swear by the twilight glow

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّيلِ وَما وَسَقَ
blank: w-l-layl w-mā wasaq
english_saheeh_international: And by the night and what it envelops

arabic_uthmani: وَالقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
blank: w-l-qamar ʾidhā ttasaq
english_saheeh_international: And by the moon when it becomes full

arabic_uthmani: لَتَركَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
blank: l-tarkabunn ṭabaq ʿ ṭabaq
english_saheeh_international: That you will surely experience state after state

arabic_uthmani: فَما لَهُم لا يُؤمِنونَ
blank: f-mā lahum lā yuʾminūn
english_saheeh_international: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe

arabic_uthmani: وَإِذا قُرِئَ عَلَيهِمُ القُرآنُ لا يَسجُدونَ ۩
blank: w-ʾidhā quriʾ ʿalayhimul-qurʾān lā yasjudūn
english_saheeh_international: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate to Allah

arabic_uthmani: بَلِ الَّذينَ كَفَروا يُكَذِّبونَ
blank: balilladhīn kafarū yukadhdhibūn
english_saheeh_international: But those who have disbelieved deny

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّهُ أَعلَمُ بِما يوعونَ
blank: w-llāh ʾaʿlam b-mā yūʿūn
english_saheeh_international: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves

arabic_uthmani: فَبَشِّرهُم بِعَذابٍ أَليمٍ
blank: f-bashshirhum b-ʿadhāb ʾalīm
english_saheeh_international: So give them tidings of a painful punishment

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ لَهُم أَجرٌ غَيرُ مَمنونٍ
blank: ʾillālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt lahum ʾajr ghayr mamnūn
english_saheeh_international: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted

arabic_uthmani: وَالسَّماءِ ذاتِ البُروجِ
blank: w-s-samāʾ dhātil-burūj
english_saheeh_international: By the sky containing great stars

arabic_uthmani: وَاليَومِ المَوعودِ
blank: w-l-yawmil-mawʿūd
english_saheeh_international: And by the promised Day

arabic_uthmani: وَشاهِدٍ وَمَشهودٍ
blank: w-shāhid w-mashhūd
english_saheeh_international: And by the witness and what is witnessed

arabic_uthmani: قُتِلَ أَصحابُ الأُخدودِ
blank: qutil ʾaṣḥābul-ʾukhdūd
english_saheeh_international: Cursed were the companions of the trench

arabic_uthmani: النّارِ ذاتِ الوَقودِ
blank: -nār dhātil-waqūd
english_saheeh_international: Containing the fire full of fuel

arabic_uthmani: إِذ هُم عَلَيها قُعودٌ
blank: ʾidh hum ʿalayhā quʿūd
english_saheeh_international: When they were sitting near it

arabic_uthmani: وَهُم عَلىٰ ما يَفعَلونَ بِالمُؤمِنينَ شُهودٌ
blank: w-hum ʿalā mā yafʿalūn b-l-muʾminīn shuhūd
english_saheeh_international: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses

arabic_uthmani: وَما نَقَموا مِنهُم إِلّا أَن يُؤمِنوا بِاللَّهِ العَزيزِ الحَميدِ
blank: w-mā naqamū minhum ʾillā ʾ yuʾminū b-llāhil-ʿazīzil-ḥamīd
english_saheeh_international: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي لَهُ مُلكُ السَّماواتِ وَالأَرضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلىٰ كُلِّ شَيءٍ شَهيدٌ
blank: alladhī lahū mulk s-samāwāt w-l-ʾarḍ w-llāh ʿalā kull shayʾ shahīd
english_saheeh_international: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ فَتَنُوا المُؤمِنينَ وَالمُؤمِناتِ ثُمَّ لَم يَتوبوا فَلَهُم عَذابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُم عَذابُ الحَريقِ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn fatanūl-muʾminīn w-l-muʾmināt thumm lam yatūbū f-lahum ʿadhāb jahannam w-lahum ʿadhābul-ḥarīq
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire

english_saheeh_international: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank

arabic_uthmani: وَجِيءَ يَومَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَومَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الإِنسانُ وَأَنّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكرىٰ
blank: w-jīʾ yawmaʾidh b-jahannam yawmaʾidh yatadhakkarul-ʾinsān w-ʾannā lah dh-dhikrā
english_saheeh_international: And brought within view, that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance

arabic_uthmani: يَقولُ يا لَيتَني قَدَّمتُ لِحَياتي
blank: yaqūl yā-laytanī qaddamt l-ḥayātī
english_saheeh_international: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead some good for my life

arabic_uthmani: فَيَومَئِذٍ لا يُعَذِّبُ عَذابَهُ أَحَدٌ
blank: f-yawmaʾidh lā yuʿadhdhib ʿadhābahū ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: So on that Day, none will punish as severely as His punishment

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يوثِقُ وَثاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
blank: w-lā yūthiq wathāqahū ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: And none will bind as severely as His binding of the evildoers

arabic_uthmani: يا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفسُ المُطمَئِنَّةُ
blank: yā-ʾayyatuhā n-nafsul-muṭmaʾinnat
english_saheeh_international: To the righteous it will be said, "O reassured soul

arabic_uthmani: ارجِعي إِلىٰ رَبِّكِ راضِيَةً مَرضِيَّةً
blank: irjiʿī ʾilā rabbik rāḍiyatam-marḍiyyat
english_saheeh_international: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing to Him

arabic_uthmani: فَادخُلي في عِبادي
blank: f-dkhulī fī ʿibādī
english_saheeh_international: And enter among My righteous servants

arabic_uthmani: وَادخُلي جَنَّتي
blank: w-dkhulī jannatī
english_saheeh_international: And enter My Paradise

arabic_uthmani: لا أُقسِمُ بِهٰذَا البَلَدِ
blank: lā ʾuqsim b-hādhāl-balad
english_saheeh_international: I swear by this city, Makkah

arabic_uthmani: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهٰذَا البَلَدِ
blank: w-ʾant ḥill b-hādhāl-balad
english_saheeh_international: And you, O Muhammad, are free of restriction in this city

arabic_uthmani: وَوالِدٍ وَما وَلَدَ
blank: w-wālid w-mā walad
english_saheeh_international: And by the father and that which was born of him

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد خَلَقنَا الإِنسانَ في كَبَدٍ
blank: l-qad khalaqnāl-ʾinsān fī kabad
english_saheeh_international: We have certainly created man into hardship

arabic_uthmani: أَيَحسَبُ أَن لَن يَقدِرَ عَلَيهِ أَحَدٌ
blank: ʾ-yaḥsab ʾ l yaqdir ʿalayh ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him

arabic_uthmani: يَقولُ أَهلَكتُ مالًا لُبَدًا
blank: yaqūl ʾahlakt māl lubad
english_saheeh_international: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance

arabic_uthmani: أَيَحسَبُ أَن لَم يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
blank: ʾ-yaḥsab ʾ lam yarahū ʾaḥad
english_saheeh_international: Does he think that no one has seen him

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم نَجعَل لَهُ عَينَينِ
blank: ʾ-lam najʿal lahū ʿaynayn
english_saheeh_international: Have We not made for him two eyes

arabic_uthmani: وَلِسانًا وَشَفَتَينِ
blank: w-lisān w-shafatayn
english_saheeh_international: And a tongue and two lips

arabic_uthmani: وَهَدَيناهُ النَّجدَينِ
blank: w-hadaynāh n-najdayn
english_saheeh_international: And have shown him the two ways

arabic_uthmani: فَلَا اقتَحَمَ العَقَبَةَ
blank: f-lā qtaḥamal-ʿaqabat
english_saheeh_international: But he has not broken through the difficult pass

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ مَا العَقَبَةُ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk māl-ʿaqabat
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is breaking through the difficult pass

arabic_uthmani: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
blank: fakk raqabat
english_saheeh_international: It is the freeing of a slave

arabic_uthmani: أَو إِطعامٌ في يَومٍ ذي مَسغَبَةٍ
blank: ʾaw ʾiṭʿām fī yawm dhī masghabat
english_saheeh_international: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

arabic_uthmani: يَتيمًا ذا مَقرَبَةٍ
blank: yatīm dhā maqrabat
english_saheeh_international: An orphan of near relationship

arabic_uthmani: أَو مِسكينًا ذا مَترَبَةٍ
blank: ʾaw miskīn dhā matrabat
english_saheeh_international: Or a needy person in misery

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ كانَ مِنَ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَتَواصَوا بِالصَّبرِ وَتَواصَوا بِالمَرحَمَةِ
blank: thumm kān minalladhīn ʾāmanū w-tawāṣaw b-ṣ-ṣabr w-tawāṣaw b-l-marḥamat
english_saheeh_international: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion

arabic_uthmani: أُولٰئِكَ أَصحابُ المَيمَنَةِ
blank: ʾulāʾik ʾaṣḥābul-maymanat
english_saheeh_international: Those are the companions of the right

arabic_uthmani: وَالَّذينَ كَفَروا بِآياتِنا هُم أَصحابُ المَشأَمَةِ
blank: w-lladhīn kafarū b-ʾāyātinā hum ʾaṣḥābul-mashʾamat
english_saheeh_international: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left

arabic_uthmani: عَلَيهِم نارٌ مُؤصَدَةٌ
blank: ʿalayhim nār muʾṣadat
english_saheeh_international: Over them will be fire closed in

arabic_uthmani: وَالشَّمسِ وَضُحاها
blank: w-sh-shams w-ḍuḥāhā
english_saheeh_international: By the sun and its brightness

arabic_uthmani: وَالقَمَرِ إِذا تَلاها
blank: w-l-qamar ʾidhā talāhā
english_saheeh_international: And by the moon when it follows it

arabic_uthmani: وَالنَّهارِ إِذا جَلّاها
blank: w-n-nahār ʾidhā jallāhā
english_saheeh_international: And by the day when it displays it

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّيلِ إِذا يَغشاها
blank: w-l-layl ʾidhā yaghshāhā
english_saheeh_international: And by the night when it covers it

arabic_uthmani: وَالسَّماءِ وَما بَناها
blank: w-s-samāʾ w-mā banāhā
english_saheeh_international: And by the sky and He who constructed it

arabic_uthmani: وَالأَرضِ وَما طَحاها
blank: w-l-ʾarḍ w-mā ṭaḥāhā
english_saheeh_international: And by the earth and He who spread it

arabic_uthmani: وَنَفسٍ وَما سَوّاها
blank: w-nafs w-mā sawwāhā
english_saheeh_international: And by the soul and He who proportioned it

arabic_uthmani: فَأَلهَمَها فُجورَها وَتَقواها
blank: f-ʾalhamahā fujūrahā w-taqwāhā
english_saheeh_international: And inspired it with discernment of its wickedness and its righteousness

arabic_uthmani: قَد أَفلَحَ مَن زَكّاها
blank: qad ʾaflaḥ m zakkāhā
english_saheeh_international: He has succeeded who purifies it

arabic_uthmani: وَقَد خابَ مَن دَسّاها
blank: w-qad khāb m dassāhā
english_saheeh_international: And he has failed who instills it with corruption

arabic_uthmani: كَذَّبَت ثَمودُ بِطَغواها
blank: kadhdhabat thamūd b-ṭaghwāhā
english_saheeh_international: Thamud denied their prophet by reason of their transgression

arabic_uthmani: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشقاها
blank: ʾidh nbaʿath ʾashqāhā
english_saheeh_international: When the most wretched of them was sent forth

arabic_uthmani: فَقالَ لَهُم رَسولُ اللَّهِ ناقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقياها
blank: f-qāl lahum rasūl llāh nāqat llāh w-suqyāhā
english_saheeh_international: And the messenger of Allah Salih said to them, "Do not harm the she-camel of Allah or prevent her from her drink

arabic_uthmani: فَكَذَّبوهُ فَعَقَروها فَدَمدَمَ عَلَيهِم رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِم فَسَوّاها
blank: f-kadhdhabūh f-ʿaqarūhā f-damdam ʿalayhim rabbuhum b-dhanbihim f-sawwāhā
english_saheeh_international: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal upon all of them

arabic_uthmani: وَلا يَخافُ عُقباها
blank: w-lā yakhāf ʿuqbāhā
english_saheeh_international: And He does not fear the consequence thereof

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّيلِ إِذا يَغشىٰ
blank: w-l-layl ʾidhā yaghshā
english_saheeh_international: By the night when it covers

arabic_uthmani: وَالنَّهارِ إِذا تَجَلّىٰ
blank: w-n-nahār ʾidhā tajallā
english_saheeh_international: And by the day when it appears

arabic_uthmani: وَما خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالأُنثىٰ
blank: w-mā khalaq dh-dhakar w-l-ʾunthā
english_saheeh_international: And by He who created the male and female

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ سَعيَكُم لَشَتّىٰ
blank: ʾinn saʿyakum l-shattā
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, your efforts are diverse

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمّا مَن أَعطىٰ وَاتَّقىٰ
blank: f-ʾammā m ʾaʿṭā w-ttaqā
english_saheeh_international: As for he who gives and fears Allah

arabic_uthmani: وَصَدَّقَ بِالحُسنىٰ
blank: w-ṣaddaq b-l-ḥusnā
english_saheeh_international: And believes in the best reward

arabic_uthmani: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِليُسرىٰ
blank: f-s-nuyassiruhū l-l-yusrā
english_saheeh_international: We will ease him toward ease

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاستَغنىٰ
blank: w-ʾammā m bakhil w-staghnā
english_saheeh_international: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

arabic_uthmani: وَكَذَّبَ بِالحُسنىٰ
blank: w-kadhdhab b-l-ḥusnā
english_saheeh_international: And denies the best reward

arabic_uthmani: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلعُسرىٰ
blank: f-s-nuyassiruhū l-l-ʿusrā
english_saheeh_international: We will ease him toward difficulty

arabic_uthmani: وَما يُغني عَنهُ مالُهُ إِذا تَرَدّىٰ
blank: w-mā yughnī ʿanh māluhū ʾidhā taraddā
english_saheeh_international: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ عَلَينا لَلهُدىٰ
blank: ʾinn ʿalaynā l-l-hudā
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, incumbent upon Us is guidance

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لَنا لَلآخِرَةَ وَالأولىٰ
blank: w-ʾinnā lanā l-l-ʾākhirat w-l-ʾūlā
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first life

arabic_uthmani: فَأَنذَرتُكُم نارًا تَلَظّىٰ
blank: f-ʾandhartukum nār talaẓẓā
english_saheeh_international: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing

arabic_uthmani: لا يَصلاها إِلَّا الأَشقَى
blank: lā yaṣlāhā ʾillāl-ʾashqā
english_saheeh_international: None will enter to burn therein except the most wretched one

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلّىٰ
blank: alladhī kadhdhab w-tawallā
english_saheeh_international: Who had denied and turned away

arabic_uthmani: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الأَتقَى
blank: w-s-yujannabuhāl-ʾatqā
english_saheeh_international: But the righteous one will avoid it

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي يُؤتي مالَهُ يَتَزَكّىٰ
blank: alladhī yuʾtī mālahū yatazakkā
english_saheeh_international: He who gives from his wealth to purify himself

arabic_uthmani: وَما لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِعمَةٍ تُجزىٰ
blank: w-mā l-ʾaḥad ʿindahū m niʿmat tujzā
english_saheeh_international: And not giving for anyone who has done him a favor to be rewarded

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا ابتِغاءَ وَجهِ رَبِّهِ الأَعلىٰ
blank: ʾillā btighāʾ wajh rabbihil-ʾaʿlā
english_saheeh_international: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High

arabic_uthmani: وَلَسَوفَ يَرضىٰ
blank: w-l-sawf yarḍā
english_saheeh_international: And he is going to be satisfied

arabic_uthmani: وَالضُّحىٰ
blank: w-ḍ-ḍuḥā
english_saheeh_international: By the morning brightness

arabic_uthmani: وَاللَّيلِ إِذا سَجىٰ
blank: w-l-layl ʾidhā sajā
english_saheeh_international: And by the night when it covers with darkness

arabic_uthmani: ما وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَما قَلىٰ
blank: mā waddaʿak rabbuk w-mā qalā
english_saheeh_international: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, O Muhammad, nor has He detested you

arabic_uthmani: وَلَلآخِرَةُ خَيرٌ لَكَ مِنَ الأولىٰ
blank: w-l-l-ʾākhirat khayr lak minal-ʾūlā
english_saheeh_international: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first life

arabic_uthmani: وَلَسَوفَ يُعطيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرضىٰ
blank: w-l-sawf yuʿṭīk rabbuk f-tarḍā
english_saheeh_international: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَجِدكَ يَتيمًا فَآوىٰ
blank: ʾ-lam yajidk yatīm f-ʾāwā
english_saheeh_international: Did He not find you an orphan and give you refuge

arabic_uthmani: وَوَجَدَكَ ضالًّا فَهَدىٰ
blank: w-wajadak ḍāll f-hadā
english_saheeh_international: And He found you lost and guided you

arabic_uthmani: وَوَجَدَكَ عائِلًا فَأَغنىٰ
blank: w-wajadak ʿāʾil f-ʾaghnā
english_saheeh_international: And He found you poor and made you self-sufficient

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمَّا اليَتيمَ فَلا تَقهَر
blank: f-ʾammāl-yatīm f-lā taqhar
english_saheeh_international: So as for the orphan, do not oppress him

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمَّا السّائِلَ فَلا تَنهَر
blank: w-ʾammā s-sāʾil f-lā tanhar
english_saheeh_international: And as for the petitioner, do not repel him

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا بِنِعمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّث
blank: w-ʾammā b-niʿmat rabbik f-ḥaddith
english_saheeh_international: But as for the favor of your Lord, report it

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم نَشرَح لَكَ صَدرَكَ
blank: ʾ-lam nashraḥ lak ṣadrak
english_saheeh_international: Did We not expand for you, O Muhammad, your breast

arabic_uthmani: وَوَضَعنا عَنكَ وِزرَكَ
blank: w-waḍaʿnā ʿank wizrak
english_saheeh_international: And We removed from you your burden

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي أَنقَضَ ظَهرَكَ
blank: alladhī ʾanqaḍ ẓahrak
english_saheeh_international: Which had weighed upon your back

arabic_uthmani: وَرَفَعنا لَكَ ذِكرَكَ
blank: w-rafaʿnā lak dhikrak
english_saheeh_international: And raised high for you your repute

arabic_uthmani: فَإِنَّ مَعَ العُسرِ يُسرًا
blank: f-ʾinn maʿal-ʿusr yusr
english_saheeh_international: For indeed, with hardship will be ease

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ مَعَ العُسرِ يُسرًا
blank: ʾinn maʿal-ʿusr yusr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, with hardship will be ease

arabic_uthmani: فَإِذا فَرَغتَ فَانصَب
blank: f-ʾidhā faraght f-nṣab
english_saheeh_international: So when you have finished your duties, then stand up for worship

arabic_uthmani: وَإِلىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارغَب
blank: w-ʾilā rabbik f-rghab
english_saheeh_international: And to your Lord direct your longing

arabic_uthmani: وَالتّينِ وَالزَّيتونِ
blank: w-t-tīn w-z-zaytūn
english_saheeh_international: By the fig and the olive

arabic_uthmani: وَطورِ سينينَ
blank: w-ṭūr sīnīn
english_saheeh_international: And by Mount Sinai

arabic_uthmani: وَهٰذَا البَلَدِ الأَمينِ
blank: w-hādhāl-baladil-ʾamīn
english_saheeh_international: And by this secure city Makkah

arabic_uthmani: لَقَد خَلَقنَا الإِنسانَ في أَحسَنِ تَقويمٍ
blank: l-qad khalaqnāl-ʾinsān fī ʾaḥsan taqwīm
english_saheeh_international: We have certainly created man in the best of stature

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ رَدَدناهُ أَسفَلَ سافِلينَ
blank: thumm radadnāh ʾasfal sāfilīn
english_saheeh_international: Then We return him to the lowest of the low

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ فَلَهُم أَجرٌ غَيرُ مَمنونٍ
blank: ʾillālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt f-lahum ʾajr ghayr mamnūn
english_saheeh_international: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted

arabic_uthmani: فَما يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعدُ بِالدّينِ
blank: f-mā yukadhdhibuk baʿd b-d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense

arabic_uthmani: أَلَيسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحكَمِ الحاكِمينَ
blank: ʾ-lays llāh b-ʾaḥkamil-ḥākimīn
english_saheeh_international: Is not Allah the most just of judges

arabic_uthmani: اقرَأ بِاسمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذي خَلَقَ
blank: iqraʾ bism rabbikalladhī khalaq
english_saheeh_international: Recite in the name of your Lord who created

arabic_uthmani: خَلَقَ الإِنسانَ مِن عَلَقٍ
blank: khalaqal-ʾinsān m ʿalaq-
english_saheeh_international: Created man from a clinging substance

arabic_uthmani: اقرَأ وَرَبُّكَ الأَكرَمُ
blank: iqraʾ w-rabbukal-ʾakram
english_saheeh_international: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي عَلَّمَ بِالقَلَمِ
blank: alladhī ʿallam b-l-qalam
english_saheeh_international: Who taught by the pen

arabic_uthmani: عَلَّمَ الإِنسانَ ما لَم يَعلَم
blank: ʿallamal-ʾinsān mā lam yaʿlam
english_saheeh_international: Taught man that which he knew not

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا إِنَّ الإِنسانَ لَيَطغىٰ
blank: kallā ʾinnal-ʾinsān l-yaṭghā
english_saheeh_international: No! But indeed, man transgresses

arabic_uthmani: أَن رَآهُ استَغنىٰ
blank: arraʾāhu staghna
english_saheeh_international: Because he sees himself self-sufficient

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ إِلىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجعىٰ
blank: ʾinn ʾilā rabbik r-rujʿā
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, to your Lord is the return

arabic_uthmani: أَرَأَيتَ الَّذي يَنهىٰ
blank: ʾ-raʾaytalladhī yanhā
english_saheeh_international: Have you seen the one who forbids

arabic_uthmani: عَبدًا إِذا صَلّىٰ
blank: ʿabd ʾidhā ṣallā
english_saheeh_international: A servant when he prays

arabic_uthmani: أَرَأَيتَ إِن كانَ عَلَى الهُدىٰ
blank: ʾ-raʾayt ʾ kān ʿalāl-hudā
english_saheeh_international: Have you seen if he is upon guidance

arabic_uthmani: أَو أَمَرَ بِالتَّقوىٰ
blank: ʾaw ʾamar b-t-taqwā
english_saheeh_international: Or enjoins righteousness

arabic_uthmani: أَرَأَيتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلّىٰ
blank: ʾ-raʾayt ʾ kadhdhab w-tawallā
english_saheeh_international: Have you seen if he denies and turns away

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَعلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرىٰ
blank: alam yaʿlam biʾan-nallāha yarā
english_saheeh_international: Does he not know that Allah sees

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا لَئِن لَم يَنتَهِ لَنَسفَعًا بِالنّاصِيَةِ
blank: kallā laʾil-lam yantahi la-nasfaʿan bin-nāṣiya
english_saheeh_international: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock

arabic_uthmani: ناصِيَةٍ كاذِبَةٍ خاطِئَةٍ
blank: nāṣiyat kādhibat khāṭiʾat
english_saheeh_international: A lying, sinning forelock

arabic_uthmani: فَليَدعُ نادِيَهُ
blank: f-l-yadʿ nādiyahū
english_saheeh_international: Then let him call his associates

arabic_uthmani: سَنَدعُ الزَّبانِيَةَ
blank: sa-nadʿuz-zabāniya
english_saheeh_international: We will call the angels of Hell

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا لا تُطِعهُ وَاسجُد وَاقتَرِب ۩
blank: kallā lā tuṭiʿhu wasjud waqtarib
english_saheeh_international: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near to Allah

arabic_uthmani: إِنّا أَنزَلناهُ في لَيلَةِ القَدرِ
blank: ʾinnā ʾanzalnāh fī laylatil-qadr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ ما لَيلَةُ القَدرِ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk mā laylatul-qadr
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree

arabic_uthmani: لَيلَةُ القَدرِ خَيرٌ مِن أَلفِ شَهرٍ
blank: laylatul-qadr khayr m ʾalf shahr
english_saheeh_international: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months

arabic_uthmani: تَنَزَّلُ المَلائِكَةُ وَالرّوحُ فيها بِإِذنِ رَبِّهِم مِن كُلِّ أَمرٍ
blank: tanazzalul-malāʾikat w-r-rūḥ fīhā b-ʾidhn rabbihim m kull ʾamr
english_saheeh_international: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter

arabic_uthmani: سَلامٌ هِيَ حَتّىٰ مَطلَعِ الفَجرِ
blank: salām hiy ḥattā maṭlaʿil-fajr
english_saheeh_international: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn

arabic_uthmani: لَم يَكُنِ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِن أَهلِ الكِتابِ وَالمُشرِكينَ مُنفَكّينَ حَتّىٰ تَأتِيَهُمُ البَيِّنَةُ
blank: lam yakunilladhīn kafarū m ʾahlil-kitāb w-l-mushrikīn munfakkīn ḥattā taʾtiyahumul-bayyinat
english_saheeh_international: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted from misbelief until there came to them clear evidence

arabic_uthmani: رَسولٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ يَتلو صُحُفًا مُطَهَّرَةً
blank: rasūl min llāh yatlū ṣuḥufam-muṭahharat
english_saheeh_international: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures

arabic_uthmani: فيها كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
blank: fīhā kutub qayyimat
english_saheeh_international: Within which are correct writings

arabic_uthmani: وَما تَفَرَّقَ الَّذينَ أوتُوا الكِتابَ إِلّا مِن بَعدِ ما جاءَتهُمُ البَيِّنَةُ
blank: w-mā tafarraqalladhīn ʾūtūl-kitāb ʾillā m baʿd mā jāʾathumul-bayyinat
english_saheeh_international: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence

arabic_uthmani: وَما أُمِروا إِلّا لِيَعبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخلِصينَ لَهُ الدّينَ حُنَفاءَ وَيُقيمُوا الصَّلاةَ وَيُؤتُوا الزَّكاةَ ۚ وَذٰلِكَ دينُ القَيِّمَةِ
blank: w-mā ʾumirū ʾillā l-yaʿbudū llāh mukhliṣīn lah d-dīn ḥunafāʾ w-yuqīmū ṣ-ṣalāt w-yuʾtū z-zakāt w-dhālik dīnul-qayyimat
english_saheeh_international: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, being sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ كَفَروا مِن أَهلِ الكِتابِ وَالمُشرِكينَ في نارِ جَهَنَّمَ خالِدينَ فيها ۚ أُولٰئِكَ هُم شَرُّ البَرِيَّةِ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn kafarū m ʾahlil-kitāb w-l-mushrikīn fī nār jahannam khālidīn fīhā ʾulāʾik hum sharrul-bariyyat
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ أُولٰئِكَ هُم خَيرُ البَرِيَّةِ
blank: ʾinnalladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt ʾulāʾik hum khayrul-bariyyat
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures

arabic_uthmani: جَزاؤُهُم عِندَ رَبِّهِم جَنّاتُ عَدنٍ تَجري مِن تَحتِهَا الأَنهارُ خالِدينَ فيها أَبَدًا ۖ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنهُم وَرَضوا عَنهُ ۚ ذٰلِكَ لِمَن خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
blank: jazāʾuhum ʿind rabbihim jannāt ʿadn tajrī m taḥtihāl-ʾanhār khālidīn fīhā ʾabad raḍiy llāh ʿanhum w-raḍū ʿanh dhālik l-m khashiy rabbahū
english_saheeh_international: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord

arabic_uthmani: إِذا زُلزِلَتِ الأَرضُ زِلزالَها
blank: ʾidhā zulzilatil-ʾarḍ zilzālahā
english_saheeh_international: When the earth is shaken with its final earthquake

arabic_uthmani: وَأَخرَجَتِ الأَرضُ أَثقالَها
blank: w-ʾakhrajatil-ʾarḍ ʾathqālahā
english_saheeh_international: And the earth discharges its burdens

arabic_uthmani: وَقالَ الإِنسانُ ما لَها
blank: w-qālal-ʾinsān mā lahā
english_saheeh_international: And man says, "What is wrong with it

arabic_uthmani: يَومَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخبارَها
blank: yawmaʾidh tuḥaddith ʾakhbārahā
english_saheeh_international: That Day, it will report its news

arabic_uthmani: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوحىٰ لَها
blank: b-ʾann rabbak ʾawḥā lahā
english_saheeh_international: Because your Lord has commanded it

arabic_uthmani: يَومَئِذٍ يَصدُرُ النّاسُ أَشتاتًا لِيُرَوا أَعمالَهُم
blank: yawmaʾidh yaṣdur n-nās ʾashtāt l-yuraw ʾaʿmālahum
english_saheeh_international: That Day, the people will depart separated into categories to be shown the result of their deeds

arabic_uthmani: فَمَن يَعمَل مِثقالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيرًا يَرَهُ
blank: f-m yaʿmal mithqāl dharrat khayr yarahū
english_saheeh_international: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it

arabic_uthmani: وَمَن يَعمَل مِثقالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
blank: w-m yaʿmal mithqāl dharrat sharr yarahū
english_saheeh_international: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it

arabic_uthmani: وَالعادِياتِ ضَبحًا
blank: w-l-ʿādiyāt ḍabḥ
english_saheeh_international: By the racers, panting

arabic_uthmani: فَالمورِياتِ قَدحًا
blank: f-l-mūriyāt qadḥ
english_saheeh_international: And the producers of sparks when striking

arabic_uthmani: فَالمُغيراتِ صُبحًا
blank: f-l-mughīrāt ṣubḥ
english_saheeh_international: And the chargers at dawn

arabic_uthmani: فَأَثَرنَ بِهِ نَقعًا
blank: f-ʾatharn bihī naqʿ
english_saheeh_international: Stirring up thereby clouds of dust

arabic_uthmani: فَوَسَطنَ بِهِ جَمعًا
blank: f-wasaṭn bihī jamʿ
english_saheeh_international: Arriving thereby in the center collectively

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الإِنسانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنودٌ
blank: ʾinnal-ʾinsān l-rabbihī l-kanūd
english_saheeh_international: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ عَلىٰ ذٰلِكَ لَشَهيدٌ
blank: w-ʾinnahū ʿalā dhālik l-shahīd
english_saheeh_international: And indeed, he is to that a witness

arabic_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الخَيرِ لَشَديدٌ
blank: w-ʾinnahū l-ḥubbil-khayr l-shadīd
english_saheeh_international: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense

arabic_uthmani: ۞ أَفَلا يَعلَمُ إِذا بُعثِرَ ما فِي القُبورِ
blank: ʾ-f-lā yaʿlam ʾidhā buʿthir mā fīl-qubūr
english_saheeh_international: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered

arabic_uthmani: وَحُصِّلَ ما فِي الصُّدورِ
blank: w-ḥuṣṣil mā fī ṣ-ṣudūr
english_saheeh_international: And that within the breasts is obtained

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِم يَومَئِذٍ لَخَبيرٌ
blank: ʾinn rabbahum bihim yawmaʾidh l-khabīr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is fully Acquainted

arabic_uthmani: القارِعَةُ
blank: al-qāriʿat
english_saheeh_international: The Striking Calamity

arabic_uthmani: مَا القارِعَةُ
blank: māl-qāriʿat
english_saheeh_international: What is the Striking Calamity

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ مَا القارِعَةُ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk māl-qāriʿat
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity

arabic_uthmani: يَومَ يَكونُ النّاسُ كَالفَراشِ المَبثوثِ
blank: yawm yakūn n-nās k-l-farāshil-mabthūth
english_saheeh_international: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed

arabic_uthmani: وَتَكونُ الجِبالُ كَالعِهنِ المَنفوشِ
blank: w-takūnul-jibāl k-l-ʿihnil-manfūsh
english_saheeh_international: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up

arabic_uthmani: فَأَمّا مَن ثَقُلَت مَوازينُهُ
blank: f-ʾammā m thaqulat mawāzīnuhū
english_saheeh_international: Then as for one whose scales are heavy with good deeds

arabic_uthmani: فَهُوَ في عيشَةٍ راضِيَةٍ
blank: f-huw fī ʿīshat rāḍiyat
english_saheeh_international: He will be in a pleasant life

arabic_uthmani: وَأَمّا مَن خَفَّت مَوازينُهُ
blank: w-ʾammā m khaffat mawāzīnuhū
english_saheeh_international: But as for one whose scales are light

arabic_uthmani: فَأُمُّهُ هاوِيَةٌ
blank: f-ʾummuhū hāwiyat
english_saheeh_international: His refuge will be an abyss

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ ما هِيَه
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk mā hiyah
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what that is

arabic_uthmani: نارٌ حامِيَةٌ
blank: nār ḥāmiyat
english_saheeh_international: It is a Fire, intensely hot

arabic_uthmani: أَلهاكُمُ التَّكاثُرُ
blank: ʾalhākum t-takāthur
english_saheeh_international: Competition in worldly increase diverts you

arabic_uthmani: حَتّىٰ زُرتُمُ المَقابِرَ
blank: ḥattā zurtumul-maqābir
english_saheeh_international: Until you visit the graveyards

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا سَوفَ تَعلَمونَ
blank: kallā sawf taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: No! You are going to know

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ كَلّا سَوفَ تَعلَمونَ
blank: thumm kallā sawf taʿlamūn
english_saheeh_international: Then no! You are going to know

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا لَو تَعلَمونَ عِلمَ اليَقينِ
blank: kallā law taʿlamūn ʿilmal-yaqīn
english_saheeh_international: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty

arabic_uthmani: لَتَرَوُنَّ الجَحيمَ
blank: l-tarawunnal-jaḥīm
english_saheeh_international: You will surely see the Hellfire

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّها عَينَ اليَقينِ
blank: thumm l-tarawunnahā ʿaynal-yaqīn
english_saheeh_international: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty

arabic_uthmani: ثُمَّ لَتُسأَلُنَّ يَومَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعيمِ
blank: thumm l-tusʾalunn yawmaʾidh ʿan n-naʿīm
english_saheeh_international: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure

arabic_uthmani: وَالعَصرِ
blank: w-l-ʿaṣr
english_saheeh_international: By time

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّ الإِنسانَ لَفي خُسرٍ
blank: ʾinnal-ʾinsān l-fī khusr
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, mankind is in loss

arabic_uthmani: إِلَّا الَّذينَ آمَنوا وَعَمِلُوا الصّالِحاتِ وَتَواصَوا بِالحَقِّ وَتَواصَوا بِالصَّبرِ
blank: ʾillālladhīn ʾāmanū w-ʿamilū ṣ-ṣāliḥāt w-tawāṣaw b-l-ḥaqq w-tawāṣaw b-ṣ-ṣabr
english_saheeh_international: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience

arabic_uthmani: وَيلٌ لِكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُمَزَةٍ
blank: wayl l-kull humazat lumazat-
english_saheeh_international: Woe to every scorner and mocker

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي جَمَعَ مالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
blank: alladhī jamaʿ māl w-ʿaddadahū
english_saheeh_international: Who collects wealth and continuously counts it

arabic_uthmani: يَحسَبُ أَنَّ مالَهُ أَخلَدَهُ
blank: yaḥsab ʾann mālahū ʾakhladahū
english_saheeh_international: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal

arabic_uthmani: كَلّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الحُطَمَةِ
blank: kallā l-yunbadhann fīl-ḥuṭamat
english_saheeh_international: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher

arabic_uthmani: وَما أَدراكَ مَا الحُطَمَةُ
blank: w-mā ʾadrāk māl-ḥuṭamat
english_saheeh_international: And what can make you know what is the Crusher

arabic_uthmani: نارُ اللَّهِ الموقَدَةُ
blank: nār llāhil-mūqadat
english_saheeh_international: It is the fire of Allah, eternally fueled

arabic_uthmani: الَّتي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الأَفئِدَةِ
blank: allatī taṭṭaliʿ ʿalāl-ʾafʾidat
english_saheeh_international: Which mounts directed at the hearts

arabic_uthmani: إِنَّها عَلَيهِم مُؤصَدَةٌ
blank: ʾinnahā ʿalayhim muʾṣadat
english_saheeh_international: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them

arabic_uthmani: في عَمَدٍ مُمَدَّدَةٍ
blank: fī ʿamad mumaddadat
english_saheeh_international: In extended columns

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم تَرَ كَيفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصحابِ الفيلِ
blank: ʾ-lam tar kayf faʿal rabbuk b-ʾaṣḥābil-fīl
english_saheeh_international: Have you not considered, O Muhammad, how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant

arabic_uthmani: أَلَم يَجعَل كَيدَهُم في تَضليلٍ
blank: ʾ-lam yajʿal kaydahum fī taḍlīl
english_saheeh_international: Did He not make their plan into misguidance

arabic_uthmani: وَأَرسَلَ عَلَيهِم طَيرًا أَبابيلَ
blank: w-ʾarsal ʿalayhim ṭayr ʾabābīl
english_saheeh_international: And He sent against them birds in flocks

arabic_uthmani: تَرميهِم بِحِجارَةٍ مِن سِجّيلٍ
blank: tarmīhim b-ḥijārat m sijjīl
english_saheeh_international: Striking them with stones of hard clay

arabic_uthmani: فَجَعَلَهُم كَعَصفٍ مَأكولٍ
blank: f-jaʿalahum k-ʿaṣf maʾkūl
english_saheeh_international: And He made them like eaten straw

arabic_uthmani: لِإيلافِ قُرَيشٍ
blank: l-ʾīlāf quraysh
english_saheeh_international: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh

arabic_uthmani: إيلافِهِم رِحلَةَ الشِّتاءِ وَالصَّيفِ
blank: ʾīlāfihim riḥlat sh-shitāʾ w-ṣ-ṣayf
english_saheeh_international: Their accustomed security in the caravan of winter and summer

arabic_uthmani: فَليَعبُدوا رَبَّ هٰذَا البَيتِ
blank: f-l-yaʿbudū rabb hādhāl-bayt
english_saheeh_international: Let them worship the Lord of this House

arabic_uthmani: الَّذي أَطعَمَهُم مِن جوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِن خَوفٍ
blank: alladhī ʾaṭʿamahum m jūʿ w-ʾāmanahum m khawf
english_saheeh_international: Who has fed them, saving them from hunger and made them safe, saving them from fear

arabic_uthmani: أَرَأَيتَ الَّذي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدّينِ
blank: ʾ-raʾaytalladhī yukadhdhib b-d-dīn
english_saheeh_international: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense
